GS24pmbhasuu:889: aṇgrahaṇe sandehaḥ ke aṇaḥ iti . asandigdham pūrveṇa na pareṇa . kutaḥ etat . parābhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:890: . na hi ke pare aṇaḥ santi . nanu ca ayam asti . gokā naukā iti . evam tarhi sāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:891: pūrveṇa na pareṇa . yadi hi pareṇa syāt aṇgrahaṇam anarthakam syāt . ke acaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:892: eva brūyāt . atha vā etat api na brūyāt . acaḥ hi etat bhavati hrasvaḥ dīrghaḥ plutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:893: iti . asmin tarhi aṇgrahaṇe sandehaḥ aṇaḥ apragṛhyasya anunāsikaḥ iti . asandigdham
GS24pmbhasuu:894: pūrveṇa na pareṇa . kutaḥ etat . parābhāvāt . na hi padāntāḥ pare aṇaḥ santi . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:895: ca ayam asti kartṛ hartṛ iti . evam tarhi sāmarthyāt pūrveṇa na pareṇa . yadi hi
GS24pmbhasuu:896: pareṇa syāt aṇgrahaṇam anarthakam syāt .acaḥ apragṛhyasya anunāsikaḥ iti eva brūyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:897: . atha vā etat api na brūyāt . acaḥ eva hi pragṛhyāḥ bhavanti . asmin tarhi aṇgrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:898: sandehaḥ uḥ aṇ raparaḥ iti . asandigdham pūrveṇa na pareṇa . kutaḥ etat . parābhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:899: . na hi uḥ sthāne pare aṇaḥ santi . nanu ca ayam asti kartrartham hartrartham iti
GS24pmbhasuu:900: . kim ca syāt . yadi atra raparatvam syāt dvayoḥ rephayoḥ śravaṇam prasajyeta . halaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:901: yamām yami lopaḥ iti evam ekasya atra lopaḥ bhavati. vibhāṣā saḥ lopaḥ . vibhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:902: śravaṇam prasajyeta . ayam tarhi nityaḥ lopaḥ raḥ ri iti . padāntasya iti evam saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:903: . na śakyaḥ padāntasya vijñātum . iha hi lopaḥ na syāt jargṛdheḥ laṅ ajarghāḥ pāspardheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:904: apāspāḥ iti . iha tarhi mātṝṇām pitṝṇām iti raparatvam prasajyeta . ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:905: jñāpayati na atra raparatvam bhavati iti yat ayam ṝtaḥ it dhātoḥ iti dhātugrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:906: karoti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . dhātugrahaṇasya etat prayojanam . iha mā bhūt : mātṝṇām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:907: pitṝṇām iti . yadi ca atra raparatvam syāt dhātugrahaṇam anarthakam syāt . raparatve
GS24pmbhasuu:908: kṛte anantyatvāt ittvam na bhaviṣyati . paśyati tu ācāryaḥ na atra raparatvam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:909: iti tataḥ dhātugrahaṇam karoti . iha api tarhi ittvam na prāpnoti cikīrṣati jihīrṣati
GS24pmbhasuu:910: iti . mā bhūt evam . upadhāyāḥ ca iti evam bhaviṣyati . iha api tarhi prāpnoti mātṝṇām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:911: pitṝṇām iti . tasmāt tatra dhātugrahaṇam kartavyam . evam tarhi aṇgrahaṇasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:912: pūrveṇa na pareṇa . yadi pareṇa syāt aṇgrahaṇam anarthakam syāt . uḥ ac raparaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:913: eva brūyāt . asmin tarhi aṇgrahaṇe sandehaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:914: aṇuditsavarṇasya ca apratyayaḥ iti . asandigdham pareṇa na pūrveṇa iti. kutaḥ etat
GS24pmbhasuu:915: . savarṇe aṇ taparam hi uḥ ṛt . yat ayam uḥ ṛt iti ṛkāram taparam karoti tat jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:916: ācāryaḥ pareṇa na pūrveṇa . iṇgrahaṇeṣu tarhi sandehaḥ . asandigdham pareṇa na pūrveṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:917: iti. kutaḥ etat . yvoḥ anyatra pareṇa iṇ syāt . yatra icchati pūrveṇa sammṛdya grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:918: tatra karoti yvoḥ iti . tat ca guru bhavati . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . tatra vibhaktinirdeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:919: sammṛdya grahaṇe ardhacatasraḥ mātrāḥ . pratyāhāragrahaṇe punaḥ tisraḥ mātrāḥ . saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:920: ayam evam laghīyasā nyāsena siddhe sati yat garīyāṃsam yatnam ārabhate tat jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:921: ācāryaḥ pareṇa na pūrveṇa iti . kim punaḥ varṇotsattau iva ṇakāraḥ dviḥ anubadhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:922: . etat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati eṣā paribhāṣā vyākhyānataḥ viśeṣapratipattiḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:923: hi sandehāt alakṣaṇam iti. aṇuditsavarṇam parihāya pūrveṇa aṇgrahaṇam pareṇa iṇgrahaṇam iti vyākhyāsyāmaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:924: (Śs_7-8.1) KA_I,35.20-36.4 Ro_I,115-116 kimartham imau mukhanāsikāvacanau varṇau
GS24pmbhasuu:925: ubhau api anubadhyete na ñakāra eva anubadhyeta . katham yāni makāreṇa grahaṇāni
GS24pmbhasuu:926: halaḥ yamām yami lopaḥ iti . santu ñakāreṇa halaḥ yañām yañi lopaḥ iti . na evam
GS24pmbhasuu:927: śakyam. jhakārabhakāraparayoḥ api hi jhakārabhakāryoḥ lopaḥ prasajyeta . na jhakārabhakārau
GS24pmbhasuu:928: jhakārabhakārayoḥ staḥ . katham pumaḥ khayyi ampare iti . etat api astu ñakāreṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:929: pumaḥ khayyi añpare iti . na evam śakyam . jhakārabhakārapare hi khayyi ruḥ prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:930: . na jhakārabhakāraparaḥ khay asti .katham ṅamaḥ hrasvāt aci ṅamuṭ nityam iti . etat
GS24pmbhasuu:931: api astu ñakāreṇa ṅañaḥ hrasvāt aci ṅañuṭ nityam iti . na evam śakyam . jhakārabhakāraparayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:932: api hi padāntayoḥ jhakārabhakārau āgamau syātām . na jhakārabhakārau padāntau staḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:933: . evam api pañca āgamāḥ trayaḥ āgaminau vaiṣamyāt saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:934: santu tāvat yeṣām āgamānām āgaminaḥ santi . jhakārabhakārau padāntau na staḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:936: (Śs_7-8.2) KA_I,36.5-11 Ro_I,117 atha kim idam akṣaram iti . akṣaram na kṣaram vidyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:937: . na kṣīyate na kṣarati iti vā akṣaram . aśnoteḥ vā saraḥ akṣaram . aśnoteḥ vā punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:938: ayam auṇādikaḥ saranpratyayaḥ . varṇam vā āhuḥ pūrvasūtre . atha vā pūrvasūtre varṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:940: (Śs_7-8.3) KA_I,36.12-18 Ro_I,118-120 kimartham idam upadiśyate . atha kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:941: idam upadiśyate . varṇajñānam vāgviṣayaḥ yatra brahma vartate . tadartham iṣṭadbuddhyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:942: laghvartham ca upadiśyate . saḥ ayam akṣarasamāmnāyaḥ vāksamāmnāyaḥ puṣpitaḥ phalitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:944: ca asya jñāne bhavati . mātāpitarau ca asya svarge loke mahīyete .
GS24pmbhasuu:946: 121-123 kutvam kasmāt na bhavati coḥ kuḥ padasya iti . bhatvāt . katham bhasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:947: . ayasmayādīni chandasi iti . chandasi iti ucyate . na ca idam chandaḥ . chandovat
GS24pmbhasuu:948: sūtrāṇi bhavanti . yadi bhasañjñā vṛddhiḥ ād aic at eṅ guṇaḥ iti jaśtvam api na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:949: . ubhayasañjñāni api chandāṃsi dṛśyante . tat yathā . saḥ suṣṭubhā saḥ ṛkvatā gaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:950: . padatvāt kutvam bhatvāt jaśvtam na bhavati . evam iha api bhatvāt kutvam na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:953: vṛddhiḥ iti evam ye ākāraikāraukārāḥ bhāvyante teṣām grahaṇam āhosvit ādaijmātrasya
GS24pmbhasuu:954: . kim ca ataḥ . yadi tadbhāvitagrahaṇam śālīyaḥ mālīyaḥ iti vṛddhalakṣaṇaḥ chaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:955: prāpnoti . āmramayam śālamayam vṛddhalakṣaṇaḥ mayaṭ na prāpnoti . āmraguptāyaniḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:956: śālaguptayaniḥ vṛddhalakṣaṇaḥ phiñ na prāpnoti . atha aijmātrasya grahaṇam sarvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:957: bhāsaḥ sarvabhāsaḥ iti uttarapadapadavṛddhau sarvam ca iti eṣaḥ vidhiḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:958: iha ca tāvatī bhāryā asya tāvadbhāryaḥ yāvadbhāryaḥ vṛddhinimittasya iti puṃvadbhāvapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:959: prāpnoti . astu tarhi aijmātrasya . nanu ca uktam sarvaḥ bhāsaḥ sarvabhāsaḥ iti uttarapadapadavṛddhau
GS24pmbhasuu:960: sarvam ca iti eṣaḥ vidhiḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na evam vijñāyate uttarapadasya
GS24pmbhasuu:961: vṛddhiḥ uttarapadavṛddhiḥ uttarapadavṛddhau iti . katham tarhi . uttarapadasya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:962: evam prakṛtya yā vṛddhiḥ tadvati uttarapade iti evam etat vijñāyate . avaśyam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:963: etat evam vijñeyam . tadbhāvitagrahaṇe sati api iha prasajyeta :
GS24pmbhasuu:964: sarvaḥ kārakaḥ sarvakārakaḥ iti . yad api ucyate iha tāvatī bhāryā asya tāvadbhāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:965: yāvadbhāryaḥ vṛddhinimittasya iti puṃvadbhāvapratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti iti na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:966: . na evam vijñāyate vṛddheḥ nimittam vṛddhinimittam vṛddhinimittasya iti . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:967: tarhi . vṛddheḥ nimittam yasmin saḥ ayam vṛddhinimittaḥ vṛddhinimittasya iti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:968: ca vṛddheḥ nimittam. yaḥ asau kakāraḥ ṇakāraḥ ñakāraḥ vā . atha vā yaḥ kṛtsnāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:969: vṛddheḥ nimittam . kaḥ ca kṛtsnāyāḥ vṛddheḥ nimittam . yaḥ trayāṇām ākāraikāraukārāṇām .
GS24pmbhasuu:971: 125-133 sañjñādhikāraḥ sañjñāsampratyayārthaḥ . atha sañjñā iti prakṛtya vṛddhyādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:972: śabdāḥ paṭhitavyāḥ . kim prayojanam . sañjñāsampratyayārthaḥ . vṛddhyādīnām śabdānām
GS24pmbhasuu:973: sañjñā iti eṣaḥ sampratyayaḥ yathā syāt . itarathā hi asampratyayaḥ yathā loke .
GS24pmbhasuu:974: akriyamāṇe hi sañjñādhikāre vṛddhyādīnām sañjñā iti eṣaḥ sampratyayaḥ na syāt . idam
GS24pmbhasuu:975: idānīm bahusūtram anarthakam syāt . anarthakam iti āha . katham . yathā loke . loke
GS24pmbhasuu:976: hi arthavanti ca anarthakāni ca vākyāni dṛśyante . arthavanti tāvat :
GS24pmbhasuu:977: devadatta gām abhyāja śuklām daṇḍena . devadatta gām abhyāja kṛṣṇām iti . anarthakāni
GS24pmbhasuu:978: ca . daśa dāḍimāni ṣaṭ apūpāḥ kuṇḍam ajājinam palalapiṇḍaḥ adhorukam etat kumāryāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:979: sphaiyakṛtasya pitā pratiśīnaḥ iti . sañjñāsañjñyasandehaḥ ca . kriyamāṇe api sañjñādhikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:980: sañjñāsañjñinoḥ asandehaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kutaḥ hi etat vṛddhiśabdaḥ sañjñā ādaicaḥ sañjñinaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:981: iti . na punaḥ ādaicaḥ sañjñā vṛddhiśabdaḥ sañjñī iti . yat tāvat ucyate sañjñādhikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:982: kartavyaḥ sañjñāsampratyayārthaḥ iti na kartavyaḥ . ācāryācārāt sañjñāsiddhiḥ . ācāryācārāt
GS24pmbhasuu:983: sañjñāsiddhiḥ bhaviṣyati . kim idam ācāryācārāt . ācāryāṇām upacārāt . yathā laukikavaidikeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:984: . tat yathā laukikeṣu vaidikeṣu ca kṛtānteṣu . loke tāvat :
GS24pmbhasuu:985: mātāpitarau putrasya jātasya saṃvṛte avakāśe nāma kurvāte devadattaḥ yajñadattaḥ iti . tayoḥ upacārāt anye api jānanti iyam asya sañjñā iti . vede :
GS24pmbhasuu:986: yājñikāḥ sañjñām kurvanti sphyaḥ yūpaḥ caṣālaḥ iti . tatrabhavatām upacārāt anye
GS24pmbhasuu:987: api jānanti iyam asya sañjñā iti . apare punaḥ sici vṛddhiḥ iti uktvā ākāraikāraukārān
GS24pmbhasuu:989: yayā pratyāyyante sā sañjñā ye pratīyante te sañjñinaḥ iti . yat api ucyate kriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:990: api sañjñādhikāre sañjñāsañjñinoḥ asandehaḥ vaktavyaḥ iti . sañjñāsañjñyasandehaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:991: . sañjñāsañjñinoḥ asandehaḥ siddhaḥ . kutaḥ . ācāryācārāt eva . uktaḥ ācāryācāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:992: . anākṛtiḥ . atha vā anākṛtiḥ sañjñā . ākṛtimantaḥ sañjñinaḥ . loke api hi ākrtimataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:993: māṃsapiṇḍasya devadattaḥ iti sañjñā kriyate . liṅgena vā . atha vā kim cit liṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:994: āsajya vakṣyāmi itthaṃliṅgā sañjñā iti . vṛddhiśabde ca tat liṅgam kariṣyate na ādaicchabde
GS24pmbhasuu:995: . idam tāvat ayuktam yat ucyate ācāryācārāt iti . kim atra ayuktam . tam eva upālabhya
GS24pmbhasuu:996: agamakam te sūtram iti tasya eva punaḥ pramāṇīkaraṇam iti etat ayuktam . aparituṣyan
GS24pmbhasuu:997: khalu api bhavān anena parihāreṇa ākṛtiḥ liṅgena vā iti āha . tat ca api vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:998: . yadi api etat ucyate atha vā etarhi itsañjñā na vaktavyā lopaḥ ca na vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:999: . sañjñāliṅgam anubandheṣu kariṣyate . na ca sañjñāyāḥ nivṛttiḥ ucyate . svabhāvataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1000: sañjñāḥ sañjñinaḥ pratyāyya nivartante . tena anubandhānām api nivṛttiḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:1001: . sidhyati evam . apāṇinīyam tu bhavati . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam sañjñādhikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1002: sañjñāsampratyayārthaḥ itarathā hi asampratyayaḥ yathā loke iti . na yathā loke tathā
GS24pmbhasuu:1003: vyākaraṇe . pramāṇabhūtaḥ ācāryaḥ darbhapavitrapāṇiḥ śucau avakāśe prāṅmukhaḥ upaviśya
GS24pmbhasuu:1004: mahatā yatnena sūtram praṇayati sma . tatra aśakyam varṇena api anarthakena bhavitum
GS24pmbhasuu:1005: kim punaḥ iyatā sūtreṇa . kim ataḥ yat aśakyam . ataḥ sañjñāsañjñinau eva . kutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1006: nu khalu etat sañjñāsañjñinau eva iti na punaḥ sādhvanuśāsane asmin śāstre sādhutvam
GS24pmbhasuu:1007: anena kiryate . kṛtam anayoḥ sādhutvam . katham . vṛdhiḥ asmai aviśeṣeṇa upadiṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1008: prakṛtipāṭhe . tasmāt ktinpratyayaḥ . ādaicaḥ api akṣarasamāmnāye upadiṣṭāḥ . prayoganiyamārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:1009: tarhi idam syāt . vṛddhiśabdāt paraḥ ādaicaḥ prayoktavyāḥ iti . na iha prayoganiyamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1010: ārabhyate . kim tarhi . saṃskṛtya saṃskṛtya padāni utsṛjyante . teṣām yatheṣṭham
GS24pmbhasuu:1013: pātram āhara iti . ādeśāḥ tarhi ime syuḥ . vṛddhiśabdasya ādaicaḥ . ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1014: ādeśāḥ ucyante na ca atra ṣaṣṭhīm paśyāmaḥ . āgamāḥ tarhi ime syuḥ . vṛddhiśabdasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1015: ādaicaḥ āgamāḥ . āgamāḥ api ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭasya eva ucyante liṅgena
GS24pmbhasuu:1016: ca . na ca atra ṣaṣṭhīm na khalu api āgamaliṅgam paśyāmaḥ . idam khalu api bhūyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1017: sāmanādhikaraṇyam ekavibhaktikatvam ca . dvayoḥ ca etat bhavati . kayoḥ . viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1018: vā sañjñāsañjñinoḥ vā . tatra etat syāt viśeṣaṇaviśeṣye iti . tat ca na . dvayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1019: hi pratītpadārthakayoḥ loke viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaḥ bhavati . na ca ādaicchabdaḥ pratītapadārthakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1020: . tasmāt sañjñāsañjñinau eva . tatra tu etāvān sandedhaḥ kaḥ sañjñī kā sañjñā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1021: . saḥ ca api kva sandehaḥ . yatra ubhe samānākṣare . yatra tu anyatarat laghu yat
GS24pmbhasuu:1022: laghu sā sañjñā . kutaḥ etat . laghvartham hi sañjñākaraṇam . tatra api ayam na avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:1023: gurulaghutām eva upalakṣayitum arhati . kim tarhi . anākṛtitām api . anākṛtiḥ sañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:1024: . ākṛtimantaḥ sañjñinaḥ . loke hi ākṛtimataḥ māṃsapiṇḍasya devadattaḥ iti sañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:1025: kriyate . atha vā āvartinyaḥ sañjñāḥ bhavanti . vṛddhiśabdaḥ ca āvartate na ādaicchabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1026: . tat yathā . itaratra api devadattaśabdaḥ āvartate na māṃsapiṇḍaḥ . atha vā pūrvoccāritaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1027: sañjñī paroccāritā sañjñā . kutaḥ etat . sataḥ hi kāryiṇaḥ kāryeṇa bhavitavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1028: tat yathā . itaratra api sataḥ māṃsapiṇḍasya devadattaḥ iti sañjñā kriyate . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:1029: vṛddhiḥ āt aic iti . etat ekam ācāryasya maṅgalārtham mṛṣyatām . māṅgalikaḥ ācāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1030: mahataḥ śāstraughasya maṅgalārtham vṛddhiśabam āditaḥ prayuṅkte . maṅgalādīni hi
GS24pmbhasuu:1031: śāstrāṇi prathante vīrapuruṣakāṇi ca bhavanti āyuṣmatpuruṣakāṇi ca . adhyetāraḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:1032: siddhārthāḥ yathā syuḥ iti . sarvatra eva hi vyākaraṇe pūrvoccāritaḥ sañjñī paroccāritā
GS24pmbhasuu:1033: sañjñā . at eṅ guṇaḥ iti yathā . doṣavān khalu api sañjñādhikāraḥ . aṣṭame api hi
GS24pmbhasuu:1034: sañjñā kriyate tasya param āmreḍitam iti . tatra api idam anuvartyam syāt . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:1035: vā asthāne ayam yatnaḥ kriyate . na hi idam lokāt bhidyate . yadi idam lokāt bhidyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:1036: tataḥ yatnārham syāt . tat yathā agojñāya kaḥ cit gām sakthani karṇe vā gṛhītvā upadiśati
GS24pmbhasuu:1037: ayam gauḥ iti . na ca asmai ācaṣṭe iyam asya sañjñā iti . bhavati ca asya sampratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1038: . tatra etat syāt kṛtaḥ pūrvaiḥ abhisambandhaḥ iti . iha api kṛtaḥ pūrvaiḥ abhisambandhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1039: . kaiḥ . ācāryaiḥ . tatra etat syāt . yasmai samprati upadiśati tasya akṛtaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1040: . loke api yasmai samprati upadiśati tasya akṛtaḥ . atha tatra kṛtaḥ iha api kṛtaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1042: 133-134 sataḥ vṛddhyādiṣu sañjñābhāvāt tadāśraye itaretarāśrayatvāt asiddhiḥ . sataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1043: sañjñinaḥ sañjñābhāvāt sañjñāśraye sañjñini vṛddhyādiṣu itaretarāśrayatvāt aprasiddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1044: . kā iteretarāśrayatā . satām ādaicām sañjñayā bhavitavyam sañjñayā ca ādaicaḥ bhāvyante
GS24pmbhasuu:1046: itaretarāśrayāṇi ca kāryāṇi na prakalpante . tat yathā . nauḥ nāvi baddhā na itaratrāṇāya
GS24pmbhasuu:1047: bhavati. nanu ca bhoḥ itaretarāśrayāṇi api kāryāṇi dṛśyante . tat yathā . nauḥ śakaṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:1048: vahati śakaṭam ca nāvam vahati . anyat api tatra kim cit bhavati jalam sthalam vā
GS24pmbhasuu:1049: . sthale śakaṭam nāvam vahati . jale nauḥ śakaṭam vahati . yathā tari triviṣṭabdhakam
GS24pmbhasuu:1050: . tatra api antataḥ sūtrakam bhavati . idam punaḥ itaretarāśrayam eva . siddham tu
GS24pmbhasuu:1051: nityaśabdatvāt . siddham etat . katham . nityaśabdatvāt . nityāḥ śabdāḥ . nityeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:1052: śabdeṣu satām ādaicām sañjñā kriyate . na sañjñayā ādaicaḥ bhāvyante . yadi tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:1053: nityāḥ śabdāḥ kimartham śāstram . kimartham śāstram iti cet nivartakatvāt siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:1054: . nivartakam śāstram . katham . mṛjiḥ asmai aviśeṣeṇa upadiṣṭaḥ . tasya sarvatra
GS24pmbhasuu:1055: mṛjibuddhiḥ prasaktā . tatra anena nivṛttiḥ kriyate . mṛjeḥ akṅitsu pratyayeṣu mṛjiprasaṅge
GS24pmbhasuu:1058: 134-136 pratyekam vṛddhiguṇasañjñe bhavataḥ iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . samudāye
GS24pmbhasuu:1059: mā bhūtām iti . anyatra sahavacanāt samudāye sañjñāprasaṅgaḥ . anyatra sahavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1060: samudāye vṛddhiguṇasañjñayoḥ aprasaṅgaḥ . yatra icchati sahabhūtānām kāryam karoti
GS24pmbhasuu:1061: tatra sahagrahaṇam . tat yathā . saha supā . ubhe abhyastam saha iti . pratyavayavam
GS24pmbhasuu:1062: ca vākyaparisamāpteḥ . pratyavayavam ca vākyaparisamāptiḥ dṛśyate . tat yathā . devadattayajñadattaviṣṇumitrāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1063: bhojyantām iti . na ca ucyate pratyekam iti . pratyekam ca bhujiḥ parisamāpyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:1064: nanu ca ayam api asti dṛṣṭāntaḥ samudāye vākyaparisamāptiḥ iti . tat yathā . gargāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1065: śatam daṇḍyantām iti . arthinaḥ ca rājānaḥ hiraṇyena bhavanti na ca pratyekam daṇḍayanti
GS24pmbhasuu:1066: . sati etasmin dṛṣṭānte yadi tatra sahagrahaṇam kriyate iha api pratyekam iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:1067: . atha tatra antareṇa sahagrahaṇam sahabhūtānām kāryam bhavati iha api na arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1070: 136-140 atha kimartham ākāraḥ taparaḥ kriyate . ākārasya taparakaraṇam savarṇārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:1071: . ākārasya taparakaraṇam kriyate . kim prayojanam . savarṇārtham . taparaḥ tatkālasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1072: iti tatkālānām grahaṇam yathā syāt . keṣām . udāttānundāttasvaritānām . kim ca kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:1073: na syāt . bhedakatvāt svarasya . bhedakāḥ udāttādayaḥ . katham punaḥ jñāyate bhedakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1074: udāttādayaḥ iti . evam hi dṛśyate loke . yaḥ udātte kartavye anudāttam karoti khaṇḍikopādhyāyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1075: tasmai capeṭām dadāti anyat tvam karoṣi iti . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1076: . bhedakatvāt guṇasya iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . ānunāsikyam nāma guṇaḥ . tadbhinnasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1077: api yathā syāt . kim ca kāraṇam na syāt . bhedakatvāt guṇasya . bhedakāḥ guṇāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1078: katham punaḥ jñāyate bhedakāḥ guṇāḥ iti . evam hi dṛśyate loke . ekaḥ ayam ātmā udakam
GS24pmbhasuu:1080: anyat idam śītam anyat idam ūṣṇam iti . nanu ca bhoḥ abhedakāḥ api guṇāḥ dṛśyante
GS24pmbhasuu:1081: . tat yathā . devadattaḥ muṇḍī api jaṭī api śikhī api svām ākhyām na jahāti . tathā
GS24pmbhasuu:1082: bālaḥ yuvā vṛddhaḥ vatsaḥ damyaḥ balīvardaḥ iti . ubhayam idam guṇeṣu uktam bhedakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1083: abhedakāḥ iti . kim punaḥ atra nyāyyam . abhedakāḥ guṇāḥ iti eva nyāyyam . kutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1084: etat . yat ayam asthidadhisakthyakṣṇām anaṅ udāttaḥ iti udāttagrahaṇam karoti . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:1085: bhedakāḥ guṇāḥ syuḥ udāttam eva uccārayet . yadi tarhi abhedakāḥ guṇāḥ anudāttādeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1086: antodāttāt ca yat ucyate tat svaritādeḥ svaritāntāt ca prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1087: āśrīyamāṇaḥ guṇaḥ bhedakaḥ bhavati . tat yathā . śuklam ālabheta . kṛṣṇam ālabheta
GS24pmbhasuu:1088: . tatra yaḥ śukle ālabdhavye kṛṣṇam ālabheta na hi tena yathoktam kṛtam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1089: asandehārthaḥ tarhi takāraḥ . aic iti ucyamane sandehaḥ syāt . kim imau aicau eva
GS24pmbhasuu:1090: āhosvit ākāraḥ api atra nirdiśyate iti . sandehamātram etat bhavati . sarvasandeheṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:1091: ca idam upatiṣṭhate vyākhyānataḥ viśeṣapratipattiḥ na hi sandehāt alakṣaṇam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1092: trayāṇām grahaṇam iti vyākhyāsyāmaḥ . anyatra api hi ayam evañjātīyakeṣu sandeheṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:1093: na kam cid yatnam karoti . tat yathā . autaḥ amśasoḥ iti .idam tarhi prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:1094: āntaryataḥ trimātracaturnātrāṇām sthāninām trimātracaturmātrāḥ ādeśāḥ mā bhūvan iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:1097: khaṭvā* īṣā khaṭveṣā khaṭvā* ūḍhā khaṭvoḍhā khaṭvā* elakā khaṭvailakā khaṭvā* odanaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1102: khaṭvaupagavaḥ iti . atha kriyamāṇe api takāre kasmāt eva trimātracaturnātrāṇām sthāninam
GS24pmbhasuu:1103: trimātracaturmātrāḥ ādeśāḥ na bhavanti . taparaḥ tatkālasya iti niyamāt . nanu taḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1104: paraḥ yasmāt saḥ ayam taparaḥ . na iti āha . tāt api paraḥ taparaḥ iti . yadi tāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1105: api paraḥ taparaḥ ṝdoḥ ap iti iha eva syāt . yavaḥ stavaḥ . lavaḥ pavaḥ iti atra
GS24pmbhasuu:1106: na syāt . na eṣaḥ takāraḥ . kaḥ tarhi . dakāraḥ . kim dakāre prayojanam . atha kim
GS24pmbhasuu:1107: takāre prayojanam . yadi asandehārthaḥ takāraḥ dakāraḥ api . atha mukhasukhārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1109: (P_1,1.3.1) KA_I,42.26-44.14 Ro_140-146 iggrahaṇam kimartham . iggrahaṇam ātsandhyakṣaravyañjananivṛttyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:1111: ca. ākāranivṛttyartham tāvat . yātā vātā . ākārasya guṇaḥ prāpnoti . iggrahaṇāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:1112: bhavati . sandhyakṣaranivṛttyartham . glāyati mlāyati . sandhyakṣarasya guṇaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:1114: umbhitum umbhitavyam . vyañjanasya guṇaḥ prāpnoti . iggrahaṇāt na bhavati . ākāranivṛttyarthena
GS24pmbhasuu:1115: tāvat nārthaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na ākārasya guṇaḥ bhavati iti yat ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:1116: ātaḥ anupasarge kaḥ iti kakāram anubandham karoti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . kitkaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:1117: etat prayojanam kiti iti ākāralopaḥ yathā syāt . yadi ca ākārasya guṇaḥ syāt kitkaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:1118: anarthakam syāt . guṇe kṛte dvayoḥ akārayoḥ pararūpeṇa siddham rūpam syāt godaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1119: kambaladaḥ iti . paśyati tu ācāryaḥ na ākārasya guṇaḥ bhavati iti . tataḥ kakāram
GS24pmbhasuu:1120: anubandham karoti . sandhyakṣarārthena api na arthaḥ . upadeśasāmarthyāt sandhyakṣarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1121: guṇaḥ na bhaviṣyati . vyañjananivṛttyarthena api na arthaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:1122: na vyañjanasya guṇaḥ bhavati iti yat ayam janeḥ ḍam śāsti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam
GS24pmbhasuu:1123: . ḍitkaraṇe etat prayojanam ḍiti iti ṭilopaḥ yathā syāt . yadi vyañjansya guṇaḥ syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1124: ḍitkaraṇam anarthakam syāt . guṇe kṛte trayāṇām akārāṇām pararūpeṇa siddham rūpam syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:1126: mandurajaḥ iti . paśyati tu ācāryaḥ na vyañjanasya guṇaḥ bhavati iti . tataḥ janeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1127: ḍam śāsti. na etāni santi prayojanāni . yat tāvat ucyate kitkaraṇam jñāpakam ākārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1128: guṇaḥ na bhavati iti . uttarārtham etat syāt . tundaśokayoḥ parimṛjāpanudoḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1129: yat tarhi gāpoḥ ṭhak iti ananyārtham kakāram anubandham karoti . yat api ucyate upadeśasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1130: sandhyakṣarasya guṇaḥ na bhavati iti . yadi yat yat sandhyakṣarasya prāpnoti tat
GS24pmbhasuu:1131: tat upadeśasāmarthyāt bādhyate āyādayaḥ api tarhi na prāpnuvanti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1132: . yam vidhim prati upadeśaḥ anarthakaḥ sa vidhiḥ bādhyate . yasya tu vidheḥ nimittam
GS24pmbhasuu:1133: eva na asau bādhyate . guṇam ca prati upadeśaḥ anarthakaḥ āyādīnām punaḥ nimittam
GS24pmbhasuu:1134: eva . yat api ucyate janeḥ ḍavacanam jñāpakam na vyañjanasya guṇaḥ bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1135: siddhe vidhiḥ ārabhyamāṇaḥ jñāpakārthaḥ bhavati . na ca janeḥ guṇena sidhyati . kutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1136: hi etat janeḥ guṇaḥ ucyamānaḥ akāraḥ bhavati na punaḥ ekāraḥ vā syāt okāraḥ vā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1137: . āntaryataḥ ardhamātrikasya vyañjanasya mātrikaḥ akāraḥ bhaviṣyati . evam api anunāsikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1138: prāpnoti . pararūpeṇa śuddhaḥ bhaviṣyati . evam tarhi gameḥ api ayam ḍaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1139: . gameḥ ca guṇaḥ ucyamānaḥ āntaryataḥ okāraḥ prāpnoti . tasmāt iggrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:1143: imam ite ete api ikaḥ prāpnuvanti . sañjñayā vidhāne niyamaḥ . sañjñayā ye vidhīyante
GS24pmbhasuu:1144: teṣu niyamaḥ . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . guṇavṛddhigrahaṇasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1145: . katham punaḥ antareṇa guṇavṛddhigrahaṇam ikaḥ guṇavṛddhī syātām . prakṛtam guṇavṛddhigrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:1146: anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . vṛddhiḥ āt aic at eṅ guṇaḥ iti . yadi tat anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:1147: at eṅ guṇaḥ vṛddhiḥ ca iti adeṅām api vṛddhisañjñā prāpnoti . sambandham anuvartiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:1148: . vṛddhiḥ āt aic . at eṅ guṇaḥ vṛddhiḥ āt aic . tataḥ ikaḥ guṇavṛddhī iti . guṇavṛddhigrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:1149: anuvartate ādaijgrahaṇam nivṛttam . atha vā maṇḍūkagatayaḥ adhikārāḥ . yathā maṇḍūkāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1150: utplutya utplutya gacchanti tadvat adhikārāḥ . atha vā ekayogaḥ kariṣyate vṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1151: āt aic at eṅ guṇaḥ iti . tataḥ iko guṇavṛddhī iti . na ca ekayoge anuvṛttiḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:1152: . atha vā anyavacanāt cakārākaraṇāt prakṛtāpavādaḥ vijñāyate yathā utsargeṇa prasaktasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1153: apavādaḥ bādhakaḥ bhavati . anyasyāḥ sañjñāyāḥ vacanāt cakārasya anukarṣaṇārthasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1154: akaraṇāt prakṛtāyāḥ vṛddhisañjñāyāḥ guṇasañjña bādhikā bhaviṣyati yathā utsargeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:1155: prasaktasya apavādaḥ bādhakaḥ bhavati . atha vā vakṣyati etat . anuvartante ca nāma
GS24pmbhasuu:1156: vidhayaḥ na ca anuvartanāt eva bhavanti . kim tarhi yatnāt bhavanti . atha vā ubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:1159: 146-155 kim punaḥ ayam alontyaśeṣaḥ āhosvit alontyāpavādaḥ . katham ca ayam taccheṣaḥ syāt katham vā tadapavādaḥ . yadi ekam vākyam tat ca idam ca alaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1160: antyasya vidhayaḥ bhavanti ikaḥ guṇavṛddhī* alaḥ antyasya iti tataḥ ayam taccheṣaḥ . atha nānā vākyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:1162: ikaḥ guṇavṛddhī* antyasya ca anantyasya ca iti tataḥ ayam tadapavādaḥ . kaḥ ca atra
GS24pmbhasuu:1163: viśeṣaḥ . vṛddhiguṇau alaḥ antyasya iti cet midipugantalaghūpadharcchidṛśikṣiprakṣudreṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:1164: iggrahaṇam . vṛddhiguṇau alaḥ antyasya iti cet midipugantalaghūpadharcchidṛśikṣiprakṣudreṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:1165: iggrahaṇam kartavyam . mideḥ guṇaḥ ikaḥ iti vaktavyam . anantyatvāt hi na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:1166: . pugantalaghūpadhasya guṇaḥ ikaḥ iti vaktavyam . anantyatvāt hi na prāpnoti . ṛccheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1167: liṭi guṇaḥ ikaḥ iti vaktavyam . anantyatvāt hi na prāpnoti . ṛdṛsaḥ aṅi guṇaḥ ikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1168: iti vaktavyam . anantyatvāt hi na prāpnoti . kṣiprakṣudrayoḥ guṇaḥ ikaḥ iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:1169: . anantyatvāt hi na prāpnoti . sarvādeśaprasaṅgaḥ ca anigantasya . sarvādeśaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:1171: yātā vātā . kim kāraṇam . alaḥ antyasya iti ṣaṣṭhī ca eva hi antyam ikam upasaṅkrāntā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1172: aṅgasya iti ca sthānaṣaṣṭhī . tat yat idānīm anigantam aṅgam tasya guṇaḥ sarvādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1173: prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yathā eva hi alaḥ antyasya iti ṣaṣṭhī antyam ikam upasaṅkrāntā
GS24pmbhasuu:1174: evam aṅgasya iti api sthānaṣaṣṭhī . tat yad idānīm anigantam aṅgam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1175: tatra ṣaṣṭhī eva na asti kutaḥ guṇaḥ kutaḥ sarvādeśaḥ . evam tarhi na ayam doṣasamuccayaḥ . kim tarhi . pūrvāpekṣaḥ ayam doṣaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1176: hyarthe ca ayam caḥ paṭhitaḥ . midipugantalaghūpadharcchidṛśikṣiprakṣudreṣu iggrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:1177: sarvādeśaprasaṅgaḥ hi anigantasya iti . mideḥ guṇaḥ ikaḥ iti vacanāt antyasya na
GS24pmbhasuu:1178: . antyasya iti vacanāt ikaḥ na . ucyate tu guṇaḥ . saḥ sarvādeśaḥ prāpnoti . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:1179: sarvatra . astu tarhi tadapavādaḥ . igmātrasya iti cet jusisārvadhātukārdhadhātukahrasvādyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1180: guṇeṣu anantyapratiṣedhaḥ . igmātrasya iti cet jusisārvadhātukārdhadhātukahrasvādyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1181: guṇeṣu anantyapratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . jusi guṇaḥ . saḥ yathā iha bhavati : ajuhavuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1185: atra api prāpnoti . sārvadhātukārdhadhātukayoḥ guṇaḥ . saḥ yathā iha bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:1188: īhitum iti atra api prāpnoti . hrasvasya guṇaḥ . saḥ yathā iha bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:1191: he somasut iti atra api prāpnoti . jasi guṇaḥ . saḥ yathā iha bhavati agnayaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1193: somasutaḥ iti atra api prāpnoti . ṛto ṅisarvanāmasthānayoḥ guṇaḥ . saḥ yathā iha
GS24pmbhasuu:1194: bhavati kartari kartārau kartāraḥ iti evam sukṛti sukṛtau sukṛtaḥ iti atra api prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:1195: .gheḥ ṅiti guṇaḥ . saḥ yathā iha bhavati agnaye vāyave evam agnicite somasute iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1196: atra api prāpnoti . oḥ guṇaḥ . saḥ yathā iha bhavati bābhravyaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1198: sauśrutaḥ iti atra api prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . pugantalaghūpadhagrahaṇam anantyaniyamārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:1200: eva anantyasya na anyasya anantyasya iti . prakṛtasya eṣaḥ niyamaḥ syāt . kim ca
GS24pmbhasuu:1201: prakṛtam . sārvadhātukārdhadhātukayoḥ iti . tena bhavet iha niyamāt na syāt īhitā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1203: īhitavyam iti . hrasvādyoḥ guṇaḥ tu aniyataḥ . saḥ anantyasya api prāpnoti . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:1204: api evam niyamaḥ syāt . pugantalaghūpadhasya sārvadhātukārdhadhātukayoḥ eva iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1205: evam api sārvadhātukārdhadhātukayoḥ guṇaḥ aniyataḥ . saḥ anantyasya api prāpnoti : īhitā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1206: īhitum īhitavyam iti . atha api ubhayataḥ niyamaḥ syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:1208: sārvadhātukārdhadhātukayoḥ eva pugantalaghūpadhasya iti , evam api
GS24pmbhasuu:1209: ayam jusi guṇaḥ aniyataḥ . saḥ anantyasya api prāpnoti : anenijuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1210: paryaviviṣuḥ iti . evam tarhi na ayam taccheṣaḥ na api tadapavādaḥ . anyat eva idam
GS24pmbhasuu:1211: paribhāṣāntaram asambaddham anayā paribhāṣayā . paribhāṣāntaram iti ca matvā kroṣṭrīyāḥ paṭhanti :
GS24pmbhasuu:1212: niyamāt ikaḥ guṇavṛddhī bhavataḥ vipratiṣedhena iti . yadi ca ayam taccheṣaḥ syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1213: tena eva tasya ayuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . atha api tadapavādaḥ utsargāpavādayoḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:1216: rājakīyam . ikaḥ guṇavṛddhī* iti asya avakāśaḥ : cayanam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1220: medyati mārṣṭi iti . ikaḥ guṇavṛddhī* iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena . na eṣaḥ yuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . vipratiṣedhe hi param iti ucyate ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1221: pūrvaḥ ca ayam yogaḥ paraḥ niyamaḥ . iṣṭavācī paraśabdaḥ . vipratiṣedhe param yat
GS24pmbhasuu:1222: iṣṭam tat bhavati . evam api ayuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . dvikāryayogaḥ hi vipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1223: . na ca atra ekaḥ dvikāryayuktaḥ . na avaśyam dvikāryayogaḥ eva vipratiṣedhaḥ . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:1224: tarhi. asambhavaḥ api . saḥ ca asti atra asambhavaḥ . kaḥ asau asmbhavaḥ . iha tāvat :
GS24pmbhasuu:1226: plakṣebhyaḥ iti ekaḥ sthānī dvau ādeśau . na ca asti sambhavaḥ yat ekasya sthāninaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1227: dvau ādeśau syātām . iha idānīm medyati medyataḥ medyanti iti dvau sthāninau ekaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1228: ādeśaḥ . na ca asti sambhavaḥ yat dvayoḥ sthāninoḥ ekaḥ ādeśaḥ syāt iti eṣaḥ asambhavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1229: . satyam etasmin asambhave yuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . evam api ayuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1230: . dvayoḥ hi sāvakāśayoḥ samavasthitayoḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ bhavati . anavakāśaḥ ca ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:1231: yogaḥ . nanu ca idānīm eva asya avakāśaḥ prakḷptaḥ : cayanam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1234: lāvakaḥ iti . atra api niyamaḥ prāpnoti . yāvatā na aprāpte niyame ayam yogaḥ ārabhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:1235: ataḥ tadapavādaḥ ayam yogaḥ bhavati . utsargāpavādayoḥ ca ayuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1236: atha api katham cit ikaḥ guṇavṛddhī* iti asya avakāśaḥ syāt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1237: evam api yathā iha vipratiṣedhāt ikaḥ guṇaḥ bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:1240: paryaveviṣuḥ iti . evam tarhi vṛddhiḥ bhavati guṇaḥ bhavati iti yatra brūyāt ikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1241: iti etat tatra upasthitam draṣṭavyam . kim kṛtam bhavati . dvitīyā ṣaṣṭhī prāduḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1243: gṛhyamāṇena vā ikam viśeṣayitum ikā vā gṛhyamāṇam . yāvatā kāmacāraḥ iha tāvat :
GS24pmbhasuu:1245: eteṣām yaḥ ik iti . iha idānīm :
GS24pmbhasuu:1247: eteṣām guṇaḥ bhavati ikaḥ . igantānām iti . atha vā sarvatra eva sthānī nirdiśyate . iha tāvat : mideḥ iti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1250: mideḥ iti . atha vā ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ bhaviṣyati midaḥ iḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1252: mideḥ iti . pugantalaghūpadhasya iti na evam vijñāyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:1253: pugantasya aṅgasya laghūpadhasya ca iti . katham tarhi . puki antaḥ pugantaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1255: pugantaḥ ca laghūpadhā ca pugantalaghūpadham pugantalaghūpadhasya iti . avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam . aṅgaviśeṣaṇe hi sati iha prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:1256: bhinatti chinatti iti . ṛccheḥ api praśliṣṭanirdeśaḥ ayam . ṛcchati , ṛ , ṛ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1257: ṝtām ṛcchatyṝtām iti . dṛśeḥ api yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . uḥ aṅi guṇaḥ . uḥ aṅi guṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1258: bhavati . tataḥ dṛśeḥ . dṛśeḥ ca aṅi guṇaḥ bhavati . uḥ iti eva. kṣiprakṣudrayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1259: api yaṇādiparam guṇa iti iyatā siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:1260: saḥ ayam evam siddhe sati yat pūrvagrahaṇam karoti tasya etat prayojanam ikaḥ yathā syāt anikaḥ mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1262: 155-161 atha vṛddhigrahaṇam kimartham . kim viśeṣeṇa vṛddhigrahaṇam codyate na punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1263: guṇagrahaṇam api . yadi kim cit guṇagrahaṇasya prayojanam asti vṛddhigrahaṇasya api
GS24pmbhasuu:1264: tat bhavitum arhati . kaḥ vā viśeṣaḥ . ayam asti viśeṣaḥ . guṇavidhau na kva cit
GS24pmbhasuu:1265: sthānī nirdiśyate . tatra avaśyam sthāninirdeśārtham guṇagrahaṇam kartavyam . vṛddhividhau
GS24pmbhasuu:1266: punaḥ sarvatra eva sthānī nirdiśyate . acaḥ ñṇiti ataḥ upadhāyāḥ taddhiteṣu acām
GS24pmbhasuu:1267: ādeḥ iti . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . vṛddhigrahaṇam uttarārtham . vṛddhigrahaṇam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:1268: uttarārtham . kṅiti iti pratiṣedham vakṣyati . saḥ vṛddheḥ api yathā syāt . kaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:1269: idānīm kṅitpratyayeṣu vṛddheḥ prasaṅgaḥ yāvatā ñṇiti iti ucyate . tat ca mṛjyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:1270: . mṛjeḥ vṛddhiḥ aviśeṣeṇa ucyate . sā kṅiti mā bhūt : mṛṣṭaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1271: mṛṣṭavān iti . ihārtham ca api mṛjyartham vṛddhigrahaṇam kartavyam . mṛjeḥ vṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1272: aviśeṣeṇa ucyate . sā ikaḥ yathā syāt . anikāḥ mā bhūt iti . mṛjyartham iti cet yogavibhāgāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1273: siddham . mṛjyartham iti cet yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . mṛjeḥ vṛddhiḥ . tataḥ ñṇiti
GS24pmbhasuu:1274: . ñiti ṇiti ca vṛddhiḥ bhavati . acaḥ iti eva . yadi acaḥ vṛddhiḥ ucyate nyamārṭ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1275: aṭaḥ api vṛddhiḥ prāpnoti . aṭi ca uktam . kim uktam. anantyavikāre antyasadeśasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1276: kāryam bhavati iti . vṛddhipratiṣedhānupapattiḥ tu ikprakaraṇāt . vṛddheḥ tu pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1277: na upapadyate . kim kāraṇam . ikprakaraṇāt . iglakṣaṇayoḥ guṇavṛddhyoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1278: na ca evam sati mṛjeḥ iglakṣaṇā vṛddhiḥ bhavati . tasmāt mṛjeḥ iglakṣaṇā vṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1279: eṣitavyā . evam tarhi iha anye vaiyākaraṇāḥ mṛjeḥ ajādau saṅkrame vibhāṣā vṛddhim ārabhante :
GS24pmbhasuu:1281: parimamārjatuḥ ityādyartham . tat iha api sādhyam . tasmin sādhye yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . mṛjeḥ vṛddhiḥ acaḥ bhavati . tataḥ aci kṅiti . ajādau ca kṅiti mṛjeḥ vṛddhiḥ bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:1283: ajādau eva kṅiti na anyatra . kva anyatra mā bhūt . mṛṣṭaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1284: mṛṣṭavān iti . tataḥ vā . vā aci kṅiti mṛjeḥ vṛddhiḥ bhavati . parimṛjanti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1287: parimamārjatuḥ iti . ihārtham eva sijartham vṛddhigrahaṇam kartavyam . sici vṛddhiḥ aviśeṣeṇa ucyate . sā ikaḥ yathā syāt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1288: anikaḥ mā bhūt iti . kasya punaḥ anikaḥ prāpnoti . akārasya : acikīrṣīt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1289: ajihīrṣīt . na etat asti . lopaḥ atra bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . ākārasya tarhi prāpnoti : ayāsīt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1290: avāsīt . na asti atra viśeṣaḥ satyām vṛddhau asatyām vā . sandhyakṣarasya tarhi prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:1291: . na eva sandhyakṣaram antyam asti . nanu ca idam asti ḍhalope kṛte udavoḍhām udavoḍham
GS24pmbhasuu:1292: udavoḍha iti . na etat asti . asiddhaḥ ḍhalopaḥ . tasya asiddhatvāt na etat antyam
GS24pmbhasuu:1294: acchaitsīt . halantalakṣaṇā vṛddhiḥ bādhikā bhaviṣyati . yatra tarhi sā pratiṣidhyate : akoṣīt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1295: amoṣīt . sici vṛddheḥ api eṣaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . katham . lakṣaṇam hi nāma dhvanati bhramati
GS24pmbhasuu:1296: muhūrtam api na avatiṣṭhate . atha vā sici vṛddhiḥ parasmaipadeṣu iti sici vṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1297: prāpnoti . tasyāḥ halantalakṣaṇā vṛddhiḥ bādhikā . tasyāḥ api na iṭi iti pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1299: anyatra api apavāde pratiṣiddhe utsargaḥ api na bhavati . asti iti āha . sujāte* aśvasūnṛte ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1301: śukram te* anyat iti . pūrvarūpatve pratiṣiddhe ayādayaḥ api na bhavanti . uttarārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:1302: eva tarhi sijartham vṛddhigrahaṇam kartavyam . sici vṛddhiḥ aviśeṣeṇa ucyate . sā
GS24pmbhasuu:1304: nyadhuvīt . na etat asti prayojanam . antaraṅgatvāt atra uvaṅādeśe kṛte anantyatvāt vṛddhiḥ na bhaviṣyati . yadi tarhi sici antaraṅgam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:1306: ahārṣīt : guṇe kṛte raparatve ca anantyatvāt vṛddhiḥ na prāpnoti . mā bhūt evam . halantasya iti evam bhaviṣyati . iha tarhi : nyastārīt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1307: vyadārīt : guṇe raparatve ca anantyatvāt vṛddhiḥ na prāpnoti . halantalakṣaṇāyāḥ ca na iṭi iti pratiṣedhaḥ . mā bhūt evam . rlāntasya iti evam bhaviṣyati . iha tarhi :
GS24pmbhasuu:1309: guṇe kṛte avādeśe ca anantyatvāt vṛddhiḥ na prāpnoti . halantalakṣaṇāyāḥ ca na iṭi
GS24pmbhasuu:1310: iti pratiṣedhaḥ . mā bhūt evam . rlāntasya iti evam bhaviṣyati . rlāntasya iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:1311: na ca idam rlāntam . rlāntasya iti atra vakāraḥ api nirdiśyate . kim vakāraḥ na śrūyate
GS24pmbhasuu:1312: . luptanirdiṣtaḥ vakāraḥ . yadi evam mā bhavān mavīt :
GS24pmbhasuu:1313: atra api prāpnoti . avimavyoḥ iti vakṣyāmi . tat vaktavyam . ṇiśvibhyām tau nimātavyau
GS24pmbhasuu:1314: . yadi api etat ucyate atha vā etarhi ṇiśvyoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ na vaktavyaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1315: guṇe kṛte ayādeśe ca yāntānam na iti pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1316: jñāpayati na sici antaraṅgam bhavati iti yat ayam ataḥ halādeḥ laghoḥ iti akāragrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:1317: karoti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . akāragrahaṇasya etat prayojanam iha mā bhūt : akoṣīt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1318: amoṣīt . yadi sici antaraṅgam syāt akāragrahaṇam anarthakam syāt . guṇe kṛte alaghutvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1319: vṛddhiḥ na bhaviṣyati . paśyati tu ācāryaḥ na sici antaraṅgam bhavati iti . tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1320: akāragrahaṇam karoti . na etat asti jñāpakam . asti anyat etasya vacane prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:1321: . kim . yatra guṇaḥ pratiṣidhyate tadartham etat syāt : nyakuṭīt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1322: nyapuṭīt iti . yat tarhi ṇiśvyoḥ pratiṣedham śāsti tena na iha antaraṅgam asti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1323: darśayati . yat ca karoti akāragrahaṇam laghoḥ iti kṛte api . tasmāt iglakṣaṇā vṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1326: 161-163 ṣaṣṭhyāḥ sthāneyogatvāt ignivṛttiḥ . ṣaṣṭhyāḥ sthāneyogatvāt sarveṣām ikām nivṛttiḥ prāpnoti . asya api prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:1327: dadhi madhu . punarvacanam idānīm kimartham syāt . anyatarārtham punarvacanam . anyatarārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:1328: etat syāt . sārvadhādukārdhadhātukayoḥ guṇaḥ eva iti . prasāraṇe ca . prasāraṇe ca
GS24pmbhasuu:1329: sarveṣam yaṇām nivṛttiḥ prāpnoti . asya api prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:1330: yātā vātā . punarvacanam idānīm kimartham syāt . viṣayārtham punarvacanam . viṣayārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:1331: etat syāt . vacisvapiyajādīnām kiti eva iti . uḥ aṇ rapare ca . uḥ aṇ rapare ca sarvarkārāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:1332: nivṛttiḥ prāpnoti . asya api prāpnoti kartṛ hartṛ . siddham tu ṣaṣṭhyadhikāre vacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1333: . siddham etat . katham . ṣaṣṭhyadhikāre ime yogāḥ kartavyāḥ . ekaḥ tāvat kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:1334: tatra eva . imau api yogau ṣaṣṭhadhikāram anuvartiṣyete . atha vā ṣaṣṭhadhikāre imau
GS24pmbhasuu:1335: yogau apekṣiṣyāmahe . atha vā idam tāvad ayam praṣṭavyaḥ . sārvadhātukārdhadhātukayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1336: guṇaḥ bhavati iti iha kasmāt na bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:1337: yātā vātā . idam tatra apekṣiṣyate ikaḥ guṇavṛddhī* iti . yathā eva tarhi idam tatra apekṣiṣyate evam iha api tad apekṣiṣyāmahe sārvadhātukārdhadhātukayoḥ ikaḥ guṇavṛddhī* iti.
GS24pmbhasuu:1340: lūñ lavitā lavitum pūñ pavitā pavitum . ārdhadhātuke iti kimartham . tridhā baddhaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ roravīti . kim punaḥ idam ārdhadhātukagrahaṇam lopaviśeṣaṇam :
GS24pmbhasuu:1341: ārdhadhātukanimitte lope sati ye guṇavṛddhī prāpnutaḥ te na bhavataḥ iti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1343: dhātulope sati ārdhadhātukanimitte ye guṇavṛddhī prāpnutaḥ te na bhavataḥ iti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:1344: ca ataḥ . yadi lopaviśeṣaṇam upeddhaḥ preddhaḥ atra api prāpnoti . atha guṇavṛddhiviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:1345: knopayati iti atra api prāpnoti . yathā icchasi tathā astu . astu lopaviśeṣaṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1346: katham upeddhaḥ preddhaḥ iti . bahiraṅgaḥ guṇaḥ antaraṅgaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . asiddham
GS24pmbhasuu:1347: bahiraṅgam antaraṅge . yadi evam na arthaḥ dhātugrahaṇena . iha kasmāt na bhavati:
GS24pmbhasuu:1348: lūñ lavitā lavitum . ārdhadhātukanimitte lope pratiṣedhaḥ na ca eṣaḥ ārdhadhātukanimittaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1349: lopaḥ . atha vā punaḥ astu guṇavṛddhiviśeṣaṇam . nanu ca uktam knopayati iti atra
GS24pmbhasuu:1350: api prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . nipātanāt siddham . kim nipātanam . cele knopeḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1352: 166-169 parigaṇanam kartavyam . yaṅyakkyavalope pratiṣedhaḥ . yaṅyakkyavalope pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . yaṅ:
GS24pmbhasuu:1356: jīradānuḥ . kim prayojanam . numlopasrivyanubandhalope apratiṣedhārtham . numlope srivyanubandhalope ca pratiṣedhaḥ mā bhūt iti . numlope:
GS24pmbhasuu:1359: lūñ lavitā lavitum . yadi parigaṇanam kriyate syadaḥ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1361: himaśrathaḥ iti atra api prāpnoti . vakṣyati etat nipātanāt syadādiṣu iti . tat tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:1362: parigaṇanam kartavyam . na kartavyam . numlope kasmāt na bhavati . ikprakaraṇāt numlope
GS24pmbhasuu:1363: vṛddhiḥ . iglakṣaṇayoḥ guṇavṛddhyoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ na ca eṣā iglakṣaṇā vṛddhiḥ . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:1366: himaśrathaḥ iti atra na prāpnoti . iha ca prāpnoti: avodaḥ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1368: odmaḥ iti . nipātanāt syadādiṣu . nipātanāt syadādiṣu pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati na ca
GS24pmbhasuu:1369: bhaviṣyati . yadi iglakṣaṇayoḥ guṇavṛddhyoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ srivyanubandhalope katham
GS24pmbhasuu:1370: sriveḥ āsremāṇam lūñ lavitā . pratyayāśrayatvāt anyatra siddham . ārdhadhātukanimitte
GS24pmbhasuu:1371: lope pratiṣedhaḥ na ca eṣaḥ ārdhadhātukanimittaḥ lopaḥ . yadi ārdhadhātukanimitte
GS24pmbhasuu:1372: lope pratiṣedhaḥ jīradānuḥ atra na prāpnoti . raki jyaḥ prasāraṇam . na etat jīveḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1373: rūpam . raki etat jyaḥ prasāraṇam . yāvatā ca idānīm raki jīveḥ api siddham bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:1374: . katham upabarhaṇam . bṛhiḥ prakṛtyantaram . katham jñāyate bṛhiḥ prakṛtyantaram
GS24pmbhasuu:1375: iti . aci iti hi lopaḥ ucyate anajādau api dṛśyate:
GS24pmbhasuu:1376: nibṛhyate . aniṭi iti ca ucyate . iḍādau api dṛśyate:
GS24pmbhasuu:1377: nibarhitā nibarhitum iti . ajādau api na dṛśyate:
GS24pmbhasuu:1378: bṛṃhayati bṛṃhakaḥ . tasmāt na arthaḥ parigaṇanena . yadi parigaṇanam na kriyate bhedyate chedyate atra api prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . dhātulope iti na evam vijñāyate:
GS24pmbhasuu:1380: dhātulope iti . katham tarhi . dhātoḥ lopaḥ asmin tat idam dhātulopam,
GS24pmbhasuu:1381: dhātulope iti . tasmāt iglakṣaṇayoḥ guṇavṛddhyoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . yadi tarhi iglakṣaṇayoḥ guṇavṛddhyoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ pāpacakaḥ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1384: dṛṣadakaḥ atra na prāpnoti . allopasya sthānivatvāt . akāralope kṛte tasya sthānivatvāt guṇavṛddhī na bhaviṣyataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1386: 169-171 anārambhaḥ vā . anārambhaḥ vā punaḥ asya yogasya nyāyyaḥ . katham bebhiditā,
GS24pmbhasuu:1388: kuṣubhitā samidhitā iti . atra api akāralope kṛte tasya sthānivatvāt guṇavṛddhī na
GS24pmbhasuu:1389: bhaviṣyataḥ . yatra tarhi sthānivadbhāvaḥ na asti tadartham ayam yogaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1390: . kva ca sthānivadbhāvaḥ na asti . yatra halacoḥ ādeśaḥ:
GS24pmbhasuu:1391: loluvaḥ popuvaḥ marīmṛjaḥ sarīsṛpaḥ iti . atra api akāralope kṛte tasya sthānivatvāt guṇavṛddhī na bhaviṣyataḥ . luki kṛte na prāpnoti . idam iha sampradhāryam:
GS24pmbhasuu:1392: luk kriyatām allopaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt allopaḥ . nityaḥ luk . kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:1393: api allope prāpnoti akṛte api prāpnoti . luk api anityaḥ . katham . anyasya kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:1394: allope prāpnoti anyasya akṛte . śabdāntarasya ca prāpnuvan vidhiḥ anityaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:1395: . anavakāśaḥ tarhi luk. sāvakāśaḥ luk . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . avaśiṣṭaḥ . atham katham cit
GS24pmbhasuu:1396: anavakāśaḥ luk syāt evam api na doṣaḥ . allope yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:1398: yasya ca lopaḥ bhavati . ataḥ iti eva . kimartham idam . lukam vakṣyati tadbādhanārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:1399: . tato halaḥ . halaḥ uttarasya ca yasya lopaḥ bhavati iti . iha api paratvāt yogavibhāgāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1401: kṛṣṇaḥ nonāva vṛṣabhaḥ yadi idam . nonūyateḥ nonāva . samānāśrayaḥ luk lopena bādhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:1402: . kaḥ ca samānāśrayaḥ . yaḥ pratyayāśrayaḥ . atra ca prāk eva pratyayotpatteḥ luk
GS24pmbhasuu:1407: nikucitaḥ iti . uktam śeṣe . kim uktam . nipātanāt syadādiṣu . pratyayāśratvāt anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:1408: siddham . raki jyaḥ prasāraṇam iti . nikucite api uktam sannipātalakṣaṇaḥ vidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1411: 171-174 kṅiti pratiṣedhe tannimittagrahaṇam . kṅiti pratiṣedhe tannimittagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:1412: kartavyam . kṅinnimitte ye guṇavṛddhī prāpnutaḥ te na bhavataḥ iti vaktavyam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:1413: prayojanam . upadhāroravītyartham . upadhārtham roravītyartham ca . upadhārtham tāvat : bhinnaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1414: bhinnavān iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . kṅiti iti ucyate . tena yatra kṅiti anantaraḥ guṇabhāvī asti tatra eva syāt:
GS24pmbhasuu:1415: citam stutam . iha tu na syāt: bhinnaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1416: bhinnavān iti . nanu ca yasya guṇaḥ ucyate tat kṅitparatvena viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . pugantalaghūpadhasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1417: ca guṇaḥ ucyate tat ca atra kṅitparam . pugantalaghūpadhasya iti na evam vijñāyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:1418: pugantasya aṅgasya laghūpadhasya ca iti . katham tarhi . puki antaḥ pugantaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1421: pugantalaghūpadhasya iti . avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam . aṅgaviśeṣaṇe hi sati iha prasajyeta :
GS24pmbhasuu:1422: bhinatti chinatti iti . roravītyartham ca . tridhā baddhaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ roravīti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1423: . yadi tannimittagrahaṇam kriyate śacaṅante doṣaḥ . riyati piyati dhiyati . prādudruvat
GS24pmbhasuu:1424: prāsusruvat . atra prāpnoti . śacaṅantasya antaraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . antaraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1425: atra iyaṅuvaṅoḥ kṛtayoḥ anupadhātvāt guṇaḥ na bhaviṣyati . evam kriyate ca idam tannimittagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:1426: na ca kaḥ cit doṣaḥ bhavati . imāni ca bhūyaḥ tannimittagrahaṇasya prayojanāni : hataḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1432: nenikte iti . na etāni santi prayojanāni . iha tāvat hataḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1433: hathaḥ iti . prasaktasya anabhinirvṛttasya pratiṣedhena nivṛttiḥ śakyā kartum atra ca dhātūpadeśāvasthāyām eva akāraḥ . iha ca upoyate ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1436: pauyamāniḥ iti . bahiraṅge guṇavṛddhī antaraṅgaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge . nenikte iti pareṇa rūpeṇa vyavahitatvāt na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:1438: 175-177 upadhārthena tāvat na arthaḥ . dhātoḥ iti vartate . dhātum kṅitparatvena viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . yadi dhātuḥ viśeṣyate vikaraṇasya na prāpnoti : cinutaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1441: punītaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . vihitaviśeṣaṇam dhātugrahaṇam . dhātoḥ yaḥ vihitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1442: iti . dhātoḥ eva tarhi na prāpnoti . na evam vijñāyate dhātoḥ vihitasya kṅiti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1443: . katham tarhi . dhātoḥ vihite kṅiti iti . atha vā kāryakālam hi sañjñāparibhāṣam
GS24pmbhasuu:1444: . yatra kāryam tatra draṣṭavyam . pugantalaghūpadhasya guṇaḥ bhavati iti upasthitam
GS24pmbhasuu:1445: idam bhavati kṅiti na iti . atha vā yat etasmin yoge kṅidgrahaṇam tad anavakāśam
GS24pmbhasuu:1446: . tasya anavakāśatvāt guṇavṛddhī na bhaviṣyataḥ . atha vā ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:1447: bhavati upadhālakṣaṇasya guṇasya pratiṣedhaḥ iti yat ayam trasigṛdhidhṛṣikṣipeḥ knuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1448: ikaḥ jhal halantāt ca iti knusanau kitau karoti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . kitkaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:1449: etat prayojanam guṇaḥ katham na syāt iti . yadi ca atra guṇapratiṣedhaḥ na syāt kitkaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:1450: anarthakam syāt . paśyati tu ācāryaḥ bhavati upadhālakṣaṇasya guṇasya pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1451: iti . tataḥ knusanau kitau karoti . roravītyarthena api na arthaḥ . kṅiti iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:1452: . na ca atra kṅitam paśyāmaḥ . pratyayalakṣaṇena prāpnoti . na lumatā tasmin iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1453: pratyayalakṣaṇapratiṣedhaḥ . atha api na lumatā aṅgasya iti ucyate evam api na doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1454: . katham . na lumatā lupte aṅgādhikāraḥ pratinirdiśyate . kim tarhi . yaḥ asau lumatā
GS24pmbhasuu:1455: lupyate tasmin yat aṅgam tasya yat kāryam tat na bhavati iti . atha api āṅgādhikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1456: pratinirdiśyate evam api na doṣaḥ . katham . kāryakālam hi sañjñāparibhāṣam yatra
GS24pmbhasuu:1457: kāryam tatra draṣṭavyam . sārvadhātukārdhadhātukayoḥ guṇaḥ bhavati iti upasthitam
GS24pmbhasuu:1458: idam bhavati kṅiti na iti . atha vā chāndasam etat . dṛṣṭānuvidhiḥ ca chandasi bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:1459: . atha vā bahiraṅgaḥ guṇaḥ antaraṅgaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge
GS24pmbhasuu:1460: . atha vā pūrvasmin yoge yad ārdhadhātukagrahaṇam tat anavakāśam . tasya anavakāśatvāt guṇaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1464: kāmayate . taddhitakāmyoḥ ikprakaraṇāt . iglakṣaṇayoḥ guṇavṛddhyoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:1465: ca ete iglakṣaṇe . lakārasya ṅittvāt ādeśeṣu sthānivadbhāvaprasaṅgaḥ . lakārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1467: acinavam asunavam akaravam . lakārasya ṅittvāt ādeśeṣu sthānivadbhāvaprasaṅgaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1468: cet yāsuṭaḥ ṅidvacanāt siddham . yat ayam yāsuṭaḥ ṅidvacanam śāsti tat jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:1469: ācāryaḥ na ṅidādeśāḥ ṅitaḥ bhavanti iti . yadi etat jñāpyate katham nityam ṅitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1470: itaḥ ca iti . ṅitaḥ yat kāryam tat bhavati ṅiti yat kāryam tat na bhavati iti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:1471: vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . yāsuṭaḥ eva ṅidvacanāt . aparyāptaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1472: ca eva hi yāsuṭ samudāyasya ṅittve ṅitam ca enam karoti . tasya etat prayojanam ṅitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1473: yat kāryam tat yathā syāt ṅiti yat kāryam tat mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1475: 180-182 kimartham idam udyate . guṇavṛddhī mā bhūtām iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:1477: āvevyanam āvevyakaḥ iti . ayam yogaḥ śakyaḥ akartum . katham . dīdhīvevyoḥ chandoviṣayatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1478: dṛṣṭānuvidhitvāt ca chandasaḥ adīdhet adīdhayuḥ iti ca guṇadarśanāt apratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1479: . dīdhīvevyoḥ chandoviṣayatvāt . dīdhīvevyau chandoviṣayau . dṛṣṭānuvidhitvāt ca
GS24pmbhasuu:1480: chandasaḥ . dṛṣṭānuvidhiḥ ca chandasi bhavati . adīdhet ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1481: adīdhayuḥ iti ca guṇadarśanāt apratiṣedhaḥ . anarthakaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1482: . prajapatiḥ vai yat kim cana manasā adīdhet . hotraya vṛtaḥ kṛpayan adīdhet . adīdhayuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1483: dāśarājñe vṛtasaḥ . bhavet idam yuktam udāharaṇam :
GS24pmbhasuu:1485: adīdhayuḥ iti . ayam jusi guṇaḥ pratiṣedhaviṣaye [pratiṣedhaviṣayaḥ] ārabhyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:1486: saḥ yathā eva kṅiti na iti etam pratiṣedham bādhate evam imam api bādhate . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1487: doṣaḥ . jusi guṇaḥ pratiṣedhaviṣaye ārabhyamāṇaḥ tulyajātīyam pratiṣedham bādhate
GS24pmbhasuu:1488: . kaḥ ca tulyajātīyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . yaḥ pratyayāśrayaḥ . prakṛtyāśrayaḥ ca ayam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1489: atha vā yena na aprāpte tasya bādhanam bhavati . na ca aprāpte kṅiti na iti etasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:1490: pratiṣedhe jusi guṇaḥ ārabhyate . asmin punaḥ prāpte ca aprāpte ca . yadi tarhi ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:1491: yogaḥ na ārabhyate katham dīdhyat iti . dīdhyat iti śyanvyatyayena . dīdhyat iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1492: śyan eṣaḥ vyatyayena bhaviṣyati . iṭaḥ ca api grahaṇam śakyam akartum . katham akaṇiṣam araṇiṣam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1494: raṇitā śvaḥ iti . ārdhadhātukasya iṭ valādeḥ iti atra iṭ iti vartamāne punaḥ iḍgrahaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1495: prayojanam iṭ eva yathā syāt yat anyat prāpnoti tat mā bhūt iti . kim ca anyat prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:1496: . guṇaḥ . yadi niyamaḥ kriyate pipaṭhiṣateḥ apratyayaḥ pipaṭḥīḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1497: dīrghatvam na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . āṅgam yat kāryam tat niyamyate . na ca etat āṅgam . atha vā asiddham dīrghatvam . tasya asiddhatvāt niyamaḥ na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1500: avidyamānam antaram eṣām iti āhosvit avidyamānāḥ antarā eṣām iti . kim ca ataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1501: yadi vijñāyate avidyamānam antaram eṣām iti avagrahe saṃyogasañjñā na prāpnoti apsu
GS24pmbhasuu:1502: iti ap-su iti . vidyate hi atra antaram . atha vijñāyate avidyamānāḥ antarā eṣām
GS24pmbhasuu:1503: iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . yathā na doṣaḥ tathā astu . atha vā punaḥ astu avidyamānam
GS24pmbhasuu:1504: antaram eṣām iti . nanu ca uktam avagrahe saṃyogasañjñā na prāpnoti ap-su iti apsu
GS24pmbhasuu:1505: iti . vidyate hi atra antaram iti . na eva doṣaḥ na prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1507: 183-186 saṃyogasañjñāyām sahavacanam yathā anyatra . saṃyogasañjñāyām sahavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:1508: kartavyam . halaḥ anantarāḥ saṃyogaḥ saha iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . sahabhūtānām
GS24pmbhasuu:1509: saṃyogasañjñā yathā syāt ekaikasya mā bhūt iti . yathā anyatra . tat yathā anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:1510: api yatra icchati sahabūtānām kāryam karoti tatra sahagrahaṇam . tat yathā . saha
GS24pmbhasuu:1511: supā . ubhe abhyastam saha iti . kim ca syāt yadi ekaikasya halaḥ saṃyogasañjñā syāt . iha niryāyāt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1513: vā anyasya saṃyogādeḥ iti ettvam prasajyeta . iha ca saṃhṛṣīṣṭa iti ṛtaḥ ca saṃyogādeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1514: iti iṭ prasajyeta . iha ca saṃhriyate iti guṇaḥ artisaṃyogādyoḥ iti guṇaḥ prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:1515: . iha ca dṛṣat karoti samit karoti iti saṃyogāntasya lopaḥ prasajyeta . iha ca śaktā
GS24pmbhasuu:1516: vastā iti skoḥ saṃyogādyoḥ iti lopaḥ prasajyeta . iha ca niryātaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1517: nirvātaḥ saṃyogādeḥ ātaḥ dhātoḥ yaṇvataḥ iti niṣṭhānatvam prasajyeta . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yat tāvat ucyate iha tāvat niryāyāt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1518: nirvāyāt vā anyasya saṃyogādeḥ iti ettvam prasajyeta iti . na evam vijñāyate saṃyogaḥ ādiḥ yasya saḥ ayam saṃyogādiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1519: saṃyogādeḥ iti . katham tarhi . saṃyogau ādī yasya saḥ ayam saṃyogādiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1520: saṃyogādeḥ iti . evam tāvat sarvam āṅgam parihṛtam . yat api ucyate iha ca dṛṣat
GS24pmbhasuu:1521: karoti samit karoti iti saṃyogāntasya lopaḥ prasajyeta iti . na evam vijñāyate saṃyogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1523: saṃyogāntasya iti . katham tarhi . saṃyogau antau asya tad idam saṃyogāntam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1524: saṃyogāntasya iti . yat api ucyate iha ca śaktā vastā iti skoḥ saṃyogādyoḥ iti lopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1525: prasajyeta iti . na evam vijñāyate saṃyogau ādī saṃyodādī saṃyogādyoḥ iti . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:1526: tarhi . saṃyogayoḥ ādī saṃyogādī saṃyogādyoḥ iti . yat api ucyate iha ca niryātaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1527: nirvātaḥ saṃyogādeḥ ātaḥ dhātoḥ yaṇvataḥ iti niṣṭhānatvam prasajyeta iti . na evam vijñāyate saṃyogaḥ ādiḥ yasya saḥ ayam saṃyogādiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1528: saṃyogādeḥ iti . katham tarhi . saṃyogau ādī yasya saḥ ayam saṃyogādiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1529: saṃyogādeḥ iti . katham kṛtvā ekaikasya saṃyogasañjñā prāpnoti . pratyekam vākyaparisamāptiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1530: dṛṣṭā . tat yathā . vṛddhiguṇasañjñe pratyekam bhavataḥ . nanu ca ayam api asti dṛṣṭāntaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1531: samudāye vākyaparisamāptiḥ iti . tat yathā . gargāḥ śatam daṇḍyantām iti . arthinaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1532: ca rājānaḥ hiraṇyena bhavanti na ca pratyekam daṇḍayanti . sati etasmin dṛṣṭānte
GS24pmbhasuu:1533: yadi tatra pratyekam iti ucyate iha api sahagrahaṇam kartavyam . atha tatra antareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:1534: pratyekam iti vacanam pratyekam vṛddhiguṇasañjñe bhavataḥ iha api na arthaḥ sahagrahaṇena .
GS24pmbhasuu:1536: 186-190 atha yatra bahūnām ānantaryam kim tatra dvayoḥ dvayoḥ saṃyogasñjñā bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:1537: āhosvit aviśeṣeṇa . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . samudāye saṃyogādilopaḥ masjeḥ . samudāye
GS24pmbhasuu:1538: saṃyogādilopaḥ masjeḥ na sidhyati . maṅktā maṅktum . iha ca nirgleyāt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1541: nirmlāyāt : vā anyasya saṃyogādeḥ iti ettvam na prāpnoti . iha ca saṃsvariṣīṣṭa iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1542: ṛtaḥ ca saṃyogādeḥ iti iṭ na prāpnoti . iha ca saṃsvaryate iti guṇaḥ artisaṃyogādyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1543: iti guṇaḥ na prāpnoti . iha ca gomān karoti yavamān karoti iti saṃyogāntasya lopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1544: iti lopaḥ na prāpnoti . iha ca nirglānaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1545: nirmlānaḥ iti saṃyogādeḥ ātaḥ dhātoḥ yaṇvataḥ iti niṣṭhānatvam na prāpnoti . astu
GS24pmbhasuu:1546: tarhi dvayoḥ dvayoḥ . dvayoḥ haloḥ saṃyogaḥ iti cet dvirvacanam . dvayoḥ haloḥ saṃyogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1547: iti cet dvirvacanam na sidhyati . indram icchati indrīyati . indrīyateḥ san :
GS24pmbhasuu:1548: indidrīyiṣati . na ndrāḥ saṃyogādayaḥ iti dakārasya dvirvacanam na prāpnoti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:1549: vā ajvidheḥ . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . ajvidheḥ . ndrāḥ saṃyogādayaḥ na dviḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1550: ucyante . ajādeḥ iti vartate . atha yadi eva bahūnām saṃyogasñjñā atha api dvayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1551: dvayoḥ kim gatam etat iyatā sūtreṇa āhosvit anyatarasmin pakṣe bhūyaḥ sūtram kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:1552: . gatam iti āha . katham . yada tāvat bahūnām saṃyogasñjñā tadā evam vigrahaḥ kariṣyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:1553: avidyamānam antaram eṣām iti . yadā dvayoḥ dvayoḥ tadā evam vigrahaḥ kariṣyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:1554: avidyamānāḥ antarā eṣām iti . dvayoḥ ca eva antarā kaḥ cit vidyate na vā . evam api
GS24pmbhasuu:1555: bahūnām eva prāpnoti . yān hi bhavān ṣaṣṭhyā pratinirdiśati eteṣām anyena vyavāye
GS24pmbhasuu:1556: na bhavitavyam . astu tarhi samudāye sañjñā . nanu ca uktam samudāye saṃyogādilopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1557: masjeḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . vakṣyati etat . antyāt pūrvaḥ masjeḥ mit anuṣaṅgasaṃyogādilopārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:1558: iti . atha vā aviśeṣeṇa saṃyogasañjñā vijñāsyate dvayoḥ api bahūnām api . tatra dvayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1559: yā saṃyogasñjñā tadāśrayaḥ lopaḥ bhaviṣyati . yat api ucyate iha ca nirgleyāt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1562: nirmlāyāt : vā anyasya saṃyogādeḥ iti ettvam na prāpnoti iti aṅgena saṃyogādim viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1563: . aṅgasya saṃyogādeḥ iti . evam tāvat sarvam āṅgam parihṛtam . yat api ucyate iha
GS24pmbhasuu:1564: ca gomān karoti yavamān karoti iti saṃyogāntasya lopaḥ iti lopaḥ na prāpnoti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1565: padena saṃyogāntam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . padasya saṃyogāntasya . yat api ucyate iha ca nirglānaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1566: nirmlānaḥ iti saṃyogādeḥ ātaḥ dhātoḥ yaṇvataḥ iti niṣṭhānatvam na prāpnoti iti dhātuna saṃyogādim viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . dhātoḥ saṃyogādeḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1568: 190-192 svarānantarhitavacanam . svaraiḥ anantarhitāḥ halaḥ saṃyogasañjñāḥ bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:1569: iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . vyavahitānām mā bhūt . pacati panasam . nanu ca
GS24pmbhasuu:1570: anantarāḥ iti ucyate . tena vyavahitānām na bhaviṣyati . dṛṣṭam ānantaryam vyavahite
GS24pmbhasuu:1571: . vyavahite api anantaraśabdaḥ dṛśyate . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:1572: anantarau imau grāmau iti ucyate . tayoḥ ca eva antarā nadyaḥ ca parvatāḥ ca bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:1573: . yadi tarhi vyavahite api anantaraśabdaḥ bhavati ānantaryavacanam idānīm kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:1574: syāt . ānantaryavacanam kimartham iti cet ekapratiṣedhārtham . ekasya halaḥ saṃyogasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:1575: mā bhūt iti . kim ca syāt yadi ekasya halaḥ saṃyogasañjñā syāt . iyeṣa ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1576: uvoṣa . ijādeḥ ca gurumataḥ anṛcchaḥ iti ām prasajyeta . na vā atajjātīyavyavāyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1577: . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . atajjātīyasya vyavāyāt . atajjātīyakam hi loke
GS24pmbhasuu:1578: vyavadhāyakam bhavati . katham punaḥ jñāyate atajjātīyakam loke vyavadhāyakam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:1579: iti . evam hi kam cit kaḥ cit pṛcchati . anantare* ete brāhmaṇakule* iti . saḥ āha
GS24pmbhasuu:1580: . na anantare . vṛṣalakulam anayoḥ antarā iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam kva cit atajjātīyakam
GS24pmbhasuu:1581: vyavadhāyakam bhavati kva cit na . sarvatra eva hi atajjātīyakam vyavadhāyakam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:1582: . katham anantarau imau grāmau iti . grāmaśabdaḥ ayam bahvarthaḥ . asti eva śālāsamudāye
GS24pmbhasuu:1583: vartate . tat yathā grāmaḥ dagdhaḥ iti . asti vāṭaparikṣepe vartate . tat yathā grāmam
GS24pmbhasuu:1584: praviṣṭaḥ . asti manuṣyeṣu vartate . tat yathā grāmaḥ gataḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1585: grāmaḥ āgataḥ iti . asti sāraṇyake sasīmake sasthaṇḍilake vartate . tat yathā grāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1586: labdhaḥ iti . tat yaḥ sāraṇyake sasīmake sasthaṇḍilake vartate tam abhisamīkṣya etat prayujyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:1587: anantarau imau grāmau iti . sarvatra eva hi atajjātīyakam vyavadhāyakam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1589: 192-193 kim idam mukhanāsikāvacanaḥ iti . mukham ca nāsikā ca mukhanāsikam . mukhanāsikam
GS24pmbhasuu:1590: vacanam asya saḥ ayam mukhanāsikāvacanaḥ . yadi evam mukhanāsikavacanaḥ iti prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:1591: . nipātanāt dīrghatvam bhaviṣyati . atha vā mukhanāsikam āvacanam asya saḥ ayam mukhanāsikāvacanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1592: . kim idam āvacanam iti . īṣadvacanam āvacanam . kim cit mukhavacanam kim cit nāsikāvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:1593: . mukhadvitīyā vā nāsikā vacanam asya saḥ ayam mukhanāsikāvacanaḥ . mukhopasaṃhitā
GS24pmbhasuu:1594: vā nāsikā vacanam asya saḥ ayam mukhanāsikāvacanaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1596: 193-194 atha mukhagrahaṇam kimartham . nāsikāvacanaḥ anunāsikaḥ iti iyati ucyamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:1597: yamānusvārāṇām eva prasajyeta . mukhagrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ bhavati . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:1598: nāsikāgrahaṇam kimartham . mukhavacanaḥ anunāsikaḥ iti iyati ucyamāne kacaṭatapānām
GS24pmbhasuu:1599: eva prasajyeta . nāsikāgrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ bhavati . mukhagrahaṇam śakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:1600: akartum . kena idānīm ubhayavacanānām bhaviṣyati . prāsādavāsinyāyena . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:1601: . ke cit prāsādavāsinaḥ ke cit bhūmivāsinaḥ ke cit ubhayavāsinaḥ . ye prāsādavāsinaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1602: gṛhyante te prāsādavāsigrahaṇena . ye bhūmivāsinaḥ gṛhyante te bhūmivāsinyāyena .
GS24pmbhasuu:1603: ye ubhayavāsinaḥ gṛhyante te prāsādavāsigrahaṇena bhūmivāsinyāyena ca . evam iha
GS24pmbhasuu:1604: api ke cit mukhavacanāḥ ke cit nāsikāvacanāḥ ke cit ubhayavacanāḥ . tatra ye mukhavacanāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1605: gṛhyante te mukhagrahaṇena . ye nāsikāvacanāḥ gṛhyante te nāsikāgrahaṇena . ye ubhayavacanāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1606: gṛhyante eva te mukhagrahaṇena nāsikāgrahaṇena ca. bhavet ubhayavacanānām siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:1607: . yamānusvārāṇām api prāpnoti . na eva doṣaḥ na prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1609: 194-195 itaretarāśrayam tu bhavati . kā itaretarāśrayatā . sataḥ anunāsikasya sañjñayā
GS24pmbhasuu:1610: bhavitavyam sañjñayā ca nāma anunāsikaḥ bhāvyate . tat itaretarāśrayam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1611: itaretarāśrayāṇi ca kāryāṇi na prakalpante . anunāsikasañjñāyām itaretarāśraye uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:1612: . siddham tu nityaśabdatvāt iti . nityāḥ śabdāḥ . nityeṣu śabdeṣu sataḥ anunāsikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1613: sañjñā kriyate . na sañjñayā anunāsikaḥ bhāvyate . yadi tarhi nityāḥ śabdāḥ kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:1614: śāstram . kimartham śāstram iti cet nivartakatvāt siddham . nivartakam śāstram .
GS24pmbhasuu:1615: katham . āṅ asmai aviśeṣeṇa upadiṣṭaḥ ananunāsikaḥ . tasya sarvatra ananunāsikabuddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1616: prasaktā . tatra anena nivṛttiḥ kriyate . chandasi aci parataḥ āṅaḥ ananunāsikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1619: 195-197 tulayā sammitam tulyam . āsyam ca prayatnaḥ ca āsyaprayatnam . tulyāsyam
GS24pmbhasuu:1620: tulyaprayatnam ca savarṇasañjñam bhavati . kim punaḥ āsyam . laukikam āsyam oṣṭhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1621: prabhṛti prāk kākalakāt . katham punaḥ āsyam . asyanti anena varṇān iti āsyam . annam
GS24pmbhasuu:1622: etat āsyandate iti vā āsyam . atha kaḥ prayatnaḥ . prayatanam prayatnaḥ . prapūrvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1623: yatateḥ bhāvasādhanaḥ naṅpratyayaḥ . yadi laukikam āsyam kim āsyopādāne prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:1624: . sarveṣām hi tat tulyam bhavati . vakṣyati etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:1628: bhinnadeśeṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati jabagaḍadaśām . kim kāraṇam . prayatnasāmānyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1629: . eteṣām hi samānaḥ prayatnaḥ . siddham tu āsye tulyadeśaprayatnam savarṇam . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:1630: etat. katham . āsye yeṣām tulyaḥ deśaḥ yatnaḥ ca te savarṇasañjñāḥ bhavanti iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:1631: . evam api kim āsyopādāne prayojanam . sarveṣām hi tat tulyam . prayatnaviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:1632: āsyopādānam . santi hi āsyāt bāhyāḥ prayatnāḥ . te hāpitāḥ bhavanti . teṣu satsu
GS24pmbhasuu:1633: asatsu api savarṇasañjñā sidhyati . ke punaḥ te . vivārasaṃvārau śvāsanādau ghoṣavadaghoṣatā
GS24pmbhasuu:1634: alpaprāṇatā mahāprāṇatā iti . tatra vargāṇām prathamadvitīyāḥ vivṛtakaṇṭhāḥ śvāsānupradānāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1635: aghoṣāḥ . eke alpaprāṇāḥ apare mahāprāṇāḥ . tṛtīyacaturthāḥ saṃvṛtakaṇṭhāḥ nādānupradānāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1636: ghoṣavantaḥ . eke alpaprāṇāḥ apare mahāprāṇāḥ . yathā tṛtīyāḥ tathā pañcamāḥ ānunāsikyavarjam
GS24pmbhasuu:1637: . ānunāsikyam teṣām adhikaḥ guṇaḥ . evam api avarṇasya savarṇasañjñā na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:1638: . kim kāraṇam . bāhyam hi āsyāt sthānam avarṇasya . sarvamukhasthānam avarṇam eke
GS24pmbhasuu:1639: icchanti . evam api vyapadeśaḥ na prakalpate :
GS24pmbhasuu:1640: āsye yeṣām tulyaḥ deśaḥ iti . vyapadeśivadbhāvena vyapadeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:1641: . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam savarṇasañjñayām bhinnadeśeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:1642: atiprasaṅgaḥ prayatnasāmānyāt iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na hi laukikam āsyam . kim tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:1644: āsye bhavam āsyam . śarīrāvayavāt yat . kim punaḥ āsye bhavam . sthānam karaṇam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:1645: . evam api prayatnaḥ aviśeṣitaḥ bhavati . prayatnaḥ ca viśeṣitaḥ . katham . na hi
GS24pmbhasuu:1646: prayatanam prayatnaḥ . kim tarhi . prārambhaḥ yatnasya prayatnaḥ . yadi prārambhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1647: yatnasya prayatnaḥ evam api avarṇasya eṅoḥ ca savarṇasañjñā prāpnoti . praśliṣṭavarṇau
GS24pmbhasuu:1648: etau . avarṇasya tarhi aicoḥ ca savarṇasañjñā prāpnoti . vivṛtatarāvarṇau etau .
GS24pmbhasuu:1649: etayoḥ eva tarhi mithaḥ savarṇasañjñā prāpnoti . na etau tulyasthānau . udāttādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:1650: tarhi savarṇasañjñā na prāpnoti . abhedakāḥ udāttādayaḥ . atha vā kim naḥ etena prārambhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1651: yatnasya prayatnaḥ iti .prayatanam eva prayatnaḥ . tat eva ca taddhitāntam āsyam
GS24pmbhasuu:1652: . yat samānam tat āśrayiṣyāmaḥ . kim sati bhede . sati iti āha . sati eva hi bhede
GS24pmbhasuu:1653: savarṇasañjñayā bhavitavyam . kutaḥ etat . bhedādhiṣṭhānā hi savarṇasañjñā . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:1654: hi yatra sarvam samānam tatra syāt savarṇasañjñāvacanam anarthakam syāt . yadi tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:1655: sati bhede kim cit samānam iti kṛtva savarṇasañjñā bhaviṣyati śakārachakārayoḥ ṣakāraṭhakārahoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1656: sakārathakārayoḥ savarṇasañjñā prāpnoti . eteṣām hi sarvam anyat samānam karaṇavarjam
GS24pmbhasuu:1657: . evam tarhi prayatanam eva prayatnaḥ tat eva taddhitāntam āsyam na tu ayam dvandvaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1658: āsyam ca prayatnaḥ ca āsyaprayatnam iti . kim tarhi . tripadaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1659: tulyaḥ āsye prayatnaḥ eṣām iti . atha vā pūrvaḥ tatpuruṣaḥ tataḥ bahuvrīhiḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1661: tulyāsyaḥ prayatnaḥ eṣām iti . atha vā paraḥ tatpuruṣaḥ tataḥ bahuvrīhiḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1665: 202-203 tasya . tasya iti tu vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . yaḥ yasya tulyāsyaprayatnaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1666: saḥ tasya savarṇasañjñaḥ yathā syāt . anyasya tulyāsyaprayatnaḥ anyasya savarṇasañjñaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1667: mā bhūt . tasya avacanam vacanaprāmāṇyāt . tasya iti na vaktavyam . anyasya tulyāsyaprayatnaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1668: anyasya savarṇasañjñaḥ kasmāt na bhavati . vacanaprāmāṇyāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:1669: savarṇasañjñāvacanasāmarthyāt . yadi hi anyasya tulyāsyaprayatnaḥ saḥ anyasya savarṇasañjñaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1670: syāt savarṇasañjñāvacanam anarthakam syāt . sambandhiśabdaiḥ vā tulyam . sambandhiśabdaiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1671: vā punaḥ tulyam etat . tat yathā sambandhiśabdāḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1673: pitari śuśrūṣitavyam iti . na ca ucyate svasyām mātari svasmin vā pitari iti sambandhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1674: ca etat gamyate yā yasya mātā yaḥ ca yasya pitā iti . evam iha api tulyāsyaprayatnam
GS24pmbhasuu:1675: savarṇam iti atra sambandiśabdau etau . tatra sambandhāt etat gantavyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:1676: yat prati yat tulyāsyaprayatnam tat prati tat savarṇasañjñam bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1678: 203-207 ṛkāraḷkārayoḥ savarṇavidhiḥ . ṛkāraḷkārayoḥ savarṇasañjñā vidheyā . hotṛ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1680: hotṝḷkāraḥ . kim prayojanam . akaḥ savarṇe dīrghaḥ iti dīrghatvam yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . vakṣyati etat . savarṇadīrghatve ṛti
GS24pmbhasuu:1682: lḷvāvacanam iti . tat savarṇe yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt : dadhi ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1685: ḷkāraḥ iti . yat etat savarṇadīrghatve ṛti iti etat ṛtaḥ iti vakṣyāmi . tataḥ ḷti
GS24pmbhasuu:1686: . ḷti ca vā lḷ bhavati . ṛtaḥ iti eva . tat na vaktavyam bhavati . avaśyam tat vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:1687: . ūkālaḥ ac hrasvardīrghaplutasañjñaḥ bhavati iti ucyate . na ca rṛkāraḥ lḷkāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1689: lḷkārasya ca actvam vakṣyāmi . tat ca avaśyam vaktavyam plutaḥ yathā syāt : hotṛ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1694: hotḷ3kāraḥ . kim punaḥ atra jyāyaḥ . savarṇasañjñāvacanam eva jyāyaḥ . dīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:1695: ca eva hi siddham bhavati. api ca ṛkāragrahaṇe ḷkāragrahaṇam sannihitam bhavati . yathā iha bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:1698: māla ṛśyaḥ idam api saṅgṛhītam bahavati : khaṭva ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1706: upālkārīyati iti . yadi tarhi ṛkāragrahaṇe ḷkāragrahaṇam sannihitam bhavati uḥ aṇ raparaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1707: ḷkārasya api raparatvam prāpnoti . ḷkārasya laparatvam vakṣyāmi . tat ca avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:1708: vaktavyam asatyām savarṇasañjñāyām vidhyartham . tat eva satyām rephabādhanārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:1709: bhaviṣyati . iha tarhi raṣābhyām naḥ ṇaḥ samānapade iti ṛkāragrahaṇam coditam mātṝṇām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1710: pitṝṇām iti evamartham . tat iha api prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:1711: kḷpyamānam paśya iti . atha asatyām api savarṇasañjñāyām iha kasmāt na bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:1712: prakḷpyamānam paśya iti . cuṭutulaśarvyavāye na iti vakṣyāmi . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:1713: tribhiḥ ca madhyamaiḥ vargaiḥ laśasaiḥ ca vyavāye na iti vakṣyāmi iti . varṇaikadeśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1714: ca varṇagrahaṇena gṛhyante iti yaḥ asau ḷkāre lakāraḥ tadāśrayaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:1715: . yadi evam na arthaḥ raṣābhyām ṇatve ṛkāragrahaṇena . varṇaikadeśāḥ ca varṇagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:1716: gṛhyante iti yaḥ asau ṛkāre rephaḥ tadāśrayam ṇatvam bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1718: 207-211 ajjhaloḥ pratiṣedhe śakārapratiṣedhaḥ ajjhaltvāt . ajjhaloḥ pratiṣedhe śakārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1719: śakāreṇa savarṇasañjñāyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . ajjhaltvāt . ac ca
GS24pmbhasuu:1720: eva hi śakāraḥ hal ca . katham tāvat actvam . ikāraḥ savarṇagrahaṇena śakāram api
GS24pmbhasuu:1721: gṛhṇāti iti actvam . halṣu upadeśāt haltvam . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . tatra savarṇalope
GS24pmbhasuu:1722: doṣaḥ . tatra savarṇalope doṣaḥ bhavati . paraśśatāni kāryāṇi . jharaḥ jhari savarṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:1723: iti lopaḥ na prāpnoti . siddham anactvāt . siddham etat . katham . anactvāt . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:1724: anactvam . spṛṣṭam sparśānām karaṇam . īṣatspṛṣṭam antaḥsthānām . vivṛtam ūṣmaṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:1725: . īṣat iti anuvartate . svarāṇām vivṛtam . īṣat iti nivṛttam . vākyāparisamāpteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1726: vā . vākyāparisamāpteḥ vā siddham etat . kim idam vākyāparisamāpteḥ iti . varṇānām
GS24pmbhasuu:1727: upadeśaḥ tāvat . upadeśottarakālā itsañjñā . itsañjñottarakālaḥ ādiḥ antyena saha
GS24pmbhasuu:1728: itā iti pratyāhāraḥ . pratyāhārottarakālā savarṇasañjñā . savarṇasañjñottarakālam
GS24pmbhasuu:1729: aṇ udit savarṇasya ca apratyayaḥ iti savarṇagrahaṇam . etena sarveṇa samuditena vākyena
GS24pmbhasuu:1730: anyatra savarṇānām grahaṇam bhavati . ca ca atra ikāraḥ śakāram gṛhṇāti . yathā eva
GS24pmbhasuu:1731: tarhi ikāraḥ śakāram na gṛhṇāti evam īkāram api na gṛhṇīyāt . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . kumārī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1732: īhate kumārīhate . akaḥ savarṇadīrghatvam na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yat etat
GS24pmbhasuu:1733: akaḥ savarṇe dīrghaḥ iti pratyāhāragrahaṇam tata ikāraḥ īkāram gṛhṇāti . śakāram
GS24pmbhasuu:1735: ajjhaloḥ pratiṣedhe śakārapratiṣedhaḥ ajhaltvāt . ajjhaloḥ pratiṣedhe śakārasya śakāreṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:1736: savarṇasañjñāyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . ajjhaltvāt . ac ca eva śakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1737: hal ca . katham tāvat actvam . ikāraḥ savarṇagrahaṇena śakāram api gṛhṇāti iti actvam
GS24pmbhasuu:1738: . halṣu upadeśāt haltvam . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . tatra savarṇalope doṣaḥ . tatra savarṇalope
GS24pmbhasuu:1739: doṣaḥ bhavati . paraśśatāni kāryāṇi . jharaḥ jhari savarṇe iti lopaḥ na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:1740: . siddham anactvāt . siddham etat . katham . anactvāt . katham anactvam . vākyāparisamāpteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1741: vā . uktā vākyāparisamāptiḥ . asmin pakṣe vā iti etat asamarthitam bhavati . etat
GS24pmbhasuu:1742: ca samarthitam . katham . astu vā śakārasya śakāreṇa savarṇasañjñā mā vā bhūt . nanu ca uktam :
GS24pmbhasuu:1743: paraśśatāni kāryāṇi . jharaḥ jhari savarṇe iti lopaḥ na prāpnoti iti . mā bhūt lopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1744: . nanu ca bhedaḥ bhavati . sati lope dviśakāram asati lope triśakāram . na asti bhedaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1745: . asati api lope dviśakāram eva . katham . vibhāṣā dvirvacanam . evam api bhedaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1746: . asati lope kadā cit dviśakāram kadā cit triśakāram sati lope dviśakāram eva . saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1747: eṣaḥ katham bhedaḥ na syāt . yadi nityaḥ lopaḥ syāt . vibhāṣā tu saḥ lopaḥ . yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:1750: 213-217 kimartham īdādīnām taparāṇām pragṛhyasañjñā ucyate . taparaḥ tatkālasya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1751: tatkālānām savarṇānām grahaṇam yathā syāt . keṣām . udāttānudāttasvaritānām . asti
GS24pmbhasuu:1752: prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . plutānām tu pragṛhyasañjñā na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:1753: . atatkālatvāt . na hi plutāḥ tatkālāḥ . asiddhaḥ plutaḥ . tasyāsiddhatvāt tatkālāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1754: eva bhavanti . siddhaḥ plutaḥ svarasandhiṣu . katham jñāyate siddhaḥ plutaḥ svarasandhiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:1755: iti . yat ayam plutapragṛhyāḥ aci iti plutasya prakṛtibhāvam śāsti . katham kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:1756: jñāpakam . sataḥ hi kāryiṇaḥ kāryeṇa bhavitavyam . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:1757: . aplutāt aplute iti etat na vaktavyam bhavati . kim ataḥ yat siddhaḥ plutaḥ svarasandhiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:1758: . sañjñāvidhau asiddhaḥ . tasya asiddhatvāt tatkālāḥ eva bhavanti . sañjñāvidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:1759: ca siddhaḥ . katham . kāryakālam sañjñāparibhāṣam . yatra kāryam tatra upasthitam
GS24pmbhasuu:1760: draṣṭavyam . pragṛhyaḥ prakṛtyā iti upasthitam idam bhavati īdūdet dvivacanam pragṛhyam
GS24pmbhasuu:1761: iti . kim punaḥ plutasya pragṛhyasañjñāvacane prayojanam . pragṛhyāśrayaḥ prakṛtibhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1762: yathā syāt . mā bhūt evam . plutaḥ prakṛtyā iti evam bhaviṣyati . na evam śakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:1763: . upasthite hi doṣaḥ syāt . aplutavat upasthithe iti atra paṭhiṣyati hi ācāryaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1765: plutapratiṣedhe hi pragṛhyplutapratiṣedhaprasaṅgaḥ anyena vihitatvāt iti . tasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1766: plutasya pragṛhyasañjñā eṣitavyā pragṛhyāśrayaḥ prakṛtibhāvaḥ yathā syāt . yadi punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1767: dīrghāṇām ataparāṇām pragṛhyasañjñā ucyeta . evam api ekāraḥ eva ekaḥ savarṇān gṛhṇīyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1768: . īkārokārau na gṛhṇīyātām . kim kāraṇam . anaṇtvāt . yadi punaḥ hrasvānām ataparāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:1769: pragṛhyasañjñā ucyeta . na evam śakyam . iha api prasajyeta : akurvahi ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1770: atra akurvahi atra iti . tasmāt dīrghāṇām eva taparāṇām pragṛhyasañjñā vaktavyā .
GS24pmbhasuu:1771: dīrghāṇām ca ucyamānā plutānām na prāpnoti . evam tarhi kim naḥ etena yatnena yat
GS24pmbhasuu:1772: siddhaḥ plutaḥ svarasandhiṣu iti . asiddhaḥ plutaḥ . tasya asiddhatvāt tatkālāḥ eva
GS24pmbhasuu:1773: bhavanti iti . katham yat tat jñāpakam uktam plutapragṛhyāḥ aci iti. plutabhāvī prakṛtyā
GS24pmbhasuu:1774: iti evam etat vijñāyate . katham yat tat prayojanam uktam . kriyate tat nyāse eva
GS24pmbhasuu:1775: aplutāt aplute iti . evam api yat siddhe pragṛhyakāryam tat plutasya na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:1776: . aṇaḥ apragṛhyasya anunāsikaḥ iti . evam tarhi kim naḥ etena kāryakālam sañjñāparibhāṣam
GS24pmbhasuu:1777: iti . yathoddeśam eva sañjñāparibhāṣam . tatra ca asau asiddhaḥ . tasyāsiddhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1781: īdādayaḥ yat dvivacanam iti āhosvit īdādyantam yat dvivacanam iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1782: . īdādayaḥ dvivacanam pragṛhyāḥ iti cet antyasya vidhiḥ . īdādayaḥ dvivacanam pragṛhyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1783: iti cet antyasya pragṛhyasañjñā vidheyā . pacete* iti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1784: pacethe* iti . vacanāt bhaviṣyati . asti vacane prayojanam . kim . khaṭve* iti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1785: māle* iti . astu tarhi īdādyantam yat dvivacanam iti . īdādyantam iti cet ekasya vidhiḥ . īdādyantam iti cet ekasya pragṛhyasañjñā vidheyā . khaṭve* iti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1786: māle* iti . na vā ādyantatvāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . ādyantatvāt . ādyantavat ekasmin iti ekasya api bhaviṣyati . atha vā evam vakṣyāmi
GS24pmbhasuu:1787: īdādyantam yat dvivacanāntam iti . īdādyantam dvivacanāntam iti cet luki pratiṣedhaḥ . īdādyantam dvivacanāntam iti cet luki pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kumāryoḥ agāram ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1789: vadhvagāram . etat hi īdādyantam ca śrūyate dvivacanāntam ca bhavati pratyayalakṣaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:1790: . saptamyām arthagrahaṇam jñāpakam pratyayalakṣaṇapratiṣedhasya . yat ayam īdūtau
GS24pmbhasuu:1791: ca saptamyarthe iti arthagrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na pragṛhyasañjñāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:1792: pratyayalakṣaṇam bhavati iti . tat tarhi jñāpkārtham arthagrahaṇam kartavyam . na
GS24pmbhasuu:1793: kartavyam . īdādibhiḥ dvivacanam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ īdādiviśiṣṭena ca dvivacanena tadantavidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1794: bhaviṣyati . īdādyantam yat dvivacanam tadantam īdādyantam iti . evam api aśukle
GS24pmbhasuu:1796: śuklī āstām vastre* iti atra prāpnoti . atra hi īdādi dvivacanam tadantam ca bhavati
