GS24pmbhasuu:1970: dādhoḥ grahaṇam . na ca etau arthavantau . anupasargāt vā . atha vā yatkriyāyuktās
GS24pmbhasuu:1971: prādayaḥ tam prati gatyupasargasañjñe bhavataḥ . na ca etau dādhau prati kriyāyogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1972: . yadi evam iha api tarhi na prāpnoti praṇidāpayati praṇidhāpayati . atra api na
GS24pmbhasuu:1973: etau dādhau arthavantau na api etau dādhau prati kriyāyogaḥ . na vā arthavataḥ hi
GS24pmbhasuu:1974: āgamaḥ tadguṇībhūtaḥ tadgrahaṇena gṛhyate yathā anyatra . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:1975: kāraṇam . arthavataḥ āgamaḥ tadguṇībhūtaḥ arthavadgrahaṇena gṛhyate yathā anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:1976: . tat yathā . anyatra api arthavataḥ āgamaḥ arthavadgrahaṇena gṛhyate . kva anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:1977: . lavitā cikīrṣitā iti . yuktam punaḥ yat nityeṣu nāma śabdeṣu āgamaśāsanam syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1978: na nityeṣu śabdeṣu kūṭasthaiḥ avicālibhiḥ varṇaiḥ bhavitavyam anapāyopajanavikāribhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1979: . āgamaḥ ca nāma apūrvaḥ śabdopajanaḥ . atha yuktam yat nityeṣu śabdeṣu ādeśāḥ syuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1980: . bāḍham yuktam . śabdāntaraiḥ iha bhavitavyam . tatra śabdāntarāt śabdāntarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1981: pratipattiḥ yuktā . ādeśāḥ tarhi ime bhaviṣyanti anāgamakānām sāgamakāḥ . tat katham
GS24pmbhasuu:1982: . sarve sarvapadādeśāḥ dākṣīputrasya pāṇineḥ ekadeśavikāre hi nityatvam na upapadyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:1984: 245-246 dīṅaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ sthāghvoḥ ittve . dīṅaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ sthāghvoḥ ittve vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1985: . upādāsta asya svaraḥ śikṣakasya iti . mīnātiminoti iti āttve kṛte sthāghvoḥ it
GS24pmbhasuu:1986: ca iti ittvam prāpnoti . kutaḥ punaḥ ayam doṣaḥ jāyate . kim prakṛtigrahaṇāt āhosvit
GS24pmbhasuu:1987: rūpagrahaṇāt . rūpagrahaṇāt iti āha . iha khalu prakṛtigrahaṇāt doṣaḥ jāyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:1988: upadidīṣate . sani mīmāghurabhalabha iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . dāprakṛtiḥ iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:1989: . na ca iyam dāprakṛtiḥ . ākārāntānām ejantāḥ prakṛtayaḥ ejantānām api īkārāntāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1990: . na ca prakṛtiprakṛtiḥ prakṛtigrahaṇena gṛhyate . saḥ tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1991: . na vaktavyaḥ . ghusañjñā kasmāt na bhavati . sannipātalakṣaṇaḥ vidhiḥ animittam
GS24pmbhasuu:1994: 246-247 dāppratiṣedhe na daipi anejantatvāt . dāppratiṣedhe daipi pratiṣedhaḥ na prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:1995: avadātam mukham . nanu ca āttve kṛte bhaviṣyati . tat hi āttvam na prāpnoti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:1996: kāraṇam . anejantatvāt . siddham anubandhasya anekāntatvāt . siddham etat . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:1997: . anubandhasya anekāntatvāt . anekāntāḥ anubandhāḥ . pitpratiṣedhāt vā . atha vā
GS24pmbhasuu:1998: dādhāḥ ghu apit iti vakṣyāmi . tat ca avaśyam vaktavyam . adāp iti hi ucyamāne iha api prasajyeta :
GS24pmbhasuu:1999: praṇidāpayati iti . śakyam tāvat anena adāp iti bruvatā bāntasya pratiṣedhaḥ vijñātum
GS24pmbhasuu:2000: . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam dappratiṣedhe na daipi
GS24pmbhasuu:2001: iti . parihṛtam etat siddham anubandhasya anekāntatvāt iti . atha ekānteṣu doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2002: eva . ekānteṣu ca na doṣaḥ . āttve kṛte bhaviṣyati . nanu ca uktam tat hi āttvam
GS24pmbhasuu:2003: na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . anejantatvāt iti . pakāralope kṛte bhaviṣyati . na hi
GS24pmbhasuu:2004: ayam tadā dāp bhavati . bhūtapūrvagatyā bhaviṣyati . etat ca atra yuktam yat sarveṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:2005: eva sānubandhakagrahaṇeṣu bhūtapūrvagatiḥ vijñāyate . anaimittikaḥ hi anubandhalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2006: tāvati eva bhavati . atha vā ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na anubandhakṛtam anejantatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:2007: iti yat ayam udīcām māṅaḥ vyatīhāre iti meṅaḥ sānubandhakasya āttvabhūtasya grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2008: karoti . atha vā dāp eva ayam na daip asti . katham avadāyayati iti . śyan vikaraṇaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:2010: 247-252 kimartham idam ucyate . sati anyasmin ādyantavadbhāvāt ekasmin ādyantavadvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:2011: . sati anyasmin yasmāt pūrvam na asti param asti saḥ ādiḥ iti ucyate . sati anyasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:2012: yasmāt param na asti pūrvam asti saḥ antaḥ iti ucyate . sati anyasmin ādyantavadbhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2013: etasmāt kāraṇāt ekasmin ādyantāpadiṣṭāni kāryāṇi na sidhyanti . iṣyante ca syuḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2014: . tāni antareṇa yatnam na sidhyanti iti ekasmin ādyantavadvacanam . evamartham idam
GS24pmbhasuu:2015: ucyate . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . tatra vyapadeśivadvacanam . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:2016: vyapadeśivadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . vyapadeśivat ekasmin kāryam bhavati iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2017: . kim prayojanam . ekācaḥ dve prathamārtham . vakṣyati ekācaḥ dve prathamasya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2018: bahuvrīhinirdeśaḥ iti . tasmin kriyamāṇe iha eva :
GS24pmbhasuu:2020: āra iti atra na syāt . vyapdeśivat ekasmin kāryam bhavati iti atra api siddham bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2021: . ṣatve ca ādeśasampratyayārtham . vakṣyati ādeśapratyayayoḥ iti avayavaṣaṣṭhī eva
GS24pmbhasuu:2022: iti . etasmin kriyamāṇe iha eva syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:2025: saḥ devan yakṣat . vyapdeśivat ekasmin kāryam bhavati iti atra api siddham bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2026: . saḥ tarhi vyapadeśivadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . avacanāt lokavijñānāt siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:2027: . antareṇa eva vacanam lokavijñānāt siddham etat . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:2028: loke śālāsamudāyaḥ grāmaḥ iti ucyate . bhavati ca etat ekasmin api ekaśālaḥ grāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2029: iti . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . grāmaśabdaḥ ayam bahvarthaḥ . asti eva śālāsamudāye vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:2030: . tat yathā grāmaḥ dagdhaḥ iti . asti vāṭaparikṣepe vartate . tat yathā grāmam praviṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2031: . asti manuṣyeṣu vartate . tat yathā . grāmaḥ gataḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2032: grāmaḥ āgataḥ iti . asti sāraṇyake sasīmake sasthaṇḍilake vartate . tat yathā grāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2033: labdhaḥ iti . tat yaḥ sāraṇyake sasīmake sasthaṇḍilake vartate tam abhisamīkṣya etat prayujyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:2034: ekaśālaḥ grāmaḥ iti . yathā tarhi varṇasamudāyaḥ padam padasamudāyaḥ ṛk ṛksamudāyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2035: sūktam iti ucyate . bhavati ca etat ekasmin api ekavarṇam padam ekapadā ṛk ekarcam
GS24pmbhasuu:2036: sūktam iti . atra api arthena yuktaḥ vyapadeśaḥ . padam nāma arthaḥ sūktam nama arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2037: . yathā tarhi bahuṣu putreṣu etat upapannam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2038: bhavati ayam me jyeṣṭhaḥ ayam eva me madhyamaḥ ayam eva me kanīyān iti . bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2039: ca etat ekasmin api ayam eva me jyeṣṭhaḥ ayam me madhyamaḥ ayam me kanīyān iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2040: tathā asūtāyām asoṣyamāṇāyām ca bhavati prathamagarbheṇa hatā iti . tathā anetya
GS24pmbhasuu:2041: anājigamiṣuḥ āha idam me prathamam āgamanam iti . ādyantavadbhāvaḥ ca śakyaḥ avaktum
GS24pmbhasuu:2042: . katham . apūrvānuttaralakṣaṇatvāt ādyantayoḥ siddham ekasmin . apūrvalakṣaṇaḥ ādiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2043: anuttaralakṣaṇaḥ antaḥ . etat ca ekasmin api bhavati . apūrvānuttaralakṣaṇatvāt etasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2044: kāraṇāt ekasmin api ādyantāpadiṣṭani kāryāṇi bhaviṣyanti . na arthaḥ ādyantavadbhāvena
GS24pmbhasuu:2045: . gonardīyaḥ tu āha satyam etat sati tu anyasmin iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2047: 252-254 kāni punaḥ asya yogasya prayojanāni . ādivattve prayojanam pratyayañnidādyudāttatve . pratyayasya ādiḥ udāttaḥ bhavati iti iha eva syāt : kartavyam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2049: kāpaṭavaḥ iti atra na syāt . ñniti ādiḥ nityam iti iha eva syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:2052: kṛtiḥ iti atra na syāt . valādeḥ ārdhadhātukasya iṭ . valādeḥ ārdhadhātukasya iṭ prayojanam . ārdhadhātukasya iṭ valādeḥ iha eva :
GS24pmbhasuu:2054: manidṣat iti atra na syāt . yasmin vidhiḥ tadāditve . yasmin vidhiḥ tadāditve prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:2055: . vakṣyati yasmin vidhiḥ tadādau algrahaṇe iti . tasmin kriyamāṇe aci śnudhātubhruvām
GS24pmbhasuu:2056: yvoḥ iyaṅuvaṅau iha eva syāt : śriyaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2057: bhruvaḥ . śriyau bhruvau iti atra na syāt . ajādyāṭtve . ajādyāṭtve prayojanam . āṭ ajādīnām iha eva syāt : aihiṣṭa ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2059: adhyaiṣṭa iti atra na syāt . atha antavattve kāni prayojanāni . antavat dvivacanāntapragṛhyatve
GS24pmbhasuu:2060: . antavat dvivacanāntapragṛhyatve prayojanam . īdūdet dvivacanam pragṛhyam iha eva syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:2061: pacete* iti pacethe* iti . khaṭve* iti māle* iti iti atra na syāt . mit acaḥ antyāt paraḥ . mit acaḥ antyāt paraḥ prayojanam . iha eva syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2062: kuṇḍāni vanāni . tāni yāni iti atra na syāt . acaḥ antyādi ṭi . acaḥ antyādi ṭi prayojanam . ṭitaḥ ātmanepadānām ṭeḥ e iti iha eva syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:2063: kurvāte kurvāthe . kurute kurve iti atra na syāt . alaḥ antyasya . alaḥ antyasya prayojanam . ataḥ dīrghaḥ yañi supi ca iha eva syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:2065: paṭābhyām . ābhyām iti atra na syāt . yena vidiḥ tadantatve . yena vidiḥ tadantatve prayojanam . acaḥ yat iha eva syāt : ceyam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2066: jeyam . eyam adhyeyam iti atra na syāt . ādyantavat ekasmin kāryam bhavati iti atra api siddham bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:2068: 255-256 ghasañjñāyām nadītare pratiṣedhaḥ . ghasañjñāyām nadītare pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2069: . nadyāḥ taraḥ nadītaraḥ iti . ghasañjñāyām nadītare apratiṣedhaḥ . anarthakaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2070: apratiṣedhaḥ . ghasañjñā kasmāt na bhavati . tarabgrahaṇam hi aupadeśikam . aupadeśikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2071: tarapaḥ grahaṇam . na ca eṣaḥ upadeśe tarapśabdaḥ . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi .
GS24pmbhasuu:2072: katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . iha hi vyākaraṇe sarveṣu eva sānubandhakeṣu grahaṇeṣu rūpam āśrīyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:2073: yatra etat rūpam iti . rūpanirgrahaḥ ca na antareṇa laukikam prayogam . tasmin ca
GS24pmbhasuu:2074: laukike prayoge sānubandhakānām prayogaḥ na asti iti kṛtvā dvitīyaḥ prayogaḥ upāsyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2075: . kaḥ asau . upadeśaḥ nāma . na ca eṣaḥ upadeśe tarapśabdaḥ . atha vā astu asya ghasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:2076: . kaḥ doṣaḥ . ghādiṣu nadyāḥ hrasvaḥ bhavati iti hrasvatvam prasajyeta . samānādhikaraṇeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:2077: ghādiṣu iti evam tat . yadā tarhi sā eva nadī saḥ eva taraḥ tadā prāpnoti . strīliṅgeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:2078: eva ghādiṣu iti evam tat . avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam . samānādhikaraṇeṣu ghādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:2079: iti ucyamāne iha prasajyeta mahiṣī rūpam iva brāhmaṇī rūpam iva .
GS24pmbhasuu:2082: . bahugaṇvatuḍatayaḥ saṅkhyāsañjñāḥ bhavanti . saṅkhyā ca saṅkhyāsañjñā bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2083: vaktavvyam . kim prayojanam . saṅkhyāsampratyayārtham . ekādikāyāḥ saṅkhyāyāḥ saṅkhyāpradeśeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:2084: saṅkhyā iti eṣaḥ sampratyayaḥ yathā syāt . nanu ca ekādikā saṅkhyā loke saṅkhyā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2085: pratītā . tena asyāḥ saṅkhyāpradeśeṣu saṅkhyāsampratyayaḥ bhaviṣyati . evam api kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2086: . itarathā hi asampratyayaḥ akṛtrimatvāt yathā loke . akriyamāṇe hi saṅkhyāgrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:2087: ekādikāyāḥ saṅkhyāyāḥ saṅkhyā iti sampratyayaḥ na syāt . kim kāraṇam . akṛtrimatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2088: . bahvādīnām kṛtrimā sañjñā . kṛtrimākṛtrimayoḥ kṛtrime kāryasampratyayaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2089: yathā loke . tat yathā loke gopālakam ānaya kaṭajakam ānaya iti yasya eṣā sañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:2090: bhavati saḥ ānīyate na yaḥ gāḥ pālayati yaḥ vā kaṭe jātaḥ . yadi tarhi kṛtrimākṛtrimayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2091: kṛtrime sampratyayaḥ bhavati nadīpaurṇamāsyāgrahāyaṇībhyaḥ iti atra api prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:2092: . paurṇamāsyāgrahāyaṇīgrahaṇasāmarthyāt na bhaviṣyati . tadviśeṣebhyaḥ tarhi prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2093: gaṅgā yamunā iti . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na tadviśeṣebhyaḥ bhavati iti yat ayam vipāṭśabdam śaratprabhṛtiṣu paṭhati . iha tarhi prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2094: nadībhiḥ ca iti . bahuvacananirdeśāt na bhaviṣyati . svarūpavidhiḥ tarhi prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:2095: . bahuvacananirdeśāt eva na bhaviṣyati . evam na ca idam akṛtam bhavati kṛtrimākṛtrimayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2096: kṛtrime sampratyayaḥ iti na ca kaḥ cit doṣaḥ . uttarārtham ca . uttarārtham ca saṅkhyāgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2097: kartavyam . ṣṇāntā ṣaṭ . ṣakāranakārāntāyāḥ saṅkhyāyāḥ ṣaṭsañjñā yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt : pāmānaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2098: vipruṣaḥ iti . ihārthena tāvat na arthaḥ saṅkhyāgrahaṇena . nanu ca uktam itarathā
GS24pmbhasuu:2099: hi asampratyayaḥ akṛtrimatvāt yathā loke iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . arthāt prakaraṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2100: vā loke kṛtrimākṛtrimayoḥ kṛtrime sampratyayaḥ bhavati . arthaḥ vā asya evaṃsaṅjñakena
GS24pmbhasuu:2101: bhavati prakṛtam vā tatra bhavati idam evaṃsaṅjñakena kartavyam iti. ātaḥ ca arthāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2102: prakaraṇāt vā . aṅga hi bhavān grāmyam pāṃsurapādam aprakaraṇajñam āgatam bravītu
GS24pmbhasuu:2103: gopālakam ānaya kaṭajakam ānaya iti . ubhayagatiḥ tasya bhavati sādhīyaḥ vā yaṣṭihastam
GS24pmbhasuu:2104: gamiṣyati . yathā eva tarhi arthāt prakaraṇāt vā loke kṛtrimākṛtrimayoḥ kṛtrime sampratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2105: bhavati evam iha api prāpnoti . jānāti hi asau bahvādīnām iyam sañjñā kṛtā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2106: na yathā loke tathā vyākaraṇe . ubhayagatiḥ punaḥ iha bhavati . anyatra api na avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2108: kartuḥ īpsitatamam karma iti kṛtrimā sañjñā . karmapradeśeṣu ca ubhayagatiḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2109: . karmaṇi dvitīyā iti kṛtrimasya grahaṇam kartari karmavyatihāre iti akṛtrimasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2110: . tathā sādhakatamam karaṇam iti kṛtrimā karaṇasañjñā . karaṇapradeśeṣu ca ubhayagatiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2111: bhavati . kartṛkaraṇayoḥ tṛtīyā iti kṛtrimasya grahaṇam śabdavairakalahābhrakaṇvameghebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2112: karaṇe iti akṛtrimasya . tathā ādhāraḥ adhikaraṇam iti kṛtrimā adhikaraṇasañjñā .
GS24pmbhasuu:2113: adhikaraṇepradeśeṣu ca ubhayagatiḥ bhavati . saptamī adhikaraṇe ca iti kṛtrimasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2114: grahaṇam vipratiṣiddham ca anadhikaraṇavāci iti akṛtrimasya . atha vā na idam sañjñākaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2116: bahugaṇavatuḍatayaḥ saṅkhyāvat bhavanti iti . saḥ tarhi vatinirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na hi antareṇa vatim atideśaḥ gamyate . antareṇa api vatim atideśaḥ gamyate . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:2117: eṣaḥ brahmadattaḥ . abrahmadattam brahmadattaḥ iti āha . te manyāmahe :
GS24pmbhasuu:2118: brahmadattavat ayam bhavati iti . evam iha api asaṅkhyām saṅkhyā iti āha . saṅkhyāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:2119: iti gamyate . atha vā ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati bhavati ekādikāyāḥ saṅkhyāyāḥ saṅkhyāpradeśeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:2120: saṅkhyāsampratyayaḥ iti yat ayam saṅkhyāyāḥ atiśadantāyāḥ kan iti tiśadantāyāḥ pratiṣedham
GS24pmbhasuu:2121: śāsti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . na hi kṛtrimā tyantā śadantā vā saṅkhyā asti . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:2122: ca iyam asti ḍatiḥ . yat tarhi śadantāyāḥ pratiṣedham śāsti . yat ca api tyantāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2123: pratiṣedham śāsti . nanu ca uktam ḍatyartham etat syāt iti . arthavadgrahaṇe na anarthakasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2124: iti arthavataḥ tiśabdasya grahaṇam . na ca ḍateḥ tiśabdaḥ arthavān. atha vā mahatī
GS24pmbhasuu:2125: iyam sañjñā kriyate . sañjñā ca nāma yataḥ na laghīyaḥ . kutaḥ etat . laghvartham
GS24pmbhasuu:2126: hi sañjñākaraṇam . tatra mahatyāḥ sañjñāyāḥ karaṇe etat prayojanam anvarthasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:2127: yatha vijñāyeta . saṅkhyāyate anayā saṅkhyā iti . ekādikayā ca api saṅkhyāyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:2128: uttarārthena ca api na arthaḥ saṅkhyāgrahaṇena . idam prakṛtam anuvartiṣyate . idam
GS24pmbhasuu:2129: vai sañjñārtham uttaratra ca sañjñiviśeṣaṇārthaḥ . na ca anyārtham prakṛtam anyārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:2130: bhavati . na khalu api anyat prakṛtam anuvartanāt anyat bhavati . na hi godhā sarpantī
GS24pmbhasuu:2131: sarpaṇāt ahiḥ bhavati . yat tāvat ucyate na ca anyārtham prakṛtam anyārtham bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2132: iti anyārtham api prakṛtam anyārtham bhavati . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:2133: śālyartham kulyāḥ praṇīyante tābhyaḥ ca pāṇīyam pīyate upaśpṛśyate ca śālayaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:2134: bhāvyante . yad api ucyate na khalu api anyat prakṛtam anuvartanāt anyat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2135: . na hi godhā sarpantī sarpaṇāt ahiḥ bhavati iti . bhavet dravyeṣu etat evam syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2136: . śabdaḥ tu khalu yena yena viśeṣeṇa abhisambadhyate tasya tasya viśeṣakaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2137: . atha vā sāpekṣaḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ kriyate na ca anyat kim cit apekṣyam asti . te saṅkhyām eva apekṣiṣyāmahe .
GS24pmbhasuu:2139: 263-265 adhyardhagrahaṇam ca samāsakanvidhyartham . adhyardhagrahaṇam ca kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2140: . kim prayojanam . samāsakanvidhyartham . samāsavidhyartham kandvidhyartham ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:2143: adhyardhakam . luki ca agrahaṇam . luki ca adhyardhagrahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2144: adhyardhapūrvadvigoḥ luk asañjñāyām iti . dvigoḥ iti eva siddham . ardhapūrvapadaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2145: ca pūraṇapratyayāntaḥ . ardhapūrvapadaḥ ca pūraṇapratyayāntaḥ saṅkhyāsañjñaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2146: iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . samāsakanvidhyartham . samāsavidhyartham kandvidhyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:2149: ardhapañcamakam . adhikagrahaṇam ca aluki samāsottarapadavṛddhyartham . adhikagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2150: ca aluki kartavyam . kim prayojanam . samāsottarapadavṛddhyartham . samāsavṛddhyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:2154: adhikasāptatikaḥ . aluki iti kim artham . adhikaṣāṣṭhikaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2155: adhikasāptatikaḥ . bahuvrīhau ca agrahaṇam . bahuvrīhau ca adhikaśabdasya grahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2156: saṅkhyayā avyayāsannādūrādhikasaṅkhyāḥ saṅkhyeye iti . saṅkhyā iti eva siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:2157: bahvādīnām agrahaṇam . bahvādīnām grahaṇam śakyam akartum . kena idānīm saṅkhyāpradeśeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:2158: saṅkhyasampratyayaḥ bhaviṣyati . jñāpakāt siddham . kim jñāpakam . yat ayam vatoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2159: iṭ vā iti saṅkhyāyāḥ vihitasya kanaḥ vatvantāt iṭam śāsti . vatoḥ eva tat jñāpakam
GS24pmbhasuu:2160: syāt . na iti āha . yogāpekṣam jñāpakam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2162: 265-269 ṣaṭsañjñāyām upadeśavacanam . ṣaṭsañjñāyām upadeśagrahaṇam kartavyam . upadeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:2163: ṣakāranakārāntā saṅkhyā ṣaṭsañjñā bhavati iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . śatādyaṣṭanoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2164: numnuḍartham . śatāni sahasrāṇi . numi kṛte ṣṇāntā ṣaṭ iti ṣaṭsañjñā prāpnoti . upadeśagrahaṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2165: na bhavati . aṣṭānām iti atra ātve kṛte ṣaṭsañjñā na prāpnoti . upadeśagrahaṇāt bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2166: . uktam vā . kim uktam . iha tāvat śatāni sahasrāṇi iti . sannipātalakṣaṇaḥ vidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2167: animittam tadvighātasya iti . aṣṭanaḥ api uktam . kim uktam . aṣṭanaḥ dīrghagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2168: ṣaṭsañjñājñāpakam ākārāntasya nuḍartham iti . atha vā ākāraḥ api atra nirdiśyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2169: . ṣakārāntā nakārāntā ākārāntā ca saṅkhyā ṣaṭsañjñā bhavati iti . iha api tarhi prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2170: sadhamadhaḥ dyumnaḥ ekāḥ taḥ ekāḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ekaśabdaḥ ayam bahvarthaḥ . asti eva saṅkhyāpadam . tat yathā : ekaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2172: bahavaḥ iti . asti asahāyavācī . tat yathā : ekāgnayaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2174: ekākibhiḥ kṣudrakaiḥ jitam iti . asahāyaiḥ iti arthaḥ . asti anyārthe vartate . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:2175: prajam ekā rakṣati urjam ekā iti . anyā iti arthaḥ . sadhamadaḥ dyumnaḥ ekāḥ taḥ . anyāḥ iti arthaḥ . tat yaḥ anyārthe vartate tasya eṣaḥ prayogaḥ . iha tarhi prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2176: dvabhyām iṣṭaye viṃśatya ca iti . evam tarhi saptame yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . aṣṭābhyaḥ auś . tataḥ ṣaḍbhyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2177: ṣaḍbhyaḥ ca yat uktam aṣṭābhyaḥ api tat bhavati . tataḥ luk :
GS24pmbhasuu:2178: luk ca bhavati ṣaḍbhyaḥ iti . atha vā upariṣṭāt yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . aṣṭanaḥ ā vibhaktau . tataḥ rāyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2179: rāyaḥ ca vibhaktau ākārādeśaḥ bhavati . hali iti ubhayoḥ śeṣaḥ . yadi evam priyāṣṭau priyāṣṭāḥ iti na sidhyati priyāṣṭānau priyāṣṭānaḥ iti ca prāpnoti . yathālakṣaṇam aprayukte .
GS24pmbhasuu:2181: 269 idam ḍatigrahaṇam dviḥ kriyate saṅkhyāsañjñāyām ṣaṭsañjñāyām ca . ekam śakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2182: akartum . katham . yadi tāvat saṅkhyāsañjñāyām kriyate ṣaṭsañjñāyām na kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2183: . katham . ṣṇāntā ṣaṭ iti atra ḍati iti anuvartiṣyate . atha ṣaṭsañjñāyām kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2184: saṅkhyāsañjñāyām na kariṣyate . ḍati ca iti atra saṅkhyāsañjñā anuvartiṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:2187: kartavyaḥ . lotaḥ gartaḥ iti . niṣṭhāsañjñāyām samānaśabdāpratiṣedhaḥ . niṣṭhāsañjñāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:2188: samānaśabdapratiṣedhaḥ . anarthakaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ . niṣṭhāsañjñā kasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2189: na bhavati . anubandhaḥ anyatvakaraḥ . anubandhaḥ kriyate . saḥ anyatvam kariṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:2190: . anubandhaḥ anyatvakaraḥ iti cet na lopāt . anubandhaḥ anyatvakaraḥ iti cet tat
GS24pmbhasuu:2191: na . kim kāraṇam . lopāt . lupyate atra anubandhaḥ . lupte atra anubandhe na anyatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:2193: katarat devadattasya gṛham . adaḥ yatra asau kākaḥ iti . utpatite kāke naṣṭam tat
GS24pmbhasuu:2194: gṛham bhavati . evam iha api lupte anubandhe naṣṭaḥ pratyayaḥ bhavati . yadi api
GS24pmbhasuu:2195: lupyate jānāti tu asau sānubandhakasya iyam sañjñā kṛtā iti . tat yathā itaratra api :
GS24pmbhasuu:2196: katarat devadattasya gṛham . adaḥ yatra asau kākaḥ iti . utpatite kāke yadi api naṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:2197: tat gṛham bhavati antataḥ tam uddeśam jānāti . siddhaviparyāsaḥ ca . siddhaḥ ca viparyāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2198: . yadi api jānāti sandehaḥ tasya bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2199: ayam saḥ taśabdaḥ lotaḥ gartaḥ iti ayam saḥ taśabdaḥ lūnaḥ gīrṇaḥ iti . tat yathā itaratra api :
GS24pmbhasuu:2200: katarat devadattasya gṛham . adaḥ yatra asau kākaḥ iti . utpatite kāke yadi api naṣṭam tat gṛham bhavati antataḥ tam uddeśam jānāti . sandehaḥ tu tasya bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2201: idam tat gṛham idam tat gṛham iti . evam tarhi . kārakakālaviśeṣāt siddham . kārakakālaviśeṣau
GS24pmbhasuu:2202: upādeyau . bhūte yaḥ taśabdaḥ kartari karmaṇi bhāve ca iti . tat yathā itaratra api
GS24pmbhasuu:2203: . yaḥ eṣaḥ manuṣyaḥ prekṣāpūrvakārī bhavati saḥ adhruveṇa nimittena dhruvam nimittam
GS24pmbhasuu:2204: upādatte vedikām puṇḍarīkam vā . evam api prākīrṣṭa iti atra prāpnoti . luṅi sijādidarśanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2205: . luṅi sijādidarśanāt na bhaviṣyati . yatra tarhi sijādayaḥ na dṛśyante prābhitta
GS24pmbhasuu:2206: iti . dṛśyante atra api sijādayaḥ . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam
GS24pmbhasuu:2207: gaṃsyate . yathā eva ayam anupadiṣṭān kārakakālaviśeṣān avagacchati evam etat api avagantum arhati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2210: 273-274 sarvādīni iti kaḥ ayam samāsaḥ . bahuvrīhiḥ iti āha . kaḥ asya vigrahaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2211: sarvaśabdaḥ ādiḥ yeṣām tāni imāni iti . yadi evam sarvaśabdasya sarvanāmasañjñā na
GS24pmbhasuu:2212: prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . anyapadārthatvāt bahuvrīheḥ . bahuvrīhiḥ ayam anyapadārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:2213: vartate . tena yat anyat sarvaśabdāt tasya sarvanāmasñjñā prāpnoti . tat yathā citraguḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2214: ānīyatām iti ukte yasya tāḥ gāvaḥ bhavanti sa ānīyate na gāvaḥ . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2215: bhavati bahuvrīhau tadguṇasaṃvijñānam api . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:2216: citravāsam ānaya . lohitoṣṇīṣāḥ ṛtvijaḥ pracaranti . tadguṇaḥ ānīyate tadguṇāḥ ca pracaranti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2218: 274-277 iha sarvanāmāni iti pūrvapadāt sañjñāyām agaḥ iti ṇatvam prāpnoti . tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2219: pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . sarvanāmasañjñāyām nipātanāt ṇatvābhāvaḥ . sarvanāmasañjñāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:2220: nipātanāt ṇatvam na bhaviṣyati . kim etat nipātanam nāma . atha kaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ nāma
GS24pmbhasuu:2221: . aviśeṣeṇa kim cit uktvā viśeṣeṇa na iti ucyate . tatra vyaktam ācāryasya abhiprāyaḥ gamyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:2222: idam na bhavati iti . nipātanam api evañjātīyakam eva . aviśeṣeṇa ṇatvam uktvā viśeṣeṇa nipātanam kriyate . tatra vyaktam ācāryasya abhiprāyaḥ gamyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:2223: idam na bhavati iti . nanu ca nipātanāt ca aṇatvam syāt yathāprāptam ca ṇatvam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2224: kim anye api evam vidhayaḥ bhavanti . iha ikaḥ yaṇ aci iti vacanāt ca yaṇ syāt yathāprāptaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2225: ca ik śrūyeta . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . asti atra viśeṣaḥ . ṣaṣṭhyā atra nirdeśaḥ kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2226: . ṣaṣṭhī ca punaḥ sthāninam nivartayati . iha tarhi :
GS24pmbhasuu:2227: kartari śap divādibhyaḥ śyan iti vacanāt ca śyan syāt yathāprāptaḥ ca śap śrūyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:2228: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . śabādeśāḥ śyanādayaḥ kariṣyante . tat tarhi śapaḥ grahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2229: . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . kartari śap iti . tat vai prathamānirdiṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:2230: ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭena ca iha arthaḥ . divādibhyaḥ iti eṣā pañcamī śap iti prathamāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2232: tasmāt iti uttarasya . pratyayavidhiḥ ayam . na ca pratyayavidhau pañcamyaḥ prakalpikāḥ bhavanti . na ayam pratyayavidhiḥ . vihitaḥ pratyayaḥ prakṛtaḥ ca anuvartate . iha tarhi :
GS24pmbhasuu:2233: avyayasarvanāmnām akac prāk ṭeḥ iti . vacanāt ca akac syāt yathāprāptaḥ ca kaḥ śrūyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:2234: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na aprāpte hi ke akac ārabhyate . saḥ bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . nipātanam
GS24pmbhasuu:2235: api evañjātīyakam eva . na aprāpte ṇatve nipātanam ārabhyate . tat bādhakam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:2236: . yadi tarhi nipātanāni api evañjātīyakāni bhavanti samaḥ tate doṣaḥ bhavati . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:2237: anye vaiyākaraṇāḥ samaḥ tate vibhāṣā lopam ārabhante :
GS24pmbhasuu:2238: samaḥ hi tatayoḥ vā iti . satatam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2241: saṃhitam iti . iha punaḥ bhavān nipātanāt ca malopam icchati aparasparāḥ kriyāsātatye
GS24pmbhasuu:2242: iti yathāprāptam ca alopam santatam iti . etat na sidhyati . kartavyaḥ atra yatnaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2246: vaktavyaḥ . sarvaḥ nāma kaḥ cit . tasmai sarvāya dehi . atisarvāya dehi . saḥ katham
GS24pmbhasuu:2247: kartavyaḥ . pāṭhāt paryudāsaḥ paṭhitānām sañjñākaraṇam . pāṭhāt eva paryudāsaḥ kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2248: . śuddhānām paṭhitānām sañjñā kartavyā . sarvādīni sarvanāmasañjñāni bhavanti . sañjñopasarjanībhūtāni
GS24pmbhasuu:2249: na sarvādīni . kim aviśeṣeṇa . na iti āha . viśeṣeṇa ca . kim prayojanam . sarvādyānantaryakāryārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:2250: . sarvādīnām ānantaryeṇa yat ucyate kāryam tat api sañjñopasarjanībhūtānām mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:2251: iti . kim prayojanam . prayojanam ḍatarādīnām adbhāve . ḍatarādīnām adbhāve prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:2253: atikataram brāhmaṇakulam iti . tyadādividhau ca . tyadādividhau ca prayojanam . atikrāntaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2254: ayam brāhmaṇaḥ tam atitat brāhmaṇaḥ iti . sañjāpratiṣedhaḥ tāvat na vaktavyaḥ . upariṣṭāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2256: asañjñāyām iti . sarvādīni iti evam yāni anukrāntāni asañjñāyām tāni draṣṭavyāni
GS24pmbhasuu:2257: . upasarjanapratiṣedhaḥ ca na kartavyaḥ . anupasarjanāt iti eṣaḥ yogaḥ pratyākhyāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2259: anupasarjana* a* at iti . kim idam a* at iti . akārātkārau śiṣyamāṇau anupasarjanasya draṣṭavyau . yadi evam atiyuṣmat atyasmat iti na sidhyati . praśliṣṭanirdeśaḥ ayam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2260: anupasarjana* a* a* at iti . akārāntāt akārātkārau śiṣyamāṇau anupasarjanasya draṣṭavyau
GS24pmbhasuu:2261: . atha vā aṅgādhikāre yat ucyate gṛhyamāṇavibhakteḥ tat bhavati . yadi evam paramapañca
GS24pmbhasuu:2262: paramasapta ṣaḍbhyaḥ luk iti luk na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ṣaṭpradhānaḥ eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2263: samāsaḥ . iha tarhi priyasakthnā brāhmaṇena anaṅ na prāpnoti . saptamīnirdiṣṭe yat
GS24pmbhasuu:2264: ucyate prakṛtavibhaktau tat bhavati . yadi evam atitat ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2266: atitadaḥ iti atvam prāpnoti . tat ca api vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . iha tāvat adḍ
GS24pmbhasuu:2267: ḍatarādibhyaḥ pañcabhyaḥ iti pañcamī aṅgasya iti ṣaṣṭhī . tatra aśakyam vivibhaktitvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2268: ḍatarādibhyaḥ iti pañcamyā aṅgam viśeṣayitum . tatra kim anyat śakyam viśeṣayitum
GS24pmbhasuu:2269: anyat ataḥ vihitāt pratyayāt . ḍatarādibhyaḥ yaḥ vihitaḥ iti . iha idānīm asthidadhisakhthyakṣṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:2270: anaṅ udāttaḥ iti tyadādīnām aḥ bhavati iti asthyādīnām iti eṣā ṣaṣṭhī aṅgasya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2271: api tyadādīnām iti api ṣaṣṭhī aṅgasya iti api . tatra kāmacāraḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2272: gṛhyamāṇena vā vibhaktim viśeṣayitum aṅgena vā . yāvatā kāmacāraḥ iha tāvat asthidadhisakhthyakṣṇām anaṅ udāttaḥ iti aṅgena vibhaktim viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ asthyādibhiḥ anaṅam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2273: aṅgasya vibhaktau anaṅ bhavati asthyādīnām iti . iha idānīm tyadādīnām aḥ bhavati iti gṛhyamāṇena vibhaktim viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ aṅgena akāram :
GS24pmbhasuu:2274: tyadādīnām vibhaktau aḥ bhavati aṅgasya iti . yadi evam atisaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2275: atvam na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . tyadādipradhānaḥ eṣaḥ samāsaḥ . atha vā na idam sañjñākaraṇam . pāṭhaviśeṣaṇam idam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2276: sarveṣām yāni nāmāni tāni sarvādīni . sañjñopasarjane ca viśeṣe avatiṣṭhete . yadi evam sañjñāśrayam yat kāryam tat na sidhyati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2278: āmi sarvanāmnaḥ suṭ iti . anvarthagrahaṇam tatra vijñāsyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:2279: sarveṣām yat nāma tat sarvanāma . sarvanāmnaḥ uttarasya ṅeḥ smai bhavati . sarvanāmnaḥ uttarasya āmaḥ suṭ bhavati . yadi evam sakalam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2281: jagat iti atra api prāpnoti . eteṣām ca api śabdānām ekaikasya saḥ saḥ viṣayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2282: tasmin tasmin viṣaye yaḥ yaḥ śabdaḥ vartate tasya tasya tasmin tasmin vartamānasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2283: sarvanāmakāryam prāpnoti . evam tarhi ubhayam anena kriyate . pāṭhaḥ ca eva viśeṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2284: sañjñā ca . katham punaḥ ekena yatnena ubhayam labhyam . labhyam iti āha . katham.
GS24pmbhasuu:2286: sarvādīni ca sarvādīni ca sarvādīni . sarvanāmāni ca sarvanāmāni ca sarvanāmāni . sarvādīni sarvanānasañjñāni bhavanti . sarveṣām yāni ca nāmāni tāni sarvādīni .
GS24pmbhasuu:2287: sañjñopasarjane ca viśeṣe avatiṣṭhete . atha vā mahatī iyam sañjñā kriyate . sañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:2288: ca nāma yataḥ na laghīyaḥ . kutaḥ etat . laghvartham hi sañjñākaraṇam . tatra mahatyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2289: sañjñāyāḥ karaṇe etat prayojanam anvarthasañjñā yathā vijñāyeta . sarvādīni sarvanānasañjñāni
GS24pmbhasuu:2290: bhavanti sarveṣām nāmāni iti ca ataḥ sarvanāmāni . sañjñopasarjane ca viśeṣe avatiṣṭhete .
GS24pmbhasuu:2292: 286-289 atha ubhasya sarvanāmatve kaḥ arthaḥ . ubhasya sarvanāmatve akajarthaḥ . ubhasya sarvanāmatve akajarthaḥ pāṭhaḥ kriyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:2293: ubhakau . kim ucyate akajarthaḥ iti na punaḥ anyāni api sarvanāmakāryāṇi . anyābhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2294: dvivacanaṭābviṣayatvāt . anyeṣām sarvanāmkāryāṇām abhāvaḥ . kim kāraṇam . dvivacanaṭābviṣayatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2295: . ubhaśabdaḥ ayam dvivacanaṭābviṣayaḥ . anyāni ca sarvanāmakāryāṇi ekavacanabahuvacaneṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:2296: ucyante . yadā punaḥ ayam ubhaśabdaḥ dvivacanaṭābviṣayaḥ kaḥ idānīm asya anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:2297: bhavati . ubhayaḥ anyatra . ubhayaśabdaḥ asya anyatra bahvati . ubhaye devamanuṣyāḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2298: ubhayaḥ maṇiḥ iti . kim ca syāt yadi atra akac na syāt . kaḥ prasajyeta . kaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:2299: idānīm kākacoḥ viśeṣaḥ . ubhaśabdaḥ ayam dvivacanaṭābviṣayaḥ iti uktam . tatra akaci
GS24pmbhasuu:2300: sati akacaḥ tanmadhyapatitatvāt śakyate etat vaktum :
GS24pmbhasuu:2301: dvivacanaparaḥ ayam iti . ke punaḥ sati na ayam dvivacanaparaḥ syāt . tatra dvivacanaparatā
GS24pmbhasuu:2302: vaktavyā . yathā eva tarhi ke sati na ayam dvivacanaparaḥ evam āpi api sati na ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:2303: dvivacanaparaḥ syāt . tatra api dvivacanaparatā vaktavyā . avacanāt api tatparavijñānam
GS24pmbhasuu:2304: . antareṇa api vacanam āpi dvivacanaparaḥ ayam bhaviṣyati . kim vaktavyam etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:2305: na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . ekādeśe kṛte dvivacanaparaḥ ayam antādivadbhāvena
GS24pmbhasuu:2306: . avacanāt āpi tatparavijñānam iti cet ke api tulyam . avacanāt āpi tatparavijñānam
GS24pmbhasuu:2307: iti cet ke api antareṇa vacanam dvivacanaparaḥ bhaviṣyati . katham . svārthikāḥ pratyayāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2308: prakṛtitaḥ aviśiṣṭāḥ bhavanti iti prakṛtigrahaṇena svārthikānām api grahaṇam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2309: . atha bhavataḥ sarvanāmatve kāni projanāni . bhavataḥ akaccheṣātvāni . bhavataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2312: saḥ ca bhavān ca bhavantau . ātvam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2313: bhavādṛk iti . kim punaḥ idam parigaṇanam āhosvit udāharaṇamātram . udāharaṇamātram iti āha . tṛtīyādayaḥ api hi iṣyante . sarvanāmnaḥ tṛtīyā ca :
GS24pmbhasuu:2317: 289-291 diggrahaṇam kimartham . na bahuvrīhau iti pratiṣedham vakṣyati . tatra na
GS24pmbhasuu:2318: jñāyate kva vibhāṣā kva pratiṣedhaḥ iti . diggrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2319: . digupadiṣṭe vibhāṣā anyatra pratiṣedhaḥ . atha samāsagrahaṇam kimartham. samāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2320: eva yaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ tatra yathā syāt . bahuvrīhivadbhāvena yaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ tatra mā bhūt iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2321: dakṣiṇadakṣiṇasyai dehi iti . atha bahuvrīhigrahaṇam kimartham . dvandve mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:2322: dakṣiṇottarapūrvāṇām iti . na etat asti prayojanam . dvandve ca iti pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:2323: . na aprāpte pratiṣedhe iyam paribhāṣā ārabhyate . sā yathā eva bahuvrīhau iti etam
GS24pmbhasuu:2324: pratiṣedham bādhate evam dvandve ca iti etam api bādheta . na bādhate . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2325: . yena na aprāpte tasya bādhanam bhavati . na ca aprāpte na bahuvrīhau iti etasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:2326: pratiṣedhe iyam paribhāṣā ārabhyate . dvandve ca iti etasmin punaḥ prāpte ca aprāpte
GS24pmbhasuu:2327: ca . atha vā purastāt apavādāḥ anantarān vidhīn bādhante iti evam iyam vibhāṣā na
GS24pmbhasuu:2328: bahuvrīhau iti etam pratiṣedham bādhiṣyate dvandve ca iti etam pratiṣedham na bādhiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2329: . atha vā idam tāvat ayam praṣṭavyaḥ . iha kasmāt na bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2330: yā pūrvā sā uttarā asya unmugdhasya saḥ ayam pūrvottaraḥ unmugdhaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2331: tasmai pūrvottarāya dehi . lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya eva iti . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:2332: evam na arthaḥ bahuvrīhigrahaṇena . dvandve kasmāt na bhavati . lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2333: pratipadoktasya eva iti . uttarārtham tarhi bahuvrīhigrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2334: . kriyate tatra eva bahuvrīhau iti . dvitīyam kartavyam . bahuvrīhiḥ eva yaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2335: tatra yathā syāt . bahuvrīhivadbhāvena yaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ tatra mā bhūt iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2336: ekaikasmai dehi . etat api na asti prayojanam. samāse iti vartate . tena bahuvrīhim viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2337: samāsaḥ yaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ iti . idam tarhi prayojanam . avayavabhūtasya api bahuvrīheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2338: pratiṣedhaḥ yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt vastram antaram eṣām te ime vastrāntarāḥ vasanam
GS24pmbhasuu:2339: antaram eṣām te ime vasanāntarāḥ vastrāntarāḥ ca vasanāntarāḥ ca vastrāntaravasanāntarāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2341: 291-293 kim udāharaṇam . priyaviśvāya . na etat asti prayojanam . sarvādyantasya bahuvrīheḥ pratiṣedhena bhavitavyam . vakṣyati ca etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:2342: bahuvrīhau sarvanāmasaṅkhyayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam iti . tatra viśvapriyāya iti bhavitavyam . idam tarhi :
GS24pmbhasuu:2343: dvyanyāya tryanyāya . nanu ca atra api sarvanāmnaḥ eva pūrvanipātena bhavitavyam . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . vakṣyati etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:2344: saṅkhyāsarvanāmnoḥ yaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ paratvāt tatra saṅkhyāyāḥ pūrvanipātaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2345: iti . idam ca api udāharaṇam priyaviśvāya . nanu ca uktam viśvapriyāya iti bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2347: vā priyasya iti . na khalu api avaśyam sarvādyantasya eva bahuvrīheḥ pratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:2348: bhavitavyam . kim tarhi . asarvādyantasya api bhavitavyam . kim prayojanam . akac
GS24pmbhasuu:2349: mā bhūt . kim ca syāt yadi akac syāt . kaḥ na syāt . kaḥ ca idānīm kākacoḥ viśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2350: . vyañjanānteṣu viśeṣaḥ . ahakam pitā asya makatpitṛkaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2351: tvakam pitā asya tvakatpitṛkaḥ iti prāpnoti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2352: matkapitṛkaḥ tvatkapitṛkaḥ iti ca iṣyate . katham punaḥ icchatā api bhavatā bahiraṅgena
GS24pmbhasuu:2353: pratiṣedhena antaraṅgaḥ vidhiḥ śakhyaḥ bādhitum . antaraṅgān api vidhīn bahiraṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2354: vidhiḥ bādhate gomatpriyaḥ iti yathā . kriyate tatra yatnaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2355: pratyayottarapadayoḥ ca iti . nanu ca iha api kriyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:2356: na bahuvrīhau iti . asti anyat etasya vacane prayojanam . kim . priyaviśvāya . upasarjanapratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:2357: api etat siddham . ayam khalu api bahuvrīhiḥ asti eva prāthamakalpikaḥ yasmin aikapadyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2358: aikasvaryam aikavibhaktikatvam ca . asti tādarthyāt tācchabdyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2359: bahuvrīhyarthāni padāni bahuvrīhiḥ iti . tat yat tādarthyāt tācchabdyam tasya idam
GS24pmbhasuu:2360: grahaṇam . gonardīyaḥ āha akacsvarau tu kartavyau pratyaṅgam muktasaṃśayau . tvakatpitṛkaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2363: 293-294 pratiṣedhe bhūtapūrvasya upasaṅkhyānam . pratiṣedhe bhūtapūrvasya upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . āḍhyaḥ bhūtapūrvaḥ āḍhyapūrvaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2364: āḍhyapūrvāya dehi iti . pratiṣedhe bhūtapūrvasya upasaṅkhyānānarthakyam pūrvādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:2365: vyavasthāyām iti vacanāt . pratiṣedhe bhūtapūrvasya upasaṅkhyānam narthakam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:2366: kāraṇam . pūrvādīnām vyavasthāyām iti vacanāt . pūrvādīnām vyavasthāyām sarvanāmasñjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:2367: ucyate . na ca atra vyavasthā gamyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:2369: 294 samāse iti vartamāne punaḥ samāsagrahaṇam kimartham . ayam tṛtīyāsamāsaḥ asti
GS24pmbhasuu:2370: eva prāthamakalpikaḥ yasmin aikapadyam aikasvaryam aikavibhaktikatvam ca . asti tādarthyāt tācchabdyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2371: tṛtīyāsamāsārthāni padāni tṛtīyāsamāsaḥ iti . tat yat tādarthyāt tācchabdyam tasya idam grahaṇam . atha vā samase iti vartamāne punaḥ samāsagrahaṇasya etat prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2372: yogāṅgam yathā upajāyeta . sati yogāṅge yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . tṛtīyā . tṛtīyāsamāse
GS24pmbhasuu:2373: sarvādīni sarvanāmasañjñāni na bhavanti . māsapūrvāya dehi saṃvatsarapūrvāya dehi
GS24pmbhasuu:2374: . tataḥ asamāse . asamāse ca tṛtīyāyāḥ sarvādīni sarvanāmasañjñāni na bhavanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2380: 295-297 avarādīnām ca punaḥ sūtrapāṭhe grahaṇānarthakyam gaṇe paṭhitatvāt . avarādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:2381: ca punaḥ sūtrapāṭhe grahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . gaṇe paṭhitatvāt . gaṇe hi
GS24pmbhasuu:2382: etāni paṭhyante . katham punaḥ jñāyate saḥ pūrvaḥ pāṭhaḥ ayam punaḥ pāṭhaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2383: tāni hi pūrvādīni imāni avarādīni . imāni api pūrvādīni . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2384: jñāpayati saḥ pūrvaḥ pāṭhaḥ ayam punaḥ pāṭhaḥ iti yat ayam pūrvādibhyaḥ navabhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2385: vā iti navagrahaṇam karoti . nava eva pūrvādīni . idam tarhi prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2386: vyavasthāyām asañjñāyām iti vakṣyāmi iti . etat api na asti prayojanam . evaṃviśiṣṭāni
GS24pmbhasuu:2387: eva etāni gaṇe paṭhyante . idam tarhi prayojanam dvyādiparyudāsena paryudāsaḥ mā
GS24pmbhasuu:2388: bhūt iti . etat api na asti prayojanam . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na eṣām dvyādiparyudāsena
GS24pmbhasuu:2389: paryudāsaḥ bhavati iti yat ayam pūrvatra asiddham iti nipātanam karoti . vārttikakāraḥ ca paṭhati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2390: jaśbhāvāt iti cet uttaratra abhāvāt apavādaprasaṅgaḥ iti . idam tarhi prayojanam jasi vibhāṣām vakṣyāmi iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2392: 297-298 ākhyāgrahaṇam kimartham . jñātidhanaparyāyavācī yaḥ svaśabdaḥ tasya yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt :
GS24pmbhasuu:2393: sve putrāḥ svāḥ putrāḥ sve gāvaḥ svāḥ gāvaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2396: anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . bahiryogeṇa kṛtatvāt . bahiryoge iti eva siddham . na
GS24pmbhasuu:2397: vā śāṭakayugādyartham . na vā anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . śāṭakayugādyartham . śāṭakayugādyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:2398: tarhi idam vaktavyam yatra etat na jñāyate kim antarīyam kim uttarīyam iti. atra
GS24pmbhasuu:2399: api yaḥ eṣaḥ manuṣyaḥ prekṣāpūrvakārī bhavati nirjñātam tasya bhavati idam antarīyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2402: 299 apuri iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt :
GS24pmbhasuu:2403: antarāyām puri vasati iti . vāprakaraṇe tīyasya ṅitsu upasaṅkhyānam . vāprakaraṇe tīyasya ṅitsu upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2404: dvitīyāyai dvitīyasyai tṛtīyāyai tṛtīyasyai . vibhāṣā dvitīyātṛtīyābhyām iti etat
GS24pmbhasuu:2405: na vaktavyam bhavati . kim punaḥ atra jyāyaḥ . upasaṅkhyānam eva atra jyāyaḥ . idam
GS24pmbhasuu:2409: 299-300 kimartham pṛthak grahaṇam svarādīnām kriyate na cādiṣu eva paṭhyeran . cādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:2410: vai asattvavacanānām nipātasañjñā svarādīnām punaḥ sattvavacanānām asattvavacanānām
GS24pmbhasuu:2411: ca . atha kimartham ubhe sañjñe kriyete na nipātsañjñā eva syāt . na evam śakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2412: . nipātaḥ ekāc anāṅ iti pragṛhyasañjñā uktā . sā svarādīnām api ekācām prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:2413: . evam tarhi avyayasañjñā eva astu . tat ca aśakyam . vakṣyati etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:2414: avyaye nañkunipātānām iti . tat garīyasā nyāsena parigaṇanam kartavyam syāt . tasmāt pṛthak grahaṇam kartavyam ubhe ca sañjñe kartavye .
GS24pmbhasuu:2416: 300-301 asarvavibhaktau avibhaktinimittasya upasaṅkhyānam . asarvavibhaktau avibhaktinimittasya upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2417: nānā vinā . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . sarvavibhaktiḥ hi aviśeṣāt. sarvavibhaktiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2418: hi eṣaḥ bhavati . kim kāraṇam . aviśeṣāt . aviśeṣeṇa vihitatvāt . tralādīnām ca upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:2419: . tralādīnām ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . tatra yatra tataḥ yataḥ . nanu ca viśeṣeṇa ete vidhīyante :
GS24pmbhasuu:2420: pañcamyāḥ tasil saptamyāḥ tral iti . vakṣyati etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:2423: 302-303 yadi punaḥ avibhaktiḥ śabdaḥ avyayasañjñaḥ bhavati iti ucyeta . avibhaktau
GS24pmbhasuu:2424: itaretarāśrayatvāt aprasiddhiḥ . avibhaktau itaretarāśrayatvāt aprasiddhiḥ sañjñāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2425: . kā itaretarāśrayatā . sati avibhaktitve sañjñayā bhavitavyam sañjñayā ca avibhaktitvam
GS24pmbhasuu:2427: itaretarāśrayāṇi ca kāryāṇi na prakalpante . aliṅgam asaṅkhyam iti vā . atha vā aliṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:2428: asaṅkhyam avyayam iti vaktavyam . evam api itaretarāśrayam eva bhavati . kā itaretarāśrayatā
GS24pmbhasuu:2429: . sati aliṅgāsaṅkhyatve sañjñayā bhavitavyam sañjñayā ca aliṅgāsaṅkhyatvam bhāvyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2431: itaretarāśrayāṇi ca kāryāṇi na prakalpante . na idam vācanikam aliṅgatā asaṅkhyatā ca . kim tarhi . svābhāvikam etat . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:2432: samānam īhamānānām adhīyānānām ca ke cit arthaiḥ yujyante apare na . tatra kim asmābhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2433: kartum śakyam . svābhāvikam etat . tat tarhi vaktavyam aliṅgam asaṅkhyam iti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:2434: vaktavyam . siddham tu pāṭhāt . pāṭhāt vā siddham etat. katham pāṭhaḥ kartavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2442: 303-304 atha vā punaḥ astu avibhaktiḥ śabdaḥ avyayasañjñaḥ bhavati iti eva . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:2443: ca uktam avibhaktau itaretarāśrayatvāt aprasiddhiḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . idam tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:2444: ayam praṣṭavyaḥ . yadi api vaiyākaraṇāḥ vibhaktilopam ārabhamāṇāḥ avibhaktikān śabdāñ
GS24pmbhasuu:2445: prayuñjate ye tu ete vaiyākaraṇebhyaḥ anye manuṣyāḥ katham te avibhaktikān śabdān
GS24pmbhasuu:2446: prayuñjate iti . abhijñāḥ ca punaḥ laukikāḥ ekatvādīnām arthānām . ātaḥ ca abhijñāḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2447: anyena hi vasnena ekam gām krīṇanti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2449: anyena trīn . abhijñāḥ ca na ca prayuñjate . tat etat evam sandṛśyatām :
GS24pmbhasuu:2450: artharūpam etat evañjātīyakam yena atra vibhaktiḥ na bhavati iti . tat ca api etat evam anugamyamānam dṛśyatām :
GS24pmbhasuu:2451: kim cit avyayam vibhaktyarthapradhānam kim cit kriyāpradhānam . uccaiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2453: hiruk pṛthak iti kriyāpradhānam . taddhitaḥ ca api kaḥ cit vibhaktyarthapradhānaḥ kaḥ cit kriyāpradhānaḥ . tatra yatra iti vibhaktyarthapradhānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2454: nānā vina iti kriyāpradhānaḥ . na ca etayoḥ arthayoḥ liṅgasaṅkhyābhyām yogaḥ asti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2456: 304-307 atha api asarvavibhaktiḥ iti ucyate evam api na doṣaḥ . katham . idam ca api adyatve atibahu kriyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:2459: bahuṣu bahuvacanam iti . katham tarhi . ekavacanam utsargaḥ kariṣyate . tasya dvibahvoḥ arthayoḥ dvivacanabahuvacane bādhake bhaviṣyataḥ . na ca api evam vigrahaḥ kariṣyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:2461: asarvāḥ vibhaktayaḥ asmāt iti . katham tarhi . na sarvā asarvā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2462: asarvā vibhaktiḥ asmāt iti . trikam punaḥ vibhaktisañjñam . evam gate kṛti api tulyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2463: etat māntasya kāryam grahaṇam na tatra . tataḥ pare ca abhimatāḥ kāryāḥ trayaḥ kṛdarthāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2464: grahaṇena yogāḥ . kṛttaddhitānām grahaṇam tu kāryam saṅkhyāviśeṣam hi abhiniśritāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2465: ye . teṣām pratiṣedhaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt : ekaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2467: bahavaḥ iti . tasmāt svarādigrahaṇam ca kāryam kṛttaddhitānām ca pāṭhe .
GS24pmbhasuu:2469: 307-308 pāṭhena iyam avyayasañjñā kriyate . sā iha na prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2471: paramanīcaiḥ iti . tadantavidhinā bhaviṣyati . iha api tarhi prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2472: atyuccaiḥ atyuccaisau atyuccaisaḥ iti . upasarjanasya na iti pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:2473: . saḥ tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . sarvanāmasañjñāyām prakṛtaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2474: iha anuvartiṣyate . saḥ vai tatra pratyākhyāyate . yathā saḥ tatra pratyākhyāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2475: iha api tathā śakyaḥ pratyākhyātum . katham saḥ tatra pratyākhyāyate . mahatī iyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2476: sañjñā kriyate . iyam api ca mahatī sañjñā kriyate . sañjñā ca nāma yataḥ na laghīyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2477: . kutaḥ etat . laghvartham hi sañjñākaraṇam . tatra mahatyāḥ sañjñāyāḥ karaṇe etat
GS24pmbhasuu:2479: na vyeti iti avyayam iti . kva punaḥ na vyeti . strīpuṃnapuṃsakāni sattvaguṇāḥ ekatvadvitvabahutvāni
GS24pmbhasuu:2480: ca . etān arthān ke cit viyanti ke cit na viyanti . ye na viyanti tad avyayam . sadṛśam
GS24pmbhasuu:2481: triṣu liṅgeṣu sarvāsu ca vibhaktiṣu vacaneṣu ca sarveṣu yat na vyeti tat avyayam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2484: kṛt yaḥ māntaḥ iti āhosvit kṛdantam yat māntam iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2485: kṛt yaḥ māntaḥ iti kārayām cakāra hārayām cakāra iti atra na prāpnoti . atha vijñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2486: kṛdantam yat māntam iti pratāmau pratāmaḥ iti atra api prāpnoti . yathā icchasi tathā
GS24pmbhasuu:2487: astu . astu tāvat kṛt yaḥ māntaḥ iti . katham kārayām cakāra hārayām cakāra iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2488: kim punaḥ atra avyayasañjñayā prārthyate . avyayāt iti luk yathā syāt . mā bhūt evam
GS24pmbhasuu:2489: . āmaḥ iti evam bhaviṣyati . na sidhyati . ligrahaṇam tatra anuvartate . ligrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2490: nivartiṣyate . yadi nivartate pratyayamātrasya luk prāpnoti . iṣyate ca pratyayamātrasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2491: . ātaḥ ca iṣyate . evam hi āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:2492: kṛñ ca anuprayujyate liṭi iti . yadi ca pratyayamātrasya luk bhavati tataḥ etat upapannam
GS24pmbhasuu:2493: bhavati . atha vā punaḥ astu kṛdantam yat māntam iti . katham pratāmau pratāmaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2494: . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na pratyayalakṣaṇena avyayasañjñā bhavati iti yat ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:2497: 310-318 kṛt mejantaḥ ca anikārokāraprakṛtiḥ . kṛt mejantaḥ ca anikārokāraprakṛtiḥ iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt : ādhaye ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2500: cikīrṣoḥ iti . ananyaprakṛtiḥ iti vā . atha vā ananyaprakṛtiḥ kṛt avyayasañjñaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2501: iti vaktavyam . kim punaḥ atra jyāyaḥ . ananyaprakṛtivacanam eva jyāyaḥ . idam api siddham bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2503: nagarakārebhyaḥ iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vā sannipātalakṣaṇaḥ vidhiḥ animittam
GS24pmbhasuu:2504: tadvighātasya . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam . sannipātalakṣaṇaḥ vidhiḥ animittam
GS24pmbhasuu:2505: tadvighātasya iti eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā . kaḥ punaḥ atra viśeṣaḥ eṣā vā paribhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:2506: kriyeta ananyaprakṛtiḥ iti vā ucyeta . avaśyam eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā . bahūni etasyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2507: paribhāṣāyāḥ prayojanāni . kāni punaḥ tāni . prayojanam hrasvatam tugvidheḥ grāmaṇikulam . grāmaṇikulam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2508: senānikulam iti atra hrasvatve kṛte hrasvasya piti kṛti tuk bhavati iti tuk prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:2509: . sannipātalakṣaṇaḥ vidhiḥ animittam tadvighātasya iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . na etat
GS24pmbhasuu:2510: asti prayojanam . bahiraṅgam hrasvatvam . antaraṅgaḥ tuk . asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge
GS24pmbhasuu:2512: bhrūṇhabhiḥ iti atra nalope kṛte hrasvasya piti kṛti tuk bhavati iti tuk prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:2513: . sannipātalakṣaṇaḥ vidhiḥ animittam tadvighātasya iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . etat api
GS24pmbhasuu:2514: na asti prayojanam . asiddhaḥ nalopaḥ . tasya asiddhatvāt na bhaviṣyati . udupadhatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:2515: akittvasya nikucite . udupadhatvam akittvasya animittam . kva . nikucite . nikucitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2516: iti atra nalope kṛte udupadhāt bhāvādikarmaṇoḥ anyatarasyām iti akittvam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:2517: . sannipātalakṣaṇaḥ vidhiḥ animittam tadvighātasya iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . etat api
GS24pmbhasuu:2518: na asti prayojanam . astu atra akittvam . na dhātulope ārdhadhātuke iti pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2519: bhaviṣyati . nābhāvaḥ yañi dīrghatvasya amunā . nābhāvaḥ yañi dīrghatvasya asnimittam
GS24pmbhasuu:2520: . kva . amunā . nābhāve kṛte ataḥ dīrghaḥ yañi supi ca iti dīrghatvam prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2521: sannipātalakṣaṇaḥ vidhiḥ animittam tadvighātasya iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . etat api
GS24pmbhasuu:2523: na mu ṭādeśe iti . āttvam kittvasya upādāsta . āttvam kittvasya animittam . kva .
GS24pmbhasuu:2524: upādāsta asya svaraḥ śikṣakasya iti . āttve kṛte sthāghvoḥ it ca iti ittvam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:2525: . sannipātalakṣaṇaḥ vidhiḥ animittam tadvighātasya iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . etat api
GS24pmbhasuu:2527: dīṅaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ sthāghvoḥ ittve iti . tisṛcatasṛtvam ṅībvidheḥ . tisṛcatasṛtvam
GS24pmbhasuu:2528: ṅībvidheḥ animittam . tisraḥ tiṣṭhanti catasraḥ tiṣṭhanti . tisṛcatasṛbhāve kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:2529: ṛnnebhyaḥ ṅīp iti ṅīp prāpnoti . sannipātalakṣaṇaḥ vidhiḥ animittam tadvighātasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2530: iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na
GS24pmbhasuu:2531: tisṛcatasṛbhāve kṛte ṅīp bhavati iti yat ayam na tisṛcatasṛ iti nāmi dīrghatvapratiṣedham
GS24pmbhasuu:2533: śatāni sahasrāṇi . numi kṛte ṣṇāntā ṣaṭ it ṣaṭsañjñā prāpnoti . sannipātalakṣaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2534: vidhiḥ animittam tadvighātasya iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . śakaṭau paddhatau . attve kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:2536: sannipātalakṣaṇaḥ vidhiḥ animittam tadvighātasya iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . iyeṣa ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2537: uvoṣa . guṇe kṛte ijādeḥ ca gurumataḥ anṛcchaḥ iti ām prāpnoti . sannipātalakṣaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2538: vidhiḥ animittam tadvighātasya iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . tasya doṣaḥ varṇāśrayaḥ pratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2539: varṇavicālasya . tasya etasya lakṣaṇasya doṣaḥ varṇāśrayaḥ pratyayaḥ varṇavicālasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2540: animittam syāt . kva . ata iñ : dākṣiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2541: plākṣiḥ . na pratyayaḥ sannipātalakṣaṇaḥ . aṅgasañjñā tarhi animittam syāt . āttvam
GS24pmbhasuu:2542: pugvidheḥ krāpayati . āttvam pugvidheḥ animittam syāt . kva . krāpayati iti . pug
GS24pmbhasuu:2543: hrasvatvasya adīdapat . puk hrasvatvasya animittam syāt . kva . adīdapat iti . tyadādyakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2544: ṭābvidheḥ . tyadādyakāraḥ ṭābvidheḥ animittam syāt . kva . yā sā . iḍvidhiḥ ākāralopasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2545: papivān . iḍvidhiḥ ākāralopasya animittam syāt . kva . papivān tasthivān iti . matubvibhaktyudāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:2546: pūrvanighātasya . matubvibhaktyudāttatvam pūrvanighātasya animittam syāt . kva .
GS24pmbhasuu:2547: agnimān vāyumān paramavācā paramavāce . nadīhrasvratvam sambuddhilopasya . nadīhrasvratvam
GS24pmbhasuu:2548: sambuddhilopasya animittam syāt . kva . nadi kumāri kiśori brāhmaṇi brahmabandhu
GS24pmbhasuu:2549: . hrasvatve kṛte eṅhrasvāt sambuddheḥ iti lopaḥ na prāpnoti . mā bhūt evam . ṅyantāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2550: iti evam bhaviṣyati . na sidhyati . dīrghāt iti ucyate . hrasvāntāt ca na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:2552: hrasvatvam kriyatām sambuddhilopaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt hrasvatvam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2553: nityaḥ sambuddhilopaḥ . kṛte api hrasvatve prāpnoti akṛte api . anityaḥ sambuddhilopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2554: . na hi kṛte hrasvatve prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . sannipātalakṣaṇaḥ vidhiḥ animittam
GS24pmbhasuu:2555: tadvighātasya iti . ete doṣāḥ samāḥ bhūyāṃsaḥ vā . tasmāt na arthaḥ anayā paribhāṣayā
GS24pmbhasuu:2556: . na hi doṣāḥ santi iti paribhāṣā na kartavyā lakṣaṇam vā na praṇeyam . na hi bhikṣukāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2557: santi iti sthālyaḥ na adhiśrīyante na ca mṛgāḥ santi iti yavāḥ na upyante . doṣāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2558: khalu api sākalyena parigaṇitāḥ prayojanānām udāharaṇamātram . kutaḥ etat . na hi
GS24pmbhasuu:2559: doṣāṇām lakṣaṇam asti . tasmāt yāni etasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ prayojanāni tadartham eṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:2562: 318-320 avyayībhāvasya avyayatve prayojanam lugmukhsvaropacārāḥ . avyayībhāvasya avyayatve prayojanam kim . lugmukhsvaropacārāḥ . luk :
GS24pmbhasuu:2563: upāgni pratyagni . avyayāt iti luk siddhaḥ bhavati . mukhasvaraḥ . upāgnimukhaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2564: pratyagnimukhaḥ . na avyayadikśabdgomahatsthūlapṛthuvatsebhyaḥ iti pratiṣedhaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . upacāraḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2566: upapayaḥkāmaḥ iti . ataḥ kṛkamikaṃsakumbhapātrakuśākarṇīṣu anavyayasya iti pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2567: siddhaḥ bhavati . kim punaḥ idam parigaṇanam āhosvit udāharaṇamātram . parigaṇanam
GS24pmbhasuu:2568: iti āha . api khalu api āhuḥ . yat anyat avyayībhāvasya avyayakṛtam prāpnoti tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2569: pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ iti . kim punaḥ tat . parāṅgavadbhāvaḥ . parāṅgavadbhāve avyayapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2570: coditaḥ uccaiḥ adhīyāna nīcaiḥ adhīyāna iti evamartham . saḥ iha api prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2571: upāgni adhīyāna pratyagni adhīyāna . akaci avyayagrahaṇam kriyate uccakaiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2572: nīcakaiḥ iti evamartham . tat iha api prāpnoti : upāgnikam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2573: pratyagnikam iti . mumi avyayapratiṣedhaḥ ucyate doṣāmanyam ahaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2574: divāmanyā rātriḥ iti evamartham . saḥ iha api prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2576: upamaṇikammanyaḥ . asya cvau avyayapratiṣedhaḥ ucyate doṣābhūtam ahaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2577: divābhūtā rātriḥ iti evamartham . saḥ iha api prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2578: upakumbhībhūtam upamaṇikībhūtam . yadi parigaṇanam kriyate na arthaḥ avyayībhāvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2579: avyayasañjñayā . katham yāni avyayībhāvasya avyayatve prayojanāni . na etāni santi
GS24pmbhasuu:2581: ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati bhavati avyayībhāvāt luk iti yad ayam na avyayībhāvāt ataḥ iti pratiṣedham śāsti . upacāraḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2582: anuttarapadasthasya iti vartate . tatra mukhasvaraḥ ekaḥ prayojayati . na ca ekam
GS24pmbhasuu:2583: prayojanam yogārambham prayojayati . yadi etāvat prayojanam syāt tatra eva ayam brūyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2586: 320-322 śi sarvanāmasthānam suṭ anapuṃsakasya iti cet jasi śipratiṣedhaḥ . śi sarvanāmasthānam suṭ anapuṃsakasya iti cet jasi śeḥ pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2587: kuṇḍāni tiṣṭhanti vanāni tiṣṭhanti . asamarthasamāsaḥ ca ayam draṣṭavyaḥ anapuṃsakasya iti . na hi nañaḥ napuṃsakena sāmarthyam. kena tarhi . bhavatinā :
GS24pmbhasuu:2588: na bhavati napuṃsakasya iti . yat tāvat ucyate śi sarvanāmasthānam suṭ anapuṃsakasya iti cet jasi śipratiṣedhaḥ iti . na apratiṣedhāt . na ayam prasajyapratiṣedhaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2589: napuṃsakasya na iti . kim tarhi . paryudāsaḥ ayam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2590: yat anyat napuṃsakāt iti . napuṃsake avyāpāraḥ . yadi kena cit prāpnoti tena bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:2591: . pūrveṇa ca prāpnoti . aprāpteḥ vā . atha vā anantarā yā prāptiḥ sā pratiṣidhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2592: . kutaḥ etat . anantarasya vidhiḥ vā bhavati pratiṣedhaḥ vā iti . pūrvā prāptiḥ apratiṣiddhā
GS24pmbhasuu:2593: . tayā bhaviṣyati . nanu ca iyam prāptiḥ pūrvām prāptim bādhate . na utsahate pratiṣiddhā
GS24pmbhasuu:2594: satī bādhitum . yat api ucyate . asamarthasamāsaḥ ca ayam draṣṭavyaḥ iti yadi api
GS24pmbhasuu:2595: vaktavyaḥ atha vā etarhi bahūni prayojanāni . kāni . asūryampaśyāni mukhāni ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2599: 322-323 na vā iti vibhāṣāyām arthasañjñākaraṇam . na vā iti vibhāṣāyām arthasya sañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:2600: kartavyā . navāśabdasya yaḥ arthaḥ tasya sañjñā bhavati iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:2601: . śabdasañjñāyām hi arthāsampratyayaḥ yathā anyatra . śabdasañjñāyām hi satyām arthasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2602: asampratyayaḥ syāt yathā anyatra . anyatra api śabdasañjñāyām śabdasya sampratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2603: bhavati na arthasya . kva anyatra . dādhāḥ ghu adāp taraptamapau ghaḥ iti ghugrahaṇeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:2604: ghagrahaṇeṣu ca śabdasya sampratyayaḥ bhavati na arthasya . tat tarhi vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2605: na vaktavyam . itikaraṇaḥ arthanirdeśārthaḥ . itikaraṇaḥ kriyate . saḥ arthanirdeśārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2606: bhaviṣyati . kim gatam etat itinā āhosvit śabādhikyāt arthādhikyam . gatam iti āha
GS24pmbhasuu:2607: . kutaḥ . lokataḥ . tat yathā loke gauḥ ayam iti āha iti gośabdāt itikaraṇaḥ paraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2608: prayujyamānaḥ gośabdam svasmāt padārthāt pracyāvayati . saḥ asau svasmāt padārthāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2609: pracyutaḥ yā asau arthapadārthakatā tasyāḥ śabdapadārthakaḥ sampadyate . evam iha
GS24pmbhasuu:2610: api navāśabdāt itikaraṇaḥ paraḥ prayujyamānaḥ navāśabdam svasmāt padārthāt pracyāvayati
GS24pmbhasuu:2611: . saḥ asau svasmāt padārthāt pracyutaḥ yā asau śabdapadārthakatā tasyāḥ laukikam
GS24pmbhasuu:2612: artham sampratyāyayati . na vā iti yat gamyate na vā iti yat pratīyate iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2615: navā kuṇḍikā navā ghaṭikā iti . kim ca syāt yadi eteṣām api vibhāṣāsañjñā syāt . vibhāṣā diksamāse bahuvrīhau :
GS24pmbhasuu:2616: dakṣiṇapūrvasyām śālāyām . acirakṛtāyām sampratyayaḥ syāt . na vā vidhipūrvakatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2617: pratiṣedhasamapratyayaḥ yathā loke . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . vidhipūrvakatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2618: . vidhāya kim cit na vā iti ucyate . tena pratiṣedhavācinaḥ samapratyayaḥ bhavati . tat yathā loke :
GS24pmbhasuu:2619: grāmaḥ bhavatā gantavyaḥ na vā . na iti gamyate . asti kārṇam yena loke pratiṣedhavācinaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2620: samapratyayaḥ bhavati . kim kāraṇam . viliṅgam hi bhavān loke nirdeśam karoti . āṅga
GS24pmbhasuu:2621: hi samānaliṅgaḥ nirdeśaḥ kriyatām pratyagravācinaḥ sampratyayaḥ bhaviṣyati . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:2622: grāmaḥ bhavatā gantavyaḥ navaḥ . pratyagraḥ iti gamyate . etat ca eva na jānīmaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2623: kva cit vyākaraṇe samānaliṅgaḥ nirdeśaḥ kriyate iti . api ca kāmacāraḥ prayoktuḥ śabdānām abhisambandhe . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:2624: yavāgūḥ bhavatā bhoktavyā navā . yadā yavāgūśabdaḥ bhujinā abhisambadhyate bhujiḥ navāśabdena tadā pratiṣedhavācinaḥ sampratyayaḥ bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2625: yavāgūḥ bhavatā bhoktavyā navā . na iti gamyate . yadā yavāgūśabdaḥ navāśabdena abhisambadhyate na bhujinā tadā pratyagravācinaḥ sampratyayaḥ bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2626: yavāgūḥ navā bhavatā bhoktavyā . pratyagrā iti gamyate . na ca iha vayam vibhāṣāgrahaṇena sarvādīni abhisambadhnīmaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2627: diksamāse bahuvrīhau sarvādīni vibhāṣā bhavanti iti . kim tarhi . bhavatiḥ abhisambadhyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:2628: diksamāse bahuvrīhau sarvādīni bhavanti vibhāṣā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2630: 325-328 vidhyanityatvam anupapannam pratiṣedhasañjñākaraṇāt . vidhyanityatvam na upapadyate : śuśāva ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2635: śiśviyuḥ . kim kāraṇam . pratiṣedhasañjñākaraṇāt . pratiṣedhasya iyam sañjñā kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2636: . tena vibhāṣāpradeśeṣu pratiṣedhasya eva sampratyayaḥ syāt . siddham tu prasajyapratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2637: . siddham etat . katham . prasajyapratiṣedhāt . prasajya kim cit na vā iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2638: . tena ubhayam bhaviṣyati . vipratiṣiddham tu . vipratiṣiddham tu bhavati . atra na jñāyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:2639: kena abhiprāyeṇa prasajati kena nivṛttim karoti iti . na vā prasaṅgasāmarthyāt anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:2640: pratiṣedhaviṣayāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . prasaṅgasāmarthyāt . prasaṅgasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2641: ca vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati anyatra pratiṣedhaviṣayāt pratiṣedhasāmarthyāt ca pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2642: bhaviṣyati anyatra vidhiviṣayāt . tat etat kva siddham bhavati . yā aprāpte vibhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:2643: . yā hi prāpte kṛtasāmarthyaḥ tatra pūrveṇa vidhiḥ iti kṛtvā pratiṣedhasya eva sampratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2644: syāt . etat api siddham . katham . vibhāṣā iti mahatīsañjñā kriyate . sañjñā ca nāma
GS24pmbhasuu:2645: yataḥ na laghīyaḥ . kutaḥ etat . laghvartham hi sañjñākaraṇam . tatra mahatyāḥ sañjñāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2646: karaṇe etat prayojanam ubhayoḥ sañjñā yathā vijñāyeta :
GS24pmbhasuu:2647: na iti ca vā iti ca . tatra yā tāvat aprāpte vibhāṣā tatra pratiṣedhyam na asti iti kṛtvā vā iti anena vikalpaḥ bhaviṣyati . yā hi prāpte vibhāṣā tatra ubhayam upasthitam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2648: na iti ca vā iti ca . tatra na iti anena pratiṣiddhe vā iti anena vikalpaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:2649: . evam api vipratiṣedhayoḥ yugapadvacanānupapattiḥ . vipratiṣedhayoḥ yugapadvacanam na upapadyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:2650: śuśāva śuśuvatuḥ śuśuvuḥ śiśvāya śiśviyatuḥ śiśviyuḥ . kim kāraṇam . bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2651: cet na pratiṣedhaḥ . bhavati iti cet pratiṣedhaḥ na prāpnoti . na iti cet na vidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2652: . na it cet vidhiḥ na sidhyati . siddham tu pūrvasya uttareṇa bādhitatvāt . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:2653: etat. katham . pūrvavidhim uttarvidhiḥ bādhate . itikaraṇaḥ arthanirdeśāṛthaḥ iti uktam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2655: 328-332 sādhvanuśāsane asmin yasya vibhāṣā tasya sādhutvam . sādhvanuśāsane asmin
GS24pmbhasuu:2656: śāstre yasya vibhāṣā kriyate saḥ vibhāṣā sādhuḥ syāt . samāsaḥ ca eva hi vibhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:2657: . tena samāsasya eva vibhāṣā sādhutvam syāt . astu . yaḥ sādhuḥ saḥ prayokṣyate.
GS24pmbhasuu:2658: asādhuḥ na prayokṣyate . na ca eva hi kadā cit rājapuruṣaḥ iti asyām avasthāyām asādhutvam
GS24pmbhasuu:2659: iṣyate . api ca dvedhāpratipattiḥ . dvaidham śabdānām apratipattiḥ . icchāmaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:2660: punaḥ vibhāṣāpradeśeṣu dvaidham śabdānām pratipattiḥ syāt iti tat ca na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:2661: . yasya punaḥ kāryāḥ śabdāḥ vibhāṣā asau samāsam nirvartayati . yasya api nityāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2662: śabdāḥ tasya api eṣaḥ na doṣaḥ . katham . na vibhāṣāgrahaṇena sādhutvam abhisambadhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2664: samāsaḥ iti eṣā sañjñā vibhāṣā bhavati iti . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:2665: medhyaḥ paśuḥ vibhāṣitaḥ . medhyaḥ anaḍvān vibhāṣitaḥ iti . na etat vicāryate :
GS24pmbhasuu:2666: anaḍvān na anaḍvān iti . kim tarhi ālabdhavyaḥ na ālabdhavyaḥ iti . kārye yugapadanvācayayaugapadyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2667: . kāryeṣu śabdeṣu yugapat anvācayena ca yat ucyate tasya yugapadvacanatā prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2669: ḍhak ca maṇḍūkāt iti . yasya punaḥ nityāḥ śabdāḥ prayuktānām asau sādhutvam anvācaṣṭe
GS24pmbhasuu:2670: . nanu ca yasya api kāryāḥ tasya api eṣaḥ na doṣaḥ . katham . pratyayaḥ paraḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2671: iti ucyate . na ca ekasyāḥ prakṛteḥ anekasya pratyayasya yugapat paratvena sambhavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2672: asti . na api brūmaḥ pratyayamālā prāpnoti . kim tarhi . kartavyam iti prayoktavye
GS24pmbhasuu:2673: yugapat dvitīyasya tṛtīyasya ca prayogaḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . arthagatyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2674: śabdaprayogaḥ . artham sampratyāyayiṣyāmi iti śabdaḥ prayujyate . tatra ekena uktatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2675: tasya arthasya dvitīyasya prayogeṇa na bhavitavyam uktārthānām aprayogaḥ iti . ācāryadeśaśīlane
GS24pmbhasuu:2676: ca tadviṣayatā . ācāryadeśaśīlanena yat ucyate tasya tadviṣayatā prāpnoti . ikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2677: hrasvaḥ aṅyaḥ gālavasya prācām avṛddhāt phin bahulam iti gālavāḥ eva hrasvān prayuñjīran
GS24pmbhasuu:2678: prākṣu ca eva hi phin syāt . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:2679: jamadagniḥ vai etat pañcamam avadānam avādyat tasmāt na ajāmadagnyaḥ pañcāvattam
GS24pmbhasuu:2680: juhoti . yasya punaḥ nityāḥ śabdāḥ gālavagrahaṇam tasya pūjārtham deśagrahaṇam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:2681: kīrtyartham . nanu ca yasya api kāryāḥ tasya api pūjārtham gālavagrahaṇam syāt deśagraham
GS24pmbhasuu:2682: ca kīrtyartham . tatkīrtane ca dvedhāpratipattiḥ . tatkīrtane ca dvaidham śabdānām
GS24pmbhasuu:2683: apratipattiḥ syāt . icchāmaḥ ca punaḥ ācāryagrahaṇeṣu deśagrahaṇeṣu ca dvaidham śabdānām
GS24pmbhasuu:2684: pratipattiḥ syāt iti tat ca na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:2686: 332-333 aśiṣyaḥ vā viditatvāt . aśiṣyaḥ vā punaḥ ayam yogaḥ . kim kāraṇam . viditatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2687: . yat anena yogena prārthyate tasya arthasya viditatvāt . ye api hi etām sañjñām
GS24pmbhasuu:2688: na ārabhante te api vibhāṣā iti ukte anityatvam avagacchanti . yājñikāḥ khalu api
GS24pmbhasuu:2689: sañjñām anārabhamāṇāḥ vibhāṣā iti ukte anityatvam avagacchanti . tat yathā . medhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2690: paśuḥ vibhāṣitaḥ . medhyaḥ anaḍvān vibhāṣitaḥ iti . ālabdhavyaḥ na ālabdhavyaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2691: gamyate . ācāryaḥ khalu api sañjñām ārabhamāṇaḥ bhūyiṣṭham anyaiḥ api śabdaiḥ etam
GS24pmbhasuu:2692: artham sampratyāyayati bahulam anyatarasyām ubhayathā vā ekeṣām iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2694: 333-339 aprāpte trisaṃśayāḥ . itaḥ uttaram yāḥ vibhāṣāḥ anukramiṣyāmaḥ aprāpte tāḥ draṣṭavyāḥ . trisaṃśayāḥ tu bhavanti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2695: prāpte aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti . dvandve ca vibhāṣā jasi :
GS24pmbhasuu:2696: prāpte aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti sandehaḥ . katham ca prāpte katham vā aprāpte katham
GS24pmbhasuu:2697: vā ubhayatra . ubhayaśabdaḥ sarvādiṣu paṭhyate tayapaḥ ca ayajādeśaḥ kriyate . tena
GS24pmbhasuu:2698: vā nitye prāpte anyatra vā aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti . aprāpte . ayac pratyayāntaram
GS24pmbhasuu:2699: . yadi pratyayāntaram ubhayī iti īkāraḥ na prāpnoti . mā bhūt evam . mātracaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2700: evam bhaviṣyati . katham . mātrac iti na idam pratyayagrahaṇam . kim tarhi . pratyāhāragrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2701: . kva sanniviṣṭānām pratyāhāraḥ . mātraśabdāt prabhṛti ā āyacaḥ cakārāt . yadi pratyāhāragrahaṇam kati tiṣṭhanti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2702: atra api prāpnoti . ataḥ iti vartate . evam api tailamātrā ghrtamātrā iti atra api prāpnoti . sadṛśasya api asanniviṣṭasya na bhaviṣyati pratyāhāreṇa grahaṇam . ūrṇoḥ vibhāṣā :
GS24pmbhasuu:2703: prāpte aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti sandehaḥ . katham ca prāpte katham vā aprāpte katham
GS24pmbhasuu:2704: vā ubhayatra . asaṃyogāt liṭ kit iti vā nitye prāpte anyatra vā aprāpte ubhayatra
GS24pmbhasuu:2705: vā iti . aprāpte . anyat hi kittvam anyat ṅittvam . ekam cet ṅitkitau . yadi ekam
GS24pmbhasuu:2706: ṅitkitau tataḥ asti sandehaḥ . atha hi nānā na asti sandehaḥ . yadi api nānā evam
GS24pmbhasuu:2707: api sandehaḥ . katham . praurṇuvi iti . sārvadhātukam apit iti vā nitye prāpte anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:2708: vā aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti . aprāpte . vibhāṣā upayamane :
GS24pmbhasuu:2709: prāpte aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti sandehaḥ . katham ca prāpte katham vā aprāpte katham
GS24pmbhasuu:2710: vā ubhayatra . gandhane iti vā nitye prāpte anyatra vā aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2711: aprāpte . gandhane iti nivṛttam . anupasargāt vā :
GS24pmbhasuu:2712: prāpte aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti sandehaḥ . katham ca prāpte katham vā aprāpte katham
GS24pmbhasuu:2713: vā ubhayatra . vṛttisargatāyaneṣu kramaḥ iti vā nitye prāpte anyatra vā aprāpte ubhayatra
GS24pmbhasuu:2714: vā iti . aprāpte . vṛttyādiṣu iti nivṛttam . vibhāṣā vṛkṣamṛgādīnām :
GS24pmbhasuu:2715: prāpte aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti sandehaḥ . katham ca prāpte katham vā aprāpte katham
GS24pmbhasuu:2716: vā ubhayatra . jātiḥ aprāṇinām iti vā nitye prāpte anyatra vā aprāpte ubhayatra vā
GS24pmbhasuu:2717: iti . aprāpte . jātiḥ aprāṇinām iti nivṛttam . uṣavidajāgṛbhyaḥ anyatarasyām :
GS24pmbhasuu:2718: prāpte aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti sandehaḥ . katham ca prāpte katham vā aprāpte katham
GS24pmbhasuu:2719: vā ubhayatra . pratyayāntāt iti vā nitye prāpte anyatra vā aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2721: prāpte aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti sandehaḥ . katham ca prāpte katham vā aprāpte katham
GS24pmbhasuu:2722: vā ubhayatra . bhāvakarmaṇoḥ iti vā nitye prāpte anyatra vā aprāpte ubhayatra vā
GS24pmbhasuu:2723: iti . aprāpte . kartari iti vartate . evam api sandehaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2724: nyāyye vā kartari karmakartari vā iti . na asti sandehaḥ . sakarmakasya kartā karmavat
GS24pmbhasuu:2725: bhavati akarmakāḥ ca dīpādayaḥ . akarmakāḥ api vai sopasargāḥ sakarmakāḥ bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:2726: . karmāpadiṣṭāḥ vidhayaḥ karmasthabhāvakānām karmasthakriyāṇām ca bhavanti kartṛsthabhāvakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2728: prāpte aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti sandehaḥ . katham ca prāpte katham vā aprāpte katham
GS24pmbhasuu:2729: vā ubhayatra . ābhīkṣṇye iti vā nitye prāpte anyatra vā aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2730: . aprāpte . ābhīkṣṇye iti nivṛttam . tṛnādīnām vibhāṣā :
GS24pmbhasuu:2731: prāpte aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti sandehaḥ . katham ca prāpte katham vā aprāpte katham
GS24pmbhasuu:2732: vā ubhayatra . ākrośe iti vā nitye prāpte anyatra vā aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti . aprāpte
GS24pmbhasuu:2733: . ākrośe iti nivṛttam . ekahalādau pūrayitavye anyatarasyām . prāpte aprāpte ubhayatra
GS24pmbhasuu:2734: vā iti sandehaḥ . katham ca prāpte katham vā aprāpte katham vā ubhayatra . udakasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2735: udaḥ sañjñāyām iti vā nitye prāpte anyatra vā aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti . aprāpte
GS24pmbhasuu:2736: . sañjñāyām iti nivṛttam . śvādeḥ iñi padāntasya anyatarasyām . prāpte aprāpte ubhayatra
GS24pmbhasuu:2737: vā iti sandehaḥ . katham ca prāpte katham vā aprāpte katham vā ubhayatra . iñi iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2738: vā nitye prāpte anyatra vā aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti . aprāpte . iñi iti nivṛttam
GS24pmbhasuu:2739: . sapūrvāyāḥ prathamāyāḥ vibhāṣā . prāpte aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti sandehaḥ . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:2740: ca prāpte katham vā aprāpte katham vā ubhayatra . cādibhiḥ yoge iti vā nitye prāpte
GS24pmbhasuu:2741: anyatra vā aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti . aprāpte . cādibhiḥ yoge iti nivṛttam . graḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:2743: katham ca prāpte katham vā aprāpte katham vā ubhayatra . yaṅi iti vā nitye prāpte anyatra vā aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti . aprāpte . aprāpte . yaṅi iti nivṛttam

GS24pmbhasuu:2748: vā ubhayatra . vyaktavācām iti vā nitye prāpte anyatra vā aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2749: . prāpte . vyaktavācām iti hi vartate . vibhāṣā upapadena pratīyamāne :

GS24pmbhasuu:2752: . prāpte . svaritañitaḥ iti hi vartate . tiraḥ antardhau vibhāṣā kṛñi :
GS24pmbhasuu:2753: prāpte aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti sandehaḥ . katham ca prāpte katham vā aprāpte katham
GS24pmbhasuu:2754: vā ubhayatra . antardhau iti vā nitye prāpte anyatra vā aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti

GS24pmbhasuu:2763: 340-341 ubhayatra ca . itaḥ uttaram yāḥ vibhāṣāḥ anukramiṣyāmaḥ ubhayatra tāḥ draṣṭavyāḥ . trisaṃśayāḥ tu bhavanti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2764: prāpte aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti . hṛkroḥ anyatarasyām :
GS24pmbhasuu:2765: prāpte aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti sandehaḥ . katham ca prāpte katham vā aprāpte katham
GS24pmbhasuu:2766: vā ubhayatra . gatibuddhipratyavasānārthaśabdakarmākarmakāṇām iti vā nitye prāpte
GS24pmbhasuu:2767: anyatra vā aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti . ubhayatra . prāpte tāvat :
GS24pmbhasuu:2772: harati bhāram devadattaḥ . hārayati bhāram devadattam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2773: hārayati bhāram devadattena . karoti kaṭam devadattaḥ . kārayati kaṭam devadattam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2774: kārayati kaṭam devadattena . na yadi vibhāṣā sākāṅkṣe :
GS24pmbhasuu:2775: prāpte aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti sandehaḥ . katham ca prāpte katham vā aprāpte katham
GS24pmbhasuu:2776: vā ubhayatra .yadi iti vā nitye prāpte anyatra vā aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti . ubhayatra . prāpte tāvat :
GS24pmbhasuu:2785: prāpte aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti sandehaḥ . katham ca prāpte katham vā aprāpte katham
GS24pmbhasuu:2786: vā ubhayatra .kiti iti vā nitye prāpte anyatra vā aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti . ubhayatra
GS24pmbhasuu:2791: śuśāva śuśavitha śiśvāya śiśvayitha . vibhāṣā saṅghuṣāsvanām :
GS24pmbhasuu:2792: sampūrvāt ghuṣeḥ prāpte aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti sandehaḥ . katham ca prāpte katham
GS24pmbhasuu:2793: vā aprāpte katham vā ubhayatra . ghuṣiḥ aviśabdane iti vā nitye prāpte anyatra vā
GS24pmbhasuu:2794: aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti . ubhayatra . prāpte tāvat :
GS24pmbhasuu:2798: saṅghuṣitam vākyam . āṅpūrvāt svaneḥ prāpte aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti sandehaḥ . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:2799: ca prāpte katham vā aprāpte katham vā ubhayatra . manasi iti vā nitye prāpte anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:2800: vā aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti . ubhayatra . prāpte tāvat :
GS24pmbhasuu:2807: ik yaṇaḥ iti etat vākyam samprasāraṇasañjñam bhavati iti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2809: ik yaḥ yaṇaḥ sthāne saḥ samprasāraṇasañjñaḥ bhavati iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . samprasāraṇasañjñāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:2810: vākyasañjñā cet varṇavidhiḥ . samprasāraṇasañjñāyām vākyasañjñā cet varṇavidhiḥ na sidhyati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2812: samprasāraṇasya dīrghaḥ bhavati iti . na hi vākyasya samprasāraṇasañjñāyām satyām
GS24pmbhasuu:2813: eṣaḥ nirdeśaḥ upapadyate na api etayoḥ kāryayoḥ sambhavaḥ asti . astu tarhi varṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2814: . varṇasañjñā cet nirvṛttiḥ . varṇasañjñā cet nirvṛttiḥ na sidhyati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2815: ṣyaṅaḥ samprasāraṇam iti . saḥ eva hi tāvat ik durlabhaḥ yasya sañjñā kriyate . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:2816: api katham cit labhyeta kena asu yaṇaḥ sthāne syāt . anena eva hi asau vyavasthāpyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2818: itaretarāśrayāṇi ca kāryāṇi na prakalpante . vibhaktiviśeṣanirdeśaḥ tu jñāpakaḥ ubhayasañjñātvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2819: . yat ayam vibhaktiviśeṣaiḥ nirdeśam karoti samprasāraṇāt paraḥ pūrvaḥ bhavati samprasāraṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2820: dīrghaḥ bhavati ṣyaṅaḥ samprasāraṇam iti tena jñāyate ubhayoḥ sañjñā bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2821: . yat tāvat āha samprasāraṇāt paraḥ pūrvaḥ bhavati samprasāraṇasya dīrghaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2822: iti tena jñāyate varṇasya bhavati iti . yat api āha ṣyaṅaḥ samprasāraṇam iti tena
GS24pmbhasuu:2823: jñāyate vākyasya api sañjñā bhavati iti . atha vā punaḥ astu vākyasya eva . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:2824: ca uktam samprasāraṇasañjñāyām vākyasañjñā cet varṇavidhiḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2826: śyenāt jātaḥ śyenaḥ evam samprasāraṇāt jātam samprasāraṇam . yat tat samprasāraṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2827: jātam samprasāraṇam tasmāt paraḥ pūrvaḥ bhavati tasya dīrghaḥ bhavati iti . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:2828: vā dṛśyante hi vākyeṣu vākyaikadeśān prayuñjānāḥ padeṣu ca padaikadeśān . vākyeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:2833: satyabhāmā bhāmā iti . evam iha api samprasāraṇanirvṛttāt samprasāraṇanirvṛttasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2834: iti etasya vākyasya arthe samprasāraṇāt samprasāraṇasya iti vākyaikadeśaḥ prayujyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2835: . tena nirvṛttasya vidhim vijñāsyāmaḥ . samprasāraṇanirvṛttāt samprasāraṇanirvṛttasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2836: iti . atha vā āha ayam samprasāraṇāt paraḥ pūrvaḥ bhavati samprasāraṇasya dīrghaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2837: bhavati iti . na ca vākyasya samprasāraṇasañjñāyām satyām eṣaḥ nirdeśaḥ upapadyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2838: na api etayoḥ kāryayoḥ sambhavaḥ asti . tatra vacanāt bhaviṣyati . atha vā punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2839: astu varṇasya . nanu ca uktam varṇasañjñā cet nirvṛttiḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . itaretarāśrayamātram
GS24pmbhasuu:2840: etat coditam . sarvāṇi ca itaretarāśrayāṇi ekatvena parihṛtāni siddham tu nityaśabdatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2841: iti . na idam tulyam anyaiḥ itaretarāśrayaiḥ . na hi tatra kim cit ucyate asya sthāne
GS24pmbhasuu:2842: ye ākāraikāraukārāḥ bhāvyante te vṛddhisañjñāḥ bhavanti iti . iha punaḥ ucyate ik
GS24pmbhasuu:2843: yaḥ yaṇaḥ sthāne saḥ samprasāraṇasañjñaḥ bhavati iti . evam tarhi bhāvinī iyam sañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:2845: kaḥ cit kam cit tantuvāyam āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:2846: asya sūtrasya śāṭakam vaya iti . saḥ paśyati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2847: yadi śāṭakaḥ na vātavyaḥ atha vātavyaḥ na śāṭakaḥ . śāṭakaḥ vātavyaḥ iti vipratiṣiddham
GS24pmbhasuu:2848: . bhāvinī khalu asya sañjñā abhipretā . saḥ manye vātavyaḥ yasmin ute śāṭakaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2849: etat bhavati iti . evam iha api saḥ yaṇaḥ sthāne bhavati yasya abhinirvṛttasya samprasāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2850: iti eṣā sañjñā bhaviṣyati . atha vā ijādiyajādipravṛttiḥ ca eva hi loke lakṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2851: . yajādyupadeśāt tu ijādinivṛttiḥ prasaktā . prayuñjate ca punaḥ lokāḥ iṣṭam uptam
GS24pmbhasuu:2853: asya yaṇaḥ sthāne imam ikam prayuñjate iti . tatra tasya asādhvabhimatasya śāstreṇa sādhutvam avasthāpyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:2854: kiti sādhuḥ bhavati ṅiti sādhuḥ bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2856: 346 samāsanirdeśaḥ ayam . tatra na jñāyate kaḥ ādiḥ kaḥ antaḥ iti . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:2857: ajāvidhanau devadattayajñadattau iti ukte na jñāyate kasya ajāḥ dhanam kasya avayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2858: iti . yadi api tāvat loke eṣaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ dṛṣṭāntasya api puruṣārambhaḥ nivartakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2859: bhavati . asti ca iha kaḥ cit puruṣārambhaḥ . asti iti āha . kaḥ . saṅkhyātanudeśaḥ nāma .
GS24pmbhasuu:2861: 346-349 kau punaḥ ṭakitau ādyantau bhavataḥ . āgamau iti āha . yuktam punaḥ yat nityeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:2862: nāma śabdeṣu āgamaśāsanam syāt na nityeṣu śabdeṣu kūṭasthaiḥ avicālibhiḥ varṇaiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2863: bhavitavyam anapāyopajanavikāribhiḥ . āgamaḥ ca nāma apūrvaḥ śabdopajanaḥ . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:2864: yuktam yat nityeṣu śabdeṣu ādeśāḥ syuḥ . bāḍham yuktam . śabdāntaraiḥ iha bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2865: . tatra śabdāntarāt śabdāntarasya pratipattiḥ yuktā . ādeśāḥ tarhi ime bhaviṣyanti
GS24pmbhasuu:2866: anāgamakānām sāgamakāḥ . tat katham . sañjñādhikāraḥ ayam . ādyantau ca iha saṅkīrtyete
GS24pmbhasuu:2867: . ṭakārkakārau itau udāhriyete . tatra ādyantayoḥ ṭakārakakārau itau sañjñe bhaviṣyataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2868: . tatra ārdhadhātukasya iṭ valādeḥ iti upasthitam idam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2869: ādiḥ iti . tena ikārādiḥ ādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . etāvat iha sūtram iṭ iti . katham punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2870: iyatā sūtreṇa ikārādiḥ ādeśaḥ labhyaḥ . labhyaḥ iti āha . katham. bahuvrīhinirdeśāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2872: ikāraḥ ādiḥ asya iti . yadi api tāvat atra etat śakyate vakutm iha katham :
GS24pmbhasuu:2873: luṅlaṅlṛṅkṣu aṭ udāttaḥ iti yatra aśakyam udāttagrahaṇena akāraḥ viśeṣayitum . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:2874: kaḥ doṣaḥ . aṅgasya udāttatvam prasajyeta . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . tripadaḥ ayam bahuvrīhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2875: . tatra vākye eva udāttagrahaṇena akāraḥ viśeṣyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:2876: akāraḥ udāttaḥ ādiḥ asya iti . yatra tarhi anuvṛttyā etat bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2878: ajādīnām aṭā siddham iti . atha vā yat tāvat ayam sāmānyena śaknoti upadeṣṭum tat
GS24pmbhasuu:2879: tāvat upadiśati prakṛtim tataḥ valādi ārdhadhātukam tataḥ paścāt ikāram . tena ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:2880: viśeṣeṇa śabdāntaram samudāyam pratipadyate . tat yathā khadiraburburayoḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2881: khadiraburburau gaurakāṇḍau sūkṣmaparṇau . tataḥ paścāt āha kaṇṭakavān khadiraḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2882: . tena asau viśeṣeṇa dravyāntaram samudāyam pratipadyate . atha vā etayā ānupūrvyā
GS24pmbhasuu:2884: prakṛtim tataḥ valādi ārdhadhātukam tataḥ paścāt ikāram yasmin tasya āgamabuddhiḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:2886: 349-351 ṭakitoḥ ādyantavidhāne pratyayapratiṣedhaḥ . ṭakitoḥ ādyantavidhāne pratyayasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . pratyayaḥ ādiḥ antaḥ vā mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:2887: careḥ ṭaḥ ātaḥ anupasarge kaḥ iti . paravacanāt siddham . paravacanāt pratyayaḥ ādiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2888: antaḥ vā na bhaviṣyati . paravacanāt siddham iti cet na apavādatvāt . paravacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2889: siddham iti cet na . kim kāraṇam . apavādatvāt . apavādaḥ ayam yogaḥ . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:2890: mit acaḥ antyāt paraḥ iti eṣaḥ yogaḥ sthāneyogatvasya pratyayaparatvasya ca apavādaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2891: . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . yuktam tatra yat anavakāśam mitkaraṇam sthāneyogatvam pratyayaparatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:2892: ca bādhate . iha punaḥ ubhayam sāvakāsam . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . ṭitkaraṇasya avakāśaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2893: ṭitaḥ iti īkāraḥ yathā syāt . kitkaraṇasya avakāśaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2894: kiti iti ākāralopaḥ yathā syāt . prayojanam nāma tat vaktavyam yat niyogataḥ syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2895: . yadi ca ayam niyogataḥ paraḥ syāt tataḥ etat prayojanam syāt . kutaḥ nu khalu etat
GS24pmbhasuu:2896: ṭitkaraṇāt ayam paraḥ bhaviṣyati na punaḥ ādiḥ iti kitkaraṇāt ca paraḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:2897: na punaḥ antaḥ iti . ṭitaḥ khalu api eṣaḥ parihāraḥ yatra na asti sambhavaḥ yat paraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2898: ca syāt ādiḥ ca . kitaḥ tu aparihāraḥ . asti hi sambhavaḥ yat paraḥ ca syāt antaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2899: ca . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . upasarge ghoḥ kiḥ : ādhyoḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2900: pradhyoḥ . noṅdhātvoḥ iti pratiṣedhaḥ prasajyeta . ṭitaḥ ca api aparihāraḥ . syāt eva hi ayam ṭitkaraṇāt ādiḥ na punaḥ paraḥ . kva tarhi idānīm idam syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:2901: ṭitaḥ īkāraḥ bhavati iti . yaḥ ubhayavān :
GS24pmbhasuu:2902: gāpoḥ ṭak iti . siddham tu ṣaṣṭhyadhikāre vacanāt . siddham etat . katham . ṣaṣṭhyadhikāre ayam yogaḥ karatvyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2903: ādyantau ṭakitau ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭasya iti . ādyantayoḥ vā ṣaṣthyarthatvāt tadabhāve
GS24pmbhasuu:2904: asampratyayaḥ . ādyantayoḥ vā ṣaṣthyarthatvāt ṣaṣṭhyāḥ abhāve asampratyayaḥ . ādiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2905: antaḥ vā na bhaviṣyati . yuktam punaḥ yat śabdanimittakaḥ nāma arthaḥ syāt na arthanimittakena
GS24pmbhasuu:2906: śabdena bhavitavyam . arthanimittakaḥ eva śabdaḥ . tat katham . ādyantau ṣaṣṭhyarthau
GS24pmbhasuu:2907: . na ca atra ṣaṣṭhīm paśyāmaḥ . te manyāmahe :
GS24pmbhasuu:2908: ādyantau eva atra na staḥ . tayoḥ abhāve ṣaṣṭhī api na bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2910: 352 kimartham idam ucyate . mit acaḥ antyāt paraḥ iti sthānaparapratyayāpavādaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2911: mit acaḥ antyāt paraḥ iti ucyate sthāneyogatvasya pratyayaparatvasya ca apavādaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2914: bhinatti chinatti . bhavet idam yuktam udāharaṇam kuṇḍāni vanāni yatra na asti sambhavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2915: yat ayam acaḥ anytāt paraḥ ca syāt sthāne ca iti . idam tu ayuktam payāṃsi yaśāṃsi
GS24pmbhasuu:2916: . asti hi sambhavaḥ yat acaḥ anytāt paraḥ ca syāt sthāne ca . etat api yuktam . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:2917: . na eva īśvaraḥ ājñāpayati na api dharmasūtrakārāḥ paṭhanti apavādaiḥ utsargāḥ bādhyantām
