GS24pmbhasuu:2918: iti . kim tarhi . laukikaḥ ayam dṛṣṭāntaḥ . loke hi sati api sambhave bādhanam bhavati . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:2919: dadhi brāhmaṇebhyaḥ dīyatām takram kauṇḍinyāya iti sati api sambhave dadhidānasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2920: takradānam nivartakam bhavati . evam iha api sati api sambhave acām antyāt paratvam
GS24pmbhasuu:2923: 352-353 antyāt pūrvaḥ masjeḥ anuṣaṅgasaṃyogādilopārtham . antyāt pūrvaḥ masjeḥ mit
GS24pmbhasuu:2924: vaktavyaḥ . kim prayojanam . anuṣaṅgasaṃyogādilopārtham . anuṣaṅgalopārtham saṃyogādilopārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:2927: maṅktavyam . bharjimarcyoḥ ca . bharjimarcyoḥ ca antyāt pūrvaḥ mit vaktavyaḥ . bharūjā
GS24pmbhasuu:2928: marīcayaḥ iti . saḥ tarhi vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . nipātanāt siddham . kim nipātanam
GS24pmbhasuu:2931: 353-357 kim punaḥ ayam pūrvāntaḥ āhosvit parādiḥ āhosvit abhaktaḥ . katham ca ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:2932: pūrvāntaḥ syāt katham vā parādiḥ katham vā abhaktaḥ . yadi antaḥ iti vartate tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2933: pūrvāntaḥ . atha ādiḥ iti vartate tataḥ parādiḥ . atha ubhayam nivṛttam tataḥ abhaktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2934: . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . abhakte dīrghanalopasvaraṇatvānusvāraśībhāvāḥ . yadi abhaktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2936: kuṇḍāni vanāni . nopadhāyāḥ sarvanāmasthāne ca asambuddhau iti dīrghatvam na prāpnoti . dīrgha . nalopa :
GS24pmbhasuu:2938: agne trī te vajinā trī sadhasthā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2939: ta tā piṇḍānām . nalopaḥ prātipadikāntasya iti nalopaḥ na prāpnoti . nalopa . svara :
GS24pmbhasuu:2941: sarvāṇi jyotīṃṣi . sarvasya supi iti ādyudāttatvam na prāpnoti . svara . ṇatva :
GS24pmbhasuu:2943: māṣavāpāṇi vrīhivāpāṇi . pūrvānte prātipadikāntanakārasya iti siddham ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2945: abhakte numaḥ grahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . kriyate nyāse eva :
GS24pmbhasuu:2949: parantapaḥ . maḥ anusvāraḥ hali iti anusvāraḥ na prāpnoti . mā bhūt evam . naḥ ca apadāntasya jhali iti evam bhaviṣyati . yaḥ tarhi na jhalparaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2953: trapuṇī jatunī tumburuṇī . napuṃsakāt uttarasya auṅaḥ śībhāvaḥ bhavati iti śībhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2954: na prāpnoti . śībhāva . evam tarhi parādiḥ kariṣyate . parādau guṇavṛddhyauttvadīrghanalopānusvāraśībhāvenakārapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2956: trapuṇe jatune tumburuṇe . gheḥ ṅiti iti guṇaḥ prāpnoti . guṇa . vṛddhi :
GS24pmbhasuu:2958: atisakhīni brāhmaṇakulāni . sakhyuḥ asambuddhau iti ṇittve acaḥ ñṇiti iti vṛddhiḥ prāpnoti . vṛddhi . auttva :
GS24pmbhasuu:2960: trapuṇi jatuni tumburuṇi . idudbhyām aut at ca gheḥ iti auttvam prāpnoti . auttva . dīrgha :
GS24pmbhasuu:2962: kuṇḍāni vanāni . nopadhāyāḥ sarvanāmasthāne ca asambuddhau iti dīrghatvam na prāpnoti . mā bhūt evam . ataḥ dīrghaḥ yañi supi ca iti evam bhaviṣyati . iha tarhi :
GS24pmbhasuu:2963: asthīni dadhīni priyasakhīni brāhmaṇakulāni . dīrgha . nalopa :
GS24pmbhasuu:2965: agne trī te vajinā trī sadhasthā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2966: ta tā piṇḍānām . nalopaḥ prātipadikāntasya iti nalopaḥ na prāpnoti . nalopa . anusvāra :
GS24pmbhasuu:2969: parantapaḥ . maḥ anusvāraḥ hali iti anusvāraḥ na prāpnoti . mā bhūt evam . naḥ ca apadāntasya jhali iti evam bhaviṣyati . yaḥ tarhi na jhalparaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2973: trapuṇī jatunī tumburuṇī . sanumkasya śībhāvaḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . nirdiśyamānasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2974: ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti evam na bhaviṣyati . yaḥ tarhi nirdiśyate tasya na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2975: kasmāt . numā vyavahitatvāt . evam tarhi pūrvāntaḥ kariṣyate . pūrvānte napuṃsakopasarjanahrasvatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:2976: dvigusvaraḥ ca . yadi pūrvantaḥ kriyate napuṃsakopasarjanahrasvatvam dvigusvaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2979: pañcāratninī daśāratninī . numi kṛte anantyatvāt ete vidhayaḥ na prāpnunvanti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:2980: vā bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . bahiraṅgaḥ num ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2983: saṅghātabhaktaḥ asau na utsahate avayavasya igantatām vihantum iti kṛtvā dvigusvaraḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:2985: 357-359 kimartham idam ucyate . ecaḥ ik savarṇākāranivṛttyartham . ecaḥ ik bhavati iti ucyate savarṇanivṛttyartham akāranivṛttyartham ca . savarṇnivṛttyartham tāvat :
GS24pmbhasuu:2986: eṅaḥ hrasvaśāsaneṣu ardhaḥ ekāraḥ ardhaḥ okāraḥ vā mā bhūt iti . akāranivṛttyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:2987: ca . imau aicau samāhāravarṇau . mātrā avarṇasya mātrā ivarṇovarṇayoḥ . tayoḥ hrasvaśāsaneṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:2988: kadā cit avarṇaḥ syāt kadā cit ivarṇovarṇau . mā kadā cit avarṇam bhūt iti evamartham
GS24pmbhasuu:2989: idam ucyate . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . dīrghaprasaṅgaḥ . dīrghāḥ tu
GS24pmbhasuu:2990: ikaḥ prāpnuvanti . kim kāraṇam . sthāne antaratamaḥ bhavati iti . nanu ca hrasvādeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:2991: iti ucyate . tena dīrghāḥ na bhaviṣyanti . viṣyārtham etat syāt . ecaḥ hrasvaprasaṅge
GS24pmbhasuu:2992: ik bhavati iti . dīrghāprasaṅgaḥ tu nivartakatvāt . dīrghāṇām tu ikām aprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2993: . kim kāraṇam . nivartakatvāt . na anena ikaḥ nirvartyante . kim tarhi . anikaḥ nivartyante
GS24pmbhasuu:2994: . siddhāḥ eva hrasvāḥ ikaḥ ca anikaḥ ca . tatra anena anikaḥ nivartyante . savarṇanivṛttyarthena
GS24pmbhasuu:2995: tāvat na arthaḥ . siddham eṅaḥ sasthānatvāt . siddham etat . katham . eṅaḥ sasthānatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2996: ikārokārau bhaviṣyataḥ . ardhaḥ ekāraḥ aradhaḥ okāraḥ vā na bhaviṣyati . nanu ca
GS24pmbhasuu:2997: eṅaḥ sasthānatarau ardhaḥ ekāraukārau . na tau staḥ . yadi hi tau syātām tau eva
GS24pmbhasuu:2998: ayam upadiśet . nanu ca bhoḥ chandogānām sātyamugrirāṇāyanīyāḥ ardham ekāram ardham
GS24pmbhasuu:3002: śukram te enyat yajatam te enyat iti . pārṣadakṛtiḥ eṣā tatrabhavatām . na eva loke
GS24pmbhasuu:3003: na anyasmin vede ardhaḥ ekāraḥ ardhaḥ okāraḥ vā asti . akāranivṛttyarthena api na
GS24pmbhasuu:3004: arthaḥ . aicoḥ ca uttarabhūyastvāt . aicoḥ ca uttarabhūyastvāt avarṇaḥ na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3005: . bhūyasī mātrā ivarṇovarṇayoḥ alpīyasī avarṇasya . bhūyasaḥ eva grahaṇāni bhaviṣyanti
GS24pmbhasuu:3006: . tat yathā brāhmaṇagrāmaḥ ānīyatām iti ucyate tatra ca avarataḥ pañcakārukī bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3008: 360 kim idam sthāneyogā iti . sthāne yogaḥ asyāḥ sā iyam sthāneyogā . saptamyalopaḥ nipātanāt . tṛtiyāyā vā etvam :
GS24pmbhasuu:3009: sthānena yogaḥ asyāḥ sā iyam sthāneyogā .
GS24pmbhasuu:3011: 360-364 kimartham punaḥ idam ucyate . ṣaṣṭhyāḥ sthāneyogavacanam niyamārtham . niyamāṛthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3012: ayam ārambhaḥ . ekaśatam ṣaṣṭhyarthāḥ yāvantaḥ vā te sarve ṣaṣṭhyām uccāritāyām prāpnuvanti
GS24pmbhasuu:3013: . iṣyate ca vyākaraṇe yā ṣaṣṭhī sā sthāneyogā eva syāt iti . tat ca antareṇa yatnam
GS24pmbhasuu:3014: na sidhyati iti ṣaṣṭhyāḥ sthāneyogavacanam niyamārtham . evamartham idam ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3015: asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . avayavaṣaṣṭhyādiṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ śāsaḥ gohaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3016: iti . avayavaṣaṣṭhyādayaḥ tu na sidhyanti . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . śāsaḥ it aṅhaloḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3017: śāseḥ ca antyasya syāt upadhāmātrasya ca . ūt upadhāyāḥ gohaḥ iti gohaḥ ca antyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3018: syāt upadhāmātrasya ca . avayavaṣaṣṭhyādīnām ca aprāptiḥ yogasya asandigdhatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:3019: avayavaṣaṣṭhyādīnām ca niyamasya aprāptiḥ . kim kāraṇam . yogasya asandigdhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3020: . sandehe niyamaḥ na ca avayavaṣaṣṭhyādiṣu sandehaḥ . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi
GS24pmbhasuu:3021: . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate. laukikaḥ ayam dṛṣṭāṇtaḥ . tat yathā loke :
GS24pmbhasuu:3023: grāmāntaram gamiṣyāmi panthānam me bhavān upadiśatu iti . saḥ tasmai ācaṣṭe . amuṣmin
GS24pmbhasuu:3024: avakāśe hastadakṣiṇaḥ grahītavyaḥ amuṣmin avakāśe hastavāmaḥ iti . yaḥ tu atra tiryakpathaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3025: bhavati na tasmin sandehaḥ iti kṛtvā na asau upadiśyate . evam iha api sandehe niyamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3026: na ca avayavaṣaṣṭhyādiṣu sandehaḥ . atha vā sthāne ayogā sthāneyogā kim idam ayogā
GS24pmbhasuu:3027: iti . avyaktayogā ayogā . atha vā yogavatī yogā . kā punaḥ yogavatī . yasyāḥ bahavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3028: yogāḥ . kutaḥ etat . bhūmni hi matup bhavati . viśiṣṭā vā ṣaṣṭhī sthāneyogā . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:3029: vā kim cid liṅgam āsajya vakṣyāmi :
GS24pmbhasuu:3030: itthaṃliṅgā ṣaṣṭhī sthāneyogā bhavati iti . na tat liṅgam avayavaṣaṣṭhyādiṣu kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3031: . yadi evam śāsaḥ it aṅhaloḥ śā hau śāsigrahaṇam kartavyam sthāneyogārtham liṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:3032: āsaṅkṣyāmi iti . na kartavyam . yat eva adaḥ purastāt avayavaṣaṣṭhyartham prakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:3033: etat uttaratra anuvṛttam sat sthāneyogārtham bhaviṣyati . katham . adhikāraḥ nāma
GS24pmbhasuu:3034: triprakāraḥ . kaḥ cit ekadeśasthaḥ sarvam śāstram abhijvalayati yathā pradīpaḥ supravijvalitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3035: sarvam veśma abhijvalayati . aparaḥ adhikāraḥ yathā rajjvā ayasā vā baddham kāṣṭham
GS24pmbhasuu:3036: anukṛṣyate tadvat anukṛṣyate cakāreṇa . aparaḥ adhikāraḥ pratiyogam tasya anirdeśārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3037: iti yoge yoge upatiṣṭhate . tat yadā eṣaḥ pakṣaḥ adhikāraḥ pratiyogam tasya anirdeśārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3038: iti tadā hi yat eva adaḥ purastāt avayavaṣaṣṭhyartham prakaṛtam etat uttaratra anuvṛttam
GS24pmbhasuu:3039: sat sthāneyogārtham bhaviṣyati . sampratyayamātram etat bhavati . na hi anuccārya
GS24pmbhasuu:3040: śabdam liṅgam śakyam āsaṅktum . evam tarhi ādeśe tat liṅgam kariṣyate tat prakṛtim
GS24pmbhasuu:3041: āskantsyati . yadi niyamaḥ kriyate yatra ekā ṣaṣṭhī anekam ca viśeṣyam tatra na sidhyati : aṅgasya ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3044: samprasāraṇasya iti . hal api viśeṣyaḥ aṇ api viśeṣyaḥ samprasāraṇam api viśeṣyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3045: . asati punaḥ niyame kāmacāraḥ ekayā ṣaṣthyā anekam viśeṣayitum . tat yathā . devadattasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3046: putraḥ pāṇiḥ kambalaḥ iti . tasmāt na arthaḥ niyamena . nanu ca uktam ekaśatam ṣaṣṭhyarthāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3047: yāvantaḥ vā te sarve ṣaṣṭhyām uccāritāyām prāpnuvanti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:3048: api loke bahavaḥ abhisambandhāḥ ārthāḥ yaunāḥ maukhāḥ srauvāḥ ca śabdasya tu śabdena
GS24pmbhasuu:3049: kaḥ anyaḥ abhisambandhaḥ bhavitum arhati anyat ataḥ sthānāt . śabdasya api śabdena
GS24pmbhasuu:3050: anantarādayaḥ abhisambandhāḥ . asteḥ bhūḥ bhavati iti sandehaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3051: sthāne anantare samīpe iti . sandehamātram etat bhavati . sarvasandeheṣu ca idam upatiṣṭhate :
GS24pmbhasuu:3052: vyākhyānataḥ viśeṣapratipattiḥ na hi sandehāt alakṣaṇam iti . sthāne iti vyākhyāsyāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3053: . na tarhi idānīm ayam yogaḥ vaktavyaḥ . vaktavyaḥ ca . kim prayojanam . ṣaṣṭhyantam
GS24pmbhasuu:3054: sthānena yathā yujyeta yataḥ ṣaṣṭhī uccāritā . kim kṛtam bhavati . nirdiśyamānasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3055: ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti eṣā paribhāṣā na kartavyā bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3059: tālusthānasya tālusthānaḥ oṣṭhasthānasya oṣṭhasthānaḥ yathā syāt . na etat asti . saṅkhyātānudeśena api etat siddham . idam tarhi :
GS24pmbhasuu:3060: tasthasthamipām tāmtamtāmaḥ iti ekārthasya ekārthaḥ dvyarthasya dvyarthaḥ bahvarthasya bahuvarthaḥ yathā syāt . nanu ca etat api saṅkhyātānudeśena eva siddham . idam tarhi :
GS24pmbhasuu:3065: kaṇṭhasthānayoḥ kaṇṭhasthānaḥ tālusthānayoḥ tālusthānaḥ oṣṭhasthānayoḥ oṣṭhasthānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3066: yathā syāt iti . atha sthāne iti vartamāne punaḥ sthānagrahaṇam kimartham . yatra
GS24pmbhasuu:3067: anekavidham āntaryam tatra sthānataḥ eva āntaryam balīyaḥ yathā syāt . kim punaḥ tat . cetā stotā :
GS24pmbhasuu:3068: pramāṇataḥ akāraḥ guṇaḥ prāpnoti sthānataḥ ekāraukārau . punaḥ sthānagrahaṇāt ekāraukārau
GS24pmbhasuu:3069: bhavataḥ . atha tamabgrahaṇam kimartham . jhayaḥ haḥ anyatarasyām iti atra soṣmaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3070: soṣmāṇaḥ iti dvitīyāḥ prasaktāḥ nādavataḥ nādavantaḥ iti tṛtīyāḥ . tamapgrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:3071: soṣmāṇaḥ nādavantaḥ ca te bhavanti caturthāḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3074: 366-370 kimartham punaḥ idam ucyate . sthāninaḥ ekatvanirdeśāt anekādeśanirdeśāt ca sarvaprasaṅgaḥ tasmāt sthānentaratamavacanam . sthānī ekatvena nirdiśyate : akaḥ iti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3076: dīrghaḥ iti . sthāninaḥ ekatvanirdeśāt anekādeśanirdeśāt ca sarvaprasaṅgaḥ . sarve
GS24pmbhasuu:3077: sarvatra prāpnuvanti . iṣyate ca antaratamāḥ eva syuḥ iti . tat ca antareṇa yatnam
GS24pmbhasuu:3078: na sidhyati . tasmāt sthāne antaratamaḥ iti vacanam niyamārtham . evamartham idam
GS24pmbhasuu:3079: ucyate . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . yathā punaḥ iyam antaratamanirvṛtttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3083: sthāne prāpyamāṇānām antaratamaḥ ādeśaḥ bhavati iti . kutaḥ punaḥ iyam vicāraṇā . ubhayathā api tulyā saṃhitā :
GS24pmbhasuu:3085: uraṇ raparaḥ iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi prakṛtitaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3087: yaṇām ye antaratamāḥ ikaḥ tatra ṣaṣṭhī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3088: yatra ṣaṣṭhī tatra ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti iha eva syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:3089: dadhi atra madhu atra . kumārī atra brahmabandhvartham iti atra na syāt . ādeśataḥ punaḥ antaratamanirvṛttau satyām sarvatra ṣaṣṭhī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3090: yatra ṣaṣṭhī tatra ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti sarvatra siddham bhavati . tathā ikaḥ guṇavṛddhī :
GS24pmbhasuu:3091: guṇavṛddhyoḥ ye antaratamāḥ ikaḥ tatra ṣaṣṭhī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3092: yatra ṣaṣṭhī tatra ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti iha eva syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:3093: netā lavitā nāyakaḥ lāvakaḥ . cetā stotā cāyakaḥ stāvakaḥ iti atra na syāt . ādeśataḥ punaḥ antaratamanirvṛttau satyām sarvatra ṣaṣṭhī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3094: yatra ṣaṣṭhī tatra ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti sarvatra siddham bhavati . tathā ṛvarṇasya guṇavṛddhiprasaṅge guṇavṛddhyoḥ yat antaratamam ṛvarṇam tatra ṣaṣṭhī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3095: yatra ṣaṣṭhī tatra ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti iha eva syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:3099: hārakaḥ iti atra na syāt . ādeśataḥ punaḥ antaratamanirvṛttau satyām sarvatra ṣaṣṭhī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3100: yatra ṣaṣṭhī tatra ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti sarvatra siddham bhavati . atha ādeśataḥ antaratamanirvṛttau satyām ayam doṣaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3102: sthāninirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . okāraukārayoḥ iti vaktavyam ekāraikārayoḥ mā bhūt iti . prakṛtitaḥ punaḥ antaratamanirvṛttau satyām vāntādeśasya yā antaratamā prakṛtiḥ tatra ṣaṣṭhī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3103: yatra ṣaṣṭhī tatra ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti antareṇa sthāninirdeśam siddham bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3104: ādeśataḥ api antaratamanirvṛttau satyām na doṣaḥ . katham . vāntagrahaṇam na kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3105: . yi pratyaye ecaḥ ayādayaḥ bhavanti iti eva. yadi na kriyate ceyam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3106: jeyam iti atra api prāpnoti . kṣayyajayyau śakyārthe iti etat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati :
GS24pmbhasuu:3107: kṣijyoḥ eva ecaḥ iti . tayoḥ tarhi śakyārthāt anyatra api prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:3108: kṣeyam pāpam jeyaḥ vṛṣalaḥ iti . ubhayataḥ niyamaḥ vijñāsyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:3109: kṣijyoḥ eva ecaḥ anayoḥ ca śakyāṛthe eva iti . iha api tarhi niyamāt na prāpnoti : lavyam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3110: pavyam avaśyalāvyam avaśyapāvyam iti . tulyajātīyasya niyamaḥ . kaḥ ca tulyajātīyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3111: . yathājātīyakaḥ kṣijyoḥ ec . kathañjātīyakaḥ kṣijyoḥ ec . ekāraḥ . evam api rāyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3112: icchati raiyati atra api prāpnoti . rāyiḥ chāndasaḥ . dṛṣṭānuvidhiḥ chandasi bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3114: ādeśataḥ antaratamanirvṛttau satyām upadhāgrahaṇam kartavyam . prakṛtitaḥ punaḥ antaratamanirvṛttau satyām ūkārasya gohaḥ yā antaratamā prakṛtiḥ tatra ṣaṣṭhī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3115: yatra ṣaṣṭhī tatra ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti antareṇa upadhāgrahaṇam siddham bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3116: ādeśataḥ api antaratamanirvṛttau satyām na doṣaḥ . kriyate etat nyāse eva . radābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:3118: ādeśataḥ antaratamanirvṛttau satyām takāragrahaṇam kartavyam . prakṛtitaḥ punaḥ antaratamanirvṛttau satyām nakārasya niṣṭhāyām yā antaratamā prakṛtiḥ tatra ṣaṣṭhī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3119: yatra ṣaṣṭhī tatra ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti antareṇa takāragrahaṇam siddham bhavati . ādeśataḥ api antaratamanirvṛttau satyām na doṣaḥ . kriyate etat nyāse eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:3124: anyena nirvṛttānām anena pratipattiḥ . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . sthāne antaratamanirvatake
GS24pmbhasuu:3125: sthāninivṛttiḥ . sthāne antaratamanirvatake sarvasthāninām nivṛttiḥ prāpnoti . asya api prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:3126: dadhi madhu . astu . na kaḥ cit anyaḥ ādeśaḥ pratinirdiśyate . tatra āntaryataḥ dadhiśabdasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3127: dadhiśabdaḥ eva madhuśabdasya madhuśabdaḥ eva ādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . yadi ca evam kva
GS24pmbhasuu:3130: musalam musalam . iṇkoḥ iti ṣatvam prāpnoti . api ca iṣṭā vyavasthā na prakalpeta
GS24pmbhasuu:3131: . tat yathā tapte bhrāṣṭre tilāḥ kṣiptāḥ muhūrtam api na avatiṣṭhante evam ime varṇāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3132: muhūrtam api na avatiṣṭheran . astu tarhi pratipādakam :
GS24pmbhasuu:3133: anyena nirvṛttānām anena pratipattiḥ . nirvṛttapratipattau nirvṛttiḥ . nirvṛttapratipattau
GS24pmbhasuu:3134: nirvṛttiḥ na sidhyati . sarve sarvatra prāpnuvanti . kim tarhi ucyate nirvṛttiḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:3135: sidhyati iti . na sādhīyaḥ nirvṛttiḥ siddhā bhavati . na brūmaḥ nirvṛttiḥ na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3136: iti . kim tarhi . iṣṭā vyavasthā na prakalpeta . na sarve sarvatra iṣyante . idam
GS24pmbhasuu:3137: idānīm kimartham syāt . anarthakam ca . anarthakam etat syāt . yaḥ hi bhuktavantam
GS24pmbhasuu:3138: brūyāt mā bhukthāḥ iti kim tena kṛtam syāt . uktam vā . kim uktam . siddham tu ṣaṣṭhyadhikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:3139: vacanāt iti . ṣaṣṭhyadhikāre ayam yogaḥ kartvyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3142: 372-373 pratyātmavacanam ca . pratyātmam iti ca vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3143: yasya antaratamaḥ sa tasya sthāne yathā syāt anyasya antaratamaḥ anyasya sthāne mā
GS24pmbhasuu:3144: bhūt iti . pratyātmavacanam aśiṣyam svabhāvasiddhatvāt . pratyātmavacanam aśiṣyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3145: . kim kāraṇam . svabhāvasiddhatvāt . svabhāvataḥ etat siddham . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:3146: samājeṣu samāśeṣu samavāyeṣu ca āsyatām iti ucyate . na ca ucyate pratyātmam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3147: pratyātmam ca āsate . antaratamavacanam ca . antaratamavacanam ca aśiṣyam . yogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3148: ca api ayam aśiṣyaḥ . kutaḥ . svabhāvasiddhatvāt eva . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:3149: samājeṣu samāśeṣu samavāyeṣu ca āsyatām iti ukte na eva kṛśāḥ kṛśaiḥ saha āsata na
GS24pmbhasuu:3150: pāṇḍavaḥ pāṇḍubhiḥ . yeṣām eva kim cit arthakṛtam āntaryam taiḥ eva saḥ āsate . tathā
GS24pmbhasuu:3151: gāvaḥ divasam caritavatyaḥ yaḥ yasyāḥ prasavaḥ bhavati tena saha śerate . tathā yāni
GS24pmbhasuu:3152: etāni goyuktakāni saṅghuṣṭakāni bhavanti tāni anyonyam paśyanti sabdam kurvanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3153: evam tāvat cetanāvatsu . acetaneṣu api . loṣṭaḥ kṣiptaḥ bāhuvegam gatvā na eva tiryak
GS24pmbhasuu:3154: gacchati na ūrdhvam ārohati pṛthivīvikāraḥ pṛthivīm gacchati āntaryataḥ . tathā yā
GS24pmbhasuu:3155: etāḥ āntarikṣyaḥ sūkṣmāḥ āpaḥ tāsām vikāraḥ dhūmaḥ saḥ ākāśadeśe nivāte na eva tiryak
GS24pmbhasuu:3156: gacchati na avāk avarohati abvikāraḥ apaḥ eva gacchati āntaryataḥ . tathā jyotiṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3157: vikāraḥ arciḥ ākāśadeśe nivāte suprajvalitaḥ na eva tiryak gacchati na avāk avarohati
GS24pmbhasuu:3158: jyotiṣaḥ vikāraḥ jyotiḥ eva gacchati āntaryataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3160: 373-377 vyañjanasvaravyatikrame ca tatkālaprasaṅgaḥ . vyañjanavyatikrame svaravyatikrame ca tatkālatā prāpnoti . vyañjanavyatikrame :
GS24pmbhasuu:3161: iṣṭam uptam . āntaryataḥ ardhamātrikasya vyañjanasya ardhamātrikaḥ ik prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3162: na eva loke na ca vede ardhamātrikaḥ ik asti . kaḥ tarhi . mātrikaḥ . yaḥ asti saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3164: dadhi atra madhu atra kumārī atra brahmabandhvartham iti . āntaryataḥ mātrikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3165: dvimātrikasya ikaḥ mātrikaḥ dvimātrikaḥ vā yaṇ prāpnoti . na eva loke na ca vede
GS24pmbhasuu:3166: mātrikaḥ dvimātrikaḥ vā yaṇ asti .kaḥ tarhi . ardhamātrikaḥ . yaḥ asti saḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3167: . akṣu ca anekavarṇādeśeṣu . akṣu ca anekavarṇādeśeṣu tatkālatā prāpnoti . idamaḥ iś :
GS24pmbhasuu:3168: āntaryataḥ ardhtṛtīyamātrasya idamaḥ sthāne ardhtṛtīyamātram ivarṇam prāpnoti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:3169: eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . bhāvyamānena savarṇānām grahaṇam na iti evam na bhaviṣyati . guṇavṛddhyejbhāveṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3171: khaṭvā indraḥ khaṭvendraḥ khaṭvā udakam khaṭvodakam khaṭvā īṣā khaṭveṣā khaṭvā ūḍhā khaṭvoḍhā khaṭvā elakā khaṭvailakā khaṭvā odanaḥ khaṭvaudanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3173: khaṭvā aupagavaḥ khaṭvaupagavaḥ iti . āntaryataḥ trimātrcaturmātrāṇām sthāninām trimātracaturmātrāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3174: ādeśāḥ prāpnuvanti . na eṣaḥ doṣāḥ . tapare guṇavṛddhī . nanu ca taḥ paraḥ yasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3175: saḥ ayam taparaḥ . na iti āha . tāt api paraḥ taparaḥ . yadi tāt api paraḥ taparaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3176: ṝdoḥ ap iti iha eva syāt : yavaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3178: pavaḥ iti atra na syāt . na eṣaḥ takāraḥ . kaḥ tarhi . dakāraḥ . kim dakāre prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3179: . atha kim takāre prayojanam . yadi asandehārthaḥ takāraḥ dakāraḥ api . atha mukhasukhārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3181: kurvāte kurvāthe . āntaryataḥ ardhatṛtīyamātrasya ṭisañjñakasya ardhatṛtīyamātraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3182: eḥ prāpnoti . na eva loke na ca vede ardhatṛtīyamātraḥ eḥ asti . ṛvarṇasya guṇavṛddhiprasaṅge
GS24pmbhasuu:3183: sarvaprasaṅgaḥ aviśeṣāt . ṛvarṇasya guṇavṛddhiprasaṅge sarvaprasaṅgaḥ . sarve guṇavṛddhisañjñakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3184: ṛvarṇasya sthāne prāpnuvanti . kim kāraṇam . aviśeṣāt . na hi kaḥ cit viśeṣaḥ upādīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3185: evañjātīyakaḥ guṇavṛddhisañjñakaḥ ṛvarṇasya sthāne bhavati iti . anupādīyamāne viśeṣe
GS24pmbhasuu:3186: sarvaprasaṅgaḥ . na vā ṛvarṇasya sthāne raparaprasaṅgāt avarṇasya āntaryam . na vā
GS24pmbhasuu:3187: eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . ṛvarṇasya sthāne raparaprasaṅgāt . uḥ sthāne aṇ prasajyamānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3188: eva raparaḥ bhavati iti ucyate . tatra ṛvarṇasya āntaryataḥ rephavataḥ rephavān akāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3189: eva antaratamaḥ bhavati . sarvādeśaprasaṅgaḥ tu anekāltvāt . sarvādeśaprasaṅgaḥ tu
GS24pmbhasuu:3190: guṇavṛddhisañjñakaḥ ṛvarṇasya prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . anekāltvāt . anekāl śit sarvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3191: iti . na vā anekāltvasya tadāśrayatvāt ṛvarṇādeśasya avighātaḥ . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3192: . kim kāraṇam . anekāltvasya tadāśrayatvāt . yadā ayam uḥ sthāne tadā anekāl . anekāltvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3193: tadāśrayatvāt ṛvarṇādeśasya vighātaḥ na bhaviṣyati . athavā anāntaryam eva etayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3194: āntaryam . ekasya api antaratamā prakṛtiḥ na asti aparasya api antaratamaḥ ādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3195: na asti . etat eva etayoḥ āntaryam . samprayogaḥ vā naṣṭāśvadagdharathavat . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:3196: vā naṣṭāśvadagdharathavat samprayogaḥ bhavati . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:3197: tava aśvaḥ naṣṭaḥ mama api rathaḥ dagdhaḥ . ubhau samprayujyāvahai iti . evam iha api :
GS24pmbhasuu:3198: tava api antaratamā prakṛtiḥ na asti mama api antaratamaḥ ādeśaḥ na asti . astu nau
GS24pmbhasuu:3199: samprayogaḥ iti . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . cetanāvatsu arthāt prakaraṇāt vā loke samprayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3200: bhavati . varṇāḥ ca punaḥ acetanāḥ . tatra kiṅkṛtaḥ samprayogaḥ . yadi api varṇāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3201: acetanāḥ yaḥ tu asau prayuṅkte saḥ cetanāvān . ejavarṇayoḥ ādeśe avarṇam sthāninaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3204: mālā aupagavaḥ . kim kāraṇam . sthāninaḥ avarṇapradhānatvāt . sthānī hi atra avarṇapradhānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3205: . siddham tu ubhayāntaryāt . siddham etat . katham . ubhayoḥ yaḥ antaratamaḥ tena
GS24pmbhasuu:3206: bhavitavyam . na ca avarṇam ubhayoḥ antaratamam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3209: uḥ sthāne aṇ eva bhavati raparaḥ ca iti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3211: uḥ sthāne aṇ ca anaṇ ca aṇ tu raparaḥ eva . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . uraṇraparavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3212: anyanivṛttyartham cet udāttādiṣu doṣaḥ . uraṇraparavacanam anyanivṛttyartham cet
GS24pmbhasuu:3213: udāttādiṣu doṣaḥ bhavati . ke punaḥ udāttādayaḥ . udāttānudāttasvaritānunāsikāḥ . kṛtiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3218: prahṛtam nṝṃḥ pāhi . astu tarhi uḥ sthāne aṇ ca anaṇ ca aṇ tu raparaḥ iti . yaḥ uḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3219: sthāne saḥ raparaḥ iti cet guṇavṛddhyoḥ avarṇāpratipattiḥ . yaḥ uḥ sthāne saḥ raparaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3220: iti cet guṇavṛddhyoḥ avarṇāpratipattiḥ . kartā hartā vārṣagaṇyaḥ . kim hi sādhīyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3221: ṛvarṇasya asavarṇe yat avarṇam syāt na punaḥ eṅaicau . pūrvasmin api pakṣe eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3222: . kim hi sādhīyaḥ tatra api ṛvarṇasya asavarṇe yat avarṇam syāt na punaḥ ivarṇovarṇau
GS24pmbhasuu:3223: . atha matam etat uḥ sthāne aṇaḥ ca anaṇaḥ ca prasaṅge aṇ eva bhavati raparaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3224: iti siddhā pūrvasmin pakṣe avarṇasya pratipattiḥ . yat tu tat uktam udāttādiṣu doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3225: bhavati iti iha saḥ doṣaḥ jāyate . na jāyate . jāyate saḥ doṣaḥ . katham . udāttaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3226: iti anena aṇaḥ api pratinirdiśyante anaṇaḥ api . yadi api pratinirdiśyante na tu
GS24pmbhasuu:3227: prāpnuvanti . kim kāraṇam . sthāne antaratamaḥ bhavati . kutaḥ nu khalu dvayoḥ paribhāṣayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3228: sāvakāśayoḥ samavasthitayoḥ sthāne antaratamaḥ uḥ aṇ raparaḥ iti ca sthāne antaratamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3229: iti anayā paribhāṣayā vyavasthā bhaviṣyati na punaḥ uḥ aṇ raparaḥ iti . ataḥ kim
GS24pmbhasuu:3231: udāttādiṣu doṣaḥ iti . ye ca api ete ṛvarṇasya sthāne pratipadam ādeśāḥ ucyante teṣu raparatvam na prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:3232: ṝtaḥ it dhātoḥ ut oṣṭhyapūrvasya iti . siddham tu prasaṅge raparatvāt . siddham etat
GS24pmbhasuu:3233: . katham . prasaṅge raparatvāt . uḥ sthāne aṇ prasajyamānaḥ eva raparaḥ bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3234: . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . sthāne iti vartate sthānaśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3235: ca prasaṅgavācī . yadi evam ādeśaḥ aviśeṣitaḥ bhavati . ādeśaḥ ca viśeṣitaḥ . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:3236: . dvitīyam sthānagrahaṇam prakṛtam anuvartate. tatra evam abhisambandhaḥ kariṣyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:3237: uḥ sthāne aṇ sthāne iti . uḥ prasaṅge aṇ prasajyamānaḥ eva raparaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3239: 382 atha aṇgrahaṇam kimartham na uḥ raparaḥ iti eva ucyeta . uḥ raparaḥ iti iyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3240: ucyamāne kaḥ idānīm raparaḥ syāt . yaḥ uḥ sthāne bhavati . kaḥ ca uḥ sthāne bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3241: . ādeśaḥ . ādeśaḥ raparaḥ iti cet rīrividhiṣu raparapratiṣedhaḥ . ādeśaḥ raparaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3242: iti cet rīrividhiṣu raparatvasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . ke punaḥ rīrividhayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3249: kriyate hriyate . udāttādiṣu ca . kim . raparatvasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kṛtiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3254: prahṛtam nṝṃḥ pāhi . tasmāt aṇgrahaṇam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3258: mālarśyaḥ . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . uḥ sthāne aṇ prasajyamānaḥ eva raparaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3259: bhavati iti ucyate na ca ayam uḥ eva sthāne aṇ śiṣyate . kim tarhi . uḥ ca anyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3260: ca . avayavagrahaṇāt siddham . yat atra ṛvarṇam tadāśrayam raparatvam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3261: . tat yathā māṣāḥ na bhoktavyāḥ iti miśrāḥ api na bhujyante . avayavagrahaṇāt siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:3262: iti cet ādeśe rāntapratiṣedhaḥ . avyayavagrahaṇāt siddham iti cet ādeśe rāntasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3264: hotāpotārau . yathā eva uḥ ca anyasya ca sthāne aṇ raparaḥ bhavati evam yaḥ uḥ sthāne aṇ ca anaṇ ca saḥ api raparaḥ syāt . yadi punaḥ ṛvarṇāntasya sthāninaḥ raparatvam ucyeta :
GS24pmbhasuu:3266: mālarśyaḥ . na evam śakyam . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:3267: kartā hartā kirati girati . ṛvarṇāntasya iti ucyate . na ca etat ṛvarṇāntam . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:3268: ca etat api vyapadeśivadbhāvena ṛvarṇāntam . arthavatā vyapadeśivadbhāvaḥ na ca eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3269: arthavān . tasmāt na evam śakyam . na cet evam upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . iha ca raparatvapratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ : mātuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3270: pituḥ iti . ubhayam na vaktavyam . katham . iha yaḥ dvayoḥ ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭayoḥ prasaṅge bhavati labhate asau anyatarataḥ vyapadeśam . tat yathā devadattasya putraḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3271: devadattāyāḥ putraḥ iti . katham mātuḥ pituḥ iti . astu atra raparatvam . kā rūpasiddiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3272: . rāt sasya iti sakārasya lopaḥ rephasya visarjanīyaḥ . na evam śakyam . iha hi mātuḥ karoti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3273: pituḥ karoti iti apratyayavisarjanīyasya iti ṣatvam prasajyeta . apratyayasvisarjanīyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3274: iti ucyate . pratyayavisarjanīyaḥ ca ayam . lupyate atra pratyayaḥ rāt sasya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3275: . evam tarhi bhrātuṣputragrahaṇam jñāpakam ekādeśanimittāt ṣatvapratiṣedhasya . yat
GS24pmbhasuu:3276: ayam kaskādiṣu bhrātuṣputraśabdam paṭhati tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na ekādeśanimitttāt ṣatvam bhavati iti.
GS24pmbhasuu:3278: 385-391 kim punaḥ ayam pūrvāntaḥ āhosvit parādiḥ āhosvit abhaktaḥ . katham ca ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:3279: pūrvāntaḥ syāt katham vā parādiḥ katham vā abhaktaḥ . yadi antaḥ iti vartate tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3280: pūrvāntaḥ . atha ādiḥ iti vartate tataḥ parādiḥ . atha ubhayam nivṛttam tataḥ abhaktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3282: pratyayāvyavasthā ca . yadi abhaktaḥ dīrghatvam na prāpnoti : gīḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3283: pūḥ . rephavakārāntasya dhātoḥ iti dīrghatvam na prāpnoti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam rephavakārābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:3284: dhātuḥ viśeṣyate na punaḥ padam viśeṣyate rephavakārāntasya padasya iti . na evam
GS24pmbhasuu:3286: vāyuḥ iti . evam tarhi rephavakārābhyām padam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ dhātunā ikam :
GS24pmbhasuu:3287: rephavakārāntasya padasya ikaḥ dhātoḥ iti . evam api priyam grāmaṇi kulam asya priyagrāmaṇiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3288: priyasenāniḥ atra api prāpnoti . tasmāt dhātuḥ eva viśeṣyate . dhātau ca viśeṣyamāṇe iha dīrghatvam na prāpnoti : gīḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3291: nijegilyate . graḥ yaṅi iti latvam na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . graḥ iti anantarayogā
GS24pmbhasuu:3292: eṣā ṣaṣṭhī . evam api svaḥ jegilyate iti atra api prāpnoti . evam tarhi yaṅā ānantaryam
GS24pmbhasuu:3293: viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . atha vā graḥ iti pañcamī . latva . yaksvara :
GS24pmbhasuu:3294: yaksvaraḥ ca na sidhyati . gīryate svayam eva ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3295: puryate svayam eva . acaḥ kartṛyaki iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ na prāpnoti repheṇa vyavahitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3296: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . svaravidhau vyañjanam avidyamānavat iti na asti vyavadhānam . yaksvara . abhyastasvara :
GS24pmbhasuu:3299: ma hi sma te bibharuḥ . abhyastānām ādiḥ udāttaḥ bhavati ajādau lasārvadhātuke iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3300: eṣaḥ svaraḥ na prāpnoti repheṇa vyavahitatvāt . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . svaravidhau vyañjamam
GS24pmbhasuu:3301: avidyamānavat iti na asti vyavadhānam . abhyastasvara . halādiśeṣa :
GS24pmbhasuu:3303: vavṛte vavṛdhe . abhyāsasya iti halādiśeṣaḥ na prāpnoti . halādiśeṣa . visarjanīya :
GS24pmbhasuu:3305: nārpatyaḥ . kharavasānayoḥ visarjanīyaḥ iti visarjanīyaḥ prāpnoti . visarjanīya . pratyayāvyavasthā :
GS24pmbhasuu:3307: girataḥ . rephaḥ api abhaktaḥ pratyayaḥ api . tatra vyavasthā na prakalpate . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:3308: tarhi pūrvāntaḥ kariṣyate . pūrvānte rvavadhāraṇam visarjanīyapratiṣedhaḥ yaksvaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3309: ca . yadi pūrvāntaḥ roḥ avadhāraṇam kartavyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:3310: roḥ supi . roḥ eva supi na anyasya rephasya :
GS24pmbhasuu:3312: gīrṣu pūrṣu . parādau api sati avadhāraṇam kartavyam caturṣu iti evam artham . visarjanīyapratiṣedhaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3314: nārpatyaḥ . kharavasānayoḥ visarjanīyaḥ iti visarjanīyaḥ prāpnoti . parādau api visarjanīyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3315: pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ nārkalpiḥ iti evamartham . kalpipadasaṅghātabhaktaḥ asau na
GS24pmbhasuu:3316: utsahate avayavasya padāntatām vihantum iti kṛtvā visarjanīyaḥ prāpnoti . yaksvaraḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3319: puryate svayam eva . acaḥ kartṛyaki iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3320: upadeśe iti vartate . atha vā punaḥ astu parādiḥ . parādau akāralopautvapukpratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3321: caṅi upadhāhrasvatvam iṭaḥ avyavasthā abhyāsalopaḥ abhyastatādisvaraḥ dīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:3324: ataḥ lopaḥ ārdhadhātuke iti akāralopaḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . upadeśe iti vartate . yadi upadeśe iti vartate dhinutaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3325: kṛṇutaḥ atra lopaḥ na prāpnoti . na upadeśagrahaṇena prakṛtiḥ abhisambadhyate . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:3326: tarhi . ārdhadhātukam abhisambadhyate . ārdhadhātukopadeśe yat akārāntam iti . akāralopa . autva :
GS24pmbhasuu:3328: cakāra jahāra . ātaḥ au ṇalaḥ iti autvam prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . nirdiśyamānasya ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti evam na bhaviṣyati . yaḥ tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:3329: nirdiśyate tasya kasmāt na bhavati . rephena vyavahitatvāt . autva . pukpratiṣedhaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3331: kārayati hārayati . ātām puk iti puk prāpnoti . pukpratiṣedhaḥ . caṅi upadhāhrasvatvam ca na sidhyati :
GS24pmbhasuu:3332: acīkarat ajīharat . ṇau caṅi upadhāyāḥ hrasvaḥ iti hrasvatvam na prāpnoti . caṅi upadhāhrasvatvam . iṭaḥ avyavasthā :
GS24pmbhasuu:3334: āstaritā niparitā . iṭ api parādiḥ rephaḥ api . tatra vyavasthā na prakalpate . iṭaḥ avyavasthā . abhyāsalopaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3336: vavṛte vavṛdhe . abhyāsasya iti halādiśeṣaḥ na prāpnoti . abhyāsalopaḥ . abhyastasvara :
GS24pmbhasuu:3339: ma hi sma te bibharuḥ . abhyastānām ādiḥ udāttaḥ bhavati ajādau lasārvadhātuke iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ na prāpnoti . abhyastasvara . tādisvaraḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3342: prahartā prahartum . tādau ca niti kṛti atau iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . uktam etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:3343: kṛdupadeśe vā tādyartham iḍartham iti . tādisvaraḥ . dīrghatvam :
GS24pmbhasuu:3345: pūḥ . rephavakārāntasya dhātoḥ iti dīrghatvam na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3347: 391-392 kim idam algrahaṇam antyaviśeṣaṇam āhosvit ādeśaviśeṣaṇam . kim ca ataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3348: yadi antyaviśeṣaṇam ādeśaḥ aviśeṣitaḥ bhavati . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . anekāl api ādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3349: antyasya prasajyeta . yadi punaḥ al antyasya iti ucyeta . tatra ayam api arthaḥ anekāl
GS24pmbhasuu:3350: śit sarvasya iti etat na vaktavyam bhavati . idam niyamārtham bhaviṣyati :
GS24pmbhasuu:3351: al eva antyasya bhavati na anyaḥ iti . evam api antyaḥ aviśeṣitaḥ bhavati . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:3352: kaḥ doṣaḥ . vākyasya api padasya api antyasya prasajyeta . yadi khalu api eṣaḥ abhiprāyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3353: tat na kriyeta iti antyaviśeṣaṇe api sati tat na kariṣyate . katham . ṅit ca alaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3355: ṅit eva anekāl antyasya bhavati na anyaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3357: 392-394 kimartham punaḥ idam ucyate . alaḥ antyasya iti sthāne vijñātasya anusaṃhāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3358: . alaḥ antyasya iti sthāne vijñātasya anusaṃhāraḥ kriyate sthāne prasaktasya . itarathā
GS24pmbhasuu:3359: hi aniṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ . itarathā hi aniṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ prasajyeta . ṭitkinmitaḥ api antyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3360: syuḥ . yadi punaḥ ayam yogaśeṣaḥ vijñāyeta . yogaśeṣe ca . kim . aniṣṭam prasajyete
GS24pmbhasuu:3361: . ṭitkinmitaḥ api antyasya syuḥ . tasmāt suṣṭhu ucyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:3362: alaḥ antyasya iti sthāne vijñātasya anusaṃhāraḥ itarathā hi aniṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3364: 394-395 tātaṅ antyasya kasmāt na bhavati . ṅit ca alaḥ antyasya iti prāpnoti . tātaṅi
GS24pmbhasuu:3365: ṅitkaraṇasya sāvakāśatvāt vipratiṣedhāt sarvādeśaḥ . tātaṅi ṅitkaraṇasya sāvakāśam
GS24pmbhasuu:3366: . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . guṇavṛddhipratiṣedhārthaḥ ṅakāraḥ . tātaṅi ṅitkaraṇasya sāvakāśatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3367: vipratiṣedhāt sarvādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . prayojanam nāma tat vaktavyam yat niyogataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3368: syāt . yadi ca ayam niyogataḥ sarvādeśaḥ syāt tataḥ etat prayojanam syāt . kutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3369: nu khalu etat ṅitkaraṇāt ayam sarvādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati na punaḥ antyasya syāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3370: evam tarhi etat eva jñāpayati na tātaṅ antyasya sthāne bhavati iti yat etam ṅitam
GS24pmbhasuu:3371: karoti . itarathā hi loṭaḥ eruprakaraṇe eva brūyāt tihyoḥ tāt āśiṣi anyatarasyām iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3373: 395-396 alaḥ antyasya adeḥ parasya anekāl śit sarvasya iti apavādavipratiṣedhāt sarvādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3374: . alaḥ antyasya iti utsargaḥ . tasya ādeḥ parasya anekālśit sarvasya iti apavādau
GS24pmbhasuu:3375: . apavādavipratiṣedhāt tu sarvādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . ādeḥ parasya iti asya avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3377: dvīpam anvīpam . anekālśit sarvasya iti asya avakāśaḥ asteḥ bhūḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3379: ataḥ bhisaḥ ais . anekālśit sarvasya iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena . śit sarvasya iti asya avakāśaḥ idamaḥ iś : itaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3380: iha . ādeḥ parasya iti asya avakāśaḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:3381: aṣṭābhyaḥ auś . śit sarvasya iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:3383: 396-397 śit sarvasya iti kim udāharaṇam . idamaḥ iś : itaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3384: iha . na etat asti prayojanam . śitkaraṇāt eva atra sarvādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi :
GS24pmbhasuu:3385: aṣṭābhyaḥ auś . nanu ca atra api śitkaraṇāt eva sarvādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi :
GS24pmbhasuu:3386: jasaḥ śī jaśśasoḥ śiḥ . nanu ca atra api śitkaraṇāt eva sarvādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . asti
GS24pmbhasuu:3387: anyat śitkaraṇe prayojanam . kim . viśeṣaṇārthaḥ . kva viśeṣaṇārthena arthaḥ . śi
GS24pmbhasuu:3388: sarvanāmasthānam vibhāṣā ṅiśyoḥ iti . śit sarvasya iti śakyam akartum . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:3389: antyasya ayam sthāne bhavan na pratyayaḥ syāt . asatyām pratyayasañjñāyām itsañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:3390: na syāt . asatyām itsañjñāyām lopaḥ na syāt . asati lope anekāl . yadā anekāl tadā
GS24pmbhasuu:3391: sarvādeśaḥ . yadā sarvādeśaḥ tada pratyayaḥ . yadā pratyayaḥ tadā itsañjñā . yadā
GS24pmbhasuu:3392: itsañjñā tadā lopaḥ . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat śit sarvasya iti āha tat jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:3394: na anubandhakṛtam anekāltvam bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:3395: asarūpasarvādeśāppratiṣedheṣu pṛthaktvanirdeśaḥ anākārāntatvāt iti uktam . tat na
GS24pmbhasuu:3398: 398-401 vatkaraṇam kimartham . sthānī ādeśaḥ analvidhau iti iyati ucyamāne sañjñādhikaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3399: ayam tatra sthānī ādeśasya sañjñā syāt . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . āṅaḥ yamahanaḥ ātmanepadam
GS24pmbhasuu:3400: bhavati iti vadheḥ eva syāt . hanteḥ na syāt . vatkaraṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3401: bhavati . sthānikāryam ādeśe atidiśyate guruvat guruputraḥ iti yathā . atha ādeśagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3402: kimartham . sthānivat analvidhau iti iyati ucyamāne kaḥ idānīm sthānivat syāt . yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3403: sthāne bhavati . kaḥ ca sthāne bhavati . ādeśaḥ . idam tarhi prayojanam ādeśamātram
GS24pmbhasuu:3404: sthānivat yathā syāt . ekadeśavikṛtasya upasaṅkhyānam codayiṣyati . tat na vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3405: bhavati . atha vidhigrahaṇam kimartham. sarvavibhaktyantaḥ samāsaḥ yathā vijñāyeta :
GS24pmbhasuu:3409: alā vidhiḥ alvidhiḥ iti . na etat asti prayojanam . prātipadikarnirdeśaḥ ayam . prātipadikarnirdeśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3410: ca arthatantrāḥ bhavanti . na kāṃ cit prādhānyena vibhaktim āśrayanti . tatra prātipadikārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:3411: nirdiṣṭe yām yām vibhaktim āśrayitum buddhiḥ upajāyate sā sā āśrayitavyā . idam tarhi prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:3414: alāśrayaḥ vidhiḥ alvidhiḥ iti . yatra prādhānyena al āśrīyate tatra eva pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3415: syāt . yatra viśeṣaṇatvena al āśrīyate tatra pratiṣedhaḥ na syāt . kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3416: . pradīvya prasīvya iti valādilakṣaṇaḥ iṭ mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3418: 401-402 kimartham punaḥ idam ucyate . sthānyādeśapṛthaktvāt ādeśe sthānivadanudeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3419: guruvat guruputre iti yathā . anyaḥ sthānī anyaḥ ādeśaḥ . sthānyādeśapṛthaktvāt etasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3420: kāraṇāt sthānikāryam ādeśe na prāpnoti . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . āṅaḥ yamahanaḥ ātmanepadam
GS24pmbhasuu:3421: bhavati iti hanteḥ eva syāt vadheḥ na syāt . iṣyate ca vadheḥ api syāt iti . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:3422: ca antareṇa yatnam na sidhyati . tasmāt . sthānivadanudeśaḥ . evamartham idam ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3423: . guruvat guruputraḥ iti yathā . tat yathā guruvat asmin guruputre vartitavyam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3424: gurau yat kāryam tat guruputre atidiśyate ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3425: evam iha api sthānikāryam ādeśe atidiśyate . na etat asti prayojanam . lokataḥ etat
GS24pmbhasuu:3426: siddham . tat yathā loke yaḥ yasya prasaṅge bhavati labhate asau tatkāryāṇi . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:3427: yathā upādhyāyasya śiṣyaḥ yājyakulāni gatvā agrāsanādīni labhate . yadi api tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:3428: loke eṣaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ dṛṣṭāntasya api tu puruṣārambhaḥ nivartakaḥ bhavati . asti ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3429: iha kaḥ cit puruṣārambhaḥ . asti iti āha . kaḥ . svarūpavidhiḥ . hanteḥ ātmanepadam
GS24pmbhasuu:3430: ucyamānam hanteḥ eva syāt vadheḥ na syāt . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati sthānivat
GS24pmbhasuu:3431: ādeśaḥ bhavati iti yat ayam yuṣmadasmadoḥ anādeśe iti ādeśapratiṣedham śāsti . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:3432: kṛtvā jñāpakam . yuṣmadasmadoḥ vibhaktau kāryam ucyamānam kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ yat ādeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:3433: syāt . paśyati tu ācāryaḥ sthānivat ādeśaḥ bhavati iti . ataḥ ādeśe pratiṣedham śāsti
GS24pmbhasuu:3438: saḥ iti . etat api na asti prayojanam . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati alvidhau sthānivadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3439: na bhavati iti yat ayam adaḥ jagdhiḥ lyap ti kiti iti ti kiti iti eva siddhe lyabgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3440: karoti . tasmāt na arthaḥ anena yogena .
GS24pmbhasuu:3442: 403-406 ārabhyamāṇe api etasmin yoge alvidhau pratiṣedhe aviśeṣaṇe aprāptiḥ tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3443: adarśanāt . alvidhau pratiṣedhe asati api viśeṣaṇe samāśrīyamaṇe asati tasmin viśeṣaṇe aprāptiḥ vidheḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3444: pradīvya prasīvya . kim kāraṇam . tasya adarśanāt . valādeḥ iti ucyate na ca atra valādim paśyāmaḥ . nanu ca evamarthaḥ eva ayam yatnaḥ kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3445: anyasya kāryam ucyamānam anyasya yathā syāt iti . satyam evamarthaḥ na tu prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3446: . kim kāraṇam . sāmānyātideśe viśeṣānatideśaḥ . sāmanye hi atidiśyamāne viśeṣaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:3448: brahmaṇavat asmin kṣatriye vartitavyam iti sāmānyam yat brāhmaṇakāryam tat kṣatriye
GS24pmbhasuu:3449: atidiśyate . yat viśiṣṭam māṭhare kauṇḍinye vā na tat atidiśyate . evam iha api sāmānyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3450: yat pratyayakāryam tat atidiśyate yat viśiṣṭam valādeḥ iti na tat atidiśyate . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:3451: evam agrahīt iti iṭaḥ īṭi iti sicaḥ lopaḥ na prāpnoti . analvidhau iti punaḥ ucyamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:3453: pradīvya prasīvya iti . viśiṣṭam hi eṣaḥ alam āśrayate valam nāma . iha ca pratiṣedhaḥ na bhaviṣyati :
GS24pmbhasuu:3454: agrahīt iti . viśiṣṭam hi eṣaḥ analam āśrayati iṭam nāma . yadi tarhi sāmānyam api atidiśyate viśeṣaḥ ca sati āśraye vidhiḥ iṣṭaḥ . sati ca valāditve iṭā bhavitavyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:3455: aruditām aruditam arudita . kim ataḥ yat sati bhavitavyam . pratiṣedhaḥ tu prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3456: alvidhitvāt . pratiṣedhaḥ tu prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . alvidhitvāt . alvidhiḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:3457: bhavati . tatra analvidhau iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . na vā ānudeśikasya pratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3458: itareṇa bhāvaḥ . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . ānudeśikasya pratiṣedhāt . astu
GS24pmbhasuu:3459: atra ānudeśikasya valāditvasya pratiṣedhaḥ . svāśrayam atra valāditvam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3460: . na etat vivadāmahe valādiḥ na valādiḥ iti . kim tarhi . sthānivadbhāvāt sārvadhātukatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:3461: eṣitavyam . tatra analvidhau iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3463: 406-408 kim punaḥ ādeśini ali āśrīyamāṇe pratiṣedhaḥ bhavati āhosvit aviśeṣeṇa ādeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:3464: ādeśini ca . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . ādeśyalvidhipratiṣedhe kuruvadhapibām guṇavṛddhipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3465: . ādeśyalvidhipratiṣedhe kuruvadhapibām guṇavṛddhipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kuru iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3466: atra sthānivadbhāvāt aṅgasañjñā śvāśrayam ca laghūpadhatvam . tatra laghūpadhaguṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3467: prāpnoti . vadhakam iti atra sthānivadbhāvāt aṅgasañjñā śvāśrayam ca adupadhatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:3468: . tatra vṛddhiḥ prāpnoti . piba iti atra sthānivadbhāvāt aṅgasañjñā śvāśrayam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3469: laghūpadhatvam . tatra guṇaḥ prāpnoti . astu tarhi aviśeṣeṇa ādeśe ādeśini ca . ādeśyādeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:3470: iti cet suptiṅkṛdatidiṣṭeṣu upasaṅkhyānam . ādeśyādeśe iti cet suptiṅkṛdatidiṣṭeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3472: vṛkṣāya plakṣāya . sthānivadbhāvāt supsañjñā svāśrayam ca yañāditvam . tatra pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . sup . tiṅ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3473: aruditām aruditam arudita . sthānivadbhāvāt sārvadhātukasañjñā svāśrayam ca valāditvam . tatra pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . tiṅ . kṛdatidiṣṭam : bhuvanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3475: dhuvanam . sthānivadbhāvāt pratyayasañjñā svāśrayam ca ajāditvam . tatra pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3476: prāpnoti . kim punaḥ atra jyāyaḥ . ādeśini ali āśrīyamāṇe pratiṣedhaḥ iti jyāyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3477: . kutaḥ etat . tathā hi ayam viśiṣṭam sthānikāryam ādeśe atidiśati guruvat guruputre
GS24pmbhasuu:3479: guruvat guruputre vartitavyam anyatra ucchiṣṭabhojanāt pādopasaṅgrahaṇāc ca iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3480: yadi ca guruputraḥ api guruḥ bhavati tat api kartavyam . astu tarhi ādeśini ali āśrīyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:3481: pratiṣedhaḥ . nanu ca uktam ādeśyalvidhipratiṣedhe kuruvadhapibām guṇavṛddhipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3482: iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . karotau taparakaraṇanirdeśāt siddham . pibatiḥ adantaḥ . vadhakam
GS24pmbhasuu:3483: iti na ayam ṇvul . anyaḥ ayam akaśabdaḥ kit auṇādikaḥ rucakaḥ iti yathā .
GS24pmbhasuu:3486: . kim prayojanam . pacatu pacantu . tiṅgrahaṇena grahaṇam yathā syāt . ekadeśavikṛtasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3487: ananyatvāt siddham . ekadeśavikṛtam ananyavat bhavati iti tiṅgrahaṇena grahaṇam bhaviṣyati . tat yatha :
GS24pmbhasuu:3488: śvā karṇe vā pucche vā chinne śvā eva bhavati na aśvaḥ na gardabhaḥ iti . anityatvavijñānam
GS24pmbhasuu:3489: tu tasmāt upasaṅkhyanam . anityatvavijñānam tu bhavati . nityāḥ śabdāḥ . nityeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3490: nāma śabdeṣu kūṭasthaiḥ avicālibhiḥ varṇaiḥ bhavitavyam anapāyopajanavikāribhiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3491: tatra saḥ eva ayam vikṛtaḥ ca etat nityeṣu na upapadyate . tasmāt upasaṅkhyanam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3493: ekadeśavikṛteṣu upasaṅkhyānam . ekadeśavikṛteṣu upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . kim prayojanam . pacatu pacantu :
GS24pmbhasuu:3494: tiṅgrahaṇena grahaṇam yathā syāt . kim ca kāraṇam na syāt . anādeśatvāt . ādeśaḥ sthānivat iti ucyate ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3495: na ca ime ādeśāḥ . rūpānyatvāt ca . anyat khalu api rūpam pacati iti anyat pacatu
GS24pmbhasuu:3496: iti . ime api ādeśāḥ . katham . ādiśyate yaḥ saḥ ādeśaḥ . ime ca api ādiśyante .
GS24pmbhasuu:3497: ādeśaḥ sthānivat iti cet na anāśritatvāt . ādeśaḥ sthānivat iti cet tat na . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:3498: kāraṇam . anāśritatvāt . yaḥ atra ādeśaḥ na asau āśrīyate yaḥ ca āśrīyate na asau
GS24pmbhasuu:3500: samudāye āśrīyamāṇe avayavaḥ na āśrīyate iti . abhyantaraḥ hi samudāyasya avayavaḥ . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:3501: vṛkṣaḥ pracalan saha avayavaiḥ pracalati . āśrayaḥ iti cet alvidhiprasaṅgaḥ . āśrayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3502: iti cet alvidhiḥ ayam bhavati . tatra analvidhau iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3503: doṣaḥ . na evam sati kaḥ cit api analvidhiḥ syāt . ucyate ca idam analvidhau iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3505: sādhīyaḥ yaḥ alvidhiḥ iti . kaḥ ca sādhīyaḥ alvidhiḥ . yatra prādhānyena al āśrīyate . yatra nāntarīyakaḥ al āśrīyate na asau alvidhiḥ . atha vā uktam ādeśagrahaṇasya prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:3508: 411-412 anupapannam sthānyādeśatvam nityatvāt . sthānī ādeśaḥ iti etat nityeṣu śabdeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3509: na upapadyate . kim kāraṇam . nityatvāt . sthānī hi nām yaḥ bhūtvā na bhavati . ādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3510: hi nāma yaḥ abhūtvā bhavati . etat ca nityeṣu śabdeṣu na upapadyate yat sataḥ nāma
GS24pmbhasuu:3511: vināśaḥ syāt asataḥ vā prādurbhāvaḥ iti . siddham tu yathā laukikavaidikeṣu abhūtapūrve
GS24pmbhasuu:3512: api sthānaśabdaprayogāt . siddham etat . katham . yathā laukikeṣu vaidikeṣu ca kṛtānteṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3513: abhūtapūrve api sthānaśabdaḥ vartate . loke tāvat :
GS24pmbhasuu:3514: upādhyāyasya sthāne śiṣyaḥ iti ucyate na ca tatra upādhyāyaḥ bhūtapūrvaḥ bhavati . vede api :
GS24pmbhasuu:3515: somasya sthāne pūtīkatṛṇāni abhiṣuṇuyāt iti ucyate na ca tatra somaḥ bhūtapūrvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3516: bhavati . kāryavipariṇāmāt vā siddham . atha vā kāryavipariṇāmāt siddham etat . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:3517: idam kāryavipariṇāmāt iti . kāryā buddhiḥ . sā vipariṇamyate . nanu ca kāryāvipariṇāmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3518: iti bhavitavyam . santi ca eva hi auttarpadikāni hrasvatvāni . api ca buddhiḥ sampratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3519: iti anarthāntaram . kāryā buddhiḥ kāryaḥ sampratyayaḥ kāryasya sampratyayasya vipariṇāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3520: kāryavipariṇāmaḥ kāryavipariṇāmāt iti . parihārantaram eva idam matvā paṭhitam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3521: katham ca idam parihārāntaram syāt . yadi bhūtapūrve sthānaśabdaḥ vartate . bhūtapūrve
GS24pmbhasuu:3522: ca api sthānaśabdaḥ vartate . katham . buddhyā . tat yathā kaḥ cit kasmai cit upadiśati
GS24pmbhasuu:3523: prācīnam grāmāt āmrāḥ iti . tasya sarvatra āmrabuddhiḥ prasaktā . tataḥ paścāt aha
GS24pmbhasuu:3524: ye kṣīriṇaḥ avarohavantaḥ pṛthuparṇāḥ te nyagrodhāḥ iti. saḥ tatra āmrabuddhyāḥ nyagrodhabuddhim
GS24pmbhasuu:3525: pratipadyate . saḥ tataḥ paśyati buddhyā āmrān ca apakṛṣyamāṇān nyagrodhān ca ādhīyamānān
GS24pmbhasuu:3526: . nityāḥ eva ca svasmin viṣaye āmrāḥ nityāḥ ca nyagrodhāḥ . buddhiḥ tu asya vipariṇamyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3527: . evam iha api astiḥ asmai aviśeṣeṇa upadiṣṭaḥ . tasya sarvatra astibuddhiḥ prasaktā
GS24pmbhasuu:3528: . saḥ asteḥ bhūḥ iti astibuddhyāḥ bhavatibuddhim pratipadyate . saḥ tataḥ paśyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3529: buddhyā astim ca apakṛṣyamāṇam bhavatim ca ādhīyamānam . nityaḥ eva svasmin viṣaye
GS24pmbhasuu:3530: astiḥ nityaḥ bhavatiḥ . buddhiḥ tu asya vipariṇamyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3532: 413-414 apavādaprasaṅgaḥ tu sthānivattvāt . apavāde utsargakṛtam ca prāpnoti . karmaṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:3533: aṇ ātaḥ anupasarge kaḥ iti ke api aṇi kṛtam prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . sthānivattvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3534: . uktam vā . kim uktam . viṣayeṇa tu nānāliṅgakaraṇāt siddham iti . atha vā . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:3535: tu ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭasya sthānivadvacanāt . siddham etat . katham . ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3536: ādeśaḥ sthānivat iti vaktavyam . tat tarhi ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭagrahaṇam kartavyam . na
GS24pmbhasuu:3537: kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . ṣaṣṭhī sthāneyogā iti . atha vā
GS24pmbhasuu:3538: ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na apavāde utsargakṛtam bhavati iti yat ayam śyanādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:3544: 414-421 tasya doṣaḥ tayādeśe ubhayapratiṣedhaḥ . tasya etasya lakṣaṇasya doṣaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3546: ubhaye devamanuṣyāḥ . tayapaḥ grahaṇena grahaṇāt jasi vibhāṣā prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3547: doṣaḥ . ayac pratyayāntaram . yadi pratyayāntaram ubhayī iti īkāraḥ na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3548: mā bhūt evam . mātracaḥ iti evam bhaviṣyati . katham . mātrac iti na idam pratyayagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3549: . kim tarhi . pratyāhāragrahaṇam . kva sanniviṣṭānām pratyāhāraḥ . mātraśabdāt prabhṛti
GS24pmbhasuu:3550: ā āyacaḥ cakārāt . yadi pratyāhāragrahaṇam kati tiṣṭhanti atra api prāpnoti . ataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3551: iti vartate . evam api tailamātrā ghrtamātrā iti atra api prāpnoti . sadṛśasya api
GS24pmbhasuu:3552: asanniviṣṭasya na bhaviṣyati pratyāhāreṇa grahaṇam . jātyakhyāyām vacanātideśe sthānivadbhāvapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3553: . jātyakhyāyām vacanātideśe sthānivadbhāvasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . vrīhibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3554: āgataḥ iti atra gheḥ ṅiti it guṇaḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . uktam etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:3555: arthātideśāt siddham iti . ṅyābgrahaṇe adīrghaḥ . ṅyābgrahaṇe adīrghaḥ ādeśaḥ na sthānivat iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . niṣkauśāmbiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3556: atikhaṭvaḥ . ṅyābgrahaṇena grahaṇāt sulopaḥ mā bhūt iti . nanu ca dīrghāt iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3557: . tat na vaktavyam bhavati . kim punaḥ atra jyāyaḥ . sthānivatpratiṣedhaḥ eva jyāyān
GS24pmbhasuu:3559: atikhaṭvāya atimālāya . yāṭ āpaḥ iti yāṭ na bhavati . atha idānīm asati api sthānivadbhāve
GS24pmbhasuu:3560: dīrghatve kṛte pit ca asau bhūtapūrvaḥ iti kṛtvā yāṭ āpaḥ iti yāṭ kasmāt na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3561: . lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya eva iti . nanu ca idānīm sati api sthānivadbhāve
GS24pmbhasuu:3562: etayā paribhāṣayā śakyam iha upasthātum . na iti āha . na hi idānīm kva cit api sthānivadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3563: syāt . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam. praśliṣṭanirdeśāt siddham . praśliṣṭanirdeśaḥ ayam :
GS24pmbhasuu:3564: ṅī* ī* īkārāntāt ā* āp ākārāntāt iti . āhibhuvoḥ īṭpratiṣedhaḥ . āhibhuvoḥ īṭpratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3565: āttha abhūt . astibrūgrahaṇena grahaṇāt īṭ prāpnoti . āheḥ tāvat na vaktavyaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3566: jñāpayati na āheḥ īṭ bhavati iti yat ayam āhaḥ thaḥ iti jhalādiprakaraṇe thatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:3567: śāsti . na etat asti prayojanam. asti hi anyat etasya vacane prayojanam . kim . bhūtapūrvagatiḥ yathā vijñāyeta :
GS24pmbhasuu:3568: jhalādiḥ yaḥ bhūtapūrvaḥ iti . yadi evam thavacanam anarthakam syāt . āthim eva ayam uccārayet :
GS24pmbhasuu:3569: bruvaḥ pañcānām āditaḥ āthaḥ bruvaḥ iti . bhavateḥ ca api na vaktavyaḥ . astisicaḥ apṛkte iti dvisakārakaḥ nirdeśaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3570: asteḥ sakārāntāt iti . vadhyādeśe vṛddhitatvapratiṣedhaḥ . vadhyādeśe vṛddhitatvapratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3571: vadhakam puṣkaram iti . sthānivadbhāvāt vṛddhitatve prāpnutaḥ . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . uktam etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:3572: na ayam ṇvul . anyaḥ ayam akaśabdaḥ kit auṇādikaḥ rucakaḥ iti yathā . iḍvidhiḥ ca . iḍvidheyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3573: āvadhiṣīṣṭa . ekācaḥ upadeśe anudāttāt iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3574: ādyudāttanipātanam kariṣyate . sa nipātanasvaraḥ prakṛtisvarasya bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3575: . evam api upadeśivadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . yathā eva hi nipātanasvaraḥ prakṛtisvaram
GS24pmbhasuu:3577: āvadhiṣīṣṭa iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ārdhadhātukīyāḥ sāmānyena bhavanti anavasthiteṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3578: pratyayeṣu . tatra ārdhadhātukasāmānye vadhibhāve kṛte sati śiṣṭatvāt pratyayasvaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3579: bhaviṣyati . ākārāntāt nukṣukpratiṣedhaḥ . ākārāntāt nukṣukoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3580: vilāpayati bhāpayate . lībhīgrahaṇena grahaṇāt nukṣukau prāpnutaḥ . lībhiyoḥ praśliṣṭanirdeśāt siddham . lībhiyoḥ praśliṣṭanirdeśaḥ ayam :
GS24pmbhasuu:3581: lī* ī* īkārāntasya bhī* ī* īkārāntasya ca iti . loḍādeśe śābhāvajabhāvadhitvahilopaittvapratiṣedhaḥ . loḍādeśe eṣām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ : śiṣṭāt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3583: , kurutāt , stāt . loḍādeśe kṛte śābhāvaḥ jabhāvaḥ dhitvam hilopaḥ ettvam iti ete vidhayaḥ prāpnuvanti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . idam iha sampradhāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:3584: loḍādeśaḥ kriyatām ete vidhayaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt loḍādeśaḥ . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:3585: idānīm loḍādeśe kṛte punaḥprasaṅgavijñānāt kasmāt ete vidhayaḥ na bhavanti . sakṛdgatau
GS24pmbhasuu:3586: vipratiṣedhe yat bādhitam tat bādhitam eva iti kṛtvā . trayādeśe srantapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3588: tisṛṇām . tisṛbhāve kṛte treḥ trayaḥ iti trayādeśaḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . idam iha sampradhāryam :
GS24pmbhasuu:3589: tisṛbhāvaḥ kriyatām trayādeśaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt tisṛbhāvaḥ . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:3590: idānīm tisṛbhāve kṛte punaḥprasaṅgavijñānāt trayādeśaḥ kasmāt na bhavati . sakṛdgatau
GS24pmbhasuu:3591: vipratiṣedhe yat bādhitam tat bādhitam eva iti . āmvidhau ca . āmvidhau ca srantasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3593: catasraḥ tiṣṭhanti . catasṛbhāve kṛte caturanaḍuhoḥ ām udāttaḥ iti ām prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . idam iha sampradhāryam :
GS24pmbhasuu:3594: catasṛbhāvaḥ kriyatām caturanaḍuhoḥ ām udāttaḥ iti ām iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3595: catasṛbhāvaḥ . atha idānīm catasṛbhāve kṛte punaḥprasaṅgavijñānāt ām kasmāt na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3596: . sakṛdgatau vipratiṣedhe yat bādhitam tat bādhitam eva iti . svare vasvādeśe . svare
GS24pmbhasuu:3598: viduṣaḥ paśya . śatuḥ anumaḥ nadyajādī antodāttāt iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3599: doṣaḥ . anumaḥ iti pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati . anumaḥ iti ucyate na ca atra numam paśyāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3600: . anumaḥ iti na idam āgamagrahaṇam . kim tarhi . pratyāhāragrahaṇam . kva sanniviṣṭānām
GS24pmbhasuu:3601: pratyāhāraḥ . ukārāt prabhṛti ā numaḥ makārāt . yadi pratyāhāragrahaṇam lunata punata
GS24pmbhasuu:3602: atra api prāpnoti . anumgrahaṇena na śatrantam viśeṣyate . kim tarhi . śatā eva viśeṣyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:3603: śatā yaḥ anumkaḥ iti . avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam . āgamagrahaṇe hi sati iha prasajyeta :
GS24pmbhasuu:3604: muñcatā muñcataḥ iti . goḥ pūrvaṇittvātvasvareṣu . goḥ pūrvaṇittvātvasvareṣu pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3606: śabalagvagram . sarvatra vibhāṣā goḥ iti vibhāṣā pūrvatvam prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3607: . eṅaḥ iti vartate . tatra analvidhau iti pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati . evam api he citrago
GS24pmbhasuu:3609: citragū citragavaḥ . goto ṇit iti ṇittvam prāpnoti . ātvam :
GS24pmbhasuu:3610: citragum paśya śabalagum paśya . ā otaḥ iti ātvam prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . taparakaraṇāt siddham . taparakaraṇasāmārthyāt ṇittvātve na bhaviṣyataḥ . svara :
GS24pmbhasuu:3611: bahugumān . na gośvansāvavarṇa iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . karotipibyoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . karotipibyoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3612: kuru piba iti . sthānivadbhāvāt laghūpadhaguṇaḥ prāpnoti . uktam vā . kim uktam . karotau taparakaraṇanirdeśāt siddham ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3618: viśnaḥ iti atra chakārasya śakāraḥ paranimittakaḥ . tasya sthānivadbhāvāt che ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3619: iti tuk prāpnoti . acaḥ iti vacanāt na bhavati . na etat asti prayojanam . kriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:3620: api vai ajgrahaṇe avaśyam atra tugabhāve yatnaḥ kartavyaḥ . antaraṅgatvāt hi tuk
GS24pmbhasuu:3622: dyūtvā . vakārasya ūṭh paranimittakaḥ . tasya sthānivadbhāvāt aci iti yaṇādeśaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:3623: prāpnoti . acaḥ iti vacanāt bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam . svāśrayam atra
GS24pmbhasuu:3624: actvam bhaviṣyati . atha vā yaḥ atra ādeśaḥ na asau āśrīyate yaḥ ca āśrīyate na asau
GS24pmbhasuu:3626: ākrāṣṭām . sicaḥ lopaḥ paranimittakaḥ . tasya sthānivadbhāvāt ṣaḍhoḥ kaḥ si iti katvam prāpnoti . acaḥ iti vacanāt bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam .vakṣyati etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:3627: pūrvatrāsiddhe na sthānivat iti . idam tarhi prayojanam : āgatya ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3628: abhigatya . anunāsikalopaḥ paranimittakaḥ . tasya sthānivadbhāvāt hrasvasya iti tuk na prāpnoti . acaḥ iti vacanāt bhavati . atha parasmin iti kimartham . yuvajāniḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3633: jāyāyāḥ niṅ na paranimittakaḥ . tasya sthānivadbhāvāt vali iti yalopaḥ na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3634: . parasmin iti vacanāt bhavati . na etat asti prayojanam . svāśrayam atra valtam
GS24pmbhasuu:3635: bhaviṣyati . atha vā yaḥ atra ādeśaḥ na asau āśrīyate yaḥ ca āśrīyate na asau ādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3637: dvipadikā tripadikā . pādasya lopaḥ na paranimittakaḥ . tasya sthānivadbhāvāt padbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3638: na prāpnoti . parasmin iti vacanāt bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam . punarlopavacanasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3639: sthānivadbhāvaḥ na bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:3640: vaiyāghrapadyaḥ . nanu ca atra api punarvacanasāmarthyāt eva na bhaviṣyati . asti hi anyat punarlopavacane prayojanam . kim . yatra bhasañjñā na :
GS24pmbhasuu:3642: śyenapāt iti . idam ca api udāharaṇam : ādīdhye ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3643: āvevye . ikārasya ekāraḥ na paranimittakaḥ . tasya sthānivadbhāvāt yīvarṇayoḥ dīdhīvevyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3644: iti lopaḥ prāpnoti . parasmin iti vacanāt bhavati . atha pūrvavidhau iti kim artham . he gauḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3646: naidheyaḥ . he gauḥ iti aukāraḥ paranimittakaḥ . tasya sthānivadbhāvāt eṅhrasvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3647: sambuddheḥ iti lopaḥ prāpnoti . pūrvavidhau iti vacanāt na bhavati . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:3648: prayojanam . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na sambuddhilope sthānivadbhāvaḥ bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3649: yat ayam eṅhrasvāt sambuddheḥ iti eṅgrahaṇam karoti . na etat asti jñāpakam . gortham
GS24pmbhasuu:3650: etat syāt . yat tarhi pratyāhāragrahaṇam karoti . itarathā hi ohrasvāt iti eva brūyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3653: mādhavīyāḥ . vāntādeśaḥ paranimittakaḥ . tasya sthānivadbhāvāt halaḥ taddhitasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3654: iti yalopaḥ na prāpnoti . pūrvavidhau iti vacanāt na bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3655: . svāśrayam atra haltvam bhaviṣyati . atha vā yaḥ atra ādeśaḥ na asau āśrīyate yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3656: ca āśrīyate na asau ādeśaḥ . idam tarhi prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:3657: naidheyaḥ . ākāralopaḥ paranimittakaḥ . tasya sthānivadbhāvāt dvyajlakṣaṇaḥ ḍhak
GS24pmbhasuu:3658: na prāpnoti . pūrvavidhau iti vacanāt na bhavati . atha vidhigrahaṇam kimartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:3661: pūrvasmāt vidhiḥ pūrvavidhiḥ iti . kāni punaḥ pūrvasmāt vidhau sthānivadbhāvasya prayojanāni . bebhiditā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3664: cecchiditā iti akāralope kṛte ekājlakṣaṇaḥ iṭpratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . sthānivadbhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3665: na bhavati . māthitikaḥ iti akāralope kṛte tāntāt kaḥ iti kādeśaḥ prāpnoti . sthānivadbhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3666: na bhavati . apīpacan iti ekādeśe kṛte abhyastāt jheḥ jus bhavati iti jusbhāvaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3667: . sthānivadbhāvāt na bhavati . na etāni santi prayojanāni . kutaḥ . prātipadikarnirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3668: ayam . prātipadikarnirdeśāḥ ca arthatantrāḥ bhavanti . na kāṃ cit prādhānyena vibhaktim
GS24pmbhasuu:3669: āśrayanti . tatra prātipadikārthe nirdiṣṭe yām yām vibhaktim āśrayitum buddhiḥ upajāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3670: sā sā āśrayitavyā . idam tarhi prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:3671: vidhimātre sthānivat yathā syāt anāśrīyamāṇāyām api prakṛtau : vāyvoḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3672: adhvaryvoḥ . lopaḥ vyoḥ vali iti yalapaḥ mā bhūt iti . asti prayojanam etat . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:3673: tarhi iti . aparavidhau iti tu vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . svavidhau api sthānivadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3674: yathā syāt . kāni punaḥ svavidhau sthānivadbhāvasya prayojanāni . āyan ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3679: āsan iti iṇastyoḥ yaṇlopayoḥ kṛtayoḥ anajāditvāt āṭ ajādīnām iti āṭ na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3680: sthānivadbhāvāt bhavati . dhinvanti kṛṇvanti iti yaṇādeśe kṛte valādilakṣaṇaḥ iṭ
GS24pmbhasuu:3681: prāpnoti . sthānivadbhāvāt na bhavati . dadhi atra madhu atra iti yaṇādeśe kṛte saṃyogāntalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3683: cakruḥ iti yaṇādeśe kṛte anactvāt dvirvacanam na prāpnoti . sthānivadbhāvāt bhavati . yadi tarhi svavidhau api sthānivadbhāvaḥ bhavati dvābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:3685: lavanam atra api prāpnoti . dvābhyām iti atra atvasya sthānivadbhāvāt dīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:3686: na prāpnoti . deyam iti īttvasya sthānivadbhāvāt guṇaḥ na prāpnoti . lavanam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3687: guṇasya sthānivadbhāvāt avādeśaḥ na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . svāśrayāḥ atra ete
GS24pmbhasuu:3688: vidhayaḥ bhaviṣyanti . tat tarhi vaktavyam aparavidhau iti . na vaktavyam . pūrvavidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:3689: iti eva siddham . katham . na pūrvgrahaṇena ādeśaḥ abhisambadhyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:3690: ajādeśaḥ paranimittakaḥ pūrvasya vidhim prati sthānivat bhavati . kutaḥ pūrvasya . ādeśāt iti . kim tarhi . nimittam abhisambadhyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:3691: ajādeśaḥ paranimittakaḥ pūrvasya vidhim prati sthānivat bhavati . kutaḥ pūrvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3692: . nimittāt iti . atha nimitte abhisambadhyamāne yat tat asya yogasya mūrdhābhiṣiktam
GS24pmbhasuu:3693: udāharaṇam tat api saṅgṛhītam bhavati . kim punaḥ tat . paṭvyā mṛdvyā iti . bāḍham
GS24pmbhasuu:3694: saṅgṛhītam . nanu ca īkārayaṇā vyavahitatvāt na asau nimittāt pūrvaḥ bhavati . vyavahite
GS24pmbhasuu:3696: pūrvam mathurāyāḥ pāṭaliputram iti . atha vā ādeśaḥ eva abhisambadhyate . katham yāni svavidhau sthānivadbhāvasya prayojanāni . na etāni santi . iha tāvat āyan ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3698: dhinvanti kṛṇvanti iti . ayam vidhiśabdaḥ asti eva karmasādhanaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3700: vidhānam vidhiḥ iti . karmasādhanasya vidhiśabdasya upādāne na sarvam iṣṭam saṅgṛhītam iti kṛtvā bhāvasādhanasya vidhiśabdasya upādānam vijñāsyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3701: pūrvasya vidhānam prati pūrvasya bhāvam prati pūrvaḥ syāt iti sthānivat bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3702: evam āṭ bhaviṣyati iṭ ca na bhaviṣyati . dadhi atra madhu atra cakratuḥ cakruḥ iti parihāram vakṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3704: 431-435 kāni punaḥ asya yogasya prayojanāni . stoṣyāmi aham pādikam audavāhim tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3705: śvobhūte śātanīm pātanīm ca . netārau āgacchatam dhāraṇim rāvaṇim ca tataḥ paścāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3706: sraṃsyate dhvaṃsyate ca . iha tāvat pādikam audavāhim śātanīm pātanīm dhāraṇim rāvaṇim
GS24pmbhasuu:3707: iti akāralope kṛte padbhāvaḥ ūṭh allopaḥ ṭilopaḥ iti ete vidhayaḥ prāpnuvanti . sthānivadbhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3709: ṇilope kṛte aniditām halaḥ upadhāyāḥ kṅiti iti nalopaḥ prāpnoti . sthānivadbhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3710: na bhavati . na etāni santi prayojanāni . asiddhavat atra ā bhāt iti anena api etāni
GS24pmbhasuu:3712: yājyate vāpyate . ṇilope kṛte yajādīnām kiti iti samprasāraṇam prāpnoti . sthānivadbhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3713: na bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam . yajādibhiḥ atra kitam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ yajādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:3714: yaḥ kit iti . kaḥ ca yajādīnām kit . yajādibhyaḥ yaḥ vihitaḥ iti . idam tarhi prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:3715: paṭvyā mṛdvyā iti . parasya yaṇādeśe kṛte pūrvasya na prāpnoti īkārayaṇā vyavahitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3716: . sthānivadbhāvāt bhavati . kim punaḥ kāraṇam parasya tāvat bhavati na punaḥ pūrvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3717: . nityatvāt . nityaḥ parayaṇādeśaḥ . kṛte api pūrvayaṇādeśe prāpnoti akṛte api prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3718: . nityatvāt parayaṇādeśe kṛte pūrvasya na prāpnoti . sthānivadbhāvāt bhavati . etat
GS24pmbhasuu:3719: api na asti prayojanam . asiddham bahiraṅgalakṣaṇam antaraṅgalakṣaṇe iti asiddhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3721: avaśyam ca eṣā paribhāṣā āśrayitavyā svarārtham kartrya hartrya iti udāttayaṇaḥ halpūrvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3722: iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ yathā syāt . anena api siddhaḥ svaraḥ . katham . ārabhyamāṇe nityaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3723: asau . ārabhyamāṇe tu asmin yoge nityaḥ pūrvayaṇādeśaḥ . kṛte api parayaṇādeśe prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3724: akṛte api . parayaṇādeśaḥ api nityaḥ . kṛte api pūrvayaṇādeśe prāpnoti akṛte api
GS24pmbhasuu:3725: . paraḥ ca asau vyavasthā . vyavasthayā ca asau paraḥ . yugapatsambhavaḥ na asti
GS24pmbhasuu:3726: . na ca asti yaugapadyena sambhavaḥ . katham ca sidhyati . bahiraṅgeṇa sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3727: asiddham bahiraṅgalakṣaṇam antaraṅgalakṣaṇe iti anena sidhyati . evam tarhi yaḥ atra
GS24pmbhasuu:3728: udāttayaṇ tadāśrayaḥ svaraḥ bhaviṣyati . īkārayaṇā vyavahitatvāt na prāpnoti . svaravidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:3729: vyañjanam avidyamānavat bhavati iti na asti vyavadhānam . sā tarhi eṣā paribhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:3730: kartavyā . nanu ca iyam api kartavyā :
GS24pmbhasuu:3731: asiddham bahiraṅgalakṣaṇam antaraṅgalakṣaṇe iti . bahuprayojanā eṣā paribhāṣā . avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3732: eṣā kartavyā . sā ca api eṣā lokataḥ siddhā . katham . pratyaṅgavartī lokaḥ lakṣyate . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:3733: puruṣaḥ ayam prātaḥ utthāya yāni asya pratiśarīram kāryāṇi tāni tāvat karoti tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3734: suhṛdām tataḥ sambandhinām . prātipadikam ca api upadiṣṭam sāmānyabhūte arthe vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:3735: . sāmanye vartamānasya vyaktiḥ upajāyate . vyaktasya sataḥ liṅgasaṅkhyābhyām anvitasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3736: bāhyena arthena yogaḥ bhavati . yayā eva ānupūrvyā arthānām prādurbhāvaḥ tayā eva
GS24pmbhasuu:3737: śabdānām api tadvat kāryaiḥ api bhavitavyam . imāni tarhi prayojanāni : paṭayati ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3739: bahukhaṭvakaḥ . paṭayati laghayati iti ṭilope kṛte ataḥ upadhāyāḥ iti vṛddhiḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3740: . sthānivadbhāvāt na bhavati . avadhīt iti akāralope kṛte ataḥ halādeḥ laghoḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3741: vibhāṣā vṛddhiḥ prāpnoti . sthānivadbhāvāt na bhavati . bahukhaṭvakaḥ it āpaḥ anyatarasyām
GS24pmbhasuu:3742: hrasvatve kṛte hrasvānte antyāt pūrvam iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ prāpnoti . sthānivadbhāvāt na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3745: sauvaśvaḥ iti yvoḥ sthānivadbhāvāt āyāvau prāpnutaḥ . tayoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3746: . acaḥ pūrvavijñānāt aicoḥ siddham . yaḥ anādiṣṭāt acaḥ pūrvaḥ tasya vidhim prati
GS24pmbhasuu:3747: sthānivadbhāvaḥ . ādiṣṭāt ca eṣaḥ acaḥ pūrvaḥ . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:3749: acaḥ pūrvasya . yadi evam ādeśaḥ aviśeṣitaḥ bhavati . ādeśaḥ ca viśeṣitaḥ . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:3750: . na brūmaḥ yat ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭam ajgrahaṇam tat pañcamīnirdiṣṭam kartavyam . kim tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:3751: anyat kartavyam . anyat ca na kartavyam . yat eva adaḥ ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭam ajgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3753: ajādeśaḥ paranimittakaḥ pūrvasya vidhim prati sthānivat bhavati . kutaḥ pūrvasya . acaḥ iti . tat yathā ādeśaḥ prathamānirdiṣṭaḥ . tasya dikśabdaiḥ yoge pañcamī bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:3754: ajādeśaḥ paranimittakaḥ pūrvasya vidhim prati sthānivat bhavati . kutaḥ pūrvasya . ādeśāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3756: 436-438 tatra ādeśalakṣaṇapratiṣedhaḥ . tatra ādeśalakṣaṇam kāryam prāpnoti . tasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ : vāyvoḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3757: adhvaryvoḥ . lopaḥ vyoḥ vali iti yalopaḥ prāpnoti . asiddhavacanāt siddham . ajādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3758: paranimittakaḥ pūrvasya vidhim prati asiddhaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . asiddhavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3759: siddham iti cet utsargalakṣaṇānām anudeśaḥ . asiddhavacanāt siddham iti cet utsargalakṣaṇānām
GS24pmbhasuu:3761: paṭvyā mrdvyā iti . nanu ca etat api asiddhavacanāt siddham . asiddhavacanāt siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:3762: iti cet na anyasya asiddhavacanāt anyasya bhāvaḥ . asiddhavacanāt siddham iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:3763: tat na . kim kāraṇam . na anyasya asiddhavacanāt anyasya bhāvaḥ . na hi anyasya asiddhavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3764: anyasya prādurbhāvaḥ bhavati . na hi devadattasya hantari hate devadattasya prādurbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3765: bhavati . tasmāt sthānivadvacanam asiddhatvam ca . tasmāt sthānivadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3766: asiddhatvam ca . paṭvyā mṛdvyā iti atra sthānivadbhāvaḥ . vāyvoḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3767: adhvaryvoḥ iti asiddhatvam . uktam vā . kim uktam . sthānivadvacanānarthakyam śāstrāsiddhatvāt iti . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . yuktam tatra yat ekādeśaśāstram tukśāstre asiddham syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:3768: anyat anyasmin . iha punaḥ na yuktam . katham hi tad eva nāma tasmin asiddham syāt . tad eva ca api tasmin asiddham bhavati . vakṣyati hi ācāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3769: ciṇaḥ luki tagrahaṇānarthakyam saṅghātasya apratyayatvāt talopasya ca asiddhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3770: iti . ciṇaḥ luk ciṇaḥ luki eva asiddhaḥ bhavati . kāmam atidiśyatām vā sat ca asat
GS24pmbhasuu:3771: ca api na iha bhāraḥ asti . kalpyaḥ hi vākyaśeṣaḥ vākyam vaktari adhīnam hi . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:3772: vā vatinirdeśaḥ ayam . kāmacāraḥ ca vatinirdeśe vākyaśeṣam samarthayitum . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:3773: . uśīnaravat madreṣu yavāḥ . santi na santi iti . mātṛvat asyāḥ kalāḥ . santi na
GS24pmbhasuu:3774: santi . evam iha api sthānivat bhavati sthānivat na bhavati iti vākyaśeṣam samarthayiṣyāmahe
GS24pmbhasuu:3775: . iha tāvat paṭvyā mṛdvyā iti yathā sthānini yaṇādeśaḥ bhavati evam ādeśe api . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:3776: idānīm vāyvoḥ adhvaryvoḥ iti yathā sthānini yalopaḥ na bhavati evam ādeśe api na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3778: 438-441 kim punaḥ anantarasya vidhim prati sthānivadbhāvaḥ āhosvit pūrvamātrasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3779: . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . anantarasya cet ekānanudāttadvigusvaragatinighāteṣu upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:3780: . anantarasya cet ekānanudāttadvigusvaragatinighāteṣu upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . ekānanudātta :
GS24pmbhasuu:3781: lunīhi atra punīhi atra . anudāttam padam ekavarjam iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ na prāpnoti . dvigusvara :
GS24pmbhasuu:3783: daśāratnyaḥ . igantakāla iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ na prāpnoti . gatinighāta :
GS24pmbhasuu:3785: yat prapunīhi atra . tiṅi codāttavati iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ na prāpnoti . astu tarhi pūrvamātrasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3786: . pūrvamātrasya iti cet upadhāhrasvatvam . pūrvamātrasya iti cet upadhāhrasvatvam vaktavyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:3788: avīvadat vīṇām parivādakena . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . yaḥ asau ṇau ṇiḥ lupyate tasya sthānivadbhāvāt hrasvatvam na prāpnoti . gurusañjñā ca . gurusañjñā ca na sidhyati :
GS24pmbhasuu:3789: śleṣmā3ghna pittā3ghna dā3dhyaśva mā3dhvaśva . halaḥ anantarāḥ saṃyogaḥ iti saṃyogasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:3790: . saṃyoge guru iti gurusañjñā . guroḥ iti plutaḥ na prāpnoti . nanu ca yasya api
GS24pmbhasuu:3791: anantarasya vidhim prati sthānivadbhāvaḥ tasya api anantaralakṣaṇaḥ vidhiḥ saṃyogasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:3792: vidheyā . na vā saṃyogasya apūrvavidhitvāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . saṃyogasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3793: apūrvavidhitvāt . na pūrvavidhiḥ saṃyogaḥ . kim tarhi . pūrvaparavidhiḥ saṃyogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3797: udavāhe . ekādeśe kṛte numāmau padbhāvaḥ ūṭh iti ete vidhayaḥ prāpnuvanti . kim punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3798: kāraṇam na sidhyati . ubhayanimittatvāt . ajādeśaḥ paranimittakaḥ iti ucyate ubhayanimittaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3799: ca ayam . ubhayādeśatvāt ca . acaḥ ādeśaḥ ici ucyate acoḥ ca ayam ādeśaḥ . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3800: doṣaḥ . yat tāvat ucyate ubhayanimittatvāt iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:3801: iha yasya grāme nagare vā anekam kāryam bhavati śaknoti asau tataḥ anyatarat vyapadeṣṭum :
GS24pmbhasuu:3802: gurunimittam vasāmaḥ . adhyayananimittam vasāmaḥ iti . yat api ucyate ubhayādeśatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3803: ca iti . iha yaḥ dvayoḥ ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭayoḥ prasaṅge bhavati labhate asau anyatarataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3807: 441-443 atha halacoḥ ādeśaḥ sthānivat bhavati utāho na . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . halacoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3808: ādeśaḥ sthānivat iti cet viṃśateḥ tilopaḥ ekādeśaḥ . halacoḥ ādeśaḥ sthānivat iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3809: cet viṃśateḥ tilope ekādeśaḥ vaktavyaḥ : viṃśakaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3811: viṃśaḥ . sthūlādīnām yaṇādilope avādeśaḥ . sthūlādīnām yaṇādilope kṛte avādeśaḥ vaktavyaḥ : sthavīyān ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3812: davīyān . kekayimitrayvoḥ iyādeśe etvam . kekayimitrayvoḥ iyādeśe etvam na sidhyati : kaikeyaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3813: maitreyaḥ . aci iti etvam na sidhyati . uttarapadalope ca . uttarapadalope ca doṣaḥ bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:3814: dadhyupasiktāḥ saktavaḥ dadhisaktavaḥ . aci iti yaṇādeśaḥ prāpnoti . yaṅlope yaṇiyaṅuvaṅaḥ . yaṅlope yaṇiyaṅuvaṅaḥ na sidhyanti : cecyaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3818: popuvaḥ . aci iti yaṇiyaṅuvaṅaḥ na sidhyanti . astu tarhi na sthānivat . asthānivattve
GS24pmbhasuu:3819: yaṅlope guṇavṛddhipratiṣedhaḥ . asthānivattve yaṅlope guṇavṛddhipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ : loluvaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3822: marīmṛjaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na dhātulope ārdhadhātuke iti pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3824: 443-447 kim punaḥ āśrīyamāṇāyām prakṛtau sthānivat bhavati āhosvit aviśeṣeṇa . kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3825: ca atra viśeṣaḥ . aviśeṣeṇa sthānivat iti cet lopayaṇādeśe guruvidhiḥ . aviśeṣeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:3826: sthānivat iti cet lopayaṇādeśe guruvidhiḥ na sidhyati :
GS24pmbhasuu:3827: śleṣmā3ghna pittā3ghna dā3dhyaśva mā3dhvaśva . halaḥ anantarāḥ saṃyogaḥ iti saṃyogasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:3828: saṃyoge guru iti gurusañjñā guroḥ iti plutaḥ na prāpnoti . dvirvacanādayaḥ ca pratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:3830: dvirvacanavareyalopa iti . ksalope lugvacanam . ksalope luk vaktavyaḥ : adugdha ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3831: adugdhāḥ : luk vā duhadihalihaguhām ātmanepade dantye iti . hanteḥ ghatvam . hanteḥ ca ghatvam vaktavyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:3833: aghnan . astu tarhi āśrīyamāṇāyām prakṛtau iti . grahaṇeṣu sthānivat iti cet jagdhyādiṣu ādeśapratiṣedhaḥ . grahaṇeṣu sthānivat iti cet jagdhyādiṣu ādeśasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3834: nirādya samādya . adaḥ jagdhiḥ lyap ti kiti iti jagdhibhāvaḥ prāpnoti . yaṇādeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:3837: adhvaryvoḥ . lopaḥ vyoḥ vali iti yalopaḥ prāpnoti . ulopa :
GS24pmbhasuu:3838: akurvi* āśām akurvy āśām . nityam karoteḥ ye ca iti ukāralopaḥ prāpnoti . ītva :
GS24pmbhasuu:3839: aluni* āśām aluny āśām . ī hali aghoḥ iti ītvam prāpnoti . anunāsikāttva :
GS24pmbhasuu:3840: ajajñi* āśām ajajñy āśām . ye vibhāṣā iti anunāsikāttvam prāpnoti . rāyātvapratiṣedhaḥ ca . rāyaḥ ātvasya ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3841: rāyi* āśām rāyy āśām . rāyaḥ hali iti ātvam prāpnoti . dīrghe yalopapratiṣedhaḥ . dīrghe yalopasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3842: saurye nāma himavataḥ śrṅge tadvān sauryī himavān iti sau ināśraye dīrghatve kṛte īti yalopaḥ prāpnoti . ataḥ dīrghe yalopavacanam . ataḥ dīrghe yalopaḥ vaktavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3844: vātsābhyām . dīrghe kṛte āpatyasya ca taddhite anāti iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . āśrīyate tatra prakṛtiḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3846: uktam vidhigrahaṇasya prayojanam vidhimātre sthānivat yathā syāt anāśrīyamāṇāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:3847: api prakṛtau iti . atha vā punaḥ astu aviśeṣeṇa sthānivat iti . nanu ca uktam aviśeṣeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:3848: sthānivat iti cet lopayaṇādeśe guruvidhiḥ dvirvacanādayaḥ ca pratiṣedhe ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3850: hanteḥ ghatvam iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yat tāvat ucyate aviśeṣeṇa sthānivat iti cet lopayaṇādeśe guruvidhiḥ iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:3852: na vā saṃyogasya apūrvavidhitvāt iti . yat api ucyate dvirvacanādayaḥ ca pratiṣedhe vaktavyāḥ iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:3853: ucyante nyāse eva . ksalope lugvacanam iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:3854: kriyate nyāse eva . hanteḥ ghatvam iti . saptame parihāram vakṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3856: 447-453 padāntavidhim prati na sthānivat iti ucyate . tatra vetasvān iti ruḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . bhasañjñā atra bādhikā bhaviṣyati :
GS24pmbhasuu:3857: tasau matvarthe iti . akārāntam etat bhasañjñām prati . padasañjñām prati sakārāntam . nanu ca evam vijñāsyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:3858: yaḥ samprati padāntaḥ iti . karmasādhanasya vidhiśabdasya upādāne etat evam syāt . ayam ca vidhiśabdaḥ asti eva karmasādhanaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3860: vidhānam vidhiḥ iti . tatra bhāvasādhanasya upādāne eṣaḥ doṣaḥ bhavati . iha ca :
GS24pmbhasuu:3862: dhakārasya jaśtvam prāpnoti . asti punaḥ kim cit bhāvasādhanasya vidhiśabdasya upādāne
GS24pmbhasuu:3863: sati iṣṭam saṅgṛhītam āhosvit doṣāntam eva . asti iti āha . iha kāni santi yāni santi kau staḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3864: yau staḥ iti yaḥ asau padāntaḥ yakāraḥ vakāraḥ vā śrūyeta saḥ na śrūyate . ṣaḍikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3865: ca api siddhaḥ bhavati . vācikaḥ tu na sidhyati . astu tarhi karmasādhanaḥ . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:3866: karmasādhanaḥ ṣaḍikaḥ na sidhyati . astu tarhi bhāvasādhanaḥ . vācikaḥ na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3867: . vācikaṣaḍikau na saṃvadete . kartavyaḥ atra yatnaḥ . katham brahmabandhvā brahmabandhvai.
GS24pmbhasuu:3868: ubhayataḥ āśraye na antādivat iti . katham vetasvān . na evam vijñāyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:3869: padasya antaḥ padāntaḥ padantavidhim prati iti . katham tarhi . pade antaḥ padāntaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3870: padāntavidhim prati iti . atha vā yathā eva anyāni api padakāryāṇi upaplavante rutvam
GS24pmbhasuu:3871: jaśtvam ca evam idam api padakāryam upaploṣyate . kim. bhasañjñā nāma . vare yalopavidhim
GS24pmbhasuu:3872: prati na sthānivat bhavati iti ucyate . tatra te apsu yāyāvaraḥ pravapeta piṇḍān
GS24pmbhasuu:3873: avarṇalopavidhim prati sthānivat syāt . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na evam vijñāyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:3874: vare yalopavidhim prati na sthānivat bhavati iti . katham tarhi . vare ayalopavidhim
GS24pmbhasuu:3875: prati iti . kim idam ayalopavidhim prati iti . avarṇalopavidhim prati yalopavidhim
GS24pmbhasuu:3876: ca prati iti . atha vā yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:3877: vare luptam na sthānivat . tataḥ yalopavidhim ca prati na sthānivat iti . yalope
GS24pmbhasuu:3878: kim udāharaṇam . kaṇḍūyateḥ apratyayaḥ kaṇḍūḥ iti . na etat asti . kvau luptam na
GS24pmbhasuu:3880: saurī balākā . na etat asti . upadhātvavidhim prati na sthānivat . idam tarhi prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:3881: ādityaḥ . na etat asti . pūrvatrāsiddhe na sthānivat . idam tarhi : kaṇḍūtiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3882: valgūtiḥ . na etat asti prayojanam . kaṇḍūyā valgūyā iti bhavitavyam . idam tarhi :
GS24pmbhasuu:3887: 453-454 pratiṣedhe svaradīrghayalopeṣu lopājādeśaḥ na sthānivat . pratiṣedhe svaradīrghayalopeṣu lopājādeśaḥ na sthānivat iti vaktavyam . svara : ākarṣikaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3889: jihīrṣakaḥ . yaḥ hi anyaḥ ādeśaḥ sthānivat eva asau bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:3892: pratidīvnā pratidīvne . yaḥ hi anyaḥ ādeśaḥ sthānivat eva asau bhavati : kiryoḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3895: kṣatriyakaṇḍūtiḥ . yaḥ hi anyaḥ ādeśaḥ sthānivat eva asau bhavati : vāyvoḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3896: adhvaryvoḥ iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . iha hi lopaḥ api prakṛtaḥ ādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3897: api . vidhigrahaṇam api prakṛtam anuvartate . dīrghādayaḥ api nirdiśyante . kevalam
GS24pmbhasuu:3899: svaradīrghayalopavidhiṣu lopājādeśaḥ na sthānivat iti . ānupūrvyeṇa sanniviṣṭānām
GS24pmbhasuu:3900: yatheṣṭam abhisambandhaḥ śakyate kartum . na ca etani ānupūrvyeṇa sanniviṣṭāni .
GS24pmbhasuu:3901: anānupūrvyeṇa api sanniviṣṭānām yatheṣtam abhisambandhaḥ bhavati . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:3902: anaḍvāham udahāri yā tvam harasi śirasā kumbham bhagini sācīnam abhidhāvantam adrākṣīḥ iti . tasya yatheṣtam abhisambandhaḥ bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:3903: udahāri bhagini yā tvam kumbham harasi śirasā anaḍvāham sācīnam abhidhāvantam adrākṣīḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3906: upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . kvau kim udāharaṇam . kaṇḍūyateḥ apratyayaḥ kaṇḍūḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3907: . na etat asti . yalopavidhim prati na sthānivat . idam tarhi :
GS24pmbhasuu:3908: pipaṭhiṣateḥ apratyayaḥ pipaṭhīḥ . na etat asti . dīrghatvam prati na sthānivat . idam tarhi :
GS24pmbhasuu:3910: pāvayateḥ pauḥ . na etat asti . akṛtvā vṛddhyāvādeśau ṇilopaḥ . pratyayalakṣaṇena vṛddhiḥ bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi :
GS24pmbhasuu:3911: lavam ācaṣṭe lavayati . lavayateḥ apratyayaḥ lauḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3912: pauḥ . sthānivadbhāvāt ṇeḥ ūṭh na prāpnoti . kvau luptam na sthānivat iti bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3913: . evam api na sidhyati . katham . kvau ṇilopaḥ ṇau akāralopaḥ . tasya sthānivadbhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3914: ūṭh na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na evam vijñāyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:3915: kvau luptam na sthānivat iti . katham tarhi . kvau vidhim prati na sthānivat . luki kim udāharaṇam . bimbam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3916: badaram . na etat asti . puṃvadbhāvena api etat siddham . idam tarhi :
GS24pmbhasuu:3917: āmalakam . etat api na asti . vakṣyati etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:3918: phale lugvacanānarthakyam prakṛtyantaratvāt iti . idam tarhi :
