GS24pmbhasuu:3920: daśapaṭuḥ iti . nanu ca etat api puṃvadbhāvena eva siddham . katham puṃvadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3921: . bhasya aḍhe taddhite puṃvat bhavati iti . bhasya iti ucyate . yajādau ca bham bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3922: na ca atra yajādim paśyāmaḥ . pratyayalakṣaṇena yajādiḥ . varṇāśraye na asti pratyayalakṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3923: . evam tarhi ṭhakchasoḥ ca iti evam bhaviṣyati . ṭakchasoḥ ca iti ucyate . na ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3924: atra ṭakchasau paśyāmaḥ . pratyayalakṣaṇena . na lumatā tasmin iti pratyayalakṣaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3925: pratiṣedhaḥ . na khalu api ṭhak eva krītapratyayaḥ krītādyarthāḥ eva vā taddhitāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3926: . kim tarhi . anye api taddhitāḥ ye lukam prayojayanti :
GS24pmbhasuu:3930: daśāgniḥ . upadhātve kim udāharaṇam . pipaṭhiṣateḥ apratyayaḥ pipaṭhīḥ iti . na etat asti . dīrghavidhim prati na sthānivat . idam tarhi:
GS24pmbhasuu:3931: saurī balākā . na etat asti . yalopavidhim prati na sthānivat . idam tarhi :
GS24pmbhasuu:3932: pārikhīyaḥ . caṅparanirhrāse ca upasaṅkhyanam kartavyam . vāditavantam prayojitavān :
GS24pmbhasuu:3933: avīvadat vīṇām parivādakena . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . yaḥ asau ṇau ṇiḥ lupyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3934: tasya sthānivadbhāvāt hrasvatvam na prāpnoti . nanu ca etat api upadhātvavidhim prati
GS24pmbhasuu:3935: na sthānivat iti eva siddham . viśeṣe etat vaktavyam . kva . pratyayavidhau iti . iha mā bhūt :
GS24pmbhasuu:3936: paṭayati laghayati iti . kutve ca upasaṅkhyanam kartavyam . arcayateḥ arkaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3937: marcayateḥ markaḥ . na etat ghañantam . auṇādikaḥ eṣaḥ kaśabdaḥ . tasmin āṣṭamikam kutvam . etat api ṇicā vyavahitatvāt na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3939: 459-461 pūrvatrāsiddhe ca . pūrvatrāsiddhe ca na sthānivat iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . prayojanam ksalopaḥ salope ksalopaḥ salope prayojanam : adugdha ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3940: adugdhāḥ . luk vā duhadihalihaguhām ātmanepade dantye iti luggrahaṇam na kartavyam . dadhaḥ ākāralope ādicaturthatve . dadhaḥ ākāralope ādicaturthatve prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:3941: dhatse dhaddhve dhaddhvam iti . dadhaḥ tathoḥ ca iti cakāraḥ na kartavyaḥ bhavati . halaḥ yamām yami lope . halaḥ yamām yami lope prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3942: ādityaḥ . halaḥ yamām yami lopaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . allopaṇilopau saṃyogāntalopaprabhṛtiṣu . allopaṇilopau saṃyogāntalopaprabhṛtiṣu prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3946: yājayateḥ yāṣṭiḥ . dvirvacanādīni ca . dvirvacanādīni ca na paṭhitavyāni bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:3947: . pūrvatrāsiddhena eva siddhāni bhavanti . kim aviśeṣeṇa . na iti āha . vareyalopasvaravarjam
GS24pmbhasuu:3948: . vareyalopam svaram ca varjayitvā . tasya doṣaḥ saṃyogādilopalatvaṇatveṣu . tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3951: vāsyartham . skoḥ saṃyogādyoḥ ante ca iti lopaḥ prāpnoti . latvam :
GS24pmbhasuu:3952: nigāryate nigālyate . aci vibhāṣā iti latvam na prāpnoti . ṇatvam :
GS24pmbhasuu:3953: māṣavapanī vrīhivāpanī . prātipadikāntasya iti ṇatvam prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3955: 461-462 ādeśe sthānivadanudeśāt tadvataḥ dvirvacanam . ādeśe sthānivadanudeśāt tadvataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3956: . kiṃvataḥ . ādeśavataḥ dvirvacanam prāpnoti . tata kaḥ doṣaḥ . tatra abhyāsarūpam
GS24pmbhasuu:3958: cakruḥ iti . ajgrahaṇam tu jñāpakam rūpasthānivadbhāvasya . yat ayam ajgrahaṇam karoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3959: tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ rūpam sthānivat bhavati iti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . ajgrahaṇasya etat prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:3962: dedhmīyate iti . yadi rūpam sthānivat bhavati tataḥ ajgrahaṇam arthavat bhavati . atha hi kāryam na arthaḥ ajgrahaṇena . bhavati eva atra dvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3964: 462-466 tatra gāṅpratiṣedhaḥ . tatra gāṅaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3965: adhijage . ivarṇābhyāsatā prāpnoti . na vaktavyaḥ . gāṅ liṭi iti dvilakārakaḥ nirdeśaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3966: liṭi lakārādau iti . kṝtyejantadivādināmadhātuṣu abhyāsarūpam . kṝtyejantadivādināmadhātuṣu abhyāsarūpam na sidhyati . kṝti :
GS24pmbhasuu:3971: bibhavanīyiṣati . evam tarhi pratyaye iti vakṣyāmi . pratyaye iti cet kṝtyejantanamadhātuṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3972: abhyāsarūpam . pratyaye iti cet kṝtyejantanamadhātuṣu abhyāsarūpam na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3973: divādayaḥ eke parihṛtāḥ . evam tarhi dvirvacananimitte aci ajādeśaḥ sthānivat iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3974: vakṣyāmi . saḥ tarhi nimittaśabdaḥ upādeyaḥ . na hi antareṇa nimittaśabdam nimittārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3975: gamyate . antareṇa api nimittaśabdam nimittārthaḥ gamyate . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:3976: dadhitrapusam pratyakṣaḥ jvaraḥ . jvaranimittam iti gamyate . naḍvalodakam pādarogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3977: . pādaroganimittam iti gamyate . ayuḥ ghṛtam . āyuṣaḥ nimittam iti gamyate . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:3979: dvirvacanam asmin asti saḥ ayam dvirvacanaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3980: dvirvacane iti . evam api na jñāyate kiyantam asau kālam sthānivat bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3981: yaḥ punaḥ āha dvirvacane kartavye iti kṛte tasya dvirvacane sthānivat na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3982: . evam tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ prakṛtaḥ . saḥ anuvartiṣyate . kva prakṛtaḥ . na padāntadvirvacana
GS24pmbhasuu:3983: iti . dvirvacananimitte aci ajādeśaḥ na bhavati iti . evam api na jñāyate kiyantam
GS24pmbhasuu:3984: asau kālam na bhavati iti . yaḥ punaḥ āha dvirvacane kartavye iti kṛte tasya dvirvacane
GS24pmbhasuu:3985: ajādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . evam tarhi ubhayam anena kriyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:3986: pratyayaḥ ca viśeṣyate dvirvacanam ca . katham punaḥ ekena yatnena ubhayam labhyam . labhyam iti āha . katham . ekaśeṣanirdeśāt . ekaśeṣanirdeśaḥ ayam :
GS24pmbhasuu:3987: dvirvacanam ca dvirvacanam ca dvirvacanam . dvirvacane ca kartavye dvirvacane aci
GS24pmbhasuu:3988: pratyaye iti dvirvacananimitte aci sthānivat bhavati . dvirvacananimitte aci sthānivat
GS24pmbhasuu:3989: iti cet ṇau sthānivadvacanam . dvirvacananimitte aci sthānivat iti cet ṇau sthānivadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3991: avacukṣāvayiṣati . na vaktavyaḥ . oḥ puyaṇjiṣu vacanam jñāpakam ṇau sthānivadbhāvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3992: . yat ayam puyaṇji apare iti āha tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati ṇau sthānivat iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3993: . yadi etat jñāpyate acīkīrtat atra api prāpnoti . tulyajātīyasya jñāpakam . kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3994: ca tulyajātīyaḥ . yathājātīyakāḥ puyaṇjayaḥ . kathañjātīyakāḥ ca ete . avarṇaparāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3995: . katham jagle mamle . anaimittikam āttvam śiti tu pratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3997: 466-468 kāni punaḥ asya yogasya prayojanāni . papatuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4006: cakruḥ iti . āllopopadhālopaṇilopayaṇādeśeṣu kṛteṣu anackatvāt dvirvacanam na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:4007: . sthānivadbhāvāt bhavati . na etāni santi prayojanāni . pūrvavipratiṣedhena api
GS24pmbhasuu:4008: etāni siddhāni . katham . vakṣyati hi ācāryaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:4010: na paṭhitavyaḥ bhavati . kim punaḥ atra jyāyaḥ . sthānivadbhāvaḥ eva jyāyān . pūrvavipratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:4012: odaudādeśasya ut bhavati cuṭutuśarādeḥ abhyāsasya iti . nanu ca tvayā api ittvam vaktavyam . parārtham mama bhaviṣyati :
GS24pmbhasuu:4013: sani ataḥ it bhavati iti . mama api tarhi uttvam parārtham bhaviṣyati :
GS24pmbhasuu:4014: utparasya ataḥ ti ca iti . ittvam api tvayā vaktavyam yat samānāśrayam tadartham :
GS24pmbhasuu:4015: utpipaviṣate saṃyiyaviṣati iti evamartham . tasmāt sthānivat iti eṣaḥ eva pakṣaḥ jyāyān .
GS24pmbhasuu:4017: 469-471 arthasya sañjñā kartavyā śabdasya mā bhūt iti . itaretarāśrayam ca bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4018: . kā itaretarāśrayatā . sataḥ adarśanasya sañjñayā bhavitavyam sañjñaya ca adarśanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4019: bhāvyate . tat etat itaretarāśrayam bhavati . itaretarāśrayāṇi ca kāryāṇi na prakalpante
GS24pmbhasuu:4020: . lopasañjñāyām arthasatoḥ uktam . kim uktam . arthasya tāvat uktam :
GS24pmbhasuu:4021: itikaraṇaḥ arthanirdeśārthaḥ iti . sataḥ api uktam :
GS24pmbhasuu:4022: siddham tu nityaśabdatvāt iti . nityāḥ śabdāḥ . nityeṣu ca śabdeṣu sataḥ adarśanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4023: sañjñā kriyate . na sañjñayā adarśanam bhāvyate . sarvaprasaṅgaḥ tu sarvasya anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:4024: adṛṣṭatvāt . sarvaprasaṅgaḥ tu bhavati . sarvasya adarśanasya lopasañjñā prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:4025: . kim kāraṇam . sarvasya anyatra adṛṣṭatvāt . sarvaḥ hi śabdaḥ yaḥ yasya prayogaviṣayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4026: saḥ tataḥ anyatra na dṛśyate . trapu jatu iti atra aṇaḥ adarśanam . tatra adarśanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4027: lopaḥ iti lopasañjñā prāpnoti . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . tatra pratyayalakṣaṇapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4028: . tatra pratyayalakṣaṇam kāryam prāpnoti . tasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . acaḥ ñṇiti
GS24pmbhasuu:4029: iti vṛddhiḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ñṇiti aṅgasya acaḥ vṛddhiḥ ucyate . yasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4030: pratyayavidhiḥ tadādi pratyaye aṅgam bhavati . yasmāt ca atra pratyayavidhiḥ na tat
GS24pmbhasuu:4031: pratyaye parataḥ yat ca pratyaye parataḥ na tasmāt pratyayavidhiḥ . kvipaḥ tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:4032: adarśanam . tatra adarśanam lopaḥ iti lopasañjñā prāpnoti . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:4033: pratyayalakṣaṇapratiṣedhaḥ . tatra pratyayalakṣaṇam kāryam prāpnoti . tasya pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4034: vaktavyaḥ . hrasvasya piti kṛti tuk bhavati iti tuk prāpnoti . siddham tu prasaktādarśanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4035: lopasañjñitvāt . siddham etat . katham . prasaktādarśanam lopasañjñam bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4036: vaktavyam . yadi prasaktādarśanam lopasañjñam bhavati iti ucyate grāmaṇīḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4037: senānīḥ : atra vṛddhiḥ prāpnoti . prasaktādarśanam lopasañjñam bhavati ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4038: . yadi ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭasya iti ucyate cāhalope eva iti avadhāraṇe cādilope vibhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:4039: iti atra lopasañjñā na prāpnoti . atha prasaktādarśanam lopasañjñam bhavati iti ucyamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:4040: katham iva etat sidhyati . kaḥ śabdasya prasaṅgaḥ . yatra gamyate ca arthaḥ na ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4041: prayujyate . astu tarhi prasaktādarśanam lopasañjñam bhavati iti eva . katham grāmaṇīḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4042: senānīḥ . yaḥ atra aṇaḥ prasaṅgaḥ kvipā asau bādhyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:4045: . lumati pratyayagrahaṇam kriyate apratyayasya etāḥ sañjñāḥ mā bhūvan iti . kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4046: . prayojanam taddhitaluki kaṃsīyaparaśavyayoḥ luki ca goprakṛtinivṛttyartham . taddhitaluki
GS24pmbhasuu:4047: gonivṛttyartham kaṃsīyaparaśavyayoḥ ca luki prakṛtinivṛttyartham . luk taddhitaluki
GS24pmbhasuu:4048: iti goḥ api luk prāpnoti . pratyayagrahaṇāt na bhavati . kaṃsīyaparaśavyayoḥ yañañau
GS24pmbhasuu:4049: luk ca iti prakṛteḥ api luk prāpnoti . pratyayagrahaṇāt na bhavati . gonivṛttyarthena
GS24pmbhasuu:4050: tāvat na arthaḥ . yogavibhāgāt siddham . yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:4051: goḥ upasarjanasya . gontasya prātipadikasya upasarjanasya hrasvaḥ bhavati . tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4052: striyāḥ . strīpratyayāntasya prātipadikasya upasarjanasya hrasvaḥ bhavati . tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4053: luk taddhitaluki iti . striyāḥ iti vartate . goḥ iti nivṛttam . kaṃsīyaparaśavyayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4054: viśiṣṭanirdeśāt siddham . kaṃsīyaparaśavyayoḥ api viśiṣṭanirdeśḥ kartavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:4055: kaṃsīyaparaśavyayoḥ yañañau bhavataḥ chayatoḥ ca luk bhavati iti . saḥ ca avaśyam viśiṣṭanirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ kriyamāṇe api vai pratyayagrahaṇe ukārasaśabdayoḥ mā bhūt iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:4056: kameḥ saḥ kaṃsaḥ . parān śṛṇāti iti paraśuḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . uṇādayaḥ avyutpannāni
GS24pmbhasuu:4057: prātipadikāni . saḥ eṣaḥ ananyārthaḥ viśiṣṭanirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ pratyayagrahaṇam vā
GS24pmbhasuu:4058: kartavyam . uktam vā . kim uktam . ṅyāpprātipadikagrahaṇam āṅgabhapadasañjñārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:4059: yacchayoḥ ca lugartham iti . ṣaṣṭhīnirdeśārtham tu . ṣaṣṭhīnirdeśārtham tarhi pratyayagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4060: kartavyam . anirdeśe hi ṣaṣṭhyarthāprasiddhiḥ . akriyamāṇe hi pratyayagrahaṇe ṣaṣṭhyarthasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4061: aprasiddhiḥ syāt . kasya . sthāneyogatvasya . kva punaḥ iha ṣaṣṭhīnirdeśārthena arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4062: pratyayagrahaṇena yāvatā sarvatra eva ṣaṣṭhī uccāryate :
GS24pmbhasuu:4063: aṇiñoḥ tadrājasya yañañoḥ śapaḥ iti . iha na kā cit ṣaṣṭhī :
GS24pmbhasuu:4064: janapade lup iti . atra api prakṛtam pratyayagrahaṇam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4065: pratyayaḥ paraḥ ca iti . tat vai prathamānirdiṣṭam ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭena ca iha arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4066: . ṅyāpprātipadikāt iti eṣā pañcamī pratyayaḥ iti prathamāyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayiṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4067: tasmāt iti uttarasya . pratyayavidhiḥ ayam . na ca pratyayavidhau pañcamyaḥ prakalpikāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4068: bhavanti . na ayam pratyayavidhiḥ . vihitaḥ pratyayaḥ prakṛtaḥ ca anuvartate . sarvādeśārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:4069: vā vacanaprāmāṇyāt . sarvādeśārtham tarhi pratyayagrahaṇam kartavyam . lukślulupaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4070: sarvādeśāḥ yathā syuḥ . atha kriyamāṇe api pratyayagrahaṇe katham iva lukślulupaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4072: pratyayagrahaṇasāmāṛthyāt . etat api na asti prayojanam . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:4073: lukślulupaḥ sarvādeśāḥ bhavanti iti yat ayam luk vā duhadihalihaguhām ātmanepade
GS24pmbhasuu:4074: dantye iti lope kṛte lukam śāsti . uttarārtham tu . uttarārtham tarhi pratyayagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4075: kartavyam . na kartavyam. kriyate tatra eva :
GS24pmbhasuu:4076: pratyayalope pratyayalakṣaṇam iti . dvitīyam kartavyam kṛtsnapratyayalope pratyayalakṣaṇam yathā syāt . ekadeśalope mā bhūt iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:4079: 476-478 pratyayagrahaṇam kimartham. lope pratyayalakṣaṇam iti iyati ucyamāne saurathī vahatī iti gurūpottamalakṣaṇaḥ ṣyaṅ prasajyeta . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na evam vijñāyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:4080: lope pratyayalakṣaṇam pratyayasya prādurbhāvaḥ iti . katham tarhi . pratyayaḥ lakṣaṇam yasya kāryasya tat lupte api bhavati iti . idam tarhi prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:4081: sati pratyaye yat prāpnoti tat pratyayalakṣanena yathā syāt . lopottarakālam yat prāpnoti tat pratyayalakṣaṇena mā bhūt iti . kim prayojanam . grāmaṇikulam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4083: auttarapadike hrasvatve kṛte hrasvasya piti kṛti tuk bhavati iti tuk prāpnoti . saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4084: mā bhūt iti . yadi tarhi yat sati pratyaye prāpnoti tat pratyayalakṣanena bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4085: . lopottarakālam yat prāpnoti tat na bhavati jagat ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4086: janagat iti atra tuk na prāpnoti . lopottarakalaḥ hi atra tuk āgamaḥ . tasmāt na arthaḥ evamarthena pratyayagrahaṇena . kasmāt na bhavati grāmaṇikulam
GS24pmbhasuu:4087: senānikulam . bahiraṅgam hrasvatvam . antaraṅgaḥ tuk . asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge . idam tarhi prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:4088: kṛtsnapratyayalope pratyayalakṣaṇam yathā syāt . ekadeśalope mā bhūt iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:4089: āghnīta sam rāyaspoṣeṇa gmīya iti . pūrvasmin api yoge pratyayagrahaṇasya etat prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4090: uktam. anyatarat śakyam akartum . atha dvitīyam pratyayagrahaṇam kimartham . pratyayalakṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4091: yathā syāt varṇalakṣaṇam mā bhūt iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:4095: 479-482 kimartham punaḥ idam ucyate . pratyayalope pratyayalakṣaṇavacanam sadanvākhyānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4096: śāstrasya . pratyayalope pratyayalakṣaṇam iti ucyate sadanvākhyānāt śāstrasya . sat
GS24pmbhasuu:4097: śāstreṇa anvākhyāyate sataḥ vā śāstram anvyākhāyakam bhavati . sadanvākhyānāt śāstrasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4099: eva syāt gomantau yavamantau . gomān yavamān iti atra na syāt . iṣyate ca syāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4100: . tat ca antareṇa yatnam na sidhyati . ataḥ pratyayalope pratyayalakṣaṇavacanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4101: evamartham idam ucyate . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti. luki upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:4103: pañca sapta . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . lope hi vidhānam . lope hi pratyayalakṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4104: vidhīyate . tena luki na prāpnoti . na vā adarśanasya lopasañjñitvāt . na vā kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4105: . kim kāraṇam . adarśanasya lopasañjñitvāt . adarśanam lopasañjñam iti ucyate . lumatsañjñāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4106: ca adarśanasya kriyante . tena luki api bhaviṣyati . yadi evam . pratyayādarśanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4107: tu lumatsañjñam . pratyayādarśanam tu lumatsañjñam api prāpnoti . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4108: . tatra luki śluvidhipratiṣedhaḥ . tatra luki śluvidhiḥ api prāpnoti . saḥ pratiṣedhyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:4109: atti hanti . ślau iti dvirvacanam prāpnoti . na vā pṛthaksañjñākaraṇāt . na vā eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4110: doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . pṛthaksañjñākaraṇāt . pṛthaksañjñākaraṇasāmarthyāt luki śluvidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4111: na bhaviṣyati . tasmāt adarśanasāmānyāt lopasañjñā lumatsañjñāḥ avagāhate . yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:4112: eva tarhi adarśanasāmānyāt lopasañjñā lumatsañjñāḥ avagāhate evam lumatsañjñāḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:4113: lopasañjñām avagāheran . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . agomatī gomatī sampannā gomatībhūtā :
GS24pmbhasuu:4114: luk taddhitaluki iti ṅīpaḥ luk prasajyeta . nanu ca atra api pṛthaksañjñākaraṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4115: iti eva siddham . yathā eva tarhi pṛthaksañjñākaraṇasāmarthyāt lumatsañjñāḥ lopasañjñām
GS24pmbhasuu:4116: na avagāhante evam lopasañjñā api lumatsañjñāḥ na avagāheta . tatra saḥ eva doṣaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:4117: luki upasaṅkhyānam iti . asti anyat lopasañjñāyāḥ pṛthaksañjñākaraṇe prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4118: kim. lumatsañjñāsu yat ucyate tat lopamātre mā bhūt iti . lumati pratiṣedhāt vā .
GS24pmbhasuu:4119: atha vā yat ayam na lumatā aṅgasya iti pratṣedham śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4122: 482-486 sataḥ nimittābhāvāt padasañjñābhāvaḥ . san pratyayaḥ yeṣām kāryāṇām animittam :
GS24pmbhasuu:4123: rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ iti saḥ luptaḥ api animittam syāt:
GS24pmbhasuu:4124: rājapuruṣaḥ iti . astu tasyāḥ animittam yā svādau padam iti padasañjñā yā tu subantam padam iti padasañjñā sā bhaviṣyati . sati etatpratyaye āsīt :
GS24pmbhasuu:4125: anayā bhaviṣyati anayā na bhaviṣyati iti . lupte idānīm pratyaye yāvataḥ eva avadheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4126: svādau padam iti padasañjñā tāvataḥ eva avadheḥ subantam padam iti . asti ca pratyayalakṣaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:4127: yajādiparatā iti kṛtvā bhasañjñā prāpnoti . tugdīrghatvayoḥ ca vipratiṣedhānupapattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4128: ekayogalakṣaṇatvāt parivīḥ iti . tugdīrghatvayoḥ ca vipratiṣedhaḥ na upapadyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:4129: kva . parivīḥ iti . kim kāraṇam . ekayogalakṣaṇatvāt . ekayogalakṣaṇe tugdīrghatve
GS24pmbhasuu:4130: . iha lupte pratyaye sarvāṇi pratyayāśrayāṇi kāryāṇi paryavapannāni bhavanti . tāni
GS24pmbhasuu:4131: etāni pratyutthāpyante . anena eva tuk anena eva ca dīrghatvam iti . tat etat ekayogalakṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4132: bhavati . ekayogalakṣaṇāni ca na prakalpante . siddham tu sthānisañjñānudeśāt ānyabhāvyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4133: . siddham etat . katham . sthānisañjñā anyabhūtasya bhavati iti vaktavyam . kim kṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:4134: bhavati . sattāmātram anena kriyate . yathāprāpte tugdīrghatve bhaviṣyataḥ . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:4135: vaktavyam bhavati . yadi api etat ucyate atha vā etarhi sthānivadbhāvaḥ na ārabhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4136: . sthānisañjñā anyabhūtasya analvidhau iti vakṣyāmi . yadi evam āṅaḥ yamahanaḥ ātmanepadam
GS24pmbhasuu:4137: bhavati iti hanteḥ eva syāt vadheḥ na syāt . na hi kā cit hanteḥ sañjñā asti yā vadheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4138: atidiśyeta . hanteḥ api sañjñā asti . kā . hantiḥ eva . katham . svam rūpam śabdasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4139: aśabdasañjñā iti vacanāt svam rūpam śabdasya sañjñā bhavati iti hanteḥ api hantiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4140: sañjñā bhaviṣyati . bhasañjñāṅīpṣphagorātveṣu ca siddham . bhasañjñāṅīpṣphagorātveṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:4142: rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ rājapuruṣaḥ . pratyayalakṣaṇena yaci bham iti bhāsañjñā prāpnoti . sthānisañjñā anyabhūtasya analvidhau iti vacanāt na bhavati . ṅīp :
GS24pmbhasuu:4143: citrāyām jātā citrā . pratyayalakṣaṇena aṇantāt īkāraḥ prāpnoti . sthānisañjñā anyabhūtasya analvidhau iti vacanāt na bhavati . ṣpha :
GS24pmbhasuu:4144: vataṅḍī . pratyayalakṣaṇena yañantāt iti ṣphaḥ prāpnoti . sthānisañjñā anyabhūtasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4145: analvidhau iti vacanāt na bhavati . goḥ ātvam . gām icchati gavyati . pratyayalakṣaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:4146: ami ā otaḥ amśasoḥ iti ātvam prāpnoti . sthānisañjñā anyabhūtasya analvidhau iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4147: vacanāt na bhavati . tasya doṣaḥ ṅaunakāralopettvemvidhayaḥ . tasya etasya lakṣaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4148: doṣaḥ ṅaunakāralopaḥ . ārdre carman lohite carman . pratyayalakṣaṇena yaci bham iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4149: bhasañjñā siddhā bhavati . sthānisañjñā anyabhūtasya analvidhau iti vacanāt na prāpnoti . ittvam :
GS24pmbhasuu:4150: āśīḥ . pratyayalakṣaṇena hali iti itvam siddham bhavati . sthānisañjñā anyabhūtasya analvidhau iti vacanāt na prāpnoti . im :
GS24pmbhasuu:4151: atṛṇet . pratyayalakṣaṇena hali iti ittvam siddham bhavati . sthānisañjñā anyabhūtasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4152: analvidhau iti vacanāt na prāpnoti . sūtram ca bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu .
GS24pmbhasuu:4153: nanu ca uktam sataḥ nimittābhāvāt padasañjñābhāvaḥ tugdīrghatvayoḥ ca vipratiṣedhānupapattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4154: ekayogalakṣaṇatvāt parivīḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . vakṣyati atra parihāram . iha api
GS24pmbhasuu:4155: parivīḥ iti śāstraparavipratiṣedhena paratvāt dīrghatvam bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4157: 486-490 kāni punaḥ asya yogasya prayojanāni . prayojanam apṛktaśilope num amāmau
GS24pmbhasuu:4158: guṇavṛddhidīrghatvemaḍāṭśnamvidhayaḥ . apṛktalope śilope ca kṛte num amāmau guṇavṛddhī
GS24pmbhasuu:4159: dīrghatvam imaḍāṭau śnamvidhiḥ iti prayojanāni . num :
GS24pmbhasuu:4160: agne trī te vajinā trī sadhasthā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4161: ta tā piṇḍānām . num . amāmau : he anaḍvan ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4165: agne trī te vajinā trī sadhasthā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4172: acchinaḥ atra . apṛktaśilopayoḥ kṛtayoḥ ete vidhayaḥ na prāpnuvanti . pratyayalakṣaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:4173: bhavanti . na etāni santi prayojanāni . sthānivadbhāvena api etāni siddhāni . na
GS24pmbhasuu:4174: sidhyanti . ādeśaḥ sthānivat iti ucyate . na ca lopaḥ ādeśaḥ . lopaḥ api ādeśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4175: katham . ādiśyate yaḥ saḥ ādeśaḥ . lopaḥ api ādiśyate . doṣaḥ khalu api syāt yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:4176: lopaḥ na ādeśaḥ syāt . iha acaḥ parasmin pūrvavidhau iti etasya bhūyiṣṭhāni lope
GS24pmbhasuu:4177: udāharaṇāni tāni na syuḥ . yatra tarhi sthānivadbhāvaḥ na asti tadartham ayam yogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4178: vaktavyaḥ . kva ca sthānivadbhāvaḥ na asti . yaḥ alvidhiḥ . kim prayojanam . prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4180: doṣaḥ bhavati. bhasañjñāyām tāvat na doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na pratyayalakṣaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:4181: bhasañjñā bhavati iti yat ayam na ṅisambuddhyoḥ iti ṅau pratiṣedham śāsti . ṅīpi api :
GS24pmbhasuu:4183: aṇantāt akārāntāt . katham tarhi . aṇ yaḥ akāraḥ iti . ṣphe api :
GS24pmbhasuu:4185: yañantāt akārantāt iti . katham tarhi . yañ yaḥ akāraḥ iti . goḥ ātve api :
GS24pmbhasuu:4187: ami aci iti . katham tarhi . aci ami iti . prayojanāni api tarhi tāni na santi . yat tāvat ucyate ṅaunakārlopaḥ iti kriyate etat nyāse eva :
GS24pmbhasuu:4188: na ṅisambuddhyoḥ iti . ittvam api . vakṣyati etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:4189: śāsaḥ ittve āśāsaḥ kvau iti . imvidhiḥ api :
GS24pmbhasuu:4190: hali iti nivṛttam . yadi hali iti nivṛttam tṛṇahāni atra api prāpnoti . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:4191: aci na iti api anuvartiṣyate . na tarhi idānīm ayam yogaḥ vaktavyaḥ . vaktavyaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4192: . kim prayojanam . pratyayam gṛhītvā yat ucyate tat pratyayalakṣaṇena yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4193: śabdam gṛhītvā yat ucyate tat pratyayalakṣaṇena mā bhūt iti . kim prayojanam . śobhanāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4194: dṛṣadaḥ asya sudṛṣat brāhmaṇaḥ . soḥ manasī* alomoṣasī* iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4196: 490-492 lumati pratiṣedhe ekapadasvarasya upasaṅkhyānam . lumati pratiṣedhe ekapadasvarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4197: upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam. ekapadasvare ca lumatā lupte pratyayalakṣaṇam na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4198: iti vaktavyam . kim aviśeṣeṇa . na iti āha . sarvāmantritasijluksvaravarjam . sarvasvaram
GS24pmbhasuu:4202: sarvasya supi iti ādyudāttatvam yathā syāt . āmantritasvara :
GS24pmbhasuu:4205: āmantritasya ca iti ādyudāttatvam yathā syāt . sijluksvara : ma hi datām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4207: ādiḥ sicaḥ anyatarasyām iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ yathā syāt . kim prayojanam . prayojanam ñinikilluki svarāḥ . ñinikitsvarāḥ luki prayojayanti . gargaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4213: ñniti iti ādyudāttatvam mā bhūt iti . iha ca :
GS24pmbhasuu:4215: kitaḥ iti antodāttatvam mā bhūt iti . pathimathoḥ sarvanāmasthāne . pathimathoḥ sarvanāmasthāne luki prayojanam . pathipriyaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4217: pathimathoḥ sarvanāmasthāne iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ mā bhūt iti . ahnaḥ ravidhau . ahnaḥ ravidhau lumatā lupte pratyayalakṣaṇam na bhavati iti vaktavyam . ahaḥ dadati ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4219: raḥ asupi iti pratyayalakṣaṇena pratiṣedhaḥ mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4221: 493-498 uttarapadatve ca apadādividhau . uttarapadatve ca apadādividhau lumatā lupte
GS24pmbhasuu:4222: pratyayalakṣaṇam na bhavati iti vaktavyam . paramavācā paramavāce paramagoduhā paramagoduhe
GS24pmbhasuu:4224: padasya iti pratyayalakṣaṇena kutvādīni mā bhūvan iti . apadādividhau iti kimartham . dadhisecau dadhisecaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:4225: sātpadādyoḥ iti pratiṣedhaḥ yathā syāt . yadi apadādividhau iti ucyate uttarapadādhikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4226: na prakalpeta . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . karṇaḥ varṇalakṣaṇāt iti evamādiḥ vidhiḥ na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4227: . yadi punaḥ nalopādividhau plutyante lumatā lupte pratyayalakṣaṇam na bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4228: ucyeta . na evam śakyam . iha hi :
GS24pmbhasuu:4229: rājakumāryau rājakumāryaḥ iti śākalam prasajyeta . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yat etat siti
GS24pmbhasuu:4230: śākalam na iti etat pratyaye śākalam na iti vakṣyāmi . yadi pratyaye śākalam na iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4232: atra api na prasajyeta . pratyaye śākalam na bhavati . kasmin . yasmāt yaḥ pratyayaḥ vihitaḥ iti . iha tarhi paramadivā paramadive :
GS24pmbhasuu:4233: diva ut iti uttvam prāpnoti iti. astu tarhi aviśeṣeṇa . nanu ca uktam uttarapadādhikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4234: na prakalpeta iti . vacanāt uttarapadādhikāraḥ bhaviṣyati . tat tarhi vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4235: na vaktavyam . anuvṛttiḥ kariṣyate . idam asti :
GS24pmbhasuu:4237: suptiṅantam padam . yasmāt suptiṅvidhiḥ tadādi subantam ca . naḥ kye . nāntam kye
GS24pmbhasuu:4238: padasañjñam bhavati yasmāt kyavidhiḥ subantam ca . siti ca . siti ca pūrvam padasañjñam
GS24pmbhasuu:4239: bhavati yasmāt sidvidhiḥ tadādi subantam ca . svādiṣu asarvanāmasthāne . svādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:4240: asarvanāmasthāne pūrvam padasañjñam bhavati yasmāt svādividhiḥ tadādi subantam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4241: . yaci bham . yajādipratyaye pūrvam padasañjñam bhavati yasmāt yajādividhiḥ tadādi
GS24pmbhasuu:4244: asarvanāmasthāne iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . astu tasyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ yā svādau padam
GS24pmbhasuu:4245: iti padasañjñā yā tu subantam padam iti padasañjñā sā bhaviṣyati . sati etatpratyaye
GS24pmbhasuu:4246: āsīt anayā bhaviṣyati anayā na bhaviṣyati iti . lupte idānīm pratyaye yāvataḥ eva
GS24pmbhasuu:4247: avadheḥ svādau padam iti padasañjñā tāvataḥ eva avadheḥ subantam padam iti . asti
GS24pmbhasuu:4248: ca pratyayalakṣaṇena sarvanāmasthānaparatā iti kṛtvā pratiṣedhāḥ ca balīyāṃsaḥ bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:4249: iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . na apratiṣedhāt . na ayam prasajyapratiṣedhaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:4250: sarvanāmasthāne na iti . kim tarhi . paryudāsaḥ ayam :
GS24pmbhasuu:4251: yat anyat sarvanāmasthānāt iti . sarvanāmasthāne avyāpāraḥ . yadi kena cit prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:4252: tena bhaviṣyati . pūrveṇa ca prāpnoti . aprāpteḥ vā . atha vā anantarā ya prāptiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4253: sā pratiṣidhyate . kutaḥ etat . anantarasya vidhiḥ vā bhavati pratiṣedhaḥ vā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4254: . pūrvā prāptiḥ apratiṣiddhā tayā bhaviṣyati . nanu ca iyam prāptiḥ pūrvām prāptim
GS24pmbhasuu:4255: bādhate . na utsahate pratiṣiddhā satī bādhitum . yadi evam paramavācau paramavācaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4256: iti suptiṅantam padam iti padasañjñā prāpnoti . evam tarhi yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4257: . svādiṣu pūrvam padasañjñam bhavati . tataḥ sarvanāmasthāne ayaci pūrvam padasañjñam
GS24pmbhasuu:4258: bhavati . tataḥ bham . bhasañjñam bhavati yajādau asarvanāmasthane iti . yadi tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:4260: ecaḥ plutādhikāre padāntagrahaṇam codayiṣyati iha mā bhūt :
GS24pmbhasuu:4262: tasmin kriyamāṇe api bhaviṣyati . vākyapadayoḥ antyasya iti evam tat . iha tarhi :
GS24pmbhasuu:4264: sātpadādyoḥ iti padādilakṣaṇaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ na prāpnoti . mā bhūt evam :
GS24pmbhasuu:4268: padādeḥ na iti evam bhaviṣyati . na evam śakyam . iha api prasajyeta :
GS24pmbhasuu:4269: ṛkṣu vākṣu tvakṣu kumārīṣu kiśorīṣu iti . sātpratiṣedhaḥ jñāpakaḥ svādiṣu padatvena yeṣām padasañjñā na tebhyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ bhavati iti . iha tarhi : bahusecau ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4270: bahusecaḥ : bahuc ayam pratyayaḥ . atra padāt ādiḥ padādiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4271: padādeḥ na iti ucyamāne api na sidhyati . evam tarhi uttarapadatve ca padādividhau lumatā lupte pratyayalakṣaṇam bhavati iti vakṣyāmi . tat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati :
GS24pmbhasuu:4272: padādividhau eva na padāntavidhau iti . katham bahusecau bahusecaḥ . bahucpūrvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4273: ca padādividhau na padāntavidhau iti . dvandve antyasya . dvandve antyasyalumatā
GS24pmbhasuu:4274: lupte pratyayalakṣaṇam na bhavati iti vaktavyam . vāksraktvacam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4276: 498-500 iha abhūvan iti pratyayalakṣaṇena jusbhāvaḥ prāpnoti . sicaḥ usaḥ aprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4277: ākāraprakaraṇāt . sicaḥ usaḥ aprasaṅgaḥ . kim kāraṇam . ākāraprakaraṇāt . ātaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4279: ātaḥ eva sijlugantāt na anyasmāt sijlugantāt iti . iha :
GS24pmbhasuu:4281: iti asmatputraḥ dadāti iti atra yuṣmadasmadoḥ ṣaṣṭhīcaturthīdvitīyāsthayoḥ vāmnāvau
GS24pmbhasuu:4282: iti vāmnāvādayaḥ prāpnuvanti . yuṣmadasmadoḥ sthagrahaṇāt . sthagrahaṇam tatra kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4283: . tat śrūyamāṇavibhaktiviśeṣaṇam vijñāsyate . asti anyat sthagrahaṇasya prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4284: . kim . savibhaktikasya vāmnāvādayaḥ yathā syuḥ iti . na etat asti prayojanam . padasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4285: iti vartate vibhaktyantam ca padam . tatra antareṇa api sthagrahaṇam savibhaktikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4286: eva grahaṇam bhaviṣyati . bhavet siddham yatra vibhaktyantam padam . yatra tu khalu
GS24pmbhasuu:4289: grāmaḥ nau dīyate janapadaḥ vām dīyate ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4290: janapadaḥ nau dīyate . sarvagrahaṇam api prakṛtam anuvartate . tena savibhaktikasya eva bhaviṣyati . iha :
GS24pmbhasuu:4291: cakṣuṣkāmam yājayām cakāra iti tiṅ atiṅaḥ iti . tasya ca nighātaḥ tasmāt ca anighātaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4292: prāpnoti . āmi lilopāt tasya ca anighātaḥ tasmāt ca nighātaḥ . āmi lilopāt tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4293: ca anighātaḥ tasmāt ca nighātaḥ siddhaḥ bhaviṣyati . aṅgādhikāre iṭaḥ vidhipratiṣedhau
GS24pmbhasuu:4295: jigamiṣa saṃvivṛtsa . aṅgasya iti iṭaḥ vidhipratiṣedhau na prāpnutaḥ . krameḥ dīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:4296: ca . kim ca . iṭaḥ ca vidhipratiṣedhau . na iti āha . adeśe ayam caḥ paṭhitaḥ . krameḥ ca dīrghatvam :
GS24pmbhasuu:4299: 500-502 iha kim cit aṅgādhikāre lumatā lupte pratyayalakṣaṇena bhavati kim cit ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4300: anyatra na bhavati . yadi punaḥ na lumatā tasmin iti ucyeta . atha na lumatā tasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:4301: iti ucyamāne kim siddham etat bhavati iṭaḥ vidhipratiṣedhau krameḥ dīrghatvam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4302: . bāḍham siddham . na iṭaḥ ividhipratiṣedhau parasmaipadeṣu iti ucyate . katham tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:4303: . sakārādau iti . tadviśeṣaṇam parasmaipadagrahaṇam . na khalu api krameḥ dīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:4304: parasmaipadeṣu iti ucyate . katham tarhi . śiti iti . tadviśeṣaṇam parasmaipadagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4305: . na lumatā tasmin iti cet haniṇiṅādeśāḥ talope . na lumatā tasmin iti cet haniṇiṅādeśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4309: adhyagāyi bhavatā anuvākaḥ . talope kṛte luṅi iti haniṇiṅādeśāḥ na prāpnuvanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4310: na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na luṅi iti haniṇiṅādeśāḥ ucyante . kim tarhi . ārdhadhātuke iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4313: sarvapṛṣṭhaḥ sarvasya supi iti ādyudāttatvam na prāpnoti . tat ca api vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4314: na vaktavyam . na lumatā aṅgasya iti eva siddham . katham . na lumatā lupte aṅgādhikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4315: pratinirdiśyate . kim tarhi . yaḥ asau lumatā lupyate tasmin yat aṅgam tasya yat
GS24pmbhasuu:4316: kāryam tat na bhavati . evam api sarvasvaraḥ na sidhyati . kartavyaḥ atra yatnaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4318: 502-503 kim idam algrahaṇam antyaviśeṣaṇam . evam bhavitum arhati . upadhāsañjñāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:4319: algrahaṇam antyanirdeśaḥ cet saṅghātapratiṣedhaḥ . upadhāsañjñāyām algrahaṇam antyanirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4320: cet saṅghātasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . saṅghātasya upadhāsañjñā prāpnoti . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:4323: saṅghātasya ittvam prāpnoti . yadi punaḥ al antyāt iti ucyeta . evam api antyaḥ aviśeṣitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4324: bhavati . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . saṅghātāt api pūrvasya upadhāsañjñā prasajyeta . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:4325: kaḥ doṣaḥ . śāsaḥ it aṅhaloḥ : śiṣṭaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4326: śiṣṭavān : śakārasya ittvam prasajyeta . sūtram ca bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu
GS24pmbhasuu:4327: . nanu ca uktam upadhāsañjñāyām algrahaṇam antyanirdeśaḥ cet saṅghātapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4328: iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . antyavijñānāt siddham . siddham etat . katham . alaḥ antyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4331: 503-506 antyavijñānāt siddham iti cet na anarthake alontyavidhiḥ anabhyāsavikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:4332: . antyavijñānāt siddham iti cet tat na . kim kāraṇam . na anarthake alontyavidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4333: anabhyāsavikāre . anarthake alontyavidhiḥ na iti eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā . kim aviśeṣeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:4334: . na iti āha . anabhyāsavikāre . abhyāsavikārān varjayitvā . bhṛñām it ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4335: artipipartyoḥ ca iti . kāni etasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ prayojanāni . prayojanam avyaktānukaraṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4336: ataḥ itau . antyasya prāpnoti . anarthake alontyavidhiḥ na bhavati iti na doṣaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4337: . na etat asti prayojanam . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na antyasya pararūpam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4338: iti yat ayam na āmreḍitasya antyasya tu vā iti āha . ghvasoḥ et hau abhyāsalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4339: ca . ghvasoḥ et hau abhyāsalopaḥ ca iti antyasya prāpnoti . anarthake alontyavidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4340: na bhavati iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam . punarlopavacanasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4341: sarvasya bhaviṣyati . atha vā śit lopaḥ kariṣyate . saḥ śit sarvasya iti sarvādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4342: bhaviṣyati . saḥ tarhi śakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . kriyate nyāse eva . dviśakārakaḥ nirdeśaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:4343: ghvasoḥ et hau abhyāsalopaśśca iti . āpi lopaḥ akaḥ anaci . tiṣṭhati sūtram . anyathā vyākhyāyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:4344: āpi hali lopaḥ iti antyasya prāpnoti . anarthake alontyavidhiḥ na bhavati iti na
GS24pmbhasuu:4345: doṣaḥ bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam . anaḥ eva lopam vakṣyāmi . tat anaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4346: grahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . an āpi akaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4347: iti . tat vai prathamānirdiṣṭam . ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣtena ca iha arthaḥ . hali iti eṣā saptamī
GS24pmbhasuu:4349: tasmin iti nirdiṣṭe pūrvasya iti . atra lopaḥ abhyāsasya . atra lopaḥ abhyāsasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4350: iti antyasya prāpnoti . anarthake alontyavidhiḥ na bhavati iti na doṣaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4351: etat api na asti prayojanam . atragrahaṇasāmarthyāt sarvasya bhaviṣyati . asti anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:4353: iha mā bhūt : dadhau dadau . antareṇa api atragrahaṇam sanadhikāram apekṣiṣyāmahe . san tarhi sakārādiḥ apekṣyate sani sakārādau iti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4354: iha mā bhūt : jijñāpayiṣati . antareṇa api atragrahaṇam sanam sakārādim apekṣiṣyāmahe . prakṛtayaḥ tarhi apekṣyante . etāsām prakṛtīnām lopaḥ yathā syāt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4355: iha mā bhūt : pipakṣati yiyakṣati . antareṇa api atragrahaṇam etāḥ prakṛtīḥ apekṣiṣyāmahe . viṣayaḥ tarhi apekṣyate . mucaḥ akarmakasya guṇaḥ vā iti iha mā bhūt :
GS24pmbhasuu:4356: mumukṣati gām iti . antareṇa api atragrahaṇam viṣayam apekṣiṣyāmahe . katham . akarmakasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4357: iti ucyate . tena yatra eva ayam muciḥ akarmakaḥ tatra eva bhaviṣyati . tasmāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:4360: 506 alaḥ antyāt pūrvaḥ al upadhā iti vā . atha vā vyaktam eva pathitavyam alaḥ antyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4361: pūrvaḥ al upadhāsañjñaḥ bhavati iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . avacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4362: lokavijñānāt siddham . antareṇa api vacanam lokavijñānāt siddham etat . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:4363: loke amīṣām brāhmaṇānām antyāt pūrvaḥ ānīyatām iti ukte yathājātīyakaḥ antyaḥ tathājātīyakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4372: dvīpam antarīpam samīpam . anyathājātīyakena śabdena nirdeśaḥ kriyate anyathājātīyakaḥ udāhriyate . kim punaḥ udāharaṇam . iha tāvat :
GS24pmbhasuu:4374: tasmin aṇi ca yuṣmākāsmākau iti . tasmāt iti uttarasya iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:4375: tasmāt śasaḥ naḥ puṃsi iti . idam ca api udāharaṇam :
GS24pmbhasuu:4376: ikaḥ yaṇ aci dvyantarupasargebhyaḥ apaḥ īt iti . katham . sarvanāmnā ayam nirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4377: kriyate sarvanāma ca sāmānyavāci . tatra sāmānye nirdiṣṭe viśeṣāḥ api udāharaṇāni
GS24pmbhasuu:4378: bhavanti . kim punaḥ sāmānyam kaḥ vā viśeṣaḥ . gauḥ sāmānyam kṛṣṇaḥ viśeṣaḥ . na
GS24pmbhasuu:4379: tarhi idānīm kṛṣṇaḥ sāmānyam bhavati gauḥ viśeṣaḥ bhavati . bhavati ca . yadi sāmānyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4380: api viśeṣaḥ viśeṣaḥ api sāmānyam sāmānyaviśeṣau na prakalpete . prakalpete ca . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:4381: . vivakṣātaḥ . yadā asya gauḥ sāmānyena vivakṣitaḥ bhavati kṛṣṇaḥ viśeṣatvena tadā
GS24pmbhasuu:4382: gauḥ sāmānyam kṛṣṇaḥ viśeṣaḥ . yadā kṛṣṇaḥ sāmānyena vivakṣitaḥ bhavati gauḥ viśeṣatvena
GS24pmbhasuu:4383: tadā kṛṣṇaḥ sāmānyam kṛṣṇaḥ viśeṣaḥ . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:4384: prakalpete ca . katham . pitāputravat . tat yathā saḥ eva kam cit prati pitā bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4385: kam cit prati putraḥ bhavati evam iha api saḥ eva kam cit prati sāmānyam kam cit
GS24pmbhasuu:4386: prati viśeṣaḥ . ete khalu api nairdeśikānām vārttatarakāḥ bhavanti ye sarvanāmnā
GS24pmbhasuu:4387: nirdeśāḥ kriyante . etaiḥ hi bahutarakam vyāpyate . atha kimartham upasargeṇa nirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4388: kriyate . śabde saptamyā nirdiṣṭe pūrvasya kāryam yathā syāt arthe mā bhūt :
GS24pmbhasuu:4389: janapade atiśāyane iti . kim gatam etat upasargeṇa āhosvit śabdādhikyāt arthādhikyam . gatam iti āha . katham . niḥ ayam bahirbhāve vartate . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:4390: niṣkrāntaḥ deśāt nirdeśaḥ . bahirdeśaḥ iti gamyate . śabdaḥ ca śabdāt bahirbhūtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4391: arthaḥ abahirbhūtaḥ . atha nirdiṣṭagrahaṇam kimartham . nirdiṣṭagrahaṇam ānantaryārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:4392: . nirdiṣṭagrahaṇam kriyate ānantaryārtham . ānantaryamātre kāryam yathā syāt . ikaḥ yaṇ aci :
GS24pmbhasuu:4393: dadhi atra madhu atra . iha mā bhūt :
GS24pmbhasuu:4397: 511-515 kimartham punaḥ idam ucyate . tasmin tasmāt iti pūrvottarayoḥ yogayoḥ aviśeṣāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4398: niyamārtham vacanam dadhi udakam pacati odanam . tasmin tasmāt iti pūrvottarayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4399: yogayoḥ aviśeṣāt niyamārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . grāme devadattaḥ . pūrvaḥ paraḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4400: sandehaḥ . grāmāt devadattaḥ . pūrvaḥ paraḥ iti sandehaḥ . evam iha api :
GS24pmbhasuu:4402: pacati odanam . ubhau ikau ubhau acau . aci pūrvasya aci parasya iti sandehaḥ . tiṅ atiṅaḥ iti atiṅaḥ pūrvasya atiṅaḥ parasya iti sandehaḥ . iṣyate ca atra aci pūrvasya syāt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4403: atiṅaḥ parasya iti . tat ca antareṇa yatnam na sidhyati iti niyamārtham vacanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4404: asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . atha yatra ubhayam nirdiśyate kim tatra pūrvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4405: kāryam bhavati āhosvit parasya iti . ubhayanirdeśe vipratiṣedhāt pañcamīnirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4406: . ubhayanirdeśe vipratiṣedhāt pañcamīnirdeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . kim prayojanam . prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4407: ataḥ lasārvadhātukanudāttatve . vakṣyati tāsyādibhyaḥ anudāttatve saptamīnirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4408: abhyastasijarthaḥ iti . tasmin kriyamāṇe tāsyādibhyaḥ parasya lasārvadhātukasya lasārvadhātuke
GS24pmbhasuu:4409: parataḥ tāsyādīnām iti sandehaḥ . tāsyādibhyaḥ parasya lasārvadhātukasya . bahoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4410: iṣṭhādīnām ādilopaḥ . bahoḥ uttareṣām iṣṭhemeyasām iṣṭhemayaḥsu parataḥ bahoḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4411: sandehaḥ . bahoḥ uttareṣām iṣṭhemeyasām . gotaḥ ṇit . gotaḥ parasya sarvanāmasthānasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4412: sarvanāmasthāne parataḥ gotaḥ iti sandehaḥ . gotaḥ parasya sarvanāmasthānasya . rudādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4413: sārvadhātuke . rudādibhyaḥ parasya sārvadhātukasya sārvadhātuke parataḥ rudādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:4414: iti sandehaḥ . rudādibhyaḥ parasya sārvadhātukasya . āne muk īt āsaḥ . āsaḥ uttarasya ānasya ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4415: āne parataḥ āsaḥ iti sandehaḥ . āsaḥ uttarasya ānasya . āmi sarvanāmnaḥ suṭ . sarvanāmnaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4416: uttarasya āmaḥ āmi parataḥ sarvanāmnaḥ iti sandehaḥ . sarvanāmnaḥ uttarasya . gheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4417: ṅiti āṭ nadyāḥ . nadyāḥ uttareṣām ṅitām ṅitsu parataḥ nadyāḥ iti sandehaḥ . nadyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4418: uttareṣām ṅitām . yāṭ āpaḥ . āpaḥ uttarasya ṅitaḥ ṅiti parataḥ āpaḥ iti sandehaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4419: . āpaḥ uttarasya ṅitaḥ . ṅamaḥ hrasvāt aci ṅamuṭ nityam . ṅamaḥ uttarasya acaḥ aci
GS24pmbhasuu:4420: parataḥ ṅamaḥ iti sandehaḥ . ṅamaḥ uttarasya acaḥ . vibhaktiviśeṣanirdeśānavakāśatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4421: avipratiṣedhaḥ . vibhaktiviśeṣanirdeśasya anavakāśatvāt ayuktaḥ ayam vipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4422: . sarvatra eva atra kṛtasāmarthyā saptamī akṛtasāmārthyā pañcamī iti kṛtvā pañcamīnirdeśaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4424: 515-518 yathārtham vā ṣaṣṭhīnirdeśaḥ . yathārtham vā ṣaṣṭhīnirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . yatra
GS24pmbhasuu:4425: pūrvasya kāryam iṣyate tatra pūrvasya ṣaṣṭhī kartavyā . yatra parasya kāryam iṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4426: tatra parasya ṣaṣṭhī kartavyā . saḥ tarhi tathā nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4428: tasmin iti nirdiṣṭe pūrvasya ṣaṣṭhī . tasmāt iti nirdiṣṭe parasya ṣaṣṭhī . tat tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:4429: ṣaṣṭhīgrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . ṣaṣṭhī
GS24pmbhasuu:4430: sthāneyogā iti . prakalpakam iti cet niyamābhāvaḥ . prakalpakam iti cet niyamasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4432: niyamārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ iti . pratyayavidhau khalu api pañcamyāḥ prakalpikāḥ syuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4433: . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . guptijkibhyaḥ san iti eṣā pañcamī san iti prathamāyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm
GS24pmbhasuu:4434: prakalpayet tasmāt iti uttarasya iti . astu . na kaḥ cit ādeśaḥ pratinirdiśyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:4435: tatra āntaryataḥ sanaḥ san eva bhaviṣyati . na evam śakyam . itsañjñā na prakalpeta
GS24pmbhasuu:4436: . upadeśe iti itsañjñā ucyate . prakṛtivikārāvyavasthā ca . prakṛtivikārayoḥ ca vyavasthā
GS24pmbhasuu:4438: aci iti eṣā saptamī yaṇ iti prathamāyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayet tasmin iti nirdiṣṭe pūrvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4439: iti . saptamīpañcamyoḥ ca bhāvāt ubhayatra ṣaṣṭhīprakḷptiḥ tatra ubhayakāryaprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4440: . saptamīpañcamyoḥ ca bhāvāt ubhayatra eva ṣaṣṭhī prāpnoti . tāsyādibhyaḥ iti eṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:4441: pañcamī lasārvadhātuke iti asyāḥ saptamyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayet tasmāt iti uttarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4442: iti . tathā lasārvadhātuke iti eṣā saptamī tāsyādibhyaḥ iti pañcamyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayet
GS24pmbhasuu:4443: tasmin iti nirdiṣṭe pūrvasya iti . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . ubhayoḥ kāryam tatra prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:4444: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yat tāvat ucyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:4445: prakalpakam iti cet niyamābhāvaḥ iti . mā bhūt niyamaḥ . saptamīnirdiṣṭe pūrvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4446: ṣaṣṭhī prakalpyate pañcamīnirdiṣṭe parasya . yāvatā saptamīnirdiṣṭe pūrvasya ṣaṣṭhī
GS24pmbhasuu:4447: prakalpyate evam pañcamīnirdiṣṭe parasya . na utsahate saptamīnirdiṣṭe parasya kāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:4448: bhavitum na api pañcamīnirdiṣṭe pūrvasya . yat api ucyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:4449: pratyayavidhau khalu api pañcamyāḥ prakalpikāḥ syuḥ iti . santu prakalpikāḥ . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:4450: ca uktam guptijkibhyaḥ san iti eṣā pañcamī san iti prathamāyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayet
GS24pmbhasuu:4451: tasmāt iti uttarasya iti . parihṛtam etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:4452: na kaḥ cit ādeśaḥ pratinirdiśyate . tatra āntaryataḥ sanaḥ san eva bhaviṣyati iti . nanu ca uktam :
GS24pmbhasuu:4453: na evam śakyam . itsañjñā na prakalpeta . upadeśe iti itsañjñā ucyate iti . syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4454: eṣaḥ doṣaḥ yadi itsañjñā ādeśam pratīkṣeta . tatra khalu kṛtāyām itsañjñāyām lope
GS24pmbhasuu:4455: ca kṛte ādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . upadeśe iti hi itsañjñā ucyate . atha vā na anutpanne
GS24pmbhasuu:4456: sani prakḷptyā bhavitavyam . yadā ca utpannaḥ san tadā kṛtasāmarthyā pañcamī iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4457: kṛtvā prakḷptiḥ na bhaviṣyati . yat api ucyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:4458: prakṛtivikārāvyavasthā ca iti . tatra api kṛtā prakṛtau ṣaṣṭhī ikaḥ iti vikṛtau prathamā
GS24pmbhasuu:4459: yaṇ iti . yatra ca nāma sautrī ṣaṣṭhī na asti tatra prakḷptyā bhavitavyam . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:4460: vā astu tāvat ikaḥ yaṇ aci iti yatra nāma sautrī ṣaṣṭhī . yadi ca idānīm aci iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4461: eṣā saptamī yaṇ iti prathamāyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayet tasmin iti nirdiṣṭe pūrvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4462: iti astu . na kaḥ cit anyaḥ ādeśaḥ pratinirdiśyate . tatra āntaryataḥ yaṇaḥ yaṇ eva
GS24pmbhasuu:4464: saptamīpañcamyoḥ ca bhāvāt ubhayatra ṣaṣṭhīprakḷptiḥ tatra ubhayakāryaprasaṅgaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4465: . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na ubhe yugapat prakalpike bhavataḥ iti yat ayam ekaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4468: 519-520 rūpagrahaṇam kim artham na svam śabdasya aśabdasañjñā bhavati iti eva rūpam
GS24pmbhasuu:4469: śabasya sañjñā bhaviṣyati . na hi anyat svam śabdasya asti anyat ataḥ rūpāt . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:4470: tarhi siddhe sati yat rūpagrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ asti anyat rūpāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4471: svam śabdasya iti . kim punaḥ tat . arthaḥ . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . arthavadgrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:4472: na anarthakasya iti eṣā paribhāṣā na kartavyā bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4474: 520-523 kimartham punaḥ idam ucyate . śabdena arthagateḥ arthasya asambhavāt tadvācinaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4475: sañjñāpratiṣedhārtham svaṃrūpavacanam . śabdena uccāritena arthaḥ gamyate . gām ānaya
GS24pmbhasuu:4476: dadhi aśāna iti arthaḥ ānīyate arthaḥ ca bhujyate . arthasya asambhavāt . iha vyākaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:4477: arthe kāryasya asambhavaḥ . agneḥ ḍak iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:4478: na śakyate aṅgārebhyaḥ paraḥ ḍhak kartum . śabdena arthagateḥ arthasya asambhavāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4479: yāvantaḥ tadvācinaḥ śabdāḥ tāvadbhyaḥ sarvebhyaḥ utpattiḥ prāpnoti . iṣyate ca tasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4480: eva syāt iti . tat ca antareṇa yatnam na sidhyati iti tadvācinaḥ sañjñāpratiṣedhārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:4481: svaṃrūpavacanam . evamartham idam ucyate . na vā śabdapūrvakaḥ hi arthe sampratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4482: tasmāt arthanivṛttiḥ . na vā etat prayojanam asti . kim kāraṇam . śabdapūrvakaḥ hi
GS24pmbhasuu:4483: arthe sampratyayaḥ . śabdapūrvakaḥ hi arthasya sampratyayaḥ . ātaḥ ca śabdapūrvakaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:4484: yaḥ api hi asau āhūyate nāmnā nāma yadā anena na upalabdham bhavati tada pṛcchati
GS24pmbhasuu:4485: kim bhavān āha iti . śabdapūrvakaḥ ca arthasya sampratyayaḥ iha ca vyākaraṇe śabde
GS24pmbhasuu:4486: kāryasya sambhavaḥ arthe asambhavaḥ . tasmāt arthanivṛttiḥ bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:4487: prayojanam aśabdasañjñā iti vakṣyāmi iti . iha mā bhūt :
GS24pmbhasuu:4488: dādhāḥ ghu adāp taraptamapau ghaḥ iti . sañjñāpratiṣedhānarthakyam vacanaprāmāṇyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4489: . sañjñāpratiṣedhaḥ ca anarthakaḥ . śabdasañjñāyām svarūpavidhiḥ kasmāt na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4490: . vacanaprāmāṇyāt . śabdasañjñāvacanasāmarthyāt . nanu ca vacanaprāmāṇyāt sañjñinām
GS24pmbhasuu:4491: sampratyayaḥ syāt svarūpagrahaṇāt ca sañjñāyāḥ . etat api na asti prayojanam . ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4492: jñāpayati śabdasañjñāyām na svarūpavidhiḥ bhavati iti yat ayam ṣṇāntā ṣaṭ iti ṣakārāntāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4493: saṅkhyāyāḥ ṣaṭsañjñām śāsti . itarathā hi vacanaprāmāṇyāt nakārāntāyāḥ saṅkhyāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4494: sampratyayaḥ syāt svarūpagrahaṇāt ca ṣakārāntāyāḥ . na etat asti prayojanam . na
GS24pmbhasuu:4495: hi ṣakārāntā sañjñā . kā tarhi . ḍakārāntā . asiddham jaśtvam . tasya asiddhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4496: ṣakārāntā . mantrādyartham tarhi idam vaktavyam . mantre ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4497: ṛci yajuṣi iti yat ucyate tat mantraśabde ṛkśabde ca yajuḥśabde ca mā bhūt . mantrādyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:4498: iti cet śāstrasāmarthyāt arthagateḥ siddham . mantrādyartham iti cet na . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4500: ṛci yajuṣi iti yat ucyate tat mantraśabde ṛkśabde ca yajuḥśabde ca tasya kāryasya sambhavaḥ na asti iti kṛtvā mantrādisahacaritaḥ yaḥ arthaḥ tasya gatiḥ bhaviṣyati sāhacaryāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:4502: 523-525 sit tadviśeṣāṇām vṛkṣādyartham . sinnirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . tataḥ vaktavyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:4503: tadviśeṣāṇām grahaṇam bhavati iti . kim prayojanam . vṛkṣādyartham . vibhāṣā vṛkṣamṛga iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:4505: plakṣanyagrodhāḥ . pit paryāyavacanasya ca svādyartham . pinnirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . tataḥ vaktavyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:4506: paryāyavacanasya tadviśeṣāṇām ca grahaṇam bhavati svasya ca rūpasya iti . kim prayojanam . svādyartham . sve puṣaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:4509: gopoṣam aśvapoṣam . jit paryāyavacanasya eva rājādyartham . jinnirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4510: . tataḥ vaktavyam paryāyavacanasya eva grahaṇam bhavati . kim prayojanam . rājādyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:4512: inasabham īśvarasabham . tasya eva na bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:4514: puṣyamitrasabhā candraguptasabhā . jhit tasya ca tadviśeṣāṇām ca matsyādyartham . jhinnirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . tataḥ vaktavyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:4515: tasya ca grahaṇam bhavati tadviśeṣāṇām ca iti . kim prayojanam . matsyādyartham . pakṣimatsyamṛgān hanti :
GS24pmbhasuu:4519: ajihmān hanti iti . asya ekasya paryāyavacanasya iṣyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:4524: apratyayaḥ iti . apratyayādeśaṭitkinmitaḥ iti vaktavyam . pratyaye udāhṛtam . ādeśe :
GS24pmbhasuu:4526: itaḥ . ṭiti . lavitā lavitum . kiti . babhūva . miti . he anaḍvan . ṭitaḥ parihāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4527: . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na ṭitaḥ savarṇānām grahaṇam bhavati iti yat ayam grahaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4528: aliṭi dīrghatvam śāsti . na etat asti jñāpakam . niyamārtham etat syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:4529: grahaḥ aliṭi dīrghaḥ eva iti . yat tarhi vṝtaḥ vā iti vibhāṣām śāsti . sarveṣām eva parihāraḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:4530: bhāvyamānena savarṇānām grahaṇam na iti evam bhaviṣyati . pratyaye bhūyān parihāraḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:4531: anabhidhānāt pratyayaḥ savarṇān na grahīṣyati . yān hi pratyayaḥ savarṇagrahaṇena gṛhṇīyāt na taiḥ arthasya abhidhānam syāt . anabhidhānāt na bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:4532: iha ke cit pratīyante ke cit pratyāyyante . hrasvāḥ pratīyante ḍīrghāḥ pratyāyyante
GS24pmbhasuu:4533: . yāvat brūyāt pratyāyyamānena savarṇānam grahaṇam na iti tāvat apratyayaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4534: kam punaḥ dīrghaḥ savarṇagrahaṇena gṛhṇīyāt . hrasvam . yatnādhikyāt na grahīṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4535: . plutam tarhi gṛhṇīyāt . anaṇtvāt na grahīṣyati . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat apratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4536: iti pratiṣedham śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati eṣā paribhāṣā :
GS24pmbhasuu:4539: 528-531 kimartham punaḥ idam ucyate . aṇ savarṇasya iti svarānunāsikyakālabhedāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4540: . aṇ savarṇasya iti ucyate . svarabhedāt ānunāsikyabhedāt kālabhedāt ca aṇ savarṇān
GS24pmbhasuu:4541: na gṛhṇīyāt . iṣyate ca savarṇagrahaṇam syāt iti . tat ca antareṇa yatnam na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4542: iti evamartham idam ucyate . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . tatra pratyāhāragrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:4543: savarṇāgrahaṇam anupadeśāt . tatra pratyāhāragrahaṇe savarṇānām grahaṇam na prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:4544: akaḥ savarṇe dīrghaḥ iti . kim kāraṇam . anupadeśāt . yathājātīyakānām sañjñā kṛtā
GS24pmbhasuu:4545: tathājātīyakānām sampratyāyikā syāt . hrasvānām ca kriyate . hrasvānām eva sampratyāyikā
GS24pmbhasuu:4546: syāt dīrghānām na syāt . nanu ca hrasvāḥ pratīyamānāḥ dīrghān sampratyāyayiṣyanti
GS24pmbhasuu:4547: . hrasvasampratyayāt iti cet uccāryamāṇasampratyāyakatvāt śabdasya avacanam . hrasvasampratyayāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4548: iti cet uccāryamāṇaḥ śabdaḥ sampratyāyakaḥ bhavati na sampratīyamanaḥ . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:4549: ṛk iti ukte sampāṭhamātram gamyate na asyāḥ arthaḥ gamyate . evam tarhi varṇapāṭhe
GS24pmbhasuu:4550: eva upadeśaḥ kariṣyate . varṇapāṭhe upadeśaḥ iti cet avarkālatvāt paribhāṣāyāḥ anupadeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4551: . varṇapāṭhe upadeśaḥ iti cet avarkālatvāt paribhāṣāyāḥ anupadeśaḥ . kim parā sūtrāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4552: kriyate iti ataḥ avarakālā . na iti āha . sarvathā avarakālā eva . varṇānām upadeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4553: tāvat . upadeśottarakālaḥ ādiḥ antyena saha itā iti pratyāhāraḥ . pratyāhārottarakālā
GS24pmbhasuu:4554: savarṇasañjñā . savarṇasañjñottarakālam aṇudit savarṇasya ca apratyayaḥ iti . sā
GS24pmbhasuu:4555: eṣā upadeśottarakālā avarakālā satī varṇānām utpattau nimittatvāya kalpayiṣyate iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4556: tat na . tasmāt upadeśaḥ . tasmāt upadeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . tatra anuvṛttinirdeśe savarṇāgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4557: anaṇtvāt . tatra anuvṛttinirdeśe savarṇānām grahaṇam na prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:4558: asya cvau yasya īti ca . kim kāraṇam . anaṇtvāt . na hi ete aṇaḥ ye anuvṛttinirdeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:4559: . ke tarhi . ye akṣarasamāmnāye upadiśyante . evam tarhi anaṇtvāt anuvṛttau na anupadeśāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4560: ca pratyāhāre na . ucyate ca idam aṇ savarṇān gṛhṇāti iti . tatra vacanāt bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4561: . vacanāt yatra tat na asti . na idam vacanāt labhyam . asti hi anyat etasya vacane
GS24pmbhasuu:4562: prayojanam . kim . ye ete pratyāhārāṇām āditaḥ varṇāḥ taiḥ savarṇānām grahaṇam yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:4564: 531-535 evam tarhi savarṇe aṇgrahaṇam aparibhāṣyam ākṛtigrahaṇāt . savarṇe aṇgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4565: aparibhāṣyam . kutaḥ . ākṛtigrahaṇāt . avarṇākṛtiḥ upadiṣṭā sā sarvam avarṇakulam
GS24pmbhasuu:4566: grahīṣyati . tathā ivarṇakulākṛtiḥ . tathā uvarṇakulākṛtiḥ . nanu ca anyā ākṛtiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4567: akārasya ākārasya ca . ananyatvāt ca . ananyākṛtiḥ akārasya ākārasya ca . anekāntaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4568: hi ananyatvakaraḥ . yaḥ hi anekāntena bhedaḥ na asau anyatvam karoti . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:4569: na yaḥ goḥ ca goḥ ca bhedaḥ saḥ anyatvam karoti . yaḥ tu khalu goḥ ca aśvasya ca bhedaḥ saḥ anyatvam karoti . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:4570: savarṇe aṇgrahaṇam aparibhāṣyam . ākṛtigrahaṇāt ananyatvam . savarṇe aṇgrahaṇam aparibhāṣyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4571: . ākṛtigrahaṇāt ananyatvam bhaviṣyati . ananyākṛtiḥ akārasya ākārasya ca . anekāntaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4572: hi ananyatvakaraḥ . yaḥ hi anekāntena bhedaḥ na asau anyatvam karoti . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:4573: na yaḥ goḥ ca goḥ ca bhedaḥ saḥ anyatvam karoti . yaḥ tu khalu goḥ ca aśvasya ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4574: bhedaḥ saḥ anyatvam karoti . tadvat ca halgrahaṇeṣu . evam ca kṛtvā ca halgrahaṇeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:4576: avāttām avāttam avātta yatra etat na asti aṇ savarṇān gṛhṇāti iti . anekāntaḥ hi
GS24pmbhasuu:4577: ananyatvakaraḥ iti uktārtham . drutavilambitayoḥ ca anupadeśāt . drutavilambitayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4578: ca anupadeśāt manyāmahe ākṛtigrahaṇāt siddham iti . yat ayam kasyām cit vṛttau varṇān
GS24pmbhasuu:4579: upadiśya sarvatra kṛtī bhavati . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . vṛttipṛthaktvam
GS24pmbhasuu:4580: tu na upapadyate . vṛtteḥ tu pṛthaktvam na upapadyate . tasmāt tatra taparanirdeśāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4581: siddham . tasmāt tatra taparanirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . kriyate etat nyāse eva :
GS24pmbhasuu:4584: 535-536 ayuktaḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ . tat iti anena kālaḥ pratinirdiśyate tat iti ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:4585: ca varṇaḥ . tatra ayuktam varṇasya kālena saha sāmanādhikaraṇyam . katham tarhi nirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4586: kartavyaḥ . tatkālakālasya iti . kim idam tatkālakālasya iti . tasya kālaḥ tatkālaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4587: tatkālaḥ kālaḥ yasya saḥ ayam tatkālakālaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4588: tatkālakālasya iti . saḥ tarhi tathā nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . uttarapadalopaḥ atra draṣṭavyaḥ . tat yathā uṣṭramukham iva mukham asya uṣṭramukhaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4590: tatkālasya iti . atha vā sāhacaryāt tācchabdyam bhaviṣyati . kālasahacaritaḥ varṇaḥ api kālaḥ eva.
GS24pmbhasuu:4592: 537-540 kim punaḥ idam niyamārtham āhosvit prāpakam . katham ca niyamārtham syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4593: katham vā prāpakam . yadi atra aṇgrahaṇam anuvartate tataḥ niyamārtham . atha nivṛttam
GS24pmbhasuu:4594: tataḥ prāpakam . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . taparaḥ tatkālasya iti niyamāṛtham iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:4595: dīrghagrahaṇe svarabhinnāgrahaṇam . taparaḥ tatkālasya iti niyamāṛtham iti cet dīrghagrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:4596: svarabhinnānām grahaṇam na prāpnoti . keṣām . udāttānudāttasvaritānām . astu tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:4597: prāpakam . prāpakam iti cet hrasvagrahaṇe dīrghaplutapratiṣedhaḥ . prāpakam iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:4598: hrasvagrahaṇe dīrghaplutayoḥ tu pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . vipratiṣedhāt siddham . aṇ
GS24pmbhasuu:4599: savarṇān gṛhṇāti iti etat astu taparaḥ tatkālasya iti vā . taparaḥ tatkālasya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4600: etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena . aṇ savarṇān gṛhṇāti iti asya avakāśaḥ hrasvāḥ ataparāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4601: aṇaḥ . taparaḥ tatkālasya iti asya avakāśaḥ dīrghāḥ taparāḥ . hrasveṣu tapareṣu ubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:4602: prāpnoti . taparaḥ tatkālasya iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena . yadi evam drutāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:4603: taparakaraṇe madhyamavilambitayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam kālabhedāt . drutāyām taparakaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:4604: madhyamavilambitayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam tathā madhyamāyām drutavilambitayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4605: tathā vilambitāyām drutamadhyamayoḥ . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . kālabhedāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4606: . ye hi drutāyām vṛttau varṇāḥ tribhāgādhikāḥ te madhyamāyām . ye madhyamāyām varṇāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4607: tribhāgādhikāḥ te vilambitāyām . siddham tu avasthitāḥ varṇāḥ vaktuḥ cirāciravacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4608: vṛttayaḥ viśiṣyante . siddham etat . katham . avasthitāḥ varṇāḥ drutamadhyamavilambitāsu
GS24pmbhasuu:4609: . kiṅkṛtaḥ tu vṛttiviśeṣaḥ . vaktuḥ cirāciravacanāt vṛttayaḥ viśiṣyante . vaktā kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4611: āśu varṇān abhidhatte . kaḥ cit cireṇa kaḥ cit ciratareṇa . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:4612: tam eva adhvānam kaḥ cit āśu gacchati kaḥ cit cireṇa gacchati kaḥ cit ciratareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:4613: gacchati . rathikaḥ āśu gacchati āśvikaḥ cireṇa padātiḥ ciratareṇa . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4614: . adhikaraṇam atra adhvā vrajikriyāyāḥ . tatra ayuktam yat adhikaraṇasya vṛddhihrāsau
GS24pmbhasuu:4615: syātām . evam tarhi sphoṭaḥ śabdaḥ dhvaniḥ śabdaguṇaḥ . katham . bheryāghātavat .
GS24pmbhasuu:4616: tat yathā bheryāghātaḥ bherīm āhatya kaḥ cit viṃśati padāni gacchati kaḥ cit triṃśat
GS24pmbhasuu:4617: kaḥ cit catvāriṃśat . sphoṭaḥ ca tāvān eva bhavati . dhvanikṛtā vṛddhiḥ . dhvaniḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4618: sphoṭaḥ ca śabdānām dhvaniḥ tu khalu lakṣyate /
GS24pmbhasuu:4619: alpaḥ mahān ca keṣām cit ubhayam tat svabhāvataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4621: 541-542 ādiḥ antyena saha iti asampratyayaḥ sañjñinaḥ anirdeśāt . ādiḥ antyena saha
GS24pmbhasuu:4622: iti asampratyayaḥ . kim kāraṇam . sañjñinaḥ anirdeśāt . na hi sañjñinaḥ nirdiśyante
GS24pmbhasuu:4623: . siddham tu ādiḥ itā saha tanmadhyasya iti vacanāt . siddham etat . katham . ādiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4624: antyena saha itā gṛhyamāṇaḥ svasya ca rūpasya grāhakaḥ tanmadhyānām ca iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4625: . sambandhiśabdaiḥ vā tulyam . sambandhiśabdaiḥ vā tulyam etat . tat yathā sambandhiśabdāḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:4627: pitari śuśrūṣitavyam iti . na ca ucyate svasyām mātari svasmin pitari iti sambandhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4628: ca gamyate yā yasya mātā yaḥ ca yasya pitā iti . evam iha api ādiḥ antyaḥ iti sambandhiśabdau
GS24pmbhasuu:4630: yam prati ādiḥ antyaḥ iti ca bhavati tasya grahaṇam bhavati svasya ca rūpasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4634: dadhi atra madhu atra . astu . alaḥ antyasya vidhayaḥ bhavanti iti antyasya bhaviṣyati . na evam śakyam . ye anekālaḥ ādeśāḥ teṣu doṣaḥ syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4635: ecaḥ ayavāyāvaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yathā eva prakṛtitaḥ tadantavidhiḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4636: evam ādeśataḥ api bhaviṣyati . tatra ejantasya ayādyantā ādeśāḥ bhaviṣyanti . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:4637: ca evam kva cit vairūpyam tatra doṣaḥ syāt . api ca antaraṅgabahiraṅge na prakalpyeyātām
GS24pmbhasuu:4639: syonā : antaraṅgalakṣaṇasya yaṇādeśasya bahiraṅgalakṣaṇaḥ guṇaḥ bādhakaḥ prasajyeta . ūnaśabdam hi āśritya yaṇādeśaḥ naśabdam āśritya guṇaḥ . alvidhiḥ ca na prakalpeta : dyauḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4641: saḥ iti . tasmāt prakṛte tadantavidhiḥ iti vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . yena iti karaṇe eṣā tṛtīyā anyena ca anyasya vidhiḥ bhavati . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:4642: devadattasya samāśam śarāvaiḥ odanena ca yajñadattaḥ pratividhatte ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4643: tathā saṅgrāmam hastyaśvarathapadātibhiḥ . evam iha api acā dhātoḥ yatam vidhatte . akāreṇa prātipadikasya iñam vidhatte .
GS24pmbhasuu:4645: 544-546 yena vidhiḥ tadantasya iti cet grahaṇopādhīnām tadantopādhiprasaṅgaḥ . yena
GS24pmbhasuu:4646: vidhiḥ tadantasya iti cet grahaṇopādhīnām tadantopādhitāprasaṅgaḥ . ye grahaṇopādhayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4647: te api tadantopādhayaḥ syuḥ . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . utaḥ ca pratyayāt asaṃyogapūrvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4648: iti asaṃyogapūrvagrahaṇam ukārāntviśeṣaṇam syāt . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . asaṃyogapūrvagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:4650: akṣṇuhi takṣṇuhi iti . iha na syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:4651: āpnuhi śaknuhi iti . tathā ut oṣthyapūrvasya iti oṣṭhyapūrvagrahaṇam ṝkārāntaviśeṣaṇam syāt . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . oṣṭhyapūrvagrahaṇena iha ca prasajyeta :
GS24pmbhasuu:4652: saṅkīrṇam iti . iha ca na syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:4653: nipūrtāḥ piṇḍāḥ iti . siddham tu viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayoḥ yatheṣṭatvāt . siddham etat . katham . yatheṣṭam viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayoḥ yogaḥ bhavati . yāvatā yatheṣṭam iha tāvat :
GS24pmbhasuu:4654: utaḥ ca pratyayāt asaṃyogapūrvāt iti na asaṃyogapūrvagrahaṇena ukārāntam viśeṣyate . kim tarhi . ukāraḥ eva viśeṣyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:4655: ukāraḥ yaḥ asaṃyogapūrvaḥ tadantāt pratyayāt iti . tathā ut oṣthyapūrvasya iti na oṣṭhapūrvagrahaṇena ṝkārāntam viśeṣyate . kim tarhi . ṝkāraḥ eva viśeṣyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:4656: ṝkāraḥ yaḥ oṣṭhyapūrvaḥ tadantasya dhātoḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4658: 546-550 samāsapratyayavidhau pratiṣedhaḥ . samāsavidhau pratyayavidhau ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . samāsavidhau tāvat :
GS24pmbhasuu:4661: narakaśritaḥ . kaṣṭam paramaśrita iti atra mā bhūt . pratyayavidhau :
GS24pmbhasuu:4662: naḍasya apatyam nāḍāyanaḥ . iha na bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:4663: sūtranaḍasya apatyam sautranāḍiḥ . kim aviśeṣeṇa . na iti āha . ugidvarṇagrahaṇavarjam . ugidgrahaṇam varṇagrahaṇam ca varjayitvā . ugidgrahaṇam : bhavatī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4667: plākṣiḥ . asti ca idānīm kaḥ cit kevalaḥ akāraḥ prātipadikam yadarthaḥ vidhiḥ syāt . asti iti āha . atateḥ ḍaḥ : aḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4669: ataḥ iñ iḥ . akacśnamvataḥ sarvanāmāvyayadhātuvidhau upasaṅkhyānam . akacvataḥ sarvanāmāvyayavidhau śnamvataḥ dhātuvidhau upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . akacvataḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:4672: bhinatti chinatti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . iha tasya vā grahaṇam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4673: tadantasya vā . na ca idam tat na api tadantam . siddham tu tadantāntavacanāt . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:4674: etat . katham . tadantāntavacanāt . tadantāntasya iti vaktavyam . kim idam tadantāntasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4676: tadantaḥ antaḥ yasya tat idam tadantāntam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4677: tadantāntasya iti . saḥ tarhi tathā nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . uttarapadalopaḥ atra draṣṭavyaḥ . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:4680: kharamukhaḥ . evam iha api tadantaḥ antaḥ yasya tadantasya iti . tadekadeśavijñānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4681: vā siddham . tadekadeśavijñānāt vā punaḥ siddham etat . tadekadeśabhūtaḥ tadgrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:4682: gṛhyate . tat yathā gaṅgā yamunā devadattā iti . anekā nadī gaṅgām yamunām ca praviṣṭā
GS24pmbhasuu:4683: gaṅgāyamunāgrahaṇena gṛhyate . tathā devadattāsthaḥ garbhaḥ devadattāgrahaṇena gṛhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4684: . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . iha ke cit śabdāḥ aktaparimāṇānām arthānām vācakāḥ bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:4685: ye ete saṅkhyāśabdāḥ parimāṇaśabdāḥ ca . pañca sapta iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:4686: ekena api apāye na bhavanti . droṇaḥ khārī āḍhakam iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:4687: na eva adhike bhavanti na nyūne . ke cit yāvat eva tat bhavati tāvat eva āhuḥ ye ete jātiśabdāḥ guṇaśabdāḥ ca . tailam ghṛtam iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:4688: khāryām api bhavanti droṇe api . śuklaḥ nīlaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:4689: himavati api bhavati vaṭakaṇikāmātre api dravye . imāḥ ca api sañjñāḥ aktaparimāṇānām
GS24pmbhasuu:4690: arthānām kriyante . tāḥ kena adhikasya syuḥ . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:4691: tadekadeśabhūtam tadgrahaṇena gṛhyate iti yat ayam na idamadasoḥ akoḥ iti sakakārayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4692: idamadasoḥ pratiṣedham śāsti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . idamadasoḥ kāryam ucyamānam
GS24pmbhasuu:4693: kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ yat sakakārayoḥ syāt . paśyati tu ācāryaḥ tadekadeśabhūtam tadgrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:4694: gṛhyate iti . tataḥ sakakārayoḥ pratiṣedham śāsti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4696: 550-554 kāni punaḥ asya yogasya prayojanāni . prayojanam sarvanāmāvyayasañjñāyām . sarvanāmāvyayasañjñāyām prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:4701: paramanīcaiḥ iti . upapadavidhau bhayāḍhyādigrahaṇam . upapadavidhau bhayāḍhyādigrahaṇam prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:4705: khāḍyaṅkaraṇam . ṅībvidhau ugidgrahaṇam . ṅībvidhau ugidgrahaṇam prayojanam : bhavatī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4707: atimahatī . pratiṣedhe svasrādigrahaṇam . pratiṣedhe svasrādigrahaṇam prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:4708: svasā paramasvasā duhitā paramaduhitā . aparimāṇabistādigrahaṇam ca pratiṣedhe .
GS24pmbhasuu:4709: aparimāṇabistādigrahaṇam ca pratiṣedhe prayojanam . aparimāṇabistācitakambalebhyaḥ na taddhitaluki :
GS24pmbhasuu:4710: dvibistā dviparamabistā tribistā triparamabistā dvyācitā dviparamācitā . diti . ditigrahaṇam ca prayojanam . diteḥ apatyam daityaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4711: aditeḥ apatyam ādityaḥ . dityadityāditya iti aditigrahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati . roṇyāḥ aṇ . roṇyāḥ aṇgrahaṇam ca prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:4713: saiṃhakaroṇaḥ . tasya ca . tasya ca iti vaktavyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:4714: rauṇaḥ . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . tadantāt ca tadantavidhinā siddham kevalāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4715: ca vyapdeśivadbhāvena . vyapdeśivadbhāvaḥ aprātipadikena . kim punaḥ kāraṇam vyapdeśivadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4717: sūtrāntāt ṭhak bhavati daśāntāt ḍaḥ bhavati iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:4718: kevalāt utpattiḥ mā bhūt iti . na etat asti prayojanam . siddham atra tadantāt ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4719: tadantavidhinā kevalāt ca vyapdeśivadbhāvena . saḥ ayam evam siddhe sati yat antagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4720: karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ sūtrāntāt eva daśāntāt eva iti . na atra tadantāt utpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4722: samāsapratyayavidhau pratiṣedhaḥ iti . sā tarhi eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā . na kartavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:4723: . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati vyapdeśivadbhāvaḥ aprātipadikena iti yat ayam pūrvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4724: iniḥ sapūrvāt ca iti āha . na etat asti prayojanam . asti hi anyat etasya vacane
GS24pmbhasuu:4725: prayojanam . kim . sapūrvāt pūrvāt inim vakṣyāmi iti . yat tarhi yogavibhāgam karoti
GS24pmbhasuu:4726: . itarathā hi pūrvāt sapūrvāt iti eva brūyāt . kim punaḥ ayam asya eva śeṣaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:4727: tasya ca iti . na iti āha . yat ca anukrāntam yat ca anukraṃsayte sarvasya eva śeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4728: tasya ca iti . rathasītāhalebhyaḥ yadvidhau . rathasītāhalebhyaḥ yadvidhau prayojanam : rathyaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4732: halyā paramahalyā . susarvārdhadikśabdebhyaḥ janapadasya . susarvārdhadikśabdebhyaḥ janapadasya prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:4740: pūrvamāgadhakaḥ . ṛtoḥ vṛddhimadvidhau avayavānām . ṛtoḥ vṛddhimadvidhau avayavānām prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:4744: aparanaidāgham . ṭhañvidhau saṅkhyāyāḥ . ṭhañvidhau saṅkhyāyāḥ prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:4746: pañcaṣāṣṭikam . dharmāt nañaḥ . dharmāt nañaḥ prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:4748: adharmam carati ādharmikaḥ . adharmāt ca iti na vaktavyam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4750: 555-561 padāṅgādhikāre tasya ca taduttarapadasya ca . padāṅgādhikāre tasya ca taduttarapadasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4751: ca iti vaktavyam . padādhikāre kim prayojanam . prayojanam iṣṭikeṣīkāmālānām citatūlabhāriṣu :
GS24pmbhasuu:4755: utpalamālabhāriṇī kanyā . aṅgādhikāre kim prayojanam . mahadapsvasṛtṝṇām dīrghavidhau . mahadapsvasṛtṝṇām dīrghavidhau prayojanam : mahān ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4761: naptā naptārau naptāraḥ . evam paramanaptā paramanaptārau paramanaptāraḥ . padyuṣmadasmadasthyādyanḍuhaḥ num . padbhāvaḥ prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:4762: divpadaḥ paśya . asti ca idānīm kaḥ cit kevalaḥ pācchabhdaḥ yadarthaḥ vidhiḥ syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4763: . na asti iti āha . evam tarhi aṅgādhikāre prayojanam na asti iti kṛtvā padādhikārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4766: yathā patkāṣiṇau patkāṣiṇaḥ evam paramapatkāṣiṇau paramapatkāṣiṇaḥ . yadi tarhi padādhikāre pādasya tadantavidhiḥ bhavati pādasya pada ājyatigopahateṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:4768: pādena upahatam padopahatam atra api syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:4769: digdhapādena upahatam digdhapādopahatam . evam tarhi aṅgādhikāre eva prayojanam . nanu ca uktam na asti kevalaḥ pācchabdaḥ iti . ayam asti pādayateḥ apratyayaḥ pāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:4770: padā pade . pad . yuṣmat asmat : yūyam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4772: asthnā dadhnā sakthnā parmāsthnā paramadadhnā paramasakthnā . anaḍuhaḥ num : anaḍvān ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4790: paramatrayāṇām . tyadādividhibhastrādistrīgrahaṇam ca . tyadādividhibhastrādistrīgrahaṇam ca prayojanam : saḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4792: bhastrakā bhastrikā nirbhastrakā nirbhastrikā bahubhastrakā bahubhastrikā . strīgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4793: ca prayojanam . striyau striyaḥ rājastriyau rājastriyaḥ . varṇagrahaṇam ca sarvatra
GS24pmbhasuu:4794: . varṇagrahaṇam ca sarvatra prayojanam . kva sarvatra . aṅgādhikāre ca anyatra ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4798: ābhyām . ghaṭābhyām iti atra na syāt . pratyayagrahaṇam ca apañcamyāḥ . pratyayagrahaṇam ca apañcamyāḥ prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:4799: yañiñoḥ phak bhavati . gārgyāyaṇaḥ vātsyāyanaḥ paramagārgyāyaṇaḥ paramavātsyāyanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4800: . apañcamyāḥ iti kimartham . dṛṣattīrṇā pariṣattīrṇā . alā eva anarthakena na anyena
GS24pmbhasuu:4801: anarthakena iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . hangrahaṇe plīhangrahaṇam mā bhūt .
GS24pmbhasuu:4802: udgrahaṇe garmudgrahaṇam . strīgrahaṇe śastrīgrahaṇam . saṅgrahaṇe pāyasam karoti
GS24pmbhasuu:4803: iti mā bhūt . kimartham idam ucyate na padāṅgādhikāre tasya ca taduttarapadasya ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4804: iti eva siddham . na ca idam tat na api taduttarapadam . tat na vaktavyam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4805: . kim punaḥ atra jyāyaḥ . tadantavidhiḥ eva jyāyān . idam api siddham bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:4806: paramātimahān . etat hi na eva tat na api taduttarapadam . aninasmangrahaṇāni ca arthavatā ca anarthakena ca tadantavidhim prayojayanti . an
GS24pmbhasuu:4807: rājñā iti arthavatā sāmnā iti anarthakena . an . in :
GS24pmbhasuu:4808: daṇḍī* iti arthavatā vāgmī* iti anarthakena . in . as :
GS24pmbhasuu:4809: supayāḥ iti arthavatā susrotāḥ iti anarthakena . as . man :
GS24pmbhasuu:4810: suśarmā iti arthavatā suprathimā iti anarthakena .
GS24pmbhasuu:4812: 561 yasmin vidhiḥ tadādau algrahaṇe . algrahaṇeṣu yasmin vidhiḥ tadādau iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . aci śnudhātubhruvām yvoḥ iyaṅuvaṅau iti iha eva syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:4816: 562-565 vṛddhigrahaṇam kimartham. yasya acām ādiḥ tat vṛddham iti iyati ucyamāne dāttāḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4817: rākṣitāḥ atra api prasajyeta . vṛddhigrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ bhavati . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:4818: yasyagrahaṇam kimartham . yasya iti vyapadeśāya . atha ajgrahaṇam kimartham . vṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4819: yasya ādiḥ tat vṛddham iti iyati ucyamāne iha eva syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:4822: vātsīyāḥ iti . ajgrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ bhavati . atha ādigrahaṇam kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:4823: . vṛddhiḥ yasya acām tat vṛddham iti iyati ucyamāne sabhāsannayane bhavaḥ sābhasannayanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4824: iti atra prasajyeta . ādigrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ bhavati . vṛddhasañjñāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:4825: ajasanniveśāt anāditvam . vṛddhasañjñāyām ajasanniveśāt ādiḥ iti etat na upapadyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4826: . na hi acām sanniveśaḥ asti . nanu ca evam vijñāyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:4827: ac eva ādiḥ ajādiḥ . na evam śakyam . iha eva prasajyeta :
GS24pmbhasuu:4829: gārgīyāḥ iti . ekāntāditvam tarhi vijñāyate . ekāntāditve ca sarvaprasaṅgaḥ . iha api prasajyeta :
GS24pmbhasuu:4830: sabhāsannayane bhavaḥ sābhasannayanaḥ iti . siddham ajākṛtinirdeśāt . siddham etat
GS24pmbhasuu:4831: . katham . ajākṛtiḥ nirdiśyate . evam api vyañjanaiḥ vyavahitatvāt na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4832: vyañjanasya avidyamānatvam yathā anyatra . vyañjanasya avidyamānavadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4833: yathā anyatra api bhavati vyañjanasya avidyamānavadbhāvaḥ . kva anyatra . svare .
GS24pmbhasuu:4835: 565-566 vā nāmadheyasya . vā nāmadheyasya vṛddhasañjñā vaktavyā :
GS24pmbhasuu:4839: yājñadattāḥ . gotrottarapadasya ca . gotrottarapadasya ca vṛddhasañjñā vaktavyā :
GS24pmbhasuu:4842: ghṛtarauḍhīyāḥ . gotrāntāt vā asamastavat . gotrāntāt vā asamastavat pratyayaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:4843: etāni eva udāharaṇāni . kim aviśeṣeṇa . na iti āha . jihvākātyaharitakātyavarjam . jihvākātyam haritakātyam ca varjayitvā :
GS24pmbhasuu:4845: hāritakātāḥ . kim punaḥ atra jyāyaḥ . gotrāntāt vā asamastavat iti eva jyāyaḥ . idam api siddham bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:4848: 566-567 yasyācāmādigrahaṇam anuvartate utāho na . kim ca ataḥ . yadi anuvartate iha ca prasajyeta :
GS24pmbhasuu:4850: mātputrāḥ iha ca na syāt : tvadīyaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4851: madīyaḥ iti . atha nivṛttam eṅ prācām deśe yasyācāmādigrahaṇam kartavyam . evam tarhi anuvartate . katham tvāputrāḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4852: mātputrāḥ iti . sambandham anuvartiṣyate . vṛddhiḥ yasya acām ādiḥ tat vṛddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:4853: tyadādīni ca vṛddhasañjñāni bhavanti . vṛddhiḥ yasya acām ādiḥ tat vṛddham . eṅ prācām
GS24pmbhasuu:4854: deśe . yasyācāmādigrahaṇam anuvartate . vṛddhigrahaṇam nivṛttam . tat yathā kaḥ cit
GS24pmbhasuu:4855: kāntāre samupasthite sārtham upādatte . saḥ yadā niṣkāntārībhūtaḥ bhavati tadā sārtham jahāti
GS24pmbhasuu:4857: 567-568 eṅ prācām deśe śaiṣikeṣu iti vaktavyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:4860: 3-7 ṅitkidvacane tayoḥ abhāvāt aprasiddhiḥ . ṅitkidvacane tayoḥ abhāvāt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4862: ṅittvakittvayoḥ aprasiddhiḥ . satā hi abhisambandhaḥ śakyate kartum na ca atra ṅakārakakārau itau paśyāmaḥ . tat yathā citraguḥ devadattaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4863: yasya tāḥ gāvaḥ santi saḥ eva tābhyām śabdābhyām śakyate abhisambandhum . bhāvyete
GS24pmbhasuu:4864: tarhi anena . gāṅkuṭādibhyaḥ añṇit ṅit bhavati iti . asaṃyogāt liṭ kit bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4865: . bhavati iti cet ādeśapratiṣedhaḥ . bhavati iti cet ādeśasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4866: . ṅakārakakārau itau ādeśau prāpnutaḥ . katham punaḥ itsañjñaḥ nāma ādeśaḥ syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:4867: kim hi vacanāt na bhavati . evam tarhi ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭasya ādeśāḥ ucyante na ca atra
GS24pmbhasuu:4868: ṣaṣṭhīm paśyāmaḥ . gāṅkuṭādibhyaḥ iti eṣā pañcamī añṇit iti prathamāyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayiṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4869: tasmāt iti uttarasya iti . sañjñākaraṇam tarhi idam . gāṅkuṭādibhyaḥ añṇit ṅitsañjñaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4870: bhavati iti . asaṃyogāt liṭ kitsañjñaḥ bhavati iti . sañjñākaraṇe kṅidgrahaṇe asampratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4871: śabdabhedāt . sañjñākaraṇe kṅidgrahaṇe asampratyayaḥ syāt . kim kāraṇam . śabdabhedāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4872: . anyaḥ hi śabdaḥ kṅiti iti anyaḥ kiti iti ṅiti iti ca . tathā kidgrahaṇeṣu ṅidgrahaṇeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:4873: ca anayoḥ eva sampratyayaḥ syāt . tadvadatideśaḥ tarhi ayam :
GS24pmbhasuu:4874: gāṅkuṭādibhyaḥ añṇit ṅidvat bhavati iti . asaṃyogāt liṭ kidvat bhavati iti . saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4875: tarhi vatinirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na hi antareṇa vatim atideśaḥ gamyate . antareṇa api
GS24pmbhasuu:4877: eṣaḥ brahmadattaḥ . abrahmadattam brahmadattaḥ iti āha . te manyāmahe brahmadattavat
GS24pmbhasuu:4878: ayam bhavati iti . evam iha api aṅitam ṅit iti āha . ṅidvat iti gamyate . akitam
GS24pmbhasuu:4879: kit iti āha . kidvat iti gamyate . tadvadatideśe akidvidhiprasaṅgaḥ . tadvadatideśe
GS24pmbhasuu:4880: akidvidhiḥ api prāpnoti . sṛjidṛśoḥ jhali am akiti :
GS24pmbhasuu:4882: akillakṣaṇaḥ amāgamaḥ prāpnoti . siddham tu prasajyapratiṣedhāt . siddham etat . katham . prasajya ayam pratiṣedhaḥ kriyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:4883: kiti na iti . sarvatra sanantāt ātmanepadapratiṣedhaḥ . sarveṣu pakṣeṣu sanantāt ātmanepadam prāpnoti . uccukuṭiṣati nicukuṭiṣati :
GS24pmbhasuu:4884: ṅiti iti ātmanepadam prāpnoti . tasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . siddham tu pūrvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4885: kāryātideśāt . siddham etat . katham . pūrvasya yat kāryam tat atidiśyate . kim vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4886: etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . saptamyarthe api vatiḥ bhavati . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:4887: mathurāyām iva mathurāvat pāṭaliputre iva pāṭaliputravat evam ṅiti iva ṅidvat .
GS24pmbhasuu:4889: 7-10 atha kimartham pṛthak ṅitkitau kriyete na sarvam kit eva vā syāt ṅit eva vā
GS24pmbhasuu:4891: . pṛthaganubandhatve prayojanam vacisvapiyajādīnām asamprasāraṇam sārvadhātuke caṅādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:4895: svapithaḥ : atra api prāpnoti . caṅādiṣu prayojanam . ke punaḥ caṅādayaḥ . caṅaṅnajiṅṅvanibathaṅnaṅaḥ . caṅ :
GS24pmbhasuu:4902: yathā iha bhavati suptaḥ iti evam svapnak :
GS24pmbhasuu:4904: yathā iha bhavati iṣṭaḥ iti evam yajvā :
GS24pmbhasuu:4906: yathā iha bhavati uṣitaḥ iti evam āvasathaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:4908: yathā iha bhavati iṣṭam evam yajñaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:4909: atra api prāpnoti . jāgraḥ aguṇavidhiḥ . jāgarteḥ aguṇavidhiḥ prayojanam . yathā iha bhavati jāgṛtaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4910: jāgṛthaḥ iti aṅiti iti paryudāsaḥ evam jāgaritaḥ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4911: jāgaritavān iti atra api prāpnoti . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:4912: jāgraḥ guṇavidhiḥ . jāgarteḥ guṇavidhiḥ prayojanam . yathā iha bhavati jāgaritaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4913: jāgaritavān evam jāgṛtaḥ jāgṛthaḥ iti atra api prāpnoti . kuṭādīnām iṭpratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4914: . kuṭādīnām iṭpratiṣedhaḥ prayojanam . yathā iha bhavati lūtvā pūtvā śryukaḥ kiti
GS24pmbhasuu:4916: atra api prāpnoti . ktvāyām kitpratiṣedhaḥ ca . ktvāyām kitpratiṣedhaḥ ca prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4917: . kim ca . iṭpratiṣedhaḥ ca . na iti āha . adeśe ayam caḥ paṭhitaḥ . ktvāyām ca kitpratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4918: iti . yathā iha bhavati devitvā sevitvā na ktvā seṭ iti pratiṣedhaḥ evam kuṭitvā puṭitvā :
GS24pmbhasuu:4919: atra api prāpnoti . atha vā deśe eva ayam caḥ paṭhitaḥ . ktvāyām kitpratiṣedhaḥ ca iṭpratiṣedhaḥ ca . iṭpratiṣedhaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:4920: yathā iha bhavati lūtvā pūtvā śryukaḥ kiti iti iṭpratiṣedhaḥ evam nuvitvā dhuvitvā :
GS24pmbhasuu:4921: atra api prāpnoti . syāt etat prayojanam yadi atra niyogataḥ ātideśikena ṅittvena
GS24pmbhasuu:4922: aupadeśikam kittvam bādhyeta . sati api tu ṅittve kit eva eṣaḥ . tasmāt nūtvā dhūtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:4925: 10-11 sārvadhātukagrahaṇam kimartham . apit iti iyati ucyamāne ārdhadhātukasya api apitaḥ ṅittvam prasajyeta :
GS24pmbhasuu:4926: kartā hartā . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na anena ārdhadhātukasya ṅittvam bhavati iti yat ayam ārdhadhātukīyān kān cit ṅitaḥ karoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:4927: caṅaṅnajiṅṅvanibathaṅnaṅaḥ . sārvadhātuke api etat jñāpakam syāt . na iti āha . tulyajātīyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4928: jñāpakam . kaḥ ca tulyajātīyaḥ . yathājātīyakāḥ caṅaṅnajiṅṅvanibathaṅnaṅaḥ . kathañjātīyakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4929: ca ete . ārdhadhātukāḥ . yadi etat asti tulyajātīyasya jñāpakam iti caṅaṅau luṅvikaraṇānam
GS24pmbhasuu:4930: jñāpakau syātām najiṅ vartamānakālānām ṅvanip bhūtakālānām athaṅśabdaḥ auṇādikānām
GS24pmbhasuu:4936: pit na iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . apit ṅit iti cet śabdekādeśapratiṣedhaḥ ādivattvāt . apit ṅit iti cet śabdekādeśe pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:4937: cyavante plavante . kim kāraṇam . ādivattvāt . pidapitoḥ ekādeśaḥ apitaḥ ādivat syāt . asti anyat pitaḥ iti kṛtvā ṅittvam prāpnoti . astu tarhi prasajyapratiṣedhaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:4938: pit na iti . na pit ṅit iti cet uttamaikādeśapratiṣedhaḥ . pit na iti cet uttamaikādeśe pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:4939: tudāni likhāni . kim kāraṇam . ādivattvāt eva . pidapitoḥ ekādeśaḥ pitaḥ ādivat syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4940: . tatra pit na iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . yathā icchasi tathā astu . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:4941: ubhayathā api doṣaḥ iti . ubhayathā api na doṣaḥ . ekādeśaḥ pūrvavidhau sthānivat
GS24pmbhasuu:4944: 12-13 ṛdupadhebhyaḥ liṭaḥ kittvam guṇāt vipratiṣedhena . ṛdupadhebhyaḥ liṭaḥ kittvam guṇāt bhavati vipratiṣedhena :
GS24pmbhasuu:4945: vavṛte vavṛdhe . uktam vā . kim uktam . na vā ksasya anavakāśatvāt apavādaḥ guṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4946: iti . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . yuktam tatra yat anavakāśam kitkaraṇam guṇam bādhate .
GS24pmbhasuu:4947: iha punaḥ ubhayam sāvakāśam . kitkaraṇasya avakāśaḥ:
GS24pmbhasuu:4950: vavṛte vavṛdhe . paratvāt guṇaḥ prāpnoti . idam tarhi uktam :
GS24pmbhasuu:4951: iṣṭavācī paraśabdaḥ . vipratiṣedhe param yat iṣṭam tat bhavati itI .
GS24pmbhasuu:4953: 14 kimartham idam ucyate . indheḥ samyogārtham vacanam bhavateḥ pidartham . ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:4954: yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum . katham . indheḥ chandoviṣayatvāt bhuvaḥ vukaḥ nityatvāt tābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:4955: kidvacanānarthakyam . indheḥ chandoviṣayaḥ liṭ . na hi antareṇa chandaḥ indheḥ anantaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4956: liṭ labhyaḥ . āmā bhāṣāyām bhavitavyam . bhuvaḥ vukaḥ nityatvāt . bhavateḥ api nityaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4957: vuk . kṛte api prāpnoti akṛte api . tābhyām kidvacanānarthakyam . tābhyām indhibhavitibhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:4960: 15 kimartham mṛḍādibhyaḥ parasya ktvaḥ kittvam ucyate . kit eva hi ktvā . na ktvā
GS24pmbhasuu:4961: seṭ iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti tadbādhanārtham . yadi tarhi mṛḍādibhyaḥ parasya ktvaḥ
