GS24pmbhasuu:4962: kittvam ucyate na arthaḥ na ktvā seṭ iti anena kittvapratiṣedhena . idam niyamārtham bhaviṣyati :
GS24pmbhasuu:4963: mṛḍādibhyaḥ eva parasya ktvaḥ kittvam bhavati na anyebhyaḥ iti . yadi niyamaḥ kriyate iha api tarhi niyamān na prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:4964: lūtvā pūtvā . atra api akittvam prāpnoti . tulyajātīyasya niyamaḥ . kaḥ ca tulyajātīyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4965: . yathājātīyakaḥ mṛḍādibhyaḥ paraḥ ktvā . kathañjātīyakaḥ mṛḍādibhyaḥ paraḥ ktvā
GS24pmbhasuu:4966: . seṭ . evam api asti atra kaḥ cit vibhāṣiteṭ . saḥ aniṭām niyāmakaḥ syāt . astu
GS24pmbhasuu:4967: tāvat ye seṭaḥ teṣām grahaṇam niyamāṛtham . yaḥ idānīm vibhāṣiteṭ tasya grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4970: 16 svapipracchyoḥ sanartham grahaṇam kit eva hi ktvā .
GS24pmbhasuu:4972: 16-21 kimartham ikaḥ parasya sanaḥ kittvam ucyate . ikaḥ kittvam guṇaḥ mā bhūt . ikaḥ kittvam ucyate guṇaḥ mā bhūt iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:4973: cicīṣati tuṣṭūṣati . na etat asti prayojanam . dīrghārambhāt . dīrghatvam atra bādhakam
GS24pmbhasuu:4974: bhaviṣyati . kṛte bhavet . kṛte khalu dīrghatve guṇaḥ prāpnoti . anarthakam tu .
GS24pmbhasuu:4975: anarthakam evam sati dīrghatvam syāt . na anarthakam . hrasvārtham . hrasvānām dīrghavacanasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4976: guṇaḥ na bhaviṣyati . bhavet hrasvānām dīrghavacanasāmarthyāt guṇaḥ na syāt . dīrghāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:4977: tu prasajyate . dīrghāṇām tu khalu guṇaḥ prāpnoti . nanu ca dīrghāṇām api dīrghavacanasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4978: guṇaḥ na bhaviṣyati . na dīrghāṇām dīrghāḥ prāpnuvanti . kim kāraṇam . na hi bhuktavān
GS24pmbhasuu:4979: punaḥ bhuṅkte na ca kṛtaśmaśruḥ punaḥ śmaśrūni kārayati . nanu ca punaḥ pravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4980: api dṛṣṭā . bhuktavān ca punaḥ bhuṅkte kṛtaśmaśruḥ ca punaḥ śmaśrūni kārayati . sāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4981: hi punaḥ bhāvyam . sāmarthyāt tatra punaḥ pravṛttiḥ bhavati bhojanaviśeṣāt śilpiviśeṣāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4982: vā . dīrghāṇām punaḥ dīrghatvavacane na kim cit prayojanam asti . akṛtakāri khalu
GS24pmbhasuu:4983: api śāstram agnivat . tat yathā agniḥ yad adagdham tat dahati . dīrghāṇām api dīrghavacane
GS24pmbhasuu:4984: etat prayojanam guṇaḥ mā bhūt iti . kṛtakāri khalu api śāstram parjanyavat . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:4985: yathā parjanyaḥ yāvat ūnam pūrṇam ca sarvam abhivarṣati . yathā eva tarhi dīrghavacanasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4986: guṇaḥ na bhavati evam ṝdittvam api na prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:4987: cikīrṣati jihīrṣati iti. ṝdittvam dīrghasaṃśrayam . na akṛte dīrghe ṝdittvam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:4988: . kim kāraṇam . ṝtaḥ iti ucyate . bhavet hrasvānām na akṛte dīrghe ṝdittvam syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4989: dīrghāṇām tu khalu akṛte api dīrghatve ṝdittvam prāpnoti . dīrghāṇām na akṛte dīrghe
GS24pmbhasuu:4990: . dīrghāṇām api na akṛte dīrghe ṝdittvam prāpnoti . yadā dīrghatvena guṇaḥ bādhitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4991: tataḥ uttarakālam ṝdittvam bhavati . ṇilopaḥ tu prayojanam . idam tarhi prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:4993: jñīpsati . kva astāḥ kva nipatitāḥ kva kittvam kva ṇilopaḥ . kaḥ vā abhisambandhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4994: yat sati kittve ṇilopaḥ syāt asati na syāt . eṣaḥ abhisambandhaḥ yat sati kittve
GS24pmbhasuu:4995: sāvakāśam dīrghatvam paratvāt ṇilopaḥ bādhate . asati punaḥ kittve anavakāśam dīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:4996: yathā eva guṇam bādhate evam ṇilopam api bādheta . tatra ṇilopasya avakāśaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:4999: jñīpsati . paratvāt ṇilopaḥ . asati api kittve sāvakāśam dīrghatvam . kaḥ avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5000: . isbhāvaḥ . nimitsati pramitsati . mīnātiminotyoḥ dīrghatve kṛte mīgrahaṇena grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5001: yathā syāt . yathā eva tarhi asati kittve sāvakāśam dīrghatvam paratvāt ṇilopaḥ bādhate
GS24pmbhasuu:5002: evam guṇaḥ api bādheta . tasmāt kittvam vaktavyam . ikaḥ kittvam guṇaḥ mā bhūt dīrghārambhāt kṛte bhavet /
GS24pmbhasuu:5003: anarthakam tu hrasvārtham dīrghāṇām tu prasajyate //
GS24pmbhasuu:5004: sāmarthyāt hi punaḥ bhāvyam ṝdittvam dīrghasaṃśrayam dīrghāṇām na akṛte dīrghe ṇilopaḥ tu prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5006: 22-23 ayuktaḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ . katham hi ikaḥ nāma hal antaḥ syāt anyasya anyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5007: katham tarhi nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . igvataḥ halaḥ iti . yadi evam yiyakṣati atra api
GS24pmbhasuu:5008: prāpnoti . evam tarhi igupadhāt halantāt iti vakṣyāmi . evam api dambheḥ na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:5009: . sūtram ca bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam ayuktaḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5010: iti . na ayuktaḥ . antaśabdaḥ ayam asti eva avayavavācī . tat yathā vastrāntaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5013: vasanāvayavaḥ iti gamyate . asti sāmīpye vartate . tat yathā udakāntam gataḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5014: . udakasamīpam gataḥ iti gamyate . tat yaḥ sāmīpye vartate tasya idam grahaṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5015: evam api dambheḥ na sidhyati . yaḥ atra iksamīpe hal na tasmāt uttaraḥ san . yasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5016: uttaraḥ san na asau iksamīpe hal . evam tarhi dambheḥ halgrahaṇasya jātivācakatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5021: ātmanepadam yau liṅsicau iti āhosvit ātmanepadeṣu parataḥ yau liṅsicau iti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:5022: ca ataḥ. yadi vijñāyate ātmanepadam yau liṅsicau iti liṅ viśeṣitaḥ sic aviśeṣitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5023: . atha vijñāyate ātmanepadeṣu parataḥ yau liṅsicau iti sic viśeṣitaḥ liṅ aviśeṣitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5024: . yathā icchasi tathā astu . astu tāvat ātmanepadam yau liṅsicau iti . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:5025: . liṅ viśeṣitaḥ sic aviśeṣitaḥ iti . sic ca viśeṣitaḥ . katham . ātmanepadam sic
GS24pmbhasuu:5026: na asti iti kṛtvā ātmanepadapare sici kāryam vijñāsyate . atha vā punaḥ astu ātmanepadeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:5027: parataḥ yau liṅsicau iti . nanu ca uktam sic viśeṣitaḥ liṅ aviśeṣitaḥ iti . liṅ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:5028: viśeṣitaḥ . katham . ātmanepadeṣu parataḥ liṅ na asti iti kṛtvā ātmanepade liṅi kāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:5029: vijñāsyate . na eva vā punaḥ arthaḥ liṅviśeṣaṇena ātmanepadagrahaṇena . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5030: . jhal iti vartate . ātmanepadeṣu ca eva liṅ jhalādiḥ na parasmaipadeṣu . tat etat
GS24pmbhasuu:5031: sijviśeṣaṇam ātmanepadagrahaṇam . atha sijviśeṣaṇe ātmanepadagrahaṇe sati kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5033: avātsīt . na etat asti . ikaḥ iti vartate . evam api anaiṣīt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5034: acaiṣīt : atra api prāpnoti . etat api na asti prayojanam . halantāt iti vartate . evam api akoṣīt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5035: amoṣīt : atra api prāpnoti . na etat asti prayojanam . jhal iti vartate . evam api abhaitsīt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5037: atra api prāpnoti . na etat asti . iglakṣaṇayoḥ guṇavṛddhyoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ na ca eṣā iglakṣaṇā vṛddhiḥ . idam tarhi prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:5039: asrākṣīt . kim ca syāt . akillakṣaṇaḥ amāgamaḥ na syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:5041: 25-27 it ca kasya takārettvam . kasya hetoḥ ikāraḥ taparaḥ kriyate . dīrghaḥ mā bhūt . dīrghaḥ mā bhūt iti . ṛte api saḥ . antareṇa api ārambham siddhaḥ atra dīrghaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:5042: ghumāsthāgāpājahāti iti . anantare plutaḥ mā bhūt . idam tarhi prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:5043: anantare plutaḥ mā bhūt iti . kutaḥ nu khalu etat anantarārthe ārambhe hrasvaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:5044: na punaḥ plutaḥ iti . plutaḥ ca viṣaye smṛtaḥ . viṣaye khalu plutaḥ ucyate . yadā
GS24pmbhasuu:5045: ca saḥ viṣayaḥ bhavitavyam eva tadā plutena . it ca kasya takārettvam dīrghaḥ mā bhūt ṛte api saḥ /
GS24pmbhasuu:5046: anantare plutaḥ mā bhūt plutaḥ ca viṣaye smṛtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5048: 27-31 na seṭ iti kṛte akittve . na seṭ iti eva siddham . na arthaḥ ktvāgrahaṇena . niṣṭhāyam api tarhi prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:5049: gudhitaḥ gudhitavān iti . niṣṭhāyām avadhāraṇāt . niṣṭhāyām avadhāraṇāt na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:5050: . kim avadhāraṇam . niṣṭhā śīṅsvidimidikṣvididhṛṣaḥ iti . parokṣāyām tarhi prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:5052: kṅiti iti ākāralopaḥ na syāt . mā bhūt evam . iṭi iti evam bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi :
GS24pmbhasuu:5053: jagmiva jaghniva . kṅiti iti upadhālopaḥ na syāt . jñāpakāt na parokṣāyām . jñāpakāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5054: parokṣāyām na bhaviṣyati . kim jñāpakam . sani jhalgrahaṇam viduḥ . yat ayam ikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5055: jhal iti jhalgrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ aupadeśikasya kittvasya pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5056: na ātideśikasya iti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . jhalgrahaṇasya etat prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:5058: śiśayiṣate iti . yadi ca atra ātideśikasya kittvasya pratiṣedhaḥ syāt jhalgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5059: anarthakam syāt . astu atra kittvam . na seṭ iti pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati . paśyati
GS24pmbhasuu:5060: tu ācāryaḥ aupadeśikasya kittvasya pratiṣedhaḥ na ātideśikasya iti . tataḥ jhalgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5061: karoti . na etat asti prayojanam . uttarārtham etat syāt . sthāghvoḥ it ca jhalādau
GS24pmbhasuu:5063: upāsthāyiṣātām upāsthāyiṣata . ittvam kitsanniyogena . kitsanniyogena ittvam ucyate . tena asati kittve ittvam na bhaviṣyati . reṇa tulyam sudhīvani . tat yathā sudhīvā supīvā :
GS24pmbhasuu:5064: ṅīpsanniyogena raḥ ucyamānaḥ asati ṅīpi na bhavati . atha vā astu atra ittvam . kā
GS24pmbhasuu:5065: rūpasiddhiḥ . vṛddhau kṛtāyām āyādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . vasvartham . vasvartham tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:5066: ktvāgrahaṇam kartavyam . vasau hi aupadeśikam kittvam . kim ca syāt . papivān papimān :
GS24pmbhasuu:5067: kṅiti iti ākāralopaḥ na syāt . mā bhūt evam . iṭi iti evam bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi : jagmivān ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5068: jaghnivān : kṅiti iti upadhālopaḥ na syāt . kidatīdeśāt . astu atra aupadeśikasya kittvasya pratiṣedhaḥ . ātideśikasya kittvam bhaviṣyati . yatra tarhi tat pratiṣidhyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:5069: añjeḥ ājivān iti . evam tarhi chāndasḥ kvasuḥ liṭ ca chandasi sārvadhātukam api bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5070: . tatra sārvadhātukam apit ṅit bhavati iti ṅiti upadhālopaḥ bhaviṣyati . nigṛhītiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5074: nikucitiḥ . tat tarhi ktvāgrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . ktvā ca vigrahāt . upariṣṭāt yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:5075: na seṭ niṣṭhā śīṅsvidimidikṣvididhṛṣaḥ . mṛṣaḥ titikṣāyām . udupadhāt bhāvādikarmaṇoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5076: anyatarasyām . tataḥ pūṅaḥ . pūṅaḥ niṣṭhā seṭ na kit bhavati . tataḥ ktvā . ktvā
GS24pmbhasuu:5077: ca seṭ na kit bhavati . pūṅ iti nivṛttam . na seṭ iti kṛte akittve niṣṭhāyām avadhāraṇāt /
GS24pmbhasuu:5078: jñāpakāt na parokṣāyām sani jhalgrahaṇam viduḥ //
GS24pmbhasuu:5080: vasvartham kidatīdeśāt nigṛhītiḥ ktvā ca vigrahāt //
GS24pmbhasuu:5082: 31 iha kasmāt na bhavati . gudhitaḥ gudhitavān iti . udupadhāt śapaḥ . śabvikaraṇebhyaḥ iṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:5084: 31-32 pūṅaḥ ktvāniṣṭhayoḥ iṭi vāprasaṅgaḥ seṭprakaraṇāt . pūṅaḥ ktvāniṣṭhayoḥ iṭi
GS24pmbhasuu:5085: vibhāṣā prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . seṭprakaraṇāt . seṭ iti vartate . na vā seṭtvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5086: akidāśrayatvāt aniṭi vā kittvam . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . seṭtvasya akidāśrayatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5087: . akidāśrayam seṭtvam . yadā akittvam tadā iṭā bhavitavyam . seṭtvasya akidāśrayatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5088: aniṭi eva vibhāṣā kittvam bhaviṣyati . iḍvidhau pūṅaḥ grahaṇam kriyate . tena vacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5089: iṭ seṭprakaraṇāt ca iṭi eva vibhāṣā kittvam prāpnoti . iḍvidhau hi agrahaṇam . iḍvidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:5090: hi pūṅaḥ grahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati . bhāradvājīyāḥ paṭhanti :
GS24pmbhasuu:5091: nityam akittvam iḍādyoḥ . ktvāgrahaṇam uttarārtham . nityam akittvam iḍādyoḥ siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:5092: . katham. vibhāṣāmadhye ayam yogaḥ kriyate . vibhāṣāmadhye ca ye vidhayaḥ te nityāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5093: bhavanti . kimartham tarhi ktvāgrahaṇam . ktvāgrahaṇam uttarārtham . uttarārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:5095: nopadhāt thapāntāt vā vañciluñcyṛtaḥ ca iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5097: 33 kāśyapagrahaṇam kimartham. kāśyapagrahaṇam pūjārtham . vā iti eva hi vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:5099: 33 kim idam ralaḥ ktvāsanoḥ kittvam vidhīyate āhosvit pratiṣidhyate . kim ca ataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5100: . yadi vidhīyate ktvāgrahaṇam anarthakam . kit eva hi ktvā . atha pratiṣidhyate sangrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5101: anarthakam . akit eva hi san . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati :
GS24pmbhasuu:5102: ralaḥ ktvāsanoḥ kittvam . ralaḥ ktvāsanoḥ kittvam vidhīyate . nanu ca uktam :
GS24pmbhasuu:5103: ktvāgrahaṇam anarthakam . kit eva hi ktvā iti . na anarthakam . na ktvā seṭ iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . tadbādhanārtham .
GS24pmbhasuu:5105: 34 ayuktaḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ . ū iti anena kālaḥ pratinirdiśyate ū iti ayam ca varṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5106: . tatra ayuktam varṇasya kālena saha sāmanādhikaraṇyam . katham tarhi nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5107: . ūkālakālasya iti . kim idam ūkālakālasya iti . ū iti etasya kālaḥ ūkālaḥ . ūkālaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5108: kālaḥ asya ūkālakālaḥ iti . saḥ tarhi tathā nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . uttarapadalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5109: atra draṣṭavyaḥ . tat yathā uṣṭramukham mukham asya uṣṭramukhaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5110: kharamukhaḥ evam ūkālakālaḥ ūkālaḥ iti . atha vā sāhacaryāt tācchabdyam bhaviṣyati . kālasahacaritaḥ varṇaḥ api kālaḥ eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:5113: aprasiddhiḥ . kim kāraṇam . nirdeśavaiṣamyāt . tisraḥ sañjñāḥ ekā sañjñī . vaiṣamyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5114: saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ na prāpnoti . siddham tu samasṅkhyatvāt . siddham etat . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:5115: . samasaṅkhyatvāt . katham samasaṅkhyatvam . trayāṇām hi vikāranirdeśaḥ . trayāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:5116: ayam praśliṣṭanirdeśaḥ . katham punaḥ jñāyate trayāṇām ayam praśliṣṭanirdeśaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5117: . tisṛṇām sañjñānām karaṇasāmarthyāt . yadi api tāvat tisṛṇām sañjñānām karaṇasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5118: jñāyate trayāṇām ayam praśliṣṭanirdeśaḥ iti kutaḥ tu etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:5119: etena ānupūrvyeṇa sanniviṣṭānām sañjñāḥ bhaviṣyanti iti . ādau mātrikaḥ tataḥ dvimātraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5120: tataḥ trimātraḥ iti . na punaḥ mātrikaḥ madhye vā ante vā syāt tathā dvimātraḥ ādau
GS24pmbhasuu:5121: vā ante vā syāt tathā trimātraḥ ādau vā madhye vā syāt . ayam tāvat trimātraḥ aśakyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5122: ādau vā madhye vā kartum . kutaḥ . plutāśrayaḥ hi prakṛtibhāvaḥ prasajyeta . mātrikadvimātrikayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5123: api ghyantam pūrvam nipatati iti mātrikasya pūrvanipātaḥ bhaviṣyati . yat tāvat ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5124: ayam tāvat trimātraḥ aśakyaḥ ādau vā madhye vā kartum . plutāśrayaḥ hi prakṛtibhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5125: prasajyeta iti . plutāśrayaḥ prakṛtibhāvaḥ plutasañjñā ca anena eva . yadi ca trimātraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5126: ādau vā madhye vā syāt plutasañjñā eva asya na syāt kutaḥ pratkṛtibhāvaḥ . yat api
GS24pmbhasuu:5127: ucyate mātrikadvimātrikayoḥ api ghyantam pūrvam nipatati iti mātrikasya pūrvanipātaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5128: bhaviṣyati iti . hrasvāśrayā hi ghisañjñā hrasvasañjñā ca anena eva. yadi ca mātrikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5129: madhye vā ante vā syāt hrasvasañjñā eva asya na syāt kutaḥ ghisañjñā kutaḥ pūrvanipātaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5130: . evam eṣā vyavasthā na prakalpate . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na mātrikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5131: ante bhavati iti yat ayam vibhāṣā pṛṣṭaprativacane heḥ iti mātrikasya plutam śāsti
GS24pmbhasuu:5132: . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . yaḥ ante saḥ plutasañjñakaḥ . yadi ca mātrikaḥ ante syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5133: plutasañjñā asya syāt. tatra mātrākālasya mātrākālavacanam anarthakam syāt . madhye
GS24pmbhasuu:5134: tarhi syāt iti . atra api ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na mātrikaḥ madhye bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5135: yat ayam ataḥ dīrghaḥ yañi supi ca it dīrghatvam śāsti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5136: yaḥ madhye saḥ dīrghasañjñakaḥ . yadi ca mātrikaḥ madhye syāt dīrghasañjñā asya syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5137: . tatra mātrākālasya mātrākālavacanam anarthakam syāt . dvimātraḥ tarhi ante syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5138: . atra api ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na dvimātraḥ ante bhavati iti yat ayam om abhyādāne
GS24pmbhasuu:5139: iti dvimātrikasya plutam śāsti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . yaḥ ante saḥ plutasañjñakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5140: . yadi ca dvimātrikaḥ ante syāt plutasañjñā asya syāt . tatra dvimātrakālasya dvimātrakālavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5141: anarthakam syāt . mātrikeṇa ca asya pūrvanipātaḥ bādhitaḥ iti kṛtvā kva anyatra utsahate
GS24pmbhasuu:5142: bhavitum anyat ataḥ madhyāt . evam eṣā vyavasthā prakḷptā . bhavet vyavasthā prakḷptā
GS24pmbhasuu:5143: . dīrghaplutayoḥ tu pūrvasañjñāprasaṅgaḥ . dīrghaplutayoḥ api pūrvasañjñā prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:5144: . kā . hrasvasañjñā . kim kāraṇam . aṇ savarṇān gṛhṇāti iti . siddham tu taparanirdeśāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5146: udūkālaḥ iti . yadi evam drutāyām taparakaraṇe madhyamavilambitayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:5147: kālabhedāt . drutādiṣu ca uktam . kim utktam . siddham tu . avasthitāḥ varṇāḥ vaktuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5148: cirāciravacanāt vṛttayaḥ viśiṣyante iti . saḥ tarhi taparanirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na
GS24pmbhasuu:5149: kartavyaḥ . iha kālagrahaṇam kriyate . yāvat ca taparakaraṇam tāvat kālagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5151: ukālaḥ ūkālaḥ ū3kālaḥ iti . atha vā ekasañjñādhikāre ayam yogaḥ kartavyaḥ . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:5152: ekā sañjñā bhavati yā parā anavakāśā ca iti evam hi dīrghaplutayoḥ pūrvasañjñā na
GS24pmbhasuu:5153: bhaviṣyati . atha vā svam rūpam śabdasya aśabdasañjñā iti ayam yogaḥ pratyākhyāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5154: . tatra yat etat aśabdasañjñā iti etat yayā vibhaktyā nirdiśyamānam arthavat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5156: aṇudit savarṇasya ca apratyayaḥ aśabdasañjñāyām iti . atha vā hrasvasañjñāvacanasāmarthyāt dīrghaplutayoḥ pūrvasañjñā na bhaviṣyati . nanu ca idam prayojanam syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:5157: sañjñayā vidhāne niyamam vakṣyāmi iti . hrasvasañjñayā yat ucyate tat acaḥ sthāne
GS24pmbhasuu:5158: yathā syāt iti . syāt etat prayojanam yadi kiñcitkarāṇi hrasvaśāsanāni syuḥ . yataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5159: tu khalu yāvat ajgrahaṇam tāvat hrasvagrahaṇam ataḥ akiñcitkarāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:5161: ecaḥ ik hrasvādeśe iti vakṣyāmi iti . anucyamāne hi etasmin hrasvapradeśeṣu ecaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5162: ik bhavati iti vaktavyam syāt . hrasvaḥ napuṃsake prātipadikasya ecaḥ ik bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5163: iti . ṇau caṅi upadhāyāḥ hrasvaḥ ecaḥ ik bhavati iti . hrasvaḥ halādiḥ śeṣaḥ ecaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5164: ik bhavati iti . sañjñā ca nāma yataḥ na laghīyaḥ . kutaḥ etat . laghvartham hi sañjñākaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5165: . laghīyaḥ ca triḥ hrasvapradeśeṣu ecaḥ ik bhavati iti na punaḥ sañjñākaraṇam . triḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5166: hrasvapradeśeṣu ecaḥ ik bhavati iti ṣaṭ grahaṇāni . sañjñākaraṇe punaḥ aṣṭau . hrasvasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:5167: vaktavyā . triḥ hrasvapradeśeṣu hrasvagrahaṇam kartavyam hrasvaḥ hrasvaḥ hrasvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5168: iti . ecaḥ ik hrasvādeśe iti . saḥ ayam laghīyasā nyāsena siddhe sati yat garīyāṃsam
GS24pmbhasuu:5169: yatnam ārabhate tasya etat prayojanam dīrghaplutayoḥ tu pūrvasañjñā mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5171: 40-41 kim ayam alontyaśeṣaḥ āhosvit alontyāpavādaḥ . katham ca ayam taccheṣaḥ syāt katham vā tadapavādaḥ . yadi ekam vākyam tat ca idam ca :
GS24pmbhasuu:5172: alaḥ antyasya vidhayaḥ bhavanti acaḥ hrasvadīrghaplutāḥ antyasya iti tataḥ ayam taccheśaḥ . atha nānā vākyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:5174: acaḥ hrasvadīrghaplutāḥ antyasya anantyasya ca iti tataḥ ayam tadapavādaḥ . kaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:5175: atra viśeṣaḥ . hrasvādividhiḥ alaḥ antyasya iti cet vacipracchiśamādiprabhṛtihanigamidīrgheṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:5176: ajgrahaṇam . hrasvādividhiḥ alaḥ antyasya iti cet vacipracchiśamādiprabhṛtihanigamidīrgheṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:5177: ajgrahaṇam kartavyam . vacipracchyoḥ dīrghaḥ acaḥ iti vaktavyam . anantyatvāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:5178: prāpnoti . śamādīnām dīrghaḥ acaḥ iti vaktavyam . anantyatvāt na prāpnoti . hanigamyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5179: dīrghaḥ acaḥ iti vaktavyam . anantyatvāt na prāpnoti . astu tarhi tadapavādaḥ . acaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5185: atinau evam suvāk brāhmaṇakulam iti atra api prāpnoti . akṛtsārvadhātukayoḥ dīrghaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:5187: cīyate stūyate evam bhidyate atra api prāpnoti . nāmi dīrghaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:5190: ṣaṇṇām . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . nopadhyāyāḥ iti etat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . prakṛtasya eṣaḥ niyamaḥ syāt. kim ca prakṛtam . nāmi iti . tena bhavet iha niyamāt na syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:5191: ṣaṇṇām . anyate tanyate atra api prāpnoti . atha api evam niyamaḥ syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:5192: nopadhāyāḥ nāmi eva iti evam api bhavet iha niyamāt na syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:5193: anyate tanyate . ṣaṇṇām iti atra prāpnoti . atha api ubhayataḥ niyamaḥ syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:5194: nopadhāyāḥ eva nāmi nāmi eva nopadadhyāyāḥ iti evam api bhidyate suvāk brāhmaṇakulam
GS24pmbhasuu:5195: ita atra api prāpnoti . evam tarhi hrasvaḥ dīrghaḥ plutaḥ iti yatra brūyāt acaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5196: etat tatra upasthitam draṣṭavyam . kim kṛtam bhavati . dvitīyā ṣaṣṭhī prāduḥ bhāvyate . tatra kāmacāraḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:5197: gṛhyamāṇena vā acam viśeṣayitum acā vā gṛhyamāṇaḥ . yāvatā kāmacāraḥ iha tāvat vacipracchiśamādiprabhṛtihanigamidīrgheṣu gṛhyamāṇena acam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5198: eṣām acaḥ dīrghaḥ bhavati iti . iha idānīm napuṃsakahrasvākṛtsārvadhātukanāmidīrgheṣu acā gṛhyamāṇam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:5199: napuṃsakasya hrasvaḥ bhavati acaḥ . ajantasya iti . akṛtsārvadhātukayoḥ dīrghaḥ acaḥ . ajantasya iti . nāmi dīrghaḥ bhavati acaḥ . ajantasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5203: saḥ iti . sañjñayā vidhāne niyamaḥ . sañjñayā ye vidhīyante teṣu niyamaḥ . kim vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5204: etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . ac iti vartate . tatra evam abhisambandhaḥ kariṣyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:5205: acaḥ ac bhavati hrasvaḥ dīrghaḥ plutaḥ iti evam bhāvyamanaḥ iti . atha pūrvasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:5206: yoge ajgrahaṇe sati kim prayojanam . ajgrahaṇam saṃyogācsamudāyanivṛttyartham . ajgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5207: kriyate saṃyognivṛttyartham acsamudāyanivṛttyartham ca . saṃyognivṛttyartham tāvat :
GS24pmbhasuu:5208: pratakṣya prarakṣya . hrasvasya piti kṛti tuk iti tuk mā bhūt iti . acsamudāyanivṛttyartham :
GS24pmbhasuu:5210: titaucchāyā . dīrghāt padāntāt vā iti vibhāṣā mā bhūt .
GS24pmbhasuu:5212: 43-45 kim ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭam ajgrahaṇam anuvartate utāho na . kim ca ataḥ . yadi anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:5213: halsvaraprāptau vyañjanam avidyamānavat iti paribhāṣā na prakalpate . katham halaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5214: nāma svaraprāptiḥ syāt . evam tarhi nivṛttam . bahūni etasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ prayojanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:5215: . atha prathamānirdiṣṭam ajgrahaṇam anuvartate utāho na . kim ca arthaḥ anuvṛttyā
GS24pmbhasuu:5216: . bāḍham arthaḥ yadi ete vyañjanasya api guṇāḥ lakṣyante . nanu ca pratyakṣam upalabhyante :
GS24pmbhasuu:5217: iṣe tvā ūrje tvā . na ete vyañjanasya guṇāḥ . acaḥ ete guṇāḥ . tatsāmīpyāt tu vyañjanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5218: api tadguṇam upalabhyate . tat yathā . dvayoḥ raktayoḥ vastrayoḥ madhye śuklam vastram
GS24pmbhasuu:5219: tadguṇam upalabhyate badarapiṭake riktakaḥ lohakaṃsaḥ tadguṇaḥ upalabhyate . kutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5220: nu khalu etat acaḥ ete guṇāḥ . tatsāmīpyāt tu vyañjanam api tadguṇam upalabhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5221: iti . na punaḥ vyañjanasya ete guṇāḥ syuḥ . tatsāmīpyāt tu ac api tadguṇaḥ upalabhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5222: iti . antareṇa api vyañjanam acaḥ eva ete guṇāḥ lakṣyante . na punaḥ antareṇa acam
GS24pmbhasuu:5223: vyañjanasya uccāraṇam api bhavati . anvartham khalu api nirvacanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:5224: svayam rājante svarāḥ . anvak bhavati vyañjanam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5226: 45-46 uccanīcasya anavasthitatvāt sañjñāprasiddhiḥ . idam uccanīcam anavasthitapadarthakam
GS24pmbhasuu:5227: . tat eva hi kam cit prati uccaiḥ bhavati kam cit prati nīcaiḥ . evam kam cit kaḥ cit adhīyānam āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:5228: kim uccaiḥ rorūyase . atha nīcaiḥ vartatām iti . tam eva tathā adhīyānam aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:5229: kim antardantakena adhīṣe . uccaiḥ vartatām iti . evam uccanīcam anavasthitapadarthakam . tasya anavasthānāt sañjñāyāḥ aprasiddhiḥ . evam tarhi lakṣaṇam kariṣyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:5230: āyāmaḥ dāruṇyam aṇutā khasya iti uccaiḥkarāṇi śabdasya . āyāmaḥ gātrāṇām nigrahaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5231: . dāruṇyam svarasya dāruṇatā rūkṣatā . aṇutā khasya kaṇṭhasya saṃvṛtatā . uccaiḥkarāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:5232: śabdasya . atha nīcaiḥkarāṇi śabdasya . anvavasargaḥ mārdavam urutā khasya iti nīcaiḥkarāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:5233: śabdasya . anvavasargaḥ gātrāṇām śithilatā . mārdavam svarasya mṛdutā snigdhatā .
GS24pmbhasuu:5234: urutā khasya mahattā kaṇṭhasya . iti nīcaiḥkarāṇi śabdasya . etat api anaikāntikam
GS24pmbhasuu:5235: . yat alpaprāṇasya sarvoccaiḥ tat mahāprāṇasya sarvanīcaiḥ . siddham tu samānaprakramavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5236: . siddham etat . katham . samāne prakrame iti vaktavyam . kaḥ punaḥ prakramaḥ . uraḥ kaṇṭhaḥ śiraḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5238: 46-48 samāhāraḥ svaritaḥ iti ucyate . kasya samāhāraḥ svaritasañjñaḥ bhavati . acoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5239: iti āha . samāhāraḥ acoḥ cet na abhāvāt . samāhāraḥ acoḥ cet tat na . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5240: . abhāvāt . na hi acoḥ samāhāraḥ asti . nanu ayam asti gāṅgenūpe iti . na eṣaḥ acoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5241: samāhāraḥ . anyaḥ ayam udāttānudāttayoḥ sthāne ekaḥ ādiśyate . evam tarhi guṇayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5242: . guṇayoḥ cet na acprakaraṇāt . guṇayoḥ samahāraḥ iti cet tat na . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5243: acprakaraṇāt . ac iti vartate . siddham tu acsamudāyasya abhāvāt tadguṇe sampratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5244: . siddham etat . katham . acsamudāyaḥ na asti iti kṛtvā tadguṇasya acaḥ samāhāraguṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5245: sampratyayaḥ bhaviṣyati . katham punaḥ samāhāraḥ iti anena ac śakyaḥ pratinirdeṣṭum
GS24pmbhasuu:5246: . matublopaḥ atra draṣṭavyaḥ . tat yathā puṣpakāḥ eṣām te puṣpakāḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5247: kālakāḥ eṣām te kālakāḥ iti evam samāhāravān samāhāraḥ . atha vā akāraḥ matvarthīyaḥ . tat yathā tundaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5248: ghāṭaḥ iti . yadi evam traisvaryam na prakalpate . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . traisvaryam
GS24pmbhasuu:5249: adhīmahe iti etat na upapadyate . na etat guṇāpekṣam . kim tarhi . ajapekṣam . traisvaryam adhīmahe :
GS24pmbhasuu:5250: triprakāraiḥ ajbhiḥ adhīmahe kaiḥ cit udāttaguṇaiḥ kaiḥ cit anudāttaguṇaiḥ kaiḥ cit ubhayaguṇaiḥ . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:5251: śuklaguṇaḥ śuklaḥ kṛṣṇaguṇaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ . yaḥ idānīm ubhayaguṇaḥ saḥ tṛtīyām ākhyām labhate
GS24pmbhasuu:5252: kalmāṣaḥ iti vā sāraṅgaḥ iti vā . evam iha api udāttaguṇaḥ udāttaḥ anudāttaguṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5253: anudāttaḥ . yaḥ idānīm ubhayavān sa tṛtīyām ākhyām labhate svaritaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5255: 48-50 ardhahrasvam iti ucyate . tatra dīrghaplutayoḥ na prāpnoti . kanyā śaktike3
GS24pmbhasuu:5256: śaktike . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . mātracaḥ atra lopaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ . ardhahrasvamātram ardhahrasvam
GS24pmbhasuu:5257: iti . kimartham idam ucyate . āmiśrībhūtam iva idam bhavati . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:5259: kiyat kṣīram kiyat udakam kasmin avakāśe kṣīram kasmin avakāśe udakam iti . evam iha api āmiśrībhūtatvāt na jñāyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:5260: kiyat udāttam kiyat anudāttam kasmin avakāśe udāttam kasmin avakāśe anudāttam iti . tat ācāryaḥ suhṛt bhūtvā anvācaṣṭe :
GS24pmbhasuu:5261: iyat udāttam iyat anudāttam asmin avakāśe udāttam asmin avakāśe anudāttam iti . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:5262: ayam evam suhṛt kim anyāni api evañjātīyakāni na upadiśati . kāni punaḥ tāni . sthānakaraṇānupradānāni
GS24pmbhasuu:5263: . vyākaraṇam nāma iyam uttarā vidyā . saḥ asau chandaḥśāstreṣu abhivinītaḥ upalabdhyā
GS24pmbhasuu:5264: avagantum utsahate . yadi evam na arthaḥ anena . idam api upalabdhyā gamiṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5266: tasya svaritasya āditaḥ ardhahrasvam udāttasañjñam iti . kim kṛtam bhavati . triḥ udāttapradeśeṣu svaritagrahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:5268: udāttasvaritayoḥ yaṇaḥ svaritaḥ anudāttasya na udāttasvaritodayam iti . sañjñākaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5269: hi nāma yataḥ na laghīyaḥ . kutaḥ etat . laghvartham hi sañjñākaraṇam . laghīyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5270: ca triḥ udāttapradeśeṣu svaritagrahaṇam na punaḥ sañjñākaraṇam . triḥ udāttapradeśeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:5271: svaritagrahaṇe nava akṣarāṇi sañjñākaraṇe punaḥ ekādaśa . evam tarhi ubhayam anena
GS24pmbhasuu:5272: kriyate anvākhyānam ca sañjñā ca . katham punaḥ ekena yatnena ubhayam labhyam . labhyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5274: tasya svaritasya āditaḥ ardhahrasvram udāttasañjñam bhavati iti . ūrdhvam āttam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5275: ca ataḥ udāttam . yadi tarhi sañjñākaraṇam udāttādeḥ yat ucyate tat svaritādeḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:5276: prāpnoti . anvākhyānam eva tarhi idam mandabuddheḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5279: kāryam svaritāt iti siddhyartham . svaritasyārdhahrasvodāttāt ā udāttasvaritaparasyasannataraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5280: iti etasmāt sūtrāt idam sūtrakāṇḍam ūrdhvam udāttāt anudāttasya svaritaḥ iti ataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5281: kāryam . kim prayojanam . svaritāt iti siddhyartham . svaritāt iti siddhiḥ yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:5283: imam me gaṅge yamune sarasvati śutudri . kva tarhi syāt . yaḥ siddhaḥ svaritaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:5284: kāryam devadattayajñadattau . svaritodāttārtham ca . svaritodāttārtham ca tatra eva kartavyam . na subrahmaṇyāyām svaritasya tu udāttaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:5285: indra agaccha . kva tarhi syāt . yaḥ siddhaḥ svaritaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:5286: subrahmaṇyom indra agaccha . svaritodāttāt ca asvaritārtham . svaritodāttāt ca asvaritārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:5287: tatra eva kartavyam . indra agaccha harivaḥ agaccha . svaritaparasannatarārtham ca
GS24pmbhasuu:5288: . svaritaparasannatarārtham ca tatra eva kartavyam . udāttasvaritaparasya sannataraḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:5289: maṇavaka jaṭilakādhyāpaka nyaṅ . kva tarhi syāt . yaḥ siddhaḥ svaritaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:5290: maṇavaka jaṭilakābhirūpaka kva . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . devabrahmaṇoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5291: anudāttavacanam jñāpakam svaritāt iti siddhatvasya . devabrahmaṇoḥ anudāttavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5292: jñāpakam siddhaḥ iha svaritaḥ iti . yadi etat jñāpyate svaritodāttaparasya anudāttasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5293: svaritatvam prāpnoti . na brūmaḥ devabrahmaṇoḥ anudāttavacanam jñāpakam siddhaḥ iha
GS24pmbhasuu:5294: svaritaḥ iti . kim tarhi . param etat kāṇḍam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5298: sambodhanam sambuddhiḥ iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi pāribhāṣikyāḥ devāḥ brahmāṇaḥ iti atra na prāpnoti . atha anvarthagrahaṇam na doṣaḥ . yathā na doṣaḥ tathā astu .
GS24pmbhasuu:5300: 53-54 kim punaḥ iyam ekaśrutiḥ udāttā āhosvit anudāttā . na udāttā . katham jñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5301: . yat ayam uccaistarām vā vaṣaṭkāraḥ iti āha . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . atantram taranirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5302: . yāvat uccaiḥ tāvat uccaistarām iti . yadi tarhi na udāttā anudāttā . anudāttā ca
GS24pmbhasuu:5303: na . katham jñāyate . yat ayam udāttasvaritaparasya sannataraḥ iti āha . katham kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:5304: jñāpakam . atantram taranirdeśaḥ . yāvat sannaḥ tāvat sannataraḥ iti . sā eṣā jñāpakābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:5305: udāttānudāttayoḥ madhyam ekaśrutiḥ antarālam hriyate . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:5306: kim punaḥ iyam ekaśrutiḥ udāttā uta anudāttā . udāttā . katham jñāyate . yat ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:5307: uccaistarām vā vaṣaṭkāraḥ iti āha . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . tantram taranirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5308: . uccaiḥ dṛṣṭvā uccaistarām iti etat bhavati . yadi tarhi udāttā na anudāttā . anudāttā
GS24pmbhasuu:5309: ca . katham jñāyate . yat ayam udāttasvaritaparasya sannataraḥ iti āha . katham kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:5310: jñāpakam . tantram taranirdeśaḥ . sannam dṛṣṭvā sannataraḥ iti etat bhavati . te
GS24pmbhasuu:5311: ete tantre taranirdeśe sapta svarāḥ bhavanti : udāttaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5316: svarite yaḥ udāttaḥ saḥ anyena viśiṣtaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5319: 55-56 subrahmaṇyāyam okāraḥ udāttaḥ . subrahmaṇyāyam okāraḥ udāttaḥ bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:5320: subrahmaṇyom . ākāraḥ ākhyāte parādiḥ ca . ākāraḥ ākhyāte parādiḥ ca udāttaḥ bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:5321: indra agaccha . harivaḥ agaccha . vākyādau ca dve dve . vākyādau ca dve dve udātte bhavataḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:5322: indra agaccha . harivaḥ agaccha . maghavanvarjam . agaccha maghavan . sutyāparāṇām antaḥ . sutyāparāṇām antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:5323: dvyahe sutyam . tryahe sutyam . asau iti antaḥ . asau iti antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:5324: gārgyaḥ yajate . vātsyaḥ yajate . amuṣya iti antaḥ . amuṣya iti antaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:5325: dākṣeḥ pita yajate . syāntasya upottamam ca . syāntasya upottamam udāttam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5326: antaḥ ca . gārgyasya pita yajate . vātsyasya pita yajate . vā nāmadheyasya . vā nāmadheyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5328: devadattasya pita yajate . devadattasya pita yajate .
GS24pmbhasuu:5330: 56-57 devabrahmaṇoḥ anudāttatvam eke . devabrahmaṇoḥ anudāttatvam eke icchanti :
GS24pmbhasuu:5333: 57-59 svaritāt saṃhitāyām anudāttānām iti cet dvyekayoḥ aikaśrutyavacanam . svaritāt saṃhitāyām anudāttānām iti cet dvyekayoḥ aikaśrutyam vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5334: agniveśyaḥ pacati . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . bahuvacanena nirdeśaḥ kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5335: . tena bahūnām aikaśrutyam syāt dvyekayoḥ na syāt . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na atra nirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5336: tantram . katham punaḥ tena eva nirdeśaḥ kriyate tat ca atantram syāt . tatkārī ca
GS24pmbhasuu:5337: bhavān taddveṣī ca . nāntarīyakatvāt atra bahuvacanena nirdeśaḥ kriyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:5338: avaśyam kayā cit vibhaktyā kena cit vacanena nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ iti . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:5339: kaḥ cit annārthī śālikalāpam sapalālam satuṣam āharati nāntayīyakatvāt . saḥ yāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:5340: ādeyam tāvat ādāya tuṣapalālāni utsṛjati . tathā kaḥ cit māṃsārthī matsyān sakaṇṭakān
GS24pmbhasuu:5341: saśakalān āharati nāntayīyakatvāt . saḥ yāvat ādeyam tāvat ādāya śakalakaṇṭakān utsṛjati
GS24pmbhasuu:5342: . evam iha api nāntarīyakatvāt bahuvacanena nirdeśaḥ kriyate . aviśeṣeṇa aikaśrutyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5343: . aviśeṣeṇa aikaśrutyam iti cet vyavahitānām aprasiddhiḥ . aviśeṣeṇa aikaśrutyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5344: iti cet vyavahitānām aikaśrutyam na prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:5345: imam me gaṅge yamune sarasvati śutudri . anekam api iti tu vacanāt siddham . anekam
GS24pmbhasuu:5346: api ekam api svaritāt param saṃhitāyām ekaśruti bhavati iti vaktavyam . sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:5347: . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam :
GS24pmbhasuu:5348: svaritāt saṃhitāyām anudāttānām iti cet dvyekayoḥ aikaśrutyavacanam . aviśeṣeṇa aikaśrutyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5349: vyavahitānām aprasiddhiḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . katham . ekaśeṣanirdeśaḥ ayam anudāttasya ca :
GS24pmbhasuu:5350: anudāttayoḥ ca anudāttānām ca anudāttānām iti . evam api ṣaṭprabhṛtīnām eva prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:5351: . ṣaṭprabhṛtiṣu ekaśeṣaḥ parisamāpyate . pratyekam vākyaparisamāptiḥ dṛṣṭā iti dvyekayoḥ api bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5353: 59-62 apṛktasañjñāyām halgrahaṇam svādilope halaḥ agrahaṇārtham . apṛktasañjñāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:5354: halgrahaṇam kartavyam . ekahal pratyayaḥ apṛktasañjñaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:5355: prayojanam . svādilope halaḥ agrahaṇārtham . svādilope halaḥ grahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:5356: halṅyābbhyaḥ dīrghāt sutisi apṛktam hal iti apṛktasya iti eva siddham . aṇiñoḥ lugartham
GS24pmbhasuu:5357: algrahaṇam . aṇiñoḥ lugartham algrahaṇam kartavyam . kim prayojanam . aṇiñoḥ luki
GS24pmbhasuu:5359: ṇyakṣatriyārṣañitaḥ yūni luk aṇiñoḥ iti apṛktasya iti eva siddham . aṇiñoḥ lugartham iti cet ṇe atiprasaṅgaḥ . aṇiñoḥ lugartham iti cet ṇe atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . iha api prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:5360: phāṇṭāhṛteḥ apatyam māṇavakaḥ pḥāṇṭāhṛtaḥ iti . ṇavacanasāmārthyāt na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:5361: . vacanaprāmāṇyāt iti cet phagnivṛttyartham vacanam . vacanaprāmāṇyāt iti cet phagnivṛttyartham etat syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:5362: phak ataḥ mā bhūt iti . pailādiṣu vacanāt siddham . yadi etāvat prayojanam syāt pailādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:5363: eva pāṭham kurvīta . tatra pāṭhāt anyeṣām api phakaḥ nivṛttiḥ bhavati . evam siddhe
GS24pmbhasuu:5364: sati yat ayam ṇam śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na asya luk bhavati iti . tāni etāni
GS24pmbhasuu:5365: trīṇi grahaṇāni bhavanti . apṛktasañjñāyām halgrahaṇam kartavyam . svādilope halaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5366: grahaṇam na kartavyam . aṇiñoḥ luki grahaṇam kartavyam . algrahaṇe api vai kriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:5367: tāni eva trīṇi grahaṇāni bhavanti . apṛktasañjñāyām algrahaṇam kartavyam . svādilope
GS24pmbhasuu:5368: halaḥ grahaṇam kartavyam . aṇiñoḥ luki grahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati . apṛktagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5369: kartavyam . tatra na asti lāghavakṛtaḥ viśeṣaḥ . ayam asti viśeṣaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:5370: algrahaṇe kriyamāṇe ekagrahaṇam na kariṣyate . kasmāt na bhavati darviḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5371: jāgṛviḥ . al eva yaḥ pratyayaḥ . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam
GS24pmbhasuu:5372: gaṃsyate . algrahaṇasāmarthyāt . yadi yaḥ al ca anyaḥ ca tatra syāt algrahaṇam anarthakam
GS24pmbhasuu:5373: syāt . halgrahaṇe api kriyamāṇe ekagrahaṇam na kariṣyate . kasmāt na bhavati darviḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5374: jāgṛviḥ . hal eva yaḥ pratyayaḥ . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam
GS24pmbhasuu:5375: gaṃsyate . halgrahaṇasāmarthyāt . yadi yaḥ hal ca anyaḥ ca tatra syāt halgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5376: anarthakam syāt . asti anyat halgrahaṇasya prayojanam . kim . halantasya yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5377: alantasya mā bhūt iti . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat algrahaṇe kriyamāṇe ekagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5378: karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ anyatra varṇagrahaṇe jātigrahaṇam bhavati iti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:5379: etasya jñāpane prayojanam . dambheḥ halgrahaṇasya jātivācakatvāt siddham iti uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:5382: 62-63 tatpuruṣaḥ samānādhikaraṇaḥ karmadhārayaḥ iti cet samāsaikārthatvāt aprasiddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5383: . tatpuruṣaḥ samānādhikaraṇaḥ karmadhārayaḥ iti cet samāsasya ekārthatvāt sañjñāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5384: aprasiddhiḥ . ekaḥ ayam arthaḥ tatpuruṣaḥ nāma anekārthāśrayam ca sāmānādhikaraṇyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5385: . siddham tu padasāmānādhikaraṇyāt . siddham etat . katham . tatpuruṣaḥ samānādhikaraṇapadaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5386: karmadhārayasañjñaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam
GS24pmbhasuu:5387: eva astu . nanu ca uktam tatpuruṣaḥ samānādhikaraṇaḥ karmadhārayaḥ iti cet samāsaikārthatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5388: aprasiddhiḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ayam tatpuruṣaḥ asti prāthamakalpikaḥ yasmin aikapadyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5389: aikasvaryam ekavibhaktikatvam ca . asti tādarthyāt tācchabdyam ;
GS24pmbhasuu:5390: tatpuruṣārthāni padāni tatpuruṣaḥ iti . tat yaḥ tādarthyāt tācchabdyam tasya iha grahaṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5392: 63-64 prathamānirdiṣṭam samāse upasajanam iti cet anirdeśāt prathamāyāḥ samāse sañjñāprasiddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5393: .prathamānirdiṣṭam samāse upasajanam iti cet anirdeśāt prathamāyāḥ samāse sañjñāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5394: aprasiddhiḥ . na hi kaṣṭādīnām samāse prathamām paśyāmaḥ . siddham tu samāsavidhāne
GS24pmbhasuu:5395: vacanāt . siddham etat . katham . samāsavidhāne prathamānirdiṣṭam upasarjanasañjñam
GS24pmbhasuu:5396: bhavati iti vaktavyam . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vā tādarthyāt tācchabdyam . na vā
GS24pmbhasuu:5397: vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam . tādarthyāt tācchabdyam bhavati. samāsārtham śāstram samāsaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5399: 64-67 yasya vidhau prathamānirdeśaḥ tataḥ anyatra api upasarjanasañjñāprasaṅgaḥ . yasya vidhau prathamānirdeśaḥ kriyate tataḥ anyatra api tasya upasarjanasañjñā prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:5400: rajñaḥ kumārīm rājakumārīm śritaḥ . śritādisamāse dvitīyāntam prathamānirdiṣṭam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5401: tasya ṣaṣṭhīsamāse api upasarjanasañjñā prāpnoti . siddham tu yasya vidhau tam prati
GS24pmbhasuu:5402: iti vacanāt . siddham etat . katham . yasya vidhau yat prathamānirdiṣṭam tam prati
GS24pmbhasuu:5403: tat upasarjanasañjñam bhavati iti vaktavyam . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5404: . upasarjanam iti mahatī sañjñā kriyate . sañjñā ca nāma yataḥ na laghīyaḥ . kutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5405: etat . laghvartham hi sañjñākaraṇam . tatra mahatyāḥ sañjñāyāḥ karaṇe etat prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5406: anvarthasañjñā yathā vijñāyeta . apradhānam upasarjanam iti . pradhānam upasarjanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5407: iti ca sambandhiśabdau etau . tatra sambandhāt etat gantavyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:5408: yam prati yat apradhānam tam prati tat upasarjanasñjñam bhavati iti . atha yatra dve ṣaṣṭhyante kasmāt tatra pradhānasya upasarjanasañjñā na bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:5409: rājñaḥ puruṣasya rājapuruṣasya iti . ṣaṣṭhyantayoḥ upasarjanatve uktam . kim uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:5410: . ṣaṣṭhyantayoḥ samāse arthābhedāt pradhānasya apūrvanipātaḥ iti . evam na ca idam
GS24pmbhasuu:5411: akṛtam bhavet upsarjanam pūrvam iti arthaḥ ca abhinnaḥ iti kṛtvā pradhānasya pūrvanipātaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5412: na bhaviṣyati . yadi api tāvat etat upasarjanakāryam parihṛtam idam aparam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:5413: . rājñaḥ kumāryāḥ rājakumāryāḥ . gostriyoḥ upasarjanasya iti hrasvatvam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:5414: . uktam vā . kim uktam . paravat liṅgam iti śabdaśabdārthau iti . tatra aupadeśikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5417: 67-68 dvitīyādīnām api anena upasarjanasañjñā prāpnoti . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . tatra apūrvanipāte iti pratiṣedhaḥ prasajyeta . na apratiṣedhāt . na ayam prasajyapratiṣedhaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:5418: pūrvanipāte na iti . kim tarhi . paryudāsaḥ ayam :
GS24pmbhasuu:5419: yat anyat pūrvanipātāt iti . pūrvanipāte avyāpāraḥ . yadi kena cit prāpnoti tena
GS24pmbhasuu:5420: bhaviṣyati . pūrveṇa ca prāpnoti . tena bhaviṣyati . aprāpteḥ vā . atha vā anantarā
GS24pmbhasuu:5421: yā prāptiḥ sā pratiṣidhyate . kutaḥ etat . anantarasya vidhiḥ vā bhavati pratiṣedhaḥ vā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5423: 68 ekavibhaktau aṣaṣṭhyantavacanam . ekavibhaktau aṣaṣṭhyantānām iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt :
GS24pmbhasuu:5424: ardham pippalyāḥ ardhapippalī iti . uktam vā . kim uktam . paravat liṅgam iti śabdaśardārthau iti . tatra aupadeśikasya hrasvatvam . ātideśikasya śravaṇam bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5426: 68 kāni punaḥ asya yogasya prayojanāni . prayojanam dviguprāptāpannālampūrvopasargāḥ ktārthe . dviguḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:5428: prāptaḥ jivikām prāptajīvikaḥ . āpannaḥ jīvikām āpannajīvikaḥ . alampūrva :
GS24pmbhasuu:5433: varṇānām ca mā bhūt iti . kim ca syāt . vanam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5434: dhanam iti nalopaḥ prātipadikāntasya iti nalopaḥ prasajyeta . adhātuḥ iti kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:5435: . ahan vṛtram iti . adhātuḥ iti śakyam akartum . kasmāt na bhavati ahan vṛtram iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5436: . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na dhātoḥ prātipadikasañjñā bhavati iti yat ayam supaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5437: dhātuprātipadikayoḥ iti dhātugrahaṇam karoti . na etat asti jñāpakam . pratiṣiddhārtham etat syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:5438: api kākaḥ śyenāyate iti . apratyayaḥ iti kimartham . kāṇḍe kuḍye . apratyayaḥ iti śakyam akartum . kasmāt na bhavati kāṇḍe kuḍye* iti . kṛttaddhitagrahaṇam niyamārtham bhaviṣyati :
GS24pmbhasuu:5439: kṛttaddhitāntasya eva pratyayāntasya prātipadikasañjñā bhavati na anyasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5441: 71-77 arthavati anekapadaprasaṅgaḥ . arthavati prātipadikasañjñāyām anekasya api padasya prātipadikasañjñā prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:5442: daśa dāḍimāni ṣaṭ apūpāḥ kuṇḍam ajājinam palalapiṇḍaḥ adhorukam etat kumāryāḥ sphaiyakṛtasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5443: pitā pratiśīnaḥ iti . samudāyaḥ anarthakaḥ . samudāyaḥ anarthakaḥ iti cet avayavārthavattvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5444: samudāyārthavattvam yathā loke . samudāyaḥ anarthakaḥ iti cet avayavaiḥ arthavadbhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5445: samudāyāḥ api arthavantaḥ bhavanti yathā loke . tat yathā loke āḍhyam idam nagaram ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5446: gomat idam nagaram iti ucyate na ca tatra sarve āḍhyāḥ bhavanti sarve vā gomantaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5447: . yathā loke iti ucyate loke ca avayavāḥ eva arthavantaḥ na samudāyaḥ . ātaḥ ca avayavāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5448: eva arthavantaḥ na samudāyaḥ . yasya hi tat dravyam bhavati saḥ tena kāryam karoti
GS24pmbhasuu:5449: yasya ca gāvaḥ santi saḥ tāsām kṣīram ghṛtam ca upabhuṅkte . anyaiḥ etat draṣṭum
GS24pmbhasuu:5450: api aśakyam . kā tarhi iyam vācoyuktiḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:5452: gomat idam iti . eṣā eṣā vācoyuktiḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:5453: iha tāvat āḍhyam idam nagaram iti akāraḥ matvarthīyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:5454: āḍhyāḥ asmin santi iti tat idam āḍhyam iti . gomat idam iti matvantāt matvarthīyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5455: lupyate . evam api vākyapratiṣedhaḥ arthavattvāt . vākyasya prātipadikasñjñāyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:5456: devadatta gām abhyāja śuklām . devadatta gām abhyāja kṛṣṇām iti . kim kāraṇam . arthavattvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5457: . arthavat hi etat vākyam bhavati . na vai padārthāt anyasya arthasya upalabdhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5458: bhavati vākye . padārthāt anyasya anupalabdhiḥ iti cet padārthābhisambandhasya upalabdhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5459: . padārthāt anyasya anupalabdhiḥ iti cet evam ucyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:5460: padārthābhisambandhasya upalabdhiḥ bhavati vākye . iha devadatta iti ukte kartā nirdiṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5461: karma kriyāguṇau ca anirdiṣṭau . gām iti ukte karma nirdiṣṭam kartā kriyāguṇau ca
GS24pmbhasuu:5462: anirdiṣṭau . abhyāja iti ukte kriyā nirdiṣṭā kartṛkarmaṇī guṇaḥ ca anirdiṣṭaḥ . śuklām
GS24pmbhasuu:5463: iti ukte guṇaḥ nirdiṣṭaḥ kartṛkarmaṇī kriyā ca anirdiṣṭā . iha idānīm devadatta gām
GS24pmbhasuu:5464: abhyāja śuklām iti ukte sarvam nirdiṣṭam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:5465: devadattaḥ eva kartā na anyaḥ . gauḥ eva karma na anyat . abhyājiḥ eva kriyā na anyā
GS24pmbhasuu:5466: . śuklām eva na kṛṣṇām iti . eteṣām padānām sāmānye vartamānānām yadviśeṣe avasthānam
GS24pmbhasuu:5467: saḥ vākyārthaḥ . tasmāt pratiṣedhaḥ . tasmāt pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5470: samāsaḥ eva arthavatām samudāyāyānām prātipadikasañjñaḥ bhavati na anyaḥ iti . yadi niyamaḥ kriyate prakṛtipratyayasamudāyasya prātipadikasañjñā na prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:5472: uccakaiḥ iti . kim punaḥ atra prātipadikasañjñayā prārthyate . prātipadikāt iti svādyutpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5473: yathā syāt . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yathā eva atra aprātipadikatvāt svādyutpattiḥ na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5474: evam luk api na bhaviṣyati . tatra yā eva antarvartinī vibhaktiḥ tasyāḥ eva śravaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5475: bhaviṣyati . na evam śakyam . svare hi doṣaḥ syāt . bahupaṭavaḥ iti evam svaraḥ prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:5476: bahupaṭavaḥ iti ca iṣyate . paṭhiṣyati hi ācāryaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:5477: citaḥ saprakṛteḥ bahvakajartham iti . tasyām punaḥ luptāyam yā anyā vibhaktiḥ utpadyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5478: tasyāḥ prakṛtyanekadeśatvāt antodāttatvam na bhaviṣyati . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5479: jñāpayati bhavati prakṛtipratyayasamudāyasya prātipadikasañjñā iti yat ayam aprayayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5480: iti pratiṣedham śāsti . saḥ ca tadantapratiṣedhaḥ . saḥ tarhi jñāpakārthaḥ pratyayapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5481: vaktavyaḥ . nanu ca ayam prāptyarthaḥ api vaktavyaḥ . na arthaḥ prāptyarthena . kṛttaddhitagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5483: kṛttaddhitāntasya eva pratyayāntasya prātipadikasañjñā bhaviṣyati na anyasya pratyayāntasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5484: iti . saḥ eṣaḥ ananyārthaḥ pratyayapratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ prakṛtipratyayasamudāyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5485: vā prātipadikasañjñā vaktavyā . ubhayam na vaktavyam . tulyajātīyasya niyamaḥ . kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5486: ca tulyajātīyaḥ . yathājātīyakānām samāsaḥ . kathañjātīyakānām samāsaḥ . subantānām
GS24pmbhasuu:5487: . suptiṅsamudāyasya tarhi prātipadikasañjñā prāpnoti . suptiṅsamudāyasya prātipadikasañjñā ārabhyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:5488: jahi karmaṇā bahulam ābhīkṣṇye kartāram ca abhidadhāti iti . tat niyamārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:5490: etasya eva suptiṅsamudāyasya prātipadikasañjñā bhavati na anyasya iti . tiṅsamudāyasya tarhi prātipadikasañjñā prāpnoti . tiṅsamudāyasya api prātipadikasañjñā ārabhyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:5491: ākhyātam ākhyātena kriyāsātatye iti . tat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati :
GS24pmbhasuu:5492: etasya eva tiṅsamudāyasya prātipadikasañjñā bhavati na anyasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5494: 77-79 arthavattā na upapadyate kevalena avacanāt . arthavattā na upapadyate vṛkṣaśabdasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5495: . kim kāraṇam . kevalena avacanāt . na kevalena vṛkṣaśabdena arthaḥ gamyate . kena
GS24pmbhasuu:5496: tarhi . sapratyayakena . na vā pratyayena nityasambandhāt kevalasya aprayogaḥ . na
GS24pmbhasuu:5497: vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . pratyayena nityasambandhāt . nityasambandhau etau arthau
GS24pmbhasuu:5498: prakṛtiḥ pratyayaḥ iti . pratyayena nityasambandhāt kevalasya aprayogaḥ na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:5499: . anyat bhavān pṛṣṭaḥ anyat ācaṣṭe . āmrān pṛṣṭaḥ kovidārān ācaṣṭe . arthavattā na
GS24pmbhasuu:5500: upapadyate kevalena avacanāt iti bhavān asmābhiḥ coditaḥ kevalasya aprayoge hetum
GS24pmbhasuu:5501: āha . evam ca kila nāma kṛtvā codyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:5502: samudāyasya arthe prayogāt avayavānām aprasiddhiḥ iti . siddham tu anvayavyatirekābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:5503: . siddham etat . katham . anvayāt vyatirekāt ca . kaḥ asau anvayaḥ vyatirekaḥ vā
GS24pmbhasuu:5504: . iha vṛkṣaḥ iti ukte kaḥ cit śabdaḥ śrūyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:5505: vṛkṣaśabdaḥ akārāntaḥ sakārāntaḥ ca pratyayaḥ . arthaḥ api kaḥ cit gamyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:5506: mūlaskandhaphalapalāśavān ekatvam ca . vṛkṣau iti ukte kaḥ cit śabdaḥ hīyate kaḥ cit upajāyate kaḥ cit anvayī :
GS24pmbhasuu:5508: aukāraḥ upajāyate vṛkṣaśabdaḥ akārāntaḥ anvayī . arthaḥ api kaḥ cit hīyate kaḥ cit upajāyate kaḥ cit anvayī :
GS24pmbhasuu:5509: ekatvam hīyate dvitvam upajāyate mūlaskandhaphalapalāśavān anvayī . te manyāmahe :
GS24pmbhasuu:5510: yaḥ śabdaḥ hīyate tasya asau arthaḥ yaḥ arthaḥ hīyate . yaḥ śabdaḥ upajāyate tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5511: asau arthaḥ yaḥ arthaḥ upajāyate . yaḥ śabdaḥ anvayī tasya asau arthaḥ yaḥ arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5512: anvayī. viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . bahavaḥ hi śabdāḥ ekārthāḥ bhavanti . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:5514: kanduḥ koṣṭhaḥ kuśūlaḥ iti . ekaḥ ca śabdaḥ bahvarthaḥ . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:5515: akṣāḥ pādāḥ māṣāḥ iti . ataḥ kim na sādhīyaḥ arthavattā siddhā bhavati . na brūmaḥ arthavattā na sidhyati iti .varṇitā arthavattā anvayavyatirekābhyām eva . tatra kutaḥ etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:5516: ayam prakṛtyarthaḥ ayam pratyayārthaḥ iti na punaḥ prakṛtiḥ eva ubhau arthau brūyāt

GS24pmbhasuu:5532: tatsamudāyaḥ ca vardhatikam samarthaḥ . ekaḥ ca balvajaḥ bandhane asamarthaḥ tatsamudāyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5533: ca rajjuḥ samarthā bhavati . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . bhavati hi tatra yā ca yāvatī ca
GS24pmbhasuu:5534: arthamātrā . bhavati hi kim cit prati ekaḥ tantuḥ tvaktrāṇe samarthaḥ ekaḥ ca taṇḍulaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5535: kṣutpratighāte samarthaḥ ekaḥ ca balvajaḥ bandhane samarthaḥ . ime punaḥ varṇāḥ atyantāya
GS24pmbhasuu:5536: eva anarthakāḥ . yathā tarhi rathāṅgāni vihṛtāni pratyekam vrajikriyām prati asamarthāni
GS24pmbhasuu:5537: bhavanti tatsamudāyaḥ ca rathaḥ samarthaḥ evam eṣām varṇānām samudāyāḥ arthavantaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5540: 81-82 nipātasya anarthakasya prātipadikatvam . nipātasya anarthakasya prātipadikasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:5541: vaktavyā . khañjati nikhañjati lambate pralambate . kim punaḥ atra prātipadikasañjñayā

GS24pmbhasuu:5548: vā prakṛtārthān apekṣya niyamaḥ . ke ca prakṛtāḥ . ekatvādayaḥ . ekasmin eva arthe

GS24pmbhasuu:5556: pratyayaḥ na iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . apratyayaḥ iti cet tibekādeśe pratiṣedhaḥ antavattvāt . apratyayaḥ iti cet tibekādeśe pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5557: kāṇḍe kuḍye . kim kāraṇam . antavattvāt . tibatipoḥ ekādeśaḥ atipaḥ antavat syāt . asti anyat tipaḥ iti kṛtvā prātipadikasañjñā prāpnoti . astu tarhi prasajyapratiṣedhaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:5558: pratyayaḥ na iti . na pratyayaḥ iti cet ūṅekādeśe pratiṣedhaḥ ādivattvāt . na pratyayaḥ iti cet ūṅekādeśe pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:5559: brahmabandhūḥ . kim kāraṇam . ādivattvāt . pratyayāpratyayayoḥ pratyayasya ādivat
GS24pmbhasuu:5560: syāt . tatra pratyayaḥ na iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5561: jñāpayati utpadyante ūṅantāt svādayaḥ iti yat ayam na ūṅdhātvoḥ iti vibhaktisvarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5562: pratiṣedham śāśti . atha vā dve hi atra prātipadikasañjñe :
GS24pmbhasuu:5563: avayavasya api samudāyasya api . tatra avayavasya yā prātipadikasañjñā tayā antavadbhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5564: svādyutpattiḥ bhaviṣyati . sublope ca pratyayalakṣaṇatvāt . sublope ca pratyayalakṣaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:5566: rājā takṣā . pratyayalakṣaṇena pratyayaḥ na iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5567: . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na pratyayalakṣaṇena pratiṣedhaḥ bhavati iti yat ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:5568: na ṅisambuddhyoḥ iti pratiṣedham śāsti . atha vā punaḥ astu paryudāsaḥ . nanu ca uktam :
GS24pmbhasuu:5569: apratyayaḥ iti cet tibekādeśe pratiṣedhaḥ antavattvāt iti . prasajyapratiṣedhe api eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . dve hi atra prātipadikasañjñe :
GS24pmbhasuu:5570: avayavasya api samudāyasya api . gṛhyate ca prātipadikāprātipadikayoḥ ekādeśaḥ prātipadikagrahaṇena . tasmāt ubhābhyām api vaktavyam syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:5571: hrasvaḥ napuṃsake yat tasya iti . kim ca napuṃsake . napuṃsakam yasya guṇaḥ . kasya ca napuṃsakam guṇaḥ . prātipadikasya .
GS24pmbhasuu:5573: 85 samāsagrahaṇam kimartham . samāsagrahaṇe uktam . kim uktam . arthavatsamudāyānām samāsagrahaṇam niyamārtham iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5576: . napuṃsakahrasvatve prātipadikagrahaṇam kriyate tibnivṛttyartham . tibantasya hrasvatvam mā bhūt :

GS24pmbhasuu:5579: na atra avyayam napuṃsake vartate . kim tarhi . adhikaraṇam atra avyayam napuṃsakasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5582: kuḍyībhūtam vṛṣalakulam iti . na vā liṅgābhāvāt . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5583: liṅgābhāvāt . aliṅgam avyayam . kim punaḥ ayam avyayasya eva parihāraḥ āhosvit tibantasya

GS24pmbhasuu:5587: hiruk pṛthak iti kriyāpradhānam . tibantam ca api kim cit vibhaktyarthapradhānam kim cit kriyāpradhānam . kāṇḍe kuḍye* iti vibhaktarthyapradhānam

GS24pmbhasuu:5590: ca prātipadikāprātipadikayoḥ ekādeśaḥ prātipadikagrahaṇena . tasmāt ubhābhyām api vaktavyam syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:5591: hrasvaḥ napuṃsake yat tasya iti . kim ca napuṃsake . napuṃsakam yasya guṇaḥ . kasya ca napuṃsakam guṇaḥ . prātipadikasya .

GS24pmbhasuu:5601: 89-94 goṭāṅgrahaṇam kṛnnivṛttyartham . goṭāṅgrahaṇam kartavyam . kim idam ṭāṅ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5602: . pratyāhāragrahaṇam . kva sanniviṣṭānām pratyāhāraḥ . ṭāpaḥ prabhṛti ā ṣyaṅaḥ ṅakārāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5603: . kim prayojanam . kṛnnivṛttyartham . kṛtstriyāḥ dhātustriyāḥ ca hrasvatvam mā bhūt iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:5606: atilakṣmīḥ iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . strīgrahaṇam svaryate . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:5607: svaritena adhikāragatiḥ bhavati . striyām iti evam prakṛtya ye vihitāḥ teṣām grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5608: vijñāsyate . svaritena adhikāragatiḥ bhavati iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . yadi evam pratyayagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5609: idam bhavati . tatra pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ tadādeḥ grahaṇam bhavati iti iha na prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:5611: atisenānīkumāriḥ iti . astrīpratyayena iti evam tat . īyasaḥ bahuvrīhau puṃvadvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5612: . īyasaḥ bahuvrīhau puṃvadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . bahvyaḥ śreyasyaḥ asya bahuśreyasī vidyamānaśreyasī
GS24pmbhasuu:5613: . pūrvapadasya ca pratiṣedhaḥ gosamāsanivṛttyartham . pūrvapadasya ca pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5614: vaktavyaḥ . kim prayojanam . gosamāsanivṛttyartham . gonivṛttyartham samāsanivṛttyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:5619: senānīkumārīputraḥ iti . kim ucyate samāsanivṛttyartham iti na punaḥ asamāsaḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:5620: kim cit pūrvapadam yadarthaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ syāt . stryantasya prātipadikasya upasarjanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5621: hrasvaḥ bhavati iti ucyate na ca antareṇa samāsam stryantam prātipadikam upasarjanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5624: mālāpādaḥ iti . ekādeśe kṛte antādivadbhāvāt prāpnoti . ubhayataḥ āśraye na antādivat
GS24pmbhasuu:5625: . gonivṛttyarthena tāvat na arthaḥ . gontasya prātipadikasya upasarjanasya hrasvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5626: bhavati iti ucyate na ca etat gontam . nanu ca etat api vyapadeśivadbhāvena gontam
GS24pmbhasuu:5627: . vyapadeśivadbhāvaḥ aprātipadikena . samāsanivṛttyarthena ca api na arthaḥ . stryantasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5628: prātipadikasya upasarjanasya hrasvaḥ bhavati iti ucyate . pradhānam upasarjanam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5629: ca sambandhiśabdau etau . tatra sambandhāt etat gantavyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:5630: yam prati yat apradhānam tasya cet saḥ antaḥ bhavati iti . avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam . ucyamāne api hi pratiṣedhe iha prasajyeta :
GS24pmbhasuu:5632: daśakumārīpriyaḥ iti . kapi ca . kapi ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:5634: bahuvṛṣalīkaḥ . dvandve ca . dvandve ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:5635: kukkuṭamayūryau . uktam vā . kim uktam . kapi tāvat uktam :
GS24pmbhasuu:5636: na kapi iti pratiṣedhaḥ iti . na etat asti uktam . ke aṇaḥ iti yā hrasvaprāptiḥ tasyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5637: pratiṣedhaḥ . kutaḥ etat . anantarasya vidhiḥ vā bhavati pratiṣedhaḥ vā iti . avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5638: ca etat evam vijñeyam . yaḥ hi manyate yā ca yāvatīca hrasvaprāptiḥ tasyāḥ sarvasyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5639: pratiṣedhaḥ iti iha api tasya pratiṣedhaḥ prasajyeta :
GS24pmbhasuu:5640: priyam grāmaṇi brāhmaṇakulam asya priyagrāmaṇikaḥ . idam tarhi uktam :
GS24pmbhasuu:5641: kapi kṛte anantyatvāt hrasvatvam na bhaviṣyati . idam iha sampradhāryam :
GS24pmbhasuu:5642: kap kriyatām hrasvatvam iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt kap . antaraṅgam hrasvatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:5643: . antaraṅgataraḥ kap . nanu ca ayam kap samāsāntaḥ ici ucyate . tādarthyāt tācchabdyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5644: bhaviṣyati . yeṣām padānām samāsaḥ na tāvat teṣām anyat bhavati . kapam tāvat pratīkṣate
GS24pmbhasuu:5645: . dvandve api uktam . kim uktam . paravat liṅgam iti śabdaśabdārthau iti . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:5648: 95 taddhitaluki avantyādīnām pratiṣedhaḥ . taddhitaluki avantyādīnām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:5649: avantī kuntī kurūḥ . taddhitaluki avantyādīnām apratiṣedhaḥ alukparatvāt . taddhitaluki
GS24pmbhasuu:5650: avantyādīnām apratiṣedhaḥ . anarthakaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ . luk kasmāt na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5651: . alukparatvāt . luki iti ucyate . na ca atra lukam paśyāmaḥ . luki iti na eṣā parasaptamī
GS24pmbhasuu:5652: śakyā vijñātum . na hi lukā paurvāparyam asti . kā tarhi . satsaptamī :
GS24pmbhasuu:5653: luki sati iti . satsaptamī cet prāpnoti . evam tarhi idam iha vyapadeśyam sat ācāryaḥ na vyapadiśati . kim . upasarjanasya iti vartate . na ca jātiḥ upasarjanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5655: 96-98 it goṇyāḥ na iti vaktavyam . goṇyāḥ na iti eva vaktavyam . na arthaḥ ittvena . kā rūpasiddhiḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:5657: daśagoṇiḥ . hrasvatā hi vidhīyate . hrasvatvam atra vidhīyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:5658: gostriyoḥ upasarjanasya iti . iti vā vacane tāvat . it iti vā ucyeta na iti vā kaḥ nu atra viśeṣaḥ . mātrārtham vā kṛtam bhavet . atha vā mātrārtham idam vaktavyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:5660: goṇyāḥ ittvam prakaraṇāt . aśiṣyam goṇyāḥ ittvam . kim kāraṇam . prakaraṇāt . prakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:5661: hrasvatvam . hrasvaḥ iti vartate . nanu sūcyāḥ . sūcyādyartham atha api vā . sūcyādyartham idam draṣṭavyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:5663: daśasūcīḥ . it goṇyāḥ na iti vaktavyam hrasvatā hi vidhīyate /
GS24pmbhasuu:5664: iti vā vacane tāvat . mātrārtham vā kṛtam bhavet //
GS24pmbhasuu:5665: goṇyāḥ ittvam prakaraṇāt . sūcyādyartham atha api vā .
GS24pmbhasuu:5667: 98-100 vyaktivacane iti kimartham . śirīṣāṇām adūrabhavaḥ grāmaḥ śirīṣāḥ . tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5668: grāmasya vanam śirīṣavanam . kim ca syāt . vibhāṣā oṣadhivanaspatibhyaḥ iti ṇatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:5670: kaṭubadaryāḥ adūrabhavaḥ grāmaḥ kaṭubadarī . ṣaṣṭhī yuktavadbhāvena mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5671: atha vyaktivacane iti api ucyamāne kasmāt eva atra na bhavati . ṣaṣṭhī api hi vacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5672: . na idam pāribhāṣikasya vacanasya grahaṇam . kim tarhi . anvarthagrahaṇam :
GS24pmbhasuu:5673: ucyate vacanam iti . evam api ṣaṣṭhī prāpnoti . ṣaṣṭhī api hi ucyate . lupā uktatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5674: tasya arthasya dvitīyasya prayogeṇa na bhavitavyam uktārthānām aprayogaḥ iti . ātideśikī
GS24pmbhasuu:5675: tarhi prāpnoti . evam tarhi prāk api vṛtteḥ yuktam vṛttam ca api . iha yāvatā yuktam
GS24pmbhasuu:5676: vaktuḥ ca kāmacāraḥ prāk vṛtteḥ liṅgasaṅkhye ye . prāk api vṛtteḥ yuktam vanaspatibhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5677: nagaram vṛttam ca api yuktam vanaspatibhiḥ nagaram . vṛtte ca yuktavadbhāvaḥ vidhīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5678: . kāmacāraḥ ca prayoktuḥ prāk vṛtteḥ ye liṅgasaṅkhye te* atideṣṭum vṛttasya vā ye
GS24pmbhasuu:5679: liṅgasaṅkhye . yāvatā kārmacāraḥ vṛttasya ye liṅgasaṅkhye te* atidiśyete na prāk vṛtteḥ ye .
GS24pmbhasuu:5681: 100-102 kimartham punaḥ idam ucyate . anyatra abhidheyavyaktivacanabhāvāt lupi yuktavadanudeśaḥ . anyatra abhidheyavat liṅgavacanāni bhavanti . kva anyatra . luki :
GS24pmbhasuu:5684: lavaṇam śākam iti . anyatra abhidheyavat liṅgavacanāni bhavanti luki. iha api anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:5685: abhidheyavat liṅgavacanāni prāpnuvanti . iṣyante ca abhidhānavat syuḥ iti . tat ca
GS24pmbhasuu:5686: antareṇa yatnam na sidhyati iti lupi yuktavadanudeśaḥ . evamartham idam ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:5687: asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . lupaḥ adarśanasañjñitvāt arthagatiḥ na upapadyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5688: . lup nāma iyam adarśanasya sañjñā kriyate . na ca adarśanasya liṅgasaṅkhye śakyete*
GS24pmbhasuu:5689: atideṣṭum . lupaḥ adarśanasañjñitvāt arthagatiḥ na upapadyate . na vā adarśanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5690: aśakyatvāt arthagatiḥ sāhacaryāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . adarśanasya aśakyatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5691: . adarśanasya liṅgasaṅkhye* aśakye* atideṣṭum iti kṛtvā adarśanasahacaritaḥ yaḥ arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5692: tasya gatiḥ bhaviṣyati sāhacaryāt . yogābhāvāt ca anyasya . adarśanena ca yogaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:5693: asti iti kṛtvā adarśanasahacaritaḥ yaḥ arthaḥ tasya gatiḥ bhaviṣyati sāhacaryāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:5695: 102 samāse uttarapadasya bahuvacanasya lupaḥ . samāse uttarapadasya bahuvacanasya lupaḥ yuktavadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:5696: madhurāpañcālāḥ . kim prayojanam . niyamārtham . samāse uttarapadasya eva . kva mā bhūt . pañcālamadhure* iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5699: jātiḥ yat viśeṣaṇam iti āhosvit jāteḥ yāni viśeṣaṇāni iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5700: jātiḥ yat viśeṣaṇam iti siddham pañcālāḥ janapadaḥ iti . subhikṣaḥ sampannapānīyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5701: bahumālyaphalaḥ iti na sidhyati . atha vijñāyate jāteḥ yāni viśeṣaṇāni iti siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:5702: subhikṣaḥ sampannapānīyaḥ bahumālyaphalaḥ iti . pañcālāḥ janapadaḥ iti na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:5703: . evam tarhi na evam vijñāyate jātiḥ yat viśeṣaṇam iti na api jāteḥ yāni viśeṣaṇāni
GS24pmbhasuu:5704: iti . katham tarhi . viśeṣaṇānām yuktavadbhāvaḥ bhavati ā jātiprayogāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:5706: 103-104 kimartham punaḥ idam ucyate . viśeṣaṇānām vacanam jātinivṛttyartham . jātinivṛttyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5707: ayam ārambhaḥ . kim ucyate jātinivṛttyarthaḥ iti na punaḥ viśeṣaṇānām api yuktavadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5708: yathā syāt iti . samānādhikaraṇatvāt siddham . samānādhikaraṇatvāt viśeṣaṇānām yuktavadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5709: bhaviṣyati . yadi evam na arthaḥ anena . lupaḥ anyatra api jāteḥ yuktavadbhāvaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:5710: bhavati . kva anyatra . badarī sūkṣmakaṇṭakā madhurā vṛkṣaḥ iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5711: anyatra api jāteḥ yuktavadbhāvaḥ na bhavati . āviṣṭaliṅgā jātiḥ yat liṅgam upādāya
GS24pmbhasuu:5712: pravartate utpattiprabhṛti ā vināśāt na tat liṅgam jahāti . na tarhi idānīm ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:5713: yogaḥ vaktavyaḥ . vaktavyaḥ ca . kim prayojanam . idam tatra tatra ucyate guṇavacanānām
GS24pmbhasuu:5714: śabdānām āśrayataḥ liṅgavacanāni bhavanti iti . tat anena kriyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:5716: 104-105 harītakyādiṣu vyaktiḥ . harītakyādiṣu vyaktiḥ bhavati yuktavadbhāvena :
GS24pmbhasuu:5717: harītakyāḥ phalāni harītakyaḥ phalāni . khalatikādiṣu vacanam . khalatikādiṣu vacanam bhavati yuktavadbhāvena :
GS24pmbhasuu:5718: khalatikasya parvatasya adūrabhavāni vanāni khalatikam vanāni . manuṣyalupi pratiṣedhaḥ . manuṣyalupi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:5722: 106 kim yāḥ etāḥ kṛtrimāḥ ṭighubhādisañjñāḥ tatprāmāṇyāt aśiṣyam . na iti āha . sañjñānam sañjñā .
GS24pmbhasuu:5724: 106-109 idam ayuktam vartate . kim atra ayuktam . bahavaḥ te arthāḥ . tatra yuktam
GS24pmbhasuu:5725: bahuvacanam . tat yat ekavacane śāsitavye bahuvacanam śiṣyate etat ayuktam . bahuṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:5726: ekavacanam iti nāma vaktavyam . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati :
GS24pmbhasuu:5727: jātyākhyāyām sāmānyābhidhānāt aikārthyam . jātyākhyāyām sāmānyābhidhānāt aikārthyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5728: bhaviṣyati . yat tat vrīhau vrīhitvam yave yavatvam gārgye gārgyatvam tat ekam tac
GS24pmbhasuu:5729: ca vivakṣitam . tasya ekatvāt ekavacanam eva prāpnoti . iṣyate ca bahuvacanam syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5730: iti . tat ca antareṇa yatnam na sidhyati iti jātyākhyāyam ekasmin bahuvacanam . evamartham
GS24pmbhasuu:5731: idam ucyate . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . tatra ekavacanādeśe uktam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5732: kim uktam . vrīhibhyaḥ āgataḥ iti atra gheḥ ṅiti iti guṇaḥ prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5733: doṣaḥ . arthātideśāt siddham . arthātideśaḥ ayam . na idam pāribhāṣikasya vacanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5735: ucyate vacanam . bahūnām arthānām vacanam bahuvacanam iti . yāvat brūyāt ekaḥ arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5736: bahuvat bhavati iti tāvat ekasmin bahuvacanam iti . saṅkhyāprayoge pratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5737: saṅkhyāprayoge pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . ekaḥ vrīhiḥ sampannaḥ subhikṣam karoti . asmadaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5738: nāmayuvapratyayayoḥ ca . asmadaḥ nāmaprayoge yuvapratyayaprayoge ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . nāmaprayoge :
GS24pmbhasuu:5739: aham devadattaḥ bravīmi . aham yajñadattaḥ bravīmi . yuvapratyayaprayoge :
GS24pmbhasuu:5740: ahaṃ gārgyāyaṇaḥ bravīmi . aham vātsyāyanaḥ bravīmi . yuvagrahaṇena nārthaḥ . asmadaḥ nāmapratyayaprayoge na iti eva . idam api siddham bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5741: aham gārgyaḥ bravīmi . aham vātsyaḥ bravīmi . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:5742: asmadaḥ saviśeṣaṇasya prayoge na iti eva . idam api siddham bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:5743: aham paṭuḥ bravīmi . aham paṇḍitaḥ bravīmi . aśiṣyam vā bahuvat pṛthakttvābhidhānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5744: . aśiṣyaḥ vā bahuvadbhāvaḥ . kim kāraṇam . pṛthaktvābhidhānāt . pṛthaktvena hi dravyāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:5745: abhidhīyante . bahavaḥ te arthāḥ . tatra yuktam bahuvacanam . kim ucyate pṛthaktvābhidhānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5747: jātyākhyāyām sāmānyābhidhānāt aikārthyam iti . jātiśabdena hi dravyābhidhānam . jātiśabdena
GS24pmbhasuu:5748: hi dravyam api abhidhīyate jātiḥ api . katham punaḥ jñāyate jātiśabdena dravyam api
GS24pmbhasuu:5749: abhidhīyate iti . evam hi kaḥ cit mahati gomaṇḍale gopālakam āsīnam pṛcchati :
GS24pmbhasuu:5750: asti atra kām cid gām paśyasi iti . saḥ paśyati :
GS24pmbhasuu:5751: paśyati ca ayam gāḥ pṛcchati ca kām cid atra gām paśyasi iti . nūnam asya dravyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5752: vivakṣitam iti . tat yadā dravyābhidhānam tadā bahuvacanam bhaviṣyati . yadā sāmānyābhidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:5755: 109-110 ayam api yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum . katham aham bravīmi ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5757: vayam brūmaḥ . imāni indriyāṇi kadā cit svātantryeṇa vivakṣitāni bhavanti . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:5758: idam me akṣi suṣṭhu paśyati . ayam me karṇaḥ suṣṭhu śṛṇoti iti . kadā cit pāratantryeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:5759: anena akṣṇā suṣṭhu paśyāmi . anena karṇena suṣṭhu śṛṇomi iti . tat yadā svātantryeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:5760: vivakṣā tadā bahuvacanam bhaviṣyati . yadā pāratantryeṇa tadā ekavacanadvivacane bhaviṣyataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5762: 110 ayam api yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum . katham udite pūrve phalgunyau ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5765: uditāḥ pūrvāḥ proṣṭhapadāḥ . phalgunīsampīpagate candramasi phalgunīśabdaḥ vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:5766: . bahavaḥ te arthāḥ . tatra yuktam bahuvacanam . yadā tayoḥ eva abhidhānam tadā dvivacanam bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5768: 110 imau api yogau śakyau avaktum . katham . punarvasuviśākhayoḥ supām sulukpūrvasavarṇa iti siddham . punarvasuviśākhayoḥ supām sulukpūrvasavarṇa iti eva siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:5769: (P_1,2.63) KA_I,231.14-232.7 Ro_110-113 tiṣyapunarvasvoḥ iti kimartham . kṛttikārohiṇyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5770: . nakṣatra iti kimartham . tiṣyaḥ ca māṇavakaḥ punarvasū maṇavakau tiṣyapunarvasavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5771: . atha nakṣatre iti vartamāne punaḥ nakṣatragrahaṇam kimartham . ayam tiṣyapunarvasuśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5772: asti eva jyotiṣi vartate . asti ca kālavācī . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:5773: bahavaḥ tiṣyapunarvasavaḥ atikrāntāḥ . katareṇa tiṣyeṇa gataḥ iti . tat yaḥ jyotiṣi
GS24pmbhasuu:5774: vartate tasya idam grahaṇam . atha vā nakṣatre iti vartamāne punaḥ nakṣatragrahaṇasya etat prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:5775: videśastham api tiṣyapunarvasvoḥ kāryam tat api nakṣatrasya eva yathā syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:5776: tiṣyapuṣyayoḥ nakṣatrāṇi yalopaḥ vaktavyaḥ iti nakṣatragrahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati . atha vā atha vā nakṣatre iti vartamāne punaḥ nakṣatra grahaṇasya etat prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:5778: puṣyapunarvasū sidhyapunarvasū . atha dvandve iti kimartham . yaḥ tiṣyaḥ tau punarvasū
GS24pmbhasuu:5779: yeṣām te ime tiṣyapunarvasavaḥ unmugdhāḥ . bahuvacanasya iti kimartham . uditam tiṣyapunarvasū
GS24pmbhasuu:5780: . katham ca atra ekavacanam . jātidvandvaḥ ekavat bhavati iti . aprāṇinām iti pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5781: prāpnoti . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat bahuvacanagrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:5782: sarvaḥ dvandvaḥ vibhāṣā ekavat bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . bābhravaśālaṅkāyanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5783: bābhravaśālaṅkāyanāḥ iti etat siddham bhavati . atha vā na atra bhavantaḥ prāṇināḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5786: 114-116 rūpagrahaṇam kimartham . samānānām ekaśeṣa ekavibhaktau iti iyati ucyamāne yatra eva sarvam samānam śabdaḥ arthaḥ ca tatra eva syāt : vṛkṣāḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5787: plakṣāḥ iti . iha na syāt : akṣāḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5789: māṣāḥ iti . rūpagrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ bhavati . rūpam nimittatvena āśrīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5790: śrutau ca rūpagrahaṇam . atha ekagrahaṇam kimartham . sarūpāṇām śeṣaḥ ekavibhaktau
GS24pmbhasuu:5791: iti iyati ucyamāne dvibahvoḥ api śeṣaḥ prasajyeta . ekagrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na
GS24pmbhasuu:5792: doṣaḥ bhavati . atha śeṣagrahaṇam kimartham . sarūpāṇām ekaḥ ekavibhaktau iti iyati
GS24pmbhasuu:5793: ucyamāne ādeśaḥ ayam vijñāyeta . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . aśvaḥ ca asvaḥ ca aśvau :
GS24pmbhasuu:5794: āntaryataḥ dvyudāttavataḥ sthāninaḥ dvyudāttavān ādeśaḥ prasajyeta . lopyalopitā ca na prakalpeta . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . gargāḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5797: urvāḥ . añ yaḥ bahuṣu yañ yaḥ bahuṣu iti ucyamānaḥ luk na prāpnoti . mā bhūt evam
GS24pmbhasuu:5798: . añantam yat bahuṣu yañantam yat bahuṣu iti evam bhaviṣyati . na evam śakyam . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt. :
GS24pmbhasuu:5799: kāśyapapratikṛtayaḥ kāśyapāḥ iti . ekavibhaktau iti kimartham . payaḥ payaḥ jarayati . vāsaḥ vāsaḥ chādayati . brāhmaṇābhyām ca kṛtam brāhmaṇābhyām ca dehi iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5801: 117-119 kimartham punaḥ idam ucyate . pratyartham śabdaniveśāt na ekena anekasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5802: abhidhānam . pratyartham śabdāḥ abhiniviśante . kim idam pratyartham iti . artham
GS24pmbhasuu:5803: artham prati pratyartham . pratyartham śābdaniveśāt etasmāt kāraṇāt na ekena śabdena
GS24pmbhasuu:5804: anekasya arthasya abhidhānam prāpnoti . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . tatra anekārthābhidhāne
GS24pmbhasuu:5805: anekaśabdatvam . tatra anekārthābhidhāne anekaśabdatvam prāpnoti . iṣyate ca ekena
GS24pmbhasuu:5806: api anekasya abhidhānam syāt iti . tat ca antareṇa yatnam na sidhyati . tasmāt ekaśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5807: . evamartham idam ucyate . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . kim idam pratyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:5808: śabdāḥ abhiniveśante iti etam dṛṣṭāntam āsthāya sarūpāṇām ekaśeṣaḥ ārabhyate na punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5809: apratyartham śabdāḥ abhiniviśante iti etam dṛṣṭāntam āsthāya virūpāṇām anekaśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5811: laghīyasī sarūpanivṛttirḥ garīyasī virūpapratipattiḥ iti . tat ca na . laghīyasī
GS24pmbhasuu:5812: virūpapratipattiḥ . kim kāraṇam . yatra hi bahūnām sarūpāṇām ekaḥ śiṣyate tatra avarataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5813: dvayoḥ sarūpayoḥ nivṛttiḥ vaktavyā syāt . evam api etasmin sati kim cit ācāryaḥ sukaratarakam
GS24pmbhasuu:5816: 119-133 kim punaḥ ayam ekavibhaktau ekaśeṣaḥ bhavati . evam bhavitum arhati . ekavibhaktau
GS24pmbhasuu:5817: iti cet na abhāvād vibhakteḥ . ekavibhaktau iti cet tat na . kim kāraṇam . abhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5818: vibhakteḥ . na hi samudāyāt parā vibhaktiḥ asti . kim kāraṇam . aprātipadikatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5819: . nanu ca arthavat prātipadikam iti prātipadikasañjñā bhaviṣyati . niyamāt na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:5820: . arthavatsamudayānām samāsagrahaṇam niyamārtham iti . yadi punaḥ pṛthak sarveṣām
GS24pmbhasuu:5821: vibhaktiparāṇām ekaśeṣaḥ ucyeta . pṛthak sarveṣām iti cet ekaśeṣe pṛthak vibhaktyupalabdhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5822: tadāśrayatvāt . pṛthak sarveṣām iti cet ekaśeṣe pṛthak vibhaktyupalabdhiḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:5823: . kim ucyate ekaśeṣe pṛthak vibhaktyupalabdhiḥ iti yāvatā samayaḥ kṛtaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:5824: na kevalā prakṛtiḥ prayoktavyā na kevalaḥ pratyayaḥ iti . tadāśrayatvāt prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:5825: . yatra hi prakṛtinimittā pratyayanivṛttiḥ tatra apratyayikāyāḥ prakṛteḥ prayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5826: bhavati agnicit somasut iti yathā . yatra ca pratyayanimittā prakṛtinivṛttiḥ tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:5828: iyān iti yathā . astu saṃyogāntalopena siddham . kutaḥ nu khalu etat parayoḥ vṛkṣaśabdayoḥ nivṛttiḥ bhaviṣyati na punaḥ pūrvayoḥ iti . tatra etat syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:5829: pūrvanivṛttav api satyām saṃyogādilopena siddham iti . na sidhyati . tatra avarataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5830: dvayoḥ sakārayoḥ śravaṇam prasajyeta. yatra ca saṃyogāntalopaḥ na asti tatra ca na
GS24pmbhasuu:5831: sidhyati . kva ca saṃyogāntalopaḥ na asti . dvivacanabahuvacanayoḥ . yadi punaḥ samāse
GS24pmbhasuu:5832: ekaśeṣaḥ ucyeta . kim kṛtam bhavati . kaḥ cit vacanalopaḥ parihṛtaḥ bhavati . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:5833: tarhi samāsagrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:5834: . tiṣyapunarvasvoḥ nakṣatradvandve bahuvacanasya dvivacanam nityam iti . samāse iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5835: cet svarasamāsānteṣu doṣaḥ . samāse iti cet svarasamāsānteṣu doṣaḥ bhavati . svara :
GS24pmbhasuu:5836: aśvaḥ ca aśvaḥ ca aśvau. samāsāntodāttatve kṛte ekaśeṣaḥ prāpnoti . idam iha sampradhāryam :
GS24pmbhasuu:5837: samāsāntodāttattvam kriyatām ekaśeṣaḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt samāsāntodāttatvam . samāsāntodāttatve ca doṣaḥ bhavati . svara . samāsānta :
GS24pmbhasuu:5838: ṛk ca ṛk ca ṛcau . samāsānte kṛte asārūpyāt ekaśeṣaḥ na prāpnoti . idam iha sampradhāryam :
GS24pmbhasuu:5839: samāsāntaḥ kriyatām ekaśeṣaḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt samāsāntaḥ . samāsānte
GS24pmbhasuu:5840: ca doṣaḥ bhavati . aṅgāśraye ca ekaśeṣavacanam . aṅgāśraye ca kārye ekaśeṣaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5841: . svasā ca svasārau ca svasāraḥ . aṅgāśraye kṛte asārūpyāt ekaśeṣaḥ na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5843: aṅgāśrayam kriyatām ekaśeṣaḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt aṅgāśrayam . tiṅsamāse
GS24pmbhasuu:5844: tiṅsamāsavacanam . tiṅsamāse tiṅsamāsaḥ vaktavyaḥ . ekam tiṅgrahaṇam anarthakam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5845: samāse tiṅsamāsaḥ iti eva siddham . na anarthakam . tiṅsamāse prakṛte tiṅsamāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5846: vaktavyaḥ . tiṅvidhipratiṣedhaḥ ca . tiṅ ca kaḥ cit vidheyaḥ kaḥ cit pratiṣedhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5848: taḥśabdaḥ vidheyaḥ tiśabdaḥ pratiṣedhyaḥ . yadi punaḥ asamāse ekaśeṣaḥ ucyeta . asamāse
GS24pmbhasuu:5849: vacanalopaḥ . yadi asamāse vacanalopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . nanu ca utpatatā eva vacanalopam
GS24pmbhasuu:5850: coditāḥ smaḥ . dvivacanabahuvacanavidhim dvandvapratiṣedham ca vakṣyati tadartham
GS24pmbhasuu:5853: vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣāḥ iti . dvandvapratiṣedhaḥ ca . dvandvasya ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:5855: vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣāḥ iti . cārthe dvandvaḥ iti dvandvaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:5856: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . anavakāśaḥ ekaśeṣaḥ dvandvam bādhiṣyate . sāvakāśaḥ ekaśeṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5857: kaḥ avakāśaḥ . tiṅantāni avakāśaḥ . yadi punaḥ pṛthak sarveṣām vibhaktyantānām ekaśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5858: ucyeta . kim kṛtam bhavati . kaḥ cit vacanalopaḥ parihṛtaḥ bhavati . vibhaktyantānām
GS24pmbhasuu:5859: ekaśeṣe vibhaktyantānām ekaśeṣe vibhaktyantānām eva tu nivṛttiḥ bhavati . ekavibhaktyantānām
GS24pmbhasuu:5860: iti tu pṛthagvibhaktipratiṣedhārtham . ekavibhaktyantānām iti tu vaktavyam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:5862: brāhmaṇābhyām ca kṛtam brāhmaṇābhyām ca dehi .
GS24pmbhasuu:5863: na vā arthavipratiṣedhāt yugapadvacanābhāvaḥ . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . arthavipratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5864: . vipratiṣiddhau etau arthau kartā saṃpradānam iti aśakyau yugapat nirdeṣṭum . tayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5865: vipratiṣiddhatvāt yugapadvacanam na bhaviṣyati . anekārthāśrayaḥ ca punaḥ ekaśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5866: . anekam artham sampratyāyayiṣyāmi iti ekaśeṣaḥ ārabhyate . tasmāt na ekaśabdatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:5867: . tasmāt ekaśabdatvam na bhaviṣyati . ayam tarhi doṣaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:5868: kaḥ cit vacanalopaḥ dvivacanabahuvacanavidhiḥ dvandvapratiṣedhaḥ ca iti . yadi punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5869: prātipadikānām ekaśeṣaḥ ucyeta . kim kṛtam bhavati . vacanalopaḥ parihṛtaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5870: . prātipadikānām ekaśeṣe mātṛmātroḥ pratiṣedhaḥ sarūpatvāt . prātipadikānām ekaśeṣe
GS24pmbhasuu:5872: mātā ca janayitrī mātārau ca dhānyasya mātṛmātāraḥ . kim kāraṇam . sarūpatvāt . sarūpāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:5873: hi etāni prātipadikāni . kim ucyate prātipadikānām ekaśeṣe mātṛmātroḥ pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5874: vaktavyaḥ iti na punaḥ yasya api vibhaktyantānām ekaśeṣaḥ tena api mātṛmātroḥ pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5875: vaktavyaḥ syāt . tasya api hi etāni kva cit vibhaktyantāni sarūpāṇi :
GS24pmbhasuu:5876: mātṛbhyām ca mātṛbhyāṃ ca iti . atha matam etat vibhaktyantānām sārūpye bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5877: eva ekaśeṣeṇa iti prātipadikānām eva ekaśeṣe doṣaḥ bhavati . evam ca kṛtvā codyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5879: striyām upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . haritasya strī hariṇī hariṇasya api hariṇī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5880: hariṇī ca hariṇī ca hariṇyau . śyetasya strī śyenī śyenasya api śyenī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5881: śyenī ca śyenī ca śyenyau . rohitasya strī rohiṇī rohiṇasya api rohiṇī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5882: rohiṇī ca rohiṇī ca rohiṇyau . na vā padasya arthe prayogāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5883: kim kāraṇam . padasya arthe prayogāt . padam arthe prayujyate vibhaktyantam ca padam
GS24pmbhasuu:5884: . rūpam ca iha āśrīyate . rūpanirgrahaḥ ca śabdasya na antareṇa laukikam prayogam
GS24pmbhasuu:5885: . tasmin ca laukike prayoge sarūpāṇi etāni . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:5886: na vā padasya arthe prayogāt . na vā eṣaḥ pakṣaḥ eva asti prātipadikānām ekaśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5887: iti . kim kārāṇam . padasya arthe prayogāt . padam arthe prayujyate vibhaktyantam
GS24pmbhasuu:5888: ca padam . rūpam ca iha āśrīyate rūpanirgrahaḥ ca śabdasya na antareṇa laukikam prayogam
GS24pmbhasuu:5889: . tasmin ca laukike prayoge prātipadikānām prayogaḥ na asti . atha anena pakṣeṇa arthaḥ syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:5890: prātipadikānām ekaśeṣaḥ iti . bāḍham arthaḥ . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:5891: anucyamānam gaṃsyate . etena eva abhihitam sūtreṇa sarūpāṇām ekaśeṣaḥ ekavibhaktau
GS24pmbhasuu:5892: iti . katham . vibhaktiḥ sārūpyeṇa āśrīyate . anaimittikaḥ ekaśeṣaḥ . ekavibhaktau
GS24pmbhasuu:5893: yāni sarūpāṇi teṣām ekaśeṣaḥ bhavati . kva . yatra vā tatra vā iti . atha anena pakṣeṇa arthaḥ syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:5894: vibhaktyantānām ekaśeṣaḥ iti . bāḍham arthaḥ . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:5895: anucyamānam gaṃsyate . etat api etena eva abhihitam sūtreṇa sarūpāṇām ekaśeṣaḥ ekavibhaktau
GS24pmbhasuu:5896: iti . katham . na idam pāribhāṣikyāḥ vibhakteḥ grahaṇam . kim tarhi . anvarthagrahaṇam :
GS24pmbhasuu:5897: vibhāgaḥ vibhaktiḥ iti . ekavibhāge yāni sarūpāṇi teṣām ekaśeṣaḥ bhavati iti . nanu ca uktaṃ :
GS24pmbhasuu:5898: kaḥ cit vacanalopaḥ dvivacanabahuvacanavidhiḥ dvandvapratiṣedhaḥ ca iti . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5899: doṣaḥ . yat tāvat ucyate kaḥ cit vacanalopaḥ dvivacanabahuvacanavidhiḥiti . sahavivakṣāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:5900: ekaśeṣaḥ . yugapadvivakṣāyām ekaśeṣeṇa bhavitavyam . na tarhi idānīm idam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:5902: vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣāḥ iti . na etat sahavivakṣāyām bhavati . atha api nidarśayitum buddhiḥ evam nidarśayitavyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:5904: vṛkṣāḥ ca vṛkṣāḥ ca vṛkṣāḥ ca vṛkṣāḥ iti . yat api ucyate dvandvapratiṣedhaḥ ca vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5905: iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . anavakāśaḥ ekaśeṣḥ dvandvam bādhiṣyate . nanu ca uktam sāvakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5906: ekaśeṣaḥ . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . tiṅantāni avakāśaḥ iti . na tiṅantāni ekaśeṣārambham prayojayanti
GS24pmbhasuu:5907: . kim kāṛaṇam . yathājātīyakānām dvitīyasya padasya prayoge sāmarthyam asti tathājātīyakānām
GS24pmbhasuu:5908: ekaśeṣaḥ . na ca tiṅantānām dvitīyasya padasya prayoge sāmarthyam asti . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5909: . ekā hi kriyā . ekena uktatvāt tasya arthasya dvitīyasya prayogeṇa na bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5911: tarhi ekā kriyā dvivacanabahuvacanāni na sidhyanti :
GS24pmbhasuu:5912: pacataḥ pacanti . na etāni kriyāpekṣāṇi . kim tarhi . sādhanāpekṣāṇi . atha vā punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5913: astu ekavibhaktau iti . nanu ca uktam ekavibhaktau iti cet na abhāvāt vibhakteḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5915: arthavat prātipadikam iti prātipadikasañjñā bhaviṣyati iti . nanu ca uktam niyamāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5916: na prāpnoti arthavatsamudāyānām samāsagrahaṇam niyamārtham iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5917: tulyajātīyasya niyamaḥ . kaḥ ca tulyajātīyaḥ . yathājātīyakānām samāsaḥ . kathañjātīyakānām
GS24pmbhasuu:5920: 133-136 sarvatra apatyādiṣu upasaṅkhyānam . sarveṣu pakṣeṣu apatyādiṣu upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:5921: bhikṣāṇām samūhaḥ bhaikṣam iti . sarvatra iti ucyate prātipadikāṇām ca ekaśeṣe siddham . apatyādiṣu iti ucyate bahavaḥ ca apatyādayaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:5922: gargasya apatyam bahavaḥ gargāḥ . ekā prakṛtiḥ bahavaḥ ca yañaḥ . asārūpyāt ekaśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5923: na prāpnoti . nanu ca yathā eva bahavaḥ yañaḥ evam prakṛtayaḥ api bahvyaḥ syuḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5924: na evam śakyam . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt : gargāḥ ,
