GS24pmbhasuu:6817: śeṣāt śeṣe iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . bhidyate kuśūlaḥ svayam eva iti . katarasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:6818: pakṣe ayam doṣaḥ . prakṛtyarthaniyame . prakṛtyarthaniyame tāvat na doṣaḥ . prakṛtyarthau
GS24pmbhasuu:6819: niyatau . pratyayāḥ aniyatāḥ . tatra na arthaḥ kartṛgrahaṇena kartṛgrahaṇāt ca doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6820: . pratyayaniyame tarhi ayam doṣaḥ . pratyayāḥ niyatāḥ . prakṛtyarthau aniyatau .
GS24pmbhasuu:6821: tatra kartṛgrahaṇam kartavyam bhāvakarmaṇoḥ nivṛttyartham . kartṛgrahaṇāt ca eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6822: doṣaḥ . prakṛtyarthaniyame śeṣagrahaṇam śakyam akartum . katham . prakṛtayarthau
GS24pmbhasuu:6823: niyatau . pratyayāḥ aniyatāḥ . tataḥ vakṣyāmi parasmaipadam bhavati iti . tat niyamārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:6824: bhaviṣyati . yatra parasmaipadam ca anyat ca prāpnoti tatra parasmaipadam eva bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:6825: iti . tat tarhi pratyayaniyame dvitīyam śeṣagrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . yogavibhāgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6826: kariṣyate . anudāttaṅitaḥ ātmanepadam . tataḥ bhāvakarmaṇoḥ . tataḥ kartari . kartari
GS24pmbhasuu:6827: ca ātmanepadam bhavati bhāvakarmaṇoḥ . tataḥ karkmavyatihāre . kartari iti eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:6828: bhāvakarmaṇoḥ iti nivṛttam . yathā eva tarhi karmaṇi kartari bhavati evam bhāve api
GS24pmbhasuu:6829: kartari prāpnoti . eti jīvantam ānandaḥ . na asya kim cit rujati iti . dvitīyaḥ yogavibhāgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6830: kariṣyate . anudāttaṅitaḥ ātmanepadam . tataḥ bhāve . tataḥ karmaṇi . karmaṇi ca
GS24pmbhasuu:6831: ātmanepadam bhavati . tataḥ kartari . kartari ca ātmanepadam bhavati . karmaṇi iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6832: anuvartate . bhāve iti nivṛttam . tataḥ karmavyatihāre . kartari iti eva . karmaṇi iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6833: nivṛttam . evam api śeṣagrahaṇam kartavyam anuparābhyām kṛñaḥ iti evamartham . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:6834: mā bhūt anukriyate svayam eva . parākriyate svayam eva . nanu ca etat api yogavibhāgāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6835: eva siddham . na sidhyati . anantarā yā prāptiḥ sā yogavibhāgena śakyā bādhitum .
GS24pmbhasuu:6836: kutaḥ etat . anantarasya vidhiḥ vā bhavati pratiṣedhaḥ vā iti . parā prāptiḥ apratiṣiddhā
GS24pmbhasuu:6837: . tayā bhaviṣyati . nanu ca iyam prāptiḥ pūrvām prāptim bādhate . na utsahate pratiṣiddhā
GS24pmbhasuu:6838: satī bādhitum . evam tarhi kartari karmavyatihāre iti atra kartṛgrahaṇam pratyākhyāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6839: . tat prakṛtam uttaratra anuvartiṣyate . śeṣāt kartari kartari iti . kimartham idam
GS24pmbhasuu:6840: kartari kartari iti . kartā eva yaḥ kartā tatra yathā syāt . kartā ca anyaḥ ca yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6841: kartā tatra mā bhūt iti . tataḥ anuparābhyām kṛñaḥ . kartari kartari iti eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:6843: 244-245 kriyāvyatirhāre iti vaktavyam . karmavyatirhāre iti ucyamāne iha prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:6844: devadattasya dhānyam vyatilunanti iti iha ca na syāt vyatilunate vyatipunate iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6845: . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . kriyām hi loke karma iti upacaranti . kām
GS24pmbhasuu:6846: kriyām kariṣyasi . kim karma kariṣyasi iti . evam api kartavyam . kṛtrimākṛtrimayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6847: kṛtrime sampratyayaḥ bhavati . kriyā api kṛtrimam karma . na sidhyati . kartuḥ īpsitatamam
GS24pmbhasuu:6848: karma iti ucyate . katham ca kriyā nāma kriyepsitatamā syāt . kriyā api kriyepsitatamā
GS24pmbhasuu:6849: bhavati . kayā kriyayā . sampaśyatikriyayā prārthayatikriyayā adhyavasyatikriyayā
GS24pmbhasuu:6850: vā . iha yaḥ eṣaḥ manuṣyaḥ prekṣāpūrvakārī bhavati salḥ buddhyā tāvat kam cit artham
GS24pmbhasuu:6851: sampaśyati . sandṛṣṭe prārthanā prārthite adhyavasāyaḥ adhyavasāye ārambhaḥ ārambhe
GS24pmbhasuu:6852: nirvṛttiḥ nirvṛttau phalāvaptiḥ . evam kriyā api kṛtrimam karma . evam api ubhayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6853: kṛtrimākṛtrimayoḥ ubhayagatiḥ prasajyeta . tasmāt kriyāvyatihāre iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6854: na vaktavyam . iha kartari vyatihāre iti iyatā siddham . saḥ ayam evam siddhe sati
GS24pmbhasuu:6855: yat karmagrahaṇam karoti tasya etat prayojanam kriyāvyatihāre yathā syāt karmavyatihāre mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6857: 246 atha kartṛgrahaṇam kimartham . karmavyatihārādiṣu kartṛgrahaṇam bhāvakarmanivṛttyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:6858: . karmavyatihārādiṣu kartṛgrahaṇam kriyate bhāvakarmaṇoḥ anena ātmanepadam mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:6859: iti . itarathā hi tatra pratiṣedhe bhāvakarmaṇoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . akriyamāṇe kartṛgrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:6860: bhāvakarmaṇoḥ api ātmanepadam prasajyeta . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . tatra pratiṣedhe bhāvakarmaṇoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6861: pratiṣedhaḥ . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . tatra pratiṣedhe bhāvakarmaṇoḥ api anena ātmanepadasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6862: pratiṣedhaḥ prasajyeta . vyatigamyante grāmāḥ vyatihanyante dasyavaḥ iti . na vā
GS24pmbhasuu:6863: anantarasya pratiṣedhāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . anantarasya pratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6864: . anantaram yat ātmanepadavidhānam tasya pratiṣedhāt . kutaḥ etat . anantarasya vidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6865: vā bhavati pratiṣedhaḥ vā iti . pūrvā prāptiḥ apratiṣiddhā tayā bhaviṣyati . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:6866: ca iyam prāptiḥ pūrvām prāptim bādhate . na utsahate pratiṣiddhā satī bādhitum .
GS24pmbhasuu:6867: uttarārtham tarhi kartṛgrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . kriyate tatra eva śeṣāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6868: kartari parasmaipadam iti . dvitīyam kartṛgrahaṇam kartavyam . kim prayojanam . kartā
GS24pmbhasuu:6869: eva yaḥ kartā tatra yathā syāt . karta ca anyaḥ ca yaḥ kartā tatra mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6871: 247 pratiṣedhe hasādīnām upasaṅkhyānam . pratiṣedhe hasādīnām upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6872: . vyatihasanti vayatijalpanti vyatipaṭhanti . harivahyoḥ apratiṣedhaḥ . harivahyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6873: apratiṣedhaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . sampraharante rājānaḥ . saṃvivahante gargaiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6874: iti . na vahiḥ gatyarthaḥ . deśāntaraprāpaṇakriyaḥ vahiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6876: 248 prarasparopapadāt ca . prarasparopapadāt ca iti vaktavyam . parasparasya vyatilunanti . parasparasya vyatipunanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6878: 248-249 upasargagrahaṇam kartavyam . parā jayati senā iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6879: na vaktavyam . yadi api tāvat ayam parāśabdaḥ dṛṣṭāpacāraḥ upasargaḥ ca anupasargaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6880: ca ayam tu khalu viśabdaḥ adṛṣṭāpacāraḥ upasargaḥ eva . tasya asya kaḥ dvitīyaḥ sahāyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6881: bhavitum arhati anyat ataḥ upasargāt . tat yathā asya goḥ dvitīyena arthaḥ iti gauḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6882: eva upādīyate na aśvaḥ na gardabhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6884: 249-250 āṅaḥ daḥ avyasanakriyasya . āṅaḥ daḥ avyasanakriyasya iti vaktavyam . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:6885: api yathā syāt . vipādikām vyādadāti . kūlam vyādadāti iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6886: . na vaktavyam . iha āṅaḥ daḥ anāsye iti iyatā siddham . saḥ ayam evam siddhe sati
GS24pmbhasuu:6887: yat viharaṇagrahaṇam karoti tasya etat prayojanam āsyaviharaṇasamānakriyāt api yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:6888: syāt . yathājātīyakā ca āsyaviharaṇakriyā tathājātīyakā atra api . svāṅgakarmāt ca

GS24pmbhasuu:6895: śikṣate . kirateḥ harṣajīvikākulāyakaraṇeṣu . kirateḥ harṣajīvikākulāyakaraṇeṣu upasaṅkhyanam
GS24pmbhasuu:6896: kartavyam . apaskirate vṛṣabhaḥ hṛṣṭaḥ . apaskirate kukkuṭaḥ bhakṣārthī . apaskirate
GS24pmbhasuu:6897: śvā āśrayārthī . harateḥ gatatācchīlye . harateḥ gatatācchīlye upasaṅkhyanam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6898: . paitṛkam aśvāḥ anuharante . mātṛkam gāvaḥ anuharante . āṅi nupracchyoḥ . āṅi nupracchyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6899: upasaṅkhyanam kartavyam . ānute śṛgālaḥ . āpṛcchate gurum . āśiṣi nāthaḥ . āśiṣi
GS24pmbhasuu:6900: nāthaḥ upasaṅkhyanam kartavyam . sarpiṣaḥ nāthate . madhunaḥ nāthate . śapaḥ upalambhane
GS24pmbhasuu:6901: . śapaḥ upalambhane upasaṅkhyanam kartavyam . devadattāya śapate . yajñadattāya śapate .

GS24pmbhasuu:6907: 254 upāt pūjāsaṅgatakaraṇayoḥ . upāt pūjāsaṅgatakaraṇayoḥ iti vaktavyam . ādityam
GS24pmbhasuu:6908: upatiṣṭhate . candramasam upatiṣṭhate . saṅgatakaraṇe . rathikān upatiṣṭhate . aśvārohān
GS24pmbhasuu:6909: upatiṣṭhate . bahūnām api acittānām ekaḥ bhavati cittavān . paśya vānarasainye asmin
GS24pmbhasuu:6910: yat arkam upatiṣṭhate . mā evam maṃsthāḥ sacittaḥ ayam eṣaḥ api yathā vayam . etat
GS24pmbhasuu:6911: api asya kāpeyam yat arkam upatiṣṭhati . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:6912: upāt devapūjāsaṅgatakaraṇamitrakaraṇapathiṣu iti vaktavyam . saṅgatakaraṇe udāhṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:6913: . mitrakaraṇe . rathikān upatiṣṭhate . aśvārohān upatiṣṭhate . pathi. ayam panthāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6914: srughnam upatiṣṭhate . ayam panthāḥ sāketam upatiṣthate . vā lipsāyām . vā lipsāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:6915: iti vaktavyam . bhikṣukaḥ brāhmaṇakulam upatiṣṭhate . bhikṣukaḥ brāhmaṇakulam upatiṣṭhati vā .
GS24pmbhasuu:6917: 255-256 akarmakāt iti eva . ut tapati suvarṇam suvarṇakāraḥ . svāṅgakarmakāt ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:6918: svāṅgakarmakāt ca iti vaktavyam . uttapate pāṇī . vitapate pāṇī . uttapate pṛṣṭham
GS24pmbhasuu:6919: . vitapate pṛṣṭham . atha udbhibhyām iti atra kim pratyudāhriyate . niṣṭapyate iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6920: . kim punaḥ kāraṇam ātmanepadam eva udāhriyate na parasmaipadam pratyudāhāryam syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6921: . tapiḥ ayam akarmakaḥ . akarmakāḥ ca api sopasargāḥ sakarmakāḥ bhavanti . na ca
GS24pmbhasuu:6922: antareṇa karmakartāram sakarmakāḥ akarmakāḥ bhavanti . yat ucyate na ca antareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:6923: karmakartāram sakarmakāḥ akarmakāḥ bhavanti iti antareṇa api karmakartāram sakarmakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6924: akarmakāḥ bhavanti . tat yathā . nadīvahati iti akarmakaḥ . bhāram vahati iti sakarmakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6927: 256 akarmakāt iti eva . āyacchati rajjum kūpāt . āhanti vṛṣalam pādena . svāṅgakarmakāt ca . svāṅgakarmakāt ca iti vaktavyam . āyacchate pāṇī . āhate udaram iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6929: 256-257 samaḥ gamyādiṣu vidipracchisvaratīnām upasaṅkhyānam . samaḥ gamyādiṣu vidipracchisvaratīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:6930: upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . saṃvitte sampṛcchate saṃsvarate . artiśrudṛśibhyaḥ ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:6931: artiśrudṛśibhyaḥ ca iti vaktavyam . ma samṛta mā samṛṣātām mā samṛṣata . arti . śru
GS24pmbhasuu:6932: . saṃśrṇute . dṛśi . sampaśyate . upasargāt asyatyūhyoḥ vāvacanam . upasargāt astyūhyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6933: vā iti vaktavyam . nirasyati nirasyate . samūhati samūhate .
GS24pmbhasuu:6935: 257 jyotiṣām udgamane. jyotiṣām udgamane iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . ākrāmati dhūmaḥ harmyatalam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6937: 257-258 vyaktavācām iti kimartham . varatanu sampravadanti kukkuṭāḥ . vyaktavācām
GS24pmbhasuu:6938: iti ucyamāne api atra prāpnoti . ete api hi vyaktavācaḥ . ātaḥ ca vyaktavācaḥ kukkuṭena
GS24pmbhasuu:6939: udite ucyate kukkuṭaḥ vadati iti . evam tarhi vyaktavācām iti ucyate . sarve eva
GS24pmbhasuu:6940: hi vyaktavācaḥ . tatra prakarṣagatiḥ vijñāsyate . sādhīyaḥ ye vyaktavācaḥ iti . ke
GS24pmbhasuu:6941: ca sādhīyaḥ . yeṣām vāci akārādayaḥ varṇāḥ vyajyante . na ca eteṣām vāci akārādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6942: varṇāḥ vyajyante . eteṣām api vāci akārādayaḥ varṇāḥ vyajyante . ātaḥ ca vyajyante
GS24pmbhasuu:6943: evam hi āhuḥ kukkuṭāḥ kukkuṭ iti . na evam te āhuḥ . anukaraṇam etat teṣām . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:6944: vā na evam vijñāyate vyaktā vāk yeṣām te ime vyaktavācaḥ iti . katham tarhi . vyaktā
GS24pmbhasuu:6945: vāci varṇāḥ yeṣām te ime vyaktavācaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6947: 258 avād graḥ girateḥ . avād graḥ iti atra girateḥ iti vaktavyam . gṛṇāteḥ mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:6948: . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam prayogābhāvāt . avāt graḥ iti ucyate na ca āpūrvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6951: 258-259 tṛtīyāyuktāt iti kimartham . ubhau lokau cañcarasi imam ca amum ca devala
GS24pmbhasuu:6952: . tṛtīyāyuktāt iti ucyamāne api atra prāpnoti . atra api hi tṛtīyayā yogaḥ . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:6953: tarhi tṛtīyāyuktāt iti ucyate sarvatra ca tṛtīyayā yogaḥ . tatra prakarṣagatiḥ vijñāsyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:6954: sādhīyaḥ yatra tṛtīyayā yogaḥ iti . kva ca sādhīyaḥ . yatra tṛtīyayā yogaḥ śrūyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:6956: 259-260 sā cet tṛtīyā caturthyarthe iti ucyate . katham nāma tṛtīyā caturthyarthe
GS24pmbhasuu:6957: syāt . evam tarhi aśiṣṭavyavahāre anena tṛtīyā ca vidhīyate ātmanepadam ca . dāsyā
GS24pmbhasuu:6958: samprayacchate . vṛṣalyā sampracchate . yaḥ hi śiṣṭavyavahāraḥ brāhmaṇībhyaḥ samprayacchati
GS24pmbhasuu:6959: iti eva tatra bhavitavyam . yadi evam na arthaḥ anena yogena . kena idānīm tṛtīyā
GS24pmbhasuu:6960: bhaviṣyati ātmanepadam ca . sahayukte tṛtīyā syāt vyatihāre taṅaḥ vidhiḥ . sahayukte
GS24pmbhasuu:6961: apradhāne iti eva tṛtīyā bhaviṣyati . kartari karmavyatihāre iti ātmanepadam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6963: 260 iha kasmāt na bhavati . svam śāṭakāntam upayacchati iti . asvam yadā svam karoti
GS24pmbhasuu:6964: tadā bhavitavyam . yadi evam svīkaraṇe iti prāpnoti . vicitrāḥ taddhitavṛttayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6967: 260-261 anoḥ jñaḥ pratiṣedhe sakarmakavacanam . anoḥ jñaḥ pratiṣedhe sakarmakagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6968: kartavyam . iha ma bhūt . auṣadhasya anujijñāsate iti . na vā akarmakasya uttareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:6969: vidhānāt . na vā kartavyam . kim kāraṇam . akarmakasya uttareṇa vidhānāt . akarmakāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6970: janāteḥ uttareṇa yogena ātmanepadam vidhīyate pūrvavat sanaḥ iti . pratiṣedhaḥ pūrvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6971: ca . pūrvasya ca ayam pratiṣedhaḥ . saḥ ca sakarmakārthaḥ ārambhaḥ . katham punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6972: jñāyate pūrvaysa ayam pratiṣedhaḥ iti . anantarasya vidhiḥ vā bhavati pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6973: vā iti . katham punaḥ jñāyate sakarmakārthaḥ ārambhaḥ iti . akarmakāt jānāteḥ sanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6974: ātmanepadavacane prayojanam na asti iti kṛtvā sakarmakārthaḥ vijñāyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:6976: 261-263 śadeḥ śitaḥ parasmaipadāśrayatvāt ātmanepadābhāvaḥ . śadeḥ śitaḥ parasmaipadāśrayatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6977: ātmanepadasya abhāvaḥ . śīyate śīyete śīyante . kim ca bhoḥ śadeḥ śit parasmaipadeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:6978: iti ucyate . na khalu parasmaipadeṣu iti ucyate parasmaipadeṣu tu vijñāyate . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:6979: anudāttaṅitaḥ ātmanepadam bhāvakarmaṇoḥ ātmanepadam iti etau dvau yogau uktvā śeṣāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6980: kartari parasmaipadam ucyate . evam na ca parasmaipadeṣu ucyate parasmaipadeṣu ca
GS24pmbhasuu:6981: vijñāyate . kaḥ punaḥ arhati etau dvau yogau uktvā śeṣāt kartari parasmaipadam vaktum
GS24pmbhasuu:6982: . kim tarhi . aviśeṣeṇa sarvam ātmanepadaprakaraṇam anukramya śeṣāt kartari parasmaipadam
GS24pmbhasuu:6983: iti ucyate . evam api parasmaipadāśrayaḥ bhavati . katham . idam tāvad ayam praṣṭavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6984: . yadi idam na ucyeta kim iha syāt iti . parasmaipadam iti āha . parasmaipadam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6985: cet parasmaipadāśrayaḥ bhavati . siddham tu laḍādīnām ātmanepadavacanam . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:6986: etat . katham . śadeḥ laḍādīnām ātmanepadam bhavati iti vaktavyam . sidhyati . sūtram
GS24pmbhasuu:6987: tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam śadeḥ śitaḥ parasmaipadāśrayatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6988: ātmanepadābhāvaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . śitaḥ iti na eṣā pañcamī . kā tarhi . sambandhaṣaṣṭhī
GS24pmbhasuu:6989: . śitaḥ yaḥ śadiḥ . kaḥ ca śitaḥ śadiḥ . prakṛtiḥ . śadeḥ śitprakṛteḥ iti . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:6990: vā āha ayam śadeḥ śitaḥ iti na ca śadiḥ śit asti . te evam vijñāsyāmaḥ śadeḥ śidviṣayāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6991: iti . atha vā yadi api tāvat etat anyatra bhavati vikaraṇebhyaḥ niyamaḥ balīyān iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6992: iha etat na asti . vikaraṇaḥ hi iha āśrīyate śitaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6994: 263-268 upasargapūrvaniyame aḍvyavāye upasaṅkhyānam . upasargapūrvasya niyame aḍvyavāye
GS24pmbhasuu:6995: upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . nyaviśata vyakrīṇīta . kim punaḥ kāraṇāt na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:6996: aṭā vyavahitatvāt . nanu ca ayam aṭ dhātubhaktaḥ dhātugrahaṇena grahīṣyate . na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:6997: . aṅgasya hi aṭ ucyate vikaraṇāntam ca aṅgam . saḥ asau saṅghātabhaktaḥ na śakyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6998: dhātugrahaṇena grahītum . evam tarhi idam iha sampradhāryam :
GS24pmbhasuu:6999: aṭ kriyatām vikaraṇaḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt aṭ āgamaḥ . nityāḥ vikaraṇāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7000: . kṛte api aṭi prāpnuvanti akṛte api prāpnuvanti . aṭ api nityaḥ . kṛteṣu api vikaraṇeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:7001: prāpnoti akṛteṣu api prāpnoti . anityaḥ aṭ . anyasya kṛteṣu vikaraṇeṣu prāpnoti anyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7002: akṛteṣu . śabdāntarasya ca prāpnuvan vidhiḥ anityaḥ bhavati . evam tarhi idam iha
GS24pmbhasuu:7003: sampradhāryam . aṭ kriyatām lādeśaḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt aṭ āgamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7004: . nityaḥ lādeśaḥ . kṛte api aṭi prāpnoti akṛte api prāpnoti . nityatvāt lādeśasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7005: ātmanepade eva aḍāgamaḥ bhaviṣyati . nityatvāt lādeśasya ātmanepade aṭ āgamaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7006: cet aṭaḥ nityanimittatvāt ātmanepadābhāvaḥ . nityatvāt lādeśasya ātmanepade eva aḍāgamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7007: iti cet evam ucyate . aṭ api nityanimittaḥ . kṛte api ladeśe prāpnoti akṛte api prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:7008: . aṭaḥ nityanimittatvāt ātmanepadābhāvaḥ . tasmāt upasaṅkhyānam . tasmāt upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:7009: kartavyam . na kartavyam . antaraṅgaḥ tarhi lādeśaḥ . na etat vivadāmahe antaraṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7010: na antaraṅgaḥ iti . astu ayam nityaḥ antaraṅgaḥ ca . atra khalu lādeśe kṛte trīṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:7012: vikaraṇāḥ aṭ āgamaḥ niyamaḥ iti . tat yadi sarvataḥ niyamaḥ labhyeta kṛtam syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:7013: tat tu na labhyam . atha api vikaraṇāt aṭ iti aṭ labhyeta evam api kṛtam syāt . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:7014: tu na labhyam . kim kāraṇam . āṅgāt pūrvam vikaraṇāḥ eṣitavyāḥ tarataḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7015: taranti iti evamartham . aḍāḍbhyām api anyat āṅgam pūrvam eṣitavyam upārcchati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7016: evamartham . tatra hi āṭi kṛte sāṭkasya ṛcchibhāvaḥ prāpnoti . nanu ca ṛcchibhāve
GS24pmbhasuu:7017: kṛte śabdāntarasya akṛtaḥ āṭ iti kṛtvā punaḥ āṭ bhaviṣyati . punaḥ ṛcchibhāvaḥ punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7018: āṭ iti cakrakam avyavasthā prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yat tāvat ucyate āṅgāt pūrvam
GS24pmbhasuu:7019: vikaraṇāḥ eṣitavyāḥ tarataḥ taranti iti evamartham iti . bhavet siddham yatra vikaraṇāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7020: nityāḥ āṅgam anityam tatra āṅgāt pūrvam vikaraṇāḥ syuḥ . yatra tu khalu ubhayam nityam
GS24pmbhasuu:7021: paratvāt tatra āṅgam tāvat bhavati . yat api ucyate aḍāḍbhyām api anyat āṅgam pūrvam
GS24pmbhasuu:7022: eṣitavyam upārcchati iti evamartham iti . astu atra āṭ . āṭi kṛte sāṭkasya ṛcchibhāve
GS24pmbhasuu:7023: kṛte śabdāntarasya akṛtaḥ āṭ iti kṛtvā punaḥ āṭ bhaviṣyati . nanu ca uktam punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7024: ṛcchibhāvaḥ punaḥ āṭ iti cakrakam avyavasthā prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . cakrakeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:7025: iṣṭataḥ vyavasthā . atha vā neḥ iti na eṣā pañcamī . kā tarhi . viśeṣaṇaṣaṣṭhī .
GS24pmbhasuu:7026: neḥ yaḥ viśiḥ . kaḥ ca neḥ viśiḥ . viśeṣyaḥ . vyavahitaḥ ca api śakyate viśeṣayitum
GS24pmbhasuu:7027: . atha vā niḥ api padam viśiḥ api padam .padavidhiḥ ca samarthāmām . vyavahite api
GS24pmbhasuu:7030: 268-269 kim idam pūrvagrahaṇam sanapekṣam . prāk sanaḥ yebhyaḥ ātmanepadm uktam tebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7031: sanantebhyaḥ api bhavati iti . āhosvit yogāpekṣam . prāk etasmāt yogāt yebhyaḥ ātmanepadam
GS24pmbhasuu:7032: uktam tebhyaḥ sanantebhyaḥ ātmanepadam bhavati iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi sanapekṣam
GS24pmbhasuu:7033: nimittam aviśeṣitam bhavati . pūrvavat sanaḥ na jñāyate kimantāt bhavitavyam . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:7034: yogāpekṣam uttaratra vidhiḥ na prakalpate . bubhukṣate upayuyukṣate iti . yathā icchasi
GS24pmbhasuu:7035: tathā astu . astu tāvat sanapekṣam . nanu ca uktam nimittam aviśeṣitam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7036: nimittam ca viśeṣitam . katham . sanam eva atra nimittatvena apekṣiṣyāmahe . pūrvavat
GS24pmbhasuu:7037: sanaḥ ātmanepadam bhavati . kutaḥ sanaḥ iti . atha vā punaḥ astu yogāpekṣam . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:7038: ca uktam uttaratra vidhiḥ na prakalpate . vidhiḥ ca prakḷptaḥ . katham . uttaratra
GS24pmbhasuu:7039: api pūrvavat sanaḥ iti eva anuvartiṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:7041: 269-271 kimartham punaḥ idam ucyate . pūrvavat sanaḥ iti śadimriyatyartham . śadimriyatyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7042: ayam ārambhaḥ . śadimriyatibhyām sanantābhyām ātmanepadam mā bhūt iti . itarathā
GS24pmbhasuu:7043: hi tābhyām sanantābhyām ātmanepadapratiṣedhaḥ . itarathā hi anucyamāne asmin tābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:7044: sanantābhyām ātmanepadasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ syāt . śiśitsati mumūrṣati . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:7045: punaḥ pūrvavat sanaḥ iti anena śadimriyatibhyām sanantābhyām ātmanepadasya pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7046: śakyaḥ vijñātum . vatinirdeśaḥ ayam kāmacāraḥ ca vatinirdeśe vākyaśeṣam samarthayitum . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:7047: uśīnaravat madreṣu yavāḥ . santi na santi iti . mātṛvat asyāḥ kalāḥ . santi na santi
GS24pmbhasuu:7048: . evam iha api pūrvavat bhavati na bhavati iti . na bhavati iti vākyaśeṣam samarthayiṣyāmahe
GS24pmbhasuu:7049: . yathā pūrvayogayoḥ sanantābhyām ātmanepadam na bhavati evam iha api śadimriyatibhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:7050: sanantābhyām ātmanepadam na bhavati iti . yadi tarhi śadimriyatyarthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7051: vidhiḥ na prakalpate . āsisiṣate śiśayiṣate . atha vidhyarthaḥ śadimriyatibhyām sanantābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:7052: ātmanepadam prāpnoti . yathā icchasi tathā astu . astu tāvat pratiṣedhārthaḥ . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:7053: ca uktam vidhiḥ na prakalpate iti . vidhiḥ ca prakḷptaḥ . katham . etat eva jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:7054: sanantāt ātmanepadam bhavati iti yat ayam śadimriyatibhyām sanantābhyām ātmanepadasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7055: pratiṣedham śāsti . atha vā punaḥ astu vidhyarthaḥ . nanu ca uktam śadimriyatibhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:7056: sanantābhyām ātmanepadam prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . prakṛtam sanaḥ na iti anuvartiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7057: . kva prakṛtam . jñāśrusmṛdṛśām sanaḥ na anoḥ jñaḥ . sakarmakāt sanaḥ na . pratyāṅbhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:7058: śruvaḥ sanaḥ na . śadeḥ śitaḥ sanaḥ na . mriyateḥ luṅliṅoḥ ca sanaḥ na iti . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:7059: idānīm pūrvavat sanaḥ iti sanaḥ iti vartate na iti nivṛttam . evam ca kṛtvā saḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:7060: adoṣaḥ bhavati yat uktam nimittam aviśeṣitam bhavati iti . na eva vā punaḥ atra śadimriyatibhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:7061: sanantābhyām ātmanepadam prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . śadeḥ śitaḥ iti ucyate na ca śadiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7062: eva ātmanepadasya nimittam . kim tarhi . śit api nimittam . atha api śadiḥ eva śitparaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7063: tu nimittam . na ca ayam sanparaḥ śitparaḥ bhavati . yatra tarhi śit na āśrīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7064: mriyateḥ luṅliṅoḥ ca iti . atra api na mriyatiḥ eva ātmanepadasya nimittam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:7065: tarhi . luṅliṅau api nimittam . atha api mriyatiḥ eva luṅliṅparaḥ tu nimittam . na
GS24pmbhasuu:7068: 271-272 kim punaḥ pūrvasya yat ātmanepadadarśanam tat sanantasya api atidiśyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:7069: evam bhavitum arhati . pūrvasya ātmanepadadarśanāt sanantāt ātmanepadabhāvaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7070: cet gupādiṣu aprasiddhiḥ . pūrvasya ātmanepadadarśanāt sanantāt ātmanepadabhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7071: iti cet gupādiṣu aprasiddhiḥ . gupādīnām na prāpnoti . jugupsate mīmāṃsate iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7072: na hi etebhyaḥ prāk sanaḥ ātmanepadam na api parasmaipadam paśyāmaḥ . siddham tu
GS24pmbhasuu:7073: pūrvasya liṅgātideśāt . siddham etat . katham . pūrvasya yat ātmanepadaliṅgam tat
GS24pmbhasuu:7074: sanantasya api atidiśyate . kṛñādiṣu tu liṅgapratiṣedhaḥ . kṛñādiṣu tu liṅgapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7075: vaktavyaḥ . anucikīrṣati parācikīrṣati iti . astu tarhi prāk sanaḥ yebhyaḥ ātmanepadam
GS24pmbhasuu:7076: dṛṣṭam tebhyaḥ sanantebhyaḥ api bahvati iti . nanu ca uktam pūrvasya ātmanepadadarśanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7077: sanantāt ātmanepadabhāvaḥ iti cet gupādiṣu aprasiddhiḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . anubandhakaraṇasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7078: bhaviṣyati . atha vā avayave kṛtam liṅgam samudāyasya viśeṣakam bhavati . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:7079: goḥ sakthani karṇe vā kṛtam liṅgam samudāyasya viśeṣakam bhavati . yadi avayave kṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:7080: liṅgam samudāyasya viśeṣakam bhavati jugupsayati mīmāṃsāyati iti atra api prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:7081: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . avayave kṛtam liṅgam kasya samudāyasya viśeṣakam bhavati . yam
GS24pmbhasuu:7082: samudāyam yaḥ avayavaḥ na vyabhicarati . sanam ca na vyabhicarati . ṇicam punaḥ vyabhicarati
GS24pmbhasuu:7083: . tat yathā goḥ sakthani karṇe vā kṛtam liṅgam goḥ eva viśeṣakam bhavati na gomaṇḍalasya .
GS24pmbhasuu:7085: 273 pratyayagrahaṇam ṇijartham . pratyayasya grahaṇam kartavyam . pūrvavat pratyayāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7086: iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . ṇijartham . ṇijantāt api yathā syāt iti . ākusmayate
GS24pmbhasuu:7087: vikusmayate hṛṇīyate mahīyate iti. tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . tatra hetumaṇṇicaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7088: . tatra hetumaṇṇicaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . āsayati śāyayati . sūtram ca bhidyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7089: . yathānyāsam eva astu . katham ākusmayate vikusmayate hṛṇīyate mahīyate iti. anubandhakaraṇasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7090: bhaviṣyati . atha vā avayave kṛtam liṅgam samudāyasya viśeṣakam bhavati . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:7091: goḥ sakthani karṇe vā kṛtam liṅgam samudāyasya viśeṣakam bhavati . yadi avayave kṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:7092: liṅgam samudāyasya viśeṣakam bhavati hṛṇīyayati mahīyayati atra api prāpnoti . avayave
GS24pmbhasuu:7093: kṛtam liṅgam kasya samudāyasya viśeṣakam bhavati . yam samudāyam yaḥ avayavaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:7094: vyabhicarati . yakam ca na vyabhicarati . ṇicam tu vyabhicarati . tat yathā goḥ sakthani
GS24pmbhasuu:7095: karṇe vā kṛtam liṅgam goḥ eva viśeṣakam bhavati na gomaṇḍalasya .
GS24pmbhasuu:7097: 274 kṛñgrahaṇam kimartham . iha mā bhūt . īhāmāsa īhāmāsatuḥ īhāmāsuḥ . katham ca
GS24pmbhasuu:7098: atra asteḥ anuprayogaḥ bhavati . pratyāhāragrahaṇam tatra vijñāyate . katham punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7099: jñāyate tatra pratyāhāragrahaṇam iti . iha kṛñgrahaṇāt . iha kasmāt pratyāhāragrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7100: na bhavati . iha eva kṛñgrahaṇāt . atha iha kasmāt na bhavati . udumbhām cakāra udubjām
GS24pmbhasuu:7101: cakāra . nanu ca āmpratyayavat iti ucyate na ca atra āmpratyayāt ātmanepadam paśyāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7102: . na brūmaḥ anena iti . kim tarhi . svaritañitaḥ kartrabhiprāye kriyāphale ātmanepadam
GS24pmbhasuu:7103: bhavati iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . iha niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . āmpratyayavat eva iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7104: . yadi niyamārtham vidhiḥ na prakalpate . īhām cakre ūhām cakre iti . vidhiḥ ca prakḷptaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7105: . katham pūrvavat iti vartate . āmpratyayavat pūrvavat ca iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7107: 275 svarādyupasṛṣṭāt iti vaktavyam . udyuṅkte anuyuṅkte . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:7108: svarādyantopasṛṣṭāt iti vaktayam . prayuṅkte niyuṅkte niniyuṅkte .
GS24pmbhasuu:7110: 275 kimartham videśasthasya grahaṇam kriyate na samaḥ gamādiṣu eva ucyeta . samaḥ kṣṇuvaḥ sakarmakārtham . sakarmakārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . akarmakāt iti hi tatra anuvartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:7112: 275 anavanakauṭilyayoḥ iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt . prabhujati vāsasī nibhujati
GS24pmbhasuu:7113: jānuśirasī iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . yasya bhujeḥ avanam anavanam
GS24pmbhasuu:7114: ca arthaḥ tasya grahaṇam . na ca asya bhujeḥ avanam anavanam ca arthaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7116: 276-284 ṇeḥ ātmanepadavidhāne aṇyantasya karmaṇaḥ tatra upalabdhiḥ .ṇeḥ ātmanepadavidhāne
GS24pmbhasuu:7117: aṇyantasya yat karma yadā ṇyante tat eva karma bhavati tadā ātmanepadam bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7118: vaktavyam . itarathā hi sarvaprasaṅgaḥ . itarathā hi sarvatra prasaṅgaḥ syāt . iha api prasajyeta :
GS24pmbhasuu:7119: ārohanti hastinam hastipakāḥ . ārohamāṇaḥ hastīsthalam ārohayati manuṣyān . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . kasmāt na bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:7120: ārohanti hastinam hastipakāḥ . ārohamāṇaḥ hastīsthalam ārohayati manuṣyān iti . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:7121: vakṣyāmi . ṇeḥ ātmanepadam bhavati . tataḥ aṇau yat karma ṇau cet . aṇyante yat karma
GS24pmbhasuu:7122: ṇau yadi tat eva karma bhavati . tataḥ saḥ kartā . kartā cet saḥ bhavati ṇau iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7123: . yadi evam karmakāryam bhavati . tatra karmakartṛtvāt siddham . karmakartṛtvāt siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:7124: iti cet yakciṇoḥ nivṛttyartham vacanam . karmakartṛtvāt siddham iti cet yakciṇoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7125: nivṛttyartham idam vaktavyam . karmāpadiṣṭau yakciṇau mā bhūtām iti . na vā yakciṇoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7126: pratiṣedhāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . yakciṇoḥ pratiṣedhāt . pratiṣidhyete
GS24pmbhasuu:7127: atra yakciṇau . yakciṇoḥ pratiṣedhe hetumaṇṇiśribrūñām upasaṅkhyānam iti . yaḥ tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:7128: na hetumaṇṇic tadartham idam vaktavyam . tasya karmāpadiṣṭau yakciṇau mā bhūtām iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:7129: utpucchayate puccham svayam eva . udapuppucchata puccham svayam eva . atra api yathā bhāradvājīyāḥ paṭhanti tathā bhavitavyam pratiṣedhena :
GS24pmbhasuu:7130: yakciṇoḥ pratiṣedhe ṇiśrigranthibrūñātmanepadākarmakāṇām upsaṅkhyānam iti . saḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:7131: avaśyam pratiṣedhaḥ āśrayitavyaḥ . itarathā hi yatra niyamaḥ tataḥ anyatra pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7132: . anucyamāne hi etasmin yatra niyamaḥ tataḥ anyatra tena yakciṇoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7133: syāt . gaṇayati gaṇam gopālakaḥ . gaṇayati gaṇaḥ svayam eva . ātmanepadasya ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:7135: gaṇayati gaṇaḥ svayam eva . ātmanepadapratiṣedhārtham tu . ātmanepadapratiṣedhārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:7136: idam vaktavyam . gaṇayati gaṇaḥ svayam eva . iṣyate eva atra ātmanepadam . kim iṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7137: eva āhosvit prāpnoti api . iṣyate ca prāpnoti ca . katham . aṇau it kasya idam ṇeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7138: grahaṇam . yamāt ṇeḥ prāk karma kartā vā vidyate . na ca etasmāt ṇeḥ prāk karma kartā
GS24pmbhasuu:7140: anādhyāne iti vakṣyāmi iti . iha mā bhūt . smarati vanagulmasya kokilaḥ . smarayati
GS24pmbhasuu:7141: enam vanagulmaḥ svayam eva . etat api na asti prayojanam . karmāpadiṣṭāḥ vidhayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7142: karmasthabhāvakānām karmasthakriyāṇām bhavanti kartṛsthabhāvakaḥ ca ayam . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:7143: siddhe sati yat anādhyāne iti pratiṣedham śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati evañjātīyakānām
GS24pmbhasuu:7144: ātmanepadam iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . paśyanti bhṛtyāḥ rājānam . darśayate
GS24pmbhasuu:7145: bhṛtyān rājā . darśayate bhṛtyaiḥ rājā . atra ātmanepadam siddham bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7147: 285 ātmanaḥ karmatve pratiṣedhaḥ . ātmanaḥ karmatve pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . hanti
GS24pmbhasuu:7148: ātmānam . ghātayati ātmā iti . saḥ tarhi vaktavyaḥ . na vā ṇyante anyasya kartṛtvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7149: . na vā vaktavyaḥ . kim kāraṇam . ṇyante anyasya kartṛtvāt . anyat atra aṇyante karma
GS24pmbhasuu:7150: anyaḥ ṇyantasya kartā . katham . dvau ātmanau antarātmā śarīrātmā ca . antarātmā
GS24pmbhasuu:7151: tat karma karoti yena śarīrātmā sukhaduḥkhe anubhavati . śarīrātmā tat karma karoti
GS24pmbhasuu:7154: 286-290 svaritañitaḥ iti kimartham . yāti vāti drāti psāti . svaritañitaḥ iti śakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7155: akartum . kasmāt na bhavati yāti vāti drāti psāti iti . kartrabhiprāye kriyāphale
GS24pmbhasuu:7156: iti ucyate sarveṣām ca kartrabhiprāyam kriyāphalam asti . te evam vijñāsyāmaḥ . yeṣām
GS24pmbhasuu:7157: kartrabhiprāyam akartrabhiprayam ca kriyāphalam asti tebhyaḥ ātmanepadam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7158: iti . na ca eteṣām kartrabhiprāyam akartrabhiprayam ca kriyāphalam asti . tathājātīyakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7159: khalu ācāryeṇa svaritañitaḥ paṭhitāḥ yeṣām kartrabhiprāyam akartrabhiprayam ca kriyāphalam
GS24pmbhasuu:7160: asti . atha abhiprāyagrahaṇam kimartham . svaritañitaḥ kartrāye kriyāphale iti iyati
GS24pmbhasuu:7161: ucyamāne yam eva samprati eti kriyāphalam tatra eva syāt . lūñ lunīte pūñ punīte
GS24pmbhasuu:7162: . iha na syāt . yaj yajate vap vapate . abhiprayagrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7163: bhavati . abhiḥ ābhimukhye vartate pra ādikarmaṇi . tena yam ca abhipraiti yam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:7164: abhipraiṣyati yam ca abhiprāgāt tatra sarvatra ābhimukhyamātre siddham bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7165: kartrabhiprāye kriyāphale iti kimartham . pacanti bhaktakārāḥ . kurvanti karmakārāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7166: . yajanti yājakāḥ . kartrabhiprāye kriyāphale iti ucyamāne api atra prāpnoti . atra
GS24pmbhasuu:7167: api hi kriyāphalam kartāram abhipraiti . yājakāḥ yajanti gāḥ lapsyāmahe iti . karmakarāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7168: kurvanti pādikam ahaḥ lapsyāmahe iti . evam tarhi kartrabhipraye kriyāphale iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7169: sarvatra ca kartāram kriyāphalam abhipraiti . tatra prakarṣagatiḥ vijñāsyate . sādhīyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7170: yatra kartāram kriyāphalam abhipraiti iti . na ca antareṇa yajim yajiphalam vapim
GS24pmbhasuu:7171: va vapiphalam labhante . yājakāḥ punaḥ antareṇa api yajim gāḥ labhante bhṛtakāḥ ca pādikam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7173: 291-292 śeṣavacanam pañcamyā cet arthe pratiṣedhaḥ . śeṣavacanam pañcamyā cet arthe
GS24pmbhasuu:7174: pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . bhidyate kuśūlaḥ svayam eva . chidyate rajjuḥ svayam eva
GS24pmbhasuu:7175: . evam tarhi śeṣe iti vakṣyāmi . saptamyā cet prakṛteḥ . saptamyā cet prakṛteḥ pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7176: vaktavyaḥ . āste śete cyavante plavante . siddham tu ubhayanirdeśāt . siddham etat
GS24pmbhasuu:7177: . katham . ubhayanirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . śeṣāt śeṣe iti vaktavyam . kartṛgrahaṇam idānīm
GS24pmbhasuu:7178: kimartham syāt . kartṛgrahaṇam anuparādyartham . anuparādyartham etat syāt . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:7179: mā bhūt . anukriyate svayam eva . parākriyate svayam eva iti . sidhyati . sutram
GS24pmbhasuu:7180: tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam śeṣavacanam pañcamyā cet arthe
GS24pmbhasuu:7181: pratiṣedhaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kartari karmavyatihāre iti atra kartṛgrahaṇam pratyākhyāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7182: . tat prakṛtam iha anuvartiṣyate . śeṣāt kartari kartari iti . kim idam kartari kartari
GS24pmbhasuu:7183: iti . kartā eva yaḥ kartā tatra yathā syāt . kartā ca anyaḥ ca yaḥ kartā tatra mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7185: 292-293 kimartham idam ucyate . parasmaipadapratiṣedhāt kṛñādiṣu vidhānam . parasmaipadapratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7186: kṛñādiṣu parasmaipadam vidhīyate . pratiṣidhyate tatra parasmaipadam svaritañitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7187: kartrabhiprāye kriyāphale ātmanepadam bhavati iti . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:7188: iti . tatra ātmanepadapratiṣedhaḥ apratiṣiddhatvāt . tatra ātmanepadasya pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7189: vaktavyaḥ . kim kāraṇam . apratiṣiddhatvāt . na hi ātmanepadam pratiṣidhyate . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:7190: tarhi . parasmaipadam anena vidhīyate . na vā dyutādibhyaḥ vāvacanāt . na vā eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7191: doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . dyutādibhyaḥ vāvacanāt . yat ayam dyutādibhyaḥ vāvacanam karoti
GS24pmbhasuu:7192: tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na parasmaipadaviṣaye ātmanepadam bhavati iti . ātmanepadaniyame
GS24pmbhasuu:7193: vā pratiṣedhaḥ . ātmanepadaniyame vā pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . svaritañitaḥ kartrabhiprāye
GS24pmbhasuu:7194: kriyāphale ātmanepadam bhavati kartari . anuparābhyām kṛñaḥ na iti . sidhyati . sūtram
GS24pmbhasuu:7195: tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam tatra ātmanepadapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7196: apratiṣiddhatvāt iti . parihṛtam etat na vā dyutādibhyaḥ vāvacanāt . atha vā idam
GS24pmbhasuu:7197: tāvat ayam praṣṭavyaḥ . svaritañitaḥ kartrabhiprāye kriyāphale ātmanepadam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7198: iti parasmaipadam kasmāt na bhavati . ātmanepadena bādhyate . yathā eva tarhi ātmanepadena
GS24pmbhasuu:7199: parasmaipadam bādhyate evam parasmaipadena ātmanepadam bādhiṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:7201: 294 budhādiṣu ye akarmakāḥ teṣām grahaṇam kimartham . sakarmakārtham acittavatkartṛkārtham vā .
GS24pmbhasuu:7203: 294-295 aṇau akarmakāt iti curādiṇicaḥ ṇyantāt parasmaipadavacanam . aṇau akarmakāt iti curādiṇicaḥ ṇyantāt parasmaipadam vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:7204: cetayamāṇam prayojayati cetayati iti . yadi tarhi atra api iṣyate aṇigrahaṇam idānīm
GS24pmbhasuu:7205: kimartham syāt . akarmakagrahaṇam aṇyantaviśeṣaṇam yathā vijñāyeta . atha akriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:7206: aṇigrahaṇam kasya akarmakgrahaṇam viśeṣaṇam syāt . ṇeḥ iti vartate . ṇyantaviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7207: . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . iha eva syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:7208: cetayamānam prayojayati cetayati iti . iha na syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:7209: āsayati śāyayati iti . siddham tu atasmin ṇau iti vacanāt . siddham etat . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:7210: . atasmin ṇau yaḥ akarmakaḥ tatra iti vaktavyam . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7211: . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam aṇav akarmakāt iti curādiṇicaḥ ṇyantāt parasmaipadavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:7212: iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . aṇau iti kasya idam ṇeḥ grahaṇam . yasmāṇ ṇeḥ prāk karma kartā
GS24pmbhasuu:7213: vā vidyate . na ca etasmāṇ ṇeaḥ prāk karma kartā vā vidyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:7215: 295-296 pādiṣu dheṭaḥ upasaṅkhyānam . pādiṣu dheṭaḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . dhāpayate śiśumeka samīcī .
GS24pmbhasuu:7217: 296. kimarthaḥ cakāraḥ . syasanoḥ iti etat anukṛṣyate . yadi tarhi na antareṇa cakāram
GS24pmbhasuu:7218: anuṅrttiḥ bhavati dyudbhyaḥ luṅi iti atra api cakāraḥ kartavyaḥ vibhāṣā iti anukarṣaṇārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7219: . atha idānīm antareṇa api cakāram anuvṛttiḥ bhavati iha api na arthaḥ cakāreṇa .
GS24pmbhasuu:7222: 297-298 kimartham idam ucyate . anyatra sañjñāsamāveśānniyamārtham vacanam . anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:7223: sañjñāsamāveśaḥ bhavati . kvānyatra . loke vyākaraṇe ca . loke tāvat . indraḥ śakraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7224: puruhūtaḥ purandaraḥ . kanduḥ koṣṭhaḥ kuśūlaḥ iti . ekasya dravyasya bahvyaḥ sañjñāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7225: bhavanti . vyākaraṇe api kartavyam hartavyam iti atra pratyayakṛtkṛtyasañjñānām samāveśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7226: bhavati . pāñcālaḥ vaidehaḥ vaidarbhaḥ iti atra pratyayataddhitatadrājasañjñānāṃ
GS24pmbhasuu:7227: samāveśaḥ bhavati . anyatra sañjñāsamāveśāt etasmāt kāraṇāt ā kaḍārāt api sañjñānām
GS24pmbhasuu:7228: samāveśaḥ prāpnoti . iṣyate ca ekā eva sañjñā syāt iti . tat ca antareṇa yatnam na
GS24pmbhasuu:7229: sidhyati iti niyamārtham vacanam . evamartham idam ucyate . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7231: 298-308 katham tvetatsūtram paṭhitavyam . kim ā kaḍārāt ekā sañjñā iti āhosvit prāk
GS24pmbhasuu:7232: kaḍārāt param kāryam iti . kutaḥ punaḥ ayam sandehaḥ . ubhayathā hi ācāryeṇa śiṣyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7234: kecit ā kaḍārāt ekā sañjñā iti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7235: kecit prāk kaḍārāt param kāryam iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . tatra ekasañjñādhikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:7236: tadvacanam . tatra ekasañjñādhikāre tat vaktavyam . kim . ekā sañjñā bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7237: . nanu ca yasya api paraṅkāryatvam tena api paragrahaṇam kartavyam . parārtham mama
GS24pmbhasuu:7238: bhaviṣyati . vipratiṣedhe ca iti . mama api tarhi ekagrahaṇam parārtham bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:7239: . sarūpāṇām ekaśeṣaḥ ekavibhaktau iti . sañjñādhikāraḥ ca ayam . tatra kim anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:7240: śakyam vijñātum anyat ataḥ sañjñāyāḥ . tatra etāvat vācyam . ā kaḍārāt ekā . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:7241: . ekā sañjñā bhavati iti . aṅgasañjñayā bhapadasañjñayoḥ asamāveśaḥ . aṇgasañjñayā
GS24pmbhasuu:7242: bhapadasañjñayoḥ samāveśaḥ na prāpnoti . sārpiṣkaḥ bārhiṣkaḥ yājuṣkaḥ dhānuṣkaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7243: bābhravyaḥ māṇḍavya iti . anavakāśe bhapadasañjñe aṅgasañjñāṃ bādheyātām . paravacane
GS24pmbhasuu:7244: hi niyamānupapatteḥ ubhayasañjñābhāvaḥ . yasya punaḥ paraṅkāryatvam niyamānupapatteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7245: tasya ubhayoḥ sañjñayoḥ bhāvaḥ siddhaḥ . katham . pūrve tasya bhapadasañjñe parā
GS24pmbhasuu:7246: aṅgasañjñā . katham . evam sa vakṣyati . yasmātpratyayavidhiḥ tadādi suptiṅantaṃ
GS24pmbhasuu:7247: padam naḥ kye siti ca . svādiṣu asarvanāmasthāne yaci bham . tasya ante pratyaye
GS24pmbhasuu:7248: aṅgamiti . tatra ārambhasāmarthyāc ca bhapadasañjñe paraṅkāryatvāt ca aṅgasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:7249: bhaviṣyati . nanu ca yasya api ekasañjñādhikāraḥ tasya api aṅgasañjñāpūrvike bhapadasañjñe
GS24pmbhasuu:7250: . katham .anuvṛttiḥ kriyate . paryāyaḥ prasajyeta. ekā sañjñā iti vacanāt na asti
GS24pmbhasuu:7251: yaugapadyena saṃbhavaḥ . karmadhārayatve tatpuruṣagrahaṇam . karmadhārayatve tatpuruṣagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7252: kartavyam . tatpuruṣaḥ samānādhikaraṇaḥ karmadhārayaḥ iti . ekasañjñādhikāraḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7253: coditam . akriyamāṇe hi anavakāśā karmadhārayasañjñā tatpuruṣasañjñām bādheta . paravacane
GS24pmbhasuu:7254: hi niyamānupapatteḥ ubhayasañjñābhāvaḥ . yasya punaḥ paraṅkāryatvam niyamānupapatteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7255: tasya ubhayoḥ sañjñayoḥ bhāvaḥ siddhaḥ . katham . pūrvā tasya karmadhārayasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:7256: parā tatpuruṣasañjñā . katham . evam sa vakṣyati . pūrvakālaikasarvajaratpurāṇanavakevalāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7257: samānādhikaraṇena karmadhārayaḥ iti . evam sarvam karmadhārayaprakaraṇam anukramya
GS24pmbhasuu:7258: tasya ante śritādiḥ tatpuruṣaḥ iti . tatra ārambhasāmarthyāt ca karmadhārayasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:7259: paraṅkāryatvāt ca tatpuruṣasañjñā bhaviṣyati . nanu ca yasya api ekasañjñādhikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7260: tasya api tatpuruṣasañjñāpūrvikā karmadhārayasañjñā . katham . anuvṛttiḥ kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7261: . paryāyaḥ prasajyeta . ekā sañjñā iti vacanāt na asti yaugapadyena sambhavaḥ . tatpuruṣatve
GS24pmbhasuu:7262: dvigucagrahaṇam . tatpuruṣatve dvigucagrahaṇam kartavyam . tatpuruṣaḥ dviguḥ ca iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7263: cakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . akriyamāṇe hi cakāre anavakāśā dvigusañjñā tatpuruṣasañjñām bādheta
GS24pmbhasuu:7264: . paravacane hi niyamānupapatteḥ ubhayasañjñābhāvaḥ . yasya punaḥ paraṅkāryatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:7265: niyamānupappateḥ tasya ubhayoḥ sañjñayoḥ bhāvaḥ siddhaḥ . katham . pūrvā tasya dvigusañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:7266: parā tatpuruṣasañjñā. katham . evaṃ sa vakṣyati . taddhitārthottarapadasamāhāre ca
GS24pmbhasuu:7267: saṅkhyāpūrvaḥ dviguḥ iti . evam sarvam dviguprakaraṇam anukramya tasya ante śritādiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7268: tatpuruṣaḥ iti . tatra ārambhasāmarthyāt ca dvigusañjñā paraṅkāryatvāt ca tatpuruṣasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:7269: bhaviṣyati . nanu ca yasya api ekasañjñādhikāraḥ tasya api tatpuruṣasañjñāpūrvikā
GS24pmbhasuu:7270: dvigusañjñā . katham . anuvṛttiḥ kriyate . paryāyaḥ prasajyeta . ekā sañjñā iti vacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7271: na asti yaugapadyena saṃbhavaḥ . gatidivaḥkarmahetumatsu cagrahaṇam . gatidivaḥkarmahetumatsu
GS24pmbhasuu:7272: cagrahaṇam kartavyam . upasargāḥ kriyāyoge gatiśca iti cakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . akriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:7273: hi cakāre anavakāśaḥ pasargasañjñā gatisañjñām bādheta . paravacane hi niyamānupapatteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7274: ubhayasañjñābhāvaḥ . yasya punaḥ paraṅkāryatvam niyamānupapatteḥ tasya ubhayoḥ sañjñayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7275: bhāvaḥ siddhaḥ . katham . pūrvā tasya upasargasañjñā parā gatisañjñā . atra ārambhasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7276: ca upasargasañjñā paraṅkāryatvāt ca gatisañjñā bhaviṣyati . nanu ca yasya api ekasañjñādhikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7277: tasya upasargasañjñāpūrvikā gatisañjñā . katham . anuvṛttiḥ kriyate . paryāyaḥ prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:7278: . ekā sañjñā iti vacanāt na asti yaugapadyena saṃbhavaḥ . gatisañjñā api anavakāśā
GS24pmbhasuu:7279: sā vacanāt bhaviṣyati . sāvakāśā gatisañjñā . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . ūryādīni avakāśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7280: prādīnāṃ yā gatisañjñā sā anavakāśā . gati . divaḥ karma . sādhakatamam karaṇam divaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7281: karma ca iti cakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . akriyamāṇe hi cakāre anavakāśā karmasañjñā karaṇasañjñām
GS24pmbhasuu:7282: bādheta . paravacane hi niyamānupapatteḥ ubhayasañjñābhāvaḥ . yasya punaḥ paraṅkāryatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:7283: niyamānupapatteḥ tasya ubhayoḥ sañjñayoḥ bhāvaḥ siddhaḥ . katham . pūrvā tasya karmasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:7284: parā karaṇasañjñā . katham . evam sa vakṣyati . divaḥ sādhakatamam karma . tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7285: karaṇam . karaṇasañjñām ca bhavati sādhakatamam . diva iti nivṛttam . tatra ārambhasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7286: ca karmasañjñā paraṅkāryatvāt ca karaṇasañjñā bhaviṣyati . nanu ca yasya api ekasañjñādhikāraḥtasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7288: katham . anuvṛttiḥ kriyate . paryāyaḥ prasajyeta . ekā sañjñā iti vacanāt na asti
GS24pmbhasuu:7289: yaugapadyena saṃbhavaḥ . divaḥ karma . hetumat . svatantraḥ kartā tatprayojako hetuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7290: ca iti cakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . akriyamāṇe hi cakāre anavakāśā hetusañjñā kartṛsañjñām
GS24pmbhasuu:7291: bādheta . paravacane hi niyamānupapatteḥ ubhayasañjñābhāvaḥ . yasya punaḥ paraṅkāryatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:7292: niyamānupapatteḥ tasya ubhayoḥ sañjñayorbhāvaḥ siddhaḥ . katham . pūrvā tasya hetusañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:7293: parā kartṛsañjñā . katham . evam sa vakṣyati . svatantraḥ prayojakaḥ hetuḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7294: tataḥ kartā . kartṛsañjñaḥ ca bhavati svatantraḥ . prayojakaḥ iti nivṛttam . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:7295: ārambhasāmarthyāt ca hetusañjñā paraṅkāryatvāt ca kartṛsañjñā bhaviṣyati . nanu ca
GS24pmbhasuu:7296: yasya api ekasañjñādhikāraḥ tasya api kartṛsañjñāpūrvikā hetusañjñā . katham . anuvṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7297: kriyate . paryāyaḥ prasajyeta . ekā sañjñā iti vacanāt na asti yaugapadyena saṃbhavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7298: . gurulaghusañjñe nadīghisañjñe . gurulaghusañjñe nadīghisañjñe bādheyātām . gārgibandhuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7299: vātsībandhuḥ vaitram viviniyya . paravacane hi niyamānupatteḥ ubhayasañjñābhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7300: . yasya punaḥ paraṅkāryatvam niyamānupatteḥ tasya ubhayoḥ sañjñayoḥ bhāvaḥ siddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7301: . katham . pūrve tasya nadīghisañjñe pare gurulaghusañjñe . tatra ārambhasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7302: ca nadīghisañjñe paraṅkāryatvāt ca gurulaghusañjñe bhaviṣyataḥ . nanu ca yasya api
GS24pmbhasuu:7303: ekasañjñādhikāraḥ tasya api nadīghisaṃghisañjñāpūrvike gurulaghusañjñe . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:7304: anuvṛttiḥ kriyate . paryāyaḥ prasajyeta . ekā sañjñā iti vacanāt na asti yaugapadyena
GS24pmbhasuu:7305: sambhavaḥ . parasmaipadasañjñām puruṣasañjñā . parasmaipadasañjñām puruṣasañjñā bādheta
GS24pmbhasuu:7306: . paravacane hi niyamānupapatteḥ ubhayasañjñābhāvaḥ . yasya punaḥ paraṅkāryatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:7307: niyamānupapatteḥ tasyobhayoḥ sañjñayoḥ bhāvaḥ siddhaḥ . katham . pūrvā tasya puruṣasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:7308: parā parasmaipadasañjñā . katham . evaṃ sa vakṣyati . tiṅaḥ trīṇi trīṇi prathamamadhyottamāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7309: iti . evam sarvam puruṣaniyamam anukramya tasya ante laḥ parasmaipadam iti . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:7310: ārambhasāmārthyāt ca puruṣasañjñā paraṅkāryatvāt ca parasmaipadasañjñā bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:7311: . nanu ca yasya api ekasañjñādhikaraḥ tasya api parasmaipadasañjñāpūrvikā puruṣasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:7312: . katham . anuvṛttiḥ kriyate . paryāyaḥ prasajyeta. ekā sañjñā iti vacanāt na asti
GS24pmbhasuu:7313: yaugapadyena sambhavaḥ . parasmaipadasañjñā api anavakāśā sā vacanāt bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7314: sāvakāśā parasmaipadasañjñā . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . śatṛkvasū avakāśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7316: 308-313 paravacane siti padaṃ bham . paravacane siti padam bhasañjñamapi prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:7317: . ayam te yoniḥ ṛtviyaḥ . prajam vindāma ṛtvijayām . ārambhasāmarthyāt ca padasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:7318: paraṅkāryatvāt ca bhasañjñā prāpnoti . gatibuddhyādīnām ṇyantānām karma kartṛsañjñam
GS24pmbhasuu:7319: . gatibuddhyādīāṃ ṇyantānām karma kartṛsañjñam api prāpnoti . ārambhasāmarthyāt ca
GS24pmbhasuu:7320: karmasañjñā padasañjñā paraṅkāryatvāt ca kartṛsañjñā prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7321: jñāpayati na karmasañjñāyām kartṛsañjñā bhavati iti yat ayam hṛkroḥ anyatarasyām
GS24pmbhasuu:7322: iti antarasyāṅgrahaṇam karoti . śeṣavacanam ca ghisañjñānivṛttyartham . śeṣagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7323: ca kartavyam . śeṣaḥ ghi asakhi iti . kim prayojanam . ghisāñjñānivṛttyartham . nadīsañjñāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:7324: ghisañjñā mā bhūt iti . śakaṭyai paddhatyai buddhayai dhenvai . itarathā hi paraṅkāryatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7325: ca ghisañjñā ārambhasāmarthyāt ca ṅiti hrasvaḥ ca iti nadīsañjñā . na vā asambhavāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7326: . na vā asambhavāt . na vā kartavyam . nadīsañjñāyām ghisañjñā kasmāt na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7327: . asambhavāt . kaḥ asau asambhavaḥ . hrasvalakṣaṇā hi nadīsañjñā ghisañjñāyām ca
GS24pmbhasuu:7328: guṇaḥ . hrasvalakṣaṇā hi nadīsañjñā ghisañjñāyām ca guṇena bhavitavyam . tatra vacanaprāmāṇyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7329: nadīsañjñāyām ghisañjñābhāvaḥ . tatra vacanaprāmāṇyāt nadīsañjñāyām ghisañjñā na
GS24pmbhasuu:7330: bhaviṣyati . kim kāraṇam . āśrayābhāvāt . āśrayābhāvāt nadīsañjñāyām ghisañjñānivṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7331: iti cet yaṇādeśābhāvaḥ . āśrayābhāvāt nadīsañjñāyām ghisañjñānivṛttiḥ iti cet evam
GS24pmbhasuu:7332: ucyate yaṇādeśaḥ api na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . nadyāśrayatvāt yaṇādeśasya hrasvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7333: nadīsañjñābhāvaḥ . nadyāśrayaḥ yaṇādeśaḥ . yadā nadīsañjñayā ghisañjñā bādhitā tata
GS24pmbhasuu:7334: uttarakālam yaṇādeśena bhavitavyam . nadyāśrayatvāt yaṇādeśasya hrasvasya nadīsañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:7335: bhaviṣyati . bahuvrīhyartham tu . bahvrīhipratiṣedhārtham tu śeṣagrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7336: . śeṣaḥ bavuvrīhiḥ iti . kiṃ prayojanam . prayojanamavyayībhāvopamānadvigukṛllopeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:7337: . avyayībhāve . unmattagaṅgam lohitagaṅgam . upamāne . śastrīśyāmā kumudaśyenī .
GS24pmbhasuu:7338: dvigu . pañcagavam daśagavam . kṛllope . niṣkauśāmbiḥ nirvārāṇasiḥ . tatra śeṣavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7339: doṣaḥ saṅkhyāsamānādhikaraṇañsamāseṣu bahuvrīhipratiṣedhaḥ . tatra śeṣavacanāt doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7340: bhavati . saṅkhyāsamānādhikaraṇañsamāseṣu bahuvrīheḥ pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . saṅkhyā
GS24pmbhasuu:7341: . dvīrāvatīkaḥ deśaḥ trīrāvatīkaḥ deśaḥ . samānādhikaraṇa . vīrpuruṣakaḥ grāmaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7342: nañsamāse . abrāhmaṇakaḥ deśaḥ avṛṣalakaḥ deśaḥ . kṛllope ca śeṣavacanāt prādibhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7343: na bahuvrīhiḥ . kṛllope ca śeṣavacanāt prādibhiḥ na prāpnoti . prapatitaparṇaḥ praparṇakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7344: prapatitapalāśaḥ prapalāśakaḥ iti . atha ekasañjñādhikāre katham sidhyati . ekasañjñādhikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:7345: vipratiṣedhād bahuvrīhiḥ . ekasañjñādhikāre vipratiṣedhāt bahuvrīhiḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7346: ekasañjñādhikāre vipratiṣedhāt bahuvrīhiḥ iti cet ktārthe pratiṣedhaḥ . ekasañjñādhikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:7347: vipratiṣedhāt bahuvrīhiḥ iti cet ktārthe pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . niṣkauśāmbiḥ nirvārāṇasiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7348: . tatpuruṣaḥ atra bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . tatpuruṣaḥ iti cet anyatra ktārthāt pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7349: . tatpuruṣaḥ iti cet anyatra ktārthāt pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . prapatitaparṇaḥ praparṇakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7350: pratitatpalāśaḥ prapalāśakaḥ iti . siddham tu prādīnām ktārthe tatpuruṣavacanāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:7351: siddhametat . katham . prādīnām ktārthe tatpuruṣaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7353: 313-317 kāni punaḥ asya yogasya prayojanāni . prayojanam hrasvasañjñām dīrghaplutau
GS24pmbhasuu:7354: . hrasvasañjñām dīrghaplutasañjñe bādhete . tiṅsārvadhātukam liṅliṭoḥ ārdhadhātukam
GS24pmbhasuu:7355: . tiṅaḥ sārvadhātukasañjñām liṅliṭoḥārdhadhātusañjñā bādhate . apatyam vṛddham yuvā
GS24pmbhasuu:7356: . apatyam vṛddham yavusañjñā bādhate . ghim nadī . ghisañjñām nadīsañjñā bādhate
GS24pmbhasuu:7357: . laghu guru . laghusañjñām gurusañjñā bādhate . padam bham . padasañjñām bhasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:7358: bādhate . apādādnam uttarāṇi dhanuṣā vidhyati kaṃsapātryām bhuṅkte gām dogdhi dhanuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7359: vidhyati iti . apādānasañjñām uttarāṇi kārakāṇi bādhante . kva . dhanuṣā vidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:7360: . kaṃsapātryām bhuṅkte . gām dogdhi . dhanuḥ vidhyati . dhanuṣā vidhyati iti apāyayuktatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7361: ca dhruvamapāye apādānam iti apādānasañjñā prāpnoti sādhakatamam karaṇam iti ca karaṇasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:7362: . karaṇasañjñā parā sā bhavati . kaṃsapātryām bhuṅkte iti atra apāyuktatvāt ca dhruvamapāye
GS24pmbhasuu:7363: apādānamiti apādānasañjñā prāpnoti ādhāraḥ adhikaraṇam iti ca adhikaraṇasañjñā .
GS24pmbhasuu:7364: adhikaraṇasañjñā parā sā bhavati . gām dogdhi iti atra apāyuktatvāt ca apādānasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:7365: prāpnoti karturīpsitatamam karma . iti ca karmasañjñā . karmasañjñā parā sā bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7366: . dhanuḥ vidhyati iti atra apāyayuktatvāt ca apādānasañjñā prāpnoti svatantraḥ kartā
GS24pmbhasuu:7367: iti ca . kartṛsañjñā parā sā bhavati . krudhadruhoḥ upsṛṣṭayoḥ karma saṃpradānam
GS24pmbhasuu:7368: . krudhadruhoḥ upsṛṣṭayoḥ karmasañjñā saṃpradānasañjñām bādhate . karaṇam parāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:7369: sādhu asiḥ chinatti . karaṇasañjñām parāṇi āṇi bādhante . kva . dhanuḥ vidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7370: asiḥ chinatti iti . adhikaraṇam karma geham praviśati . adhikaraṇasañjñām karmasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:7371: bādhate . kva . geham praviśati iti . adhikaraṇam kartā sthālī pacati . adhikaraṇasañjñām
GS24pmbhasuu:7372: karmasañjñā bādhate . kva . sthālī pacati iti . adhyupasṛṣṭam karma . adhyupasṛṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:7373: karma adhikaraṇasañjñām bādhate . gatyupasargasañjñe karmapravacanīyasañjñā . gatyupasargasañjñe
GS24pmbhasuu:7375: ātmanepadasañjñā bādhate . samāsasañjñāḥ ca . samāsasañjñāḥ ca yāḥ yāḥ parāḥ anavakāśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7376: ca tāḥ tāḥ pūrvāḥ sāvakāśāḥ ca bādhante .
GS24pmbhasuu:7378: 317-319 arthavat prātipadikam . arthavat prātipadikasañjñam bhavati . guṇavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:7379: ca . guṇavacanasañjñam ca bhavati arthavat . samāsakṛttaddhitāvyayasarvanāma asarvaliṅgā jātiḥ . 41 //
GS24pmbhasuu:7381: samāsasañjñā ca vaktavyā . kṛt . kṛtsañjñā ca vaktavyā . taddhita . taddhitasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:7382: ca vaktavyā . avyaya . avyayasañjñā ca vaktavyā . sarvanāma . sarvanāmasañjñā ca
GS24pmbhasuu:7383: vaktavyā . asarvaliṅgā jātiḥ iti etat ca vaktavyam . saṅkhyā . saṅkhyāsañjñā ca vaktavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:7384: . ḍu ca . ḍusañjñā ca vaktavyā . kā punaḥ ḍusañjñā . ṣaṭsañjñā . ekadravyopaniveśinī
GS24pmbhasuu:7385: sañjñā . ekadravyopaniveśinī sañjñā iti etat ca vaktavyam . kimartham idamucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7386: . yathānyāse eva bhūyiṣṭhāḥ sañjñāḥ kriyante . santi ca eva atra kāḥ cit apūrvāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7387: sañjñāḥ . api ca etena ānupūrvyeṇa sanniviṣṭānām bādhanam yathā syāt . guṇavacanasañjñāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7388: ca etābhiḥ bādhanam yathā syāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7390: 319-325 vipratiṣedhaḥ iti kaḥ ayam śabdaḥ . vipratipūrvāt siddheḥ karmavyatihāre
GS24pmbhasuu:7391: karmavyatihāre ghañ . itaretarapratiṣedhaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . anyonyapratiṣedhaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7392: . kaḥ punaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . dvau prasaṅgau anyārthau ekasmin saḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7393: dvau prasaṇgau yadā anyārthau bhavataḥ ekasmin ca yugapat prāptnutaḥ saḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7394: . kva punaḥ anyārthau kva ca ekasmin yugapat prāpnutaḥ . vṛkṣābhyām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7395: vṛkṣeṣu iti anyārthau vṛkṣebhyaḥ iti atra yugapat prāpnutaḥ . kim ca syāt . ekasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:7397: ca parasyāḥ ca prāpteḥ ubhayaprasaṅgaḥ . idam vipratiṣiddham yat ucyate ekasmin yugapadasambhavātpūrvaparaprāpteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7398: ubhayaprasaṅgaḥ iti . katham hi ekasmin ca nāma yugapadasambhavaḥ syāt pūrvasyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7399: ca parasyāḥca prāpteḥ ubhayaprasaṅgaḥ ca syāt . na etat vipratiṣiddham . yat ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7400: ekasmin yugapadasambhavāt iti kāryayoḥ yugapadasambhavaḥ śāstrayoḥ ubhayaprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7401: . tṛjādibhiḥ tulyam . tṛjādibhiḥ tulyam paryāyaḥ prāpnoti . tat yathā tṛjādayaḥ paryāyeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:7402: bhavanti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam tṛjādayaḥ paryāyeṇa bhavanti . anavayaprasaṅgāt pratipadam
GS24pmbhasuu:7403: vidheḥ ca . anavayavena prasajyante pratipadam ca vidhīyante . apratipattiḥ vā ubhayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7404: tulyabalatvāt . apratipattiḥ vā punaḥ ubhayoḥ śāstrayoḥ syāt . kim kāraṇam . tulyabalatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7405: . tulyabale hi ubhe śāstre . tat yathā . dvayoḥ tulyabalayoḥ ekaḥ preṣyaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7406: . saḥ tayoḥ paryāyeṇa kāryam karoti . yadā tam ubhau yugapat preṣayataḥ nānādikṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:7407: ca kārye bhavataḥ tadā yadi asau avirodhārthī bhavati tataḥ ubhayoḥ na karoti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:7408: punaḥ kāraṇam ubhayoḥ na karoti . yaugapadyāsambhavāt . na asti yaugapadyena sambhavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7409: . tatra pratipattyartham vacanam . tatra pratipattyartham idam vaktavyam . tavyadādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:7410: tu aprasiddhiḥ . tavyadādīnām tu kāryasya aprasiddhiḥ . na hi kim cit tavyadādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:7411: niyamakāri śāstram ārabhyate yena tavyadādayaḥ syuḥ . yaḥ ca bhavatā hetuḥ vyapadiṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7412: apratipattiḥ vā ubhayoḥ tulyabalatvāt iti tulyaḥ sa tavyadādiṣu . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7413: anavakāśāḥ tavyadādayaḥ ucyante ca . te vacanāt bhaviṣyanti . yaḥ ca bhavatā hetuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7414: vyapadiṣṭaḥ tṛjādibhiḥ tulyam paryāyaḥ prāpnoti iti tulyaḥ sa tavyadādiṣu . etāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:7415: iha sūtram vipratiṣedhe param iti . paṭhiṣyati hi ācāryaḥ sakṛdgatau virpratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:7416: yat bādhitam tat bādhitam eva iti . punaḥ ca paṭhiṣyati punaḥ prasaṅgavijñānāt siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:7417: iti . kim punaḥ iyatā sūtreṇa ubhayam labhyam . labhyam iti āha . katham . iha bhavatā
GS24pmbhasuu:7418: dvau hetū vyapadiṣṭau . tṛjādibhiḥ tulyam paryāyaḥ prāpnoti iti ca apratipattiḥ vā
GS24pmbhasuu:7419: ubhayoḥ tulyabalatvāt iti ca . tat yadā tāvat eṣaḥ hetuḥ tṛjādibhiḥ tulyam paryāyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7420: prāpnoti iti tadā vipratiṣeḍhe param iti anena kim kriyate . niyamaḥ . vipratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:7421: param eva bhavati iti . tadā etat upapannam bhavati sakṛdgatau vipratiṣedhe yat bādhitam
GS24pmbhasuu:7422: tat bādhitam eva iti . yadā tu eṣaḥ hetuḥ apratipattiḥ vā ubhayoḥ tulyabalatvāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7423: tadā vipratiṣedhe param iti anena kim kriyate . dvāram . vipratiṣedhe param tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:7424: bhavati tasmin krṭe yadi pūrvam api prāpnoti tat api bhavati . tadā etat upapannam
GS24pmbhasuu:7425: bhavati punaḥprasaṅgavijñānāt siddham iti . vipratiṣedhe param iti uktvā aṅgādhikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:7426: pūrvam iti vaktavyam . kim kṛtam bhavati . pūrvavipratiṣedhāḥ na paṭhitavyāḥ bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:7428: nuṭ iti . katham ye paravipratiṣedhāḥ . ittvottvābhyām guṇavṛddhī bhavataḥ vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:7429: iti . sūtram ca bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . katham ye pūrvavipratiṣedhāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7430: vipratiṣedhe param iti eva siddham . katham . paraśabdaḥ ayam bahvarthaḥ . asti eva
GS24pmbhasuu:7431: vyavasthāyām vartate . tat yathā pūrvaḥ paraḥ iti . asti anyārthe vartate . paraputraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7432: parabhāryā . anyaputraḥ anyabhāryā iti gamyate . asti prādhānye vartate . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:7433: param iyaṃ brāhmāṇī asmin kuṭumbe . pradhānam iti gamyate . asti
GS24pmbhasuu:7434: iṣṭavācī paraśabdaḥ . tat yathā . param dhāma gataḥ iti . iṣṭam dhāma iti gamyate . tat yaḥ iṣṭavācī paraśabdaḥ tasya idam grahaṇam . vipratiṣedhe param yat iṣṭam tat bhavati .

GS24pmbhasuu:7437: . prayojanam yaṇekādeśettvottvāni guṇavṛddhidvirvacanāllopasvarebhyaḥ . guṇāt yaṇādeśaḥ : syonaḥ ,

GS24pmbhasuu:7453: nivṛttau satyām udāttanivṛttisvaraḥ prasajyeta . na atra udāttanivṛttisvaraḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:7454: . kim kāraṇam . na gośvansāvavarṇa iti pratiṣedhāt . na eṣaḥ udāttanivṛttisvarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7455: pratiṣedhaḥ . kasya tarhi . tṛtīyādisvarasya . yatra tarhi tṛtīyādisvaraḥ na asti
GS24pmbhasuu:7456: . śunaḥ paśya iti . evam tarhi na lākṣaṇikasya pratiṣedham śiṣmaḥ . kim tarhi . yena

GS24pmbhasuu:7458: na asti . bahhuśunī iti . yadi punaḥ ayam udāttanivṛttisvarasya api pratiṣedhaḥ vijñāyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:7459: . na evam śakyam . iha api prasajyeta :
GS24pmbhasuu:7460: kumārī iti . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati nodāttanivṛttisvaraḥ śuni avatarati
GS24pmbhasuu:7461: iti yat ayam śvanśabdam gaurādiṣu paṭhati . antodāttārtham yatnam karoti . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:7462: hi syān ṅīpā eva . svarāt ekādekādeśaḥ . sautthitiḥ vaikṣmāṇiḥ . svaraḥ ca prāpnoti

GS24pmbhasuu:7472: anavakāśatvāt . na vā etat antaraṅgeṇa api sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . savarṇadīrghatvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7473: anavakāśatvāt . anavakāśam savarṇadīrghatvam āt guṇam bādheta . na etat antaraṅge

GS24pmbhasuu:7484: . veñ vānīyam śo śānīyam glai glānīyam mlai mlānīyam glācchattram clācchatram . āttvam

GS24pmbhasuu:7498: . iyaṅādeśaḥ guṇāt . iyaṅādeśaḥ guṇāt bhavati antaraṅgataḥ prayojanam . dhiyati riyati

GS24pmbhasuu:7500: . uvaṅādeśaḥ ca iti vaktavyam . prādudruvat prāsusruvat . śveḥ samprasāraṇapūrvatvam

GS24pmbhasuu:7503: . pūrvatvam bhavati antaraṇgataḥ . hvaḥ ākāralopāt . hvaḥ ākāralopāt pūrvatvam bhavati

GS24pmbhasuu:7505: paratvāt ākāralopaḥ syāt . pūrvatvam bhavati antaraṅgataḥ . svaraḥ lopāt . svaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7506: lopāt bhavati antaraṅgataḥ prayojanam . aupagavī saudāmanī . svaraḥ ca prāpnoti lopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7507: ca . paratvāt lopaḥ syāt . svaraḥ bhavati antaraṅgataḥ . pratyayavidhiḥ ekādeśāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7508: . pratyayavidhiḥ ekādeśāt bhavati antaraṅgataḥ prayojanam . agniḥ indraḥ vāyuḥ udakam
GS24pmbhasuu:7509: . pratyayavidhiḥ ca prāpnoti ekādeśaḥ ca . paratvāt ekādeśaḥ syāt . /
GS24pmbhasuu:7510: pratyayavidhiḥ bhavati antaraṅgataḥ . yaṇādeśāt ca iti vaktavyam . agniḥ atra vāyuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7511: atra . lādeśaḥ varṇavidheḥ . lādeśaḥ varṇavidheḥ bhavati antaraṅgataḥ prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:7512: . pacatu atra paṭhtu atra . lādeśaḥ ca prāpnoti yaṇādeśaḥ ca .paratvāt yaṇādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7513: syāt . lādeśaḥ bhavati antaraṅgataḥ . tatpuruṣāntodāttatvam pūrvapadaprakṛtisvarāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7515: pūrvaśālāpriyaḥ aparaśālāpriyaḥ ṭatpuruṣāntodāttatvam ca prāpnoti pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaratvam
GS24pmbhasuu:7516: ca . paratvāt pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaratvam syāt . tatpuruṣāntodāttatvam bhavati antaraṅgataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7517: . etāni asyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ prayojanāni yadartham eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā .
GS24pmbhasuu:7519: 335-339 yadi santi prayojanāni iti eṣā paribhāṣā kriyate nanu ca iyam api kartavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:7520: asiddham bahiraṅgalakṣaṇam antaraṅgalakṣaṇe iti . kim prayojanam . pacāvedam pacāmedam
GS24pmbhasuu:7521: . asiddhatvāt bahiraṅgalakṣaṇasya guṇasya antaraṇgalakṣaṇam aitvam mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7522: ubhe tarhi kartavye . na iti āha . anayā eva siddham . iha api syonaḥ syonā iti asiddhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7523: bahiraṅgalakṣaṇasya guṇasya antaraṅgalakṣaṇaḥ yaṇādeśo bhaviṣyati . yadi asiddham
GS24pmbhasuu:7524: bahiraṅgalakṣaṇam antaraṅgalakṣaṇe iti ucyate akṣadyūḥ hiraṇyadyūḥ asiddhatvāt asiddhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7525: bahiraṅgalakṣaṇasya ūṭhaḥ antaraṅgalakṣaṇaḥ yaṇādeśaḥ na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7526: . asiddham bahiraṅgalakṣaṇam antaraṅgalakṣaṇe iti uktvā tataḥ vakṣyāmi na ajānantarye
GS24pmbhasuu:7527: bahiṣṭvaprakḷptiḥ iti . sā tarhi eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā . na kartavyā . ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7528: jñāpayati bhavati eṣā paribhāṣā iti yat ayam ṣatvatukoḥ asiddhaḥ iti āha . iyam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:7529: paribhāṣā kartavyā asiddham bahiraṅgalakṣaṇamantaraṅgalakṣaṇe iti . eṣā ca na kartavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:7530: . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati bhavati eṣā paribhāṣā iti yat ayam vāhaḥ ūṭh iti ūṭham
GS24pmbhasuu:7531: śāsti . tasya doṣaḥ pūrvapadottarapadayoḥ vṛddhisvarau ekādeśāt . tasya etasya lakṣaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7532: doṣaḥ pūrvapadottarapadayoḥ vṛddhisvarau ekādeśāt antaraṅgataḥ abhinirvṛttāt na prāpnutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7533: . pūrvaiṣukāmaśamaḥ aparaiṣukāmaśamaḥ guḍodakam tilodakam . udake akevale iti pūrvottarapadayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7534: vyapavargābhāvāt na syāt . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati pūrvottarapadayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7535: tāvat kāryam bhavati na ekādeśaḥ iti yat ayam na indrasya parasya iti pratiṣedham
GS24pmbhasuu:7536: śāsti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . indre dvau acau . tatra ekaḥ yasya īti ca iti lopena
GS24pmbhasuu:7537: hriyate aparaḥ ekādeśena . tataḥ anackaḥ indraḥ sampannaḥ . tatra kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ vṛddheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7538: . paśyati tu ācāryaḥ pūrvapadottarapadyoḥ tāvatkāryam bhavati na ekādeśaḥ iti tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7539: na indrasya parasya iti pratiṣedham śāsti . yaṇādeśāt iyuvau . yaṇādeśāt iyuvau antaraṅgataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7540: abhinirvṛttāt na prāpnutaḥ . vaiyākaraṇaḥ sauvaśvaḥ iti . lakṣaṇam hi bhavati yvoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7541: vṛddhiprasaṅge iyuvau bhavataḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . anavakāśau iyuvau . aci iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7542: ucyate . kim punaḥ kāraṇam aci ti ucyate . iha mā bhūtām . aitikāyanaḥ aupagavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7543: iti . stām atra iyuvau lopaḥ vyoḥ vali iti lopaḥ bhaviṣyati . yatra tarhi lopaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:7544: asti . praiyamedhaḥ praiyamgavaḥ iti . usi pararūpāt ca . usi pararūpāt ca antaraṅgataḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:7546: yā iti etasya iy bhavati iti . katham tarhi . yās iti etasya iy bhavati iti . luk
GS24pmbhasuu:7547: lopayaṇayavāyāvekādeśebhyaḥ . lopayaṇayavāyāvekādeśebhyaḥ luk balīyān iti vaktavyam
