GS24pmbhasuu:7549: yavamatyate . yaṇādeśāt . grāmaṇyaḥ kulam grāmaṇikulam senānyaḥ kulam senānikulam
GS24pmbhasuu:7550: . ayavāyāvekādeśebhyaḥ . gave hitam gohitam rāyaḥ kulam raikulam nāvaḥ kulam naukulam
GS24pmbhasuu:7551: vṛkādbhayam vṛkabhayam . luk ca prāpnoti ete ca vidhayaḥ . paratvāt ete vidhayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7552: syuḥ . luk balīyān iti vaktavyam luk yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:7554: 340-344 yū iti kimartham . khaṭvā mālā . kim ca syāt . khaṭvābandhuḥ mālābandhuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7555: . nadī bandhuni iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ prasajyeta . iha ca bahukhaṭvakaḥ iti nadyṛtaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:7556: iti nityaḥ kap prasajyeta . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na āpaḥ nadīsañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:7557: bhavati iti yat ayam ṅeḥ ām nadyāmnībhyaḥ iti pṛthak ābgrahaṇam karoti . iha tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:7558: mātre mātuḥ iti āṭ nadyāḥ iti āṭ prasajyeta . kim punaḥ idam dīrghayoḥ grahaṇam āhosvid
GS24pmbhasuu:7559: hrasvayoḥ . kim cātaḥ . yadi dīrghayoḥ grahaṇam yū iti nirdeśaḥ na upapadyate . dīrghāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7560: hi pūrvasavarṇaḥ pratiṣidhyate . uttaratra ca viśeṣaṇam na prakalpeta yū hrasvau
GS24pmbhasuu:7561: iti . yadi yū na hrasvau . atha hrasvau na yū . yū hrasvau ceti vipratiṣiddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:7562: atha hrasvayoḥ he śakaṭe atra api prasajyeta . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . avaśyam atra vibhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:7564: he śakaṭi he śakaṭe iti . iha tarhi śakaṭibandhuḥ iti nadī bandhuni iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7565: prasajyeta . iha ca bahuśakaṭiḥ iti nadyṛtaḥ ceti nityaḥ kap prasajyeta . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7566: doṣaḥ . ṅiti hrasvaḥ ca iti ayam niyamārthaḥ bhaviṣyati . ṅiti eva yū hrasvau nadīsañjñau
GS24pmbhasuu:7567: bhavataḥ na nyatra iti . kaimarthakyāt niyamaḥ bhavati . vidheyam na asti iti kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:7568: . iha ca asti vidheyam . kim . nityā nadīsañjñā prāptā sā vibhāṣā vidheyā . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:7569: apūrvaḥ vidhiḥ astu niyamaḥ astu iti apūrvaḥ eva vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati na niyamaḥ . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:7570: ayam nityaḥ yogaḥ syāt prakalpeta niyamaḥ . bāḍham prakalpeta . nityaḥ tarthi bhaviṣyati /
GS24pmbhasuu:7571: tat katham . yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . idam asti . yū stryākhyau nadī na iyaṅuvaṅsthānau
GS24pmbhasuu:7572: astrī vāmi . tataḥ ṅiti . ṅiti ca iyaṅuvaṅsthānau yū vā astrī nadīsañjñau na bhavataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7573: . tataḥ hrasvau . hrasvau ca yū stryākhyau ṅiti nadīsañjñau bhavataḥ . iyaṅuvaṅsthānau
GS24pmbhasuu:7574: vā na iti ca nivṛttam . yadi evam śakaṭaye atra guṇaḥ na prāpnoti . dvitīyaḥ yogavibhāgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7575: kariṣyate . śeṣagrahaṇam na kariṣyate . katham . idam asti . yū stryākhyau nadī na
GS24pmbhasuu:7576: iyaṅuvaṅsthānau astrī vāmi . tataḥ ṅiti . ṅiti ca iyaṅuvaṅsthānau yū vā astrī nadīsañjñau
GS24pmbhasuu:7577: na bhavataḥ . tataḥ hrasvau . hrasvau ca yū stryākhyau ṅiti nadīsañjñau bhavataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7578: . tataḥ hrasvau . hrasvau ca yū stryākhyau ṅiti nadīsañjñau bhavataḥ . iyaṅuvaṅsthānau
GS24pmbhasuu:7579: vā na iti ca nivṛttam . tataḥ ghi . ghisañjñau ca bhavataḥ stryākhyau yū hrasvau
GS24pmbhasuu:7580: ṅiti . tataḥ asakhi . sakhivarjitau ca yū hrasvau ghisañjñau bhavataḥ . stryākhyau
GS24pmbhasuu:7581: ṅiti iti ca nivṛttam . yadi tarhi śeṣagrahaṇam na kriyate na arthaḥ ekena api yogavibhāgena
GS24pmbhasuu:7582: . aviśeṣeṇa nadīsañjñā utsargaḥ . tasyāḥ hrasvayoḥ ghisañjñā bādhikā . tasyām nityāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:7583: prāptāyām ṅiti vibhāṣā ārabhyate . atha vā punaḥ astu dīrghayoḥ . nanu ca uktam nirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7584: na upapadyate . dīrghāt hi pūrvasavarṇaḥ pratiṣidhyate . vā chandasi iti evam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:7585: . chandasi iti ucyate na ca idam chandaḥ . chandovat sūtrāṇi bhavanti iti . yat api
GS24pmbhasuu:7586: ucyate uttaratra viśeṣeṇam na prakalpeta yū hrasvau iti . yadi yū na hrasvau atha
GS24pmbhasuu:7587: hrasvau na yū . yū hrasvau iti vipratiṣiddham iti . na etat vipratiṣiddham . āha
GS24pmbhasuu:7588: ayam yū hrasvau iti . yadi yū na hrasvau . atha hrasvau na yū . te evam vijñāsyāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7589: yvoḥ yau hrasvau iti . kau ca yvoḥ hrasvau . savarṇau . atha stryākhyau iti kaḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:7590: śabdaḥ . striyam ācakṣāte stryākhyau . yadi evam stryākhyāyau iti prāpnoti . anupasarge
GS24pmbhasuu:7591: hi kaḥ vidhīyate . na tarhi idānīm idam bhavati yasmin daśa sahasrāṇi putre jāte
GS24pmbhasuu:7592: gavām dadau . brāhmaṇebhyaḥ priyākhyebhyaḥ saḥ ayam uñchena jīvati . chandovat kavayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7593: kurvanti . na hi eṣā iṣṭiḥ . evam tarhi karmasādhanaḥ bhaviṣyati :
GS24pmbhasuu:7594: striyām ākhyāyete stryākhyau . yadi karmasādhanaḥ kṛtstriyāḥ dhātustriyāḥ ca na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:7595: . tantryai lakṣmyai śriyai bhruvai . evam tarhi bahuvrīhiḥ bhaviṣyati . striyām ākhyā
GS24pmbhasuu:7596: anayoḥ stryākhyau . evam api kṛtstriyāḥ dhātustriyāḥ ca na sidhyati . tantryai lakṣmyai
GS24pmbhasuu:7597: śriyai bhruvai . evam tarhi vic bhaviṣyati . atha vā punaḥ astu kaḥ eva . striyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7598: ācakṣāte stryākhyau iti . nanu ca uktam stryākhyāyau iti prāpnoti . anupasarge hi
GS24pmbhasuu:7599: kaḥ vidhīyate . mūlavibhujādipāṭhāt kaḥ bhaviṣyati . evam ca kṛtvā saḥ api adoṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7600: bhavati yat uktam yasmin daśa sahasrāṇi putre jāte gavām dadau . brāhmaṇebhyaḥ priyākhyebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7603: 345-349 atha ākhyāgrahaṇam kimartham . nadīsañjñāyām ākhyāgrahaṇam strīviṣayārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:7604: . nadīsañjñāyām ākhyāgrahaṇam strīviṣayārtham . strīviṣayau eva yau nityam tayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7605: eva nadīsañjñā yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt grāmaṇye senānye striyai iti . prathamaliṅgagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7606: ca . prathamaliṅgagrahaṇam ca kartavyam . prathamaliṅge yau stryākhau iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7607: . kim prayojanam . prayojanam kviblupsamāsāḥ . kumāryai brāhmaṇāya . lup . kharakuṭyai
GS24pmbhasuu:7608: brāhmaṇāya . atitantryai brāhmaṇāya atilakṣmyai brāhmaṇāya . tat tarhi vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7609: . na vaktavyam . avayavastrīviṣayatvāt siddham . avayavaḥ atra strīviṣayaḥ tadāśrayā
GS24pmbhasuu:7610: nadīsañjñā bhaviṣyati . avayavastrīviṣayatvāt siddham iti cet iyaṅuvaṅsthānapratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:7612: siddham iti cet iyaṅuvaṅsthānapratiṣedhe yaṇsthānayoḥ api yvoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:7613: . ādhyai pradhyai brāhmaṇyai . kim kāraṇam . avayavasya iyaṅuvaṅsthānatvāt . avayavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7614: atra iyaṅuvaṅsthānaḥ . siddham tvaṅgarūpagrahaṇāt yasya aṅgasya iyuvau tatpratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7615: . siddham etat . katham . aṅgarūpam gṛhyate . yasya aṅgasya iyuvau bhavataḥ tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7616: idam grahaṇam . na ca etasya aṅgasya iyuvau bhavataḥ . hrasveyuvsthānapravṛttau ca
GS24pmbhasuu:7617: strīvacane . hrasvau ca iyuvsthānau ca pravṛttau ca prāk ca pravṛtteḥ strīvacanau
GS24pmbhasuu:7618: eva nadīsañjñau bhavataḥ iti vaktavyam . śakaṭyai atiśakaṭyai brāmaṇāṇyai . kva mā
GS24pmbhasuu:7619: bhūt . śakaṭaye atiśakaṭaye brāhmaṇāya . dhenvai atidhenvai brāhmaṇyai . kva mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:7620: . dhenave atidhenave brāhmaṇāya . śriyai atiśriyai brāhmaṇyai . kva mā bhūt . śriye
GS24pmbhasuu:7621: atiśriye brāhmaṇāya . bhruvai atibhruvai brāhmaṇyai . kva mā bhūt . bhruve atibhruve
GS24pmbhasuu:7623: hrasvau ca iyuvsthānau ca pravṛttau api strīvacanau eva nadīsañjñau bhavataḥ iti vaktavyam : śakaṭyai ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7624: atiśakaṭyai brāmaṇāṇyai . kva mā bhūt . śakaṭaye atiśakaṭaye brāhmaṇāya . dhenvai
GS24pmbhasuu:7625: atidhenvai brāhmaṇyai . kva mā bhūt . dhenave atidhenave brāhmaṇāya . śriyai atiśriyai
GS24pmbhasuu:7626: brāhmaṇyai . kva mā bhūt . śriye atiśriye brāhmaṇāya . bhruvai atibhruvai brāhmaṇyai
GS24pmbhasuu:7627: . kva mā bhūt . bhruve atibhruve brāhmaṇāya . kimartham punaḥ idam ucyate . prathamaliṅgagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7629: sarvam etat vikalpate iti . tat ācāryaḥ suhṛt bhūtvā anvācaṣṭe hrasvau ca iyuvsthānau ca pravṛttau ca prāk ca pravṛtteḥ strīvacanau eva iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7631: 349-350 yogavibhāgaḥ kartavyaḥ . ṣaṣthīyuktaḥ chandasi . ṣaṣthīyuktaḥ patiśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7632: chandasi ghisañjñaḥ bhavati . tataḥ vā . vā chandasi sarve vidhayo bhavati . supām
GS24pmbhasuu:7633: vyatyayaḥ . tiṅām vyatyayaḥ . varṇavyatyayaḥ . liṅgavyatyayaḥ . kālavyatyayaḥ . puruṣavyatyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7634: . ātmanepadavyatyayaḥ . parasmaipadavyatyayaḥ . supām vyatyayaḥ . yukta māta asīt
GS24pmbhasuu:7635: dhuri dakṣiṇāyāḥ . dakṣiṇāyām iti prāpte . tiṅām vyatyayaḥ . caṣalam ye aśvayūpaya
GS24pmbhasuu:7636: takṣati . takṣanti iti prāpte . varṇavyatyayaḥ . triṣṭubhaujaḥ śubhitam ugravīram
GS24pmbhasuu:7637: . suhitamiti prāpte . liṅgavyatyayaḥ . madhoḥ gṛhṇāti madhoḥ tṛptāḥ iva āsate . madhunaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7638: iti prāpte . kālavyatyayaḥ . śvaḥ agnīn ādhāsyamānena śvaḥ somena yakṣamāṇena . śvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7639: ādhātā śvaḥ yaṣṭā iti prāpte . puruṣavyatyayaḥ . adhā saḥ vīraiḥ daśabhiḥ viyūyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7640: . viyūyāt iti prāpte . ātmanepadavyatyayaḥ . brahmacāriṇam icchate . icchati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7641: prāpte . parasmaipadavyatyayaḥ . pratīpam anyaḥ ūrmiḥ yudhyati /
GS24pmbhasuu:7642: anvīpam anyaḥ ūrmiḥ yudhyati . yudhyate iti prāpte .
GS24pmbhasuu:7644: 351-356 yasmāt iti vyapadeśāya . atha pratyayagrahaṇam kimartham . yasmāt vidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7645: tadādi pratyaye aṅgam iti iyati ucyamāne strī iyatī strīyati iti atra api prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:7646: . pratyayagrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ bhavati . atha vidhigrahaṇam kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:7647: . yasmāt pratyayaḥ tadādi pratyaye aṅgam iti iyati ucyamāne dadhi adhunā madhu adhunā
GS24pmbhasuu:7648: atrāpi prasajyeta . vidhigrahaṇeṇa punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ bhavati . tat etat pratyayagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:7649: vidhigrahaṇena ca samuditena kriyate sanniyogaḥ . yasmāt yaḥ pratyayaḥ vidhīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7650: tadādi tasmin aṅgasañjñam bhavati iti . atha tadādigrahaṇam kimartham . aṅgasañjñāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:7651: tadādivacanam syādinumartham . aṅgasañjñāyām tadādigrahaṇam kriyate syādyartham numartham
GS24pmbhasuu:7652: ca . syādyartham tāvat . kariṣyāvaḥ kariṣyāmaḥ . numartham . kuṇḍāni vanāni . mitsuṭoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7653: upasamkhyānam . mitvataḥ suḍvataḥ ca pasamkhyānam kartavyam . mitvataḥ . bhinatti
GS24pmbhasuu:7654: chinatti abhinat acchinat . suḍvataḥ . sañcarakastu sañcaskaruḥ . kim punaḥ kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7655: na sidhyati . suṭaḥ bahiraṅgatvāt . bahiraṅgaḥ suṭ . antaraṅgaḥ guṇaḥ . asiddham
GS24pmbhasuu:7656: bahiraṅgam antaraṅge . vakṣyati etat saṃyogādeḥ guṇavidhāne saṃyogopadhagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7657: kṛñartham . yadi saṃyogopadhagrahaṇam kriyate na arthaḥ saṃyogādigrahaṇena . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:7658: api sasvaratuḥ sasvaruḥ iti saṃyogopadhasya iti eva siddham . bhavet evamarthena
GS24pmbhasuu:7659: na arthaḥ . idam tu na sidhyati sañcakaratuḥ sañcaskaruḥ . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:7660: . iha tasya vā grahaṇam bhavati tadādeḥ vā na cedam tat na api tadādi . siddham tu
GS24pmbhasuu:7661: tadādyādivacanāt . siddham etat . katham . tadādyādi aṅgasañjñam bhavati iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7662: . kim idam tadādyādi iti . tasya ādiḥ tadādiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7663: tadādiḥ ādiḥ yasya tadidam tadādyādi iti . saḥ tarhi tathā nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . uttarapadalopaḥ atra draṣṭavyaḥ . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:7666: evam tadādyādi tadādi iti . tadekadeśavijñānāt vā siddham . tadekadeśavijñānāt vā
GS24pmbhasuu:7667: siddham etat . tadekadeśabhūtam tadgrahaṇena gṛhyate. tad yathā . gaṅgā yamunā devadattā
GS24pmbhasuu:7668: iti . anekā nadī gaṅgām yamunām ca praviṣṭā gaṅgāyamunāgrahaṇena gṛhyate . tathā
GS24pmbhasuu:7669: devadattāsthaḥ garbhaḥ devadattāgrahaṇena gṛhyate . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . iha ke cit
GS24pmbhasuu:7670: śabdāḥ aktaparimāṇānām arthānām vācakāḥ bhavanti ye ete saṅkhyāśabdāḥ parimāṇaśabdāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7672: ekena api apāye na bhavanti . droṇaḥ khārī āḍhakam iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:7673: naivā adhike bhavanti na ca nyūne . ke cit yāvat eva tat bhavati tāvat eva āhuḥ ye ete jātiśabdāḥ guṇaśabdāḥ ca . tailam ghṛtam iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:7674: khāryām api bhavanti droṇe api . śuklaḥ nīlaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:7675: himavati api bhavati vaṭakaṇikāmātre api dravye . aṅgasañjñā ca api aktaparimāṇānām
GS24pmbhasuu:7676: kriyate . sā kena adhikasya syāt . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati tadekadeśabhūtam
GS24pmbhasuu:7677: tadgrahaṇena gṛhyate iti yat ayam na idamadasoḥ akoḥ iti sakakārayoḥ pratiṣedham
GS24pmbhasuu:7678: śāsti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . idamadasoḥ kāryam ucyamānam kaḥ prasaṅgo yat sakakārayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7679: syāt . paśyati tu ācāryaḥ tadekadeśabhūtam tadgrahaṇena gṛhyate iti tataḥ sakakārayoḥ pratiṣedham śāsti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7681: 356-359 atha dvitīyam pratyayagrahaṇam kimartham . pratyayagrahaṇam padādau aprasaṅgārtham . pratyayagrahaṇam kriyate padādau aṅgasañjñā mā bhūt iti . kim ca syāt . stryartham ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7683: bhvartham : aṅgasya iti iyaṅuvaṅau syātām . parimāṇārtham ca . parimāṇārtham ca dvitīyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7684: pratyayagrahaṇam kriyate . yasmāt pratyayavidhiḥ tadādi aṅgam iti iyati ucyamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:7685: dāśatayasya api aṅgasañjñā prasajyeta . tat tarhi kartavyam . na kartavyam . kena
GS24pmbhasuu:7686: idānīm aṅgakāryam bhaviṣyati . pratyaye iti prakṛtya aṅgakāryam adhyeṣye . pratyaye
GS24pmbhasuu:7687: iti prakṛtya aṅgakāryam adhīṣe prākarot upaihiṣṭa upasargāt pūrvau aḍāṭau prāpnutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7688: . siddham tu pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ tadāditadantavijñānāt . siddham etat . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:7689: . pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ pratyayaḥ vihitaḥ tadādeḥ tadantasya ca grahaṇam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7690: iti eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā . kaḥ punaḥ atra viśeṣaḥ eṣā paribhāṣā kriyeta pratyayagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7691: vā . avaśyam eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā . bahūni etasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ prayojanāni . prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:7693: . saṅghātasya dhātusañjñā prāpnoti . prātipadika . devadattḥ gārgyaḥ . saṅghātasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7694: prātipadikasañjñā prāpnoti . pratyaya . mahāntam putram icchati . samghātāt pratyayotpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7695: prāpnoti . samāsa . ṛddhasya rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ . samghātasya samāsasañjñā prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7696: taddhitavidhi . devadattaḥ gārgyāyaṇaḥ . samghātāt taddhitotpattiḥ prāpnoti . svara
GS24pmbhasuu:7697: . devadattaḥ gārgyaḥ . samghātsya ñnityādiḥ nityam iti ādyudāttatvam prāpnoti . pratyayagrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:7698: yasmāt sa tadādeḥ tadantasya grahaṇam bhavati iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . sā tarhi eṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:7699: paribhāṣā kartavyā . na kartavyā . evam vakṣyāmi :
GS24pmbhasuu:7700: yasmāt pratyayavidhiḥ tadādi pratyaye gṛhyamāṇe gṛhyate . tataḥ aṅgam . aṅgasañjñam ca bhavati yasmā tpratyayavidhiḥ tadādi pratyaye .
GS24pmbhasuu:7702: 359-360 yadi pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ tadādeḥ grahaṇam bhavati iti ucyate avatapenakulasthitam
GS24pmbhasuu:7703: te etat udakeviśīrṇam te etat sagatikena sanakulena ca samāsaḥ na prāpnoti . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:7704: tarhi pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ tadādeḥ grahaṇam bhavati iti uktvā tataḥ vakṣyāmi :
GS24pmbhasuu:7705: kṛdgrahaṇe gatikārakapūrvasya api . kṛdgrahaṇe gatikārakapūrvasya api grahaṇam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7706: ti eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā . kāni etasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ prayojanāni . prayojanam samāsataddhitavidhisvarāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7707: . samāsa . avatapenakulasthitam te etat udakeviśīrṇam te etat sagatikena sanakulena
GS24pmbhasuu:7708: ca samāsaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . samāsa . taddhitavidhi . sāṅkūṭinam vyāvakrośī . samghātāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7709: taddhitopattiḥ siddhā bhavati . taddhitavidhi . svara . dūrāt āgataḥ dūrādāgataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7710: iti . antaḥ thāthaghañktājabitrakāṇām iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . kṛdgrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:7711: gatikārakapūrvasya api grahaṇam bhavati iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . sā tarhi eṣā paribhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:7712: kartavyā . na kartavyā . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati bhavati eṣā paribhāṣa iti yat
GS24pmbhasuu:7713: ayam gatiḥ anantaraḥ iti anantaragrahaṇam karoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7715: 361-362 antagrahaṇam kimartham na suptiṅ padam iti eva ucyate . kena idānīm tadantānām
GS24pmbhasuu:7716: bhaviṣyati . tadantavidhinā . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . padasañjñāyām antavacanam anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:7718: kriyate jñāpakārtham . kim jñāpyam . etat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ anyatra sañjñāvidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:7719: pratyayagrahaṇe tadantavidhiḥ na bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . taraptamau
GS24pmbhasuu:7720: ghaḥ . taraptamabantasya ghasañjñā na bhavati . kim ca syāt . kumārī gauritarā .
GS24pmbhasuu:7721: ghādiṣu nadyāḥ hrasvaḥ bhavati iti hrasvatvam prasajyeta . yadi etat jñāpyate sanādyantāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7722: dhātavaḥ iti antagrahaṇam kartavyam . kṛttaddhitasamāsāḥ ca iti antagrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7723: . idam tṛtīyam jñāpakārtham . dve tāvat kriyete nyāse eva . yat api ucyate kṛttaddhitasamāsāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7724: ca iti antagrahaṇam kartavyam iti . na kartavyam . arthavat iti vartate kṛttaddhāntam
GS24pmbhasuu:7725: ca eva arthavat na kevalāḥ kṛtaḥ taddhitāḥ vā .
GS24pmbhasuu:7727: 363 kimartham idam ucyate na subantam padam iti eva siddham . niyamārthaḥ ayamārambhaḥ . nāntameva kye padasañjñam bhavati na anyat . kva mā bhūt . vācyati srucyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7729: 363-364 asarvanāmasthāne iti ucyate . tatra te rājā takṣā asarvanāmasthāne iti padasañjñāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7730: pratiṣedhaḥ prasajyeta . na apratiṣedhāt . na ayam prasajyapratiṣedhaḥ sarvanāmasthāne
GS24pmbhasuu:7731: na iti . kim tarhi . paryudāsaḥ ayam yat anyat sarvanāmasthānāt iti . sarvanāmasthāne
GS24pmbhasuu:7732: avyāpāraḥ . yadi kena citprāpnoti tena bhaviṣyati . pūrveṇa ca prāpnoti . aprāpteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7733: vā . atha vā anantarā yā prāptiḥ sā pratiṣidhyate . kutaḥ etat . antarasya vidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7734: vā bhavati pratiṣedhaḥ vā iti . pūrvā prāptiḥ apratiṣiddhā tayā bhaviṣyati . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:7735: ca iyam prāptiḥ pūrvām prāptim bādhate . na utsahate pratiṣiddhā satī bādhitum .
GS24pmbhasuu:7736: atha vā yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . svādiṣu pūrvam padasañjñam bhavati . tataḥ sarvanāmasthāne
GS24pmbhasuu:7737: ayacipūrvam padasañjñam bhavati . tato bham . bhasañjñam ca bhavati yajādau asarvanāmasthāne
GS24pmbhasuu:7738: iti . yadi tarhi sau api padam bhavati ecaḥ plutavikāre padāntagrahaṇam coditam iha
GS24pmbhasuu:7739: mā bhūt bhadram karoṣi gauḥ iti tasmin kriyamāṇe api prāpnoti . vākyapadayoḥ antyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7740: iti evam tat . bhuvadvadbhyaḥ dhārayadbhyaḥ etayoḥ padasañjñā vaktavyā . bhuvadvadbhyaḥ dhārayadvadbhyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7742: 365-366 bhasañjñāyām uttarapadalope ṣaṣaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . bhasañjñāyām uttarapadalope
GS24pmbhasuu:7743: ṣaṣaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . anukampitaḥ ṣaḍaḍguliḥ ṣaḍikaḥ . siddham acaḥ sthānivattvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7744: . siddham etat . katham . acaḥ sthānivadbhāvāt bhasañjñā na bhaviṣyati . iha api
GS24pmbhasuu:7745: tarhi prāpnoti . vāgāśīrdattaḥ vācikaḥ iti . vakṣyati etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:7746: siddham ekākṣarapūrvapadānām uttarapadalopavacanāt iti . iha api tarhi prāpnoti ṣaḍaḍguliḥ ṣaḍikaḥ iti . vakṣyati etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:7747: ṣaṣaḥ ṭhājādivacanāt siddham iti . nabhoṅgiromanuṣām vati upasamkhyānam . nabhoṅgiromanuṣām
GS24pmbhasuu:7748: vati upasamkhyānam kartavyam . nabhasvat aṅgirasvat manuṣvat . vṛṣaṇ vasvaśvayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7749: . vṛṣaṇ iti etasya vasvaśayoḥ bhasañjñā vaktavyā . vṛṣaṇvasuḥ vṛṣaṇaśvasya yat śiraḥ vṛṣaṇaśvasya mene .
GS24pmbhasuu:7751: 366-367 arthagrahaṇam kimartham na tasau matau iti eva ucyeta . tasau matau iti iyati
GS24pmbhasuu:7752: ucyamāne ihaiva syāt payasvān yaśasvān . iha na syāt payasvī yaśasvī . arthagrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:7753: punaḥ kriyamāṇe matupi ca siddham bhavati yaḥ ca nyaḥ tena samānārthaḥ tasmin ca
GS24pmbhasuu:7754: . yadi arthagrahaṇam kriyate payasvān yaśasvān atra na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . na
GS24pmbhasuu:7755: hi matup matvarthe vartate . matup api matvarthe vartate . tat yathā devadattaśālāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:7756: brāhmaṇā ānīyantām iti ukte yadi devadattaḥ pi brāhmaṇaḥ bhavati saḥ api ānīyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:7758: 367 ubhayasañjñānyapi iti vaktavyam . saḥ suṣṭhubhā saḥ ṛkvatā gaṇena .
GS24pmbhasuu:7760: 368-372 bahuṣu bahuvacanam iti ucyate . keṣu bahuṣu . artheṣu . yadi evam vṛkṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7761: plakṣaḥ atra api prāpnoti . bahavaḥ te arthāḥ mūlam skandhaḥ phalam palāśam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7762: evam tarhi ekavacanam dvivacanam bahuvacanamiti śabdasañjñāḥ etāḥ . yeṣu artheṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:7763: svādayaḥ vidhīyante teṣu bahuṣu . keṣu ca artheṣu svādayaḥ vidhīyante . karmādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:7764: . na vai karmādayaḥ vibhaktyarthāḥ . ke tarhi . ekatvādayaḥ . ekatvādiṣu api vai
GS24pmbhasuu:7765: vibhakyartheṣu avaśyam karmādayaḥ nimittatvena upādeyāḥ . karmaṇaḥ ekatve karmaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7766: dvitve karmaṇaḥ bahutve iti . saḥ tarhi tathā nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na hi antareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:7767: bhāvapratyayam guṇapradhānaḥ bhavati nirdeśaḥ . iha ca :
GS24pmbhasuu:7769: tat eke manyante iti paratvāt ekavacanam prāpnoti . bahuṣu bahuvacanam iti eṣaḥ yogaḥ paraḥ kariṣyate . sūtraviparyāsaḥ kṛtaḥ bhavati . iha ca :
GS24pmbhasuu:7771: bahuḥ sūpaḥ iti paratvāt bahuvacanam prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yat tāvat ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7772: na hi antareṇa bhāvaprayayam guṇapradhānaḥ bhavati nirdeśaḥ iti tan na . antareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:7773: api bhāvapratyayam guṇapradhānaḥ bhavati nirdeśaḥ . katham . iha kadā cit guṇaḥ guṇiviśeṣakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7774: bhavati . tat yathā paṭaḥ śuklaḥ iti . kadā cit ca guṇinā guṇaḥ vypadiśyate . paṭhasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7775: śuklaḥ iti . tat yadā tāvat guṇaḥ guṇiviśeṣakaḥ bhavati paṭaḥ śuklaḥ iti tadā sāmānādhikaraṇyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7776: guṇaguṇinoḥ . tadā na antareṇa bhāvapratyayam guṇapradhānaḥ bhavati nirdeśaḥ . yadā
GS24pmbhasuu:7777: tu guṇinā guṇaḥ vyapadiśyate paṭasya śuklaḥ iti svapradhānaḥ tadā guṇaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7778: tadā dravye ṣaṣṭhī . tadā antareṇa bhāvapratyayam guaṇapradhānaḥ bhavati nirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7779: . na ca iha vayam ekatvādibhiḥ karmādīn viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . kim tarhi . karmādibhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7780: ekatvādīn viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . katham . ekasmin ekavacanam . kasyaikasmin . karmaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7781: . dvayoḥ dvivacanam . kayoḥ dvayoḥ . karmaṇoḥ . bahuṣu bahuvacanam . keṣām bahuṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:7782: . karmaṇām iti . katham bahuṣu bahuvacanamiti . etat eva jñāpayati ācāryaḥ nānādhikaraṇavācī
GS24pmbhasuu:7783: yaḥ bahuśabdaḥ tasya idam grahaṇam na vaipulyavācinaḥ iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:7784: . yat uktam bahuḥ odanaḥ bahuḥ sūpaḥ iti paratvāt bahuvacanam prāpnoti iti sa doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7785: na bhavati . yat apyucyate iti eke manyante tat eke manyanta iti paratvāt ekavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:7786: prāpnoti iti na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ekaśabdaḥ ayam bahvarthaḥ . asti eva samkhyāvācī . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:7787: yathā ekaḥ dvau bahavaḥ iti . asti asahāyavācī . tat yathā ekāgnayaḥ ekahalāni ekākibhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7788: kṣudrakaiḥ jitam iti . asti anyārthe vartate . tat yathā sadhamādaḥ dyumnaḥ ekāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7789: tāḥ . anyāḥ iti arthaḥ . tat yaḥ anyārthe vartate tasya eṣaḥ prayogaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7791: 372-375 kimartham punaḥ idam ucyate . suptiṅām aviśeṣavidhānāt dṛṣtaviprayogatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7792: ca niyamārtham vacanam . supaḥ aviśeṣeṇa prātipadikamātrāt vidhīyante . tiṅaḥ aviśeṣeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:7793: dhātumātrāt vidhīyante . tatra etat syāt yadi apyaviśeṣeṇa vidhīyante na eva viprayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7794: lakṣyate iti . dṛṣṭaviprayogatvāt ca . dṛśyate khalu api viprayogaḥ . tadyathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:7796: pādāḥ me sukumārāḥ iti . suptiṅoḥ aviśeṣavidhānāt dṛṣṭaviprayogatvāt ca vyatikaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7797: prāpnoti . iṣyate ca avyatikaraḥ syāt iti . tat ca antareṇa yatnam na sidhyati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7798: niyamārtham vacanam . evamartham idam ucyate . atha etasmin niyamārthe sati kim punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7802: bahuṣu eva bahuvacanam iti . āhosvit arthaniyamaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:7805: bahuṣu bahuvacanam eva iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . tatra pratyayaniyame avyayānām
GS24pmbhasuu:7806: padasañjñābhāvaḥ asubantatvāt . tatra pratyayaniyame avyayānām padasañjñā na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:7807: . uccaiḥ nīcaiḥ iti . kim kāraṇam . asubantatvāt . arthaniyame siddham . arthaniyame
GS24pmbhasuu:7808: siddham bhavati . astu arthaniyamaḥ . atha vā punaḥ astu pratyayaniyamaḥ . nanu ca uktam :
GS24pmbhasuu:7809: tatra pratyayaniyame avyayānām padasañjñābhāvaḥ asubantatvāt iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7810: . supām karmādayaḥ api arthāḥ saṅkhyā ca eva tathā tiṅām . supām saṅkhyā ca eva arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7811: karmādayaḥ ca . tathā tiṅām . prasiddhaḥ niyamaḥ tatra . prasiddhaḥ tatra niyamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7812: . niyamaḥ prakṛteṣu vā . atha vā prakṛtān arthān apekṣya niyamaḥ . ke ca prakṛtāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7813: . ekatvādayaḥ . ekasmin eva ekavacanam na dvayoḥ na bahuṣu . dvayoḥ eva dvivacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:7814: naikasmin na bahuṣu . bahuṣu eva bahuvacanam na dvayoḥ na ekasmin iti . atha vā ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7815: jñāpayati utpadyante avyayebhyaḥ svādayaḥ iti yat ayam avyayāt āpsupaḥ iti avyayāt lukam śāsti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7817: 376-379 kim idam kārake iti . sañjñānirdeśaḥ . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:7818: anucyamānam gaṃsyate . iha hi vyākaraṇe ye vā ete loke pratītapadārthakāḥ śabdāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7819: taiḥ nirdeśāḥ kriyante paśuḥ apatyam devatā iti yāḥ vā etāḥ kṛtrimāḥ ṭighughabhasañjñāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7820: tābhiḥ . na ca ayam loke dhruvādīnām pratītapadārthakaḥ śabdaḥ na khalu api kṛtrimā
GS24pmbhasuu:7821: sañjñā anyatra avidhānāt . sañjñādhikāraḥ ca ayam . tatra kim anyat śakyam vijñātum
GS24pmbhasuu:7822: anyat ataḥ sañjñāyāḥ . kārake iti sañjñānirdeśaḥ cetsañjñinaḥ api nirdeśaḥ . kārake
GS24pmbhasuu:7823: iti sañjñānirdeśaḥ cetsañjñinaḥ api nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . sādhakam nirvartakam kārakasañjñam
GS24pmbhasuu:7824: bhavati iti vaktavyam . itarathā hi aniṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ grāmasya samīpāt āgacchati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7825: akārakasya . itarathā hi aniṣṭam prasajyeta . akārakasya api apādādanasañjñā prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:7826: . kva . grāmasya samīpāt āgacchati iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na atra grāmaḥ apāyayuktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7827: . kim tarhi . samīpam . yadā ca grāmaḥ apāyayuktaḥ bhavati bhavati tadā apādānasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:7828: . tat yathā grāmāt āgacchati iti . karmasañjñāprasaṅgaḥ akathitasya brāhmaṇasya putram
GS24pmbhasuu:7829: panthānam pṛcchati iti . karmasañjñā ca prāpnoti akathitasya. kva . brāhmaṇasya putram
GS24pmbhasuu:7830: panthānam pṛcchati iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ayam akathitaśabdaḥ asti eva saṅkīrtite
GS24pmbhasuu:7831: vartate . tat yathā kaḥ cit kam cit sañcakṣya āha asau atra akathitaḥ . asaṃkīrtitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7832: iti gamyate . asti aprādhānye vartate . tat yathā akathitaḥ asau grāme akathitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7833: asau nagare iti ucyate yaḥ yatra apradhānaḥ bhavati . tat yadā aprādhānye akathitśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7834: vartate tadā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ karmasañjñāprasaṅgaḥ akathitasya brāhmaṇasya putram panthānam
GS24pmbhasuu:7835: pṛcchati iti . apādānam ca vṛkṣasya parṇam patati iti . apādānasañjñā ca prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:7836: . kva . vṛkṣasya parṇam patati . kuḍyasya piṇḍaḥ patati iti . nā vā apāyasyāvivakṣitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7837: . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . apāyasya avivakṣitatvāt . na atra apāyaḥ vivakṣitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7838: . kim tarhi . sambandhaḥ . yadā ca apāyaḥ vivakṣitaḥ bhavati bhavati tadā apādānasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:7839: . tat yathā . vṛkṣāt parṇam patati iti . sambandhastu tadā na vivakṣitaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7840: . na jñāyate kaṅkasya vā kurarasya vā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7842: 379-386 ayam tarhi doṣaḥ karmasañjñāprasaṅgaḥ ca akathitasya brāhmaṇasya putram panthānam
GS24pmbhasuu:7843: pṛcchati iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kārakaḥ iti mahatī sañjñā kriyate . sañjñā ca nāma
GS24pmbhasuu:7844: yataḥ na laghīyaḥ . kutaḥ etat . laghvartham hi sañjñākāraṇam . tatra mahatyāḥ sañjñāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7845: karaṇe etatprayojanam anvarthasañjñā yathā vijñāyeta . karoti iti kārakam iti . anvartham
GS24pmbhasuu:7846: iti cet akartari kartṛśabdānupapattiḥ . anvartham iti cet akartari kartṛśabdaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:7847: upapadyate . karaṇam kārakam adhikaraṇam kārakam iti . siddham tu pratikārakam kriyābhedāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7848: pacādīnām karaṇādhikaraṇayoḥ kartṛbhāvaḥ . siddhaḥ karaṇādhikaraṇayoḥ kartṛbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7849: . kutaḥ . pratikārakam kriyābhedāt pacādīnām . pacādīnām hi pratikārakam kriyā bhidyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7850: . kim idam pratikārakam iti . kārakam kārakam prati pratikārakam . kaḥ asau pratikārakam
GS24pmbhasuu:7853: devadattaḥ pacati iti ucyate . tatra tadā paciḥ vartate . eṣaḥ pradhānakartuḥ pākaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7854: . etat pradhānakartuḥ kartṛtvam . droṇam pacati āḍhakam pacati ti sambhavanakriyā
GS24pmbhasuu:7855: dhāraṇakriyā ca adhikaraṇasya pākaḥ . droṇam pacati āḍhakam pacati iti sambhavanakriyām
GS24pmbhasuu:7856: dhāraṇakriyām ca kurvatī sthālī pacati iti ucatye . tatra tadā paciḥ vartate . eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7857: dhikaraṇasya pākaḥ . etat adhikaraṇasya kartṛtvam . edhāḥ pakṣyanti ā viklitteḥ jvaliṣyanti
GS24pmbhasuu:7858: iti jvalvanakriyā karaṇasya pākaḥ . edhāḥ pakṣyanti ā viklitteḥ jvaliṣyanti iti kurvanti
GS24pmbhasuu:7859: kāṣṭhāni pacanti iti ucyante . tatra tadā paciḥ vartate . eṣaḥ karaṇasya pākaḥ .etat
GS24pmbhasuu:7860: karaṇasya kartṛtvam . udyamananipātanāni kartuḥ chidikriyā . udyamananipātanāni kurvan
GS24pmbhasuu:7861: devadattaḥ chinatti iti ucyate . tatra tadā chidiḥ vartate . eṣaḥ pradhānakartuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7862: chedaḥ . etat pradhānakartuḥ kartṛtvam . yat tat na tṛṇena tatparaśoḥ chedanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7863: yat tat samāne udyamane nipātane ca paraśunā chidyate na tṛṇena tat paraśoḥ chedanam
GS24pmbhasuu:7864: . avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam . itarathā hi asitṛṇayoḥ chedane aviśeṣaḥ syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:7865: yaḥ hi manyata udyamananipātanāt eva etat bhavati chinatti iti asitṛṇayoḥ chedane
GS24pmbhasuu:7866: na tasya viśeṣaḥ syāt . yat asinā chidyate tṛṇena api tat chidyeta . apādānādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:7867: tu aprasiddhiḥ . apādānādīnām kartṛtvasya aprasiddhiḥ . yathā hi bhavatā karaṇādhikaraṇayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7868: kartṛtvam nirdarśitam na tathā apādānādīnām kartṛtvam nidarśyate . na vā svatantraparatantratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7869: tayoḥ paryāyeṇa vacanam vacanāśrayā ca sañjñā . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7870: svatantraparatantratvāt . sarvatra eva atra svātantryam pāratantryam ca vivakṣitam
GS24pmbhasuu:7871: . tayoḥ paryāyeṇa vacanam . tayoḥ svātantryapāratantryayoḥ paryāyeṇa vacanam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:7872: . vacanāśrayā ca sañjñā bhaviṣyati . tat yathā . balāhakāt vidyotate . balāhake vidyotate
GS24pmbhasuu:7873: . balāhakaḥ vidyotate iti . kim tarhi ucyate apādānādīnām tu aprasiddhiḥ iti . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:7874: tarhi na brūmaḥ apādānādīnām kartṛtvasya aprasiddhiḥ iti . paryāptam karaṇādhikaraṇayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7875: kartṛtvam nidarśitam apādānīnām kartṛtvanirdarśanāya . paryāptaḥ hyekaḥ pulākaḥ sthālyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7876: nirdarśanāya . kim tarhi . sañjñāyāḥ aprasiddhiḥ . yāvatā sarvatra eva atra svātantryam
GS24pmbhasuu:7877: vidyate pāratantryam ca tatra paratvāt kartṛsañjñā eva prāpnoti . atra api na vā
GS24pmbhasuu:7878: svatantryaparatantratvāt tayoḥ paryāyeṇa vacanam vacanāśrayā ca sañjñā iti eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:7879: yathā punaḥ idam sthālyāḥ svātantryam nidarśitam sambhavanakriyām dhāraṇakriyām ca
GS24pmbhasuu:7880: kurvatī sthālī svatantrā iti kva idānīm paratantrā syāt . yat tat prakṣālanam parivartanam
GS24pmbhasuu:7881: vā . na vai evamartham sthālī upādiyate prakṣālanam parivartanam ca kariṣyāmi iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7882: . katham tarhi . sambhavanakriyām dhāraṇakriyām ca kariṣyati iti . tatra ca sau svatantrā
GS24pmbhasuu:7883: . kva idānīm paratantrā . evam tarhi sthālīsthe yatne kathyamāne sthālī svatantrā
GS24pmbhasuu:7884: kartṛsthe yatne kathyamāne paratantrā . nanu ca bhoḥ kartṛsthe api vai yatne kathyamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:7885: sthālī sambhavanakriyām dhāraṇakriyām ca karoti . tatra asau svatantrā . kva idānīm
GS24pmbhasuu:7886: paratantrā . evam tarhi pradhānena samavāye sthālī paratantrā vyavāye svatantrā .
GS24pmbhasuu:7887: tat yathā amātyādīnām rājñā saha samavāye pāratantryam vyavāye svātantryam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:7888: punaḥ pradhānam . kartā .katham punaḥ jñāyate kartā pradhānam iti . yat sarveṣu sādhaneṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:7889: samnihiteṣu kartā pravartayitā bhavati . nanu ca bhoḥ pradhānena api vai samavāye
GS24pmbhasuu:7891: . na hi kārakam iti anena adhikaraṇatvam uktam adhikaraṇamiti vā kārakatvam . ubhau
GS24pmbhasuu:7892: ca anyonyaviśeṣakau bhavataḥ . katham . ekadravyasamavāyitvāt . tat yathā gārgyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7893: devadattaḥ iti . na hi gārgyaḥ iti anena devadattatvam uktam devadattaḥ iti anena
GS24pmbhasuu:7894: vā gārgyatvam . ubhau ca anyonyaviśeṣakau bhavataḥ ekadravyasamavāyitvāt . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:7895: sāmānyabhūtā kriyā vartate tasyāḥ nirvartakam kārakam . atha vā yāvat brūyāt kriyāyāmiti
GS24pmbhasuu:7896: tāvat kārake iti . evam ca kṛtvā nirdeśaḥ upapannaḥ bhavati kārake iti . itarathā
GS24pmbhasuu:7899: 387-392 dhruvam iti kimartham . grāmāt āgacchati śakaṭena . na etat asti . karaṇasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:7900: atra bādhikā bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi grāmāt āgacchan kaṃsapātryām pāṇinā odanam bhuṅkte
GS24pmbhasuu:7901: iti . atra api adhikaraṇasañjñā bādhikā bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi vṛkṣasya parṇam patati
GS24pmbhasuu:7902: . kuḍyasya piṇḍaḥ patiti iti . jugupsāvirāmapramādārthānām upasamkhyānam . jugupsāvirāmapramādārthānām
GS24pmbhasuu:7903: upasamkhyānam kartavyam . jugupsā . adharmāt jugupsate. adharmāt bībhatsate . virāma /
GS24pmbhasuu:7904: dharmāt viramati. dharmāt nivartate . pramāda . dharmāt pramādyati . dharmāt muhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:7905: . iha ca upasamkhyānam kartavyam . sāmkāśyakebhyaḥ pāṭaliputrakāḥ abhirūpatarāḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7906: . tat tarhi idam vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . iha tāvat adharmāt jugupsate adharmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7907: bībhatsate iti . yaḥ eṣaḥ manuṣyaḥ prekṣāpūrvakārī bhavati saḥ paśyati duḥkhaḥ adharmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7908: na anena kṛtyam asti iti . saḥ buddhyā samprāpya nivartate . tatra dhruvamapāye apādānam
GS24pmbhasuu:7909: iti eva siddham . iha ca dharmāt viramati dharmāt nivartate iti dharmāt pramādyati
GS24pmbhasuu:7910: dharmāt muhyati iti . yaḥ eṣaḥ manuṣyaḥ sambhinnabuddhiḥ bhavati saḥ paśyati na idam
GS24pmbhasuu:7911: kim cit dharmaḥ nāma na enam kariṣyāmi iti . saḥ buddhyā samprāpya nivartate . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:7912: dhruvamapāye apādānam iti eva siddham . iha ca sāmkāśyakebhyaḥ pāṭaliputrakāḥ abhirūpatarāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7913: iti . yaḥ taiḥ sāmyam gatavān bhavati saḥ etatprayuṅkte . gatiyukteṣu apādānasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:7914: na papadyate adhruvatvāt . gatiyukteṣu apādānasañjñā na upapadyate . aśvāt trastāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7915: patitaḥ . rathāt pravītāt patitaḥ . sārthāt gacchataḥ hīnaḥ iti . kim kāraṇam . adhruvatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7916: . na vā adhrauvyasya avivikṣitatvāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . adhrauvyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7917: avivakṣitatvāt . na atra adhrauvyam vivakṣitam . kim tarhi . dhrauvyam . iha tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:7918: aśvāt trastāt patitaḥ iti . yat tadaśve aśvatvam āśugāmitvam tat dhruvam tat ca vivakṣitam
GS24pmbhasuu:7919: . rathāt pravītāt patitaḥ iti yat tat rathe rathatvam ramante asmin rathaḥ iti tat
GS24pmbhasuu:7920: dhruvam tat ca vivakṣitam . sārthāt gacchataḥ hīnaḥ iti yat tatsārthe sārthatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:7921: sahārthībhāvaḥ tat dhruvam tat ca vivakṣiktam . yadi api tāvat atra etat śakyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7922: vaktum ye tu ete atyantagatiyuktāḥ tatra katham . dhāvataḥ patitaḥ . tvaramāṇāt patitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7923: iti . atra api na vā adhrauvyasya avivakṣitatvāt iti eva siddham . katham punaḥ sataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7924: nāma avivakṣā syāt . sataḥ api avivakṣā bhavati . tat yathā alomikā eḍakā . anudarā
GS24pmbhasuu:7925: kanya iti . asataḥ ca vivakṣā bhavati . samudraḥ kuṇḍikā . vindhyaḥ vardhitakam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7927: 392-393 ayam yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum . katham vṛkebhyaḥ bibheti dasyubhyaḥ bibheti caurebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7928: trāyate dasyubhyaḥ trāyate iti . iha tāvat vṛkebhyaḥ bibheti dasyubhyaḥ bibheti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7929: . yaḥ eṣaḥ manuṣyaḥ prekṣāpūrvakārī bhavati saḥ paśyati yadi mām vṛkāḥ paśyanti dhruvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7930: me mṛtyuḥ iti . saḥ buddhyā samprāpya nivartate . tatra dhruvam apāye apādānam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7931: eva siddham . iha caurebhyaḥ trāyate dasyubhyaḥ trāyate iti . yaḥ eṣaḥ manuṣyaḥ prekṣāpūrvakārī
GS24pmbhasuu:7932: bhavati saḥ paśyati yadi imam paśyanti dhruvam asya vadhabandhaparikleśāḥ iti . saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7933: buddhyā samprāpya nivartate . tatra dhruvam apāye apādānam iti eva siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:7935: 393 ayam api yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum . katham adhyayanāt parājayate iti . yaḥ eṣaḥ manuṣyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7936: prekṣāpūrvakārī bhavati saḥ paśyati duḥkham adhyayanam durdharam ca guravaḥ ca durupacārāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7937: iti . saḥ buddhyā samprāpya nivartate . tatra dhruvam apāye apādānam iti eva siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:7939: 393-395 kim udāharaṇam . māṣebhyaḥ gāḥ vārayati . bhaved yasya māṣāḥ na gāvaḥ tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7940: māṣāḥ īpsitāḥ syuḥ . yasya tu khalu gāvaḥ na māṣāḥ katham tasya māṣāḥ īpsitāḥ syuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7941: . tasya api māṣāḥ eva īpsitāḥ . ātaḥ ca īpsitāḥ yavebhyḥ gāḥ vārayati . iha kūpāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7942: andham vārayati iti kūpe apādānasañjñā na prāpnoti . na hi tasya kūpaḥ īpsitaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7943: kaḥ tarhi . andhaḥ . tasya api kūpaḥ eva īpsitaḥ . paśyati ayam andhaḥ kūpam mā prāpat
GS24pmbhasuu:7944: iti . atha vā yathā eva asya anyatra apaśyataḥ īpsā evam kūpe api . iha agneḥ māṇavakam
GS24pmbhasuu:7945: vārayati iti māṇavake apādānasañjñā prāpnoti . karmasañjñātra bādhikā bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:7946: . agnau api tarhi bādhikā syāt . tasmāt vaktavyam karmaṇaḥ yat īpsitam iti īpsitepsitam
GS24pmbhasuu:7947: iti vā . vāraṇartheṣu karmagrahaṇānarthakyam kartuḥ īpsitatamam karma iti vacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7948: . vāraṇārtheṣu karmagrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . kartuḥ īpsitatamam karma
GS24pmbhasuu:7949: iti vacanāt . kartuḥ īpsitatamam karma iti eva siddham . ayam api yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum
GS24pmbhasuu:7950: . katham māṣebhyaḥ gāḥ vārayati iti . paśyati ayam yadi imāḥ gāvaḥ tatra gacchanti
GS24pmbhasuu:7951: dhruvam sasyavināśaḥ sasyavināśe adharmaḥ ca eva rājabhayam ca . saḥ buddhyā samprāpya
GS24pmbhasuu:7952: nivartate . tatra dhruvam apāye apādānam iti eva siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:7954: 396 ayam api yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum . katham upādhyāyāt antardhatte iti . paśyati ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:7955: yadi mām upādhyāyaḥ paśyati dhruvam preṣaṇam upālambhaḥ vā iti . saḥ buddhyā samprāpya
GS24pmbhasuu:7956: nivartate . tatra dhruvam apāye apādānam iti eva siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:7958: 396-398 upayoge iti kimartham . naṭasya śṛṇoti . granthikasya śṛṇoti . upayoge iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7959: ucyamāne api atra prāpnoti . eṣaḥ api hi upayogaḥ . ātaḥ ca upayogaḥ yat ārambhakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7961: granthikasya śroṣyāmaḥ iti . evam tarhi upayoge iti ucyate sarvaḥ ca upayogaḥ . tatra prakarṣagatiḥ vijñāsyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:7962: sādhīyaḥ yaḥ upayogaḥ iti . kaḥ ca sādhīyaḥ . yaḥ granthārthayoḥ . atha vā upayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7963: kaḥ bhavitum arhati . yaḥ niyamapūrvakaḥ . tat yathā upayuktāḥ māṇavakāḥ iti ucyante
GS24pmbhasuu:7964: ye ete niyamapūrvakam adhītavantaḥ bhavanti . kim punaḥ ākhyātā anupayoge kārakam
GS24pmbhasuu:7965: āhosvit akārakam . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . ākhyātā anupayoge kārakam iti cet akathitvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7966: karmasañjñāprasaṅgaḥ . ākhyātā anupayoge kārakam iti cet akathitvāt karmasañjñā prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:7967: . astu tarhi akārakam . akārakam iti cet upayogavacanānarthakyam . yadi akārakam
GS24pmbhasuu:7968: upayogavacanam anarthakam . astu tarhi kārakam . nanu ca uktam ākhyātā anupayoge
GS24pmbhasuu:7969: kārakam iti cet akathitatvāt karmasañjñāprasaṅgaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . parigaṇanam
GS24pmbhasuu:7970: tatra kriyate . duhiyācirudhipracchibhikṣiciñām iti . ayam api yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum
GS24pmbhasuu:7971: . katham upādhyāyāt adhīte iti . apakrāmati tasmāt tadadhyayanam . yadi apakrāmati
GS24pmbhasuu:7972: kim na atyantāya apakrāmati . sattatatvāt . atha vā jyotirvat jñānāni bhavanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7974: 399 ayam api yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum . katham gomayāt vṛścikaḥ jāyate . golomāvilomabhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7975: durvāḥ jāyante iti . apakrāmanti tāḥ tebhyaḥ . yadi apakrāmati kim na atyantāya apakrāmati
GS24pmbhasuu:7976: . santatatvāt . atha vā anyāḥ canyāḥ ca prādurbhavanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7978: 399 ayam api yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum . katham himavataḥ gaṅgā prabhavati iti . apakrāmanti
GS24pmbhasuu:7979: tāḥ tasmāt āpaḥ . yadi apakrāmati kim na atyantāya apakrāmati . santatatvāt . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:7982: 400-401 karmagrahaṇam kimartham . yam abhipraiti saḥ sampradānam iti iyati ucyamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:7983: karmaṇaḥ eva sampradānasañjñā prasajyeta . karmagrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7984: bhavati . karma nimittatvena āśrīyate . atha yamsagrahaṇam kimartham . karmaṇā abhipraiti
GS24pmbhasuu:7985: sampradānam iti iyati ucyamāne abhiprayataḥ eva sampradānasañjñā prasajyeta . yamsagrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:7986: punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ bhavati . yamsagrahaṇāt abhiprayataḥ sampradānasañjñā nirbhajyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7987: . atha abhipragrahaṇam kimartham . karmaṇā yam eti sa sampradānam iti iyati ucyamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:7988: yam eva sampratyeti tatra eva syāt . upādhyāyāya gām dadāti iti . iha na syāt . upādhyāyāya
GS24pmbhasuu:7989: gām adāt . upādhyāyāya gām dāsyati iti . abhipragrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7990: bhavati . abhiḥ ābhimukhye vartate praśabdaḥ ādikarmaṇi . tena yam ca abhipraiti
GS24pmbhasuu:7991: yam ca abhipraiṣyati yam ca abhiprāgād ābhimukhyamātre sarvatra siddham bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7993: 401-403 kriyāgrahaṇam api kartavyam . iha api yathā syāt . śrāddhāya nigarhate .
GS24pmbhasuu:7994: yuddhāya sannahyate . patye śete iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:7995: . kriyām hi loke karma iti upacaranti . kām kriyām kariṣyasi . kim karma kariṣyasi
GS24pmbhasuu:7996: iti . evam api kartavyam . kṛtrimākṛtrimayoḥ kṛtrime sampratyayaḥ bhavati . kriyā
GS24pmbhasuu:7997: api kṛtrimam karma . na sidhyati . kartuḥ īpsitatamam karma iti ucyate katham ca
GS24pmbhasuu:7998: nāma kriyayā kriyā īpsitatamā syāt . kriyā api kriyayā īpsitatamā bhavati . kayā
GS24pmbhasuu:7999: kriyayā . sandarśanakriyayā vā prārthayatikriyayā vā adhyavasyatikriyayā vā . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:8000: yaḥ eṣaḥ manuṣyaḥ prekṣāpūrvakārī bhavati saḥ buddhyā tāvat kamcidartham sampaśyati
GS24pmbhasuu:8001: sandṛṣṭe prārthanā prārthanāyām adhavasāyaḥ adhyavasāye ārambhaḥ ārambhe nirvṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8002: nirvṛttau phalāvāptiḥ . evam kriyā api kṛtrimam karma . evam api karmaṇaḥ karaṇasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:8003: vaktavyā sampradānasya ca karmasañjñā . paśunā rudram yajate . paśum rudrāya dadāti
GS24pmbhasuu:8004: iti arthaḥ . agnau kila paśuḥ prakṣipyate tat rudrāya pahriyate iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8006: 403-404 kimete ekārthāḥ āhosvit nānārthāḥ . kim ca ataḥ . yadi ekārthāḥ kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:8007: pṛthak nirdiśyante . atha nānārthāḥ katham kupinā śakyante viśeṣayitum . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:8008: nānārthāḥ kupau tu eṣām sāmānyam asti . na hi akupitaḥ krudhyate na vā akupitaḥ druhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:8009: na vā akupitaḥ īrṣyati na vā akupitaḥ asūyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:8011: 404-406 tamagrahaṇam kimartham na sādhakam karaṇam iti eva ucyeta ṣādhakam karaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8012: iti iyati ucyamāne sarveṣām kārakāṇām karaṇasañjñā prasajyeta . sarvāṇi hi kārakāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:8013: sādhakāni . tamagrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ bhavati . na etat asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:8014: . pūrvāḥ tāvat sañjñāḥ apavādatvāt bādhikāḥ bhaviṣyanti parāḥ paratvāt ca anavakāśatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8015: ca . iha tarhi dhanuṣā vidhyati apāyayuktatvāt ca apādānasañjñā sādhakatvāt ca karaṇasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:8016: prāpnoti . tamagrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ bhavati . evam tarhi lokataḥ etat
GS24pmbhasuu:8017: siddham . tat yathā . loke abhirūpāya udakamāneyam abhirūpāya kanyā deyā iti na ca
GS24pmbhasuu:8018: anabhirūpe pravṛttiḥ asti . tatra abhirūpatamāya iti gamyate . evam iha api sādhakam
GS24pmbhasuu:8019: karaṇam iti ucyate sarvāṇi ca kārakāṇi sādhakāni na ca asādhake pravṛttiḥ asti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8020: tatra sādhakatamam iti vijñāsyate . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat tamagrahaṇam karoti
GS24pmbhasuu:8021: tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ kārakasañjñāyām taratamayogaḥ na bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane
GS24pmbhasuu:8022: prayojanam . apādānam ācāryaḥ kim nyāyyam manyate . yatra samprāpya nivṛttiḥ . tena
GS24pmbhasuu:8023: iha eva syāt grāmāt āgacchati nagarāt āgacchati iti . sāṅkāśyakebhyaḥ pāṭaliputrakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8024: abhirūpatarāḥ iti atra na syāt . kārakasañjñāyām taratamayogaḥ na bhavati iti atra
GS24pmbhasuu:8025: api siddham bhavati . tathā ādhāram ācāryaḥ kim nyāyyam manyate . yatra kṛtsnaḥ ādhārātmā
GS24pmbhasuu:8026: vyāptaḥ bhavati . tena iha eva syāt tileṣu tailam dadhni sarpiḥ iti . gaṅgāyām gāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8027: kūpe gargarkulam iti atra na syāt . kārakasañjñāyām taratamayogaḥ na bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8030: 406-407 vaseḥ aśyarthasya pratiṣedhaḥ . vaseḥ aśyarthasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8031: grāma upavasati iti . saḥ tarhi vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . na atra upapūrvasya vaseḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8032: grāmaḥ adhikaraṇam . kasya tarhi . anupasargasya . grāme asau vasan trirātram upavasati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8034: 407 tamagrahaṇam kimartham . kartuḥ īpsitam karma iti iyati ucyamāne iha:
GS24pmbhasuu:8035: agneḥ māṇavakam vārayati iti māṇavake apādānasañjñā prasajyeta . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8036: karmasañjñā tatra bādhikā bhaviṣyati . agnau api tarhi bādhikā syāt . iha punaḥ tamagrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:8037: kriyamāṇe tat upapannam bhavati yat uktam vāraṇārtheṣu karmagrahaṇānarthakyam kartuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8040: 408-409 iha ucyate odanam pacati iti . yadi odanaḥ pacyeta dravyāntarama bhinirvarteta
GS24pmbhasuu:8041: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . tādarthyāt tācchabdyam bhaviṣyati . odanārthāḥ taṇḍulāḥ odanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8042: iti . atha iha katham bhavitavyam taṇḍulān odanam pacati iti āhosvit taṇḍulānām odanam
GS24pmbhasuu:8043: pacati iti . ubhyathā api bhavitavyam . katham . iha hi taṇḍulān odanam pacati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8044: dvyarthaḥ paciḥ . taṇḍulān pacan odanam nirvartayati iti . iha idanīm taṇḍulānām
GS24pmbhasuu:8045: odanam pacati iti dvyarthaḥ ca eva paciḥ vikārayoge ca ṣaṣṭhī . taṇḍulavikāram odanam
GS24pmbhasuu:8046: nirvartayati iti . iha kaḥ cit kam cidāmantrayate siddham bhujyatām iti . saḥ āmantrayamāṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8047: āha prabhūtam bhuktam asmābhiḥ iti . āmantrayamāṇaḥ āha dadhi khalu bhaviṣyati payaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8048: khalu bhaviṣyati . āmantryamāṇaḥ āha dadhnā khalu bhuñjīya payasā khalu bhuñjīya
GS24pmbhasuu:8049: iti . atra karmasañjñā prāpnoti . tat hi tasya īpsitatamam bhavati . tasya api odanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8050: eva eva īpsitatamaḥ na tu guṇeṣu asya anurodhaḥ . tat yathā bhuñjīya aham odanam
GS24pmbhasuu:8051: yadi mṛduviśadaḥ syāt iti evam iha api dadhiguṇam odanam bhuñjīya payoguṇamodanam bhuñjīya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8053: 410-411 īpsitasya karmasañjñāyām nirvṛttasya kārakatve karmasañjñāprasaṅgaḥ kriyepsitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8054: . īpsitasya karmasañjñāyām nirvṛttasya kārakatve karmasañjñā na prāpnoti . guḍam
GS24pmbhasuu:8055: bhakṣayati iti . kim kāraṇam . kriyepsitatvāt . kriyā tasya īpsitā . na vā ubhayepsitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8056: . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . ubhayepsitatvāt . ubhayam tasya īpsitam . ātaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8057: ca ubhayam yasya hi guḍabhakṣaṇe buddhiḥ prasaktā bhavati na asau loṣṭam bhakṣayitvā
GS24pmbhasuu:8058: kṛtī bhavati . yadi api tāvat atra etat śakyate vaktum ye tu ete rājakarmiṇaḥ manuṣyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8059: teṣām kaḥ cit kam cit āha kaṭam kuru iti . sa āha na aham kaṭam kariṣyāmi ghaṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8060: mayā āhṛtaḥ iti . tasya kriyāmātram īpsitam . yadi api tasya kriyāmātram īpsitam
GS24pmbhasuu:8061: yaḥ tu asau preṣayati tasya ubhayam īpsitam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8063: 411-412 kim udāharaṇam . viṣam bhakṣayati iti . na etat asti . pūrveṇa api etat sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:8064: . na sidhyati . kartuḥ īpsitatamam karma iti ucyate kasya ca nāma viṣabhakṣaṇam īpsitam
GS24pmbhasuu:8065: syāt . viṣabhakṣaṇam api kasya cit īpsitam bhavati . katham . iha yaḥ eṣaḥ manuṣyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8066: duḥkhārtaḥ bhavati saḥ anyāni duḥkhāni anuniśamya viṣabhakṣaṇam eva jyāyaḥ manyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8067: . ātaḥ ca īpsitam yat tat bhakṣayati . yat tarthi anyat kariṣyāmi iti anyat karoti
GS24pmbhasuu:8068: tat udāharaṇam . kim punaḥ tat . grāmāntaram ayam gacchan caurān paśyati ahim laṅghayati
GS24pmbhasuu:8069: kaṇṭakān mṛdnāti . iha īpsitasya api karmasañjñā ārabhyate anīpsitasya api . yat
GS24pmbhasuu:8070: idānīm na eva īpsitamam na api anīpsitam tatra katham bhavitavyam . grāmāntaram ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:8071: gacchan vṛkṣamūlāni upasarpati kuḍyamūlāni upasarpati iti . atra api siddham . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:8072: . anīpsitam iti na ayam prasajyapratiṣedhaḥ īpsitam na iti . kim tarhi . paryudāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8073: ayam yat anyat īpsitāt tat anīpsitam iti . anyat ca etat īpsitāt yat na eva īpsitam
GS24pmbhasuu:8076: 413-418 kena akathitam . apādānādibhiḥ viśeṣakathābhiḥ . kim udāharaṇam . duhiyācirudhiprachibhikṣiciñām
GS24pmbhasuu:8077: upayoganimittam apūrvavidhau bruviśāsiguṇena ca yatsacate tat akīrtitam ācaritam kavinā . duhi :
GS24pmbhasuu:8078: gām dogdhi payaḥ . na etat asti . kathitā atra pūrvā apādansañjñā . duhi . yāci :
GS24pmbhasuu:8079: idam tarhi pauravam gām yācate iti . na etat asti . kathitā atra pūrvā apādansañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:8080: . na yācanāt eva apāyaḥ bhavati . yācitaḥ asau yadi dadāti tataḥ apāyena yujyate . yāci . rudhi :
GS24pmbhasuu:8081: anvavaruṇaddhi gām vrajam . na etat asti . kathitā atra pūrvā adhikaraṇasañjñā . rudhi . pracchi :
GS24pmbhasuu:8082: māṇavakam panthānam pṛcchati . na etat asti . kathitā atra pūrvā apādānasañjñā . na praśnāt eva apāyaḥ bhavati . pṛṣtaḥ asau yadi ācāṣṭe tataḥ apāyena yujyate . pracchi. bhikṣi :
GS24pmbhasuu:8083: pauravam gām bhikṣate . na etat asti . kathitā atra pūrvā apādānasañjñā . na bhikṣaṇāt eva apāyaḥ bhavati . bhikṣitaḥ asau yadi dadāti tataḥ apāyena yujyate . bhikṣi . ciñ :
GS24pmbhasuu:8084: vṛkṣam avacinoti phalāni . na etat asti . kathitā atra pūrvā apādānasañjñā . bruviśāsiguṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:8085: ca yat sacate tat akīrtitam ācaritam kavinā . bruviśāsiguṇena ca yat sacate sambadhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8086: tat ca dāharaṇam . kim punaḥ tat . putram brūte dharmam . putram anuśāsti dharmam
GS24pmbhasuu:8087: iti . na etat asti . kathitā atra pūrvā sampradānasañjñā . tasmāt trīṇi eva udāharaṇāni
GS24pmbhasuu:8088: . pauravam gām yācate . māṇavakam panthānam pṛcchati . pauravam gām bhikṣate iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8090: 418-424 atha ye dhātūnām dvikarmakāḥ teṣām kim kathite lādayaḥ bhavanti āhosvit akathite
GS24pmbhasuu:8091: . kathite lādayaḥ . kathite lādibhiḥ abhihite guṇamkarmaṇi kā kartavyā . kathite
GS24pmbhasuu:8092: lādayaḥ cet syuḥ ṣaṣṭḥīm kuryāt tadā guṇe . kathite lādayaḥ cet syuḥ ṣaṣṭhī guṇakarmaṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:8093: tadā kartavyā . duhyate goḥ payaḥ . yācyate pauravasya kambalaḥ iti . katham . akārakam
GS24pmbhasuu:8094: hyakathitatvāt . akārakam hi etat bhavati . kim kāraṇam . akathitatvāt . kārakam
GS24pmbhasuu:8095: cet tu na akathā . atha kārakam na akathitam . atha kārake sati kā kartavyā . kārakam
GS24pmbhasuu:8096: cet vijānīyāt yām yām manyeta sā bhavet . kārakam cet vijānātīyāt yā yā prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:8097: sā kartavyā . duhyate goḥ payaḥ . yācyate pauravāt kambalaḥ iti . kathite abhihite
GS24pmbhasuu:8098: tvavidhiḥ tvamatiḥ guṇakarmaṇi lādividhiḥ sapare . kathite lādibhiḥ abhihite tvavidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8099: eṣaḥ bhavati . kim idam tvavidhiḥ iti . tava vidhiḥ tvavidhiḥ . tvamatiḥ . kimidam
GS24pmbhasuu:8100: tvamatiḥ iti . tava matiḥ tvamatiḥ . na evam anye manyante . katham tarhi anye manyante
GS24pmbhasuu:8101: . guṇakarmaṇi lādividhiḥ sapare . guṇakarmaṇi lādividhiyaḥ bhavanti saha pareṇa yogena
GS24pmbhasuu:8103: ca api aguṇe tat analpamateḥ vacanam smarata . dhruvayuktiṣu ceṣṭitayuktiṣu ca api
GS24pmbhasuu:8104: aguṇe karmaṇi lādayaḥ bhavanti . tat analpmateḥ ācāryasya vacanam smaryatām . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:8105: pradhānakarmaṇi ākhyeye lādīn āhuḥ dvikarmaṇām . pradhānakarmaṇi abhidheye dvikarmaṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:8106: dhātūnām karmaṇi lādayaḥ bhavanti iti vaktavyam . ajām nayati grāmam . ajā nīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8107: grāmam . ajā nītā grāmam iti . apradhāne duhādīnām . apradhāne duhādīnām karmaṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:8108: lādayaḥ bhavanti iti vaktavyam . duhyate gauḥ payaḥ . ṇyante kartuḥ ca karmaṇaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8109: lādayaḥ bhavanti iti vaktavyam . gamyate devadattaḥ grāmam yajñadattena . ke punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8110: dhātūnām dvikarmakāḥ . nīvahyoḥ harateḥ ca api gatyarthānām tathā eva ca dvikarmakeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:8111: grahaṇam draṣṭavyam iti niścayaḥ . ajām nayati grāmam . bhāram vahati grāmam . bhāram
GS24pmbhasuu:8112: harati grāmam . gatyarthānām . gamayati devadattam grāmam . yāpayati devadattam grāmam
GS24pmbhasuu:8113: . siddham vā apo anyakarmaṇaḥ . siddham vā punaḥ etat bhavati . kutaḥ . anyakarmaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8114: . anyasya atra ajā karma anyasya grāmaḥ . ajām asau gṛhītvā grāmam nayati . anyakarma
GS24pmbhasuu:8115: iti cet brūyāt lādīnām avidhiḥ bhavet . anyakarma iti cet brūyāt lādīnām avidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8116: ayam bhavet . ajā nīyate grāmam iti . parasādhane utpadyamānena lena ajāyāḥ abhidhānam na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8119: akarmakāṇām dhātūnām karmasañjñāḥ bhavanti iti vaktavyam . kāla . māsam āste . māsam
GS24pmbhasuu:8120: svapiti . bhāva . godoham āste . godoham svapiti . adhvagantavya . krośam āste .
GS24pmbhasuu:8121: krośam svapiti . deśaḥ ca akarmaṇām karmasañjñaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . kurūn svapiti
GS24pmbhasuu:8122: . pañcālān svapiti . viparītam tu yat karma tat kalma kavayaḥ viduḥ . kimidam kalma
GS24pmbhasuu:8123: iti . aparisamāptam karma kalma . na vā asmin sarvāṇi karmakāryāṇi kriyante . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:8124: tarhi . dvitīyā eva . yasmin tu karmaṇi upajāyate anyat dhātvarthayogā api ca yatra
GS24pmbhasuu:8125: ṣaṣṭhī tat karma kalma iti ca kalma na uktam dhātoḥ hi vṛttiḥ na ralatvataḥ asti
GS24pmbhasuu:8126: . etena karmasañjñā sarvā siddhā bhavati kathitena . tatra īpsitasya kim syāt prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:8127: karmasañjñāyāḥ . yat tu kathitam purastāt īpsitatayuktam ca tasya siddhyartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:8128: īpsitam eva tu yat syāt tasya bhaviṣyati kathitena . atha iha katham bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8129: . netā aśvasya srughnam iti āhosvit netā aśvasya srughnasya iti . ubhayathā goṇikāputraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8131: 429-431 śabdakarma iti katham idam vijñāyate . śabdaḥ yeṣām kriyā iti āhosvit śabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8132: yeṣām karma iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . śabdakarmanirdeśe śabdakriyāṇām iti cet hvayatyādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:8133: pratiṣedhaḥ . śabdakarmanirdeśe śabdakriyāṇāmiti ced hvayadādīnām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8134: . ke punaḥ hvayatādayaḥ . hvayati krandati śabdāyate . hvayati devadattaḥ . hvāyayati
GS24pmbhasuu:8135: devadattena . krandati devadattaḥ . krandayati devadattena . śabdāyate devadattaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8136: . śabdāyayati devadattena iti . śṛṇotyādīn ām ca upasamkhyānam aśabdakriyatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:8137: śṛṇotyādīnām ca upasamkhyānam kartavyam . ke punaḥ śṛṇotyādayaḥ . śṛṇoti vijānāti
GS24pmbhasuu:8138: upalabhate . śṛṇoti devadattaḥ . śrāvayati devadattam . vijānāti devadattaḥ . vijñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:8139: devadattam . upalabhate devadattaḥ . upalambhayati devadattam . kim punaḥ kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8140: na sidhyati . aśabdakriyatvād . astu tarhi śabdaḥ yeṣām karma iti . śabdakarmaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8141: iti cet jalpatiprabhṛtīnām upasamkhyānam . śabdakarmaṇa iti cet jalpatiprabhṛtīnāmupasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:8142: kartavyam . ke punaḥ jalpatiprabhṛatayaḥ . jalpati vilapati ābhāṣate . jalpati devadattaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8143: . jalpayati devadattam . vilapati devadattaḥ . vilāpayati devadattam . ābhāṣate devadattaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8144: .ābhāṣayati devadattam . dṛśeḥ sarvatra . dṛśeḥ sarvatra upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8145: . paśyati rūpatarkaḥ kārṣāpaṇam . darśayati rūpatarkam kārṣāpaṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8147: 431-432 adikhādinīvahīnām pratiṣedhaḥ . adikhādinīvahīnām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . atti devadattaḥ . ādayate devadattena . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:8148: sarvam eva pratyavasānakāryam adeḥ na bhavati iti vaktavyam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8151: idam eṣām jagdham . khādi . khādati devadattaḥ . khādayati devadattena . nī . nayati
GS24pmbhasuu:8152: devadattaḥ . nāyayati devadattena . vaheraniyantṛkartṛkasya . vaheḥ aniyantṛkartṛkasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8153: iti vaktavyam . vahati bhāram devadattaḥ . vāhayati bhāram devadattena . aniyantṛkartṛkasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8154: iti kimartham . vahanti yavān balīvardāḥ . vāhayanti balīvardān yavān . bhakṣeḥ ahiṃsārthasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8155: . bhakṣeḥ ahimsārthasya iti vaktavyam . bhakṣayati piṇḍīm devadattaḥ . bhakṣayati
GS24pmbhasuu:8156: piṇḍīm devadattena . ahimsārthasya iti kimartham . bhakṣayanti yavān balīvardāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8160: upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . māsam āste devadattaḥ . māsam āsayati devadattam . māsam
GS24pmbhasuu:8161: śete devadattaḥ . māsam śāyayati devadattam . siddham tu kālakarmakāṇām akarmakavadvacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8162: . siddham etat . katham . kālakarmakāḥ akarmakavat bhavanti iti vaktavyam . tat tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:8163: vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . akarmakāṇām iti ucyate na ca ke cit kadā cit kālabhāvādhvabhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8164: akarmakāḥ . te evam vijñāsyāmaḥ . kva cit ye akarmakāḥ iti . atha vā yena karmaṇā
GS24pmbhasuu:8165: sakarmkāḥ ca akarmakāḥ ca bhavanti tena akarmakāṇām . na ca etena karmaṇā kaḥ cit
GS24pmbhasuu:8166: api akarmakaḥ . atha vā yat karma bhavati na ca bhavati tena karmakāṇām . na ca etat
GS24pmbhasuu:8167: karma kva cit api na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:8169: 435 hṛkroḥ vāvacane abhivādidṛśyoḥ ātmanepade upasaṅkhyānam . hṛkrorvāvacane abhivādidṛśoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8170: ātmanepade upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . abhivadati gurum devadattaḥ . abhivādayate gurum
GS24pmbhasuu:8171: devadattam . abhivādayate gurum devadattena . paśyanti bhṛtyāḥ rājānam . darśayate
GS24pmbhasuu:8172: bhṛtyān rājā . darśayate bhṛtyaiḥ rājā . katham ca atra ātmanepadam . ekasya ṇeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8173: aṇau i ti aparasya ṇicaḥ ca iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8175: 435-436 kim yasya svam tantram saḥ svatantraḥ . kim ca ataḥ . tantuvāye prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ayam tantraśabdaḥ asti eva vitāne vartate . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:8176: āstīrṇam tantram . pretam tantram . vitānaḥ iti gamyate . asti prādhānye vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:8177: . tat yathā svatantraḥ asau brāhmaṇaḥ iti ucyate . svapradhānaḥ iti gamyate . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:8178: yaḥ prādhānye vartate tantraśabdaḥ tasya idam grahaṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8180: 436-438 svatantrasya kartṛsañjñāyām hetumati upasaṅkhyānam asvatrantvāt . svatantrasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8181: kartṛsañjñāyām hetumati upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . pācayati odanam devadattaḥ yajñadattena
GS24pmbhasuu:8182: iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . asvatantratvāt . na vā svātrantryāt itarathā
GS24pmbhasuu:8183: hi akurvati api kārayati iti syāt . na vā kartavyam . kim kāraṇam . svātantryāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:8184: svatantraḥ asau bhavati . itarathā hi akurvati api kārayati iti syāt . yaḥ hi manyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8185: na asau svatantraḥ akurvati api tasya kārayati iti etat syāt . na akurvat i iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:8186: svatantraḥ . na cet akurvati tasmin kārayati iti etat bhavati svatantraḥ asau bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:8187: . śakyam tāvat anena upasamkhyānam kurvatā vaktum kurvan svatantraḥ akurvan na iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8188: . sādhīyaḥ jñāpakam bhavati . preṣite ca kila ayam kriyām ca akriyām ca dṛṣṭvā adhyavasyati
GS24pmbhasuu:8189: kurvan svatantraḥ akurvan na iti . yadi ca preṣitaḥ asau na karoti svatantraḥ asau bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8192: hetusañjñāyāḥ aprasiddhiḥ . svatantraprayojakaḥ hetusañjñaḥ bhavati iti ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:8193: na ca asau svatantram prayojayati . svatantratvāt siddham . siddham etat . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:8194: . svatantratvāt . svatantram asau prayojayati . svatantratvāt siddham iti cet svatantraparatantratvam
GS24pmbhasuu:8195: vipratiṣiddam . yadi svatantraḥ na prayojyaḥ atha prayojyaḥ na svatantraḥ prayojyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8196: svatantraḥ ca iti vipratiṣiddham . uktam vā . kim uktam . ekam tāvat uktam na vā
GS24pmbhasuu:8197: svātrantryāt itarathā hi akurvati api kārayati iti syāt iti . aparam uktam . na vā
GS24pmbhasuu:8198: sāmānyakṛtatvāt hetutaḥ hi aviśiṣṭam svatantraprayojakatvāt aprayojakaḥ iti cet muktamasamśayena tulyam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8200: 440-442 kimartham rephādhikaḥ īśvaraśabdaḥ gṛhyate . rīśvarāt vīśvarāt mā bhūt .
GS24pmbhasuu:8201: rīśvarāt iti ucyate vīśvarāt mā bhūt . śaki ṇamulkamulau īśvare tosunkasunau iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8202: . na etat asti prayojanam . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati anantaraḥ yaḥ īśvaraśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8203: tasya grahaṇam iti yat ayam kṛt mejantaḥ iti kṛtaḥ māntasya ejantasya ca avyayasañjñām
GS24pmbhasuu:8204: śāsti . kṛt mejantaḥ paraḥ api saḥ . paraḥ api etasmāt kṛt māntaḥ ejantaḥ ca asti
GS24pmbhasuu:8205: . tadartham etat syāt . yat tarhi avyayībhāvasya avyayasañjñām śāsti tat jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:8206: ācāryaḥ nantaraḥ yaḥ īśvaraśabdaḥ tasya grahaṇam iti . samāseṣu avyayībhāvaḥ . samāsasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8207: etat jñāpakam syāt . avyayībhāvaḥ eva samāsaḥ avyayasañjñaḥ bhavati na anyaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8208: . evam tarhi lokataḥ etat siddham . tat yathā loke ā vanāntāt ā udakāntāt priyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8209: pānthaman uvrajet iti yaḥ eva prathamaḥ vanāntaḥ udakāntaḥ ca tataḥ nuvrajati . laukikam
GS24pmbhasuu:8210: ca ativartate . dvitīyam ca tṛtīyam ca vanāntam udakāntam vā anuvrajati . tasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8211: rephādikaḥ īśvaraśabdaḥ grahītavyaḥ . atha prāgvacanam kimartham . prāgvacanam sañjñānivṛttyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:8212: . prāgvacanam kriyate nipātasañjñāyāḥ anivṛttiḥ yathā syāt . akriyamāṇe hi prāgvacane
GS24pmbhasuu:8213: anavakāśāḥ gatyupasargakarmapravacanīyasañjñāḥ nipātasañjñām bādheran . tāḥ mā bādhiṣata
GS24pmbhasuu:8214: iti prāgvacanam kriyate . atha kriyamāṇe api prāgvacane yāvatā anavakāśāḥ etāḥ sañjñāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8215: kasmāt eva na bādhante . kriyamāṇe hi prāgvacane satyām nipātasañjñāyām etāḥ avayavasañjñāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8218: 442-444 ayam sattvaśabdaḥ asti eva dravyapadārthakaḥ . tat yathā sattvam ayam brāhmaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8219: sattvamiyam brāhmaṇī iti . asti kriyāpadārthakaḥ . sadbhāvaḥ sattvam iti . kasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8220: idam grahaṇam . dravyapadārthakasya . kutaḥ etat . evam hi kṛtvā vidhiḥ ca siddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8221: bhavati pratiṣedhaḥ ca . kim punaḥ ayam paryudāsaḥ . yat anyat sattvavacanāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8222: . āhosvit prasajya ayam pratiṣedhaḥ . sattvavacane na iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi paryudāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8223: vipraḥ iti atra api prāpnoti . kriyādravyavacanaḥ ayam samghāto dravyāt anyaśca vidhinā
GS24pmbhasuu:8224: āśrīyate . asti ca prādibhiḥ sāmānyam iti kṛtvā tadantavidhinā nipātasañjñā prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:8225: . atha prasajyapratiṣedhaḥ na doṣaḥ bhavati . yathā na doṣaḥ tathā astu .

GS24pmbhasuu:8241: 446-448 gatyupasargasañjñāḥ kriyāyoge yatkriyāyuktāḥ tam prati iti vacanam . gatyupasargasañjñāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8242: kriyāyoge yatkriyāyuktāḥ tam prati gatyupasargasañjñāḥ bhavanti iti vaktavyam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:8243: prayojanam . prayojanam ghañ ṣaṭvaṇatve . ghañ . pravṛddhaḥ bhāvaḥ prabhāvaḥ . anupasarge
GS24pmbhasuu:8244: iti pratiṣedhaḥ mā bhūt . ṣatvam . vigatāḥ secakāḥ asmāt grāmāt visecakaḥ grāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8245: . upasargāt iti ṣatvam mā bhūt . ṇatvam . pragatāḥ nāyakāḥ asmāt grāmāt pranāyakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8246: grāmaḥ . upasargāditi ṇatvam mā bhūt . vṛddhividhau ca dhātugrahaṇānarthakyam . vṛddhividhau
GS24pmbhasuu:8247: ca dhātugrahaṇam anarthakam . upasargāt ṛti dhātau iti . tatra dhātugrahaṇasya etat
GS24pmbhasuu:8248: prayojanam iha mā bhūt prarṣabham vanam iti . kriyamāṇe ca api dhātugrahaṇe prarcchaka
GS24pmbhasuu:8249: iti atra prāpnoti . yatkriyāyuktāḥ tam prati iti vacanāt na bhavati . vadvidhnabhāvābīttvasvāṅgādisvaraṇatveṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:8250: doṣaḥ bhavati . vadvidhi. yat udvataḥ nivataḥ yāsi bapsat . vadvidhi . nasbhāva .
