GS24pmbhasuu:8252: . prasphik prodaraḥ . svāṅgādisvara . ṇatva . pra ṇaḥ śūdraḥ pra ṇaḥ ācāryaḥ pra
GS24pmbhasuu:8253: ṇaḥ rājā pra ṇaḥ vṛtrahā . upasargāt iti ete vidhayaḥ na prāpnuvanti . vadvidhinasbhāvabīttvasvāṅgadisvaraṇatveṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:8254: vacanaprāmāṇyāt siddham . anavakāśāḥ ete vidhayaḥ . te vacanaprāmāṇyāt bhaviṣyanti
GS24pmbhasuu:8255: . suduroḥ pratiṣedhaḥ numvidhitatvaṣatvaṇatveṣu . suduroḥ pratiṣedhaḥ numvidhitatvaṣatvaṇatveṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:8257: sulabham durlabham . upasargāt iti num mā bhūt iti . na sudurbhyām kevalābhyām .
GS24pmbhasuu:8258: iti etat na vaktavyam bhavati . na etat asti prayojanam . kriyate etat nyāse eva
GS24pmbhasuu:8259: . tatvam . sudattam . acaḥ upasargāt taḥ iti tatvam mā bhūt iti . ṣatvam . susiktam
GS24pmbhasuu:8260: ghaṭaśatena sustutam ślokaśatena . upasargāt iti ṣatvam mā bhūtiti . suḥ pūjāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:8261: iti etat na vaktavyam bhavati . na etat asti prayojanam . kriyata etat nyāse eva
GS24pmbhasuu:8262: . ṇatvam . durnayam durnītamiti . upasargāt iti ṇatvam mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8264: 449 kṛbhvastiyoge iti vaktavyam . iha eva yathā syāt . ūrīkṛtya ūrībhūya . iha mā
GS24pmbhasuu:8265: bhūt . ūrī paktvā . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . kriyāyoge iti anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:8266: na ca anyayā kriyayā ūryādicviḍācām yogaḥ asti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8268: 449-450 katham idam vijñāyate . iteḥ param itiparam na itiparam anitiparam iti āhosvit
GS24pmbhasuu:8269: itiḥ paro yasmāt tat idam itiparam na itiparam anitiparamiti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:8270: vijñāyata iteḥ param itiparam na itiparam anitiparam iti khāṭ iti kṛtvā niraṣṭhīvat
GS24pmbhasuu:8271: iti atra prāpnoti . atha itiḥ paro yasmāt tat idam itiparam na itiparam anitiparamiti
GS24pmbhasuu:8272: śrauṣaṭ vauṣaṭ iti kṛtvā niraṣṭhīvat iti atra prāpnoti . astu tāvat itiḥ paro yasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8273: tat idam itiparam na itiparam anitiparamiti . nanu ca uktam śrauṣaṭ vauṣaṭ iti kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:8274: niraṣṭhīvat iti atra prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . idam tāvat ayam praṣṭavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8275: atha iha te prāk dhātoḥ iti katham gatimātrasya pūrvaprayogḥ bhavati . upoddharati
GS24pmbhasuu:8276: iti . gatyākṛtiḥ pratinirdiśyate . iha api tarhi anukaraṇākṛtiḥ nirdiśyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:8278: 450 kimartham idam ucyate . anukaraṇasya itikaraṇaparatvapratiṣedhaḥ aniṣṭaśabdanivṛttyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8279: . anukaraṇasya itikaraṇaparatvapratiṣedhaḥ ucyate . kim prayojanam . aniṣṭaśabdanivṛttyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8280: . aniṣṭhaśabdatā mā bhūt iti . idam vicārayiṣyati teprāgdhātuvacanam prayoganiyamārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:8281: vā syāt sañjñāniyamārtham vā iti . tat yadā prayoganiyamārtham tadā aniṣṭhaśabdanivṛttyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:8282: idam vaktavyam . yadā hi sañjñāniyamārtham tadā na doṣaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:8284: 450-451 idam atibahu kriyate ādare anādare sat asat iti . ādāre sat iti eva siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:8285: . katham asatkṛtya iti . tadantividhinā bhaviṣyati . kena idānīm anādare bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:8286: . nañā ādarapratiṣedham vijñāsyāmaḥ . nādare anādare iti . na evam śakyam . ādaraprasaṅge
GS24pmbhasuu:8287: eva hi syāt . anādaraprasaṅge na syāt . anādaragrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe bahuvrīhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8288: ayam vijñāyate . avidyamānādare anādare iti . tasmāt anādaragrahaṇam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8292: pasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . aṅ . antardhā . kividhiḥ . antardhiḥ . samāsaḥ . antarhatya
GS24pmbhasuu:8296: . asākṣātsākṣātkṛtvā sākṣātkṛtya . yadā hi sākṣāt eva kim cit kriyate tadā mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:8297: iti . makārāntatvam ca gatisañjñāsanniyuktam . makārāntatvam ca gatisañjñāsanniyogena
GS24pmbhasuu:8298: vaktavyam . lavaṇaṅkṛtya . tatra cvipratiṣedhaḥ . tatra cvyantasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8299: . lavaṇīkṛtya . na vā pūrveṇa kṛtatvāt ṇa vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam . pūrveṇa kṛtatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8300: . astu anena vibhāṣā . pūrveṇa nityaḥ bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam . makārāntatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:8301: ca gatisañjñāsanniyuktam iti uktam . tat cvyantasya mā bhūt iti . etat api na asti
GS24pmbhasuu:8302: prayojanam . lavaṇaśabdasya ayam vibhāṣā lavaṇamśabda ādeśaḥ kriyate . yadi ca lavaṇī
GS24pmbhasuu:8303: śabdasya api vibhāṣā lavaṇamśabdaḥ ādeśaḥ bhavati na kim cid duṣyati . traiśabdyam ca ha sādhyam . /
GS24pmbhasuu:8304: tacca evam sati siddham bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8307: ete prāk eva dhātoḥ prayoktavyāḥ . āhosvit sañjñāniyamārtham :
GS24pmbhasuu:8308: ete prāk ca akprāk ca prayoktavyāḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8309: prāk prayujyamānānām gatisañjñā bhavati iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . prāgdhātuvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:8310: prayoganiyamārtham iti cet anukaraṇasya itikaraṇaparapratiṣedhaḥ aniṣṭaśabdanivṛttyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8311: . prāgdhātuvacanam prayoganiyamārtham iti cet anukaraṇasya itikaraṇaparapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8312: vaktavyaḥ . kim prayojanam . aniṣṭaśabdanivṛttyarthaḥ . aniṣṭaśabatā mā bhūt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8313: . chandasi paravyavahitavacanam ca . chandasi pare api vyavahitāḥ ca iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8314: . sañjñāniyame siddham . sañjñāniyame siddham etat bhavati . astu tarhi sañjñāniyamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8315: . ubhayoḥ anarthakam vacanam aniṣṭādarśanāt . ubhayoḥ api pakṣayoḥ vacanamanarthakam
GS24pmbhasuu:8316: . kim kāraṇam . aniṣṭādarśanāt . na hi kaḥ citprapacati iti prayoktavye pacatipra
GS24pmbhasuu:8317: iti prayuṅkte . yadi ca aniṣṭam dṛśyeta tataḥ yatnārham syāt . upasarjanasannipāte
GS24pmbhasuu:8318: tu pūrvaparavyavasthārtham . upasarjanasannipāte tu pūrvaparavyavasthārtham etat
GS24pmbhasuu:8319: vaktavyam . ṛṣabham kūlamudrujam ṛṣabham kūlamudvaham . atra gateḥ prāk dhātoḥ prayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8320: yathā syāt . yadi upasarjanasannipāte pūrvaparavyavasthārtham idam ucyate sukaṭamkarāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:8321: vīraṇān i iti atra gateḥ prāk dhātoḥ prayogaḥ prāpnoti . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:8322: na atra gateḥ prākprayogaḥ bhavati iti yat ayam īṣadduḥsuṣu kṛcchrākṛcchārtheṣu khal
GS24pmbhasuu:8323: iti khakāram anubandham karoti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . khitkaraṇe etat prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:8324: khiti iti mum yathā syāt iti . yadi ca atra gateḥ prākprayogaḥ syāt khitkaraṇam anarthakam
GS24pmbhasuu:8325: syāt . astu atra mum . anavyayasya iti pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati . paśyati tu ācāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8326: na atra gateḥ prāk dhatoḥ prayogaḥ bhavati iti tataḥ khakāram anubandham karoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8327: na etat asti jñāpakam . yadi api atra gateḥ prākprayogaḥ syāt syātevātra mumāgamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8328: . katham . kṛdgrahaṇe gatikārakapūrvasya api grahaṇam bhavati iti . tasmāt na arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8329: evamarthena prāgdhātuvacanena . katham ṛṣabham kūlamudrujam ṛṣabham kūlamudvaham
GS24pmbhasuu:8330: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na eṣaḥ udiḥ upapadam . kim tarhi . viśeṣaṇam . udi kūle rujivahoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8333: 456-457 kimartham mahatī sañjñā kriyate . anvarthasañjñā yathā vijñāyeta . karma
GS24pmbhasuu:8334: proktavantaḥ karmapravacanīyāḥ iti . ke punaḥ karma proktavantaḥ . ye samprati kriyām
GS24pmbhasuu:8335: na āhuḥ . ke ca samprati kriyām na āhuḥ . ye aprayujyamānasya kriyām āhuḥ te karmapravacanīyāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8337: 458-460 kimartham idam ucyate . karmapravacanīyasañjñā yathā syāt . gatyupasargasañjñe mā bhūtām iti . kim ca syāt . śākalyasya samhitām anu prāvarṣat :
GS24pmbhasuu:8338: gatiḥ gatau iti nighātaḥ prasajyeta . yadi evam veḥ api karmapravacanīyasañjñā vaktavyā . veḥ api nighātaḥ na iṣyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:8339: prādeśam prādeśam viparilikhati . asti atra viśeṣaḥ . na atra veḥ likhim prati kriyāyogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8340: . kim tarhi . aprayujyamānam . prādeśam prādeśam vimāya parilikhati iti . yadi evam
GS24pmbhasuu:8341: anoḥ api karmapravacanīyasañjñayā na arthaḥ . anoḥ api hi na vṛṣim prati kriyāyogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8342: . kim tarhi aprayujyamānam . śākalyena sukṛtām samhitām anuviśamya devaḥ prāvarṣat
GS24pmbhasuu:8343: . idam tarhi prayojanam dvitīyā yathā syāt karmapravacanīyayukte dvitīyā iti . ataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8345: . kim kāraṇam . sāmānyakṛtatvāt . sāmānyena eva atra karmapravacanīyasañjñā bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:8346: lakṣaṇetthambhūtākhyānabhāgavīpsāsu pratiparyanavaḥ iti . hetvartham tu vacanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8347: hetvartham idam vaktavyam . hetuḥ śākalyasya samhitā varṣasya na lakṣaṇam . kim vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8348: etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . lakṣaṇam hi nāma saḥ bhavati yena punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8349: punaḥ lakṣyate na yaḥ sakṛdapi nimittatvāya kalpate . sakṛt ca asau śākalyena sukṛtām
GS24pmbhasuu:8350: samhitām anuśimya devaḥ prāvarṣat . saḥ tarhi tathā . nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ anuḥ hetau
GS24pmbhasuu:8351: iti . atha idānīm lakṣaṇena hetuḥ api vyāptaḥ na arthaḥ anena . lakṣaṇena hetuḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:8352: vyāptaḥ . na hi avaśyam tat eva lakṣaṇam bhavati yena punaḥ punaḥ lakṣyate . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:8353: tarhi . yat sakṛt api nimittvāya kalpate tat api lakṣaṇam bhavati . tat yathā api
GS24pmbhasuu:8354: bhavān kamaṇḍulapāṇim chātram adrakṣīt iti . sakṛt āsau kamaṇḍalupāṇiḥ chātraḥ dṛṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8355: tasya tat eva lakṣaṇam bhavati . tat eva tarhi prayojanam dvitīyā yathā syāt karmapravacanīyayukte
GS24pmbhasuu:8356: dvitīyā iti . etat api na asti prayojanam . siddhā atra dvitīyā karmapravacanīyayukte
GS24pmbhasuu:8357: iti eva . na sidhyati . paratvāt hetutvāśrayā tṛtīyā prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8359: 461 āṅ maryādābhividhyoḥ iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt ākumāram yaśaḥ pāṇineḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8360: iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . maryādāvacane iti eva siddham . eṣā asya yaśasaḥ maryādā .
GS24pmbhasuu:8362: 461-462 kasya lakṣaṇadayaḥ arthāḥ nirdiśyante . vṛkṣādīnām . kimartham punaḥ idam
GS24pmbhasuu:8363: ucyate . karmapravacanīyasañjñā yathā syāt . gatyupasargasañjñe mā bhūtām iti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:8364: etat asti prayojanam . yatkriyāyuktāḥ tam prati gatyupasargasañjñe bhavataḥ na ca
GS24pmbhasuu:8365: vṛkṣādīn prati kriyāyogaḥ . idam tarhi prayojanam dvitīyā yathā syāt karmapravacanīyayukte
GS24pmbhasuu:8366: dvitīyā iti . vṛkṣam prati vidyotate . vṛkṣamanu vidyotate iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8368: 462-464 kimartham adhiparyoḥ anarthakayoḥ karmapravacanīyasañjñā ucyate . karmapravacanīyasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:8369: yathā syāt . gatyupasargasañjñe mā bhūtām iti . na etat asti prayojanam . yatkriyāyuktāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8370: tam prati gatyupasargasañjñe bhavataḥ anarthakau ca imau . idam tarhi prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:8371: pañcamī yathā syāt pañcamī apāṅparibhiḥ iti . kutaḥ paryāgamyata iti . siddhā atra
GS24pmbhasuu:8372: pañcamī apādāne iti eva . ātaḥ ca apādānapañcamī eṣā . yatra api adhiśabdena yoge
GS24pmbhasuu:8373: pañcamī na vidhīyate tatra api śrūyate . kutaḥ adhyāgamyata iti . evam tarhi siddhe
GS24pmbhasuu:8374: sati yat anarthakayoḥ gatyupasargasañjñābādhikām karmapravacanīyasañjñām śāsti tat
GS24pmbhasuu:8375: jñāpayati ācāryaḥ anarthakānām api eṣām bhavati arthavatkṛtam iti . kim etasya jñāpane
GS24pmbhasuu:8376: prayojanam . nipātasya anarthakasya prātipadikatvam coditam . tat na vaktavyam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:8377: . atha vā na eva imau anarthakau . kim tarhi anarthakau iti ucyate . anarthāntarvācinau
GS24pmbhasuu:8378: anarthakau . dhātunā uktām kriyām āhatuḥ . tad aviśiṣṭam bhavati yathā śaṅkhe payaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8379: . yadi evam dhātunā uktatvāt tasyārthasya upasargaprayogo na prāpnoti uktārthānām
GS24pmbhasuu:8380: aprayogaḥ iti . uktārthānāmapi prayogaḥ dṛśyate . tat yathā apūpau dvau ānaya . brāhmaṇau dvau anaya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8382: 464-465 iha kasmāt na bhavati . sarpiṣaḥ api syāt . gomūtrasya api syāt . kim ca
GS24pmbhasuu:8383: syāt . dvitīyā api prasajyeta karmapravacanīyayukte dvitīyā iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8384: na ime apyarthāḥ nirdiśyante . kim tarhi . parapadārthāḥ ime nirdiśyante . eteṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:8385: artheṣu yat padam vartate tat prati apiḥ karmapravacanīyasañjñaḥ bhavati iti . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:8386: vā yat atra karmapravacanīyayuktam na adaḥ prayujyate . kim punaḥ tat . binduḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8387: bindoḥ tarhi kasmāt na bhavati . upapadavibhakteḥ kārakavibhaktiḥ balīyasī iti prathamā bhaviṣyati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8389: 466 adhirīśvaravacane uktam . kim uktam . yasya ca īśvaravacanam iti kartṛnirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8390: cet avacanāt siddham . prathamānupapattiḥ tu . svavacanāt siddham iti . adhiḥ svam
GS24pmbhasuu:8394: kartavyam . kim kāraṇam . puruṣabādhitatvāt . iha vacane hi sañjñābādhanam . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:8395: hi kriyamāṇe anavakāśā puruṣasañjñā parasmaipadasañjñām bādheta . parasmaipadasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:8396: api anavakāśā . sā vacanāt bhaviṣyati . sāvakāśā parasamaipadasañjñā . kaḥ vakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8397: . śatṛkkvasū avakāśaḥ . sici vṛddhau tu parasmaipadagrahaṇam jñāpakam puruṣābādhakatvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8398: . yat ayam sici vṛddhiḥ parasmaipadeṣu iti parasmaipadagrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:8399: ācāryaḥ na puruṣasañjñā parasmaipadasañjñām bādhate iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8402: ātmanepadagrahaṇam kartavyam . ātmanepadānām ca prathamamadhyamottamasañjñāḥ bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:8403: iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . samasaṅkhyārtham . saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:8404: akriyamāṇe hi ātmanepadagrahaṇe tisraḥ sañjñāḥ ṣaṭ sañjñinaḥ . vaiṣamyāt saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8405: na prāpnoti . kriyamāṇe api ca ātmanepadagrahaṇe ānupūrvyavacanam ca . ānupūrvyavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:8406: ca kartavyam . akriyamaṇe hi kasya cit eva trikasya prathamasañjñā syāt kasya cit
GS24pmbhasuu:8407: eva madhyamasañjñā kasya cit eva uttamasañjñā . na vaikaśeṣanirdeśāt . yat tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:8408: ucyate ātmanepadagrahaṇam kartavyam samasaṅkhyārtham iti . tat na kartavyam . sañjñāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8409: api ṣat eva nirdiśyante . katham . ekaśeṣanirdesāt . ekaśeṣanirdeśaḥ ayam . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:8410: etasmin ekaśeṣanirdeśe sati kim ayam kṛtaikaśeṣāṇām dvandvaḥ . prathamaḥ ca prathamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8411: ca prathamau madhyamaḥ ca madhyamaḥ ca madhyamau uttamaḥ ca uttamaḥ ca uttamau prathamau
GS24pmbhasuu:8412: ca madhyamau ca uttamau ca prathamamadhyamottamāḥ iti . āhosvit kṛtadvandvānām ekaśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8413: . prathamau ca madhyamaḥ ca uttamaḥ ca prathamamadhyamottamāḥ . prathamamadhyamotttamāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8414: ca prathamamadhyamottamāḥ ca prathamamadhyamottamāḥ iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi kṛtaikeśeṣāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:8415: dvandvaḥ prathamamadhyamayoḥ prathamasañjñā prāpnoti . uttamaprathamayoḥ madhyamasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:8416: prāpnoti . madhyamottamayoḥ uttamasañjñā prāpnoti . atha kṛtadvandvānāmekaśeṣo na
GS24pmbhasuu:8417: doṣaḥ bhavati . yathā na doṣaḥ tathā astu . kim punaḥ atra nyāyyam . ubhayam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8418: āha . ubhayam hi dṛśyate . tat yathā . bahu śaktikiṭakam bahūni śaktikiṭakāni bahu
GS24pmbhasuu:8419: sthālīpiṭharam bahūni sthālīpiṭharāṇi . yat api ucyate kriyamāṇe api ātmanepadagrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:8420: ānurpūrvyavacanam kartavyam iti . na kartavyam . lokataḥ etat siddham . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:8421: loke vihavyasya dvābhyām dvābhyām agniḥ upstheyaḥ iti . na ca ucyate ānupūrvyeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:8424: 470-471 trīṇi trīṇi iti anuvartate utāho na . kim ca ataḥ . yadi anuvartate aṣṭhanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8425: ā vibhaktau iti ātvam na prāpnoti . atha nivṛttam prathamayoḥ pūrvasavarṇaḥ iti atra
GS24pmbhasuu:8426: pratyayayoḥ eva grahaṇam prāpnoti . yathā icchasi tathā astu . astu tāvat anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:8427: iti . nanu ca uktam aṣṭhana ā vibhaktau iti ātvam na prāpnoti iti . vacanāt bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:8428: . atha vā punaḥ astu nivṛttam . nanu ca uktam prathamayoḥ pūrvasavarṇaḥ iti atra
GS24pmbhasuu:8429: pratyayayoḥ eva grahaṇam prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . aci iti anuvartate . na cājādī
GS24pmbhasuu:8430: prathamau pratyayau staḥ . nanu ca evam vijñāyate ajādī yau prathamau ajādīnām vā
GS24pmbhasuu:8431: yau prathamau iti . yat tarhi tasmāt śasaḥ naḥ pumsi iti anukrāntam pūrvasavarṇadīrgham
GS24pmbhasuu:8432: pratinirdiśati tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ vibhaktyoḥ grahaṇam iti . atha vā vacanagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8436: 471-476 kimartham idam ucyate . yuṣmadasmaccheṣavacanam niyamārtham . niyamārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8437: ayam ārambhaḥ . atha etasmin niyamārthe vijñāyamāne kim ayam upapadaniyamaḥ yuṣmadi
GS24pmbhasuu:8438: madhyamaḥ eva asmadi uttamaḥ eva āhosvit puruṣaniyamaḥ yuṣmadi eva madhyamaḥ asmadi
GS24pmbhasuu:8439: eva uttamaḥ iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi puruṣaniyamaḥ śeṣagrahaṇam kartavyam śeṣe prathamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8440: iti . kim kāraṇam . madhyamottamau niyatau yuṣmadasmadī aniyate . tatra prathamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8441: api prāpnoti . tatra śeṣagrahaṇam kartavyam prathamaniyamārtham . śeṣe eva prathamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8442: bhavati na anyatra iti . atha api upapadaniyamaḥ evam api śeṣagrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8443: śeṣe prathamaḥ iti . yuṣmadasmadī niyate madhyamottamau aniyatau tau śeṣe api prāpnutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8444: . tatra śeṣagrahaṇam kartavyam śeṣaniyamārtham . śeṣe prathamaḥ eva bhavati na anyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8445: iti . upapadaniyame śeṣagrahaṇam śakyam akartum . katham . yuṣmadasmadī niyate madhyamottamau
GS24pmbhasuu:8446: aniyatau tau śeṣe api prāpnutaḥ . tataḥ vakṣyāmi prathamaḥ bhavati iti . tat niyamārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:8447: bhaviṣyati . yatra prathamaḥ ca anyaḥ ca prāpnoti tatra prathamaḥ bhavati iti . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:8448: yuṣmadasmadanyeṣu prathamapratiṣedhaḥ śeṣatvāt . tatra yuṣmadasmadanyeṣu prathamasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8449: pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . tvam ca devadattaḥ ca pacathaḥ . aham ca devadattaḥ ca pacāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8450: . kim kāraṇam . śeṣatvāt . śeṣe prathamaḥ iti prathamaḥ prāpnoti . siddham tu yuṣmadasmadoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8451: pratiṣedhāt . siddham etat . katham . yuṣmadasmadoḥ pratiṣedhāt . śeṣe prathamḥ yuṣmadasmadoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8452: na iti vaktavyam . yuṣmadi madhyamāt asmadi uttamaḥ pratiṣedhena . yuṣmadi madhyamāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8453: asmadi uttamaḥ iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena . yuṣmadi madhyamaḥ iti asya avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8454: tvam pacasi . asmadi uttamaḥ iti asya avakāśaḥ aham pacāmi . iha ubhayam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:8455: tvam ca aham ca pacāvaḥ . asmadi uttamaḥ iti etat bhavati virpratiṣedhena . saḥ tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:8456: vipratiṣedhaḥ vaktvayaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . tyadādīnām yat yat param tat tat śiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8457: iti evam asmadaḥ śeṣaḥ bhaviṣyati . tatra asmadi uttamaḥ iti eva siddham . anekaśeṣabhāvārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:8458: tu . anekaśeṣabhāvārtham tu saḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . yadā ca ekaśeṣaḥ na . kadā
GS24pmbhasuu:8459: ca ekaśeṣaḥ na . sahavivakṣāyām ekaśeṣaḥ . yadā na sahavivakṣā tada ekaśeṣaḥ na asti
GS24pmbhasuu:8460: . na vā yuṣmadasmadoḥ anekaśeṣabhāvāt tadadhikaraṇānām api anekaśeṣabhāvāt avipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8461: . na vā arthaḥ vipratiṣedhena . kim kāraṇam . yuṣmadasmadoḥ anekaśeṣabhāvāt tadadhikaraṇānām
GS24pmbhasuu:8462: api yuṣmadasmadadhikaraṇānām api ekaśeṣena na bhavitavyam . tvam ca aham ca pacasi
GS24pmbhasuu:8463: pacāmi ca iti . kriyāpṛthaktve ca dravyapṛthaktvadarśanam anumānam uttaratra anekaśeṣabhāvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8464: . kriyāpṛthaktve ca dravyapṛthaktvam dṛśyate . tat yathā pacasi pacāmi ca tvam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:8465: aham ca iti . tat anumānam uttarayoḥ api kriyayoḥ ekaśeṣaḥ na bhavati iti . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:8466: ca kṛtvā saḥ pi adoṣaḥ bhavati yat uktam tatra yuṣmadasmadanyeṣu prathamapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8467: śeṣatvāt iti . tatra api hi evam bhavitavyam tvam ca devadattaḥ ca pacasi pacati
GS24pmbhasuu:8468: ca . aham ca devadattaḥ ca pacāmi pacati ca iti . yat tāvat ucyate na vā yuṣmadasmadoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8469: anekaśeṣabhāvāt tadadhikaraṇānām api anekaśeṣabhāvāt avipratiṣedhaḥ iti . dṛśyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8470: hi yuṣmadasmadoḥ cānekaśeṣaḥ tadadhikaraṇānām ca ekaśeṣaḥ . tat yathā tvam ca aham
GS24pmbhasuu:8471: ca vṛttrahan ubhau samprayujyāvahai iti . yat api ucyate kriyāpṛthaktve ca dravyapṛthaktvadarśanam
GS24pmbhasuu:8472: anumānam uttaratra anekaśeṣabhāvasya iti . kriyāpṛthaktve khalu api dravyaikaśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8473: bhavati iti dṛśyate . tat yathā akṣāḥ bhajyantām bhakṣyantām dīvyantām iti . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:8474: ca kṛtvā saḥ api doṣo bhavati yat uktam tatra yuṣmadasmadanyeṣu prathamapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8475: śeṣatvāt iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . parihṛtam etat siddham tu yuṣmadasmadoḥ pratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8476: iti . saḥ tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . śeṣe prathamaḥ vidhīyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:8477: na hi śeṣaḥ ca anyaḥ ca śeṣagrahaṇena gṛhyate . bhavet prathamaḥ na syān . madhyamottamau
GS24pmbhasuu:8478: api na prāpnutaḥ . kim kāraṇam . yuṣmadasmadoḥ upapadayoḥ madhyamottamau ucyete .
GS24pmbhasuu:8479: na ca yuṣmadasmadī anyaḥ ca yuṣmadasmadgrahaṇena gṛhyate . yat atra yuṣmat yat ca
GS24pmbhasuu:8480: asmat tattadāśrayau madhyamottamau bhaviṣyataḥ . yathā eva tarhi yat atra yuṣmat
GS24pmbhasuu:8481: yat ca smat tadāśrayau madhyamottamau bhavataḥ evam yaḥ atra śeṣaḥ tadāśrayaḥ prathamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8482: prāpnoti . evam tarhi śeṣe upapade prathamaḥ vidhīyate . upoccāri padam upapadam
GS24pmbhasuu:8483: . yat ca atra upoccāri na saḥ śeṣaḥ yaḥ ca śeṣaḥ na tat upoccāri . bhavet prathamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8484: na syāt . madhyamottamau api na prāpnutaḥ . kim kāraṇam . yuṣmadasmadoḥ upapadayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8485: madhyamottamau ucyete . upoccāri padam upapadam . yat ca atra upoccāri na te yuṣmadasmadī
GS24pmbhasuu:8486: ye ca yuṣmadasmadī na tat upoccāri . evam tarhi śeṣeṇa sāmānādhikaraṇye prathamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8487: vidhīyate . na ca atra śeṣeṇa eva sāmānādhikaraṇyam . bhavet prathamaḥ na syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:8488: madhyamottamau api na prāpnutaḥ . kim kāraṇam . yuṣmadasmadbhyām sāmānādhikaraṇye
GS24pmbhasuu:8489: madhyamottamau ucyete na ca atra yuṣmadasmadbhyām eva sāmānādhikaraṇyam . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:8490: tyadādīni sarvaiḥ nityam iti evam atra yuṣmadasmadoḥ śeṣaḥ bhaviṣyati . tatra yuṣmadi
GS24pmbhasuu:8491: madhyamaḥ asmadi uttamaḥ iti eva siddham . na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:8492: . sthānini api iti prathamaḥ prāpnoti . tyadādīnām khalu api yat yat param tat tat śiṣyate iti yadā bhavataḥ śeṣaḥ tadā prathamaḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8495: 477-478 yuṣmadi madhyamaḥ asmadi uttamaḥ iti eva ucyate. tau iha na prāpnutaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:8496: paramatvam pacasi . paramāham pacāmi iti . tadantavidhinā bhaviṣyati . iha api tarhi tadantavidhinā prāpnutaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:8497: atitvam pacati . atyaham pacati iti . ye ca api ete samānādhikaraṇavṛttayaḥ taddhitāḥ tatra ca madhyamottamau na prāpnutaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:8498: tvattaraḥ pacasi mattaraḥ pacāmi iti . tvadrūpaḥ pacasi madrūpaḥ pacāmi iti . tvatkalpaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8499: pacasi . matkalpaḥ pacāmi iti. evam tarhi yuṣmadvati asmadvati iti evam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:8501: atitvam pacati . atyaham pacati iti . evam tarhi yuṣmadi sādhane asmadi sādhane iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8502: evam bhaviṣyati . evam ca kṛtvā saḥ api adoṣaḥ bhavati yat uktam tatra yuṣmadasmadanyeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:8503: prathamapratiṣedhaḥ śeṣatvāt iti . atha vā prathamaḥ utsargaḥ kariṣyate . tasya yuṣmadasmadoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8504: upapadayoḥ madhyamottamau apavādau bhaviṣyataḥ . tatra yuṣmadgandhaḥ ca asmadgandhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8505: ca asti iti kṛtvā madhyamottamau bhaviṣyataḥ . atha iha katham bhavitavyam . atvam
GS24pmbhasuu:8506: tvam sampadyate tvadbhavati madbhavati iti . āhosvit tvadbhavasi madbhavāmi iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8507: tvadbhavati madbhavati iti evam bhavitavyam . madhyamottamau kasmāt na bhavataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8508: gauṇamukhyayoḥ mukhye sampratyayaḥ bhavati . tat yathā . gauḥ anubandhyaḥ ajaḥ agnīṣhomīyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8509: iti na bāhīkaḥ anubadhyate . katham tarhi bāhīke vṛddhyāttve bhavataḥ . gauḥ tiṣṭhati
GS24pmbhasuu:8510: . gām ānaya iti . arthāśraye etat evam bhavati . yat hi śabdāśrayam śabdamātre tat
GS24pmbhasuu:8513: 478-484 paraḥ sannikarṣaḥ samhitā cet adrutāyām asaṃhitam . paraḥ sannikarṣaḥ saṃhitā
GS24pmbhasuu:8514: cet adrutāyām vṛttau saṃhitāsañjñā na prāpnoti . drutāyām eva hi paraḥ sannikarṣo
GS24pmbhasuu:8515: varṇānām na adrutāyām . tulyaḥ samnikarṣaḥ . tulyaḥ samnikarṣaḥ varṇānām drutamadhyamavilimbitāsu
GS24pmbhasuu:8516: vṛttiṣu . kiṅkṛtaḥ tarthi viśeṣaḥ . varṇakālabhūyastvam tu . varṇānām tu kālabhūyastvam
GS24pmbhasuu:8517: . tat yathā . hastimaśakayoḥ tulyaḥ sannikarṣaḥ prāṇibhūyastvam tu . yadi evam drutāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:8518: taparakaraṇe madhyamavilimbitayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam kālabhedāt . drutāyām taparakaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:8519: madhyamavilimbitayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . kim kāraṇam . kālabhedāt . ye drutāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:8520: vṛttau varṇāḥ tribhāgādhikāḥ te madhyamāyām ye madhyamāyām vṛttau varṇāḥ tribhāgādhikāste
GS24pmbhasuu:8521: vilimbitāyām . uktam vā . kim uktam . siddham tu avasthitāḥ varṇāḥ vaktuḥ cirāciravacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8522: vṛttayaḥ viśiṣyante iti . atha vā śabdāvirāmaḥ saṃhitā iti etat lakṣaṇam kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8523: . śabdāvirāme prativarṇam avasānam . śabdāvirāme prativarṇam avasānasañjñā prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:8524: . kim idam prativarṇam iti . varṇam varṇam prati prativarṇam . yena eva yatnena ekaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8525: varṇaḥ uccyāryate vicchinne varṇe upasaṃhṛtya tam anyam upādāya dvitīyaḥ prayujyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8526: tathā tṛtīyaḥ tathā caturthaḥ . evam tarhi anavakāśā saṃhitāsañjñā avasānasañjñām
GS24pmbhasuu:8527: bādhiṣyate . atha vā avasānasañjñāyām prakarṣagatiḥ vijñāsyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:8528: sādhīyaḥ yaḥ virāmaḥ iti . kaḥ ca sādhīyaḥ . yaḥ śabdārthayoḥ virāmaḥ . atha vā hrādāvirāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8529: saṃhā iti etat lakṣaṇam kariṣyate . hrādāvirāme sparśāghoṣasaṃyoge asannidhānāt asaṃhitam
GS24pmbhasuu:8530: . hrādāvirāme sparśānām aghoṣāṇām saṃyoge asamnidhānāt saṃhitāsañjñā na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:8531: . kukkuṭaḥ pippakā pittam iti . kim ucyate saṃyoge iti . atha yatra ekaḥ pacati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8532: ekaḥ pūrvaparayoḥ hrādena pracchādyate . tad yathā . dvayoḥ raktayoḥ vastrayoḥ madhye
GS24pmbhasuu:8533: śuklam vastram tadguṇam upalabhyate . badarapiṭake riktakaḥ lohakaṃsaḥ tadguṇaḥ upalabhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8534: . ekena tulyaḥ sannidhiḥ . yathā ekaḥ varṇaḥ hrādena pracchādyate evam anekaḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:8535: . atha vā paurvāparyam akālavyapetam saṃhitā iti etat lakṣaṇam kariṣyate. paurvāparyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8536: akālavyapetam saṃhitā cet pūrvāparābhāvāt asaṃhitam . paurvāparyam akālavyapetam
GS24pmbhasuu:8537: saṃhitā cet pūrvāparābhāvāt saṃhitāsañjñā na prāpnoti . na hi varṇānām paurvāparyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8538: asti . kim kāraṇam . ekaikavarṇavartitvāt vācaḥ uccaritapradhvaṃsitvāt ca varṇānām
GS24pmbhasuu:8539: . ekaikavarṇavartinī vāk . na dvau yugapat uccārayati . gauḥ iti yāvat gakāre vāk
GS24pmbhasuu:8540: vartate na aukāre na visarjanīye . yāvat aukāre na gakāre na visarjanīye . yāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:8541: visarjanīye na gakāre na aukāre . uccaritapradhvaṃsitvāt . uccaritapradhvaṃsinaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8542: khalu api varṇāḥ . uccaritaḥ pradhvastaḥ . atha aparaḥ prayujyate . na varṇaḥ varṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8543: sahāyaḥ . evam tarhi buddhau kṛtvā sarvāḥ ceṣṭhāḥ kartā dhīraḥ tatvannītiḥ śabdena
GS24pmbhasuu:8544: arthān vācyān dṛṣṭvā buddhau kuryāt paurvāparyam . buddhiviṣayam eva śabdānām paurvāparyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8545: . iha yaḥ eṣaḥ manuṣyaḥ prekṣāpūrvakārī bhavati saḥ paśyati asamin arthe ayam śabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8546: prayoktvayaḥ smin tāvat śabde ayam tāvat varṇaḥ tataḥ ayam tataḥ ayam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8548: 484-488 idam vicāryate abhāvaḥ avasānalakṣaṇam syād virāmaḥ vā iti . kaḥ ca atra
GS24pmbhasuu:8549: viśeṣaḥ . abhāve avasānalakṣaṇe uparyabhāvavacanam . abhāveāvasānalakṣaṇe uparyabhāvagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8550: kartavyam . upari yaḥ abhāvaḥ iti vaktavyam . purastāt api hi śabdasya abhāvaḥ tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:8551: mā bhūt iti . kim ca syāt . rasaḥ rathaḥ . kharavasānayorvisarjanīyaḥ iti visarjanīyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8552: prasajyeta . astu tarhi virāmaḥ . virāme virāmavacanam . yasya virāmaḥ virāmagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8553: tena kartavyam . nanu ca yasya api abhāvaḥ tena api abhāvagrahaṇam kartavyam . parārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:8554: mama bhaviṣyati . abhāvaḥ lopaḥ . tataḥ avasānam ca iti . mama api tarhi virāmagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8555: parārtham bhaviṣyati . virāmaḥ lopaḥ avasānam ca iti . upari yaḥ virāmaḥ iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8556: . purastāt api śabdasya virāmaḥ tatra mā bhūt iti . kim ca syāt . rasaḥ rathaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8557: kharavasānayorvisarjanīyaḥ iti visarjanīyaḥ prasajyeta . ārambhapūrvakaḥ mama virāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8558: . atha vā na idam avasānalakṣaṇam vicāryate . kim tarhi . sañjñī . abhāvaḥ vasānasañjñī
GS24pmbhasuu:8559: syāt virāmaḥ vā iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . abhāve avasānasañjñini uparyabhāvavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:8560: . abhāve avasānasañjñin yuparyabhāvagrahaṇam kartavyam . upari yaḥ bhāvaḥ iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8561: . purastāt api hi śabdasya abhāvaḥ tatra mā bhūt iti . kim ca syāt . rasaḥ rathaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8562: . kharavasānayorvisarjanīyaḥ iti visarjanīyaḥ prasajyeta . astu tarhi virāmaḥ avāsanam
GS24pmbhasuu:8563: . virāme virāmavacanam . yasya virāmaḥ tena virāmagrahaṇam kartavyam . nanu ca yasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8564: api abhāvaḥ tena api abhāvagrahaṇam kartavyam . parārtham mama bhaviṣyati . abhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8565: lopaḥ . tataḥ avasānam ca iti . mama api tarhi virāmagrahaṇam parārtham bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:8566: . virāmaḥ lopaḥ avasānam ca iti . upari yaḥ virāmaḥ iti vaktavyam . nanu ca yasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8567: api abhāvaḥ tena api abhāvagrahaṇam kartavyam . parārtham mama bhaviṣyati . abhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8568: lopaḥ . tataḥ avasānam ca iti . mama api tarhi virāmagrahaṇam parārtham bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:8569: . virāmaḥ lopaḥ avasānam ca iti . upari yaḥ virāmaḥ iti vaktavyam . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:8570: ārambhapūrvakaḥ iti . na avaśyam ayam ramiḥ pravṛttau eva vartate . kim tarhi . apravṛttau
GS24pmbhasuu:8571: api . tat yathā . uparatāni asmin kule vratāni . uparataḥ svādhyāyaḥ iti . na ca
GS24pmbhasuu:8572: tatra svādhyāyaḥ bhūtapūrvaḥ bhavati na api vratāni . bhāvāvirāmabhāvitvāt śabdasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8573: vasānalakṣaṇam na . bhāvāvirāmabhāvitvāt śabdasya avasānalakṣaṇam na upapadyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:8574: kim idam bhāvāvirāmabhāvitvāt iti . bhāvasya avirāmaḥ bhāvāvirāmaḥ bhāvāvirāmeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:8575: bhavati iti bhāvāvirāmabhāvī bhāvāvirāmabhāvinaḥ bhāvo bhāvāvirāmabhāvitvam . aparaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8576: āha . bhāvabhāvitvādavirāmabhāvitvāt ca śabdasya avasānalakṣaṇam na upapadyate iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8577: . tatparaḥ iti vā varṇasya avasānam . virāmaparaḥ varṇaḥ vasānasañjñaḥ bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8578: vaktavyam . varṇaḥ antyaḥ vā avasānam . atha vā vyaktam eva paṭhitavyam antyaḥ varṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8579: vasānasañjñaḥ bhavati iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . saṃhitāvasānayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8580: lokaviditatvāt siddham . samhitā avasānam iti lokaviditau etau arthau . evam hi kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8582: śannodevīyam samhitayā adhīṣva iti . saḥ tatra paramasannikarṣam adhīte . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:8584: akāreṇa ikāreṇa ukāreṇa iti . evam etau lokaviditatau arthau . tayoḥ lokaviditatvāt siddham iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8586: 491-496 vidhiḥ iti kaḥ ayam śabdaḥ . vipūrvāt dhāñaḥ karmasādhanaḥ ikāraḥ . vidhīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8587: vidhiḥ iti . kim punaḥ vidhīyate . samāsaḥ vibhaktividhānam parāṅgavadbhāvaḥ ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:8588: kim punaḥ ayam adhikāraḥ āhosvit paribhāṣā . kaḥ punaḥ adhikāraparibhāṣayoḥ viśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8589: . adhikāraḥ pratiyogam tasya anirdeśārthaḥ iti yoge yoge upatiṣṭhate . paribhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:8590: punaḥ ekadeśasthā satī sarvam śāstram abhijvalayati pradīpavat . tat yathā pradīpaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8591: suprajvalitaḥ ekadeśasthaḥ sarvam veśma abhijvalayati . kaḥ punaḥ atra prayatnaviśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8592: . adhikāre sati svarayitavyam paribhāṣāyām punaḥ satyām sarvam apekṣyam . tathā idam
GS24pmbhasuu:8593: aparam dvaitam bhavati . ekārthībhāvaḥ vā sāmarthyam syāt vyapekṣā vā iti . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:8594: ekārthībhāve sāmarthye adhikāre ca sati samāsaḥ ekaḥ saṅgṛhītaḥ bhavati bibhaktividhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:8595: parāṅgavadbhāvaḥ ca asaṅgṛhītaḥ . vyapekṣāyām punaḥ sāmarthye adhikāre ca sati bibhaktividhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:8596: parāṅgavadbhāvaḥ ca saṅgṛhītaḥ samāsaḥ tu ekaḥ asaṅgṛhītaḥ . anyatra khalu api samarthagrahaṇāni
GS24pmbhasuu:8597: yuktagrahaṇāni ca kartavyāni bhavanti . kva anyatra . isusoḥ sāmarthye na cavāhāhaivayukte
GS24pmbhasuu:8598: iti . vyapekṣāyām punaḥ sāmarthye paribhāṣāyām ca satyām yāvān vyākaraṇe padagandhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8599: asti saḥ sarvaḥ saṅgṛhītaḥ bhavati samāsaḥ tu ekaḥ asaṅgṛhītaḥ . tatra ekārthībhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8600: sāmarthyam paribhāṣā ca iti evam sūtram abhinnatarakam bhavati . evam api kva cit
GS24pmbhasuu:8601: akartavyam samarthagrahaṇam kriyate kva cit ca kartavyam na kriyate . akartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8602: tāvat kriyate samarthānām prathamāt vā iti . kartavyam ca na kriyate karmaṇi aṇ samarthāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8603: iti . nanu ca gamyate tatra sāmarthyam . kumbhakāraḥ nagarakāraḥ iti . satyam gamyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8604: utpanne tu pratyaye . saḥ eva tāvat samarthāt utpādyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8606: 496-504 atha samarthagrahaṇam kimartham . vakṣyati dvitīyā śritādibhiḥ samasyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8607: . kaṣṭaśritaḥ narakaśritaḥ iti . samarthagrahaṇam kimartham . paśya devadatta kaṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:8608: . śritaḥ viṣṇumitraḥ gurukulam . tṛtīyā tatkṛtārthena guṇavacanena . śaṅkulākhaṇḍaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8609: kirikāṇaḥ . samarthagrahaṇam kimartham . tiṣṭha tvam śaṅkulayā . khaṇḍaḥ dhāvati
GS24pmbhasuu:8610: musalena . caturthī tadarthārthabalihitasukharakṣitaiḥ . gohitam aśrahitam . samarthagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8611: kimartham . sukham gobhyaḥ . hitam devadattāya . pañcamī bhayena . vṛkabhayam dasyubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:8612: corabhayam . samarthagrahaṇam kimartham . gaccha tvam mā vṛkebhyaḥ . bhayam devadattasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8615: brāhmaṇakambalaḥ . samarthagrahaṇam kimartham . bhāryā rājñaḥ . puruṣaḥ devadattasya . saptamī śauṇḍaiḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:8617: strīśauṇḍaḥ . samarthagrahaṇam kimartham . kuśalaḥ devadattaḥ akṣeṣu . śauṇḍaḥ pibati
GS24pmbhasuu:8618: pānāgāre . atha kriyamāṇe api samarthagrahaṇe iha kasmāt na bhavati mahat kaṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:8619: śritaḥ iti . na vā bhavati mahākaṣṭaśritaḥ iti . bhavati yadā etat vākyam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:8621: mahākaṣṭam śritaḥ mahākaṣṭaśritaḥ iti . yadā tu etat vākyam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:8622: mahat kaṣṭam śritaḥ iti tadā na bhavitavyam tadā ca prapnoti . tadā kasmāt na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:8623: . kasya kasmāt na bhavati . kim dvayoḥ āhosvit bahūnām . bahūnām kasmāt na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:8624: . sup supā iti vartate . nanu ca bhoḥ ākṛtau śāstrāṇi pravartante . tat yathā prātipadikāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8625: iti vartamāne anyasmāt ca anyasmāt ca prātipadikāt utpattiḥ bhavati . satyam etat
GS24pmbhasuu:8626: . ākṛtiḥ tu pratyekam parisamāpyate . yāvati etat parisamāpyate prātipadikāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8627: tāvataḥ utpattyā bhavitavyam . pratyekam ca etat parisamāpyate na samudāye . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:8628: iha api yāvati etat parisamāpyate sup supā iti tāvataḥ samāsena bhavitavyam . dvayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8629: dvayoḥ ca etat parisamāpyate na bahuṣu . dvayoḥ tarhi kasmāt na bhavati . asāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8630: . katham asāmarthyam . sāpekṣam asamartham bhavati iti . yadi sāpekṣam asamartham
GS24pmbhasuu:8631: bhavati iti ucyate rājapuruṣaḥ abhirūpaḥ rājapuruṣaḥ darśanīyaḥ atra vṛttiḥ na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:8632: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . pradhānam atra sāpekṣam . bhavati ca pradhānasya sāpekṣasya api
GS24pmbhasuu:8633: samāsaḥ . yatra tarhi apradhānam sāpekṣam bhavati tatra te vṛttiḥ na prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:8636: devadattasya dāsabhāryā iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . samudāyapekṣā atra ṣaṣṭḥī sarvam gurukulam apekṣate . yatra tarhi na samudāyapekṣā ṣaṣṭḥī tatra vṛttiḥ na prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:8637: kim odanaḥ śālīnām . saktvāḍhakam āpaṇīyānām . kutaḥ bhavān pāṭaliputrakaḥ . iha ca api :
GS24pmbhasuu:8641: yadi eṣā samudāyapekṣā ṣaṣṭḥī syāt na etat niyogataḥ gamyeta devadattasya yaḥ guruḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8642: tasya yaḥ putraḥ iti . kim tarhi . anyasya api guruputraḥ devadattasya kim cit iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8643: eṣaḥ arthaḥ gamyeta . yataḥ tu niyogataḥ devadattasya yaḥ guruḥ tasya yaḥ putraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8644: iti eṣaḥ arthaḥ gamyate ataḥ manyāmahe na samudāyapekṣā ṣaṣṭḥī iti . anyatra khalu
GS24pmbhasuu:8645: api samarthagrahaṇe sāpekṣasya api kāryam bhavati . kva anyatra . isusoḥ sāmarthye
GS24pmbhasuu:8646: . brāhamaṇasya sarpiḥ karoti iti . tasmāt na aeta śakyak vaktum sāpekṣam asamartham
GS24pmbhasuu:8647: bhavati iti . vṛttiḥ tarhi kasmāt na bhavati mahat kaṣṭam śritaḥ iti . saviśeṣaṇānām
GS24pmbhasuu:8648: vṛttiḥ na vṛttasya vā viśeṣaṇam na prayujyate iti vaktavyam . yadi saviśeṣaṇānām
GS24pmbhasuu:8649: vṛttiḥ na vṛttasya vā viśeṣaṇam na prayujyate iti ucyate devadattasya gurukulam devadattasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8650: guruputraḥ devadattasya dāsabhāryā iti atra vṛttiḥ na prāpnoti . agurukulaputrādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:8651: iti vaktavyam . tat tarhi vaktavyam saviśeṣaṇānām vṛttiḥ na vṛttasya vā viśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8652: na prayujyate agurukulaputrādīnām iti . na vaktavyam . vṛttiḥ tarhi kasmāt na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:8653: . agamakatvāt . iha samānārthena vākyena bhavitavyam samāsena ca . yaḥ ca iha arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8654: vākyena gamyate mahat kaṣṭam śritaḥ iti na jātu cit samāsena asau gamyate mahat kaṣṭaśritaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8655: iti . etasmāt hetoḥ brūmaḥ agamakatvāt iti . na brūmaḥ apaśabdaḥ syāt iti . yatra
GS24pmbhasuu:8656: gamakaḥ bhavati bhavati tatra vṛttiḥ . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:8659: devadattasya dāsabhāryā iti . yadi agamakatvam hetuḥ na arthaḥ samarthagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:8660: . iha api bhāryā rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ devadattasya iti yaḥ arthaḥ vākyena gamyate na asau
GS24pmbhasuu:8661: jātu cit samāsena asau gamyate bhārya rājapuruṣaḥ devadattasya iti . tasmāt na arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8663: tarhi prayojanam . asti asamarthasamāsaḥ nañsamāsaḥ gamakaḥ . tasya sādhutvam mā
GS24pmbhasuu:8664: bhūt . akiñcit kurvāṇam amāṣam haramāṇam agādhāt utsṛṣṭam iti . etat api na asti
GS24pmbhasuu:8665: prayojanam . avaśyam kasya cit nañsamāsasya gamakasya sādhutvam vaktavyam . asūryampaśyāni
GS24pmbhasuu:8666: mukhāni apunargeyāḥ ślokāḥ aśrāddhabhojī alavaṇabhojī brāhmaṇaḥ . suṭ anapuṃsakasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8667: etat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . etasya eva asamarthasamāsasya nañsamāsasya gamakasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8668: sādhutvam bhavati na anyasya iti . tasmān na arthaḥ samarthagrahaṇena .
GS24pmbhasuu:8670: 505-516 atha kriyamāṇe api samarthagrahaṇe samartham iti ucyate kim samartham nāma
GS24pmbhasuu:8671: . pṛthagarthānām ekārthībhāvaḥ samarthavacanam . pṛthagarthānām padānam ekārthībhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8672: samartham iti ucyate . vākye pṛthagarthāni rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ iti . samāse punaḥ ekārthāni
GS24pmbhasuu:8673: rājapuruṣaḥ iti . kim ucyate pṛthagarthāni iti yāvatā rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ ānīyatām iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8674: ukte rājapuruṣaḥ iti ca saḥ eva . na api brūmaḥ anyasya ānayanam bhavati iti . kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8675: tarhi ekārthībhāvakṛtaḥ viśeṣaḥ . subalopaḥ vyavadhānam yatheṣṭam anyatareṇa abhisambandhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8676: svaraḥ . supaḥ alopaḥ bhavati vākye . rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ iti . samāse punaḥ na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:8677: . rājapuruṣaḥ iti . vyavadhānam ca bhavati vākye . rājñaḥ ṛddhasya puruṣaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8678: samāse na bhavati . rājapuruṣaḥ iti . yatheṣṭam anyatareṇa abhisambandhaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:8679: vākye . rajñaḥ puruṣaḥ puruṣaḥ rājñaḥ iti . samāse na bhavati . rājapuruṣaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8680: dvau svarau bhavataḥ vākye . rajñaḥ puruṣaḥ . samāse punaḥ ekaḥ eva . rājapuruṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8681: iti . na ete ekārthībhāvakṛtāḥ viśeṣāḥ . kim tarhi . vācanikāni etāni . āha hi bhagavān
GS24pmbhasuu:8682: supaḥ dhātuprātipadikayoḥ upasarjanam pūrvam samāsasya antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8683: . ime tarhi ekārthībhāvkṛtāḥ viśeṣāḥ . saṅkhyāviśeṣaḥ vyaktābhidānam lkupasarjanaviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8684: cayogaḥ iti . saṅkhyāviśeṣaḥ bhavati vākye . rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ rājñoḥ puruṣaḥ rājñām
GS24pmbhasuu:8685: puruṣaḥ iti . samāse na bhavati . rājapuruṣaḥ iti . asti kāraṇam yena etat evam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:8686: . kim kāraṇam . yaḥ asau viśeṣavācī śabdaḥ tadasānnidhyāt . aṅga hi bhavān tam uccārayatu
GS24pmbhasuu:8687: gaṃsyate saḥ viśeṣaḥ . nanu ca na etena evam bhavitavyam . na hi śabdakṛtena nāma
GS24pmbhasuu:8688: arthena bhavitavyam . arthakṛtena nāma śabdena bhavitavyam . tat etat evam dṛśyatām
GS24pmbhasuu:8689: . artharūpam eva etat evañjātīyakam yena atra viśeṣaḥ na gamyate iti . avaśyam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:8690: etat evam vijñeyam . yaḥ hi manyate yaḥ asau viśeṣavācī śabdaḥ tadasānnidhyāt atra
GS24pmbhasuu:8691: viśeṣaḥ na gamyate iti iha tasya viśeṣaḥ gamyeta :
GS24pmbhasuu:8692: apsucaraḥ goṣucaraḥ varṣāsujaḥ iti . vyaktābhidhānam bhavati vākye . brāhmaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8693: kambalaḥ tiṣṭhati iti . samāse punaḥ avyaktam . brāhmaṇakambalaḥ tiṣṭhati iti . sandehaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8694: bhavati sambuddhiḥ syāt ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ vā iti . eṣaḥ api aviśeṣaḥ . bhavati hi kim
GS24pmbhasuu:8695: cit vākye avyaktam tat ca samāse vyaktam . vākye tāvat avyaktam . ardham paśoḥ devadattasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8696: iti . sandehaḥ bhavati paśuguṇasya vā devadattasya yat ardham artha vā yaḥ asau sañjñībhūtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8697: paśuḥ nāma tasya yat ardham iti . tat ca samāse vyaktam bhavati . ardhhapaśuḥ devadattasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8698: iti . upasarjanaviśeṣaṇam bhavati vākye . ṛddhasya rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ iti . samāse na
GS24pmbhasuu:8699: bhavati . rājapuruṣaḥ iti . eṣaḥ api adoṣaḥ . samāse api upasarjanaviśeṣaṇam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:8700: . tat yathā devadattasya gurukulam devadattasya guruputraḥ devadattasya dāsabhāryā
GS24pmbhasuu:8701: iti . cayogaḥ bhavati vākye . svacayogaḥ svāmicayogaḥ ca . svacayogaḥ rājñaḥ gauḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8702: ca aśvaḥ ca puruṣaḥ ca iti . samāse na bhavati . rājñaḥ gavāśvapuruṣāḥ iti . svāmicayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8703: devadattasya ca yajñadattasya ca viṣṇumitrasya ca gauḥ iti . samāse na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:8704: devadattayajñadattaviṣṇumitrāṇām gauḥ iti . atha etasmin ekārthībhāvkṛte viśeṣe kim
GS24pmbhasuu:8705: svābhāvikam śabdaiḥ arthābhidhānam āhosvit vācanikam . svābhāvikam iti āha . kutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8706: etat . arthānādeśāt . na hi arthāḥ ādiśyante . katham punaḥ arthān ādiśan evam brūyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8707: na arthāḥ ādiśyante it . yat āha bhavān anekam anyapadārthe cārthe dvandvaḥ apatye
GS24pmbhasuu:8708: rakte nirvṛtte iti . na etāni arthādeśanāni . svabhāvataḥ eteṣām śabdānām eteṣu artheṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:8709: abhiniviṣṭānām nimittatvena anvākhyānam kriyate . tat yathā . kūpe hastadakṣiṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8710: panthāḥ . abhre candramasam paśya iti . svabhāvataḥ tatrasthasya pathaḥ candramasaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8711: ca nimittatvena anvākhyānam kriyate . evam iha api cārthe yaḥ saḥ dvandvasamāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8712: anyapadārthaḥ yaḥ saḥ bahuvrīhiḥ iti . kim puna kāraṇam na ādiśyante . tat ca laghvartham
GS24pmbhasuu:8713: . laghvartham hi arthāḥ na ādiśyante . avaśyam hi anena arthān ādiśatā kena cit śabdena
GS24pmbhasuu:8714: nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ syāt . tasya ca tāvat kena kṛtaḥ yena asau kriyate . atha tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8715: kena cit kṛtaḥ tasya kena kṛtaḥ iti anavasthā . asambhavaḥ khalu api ādeśaḥ tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8716: . kaḥ hi nāma samarthaḥ dhātuprātipadikapratyayanipātānām arthān ādeṣṭum . na ca
GS24pmbhasuu:8717: etat mantavyam pratyayārthe nirdiṣṭe prakṛtyarthaḥ anirdiṣṭaḥ iti . bhavati hi guṇābhidhāne
GS24pmbhasuu:8718: guṇinaḥ sampratyayaḥ . tat yathā śuklaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8719: . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . sāmānyaśabdāḥ ete evam syuḥ . sāmanyaśabdāḥ ca na antareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:8720: viśeṣam prakaraṇam vā viśeṣeṣu avatiṣṭhante . yataḥ tu khalu niyogataḥ vṛkṣaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8721: ukte svabhāvataḥ kasmin cit eva viśeṣe vṛkṣaśabdaḥ vartate ataḥ manyāmahe na ime
GS24pmbhasuu:8722: sāmānyaśabdāḥ iti . na cet sāmānyaśabdāḥ prakṛtiḥ prakṛtyarthe vartate pratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8723: pratyayārthe vartate . apravṛttiḥ khalu api arthādeśanasya . bahavaḥ hi śabdāḥ yeṣām
GS24pmbhasuu:8724: arthāḥ na vijñāyante . jarbharī turpharītū . antareṇa khalu api śabdaprayogam bahavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8725: arthāḥ gamyante akṣinikocaiḥ pāṇivihāraiḥ ca . na khalu api nirjñātasya arthasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8726: anvyākhyane kim cit prayojanam asti . yaḥ hi brūyāt purastāt ādityaḥ udeti paścāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8727: astam eti madhuraḥ guḍaḥ kaṭukam śṛṅgaveram iti kim tena kṛtam syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:8729: 516 vāvacanānarthakyam ca svabhāvasiddhatvāt . vāvacanānarthakyam . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8730: svabhāvasiddhatvāt . iha dvau pakṣau vṛttipakṣaḥ avṛttipakṣaḥ ca . svabhāvataḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:8731: etat bhavati vākyam ca samāsaḥ ca . tatra svābhāvike vṛttiviṣaye nitye samāse prapte
GS24pmbhasuu:8732: vāvacanena kim anyat śakyam abhisambandhum anyat ataḥ sañjñāyāḥ . na ca sañjñāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8733: bhāvābhāvau iṣyete . tasmāt na arthaḥ vā vacanena .
GS24pmbhasuu:8735: 517-525 atha ye vṛttim vartayanti kim te āhuḥ . parārthābhidhānam vṛttiḥ iti āhuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8736: . atha teṣām evam bruvatām kim jahatsvārthā vṛttiḥ āhosvit ajahatsvārthā . kim ca
GS24pmbhasuu:8737: ataḥ . yadi jahatsvārthā vṛttiḥ rājapuruṣam ānaya iti ukte puruṣamātrasya ānayanam
GS24pmbhasuu:8738: prāpnoti aupagavam ānaya iti ukte apatyamātrasya . atha ajahatsvārthā vṛttiḥ ubhayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8739: vidyamānasvārthayoḥ dvayoḥ dvivacanam iti dvivacanam prāpnoti . kā punaḥ vṛttiḥ nyāyyā
GS24pmbhasuu:8740: . jahatsvārthā . yuktam punaḥ yat jahatsvārthā nāma vṛttiḥ syāt . bāḍham yuktam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8741: evam hi dṛśyate loke . puruṣaḥ ayam parakarmaṇi pravartamānaḥ svam karma jahāti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8742: tat yathā takṣā rājakarmaṇi vartamānaḥ svam karma jahāti . evam yuktam yat rājā puruṣārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:8743: vartamānaḥ svam artham jahyāt upaguḥ ca apartyārthe vartamānaḥ svam artham jahyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8744: . nanu ca uktam rājapuruṣam ānaya iti ukte puruṣamātrasya ānayanam prāpnoti aupagavam
GS24pmbhasuu:8745: ānaya iti ukte apatyamātrasya iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . jahat api asau svārtham na atyantāya
GS24pmbhasuu:8746: jahāti . yaḥ parārthavirodhī svārthaḥ tam jahāti . tat yathā takṣā rājakarmaṇi vartamānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8747: svam takṣakarma jahāti na hikkitahasitakaṇḍūyitāni . na ca ayam arthaḥ parārthavirodhī
GS24pmbhasuu:8748: viśeṣaṇam nāma . tasmāt na hāsyati . atha vā anvayāt viśeṣaṇam bhaviṣyati . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:8749: . ghṛtaghaṭaḥ tailaghaṭaḥ iti niṣikte ghṛte taile vā anvyayāt viśeṣaṇam bhavati ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:8750: ghṛtaghaṭaḥ ayam tailaghaṭaḥ iti . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . bhavati hi tatra yā ca yāvatī
GS24pmbhasuu:8751: ca arthamātrā . aṅga hi bhavān agnau niṣṭapya ghṛtaghaṭam tṛṇakūrcena prakṣālayatu
GS24pmbhasuu:8752: . na gaṃsyate saḥ viśeṣaḥ . yathā tarhi mallikāpuṭaḥ campakaputaḥ iti niṣkīrṇāsu
GS24pmbhasuu:8753: api sumanaḥsu anvayāt viśeṣaṇam bhavati ayam mallikapuṭaḥ ayam campakapuṭaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8754: atha vā samarthādhikāraḥ ayam vṛttau kriyate . sāmartham nama bhedaḥ saṃsargaḥ vā . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:8755: bhedasaṃsargau vā sāmarthyam iti . kaḥ punaḥ bhedaḥ saṃsargaḥ vā . iha rājñaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8756: ukte sarvam svam prasaktam puruṣaḥ iti ukte sarvaḥ svāmi prasaktaḥ . iha idānīm rājapuruṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8757: iti ukte rājā puruṣam nivartayati anyebhyaḥ svāmibhyaḥ puruṣaḥ api rājānam anyebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8758: svebhyaḥ . evam etasmin ubhayataḥ vyavacchinne yadi jahāti kāmam jahātu . na jātu
GS24pmbhasuu:8759: cit puruṣamātrasya ānayanam bhaviṣyati . atha vā punaḥ astu ajahatsvārthā vṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8760: . yuktam punaḥ yat ajahatsvārthā nāma vṛttiḥ syāt . bāḍham yuktam . evam hi dṛśyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8761: loke . bhikṣukaḥ ayam dvitīyām bhikṣām āsādya pūrvām na jahāti sañcayāya pravartate
GS24pmbhasuu:8762: . nanu ca uktam ubhayoḥ vidyamānasvārthayoḥ dvayoḥ dvivacanam iti dvivacanam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:8763: iti . kasyāḥ punaḥ dvivacanam prāpnoti . prathāmāyāḥ . na prathamāsamarthaḥ rājā
GS24pmbhasuu:8764: . ṣaṣṭhyāḥ tarhi . na ṣaṣṭhīsamarthaḥ puruṣaḥ . prathamāyāḥ eva tarhi prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8765: nanu ca uktam na prathamāsamarthaḥ rājā iti . abhinihitaḥ saḥ saḥ arthaḥ antarbhūtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8766: prātipadikārthaḥ sampannaḥ . tatra prātipadikārthe prathamā iti prathamāyāḥ eva dvivacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:8767: prāpnoti . saṅghātasya aikārthyāt na avayavasaṅkhyātaḥ subutpattiḥ . saṅghātasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8768: ekatvam arthaḥ . tena avayavasaṅkhyātaḥ subutpattiḥ na bhaviṣyati . parasparavyapekṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:8769: sāmarthyem eke . parasparavyapekṣā sāmarthyem eke icchanti . kā punaḥ śabdayoḥ vyapekṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:8770: . na brūmaḥ śabdayoḥ iti . kim tarhi . arthayoḥ . iha rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ iti ukte rājā
GS24pmbhasuu:8771: puruṣam apekṣate mama ayam iti . puruṣaḥ api rājānam apekṣate aham asya iti . tayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8772: abhisambandhasya ṣaṣṭhī vācikā bhavati . tathā kaṣṭam śritaḥ iti kriyākārakayoḥ abhisambandhasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8775: 525-531 atha yadi eva ekārthībhāvaḥ sāmarthyam atha api vyapekṣā sāmarthyam kim gatam
GS24pmbhasuu:8776: etat iyatā sūtreṇa āhosvit anyatarasmin pakṣe bhūyaḥ sūtram kartavyam . gatam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8777: āha . katham . samaḥ ayam arthaśabdena saha samāsaḥ . sam ca upasargaḥ . upasargāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8778: ca punaḥ evamātmakāḥ yatra kaḥ cit kriyāvācī śabdaḥ prayujyate tatra kriyāviśeṣam
GS24pmbhasuu:8779: āhuḥ . na ca iha kaḥ cit kriyāvācī śabdaḥ prayujyate yena samaḥ sāmarthyam syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:8780: tatra prayogāt etat gantavyam nūnam atra kaḥ cit prayogārhaḥ śabdaḥ na prayujyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8781: yena samaḥ sāmarthyam iti . tat yathā . dhūmam dṛṣṭvā agniḥ atra iti gamyate triviṣṭabdhakam
GS24pmbhasuu:8782: ca dṛṣṭvā parivrājakaḥ iti . kaḥ punaḥ asau prayogārhaḥ śabdaḥ . ucyate . saṅgatārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:8783: samartham saṃsṛṣṭārtham samartham samprekṣitam artham samartham sambaddhārtham samartham
GS24pmbhasuu:8784: iti . tat yadā tāvat ekārthībhāvaḥ sāmarthyam tadā evam vigrahaḥ kariṣyate saṅgatārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8785: saṃsṛṣṭārthaḥ samarthaḥ iti . tat yathā saṅgatam ghṛtam saṅgatam tailam iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8786: . ekībhūtam iti gamyate . yadā vyapekṣā sāmarthyam tadā evam vigrahaḥ kariṣyate samprekṣitārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8787: samarthaḥ sambaddhārthaḥ samarthaḥ iti . kaḥ punaḥ iha badhnātyarthaḥ . sambaddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8788: iti ucyate yaḥ rajjvā ayasā vā kīle vyatiṣiktaḥ bhavati . na avaśyam badhnātiḥ vyatiṣaṅge
GS24pmbhasuu:8789: eva vartate . kim tarhi . ahānau api vartate . tat yathā sambaddhau imau damyau iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8790: ucyete yau anyonyam na jahītaḥ . atha vā bhavati ca evañjātīyakeṣu badhnātiḥ vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:8791: . tat yathā . asti naḥ gargaiḥ sambandhaḥ . asti naḥ vatsaiḥ sambandhaḥ . saṃyogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8792: iti arthaḥ . atha etasmin vyapekṣāyām sāmarthye yaḥ asau ekārthībhāvkṛtaḥ viśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8793: sa vaktavyaḥ . tatra nānākārakāt nighātayuṣmadasmadādeśepratiṣedhaḥ . tatra etasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:8794: vyapekṣāyām sāmarthye nānākārakāt nighātayuṣmadasmadādeśāḥ prāpnuvanti . teṣām pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8795: vaktavyaḥ . nighātaḥ . ayam daṇḍaḥ . hara anena . asti daṇḍasya harateḥ ca vyapekṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:8796: iti kṛtvā nighātaḥ prāpnoti . yuṣmadasmadādeśāḥ . odanam paca . tava bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:8797: odanam paca mama bhaviṣyati . asti odanasya yuṣmadasmadoḥ ca vyapekṣā iti kṛtvā vāmnāvādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8798: prāpnuvanti . teṣām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kim ucyate nānākārakāt iti yadā tena
GS24pmbhasuu:8799: eva āsajya hriyate . na api brūmaḥ anyena āsajya hriyate iti . kim tarhi . śabdapramāṇakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8800: vayam . yat śabdaḥ āha tat asmākam pramāṇam . śabdaḥ ca iha sattām āha . ayam daṇḍaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8801: . asti iti gamyate . saḥ daṇḍaḥ kartā bhūtvā anyena śabdena abhisambadhyamānaḥ karaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8802: sampadyate . tat yathā . kaḥ cit kam cit pṛcchati . kva devadattaḥ iti . saḥ tasmai
GS24pmbhasuu:8803: ācaṣṭe . asau vṛkṣe iti . katarasmin . yaḥ tiṣṭhati iti . saḥ vṛkṣaḥ adhikaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8804: bhūtvā anyena śabdena abhisambadhyamānaḥ kartā sampadyate . pracaye samāsapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8805: . pracaye samāsapratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . rājñaḥ gauḥ ca aśvaḥ ca puruṣaḥ ca rājagavāśvapuruṣāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8806: iti . samarthatarāṇām vā . samarthatarāṇām vā padānām samāsaḥ bhaviṣyati . kāni punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8807: samarthatarāṇi . yāni dvandvabhāvīni . kutaḥ etat . eṣām hi āśutarā vṛttiḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:8808: . tat yathā samarthataraḥ ayam māṇavakaḥ adhyayanāya iti ucyate . āśrutaragranthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8810: samarthatarāṇām vā padānām samāsaḥ bhaviṣyati . kāni punaḥ samarthatarāṇi . yāni
GS24pmbhasuu:8811: dvandvabhāvīni . kutaḥ etat . etāni samānavibhaktīni anyavibhaktiḥ rājā . bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:8812: viśeṣaḥ svasmin bhrātari pitṛvyaputre ca . samudāyasāmarthyāt vā siddham ṣamudāyasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8813: vā punaḥ siddham etat . samudāyena rājñaḥ sāmarthyam bhavati na avayavena . aparaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8814: āha . samarthatarāṇām vā samudāyasāmarthyāt . samarthatarāṇām vā padānām samāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8815: bhavati . kutaḥ etat . samudāyasāmarthyāt eva . asmin pakṣe vā iti etat asamarthitam
GS24pmbhasuu:8816: bhavati . etat ca samarthitam . katham . na eva vā punaḥ atra rājñaḥ aśvapuruṣau
GS24pmbhasuu:8817: apekṣamāṇasya gavā saha samāsaḥ bhavati . kim tarhi . goḥ rājānam apekṣamāṇasya āsvapuruṣābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:8818: samāsaḥ samāsaḥ bhavati . pradhānam atra tada gauḥ bhavati . bhavati ca pradhānasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8821: 532-537 ākhyātam sāvyayakārakaviśeṣaṇam vākyam . ākhyātam sāvyayam sakārakam sakārakaviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8822: vākyasañjñam bhavati vaktavyam . sāvyayam . uccaiḥ paṭhati . nīcaiḥ paṭhati . sakārakam
GS24pmbhasuu:8823: . odanam pacati . sakārakaviśeṣaṇam . odanam mṛdu viśadam pacati . sakriyāviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8824: ca iti vaktavyam . suṣṭhu pacati . duṣṭhu pacati . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:8825: ākhyātam saviśeṣaṇam iti eva . sarvāṇi hi etāni kriyāviśeṣaṇāni . ekatiṅ . ekatiṅ
GS24pmbhasuu:8826: vākyasañjñam bhavati vaktavyam . brūhi brūhi . samānavākye nighātayuṣmadasmadādeśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8827: . samānavākye iti prakṛtya nighātayuṣmadasmadādeśāḥ vaktavyāḥ . kim prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8828: nānāvākye mā bhūvan nighātādayaḥ iti . ayam daṇḍaḥ . hara anena . odanam paca . tava
GS24pmbhasuu:8829: bhaviṣyati . odanam paca . mama bhaviṣyati . yoge pratiṣedhaḥ cādibhiḥ . cādibhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8830: yoge pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . grāmaḥ tava ca svam mama ca svam . kimartham icam ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8831: . yathānyāsam eva cādibhiḥ yoge pratiṣedhaḥ ucyate . idam adya apūrvam kriyate vākyasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:8833: sarvam etat vikalpate iti . tat ācāryaḥ suhṛt bhūtvā anvācaṣṭe cādibhiḥ yoge yathānyāsam
GS24pmbhasuu:8834: eva bhavati iti . samarthanighāte hi samānādhikaraṇayuktayukteṣu upasaṅkhyānam asamarthatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8835: . samarthanighāte hi samānādhikaraṇayuktayukteṣu upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam syāt . samānādhikaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:8836: . paṭave te dāsyāmi . mrdave te dāsyāmi . samānādhikaraṇe . yuktayukte . nadyāḥ tiṣṭhati
GS24pmbhasuu:8837: kūle . vṛkṣasya lambate śākhā . śālīnām te odanam dadāmi . śālīnām me odanam dadāti
GS24pmbhasuu:8838: . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . asamarthatvāt . rājagavīkṣīre dvisamāsaprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8839: dviṣaṣṭhībhāvāt . rājagavīkṣīre dvisamāsaprasaṅgaḥ . kim kāraṇam . dviṣaṣṭhībhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8840: . dve hi atra ṣaṣṭhyau . rājñaḥ goḥ kṣīram iti . kim ucyate dvisamāsaprasaṅgaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8841: yāvatā sup saha supā iti vartate . dvisamāsaprasaṅgaḥ iti na evam vijñāyate dvayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8842: subantayoḥ samāsaprasaṅgaḥ dvisamāsaprasaṅgaḥ iti . katham tarhi . dviprakārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8843: samāsasya prasaṅgaḥ dvisamāsaprasaṅgaḥ iti . rājagokṣīram iti api prāpnoti na ca
GS24pmbhasuu:8844: evam bhavitavyam . bhavitavyam ca yadā etat vākyam bhavati goḥ kṣīram gokṣīram rājñaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8845: gokṣīram rājagokṣīram iti . yadā tu etat vākyam bhavati rājñaḥ goḥ kṣīram iti tadā
GS24pmbhasuu:8846: na bhavitavyam tadā ca prāpnoti . tadā kasmāt na bhavati . siddham tu rājaviśiṣṭāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8847: goḥ kṣīreṇa sāmarthyāt . siddham etat . katham . rājaviśiṣṭāyāḥ goḥ kṣīreṇa saha
GS24pmbhasuu:8848: samāsaḥ bhavati na kevalāyāḥ . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8849: . yathā eva ayam gavi yatate na kṣīramātreṇa santoṣam karoti evam rājani api yatate
GS24pmbhasuu:8850: . rājñaḥ yā gauḥ tasyāḥ yat kṣīram iti . na eva vā punaḥ atra goḥ rājānam apekṣamāṇāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8851: kṣīreṇa saha samāsaḥ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . asāmarthyāt . katham asāmarthyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8852: sāpekṣam asamartham bhavati iti . katham tarhi goḥ kṣīram apekṣamāṇāyāḥ rājñā saha
GS24pmbhasuu:8853: samāsaḥ bhavati . pradhānam atra tada gauḥ bhavati . bhavati ca pradhānasya sāpekṣasya api samāsaḥ .

GS24pmbhasuu:8865: vā ekaśeṣanirdeśaḥ ayam. samarthasya ca samarthayoḥ ca samarthānām ca samarthānām

GS24pmbhasuu:8867: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . pratyekam vākyaparisamāptiḥ dṛṣṭā iti dvyekayoḥ api bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:8868: . evam api vivibhaktīnām na prāpnoti . samarthāt samarthe padāt pade iti . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:8873: samarthe vidhiḥ samarthvidhiḥ . padasya vidhiḥ padavidhiḥ ,

GS24pmbhasuu:8883: kartavyam . vīraḥ pūruṣaḥ vīrapuruṣaḥ . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . asamarthatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8884: . katham asamarthatvam . dravyam padārthaḥ iti cet. yadi dravyam padārthaḥ na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:8885: tadā sāmarthyam . atha hi guṇaḥ padārthaḥ bhavati tadā sāmarthyam . anyaḥ hi vīratvam
GS24pmbhasuu:8886: guṇaḥ anyaḥ hi puruṣatvam . na anyatvam asti iti iyatā sāmarthyam bhavati . anyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8887: hi devadattaḥ gobhyaḥ aśvebhyaḥ ca na ca tasya etāvatā sāmartham bhavati . kaḥ vā
GS24pmbhasuu:8888: viśeṣaḥ yat guṇe padārthe sāmarthyam syāt dravye ca na syāt . eṣaḥ viśeṣaḥ . ekam
GS24pmbhasuu:8889: tayoḥ adhikaraṇam anyaḥ ca vīratvam guṇaḥ anyaḥ puruṣatvam . dravyapadārthikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8890: api tarhi guṇabhedāt sāmarthyam bhaviṣyati . aśakyaḥ dravyapadārthikena dravyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8891: guṇakṛtaḥ upakāraḥ pratijñātum . nanu ca abhyantaraḥ asau bhavati . yadi api abhyantaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8892: na tu gamyate . na hi guḍaḥ iti ukte madhuratvam gamyate śṛṅgaveram iti vā kaṭukatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:8893: . guṇapadārthikena api tarhi aśakyaḥ guṇasya dravyakṛtaḥ upakāraḥ pratijñātum . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:8894: guṇapadārthikaḥ pratijānīte dravyapadārthikaḥ api kasmāt na pratijānīte . evam anayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8895: sāmarthyam syāt vā na vā . kva ca tāvat idam syāt samānādhikaraṇena iti . yatra sarvam samāman :
GS24pmbhasuu:8896: indraḥ śakraḥ puruhūtaḥ purandaraḥ . kanduḥ koṣṭhaḥ kuśūlaḥ iti . na evañjātīyakānām
GS24pmbhasuu:8897: samāsena bhavitavyam pratyayena vā utpattavyam . kim kāraṇam . arthagatyarthaḥ śabdaprayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8898: . artham pratyāyayiṣyāmi iti śabdaḥ prayujyate . tatra ekena uktatvāt tasya arthasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8899: dvitīyasya prayogeṇa na bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam . uktārthānām aprayogaḥ iti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:8900: tarhi idānīm idam bhavati bhṛtyabharaṇīyaḥ iti . na etau samānārthau . ekaḥ atra
GS24pmbhasuu:8902: śakyaḥ bhartum bhṛtyaḥ . arhati bhṛtim bharaṇīyaḥ . bhṛtyaḥ bharaṇīyaḥ bhṛtyabharaṇīyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8903: iti . yadi tarhi yatra kim cit samānam kaḥ cit viśeṣaḥ tatra bhavitavyam iha api
GS24pmbhasuu:8904: tarhi prāpnoti . darśanīyāyāḥ mātā darśanīyamātā iti . atra api kim cit samānam kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8905: cit viśeṣaḥ . kim punaḥ tat . sadbhāvānyabhāvau . na kva cit sadbhāvānyabhāvau na
GS24pmbhasuu:8906: staḥ ucyate ca samānādhikaraṇena iti . tatra prakarṣagatiḥ vijñāsyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:8907: yatra sādhīyaḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyam . kva ca sādhīyaḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyam . yatra sarvam
GS24pmbhasuu:8908: samānam sadbhāvānyabhāvau dravyam ca. atha vā samānādhikaraṇena iti tat samānam āśrīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8909: yat samānam bhavati na ca bhavati . na ca etat samānam kva cit api na bhavati . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:8910: vā yāvat brūyāt samānadravyeṇa iti tāvat samānādhikaraṇena iti . dravyam hi loke
GS24pmbhasuu:8911: adhikaraṇam iti ucyate . tat yathā . ekasmin dravye vyuditam . ekasmin adhikaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:8912: vyuditam iti . tathā vyākaraṇe vipratiṣiddham ca anadhikaraṇavāci iti adravyavāci
GS24pmbhasuu:8913: iti gamyate . evam api idam avaśyam kartavyam samānādhikaraṇam asamarthavat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:8914: iti . kim prayojanam . sarpiḥ kālakam yajuḥ pītakam iti evamartham . yadi samānādhikaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8915: asamarthavat bhavati iti ucyate sarpiḥ pīyate yajuḥ kriyate iti atra ṣatvam na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:8916: . adhātvabhihitam iti evam tat . evam ca kṛtvā samānādhikaraṇeṣu upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8917: . vīraḥ pūruṣaḥ vīrapuruṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam asamarthatvāt . na vā vacanaprāmāṇyāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:8918: na vā kartavyam . kim kāraṇam . vacanaprāmāṇyāt . vacanaprāmāṇyāt atra samāsaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:8919: . kim vacanaprāmāṇyam . samānamadhyamadhyamavīrāḥ ca iti . luptākhyāteṣu ca . luptākhyāteṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:8920: ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . niṣkauśāmbiḥ nirvārāṇasiḥ . luptākhyāteṣu ca . kim .
GS24pmbhasuu:8921: vacanaprāmāṇyāt . kim vacanaprāmāṇyam . kugatiprādayaḥ ca iti . asti anyat etasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8922: vacane prayojanam . kim . surājā atirājā iti . na brūmaḥ vṛttisūtravacanaprāmāṇyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8923: iti . kim tarhi . vārttikavacanaprāmāṇyāt iti . siddham tu kvāṅksvatidurgativacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8924: prādayaḥ ktārthe iti . tadarthagateḥ vā . tadarthagateḥ vā punaḥ siddham etat . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:8925: idam tadarthagateḥ iti . tasya arthaḥ tadarthaḥ tadarthasya gatiḥ tadarthagatiḥ tadarthagateḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8926: iti . yasya arthasya kauśāmbyā sāmarthyam saḥ nisā ucyate . atha vā saḥ arthaḥ tadarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8927: tadarthasya gatiḥ tadarthagatiḥ tadarthagateḥ iti . yaḥ arthaḥ kauśāmbyā samarthaḥ saḥ nisā ucyate .
