GS24pmbhasuu:8930: āhosvit aviśeṣeṇa . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . samāsaḥ dvayoḥ dvayoḥ cet dvandve anekagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8931: . samāsaḥ dvayoḥ dvayoḥ cet dvandve anekagrahaṇam kartavyam . carthe dvandvaḥ . anekam
GS24pmbhasuu:8932: iti vaktavyam iha api yathā syāt . plakṣanyagrodhakhadirapalāśāḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8933: . atra api dvayoḥ dvayoḥ samāsaḥ bhaviṣyati . dvayoḥ dvayoḥ samāsaḥ iti cet na bahuṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:8934: dvitvābhāvāt . dvayoḥ dvayoḥ samāsaḥ iti cet tat na . kim kāraṇam . bahuṣu dvitvābhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8935: . na bahuṣu dvitvam asti . na avaśyam evam vigrahaḥ kartavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:8936: plakṣaḥ ca nyagrodhaḥ ca khadiraḥ ca palāśaḥ ca iti . kim tarhi evam vighrahaḥ kariṣyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:8937: plakṣaḥ ca nyagrodhaḥ ca plakṣanyagrodhau khadiraḥ ca palāśaḥ ca khadirapalāśau plakṣanyagrodhau
GS24pmbhasuu:8938: ca khadirapalāśau plakṣanyagrodhakhadirapalāśāḥ iti . hotṛpotṛneṣṭodgātāraḥ tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:8939: na sidhyanti . hotāpotāneṣṭodgātāraḥ iti prāpnoti . na ca evam bhavitavyam . bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8940: ca yadā evam vigrahaḥ kriyate hotā ca potā ca hotāpotārau neṣṭā ca udgātā ca neṣṭodgātārau
GS24pmbhasuu:8941: hotāpotārau ca neṣṭodgātārau ca hotāpotāneṣṭodgātāraḥ iti . hotṛpotṛneṣṭodgātāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8942: tu na sidhyanti . samāsāntapratiṣedhaḥ ca . samāsāntasya ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8943: . vāktvaksrugdṛṣadam iti . vāktvacasrugdṛṣadam iti prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . atra
GS24pmbhasuu:8944: api pareṇa pareṇa saha samāsaḥ bhaviṣyati . sruk ca dṛṣadam ca srugdṛṣadam tvak ca
GS24pmbhasuu:8945: srugdṛṣadam ca tvaksrugdṛṣadam vāk ca tvaksrugdṛṣadam ca vāktvaksrugdṛṣadam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8946: hotṛpotṛneṣṭodgātāraḥ evam tarhi sidhyanti . iha ca susukṣmajaṭakeśena sunatājivāsanā
GS24pmbhasuu:8947: samantaśitirandhreṇa dvayoḥ vṛttau na sidhyati . astu tarhi aviśeṣeṇa . aviśeṣeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:8948: bahuvrīhau anekapadaprasaṅgaḥ . yadi aviśeṣeṇa bahuvrīhau anekapadaprasaṅgaḥ . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:8949: kaḥ doṣaḥ . tatra svarasamāsāntapuṃvadbhāveṣu doṣaḥ . tatra svarasamāsāntapuṃvadbhāveṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:8950: doṣaḥ bhavati . svara . pūrvaśālāpriyaḥ aparaśālāpriyaḥ . svara . samāsānta . pañcagavapriyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8951: . samāsānta . puṃvadbhāva . khādiretaraśamyam rauravetarśamyam . na vā avayavatatpuruṣatvāt.
GS24pmbhasuu:8952: na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . avayavatatpuruṣatvāt . avayavaḥ atra tatpuruṣasañjñaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8953: tadāśrayau samāsāntapuṃvadbhāvau bhaviṣyataḥ . svaraḥ katham . tasya antodāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:8954: vipratiṣedhāt . antodāttatvam kriyatām pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaraḥ iti antodāttatvam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:8955: vipratiṣedhena . na eṣaḥ yuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . vipratiṣedhe param iti ucyate . pūrvam
GS24pmbhasuu:8956: ca antodāttatvam param pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaratvam . na paravipratiṣedham brūmaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8957: kim tarhi . antaraṅgavipratiṣedham . nimittisvarabalīyastvāt vā . atha vā nimittasvarāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8958: nimittisvaraḥ balīyān iti vaktavyam . kim punaḥ nimittam kaḥ vā nimittī . bahuvrīhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8959: nimittam tatpuruṣaḥ nimittī . tat tarhi vaktavyam nimittasvarāt nimittisvaraḥ balīyān
GS24pmbhasuu:8960: iti . na vaktavyam . ekaśitipātsvaravacanam tu jñāpakam nimittisvarabalīyastvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8961: . yat ayam yuktārohyādiṣu ekaśitipacchabdam paṭhati tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ nimittasvarāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8962: nimittisvaraḥ balīyān iti . kaḥ punaḥ arhati yuktārohyādiṣu ekaśitipacchabdam paṭhitum
GS24pmbhasuu:8963: . evam kila nāma paṭhyate ekaḥ śitiḥ ekaśitiḥ ekaḥ śitiḥ pādaḥ yasya iti . tat ca
GS24pmbhasuu:8964: na . evam vigrahaḥ kariṣyate . ekaḥ śitiḥ eṣu te ime ekaśitayaḥ ekaśitayaḥ pādāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8965: yasya iti . atha api evam vigrahaḥ kriyate ekaḥ śitiḥ ekaśitiḥ ekaḥ śitiḥ pādaḥ yasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8966: iti evam api na arthaḥ pāṭhena . igante dvigau iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ atra bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:8967: . asya tarhi bahuvrīhyavayavasya tatpuruṣañjñā prāpnoti susukṣmajaṭakeśena sunatājivāsanā
GS24pmbhasuu:8968: samantaśitirandhreṇa iti . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . tasya antodāttatvam vipratiṣedhāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8969: antodāttatvam syāt vipratiṣedhena . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na idam bahuvrīhyavayavasya tatpuruṣasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8970: lakṣaṇam ārabhyate . kim tarhi . yasya bahuvrīhyavayavasya tatpuruṣasya tat lakṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8971: asti tasya antodāttatvam bhaviṣyati vipratiṣedhena . nanu ca asya api asti kim viśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8972: viśeṣyeṇa bahulam iti. bahulavacanāt na bhaviṣyati . asya tarhi bahuvrīhyavayavasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8974: iti . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . tasya antodāttatvam vipratiṣedhāt iti antodāttatvam syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8975: vipratiṣedhena . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . igante dvigau iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ bhaviṣyati . yaḥ tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:8976: na igantaḥ adhikaśatavarṣaḥ iti . iha ca api adhikaṣaṣṭivarṣaḥ iti samāsantaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:8977: . ḍacprakaraṇe saṅkhyāyāḥ tatpuruṣasya upasaṅkhyānam nistriṃśādyartham iti . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8978: doṣaḥ . avyayādeḥ iti evam tat . kim punaḥ kāraṇam avyayādeḥ iti evam tat . iha mā
GS24pmbhasuu:8979: bhūt gotriṃśat gocatvāriṃśat iti . bahuvrīhisañjñā tarhi prāpnoti. saṅkhyayā avyayāsannādūrādhikasaṅhyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8980: saṅkhyeye iti . na saṅkhyām saṅkhyeye vartayiṣyāmaḥ . katham . evam vigrahaḥ kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8981: adhikā ṣaṣṭiḥ varṣāṇām asya iti . yathā tarhi saḥ yogaḥ pratyākhyāyate tathā pūrveṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:8982: prāpnoti . katham ca saḥ yogaḥ pratyākhyāyate . aśiṣyaḥ saṅkhyottarapadaḥ saṅkhyā
GS24pmbhasuu:8983: iva abhidhāyitvāt iti . pratyākhyāte tasmin yoge saṅkhyām saṅkhyeye vartayiṣyāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8984: . tatra evam vigrahaḥ kariṣyate adhikā ṣaṣṭiḥ varṣāṇi asya iti . sarvatha vayam adhikaṣaṣṭivarṣāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8985: na mucyāmahe . katham . yāvatā saḥ ca yogaḥ pratyākhyāyate ayam ca vigrahaḥ asti
GS24pmbhasuu:8986: adhikā ṣaṣṭiḥ varṣāṇām asya iti . yat tu tat uktam adhikaṣaṣṭivarṣaḥ na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:8987: iti saḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . katham . yāvatā saḥ ca yogaḥ pratyākhyāyate ayam ca vigrahaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8988: asti adhikā ṣaṣṭiḥ varṣāṇi asya iti . adhikaśatavarṣaḥ tu na sidhyati . kartavyaḥ atra yatnaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8990: 555-561 sup iti kimartham . karoṣi aṭan . na etat asti . asāmarthyāt atra na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:8991: . katham asāmarthyam . samānādhikaraṇam asamarthavat bhavati iti . idam tarhi . pīḍye
GS24pmbhasuu:8992: pīḍyamāna . idam ca api udāharaṇam karoṣi aṭan . nanu ca uktam asāmarthyāt atra na
GS24pmbhasuu:8993: bhaviṣyati . katham asāmarthyam . samānādhikaraṇam asamarthavat bhavati iti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:8994: eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . adhātvabhihitam iti evam tat . āmantritasya parāṅgvadbhāve ṣaṣṭhyāmantritakārakavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:8995: . āmantritasya parāṅgvadbhāve ṣaṣṭhyantam āmantritakārakam ca parasya aṅgavat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:8996: iti vaktavyam . ṣaṣthyantam tāvat . madrāṇām rājan magadhānām rājan . āmantritakārakam
GS24pmbhasuu:8997: . kuṇḍena aṭan . na asti atra viśeṣaḥ parāṅgavadbhāve sati asati vā . idam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:8998: . paraśunā vṛścan . tannimittagrahaṇam vā . tannimittagrahaṇam vā kartavyam. āmantritanimittam
GS24pmbhasuu:8999: parasya aṅgavat bhavati iti vaktavyam . tat ca avaśyam anyatarat vaktavyam . avacane
GS24pmbhasuu:9000: hi subantamātraprasaṅgaḥ . anucyamāne hi etasmin subantramātrasya parāṅgavadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9001: prāpnoti . asya api prasajyeta . kṣtreṇa agne svāyuḥ saṃrabhasya mitreṇa agne mitradheye
GS24pmbhasuu:9002: yatasva . kim punaḥ atra jyāyaḥ . tannimittagrahaṇam eva jyāyaḥ . idam api siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:9003: bhavati . goṣu svāmin aśveṣu svāmin . etat hi na eva ṣaṣthyantam na api āmantritakārakam
GS24pmbhasuu:9004: . subantasya parāṅgavadbhāve samānādhikaraṇasya upasaṅkhyanam ananantaratvāt . subantasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9005: parāṅgavadbhāve samānādhikaraṇasya upasaṅkhyanam kartavyam . tīkṣṇayā sūcyā sīvyan
GS24pmbhasuu:9006: tīkṣṇena paraśunā vṛścan . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . ananantaratvāt . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:9007: ca parasya parāṅgavadbhāve kṛte pūrvasya api bhaviṣyati . svare avadhāraṇāt ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:9008: svare avadhāraṇāt ca na sidhyati . svare avadhāraṇam kriyate na ānantarye . param
GS24pmbhasuu:9009: api chandasi . param api chandasi pūrvasya aṅgavat bhavati iti vaktavyam . ā te pitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9010: marutām sumnam etu . prati tvā duhitaḥ divaḥ . vṛṇīṣva duhitaḥ divaḥ . avyayapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9011: ca . avyayānām ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . uccaiḥ adhīyāna nīcaiḥ adhīyāna . anavyayībhāvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9012: . anavyayībhāvasya iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . upāgni adhīyāna pratyagni adhīyāna
GS24pmbhasuu:9013: . atha kimartham svare avadhāraṇam kriyate . svare avadhāraṇam subalopārtham . svare
GS24pmbhasuu:9014: avadhāraṇam kriyate sublaḥ mā bhūt iti . paraśunā vṛścan . na vā subantaikāntatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9015: . na vā kartavyam . kim kāraṇam . subantaikāntatvāt . subantaikāntaḥ parāṅgavadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9016: bhavati . prātipadikaikāntaḥ tu sublope . prātipadikaikāntaḥ tu bhavati sublope kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:9017: . pratyayalakṣaṇena subantaikāntatā syāt . tasmāt svare avadhāraṇam na kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9018: subalopārtham . prātipadikasthāyāḥ supaḥ luk ucyate . tasmāt svaragrahaṇena na arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9019: . idam tarhi prayojanam ṣatvaṇatve mā bhūtām iti . kūpe siñcan carma naman iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9020: etat api na asti prayojanam . iha tāvat kūpe siñcan iti svāśrayam padāditvam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:9021: . carma naman iti pūrvapadāt sañjñāyām agaḥ iti etasmāt niyamāt na bhaviṣyati . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:9022: ca samāse etat bhavati pūrvapadam uttarapadam iti . na iti āha . aviśeṣeṇa etat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:9023: . pūrvam padam pūrvapadam uttaram padam uttarapadam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9025: 561-565 prāgvacanam kimartham . prāgvacanam sañjñānivṛttyartham . prāgvacanam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:9026: samāsasañjñāyāḥ anivṛttiḥ yathā syāt . akriyamāṇe hi prāgvacane anavakāśāḥ avyayībhāvādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9027: sañjñāḥ samāsasañjñām bādheran . tāḥ mā bādhiṣata iti prāgvacanam kriyate . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:9028: kriyamāṇe api prāgvacane yāvatā anavakāśāḥ avyayībhāvādayaḥ sañjñāḥ kasmāt eva na
GS24pmbhasuu:9029: bādhante . kriyamāṇe hi prāgvacane satyām samāsasañjñāyām etāḥ avayavasañjñāḥ ārabhyante
GS24pmbhasuu:9030: . tatra vacanasamāveśaḥ bhaviṣyati . samāsasañjñā api anavakāśā . sā vacanāt bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:9031: . sāvakāśā samāsasañjñā . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . vispaṣṭādīni avakāśaḥ . vispaṣṭam paṭuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9032: vispaṣṭapaṭuḥ iti . na eṣaḥ asti avakāśaḥ . eṣā hi ācāryasya śailī lakṣyate yena
GS24pmbhasuu:9033: eva avayavakāryam bhavati tena eva samudāyakāryam api bhavati . yena eva avayavakāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:9034: svaraḥ tena eva samudākāryam api samāsaḥ bhaviṣyati . vispaṣṭādīni guṇavacaneṣu iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9035: . idam tarhi kākatālīyam ajākṛpāṇīyam . atra api yena eva avayavakāryam pratyayotpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9036: kriyate tena eva samudākāryam samāsasañjñā bhaviṣyati . samāsāt ca tadviṣayāt . idam
GS24pmbhasuu:9037: tarhi punārājaḥ punargavaḥ . atra api avaśyam tatpuruṣasañjñā vaktavya tatpuruṣāśrayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9038: samāsāntaḥ yathā syāt . idam tarhi . punarādheyam . atra api avaśyam gatisañjñā vaktavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:9039: gatikārakopapadāt kṛt iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ yathā syāt . idam tarhi punarutsyūtam vāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9040: deyam . atra api avaśyam gatisañjñā vaktavyā gatiḥ gatau iti nighātaḥ yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9041: . yadi tat na asti punaścanasau chandasi iti. sati tasmin tena eva siddham . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:9042: api ekā sañjñā iti vacanāt na asti yaugapadyena sambhavaḥ . paryāyaḥ prasajyeta .
GS24pmbhasuu:9045: 565-569 sahavacanam kimartham . sahavacanam pṛthak asamāsārtham . sahagrahaṇam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:9046: sahabhūtayoḥ samāsañjñā yathā syāt ekaikasya mā bhūt iti . kim ca syāt . yadi ekaikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9047: samāsañjñā syāt iha ṛkpādaḥ iti samāsāntaḥ prasajyeta . iha ca rājāśvaḥ iti dvau
GS24pmbhasuu:9048: svarau syātām . katham ca kṛtvā ekaikasya sañjñā prāpnoti . pratyekam vākyaparisamāptiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9049: dṛṣṭā . tat yathā vṛddhiguṇasañjñe pratyekam bhavataḥ . nanu ca ayam api asti dṛṣṭāntaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9050: samudāye vākyaparisamāptiḥ iti . tat yathā gargāḥ śatam daṇḍyantām iti . arthinaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9051: ca rājānaḥ hiraṇyena bhavanti na ca pratyekam daṇḍayanti . sati etasmin dṛṣṭānte
GS24pmbhasuu:9052: yadi tatra pratyekam iti ucyate iha api sahagrahaṇam kartavyam . atha tatra antareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:9053: pratyekam iti vacanam pratyekam guṇavṛddhisañjñe bhavataḥ iha api na arthaḥ sahagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:9054: . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat sahagrahaṇam karoti tasya etat prayojanam yogāṅgam yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:9055: vijñāyeta . sati ca yogāṅge yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . saha sup samasyate . kena saha
GS24pmbhasuu:9056: . samarthena. anuvyācalat anuprāviśat . tataḥ supā . supā ca saha sup samasyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:9057: adhikāraḥ ca lakṣaṇam ca . yasya samāsasya anyat lakṣaṇam na asti idam tasya lakṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9058: bhaviṣyati . punarutsyūtam vāsaḥ deyam punarniṣkṛtaḥ rathaḥ iti . ivena vibhaktyalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9059: pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaratvam ca . ivena saha samāsaḥ vibhaktyalopaḥ pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaratvam
GS24pmbhasuu:9062: 569 kimartham mahatī sañjñā kriyate . anvarthasañjñā yathā vijñayeta . anavyayam
GS24pmbhasuu:9063: avyayam bhavati iti avyayībhāvaḥ . avyayībhāvaḥ ca samāsaḥ avyayasañjñaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:9066: 569-570 iha kasmāt na bhavati . sumadrāḥ sumagadhāḥ saputraḥ sacchātraḥ iti . samṛddhau sākalye iti ca prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . iha kaḥ cit samāsaḥ pūrvapadārthapradhānaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9071: anyapadārthapradhānaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ ubhayapadārthapradhānaḥ dvandvaḥ . na ca atra pūrvapadārthaprādhānyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9072: gamyate . atha vā na ime samāsārthāḥ nirdiśyante . kim tarhi . avyayārthāḥ nirdiśyante
GS24pmbhasuu:9073: ime . eteṣu artheṣu yat avyayam vartate tat subantena samasyate iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9075: 570-572 asādṛśye iti kimartham . yathā devadattaḥ tathā yajñadattaḥ iti . asādṛśye iti ucyate . tatra idam na sidhyati :
GS24pmbhasuu:9076: yathāśakti yathābalam iti . kim kāraṇam . yathā iti ayam prakāravacane thāl saḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:9077: sādṛśye vartate . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ayam yathāśabdaḥ asti eva avyutpannam prātipadikam
GS24pmbhasuu:9078: vīpsāvācī . asti prakāravacane thāl . tat yat avyutpannam prātipadikam vīpsāvāci
GS24pmbhasuu:9079: tasya idam grahaṇam . atha yaḥ prakāravacane thāl tasya grahaṇam kasmāt na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:9080: . pūrveṇa prāpnoti sādṛśyasampatti iti . pratiṣedhavacanasāmarthyāt na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:9082: 572 sup iti vartamāne punaḥ subgrahaṇam kimartham . avyayam iti evam tat abhūt submātre yathā syāt . māṣaprati sūpaprati odanaprati .
GS24pmbhasuu:9084: 573-574 akṣādayaḥ tṛtīyāntāḥ pūrvoktasya yathā na tat . akṣādayaḥ tṛtīyāntāḥ pariṇā
GS24pmbhasuu:9085: saha samasyante iti vaktavyam . pūrvoktasya yathā na tat . ayathājātīyake dyotye
GS24pmbhasuu:9086: . akṣeṇa na tathā vṛttam yathā pūrvam iti akṣapari śalākāpari . ekatve akṣaśalākayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9087: . akṣaśalākayoḥ ca ekavacanāntayoḥ iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . akṣābhyām vṛttam
GS24pmbhasuu:9088: akṣaiḥ vṛttam . kitavavyavahāre ca . kitavavyavahāre iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:9089: . akṣeṇa idam na vṛttam śakaṭena yathā pūrvam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9091: 574-575 yogavibhāgaḥ kartavyaḥ . vibhāṣā iti ayam adhikāraḥ. tataḥ apaparibahirañcavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9092: pañcamyā iti . pañcamīgrahaṇam śakyam akartum . katham . subantena iti vartate etaiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9093: ca karmapravacanīyaiḥ yoge pañcamī vidhīyate . tatra antareṇa api pañcamīgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9094: pañcamyantena eva samāsaḥ bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam . bahiḥśabdena yoge
GS24pmbhasuu:9095: pañcamī na vidhīyate . tatra api yathā syāt iti . bahirgrāmāt . atha kriyamāṇe api
GS24pmbhasuu:9096: pañcamīgrahaṇe yāvatā bahiḥśabdena yoge pañcamī na vidhīyate katham eva etat sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:9099: 575 maryādābhividhigrahaṇam śakyam akartum . katham . pañcamyantena iti vartate āṅā
GS24pmbhasuu:9100: ca karmapravacanīyayukte pañcamī vidhīyate . etayoḥ ca eva arthayoḥ āṅ karmapravacanīyasañjñaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9103: 575-576 kim udāharaṇam . anugaṅgam hāstinapuram anugaṅgam vārāṇasī anuśoṇam pāṭaliputram
GS24pmbhasuu:9104: . yasya ca āyāmaḥ iti ucyate gaṅgā ca api āyatā vārāṇasī api āyatā . tatra kutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9105: etat gaṅgayā saha samāsaḥ bhaviṣyati na punaḥ vārāṇasyā iti . evarm tarhi lakṣaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:9106: iti vartate gaṅgā ca eva hi lakṣaṇam na vārāṇasī . atha vā yasya ca āyāmaḥ iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:9107: gaṅgā ca api āyatā vārāṇasī api āyatā . tatra prakarṣagatiḥ vijñāsyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:9108: sādhīyaḥ yasya āyāmaḥ iti . sādhīyaḥ ca gaṅgāyāḥ na vārāṇasyāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9110: 576-577 kimarthaḥ cakāraḥ . evakārārthaḥ . tiṣṭhadguprabhṛtīni eva . kva mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:9111: . paramam tiṣṭhadgu . tiṣṭhadgu kālaviśeṣe . tiṣṭhadgu kālaviśeṣe iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9112: tiṣṭhanti gāvaḥ asmin kāle tiṣṭhadgu . vahadgu . khaleyavādīni prathamāntāni anyapadārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:9113: . khaleyavādīni prathamāntāni anyapadārthe samasyante . khaleyavam khalebusam lūnayavam
GS24pmbhasuu:9116: 577-579 vāvacanam kimartham . vibhāṣā samāsaḥ yatha syāt . samāsena mukte vākyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9117: api yathā syāt . pāram gaṅgāyāḥ iti . na etat asti prayojanam . prakṛtā mahāvibhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:9118: . tayā vākyam api bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam avyayībhāvena mukte ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9119: yathā syāt . gaṅgāpāram iti . etat api na asti prayojanam . ayam api vibhāṣā ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9120: api . tau ubhau vacanāt bhaviṣyataḥ . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . pāre madhye ṣaṣṭhyā
GS24pmbhasuu:9121: vāvacanam . pāre madhye ṣaṣṭhyā vā iti vaktavyam . avacane hi ṣaṣṭhīsamāsābhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9122: yathā ekadeśipradhāne . akriyamāṇe hi vāvacane ṣaṣṭhīsamāsasya abhāvaḥ syāt yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:9123: ekadeśipradhāne . tat yatha ekadeśisamāsena mukte ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ na bhavati . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:9124: punaḥ kāraṇam ekadeśisamāsena mukte ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ na bhavati . samāsataddhitānām
GS24pmbhasuu:9125: vṛttiḥ vibhāṣā . vṛttiviṣaye nityaḥ apavādaḥ . iha punaḥ vāvacane kriyamāṇe ekayā
GS24pmbhasuu:9126: vṛttiḥ vibhāṣā aparayā vṛttiviṣaye vibhāṣāpavādaḥ . ekārāntanipātanam ca . ekārāntanipātanam
GS24pmbhasuu:9127: ca kartavyam . pāregaṅgam iti . na kartavyam . saptamyāḥ alukā siddham . bhavet siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:9128: yadā saptamī yadā tu anyāḥ vibhaktayaḥ tadā na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:9130: 579-582 nadībhiḥ saṅkhyāsamāse anyapadārthe pratiṣedhaḥ . nadībhiḥ saṅkhyāsamāse
GS24pmbhasuu:9131: anyapadārthe pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . dvīrāvatīkaḥ deśaḥ trīrāvatīkaḥ deśaḥ . nadībhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9132: saṅkhyā iti prāpnoti . na vaktavyaḥ . iha kaḥ cit samāsaḥ pūrvapadārthapradhānaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9138: ubhayapadārthapradhānaḥ dvandvaḥ. na ca atra pūrvapadārthaprādhānyam gamyate . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:9139: ca yat yena ucyate saḥ tasya arthaḥ bhavati . atra ca vayam etābhyām padābhyām etam
GS24pmbhasuu:9140: artham ucyamānam paśyāmaḥ . etat eva ca jānīmaḥ yat yena ucyate saḥ tasya arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9141: iti . api ca anyapadārthatā na prakalpeta . citraguḥ śabalaguḥ iti . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9142: . atra api hi vayam etābhyām śabdābhyām etam artham ucyamānam paśyāmaḥ . yadi api
GS24pmbhasuu:9143: atra etābhyām śabdābhyām eṣaḥ arthaḥ ucyate anyapadārthaḥ api tu gamyate . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:9144: anyapadārthāśrayaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ bhaviṣyati . iha api tarhi anyapadārthaḥ gamyate svapadārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9145: api tu gamyate . tatra svapadārthāśrayaḥ avyayībhāvaḥ prāpnoti . evam tarhi idam
GS24pmbhasuu:9146: iha sampradhāryam . avyayībhāvaḥ kriyatām bahuvrīhiḥ iti . bahuvrīhiḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:9147: vipratiṣedhena . bhavet ekasañjñādhikāre siddham paraṅkāryatve tu na sidhyati . ārambhasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9148: avyayībhāvaḥ prāpnoti paraṅkāryatvāt ca bahuvrīhiḥ . paraṅkāryatve ca na doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9149: nadībhiḥ saṅkhyāyāḥ samāhāre avyayībhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . saḥ ca avaśyam vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9152: 582 dvigoḥ tatpuruṣatve kāni prayojanāni . dvigoḥ tatpuruṣatve samāsāntāḥ prayojanam . pañcagavam daśagavam pañcarājam daśarājam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9154: 582-587 śritādiṣu gamigāmyādīnām upasaṅkhyānam . śritādiṣu gamigāmyādīnām upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:9155: kartavyam . grāmam gamī gramagamī gramam gāmī grāmagāmī . śritādibhiḥ ahīne dvitīyāsamāsavacanānarthakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9156: bahuvrīhikṛtatvāt . śritādibhiḥ ahīnavācinyāḥ dvitīyāyāḥ samāsavacanam anarthakam
GS24pmbhasuu:9157: . kim kāraṇam . bahuvrīhikṛtatvāt . iha hi yaḥ kaṣṭam śritaḥ kaṣṭam anena śritam
GS24pmbhasuu:9158: bhavati . tatra bahuvrīhiṇā siddham . ahīne dvītīyāsvaravacanānarthakyam ca . ahīne
GS24pmbhasuu:9159: dvitīyā pūrvapadam prakṛtisvaram bhavati iti etat svaravacanam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9160: . bahuvrīhikṛtatvāt eva . jātisvaraprasaṅgaḥ tu . jātisvaraḥ tu prāpnoti . grāmatataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9161: araṇyagataḥ . jātikālasukhādibhyaḥ anācchādanāt ktaḥ akṛtamitapratipannāḥ iti . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:9162: jātādiṣu vāvacanāt siddham . yat etat vā jāte iti etat vā jātādiṣu iti vakṣyāmi .
GS24pmbhasuu:9163: ime jātādayaḥ bhaviṣyanti . nanu ca bhedaḥ bhavati . bahuvrīhau sati samāsāntodāttatvena
GS24pmbhasuu:9164: api bhavitavyam pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaratvena api tatpuruṣatve sati pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaratvena
GS24pmbhasuu:9165: eva . na asti bhedaḥ . yaḥ api tatpuruṣam ārabhate na tasya daṇḍavāritaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9166: . tatra tatpuruṣe sati dvau samāsau dvau svarau . bahuvrīhau sati ekaḥ samāsaḥ dvisvaratvam
GS24pmbhasuu:9167: . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat tatpuruṣam śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ samāne arthe
GS24pmbhasuu:9168: kevalam vigrahabhedāt yatra tatpuruṣaḥ prāpnoti bahuvrīhiḥ ca tatra tatpuruṣaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:9169: iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . rājñaḥ sakhā rājasakhaḥ . rājā sakhā asya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9170: bahuvrīhiḥ na bhavati . na etat jñāpakasādhyam apavādaiḥ utsargāḥ bādhyante iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9171: bādhakena anena bhavitavyam sāmānyavihitasya viśeṣavihitena . atha na sāmānyavihitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9172: . yat ucyate bahuvrīhikṛtatvāt iti etat ayuktam . asti khalu api viśeṣaḥ bahuvrīheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9173: tatpuruṣasya ca . kim śabdakṛtaḥ atha arthakṛtaḥ . śabdakṛtaḥ va arthakṛtaḥ ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:9174: śabdakṛtaḥ tāvat . bahuvrīhau sati kapā bhavitavyam . tatpuruṣe sati na bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9175: . arthakṛtaḥ . tatpuruṣe sati ruhādīnām ktaḥ kartari bhavati dhātvarthasya anapavarge
GS24pmbhasuu:9176: . ārūḍhaḥ vṛkṣam devadattaḥ iti . bahuvrīhau vyapavṛkte karmaṇi bhavati . ārūḍhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9177: vṛkṣaḥ devadattena iti . anyathājātīyakaḥ khalu api pratyakṣeṇa arthasampratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9178: anyathājātīyakaḥ sambandhāt . rājñaḥ sakhā rājasakhā . sambandhāt etat gantavyam

GS24pmbhasuu:9196: iti . iha api tarhi na prāpnoti . śaṅkulākhaṇḍaḥ kirikāṇaḥ iti . atra api na śaṅkulāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9197: khaṇḍena sāmarthyam . kena tarhi . karotinā . śaṅkulayā kṛtaḥ khaṇḍaḥ iti . vacanāt

GS24pmbhasuu:9199: kartavyam . guṇavacanena iti kimartham . gobhiḥ vapāvān dhānyena dhanavān . kim punaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:9201: ucyamānaḥ dravyavacanena syāt . iha tṛtīyā tatkṛtārthena guṇena iti iyatā siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:9202: . saḥ ayam evam siddhe sati yat vacanagrahaṇam karoti tasya etat prayojanam evam
GS24pmbhasuu:9203: yathā vijñāyeta guṇam uktavatā guṇavacanena iti . katham punaḥ ayam guṇavacanaḥ san
GS24pmbhasuu:9204: dravyavacanaḥ sampadyate . ārabhyate tatra matublopaḥ guṇavacanebhyaḥ matupaḥ luk
GS24pmbhasuu:9205: iti . tat yathā śuklaguṇaḥ śuklaḥ kṛṣṇaguṇaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ evam khaṇḍaguṇaḥ khaṇḍaḥ . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:9206: evam na arthaḥ kṛtārthagrahaṇena . bhavati hi śaṅkulāyāḥ khaṇḍena sāmarthyam . asāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9207: ca atra na bhaviṣyati dadhnā paṭuḥ ghṛtena paṭuḥ iti . tasmat na arthaḥ tatkṛtārthagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:9208: . tṛtīyāsamāse arthagrahaṇam anarthakam arthagatiḥ hi avacanāt . tṛtīyāsamāse arthagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9209: anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . arthagatiḥ hi avacanāt . antareṇa api vacanam arthagatiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9210: bhaviṣyati . nirdeśyam iti cet tṛtīyārthanirdeśaḥ api . atha evam api nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9211: iti cet tṛtīyārthanirdeśaḥ api kartavyaḥ syāt . tṛtīyā tadarthakṛtārthena iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9212: . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . na ayam arthanirdeśaḥ . kim tarhi . yogāṅgam

GS24pmbhasuu:9215: . pūrvasadṛśasamonārtha iti arthagrahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati .

GS24pmbhasuu:9226: api dṛśyate iti vaktavyam . busopendhyam tṛṇopendhyam ghanaghātyam . sādhanam kṛtā
GS24pmbhasuu:9227: iti vā pādahārakādyartham . atha vā sādhanam kṛtā saha samasyate iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9228: kim prayojanam . pādahārakādyartham . pādābhyām hriyate pādahārakaḥ gale copyate galecopakaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9230: 595-597 annena vyañjanam bhakṣyeṇa miśrīkaraṇam iti asamarthasamāsaḥ . annena vyañjanam
GS24pmbhasuu:9231: bhakṣyeṇa miśrīkaraṇam iti asamarthasamāsaḥ ayam draṣṭavyaḥ . kim kāraṇam . kārakāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:9232: kriyayā sāmarthyāt . kārakāṇām kriyayā sāmarthyam bhavati na teṣām anyonyena . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:9233: yathā niśrayaṇyā dvābhyām kāṣṭhābhyām sāmarthyam na teṣām anyonyena . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:9234: āha ayam annena vyañjanam bhakṣyeṇa miśrīkaraṇam iti na ca asti sāmarthyam . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:9235: vacanāt samāsaḥ bhaviṣyati . vacanaprāmāṇyāt iti cet nānākārakāṇām pratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9236: vacanaprāmāṇyāt iti cet nānākārakāṇām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . tiṣṭhatu dadhnā odanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9237: bhujyate devadattena . siddham tu samānādhikaraṇādhikāre ktaḥ tṛtīyāpūrvapadaḥ uttarapadalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9238: ca ṣiddham etat . katham . samānādhikaraṇādhikāre vaktavyam ktaḥ tṛtīyāpūrvapadaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9239: samasyatesupā uttarapadasya ca lopaḥ bhavati iti . dadhnā upasiktaḥ dadhyupasiktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9240: dadhyupasiktaḥ odanaḥ dadhyodanaḥ guḍena saṃsṛṣṭāḥ guḍasaṃsṛṣṭāḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9241: guḍasaṃsṛṣṭāḥ dhānāḥ guḍadhānāḥ . ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ ca yuktapūrṇāntaḥ . ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9242: ca yuktapūrṇāntaḥ samasyate uttarapadasya ca lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . aśvānām yuktaḥ aśvayuktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9243: aśvayuktaḥ rathaḥ aśvarathaḥ . dadhnaḥ pūrṇaḥ dadipūrṇaḥ dadhipūrṇaḥ ghaṭaḥ dadhighaṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9244: . tat tarhi bahu vaktavyam . na vā asamāse adarśanāt . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9245: . asamāse adarśanāt . yat hi asamāse dṛśyate samāse ca na dṛśyate tat lopārambham
GS24pmbhasuu:9246: prayojayati . na ca asamāse upasiktaśabdaḥ saṃsṛṣṭaśabdaḥ pūrṇaśabdaḥ vā dṛśyate
GS24pmbhasuu:9247: . katham tarhi sāmarthyam gamyate . yuktārthasampratyayāt ca sāmarthyam . dadhnā
GS24pmbhasuu:9248: yuktārthatā sampratīyate . katham punaḥ jñāyate dadhnā yuktārthatā sampratīyate iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9249: . sampratyayāt ca tadarthādhyavasānam . sampratyayāt ca tadarthaḥ adhyavasīyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:9250: avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam . sampratīyamānārthalope hi anavasthā .yaḥ hi manyate
GS24pmbhasuu:9251: sampratīyamānārthānām śabdānām lopaḥ bhavati iti anavasthā tasya lopasya syāt . dadhi
GS24pmbhasuu:9252: iti ukte bahavaḥ arthāḥ gamyante mandakam uttarakam nilīnakam iti tadvācinām śabdānām
GS24pmbhasuu:9253: lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ syāt . tathā guḍaḥ iti ukte madhuraśabdasya śṛṅgaveram iti ukte ca
GS24pmbhasuu:9254: kaṭuśabdasya . antareṇa khalu api śabdaprayogam bahavaḥ arthāḥ gamyante akṣinikocaiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9255: pāṇivihāraiḥ ca . tadvācinām śabdānām lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:9257: 598-603 kim caturthyantasya tadarthamātreṇa samāsaḥ bhavati . evam bhavitum arhati
GS24pmbhasuu:9258: . caturthī tadarthamātreṇa cet sarvaprasaṅgaḥ aviśeṣāt . caturthī tadarthamātreṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:9259: cet sarvaprasaṅgaḥ sarvasya caturthyantasya tadarthamātreṇa saha samāsaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:9260: . anena api prāpnoti . randhanāya sthālī avahananāya ulūkhalam iti . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9261: . aviśeṣāt . na hi kaḥ cit viśeṣaḥ upādīyate evañjātīyakasya caturthyantasya tadarthena
GS24pmbhasuu:9262: saha samāsaḥ bhavati iti . anupādīyamane viśeṣe sarvaprasaṅgaḥ . balirakṣitābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:9263: ca anarthakam vacanam . balirakṣitābhyām ca samāsavacanam anarthakam . yaḥ hi mahārājāya
GS24pmbhasuu:9264: baliḥ mahārājārthaḥ saḥ bhavati . tatra tadarthaḥ iti eva siddham . yadi punaḥ vikṛtiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9265: caturthyantā prakṛtyā saha samasyate iti etat lakṣaṇam kriyeta . vikṛtiḥ prakṛtyā
GS24pmbhasuu:9266: iti cet aśvaghāsādīnām upasaṅkhyānam . vikṛtiḥ prakṛtyā iti cet aśvaghāsādīnām upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:9267: kartavyam . aśvaghāsaḥ śvaśrūsuram hastividhā iti . arthena nityasamāsavacanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9268: arthśabdena nityasamāsaḥ vaktavyaḥ . brāhmaṇārtham kṣatriyārtham . kim vikṛtiḥ caturthyantā
GS24pmbhasuu:9269: prakṛtyā saha samasyate iti ataḥ arthena nityasamāsaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na iti āha sarvathā
GS24pmbhasuu:9270: arthena nityasamāsaḥ vaktavyaḥ vigrahaḥ mā bhūt iti . sarvaliṅgatā ca . sarvaliṅgatā
GS24pmbhasuu:9271: ca vaktavyā . brāhmaṇārtham payaḥ brāhmaṇārthaḥ sūpaḥ brāhmaṇārthā yavāgūḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9272: kim arthena nityasamāsaḥ ucyate iti ataḥ sarvaliṅgatā vaktavyā . na iti āha . sarvathā
GS24pmbhasuu:9273: sarvaliṅgatā vaktavyā . kim kāraṇam . arthaśabdaḥ ayam puṃliṅgaḥ uttarapadārthapradhānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9274: ca tatpuruṣaḥ . tena puṃliṅgasya eva samāsasya abhidhānam syāt strīnapuṃsakaliṅgasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9275: na syāt . tat tarhi bahu vaktavyam . vikṛtiḥ prakṛtyā iti vaktavyam . aśvaghāsādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:9276: upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . arthena nityasamāsaḥ vaktavyaḥ . sarvaliṅgatā ca vaktavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:9277: . na vaktavyam . yat tāvat ucyate vikṛtiḥ prakṛtyā iti vaktavyam . na vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9278: ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāyapati vikṛtiḥ caturthyantā prakṛtyā saha samasyate iti yat ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:9279: balirakiṣitagrahaṇam karoti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . yathājātīyakānām samāse balirakṣitagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:9280: arthaḥ tathājātīyakānām samāsaḥ . yadi ca vikṛtiḥ caturthyantā prakṛtyā saha samasyate
GS24pmbhasuu:9281: na tadarthamātreṇa tataḥ balirakiṣitagrahaṇam arthavat bhavati . yat api ucyate aśvaghāsādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:9282: upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam iti . na kartavyam . aśvaghāsādayaḥ ṣaṣṭhīsamāsāḥ bhaviṣyanti
GS24pmbhasuu:9283: . yat hi yadartham bhavati ayam api tatra abhisambandhaḥ bhavati asya idam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9284: tat yathā guroḥ idam gurvartham iti . nanu ca svarabhedaḥ bhavati . caturthīsamāse
GS24pmbhasuu:9285: sati pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaratvena bhavitavyam ṣaṣṭhīsamāse punaḥ antodāttatvena ṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:9286: asti bhedaḥ . caturthīsamāse api sati antodāttatvena eva bhavitavyam . katham . ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9287: jñāpayati vikṛtiḥ caturthyantā prakṛtisvarā bhavati na caturthīmātram iti yat ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:9288: caturthī tadarthe arthe kte ca iti arthagrahaṇam ktagrahaṇam ca karoti . katham kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:9289: jñāpakam . yathājātīyakānām arthagrahaṇena ktagrahaṇena ca arthaḥ tathājātīyakānām
GS24pmbhasuu:9290: prakṛtisvaratvam . yadi ca vikṛtiḥ caturthyantā prakṛtyā bhavati na caturthīmātram
GS24pmbhasuu:9291: tataḥ arthagrahaṇam ktagrahaṇam ca arthavat bhavati .yat api ucyate arthena nityasamāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9292: vaktavyaḥ iti . na vaktavyaḥ . sarthappratyayaḥ kariṣyate . kim kṛtam bhavati . na
GS24pmbhasuu:9293: ca eva hi kadā cit vigrahaḥ bhavati . api ca sarvaliṅgatā siddhā bhavati . yadi sarthappratayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9294: kriyate itsañjñā na prāpnoti . atha api katham cit itsañjñā syāt evam api śryartham
GS24pmbhasuu:9295: bhvartham iti aṅgasya iti iyaṅuvaṅau syātām . evam tarhi bahuvrīhiḥ bhavaiṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:9296: kim kṛtam bhavati . bhavati vai kaḥ cit asvapadavigrahaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ . tat yathā śobhanam
GS24pmbhasuu:9297: mukham asyāḥ sumukhī iti . na evam śakyam . iha hi mahadartham iti āttvakapau prasajyetām
GS24pmbhasuu:9298: . evam tarhi tadarthasya uttarapadasya arthaśabdaḥ ādeśaḥ kariṣyate . kim kṛtam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:9299: . na ca eva kadā cit ādeśena vigrahaḥ bhavati . api ca sarvaliṅgatā siddhā bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:9300: . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . caturthī subantena
GS24pmbhasuu:9301: saha samasyate . tataḥ tadarthārtha . tadarthasya uttarapadasya arthaśabdaḥ ādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9302: bhavati . iha api tarhi samāsaḥ prāpnoti chātrāya rucitam chātrāya svaditam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9303: ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati tādarthye ya caturthī sā samasyate na caturthīmātram iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9304: yat ayam hitasukhagrahaṇam karoti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . yathājātīyakānām samāse
GS24pmbhasuu:9305: hitasukhagrahaṇena arthaḥ tathājātīyakānam samāsaḥ . yadi ca tādarthye yā caturthī
GS24pmbhasuu:9306: sā samasyate na caturthīmātram tataḥ hitasukhagrahaṇam arthavat bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:9307: iha api tarhi tadarthasya uttarapadasya arthaśabdaḥ ādeśaḥ prāpnoti . yūpāya dāru
GS24pmbhasuu:9308: yūpadāru rathadāru . vāvacanam vidhāsyate . iha api tarhi vibhāṣā prāprnoti . brāhmaṇāṛtham
GS24pmbhasuu:9309: kṣatriyārtham iti . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati prakṛtivikṛtyoḥ yaḥ samāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9310: tatra tadarthasya uttarapadasya arthaśabdaḥ ādeśaḥ bhavati anyatra nityaḥ iti yat
GS24pmbhasuu:9311: ayam balihitagrahaṇam karoti . evam tarhi udakārthaḥ vīvadhaḥ . sthānivadbhāvāt udabhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9312: prāpnoti . tasmāt na evam śakyam . na cet evam arthena nityasamāsaḥ vaktavyaḥ sarvaliṅgatā
GS24pmbhasuu:9313: ca . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . idam tāvat ayam praṣṭavyaḥ . atha iha brāhmaṇebhyaḥ iti kā eṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:9314: caturthī . tādarthye iti āha . yadi tādarthye caturthī arthaśabdasya prayogeṇa na
GS24pmbhasuu:9315: bhavitavyam uktārthānām aprayogaḥ iti . samāsaḥ api tarhi na prāpnoti . vacanāt samāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9316: bhaviṣyati . yat api ucyate sarvaliṅgatā ca vaktavyā iti . na vaktavyā . liṅgam aśiṣyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9319: 604 atyalpam idam ucyate bhayena iti . bhayabhītabhītibhībhiḥ iti vaktavyam . vṛkāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9320: bhayam vṛkabhayam vṛkāt bhītaḥ vṛkabhītaḥ vṛkāt bhītiḥ vṛkabhītiḥ vṛkāt bhīḥ vṛkabhīḥ iti . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:9324: 604 śauṇḍādibhiḥ iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt . akṣadhūrtaḥ strīdhūrtaḥ akṣakitavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9325: strīkitavaḥ iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . bahuvacananirdeśāt śauṇḍādibhiḥ iti vijñāsyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:9327: 605 dhvāṅkṣeṇa iti arthagrahaṇam . dhvāṅkṣeṇa iti arthagrahaṇam kartavyam . iha api
GS24pmbhasuu:9328: yathā syāt . tīrthakākaḥ iti . kṣepe iti ucyate . kaḥ iha kṣepaḥ nāma . yathā tīrthe
GS24pmbhasuu:9329: kākāḥ na ciram sthātāraḥ bhavanti evam yaḥ gurukulāni gatvā na ciram tiṣṭhati sa
GS24pmbhasuu:9332: 605 kṛtyaiḥ niyoge yadgrahaṇam . kṛtyaiḥ niyoge iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9333: . pūrvāḥṇegeyam sāma prātaḥ adhyeyaḥ anuvākaḥ iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9334: . ṛṇe iti eva siddham . iha yat yasya niyogataḥ kāryam ṛṇam tasya tat bhavati . tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9335: ṛṇe iti eva siddham . yagrahaṇam ca kartavyam . iha mā bhūt . pūrvāhṇe dātavyā bhikṣā iti .

GS24pmbhasuu:9338: nāma . yathā avatapte nakulāḥ na ciram sthātāraḥ bhavanti evam kāryāṇi ārabhya yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9339: na ciram tiṣṭhati sa ucyate avataptenakulasthitam te etat iti . kṣepe saptamyantam
GS24pmbhasuu:9340: ktāntena saha samasyate iti ucyate . tatra sagatikena sanakulena ca samāsaḥ na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:9341: . kṣepe gatikārakapūrve uktam . kim uktam . kṛdgrahaṇe gatikārakapūrvasya api iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9343: 606 kimarthaḥ cakāraḥ . evakārārthaḥ . pātresamitādayaḥ eva . kva mā bhūt . paramam pātresamitāḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9345: 606-607 iha kasmāt avyayībhāvaḥ na bhavati . ekā nadī ekanadī . nadībhiḥ saṅkhyā iti prāpnoti . iha kaḥ cit samāsaḥ pūrvapadārthapradhānaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9351: ubhayapadārthapradhānaḥ dvandvaḥ. na ca atra pūrvapadārthaprādhānyam gamyate . athavā
GS24pmbhasuu:9352: avyayībhāvaḥ kriyatām bahuvrīhiḥ iti . bahuvrīhiḥ bhaviṣyati vipratiṣedhena . bhavet
GS24pmbhasuu:9353: ekasañjñādhikāre siddham paraṅkāryatve tu na sidhyati . ārambhasāmarthyāt ca avyayībhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9354: prāpnoti paraṅkāryatvāt ca bahuvrīhiḥ . paraṅkāryatve ca na doṣaḥ . nadībhiḥ saṅkhyāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9355: samāhāre avyayībhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . saḥ ca avaśyam vaktavyaḥ . sarvam ekanadītare .
GS24pmbhasuu:9357: 607-609 samāhāraḥ iti kaḥ ayam śabdaḥ . samāṅpūrvāt harateḥ sarmasādhane ghañ . samāhriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:9358: samāhāraḥ iti . yadi karmasādhanaḥ pañca kumāryaḥ samahṛtāḥ pañcakumāri daśakumāri
GS24pmbhasuu:9359: gostriyoḥ upasarjanasya iti hrasvatvam na prāpnoti dviguḥ ekavacanam iti etat ca
GS24pmbhasuu:9360: vaktavyam . evam tarhi bhāvasādhanaḥ bhaviṣyati . samāharaṇam samāhāraḥ . atha bhāvasādhane
GS24pmbhasuu:9361: sati kim abhidhīyate . yat tat auttarādharyam . kaḥ punaḥ gavām samāhāraḥ . yat tat
GS24pmbhasuu:9362: arjanam krayaṇam bhiṣaṇam aparaharaṇam vā . yadi evam vikṣipteṣu pūleṣu goṣu carantīṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:9363: na sidhyati . evam tarhi samabhyāśīkaraṇam samāhāraḥ . evam api pañcagrāmī ṣaṇṇagarī
GS24pmbhasuu:9364: tripurī iti na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . sam ekatvavācī āṅ ābhimukhye vartate haratiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9365: deśāntaraprāpaṇe . na avaśyam haratiḥ deśāntaraprāpaṇe eva vartate . kim tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:9366: sādṛśye api vartate . tat yathā mātuḥ anuharati pituḥ anuharati . atha vā pañcagrāmī
GS24pmbhasuu:9367: ṣaṇṇagarī tripurī iti na eva idam iyati eva avatiṣṭhate . avaśyam asau tataḥ kim
GS24pmbhasuu:9368: cit ākāṅkṣati kriyām vā guṇam vā . yat ākāṅkṣata tat ekam sa ca samāhāraḥ . ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:9369: tarhi bhāvasādhane sati doṣaḥ . pañcapūlī ānīyatām iti bhāvānayane codite dravyānayanam
GS24pmbhasuu:9370: na prāpoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . iha tāvat ayam praṣṭavyaḥ . atha iha gauḥ anubandhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9371: ajaḥ agnīṣomīyaḥ iti katham ākṛtau coditāyām dravye ārambhaṇālambhanaprokṣaṇaviśasanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:9372: kriyante . asambhavāt . ākṛtau ārambhaṇādīnām sambhavaḥ na asti iti kṛtvā ākṛtisahacarite
GS24pmbhasuu:9373: dravye ārambhaṇādīni kriyante . idam api evañjātīyakam eva . asambhavāt bhāvānayanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9374: dravyānayanam bhaviṣyati . atha vā avyatirekāt dravyākṛtyoḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9376: 609-612 kim punaḥ dvigusañjñā pratyayottarapadayoḥ bhavati . evam bhavitum arhati
GS24pmbhasuu:9377: . dvigusañjñā pratyayottarapadayoḥ cet itaretarāśrayatvāt aprasiddhiḥ . dvigusañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:9378: pratyayottarapadayoḥ cet itaretarāśrayatvāt aprasiddhiḥ . kā etaretarāśrayatā . dvigunimitte
GS24pmbhasuu:9379: pratyayottarapade pratyayottarapadanimittā ca dvigusañjñā . tat etat itaretarāśrayam
GS24pmbhasuu:9380: . itaretarāśrayāṇi ca na prakalpante . evam tarhi arthe it vakṣyāmi . arthe cet taddhitānutpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9381: bahuvrīhivat . arthe cet taddhitotpattiḥ na prāpnoti . pāñcanāpitiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9383: traimāturaḥ . kim kāraṇam . dvigunā uktatvāt bahuvrīhivat . tat yathā citraguḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9384: bahuvrīhiṇoktatvāt matvarthasya matvarthīyaḥ na bhavati . evam tarhi samāsataddhitavidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:9385: iti vakṣyāmi . samāsataddhitavidhau iti cet anyatra samāsasañjñābhāvaḥ . samāsataddhitavidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:9386: iti cet anyatra samāsasañjñā na prāpnoti . kva anyatra . svare . pañcāratniḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9387: daśāratniḥ . igante dvigau iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ na prāpnoti . siddham tu pratyayottarapadayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9388: ca iti vacanāt . siddham etat . katham . pratyayottarapadayoḥ ca iti vacanāt . pratyayottarapadayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9389: dvigusañjñā bhavati iti vaktavyam . nanu ca uktam dvigusañjñā pratyayottarapadayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9390: cet itaretarāśrayatvāt aprasiddhiḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . itaretarāśrayamātram etat
GS24pmbhasuu:9391: coditam sarvāṇi ca itaretarāśrayāṇi ekatvena parihṛtāni siddham tu nityaśabdatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9392: iti . na idam tulyam anyaiḥ itaretarāśrayaiḥ . na hi sañjñā nityā . evam tarhi bhāvinī
GS24pmbhasuu:9394: kaḥ cit kam cit tantuvāyam āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:9395: asya sūtrasya śāṭakam vaya iti . saḥ paśyati . yadi śāṭakaḥ na vātavyaḥ atha vātavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9396: na śāṭakaḥ . śāṭakaḥ vātavyaḥ ca iti vipratiṣiddham . bhāvinī khalu asya sañjñā abhipretā
GS24pmbhasuu:9397: . saḥ manye vātavyaḥ yasmin ute śāṭakaḥ iti etat bhavati iti . evam iha api tasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:9398: dviguḥ bhavati yasya abhinirvṛttasya pratyaya uttarapadam iti ca ete sañjñe bhaviṣyataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9399: . atha vā punaḥ astu arthe iti . nanu ca uktam arthe cet taddhitānutpattiḥ bahuvrīhivat
GS24pmbhasuu:9400: iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na avaśyam arthaśabdaḥ abhidheye eva vartate . kim tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:9401: syādarthe api vartate . tat yathā . dārārtham ghaṭāmahe . dhanārtham bhikṣāmahe .
GS24pmbhasuu:9402: dārāḥ naḥ syuḥ . dhanāni naḥ syuḥ iti . evam iha api taddhitārthe dviguḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:9403: taddhitaḥ syāt iti . dvigoḥ vā lugvacanam jñāpakam taddhitotpatteḥ . atha vā yat
GS24pmbhasuu:9404: ayam dvigoḥ luk anapatye iti dvigoḥ uttarasya taddhitasya lukam śāsti tat jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:9408: . samāhāraḥ samūhaḥ iti aviśiṣtau etau arthau . samāhārasamūhayoḥ aviśeṣāt samāhāragrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9409: anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . taddhitārthe kṛtatvāt . taddhitārthe dviguḥ iti evam atra
GS24pmbhasuu:9410: dviguḥ bhaviṣyati . yadi taddhitārthe dviguḥ iti evam atra dviguḥ bhavati taddhitotpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9411: prāpnoti . utpadyatām . luk bhaviṣyati . lukkṛtāni prāpnuvanti . kāni . pañcapūlī
GS24pmbhasuu:9412: daśapūlī . aparimāṇabistācitakambalebhyaḥ na taddhitaluki iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:9413: . pañcagavam daśagavam . goḥ ataddhitaluki it ṭac na prapnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . aviśeṣeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:9414: dvigoḥ ṅīp bhavati iti uktvā samāhāre iti vakṣyāmi . tat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:9415: samāhāre eva na anyatra iti . goḥ akāraḥ dvigoḥ samāhāre . aviśeṣeṇa goḥ ṭac bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:9416: iti uktvā dvigoḥ samāhāre iti vakṣyāmi . tat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . samāhāre eva
GS24pmbhasuu:9417: na anyatra iti . abhidhānārtham tu . abhidhānārtham tu samāhāragrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9418: . samāhāreṇa abhidhānam yathā syāt taddhitārthena mā bhūt iti . kim ca syāt . taddhitotpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9419: prasajyeta . utpadyatām . luk bhaviṣyati . lukkṛtāni prāpnuvanti . sarvāṇi parihṛtāni
GS24pmbhasuu:9420: . na sarvāṇi parihṛtāni . pañcakumāri daśakumāri . lik taddhitaluki iti ṅīpaḥ luk
GS24pmbhasuu:9422: uttarapade nityasamāsaḥ vaktavyaḥ . vāgdṛṣadapriyaḥ chatropānahapriyaḥ pañcagavapriyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9423: daśagavapriyaḥ . kim prayojanam . samudāyavṛttau avayavānām mā kadā cit avṛttiḥ bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:9424: iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . iha dvau pakṣau vṛttipakṣaḥ avṛttipakṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9425: ca . yadā vṛttipakṣaḥ tadā sarveṣām eva vṛttiḥ . yadā tu avṛttiḥ tadā sarveṣām avṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9426: . uttarapadena parimāṇina dvigoḥ samāsavacanam . uttarapadena parimāṇina dvigoḥ samāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9427: vaktavyaḥ . dvimāsajātaḥ trimāsajātaḥ . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . sup supā
GS24pmbhasuu:9428: iti vartate . evam tarhi idam syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:9430: dvimāsam jātasya iti . na evam śakyam . svare hi doṣaḥ syāt . dvimāsajātaḥ iti prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:9431: dvimāsajātaḥ iti ca iṣyate . dvyāhnajātaḥ ca na sidhyati . dvyahajāta iti prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:9432: na ca evam bhavitavyam . bhavitavyam ca yadā samāhāre dviguḥ . dvyahnajātaḥ tu na
GS24pmbhasuu:9433: sidhyati . kim ucyate parimāṇinā iti na punaḥ anyatra api . pañcagavapriyaḥ daśagavapriyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9434: . anyatra samudāyabahuvrīhitvāt uttarapadaprasiddhiḥ . anyatra samudāyabaḥ huvrīhisañjñḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9435: . anyatra samudāyabahuvrīhitvāt uttarapadam prasiddham . uttarapade prasiddhe uttarapade
GS24pmbhasuu:9436: iti dviguḥ bhaviṣyati . sarvatra matvarthe pratiṣedhaḥ . sarveṣu pakṣeṣu dvigusañjñāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9437: matvarthe pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kim prayojanam . pañcakhaṭvā daśakhaṭvā . dvigoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9438: iti īkāraḥ mā bhūt . pañcaguḥ daśaguḥ . goḥ ataddhitaluki iti ṭac mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9440: 617-618 kim anantare yoge saṅkhyāpūrvaḥ saḥ dvigusañjñaḥ āhosvit pūrvamātre . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:9441: ca ataḥ . yadi anantare yoge ekaśāṭī dvigoḥ iti īkāraḥ na prāpnoti . atha pūrvamātre
GS24pmbhasuu:9442: akabhikṣā atra api prāpnoti . astu anantare . kamam ekaśāṭī . īkārāntena samāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9443: bhaviṣyati . ekā śāṭī ekaśāṭī . iha tarhi ekāpūpī dvigoḥ iti īkāraḥ na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9444: astu tarhi pūrvamātre. katham ekabhikṣā . ṭābantena samāsaḥ bhaviṣyati . ekā bhikṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:9445: ekabhikṣā . iha tarhi saptarṣayaḥ igante dvigau iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ prāpnoti . astu tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:9446: anantare . katham ekāpūpī . samāhāre iti eva siddham . kaḥ punaḥ atra samāhāraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9447: yat taddānam sambhramaḥ vā . iha tarhi pañcahotāraḥ daśahotāraḥ igante dvigau iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9448: eṣaḥ svaraḥ na prapnoti . astu tarhi pūrvamātre . katham saptarṣayaḥ . antodāttaprakaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:9449: tricakrādīnām chandasi iti evam etat siddham . atha vā punaḥ astu anantare . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:9450: pañcahotāraḥ daśahotāraḥ . ādyudāttaprakaraṇe divodāsādīnām chandasi iti eva siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:9452: 619 kim udāharaṇm . vaiyākaraṇakhasūciḥ . kim vyākaraṇam kutsitam āhosvit vaiyākaraṇaḥ . vaiyākaraṇaḥ kutsitaḥ . tasmin kutsite tatstham api kutsitam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:9454: 619-627 upamānāni iti ucyate . kāni punaḥ upamānāni . kim yat eva upamānam tat eva
GS24pmbhasuu:9455: upameyam āhosvit anyat upamānam anyat upameyam . kim ca ataḥ . yadi yat eva upamānam
GS24pmbhasuu:9456: tat eva upameyam kaḥ iha upamārthaḥ gauḥ iva gauḥ iti . atha anyat eva upamānam anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:9457: upameyam kaḥ iha upamārthaḥ gauḥ iva aśvaḥ iti . evam tarhi yatra kim cit sāmānyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9458: kaḥ cit viśeṣaḥ tatra upamānopameye bhavataḥ . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:9459: anucyamānam gaṃsyate . mānam hi nāma anirjñātajñānārtham upādīyate anirjñātam artham
GS24pmbhasuu:9460: jñāsyāmi iti . tat samīpe yat na atyantāya mimīte tat upamānam . gauḥ iva gavayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9461: iti . gauḥ nirjñātaḥ gavayaḥ anirjñātaḥ . kāmam tarhi anena eva hetunā yasya gavayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9462: nirjñātaḥ syāt gauḥ anirjñātaḥ tena kartavyam syāt gavayaḥ iva gauḥ iti. bāḍham kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9463: . kim punaḥ iha udāharaṇam . śastrīśyāmā . kva punaḥ ayam śyāmāśabdaḥ vartate . śatryām
GS24pmbhasuu:9464: iti āha . kena idānīm devadattā abhidhīyate . samāsena. yadi evam śastrīśyāmo devadattaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9465: iti na sidhyati . upasarjanasya iti hrasvatvam bhaviṣyati . yadi tarhi upasarjanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:9466: api evañjātīyakāni bhavanti tittirikalmāṣī kumbhakapālalohinī anupasarjanalakṣaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9467: īkāraḥ na prāpnoti . evam tarhi śastryām eva śastrīśabdaḥ vartate devadattāyām śyāmāśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9468: . evam api guṇaḥ anirdiṣṭaḥ bhavati . bahavaḥ śastryām guṇāḥ tīkṣṇā sūkṣmā pṛthuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9469: iti . anirdiśyamānasya api guṇasya bhavati loke sampratyayaḥ . tat yathā candramukhī
GS24pmbhasuu:9470: devadattā iti . bahavaḥ candre guṇāḥ yā ca asau priyadarśanatā sā gamyate . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:9471: api samānādhikaraṇena iti vartate . vyadhikaraṇatvāt samāsaḥ na prāpnoti . kim hi
GS24pmbhasuu:9472: vacanāt na bhavati . yadi api tāvat vacanāt samāsaḥ syāt iha tu khalu mṛgī iva capalā
GS24pmbhasuu:9473: mṛgacapalā samānādhikaraṇalakṣaṇaḥ puṃvadbhāvaḥ na prāpnoti . evam tarhi tasyām eva
GS24pmbhasuu:9474: ubhayam vartate . etat ca atra yuktam yat tasyām eva ubhayam vartate iti . itarathā
GS24pmbhasuu:9475: hi bahu apekṣyam syāt . yadi tāvat evam vigrahaḥ kriyate śastrī iva śyāmā devadattā
GS24pmbhasuu:9476: iti śastryām śyāmā iti etat apekṣyam . atha api evam vigrahaḥ kriyate yathā sāstrīśyāmā
GS24pmbhasuu:9477: tadvat iyam devadattā iti evam api devadattāyām śyāmā iti apekṣyam syāt . evam api
GS24pmbhasuu:9478: guṇaḥ anirdiṣṭaḥ bhavati . bahavaḥ śastryām guṇāḥ tīkṣṇā sūkṣmā pṛthuḥ iti . anirdiśyamānasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9479: api guṇasya bhavati loke sampratyayaḥ . tat yathā candramukhī devadattā iti . bahavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9480: candre guṇāḥ yā ca asau priyadarśanatā sā gamyate . upamānasamāse guṇavacanasya viśeṣabhāktvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9482: aprasiddhiḥ syāt . śastrīśyāmā . śyāmāśabdaḥ ayam śastrīśabdena abhisambadhyamānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9483: viśeṣavacanaḥ sampadyate . tatra sāmānyavacanaiḥ iti samāsaḥ na prāpnoti . na vā
GS24pmbhasuu:9484: śyāmatvasyo uhhayatra bhāvāt tadvācaktvāt ca śabdasya sāmānyavacanaprasiddhiḥ . na
GS24pmbhasuu:9485: vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . śyāmatvasyo uhhayatra bhāvāt . ubhayatra eva śyāmatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:9486: asti śastryām devadattāyām ca . tadvācaktvāt ca śabdasya . sāmānyavacanaprasiddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9487: tadvācakaḥ ca atra śyāmāśabdaḥ prayujyate . kimvācakaḥ . ubhayavācakaḥ . śyāmatvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9488: ubhayatra bhāvāt tadvācakatvāt ca śabdasya sāmānyavacanam prasiddham . sāmānyavacane
GS24pmbhasuu:9489: prasiddhe sāmānyavacanaiḥ iti samāsaḥ bhaviṣyati . na ca avaśyam saḥ eva sāmānyavacanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9490: yaḥ bahūnām sāmānyam āha. dvayoḥ api sāmānyam āha saḥ api sāmānyavacanaḥ eva . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:9491: vā sāmānyavacanaiḥ iti ucyate . sarvaḥ ca śabdaḥ anyena śabdena abhisambadhyamānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9492: viśeṣavacanaḥ sampadyate . te evam vijñāsyāmaḥ prāk abhisambandhāt sāmānyavacanaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9494: 627-628 sāmānyāprayoge iti kimartham . iha mā bhūt . puruṣaḥ ayam vyāghraḥ iva śūraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9495: . puruṣaḥ ayam vyāghraḥ iva balavān . sāmānyāprayoge iti śakyam akartum . kasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9496: na bhavati puruṣaḥ ayam vyāghraḥ iva śūraḥ . puruṣaḥ ayam vyāghraḥ iva balavān iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9497: . asāmarthyāt . katham asāmarthyam . sāpekṣam asamartham bhavati iti . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:9498: siddhe sati yat sāmānyāprayoge iti pratiṣedham śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:9499: vai pradhānasya sāpekṣasya api samāsaḥ iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . rājapuruṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9500: abhirūpaḥ rājapuruṣaḥ darśanīyaḥ atra vṛttiḥ siddhā bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:9502: 628-632 viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayoḥ ubhayaviśeṣaṇatvāt ubhayoḥ ca viśeṣyatvāt upasarjanāprasiddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9503: . viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayoḥ ubhayaviśeṣaṇatvāt ubhayoḥ ca viśeṣyatvāt upasarjansya aprasiddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9504: . kṛṣṇatilāḥ iti kṛṣṇaśabdaḥ ayam tilaśabdena abhisambadhyamānaḥ viśeṣaṇavacanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9505: sampadyate . tathā tilaśabdaḥ kṛṣṇaśabdena abhisambadhyamānaḥ viśeṣaṇavacanaḥ sampadyate
GS24pmbhasuu:9506: . tat ubhayam viśeṣaṇam bhavati ubhayam ca viśeṣyam . viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayoḥ ubhayaviśeṣaṇatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9507: ubhayoḥ ca viśeṣyatvāt upasarjansya aprasiddhiḥ . na vā anyatarasya pradhānabhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9508: tadviśeṣakatvāt ca aparasya upasarjanaprasiddhiḥ . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9509: . anyatarasya pradhānabhāvāt . anyatarat atra pradhānam . tadviśeṣakatvāt ca aparasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9510: . tadviśeṣakam ca aparam . anyatarasya pradhānabhāvāt tadviśeṣakatvāt ca aparasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9511: upasarjanasañjñā bhaviṣyati . yadā asya tilāḥ prādhānyena vivakṣitāḥ bhavanti kṛṣṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9512: viśeṣaṇatvena tadā tilāḥ pradhānam kṛṣṇaḥ viśeṣaṇam . kāmam tarhi anena eva hetunā
GS24pmbhasuu:9513: yasya kṛṣṇāḥ prādhānyena vivakṣitāḥ bhavanti tilāḥ viśeṣaṇatvena tena kartavyam tilakṛṣṇāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9514: iti . na kartavyam . na hi ayam dvandvaḥ tilāḥ ca kṛṣṇāḥ ca iti . na khalu api ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9515: tilānām kṛṣṇāḥ iti . kim tarhi . dvau imau pradhānaśabdau ekasmin arthe yugapat avarudhyete
GS24pmbhasuu:9516: . na ca dvayoḥ pradhānaśabdayoḥ ekasmin arthe yugapat avarudhyamānayoḥ kim cit api
GS24pmbhasuu:9517: prayojanam asti . tatra prayogāt etat gantavyam . nūnam atra anyatarat pradhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:9518: tadviśeṣakam ca aparam iti . tatra tu etāvān sandehaḥ kim pradhānam kim viśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9519: iti . saḥ ca api kva sandehaḥ . yatra ubhau guṇaśabdau . tat yathā kuñjakhañjakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9520: khañjakubjakaḥ iti . yatra hi anyatarat dravyam anyataraḥ guṇaḥ tatra yat dravyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9521: tat pradhānam . tat yathā śuklam ālabheta kṛṣṇam ālabheta iti na piṣṭapiṇḍīm ālabhya
GS24pmbhasuu:9522: kṛtī bhavati . avaśyam tadguṇam dravyam ākāṅkṣati . katham tarhi imau dvau pradhānaśabdau
GS24pmbhasuu:9523: ekasmin arthe yugapat avarudhyete vṛkṣaḥ śiṃśipā iti . na etayoḥ āvaśyakaḥ samāveśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9526: 633-634 atha kimartham uttaratra evamādi anukramaṇam kriyate na viśeṣaṇam viśeṣyeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:9527: bahulam iti eva siddham . bahulavacanasya akṛtsnatvāt uttaratrānukramaṇasāmarthyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9528: . akṛtsnam bahulavacanam iti uttaratra anukramaṇam kriyate . yadi akṛtsnam yat anena
GS24pmbhasuu:9529: kṛtam akṛtam tat . evam tarhi na brūmaḥ akṛtsnam iti . kṛtsnam ca kārakam ca sādhakam
GS24pmbhasuu:9530: ca nirvartakam ca . yat ca anena kṛtam suktṛtam tat . kimartham tarhi evamādi anukramaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9531: kriyate . udāharaṇabhūyastvāt . te khalu api vidhayaḥ suparigṛhītāḥ bhavanti yeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:9532: lakṣaṇam prapañcaḥ ca . kevalam lakṣaṇam kevalaḥ prapañcaḥ vā na tathā kārakam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:9533: . avaśyam khalu asmābhiḥ idam vaktavyam bahulam anyatarasyām ubhayathā vā ekeṣām
GS24pmbhasuu:9534: iti . sarvavedapāṛiṣadam hi idam śāstram . tatra na ekaḥ panthāḥ śakyaḥ āsthātum .
GS24pmbhasuu:9536: 635 śreṇyādayaḥ paṭhyante . kṛtādiḥ ākṛtigaṇaḥ . śreṇyādiṣu cvyarthavacanam . śreṇyādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:9537: cvyarthagrahaṇam kartavyam . aśreṇayaḥ śreṇayaḥ kṛtāḥ śreṇikṛtāḥ . yadā hi śreṇayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9538: eva kim cit kriyante tadā mā bhūt . anyatra ayam cvyarthagrahaṇeṣu cvyantasya pratiṣedham
GS24pmbhasuu:9539: śāsti . tat iha na tathā . kim kāraṇam . anyatra pūrvam cvyantakāryam param cvyarthakāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:9540: . iha punaḥ pūrvam cyvarthakāryam param cvyantakāryam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9543: . iha mā būt . siddham ca abhuktam ca iti . anañ iti ca pratiṣedhaḥ kartavyaḥ . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:9544: mā bhūt . kartavyam akṛtam iti . nuḍiḍadhikena ca . nuḍiḍadhikena ca samāsaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9545: . iha api yathā syāt . aśitānaśitena jīvati . kliṣṭākliśitena jīvati . kim ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:9546: samānaprakṛtigrahaṇam kartavyam iti yadā nañviśiṣṭena iti ucyate . na ca atra nañkṛtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9547: eva viśeṣaḥ . kim tarhi . prakṛtikṛtaḥ api . ayam viśiṣṭaśabdaḥ asti eva avadhāraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:9548: vartate . tat yathā . devadattayajñadattau āḍhyau abhirūpau darśanīyau pakṣavantau
GS24pmbhasuu:9549: devadattaḥ tu yajñadattāt svādhyāyena viśiṣṭaḥ . svādhyāyena eva iti gamyate . anye
GS24pmbhasuu:9550: guṇāḥ samāḥ bhavanti . asti ādhikye vartate . tat yathā . devadattayajñadattau āḍhyau
GS24pmbhasuu:9551: abhirūpau darśanīyau pakṣavantau devadattaḥ tu yajñadattāt svādhyāyena viśiṣṭaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9552: svādhyāyena adhikaḥ anye guṇāḥ avivakṣitāḥ bhavanti . tat yadā tāvat avadhāraṇe viśiṣṭaśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9553: tadā na eva arthaḥ samānaprakṛtigrahaṇena . na iha bhaviṣyati . siddham ca abhuktam
GS24pmbhasuu:9554: ca iti . na api anañ iti pratiṣedhena . na iha bhaviṣyati kartavyam akṛtam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9555: nuḍiḍadhikena api tu tadā samāsaḥ na prāpnoti . yadā ādhikye viśiṣṭaśabdaḥ tadā samānaprakṛtigrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9556: kartavyam . iha mā bhūt ṣiddham ca abhuktam ca iti . anañ iti ca pratiṣedhaḥ kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9557: . iha mā bhūt . kartavyam akṛtam iti . nuḍiḍadhikena api tu samāsadḥ siddhaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:9558: . tatra ādhikye viśiṣṭagrahaṇam matvā samānaprakṛtigrahaṇam codyate . avadhāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9559: nañā cet nuḍiḍviśiṣṭena na prakalpeta . atha cet adhikavivakṣā kāryam tulyaprakṛtikena
GS24pmbhasuu:9560: iti . kṛtāpakṛtādīnām ca upasaṅkhyānam . kṛtāpakṛtādīnām ca upasaṅkhyānam . kṛtāpakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:9561: bhuktavibhuktam pītavipītam . siddham tu ktena visamāptau anañ . siddham etat . katham.
GS24pmbhasuu:9562: ktāntena kriyāvisamāptau anañ ktāntam samasyate iti vaktavyam . gatapratyāgatādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:9563: ca upasaṅkhyānam . gatapratyāgatādīnām ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . gatapratyāgatam
GS24pmbhasuu:9566: 639 ayuktaḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ . samānādhikaraṇena iti vartate . kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ yad vyadhikaraṇānām
GS24pmbhasuu:9567: samāsaḥ syāt . evam tarhi jñāpayati ācāryaḥ yathājātīyakam uktam uttarapadam tathājātīyakena
GS24pmbhasuu:9568: pūrvapadena samasyate iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . prātipadikagrahaṇe liṅgaviśiṣṭasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9569: api grahaṇam bhavati iti eṣā paribhāṣā na kartavyā bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:9574: kṛṣṇaḥ sāraṅgaḥ kṛṣṇasāraṅgaḥ iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . varṇena tṛtīyāsamāsaḥ etapratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:9575: varṇagrahaṇam . varṇena tṛtīyāsamāsaḥ etapratiṣedhe varṇagrahaṇam kartavyam . tṛtīyā
GS24pmbhasuu:9576: pūrvapadam prakṛtisvaram bhavati . anete varṇaḥ iti vaktavyam . atha dvitīyena varṇagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:9577: etaviśeṣaṇena arthaḥ . bāḍham arthaḥ yadi avarṇa etaśabdaḥ asti . nanu ca ayam asti : ā* itaḥ etaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9579: lohitetaḥ iti . na arthaḥ evamarthena varṇagrahaṇena . yadi tāvat ayam kartari ktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9580: tṛtīyā karmaṇi iti anena svareṇa bhavitavyam . atha api kartari paratvāt kṛtsvareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:9581: bhavitavyam . atha samānādhikaraṇaḥ . samānādhikaraṇe dviḥ varṇagrahaṇam . samānādhikaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:9582: dviḥ varṇagrahaṇam kartavyam . varṇaḥ varṇeṣu anete iti vaktavyam . ekam varṇagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9583: kartavyam iha mā bhūt . paramaśuklaḥ paramakṛṣṇaḥ iti . dvitīyam varṇagrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9584: iha mā bhūt . kṛṣṇatilāḥ iti . ekam varṇagrahaṇam anakrthakam . anyataratra kasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9585: na bhavati . lakṣaṇapratipadikoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya eva iti . evam sati . tāni
GS24pmbhasuu:9586: etāni trīṇi varṇagrahaṇāni bhavanti samāsavidhau dve svaravidhau ca ekam . yasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9587: api tṛtīyāsamāsaḥ tasya api tāni eva trīṇi varṇagrahaṇāni bhavanti samāsavidhau dve
GS24pmbhasuu:9588: svaravidhau ca ekam . sāmānyena mama tṛtīyāsamāsaḥ bhaviṣyati tṛtīyā tatkṛtārthena
GS24pmbhasuu:9589: guṇavacanena iti . avaśyam varṇena pratipadam samāsaḥ vaktavyaḥ yatra tena na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:9590: tadartham . kva ca tena na sidhyati . śukababhruḥ haritababhruḥ iti . tathā ca sati
GS24pmbhasuu:9591: tāni eva trīṇi varṇagrahaṇāni bhavanti samāsavidhau dve svaravidhau ca ekam . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:9592: samānādhikaraṇaḥ sāmānyena siddhaḥ syāt . bāḍham siddhaḥ . katham . viśeṣaṇam viśeṣyeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:9593: bahulam iti . evam api dve varṇagrahaṇe kartavye svaravidhau eva pratipadoktasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9594: abhāvāt . tasmāt samānādhikaraṇaḥ iti eṣaḥ pakṣaḥ jyāyān .
GS24pmbhasuu:9597: samānādhikaraṇādhikāre pradhānopasarjanānām param param bhavati vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:9598: pradhānānām pradhānam upasarjanānām upasarjanam . pradhānānām tāvat pradhānam . vṛdārakanāgakuñjaraiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9599: pūjyamānam iti asya avakāśaḥ govṛndārakaḥ aśvavṛndārakaḥ . poṭāyuvatīnām avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9600: ibhyayuvatiḥ āḍhyayuvatiḥ . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . nāgayuvatiḥ vṛndārakayuvatiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9601: pradhānānām param bhavati vipratiṣedhena . upasarjanānām param upasarjanam . sanmahatparamotkṛṣṭāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9602: iti asya avakāśaḥ sadgavaḥ sadaśvaḥ . kṛtyatulyākhyā ajātyā iti asya avakāśaḥ tulyaśvetaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9604: tulyasat tulyamahān . upasarjanānām param upasarjanam bhavati vipratiṣedhena . samānādhikaraṇasamāsāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9605: bahuvrīhiḥ . samānādhikaraṇasamāsāt bahuvrīhiḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . samānādhikaraṇasamāsasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9606: avakāśaḥ vīraḥ puruṣaḥ vīrapuruṣaḥ . bahuvrīheḥ avakāśaḥ kaṇṭhekālaḥ . iha ubhayam prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:9607: vīrapuruṣakaḥ grāmaḥ . bahuvrīhiḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . kadā cit karmadhārayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9608: sarvadhanādyarthaḥ . kadā cit karmadhārayaḥ bhavati bahuvrīheḥ . kim prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9609: sarvadhanādyarthaḥ . sarvadhanī sarvabījī sarvakeśī naṭaḥ gaurakharavat vanam gauramṛgavat
GS24pmbhasuu:9610: vanam kṛṣṇasarpavān valmīkaḥ lohitaśālimān grāmaḥ . kim prayojanam . karmadhārayaprakṛtibhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9611: matvarthīyaiḥ abhidhānam yathā syāt . kim ca kāraṇam na syāt . bahuvrīhiṇā uktatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9612: matvarthasya . yadi uktatvam hetuḥ karmadhārayeṇa api uktatvāt na prāpnoti . na khalu
GS24pmbhasuu:9613: api sañjñāśrayaḥ matvarthīyaḥ . kim tarhi . arthāśrayaḥ . saḥ yathā eva bahuvrīhiṇā
GS24pmbhasuu:9614: uktatvāt na bhavati evam karmadhārayeṇa api uktatvāt na bhaviṣyati . evam tarhi idam syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:9615: sarvāṇi dhanāni sarvadhanāni sarvadhanāni asya saniti sarvadhanī . na evam śakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9616: . nityam evam sati karmadhārayaḥ syāt . tatra yat uktam kadā cit karmadhārayaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9617: etat ayuktam . evam tarhi bhavati vai kim cit ācāryāḥ kāryavat buddhim kṛtvā paṭhanti
GS24pmbhasuu:9618: kāryāḥ śabdāḥ iti . tadvat idam paṭhitam samānādhikaraṇasamādāt bahuvrīhiḥ kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9619: kadā cit karmadhārayaḥ sarvadhanādyarthaḥ iti . yad ucyate samānādhikaraṇasamāsāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9620: bahuvrīhiḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena iti na eṣaḥ yuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . antaraṅgaḥ karmadhārayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9621: . kā antaraṅgatā . svapadārthe karmadhārayaḥ anyapadārthe bahuvrīhiḥ . astu . vibhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:9622: karmadhārayaḥ . yadā na karmadhārayaḥ tadā bahuvrīhiḥ bhaviṣyati . evam api yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:9623: atra kadā cit karmadhārayaḥ bhavati karmadhārayaprakṛtibhiḥ matvarthīyaiḥ abhidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:9624: prāpnoti . sarvaḥ ca ayam evamarthaḥ yatnaḥ karmadhārayaprakṛtibhiḥ matvarthīyaiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9625: abhidhānam mā bhūt iti . evam tarhi na idam tasya yogasya udāharaṇam vipratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:9626: param iti . kim tarhi . iṣṭiḥ iyam paṭhitā . samānādhikaraṇasamāsāt bahuvrīhiḥ iṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9627: kadā cit karmadhārayaḥ sarvadhanādyarthaḥ iti . yadi iṣṭiḥ paṭhitā na arthaḥ anena
GS24pmbhasuu:9628: . iha hi sarve manuṣyāḥ alpena yatnena mahataḥ arthān ākāṅkṣanti . ekena māṣeṇa śatasahasram
GS24pmbhasuu:9629: . ekena kuddālakena khārīsahasram . tatra karmadhārayaprakṛtibhiḥ matvarthīyaiḥ abhidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:9630: astu bahuvrīhiṇā iti bahuvrīhiṇā bhaviṣyati laghutvāt . katham sarvadhanī sarvabījī
GS24pmbhasuu:9631: sarvakeśī naṭaḥ iti . iniprakaraṇe sarvādeḥ inim vakṣyāmi . tat ca avaśyam vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9632: ṭhanaḥ bādhanārtham . katham gaurakharavat vanam gauramṛgavat vanam kṛṣṇasarpavān
GS24pmbhasuu:9633: valmīkaḥ lohitaśālimān grāmaḥ . asti atra viśeṣaḥ . jātyā atra abhisambandhaḥ kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:9634: . kṛṣṇasarpaḥ nāma sarpajātiḥ sā asmin valmīke asti . yadā hi antareṇa jātim tadvatām
GS24pmbhasuu:9635: abhisambandhaḥ kriyate kṛṣṇasarpaḥ valmīkaḥ iti evam tadā bhaviṣyati . pūrvapadātiśaye
GS24pmbhasuu:9636: ātiśāyikāt bahuvrīhiḥ sūkṣmavastratarādyarthaḥ . pūrvapadātiśaye ātiśāyikāt bahuvrīhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9637: bhavati vipratiṣedhena . kim prayojanam . sūkṣmavastratarādyarthaḥ . ātiśāyikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9638: avakāśaḥ paṭutaraḥ paṭutamaḥ . bahuvrīheḥ avakāśaḥ citraguḥ śabalaguḥ . iha ubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:9639: prāpnoti sūkṣmavastrataraḥ tīkṣṇśṛṅgataraḥ . bahuvrīhiḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:9640: na eṣaḥ yuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . virpatiṣedhe param iti ucyate . pūrvaḥ ca bahuvrīhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9641: paraḥ ātiśāyikaḥ . iṣṭavācī paraśabdaḥ . vipratiṣedhe param yat iṣṭam tat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:9642: . evam api ayuktaḥ . antaraṅgaḥ ātiśāiyikaḥ . kā antaraṅgatā . ṅyāpprātipadikāt ātiśāyikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9643: subantānām bahuvrīhiḥ . ātiśāyikaḥ api na antaraṅgaḥ . katham . samarthāt taddhitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9644: utpadyate sāmarthyam ca subantenta . evam api antaraṅgaḥ . katham . svapadārthe ātiśāyikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9645: anyapadārthe bahuvrīhiḥ . evam api na antaraṅgaḥ . katham . spardhāyām ātiśāyikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9646: bhavati . na ca antareṇa pratiyoginam spardhā bhavati . na eva vā atra ātiśāyikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9647: prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . asāmarthyāt . katham asāmarthyam. sāpekṣam asamartham bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:9648: iti . yāvatā vastrāṇi tadvantam apekṣante tadvantam ca apekṣya vastrāṇām vastraiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9649: yugapat spardhā bhavati . nanu ca ayam ātiśāyikaḥ evamātmakaḥ satyām vyapekṣāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:9650: vidhīyate . satyam evamātmakaḥ yām ca na anatareṇa vyapekṣām pravṛttiḥ tasyam satyām
GS24pmbhasuu:9651: bhavitavyam . kām ca na antareṇa vyapekṣām ātiśāyikasya pravṛttiḥ . yā hi pratiyoginam
GS24pmbhasuu:9652: prati vyapekṣā . yā hi tadvantam prati na tasyām bhavitavyam . bahuvrīhiḥ api tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:9653: na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . asāmarthyāt eva . katham asāmarthyam . sāpekṣam asamartham
GS24pmbhasuu:9654: bhavati iti . yāvatā vastrāṇi vastrāntarāṇi apekṣante tadvatā ca abhisambandhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9655: evam tarhi na idam tasya yogasya udāharaṇam vipratiṣedhe param iti . kim tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:9656: iṣṭiḥ iyam paṭhitā . pūrvapadātiśaye ātiśāyikāt bahuvrīhiḥ iṣṭaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:9657: sūkṣmavastratarādyarthaḥ iti . yadi iṣṭiḥ iyam paṭhitā na arthaḥ anena . katham yā eṣā yuktiḥ uktā :
GS24pmbhasuu:9658: yāvatā vastrāṇi vastrāntarāṇi apekṣante tadvatā ca abhisambandhaḥ iti . yadā hi antareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:9659: vastrāṇām vastraiḥ yugapat spardhām tadvatā ca abhisambandhaḥ kriyate niṣpratidvandvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9660: tadā bahuvrīhiḥ . bahuvrīheḥ ātiśāyikaḥ . na tarhi idānīm idam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:9661: sūkṣmataravastraḥ iti . bhavati . yadā antareṇa tadvantam vastrāṇām vastraiḥ yugapat
GS24pmbhasuu:9662: spardhā niṣpratidvandvaḥ tadā ātiśāyikaḥ . katham punaḥ anyasya prakarṣeṇa anyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9663: prakarṣaḥ syāt . na eva anyasya prakarṣeṇa anyasya prakarṣeṇa bhavitavyam . yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:9664: eva ayam dravyeṣu yatate vastrāṇi me syuḥ iti evam guṇeṣu api yatate sūkṣmatarāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:9665: me syuḥ iti . na atra ātiśāyikaḥ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . guṇavacanāt iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:9666: . na ca samāsaḥ guṇavacanaḥ . samāsaḥ api guṇavacanaḥ . katham . ajahatsvārthā vṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9667: . atha jahatsvārthāyām tu doṣaḥ eva . jahatsvāṛthāyām api na doṣaḥ . bhavati bahuvrīhau
GS24pmbhasuu:9668: tadguṇasaṃvijñānam api . tat yathā . śuklavāsasam ānaya . lohitoṣṇīṣāḥ ṛtvijaḥ pracaranti
GS24pmbhasuu:9669: iti . tatguṇaḥ ānīyate tadguṇāḥ ca pracaranti . uttarapadārthātiśaye ātiśāyikaḥ bahuvrīheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9670: bahvāḍhyatarādyarthaḥ . uttarapadārthātiśaye ātiśāyikaḥ bahuvrīheḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:9671: . kim prayojanam . bahvāḍhyatarādyarthaḥ . bahvāḍhyataraḥ bahusukumārataraḥ . kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9672: punaḥ atra viśeṣaḥ bahuvrīheḥ vā ātiśāyikaḥ syāt ātiśāyikāntena vā bahuvrīhiḥ . svarakapoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9673: viśeṣaḥ . yadi atra ātiśāyikāt bahuvrīhiḥ syāt bahvāḍyataraḥ evam svaraḥ prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:9674: bahvāḍhyataraḥ iti ca iṣyate . bahvāḍhyakataraḥ iti ca prāpnoti bahvāḍhyatarakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9675: iti ca iṣyate . samānādhikaraṇādhikāre śākapārthivādīnām upasaṅkhyānam uttarapadalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9676: ca . samānādhikaraṇādhikāre śākapārthivādīnām upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam uttarapadalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9677: ca vaktavyaḥ . śākabhojī pārthivaḥ śākapārthivaḥ . kutapavāsaḥ sauśrutaḥ kutapasauśrutraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9678: . ajāpaṇyaḥ taulvaliḥ ajātaulvaliḥ . yaṣṭipradhānaḥ maudgalyaḥ yaṣṭimaudgalyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9680: 653 catuṣpāt jātiḥ iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . kālākṣīgarbhiṇī svastimatī garbhiṇī .
GS24pmbhasuu:9682: 654 kimarthaḥ cakāraḥ . evakārārthaḥ . mayūravyaṃsakādayaḥ eva . kva mā bhūt . paramaḥ mayūravyaṃsakaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9686: nagarārdhaḥ iti . ardhaśabdasya napuṃsakaliṅgasya idam grahaṇam puṃliṅgaḥ ca ayam ardhaśabdaḥ . kva punaḥ ayam napuṃsakaliṅgaḥ kva puṃliṅgaḥ . samapravibhāge napuṃsakaliṅgaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9687: avayavavācī puṃliṅgaḥ . iha kasmāt na bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:9688: ardham pippalīnām iti . na vā bhavati ardhapippalyaḥ iti . bhavati yadā khaṇḍasamuccayaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:9689: ardhapippalī ca ardhapippalī ca ardhapippalī ca ardhapippalyaḥ iti . yada tu etat
GS24pmbhasuu:9690: vākyam bhavati ardham pippalīnām iti tadā na bhavitavyam . tadā kasmāt na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:9691: . ekādkhikaraṇe iti vartate . na tarhi idānīm idam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:9692: ardharāśiḥ iti . bhavati . ekam etat adhikaraṇam yaḥ asau rāśiḥ nāma .
GS24pmbhasuu:9694: 657-660 anyatarasyāṅgrahaṇam kimartham . anyatarasyām samāsaḥ yathā syāt . samāsena
GS24pmbhasuu:9695: mukte vākyam api yathā syāt . dvitīyam bhikṣāyāḥ iti . na etat asti prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9696: prakṛtā mahāvibhāṣā . tayā vākyam api bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam . ekadeśisamāsena
GS24pmbhasuu:9697: mukte ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ api yathā syāt . bhikṣādvitīyam iti . etat api na asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:9698: . ayam api vibhāṣā ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ api . tau ubhau vacanāt bhaviṣyataḥ . ataḥ uttaram
GS24pmbhasuu:9699: paṭhati . dvitīyādīnām vibhāṣāprakaraṇe vibhāṣāvacanam jñāpakam avayavavidhāne sāmānyavidhānābhāvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9700: . dvitīyādīnām vibhāṣāprakaraṇe vibhāṣāvacanam kriyate jñāpārtham . kim jñāpyate
GS24pmbhasuu:9701: . etat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ . avayavavidhau sāmānyavidhiḥ na bhavati iti . kim etasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9702: jñāpane prayojanam . bhinatti chinatti . śnami kṛte śap na bhavati . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:9703: prayojanam . śabādeśāḥ śyanādayaḥ kariṣyante . tat tarhi śapaḥ grahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9704: . na kartavyam .prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . kartari śap iti . tat vai prathamānirdiṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:9705: ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭena ca iha arthaḥ . rudhādibhyaḥ iti eṣā pañcamī śap iti prathamāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9706: ṣaṣthīm prakalpayiṣyati tasmāt iti uttarasya iti . pratyayavidhiḥ ayam na ca pratyayavidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:9707: pañcamyaḥ prakalpikāḥ bhavanti . na ayam pratyayavidhiḥ . vihitaḥ pratyayaḥ prakṛtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9708: ca anuvartate . evam tarhi jñāpayati ācāryaḥ yatra utsargāpavādam vibhāṣā tatra apavādena
GS24pmbhasuu:9709: mukte utsargaḥ na bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . dikpūrvapadāt ṅīp
GS24pmbhasuu:9710: . prāṅmukhī prāṅmukhā pratyaṅmukhī pratyaṅmukhā . ṅīpa mukte ṅīṣ na bhavati . na
GS24pmbhasuu:9711: etat asti prayojanam . vakṣyati etat . dikpūrvapadāt ṅīṣaḥ anudāttatvam ṅībvidhāne
GS24pmbhasuu:9712: hi anyatra api ṅīṣviṣayāt ṅīpprasaṅgaḥ iti . idam tarhi prayojanam . ardhapippalī
GS24pmbhasuu:9713: ardhakośātakī . ekadeśisamāsena mukte ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ na bhavati . unmattagaṅgam lohitagaṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:9714: . avyayībhāvena mukte bahuvrīhiḥ na bhavati . dākṣiḥ plākṣiḥ . iñā mukte aṇ na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:9715: . yadi etat jñāpyate upagoḥ apatyam aupagavaḥ . taddhitena mukte upagvapatyam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9716: na sidhyati . asti atra viśeṣaḥ . dve hi atra vibhāṣā . daivayajñiśaucivṛkṣisātyamugrikāṇṭheviddhibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9717: anyatarasyām iti samarthānām prathamāt vā iti ca . tatra ekaya vṛttiḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:9718: aparaya vṛttiviṣaye vibhāṣapavādaḥ . kriyamāṇe api vai anyatarasyāṅgrahaṇe ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9719: na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . pūraṇena iti pratiṣedhāt . na etat pūraṇāntam . anā etat
GS24pmbhasuu:9720: paryavapannam . etat api pūraṇāntam eva . katha. pūraṇam nāma arthaḥ tam āha tīyaśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9721: . ataḥ pūraṇam . yaḥ asau pūraṇāntāt svārthe bhāge an saḥ api pūraṇam eva . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:9724: 660 kimarthaḥ cakāraḥ . anukaraṣaṇārthaḥ . anyatarasyām iti etat anukṛṣyate . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:9725: prayojanam . anyatarasyām samāsaḥ yathā syāt . samāsena mukte vākyam api yatha syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9726: . jīvikām prāptaḥ iti . na etat asti prayojanam . prakṛtā mahāvibhāṣā . tayā vākyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9727: bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam . dvitīyāsamāsaḥ api yatha syāt . jīvikāprāptaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9728: iti . etat api na asti prayojanam. ayam api ucyate dvitīyāsamāsaḥ api . tat ubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:9729: vacanāt bhaviṣyati . evam tarhi na ayam anukarṣaṇārthaḥ cakāraḥ . kim tarhi . atvam
GS24pmbhasuu:9730: anena vidhīyate . prāptāpanne dvitīyāntena saha samasyete atvam ca bhavati prāptapannayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9731: iti . prāptā jīvikām prāptajīvikā āpannā jīvikām āpannajivikā .
GS24pmbhasuu:9733: 661-662 kimpradhānaḥ ayam samāsaḥ . uttarapadārthapradhānaḥ . yadi uttarapadārthapradhānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9734: sadharmaṇā anena anyaiḥ uttarapadārthapradhānaiḥ bhavitavyam . anyeṣu ca uttarapadārthapradhāneṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:9735: yā eva asau antarvartinī vibhaktiḥ tasyāḥ samāse api śravaṇam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:9736: rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ rājapuruṣaḥ iti . iha punaḥ vākye ṣaṣṭhī samāse prathamā . kena etat
GS24pmbhasuu:9737: evam bhavati . yaḥ asau māsajātayoḥ abhisambandhaḥ saḥ samāse nivartate . abhihitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9738: saḥ arthaḥ antarbhūtaḥ prātipadikārthaḥ sampannaḥ . tatra prātipadikārthe prathamā
GS24pmbhasuu:9739: iti prathamā bhavati . na tarhi idānīm idam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:9740: māsajātasya iti . bhavati . bāhyam artham apekṣya ṣaṣṭhī .
GS24pmbhasuu:9742: 662-666 kālasya yena samāsaḥ tasya aparimāṇitvāt anirdeśaḥ . kālasya yena samāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9743: saḥ aparimāṇī . tasya aparimāṇitvāt anirdeśaḥ . agamakaḥ nirdeśaḥ anirdeśaḥ . na
GS24pmbhasuu:9744: hi jātasya māsaḥ parimāṇam . kasya tarhi . triṃśadrātrasya . tat yathā . droṇaḥ badarāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:9745: devadattasya iti . na devadattasya droṇaḥ parimāṇam . kasya tarhi . badarāṇām . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:9746: tu kālaparimāṇam yasya sa kālaḥ tena . siddham etat . katham . kālaparimāṇam yasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9747: sa kālaḥ tena samasyate iti vaktavyam . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam
GS24pmbhasuu:9748: eva astu . nanu ca uktam kālasya yena samāsaḥ tasya aparimāṇitvāt anirdeśaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9749: kam punaḥ kālam matvā bhavān āha kālasya yena samāsaḥ tasya aparimāṇitvāt anirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9750: iti . yena mūrtīnām upacayāḥ ca apacayāḥ ca lakṣyante tam kālam āhuḥ . tasya eva
GS24pmbhasuu:9751: kayā cit kriyayā yuktasya ahaḥ iti ca bhavati rātriḥ iti ca . kayā kriyayā . ādityagatyā
GS24pmbhasuu:9752: . tayā eva asakṛt āvṛttayā māsaḥ iti bhavati saṃvatsaraḥ iti ca . yadi evam jātasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9753: māsaḥ parimāṇam . ekavacanadvigoḥ ca upasaṅkhyānam . ekavacanāntānām iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9754: . iha mā bhūt . māsau jātasya māsāḥ jātasya iti . dvigoḥ ca iti vaktavyam iha api yathā syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:9756: trimāsajātaḥ . uktam vā . kim uktam . ekavacane tāvat uktam anabhidhānāt iti . dvigoḥ kim uktam . uttarapadena parimāṇina dvigoḥ samāsavacanam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9758: 666-677 kimpradhānaḥ ayam samāsaḥ . uttarapadārthapradhānaḥ . yadi uttarapadārthapradhānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9759: abrāhmaṇam ānaya iti ukte brāhmaṇamātrasya ānayanam prāpnoti . anyapadārthapradhānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9761: avarṣā hemantaḥ iti hemantasya yat liṅgam vacanam ca tat samāsasya api prāpnoti . pūrvapadārthapradhānaḥ tarhi bhaviṣyati . yadi pūrvapadārthapradhānaḥ avyayasañjñā prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:9762: avyayam hi asya pūrvapadam iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . pāṭhena avyayasañjñā kriyate . na
GS24pmbhasuu:9763: ca nañsamāsaḥ tatra paṭhyate . yadi api nañsamāsaḥ na paṭhyate nañ tu paṭhyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:9764: pāṭhena api avyayasañjñāyām satyām abhideheyavat liṅgavacanāni bhavanti . yaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:9765: iha arthaḥ abhidhīyate na tasya liṅgasaṅkhyābhyām yogaḥ asti . na idam vācanikam
GS24pmbhasuu:9766: aliṅgatā asaṅkhyatā va . kim tarhi . svābhāvikam etat . tat yathā:
GS24pmbhasuu:9767: samānam īhamānānām adhīyānānām ca ke cit arthaiḥ yujyante apare na . na ca idānīm
GS24pmbhasuu:9768: kaḥ cit arthavān iti kṛtvā sarvaiḥ arthavadbhiḥ śakyam bhavitum kaḥ cit anarthakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9769: iti kṛtvā sarvaiḥ anarthakaiḥ . tatra kim asmābhiḥ śakyam kartum . yat nañaḥ prāk
GS24pmbhasuu:9770: samāsāt liṅgasaṅkhyābhyām yogaḥ na asti samāse ca bhavati svābhāvikam etat . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:9771: vā āśrayataḥ liṅgavacanāni bhaviṣyanti . guṅavacanānām hi śabdānām āśrayataḥ liṅgavacanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:9775: śuklau kambalau śuklāḥ kambalāḥ iti . yat asau dravyam śritaḥ bhavati guṇaḥ tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9776: yat liṅgam vacanam ca tat guṇasya api bhavati . evam iha api yat asau dravyam śritaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9777: bhavati samāsaḥ tasya yat liṅgam vacanam ca tat samāsasya api bhaviṣyati . atha vā
GS24pmbhasuu:9778: punaḥ astu uttarapadārthapradhānaḥ . nanu ca uktam abrāhmaṇam ānaya iti ukte brāhmaṇamātrasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9779: ānayanam prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . idam tāvat ayam praṣṭavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:9780: atha iha rājapuruṣam ānaya iti ukte puruṣamātrasya ānayanam kasmāt na bhavati . asti
GS24pmbhasuu:9781: atra viśeṣaḥ . rājā viśeṣakaḥ prayujyate . tena viśiṣṭasya ānayanam bhavati . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:9782: api tarhi nañ viśeṣakaḥ prayujyate . tena nañviśiṣṭasya ānayanam bhaviṣyati . kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9783: punaḥ asau . nivṛttapadārthakaḥ . yadā punaḥ asya padārthaḥ nivartate kim svābhāvikī
GS24pmbhasuu:9784: nivṛttiḥ āhosvit vācanikī . kim ca ataḥ . yadi svābhāvikī kim nañ prayujyamānaḥ karoti
GS24pmbhasuu:9786: nañ prayujyamānaḥ padārtham nivartayati iti . evam tarhi svābhāvikī nivṛttiḥ . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:9787: ca uktam kim nañ prayujyamānaḥ karoti iti . nañ prayujyamānaḥ padārtham nivartayati
GS24pmbhasuu:9788: katham . kīlapratikīlavat . tat yathā kīlaḥ āhanyamānaḥ pratikīlam nirhanti . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:9789: etat nañaḥ māhātmyam syāt na jātu cit rājānaḥ hastyaśvam bibhṛyuḥ . na iti eva rājānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9790: brūyuḥ . evam tarhi svābhāvikī nivṛttiḥ . nanu ca uktam kim nañ prayujyamānaḥ karoti
GS24pmbhasuu:9791: iti . nañnimittā tu upalabdhiḥ . tat yathā samandhakāre dravyāṇām samavasthitānām
GS24pmbhasuu:9792: pradīpnimittam darśanam na ca teṣām pradīpaḥ nirvartakaḥ bhavati . yadi punaḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:9793: nivṛttapadārthakaḥ kimartham brāhmaṇaśabdaḥ prayujyate . evam yathā vijñayeta asya
GS24pmbhasuu:9794: padārthaḥ nivartate iti . na iti hi ukte sandehaḥ syāt kasya padārthaḥ nivartate
GS24pmbhasuu:9795: iti . tatra asandehārtham brāhmaṇaśabdaḥ prayujyate . evam vā etat . atha vā sarve
GS24pmbhasuu:9796: ete śabdāḥ guṇasamudāyeṣu vartante brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyaḥ vaiśyaḥ śūdraḥ iti . tapaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9797: śrutam ca yoniḥ ca iti etad brāhmaṇakārakam . tapaḥśtrutābhyām yaḥ hīnaḥ jātibrāhmaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9798: eva saḥ . tathā gauraḥ śucyācāraḥ piṅgalaḥ kapilakeśaḥ iti etān api abhyantarān brāhmaṇye
GS24pmbhasuu:9799: guṇān kurvanti . samudāyeṣu ca vṛttāḥ śabdāḥ avayaveṣu api vartante. tad yathā .
GS24pmbhasuu:9800: pūrve pañcālāḥ uttare pañcālāḥ tailam bhuktam ghṛtaṃ bhuktam śuklaḥ nīlaḥ kapilaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9801: kṛṣṇaḥ iti . evam ayam samudāye brāhmaṇaśabdaḥ pravṛttaḥ avayaveṣu api vartate jātihīne
GS24pmbhasuu:9802: guṇahīne ca . guṇahīne tāvat. abrāhmaṇaḥ ayam yaḥ tiṣṭhan mūtrayati . abrāhmaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9803: ayaṃ yaḥ gacchan bhakṣayati . jātihīne sandehāt durupadeśāt ca brāhmaṇaśabdaḥ vartate . sandehāt tāvat :
GS24pmbhasuu:9804: gauram śucyācāraṃ piṅgalam kapilakeśam dṛṣṭvā adhyavasyati brāhmaṇaḥ ayam iti . tataḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:10025: bhavati sadravyaḥ saliṅgaḥ sasaṅkhyaḥ ca . arthagrahaṇasāmarthyāt . iha anekam anyapade
GS24pmbhasuu:10026: iti iyatā siddham . katham punaḥ pade nāma vṛttiḥ syāt . śabdaḥ hi eṣaḥ . śabde asambhavāt
