GS24pmbhasuu:10043: citragoḥ devadattasya . bhavati . bāhyam artham apekṣya ṣaṣṭhī .
GS24pmbhasuu:10046: bahuvrīhiḥ vaktavyaḥ . kim prayojanam . vyadhikaraṇānām mā bhūt iti . pañcabhiḥ bhuktam
GS24pmbhasuu:10047: asya iti . avyayānām ca . avyayānām bahuvrīhiḥ vaktavyaḥ . uccairmukhaḥ nīcairmukhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10049: ca bahuvrīhiḥ vaktavyaḥ uttarapadasya ca lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kaṇṭhesthaḥ kālaḥ asya
GS24pmbhasuu:10050: kaṇṭhekālaḥ uṣṭramukham iva mukham asya uṣṭramukhaḥ kharamukhaḥ . samudāyavikāraṣaṣṭhyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10051: ca . samudāyaṣaṣṭhyāḥ vikāraṣaṣṭhyāḥ ca bahuvrīhiḥ vaktavyaḥ uttarapadasya ca lopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10052: vaktavyaḥ . keśānām samāhāraḥ cūḍā asya keśacūḍaḥ suvarṇasya vikāraḥ alaṅkāraḥ asya
GS24pmbhasuu:10053: suvarṇālaṅkāraḥ . prādibhyaḥ dhātujasya vā . prādibhyaḥ dhātujasya bahuvrīhiḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10054: uttarapadasya ca vā lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . prapatitaparṇaḥ praparṇaḥ prapatitapalāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10055: prapalāśaḥ . nañaḥ astyarthānām . nañaḥ astyarthānām bahuvrīhiḥ vaktavyaḥ uttarapadasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10056: ca vā lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . avidyamānaputraḥ aputraḥ avidyamānabhāryaḥ abhāryaḥ . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:10057: tarhi bahu vaktavyam . na vā anabhidhānāt asamānādhikaraṇe sañjñābhāvaḥ . na vā vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:10059: pañcabhiḥ bhuktam asya iti . anabhidhānāt . tat ca avaśyam anabhidhānam āśrayitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:10060: . kriyamāṇe api vai parigaṇane yatra abhidhānam na asti na bhavati tatra bahuvrīhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10061: . tat yathā pañca bhuktavantaḥ asya iti . atha etasmin sati anabhidhāne yadi vṛttiparigaṇanam
GS24pmbhasuu:10062: kriyate vartiparigaṇanam api kartavyam . tat katham kartavyam . arthaniyame matvarthagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:10063: . arthaniyame matvarthagrahaṇam kartavyam . matvarthe yaḥ saḥ bahuvrīhiḥ iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt :
GS24pmbhasuu:10064: kaṣṭam śritam anena iti . tathā ca uttarasya vacanārthaḥ . evam ca kṛtvā uttarasya yogasya vacanārthaḥ upapannaḥ bhavati . ke cit tāvat āhuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10065: yat vṛttisūtre iti . saṅkhyāvyayāsannādūrādhikasaṅkhyāḥ saṅkhyeye iti . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:10066: yat vārttike iti . karmavacanena aprathmāyāḥ . karmavacanena aprathmāyāḥ bahuvrīhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10067: vaktavyaḥ . ūḍhaḥ rathaḥ anena ūḍharathaḥ anaḍvān upahṛtaḥ paśuḥ rudrāya upahṛtapaśuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10068: rudraḥ uddhṛtaḥ odanaḥ sthālyāḥ uddhṛtaudanā sthālī . yadi karmavacanena iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:10069: kartṛvacanena katham . prāptam udakam grāmam prāptodakaḥ grāmaḥ āgatāḥ atithayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10070: grāmam āgatātithiḥ grāmaḥ . kartṛvacanena api . kartṛvacanena api iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10071: aprathamāyāḥ iti kimartham . vṛṣṭe deve gataḥ . aprathamāyāḥ iti ucyamāne iha kasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10072: na bhavati . vṛṣṭe deve gatam paśya iti . bahiraṅgā atra aprathamā . subadhikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:10073: astikṣīrādivacanam . subadhikāre astikṣīrādīnām upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . astikṣīrā
GS24pmbhasuu:10074: brāhmaṇī . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vā avyayatvāt . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:10075: . avyayatvāt . avyayaḥ ayam astiśabdaḥ . na eṣaḥ asteḥ laṭ . katham avyayatvam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10076: upasargavibhaktisvarapratirūpakāḥ ca nipātasañjñāḥ bhavanti iti nipātasñjñā . nipātaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10079: 714-719 atha kiṃsabrahmacārī iti kaḥ ayam samāsaḥ . bahuvrīhiḥ iti aha . kaḥ asya
GS24pmbhasuu:10080: vigrahaḥ . ke sabrahmacāriṇaḥ asya iti . yadi evam kaṭhaḥ iti prativacanam na upapadyate
GS24pmbhasuu:10081: . na hi anyat pṛṣṭena anyat ākhyāyate . evam tarhi evam vigrahaḥ kariṣyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:10082: keṣām sabrahmacārī kiṃsbrahmacārī iti . prativacanam ca eva na upapadyate svare ca
GS24pmbhasuu:10083: doṣaḥ bhavati . kiṃsabrahmacārī iti evam svaraḥ prasajyeta . kiṃsabrahmacārī iti
GS24pmbhasuu:10084: ca iṣyate . evam tarhi evam vigrahaḥ kariṣyate . kaḥ sabrahmacārī kiṃsabrahmacārī
GS24pmbhasuu:10085: iti . bhavet prativacanam upapannam svare tu doṣaḥ bhavati . evam tarhi evam vigrahaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10086: kariṣyate . kaḥ sabrahmacārī tava kiṃsabrahmacārī tvam iti . atha vā punaḥ astu evam vigrahaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:10087: ke sabrahmacāriṇaḥ asya iti . nanu ca uktam kaṭhaḥ iti prativacanam na upapadyate
GS24pmbhasuu:10088: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . agnaukaravāṇinyāyena bhaviṣyati . tat yathā . kaḥ cit kam cit āha
GS24pmbhasuu:10089: . agnau karavāṇi iti . kuru iti kartari anujñāte karma api anujñātam bhavati . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:10090: agnau kariṣyate iti . kriyatām iti karmaṇi anujñāte kartā api anujñātaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:10091: yathā eva khalu api ke sabrahmacāriṇaḥ asya iti kaṭhāḥ iti ukte sambandhāt etat gamyate
GS24pmbhasuu:10092: . nūnam saḥ api kaṭha iti . evam kaṭhaḥ iti ukte sambandhāt etat gantavyam syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:10093: nūnam te api kaṭhāḥ iti . na khalu api te śakyāḥ samāsena pratinirdeṣṭum . upasarjanam
GS24pmbhasuu:10094: he te bhavanti . atha arthatṛtīyāḥ iti kaḥ ayam samāsaḥ . bahuvrīhiḥ iti āha . kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10095: asya vigrahaḥ . ardham tṛtīyam eṣām iti . kaḥ samāsārthaḥ . samāsārthaḥ na upapadyate
GS24pmbhasuu:10096: . anyapadārthaḥ hi nāma saḥ bhavati . yeṣām padānām samāsaḥ tataḥ anyasya padasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10097: arthaḥ anyapadārthaḥ . evam tarhi evam vigrahaḥ kariṣyate . ardham tṛtīyam anayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10098: iti . evam api kaḥ ṣaṣṭhyarthaḥ . ṣaṣṭhyarthaḥ na upapadyate . kim hi tayoḥ ardham
GS24pmbhasuu:10099: bhavati . astu tari evam vigrahaḥ ardham tṛtīyam eṣām iti . nanu ca uktam samāsārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10100: na upapadyate iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . avayavena vigrahaḥ samudāyaḥ samāsārthaḥ . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:10101: avayavena vigrahaḥ samudāyaḥ samāsārthaḥ asidvitīyaḥ anusasāra pāṇḍavam . saṅkarṣaṇadvitīyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10102: balam kṛṣṇasya vardhatām iti. dvayoḥ dvivacanam prāpnoti . astu tarhi ayam eva vigrahaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10103: ardham tṛtīyam anayoḥ . nanu ca uktam . ṣaṣṭhyarthaḥ na upapadyate iti . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10104: doṣaḥ . idam tāvat ayam praṣṭavyaḥ . atha iha devadattasya bhrātā iti kaḥ ṣaṣṭhyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10105: . tatra etat syāt . ekasmāt prādurbhāvaḥ iti . etat ca vārtam . tat yathā . sārthikanam
GS24pmbhasuu:10106: ekapratiśraye uṣitānām prātaḥ utthāya pratiṣṭhamānānām na kaḥ cit parasparam sambandhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10107: bhavati . evañjātīyakam bhrātṛtvam nāma . atra cet yuktaḥ ṣaṣṭhyarthaḥ dṛśyate iha
GS24pmbhasuu:10108: api yuktaḥ dṛśyatām . iha tarhi ardhatṛtīyāḥ ānīyantām iti ukte ardhasya ānayanam
GS24pmbhasuu:10109: na prāpnoti . astu tarhi ayam eva vigrahaḥ ardham tṛtīyam eṣām iti . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:10110: anusasāra pāṇḍavam . saṅkarṣaṇadvitīyasya balam kṛṣṇasya vardhatām iti. dvayoḥ dvivacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:10111: prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ayam tīyantaḥ śabdaḥ asti eva pūraṇam . asti sahāyavācī
GS24pmbhasuu:10112: . tat yaḥ sahāyavācī tasya idam grahaṇam . asidvitīyaḥ asisahāyaḥ iti gamyate . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:10113: api ardhatṛtīyāḥ iti ekasmin ekavacanam iti ekavacanam prāpnoti . ekārthāḥ hi samudāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10114: bhavanti . tat yathā śatam yūtham vanam iti . astu tarhi ayam eva vigrahaḥ ardham
GS24pmbhasuu:10115: tṛtīyam anayoḥ iti . nanu ca uktam ardhatṛtīyāḥ ānīyantām iti ukte ardhasya ānayanam
GS24pmbhasuu:10116: na prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . bhavati bahuvrīhau tadguṇasaṃvijñānam api . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:10117: yathā . śuklavāsasam ānaya . lohitoṣṇīṣāḥ ṛtvijaḥ pracaranti iti . tadguṇaḥ ānīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:10118: tadguṇāḥ ca pracaranti . atha vā punaḥ astu ayam eva vigrahaḥ ardham tṛtīyam eṣām
GS24pmbhasuu:10119: iti . nanu ca uktam ekavacanam prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . saṅkhyā nāma iyam parapradhānā
GS24pmbhasuu:10120: . saṅkhyeyam anayā viśeṣyam . yadi ca atra ekavacanam syāt saṅkhyeyam aviśeṣitam
GS24pmbhasuu:10121: syāt . iha tarhi ardhatṛtīyāḥ droṇāḥ iti ayam droṇaśabdaḥ samudāye pravṛttaḥ avayave
GS24pmbhasuu:10122: na upapadyate . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . samudāyeṣu api śabdāḥ pravṛttāḥ avayaveṣu api vartante.
GS24pmbhasuu:10123: tad yathā . pūrve pañcālāḥ uttare pañcālāḥ tailam bhuktam ghṛtaṃ bhuktam śuklaḥ nīlaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10124: kapilaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ iti . evam ayam samudāye droṇaśabdaḥ pravṛttaḥ avayaveṣu api vartati
GS24pmbhasuu:10125: . kāmam tarhi anena eva hetunā yadā dvau droṇau ardhārḍhakam
GS24pmbhasuu:10126: ca kartavyam ardhatṛtīyāḥ droṇāḥ iti . na kartavyam . samudāyeṣu api hi śabdāḥ pravṛttāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10127: avayaveṣu api vartante. keṣu avayaveṣu . yaḥ avayavaḥ tam samudāyam na vyabhicarati
GS24pmbhasuu:10128: . kam ca samudāyam na vyabhicarati . ardhdroṇaḥ droṇam . ardhāḍhakam punaḥ vyabhicarati .
GS24pmbhasuu:10130: 719-724 dvitrāḥ tricaturāḥ iti kaḥ ayam samāsaḥ . bahuvrīhiḥ iti āha . kaḥ asya vigrahaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10131: . dvau vā trayaḥ vā iti . bhavet yadā bahūnām ānayanam tadā bahuvacanam upapannam
GS24pmbhasuu:10132: yadā tu khalu dvau ānīyete tadā na sidhyati . tadā api sidhyati . katham . ke cit tāvat āhuḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:10133: anirjñāte arthe bahuvacanam prayoktavyam iti . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:10134: kati bhavataḥ putrāḥ . kati bhavataḥ bhāryāḥ iti . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:10135: dvau vā iti ukte trayaḥ vā iti gamyate . trayaḥ vā iti ukte dvau vā iti gamyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:10136: sā eṣā pañcādhiṣṭhānā vāk . atra yuktam bahuvacanam . atha dvidaśāḥ tridaśāḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:10137: kaḥ ayam samāsaḥ . bahuvrīhiḥ iti āha . kaḥ asya vigrahaḥ . dviḥ daśa dviśaśāḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:10138: . saṅkhyāsamāse sujantatvāt saṅkhyāprasiddhiḥ . saṅkhyāsamāse sujantatvāt saṅkhyā
GS24pmbhasuu:10139: iti aprasiddhiḥ . na hi sujantā saṅkhyā asti . evam tarhi evam vigrahaḥ kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:10140: . dvau daśatau dvidaśāḥ iti . evam api atkārāntatvāt saṅkhyā iti aprasiddhiḥ . na
GS24pmbhasuu:10141: hi atkārāntā saṅkhyā asti . astu tarhi ayam eva vigrahaḥ dviḥ daśa dviśaśāḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10142: nanu ca uktam saṅkhyāsamāse sujantatvāt saṅkhyā iti aprasiddhiḥ iti . na vā asujantatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10143: . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . asujantatvāt . sujantā iti ucyate . na ca atra
GS24pmbhasuu:10144: sujantam paśyāmaḥ . kim punaḥ kāraṇam vākye suc dṛśyate samāse tu na dṛśyate . sujabhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10145: ahihitārthatvāt samāse . samāse sucaḥ abhāvaḥ . kim kāraṇam . ahihitārthatvāt . abhihitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10146: sujarthaḥ samāsena iti kṛtvā samāse suc na bhaviṣyati .kim ca bhoḥ sujarthe iti samāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10147: ucyate . na khalu sujarthe iti ucyate gamyate tu sujarthaḥ . katham . yāvatā saṅkhyeyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10148: yaḥ saṅkhyayā saṅkhyāyate saḥ ca kriyābhyāvṛttyarthaḥ . saḥ ca uktaḥ samāsena iti
GS24pmbhasuu:10149: kṛtvā samāse suc na bhaviṣyati . aśiṣyaḥ saṅkhyottarapadaḥ saṅkhyeyavābhidhyāyitvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10150: . aśiṣyaḥ saṅkhyottarapadaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ . kim kāraṇam . saṅkhyeyavābhidhyāyitvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:10151: saṅkhyeyam vārthaḥ ca abhidīyate . tatra anyapadārthe iti eva siddham . bhavet siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:10152: adhikaviṃśāḥ adhikatriṃśāḥ iti yatra etat vicāryate . viśatyādayaḥ daśadarthe vā
GS24pmbhasuu:10153: syuḥ parimāṇini vā iti . idam tu na sidhyati adhikadaśāḥ iti yatra niyogataḥ saṅkhyeye
GS24pmbhasuu:10154: eva vartate . atha upadaśāḥ iti kaḥ ayam samāsaḥ . bahuvrīhiḥ iti āha . kaḥ asya
GS24pmbhasuu:10155: vigrahaḥ . daśānām samīpe upadaśāḥ iti . kasya punaḥ sāmīpyam arthaḥ . upasya . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:10156: evam na anyapadārthaḥ bhavati . tatra prathānirdiṣṭam saṅkhyāgrahaṇam śakyam akartum
GS24pmbhasuu:10157: . matvarthe vā pūrvasya vidhānāt . atha vā matvarthe pūrvaḥ yogaḥ . amatvarthaḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:10158: ārambhaḥ . kababhāvārtham vā . atha va kap mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10162: ca aśiṣyaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ . kim kāraṇam . antarālapradhānābhidhānāt . diksamāse sahayoge
GS24pmbhasuu:10163: ca antarālam pradhānam ca abhidhīyate . tatra anyapadārthe iti eva siddham . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:10164: evam dakṣiṇapūrvā dik samānādhikaraṇalakṣaṇaḥ puṃvadbhāvaḥ na prāpnoti . adya punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10165: iyam sā eva dakṣiṇā sā eva pūrvā iti kṛtvā samānādhikaraṇalakṣaṇaḥ puṃvadbhāvaḥ siddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10166: bhavati . na sidhyati . bhāṣitapuṃskasya puṃvadbhāvaḥ . na ca etau bhāṣitapuṃskau
GS24pmbhasuu:10167: . nanu ca bhoḥ dakṣiṇaśabdaḥ pūrvaśabdaḥ ca puṃsi bhāṣyete . samānāyām ākṛtau yat
GS24pmbhasuu:10168: bhāṣitapuṃskam . ākṛtyantare ca etau bhāṣitapuṃskau . dakṣiṇā pūrvā iti dikśabdau
GS24pmbhasuu:10169: . dakṣiṇaḥ pūrvaḥ iti vyavasthāśabdau . yadi punaḥ dikśabdāḥ api vyavasthāśabdāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10170: syuḥ . katham yāni digapadiṣṭāni kāryāṇi . yadā diśaḥ vyavasthām vakṣyanti . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:10171: tari yaḥ yaḥ diśi vartate saḥ saḥ dikśabdaḥ ramaṇīyādiṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . ramaṇīyā
GS24pmbhasuu:10172: dik śobhanā dik iti . atha matam etat diśi dṛṣṭaḥ digdṛṣṭaḥ digdiṣṭaḥ śabdaḥ dikśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10173: diśam yaḥ na vyabhicarati iti ramaṇīyādiṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ na bhavati . puṃvadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10174: tu prāpnoti . evam tarhi sarvanāmnaḥ vṛttimātre puṃvadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ dakṣiṇottarapūrvāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:10175: iti evamartham . evam ca kṛtvā dik diksamāsasahayogayoḥ ca antarālapradhānābhidhānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10176: iti eva . nanu ca uktam dakṣiṇapūrvā dik samānādhikaraṇalakṣaṇaḥ puṃvadbhāvaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:10177: prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . sarvanāmnaḥ vṛttimātre puṃvadbhāvena parihṛtam . matvarthe
GS24pmbhasuu:10178: vā pūrvasya vidhānāt . atha vā matvarthe pūrvaḥ yogaḥ . amatvarthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10179: . kababhāvārtham vā . atha va kap mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10181: 727-728 tṛtīyāsaptamyanteṣu ca kriyābhidhānāt . tṛtīyāsaptamyanteṣu ca kriyābhidhānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10182: aśiṣyaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ . kim kāraṇam . kriyābhidhānāt . kriyā abhidhīyate . tatra anyapadārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:10183: iti eva siddham . na vā ekaśeṣapratiṣedhārtham . na vā aśiṣyaḥ . kim kāraṇam . ekaśeṣapratiṣedhārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:10184: idam vaktavyam . pūrvadīrghārtham ca . pūrvadīrghārtham ca idam vaktavyam . keśākeśi
GS24pmbhasuu:10185: . syāt etat prayojanam yadi niyogataḥ asya anena eva dīrghatvam syāt . atha idānīm
GS24pmbhasuu:10186: anyeṣām api dṛśyate iti dīrghatvam na prayojanam bhavati . matvarthe vā pūrvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10187: vidhānāt . atha va matvarthe pūrvaḥ yogaḥ . amatvarthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . kababhāvārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:10188: vā . atha va kap mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10190: 729-730 cārthe iti ucyate caḥ ca avyayam . tena samāsasya avyayasañjñā prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10191: na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . pāṭhena avyayasañjñā kriyate . na ca samāsaḥ tatra paṭhyate . pāṭhena
GS24pmbhasuu:10192: api avyayasañjñāyām satyām abhideheyavat liṅgavacanāni bhavanti . yaḥ ca iha arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10193: abhidhīyate na tasya liṅgasaṅkhyābhyām yogaḥ asti . na idam vācanikam aliṅgatā asaṅkhyatā
GS24pmbhasuu:10194: va . kim tarhi . svābhāvikam etat . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:10195: samānam īhamānānām adhīyānānām ca ke cit arthaiḥ yujyante apare na . na ca idānīm
GS24pmbhasuu:10196: kaḥ cit arthavān iti kṛtvā sarvaiḥ arthavadbhiḥ śakyam bhavitum kaḥ cit anarthakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10197: iti kṛtvā sarvaiḥ anarthakaiḥ . tatra kim asmābhiḥ śakyam kartum . yat prāk samāsāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10198: cārthasya liṅgasaṅkhyābhyām yogaḥ na asti samāse ca bhavati svābhāvikam etat . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:10199: vā āśrayataḥ liṅgavacanāni bhaviṣyanti . guṇavacanānām hi śabdānām āśrayataḥ liṅgavacanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:10202: śuklau kambalau śuklāḥ kambalāḥ iti . yat asau dravyam śritaḥ bhavati guṇaḥ tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10203: yat liṅgam vacanam ca tat guṇasya api bhavati . evam iha api yat asau dravyam śritaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10204: bhavati samāsaḥ tasya yat liṅgam vacanam ca tat samāsasya api bhaviṣyati . atha iha
GS24pmbhasuu:10205: kasmāt na bhavati . yājñikaḥ ca ayam vaiyākaraṇaḥ ca . kaṭhaḥ ca ayam bahvṛcaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:10206: . aukthikaḥ ca ayam mīmāṃsakaḥ ca iti . śeṣaḥ iti vartate . aśeṣatvāt na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:10207: . yadi śeṣaḥ iti vartate upāsnātam sthūlasiktam tūṣṇīṅgaṅgam mahāhradam droṇam cet
GS24pmbhasuu:10208: aśakaḥ gantum mā tvā tāptām kṛtākṛte iti etat na sidhyati . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:10211: 731-741 cārthe dvandvavacane asamāse api cārthasampratyayāt aniṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ . cārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:10212: dvandvavacane asamāse api cārthasampratyayāt aniṣṭam prāpnoti . ahaḥ ahaḥ nayamānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10213: gām aśvam puruṣam paśum vaivasvataḥ na tṛpyati surāyāḥ iva durmadī indraḥ tvaṣṭā
GS24pmbhasuu:10214: varuṇaḥ vāyuḥ ādityaḥ iti . siddham tu yugapadadhikaraṇavacane dvandvavacanāt . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:10215: etat . katham . yugapadadhikaraṇavacane dvandvaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . tatra puṃvadbhāvapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10216: . tatra etasmin lakṣaṇe puṃvadbhāvasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . paṭvīmṛdvyau . samānādhikaraṇalakṣaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10217: puṃvadbhāvaḥ prāpnoti . vipratiṣiddheṣu ca anupapattiḥ . vipratiṣiddheṣu yugapadadhikaraṇavacatāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10218: anupapattiḥ . śītoṣṇe sukhaduḥkhe jananamaraṇe . kim kāraṇam . sukhapratighātena
GS24pmbhasuu:10219: hi duḥkham duḥkapratighātena ca sukham . yat tāvat ucyate tatra puṃvadbhāvapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10221: atha iha kasmāt na bhavati . darśanīyāyāḥ mātā darśanīyāmātā iti . atha matam etat
GS24pmbhasuu:10222: prāk samāsāt yatra sāmānādhikaraṇyam tatra puṃvadbhāvaḥ bhavati iti iha api na doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10223: bhavati . yad api ucyate vipratiṣiddheṣu ca anupapattiḥ iti . sarve eva hi śabdāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10224: vipratiṣiddhāḥ . iha api plakṣanyagrodhau iti plakṣaśabdaḥ prayujyamānaḥ plakṣārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:10225: sampratyāyayati nyagrodhārtham nivartayati . nyagrodhaśabdaḥ prayujyamānaḥ nyagrodhārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:10226: sampratyāyayati plakṣārtham nivartayati . atra cet yuktā yugapat adhikaraṇvacanatā
GS24pmbhasuu:10227: dṛśyate iha api yuktā dṛśyatām . evam api śabdapaurvāparyaprayogāt arthapaurvāparyābhidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:10228: . śabdapaurvāparyaprayogāt arthapaurvāparyābhidhānam prāpnoti . ataḥ kim . yugapatadhikaraṇavacanatāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10229: anupapattiḥ . plakṣanyagrodhau plakṣanyagrodhāḥ iti . yatha eva hi śabdānām paurvāparyam
GS24pmbhasuu:10230: tadvat arthānām api bhavitavyam . śabdapaurvāparyaprayogāt arthapaurvāparyābhidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:10233: plakṣanyagrodhau plakṣanyagrodhāḥ iti . plakṣaśabdaḥ sārthakaḥ nivṛttaḥ nyagrodhaśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10234: upasthitaḥ ekārthaḥ tasya ekārthatvāt ekavacanam eva prāpnoti . vigrahe tu yugapadvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:10235: jñāpakam yugapadvacanasya . vigrahe khalu api yugapadvacanatā dṛśyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:10236: dyavā ha kṣamā . dyavā cit asmai pṛthivī namete iti . kim etat . yugapadadhikaraṇavacanatāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10237: upodbalakam . vigrahe kila nāma yugapadadhikaraṇavacanatā syāt kim punaḥ samāse .
GS24pmbhasuu:10238: samudāyāt siddham . samudāyāt siddham etat . kim etat samudāyāt siddham iti . dvivacanabahuvacanaprasiddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10239: iti coditam . tasya ayam parihāraḥ . samudāyāt siddham iti cet na ekārthatvāt samudāyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10240: . samudāyāt siddham iti cet tat na . kim kāraṇam . ekārthatvāt samudāyasya . ekārthāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10241: hi samudāyāḥ bhavanti . tat yathā śatam yūtham vanam iti . na aikārthyam . na ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:10242: ekārthaḥ . kim tarhi . dvyarthaḥ bahvarthaḥ ca . plakṣaḥ api dvyarthaḥ nyagrodhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10243: api dvyarthaḥ . yadi tarhi plakṣaḥ api dvyarthaḥ nyagrodhaḥ api dvyarthaḥ tayoḥ anekārthatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10244: bahuvacanaprasaṅgaḥ . tayoḥ anekārthatvāt bahuṣu bahuvacanam iti bahuvacanam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:10245: . tayoḥ anekārthatvāt bahuvacanaprasaṅgaḥ iti cet na bahutvābhāvāt . tayoḥ anekārthatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10246: bahuvacanaprasaṅgaḥ iti cet tat na . kim kāraṇam . bahutvābhāvāt . na atra bahutvam
GS24pmbhasuu:10247: asti . kim ucyate bahutvābhāvāt iti yāvatā idānīm eva uktam plakṣaḥ api dvyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10248: nyagrodhaḥ api dvyarthaḥ iti . yābhyām eva atra ekaḥ dvyarthaḥ tābhyām eva aparaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10249: api . yadi evam anyavācakena anyasya vacanānupapattiḥ . anyavācakena śabdena anyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10250: vacanam na upapadyate . anyavācakena anyasya vacanānupapattiḥ iti cet plakṣasya nyagrodhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10251: nyagrodhasya plakṣatvāt svaśabdena abhidhānam . anyavācakena anyasya vacanānupapattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10252: iti cet ucyate tat na . kim kāraṇam . plakṣasya nyagrodhatvāt nyagrodhasya plakṣatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10253: svaśabdena abhidhānam . plakṣaḥ api nyagrodhaḥ nyagrodhaḥ api plakṣaḥ . katham punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10254: plakṣaḥ api nyagrodhaḥ nyagrodhaḥ api plakṣaḥ syāt yāvatā kāraṇāt dravye śabdaniveśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10255: . kāraṇāt dravye śabdaniveśaḥ iti cet tulyakāraṇatvāt siddham . kāraṇāt dravye śabdaniveśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10257: tat na tulyakāraṇatvāt siddham . tulyam hi kāraṇam . yadi tāvat prakṣarati iti plakṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10258: syān nyagrodhe api etat bhavati . tathā yadi nyak rohati iti nyagrodhaḥ plakṣe api
GS24pmbhasuu:10259: etat bhavati . darśanam vai hetuḥ na ca nyagrodhe plakṣaśabdaḥ dṛśyate . darśanam
GS24pmbhasuu:10260: hetuḥ iti cet tulyam . darśanam hetuḥ iti cet tulyam etat bhavati . plakṣe api nyagrodhaśabdaḥ dṛśyatām . tulyam
GS24pmbhasuu:10261: hi kāraṇam . na vai loke eṣaḥ sampratyayaḥ bhavati . na hi plakṣaḥ ānīyatām iti ukte
GS24pmbhasuu:10262: nyragrodhaḥ ānīyate . tadviṣayam ca . tadviṣayam ca etat draṣṭavyam plakṣasya nyagrodhatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:10263: . kiṃviṣayam . dvandvaviṣayam . yuktam punaḥ yat niyataviṣayāḥ nāma śabdāḥ syuḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10264: bāḍham yuktam . anyatra api tadviṣayadarśanāt . anyatra api hi niyataviṣayāḥ śabdāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10266: samāne rakte varṇe gauḥ lohitaḥ iti bhavati āsvaḥ śoṇaḥ iti . samāne ca kāle varṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:10267: gauḥ kṛṣṇaḥ iti bhavati aśvaḥ hemaḥ iti . samāne ca śukle varṇe gauḥ śvetaḥ iti bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:10268: aśvaḥ karkaḥ iti . yadi tarhi plakṣaḥ api nyagraodhaḥ nyagrodhaḥ api plakṣaḥ ekena
GS24pmbhasuu:10269: uktatvāt aparasya prayogaḥ anupapannaḥ . ekena uktatvāt tasya arthasya aparasya prayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10270: na upapadyate . plakṣeṇa nyagrodhasya nyagrodhaprayogaḥ . ekena uktatvāt aparasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10271: prayogaḥ anupapannaḥ iti cet anuktatvāt plakṣeṇa nyagrodhasya nyagrodhaprayogaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10272: ekena uktatvāt aparasya prayogaḥ anupapannaḥ iti cet tat na . kim kāraṇam . anuktatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10273: plakṣeṇa nyagrodhasya nyagrodhaprayogaḥ . anuktaḥ plakṣeṇa nyagrodhārthaḥ iti kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:10274: nyagrodhaśabdaḥ prayujyate . katham anuktaḥ yāvatā idānīm eva uktam plakṣaḥ api nyagrodhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10275: nyagrodhaḥ api plakṣaḥ iti . sahabhūtau etau anyonyasya artham āhatuḥ na pṛthagbhūtau
GS24pmbhasuu:10276: . kim punaḥ kāraṇam sahabhūtau etau anyonyasya artham āhatuḥ na pṛthagbhūtau . abhidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:10277: punaḥ svābhāvikam . svābhāvikam abhidhānam . atha vā iha kau cit prāthamakalpikau
GS24pmbhasuu:10278: plakṣanyagrodhau kau cit kriyayā vā guṇena va plakṣaḥ iva ayam plakṣaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10279: nyagrodhaḥ iva ayam nyagrodhaḥ iti . tatra plakṣau iti ukte sandehaḥ syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:10280: kim imau plakṣau āhosvit plakṣanyagrodhau iti . tatra asandehārtham nyagrodhaśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10281: prayujyate . iyam yugapadadhikaraṇavacanata nāma duḥkhā ca durupapādā ca . yat ca
GS24pmbhasuu:10282: api asyā nibandhanam uktam dyāvā ha kṣāmā iti tat api chāndasam . tatra supām supaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10283: bhavanti iti eva siddham . sūtram ca bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:10284: cārthe dvandvavacane asamāse api cārthasampratyayāt aniṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10285: doṣaḥ . iha ce dvandve iti iyatā siddham . katham punaḥ ce nāma vṛttiḥ syāt . śabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10286: hi eṣaḥ . śabde asambhavāt arthe kāryam vijñāsyate . saḥ ayam evam siddhe sati yat
GS24pmbhasuu:10287: arthagrahaṇam karoti tasya etat prayojanam evam yathā vijñāyeta cena kṛtaḥ artaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10288: cārthaḥ iti . kaḥ punaḥ cena kṛtaḥ arthaḥ . samuccayaḥ anvācayaḥ itaretarayogaḥ samāhāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10289: iti . samuccayaḥ . plakṣaḥ ca iti ukte gamyate etat nyagrodhaḥ ca iti . anvācayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10290: . plakṣaḥ ca iti ukte gamyate etat sāpaekṣaḥ ayam prayujyate iti . itaretarayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10291: . plakṣaḥ ca nyagrodhaḥ ca iti ukte gamyate etat plakṣaḥ api nyagrodhasahāyaḥ nyagrodhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10292: api plakṣasahāyaḥ iti . samāhāre api kriyate plakṣanyagrodham iti . tatra ayam api
GS24pmbhasuu:10293: arthaḥ dvandvaikavadbhāvaḥ na paṭhitavyaḥ bhavati . samāhārasya ekatvāt eva siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:10295: 742-743 ekādaśa dvādaśa iti kaḥ ayam samāsaḥ . ekādīnām daśādibhiḥ dvandvaḥ . ekādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:10296: daśādibhiḥ dvandvaḥ samāsaḥ . ekādīnām daśādibhiḥ dvandvaḥ iti cet viṃśatyādiṣu vacanaprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10297: . ekādīnām daśādibhiḥ dvandvaḥ iti cet viṃśatyādiṣu vacanam prāpnoti . ekaviṃśatiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10298: dvāviṃśatiḥ . siddham tu adhikāntā saṅkhya saṅkhyayā samānādhikaraṇādhikāre adhikalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10299: ca . siddham etat . katham . samānādhikaraṇādhikāre vaktavyam adhikāntā saṅkhya saṅkhyayā
GS24pmbhasuu:10300: saha samasyate adhikaśabdasya ca lopaḥ bhavati iti . ekādhikā viṃśatiḥ ekaviṃśatiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10301: dvyadhikā viṃśatiḥ dvāviṃśatiḥ . yadi samānādhikaraṇaḥ svaraḥ na sidhyati . yat hi
GS24pmbhasuu:10302: tat saṅkhyā pūrvapadam prakṛtisvaram bhavati iti dvandve iti tat . kim punaḥ kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:10303: dvandve iti evam tat . iha mā bhūt śatasahasram iti . astu tarhi dvandvaḥ . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:10304: ca uktam ekādīnām daśādibhiḥ dvandvaḥ iti cet viṃśatyādiṣu vacanaprasaṅgaḥ iti. na
GS24pmbhasuu:10305: eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . sarvaḥ dvandvaḥ vibhāṣā ekavat bhavati . yadā tarhi ekavacanam tadā
GS24pmbhasuu:10306: napuṃsakaliṅgam prāpnoti . liṅgam aśiṣyam lokāśrayatvāt liṅgasya .
GS24pmbhasuu:10308: 743-744 kimartham idam ucyate . upasarjanasya pūrvavacanam paraprayoganivṛttyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:10309: . upasarjanasya pūrvavacanam kriyate paraprayogaḥ mā bhūt iti . na vā aniṣṭadarśanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10310: . na vā etat prayojanam asti . kim kāraṇam . aniṣṭadarśanāt . na hi kim cit aniṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:10311: dṛśyate . na hi kaḥ cit rājapuruṣaḥ iti prayoktavye puruṣarājaḥ iti prayuṅkte . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:10312: ca aniṣṭam drśyete tataḥ yatnārtham syāt . atha yatra dve ṣaṣṭhyante bhavataḥ kasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10313: tatra pradhānasya pūrvanipātaḥ na bhavati . rājñaḥ puruṣasya rājapuruṣasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10314: ṣaṣṭhyantayoḥ samāse arthābhedāt pradhānasya apūrvanipātaḥ . ṣaṣṭhyantayoḥ samāse
GS24pmbhasuu:10315: arthābhedāt pradhānasya pūrvanipātaḥ na bhaviṣyati . evam na ca idam akṛtam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:10316: upasarjanam pūrvam iti arthaḥ ca abhinnaḥ iti kṛtvā pradhānasya pūrvanipātaḥ na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:10318: 744-746 kim ayam tantram taranirdeśaḥ āhosvit atantram . kim ca ataḥ . yadi tantram
GS24pmbhasuu:10319: dvayoḥ niyamaḥ bahuṣu aniyamaḥ . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . śaṅkhadundubhivīṅānām iti na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:10320: . dundubhiśabdasya api pūrvnipātaḥ prāpnoti . atha atantram mṛdaṅgaśaṅkhatūṇavāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10321: pṛthak nadanti saṃsadi. prāsāde dhanapatirāmakeśavānām iti etat na sidhyati . yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:10322: icchasi tathā astu . astu tāvat tantram . nanu ca uktam dvayoḥ niyamaḥ bahuṣu aniyamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10323: iti . tatra śaṅkhadundubhivīṅānām iti na sidhyati . dundubhiśabdasya api pūrvnipātaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10324: prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yat etat alpāctaram iti tat alpāc iti vakṣyāmi . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:10325: vā punaḥ astu atantram . nanu ca uktam mṛdaṅgaśaṅkhatūṇavāḥ pṛthak nadanti saṃsadi.
GS24pmbhasuu:10326: prāsāde dhanapatirāmakeśavānām iti etat na sidhyati iti . atantre taranirdeśe śaṅkhatūṇavayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10327: mṛdaṅgena samāsaḥ . atantre taranirdeśe śaṅkhatūṇavayoḥ mṛdaṅgena samāsaḥ kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:10328: . śaṅkhaḥ ca tūṇavaḥ ca śaṇkhatūṇavau . mṛdaṅgaḥ ca śaṇkhatūṇavau ca mṛdaṅgaśaṅkhatūṇavāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10329: . rāmaḥ ca keśavaḥ ca rāmakeśavau dhanapatiḥ ca rāmakeśavau ca dhanapatirāmakeśavāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10330: teṣām dhanapatirāmakeśavānām iti . atha yatra bahūnām pūrvanipātaprasaṅgaḥ kim tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:10331: ekasya niyamaḥ bhavati ahosvit aviśeṣeṇa . anekaprāptau ekasya niyamaḥ aniyamaḥ śeṣeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:10332: . anekaprāptau ekasya niyamaḥ aniyamaḥ śeṣeṣu . paṭumṛduśuklāḥ paṭuśuklamṛdavaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10334: 746-747 ṛtunakṣatrāṇām ānupūrvyeṇa samānākṣarāṇām . ṛtunakṣatrāṇām ānupūrvyeṇa samānākṣarāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:10335: pūrvanipātaḥ vaktavyaḥ . śiśiravasantau udagayanasthau kṛttikārohiṇyaḥ . abhyarhitam
GS24pmbhasuu:10336: . abhyarhitam pūrvam nipatati iti vaktavyam . mātāpitarau śraddhāmedhe . laghvakṣaram
GS24pmbhasuu:10337: . laghvakṣaram pūrvam nipatati iti vaktavyam . kuśakāśam śaraśīryam . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:10338: sarvatra eva abhyarhitam pūrvam nipatati iti vaktavyam . laghvakṣarāt api iti . śraddhātapasī
GS24pmbhasuu:10339: dīkṣātapasī . varṇānām ānupūrvyeṇa . varṇānām ānupūrvyeṇa pūrvanipātaḥ bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:10340: vaktavyam . brāhmaṇakṣatriyaviṭśūdrāḥ . bhrātuḥ ca jyāyasaḥ . bhrātuḥ ca jyāyasaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10341: pūrvanipātaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . yudhiṣṭhirārjunau . saṅkhyāyāḥ alpīyasaḥ . saṅkhyāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10342: alpīyasaḥ pūrvanipātaḥ vaktavyaḥ . ekādaśa dvādaśa . dharmādiṣu ubhayam . dharmādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:10343: ubhayam pūrvam nipatati iti vaktavyam . dharmārthau arthadharmau kāmārthau arthakāmau
GS24pmbhasuu:10347: upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . viśvadevaḥ viśvayasāḥ dviputraḥ dvibhāryaḥ . atha yatra
GS24pmbhasuu:10348: saṅkhyāsarvanāmnoḥ eva bahurvīhiḥ kasya tatra pūrvanipātena bhavitavyam . paratvāt saṅkhyāyāḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:10349: dvyanyāya tryanyāya . vā priyasya . vā priyasya pūrvanipātaḥ vaktavyaḥ . priyaguḍaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10350: guḍapriyaḥ . saptamyāḥ pūrvanipāte gaḍvādibhyaḥ paravacanam . saptamyāḥ pūrvanipāte
GS24pmbhasuu:10351: gaḍvādibhyaḥ parā saptamībhavati iti vaktavyam . gaḍukaṇṭhaḥ gaḍuśirāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10353: 748-749 niṣṭhāyāḥ pūrvanipāte jātikālasukhādibhyaḥ paravacanam . niṣṭhāyāḥ pūrvanipāte
GS24pmbhasuu:10354: jātikālasukhādibhyaḥ parā niṣṭhā bhavati iti vaktavyam . śārṅgajagdhī palāṇḍubhakṣitī
GS24pmbhasuu:10355: māsajātā saṃvatsarajātā sukhajātā duḥkhajātā . na vā uttarapadasya antodāttavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:10356: jñāpakam parabhāvasya . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam . uttarapadasya antodāttavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:10357: jñāpakam parabhāvasya . yat ayam jātikālasukhādibhyaḥ parasyāḥ niṣṭhāyāḥ uttarapadasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10358: antodāttatvam śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ parā atra niṣṭhā bhavati iti . pratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:10359: tu pūrvanipātaprasaṅgaḥ tasmāt rājadantādiṣu pāṭhaḥ . pratiṣedhe tu pūrvanipātaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10360: prāpnoti . akṛtamitapratipannāḥ iti . tasmāt rājadantādiṣu pāṭhaḥ kartavyaḥ . na
GS24pmbhasuu:10361: kartavyaḥ . atra api pratiṣedhavacanam jñāpakam parā niṣṭhā bhavati iti . praharaṇārthebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10362: ca . praharaṇārthebhyaḥ ca pare niṣṭhāsaptamyau bhavataḥ iti vaktavyam . asyudyataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10363: musalodyataḥ asipāṇiḥ daṇḍapāṇiḥ . dvandve ghi ajādyantam vipratiṣedhena . dvandve
GS24pmbhasuu:10364: ghi iti asmāt ajādyantam iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena . dvandve ghi iti asya avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10365: paṭuguptau . ajādyadantam iti asya avakāśaḥ uṣṭrakharau . iha ubhayam prāpnoti indrāgnī
GS24pmbhasuu:10366: . ajādyadantam iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena . ubhābhyām alpāctaram . ubhābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:10367: alpāctaram iti etat bhavati . dvandve ghi iti asya avakāśaḥ paṭuguptau . alpāctaram
GS24pmbhasuu:10368: iti asya avakāśaḥ vāgdṛṣadau . iha ubhayam prāpnoti vāgagnī . alpāctaram iti etat
GS24pmbhasuu:10369: bhavati vipratiṣedhena . ajādyadantam iti asya avakāśaḥ uṣṭrakharau . alpāctaram
GS24pmbhasuu:10370: iti asya avakāśaḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti vāgindrau . alpāctaram iti etat
GS24pmbhasuu:10373: 750 kaḍārādayaḥ iti vaktavyam iha api yathā syāt . gaḍulaśāṇḍilyaḥ śāṇḍilyagaḍulaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10374: khaṇḍavātsyaḥ vatsyakaṇḍaḥ . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . bahuvacananirdeśāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10377: 751-762 anabhihite iti ucyate . kim idam anabhihitam nāma . uktam nirdiṣṭam abhihitam
GS24pmbhasuu:10378: iti anarthāntaram . yāvat brūyāt anukte anirdiṣṭe iti tāvat anabhihite iti . anabhihitavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:10379: anarthakam anyatra api vihitasya abhāvāt abhihite . anabhihitavacanam anarthakam
GS24pmbhasuu:10380: . kim kāraṇam . anyatra api vihitasya abhāvāt abhihite . anyatra api abhihite vihitam
GS24pmbhasuu:10381: na bhavati . kva anyatra . citraguḥ śabalaguḥ . bahuvrīhiṇā uktatvāt matvarthasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10382: matvarthīyaḥ na bhavati . gargāḥ vatsāḥ vidāḥ urvāḥ . yañañbhyām uktatvāt apatyārthasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10383: nyāyyotpattiḥ na bhavati . saptaparṇaḥ aṣṭāpadamiti . samāsena uktatvāt vīpsāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10384: dvirvacanam na bhavati . yat tāvat ucyate citraguḥ śabalguḥ bahuvrīhiṇā uktatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10385: matvarthasya matvarthīyaḥ na bhavati iti . astinā sāmānādhikaraṇye matup vidhīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:10386: . na ca atra astinā sāmānādhikaraṇyam . yat api ucyate gargāḥ vatsāḥ vidāḥ urvāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10387: yañañbhyām uktatvāt apatyārthasya nyāyyotpattiḥ na bhavati iti . samarthānām prathamāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10388: vā iti vartate . na ca etat samarthānām prathamam . kiṃ tarhi . dvitīyam arthamupasaṃkrāntam
GS24pmbhasuu:10389: . yat api ucyate saptaparṇaḥ aṣṭāpadam iti samāsena uktatvāt vīpsāyāḥ dvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:10390: na bhavati iti . yat atra vīpsāyuktam na adaḥ prayujyate . kim punaḥ tat . parvaṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:10391: parvaṇi sapta parṇāni asya . paṅktau paṅktau aṣṭau padāni iti . śnambahujakakṣu tarhi . śnam :
GS24pmbhasuu:10392: bhinatti chinatti . śnamā uktatvāt kartṛtvasya kartari śap na bhavati . bahuc : bahukṛtam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10393: bahubhinnam iti . bahucā uktatvāt īṣadasmāpteḥ kalpabādayaḥ na bhavanti iti . akac : uccakaiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10394: nīcakaiḥ iti . akacā uktatvāt kutsādīnām kādayaḥ na bhavanti . nanu ca śnambahujakacaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10395: apavādāḥ te apavādatvāt bādhakāḥ bhaviṣyanti . śnambahujakakṣu nānādeśatvāt utsargāpratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10396: . samānadeśaiḥ apavādaiḥ utsargāṇām bādhanam bhavati . nānādeśatvāt na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10397: kim punaḥ iha akartavyaḥ anabhihitādhikāraḥ kriyate āhosvit anyatra kartavyaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:10398: kriyate . iha akartavyaḥ kriyate . eṣaḥ eva hi nyāyyaḥ pakṣaḥ yat abhihite vihitam
GS24pmbhasuu:10399: na syāt . anabhitaḥ tu vibhaktyarthaḥ tasmāt anabhihitavacanam . anabhihitaḥ tu vibhaktyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10400: . kaḥ punaḥ vibhaktyarthaḥ . ekatvādayaḥ vibhaktyarthāḥ teṣu anabhihiteṣu karmādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10401: bhihitāḥ vibhaktīnām utpattau nimittatvāya mā bhūvan iti . tasmāt anabhihitavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:10402: . tasmāt anabhihitādhikāraḥ kriyate . avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam ekatvādayaḥ vibhaktyarthāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10403: iti . abhihite prathamābhāvaḥ . yaḥ hi manyate karmādayaḥ vibhaktyarthāḥ teṣu abhihiteṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:10404: sāmarthyāt me vibhaktīnām utpattiḥ na bhaviṣyati iti prathamā tasya na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10405: kva . vṛkṣaḥ plakṣaḥ .kiṃ kāraṇam . prātipadikena uktaḥ prātipadikārthaḥ iti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:10406: kva cit prātipadikena anuktaḥ prātipadikārthaḥ ucyate ca prathamā . sā vacanāt bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:10407: . tava eva tu khalu eṣaḥ doṣaḥ yasya te ekatvādayaḥ vibhaktyarthāḥ abhihite prathamābhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10408: iti . prathamā te na prāpnoti . kva . pacati odanam devadattaḥ iti . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:10409: . tiṅā uktāḥ ekatvādayaḥ iti . anabhihitādhikāram ca tvam karoṣi parigaṇanam ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:10410: na kva cit tiṅā ekatvādīnām anabhidhānam ucyate ca prathamā . sā vacanāt bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:10411: . nanu ca iha anabhidhānam vṛkṣaḥ plakṣaḥ iti . atra api abhidhānam asti . katham . vakṣyati etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:10412: astiḥ bhavantīparaḥ prathamapuruṣaḥ aprayujyamānaḥ api asti iti . vṛkṣaḥ plakṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10413: . asti iti gamyate . tava eva tu khalu eṣaḥ doṣaḥ yasya te karmādayaḥ vibhaktyārthāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10414: abhihite prathamābhāvaḥ iti . prathamā te prāpnoti . kva . kaṭam karoti bhīṣmam udāram
GS24pmbhasuu:10415: śobhanam darśanīyam iti . kaṭaśabdāt utpadyamānayā dvitīyayā abhihitam karma iti
GS24pmbhasuu:10416: kṛtvā bhīṣādibhyaḥ dvitīyā na prāpnoti . kā tarhi prāpnoti . prathamā . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:10417: . kṛtaḥ kaṭaḥ bhīṣmaḥ udāraḥ śobhanaḥ darśanīyaḥ iti . karoteḥ utpadyamānena ktena abhihitam
GS24pmbhasuu:10418: karma iti kṛtvā bhīṣmādibhyaḥ dvitīyā na bhavati . kā tarhi . prathamā bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:10419: na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na hi mama anabhihitādhikāraḥ asti na api parigaṇanam . sāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10420: me vibhaktīnām utpattiḥ bhaviṣyati . asti ca sāmarthyam . kim . karmaviśeṣaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10421: . atha vā kaṭaḥ api karma bhīṣmādayaḥ api . tatra karmaṇi iti eva siddham . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:10422: vā kaṭaḥ eva karma tat sāmānādhikaraṇyāt bhīṣmādibhyaḥ dvitīyā bhaviṣyati . asti
GS24pmbhasuu:10423: khalvapi viśeṣaḥ kaṭaṃ karoti bhīṣmamudāram śobhanam darśanīyam iti ca kṛtaḥ kaṭo
GS24pmbhasuu:10424: bhīṣmaḥ udāraḥ śobhanaḥ darśanīyaḥ iti ca . karoteḥ utpadyamānaḥ ktaḥ anavayavena
GS24pmbhasuu:10425: sarvam karma abhidhatte . kaṭaśabdāt punaḥ utpadyamānayā dvitīyayā yat kaṭastham
GS24pmbhasuu:10426: karma tat śakyamabhidhātum na hi karmaviśeṣaḥ . tava eva tu khalu eṣaḥ doṣaḥ yasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10427: te ekatvādayaḥ vibhaktyarthāḥ abhihite prathamābhāvaḥ iti . prathamā te na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:10428: . kva . ekaḥ dvau bahavaḥ iti . kim kāraṇam . prātipadikena uktāḥ ekatvādayaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:10429: . karmādiṣu api vai vibhaktyartheṣu avaśyam ekatvādayaḥ nimittatvena upādeyāḥ . karmaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10430: evatve karmaṇaḥ dvitve karmaṇaḥ bahutve iti . na ca ekatvādīnām ekatvādayaḥ santi
GS24pmbhasuu:10431: . atha santi mama api santi . teṣu anabhihiteṣu prathamā bhaviṣyati . atha vā ubhayavacanāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10432: hyete . dravyam ca āhuḥ guṇam ca . yatsthaḥ asau guṇaḥ tasya anuktāḥ ekatvādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10433: iti kṛtvā prathamā bhaviṣyati . atha vā saṅkhyā nāma iyam parapradhānā . saṃkhyeyam
GS24pmbhasuu:10434: anayā viśeṣyam . yadi ca atra prathamā na syāt saṅkhyeyam aviśeṣitam syāt . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:10435: vā vakṣyati tatra vacanagrahaṇasya prayojanam ukteṣu api ekatvādiṣu prathamā yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:10436: syāt iti . atha vā samayāt bhaviṣyati . yadi sāmayakī na niyogataḥ anyāḥ kasmāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:10437: bhavanti . karmādīnām abhāvāt . ṣaṣṭhī tarhi prāpnoti . śeṣalakṣaṇā ṣaṣṭhī aśeṣatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10438: na bhaviṣyati . evam api vyatikaraḥ prāpnoti . ekasmin api dvivacanabahuvacane prāpnutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10439: . dvayoḥ api ekavavacanabahuvacane prāpnutaḥ . bahuṣu api ekavacanadvivacane prāpnutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10443: parisaṅkhyānam kartavyam . tiṅ . kriyate kaṭaḥ . kṛt . kṛtaḥ kaṭaḥ . taddhita . aupagavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10444: kāpaṭavaḥ . samāsa . citraguḥ śabalaguḥ . utsarge hi prātipadikasāmānādhikaraṇye
GS24pmbhasuu:10445: vibhaktivacanam . utsarge hi prātipadikasāmānādhikaraṇye vibhaktiḥ vaktavyā . kva
GS24pmbhasuu:10446: . kaṭam karoti bhīṣmam udāram śobhanam darśanīyam iti . kaṭaśabdāt utpadyamānayā
GS24pmbhasuu:10447: dvitīyayā abhihitam karma iti kṛtvā bhīṣmādibhyaḥ dvitīyā na prāpnoti . kā tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:10448: syāt . ṣaṣṭhī . śeṣalakṣaṇā ṣaṣṭhī . aśeṣatvāt na bhaviṣyati . anyāḥ api na prāpnuvanti
GS24pmbhasuu:10449: . kim kāraṇam . karmādīn āmabhāvāt . samayaśca kṛtaḥ ne kevalā prakṛtiḥ proktavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:10450: na kevalaḥ pratyayaḥ iti . na cānyā utpadyamānā etam abhisambandham utsahante vaktum
GS24pmbhasuu:10451: iti kṛtvā dvitīyā bhaviṣyati . atha vā kaṭaḥ api karma bhīṣmādayaḥ api . tatra karmaṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:10452: iti eva siddham . atha vā kaṭaḥ eva karma . tatsāmānādhikaraṇyāt bhīṣmādibhyaḥ dvitīyā
GS24pmbhasuu:10455: 764-767 dvayoḥ kriyayoḥ kārake anyatareṇa abhihite vibhaktyabhāvaprasaṅgaḥ . dvayoḥ kriyayoḥ kārake anyatareṇa abhihite vibhaktiḥ na prāpnoti . kva . prāsāde āste ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10456: śayane āste iti . kim kāraṇam . sadipratyayena abhihitam adhikaraṇam iti kṛtvā saptamī
GS24pmbhasuu:10457: na prāpnoti . na vā anyatareṇa anabhidhānāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . anyatareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:10458: anabhidhānāt . anyatareṇa atra anabhidhānam . sadipratyayena bhidhānam āsipratyayena
GS24pmbhasuu:10459: anabhidhānam . yataḥ anabhidhānam tadāśrayā saptamī bhaviṣyati . kutaḥ na khalu etat
GS24pmbhasuu:10460: sati abhidhāne ca anabhidhāne ca anabhihitāśrayā saptamī bhaviṣyati na punaḥ abhihitāśrayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10461: pratiṣedhaḥ iti . anabhihite hi vidhānam . anabhihite hi saptamī vidhīyate na abhihite
GS24pmbhasuu:10462: pratiṣedhaḥ . yadi api tāvat atra etat śakyate vaktum yatra anyā ca anyā ca kriyā
GS24pmbhasuu:10463: yatra tu khalu sā eva kriyā tatra katham . āsane āste . śayane śete iti . atra api
GS24pmbhasuu:10464: anyatvam asti . kutaḥ . kālabhedāt sādhanabhedāt ca . ekasya atra āseḥ āsiḥ sādhanam
GS24pmbhasuu:10465: sarvakālaḥ ca pratyayaḥ . aparasya bāhyam sādhanam vartamānakālaḥ ca pratyayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10466: kim punaḥ dravyam sādhanam āhosvit guṇaḥ . kim ca ataḥ . yadi dravyam sādhanam na
GS24pmbhasuu:10467: etat anyat bhavati abhihitāt . atha hi guṇaḥ sādhanam bhavati etat anyat abhihitāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10468: . anyaḥ hi sadiguṇaḥ anyaḥ ca āsiguṇaḥ . kiṃ punaḥ sādhanam nyāyyam . guṇaḥ iti āha
GS24pmbhasuu:10469: . katham jñāyate . evam hi kaḥ cit kam cit pṛcchati . kva devadattaḥ iti . saḥ tasmai
GS24pmbhasuu:10470: ācaṣṭe . asau vṛkṣe iti . katarasmin . yaḥ tiṣṭhati iti . saḥ vṛkṣaḥ adhikaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:10471: bhūtvā anyena śabdena abhisambadhyamānaḥ kartā sampadyate . dravye punaḥ sādhane
GS24pmbhasuu:10472: sati yat karma karma eva syāt yat karaṇam karaṇam eva yat adhikaraṇam adhikaraṇam eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:10475: anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . prathamāvidhānasya anavakāśatvāt . anavakāśā prathamā
GS24pmbhasuu:10476: . sā vacanāt bhaviṣyati. sāvakāśā prathamā . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . akārakam . vṛkṣaḥ plakṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10477: iti . avakāśaḥ akārakam iti cet na astiḥ bhavantīparaḥ prathamapuruṣaḥ aprayujyamānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10478: api asti . avakāśaḥ akārakam iti cet tat na . kim kāraṇam . astiḥ bhavantīparaḥ prathamapuruṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10479: aprayujyamānaḥ api asti iti gamyate . vṛkṣaḥ plakṣaḥ . asti iti gamyate. vipratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10480: vā prathamābhāvaḥ. atha vā dvitīyādayaḥ kriyantām prathamā vā iti prathamā bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:10481: vipratiṣedhena . dvitīyādīnām avakāśaḥ kaṭam karoti bhīṣmam udāram śobhanamdarśanīyam
GS24pmbhasuu:10482: iti . prathamāyāḥ avakāśaḥ akārakam vṛkṣaḥ plakṣaḥ iti . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . kṛtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10483: kaṭaḥ bhīṣmaḥ udāraḥ śobhanaḥ darśanīyaḥ iti . prathamā bhaviṣyati vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:10484: . na sidhyati . paratvāt ṣaṣṭhī prāpnoti . śeṣalakṣaṇā ṣaṣṭhī aśeṣatvāt na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:10485: . kṛtprayoge tu param vidhānam ṣaṣṭhyāḥ tatpratiṣedhārtham . kṛtprayoge tu paratvā
GS24pmbhasuu:10486: tṣaṣṭhī prāpnoti . tatpratiṣedhārtham anabhihitādhikāraḥ kartavyaḥ . kartavyaḥ kaṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10487: iti . saḥ katham kartavyaḥ . yadi ekatvādayaḥ vibhaktyarthāḥ . atha hi karmādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10490: 769-770 samayānikaṣāhāyogeṣu upasaṅkhyānam . samayānikaṣāhāyogeṣu upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . samayā grāmam nikaṣā grāmam . hāyoge . hā devadattam . hā yajñadattam . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:10493: paritaḥ grāmam . samayā grāmam . nikaṣā grāmam . adhi adhi grāmam . dhik jālmam dhik
GS24pmbhasuu:10494: vṛṣalam . aparaḥ āha . ubhasarvatasoḥ kāryā dhiguparyādiṣu triṣu dvitīyā āmreḍitānteṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:10495: tataḥ anyatra api dṛśyate . ubhaya sarva iti etābhyām tasantābhyām dvitīyā vaktavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:10496: . ubhayataḥ grāmam sarvataḥ grāmam . dhigyoge . dhik jālmam dhik vṛṣalam . uparyādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:10497: triṣu āmreḍitānteṣu dvitīyā vaktavyā . upari upari grāmam . adhi adhi grāmam . adhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10498: adhaḥ grāmam . tataḥ anyatra api dṛśyate . na devadattam pratibhāti kim cit . bubhukṣitam
GS24pmbhasuu:10501: 771-772 kimartham idam ucyate . tṛtīyā yathā syāt . atha dvitīyā siddhā . siddhā
GS24pmbhasuu:10502: karmaṇi iti eva . tṛtīyā api siddhā . katham . supām supaḥ bhavanti iti eva . asati
GS24pmbhasuu:10503: etasmin supām supaḥ bhavanti iti tṛtīyārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . yavāgvā agnihotraṃ juhoti
GS24pmbhasuu:10504: . evam tarhi tṛtīyā api siddhā . katham . kartṛkaraṇayoḥ iti eva . ayam agnihotraśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10505: asti eva jyotiṣi vartate . tadyathā . agnihotram prajvalayati iti . asti haviṣi vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:10506: . tat yathā . agnihotram juhoti iti . juhotiḥ ca asti eva prakṣepaṇe vartate asti
GS24pmbhasuu:10507: prīṇātyarthe vartate . tat yathā tāvat yavāgūśabdāt tṛtīyā tadā agnihotraśabdaḥ jyotiṣi
GS24pmbhasuu:10508: vartate juhotiḥ ca prīṇātyarthe . tat yathā . yavāgvā agnihotram juhoti . agniṃ prīṇāti
GS24pmbhasuu:10509: . yadā yavāgūśabdāt dvitīyā tadā agnihotraśabdaḥ haviṣi vartate juhotiḥ ca prakṣepaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:10510: . tat yathā . yavāgūm agnihotram juhoti . yavāgūm haviḥ agnau prakṣipati .
GS24pmbhasuu:10512: 772-774 iha kasmāt na bhavati . kim te bābhravaśālaṅkāyanānām antareṇa gatena iti
GS24pmbhasuu:10513: . lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya eva iti . atha vā yadi api tāvat ayam antareṇaśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10514: dṛṣṭāpacāraḥ nipātaḥ ca anipātaḥ ca ayaṃ tu khalu antarāśabdaḥ adṛṣṭāpacāraḥ nipātaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10515: eva . tasya asya kaḥ anyaḥ dvitīyaḥ sahāyaḥ bhavitum arhati anyat ataḥ nipātāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:10516: tat yathā . asya goḥ dvitīyena arthaḥ iti gauḥ eva ānīyate na aśvaḥ na gadarbhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10518: vaktavyam . apradhāne dvīiyā bhavati iti vaktavyam . antarā tvām ca mām ca kamaṇḍaluḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10519: iti . kamaṇḍaloḥ dvitīyā mā bhūt iti . kaḥ punaḥ etābhyām kamaṇḍaloḥ yogaḥ . yat
GS24pmbhasuu:10520: tat tvām ca mām ca antarā tat kamaṇḍaloḥ sthānam . tatt arhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:10521: . kamaṇḍaloḥ dvitīyā kasmāt na bhavati . upapadavibhakteḥ kārakavibhaktiḥ balīyasī
GS24pmbhasuu:10524: 774-777 atyantasaṃyoge karmavat lādyartham . atyantasaṃyoge kālādhvānau karmavat
GS24pmbhasuu:10525: bhavataḥ iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . lādyartham . lādibhiḥ abhidhānam yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:10526: syāt . āsyate māsaḥ . śayyate krośaḥ . atha vatkaraṇam kimartham . svāśrayam api
GS24pmbhasuu:10527: yathā syāt . āsyate māsam . śayyate krośam . akarmakāṇām bhāve laḥ bhavati iti bhāve
GS24pmbhasuu:10528: laḥ yathā syāt . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . prākṛtameva etat karma yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:10529: kaṭam karoti śakaṭam karoti iti . evam manyate . yatra kaḥ citkriyākṛtaḥ viśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10530: upajāyate tat nyāyyam karma iti . na ca iha kaḥ cit kriyākṛtaḥ viśeṣaḥ upajāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:10531: . na evam śakyam . iha api na syāt . ādityam paśyati . himavantam śṛṇoti . grāmam
GS24pmbhasuu:10532: gacchati . tasmāt prākṛtameva etat karma yathā kaṭam karoti śakaṭam karoti iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10533: yadi tarhi prākṛtam eva etat karma akarmakāṇām bhāve laḥ bhavati iti bhāve laḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:10534: prāpnoti. āsyate māsam devadattena iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . akarmakāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:10535: iti ucyate na ca ke cit kālabhāvādhvabhiḥ akarmakāḥ . te evam vijñāsyāmaḥ . kva cit
GS24pmbhasuu:10536: ye akarmakāḥ iti . atha vā yena karmaṇā sakarmakāḥ ca akarmakāḥ ca bhavanti tena
GS24pmbhasuu:10537: akarmakāṇām . na ca etena karmaṇā kaḥ cid api akarmakaḥ . atha vā yat karma bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:10538: na ca bhavati tena karmakāṇām . na ca etat karma kva cit api na bhavati . na tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:10539: idānīm idam sūtram vaktavyam . vaktavyam ca . kim prayojanam . yatra akriyayā atyantasaṃyogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10540: tadartham . krośam kuṭilā nadī . krośam ramaṇīyā vanarājiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10542: 777 kriyāparvarge iti vaktavyam . sādhanāpavarge mā bhūt . māsam adhītaḥ anuvāko na ca anena gṛhītaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10544: 777-778 kriyāmadhye iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt . adya devadattaḥ bhuktvā dvyahāt bhoktā dvyahe bhoktā . kārakamadhye iti iyati ucyamāne iha eva syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:10545: ihasthaḥ ayam iṣvāsaḥ krośāt lakṣyam vidhyati krośe lakṣyam vidhyati . yam ca vidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:10546: yataḥ ca vidhyati ubhayoḥ tanmadhyam bhavati . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:10547: . na antareṇa sādhanam kriyāyāḥ pravṛttiḥ bhavati . kriyāmadhyam cet kārakamadhyam
GS24pmbhasuu:10548: api bhavati tatra kārakamadhye iti eva siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:10550: 778-779 karmapravacanīyayukte pratyādibhiḥ ca lakṣaṇādiṣu upasaṅkhyānam saptamīpañcamyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10551: pratiṣedhārtham . karmapravacanīyayukte pratyādibhiḥ ca lakṣaṇādiṣu upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:10552: kartavyam . vṛkṣam prati vidyotate vidyut . vṛkṣam pari . vṛkṣamanu . sādhuḥ devadattaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10553: mātaram prati . mātaram pari . mātaram anu . kim prayojanam . saptamīpañcamyoḥ pratiṣedhārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:10554: . saptamīpañcamyau mā bhūtām iti . sādhunipuṇābhyām arcāyām saptamī iti saptamī .
GS24pmbhasuu:10555: pañcamī apāṅparibhiḥ iti pañcamī . tatra ayam api arthaḥ aprateḥ iti na vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:10556: bhavati . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . uktaṃ vā . kim uktam . ekatra tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:10557: uktam aprateḥ iti . itaratra api yadi api tāvat ayam pariḥ dṛṣṭāpacāraḥ varjane ca
GS24pmbhasuu:10558: avarjane ca ayaṃ khalu apaśabdaḥ adṛṣṭāpacāraḥ varjanārthaḥ eva . tasya kaḥ anyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10559: dvitīyaḥ sahāyaḥ bhavitum arhati anyat ataḥ varjanārthāt . tat yathā . asya goḥ dvitīyena
GS24pmbhasuu:10560: arthaḥ iti gauḥ eva ānīyate na aśvaḥ na gadarbhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10562: 779-782 katham idam vijñāyate . yasya ca aiśvaryam īśvaratā īśvarabhāvaḥ tasmāt karmapravacanīyayuktāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10563: iti . āhosvit yasya svasya īśvaraḥ tasmāt karmapravacanīyayuktāt iti . kaḥ ca atra
GS24pmbhasuu:10564: viśeṣaḥ . yasya ca īśvaravacanam iti kartṛnirdeśaḥ cet avacanāt siddham . yasya ca
GS24pmbhasuu:10565: īśvaravacanam iti kartṛnirdeśaḥ cet antareṇa vacanam siddham . adhi brahmadatte pañcālāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10566: . ādhṛtāḥ te tasmin bhavanti . satyam evam etat . nityam parigrahītavyam parigrahītradhīnam
GS24pmbhasuu:10567: bhavati . prathamānupapattiḥ tu . prathamā na upapadyate . kutaḥ . pañcālebhyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10568: kā tarhi syāt . ṣaṣṭhīsaptamyau . svāmīśvarādhipati iti . na tatra adhiśabdaḥ paṭhyate
