GS24pmbhasuu:10717: . gavīdhumataḥ sāvakāśyaīm catvāri yojanāni . kārtikyāḥ āgrahāyaṇī māse . tadyuktāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10718: kāle saptamī . tadyuktāt kāle saptamī vaktavyā . kārtikyāḥ āgrahāyaṇī māse . adhvanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10719: prathamā ca . adhvanaḥ prathamā ca saptamī ca vaktayvā . gavīdhumataḥ sāvakāśyaīm
GS24pmbhasuu:10720: catvāri yojanāni caturṣu yojaneṣu . tat tarhi idaṃ bahu vaktavyam . na vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:10721: . apādāne iti eva siddham . iha tāvat prāsādāt prekṣate . śayanāt prekṣate iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10722: apakrāmati tat tasmāt darśanam . yadi apakrāmati kim na atyantāya apakrāmati . santatatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10723: . atha vā anyānyaprādurbhāvā . praśnākhyānayoḥ ca pañcamī vaktavyā iti . idam atra
GS24pmbhasuu:10724: prayoktavyam sat na prayujyate . kutaḥ bhavān āgacchati . pāṭaliputrāt āgacchami
GS24pmbhasuu:10725: iti . yataḥ ca adhvakālanirmāṇam tatra pañcamī vaktavyā iti . idam atra prayoktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:10726: sat na prayujyate gavīdhumataḥ niḥsṛtya sāṅkāśyam catvāri yojanāni . kārtikyāḥ āgrahāyaṇī
GS24pmbhasuu:10727: māse iti . idam atra prayoktavyam sat na prayujyate . kārttikyāḥ prabhṛti āgrahāyaṇī
GS24pmbhasuu:10728: māsa iti . tadyuktāt kāle saptamī vaktavyā iti . idam atra prayoktavyam sat na prayujyate
GS24pmbhasuu:10729: . kārttikyāḥ āgrahāyaṇī gate māse iti . adhvanaḥ prathamā ca saptamī ca iti . idam
GS24pmbhasuu:10730: atra prayoktavyam sat na prayujyate . gavīdhumato niḥsṛtya yadā catvāri yojanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:10731: gatāni bhavanti tataḥ sāṅkāśyam . caturṣu yojaneṣu gateṣu sāṅkāśyam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10733: 800 añcūttarapadagrahaṇam kimartham na dikśabdaiḥ yoge iti eva siddham . ṣaṣṭhī atasarthapratyayena iti vakṣyati . tasya ayam purastāt apakarṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10735: 801 arthagrahaṇam kimartham . ṣaṣṭhī ataspratyayena iti ucyamāne iha eva syāt . dakṣiṇato
GS24pmbhasuu:10736: grāmasya uttarato grāmasya iti . iha na syāt . upari grāmasya upariṣṭāt grāmasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10737: iti . arthagrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe ataspratyayena ca siddham bhavati yaḥ ca anyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10738: tena samānārthaḥ . atha pratyayagrahaṇam kimartham . iha mā bhūt . prāk grāmāt pratyak
GS24pmbhasuu:10739: grāmāt . añcūttarapadasya api etat prayojanam uktam . tatra anyatarat śakyam akartum .
GS24pmbhasuu:10741: 801-803 pṛthagādiṣu pañcamīvidhānam . pṛthagādiṣu pañcamīvidheyā . pṛthak devadattāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10742: . kimartham na prakṛtam pañcamīgrahaṇam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . apādāne pañcamī
GS24pmbhasuu:10743: iti. anadhikārāt . anadhikāraḥ saḥ . adhikāre hi dvitīyāṣaṣṭhīviṣaye pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10744: . adhikāre hi dvitīyāṣaṣṭhīviṣaye pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ syāt . dakṣiṇena grāmam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10745: dakṣiṇataḥ grāmasya . evam tarhi anyatarasyāṅgrahaṇasāmarthyāt pañcamī bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:10746: . asti anyat anyatarasyāṅgrahaṇasya prayojanam . kim . yasyām na aprāptāyām tṛtīyā
GS24pmbhasuu:10747: ārabhyate sā yathā syāt . kasyām ca na aprāptāyām . antataḥ ṣaṣṭhyām . tat tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:10748: vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . apādāne pañcamī iti
GS24pmbhasuu:10749: . nanu ca uktam anadhikāraḥ saḥ adhikāre hi dvitīyāṣaṣṭhīviṣaye pratiṣedhaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10750: evam tarhi sambandham anuvartiṣyate . apādāne pañcamī . anyārāditarartedikśabdāñcūttarapadājāhiyukte
GS24pmbhasuu:10751: pañcamī . ṣaṣṭhī atasarthapratyayena anyārādibhiḥ yoge pañcamī . enapā dvitīyā anyārādibhiryoge
GS24pmbhasuu:10752: pañcamī . pṛthagvinānānābhiḥ tṛtīyā anyatarasyām . pañcamīgrahaṇam anuvartate anyārādibhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10753: yoge iti nivṛttam . atha vā maṇḍūkagatayaḥ adhikārāḥ . tat. yathā maṇḍūkāḥ utplutya
GS24pmbhasuu:10754: utplutya gacchanti tadvat adhikārāḥ . atha vā anyavacanāt cakārākaraṇāt prakṛtasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10755: apavādaḥ vijñāyate yathā utsargeṇa prasaktasya . anyasyā vibhakteḥ vacanāt cakārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10756: anukarṣaṇārthasya akaraṇāt prakṛtāyaḥ pañcamyāḥ dvitīyāṣaṣṭhyau bādhike bhaviṣyataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10757: yathā utsargeṇa prasaktasya apavādaḥ bādhakaḥ bhavati . atha vā vakṣyati etat . anuvartante
GS24pmbhasuu:10758: ca nāma vidhayaḥ . na ca anuvartanāt eva bhavanti . kim tarhi . yatnāt bhavanti iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10761: pañcamīvidhāne tadyuktātpañcamyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . dūrād grāmasya . na vā
GS24pmbhasuu:10762: tatra api darśanāt apratiṣedhaḥ . na vā tatra api darśanāt pañcamyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10763: anarthakaḥ . tatra api pañcamī dṛśyate . dūrāt āvasathāt mūtram dūrāt pādāvasecanam
GS24pmbhasuu:10764: dūrāt ca bhāvyam dasyubhyaḥ dūrāt ca kupitāt guroḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10766: 804-806 saptamīvidhāne ktasya inviṣayasya karmaṇi upsaṅkhyānam . saptamīvidhāne ktasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10767: inviṣayasya karmaṇi upsaṅkhyānam vaktavyam . adhītī vyākaraṇe . parigaṇitī yājñikye
GS24pmbhasuu:10768: . āmnātī cchandasi . sādhvasādhuprayoge ca . sādhvasādhuprayoge ca saptamī vaktavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:10769: . sādhuḥ devadattaḥ mātari . asādhuḥ pitari . kārakārhāṇām ca kārakatve . kārakārhāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:10770: ca kārakatve saptamī vaktavyā . ṛddheṣu bhuñjāneṣu daridrāḥ āsate . brāhmaṇeṣu taratsu
GS24pmbhasuu:10771: vṛṣalāḥ āsate . akārakārhāṇām cākārakatve . akārakārhāṇām cākārakatve saptamī vaktavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:10772: . mūrkheṣu āsīneṣu vṛddhāḥ bhuñjate . vṛṣaleṣu āsīneṣu brāhmaṇāḥ taranti . tadviparyāse
GS24pmbhasuu:10773: ca . tadviparyāse ca saptamī vaktavyā . ṛddheṣu āsīneṣu mūrkhāḥ bhuñjate . brāhmaṇeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:10774: āsīneṣu vṛṣalāḥ taranti . nimittāt karmasaṃyoge . nimittātkarmasaṃyoge saptamī vaktavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:10775: . carmaṇi dvīpinam hanti . dantayoḥ hanti kuñjaram . keṣeṣu camarīm hanti . sīmni puṣkalakaḥ hataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10777: 806-807 bhāvalakṣaṇe saptamīvidhāne abhāvalakṣaṇe upasaṅkhyānam . bhāvalakṣaṇe saptamīvidhāne
GS24pmbhasuu:10778: abhāvalakṣaṇe upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . agniṣu hūyamāneṣu prasthitaḥ huteṣu āgataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10779: . goṣu duhyamānāsu prasthitaḥ dugdhāsu āgataḥ . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . lakṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:10780: hi nāma tat bhavati yena punaḥ punaḥ lakṣyate . sakṛt ca asau katham cit agniṣu hūyamāneṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:10781: prasthitaḥ huteṣu āgataḥ goṣu duhyamānāsu prasthitaḥ dugdhāsu āgataḥ . siddham tu
GS24pmbhasuu:10782: bhāvapravṛttau yasya bhāvārambhavacanāt . siddhametat . katham . yasya bhāvapravṛttau
GS24pmbhasuu:10783: dvitīyaḥ bhāvaḥ ārabhyate tatra saptamī vaktavyā . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate
GS24pmbhasuu:10784: . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam bhāvalakṣaṇe saptamīvidhāne abhāvalakṣaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:10785: upasaṅkhyānam iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na khalu avaśyam tat eva lakṣaṇam bhavati yena
GS24pmbhasuu:10786: punaḥ punaḥ lakṣyate . sakṛt api yat nimittatvāya kalpate tat api lakṣaṇam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:10787: . tat yathā . api bhavān kamaṇḍalupāṇim chātram adrākṣīt iti . sakṛt asau kamaṇḍalupāṇiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10788: dṛṣṭaḥ chātraḥ . tasya tat eva lakṣaṇam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:10790: 807 iha kasmāt na bhavati . kṛṣṇā gavām sampannakṣīratamā iti . vibhakte iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:10791: . na ca etat vibhaktam . vibhaktametat . gobhyaḥ kṛṣṇā vibhajyate . vibhaktam eva
GS24pmbhasuu:10792: yat nityam tatra bhavitavyam . na ca etat nityam vibhaktam . kim vaktavyam etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:10793: na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . vibhaktagrahaṇasāmarthyāt . yadi hi yat vibhaktam
GS24pmbhasuu:10794: ca avibhaktam ca tatra syāt vibhāktagrahaṇam anarthakam syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:10796: 808 apratyādibhiḥ iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt . sādhuḥ devadattaḥ mātaram pari . mātaram anu .
GS24pmbhasuu:10798: 808 prasitaḥ iti ucyate kaḥ prasitaḥ nāma . yaḥ tatra nityam pratibaddhaḥ . kutaḥ etat . sinotiḥ ayam badhnātyarthe vartate . baddhaḥ iva asau tatra bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:10800: 808 iha kasmāt na bhavati . adya puṣyaḥ . adya maghā iti . adhikaraṇe iti vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:10802: 809-814 prātipadikagrahaṇam kimartham . uccaiḥ nīcaiḥ iti āpi yathā syāt . kim punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10803: atra prathamayā prārthyate . padatvam . na etat asti .ṣaṣṭhyā atra padatvam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:10804: . idam tarhi prayojanam . grāmaḥ ucaiḥ te svam . grāmaḥ uccaiḥ tava svam . sapūrvāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10805: prathamāyāḥ vibhāṣā iti eṣaḥ vidhiḥ yathā syāt . atha liṅgagrahaṇam kimartham . strī
GS24pmbhasuu:10806: pumān napuṃsakam iti ata api yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . eṣaḥ eva atra
GS24pmbhasuu:10807: prātipadikārthaḥ . idam tarhi . kumārī vṛkṣaḥ kuṇḍam iti . atha parimāṇagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:10808: kimartham . droṇaḥ khārī āḍhakam iti atra api yathā syāt . atha vacanagrahaṇam kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:10809: . iha samudāye vākyaparisamāptiḥ dṛśyate . tat yathā . gargāḥ śatam daṇḍyantām iti
GS24pmbhasuu:10810: . arthinaḥ ca rājānaḥ hiraṇyena bhavanti na ca pratyekam daṇḍayanti . sati etasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:10811: dṛṣṭānte yatra etāni samuditāni bhavanti tatra eva syāt . droṇaḥ khārī āḍhakam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:10812: . iha na syāt . kumārī vṛkṣaḥ kuṇḍam iti . na etat asti prayojanam . pratyekam api
GS24pmbhasuu:10813: vākyaparisamāptiḥ dṛśyate . tat yathā vṛddhiguṇasañjñe pratyekam bhavataḥ . idam
GS24pmbhasuu:10814: tarhi prayojanam ukteṣu api ekatvādiṣu prathamā yathā syāt . ekaḥ dvau bahavaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:10815: . atha mātragrahaṇam kimartham . etanmātre eva prathamā yathā syāt karmādiviśiṣṭe
GS24pmbhasuu:10816: mā bhūt iti . kaṭam karoti . na etat asti prayojanam . karmādiṣu dvitīyādyāḥ vibhaktayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10817: tāḥ karmādiviśiṣṭe bādhikāḥ bhaviṣyanti . atha vā ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na karmādiviśiṣṭe
GS24pmbhasuu:10818: prathamā bhavati iti yat ayam sambodhane prathamām śāsti . na etat asti jñāpakam
GS24pmbhasuu:10819: . asti hi anyat etasya vacane prayojanam . kim . sā āmantritam iti vakṣyāmi iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10820: yat tarhi yogavibhāgam karoti . itarathā hi sambodhane āmantritam iti eva brūyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10821: . idam tarhi ukteṣu api ekatvādiṣu prathamā yathā syāt . ekaḥ dvau bahavaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10822: vacanagrahaṇasya api etat prayojanam uktam . anyatarat śakyam akartum .
GS24pmbhasuu:10826: padasāmānādhikaraṇye upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . vīraḥ puruṣaḥ . kim punaḥ kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:10827: na sidhyati . adhikatvāt . vyatiriktaḥ prātipadikārthaḥ iti kṛtvā prathamā na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:10828: . katham vyatiriktiḥ . puruṣe vīratvam . na vā vākyārthatvāt . na vā vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10829: kim kāraṇam . vākyārthatvāt . yat atra ādhikyam vākyārthaḥ saḥ . atha vā abhihite
GS24pmbhasuu:10830: prathamā iti etat lakṣaṇam kariyṣyate . abhihitalakṣaṇāyām anabhihite prathamāvidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10831: . abhihitalakṣaṇāyāmanabhihite prathamā vidheyā . vṛkṣaḥ plakṣaḥ iti . uktam vā .
GS24pmbhasuu:10832: kim uktam . astiḥ bhavantīparaḥ prathamapuruṣaḥ aprayujyamānaḥ api asti iti . vṛkṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10833: plakṣaḥ . asti iti gamyate . abhihitānabhihite prathamābhāvaḥ . abhihitānabhhite
GS24pmbhasuu:10834: prathamā prāpnoti . kva . prāsāde āste . śayane āste . sadipratyayena abhihitam adhikaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:10835: iti kṛtvā prathamā prāpnoti . evam tarhi tiṅsamānādhikaraṇe prathamā iti etat lakṣaṇaṃ
GS24pmbhasuu:10836: kariṣyate . tiṅsamānādhikaraṇe iti cet tiṅaḥ aprayoge prathamāvidhiḥ . tiṅsamānādhikaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:10837: iti cet tiṅaḥ aprayoge prathamā vidheyā . vṛkṣaḥ plakṣa iti . uktam pūrveṇa . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:10838: uktam . astiḥ bhavantīparaḥ prathamapuruṣaḥ aprayujyamānaḥ api asti iti . vṛkṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10839: plakṣaḥ . asti iti gamyate . śatṛśānacoḥ ca nimittabhāvāt tiṅaḥ abhāvaḥ tayoḥ apavādatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10840: . śatṛśānacoḥ ca nimittabhāvāt tiṅaḥ abhāvaḥ . kva . pacati odanam devadattaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:10841: . kim kāraṇam . tayoḥ apavādatvāt . śatṛśānacau tiṅapavādau . tau ca atra bādhakau
GS24pmbhasuu:10842: . na ca apavādaviṣaye utsargaḥ abhiniviśate . pūrvam hi apavādāḥ abhiniviśante paścāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10843: utsargaḥ . prakalpya vā apavādaviṣayam tataḥ utsargaḥ abhiniviśate . tat na tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:10844: atra kadā cit tiṅādeśo bhavati . apavādau tāvat śatṛśānacau pratīkṣate . pākṣikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10845: eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . katarasmin pakṣe . śatṛśānacoḥ dvaitam bhavati . aprathamā vā vidhinā
GS24pmbhasuu:10846: āśrīyate prathamā vā pratiṣedhena iti . vibhaktiniyame ca api dvaitam bhavati . vibhaktiniyamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10847: vā syāt arthaniyamaḥ vā iti . tat yadā tāvat arthaniyamaḥ aprathamā ca vidhinā āśrīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:10848: tadā eṣa doṣaḥ bhavati . yadā hi vibhaktiniyamaḥ yadi eva aprathamā vidhinā āśrīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:10849: atha api prathamā pratiṣedhena na tadā doṣaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:10851: 819-825 śeṣe iti ucyate. kaḥ śeṣaḥ nāma . karmādibhyaḥ ye anye arthāḥ saḥ śeṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10852: yadi evam śeṣaḥ na prakalpate . na hi karmādibhyaḥ anye arthāḥ santi . iha tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:10853: rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ iti rājā kartā puruṣaḥ sampradānam . vṛkṣasya śākhā iti vṛkṣaḥ śākhyāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10854: adhikaraṇam . tathā yat etat svam nāma caturbhiḥ etat prakāraiḥ bhavati krayaṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10855: apaharaṇāt yāñcāyāḥ vinimayāt iti . atra ca sarvatra karmādayaḥ santi. evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:10856: karmādīnām avivakṣā śeṣaḥ . katham punaḥ sataḥ nāma avāvivakṣā syāt . sataḥ api avivakṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:10857: bhavati . tat yathā . alomikā eḍakā . anudarā kanyā iti . asataḥ ca vivakṣā bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:10858: . samudraḥ kuṇḍikā . vindhyaḥ vardhitakam iti . kimartham punaḥ śeṣagrahaṇam . pratyayāvadhāraṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10859: śeṣavacanam . pratyayāvadhāraṇāt śeṣavacanam kartavyam . pratyayāḥ niyatāḥ arthāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10860: aniyatāḥ tatra ṣaṣṭhī prāpnoti . tatra śeṣagrahaṇam kartavyam ṣaṣṭhīniyamārtham .
GS24pmbhasuu:10861: śeṣe eva ṣaṣṭhī bhavati na anyatra iti . arthāvadhāraṇāt vā . atha vā arthāḥ niyatāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10862: pratyayāḥ aniyatāḥ te śeṣe api prāpnuvanti . tatra śeṣagrahaṇam kartavyam śeṣaniyamārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:10863: . śeṣe ṣaṣṭhī eva bhavati na anyā iti . arthaniyame śeṣagrahaṇam śakyam akartum .
GS24pmbhasuu:10864: katham . arthāḥ niyatāḥ pratyayāḥ aniyatāḥ . tataḥ vakṣyāmi ṣaṣṭhī bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10865: tat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . yatra ṣaṣṭhī ca anyā ca prāpnoti ṣaṣṭhī eva tatra bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:10866: iti . ṣaṣṭhī śeṣe iti cet viśeṣyasya pratiṣedhaḥ . ṣaṣṭhī śeṣe iti cet viśeṣyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10867: pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ iti atra rājā viśeṣaṇam puruṣaḥ viśeṣyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10868: tatra prātipadikārthaḥ vyatiriktaḥ iti kṛtvā prathamā na prāpnoti . tatra ṣaṣṭhī
GS24pmbhasuu:10869: syāt . tasyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . tatra prathamāvidhiḥ . tatra ṣaṣṭhīm pratiṣidhya
GS24pmbhasuu:10870: prathamā vidheyā . rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ iti . uktam pūrveṇa . kimuktam . na vā vākyārthatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10871: iti . yadatrādikhyam vākyārthaḥ saḥ . kutaḥ nu khalu etat puruṣe yat ādikhyam saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10872: vākyārthaḥ iti na punaḥ rājani yat ādhikyam saḥ vākyārthaḥ syāt . antareṇa api puruṣaśabdaprayogam
GS24pmbhasuu:10873: rājani saḥ arthaḥ gamyate . na punaḥ antareṇa rājaśabdaprayogam puruṣe saḥ arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10874: gamyate . asti kāraṇam yena etat evam bhavati . kim kāraṇam . rājaśabdāt hi bhavān
GS24pmbhasuu:10875: ṣaṣṭhīm uccārayati. aṅga hi bhavān puruṣaśabdāt api uccārayatu gaṃsyate saḥ arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10876: . nanu ca na etena evam bhavitavyam . na hi śabdakṛtena nāma arthena bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:10877: . arthakṛtena nāma śabdena bhavitavyam . tat etat evam dṛśyatām :
GS24pmbhasuu:10878: artharūpam eva etat evañjātīyakam yena atra antareṇa api puruṣaśabdaprayogam rājani saḥ arthaḥ gamyate . kim punaḥ tat . svāmitvam . kiṅkṛtam punaḥ tat . svakṛtam . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:10879: prātipadikārthānām kriyākṛtāḥ viśeṣāḥ upajāyante tatkṛtāḥ ca ākhyāḥ prādurbhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:10880: karma karaṇam apādānaṃ sampradānam adhikaraṇam iti . tāḥ ca punaḥ vibhaktīnām utpattau
GS24pmbhasuu:10881: kadā cit nimittatvena upādīyante kadā cit na . kadā ca vibhaktīnām utpattau nimittatvena
GS24pmbhasuu:10882: upādīyante . yadā vyabhicaranti prātipadikārtham . yadā hi na vyabhicaranti ākhyābhūtāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10883: eva tadā bhavanti karma karaṇam apādānam sampradānam adhikaraṇam iti . yathā eva
GS24pmbhasuu:10884: tarhi rājani svakṛtam svāmitvam tatra ṣaṣṭhī evam puruṣe api svāmikṛtam svatvam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10885: tatra ṣaṣṭhī prāpnoti . rājaśabdāt utpadyamānayā ṣaṣṭhyā abhihitaḥ saḥ arthaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:10886: kṛtvā puruṣaśabdāt ṣaṣṭhī na bhaviṣyati . na tarhi idānīm idam bhavati puruṣasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10887: rājā iti . bhavati . rājaśabdāt tu tadā prathamā . na tarhi idānīm idam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:10888: rājñaḥ puruṣasya iti . bhavati . bāhyam artham abhisamīkṣya .
GS24pmbhasuu:10890: 826-827 karmādiṣu akarmakavadvacanam . karmādiṣu akarmakavadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:10891: prayojanam . akarmakāṇām bhāve laḥ bhavati . bhāve laḥ yathā syāt . mātuḥ smaryate
GS24pmbhasuu:10892: . pituḥ smaryate . atha vatkaraṇam kimartham . svāśrayam api yathā syāt . mātā smaryate
GS24pmbhasuu:10893: . pitā smaryate iti . karmābhidhāne hi liṅgavacanānupapattiḥ . karmābhidhāne hi sati
GS24pmbhasuu:10894: liṅgavacanayoḥ anupapattiḥ syāt . mātuḥ smṛtam . mātroḥ smṛtam . māṭṝṇām smṛtam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:10895: . mātuḥ yat liṅgam vacanam ca tat smṛtaśabdasya api prāpnoti . ṣaṣṭhīprasaṇgaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:10896: . ṣaṣṭhī ca prāpnoti . kutaḥ . smṛtaśabdāt . mātuḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyāt ṣaṣṭhī prāpnoti . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:10897: ṣaṣṭhīprasaṅgaḥ ca . ṣaṣṭhī ca prasaṅktavyā . kutaḥ . mātṛśabdāt . smṛtaśabdena bhihitam
GS24pmbhasuu:10898: karma iti kṛtvā ṣaṣṭhī na prāpnoti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . avivakṣite
GS24pmbhasuu:10899: karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhī bhavati . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate
GS24pmbhasuu:10900: . śeṣe iti vartate . śeṣaḥ ca kaḥ . karmādīnām avivakṣā śeṣaḥ . yadā karma vivakṣitam
GS24pmbhasuu:10901: bhavati tadā ṣaṣṭhī na bhavati . tat yathā . smarāmi aham mātaram . smarāmi aham pitaram iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10903: 828 ajvarisantāpyoḥ iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt . cauram santāpayati . vṛṣalam
GS24pmbhasuu:10904: santāpayati . atha kimartham bhāvavacanānām iti ucyate yāvatā rujārthāḥ bhāvavacanāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10905: eva bhavanti . bhāvakartṛkāt yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt . nadī kūlāni rujati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10907: 828-829 kim udāharaṇam . gām ghnanti . gām pradīvyanti . gām sabhāsadbhyaḥ upaharanti . na etat asti . pūrveṇa api etat siddham . idam tarhi . gāmasya tadahaḥ sabhāyām dīvyeyuḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10909: 829 haviṣaḥ aprasthitasya . haviṣaḥ aprasthitasya iti vaktavyam . indrāgnibhyām chāgam haviḥ vapām medaḥ prasthitam preṣya .
GS24pmbhasuu:10911: 830 ṣaṣṭhyarthe caturthīvacanam . ṣaṣṭhyarthe caturthī vaktavyā . yā kharveṇa pibati
GS24pmbhasuu:10912: tasyai kharvaḥ tisraḥ rātrīḥ . tasyāḥ iti prāpte . yaḥ tataḥ jāyate saḥ bhiśastaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10913: yām araṇye tasyai stenaḥ yām parācīm tasyai hrītamukhī apagagalbhaḥ yā snāti tasyai
GS24pmbhasuu:10914: apsu mārukaḥ yā abhyaṅkte tasyai duścarmā yā pralikhate tasyai khalatiḥ apamārī yā
GS24pmbhasuu:10915: āṅkte tasyai kāṇaḥ yā dataḥ dhāvate tasyai śyāvadan yā nakhani nikṛntate tasyai kunakhṝ
GS24pmbhasuu:10916: yā kṛṇatti tasyai klībaḥ yā rajjum sṛjati tasyai udbandhukaḥ yā parṇena pibati tasyai
GS24pmbhasuu:10917: unmādukaḥ jāyate . ahalyāyai jāraḥ . manāyyai tantuḥ . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:10918: . yogavibhāgāt siddham . caturthī . tataḥ arthe bahulam chandasi iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10920: 831-836 kṛdgrahaṇam kimartham . iha mā bhūt . pacati odanam devadattaḥ iti . kartṛkarmaṇoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10921: ṣaṣṭhīvidhāne kṛdgrahaṇānarthakyam lapratiṣedhāt . kartṛkarmaṇoḥ ṣaṣṭhīvidhāne kṛdgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:10922: anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . lapratiṣedhāt . pratiṣidhyate tatra ṣaṣthī laprayoge na
GS24pmbhasuu:10923: iti . tasya karmakartrartham tarhi kṛdgrahaṇam kartavyam . kṛtaḥ ye kartṛkarmaṇī
GS24pmbhasuu:10924: tatra yathā syāt . anyasya ye kartṛkarmaṇī tatra mā bhūt iti . na etat asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:10925: . dhātoḥ hi dvaye pratyayāḥ vidhīyante tiṅaḥ ca kṛtaḥ ca . tatra kṛtprayoge iṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:10926: tiṅprayoge pratiṣidhyate . na brūmaḥ ihārtham tasya karmakartrartham kṛdgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:10927: kartavyam iti . kim tarhi . uttarārtham . avyayaprayoge na iti ṣaṣṭhyāḥ pratiṣedham
GS24pmbhasuu:10928: vakṣyati . saḥ kṛtaḥ avyayasya ye kartṛkarmaṇī tatra yathā syāt . akṛtaḥ avyayasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10929: ye kartṛkarmaṇī tatra mā bhūt iti . uccaiḥ kaṭānām sraṣṭā iti . tasya karmakartrartham
GS24pmbhasuu:10930: iti cet pratiṣedhe api tadantakarmakartṛtvāt siddham . kṛtaḥ ete kartṛkarmaṇī na
GS24pmbhasuu:10931: avyayasya . adhikaraṇam atra avyayam . idam tarhi prayojanam . ubhayaprāptau karmaṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:10932: ṣaṣṭhyāḥ pratiṣedham vakṣyati . saḥ kṛtaḥ ye kartṛkarmaṇī tatra yathā syāt . kṛtoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10933: ye kartṛkarmaṇī tatra mā bhūt iti . āścaryam idam vṛttam odanasya ca nāma pākaḥ brāhmaṇānām
GS24pmbhasuu:10934: ca prādurbhāvaḥ iti . atha kriyamāṇe api kṛdgrahaṇe kasmāt eva atra na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:10935: ubhayaprāptau iti na evam vijñāyate ubhayoḥ prāptiḥ ubhayaprāptiḥ ubhayaprāptau iti
GS24pmbhasuu:10936: . katham tarhi . ubhayoḥ prāptiḥ yasmin kṛti saḥ ayam ubhayaprāptiḥ kṛt ubhayaprāptau
GS24pmbhasuu:10937: iti . atha vā kṛtaḥ ye kartṛkarmaṇī tatra yathā syāt . taddhitasya ye kartṛkarmaṇī
GS24pmbhasuu:10938: tatra mā bhūt iti . kṛtapūrvī kaṭam . bhuktapūrvī odanam iti . nanu ca vākyena eva
GS24pmbhasuu:10939: anena na bhavitavyam . dvitīyayā tāvat na bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam . ktena abhihitam
GS24pmbhasuu:10940: karma iti kṛtvā . inipratyayena ca api na utpattavyam . kim kāraṇam . asāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10941: . katham asamārthyam . sāpekṣam asamartham bhavati iti . yat tāvat ucyate dvitīyayā
GS24pmbhasuu:10942: tāvat na bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam . ktena abhihitam karma iti kṛtvā iti . yaḥ asau
GS24pmbhasuu:10943: kṛtakaṭayoḥ abhisaṃbandhaḥ saḥ utpanne pratyaye nivartate . asti ca karoteḥ kaṭena
GS24pmbhasuu:10944: sāmarthyam iti kṛtvā dvitīyā bhaviṣyati . yat api ucyate inipratyayena ca api na
GS24pmbhasuu:10945: utpattavyam . kim kāraṇam . asāmarthyāt . katham asamārthyam . sāpekṣam asamartham
GS24pmbhasuu:10946: bhavati iti . na idam ubhayam yugapat bhavati vākyam ca pratyayaḥ ca . yadā vākyam
GS24pmbhasuu:10947: na tadā pratyayaḥ . yadā pratyayaḥ sāmānyena tadā vṛttiḥ . tatra avaśyaṃ viśeṣārthinā
GS24pmbhasuu:10948: viśeṣaḥ anuprayoktavyaḥ . kṛtapūrvī . kim . kaṭam . bhuktapūrvī . kim . odanam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:10949: . atha vā idam prayojanam kartṛbhūtapūrvamātrāt api ṣaṣṭhīyathā syāt . bhedikā devadattasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10952: 836 ubhayaprāptau karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhyāḥ pratiṣedhe akādiprayoge apratiṣedhaḥ . ubhayaprāptau
GS24pmbhasuu:10953: karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhyāḥ pratiṣedhe akādiprayoge pratiṣedhaḥ na bhavati iti vaktavyam . bhedikā
GS24pmbhasuu:10954: devadattasya kāṣṭhānām . cikīrṣā viṣṇumitrasya kaṭasya . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:10955: akākārayoḥ prayoge pratiṣedhaḥ na iti vaktavyam . śeṣe vibhāṣā . śobhanā khalu pāṇineḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10956: sūtrasya kṛtiḥ . śobhanā khalu pāṇininā sūtrasya kṛtiḥ . śobhanā khalu dākṣāyaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10957: saṅgrahasya kṛtiḥ . śobhanā khalu dākṣāyeṇa saṅgrahasya kṛtiḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10959: 837-838 ktasya ca vartamāne nāpuṃsake bhāve upasaṅkhyānam . ktasya ca vartamāne nāpuṃsake bhāve upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:10963: kokilasya vyāhṛtam iti . śeṣavijñānāt siddham . śeṣalakṣaṇā atra ṣaṣṭhī bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:10964: . śeṣaḥ iti ucyate . kaḥ ca śeṣaḥ . karmādīnām avivakṣā śeṣaḥ . katham punaḥ sataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10965: nāma avivakṣā syāt yadā chātraḥ hasati ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10968: kokilaḥ vyāharati . sataḥ api avivakṣā bhavati . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:10970: anudarā kanyā iti . asataḥ ca vivakṣā bhavati . samudraḥ kuṇḍikā . vindhyaḥ vardhitakam iti . yadi evam uttaratra cātuḥśabdyam prāpnoti . idam aheḥ sṛptam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10974: grāmasya pārśve grāmasya madhye iti . iṣyate eva cātuḥśabdyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10976: 838-840 lādeśe salliḍgrahaṇam kikinoḥ pratiṣedhārtham . lādeśe salliḍgagrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:10977: . salliṭoḥ prayoge na iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . kikinoḥ pratiṣedhārtham .
GS24pmbhasuu:10978: kikinoḥ api prayoge pratiṣedhaḥ yathā syāt . /
GS24pmbhasuu:10979: papiḥ somaṃ dadiḥ gāḥ . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . tayoḥ alādeśatvāt . na hi
GS24pmbhasuu:10980: tau lādeśau . atha tau lādeśau syātām syāt pratiṣedhaḥ . bāḍham syāt . lādeśau tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:10981: bhaviṣyataḥ . tat katham . ādṛgamahanajanaḥ kikinau liṭ ca iti liḍvat iti vakṣyāmi
GS24pmbhasuu:10982: . saḥ tarhi vatinirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na hi antareṇa vatim atideśaḥ gamyate . antareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:10983: api vatim atideśaḥ gamyate . tat yathā . eṣaḥ brahmadattaḥ . abrahmadattam brahmadattaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10985: brahmadattavat ayam bhavati iti . evam iha api aliṭam liṭ iti āha . liḍvat iti vijñāsyate
GS24pmbhasuu:10986: . ukāraprayoge na iti vaktavyam . kaṭam cikīrṣuḥ . odanam bubhukṣuḥ . tat tarhi vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:10987: . na vaktavyam . ukāraḥ api atra nirdiśyate . katham . praśliṣṭanirdeśaḥ ayam . u
GS24pmbhasuu:10988: uka ūka la ūka loka iti . ukapratiṣedhe kameḥ bhāṣāyām apratiṣedhaḥ . ukapratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:10989: kameḥ bhāṣāyām pratiṣedhaḥ na bhavati iti vaktavyam . dasyāḥ kāmukaḥ . vṛṣalyāḥ kāmukaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10990: . avyayapratiṣedhe tosunkasunoḥ apratiṣedhaḥ . avyayapratiṣedhe tosunkasunoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10991: na bhavati iti vaktavyam . purā sūryasya udetoḥ ādheyaḥ . purā vatsānām apākartoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10992: . purā krūrasya visṛpaḥ virapśin . śānaṃścānaśśatṝṛṇām upasaṅkhyānam . śānaṃścānaśśatṝṛṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:10993: upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . somam pavamānaḥ . naḍam āghnānaḥ . adhīyan pārāyaṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10994: laprayoge na iti pratiṣedhaḥ na prāpnoti . mā bhūt evam . tṛn iti evam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:10995: . katham . tṛn iti na idam pratyayagrahaṇam . kim tarhi . pratyāhāragrahaṇam . kva
GS24pmbhasuu:10996: saṃniviṣṭānām pratyāhāraḥ . laṭaḥ śatṛ iti ataḥ prabhṛti ā tṛnaḥ nakārāt . yadi pratyāhāragrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:10997: caurasya dviṣan vṛṣalasya dviṣan atra api prāpnoti . dviṣaḥ śatuḥ vāvacanam . dviṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10998: śatuḥ vā iti vaktavyam . tat ca avaśyaṃ vaktavyam pratyayagrhaṇe sati pratiṣedhārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:10999: . tat eva pratyāhāragrahaṇe sati vidhyartham bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:11001: 840-841 akasya bhaviṣyati . akasya bhaviṣyati iti vaktavyam . yavān lāvakaḥ vrajati
GS24pmbhasuu:11002: . odanam bhojakaḥ vrajati . saktūnpāyakaḥ vrajati . inaḥ ādhamarṇye ca . tataḥ inaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11003: ādhamarṇye ca bhaviṣyati ca iti vaktavyam . śatam dāyī . sahasram dāyī . grāmam gāmī .
GS24pmbhasuu:11005: 841-842 kartṛgrahaṇam kimartham . karmaṇi mā bhūt iti . na etat asti prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11006: bhāvakarmaṇoḥ kṛtyāḥ vidhīyante ṭatra kṛtyaiḥ abhihitatvāt karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhī na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:11007: . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . bhavyādīnām karmaṇaḥ anabhidhānāt kṛtyānām kartṛgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:11008: . bhavyādīnām karma kṛtyaiḥ anabhitam . geyaḥ māṇavakaḥ sāmnām . bhavyādīnam karmaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11009: anabhidhānāt kṛtyānām kartṛgrahaṇam kriyate . kim ucyate bhavyādīnām karma kṛtyaiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11010: anabhitam iti . na iha api anabhihitaṃ bhavati . ākraṣṭavyā grāṃam śākhā iti . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:11011: tarhi yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . kṛtyānām . kṛtyānām prayoge ṣaṣṭhī na bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11012: . kim udāharaṇam . grāmam ākraṣṭavyā śākhā . tataḥ kartari vā iti . iha api tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:11013: prāpnoti . geyaḥ māṇavakaḥ sāmnām iti . ubhayaprāptau iti vartate . nanu ca ubhayaprāptiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11014: eṣā . geyaḥ māṇavakaḥ sāmnām iti ca geyāni māṇavakena sāmāni iti ca bhavati . ubhayaprāptiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11015: nāma sā bhavati yatra ubhayasya yugapatprasaṅgaḥ atra ca yadā karmaṇi na tadā kartari
GS24pmbhasuu:11016: yadā kartari na tadā karmaṇi iti.
GS24pmbhasuu:11018: 843 - 846 kimartham idam ucyate . pratyadhikaraṇam vacanotpatteḥ saṅkhyāsāmānādhikaraṇyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11019: ca dvigoḥ ekavacanavidhānam . pratyadhikaraṇam vacanotpattiḥ bhavati . kim idam pratyadhikaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:11020: iti . adhikaraṇam adhikaraṇam prati pratyadhikaraṇam . saṅkhyāsāmānādhikaraṇyāt ca
GS24pmbhasuu:11021: . saṅkhyayā bahvarthayā ca asya sāmānādhikaraṇyam . pratyadhikaraṇam vacanotpatteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11022: saṅkhyāsāmānādhikaraṇyāt ca bahuṣu bahuvacanam iti bahuvacanam prāpnoti . iṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:11023: ca ekavacanam syāt iti . tat ca antareṇa yatnam na sidhyati iti dvigoḥ ekavacanavidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:11024: . evamartham idam ucyate . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . tatra anuprayogasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11025: ekavacanābhāvaḥ advigutvāt . tatra anuprayogasya ekavacanam na prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:11026: pañcapūlī iyam iti . kim kāraṇam . advigutvāt . dvigoḥ ekavacanm iti ucyate . na
GS24pmbhasuu:11027: ca atra anuprayogaḥ dvigusañjñaḥ . siddham tu dvigvarthasya ekavadvacanāt . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:11028: etat . katham . dvigvarthaḥ ekavat bhavati iti vaktavyam . tat tarhi vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11029: na vaktavyam . na idam pāṛibhāṣikasya vacanasya grahaṇam . kim tarhi . anvarthagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:11030: . ucyate vacanam . ekasya arthasya vacanam ekavacanam . ekaśeṣapratiṣedhaḥ ca . ekaśeṣasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11031: ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . pañcapūlī ca pañcapūlī ca pañcapūlī ca pañcapūlyaḥ . na
GS24pmbhasuu:11032: vā anyasya anekatvāt . na vā vaktavyaḥ . kim kāraṇam . anyasya anekatvāt . na etat
GS24pmbhasuu:11033: dvigoḥ anekatvam . kasya tarhi . dvigvarthasamudāyasya . samāhāragrahaṇam ca taddhitārthapratiṣedhārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:11034: . samāhāragrahaṇam ca kartavyam . kim prayojanam . taddhitārthapratiṣedhārtham .
GS24pmbhasuu:11035: taddhitārthe yaḥ dviguḥ tasya mā bhūt iti . pañcakapālau pañcakapālāḥ iti . kim punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11036: ayam pañcakapālaśabdaḥ pratyekam parisamāpyate āhosvit samudāye vartate . kim ca
GS24pmbhasuu:11037: ataḥ . yadi pratyekam parisamāpyate purastāt eva coditam parihṛtam ca. atha samudāye
GS24pmbhasuu:11038: vartate . na vā samāhāraikatvāt . na vā etat samāhāraikatvāt api sidhyati . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:11039: tarhi pratyekam parisamāpyate . purastāt eva coditam parihṛtam ca. aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:11040: na vā samāhāraikatvāt . na vā yogārambheṇa eva arthaḥ . kim kāraṇam . samāhāraikatvāt . ekaḥ ayam samāhāraḥ nāma . tasya ekatvāt ekavacanam bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:11043: tatpūrvapadottarapadagrahaṇam kartavyam . prāṇyaṅgānām prāṇyaṅaiḥ iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11044: tūryāṅgāṇāṃ tūryāṅgaiḥ . senāṅgānām senāṅgaiḥ iti . kim prayojanam . vyatikaraḥ mā
GS24pmbhasuu:11045: bhūt iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . yogavibhāgāt siddham . yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate .

GS24pmbhasuu:11211: nityatvāt anudāttatvam . kṛte api litsvare prāptnoti akṛte api . tatra nityatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11212: anudāttatve kṛte liti pūrvaḥ udāttabhāvī na asti iti kṛtvā yathāprāptaḥ pratyayasvaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11213: prasajyeta . tat yathā goṣpadapram vṛṣṭaḥ devaḥ iti ūlope kṛte pūrvaḥ udāttabhāvī
GS24pmbhasuu:11214: na asti iti kṛtvā yathāprāptaḥ pratyayasvaraḥ bhavati . tasmāt tratasoḥ anudāttatvam vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11216: 868-869 kasya ayam enaḥ vidhīyate . etadaḥ prāpnoti . idamaḥ api tu iṣyate . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:11217: idamaḥ grahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . idamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11218: anvādeśe aś anudāttaḥ tṛtīyādau iti . yadi tat anuvartate etadaḥ tratasoḥ tratasau
GS24pmbhasuu:11219: ca anudāttau iti idamaḥ ca iti idamaḥ api prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . sambandham anuvartiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:11220: . idamaḥ anvādeśe aś anudāttaḥ tṛtīyādau . etadaḥ tratasoḥ tratasau ca anudāttau
GS24pmbhasuu:11221: idamaḥ anvādeśe aś anudāttaḥ tṛtīyādau aś bhavati . tataḥ dvitīyāṭaussu enaḥ idamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11222: etadaḥ ca . tṛtīyādau iti nivṛttam . atha vā maṇḍūkagatayaḥ adhikārāḥ . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:11223: maṇḍūkāḥ utplutya utplutya gacchanti tadvat adhikārāḥ . atha vā ekayogaḥ kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:11224: . idamaḥ anvādeśe aś anudāttaḥ tṛtīyādau iti etadaḥ tratasoḥ tratasau ca anudāttau
GS24pmbhasuu:11225: . tataḥ dvitīyāṭaussu enaḥ idamaḥ etadaḥ ca . atha vā ubhayam nivṛttam . tat apekṣiṣyāmahe
GS24pmbhasuu:11226: . enat iti napuṃsakaikavacane . enat iti napuṃsakaikavacanekartavyam . kuṇḍam ānaya
GS24pmbhasuu:11227: prakṣālaya enat parivartaya enat . yadi enat kriyate enaḥ na kartavyaḥ . kā rūpasiddhiḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:11228: atho enam atho ene atho enān iti ṭyadādyatvena siddham . yadi evam enaśritakaḥ na sidhyati . enacchritakaḥ iti pāpnoti . yathālakṣaṇam aprayukte
GS24pmbhasuu:11230: 870-872 jagdhyādiṣu ārdhadhātukāśrayatvāt sati tasmin vidhānam . jagdhyādiṣu ārdhadhātukāśrayatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11231: sati tasmin ārdhadhātuke jagdhyādibhiḥ bhavitavyam . kim ataḥ yat sati bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:11232: . tatra utsargalakṣaṇapratiṣedhaḥ . tatra utsargalakṣaṇam kāryam prāpnoti . tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11233: pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . bhavyam praveyam ākhyeyam . ṇyati avasthite aniṣṭe pratyaye
GS24pmbhasuu:11234: ādeśaḥ syāt . ṇyataḥ śravaṇam prasajyeta . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . sāmānyāśrayatvāt viśeṣasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11235: anāśrayaḥ . sāmānyena hi āśrīyamāṇe viśeṣaḥ na āśritaḥ bhavati . tatra ārdhadhātukasāmānye
GS24pmbhasuu:11236: jagdhyādiṣu kṛteṣu yaḥ yataḥ pratyayaḥ prāpnoti saḥ tataḥ bhaviṣyati . sāmānyāśrayatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11237: viśeṣasya anāśrayaḥ iti cet uvarṇākārāntebhyaḥ ṇyadvidhiprasaṅgaḥ . sāmānyāśrayatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11238: viśeṣasya anāśrayaḥ iti cet uvarṇākārāntebhyaḥ ṇyat prāpnoti . lavyam pavyam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11239: . ārdhadhātukasāmānye guṇe kṛti yi pratyayasāmānya ca vāntādeśe halantāt iti ṇyat
GS24pmbhasuu:11240: prāpnoti . iha ca ditsyam dhitsyam ārdhadhātukasāmānye akāralope kṛte halantāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11241: ṇyat prāpnoti . paurvāparyābhāt ca sāmānyena anupapattiḥ . paurvāparyābhāt ca sāmānyena
GS24pmbhasuu:11242: jagdhyādīnām anupapattiḥ . na hi sāmānyena paurvāparyam asti . siddham tu sārvadhātuke
GS24pmbhasuu:11243: pratiṣedhāt . siddham etat . katham . aviśeṣeṇa jagdhyādīn uktvā sārvadhātuke na
GS24pmbhasuu:11244: iti pratiṣedham vakṣyāmi . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu
GS24pmbhasuu:11245: . nanu ca uktam jagdhyādiṣu ārdhadhātukāśrayatvāt sati tasmin vidhānam iti . parihṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:11246: etat sāmānyāśrayatvāt viśeṣasya anāśrayaḥ iti . nanu ca uktam sāmānyāśrayatvāt viśeṣasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11247: anāśrayaḥ iti cet uvarṇākārāntebhyaḥ ṇyadvidhiprasaṅgaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . vakṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:11248: tatra ajgrahaṇasya prayojanam ajantabhūtapūrvamātrāt api yathā syāt iti . yat api
GS24pmbhasuu:11249: ucyate paurvāparyābhāt ca sāmānyena anupapattiḥ iti . arthasiddhiḥ eva eṣā yat sāmānyena
GS24pmbhasuu:11250: paurvāparyam na asti . asati paurvāparye viṣayasaptamī vijñāsyate . ārdhadhātukaviṣaye
GS24pmbhasuu:11251: iti . atha vā ārdhadhātukāsu iti vakṣyāmi . kāsu ārdhadhātukāsu . uktiṣu yuktiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:11254: 873 lyabgrahaṇam kimartham na ti kiti iti eva siddham . lyapi kṛte na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11255: idam iha sampradhāryam . lyap kriyatām ādeśaḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11256: lyap . antaraṅgaḥ ādeśaḥ . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat lyabgrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:11257: ācāryaḥ antaraṅgān api vidhīn bahiraṅgaḥ lyap bādhate iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:11258: . lyabadeśe upadeśivadvacanam anādiṣṭārtham bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt iti vakṣyati . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:11259: na vaktavyam bhavati . jagdhiḥ vidhiḥ lyapi yat tat akasmāt siddham asti kiti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11260: vidhānāt . hiprabhṛtīn tu sadā bahiraṅgaḥ lyaP bharati iti kṛtam tat u viddhi . eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11261: eva arthaḥ jagdhau siddhe antaraṅgatvāt ti kiti iti lyap ucyate . jñāpayati antaraṅgāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:11264: 874 ghasḷbhāve aci upasaṅkhyānam . ghasḷbhāve aci upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . prātti iti praghasaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11266: 874 kimayam vadhiḥ vyañjantaḥ āhosvit adantaḥ . kim ca ataḥ . yadi vyañjanāntaḥ vadhau
GS24pmbhasuu:11267: vyañjanānte uktam . kim uktam . vadhyādeśe vṛddhitatvapratiṣedhaḥ iḍvidhiḥ ca iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11268: . atha adantaḥ na doṣaḥ bhavati . yathā na doṣaḥ tathā astu .
GS24pmbhasuu:11270: 874 iṇvat ikaḥ . iṇvat ikaḥ iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt . adhyagāt adhyagātām .
GS24pmbhasuu:11272: 875 iṇvat ikaḥ iti eva . adhigamayati adhigamayataḥ aghigamayanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11274: 875 iṇvat ikaḥ iti eva . aghijigamiṣati adhijigamiśataḥ adhijigamiṣanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11276: 875-877 ṅitkaraṇam kimartham . gāṅi anubandhakaraṇam viśeṣaṇāṛtham . gāṅi anubandhakaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:11277: kriyate viśeṣaṇāṛtham . kva viśeṣaṇārthena arthaḥ . gāṅkuṭādibhyaḥ añṇit ṅit iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11278: . gākuṭādibhyaḥ añṇit ṅit iti iyati ucyamāne iṇādeśasya api prasajyeta . jñāpakam
GS24pmbhasuu:11279: vā sānubandhakasya ādeśavacane itkāryābhāvasya . atha vā etat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ sānubandhakasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11280: ādeśe itkāryam na bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . prayojanam cakṣiṅaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11281: khyāñ . ṅitaḥ iti ātmanepadam na bhavati . laṭaḥ śatṛśānacau . laṭaḥ śatṛśānacau
GS24pmbhasuu:11282: prayojanam . pacamānaḥ yajamānaḥ iti . ṭitaḥ iti etvam na bhavati . yuvoḥ anākau
GS24pmbhasuu:11283: . yuvoḥ anākau ca prayojanam . nandanaḥ kārakaḥ nandanā kārikā iti . ugillakṣaṇau
GS24pmbhasuu:11284: ṅībnumau na bhavataḥ . meḥ ca ananubandhakasya amvacanam . meḥ ca ananubandhakasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11285: amvaktavyaḥ . acinavam akaravam asunavam . atyalpam idam ucyate . tiptibmipām iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11287: veda vettha . asya jñāpakasya santi doṣāḥ santi prayojanāni . doṣāḥ samāḥ bhūyāṃsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11288: vā . tasmāt na arthaḥ anena jñāpakena . katham yāni prayojanāni . na etāni santi
GS24pmbhasuu:11289: . iha tāvat . cakṣiṅaḥ khyāñ iti . ñitkaraṇasāmarthyāt vibhāṣā ātmanepadam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:11290: . laṭaḥ śatṛśānacau iti . vakṣyati etat . prakṛtānām ātmanepadānām etvam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:11291: iti . yuvoḥ anākau iti . vakṣyati etat . siddham tu yuvoḥ ananunāsikatvāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11293: 877-879 kim ayam kaśādiḥ āhośvit khayādiḥ . cakṣiṅaḥ kśāñkhyāñau . cakiṅaḥ khyāñ
GS24pmbhasuu:11294: kaśādiḥ khayādiḥ ca . khaśādiḥ vā . atha vā khaśādiḥ bhaviṣyati . kena idānīm kaśādiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11295: bhaviṣyati . cartvena . atha khayādiḥ katham . asiddhe śasya yavacanam vibhāṣā .
GS24pmbhasuu:11296: asiddhe śasya vibhāṣā yatvam vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . prayojanam sauprakhye vuñvidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11297: . sauprakhyaḥ iti yopadhalakṣaṇaḥ vuñvidhiḥ na bhavati . sauprakhyīyaḥ . vṛddhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11298: chaḥ bhavati . niṣṭhānatvam ākhyāte . ākhyātaḥ iti niṣṭhānatvam na bhavati . ruvidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11299: puṅkhyāne . puṅkhyānam iti ruvidhiḥ na bhavati . ṇatvam paryākhyāte . paryākhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:11300: iti ṇatvam na bhavati . sasthānatvam namaḥ khyātre . namaḥ khyātre iti sasthānatvam na bhavati.
GS24pmbhasuu:11302: 879 varjane pratiṣedhaḥ . varjane pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . avasañcakṣyāḥ parisañcakṣyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11303: . asanayoḥ ca . asanayoḥ ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . nṛcakṣāḥ rakṣaḥ . vicakṣaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11304: iti . bahulam taṇi . bahulam taṇi iti vaktavyam . kim idam taṇi iti . sañjñāchandasoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11305: grahaṇam . kim prayojanam . annavadhakagātravicakṣaṇājirādyartham . anna . annam
GS24pmbhasuu:11306: . vadhaka . vadhakam . gātra . gātram paśya . vicakṣaṇa . vicakṣaṇaḥ . ajira . ajire tiṣṭhati .
GS24pmbhasuu:11308: 880-881 ghañapoḥ pratiṣedhe kyapaḥ upasaṅkhyānam . ghañapoḥ pratiṣedhe kyapaḥ upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:11309: kartavyam . iha api yathā syāt . samajanam samajyā iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na
GS24pmbhasuu:11310: vaktavyam . api iti eva bhaviṣyati . katham . api iti na idam pratyayagrahaṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11311: kim tarhi . pratyāhāragrahaṇam . kva sanniviṣṭānām pratyāhāraḥ . apaḥ akātāt prabhṛti
GS24pmbhasuu:11312: ā kyapaḥ pakārāt . yadi pratyāhāragrahaṇam saṃvītiḥ na sidhyati . evam tarhi na arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11313: uapsaṅkhyānena na api ghañnapoḥ pratiṣedhena . idam asti . cakṣiṅaḥ khyāñ vā liṭi
GS24pmbhasuu:11314: iti . tataḥ vakṣyāmi . ajeḥ vī bhavati vā vyavasthitavibhāṣā ca iti . tena iha ca bhaviṣyati :
GS24pmbhasuu:11316: saṃvītiḥ iti . iha ca na bhaviṣyati : samājaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11321: samajyā iti . tatra ayam api arthaḥ . idam api siddham bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:11322: prājitā iti . kim ca bhoḥ iṣyate etat rūpam . bāḍham iṣyate . evam hi kaḥ cit vaiyākaraṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11323: āha . kaḥ asya rathasya pravetā iti . sūtaḥ āha . āyuṣman aham prājitā iti . vaiyākaraṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11324: āha . apaśabdaḥ iti . sūtaḥ āha . prāpitjñaḥ devānām priyaḥ na tu iṣṭajñaḥ . iṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:11325: etat rūpam iti . vaiyākaraṇaḥ āha . āho khalu anena durutena bādhyāmahe iti . sūtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11326: āha . na khalu veñaḥ sūtaḥ . suvateḥ eva sūtaḥ . yadi suvateḥ kutsā prayoktavyā .
GS24pmbhasuu:11327: duḥsūtena iti vaktavyam . na tarhi idānīm idam vā yau iti vaktavyam . vaktavyam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:11328: . kim prayojanam . na iyam vibhāṣā . kim tarhi . ādeśaḥ ayam vidhīyate . vā iti ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:11329: ādeśaḥ bhavati ajeḥ yau parataḥ . vāyuḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11331: 881-882 aṇiñoḥ luki tadrājāt yuvapratyayasya upasaṅkhyānam . aṇiñoḥ luki tadrājāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11332: yuvapratyayasya upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . baudhiḥ pitā baudhīḥ putraḥ audumbariḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11334: aṇiñoḥ luki kṣatriyagotramātrāt yuvapratyayasya upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam iti . jābāliḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11335: pitā jābāliḥ putraḥ . aparaḥ āha . abrāhmaṇagotramātrāt yuvapratyayasya upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:11336: kartavyam iti . kim prayojanam . idam api siddham bhavati . bhāṇḍijaṅghiḥ pitā bhāṇḍijaṅghiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11339: 882-893 tadrājādīnām luki samāsabahutve pratiṣedhaḥ . tadrājādīnām luki samāsabahutve
GS24pmbhasuu:11340: pratiṣedhaḥ . priyaḥ āṅgaḥ eṣām te ime priyāṅgāḥ . priyaḥ vāṅgaḥ eṣām te ime priyavāṅgāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11341: iti . kim ucyate samāsabahutve pratiṣedhaḥ iti yāvatā tena eva cet kṛtam bahutvam
GS24pmbhasuu:11342: iti ucyate na ca atra tena eva kṛtam bahutvam . bhavati vai kim cit ācāryāḥ kriyamāṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:11343: api codayanti . tat vā kartavyam tena eva cet bahutvam iti samāsabahutve vā pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11344: vaktavyaḥ iti . abahutve ca lugvacanam . abahutve ca luk vaktavyaḥ . atikrāntaḥ aṅgān
GS24pmbhasuu:11345: atyaṅgaḥ . bahuvacane parataḥ yaḥ tadrājaḥ iti evam kṛtvā codyate . atha kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:11346: punaḥ idam na bahuvacane iti eva siddham . na sidhyati . bahuvacane iti ucyate na
GS24pmbhasuu:11347: ca atra bahuvacanam paśyāmaḥ . pratyayalakṣaṇena bhaviṣyati . na lumatā tasmin iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11348: pratyayalakṣaṇasya pratiṣedhaḥ . na lumatā āṅgasya iti vakṣyāmi . na evam śakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:11349: . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt . pañcabhiḥ gārgībhiḥ krītaḥ paṭaḥ pañcagārgyaḥ daśagārgyaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11350: . dvandve abahuṣu lugvacanam . dvandve abahuṣu luk vaktavyaḥ . gargavatsavājāḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11351: . iha ca luk vaktavyaḥ . gargebhyaḥ āgatam gargarūpyam gargamayam iti . iha ca atrayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11352: iti udāttanivṛttisvaraḥ prāpnoti . siddham tu pratyayārthabahutve lugvacanāt . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:11353: etat . katham . pratyayārthabahutve luk vaktavyaḥ . yadi pratyayārthabahutve luk
GS24pmbhasuu:11354: ucyate astriyām iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt :
GS24pmbhasuu:11356: vāṅgyaḥ striyaḥ iti . yasya punaḥ bahuvacane parataḥ luk ucyate tasya īkāreṇa vyavahitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11357: na bhaviṣyati . yasya api bahuvacane parataḥ luk ucyate tena api astriyām iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:11358: āmbaṣṭhyāḥ striyaḥ sauvīryāḥ striyaḥ iti evamartham . atra api cāpā vyavadhānam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11359: ekādeśe kṛte na asti vyavhadānam . ekādeśaḥ pūvavidhau sthānivat bhavati iti sthānivadbhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11360: vyavadhānam eva . dvandve abahuṣu lugvacanam . dvandve abahuṣu luk vaktavyaḥ . gargavatsavājāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11361: iti . gotrasya bahuṣu lopinaḥ bahuvacanāntasya pravṛttau dvyekayoḥ aluk . gotrasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11362: bahuṣu lopinaḥ bahuvacanāntasya pravṛttau dvyekayoḥ aluk vaktavyaḥ . bidānām apatyam
GS24pmbhasuu:11363: māṇavakaḥ baidaḥ baidau . kimartham idam na aci iti eva aluk siddhaḥ . aci iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:11364: . na ca atra ajādim paśyāmaḥ . pratyayalakṣaṇena . varṇāśraye na asti pratyayalakṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:11365: . ekavacanadvivacanāntasya pravṛttau bahuṣu lopaḥ yūni . ekavacanadvivacanāntasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11366: pravṛttau bahuṣu lopaḥ yūni vaktavyaḥ . baidasya apatyam bahavaḥ māṇavakāḥ bidāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11367: baidayoḥ vā bidāḥ . añ yaḥ bahuṣu yañ yaḥ bahuṣu iti ucyamānaḥ luk na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11368: mā bhūt evam . añantam yat bahuṣu yañantam yat bahuṣu iti evam bhaviṣyati . na evam
GS24pmbhasuu:11369: śakyam . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt . kāśyapapratikṛtayaḥ kāśyapāḥ iti . na vā sarveṣām dvandve
GS24pmbhasuu:11370: bahvarthatvāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . sarveṣām dvandve bahvarthatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:11371: sarvāṇi dvandve bahvarthāni . katham . yugapat adhikaraṇavivakṣāyām dvandvaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:11372: . tataḥ ayam āha yasya bahuvacane parataḥ luk . yadi sarvāṇi dvandve bahvarthāni
GS24pmbhasuu:11373: aham api idam acodyam codye . dvandve abahuṣu lugvacanam iti . mama api sarvatra
GS24pmbhasuu:11374: bahuvacanam param bhavati . luke kṛte na prāpnoti . pratyayalakṣaṇena . na lumatā
GS24pmbhasuu:11375: tasmin iti pratyayalakṣaṇasya pratiṣedhaḥ . na lumatā āṅgasya iti vakṣyāmi . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:11376: ca uktam na evam śakyam . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt . pañcabhiḥ gārgībhiḥ krītaḥ paṭaḥ pañcagārgyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11377: daśagārgyaḥ iti . iṣtam eva etat saṅgṛhītam . pañcagargaḥ daśagargaḥ iti eva bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:11378: . tathā idam aparam acodyam codye . gargarūpyam gargamayam . atra api bahuvacane
GS24pmbhasuu:11379: iti eva siddham katham . samarthāt taddhitaḥ utpadyate . sāmarthyam ca subantena
GS24pmbhasuu:11380: . tataḥ ayam āha yasya prtayayārthabahutve luk . yadi samarthāt taddhitaḥ utpadyate
GS24pmbhasuu:11381: aham api idam acodyam codye . gotrasya bahuṣu lopinaḥ bahuvacanāntasya pravṛttau
GS24pmbhasuu:11382: dvyekayoḥ aluk iti . katham . yasya api bahuvacane parataḥ luk tena api atra aluk
GS24pmbhasuu:11383: vaktavyaḥ . tasya api hi atra bahuvacanam param bhavati . na vaktavyaḥ . aci iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11384: evam aluk siddhaḥ . aci iti ucyate . na ca atra ajādim paśyāmaḥ . nanu ca uktam pratyayalakṣaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:11385: . varṇāśraye na asti pratyayalakṣaṇam iti . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:11386: vā kāni cit varṇāśrayāṇi api pratyayalakṣaṇena bhavanti tathā idam api bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:11387: . atha vā aviśeṣeṇa alukam uktvā hali na iti vakṣyāmi . yadi aviśeṣeṇa alukam uktvā
GS24pmbhasuu:11388: hali na iti ucyate bidānām apatyam bahavaḥ māṇavakāḥ bidāḥ atra api aluk prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:11389: . astu . punaḥ asya yuvabahutve vartamānasya luk bhaviṣyati . punaḥ aluk kasmāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:11390: bhavati . samarthānām prathamasya gotrapratyayāntasya aluk ucyate na ca tat samarthānām
GS24pmbhasuu:11391: prathamam gotrapratyayāntam . kim tarhi . dvitīyam artham upasaṅkrāntam . avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:11392: ca etat evam vijñeyam atribharadvājikā vasiṣṭhakaśyapikā bhṛgvaṅgirasikā kutsakuśikā
GS24pmbhasuu:11393: iti evamartham . gargabhārgavikāgrahaṇam vā kriyate . tat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:11394: . etasya eva dvitīyam artham upasaṅkrāntasya aluk bhavati na anyasya iti . yat api
GS24pmbhasuu:11395: ucyate ekavacanadvivacanāntasya pravṛttau bahuṣu lopaḥ yūni vaktavyaḥ iti . mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:11396: evam añ yaḥ bahuṣu yañ yaḥ bahuṣu iti . añantam yatbahuṣu yañantam yat bahuṣu iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11397: evam bhaviṣyati . nanu ca uktam na evam śakyam . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt . kāśyapapratikṛtayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11398: kāśyapāḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . laukikasya tatra gotrasya grahaṇam . na ca etat laukikam
GS24pmbhasuu:11399: gotram . yasya bahuvacane parataḥ luk samāsabahutve tena pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ tena
GS24pmbhasuu:11400: eva cet kṛtam bahutvam iti vā vaktavyam . yasya pratyayārthabahutve luk tena astriyām
GS24pmbhasuu:11401: iti vaktavyam . yasya bahuvacane parataḥ luk tasya ayam adhikaḥ doṣaḥ atraḥ iti udāttanivṛttisvaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11402: prāpnoti . tasmāt pratyayārthabahutve luk iti eṣaḥ pakṣaḥ jyāyān . atha iha katham
GS24pmbhasuu:11403: bhavitavyam . gārgī ca bātsyaḥ ca iti . yadi tāvat astri vidhinā āśrīyate asti atra
GS24pmbhasuu:11404: astrī iti kṛtvā bhavitavyam lukā . atha strī pratiṣedhena āśrīyate asti atra strī
GS24pmbhasuu:11405: iti kṛtvā bhavitavyam pratiṣedhena . kim punaḥ atra arthasatattvam . devāḥ etat jñātum
GS24pmbhasuu:11406: arhanti . atha yaḥ lopyalopinām samāsaḥ tatra katham bhavitavyam . ubhayam hi dṛśyate
GS24pmbhasuu:11407: . śaradvat śunakadarbhāt bhruguvat sāgrāyaṇeṣu na udāttasvaritodayam agārgyakāśyapagālavānām iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11409: 893 yañādīnām ekadvayoḥ vā tatpuruṣe ṣaṣṭhyāḥ upasaṅkhyānam . yañādīnām ekadvayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11410: vā tatpuruṣe ṣaṣṭhyāḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . gārgyasya kulam gārgyakulam gargakulam

GS24pmbhasuu:11412: vā . baidayoḥ kulam baidakulam bidakulam vā . yañādīnām iti kimartham . āṅgasya kulam
GS24pmbhasuu:11413: āṅgakulam. āṅgayoḥ kulam āṅgakulam . ekadvayoḥ iti kimartham . gargāṇām kulam gargakulam
GS24pmbhasuu:11414: . tatpuruṣe iti kimartham. gārgyasya samīpam upagārgyam . ṣaṣṭhyāḥ iti kim . śobhanagārgyaḥ paramagārgyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11416: 893-894 kim ayam samuccayaḥ . prākṣu bharateṣu ca iti . āhosvit bharataviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:11417: prāggrahaṇam . prāñcaḥ ye bharatāḥ iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi samuccayaḥ bharatagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:11418: anarthakam . na hi anyatra bharatā santi . atha prāggrahaṇam bharataviśeṣaṇam prāggrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:11419: anarthakam . na hi aprāñcaḥ bharatāḥ santi . evam tarhi samuccayaḥ . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:11420: bharatagrahaṇam anarthakam . na hi anyatra bharatā santi iti . na anarthakam. jñāpakārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:11421: . kim jñāpyate . etat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ anyatra prāggrahaṇe bharatagrahaṇam na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:11422: iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . iñaḥ prācām bharatgrahaṇam na bhavati . auddālakiḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:11427: 894-895 kimartham advandve iti ucyate . dvandve mā bhūt iti . na etat asti prayojanam . iṣyate eva dvandve :
GS24pmbhasuu:11428: bhraṣṭakakapiṣṭhalāḥ bhrāṣṭakikāpiṣthalayaḥ iti . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati advandve iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11429: dvandvādhikāranivṛttyartham . advandve iti ucyate dvandvādhikāranivṛttyartham . dvandvādhikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11430: nivartate . tasmin nivṛtte aviśeṣeṇa dvandve ca advandve ca bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:11433: kartavyam . agastikauṇḍinac iti etau prakṛtyādeśau bhavataḥ iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:11434: . lukpratiṣedhe vṛddhyartham . lukpratiṣedhe vṛddhiḥ yathā syāt . pratyayāntanipātane
GS24pmbhasuu:11435: hi vṛddhyabhāvaḥ . pratyayāntanipātane hi sati vṛddhyabhāvaḥ syāt . āgastīyāḥ kauṇḍinyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11436: iti . yadi prakrṭinipātanam kriyate kena idānīm pratyayasya lopaḥ bhaviṣyati . adhikārāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11437: pratyayalopaḥ . adhikārāt pratyayalopaḥ bhaviṣyati . tat tarhi prakṛtinipātanam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:11438: . na kartavyam . yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . āgastyakauṇḍinyayoḥ bahuṣu luk bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:11439: . tataḥ agastikuṇḍinac iti etau prakṛtyādeśau bhavataḥ āgastyakauṇḍinyayoḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11440: evam api pratyayāntayoḥ eva prāpnoti . pratyayāntāt hi bhavān ṣaṣṭhīm uccārayati
GS24pmbhasuu:11441: . āgastyakauṇḍinyayoḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yathā hi paribhāṣitam pratyayasya lukślulupaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11442: bhavanti iti pratyayasya eva bhaviṣyati . avaśiṣṭasya ādeśau bhaviṣyataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11444: 896-897 ūtaḥ aci .ūtaḥ aci iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . sanīsrasaḥ danīdhvasaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11445: . atha ūtaḥ iti ucyamāne iha kasmāt na bhavati . yoyūyaḥ rorūvaḥ . vihitaviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:11446: ūkārāntagrahaṇan . ūkārāntāt yaḥ vihitaḥ iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:11447: . iṣṭam eva etat saṅgṛhītam . sanīsraṃsaḥ danīdhvaṃsaḥ iti eva bhavitavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11449: 897-898 gāpoḥ grahaṇe iṇpibatyoḥ grahaṇam . gāpoḥ grahaṇe iṇpibatyoḥ grahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:11450: . iṇaḥ yaḥ gāśabdaḥ pibateḥ yaḥ pāśabdaḥ iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . agāsīt naṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11451: . apāsīt dhanam iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . iṇaḥ grahaṇe tāvat vārtam
GS24pmbhasuu:11452: . nirdeśāt eva idam vyaktam lugvikaraṇasya grahaṇam iti . pāgrahaṇe ca api vārtam
GS24pmbhasuu:11453: . vaktavyam eva etat sarvatra eva pāgrahaṇe alugvikaraṇasya grahaṇam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11455: 898 tathāsoḥ ātmanepadavacanam . tathāsoḥ ātmanepadasya grahaṇam kartavyam . ātmanepadam
GS24pmbhasuu:11456: yau tathāsau iti vaktavyam . ekavacanagrahaṇam vā . atha vā ekavacane ye tathāsī
GS24pmbhasuu:11457: iti vaktavyam . tat ca avaśyam anyatarat kartavyam . avacane hi aniṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11458: anucyamāne hi etasmin aniṣṭam prasajyeta . ataniṣṭa yūpam . asaniṣṭa yūpam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11459: tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . yadi api tāvat ayam taśabdaḥ dṛṣṭāpacāraḥ asti
GS24pmbhasuu:11460: ātmanepadam asti eva parasmaipadam asti ekavacanam asti bahuvacanam ayam khalu thāsśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11461: adṛṣṭāpacāraḥ ātmanepadam ekavacanam eva . tasya asya kaḥ anyaḥ sahāyaḥ bhavitum
GS24pmbhasuu:11462: arhati anyat ataḥ ātmanepadāt ekavacanāt ca . tat yathā asyas goḥ dvitīyena arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11463: iti . gauḥ eva ānīyate na aśvaḥ na gardabhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11465: 898-899 āmaḥ leḥ lope luṅloṭoḥ upasaṅkhyānam . āmaḥ leḥ lope luṅloṭoḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam :

GS24pmbhasuu:11467: . na vaktavyam . ligrahaṇam nivartiṣyate . yadi nivartate pratyayamātrasya prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:11468: . iṣyate ca pratyayamātrasya . ātaḥ ca iṣyate . evam hi āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:11469: kṛñ ca anuprayujyate liṭi iti . yadi ca pratyayamātrasya luk bhavati tataḥ etat upapannam
GS24pmbhasuu:11470: bhavati . āmantebhyaḥ ṇalaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . āmantebhyaḥ ṇalaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11471: . śaśāma tatāma . vṛddhau kṛtyāyām āmaḥ iti luk prāpnoti . āmantebhyaḥ arthavadgrahaṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11472: ṇalaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ . āmantebhyaḥ ṇalaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ . anarthakaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:11475: arthavadgrahaṇāt ṇalaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ iti cet amaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . āmantebhyaḥ arthavadgrahaṇāt

GS24pmbhasuu:11480: . luk ādeśānām apavādaḥ . tiṅkṛtābhāvaḥ tu . tiṅkṛtasya tu abhāvaḥ . kasya . padatvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11481: . subantapadatvāt siddham . subantam padam iti padasañjñā bhaviṣyati . katham svādyutpattiḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:11483: prātipadikam iti prātipadikasañjñā . tadāśrayam pratyayavidhānam . prātipadikāśrayatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11484: svādyutpattiḥ bhaviṣyati . supaḥ śravaṇam prāpnoti . avyayāt iti luk bhaviṣyati .

GS24pmbhasuu:11486: iti avyayasañjñā bhaviṣyati . svaraḥ katham . yat prakārayām cakāra . svaraḥ kṛdantaprakṛtisvaratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11487: . kṛdantam uttarapadam prakṛtisvaram bhavati iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ bhaviṣyati . tathā ca

GS24pmbhasuu:11489: cakāra . tiṅ atiṅaḥ iti tasya ca anighātaḥ . tasmāt ca nighātaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati .

GS24pmbhasuu:11492: iti . na atra nañaḥ āmantena sāmarthyam . kena tarhi . tiṅantena . na cakāra kārayām

GS24pmbhasuu:11496: . kim kāraṇam . liṅgābhāvāt . aliṅgam avyayam . kim idam bhavān supaḥ lukam mṛṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:11497: āpaḥ lukam na mṛṣyati . yathā eva hi aliṅgam avyayam evam asaṅkhyam api . satyam
GS24pmbhasuu:11498: etat . pratyayalakṣaṇam ācāryaḥ prārthayamānaḥ supaḥ lukam mṛṣyati . āpaḥ punaḥ asya
GS24pmbhasuu:11499: luki sati na kim cit api prayojanam asti . ucyamāne api etasmin svādyutpattiḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:11500: prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . ekatvādīnām abhāvāt . ekatvādiṣu artheṣu svādayaḥ vidhīyante
GS24pmbhasuu:11501: . na ca eṣām ekatvādayaḥ santi . aviśeṣeṇa utpadyante . utpannānām niyamaḥ kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:11502: . atha vā prakṛtān arthān apekṣya niyamaḥ . ke ca prakṛtāḥ . ekatvādayaḥ . ekasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:11503: ekavacanam na dvayoḥ na bahuṣu . dvayoḥ eva dvivacanam na ekasmin na bahuṣu . bahuṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:11504: eva bahuvacanam na ekasmin na dvayoḥ iti . atha vā ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati utpadyante
GS24pmbhasuu:11505: avyayebhyaḥ svādayaḥ iti yat ayam avyayāt āpasupaḥ iti sublukam śāsti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11507: 903 na avyayībhāvāt ataḥ iti yogavyavasānam . na avyayībhāvāt ataḥ iti yogaḥ vyavaseyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11508: . na avyayībhāvāt akārāntāt supaḥ luk bhavati . tataḥ am tu apañcamyāḥ iti . kimarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11509: yogavibhāgaḥ . pañcamyāḥ ampratiṣedhārtham . pañcamyāḥ amaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11510: . ekayoge hi ubhayoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . ekayoge hi sati ubhayoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ syāt amaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11511: alukaḥ ca . saḥ tarhi yogavibhāgaḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . tuḥ niyāmakaḥ . tuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11512: kriyate . sa niyāmakaḥ bhaviṣyati . am eva apañcamyāḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11514: 903-904 ami pañcamīpratiṣedhe apādānagrahaṇam . ami pañcamīpratiṣedhe apādānagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:11515: kartavyam . apādānapañcamyāḥ iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . karmapravacanīyayukte
GS24pmbhasuu:11516: apratiṣedhārtham . karmapravacanīyayukte mā bhūt . āpāṭaliputram vṛṣṭaḥ devaḥ . na
GS24pmbhasuu:11517: vā uttarapadasya karmapravacanīyayogāt samāsāt pañcamyabhāvaḥ . na vā vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11518: kim kāraṇam . uttarapadam atra karmapravacanīyayuktam . uttarapadasya karmapravacanīyayogāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11519: samāsāt pañcamī na bhaviṣyati . yadā ca samāsaḥ karmapravacanīyayuktaḥ bhavati tadā
GS24pmbhasuu:11520: pratiṣedhaḥ . tat yathā . ā upakumbhāt ā upamaṇikāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11523: nityam iti vaktavyam . ṛddhi . sumaram sumagadham . nadīsamāsaḥ . unmattagaṅgam lohitagaṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:11526: 905-907 ṭitām ṭeḥ evidheḥ luṭaḥ ḍāraurasaḥ pūrvavipratiṣiddham . ṭitām ṭeḥ evidheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11527: luṭaḥ ḍāraurasaḥ bhavanti pūrvavipratiṣedhena . ṭeḥ etvasya avakāśaḥ pacate pacete
GS24pmbhasuu:11528: pacante . ḍāraurasām avakāśaḥ śvaḥ kartā śvaḥ kartārau śvaḥ kartāraḥ . iha ubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:11529: prāpnoti . śvaḥ adhetā śvaḥ adhyetārau śvaḥ adhyetāraḥ . ḍāraurasaḥ bhavanti pūrvavipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:11530: . saḥ tarhi pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . ātmanepadānām ca iti vacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11531: siddham . ātmanepadānām ca ḍāraurasaḥ bhavanti iti vaktavyam . tat ca samasaṅkhyārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:11532: . tat ca avaśyam ātmanepadagrahaṇam kartavyam samasaṅkhyārtham . saṅkhyātanudeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11533: yathā syāt . akriyamāṇe hi ātmanepadagrahaṇe śaṭ sthāninaḥ trayaḥ ādeśāḥ . vaiṣamyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11534: saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ na prāpnoti . pūrvavipratiṣedhārthena tāvat na arthaḥ ātmanepadagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:11535: . idam iha sampradhāryam . ḍāraurasaḥ kriyantām ṭeḥ etvam iti . kim atra kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:11536: . paratvāt etvam . nityāḥ ḍāraurasaḥ . kṛte api etve prapnuvanti akṛte api prāpnuvanti
GS24pmbhasuu:11537: . ṭeḥ etvam api nityam . kṛteṣu api ḍāraurassu prāpnoti akṛteṣu api prāpnoti . anityam
GS24pmbhasuu:11538: etvam . anyasya kṛteṣu ḍāraurassu prāpnoti anyasya akṛteṣu . śabdāntarasya ca prāpnuvan
GS24pmbhasuu:11539: vidhiḥ anityaḥ bhavati . ḍāraurasaḥ api anityāḥ . anyasya kṛte etve prāpnuvanti anyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11540: akṛte . śabdāntarasya prāpnuvantaḥ anityā bhavanti . ubhayoḥ anityayoḥ paratvāt etvam
GS24pmbhasuu:11541: . etve kṛte punaḥprasaṅgavijñānāt ḍāraurasaḥ bhaviṣyanti . samasaṅkhyārthena ca api
GS24pmbhasuu:11542: na arthaḥ ātmanepadagrahaṇena . sthāne antaramena vyavasthā bhaviṣyati . kutaḥ āntaryam
GS24pmbhasuu:11543: . arthataḥ . ekārthasya ekārthaḥ dvyarthasya dvyarthaḥ bahvarthasya bahvarthaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11544: atha vā ādeśāḥ api ṣaṭ eva nirdiśyante . katham . ekaśeṣanirdeśāt . ekaśeṣanirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11545: ayam . atha etasmin ekaśeṣanirdeśe sati kim ayam kṛtaikaśeṣāṇām dvandvaḥ . ḍā ca
GS24pmbhasuu:11546: ḍā ca ḍā rau ca rau ca rau raḥ ca raḥ ca raḥ. ḍā ca rau ca raḥ ca ḍāraurasaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11547: . āhosvit kṛtadvandvānām ekaśeṣaḥ . ḍā ca rau ca raḥ ca ḍāraurasaḥ . ḍāraurasaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:11548: ḍāraurasaḥ ca ḍāraurasaḥ iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi kṛtaikaśeṣāṇām dvandvaḥ aniṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11549: samasaṅkhyaḥ prāpnoti ekavacanadvivacanayoḥ ḍā prāpnoti . bahuvacanaikavacanayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11550: rau prāpnoti dvivacanabahuvacanayoḥ ca raḥ prāpnoti . atha kṛtadvandvānām ekaśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11551: na doṣaḥ bhavati . yathā na doṣaḥ tathā astu . kim punaḥ atra jyāyaḥ . ubhayam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11552: āha . ubhayam hi dṛśyate . bahu śaktikiṭakam bahūni śaktikiṭakāni bahu sthālīpiṭharam
GS24pmbhasuu:11553: bahūni sthālīpiṭharāni . ḍāraurasaḥ kṛte ṭeḥ e yathāt dvitvam prasāraṇe samasṅkhyena
GS24pmbhasuu:11554: na artha asti . siddham sthāne arthataḥ antarāḥ . āntaryataḥ vyavasthā . trayaḥ eva
GS24pmbhasuu:11555: ime bhavantu sarveṣām . ṭeḥ etvam ca paratvāt kṛte api tasmin ime santu .
GS24pmbhasuu:11557: 907-911 ḍāvikārasya śitkaraṇam sarvādeśārtham . ḍāvikāraḥ śit kartavyaḥ . kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:11558: . sarvādeśārtham . śit sarvasya iti sarvādeśaḥ yathā syāt . akriyamāṇe hi śakāre
GS24pmbhasuu:11559: alaḥ antyasya vidhayaḥ bhavanti iti antasya prasajyeta . nighātaprasaṅgaḥ tu . nighātaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11560: tu prapnoti . śvaḥ kartā . tāseḥ param lasārvadhātukam anudāttam bhavati iti eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11561: svaraḥ prāpnoti . yat tāvat ucyate ḍāvikārasya śitkaraṇam sarvādeśārtham iti . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:11562: alaḥ antyavikārāt . siddham etat . katham .alaḥ antyavikārāt . astu ayam alaḥ antyasya . kā rūpasiddhiḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:11563: kartā . ḍiti ṭeḥ lopāt lopaḥ . ḍiti ṭeḥ lopena lopaḥ bhaviṣyati . abhatvāt na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:11564: . ḍitkaraṇasāmarthyāt bhaviṣyati . anittvāt vā . atha vā anittvāt etat siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:11565: kim idam anittvāt iti . antyasya ayam sthāne bhavan na pratyayaḥ syāt . asatyām pratyayasañjñāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:11566: itsañjñā na . asatyām itsañjñāyām lopaḥ na . asati lope anekāl . yada anekāl tadā
GS24pmbhasuu:11567: sarvādeśaḥ . yadā sarvādeśaḥ tadā pratyayaḥ . yadā pratyayaḥ tadā itsañjñā . yadā
GS24pmbhasuu:11568: itsañjñā tadā lopaḥ . praśliṣṭanirdeśāt vā . atha vā praśliṣṭanirdeśaḥ ayam . ḍā
GS24pmbhasuu:11569: ā ḍā . saḥ anekālśit sarvasya iti sarvādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . yadā tarhi ayam antyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11570: sthāne bhavati tadā tiṅgrahaṇena grahaṇam na prāpnoti . tiṅgrahaṇam ekadeśavikṛtasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11571: ananyatvāt . ekadeśavikṛtam ananyavat bhavati iti tiṅgrahaṇena grahaṇam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:11572: svaraḥ katham . svare vipratiṣedhāt siddham . ḍāraurasaḥ kriyantām anudāttatvam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11573: kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt anudāttatvam . nityāḥ ḍāraurasaḥ . kṛte api anudāttatve
GS24pmbhasuu:11574: prapnuvanti akṛte api prapnuvanti . anudāttatvam api nityam . kṛteṣu kṛteṣu api ḍāraurassu
GS24pmbhasuu:11575: prāpnoti akṛteṣu api prāpnoti . anityam anudāttatvam . anyasya kṛteṣu ḍāraurassu
GS24pmbhasuu:11576: prāpnoti anyasya akṛteṣu . śabdāntarasya ca prāpnuvan vidhiḥ anityaḥ bhavati . ḍāraurasaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11577: api anityāḥ . anyathāsvarasya kṛte anudāttatve prāpnuvanti anyathāsvarasya akṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:11578: . svarabhinnasya ca prāpnuvantaḥ anityāḥ bhavanti . ubhayoḥ anityayoḥ paratvāt anudāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:11579: . anudāttatve kṛte punaḥprasaṅgavijñātāt ḍāraurasaḥ . ṭilope udāttanivṛttisvareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:11580: siddham . na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . antaraṅgatvāt ḍāraurasaḥ . tatra antaraṅgatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11581: ḍāraurassu kṛteṣu anudāttatvam kriyatām ṭilopaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11582: ṭilopena bhavitavyam . evam tarhi svare vipratiṣedhāt siddham . nyāyyaḥ eva ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:11583: svare vipratiṣedhaḥ . idam iha sampradhāryam . anudāttatvam kriyatām udāttanivṛttisvaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11584: iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt anudāttatvam . anudāttatve kṛte punaḥprasaṅgavijñānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11585: udāttanivṛttisvaraḥ bhaviṣyati . tat etat kva siddham bhavati . yat pit vacanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11586: yat apit vacanam tatra na sidhyati . tatra api siddham . katham idam adya lasārvadhātukānudāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:11587: pratyayasvarasya apavādaḥ . na ca apavādaviṣaye utsargaḥ abhiniviśate . pūrvam hi
GS24pmbhasuu:11588: apavādāḥ abhiniviśante paścāt utsargāḥ . prakalpya vā apavādaviṣayam tataḥ utsargaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11589: abhiniviśate . tat na tāvat kadā cit pratyayasvaraḥ bhavati . apavādam lasārvadhātukanudāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:11590: pratīkṣate . tatra anudāttatvam kriyatām lopaḥ iti . yadi api paratvāt lopaḥ saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11591: asau avidyamānodāttatve anudātte udāttaḥ lupyate . pratyayasvarāpavādaḥ lasārvadhātukānudāttam
GS24pmbhasuu:11592: . tena tatra na prasaktaḥ pratyayasvaraḥ kadā cit . pratyayasvaraḥ tu tāseḥ vṛttisanniyogaśiṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11593: . tena ca api asau udāttaḥ lopsyate . tathā na doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11595: 3-12 adhikāreṇa iyam pratyayasañjñā kriyate . sā prakṛtyupapadopādhīnām api prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:11596: . tasyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . prakṛti . guptijkibhyaḥ san . upapada . stambakarṇayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11597: ramajapoḥ . upādhi . harateḥ dṛtināthayoḥ paśau . eteṣām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11598: kim ca syāt yadi eteṣām api pratyayasañjñā syāt . paratvam ādyudāttatvam aṅgasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:11599: iti ete vidhayaḥ prasajyeran . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . pratyayādhikāre prakṛtyupapadopādhīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:11600: apratiṣedhaḥ . adhikāreṇa api pratyayasañjñāyām satyām prakṛtyupapadopādhīnām apratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11601: . anarthakaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ . pratyayasañjñā kasmāt na bhavati . nimittasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11602: nimittikāryārthatvāt anyatra api . nimittāni hi nimittikāryārthāni bhavanti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:11603: punaḥ nimittam kaḥ vā nimittī . prakṛtyupapaopādhayaḥ nimittam pratyayaḥ nimittī
GS24pmbhasuu:11604: . anyatra api ca eṣaḥ nyāyaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ . kva anyatra . loke . tat yathā . bahuṣu āsīneṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:11605: kaḥ cit kam cit pṛcchati . katamaḥ devadattaḥ . kataraḥ yajñadattaḥ iti . saḥ tasmai
GS24pmbhasuu:11606: ācaṣṭe . yaḥ aśve yaḥ pīṭhe iti ukte nimittasya nimittikāryārthatvāt adhyavasyati
GS24pmbhasuu:11607: ayam devadattaḥ ayam yajñdatta iti . na idānīm aśvasya pīṭhasya vā devadattaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11608: sañjñā bhavati . kim punaḥ nimittam kaḥ vā nimittī . nirjñātaḥ arthaḥ nimittam anirjñātārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11609: nimittī . iha ca pratyayaḥ anirjñātaḥ prakṛtyupapadopādhayaḥ nirjñātāḥ . kva . dhātūpadeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:11610: prātipadikopadeśe ca . te nirjñātāḥ nimittatvena upādīyante . pradhāne kāryasampratyayāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11611: vā siddham . atha vā pradhāne kāryasampratyayaḥ bhaviṣyati . kim ca pradhānam . pratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11612: . tat yathā . bahuṣu yātsu kaḥ cit kam cit pṛcchati . kaḥ yāti iti . saḥ āha rājā
GS24pmbhasuu:11613: iti . rājā iti ukte pradhāne kāryasampratyayāt yaḥ pṛcchati yaḥ ca ācaṣṭe ubhayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11614: sampratyayaḥ bhavati . kiṅkṛtam punaḥ prādhānyam . arthakṛtam . yathā punaḥ loke
GS24pmbhasuu:11615: arthakṛtam prādhānyam śabdasya idānīm kiṅkṛtam prādhānyam . śabdasya apūrvopadeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11616: prādhānyam . yasya apūrvopadeśaḥ saḥ pradhānam . prakṛtyupapadopādhayaḥ ca upadiṣṭāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11617: . kva . dhātūpadeśe prātipadikopadeśe ca . yadi eva nimittasya nimittikāryārthatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11618: atha api pradhāne kāryasampratyayāt prakṛtyupapadopādhīnām na bhavati vikārāgamānām
GS24pmbhasuu:11619: tu prāpnoti . hanaḥ ta ca . trapujatunoḥ ṣuk iti . eteṣām hi apūrvopadeśāt prādhānyam
GS24pmbhasuu:11620: . nimittinaḥ ca ete . vikārāgameṣu ca paravijñānāt . vikārāgameṣu ca paravijñānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11621: pratyayasañjñā na bhaviṣyati . pratyayaḥ paraḥ bahvati iti ucyate . na ca vikārāgamāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11622: pare sambhavanti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam samāne apūrvopadeśe pratyayaḥ paraḥ vikārāgamāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11623: na pare . ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭasya ca tadyuktatvāt . ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣtam vikārāgamayuktam pañcamīnirdṣṭāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11624: ca pratyayaḥ vidhīyate . pratyayavidhānānupapattiḥ tu . pratyayavidhiḥ tu na upapapdyate
GS24pmbhasuu:11625: . kva . yatra vikārāgamāḥ vidhīyante . hanaḥ ta ca . tarpujatunoḥ ṣuk . kim punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11626: kāraṇam na sidhyati . vikārāgamayuktatvāt apañcamīnirdiṣṭatvāt ca . tasmāt tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:11627: pañcamīnirdeśāt siddham . tasmāt tatra pañcamīnirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11628: iha tāvat hanaḥ te iti . dhātoḥ iti vartate. iha trapujatunoḥ ṣuk iti . prātipadikāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11629: iti vartate . yadi evam hanaḥ ta ca dhātoḥ kyap bhavati iti dhātumātrāt kyap prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:11630: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na dhātumātrāt kyap bhavati iti yat ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:11631: etistuśasvṛdṛjuṣaḥ kyap iti parigaṇanam karoti . atha vā hantim eva atra dhātugrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:11632: abhisambhantsyāmaḥ . hanaḥ taḥ bhavati . dhātoḥ kyap bhavati . kasmāt . hanteḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11633: . arthāśrayatvāt vā . atha vā arthāśrayaḥ pratyayavidhiḥ . yaḥ tam artham sampratyāyayati
GS24pmbhasuu:11634: saḥ pratyayaḥ . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . pratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11635: iti mahatī sañjñā kriyate . sañjñā ca nāma yataḥ na laghīyaḥ . kutaḥ etat . laghvartham
GS24pmbhasuu:11636: hi sañjñākaraṇam . tatra mahatyāḥ sañjñāyāḥ karaṇe etat prayojanam anvarthasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:11637: yathā vijñāyeta . pratyāyayiti iti pratyayaḥ . yadi pratyāyayiti iti pratyayaḥ avikādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:11638: pratyayasañjñā na prāpnoti . na hi te kim cit pratyāyayanti . evam tarhi pratyāyyate
GS24pmbhasuu:11639: pratyayaḥ iti . evam api sanādīnām na prāpnoti . evam tari ubhayasādhanaḥ ayam kartṛsādhanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11640: karmasādhanaḥ ca . evam api kutaḥ etat samāne apūrvopadeśe trāpuṣam jātuṣam iti atra
GS24pmbhasuu:11641: akāraḥ tam artham sampratyāyayati na punaḥ ṣakāraḥ iti . anyatra api akāreṇa tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11642: arthasya vacanāt manyāmahe akāraḥ tam artham sampratyāyayatina ṣakāraḥ iti . kva
GS24pmbhasuu:11645: 12-19 kimartham idam ucyate . paraḥ yathā syāt . pūrvaḥ mā bhūt iti . na etat asti prayojanam . yam icchati pūrvam āha tam :
GS24pmbhasuu:11646: vibhāṣā supaḥ bahuc purastāt tu iti . madhye tarhi mā bhūt iti . madhye api yam icchati āha tam :
GS24pmbhasuu:11647: avyayasarvanāmnām akac prāk ṭeḥ iti . yaḥ idānīm anyaḥ pratyayaḥ śeṣaḥ saḥ antareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:11648: vacanam paraḥ eva bhaviṣyati iti nā arthaḥ paravacanena . evam api yeṣām eva pratyayānām
GS24pmbhasuu:11649: deśaḥ niyamyate te eva niyatadeśāḥ syuḥ . yaḥ idānīm aniyatadeśaḥ saḥ kadā cit pūrvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11650: kadā cit paraḥ kadā cit madhye syāt . tat yathā mātuḥ vatsaḥ kadā cit agrataḥ kadā
GS24pmbhasuu:11651: cit pṛṣṭhataḥ kadā cit pārśvataḥ bhavati . paraḥ eva yathā syāt iti evamartham paravacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:11652: . paravacanam anarthakam pañcamīnirdiṣṭatvāt parasya . paragrahaṇam anarthakam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11653: kim kāraṇam . pañcamīnirdiṣṭatvāt parasya kāryam ucyate . tat yathā dvyantarupasargebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11654: apaḥ īt . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . sataḥ tatra parasya kāryam ucyate . iha idānīm kasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11655: sataḥ parasya kāryam bhavitum arhati . iha api sataḥ eva. katham . paratvam svābhāvikam
GS24pmbhasuu:11656: . atha vācanike paratve sati arthaḥ syāt paragrahaṇena . vācanike ca na arthaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11657: etat hi tasya parasya kāryam yat asau paraḥ syāt . atha vā yat asya parasya sataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11658: sañjñā syāt . yatra tarhi pañcamī na asti tadartham ayam yogaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kva ca
GS24pmbhasuu:11659: pañcamī na asti . yatra vikārāgamāḥ śiṣyante . kva ca vikārāgamāḥ śiṣyante . hanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11660: ta ca . trapujatunoḥ ṣuk iti . vikārāgameṣu ca uktam . kim uktam . pratyayavidhānānupapattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11661: tu . tasmāt tatra pañcamīnirdeśāt siddham iti . atyantāparadṛṣṭānām vā parabhūtalopārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:11662: . atyantāparadṛṣṭānām tarhi parabhūtalopārtham paragrahaṇam kartavyam . ye ete atyantāparadṛṣṭāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11663: kvibādayaḥ lupyante teṣām parabhūtānām lopaḥ yathā syāt . aparabhūtānām mā bhūt .
GS24pmbhasuu:11664: kim punaḥ atyantāparadṛṣṭānām parabhūtalopavacane prayojanam . kiti ṇiti iti kāryāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:11665: yathā syuḥ iti . etat api na asti prayojanam . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati atyantāparadṛṣṭāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11666: parabhūtāḥ lupyante iti yat ayam teṣu kādīn anubandhān āsajati . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam
GS24pmbhasuu:11667: . anubandhāsañjane etat prayojanam kiti ṇiti iti kāryāṇi yathā syuḥ iti . yadi ca
GS24pmbhasuu:11668: atra atyantāparadṛṣṭāḥ parabhūtāḥ lupyantetataḥ anubandhāsañjanam arthavat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:11669: . prayoganiyamārtham vā . prayoganiyamārtham tarhi paragrahaṇam kartavyam . parabhūtānām
GS24pmbhasuu:11670: prayogaḥ yathā syāt . aparabhūtānām mā bhūt iti . asti punaḥ kim cit aniṣṭam yadarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11671: niyamaḥ syāt . asti iti āha . prakṛteḥ arthābhidhāne pratyayādarśanāt . prakṛteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11672: arthābhidhāne apratyayikāḥ dṛśyante . kva saḥ devadattaḥ kva saḥ yajñdattaḥ babhruḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11673: maṇḍuḥ lamakaḥ iti . bābhravyaḥ māṇḍavyaḥ lāmakāyanaḥ iti prayoktavye babhruḥ maṇḍuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11674: lamakaḥ iti prayujyate . dvayasajādīnām ca kevaladṛṣṭatvāt . dvayasajādīnām ca kevalānām
GS24pmbhasuu:11675: prayogaḥ dṛśyate . kim asya dvayasam . kim asya mātram . kā adya tithī iti . dvayasajādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11676: vai vṛttijasadṛśāḥ avṛttijāḥ yathā bahuḥ tathā . vāvacane ca anutpattyartham . vāvacane
GS24pmbhasuu:11677: ca anutpattyartham paragrahaṇam kartavyam . vā vacanena anutpattiḥ yathā syāt . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:11678: kriyamāṇe api vai paragrahaṇe katham iva vāvacanena anutpattiḥ labhyā . kriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:11679: paragrahaṇe vāvacanena vā paraḥ iti etat abhisambadhyate . akriyamāṇe punaḥ paragrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:11680: vāvacanena kim anyat śakyam abhisambandhum anyat ataḥ sañjñāyāḥ . na ca sañjñāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11681: bhāvābhāvau iṣyete . vāvacane ca uktam . kim uktam . vāvacanānarthakyam ca tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:11682: nityatvāt sanaḥ iti . prayoganiyamārtham eva tarhi paragrahaṇam kartavyam . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:11683: etasmin prayoganiyame sati kim ayam pratyayahiyamaḥ . prakṛtiparaḥ eva pratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11684: prayoktavyaḥ aprakṛtiparaḥ na iti . āhosvit prakṛtiniyamaḥ . pratyayaparā eva prakṛtiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11685: prayoktavyā apratyayā na iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . tatra pratyayaniyame prkṛtiniyamābhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11686: . tatra pratyayaniyame sati prkṛtiniyamaḥ na prāpnoti . apratyayikāyāḥ prakṛteḥ prayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11687: prāpnoti . kva saḥ devadattaḥ kva saḥ yajñdattaḥ babhruḥ maṇḍuḥ lamakaḥ iti . astu
GS24pmbhasuu:11688: tarhi prakṛtiniyamaḥ . prakṛtiniyame pratyayāniyamaḥ . prakṛtiniyame sati pratyayasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11689: niyamaḥ na prāpnoti . kim asya dvayasam . kim asya mātram . kā adya tithī iti . aprakṛtikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11690: pratyayasya prayogaḥ prāpnoti . siddham tu ubhayaniyamāt . siddham etat . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:11691: . ubhayaniyamāt . ubhayaniyamaḥ ayam . prakṛtiparaḥ eva pratyayaḥ prayoktavyaḥ pratyayaparā
GS24pmbhasuu:11692: eva ca prakṛtiḥ iti . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:11693: paragrahaṇasāmarthyāt . antareṇa api paragrahaṇam syāt ayam paraḥ . paraḥ eva yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:11696: 20-21 kimartham idam ucyate . ādyudāttaḥ yathā syāt . antodāttaḥ mā bhūt iti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:11697: etat asti prayojanam . yam icchati antodāttam karoti tatra cakāram anubandham āha
GS24pmbhasuu:11698: ca citaḥ antaḥ udāttaḥ iti . madhyodāttaḥ tarhi mā bhūt iti . madyodāttam yam icchati
GS24pmbhasuu:11699: tatra repham anubandham karoti āha ca upottamam riti iti . anudāttaḥ tarhi mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:11700: iti . anudāttam api yam icchati tatra pakāram anubandham karoti āha ca anudāttau
GS24pmbhasuu:11701: suppitau iti . svaritaḥ tarhi mā bhūt iti . svaritam api yam icchati karoti tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:11702: takāram anubandham āha ca tit svaritam iti . yaḥ idānīm ataḥ anyaḥ pratyayaḥ śeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11703: saḥ antareṇa api vacanam ādyudāttaḥ eva bhaviṣyati iti na arthaḥ ādyudāttavacanena
GS24pmbhasuu:11704: . evam api yeṣām eva pratyayānām svaraḥ niyamyate te eva niyatasvarāḥ syuḥ . yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11705: idānīm aniyatasvaraḥ saḥ kadā cit ādyudāttaḥ kadā cit antodāttaḥ kadā cit madhyodāttaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11706: kadā cit anudāttaḥ kacā cit svaritaḥ syāt . ādyudāttaḥ eva yathā syāt iti evam artham idam ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:11708: 21-27 atha kimartham pratyayasañjñāsanniyogena ādyudāttatvam ucyate anudāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:11709: ca na yatra eva anyaḥ svaraḥ tatra eva ayam ucyeta . ñniti ādiḥ nityam pratyayasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11710: ca . adupadeśāt lasārvadhātukam anudāttam suppitau ca iti . tatra ayam api arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11711: dviḥ ādyudāttagrahaṇam dviḥ ca anudāttagrahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati . prakṛtam anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:11713: ādyudāttatvasya pratyayasañjñāsanniyoge prayojanam yasya sañjñākaraṇam tasya ādyudāttārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:11714: . ādyudāttatvasya pratyayasañjñāsanniyogakaraṇe etat prayojanam yasya sañjñākaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:11715: tasya ādyudāttatvam yathā syāt . asanniyoge hi yasmāt saḥ tadādeḥ ādyudāttatvam tadantasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11716: ca anudāttatvam . akriyamāṇe hi pratyayasañjñāsanniyogena ādyudāttatve pratyayagrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:11717: yasmāt saḥ tadādeḥ grahaṇam bhavati iti tadādeḥ ādyudāttatvam prasajyeta tadantasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11718: ca anudāttatvam . atha kriyamāṇe api pratyayasañjñāsanniyogena ādyudāttatve anudāttatve
GS24pmbhasuu:11719: ca kasmāt eva tadādeḥ ādyudāttatvam na bhavati tadantasya ca anudāttatvam . utpannaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11720: pratyayaḥ pratyayāśrayāṇām kāryāṇām nimittam bhavati na utpadyamānaḥ . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:11721: ghaṭaḥ kṛtaḥ ghaṭāśrayāṇām kāryāṇām nimittam bhavati na kriyamāṇaḥ . na vā prakṛteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11722: ādyudāttavacanam jñāpakam tadādeḥ agrahaṇasya . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11723: yat ayam ñniti ādiḥ nityam iti prakṛteḥ ādyudāttatvam śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11724: na tadādeḥ ādyudāttatvam bhavati iti . tadantasya tarhi anudāttatvam prāpnoti . prakṛtisvarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11725: ca vidhānasāmarthyāt pratyayasvarābhāvaḥ . yat ayam dhātoḥ antaḥ prātipadikasya antaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11726: iti prakṛteḥ antodāttatvam śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na tadantasya anudāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:11727: bhavati iti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . yatra hi anudāttaḥpratyayaḥ prakṛtisvaraḥ tat
GS24pmbhasuu:11728: prayojayati . āgamānudāttārtham vā . āgamānudāttārtham tarhi pratyayasañjñāsanniyogena
GS24pmbhasuu:11729: ādyudāttatvam ucyate . pratyayasañjñāsanniyogena ādyudāttatve kṛte āgamāḥ anudāttāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11730: yathā syuḥ iti . na vā āgamasya anudāttavacanāt . na vā etat api prayojanam asti
GS24pmbhasuu:11731: . kim kāraṇam . āgamasya anudāttavacanāt . āgamāḥ anudāttāḥ bhavanti iti vakṣyāmi
GS24pmbhasuu:11732: . ke punaḥ āgamāḥ anudāttatvam prayojayanti . iṭ . lavitā . iṭ tāvat na prayojayati
GS24pmbhasuu:11733: . idam iha sampradhāryam . iṭ kriyatām ādyudāttatvam iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11734: iḍāgamaḥ . nityam ādyudāttatvam . kṛte api iṭi prāpnoti akṛte api prāpnoti . iṭ api
GS24pmbhasuu:11735: nityaḥ . kṛte api ādyudāttatve prāpnoti akṛte api prāpnoti . anityaḥ iṭ . anyathāsvarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11736: kṛte ādyudāttatve prapnoti anyathāsvarasya akṛte . svarabhinnasya ca prāpnuvan vidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11737: anityaḥ bhavati . ādyudāttatvam api anityam . anyasya kṛte iṭi prāpnoti anyasya akṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:11738: . śabdāntarasya ca prāpnuvan vidhiḥ anityaḥ bhavati . ubhayoḥ anityayoḥ paratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11739: iḍāgamaḥ . antaraṅgam tarhi ādyudāttatvam . kā antaraṅgatā . utpattisanniyogena ādyudāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:11740: ucyate . utpanne pratyaye prakṛtipratyayau āśritya aṅgasya iḍāgamaḥ . ādyudāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:11741: api na antaraṅgam yāvatā pratyaye āśrīyamāṇe prakṛtiḥ api āśritā bhavati . antaraṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:11742: eva ādyudāttatvam . katham . idānīm eva hi uktam na pratyayasvaravidhau tadādividhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11743: bhavati iti . sīyuṭ tarhi prayojayati . avacane hi sīyuḍādeḥ ādyudāttatvam . akriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:11744: hi āgamānudāttatve kriyamāṇe api pratyayasañjñāsanniyogena ādyudāttatve sīyuḍādeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11745: liṅaḥ ādyudāttatvam prasajyeta . laviṣīya paviṣīya . tat tarhi vaktavyam āgamāḥ anudāttāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11746: bhavanti iti . na vaktavyam . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati āgamāḥ anudāttāḥ bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:11747: iti yat ayam yāsuṭ parasamaipadeṣu udāttaḥ ṅit ca iti āha . na etat asti jñāpakam
GS24pmbhasuu:11748: vakṣyati etat . yāsuṭaḥ ṅidvacanam pidartham udāttavacanam ca iti . śakyam anena vaktum :
GS24pmbhasuu:11749: yāsuṭ parasmaipadeṣu bhavati apit ca liṅ bhavati iti . saḥ ayam evam laghīyasā nyāsena
