GS24pmbhasuu:11750: siddhe sati yat garīyāṃsam yatnam ārabhate tat jñapayati ācāryaḥ āgamāḥ anudāttāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11751: bhavanti iti . śakyam idam labdhum . yadi eva vacanāt atha api jñāpakāt āgamāḥ anudāttāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11752: bhavanti . āgamaiḥ tu vyavahitatvāt ādyudāttatvam na prāpnoti . āgamāḥ avidyamānavat
GS24pmbhasuu:11753: bhavanti iti vakṣyāmi . yadi āgamāḥ avidyamānavat bhavanti iti ucyate lavitā avādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11754: na prāpnoti . svaravidhau iti vakṣyāmi . evam api lavitā udāttāt anudāttasya svaritaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11755: iti svaritaḥ na prāpnoti . ṣāṣṭhike svare iti vakṣyāmi . evam api śikṣitaḥ niṣṭhā
GS24pmbhasuu:11756: ca dvyac anāt it eṣaḥ svaraḥ prāpnoti . pratyayasvaravidhau iti vakṣyāmi . tat tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:11757: vaktavyam avidyamānavat bhavanti iti . na vaktavyam . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati āgamāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11759: yat ayam yāsuṭ parasamaipadeṣu udāttaḥ ṅit ca iti āha . na etat asti jñāpakam . vakṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:11760: etat . yāsuṭaḥ ṅidvacanam pidartham udāttavacanam ca iti . śakyam anena vaktum .
GS24pmbhasuu:11761: yāsuṭ parasmaipadeṣu bhavati apit ca liṅ bhavati iti . saḥ ayam evam laghīyasā nyāsena
GS24pmbhasuu:11762: siddhe sati yat garīyāṃsam yatnam ārabhate tat jñapayati ācāryaḥ āgamāḥ avidyamānavat
GS24pmbhasuu:11763: bhavanti iti . ādyudāttasya vā lopārtham . ādyudāttasya tarhi lopārtham pratyayasañjñāsanniyogena
GS24pmbhasuu:11764: ādyudāttatvam ucyate . pratyayasañjñāsanniyogena ādyudāttatve kṛte udāttanivṛttisvaraḥ siddhaḥ bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:11765: sraughnī māthurī . atra hi paratvāt lopaḥ pratyaysvaram bādheta . na vā bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11766: . na vā etat prayojayati . kim kāraṇam . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11767: lopaḥ antaraṅgalakṣaṇaḥ svaraḥ . asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge . avaśyam ca eṣā paribhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:11768: āśrayitavyā . avacane hi ñinnitkitsu atiprasaṅgaḥ . anāśrīyamāṇāyām asyām paribhāṣāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:11769: kriyamāṇe api pratyayasañjñāsanniyogena ādyudāttatveñinnitkitsu atiprasaṅgaḥ syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11770: . autsī kaṃsikī ātreyī iti . atra hi paratvāt lopaḥ ñinnitkitsvarān bādheta . na
GS24pmbhasuu:11771: eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ñinnitkitsvarāḥ pratyaysvarāpavādāḥ . na ca apavādaviṣaye utsargaḥ bhiniviśate
GS24pmbhasuu:11772: . pūrvam hi apavādāḥ abhiniviśante paścāt utsargaḥ . prakalpya vā apavādaviṣayam
GS24pmbhasuu:11773: tataḥ utsargaḥ abhiniviśate . na tāvat atra kadā cit pratyayādyudāttatvam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:11774: . apavādān ñinnitkitsvarān pratīkṣate . kaṃsikyām bhūyān apahāraḥ . anyasya atra
GS24pmbhasuu:11775: udāttatvam anyasya lopaḥ . ādeḥ udāttatvam antyasya lopaḥ . idam tarhi ātreyī iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11776: . atra hi paratvāt lopaḥ kitsvaram bādheta . tasmāt eṣā paribhāṣā āśrayitavyā . etasyām
GS24pmbhasuu:11777: ca satyām śakyam pratyayasanniyogena ādyudāttatvam avaktum .
GS24pmbhasuu:11779: 27-30 pratyayādyudāttatvāt dhātoḥ antaḥ . pratyayādyudāttatvāt dhātoḥ antaḥ iti etat
GS24pmbhasuu:11780: bhavati vipratiṣedhena . pratyayādyudāttatvasya avakāśaḥ yatra anudāttā prakṛtiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11781: . samatvam simatvam . dhātoḥ antaḥ iti asya avakāśaḥ yatra anudāttaḥ pratyayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11782: pacati paṭhati . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . gopāyati dhapāyati . dhātoḥ antaḥ iti etat
GS24pmbhasuu:11783: bhavati vipratiṣedhena. pitsvarāt titsvaraḥ ṭāpi . pitsvarāt titsvaraḥ ṭāpi bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:11784: vipratiṣedhena . pitsvarasya avakāśaḥ . pacati paṭhati . titsvarasya avakāśaḥ . kāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:11785: hāryam . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . kāryā hāryā . titsvaraḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:11786: citsvaraḥ cāpi pitsvarāt . citsvaraḥ cāpi pitsvarāt bhavati vipratiṣedhena . citsvarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11787: avakāśaḥ . calanaḥ copanaḥ . pitsvarasya saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . āmbaṣṭhyā
GS24pmbhasuu:11788: sauvīryā . citsvaraḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . na vā ādyutāttasya pratyayasañjñāsanniyogāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11789: . na vā arthaḥ vipratiṣedhena . kim kāraṇam . ādyutāttasya pratyayasañjñāsanniyogāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11790: . pratyayasañjñāsanniyogena ādyudāttatve kṛte satiśiṣṭatvāt dhātusvaraḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:11791: . ayam ca api ayuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ pitsvarasya titsvarasya ca . kim kāraṇam . ṭāpi
GS24pmbhasuu:11792: svaritenaikādeśaḥ . ṭāpi svaritena ekādeśaḥ bhavati . idam iha sampradhāryam . svaritatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:11793: kriyatām ekādeśaḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt svaritatvam . nityaḥ ekādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11794: . kṛte api svaritatve prāpnoti akṛte api prāpnoti . . svaritatvam api nityam . kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:11795: api ekādeśe prāpnoti akṛte api . anityam svaritatvam . anyasya kṛte ekādeśe prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:11796: anyasya akṛte . śabdāntarasya ca prāpnuvan vidhiḥ anityaḥ bhavati . ekādeśaḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:11797: anityaḥ . anyathāsvarasya kṛte svaritatve prāpnoti anyathāsvarasya akṛte . svarabhinnasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11798: ca prāpnuvan vidhiḥ anityaḥ bhavati . antaraṅgaḥ tarhi ekādeśaḥ . kā antaraṅgatā
GS24pmbhasuu:11799: . varṇau āśritya ekādeśaḥ padasya svaritatvam . svaritatvam api antaraṅgam . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:11800: . vakṣyati etat . padagrahaṇam parimāṇārtham iti . ubhayoḥ antaraṅgayoḥ paratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11801: svaritatvam . svaritatve kṛte āntaryataḥ svaridānudāttayoḥ svaritaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:11802: ayam ca api ayuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ pitsvarasya citsvarasya ca . kim kāraṇam . cāpi
GS24pmbhasuu:11805: 30-31 gupādiṣu anubandhakaraṇam kimartham . gupādiṣu anubandhakaraṇam ātmanepadārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:11806: . gupādiṣu anubandhāḥ kriyante ātmanepadam yathā syāt . kriyamāṇeṣu api anubandheṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:11807: ātmanepadam na eva prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . sanā vyavahitatvāt . pūrvavat sanaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11808: evam bhaviṣyati . pūrvavat sanaḥ iti ucyate . na ce etebhyaḥ prāk sanaḥ ātmanepadam
GS24pmbhasuu:11809: na api parasmaipadam paśyāmaḥ . evam tarhi anubandhakaraṇasāmarthyāt bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:11810: atha vā avayave kṛtam liṅgam samudāyasya viśeṣakam bhaviṣyati . tat yathā goḥ sakthani
GS24pmbhasuu:11811: karṇe vā kṛtam liṅgam goḥ viśeṣakam bhavati . yadi avayave kṛtam liṅgam samudāyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11812: viśeṣakam bhavati jugupsayati mīmāṃsayati iti atra api prāpnoti . avayave kṛtam liṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:11813: kasya samudāyasya viśeṣakam bhavati . yam samudāyam yaḥ avayavaḥ na vyabhicarati
GS24pmbhasuu:11814: . sanam ca na vhabhicarati . ṇicam punaḥ vyabhicarati . tat yathā tat yathā goḥ sakthani
GS24pmbhasuu:11815: karṇe vā kṛtam liṅgam goḥ viśeṣakam bhavati na gomaṇḍalasya .
GS24pmbhasuu:11817: 31-32 abhyāsadīrghatve avarṇasya dīrghaprasaṅgaḥ . abhyāsadīrghatve avarṇasya dīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:11818: prāpnoti . mīmāṃsate . nanu ce ittve kṛte dīrghatvam bhaviṣyati . katham punaḥ utpattisanniyogena
GS24pmbhasuu:11819: dīrghatvam ucyamānam ittvam pratīkṣate . atha katham abhyāsam pratīkṣate . vacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11820: abhyāsam pratīkṣate . ittvam punaḥ na pratīkṣate . na vā abhyāsavikāreṣu apavādasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11821: utsargābādhakatvāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . abhyāsavikāreṣu apavādasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11822: utsargābādhakatvāt . abhyāsavikāreṣu apavādāḥ utsargān na bādhante iti evam dīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:11823: ucyamānam ittvam na bādhiṣyate . atha vā mānbadhadānśanbhyaḥ ī ca abhyāsasya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11824: vakṣyāmi . evam api halādiśeṣāpavādaḥ īkāraḥ prāpnoti . ī ca acaḥ iti vakṣyāmi .
GS24pmbhasuu:11825: atha vā mānbadhadānśanbhyaḥ dīrghaḥ ca itaḥ abhyāsasya iti vakṣyāmi . sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:11826: sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam abhyāsadīrghatve avarṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11827: dīrghaprasaṅgaḥ iti . parihṛtam etat na vā abhyāsavikāreṣu apavādasya utsargābādhakatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11828: iti . atha vā na evam vijñāyate dīrghaḥ ca abhyāsasya iti . katham tarhi . dīrghaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11829: ca ābhyāsasya iti . kim idam ābhyāsasya iti . abhyāsavikāraḥ ābhyāsaḥ tasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11831: 33-39 dhātoḥ iti kimartham . prakartum aicchat prācikīrṣat . sopasargāt mā bhūt .
GS24pmbhasuu:11832: karmagrahaṇāt sanvidhau dhātugrahaṇānarthakyam . karmagrahaṇāt sanvidhau dhātugrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:11833: anarthakam . karmaṇaḥ samānakartṛkāt icchāyām vā sambhavati iti eva dhātoḥ utpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11834: bhaviṣyati . soparsargam vai karma . tataḥ utpattiḥ prāpnoti . sopasargam karma iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11835: cet karmaviśeṣakatvāt upasargasya anupasargam karma . sopasargam karma iti cet karmaviśeṣakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11836: upasargaḥ . anupasargam hi karma . avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam anupasargam karma
GS24pmbhasuu:11837: iti . sopasargasya hi karmatve dhātvadhikāre api sanaḥ avidhānam akarmatvāt . yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11838: hi manyate sopasargam karma iti kriyamāṇe api tasya dhātugrahaṇe sanaḥ avidhiḥ syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11839: . kim kāraṇam . akarmatvāt . idam tarhi prayojanam . subantāt utpattiḥ mā bhūt .
GS24pmbhasuu:11840: subantāt ca aprasaṅgaḥ kyajādīnām apavādatvāt . subantāt ca sanaḥ aprasaṅgaḥ . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:11841: kāraṇam . kyajādīnām apavādatvāt . subantāt kyajādayaḥ vidhīyante . te apavādatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11842: bādhakāḥ bhaviṣyanti . anabhidhānāt vā . atha vā anabhidhānāt subantāt utpattiḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:11843: bhaviṣyati . na hi subantāt utpadyamānena sanā icchāyā abhidhānam syāt . anabhidhānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11844: tataḥ utpattiḥ na bhaviṣyati . iyam tāvat agatikā gatiḥ yat ucyate anabhidhānāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11845: . yat api ucyate subantāt ca aprasaṅgaḥ kyajādīnām apavādatvāt iti . bhavet kasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11846: cit aprasaṅgaḥ syāt ātmecchāyām . parecchāyām tu prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:11847: rājñaḥ putram icchati iti . evam tarhi idam iha vyapadeśyam sat ācāryaḥ na vyapadiśati
GS24pmbhasuu:11848: . kim . samānakartṛkāt iti ucyate . na ca subantasya samānaḥ kartā asti . evam api
GS24pmbhasuu:11849: bhavet kasmāt cit aprasaṅgaḥ yasya kartā na asti . iha tu prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:11850: āsitum icchati śayitum icchati . icchāyām arthe san vidhīyate icchārtheṣu ca tumun . tatra tumunā uktatatvāt tasya arthasya san na bhaviṣyati . evam api iha prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:11851: āsanam icchati śayanam icchati iti . iha yaḥ viśeṣaḥ upādhiḥ vā upādīyate dyotye
GS24pmbhasuu:11852: tasmin tena bhavitavyam . yaḥ ca iha arthaḥ gamyate āsitum icchati śayitum icchati
GS24pmbhasuu:11853: svayam tām kriyām kartum icchati iti na asau iha gamyate āsanam icchati śayanam icchati
GS24pmbhasuu:11854: iti . anyasya api āsanam icchati iti eṣaḥ api arthaḥ gamyate . avaśyam ca etat evam
GS24pmbhasuu:11855: vijñeyam . yaḥ hi manyate adyotye tasmin tena bhavitavyam iti kriyamāṇe api tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11857: saṅgatam icchati devadattaḥ yajñadattena iti . karmasamānakartṛkagrahaṇānarthakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:11858: ca icchābhidhāne pratyayavidhānāt . karmasamānakartṛkagrahaṇam ca anarthakam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:11859: kāraṇam . icchābhidhāne pratyayavidhānāt . icchāyām abhidheyāyām san vidhīyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:11860: akarmaṇaḥ hi asamānakartṛkāt vā anabhidhānam . icchāyām abhidheyāyām san vidhīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:11861: . na ca akarmaṇaḥ asamānakartṛkāt vā utpadyamānena sanā icchāyā abhidhānam syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:11862: anabhidhānāt tataḥ utpattiḥ na bhaviṣyati . aṅgaparimāṇārtham tu . aṅgaparimāṇārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:11863: tarhi anyatarat kartavyam karmagrahaṇam dhātugrahaṇam vā . aṅgaparimāṇam jñāsyāmi
GS24pmbhasuu:11864: iti . kim punaḥ atra jyāyaḥ . dhātugrahaṇam eva jyāyaḥ . aṅgaparimāṇam ca eva vijñātam
GS24pmbhasuu:11865: bhavati . api ca dhātoḥ vihitaḥ pratyayaḥ śeṣaḥ ārdhadhātukasañjñaḥ bhavati iti sanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11866: ārdhadhātukasañjñā siddhā bhavati . yat ca api etat uktam karmagrahaṇāt sanvidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:11867: dhātugrahaṇānarthakyam sopasargam karma iti cet karmaviśeṣakatvāt upasargasya anupasargam
GS24pmbhasuu:11868: karma sopasargasya hi karmatve dhātvadhikāre api sanaḥ avidhānam akarmatvāt iti svapakṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11869: anena varṇitaḥ . yuktam iha draṣṭavyam kim nyāyyam karma iti . etat ca atra yuktam
GS24pmbhasuu:11870: yat sopasargam karma syāt . nanu ca uktam sopasargasya hi karmatve dhātvadhikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:11871: api sanaḥ avidhānam akarmatvāt iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . karmaṇaḥ iti na eṣā dhātusamānādhikaraṇā
GS24pmbhasuu:11872: pañcamī . karmaṇaḥ dhātoḥ iti . kim tarhi . avayavayogā eṣā ṣaṣṭhī . karmaṇaḥ yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11873: dhātuḥ avayavaḥ . yadi avayavayogā eṣā ṣaṣṭhīkevalāt utpattiḥ na prāpnoti . cikīrṣati
GS24pmbhasuu:11874: jihīrṣati iti . eṣaḥ api vyapadeśivadbhāvena karmaṇaḥ dhātuḥ avayaḥ bhavati . kāmam
GS24pmbhasuu:11875: tarhi anena eva hetunā kyac api kartavyaḥ . mahāntam putram icchati . karmaṇaḥ yat
GS24pmbhasuu:11876: subantam avayayaḥ iti . na kartavyaḥ . asāmarthyāt na bhaviṣyati . katham asāmarthyam
GS24pmbhasuu:11877: . sāpekṣam asamartham bhavati iti . vāvacanānarthakyam ca tatra nityatvāt sanaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11878: vāvacanam ca anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . tatra nityatvāt sanaḥ . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:11879: hi dvau pakṣau vṛttipakṣaḥ avṛttipakṣaḥ ca . svabhāvataḥ ca etat bhavati vākyam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:11880: pratyayaḥ ca . tatra svābhāvike vṛttiviṣaye nitye pratyaye prāpte vāvacanena kim
GS24pmbhasuu:11881: anyat śakyam abhisambandhum anyat ataḥ sañjñāyāḥ . na ca sañjñāyāḥ bhāvābhāvau iṣyete
GS24pmbhasuu:11884: 39-42 tumunantāt vā tasya ca lugvacanam . tumunantāt vā san vaktavyaḥ tasya ca tumunaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11885: luk vaktavyaḥ . kartum icchati cikīrṣati . liṅuttamāt vā . liṅuttamāt vā san vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11886: tasya ca liṅaḥ luk vaktavyaḥ . kuryām iti icchati cikīrṣati . āśaṅkāyām acetaneṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:11887: upasaṅkhyānam . āśaṅkāyām acetaneṣu upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . aśmā luluṭhiṣate .
GS24pmbhasuu:11888: kūlam pipatiṣati iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . evam manyate . cetanāvataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11889: etat bhavati icchā iti . kūlam ca acetanam . acetanagrahaṇena na arthaḥ . āśaṅkāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:11890: iti eva . idam api siddham bhavati . śvā mumūrṣati . na vā tulyakāraṇatvāt icchayāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11891: hi pravṛttitaḥ upalabdhiḥ . na vā kartavyam . kim kāraṇam . tulyakāraṇatvāt . tulyam
GS24pmbhasuu:11892: hi kāraṇam cetanāvati devadatte kūle ca acetane . kim kāraṇam . icchayāḥ hi pravṛttitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11893: upalabdhiḥ . icchayāḥ hi pravṛttitaḥ upalabdhiḥ bhavati . yaḥ api asu kaṭam cikīrṣuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11894: bhavati na asau āghoṣayati . kaṭam kariṣyāmi iti . kim tarhi . sannaddham rajjukīlakpūlapāṇim
GS24pmbhasuu:11895: dṛṣṭvā tataḥ icchā gamyate . kūlasya api pipatiṣataḥ loṣṭāḥ śīryante bhidā jāyante
GS24pmbhasuu:11896: deśāt deśāntaram upasaṅkrāmati . śvānaḥ khalu api mumūrṣavaḥ ekāntaśīlāḥ śūnākṣāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11897: ca bhavanti . upamānāt vā siddham . upamānāt vā siddham etat . katham . luluṭhiṣate
GS24pmbhasuu:11898: iva luluṭhiṣate . pipatiṣati iva pipatiṣati . na tiṅantena upamānam asti . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:11899: icchā iva icchā . sarvasya vā cetanāvattvāt . atha vā sarvam cetanāvat . evam hi
GS24pmbhasuu:11900: āha . kaṃsakāḥ sarpanti . śirīṣaḥ adhaḥ svapiti . suvarcalā ādityam anu paryeti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11901: āskanda kapilaka iti ukte tṛṇam āskandati . ayaskāntam ayaḥ saṅkrāmati . ṛṣiḥ paṭhati śrṇota grāvāṇaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11903: 42-45 ime iṣavaḥ bahavaḥ paṭhyante . tatra na jñāyate kasya ayam arthe san vidhīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:11904: iti . iṣeḥ chatvabhāvinaḥ . yadi evam kartum anvicchati kartum anveṣaṇā atra api
GS24pmbhasuu:11905: prāpnoti . evam tarhi yasya striyām icchā iti etat rūpam nipātyate . kasya ca etat
GS24pmbhasuu:11906: nipātyate . kāntikarmaṇaḥ . atha iha grāmam gantum icchati iti kasya kim karma .
GS24pmbhasuu:11907: iṣeḥ ubhe karmaṇī . yadi evam grāmam gantum icchati grāmāya gantum icchati iti gatyarthakarmaṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:11908: dvitīyācaturthyau na prāpnutaḥ . evam tarhi gameḥ grāmaḥ karma iṣeḥ gamiḥ karma .
GS24pmbhasuu:11909: evam api iṣyate grāmaḥ gantum iti parasādhane utpadyamānena lena grāmasya abhidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:11910: na prāpnoti . evam tarhi gameḥ grāmaḥ karma iṣeḥ ubhe karmaṇī . atha sanantāt sanā bhavitavyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:11911: cikīrṣitum icchati jihīrṣitum icchati iti . na bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam . arthagatyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11912: śabdaprayogaḥ . artham sampratyāyayiṣyāmi iti śabdaḥ prayujyate . tatra ekena uktatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11913: tasya arthasya aparasya prayogeṇa na bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam . uktārthānām aprayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11915: eṣitum icchati eṣiṣiṣati iti . asti atra viśeṣaḥ . ekasya atra iṣeḥ iṣiḥ sādhanam
GS24pmbhasuu:11916: vartamānakālaḥ ca pratyayaḥ . aparasya bāhyam sādhanam sarvakālaḥ ca pratyayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11917: iha api tarhi ekasya iṣeḥ karotiviṣiṣṭaḥ iṣiḥ sādhanam vartamānakālaḥ ca pratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11918: . aparasya bāhyam sādhanam sarvakālaḥ ca pratyayaḥ . yena eva khalu api hetunā etat
GS24pmbhasuu:11919: vākyam bhavati cikīrṣitum icchati jihīrṣitum icchati iti tena eva hetunā vṛttiḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:11920: prāpnoti . tasmāt sanantāt sanaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . tam ca api bruvatā iṣisanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11921: iti vaktavyam . bhavati hi jugupsiṣate mīmāṃsiṣate iti . śaiṣikāt matubarthīyāt śaiṣikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11922: matubarthikaḥ sarūpaḥ pratyayaḥ na iṣṭaḥ . sanantāt na san iṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:11924: 45-48 kimarthaḥ cakāraḥ . svarārthaḥ . citaḥ antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati iti antodāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:11925: yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . ekāc ayam . tatra na arthaḥ svarārthena cakāreṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:11926: anubandhena . pratyayasvareṇa eva siddham . viśeṣaṇārthaḥ tarhi . kva viśeṣaṇārthena
GS24pmbhasuu:11927: arthaḥ . asya cvau kyaci ca iti . kye ca iti ucyamāne api kākaḥ śyenāyate atra api
GS24pmbhasuu:11928: prasayjeta . na etat asti . tadanubandhakagrahaṇe atadanubandhakasya grahaṇam na
GS24pmbhasuu:11929: iti evam etasya na bhaviṣyati . sāmānyagrahaṇāvighātārthaḥ tarhi . kva ca sāmānyagrahaṇāvighātārthena
GS24pmbhasuu:11930: arthaḥ . naḥ kye iti . atha ātmangrahaṇam kimartham . ātmecchāyām yathā syāt . parecchāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:11931: mā bhūt iti . rājñaḥ putram icchati iti . kriyamāṇe api ātmagrahaṇe parecchāyām prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:11932: . kim kāraṇam . ātmanaḥ iti iyam kartari ṣaṣṭhī . icchā iti akāraḥ bhāve . saḥ yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:11933: eva ātmanaḥ icchā atha api parasya ātmecchā eva asau bhavati . na ātmagrahaṇena icchā
GS24pmbhasuu:11934: abhisambadhyate . kim tarhi . subantam abhisambadhyate . ātmanaḥ yat subantam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11935: . yadi ātmagrahaṇam kriyate chandasi parecchāyām na prāpnoti . ma tvā vṛkāḥ aghāyavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11936: vidan . tasmāt na arthaḥ ātmagrahaṇena . iha kasmāt na bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:11937: rājñaḥ putram icchati iti . asāmarthyāt . katham asāmarthyam . sāpekṣam asamartham
GS24pmbhasuu:11938: bhavati iti . chandasi api tarhi na prāpnoti . ma tvā vṛkāḥ aghāyavaḥ vidan . asti
GS24pmbhasuu:11939: atra viśeṣaḥ . antareṇa api atra tṛtīyasya padasya prayogam parecchā gamyate . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:11940: punaḥ antareṇa api atra tṛtīyasya padasya prayogam parecchā gamyate . te ca eva vṛkāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11941: evamātmakaḥ hiṃsrāḥ . kaḥ ca ātmanaḥ agham eṣitum arhati . ataḥ antareṇa api atra
GS24pmbhasuu:11942: tṛtīyasya padasya prayogam parecchā gamyate . yathā eva tarhi chandasi aghaśabdāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11943: parecchāyām khyac bhavati evam bhāṣāyām api prāpnoti . agham icchati iti . tasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11944: ātmagrahaṇam kartavyam . chandasi katham . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati bhavati chandasi
GS24pmbhasuu:11945: aghaśabdāt parecchāyām kyac iti yat ayam aśvāghasyāt iti kyaci pratkṛte ītvabādhanārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:11946: ākāram śāsti . atha subgrahaṇam kimartham . subantāt utpattiḥ yatha syāt . prātipadikāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11947: mā bhūt iti . na etat asti prayojanam . na asti atra viśeṣaḥ subantāt utpattau satyām
GS24pmbhasuu:11948: prātipadikāt vā ayam asti viśeṣaḥ . subantāt utpattau satyām padasañjñā siddhā bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:11949: . prātipadikāt utpattau satyām padasañjñā na prāpnoti . nanu ca prātipadikāt utpattau
GS24pmbhasuu:11950: satyām padasañjñā siddhā . katham . ārabhyate naḥ kye iti . tat ca avaśyam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:11951: subantāt utpattau satyām niyamārtham . tat eva prātipadikāt utpattau satyām vidhyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:11952: bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam . subantāt utpattiḥ yatha syāt . dhātoḥ mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:11953: iti . etat api na asti prayojanam . dhātoḥ san vidhīyate . saḥ bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:11954: . anavakāśāḥ hi vidhayaḥ bādhakāḥ bhavanti sāvakāśaḥ ca san . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . parecchā
GS24pmbhasuu:11955: . na parecchāyām sanā bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam . samānakartṛkāt iti ucyate . yāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:11956: ca iha ātmagrahaṇam tāvat tatra samānakartṛkagrahaṇam . idam tarhi prayojanam . subantāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11957: utpattiḥ yatha syāt . vākyāt māt bhūt iti . mahāntam putram icchati iti . na vā bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:11958: mahāputrīyati iti . bhavati yadā etat vākyam bhavati . mahān putraḥ mahāputraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11959: mahāputram icchati mahāputrīyati iti . yadā tu etat vākyam bhavati mahāntam putram
GS24pmbhasuu:11960: icchati iti tadā na bhavitavyam tadā ca prāpnoti . tadā mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11962: 48-50 atha kriyamāṇe api subgrahaṇe kasmāt eva atra na bhavati . subantam hi etat
GS24pmbhasuu:11963: vākyam . na etat subantam . katham . pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt tadādeḥ grahaṇam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:11964: iti . atha yat atra subantam tasmāt utpattiḥ kasmāt na bhavati . samānādhikaraṇānām
GS24pmbhasuu:11965: sarvatra avṛttiḥ ayogāt ekena . samānādhikaraṇānām sarvatra eva vṛttiḥ na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:11966: . kva sarvatra . samāsavidhau pratyayavidhau . samāsavidhau tāvat . ṛddhasya rājñaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11967: puruṣaḥ . mahat kaṣṭam śritaḥ iti . pratyayavidhau . ṛddhasya upagoḥ apatyam . mahāntam
GS24pmbhasuu:11968: putram icchati . iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam samānādhikaraṇānām sarvatra vṛttiḥ na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:11969: . ayogāt ekena . na hi ekena padena yogaḥ bhavati . iha tāvat ṛddhasya rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11970: iti ṣaṣṭhyantena subantena sāmarthye sati samāsaḥ vidhīyate . yat ca atra ṣaṣthyantam
GS24pmbhasuu:11971: na tasya subantena sāmarthyam . yasya ca sāmarthyam na tat ṣaṣṭhyantam . vākyam tat
GS24pmbhasuu:11972: . ṛddhasya upagoḥ apatyam iti ca . ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt apatyena yoge pratyayaḥ vidhīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:11973: . yat ca atra ṣaṣṭḥīsamartham na tasya apatatyena yogaḥ yasya ca aptatyena yogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11974: na tat ṣaṣṭhyantam . vākyam tat . samānādhikaraṇānām iti ucyate . atha vyadhikaraṇānām
GS24pmbhasuu:11975: katham . rājñaḥ putram icchati iti . evam tarhi idam paṭhitavyam . saviśeṣaṇānām
GS24pmbhasuu:11976: sarvatra avṛttiḥ ayogāt ekena . dvitīyānupapattiḥ tu . dvitīyā tu na upapadyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:11977: mahāntam putram icchati iti . kim kāraṇam . na putraḥ iṣikarma . yadi putraḥ na iṣikarma
GS24pmbhasuu:11978: na ca avaśyam dvitīyā eva . kim tarhi . sarvāḥ dvitīyādayaḥ vibhaktayaḥ . mahatā
GS24pmbhasuu:11979: putreṇa kṛtam . mahate putrāya dehi . mahaḥ putrāt ānaya . mahataḥ putrasya svam
GS24pmbhasuu:11980: . mahati putre nidhehi . tasmāt na evam śakyam vaktum na putraḥ iṣikarma iti . putra
GS24pmbhasuu:11981: eva iṣikarma . tatsāmānādhikaraṇyāt dvitīyādayaḥ bhaviṣyanti . vṛttiḥ tarhi kasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11982: na bhavati . saviśeṣaṇānām vṛttiḥ na vṛttasya vā viśeṣaṇam na prayujyate iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:11983: . yadi saviśeṣaṇānām vṛttiḥ na vṛttasya vā viśeṣaṇam na prayujyate iti ucyate muṇḍayati
GS24pmbhasuu:11984: māṇavakam iti atra vṛttiḥ na prāpnoti . amuṇḍādīnām iti vaktavyam . tat tarhi vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:11985: saviśeṣaṇānām vṛttiḥ na vṛttasya vā viśeṣaṇam na prayujyate amuṇḍādīnām iti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:11986: vaktavyam . vṛttiḥ kasmāt na bhavati mahāntam putram icchati iti . agamakatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:11987: iha samānārthena vākyena bhavitavyam pratyayāntena ca . yaḥ ca iha arthaḥ vākyena
GS24pmbhasuu:11988: gamyate mahāntam putram icchati iti na asau jātu cit pratyayāntena gamyate mahāntam
GS24pmbhasuu:11989: putrīyati iti . etasmāt hetoḥ brūmaḥ agamakatvāt iti . na brūmaḥ apaśabdaḥ syāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11990: . yatra ca gamakatvam bhavati tatra vṛttiḥ . tat yathā muṇḍayati māṇavakam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11992: 50-55 atha asya kyajantasya kāni sādhanāni bhavanti . bhāvaḥ kartā ca . atha karma
GS24pmbhasuu:11993: . na asti karma . nanu ca ayam iṣiḥ sakarmakaḥ yasya ayam arthe kyac vidhīyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:11994: abhihitam tat karma antarbhūtam dhātvarthaḥ sampannaḥ . na ca idānīm anyat karma
GS24pmbhasuu:11995: asti yena sakarmakaḥ syāt . katham tarhi ayam sakarmakaḥ bhavati aputram putram iva
GS24pmbhasuu:11996: ācarati putrīyati māṇavakam iti . asti atra viśeṣaḥ . dve hi atra karmaṇī upamānakarma
GS24pmbhasuu:11997: upameyakarma ca . upamānakarma antarbhūtam . upameyena karmaṇā sakarmakaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:11998: . tat yathā . api kākaḥ śyenāyate iti atra dvau kartārau upamānakartā ca upameyakartā
GS24pmbhasuu:11999: ca. upamānakartā antarbhūtaḥ . upemeyakartrā sakrtṛkaḥ bhavati . ayam tarhi katham
GS24pmbhasuu:12000: sakarmakaḥ bhavati . muṇḍayati māṇavakam iti . atra api dve karmaṇī sāmānyakarma
GS24pmbhasuu:12001: viśeṣakarma ca . sāmānyakarma antarbhūtam . viśeṣakarmaṇā sakarmakaḥ bhavati . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:12002: ca vṛttyā eva atra na bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam . asāmarthyāt . katham asāmarthyam
GS24pmbhasuu:12003: . sāpekṣam asamartham bhavati iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na atra ubhau karotiyuktau muṇḍaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12004: māṇavakaḥ ca . na hi māṇavakaḥ kriyate . yadā ca ubhau karotiyuktau bhavataḥ na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:12005: tadā vṛttiḥ . tat yathā balīvardam karoti muṇḍam ca enam karoti iti . kāmam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:12006: anena eva hetunā kyac api kartavyaḥ māṇavakam muṇḍam icchati iti . na ubhau iṣiyuktau
GS24pmbhasuu:12007: iti . na kartavyaḥ . ubhau atra iṣiyuktau muṇḍaḥ māṇavakaḥ ca . katham . na hi asau
GS24pmbhasuu:12008: mauṇḍyamātreṇa santoṣam karoti . māṇavakastham asau mauṇḍyam icchati . iha api tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:12009: na prāpnoti muṇḍayati māṇavakam iti . atra api hi ubhau karotiyukta muṇḍaḥ māṇavakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12010: ca . na hi asau mauṇḍyamātreṇa santoṣam karoti . māṇavakastham asu mauṇḍyam nirvartayati
GS24pmbhasuu:12011: . evam tarhi muṇḍādayaḥ guaṇavacanāḥ . guṇavacanāḥ ca sāpekṣāḥ . vacanāt sāpekṣāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:12012: api vṛttiḥ bhaviṣyati . atha vā dhātavaḥ eva muṇḍādayaḥ . na na eva hi arthāḥ ādiśyante
GS24pmbhasuu:12013: kriyāvacanatā ca gamyate . atha vā na idam ubhayam yugapat bhavati vākyam ca pratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12014: ca . yadā vākyam na tadā pratyayaḥ . yadā pratyayaḥ sāmānyena tadā vṛttiḥ . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:12015: avśyam viśeṣārthinā viśeṣaḥ anuprayoktavyaḥ . muṇḍayati . kam . māṇavakam iti . muṇḍaviśiṣṭena
GS24pmbhasuu:12016: vā karotina tam āptum icchati . atha vā uktam etat . na atra vyāpāraḥ anugantavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12017: iti . gamaktvāt iha vṛttiḥ bhaviṣyati . muṇḍayati māṇavakam iti . atha iha kyacā
GS24pmbhasuu:12018: bhavitavyam . iṣṭaḥ putraḥ . iṣyate putraḥ iti . ke cit tāvat āhuḥ na bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:12019: it . kim kāraṇam . svaśabdena uktatvāt iti . apare āhuḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:12020: bhavitavyam iti . kim kāraṇam . dhātvarthe ayam kyac vidhīyate . saḥ ca dhātvarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12021: kena cit eva śabdena nirdeṣṭavyaḥ iti . ihabhavantaḥ tu āhuḥ na bhavitavyam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12022: kim kāraṇam . iha samānārthena vākyena bhavitavyam pratyayāntena ca . yaḥ ca iha
GS24pmbhasuu:12023: arthaḥ vākyena gamyate iṣṭaḥ putraḥ iṣyate putraḥ iti na asau jātu cit pratyayāntena gamyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:12025: 55-56 kyaci māntāvyayapratiṣedhaḥ . kyaci māntāvyayānām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:12026: māt bhūt . idam icchati . kim icchati . uccaiḥ icchati . nīcaiḥ icchati . gosamānākṣaranāntāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12027: iti eke . gām icchati gavyati . samānākṣarāt . dadhīyati madhati kartrīyati hartrīyati
GS24pmbhasuu:12030: 56-57 kimarthaḥ cakāraḥ . svarārthaḥ . citaḥ antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati iti antodāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:12031: yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . dhātusvareṇa api etat siddham . kakārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:12032: tarhi itsañjñāparitrāṇārthaḥ āditaḥ cakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . kāmyacaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12033: citkaraṇānarthakyam kasya idarthābhāvāt . kāmyacaḥ citkaraṇam anarthakam . kakārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:12034: tarhi itsañjñā kasmāt na bhavati . idarthābhāvāt . itkāryābhāvāt atra itsañjñā na
GS24pmbhasuu:12035: bhaviṣyati . nanu ca lopaḥ eva itkāryam . akāryam lopaḥ . iha hi śabdasya kāryārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12036: vā bhavati upadeśaḥ śravaṇārthaḥ vā . karyam ca iha na asti . kārye asati yadi śravaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:12037: api na syāt upadeśaḥ anarthakaḥ syāt . idam tarhi itkāryam . agnicitkamyati . kiti
GS24pmbhasuu:12038: iti guṇapratiṣedhaḥ yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . sārvadhātukārdhadhātukayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12039: aṅgasya guṇaḥ ucyate . dhātoḥ ca vihitaḥ pratyayaḥ śeṣaḥ ārdhadhātukasañjñām labhate
GS24pmbhasuu:12040: . na ca ayam dhātoḥ vidhīyate . idam tarhi . upayaṭkāmyati . kiti iti samprasāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:12041: yathā syāt .. etat api na asti prayojanam . yajādibhiḥ atra kitam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12042: . yajādīnām yaḥ kit iti . kaḥ ca yajādīnām kit . yajādibhyaḥ yaḥ vihitaḥ iti . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:12043: api katham cit itkāryam syāt . evam api na doṣaḥ . kriyate nyāse eva dvicakārakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12044: nirdeśaḥ . supaḥ ātmanaḥ kyac ckāmyat ca iti . atha vā chāndasam etat . dṛṣṭānuvidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12045: chandasi bhavati . na ca atra samprasāraṇam dṛśyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:12046: (P_3,1.10) KA_II,20.17-19 Ro_III.57 adhikaraṇāt ca . adhikaraṇāt ca iti vaktavyam . prāsādayati kuṭyām kuṭīyati prāsāde iti atra api yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12048: 58 salopasanniyogena ayam kyaṅ vidhīyate . tena yatra eva salopaḥ tatra eva syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12049: . payāyate . iha na syāt . api kākaḥ śyenāyate . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . pradhānśiṣṭaḥ kyaṅ
GS24pmbhasuu:12050: . anvācayaśiṣṭaḥ salopaḥ . yatra ca sakāram paśyasi iti . tat yatha . kaḥ cit uktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12051: grāme bhikṣām cara devadattam ca ānaya iti . saḥ grāme bhikṣām carati . yadi devadattam
GS24pmbhasuu:12052: paśyati tam api ānayati . salopaḥ vā . salopaḥ vā iti vaktavyam . payāyate payasyate
GS24pmbhasuu:12053: . ojopsarasoḥ nityam . ojopsarasoḥ nityam salopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . ojāyamānam yaḥ ahim
GS24pmbhasuu:12054: jaghāna . apsarāyate . apraḥ āha salopaḥ apsarasaḥ eva . payasyate iti eva bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:12055: iti . katham ojāyamānam yaḥ ahim jaghana iti . chāndasaḥ prayogaḥ . chandasi ca dṛṣṭānuvidhiḥ vidhīyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:12057: 58-59 ācāre galbhaklībahoḍebhyaḥ kvip vā . ācāre galbhaklībahoḍebhyaḥ kvip vā vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12058: . avagalbhate avagalbhāyate . klība . viklībate viklībāyate . klība . hoḍa . vihoḍate
GS24pmbhasuu:12059: vihoḍāyate . kim prayojanam . kriyāvacanatā yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:12060: . dhātavaḥ eva galbhādayaḥ . na ca eva hi arthāḥ ādiśyante kriyāvacanatā ca gamyate
GS24pmbhasuu:12061: . idam tarhi prayojanam . avagalbhā viklībā vihoḍā . a pratyayāt iti akāraḥ yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:12062: syāt . mā bhūt evam . guroḥ ca halaḥ iti evam bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi . avagalbhām
GS24pmbhasuu:12063: cakre . viklībām cakre . vihoḍām cakre . kāspratyayāt ām amantre iti ām yathā syāt . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:12064: sarvaprātipadikebhyaḥ ācāre kvip vaktavyaḥ aśvati gardabhati iti evamartham . na
GS24pmbhasuu:12065: tarhi idānīm galbhādyanukramaṇam kartavyam . kartavyam ca . kim prayojanam . ātmanepadārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:12066: anubandhān āsaṅkṣyāmi iti . galbha klība hoḍa .
GS24pmbhasuu:12068: 60 halaḥ lopasanniyogena ayam kyaṅ vidhīyate . tena yatra eva halaḥ lopaḥ tatra eva
GS24pmbhasuu:12069: prasajyeta . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . pradhānaśiṣṭaḥ kyaṅ . anvācayaśiṣṭaḥ halaḥ lopaḥ . yatra
GS24pmbhasuu:12073: . iha mā bhūt . kva divā bhṛśāḥ bhavanti iti . cvipratiṣedhānarthakyam ca bhavatyarthe
GS24pmbhasuu:12074: kyaṅvacanāt . cvipratiṣedhaḥ ca anarthakaḥ . kim kāraṇam . bhavatyarthe kyaṅvacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12075: . bhavatyarthe hi kyaṅ vidhīyate . bhavatiyoge cvividhānam . bhavatinā yoge cviḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12076: vidhīyate . tatra cvinā uktatvāt tasya arthasya kyaṅ na bhaviṣyati . ḍājantāt api
GS24pmbhasuu:12077: tarhi na prāpnoti . paṭapaṭāyate . ḍāc api hi bhavatinā yoge vidhīyate . bhavatyarthe
GS24pmbhasuu:12078: kyaṣ . ḍāci vacanaprāmāṇyāt . ḍāci vacanaprāmāṇyāt bhaviṣyati . kim vacanaprāmāṇyam
GS24pmbhasuu:12079: . lohitādiḍājbhyaḥ kyaṣ iti . iha kim cit akriyamāṇam codyate kim cit kriyamāṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:12080: pratyākhyāyate . saḥ sūtrabhedaḥ kṛtaḥ bhavati . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:12081: iha kasmāt na bhavati kva divā bhṛśāḥ bhavanti iti . nañivayuktam anyasadṛśādhikaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:12082: tathā hi arthagatiḥ . nañyuktam ivayuktam va yat kim cit iha dṛśyate tatra anyasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:12083: tatsadṛśe kāryam vijñāyate . tathā hi arthaḥ gamyate . abrāhmaṇam ānaya iti ukte
GS24pmbhasuu:12084: brāhmaṇasadṛśaḥ ānīyate . na asau loṣṭam ānīya kṛtī bhavati . evam iha api acveḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12085: iti cvipratiṣedhāt anyasmin acvyante cvisadṛśe kāryam vijñāsyate . kim ca ataḥ anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:12088: 61-64 iha kāḥ cit prakṛtayaḥ sopasargāḥ paṭhyante : abhimanas ,
GS24pmbhasuu:12093: abhibhavatau subhavatau udbhavatau durbhavatau iti . prakṛtyarthaviśeṣaṇam vā . abhimanasśabdāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12094: sumanasśabdāt unmanasśabdāt durmanasśabdāt iti . yuktam punaḥ idam vicārayatum .
GS24pmbhasuu:12095: nanu tena asandigdhena prakṛtyarthaviśeṣaṇam bhavitavyam yāvatā prāk prakṛteḥ paṭhyante
GS24pmbhasuu:12096: . yadi hi pratyayārthaviśeṣaṇam syāt prāk bhavateḥ paṭhyeran . na ime śakyāḥ prāk
GS24pmbhasuu:12097: bhavateḥ paṭhitum . evam viśiṣṭe hi pratyayāṛthe bhṛśādimātrāt utpattiḥ prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:12098: . tasmāt na evam śakyam kartum . na cet evam jāyate vicāraṇā . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12099: . bhṛśādiṣu upasargaḥ pratyayārthaviśeṣaṇam iti cet svare doṣaḥ . bhṛśādiṣu upasargaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12100: pratyayārthaviśeṣaṇam iti cet svare doṣaḥ bhavati . abhimanāyate . tiṅ atiṅaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:12101: nighātaḥ prasajyate . astu tarhi prakṛtyarthaviśeṣaṇam . sopasargāt iti cet aṭi doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12102: . sopasargāt iti cet aṭi doṣaḥ bhavati . svamanayata iti . atyalpam idam ucyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:12103: aṭi doṣaḥ bhavati iti . aḍlyavdvirvacaneṣu iti vaktavyam . aṭi :
GS24pmbhasuu:12106: abhimimanāyiṣate . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . avaśyam saṅgrāmayateḥ sopasargāt utpattiḥ vaktavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:12107: asaṅgrāmayata śūraḥ iti evamartham . tat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . saṅgrāmayateḥ eva
GS24pmbhasuu:12108: sopasargāt na anyasmāt sopasargāt iti . yadi niyamaḥ kriyate svaraḥ na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:12109: evam tarhi bhṛśādiṣu upasargasya parāṅgavadbhāvam vakṣyāmi . yadi parāṅgavadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12110: ucyate aḍlyavdvirvacanāni na sidhyanti . svaravidhau iti vakṣyāmi . evam ca kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:12111: astu pratyayārthaviśeṣaṇam . nanu ca uktam bhṛśādiṣu upasargaḥ pratyayārthaviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:12112: iti cet svare doṣaḥ iti . svare parāṅgavadbhāvena parihṛtam . ayam tarhi pratyayārthaviśeṣaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:12113: sati doṣaḥ . kyaṅā uktatvāt tasya arthasya upasargasya prayogaḥ na prāpnoti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:12114: kāraṇam . uktārthānām aprayogaḥ iti . tat yathā . api kākaḥ śyenāyate iti kyaṅā uktatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12115: ācārārthasya āṅaḥ prayogaḥ na bhavati . asti atra viśeṣaḥ . ekena atra viśiṣṭe pratyayārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:12116: pratyayaḥ utpadyate iha punaḥ anekena . tatra manāyate iti ukte sandehaḥ syāt abhibhavatau
GS24pmbhasuu:12117: subhavatau durbhavatau iti . tatra asandehārtham upasargaḥ prayujyate . yatra tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:12118: ekena . utpucchayate . atra api anekena . pucchāt udasane pucchāt vyasane pucchāt paryasane iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12120: 64-66 kimarthaḥ kakāraḥ . kṅiti iti guṇapratiṣedhaḥ yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:12121: . sārvadhātukārdhadhātukayoḥ aṅgasya guṇaḥ ucyate . dhātoḥ ca vihitaḥ pratyayaḥ śeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12122: ārdhadhātukasañjñām labhate . na ca ayam dhātoḥ vidhīyate . lohitādīni prātipadikāni
GS24pmbhasuu:12123: . sāmānyagrahaṇārthaḥ tarhi . kva sāmānyagrahaṇena arthaḥ . naḥ kye iti . na ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:12124: nāntāt vidhīyate . iha tarhi . yasya halaḥ kyasya vibhāṣā iti . na ayam halantāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12125: vidhīyate . iha tarhi . āpatyayasya ca taddhite anāti kyacvyoḥ ca iti . na ayam āpatyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12126: vidhīyate . iha tarhi . kyāt chandasi iti . yāt chandasi iti etāvat vaktavyam caraṇyūḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12127: turaṇyuḥ bhuraṇyuḥ iti evamartham . idam tarhi prayojanam . yat tat akṛtyakāre iti
GS24pmbhasuu:12128: dīrghatvam tatra kṅidgrahaṇam anuvartate . tat iha api yathā syāt . lohitāyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:12129: kim punaḥ kāraṇam tatra kṅidgrahaṇam anuvartate . iha mā bhūt . uruyā dhṛṣṇuyā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:12130: . yadi kṅidgrahaṇam anuvartate itryam iti pituḥ rīṅbhāvaḥ na prāpnoti . rīṅbhāve
GS24pmbhasuu:12131: kṅidgrahaṇam nivartiṣyate . yadi nivartate katham asūyā vasūyā ca yamāmahe . asūyateḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12132: asūyā vasūyateḥ vasūyā . atha vā chāndasam etat . dṛṣṭānuvidhiḥ ca chandasi bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:12133: iti . yadi chāndasatvam hetuḥ na arthaḥ kṅidgrahaṇena anuvartamānena . kasmāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:12134: bhavati uruyā dhṛṣṇuyā iti . chāndasatvāt . atha vā astu atra dīrghatvam . chāndasam
GS24pmbhasuu:12135: hrasvatvam bhaviṣyati . tat yathā upagāyantu mām patnayaḥ garbhiṇayaḥ yuvatayaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:12136: . atha kimarthaḥ ṣakāraḥ . viśeṣaṇārthaḥ . kva viśeṣaṇārthena arthaḥ . vā kyaṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12137: iti . vā yāt iti hi ucyamāne ataḥ api prasajyeta . na etat asi prayojanam . parasmaipadam
GS24pmbhasuu:12138: iti ucyate . na ca ataḥ parasmaipadam na api ātmanepadam paśyāmaḥ . sāmānyagrahaṇāvighātārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12139: tarhi bhaviṣyati . kva sāmānyagrahaṇāvighātārthena arthaḥ . kyāt chandasi iti . yāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12140: chandasi iti evam vaktavyam caraṇyūḥ turaṇyuḥ bhuraṇyuḥ iti evamartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:12142: 66 lohitaḍājbhyaḥ kyaṣvacanam . lohitaḍājbhyaḥ kyaṣ vaktavyaḥ . lohitāyati lohitāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:12143: paṭapaṭāyati paṭapaṭāyate . atha anyāni lohitādīni . bhṛśādiṣu itarāṇi . bhṛśādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:12144: itarāṇi paṭhitavyāni . kim prayojanam . ṅitaḥ iti ātmanepadam yathā syāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12146: 67-68 kaṣṭāya iti kim nipātyate . kaṣṭaśabdāt caturthīsamarthāt kramaṇe anārjave kyṅ nipātyate . kaṣṭāya karmaṇe krāmati kaṣṭāyate . atyalpam idam ucyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:12148: kaṇvacikīrṣāyām iti vaktavyam . sattrāyate . sattra. kakaṣa. kakṣāyate . kaṣṭa .
GS24pmbhasuu:12149: kaṣṭāyate . kaṣṭa . gahana . gahanāyate . aparaḥ āha:
GS24pmbhasuu:12150: . sattrādibhyaḥ caturthyantebhyaḥ kramaṇe anārjave kyaṅ vaktavyaḥ . etāni eva udāharaṇāni
GS24pmbhasuu:12151: . sattrādibhyaḥ iti kimartham . kuṭilāya krāmati anuvākāya . caturthyantebhyaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:12152: kimartham . ajaḥ kaṣṭam krāmati . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . na etat pratyayāntanipātanam
GS24pmbhasuu:12153: . kim tarhi . tādarthye eṣā caturthī . kaṣṭāya yat prātipadikam . kaṣṭārthe yat prātipadikam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12155: 68 romanthe iti ucyate . kaḥ romanthaḥ nāma . udgīrṇasya vā avagīrṇasya vā manthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12156: romanthaḥ iti . yadi evam hanucalane iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . kīṭaḥ romatham
GS24pmbhasuu:12157: vartayati . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . kasmāt na bhavati . kīṭaḥ romatham
GS24pmbhasuu:12158: vartayati iti . anabhidhānāt . tapasaḥ parasmaipadam ca . tapasaḥ parasmaipadam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:12159: iti vaktavyam . tapaḥ carati tapasyati . katham tapasyate lokajigīṣuḥ agneḥ . chāndasatvāt bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:12164: aṭṭāyate . śīkā . śīkāyate . koṭā . koṭāyate . poṭā . poṭāyate . soṭā . soṭāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:12165: . pruṣṭā . pruṣṭayate . pluṣṭā . pluṣṭāyate . sudinadurdinābhyām ca . sudinadurdinābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:12166: ca iti vaktavyam . sudināyate . durdināyate . nīhārāt ca . nīhārāt ca iti vaktavyam . nīhārāyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:12168: 69 kartṛvedanāyām iti kimartham . iha mā bhūt . sukham vedayate prasādhakaḥ devadattasya
GS24pmbhasuu:12169: . kartṛvedanāyām iti ucyamāne api atra prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . kartuḥ iti iyam kartari
GS24pmbhasuu:12170: ṣaṣṭhī . vedanāyām iti ca anaḥ bhāve . saḥ yadi eva ātmanaḥ vedayate atha api parasya
GS24pmbhasuu:12171: kartṛvedanā eva asau bhavati . na kartṛgrahaṇena vedanā abhisambadhyate . kim tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:12174: 70 namasaḥ kyaci dvitīyānupapattiḥ . namasaḥ kyaci dvitīyā na upapadyate . namasyati
GS24pmbhasuu:12175: devān . kim kāraṇam . namaḥśabdena yoge caturthī vidhīyate . sā prāpnoti . prakṛtyantaratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12176: siddham . namaḥśabdena yoge caturthī vidhīyate namasyatiśabdaḥ ca ayam . nanu ca
GS24pmbhasuu:12177: namasyatiśabde namaḥśabdaḥ asti . tena yoge prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . arthavataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12178: namaḥsābdasya grahaṇam . na ca namasyatiśabde namaḥśabdaḥ arthavān . atha vā upapadavibhakteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12182: namasaḥ pūjāyām . varivasaḥ paricaryāyām . citraṅaḥ āścarye . bhāṇḍāt samācayane
GS24pmbhasuu:12183: . cīvarāt arjane paridhāne vā . pucchāt udasane vysasane ca iti . kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:12184: . kriyāvacanatā yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:12185: kriyāvacanāḥ kyajādayaḥ iti yat ayam sanādyantāḥ dhātavaḥ iti dhātusañjñām śāsti
GS24pmbhasuu:12187: dhātoḥ iti tavyadādīnām utpattiḥ yathā syāt . yadi ca atra kriyāvacanatā na syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12188: dhātusañjñāvacanam anarthakam syāt . satyām api dhātusañjñāyām tavyadādayaḥ na syuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12189: . kim kāraṇam . sādhane tāvyādayaḥ vidhīyante sādhanam ca kriyāyāḥ . kriyābhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12190: sādhanābhāvaḥ . sādhanābhāvāt satyām api dhātusañjñāyām tavyadādayaḥ na syuḥ . paśyati
GS24pmbhasuu:12191: tu ācāryaḥ kriyāvacanāḥ kyajādayaḥ iti tataḥ sanādyantāḥ dhātavaḥ iti dhātusañjñām
GS24pmbhasuu:12192: śāsti . nanu ca idam prayojanam syāt . parasādhane utpattim vakṣyāmi iti . na parasādhane
GS24pmbhasuu:12193: utpattyā bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam . sādhanam iti sambandhiśabdaḥ ayam . sambandhiśabdāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12194: ca punaḥ evamātmakāḥ yat uta sambandhinam ākṣipanti . tat yathā . mātari vartitatvyam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:12195: pitari śuśrūṣitavyam iti . na ca ucyate svasyām mātari svasmin vā pitari iti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:12196: sambandhāt ca etat gamyate yā yasya mātā yaḥ ca yasya pitā iti . evam iha api sambandhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12197: etat gantavyam yasya dhātoḥ yat sādhanam iti . atha vā dhātavaḥ eva kyajādayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12198: na ca eva hi arthāḥ ādiśyante . kriyāvacanatā ca gamyate . kaḥ khalu api pacādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:12199: kriyāvacanatve yatnam karoti . yena eva khalu api hetunā pacādayaḥ kriyāvacanāḥ tena
GS24pmbhasuu:12200: eva kyajādayaḥ api . evamartham ācāryaḥ citrayati . kva cit arthān ādiśati kva cit
GS24pmbhasuu:12201: na . evam api arthādeśanam kartavyam . katham ime abudhāḥ budhyeran iti . atha vā
GS24pmbhasuu:12202: śakyam ādeśanam akartum . katham . karaṇe iti vartate . karaṇam ca karoteḥ karotiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12205: 72-74 imau halikalī staḥ ikārāntau . asti halaśabdaḥ kalaśabdaḥ ca akārāntaḥ . kayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12206: idam grahaṇam . yau ikārāntau tayoḥ atvam nipātyate . kim prayojanam . halikalyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12207: atvanipātanam sanvadbhāvapratiṣedhārtham . halikalyoḥ atvanipātanam kriyate sanvadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12208: mā bhūt iti . ajahalat acakalat . na etat asti prayojanam . ikāralope kṛte aglopinām
GS24pmbhasuu:12209: na iti pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati . vṛddhau kṛtāyām lopaḥ . tat na aglopi aṅgam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:12210: . idam iha sampradhāryam . vṛddhiḥ kriyatām aglopaḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12211: vṛddhiḥ . nityaḥ lopaḥ . kṛtāyām api vṛddhau prāpnoti akṛtāyām api prāpnoti . anityaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12212: lopaḥ . anyasya kṛtāyām vṛddhau prāpnoti anyasya akṛtāyām . śabdāntarasya ca prāpnuvan
GS24pmbhasuu:12213: vidhiḥ anityaḥ bhavati . vṛddhiḥ api anityā . anyasya kṛte lope prāpnoti anyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:12214: akṛte . śabdāntarasya ca prāpnuvan vidhiḥ anityaḥ bhavati . ubhayoḥ anityayoḥ paratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12215: vṛddhiḥ . vṛddhau kṛtāyām lopaḥ . tat na aglopi aṅgam bhavati . atve punaḥ sati vṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12216: kriyatām lopaḥ iti yadi api paratvāt vṛddhiḥ vṛddhau kṛtāyām api ak eva lupyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:12217: tasmāt suṣṭhu ucyate halikalyoḥ atvanipātanam sanvadbhāvapratiṣedhārtham .
GS24pmbhasuu:12218: (P_3,1.22.1) KA_II,28.13-18 Ro_III.74-75 samabhihāraḥ iti kaḥ ayam śabdaḥ . samabhipūrvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12219: harateḥ bhāvasādhanaḥ ghañ . samabhiharaṇam samabhihāraḥ . tat yatha puṣpābhihāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12220: phalābhihāraḥ iti . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . bahvyaḥ hi tāḥ sumanasaḥ . tatra yuktaḥ samabhihāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12221: . iha punaḥ ekā kriyā . yadi api ekā sāmānyakriyā avayavakriyāḥ tu bahvyaḥ adhiśrayaṇodakāsecanataṇḍulāvapanaidhkopakarṣaṇkriyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12222: . tāḥ kaḥ cit kārtsnyena karoti kaḥ cit akārtsnyena . yaḥ kārtsnyena karoti saḥ ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:12223: pāpacyate iti . punaḥ punaḥ vā pacati pāpacyate iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12225: 75-76 atha dhātugrahaṇam kimartham . iha mā bhūt prāṭati bhṛśam iti . ataḥ uttaram
GS24pmbhasuu:12226: paṭhati . yaṅvidhau dhātugrahaṇe uktam . kim uktam . tatra tāvat uktam karmagrahaṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12227: sanvidhau dhātugrahaṇānarthakyam . sopasargam karma iti cet karmaviśeṣakatvāt upasargasya
GS24pmbhasuu:12228: anupasargam karma . sopasargasya hi karmatve dhātvadhikāre api sanaḥ avidhānam akarmatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12229: iti . evam iha api kriyāsamabhihāragrahaṇāt yaṅvidhau dhātugrahaṇānarthakyam . sopasargaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12230: kriyāsamabhihāraḥ iti cet kriyāsamabhihāraviśeṣakatvāt upasargasya anupasargaḥ kriyāsamabhihāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12231: . sopasargasya hi kriyāsamahibhāratve dhātvadhikāre api yaṅaḥ avidhānam akriyāsamabhihāratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12232: iti . atha ekājjhalādigrahaṇam kimartham . iha mā bhūt :
GS24pmbhasuu:12233: jāgarti bhṛśam . īkṣate bhṛśam . ekājjhalādigrahaṇe ca . ekājjhalādigrahaṇe ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:12234: . kim uktam . tatra tāvat uktam karmasamānakartṛkagrahaṇānarthakyam ca icchābhidhāne
GS24pmbhasuu:12235: pratyayavidhānāt . akarmaṇaḥ hi asamānakartṛkāt vā anabhidhānam iti . iha api ekājjhalādigrahaṇānarthakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:12236: kriyāsamabhihāre yaṅvacanāt anekācaḥ ahalādeḥ hi anabhidhānam iti . tat ca avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:12237: anabhidānam āśrayitavyam . kriyamāṇe api hi ekājjhalādigrahaṇe yatra ekācaḥ halādeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12238: ca utpadyamānena yaṅā arthasya abhidhānam na bhavati na bhavati tatra utpattiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12239: tat yathā . bhṛśam śobhate . bhṛśam rocate . yatra ca anekācaḥ ahalādeḥ vo utpadyamānena
GS24pmbhasuu:12240: yaṅā arthasya abhidhānam bhavati bhavati tatra utpattiḥ . tat yathā . aṭāṭyate arāryate
GS24pmbhasuu:12243: 76-77 ūrṇoteḥ ca upasaṅkhyānam . ūrṇoteḥ ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . prorṇonūyate . atyalpam idam ucyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:12245: . sūcisūtrimūtryaṭyartyaśyūrṇotīnām grahaṇam kartavyam . kim prayojanam . yaṅvidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:12246: anekājahalādyartham . sosūcyate sosūtryate momūtryate aṭāṭyate arāryate aśāśyate
GS24pmbhasuu:12247: prorṇonūyate . vācyaḥ ūrṇorṇuvadbhāvaḥ yaṅprasiddhiḥ prayojanam . āmaḥ ca pratiṣedhārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:12250: 77-78 kriyāsamabhihāre yaṅaḥ vipratiṣedhena loḍvidhānam . kriyāsamabhihāre loṭ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:12251: yaṅaḥ vipratiṣedhena . kriyāsamabhihāre yaṅ bhavati iti asya avakāśaḥ dhātuḥ yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12253: lolūyate . loṭaḥ avakāśaḥ dhātuḥ yaḥ anekāc ahalādiḥ kriyāsamabhihāre vartate dhātusambandhaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:12254: saḥ bhavān jāgṛhi jāgṛhi iti eva ayam jāgarti . saḥ bhavān īhasva īhasva iti eva
GS24pmbhasuu:12255: ayam īhate . dhātuḥ yaḥ ekāc halādiḥ kriyāsamabhihāre vartate dhātusambandhaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:12257: saḥ bhavān lunīhi lunīhi iti eva ayam lunāti . loṭ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . na tarhi idānīm idam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:12258: saḥ bhavān lolūyasva lolūyasva iti eva ayam lolūyate . bhavati ca . na vā nānārthatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12259: . kartṛkarmaṇoḥ hi lavidhānam kriyāviśeṣe svārthe yaṅ . na vā arthaḥ vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:12260: . kim kāraṇam . nānārthatvāt . kā nānārthatā . kartṛkarmaṇoḥ hi lavidhānam . kartṛkarmaṇoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12261: hi loṭ vidhīyate . kriyāviśeṣe svārthe yaṅ . tatra antaraṅgatvāt yaṅā bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:12262: . na tarhi idam idānīm bhavati . saḥ bhavān lunīhi lunīhi iti eva ayam lunāti . bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:12263: ca . vibhāṣā yaṅ . yadā na yaṅ tadā loṭ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12265: 78-79 uttarayoḥ vigraheṇa viśeṣāsampratyayāt nityagrahaṇānarthakyam . uttarayoḥ yogayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12266: vigraheṇa viśeṣāsampratyayāt nityagrahaṇānarthakyam . na hi kuṭilam krāmati iti caṅkramyate
GS24pmbhasuu:12267: iti gamyate . athe etebhyaḥ kriyāsamabhihāre yaṅā bhavitavyam . kriyāsamabhihāre
GS24pmbhasuu:12268: ca na etebhyaḥ . kriyāsamabhihāre ca na etebhyaḥ yaṅā bhavitavyam . bhṛśam japati
GS24pmbhasuu:12269: brāhmaṇaḥ . bhṛśam samidaḥ dahati iti eva.
GS24pmbhasuu:12271: 79-80 satyāpa iti kim nipātyate . satyasya kṛñi āpuk ca . satyasya kṛñi āpuk ca nipātyate
GS24pmbhasuu:12272: ṇic ca . satyam karoti satyāpayati . atyalpam idam ucyate . ṇividau arthavedasatyānām
GS24pmbhasuu:12273: apuk ca . ṇividau arthavedasatyānām apuk ca iti vaktavyam . arthāpayati vedāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:12274: satyāpayati . yadi āpuk kriyate ṭilopaḥ prāpnoti . evam tarhi puk kariṣyate . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:12275: api ṭilopaḥ prāpnoti . evam tarhi āk kariṣyate . evam api ṭilopaḥ prāpnoti . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:12276: tarhi ak kariṣyate . evam api anākārāntatvāt puk na prāpnoti . evam tarhi apuṭ kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:12277: . atha vā punaḥ astu āpuk eva . nanu ca uktam . ṭilopaḥ prāpnoti iti . āpugvacanasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12278: na bhaviṣyati . atha vā punaḥ astu puk eva . nanu ca uktam evam api ṭilopaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:12279: iti . pugvacanasāmarthyāt na bhaviṣyati . atha vā punaḥ astu āk eva . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:12280: evam api ṭilopaḥ prāpnoti iti . āgvacanasāmarthyāt na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:12282: 80-86 katham idam vijñāyate . hetumati abhidheye ṇic bhavati iti . āhosvit hetumati
GS24pmbhasuu:12283: yaḥ dhātuḥ vartate iti . yuktam punaḥ idam vicārayitum . nanu anena asandigdhena
GS24pmbhasuu:12284: pratyayārthaviśeṣaṇena bhavitavyam yāvatā hetumati iti ucyate . yadi hi prakṛtarthaviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:12285: syāt hetumataḥ iti evam brūyāt . na etat asti . bhavanti iha hi viṣayasaptamyaḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:12286: . tat yathā . pramāṇe yat prātipadikam vartate striyām yat prātipadikam vartate iti
GS24pmbhasuu:12287: . evam iha api hetumati abhidheye ṇic bhavati hetumati yaḥ dhātuḥ vartate iti jāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:12288: vicāraṇā . ata uttaram paṭhati . hetumati iti kārakopādānam pratyayārthaparigrahārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:12289: yathā tanūkaraṇe takṣaḥ . hetumati iti kārakam upādīyate . kim prayojanam . pratyayārthaparigrahārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:12290: . evam sati pratyayārthaḥ suparigṛhītaḥ bhavati . yathā tanūkaraṇe takṣaḥ iti tanūkaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:12291: upādīyate . yadi tarhi tadvat prakṛtyarthaviśeṣaṇam bhavati . prakṛtyarthaviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:12292: hi tat tatra vijñāyate . tanūkaraṇakriyāyām takṣaḥ iti . astu prakṛtyarthaviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:12293: . kaḥ doṣaḥ . iha hi uktaḥ karoti preṣitaḥ karoti iti ṇic prāpnoti . pratyayārthaviśeṣaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:12294: punaḥ sati na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . svaśabdena uktatvāt na bhaviṣyati . prakṛtyarthaviśeṣaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:12295: api sati na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yatra na antareṇa śabdam arthasya gatiḥ bhavati tatra śabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12296: prayujyate . yatra hi antareṇa api śabdam arthasya gatiḥ bhavati na tatra śabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12297: prayujyate . iha tarhi pācayati odanam devadattaḥ yajñadattena iti ubhayoḥ kartroḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12298: lena abhidhānam prāpnoti . pratyayārthaviśeṣaṇe punaḥ sati na doṣaḥ . pradhānakartari
GS24pmbhasuu:12299: lādayaḥ bhavanti iti pradhānakartā lena abhidhīyate . yaḥ ca apradhānam siddha tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:12300: kartari iti eva tṛtīyā . iha ca gamitaḥ grāmam devadattaḥ yajñadattanea iti avyatiriktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12301: gatyarthaḥ iti kṛtvā gatyarthānām kartari iti kartari ktaḥ prāpnoti . iha ca vyatibhedayante
GS24pmbhasuu:12302: vyaticchedayante iti avyatiriktaḥ hiṃsārthaḥ iti kṛtvā na gatihiṃsārthebhyaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:12303: pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . astu tarhi pratyayārthaviśeṣaṇam . yadi pratyayārthaviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:12304: pācayati odanam devadattaḥ yajñadattena iti prayojye kartari karmasañjñā prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:12305: . bhavati hi tasya tasmin īpsā . iha ca grāmam gamayati grāmāya gamayati iti vyatiriktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12306: gatyarthaḥ iti kṛtvā gatyarthakarmaṇi dvitīyācaturthyau na prāpnutaḥ . iha ca edhodakasya
GS24pmbhasuu:12307: upaskārayati iti vyatiriktaḥ karotyarthaḥ iti kṛtvā kṛñaḥ pratiyatne iti ṣaṣṭhī na
GS24pmbhasuu:12308: prāpnoti . iha ca bhedikā devadattasya yajñadattasya kāṣṭhānām iti prayojye kartari
GS24pmbhasuu:12309: ṣaṣṭhī na prāpnoti . iha ca abhiṣāvayati pariṣāvayati iti vyatiriktaḥ sunotyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12310: iti kṛtvā upasargāt sunotyādīnām iti ṣatvam na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yat tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:12311: ucyate pācayati odanam devadattaḥ yajñadattena iti prayojye kartari karmasañjñā prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:12312: iti . gatibuddhipratyavasānārthaśabdakarmākarmakāṇām aṇi iti etat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:12313: . eteṣām eva aṇyantānām yaḥ kartā saḥ ṇau karmasañjñaḥ bhavati na anyeṣām iti . yat
GS24pmbhasuu:12314: api ucyate iha ca grāmam gamayati grāmāya gamayati iti vyatiriktaḥ gatyarthaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:12315: kṛtvā gatyarthakarmaṇi dvitīyācaturthyau na prāpnutaḥ iti . na asau evam preṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:12316: gaccha grāmam iti . katham tarhi . sādhanaviśiṣṭām asau kriyām preṣyate . grāmam
GS24pmbhasuu:12317: gaccha . grāmāya gaccha iti . yat api ucyate iha ca edhodakasya upaskārayati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:12318: vyatiriktaḥ karotyarthaḥ iti kṛtvā kṛñaḥ pratiyatne iti ṣaṣṭhī na prāpnoti iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12319: na asau evam preṣyate upaskuruṣva edhodakasya iti . katham tarhi . sādhanaviśiṣṭām
GS24pmbhasuu:12320: asau kriyām preṣyate . edhodakasya upaskuruṣva iti . yat api ucyate iha ca bhedikā
GS24pmbhasuu:12321: devadattasya yajñadattasya kāṣṭhānām iti prayojye kartari ṣaṣṭhī na prāpnoti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:12322: . uktam tatra kṛdgrahaṇasya prayojanam kartṛbhūtapūrvamātre api ṣaṣṭhī yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12323: iti . yat api ucyate iha ca abhiṣāvayati pariṣāvayati
GS24pmbhasuu:12324: iti vyatiriktaḥ sunotyarthaḥ iti kṛtvā upasargāt sunotyādīnām iti ṣatvam na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:12325: iti . na asau evam preṣyate sunu abhi iti . katham tarhi upasargaviśiṣṭām asau kriyām
GS24pmbhasuu:12326: preṣyate . abhiṣunu iti . yuktam punaḥ idam vicārayitum . nanu anena asandigdhena
GS24pmbhasuu:12327: pratyayārthaviśeṣaṇena bhavitavyam yāvatā vyaktam arthāntaram gamyate pacati pācayati
GS24pmbhasuu:12328: iti ca . bāḍham yuktam . iha paceḥ kaḥ pradhānārthaḥ . yā asau taṇḍulānām viklittiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12329: . atha idānīm tadabhisandhipūrvakam preṣaṇam adhyeṣaṇam vā . yuktam yat sarvam pacyarthaḥ syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:12331: 87-88 hetunirdeśaḥ ca nimittamātram bikṣādiṣu darśanāt . hetunirdeśaḥ ca nimittamātram
GS24pmbhasuu:12332: draṣṭavyam . yāvat brūyāt nimittam kāraṇam iti tāvt hetuḥ iti . kim prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12333: bikṣādiṣu darśanāt . bhikṣādiṣu hi ṇic dṛśyate . bhikṣāḥ vāsayanti .kāriṣaḥ agniḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12334: adhyāpayati iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam pāribhāṣike hetau na sidhyati . evam manyate
GS24pmbhasuu:12335: . cetanāvataḥ etat bhavati preṣaṇam adhyeṣaṇam ca iti . bhikṣāḥ ca acetanāḥ . na
GS24pmbhasuu:12336: eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na avaśyam saḥ eva vāsam prayojayati yaḥ āha uṣyatām iti . tūṣṇīm āsīnaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12337: yaḥ tatsamarthāni ācarati saḥ api vāsam prayojayati . bhikṣāḥ ca api pracurāḥ vyañjanavatyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12338: labhyamānāḥ vāsam prayojayanti . tathā kārīṣaḥ agniḥ nirvāte ekānte suprajvalitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12341: 88-89 iha kaḥ cit kam cit āha . pṛcchatu mā bhavān . anuyuṅktām mā bhavān iti . atra
GS24pmbhasuu:12342: ṇic kasmāt na bhavati . akartṛtvāt . na hi asau samprati pṛcchati . tūṣṇīm āste .
GS24pmbhasuu:12343: kim ca bhoḥ vartamānakālāyāḥ eva kriyāyāḥ kartrā bhavitavyam na bhūtabhaviṣyatkālāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12344: . bhūtabhaviṣyatkālāyāḥ api bhavitavyam . abhisambandhaḥ tatra kriyate . imām kriyām
GS24pmbhasuu:12345: akārṣīt . imām kriyām kariṣyati iti . iha punaḥ na kaḥ cit abhisambandhaḥ kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:12346: na ca asau samprati pṛcchati . tūṣṇīm āste . yadi tarhi kartā na asti katham tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:12347: kartṛpratyayena loṭā abhidhīyate . atham katham asmin apṛcchati ayam pracchiḥ vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:12348: . abhisambandhaḥ tatra kriyate . imām kriyām kuru iti . kartrā api tarhi abhisambandhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12349: kriyate . katham . kartā ca asyāḥ kriyāyāḥ bhava iti . evam na ca kartā kartṛpratyayena
GS24pmbhasuu:12350: ca loṭā abhidhīyate . atha api katham cit kartā syāt . evam api na doṣaḥ . loṭā uktatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12351: preṣaṇasya ṇic na bhaviṣyati . vidhīyante hi eteṣu artheṣu praiṣādiṣu loḍādayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12352: yatra ca dvitīyaḥ prayojyaḥ arthaḥ bhavati bhavati tatra ṇic . tat yathā āsaya śāyaya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12354: 89-90 kṛṣyādiṣu ca anutpattiḥ . kṛṣyādiṣu ca anutpattiḥ vaktavyā . ekānte tūṣṇīm
GS24pmbhasuu:12355: āsīnaḥ ucyate pañcabhiḥ halaiḥ kṛṣati iti . tatra bhavitavyam . pañcabhiḥ halaiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12356: karṣayati iti . kṛṣyādiṣu ca anutpattiḥ nānākriyāṇām kṛṣyarthatvāt . kṛṣyādiṣu ca
GS24pmbhasuu:12357: anutpattiḥ siddhā . kutaḥ . nānākriyāṇām kṛṣyarthatvāt . nānākriyāḥ kṛṣeḥ arthāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12358: . na avaśyam kṛṣiḥ vilekhane eva vartate . kim tarhi. pratividhāne api vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:12359: yat asau bhaktabījabalīvardaiḥ pratividhānam karoti saḥ kṛṣyarthaḥ . ātaḥ ca pratividhāne
GS24pmbhasuu:12360: vartate . yadahaḥ eva asau na pratividhatte tadahaḥ tat karma na pravartate . yajyādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:12361: ca aviparyāsaḥ . yajyādiṣu ca aviparyāsaḥ vaktavyaḥ . puṣyamitraḥ yajate . yājakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12362: yājayanti iti . tatra bhavitavyam . puṣyamitraḥ yājayate . yājakāḥ yajanti iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12363: yajyādiṣu ca aviparyāsaḥ nānākriyāṇām yajyarthatvāt . yajyādiṣu ca aviparyāsaḥ siddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12364: . kutaḥ . nānākriyāṇām yajyarthatvāt . nānākriyāḥ yajeḥ arthāḥ . na avaśyam yajiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12365: haviṣprakṣepaṇe eva vartate . kim tarhi . tyāge api vartate . aho yajate iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:12366: yaḥ suṣṭhu tyāgam karoti . tam ca puṣyamitraḥ karoti . yājakāḥ prayojayanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12368: 91-92 tat karoti iti upasaṅkhyānam sūtrayatyādyartham . tat karoti iti upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:12369: kartavyam . kim prayojanam . sūtrayatyādyartham . sūtram karoti . sūtrayati . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:12370: vyākaraṇasya sūtram karoti . vyākaraṇam sūtrayati iti . vākye ṣaṣṭhī utpanne ca pratyaye
GS24pmbhasuu:12371: dvitīyā . kena etat evam bhavati . yaḥ asau sūtravyākaraṇayoḥ abhisambandhaḥ saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12372: utpanne pratyaye nivartate . asti ca karoteḥ vyākaraṇena sāmarthyam iti kṛtvā dvitīyā bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:12374: 92-97 ākhyānāt kṛtaḥ tat ācaṣṭe iti kṛlluk prakṛtipratyāpattiḥ prakṛtivat ca kārakam
GS24pmbhasuu:12375: . ākhyānāt kṛdantāt tat ācaṣṭe iti etasmin arthe kṛlluk prakṛtipratyāpattiḥ prakṛtivat
GS24pmbhasuu:12376: ca kārakam bhavati iti vaktavyam . kaṃsavadham ācaṣṭe kaṃsam ghātayati . balibandham
GS24pmbhasuu:12377: ācaṣṭe balim bandhayati . ākhyānāt ca pratiṣedhaḥ . ākhyānaśabdāt ca pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12378: vaktavyaḥ . ākhyānam ācaṣṭe . kim punaḥ yāni etāni sañjñābhūtāni ākhyānāni tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12379: utpattyā bhavitavyam āhosvit kriyānvākhyānamātrāt . kim ca ataḥ . yadi sañjñābhūtebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12380: iha na prāpnoti . rājāgamanam ācaṣṭe ṛajānam āgamayati . atha kriyānvākhyānamātrāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12381: na doṣaḥ bhavati . yathā na doṣaḥ tathā astu . dṛśyarthānām ca pravṛttau . dṛśyarthānām
GS24pmbhasuu:12382: ca pravṛttau kṛdantāt ṇic vaktayaḥ tat ācaṣṭe iti etasmin arthe kṛlluk prakṛtipratyāpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12383: prakṛtivat ca kārakam bhavati iti . mṛgaramaṇam ācaṣṭe mṛgān ramayati iti . dṛśyarthānām
GS24pmbhasuu:12384: iti kimartham . yadā hi grāme mṛgaramaṇam ācaṣṭe mṛgaramaṇam ācaṣṭe iti eva tadā
GS24pmbhasuu:12385: bhavati iti . āṅlopaḥ ca kālātyantasaṃyoge maryādāyām . kālātyantasaṃyoge maryādayām
GS24pmbhasuu:12386: kṛdantāt ṇic vaktayaḥ tat ācaṣṭe iti etasmin arthe āṅlopaḥ ca kṛlluk prakṛtipratyāpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12387: prakṛtivat ca kārakam bhavati iti . ārātrimvivāsam ācaṣṭe rātrim vivāsayati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12388: citrīkaraṇe prāpi . citrīkaraṇe prāpyarthe kṛdantāt ṇic vaktayaḥ kṛlluk prakṛtipratyāpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12389: prakṛtivat ca kārakam bhavati iti . ujjayinyāḥ prasthitaḥ māhiṣmatyām suryodgamanam
GS24pmbhasuu:12390: sambhāvayate sūryam udgamayati . nakṣatrayoge jñi . nakṣatrayoge jānātyarthe kṛdantāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12391: ṇic vaktayaḥ kṛlluk prakṛtipratyāpattiḥ prakṛtivat ca kārakam bhavati iti . puṣyayogam
GS24pmbhasuu:12392: jānāti puṣyeṇa yojayati . maghābhiḥ yojayati . tat tarhi bahu vaktavyam . na vā sāmānyakṛtatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12393: hetutaḥ hi aviśiṣṭam . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam . sāmānyakṛtatvāt . sāmānyena
GS24pmbhasuu:12394: eva atra ṇic bhaviṣyati . hetumati iti . kim kāraṇam . hetutaḥ hi aviśiṣṭam . hetutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12395: hi aviśiṣṭam bhavati . tulyā hi hetutā devadatte ca āditye ca . na sidhyati . svatantraprayojakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12396: hetusañjñaḥ bhavati iti ucyate . na ca asau ādityam prayojayati . svatantraprayojakatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12397: aprayojakaḥ iti cet muktasaṃśayena tulyam . yam bhavān svatrantraprayojakam muktasaṃśayam
GS24pmbhasuu:12398: nyāyyam manyate pācayati odanam devadattaḥ yajñadattena iti tena etat tulyam . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:12399: . pravṛttiḥ hi ubhayatra anapekṣya . pravṛttiḥ hi ubhayatra anapekṣya eva kim cit
GS24pmbhasuu:12400: bhavati devadatte ca āditye ca . na iha kaḥ cit paraḥ anugrahītavyaḥ iti pravartate
GS24pmbhasuu:12401: . sarve ime svabhūtyartham pravartante . ye tāvat ete guruśuśrūṣavaḥ te api svabhūtyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:12402: eva pravartante pāralaukikam ca naḥ bhaviṣyati iha ca naḥ prītaḥ guruḥ adhyāpayiṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:12403: iti . tathā yat etat dāsakarmakaram nāma ete api svabhūtyartham eva pravartantebhaktam
GS24pmbhasuu:12404: celam ca lapsyāmahe paribhāṣāḥ ca na naḥ bhaviṣyanti iti . tathā ye ete śilpinaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12405: nāme te api svabhūtyartham eva pravartante vetanam ca lapsyāmahe mitrāṇi ca naḥ bhaviṣyanti
GS24pmbhasuu:12406: iti . evam eteṣu sarveṣu svabhūtyartham pravartamāneṣu kurvataḥ prayojakaḥ iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:12407: tulyam . yadi kaḥ cit kurvataḥ prayojakaḥ nāma bhavati tena etat tulyam . yadi tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:12408: sarve ime svabhūtyartham pravartantekaḥ prayojyārthaḥ . yat abhiprāyeṣu sajjante
GS24pmbhasuu:12409: . īdṛśau vadhrau kuru . īdṛśau paṭukau kuru . ādityaḥ ca asya abhiprāye sajjate .
GS24pmbhasuu:12410: eṣaḥ tasya abhiprāyaḥ . ujjayinyāḥ prasthitaḥ māhiṣmatyām suryodgamanam sambhāvayeya
GS24pmbhasuu:12411: iti . tam ca asya abhiprāyam ādityaḥ nirvartayati . bhavet iha vartamānakālatā yuktā
GS24pmbhasuu:12412: . ujjayinyāḥ prasthitaḥ māhiṣmatyām suryodgamanam sambhāvayate sūryam udgamayati
GS24pmbhasuu:12413: iti . tatrasthasya hi tasya ādityaḥ udeti . iha tu katham vartamānakālatām kaṃsam
GS24pmbhasuu:12414: ghātayati balim bandhayati iti cirahate kaṃse cirabaddhe ca balau . atra api yuktā
GS24pmbhasuu:12415: . katham . ye tāvat ete śobhikāḥ nāma ete pratyakṣam kaṃsam ghātayanti pratyakṣam
GS24pmbhasuu:12416: ca balim bandhayanti iti . citreṣu katham . citreṣu api udgūrṇāḥ nipatitāḥ ca prahārāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12417: dṛśyante kaṃsakarṣaṇyaḥ ca . granthikeṣu katham yatra śabdagaḍumātram lakṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:12418: te api hi teṣām utpattiprabhṛti ā vināśāt ṛddhīḥ vyācakṣāṇāḥ sataḥ buddhiviṣayān
GS24pmbhasuu:12419: prakāśayanti . ātaḥ ca sataḥ vyāmiśrāḥ hi dṛśyante . ke cit kaṃsabhaktāḥ bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:12420: ke cit vāsudevabhaktāḥ . varṇānyatvam khalu api puṣyanti . ke cit raktamukhāḥ bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:12421: ke cit kālamukhāḥ . traikālyam khalu api loke lakṣyate . gaccha hanyate kaṃsaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12422: gaccha ghāniṣyate kaṃsaḥ . kim gatena hataḥ kaṃsaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12424: 97-101 kimarthaḥ kakāraḥ . kṅiti iti guṇapratiṣedhaḥ yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:12425: . sārvadhātukārdhadhātukayoḥ aṅgasya guṇaḥ ucyate . dhātoḥ ca vihitaḥ pratyayaḥ śeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12426: ārdhadhātukasañjñām labhate . na ca ayam dhātoḥ vidhīyate . kaṇḍvādīni hi prātipadikāni
GS24pmbhasuu:12427: . kaṇḍvādibhyaḥ vāvacanam . kaṇḍvādibhyaḥ vā iti vaktavyam . avacane hi nityapratyayatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:12428: . akriyamāṇe hi vāvacane nityaḥ pratyayavidhiḥ prasajyeta . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:12429: dhātuvidhitukpratiṣedhaḥ . tatra dhātuvidheḥ tukaḥ ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12430: . kaṇḍvau kaṇḍvaḥ . aci śnudhātubhruvām yvoḥ iyaṅuvaṅau iti uvaṅadeśaḥ prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:12431: . iha ca kaṇḍvā kaṇḍve na ūṅdhātvoḥ iti pratiṣedhaḥ prasajyeta . tuk ca pratiṣedhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12432: . valguḥ mantuḥ iti . hrasvasya piti kṛti tuk prāpnoti . hrasvayalopau ca vaktavyau
GS24pmbhasuu:12433: . hrasvayalopau ca vaktavyau syātām . valguḥ mantuḥ iti . kimartham idam na hrasvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12434: eva ayam . antaraṅgatvāt akṛdyakāre iti dīrghatvam prāpnoti . yalopaḥ . yalopaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:12435: vaktavyaḥ . kaṇḍūḥ valguḥ mantuḥ iti . kimartham idam na vali iti eva siddham . vali
GS24pmbhasuu:12436: iti ucyate . na ca atra valim paśyāmaḥ . nanu cal kvip valādiḥ . kviblope kṛte valādyabhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12437: na prāpnoti . idam iha sampradhāryam . kviblopaḥ kriyatām vali lopaḥ iti . kim atra
GS24pmbhasuu:12438: kartavyam . paratvāt kviblopaḥ . nityaḥ khalu api kviblopaḥ . kṛte api yalope prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:12439: akṛte api prāpnoti . nityatvāt paratvāt ca kvilope kṛte valādyabhāvāt na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:12440: . evam tarhi pratyayalakṣaṇena bhaviṣyati . varṇāśraye na asti pratyayalakṣaṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12441: atha kriyamāṇe api vāvacane yadā yagantāt kvip tadā ete doṣāḥ kasmāt na bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:12442: . na etebhyaḥ tadā kvip drakṣyate . kim kāraṇam . anyebhyaḥ api dṛśyate iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:12443: . na ca etebhyaḥ tadā kvip dṛśyate . yathā eva tarhi kriyamāṇe vāvacane anyebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12444: api dṛśyate iti evam atra kvip na bhavati evam akriyamāṇe api na bhaviṣyati . avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:12445: etebhyaḥ tadā kvip eṣitavyaḥ . kim prayojanam . etāni rūpāṇi yathā syuḥ iti . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:12446: tarhi vāvacanam kartavyam . na kartavyam . ubhayam kaṇḍvādīni dhātavaḥ ca prātipadikāni
GS24pmbhasuu:12447: ca . ātaḥ ca ubhayam . kaṇḍūyati iti kriyām kurvāṇe prayujyate asti me kaṇḍūḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:12449: dhātuprakaraṇāt dhātuḥ kasya āsañjanāt api . āha ca ayam imam dīrgham . manye dhātuḥ vibhāṣitaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12451: 101-104 kimarthaḥ ayam ṇakāraḥ . vṛddhyarthaḥ . ñṇiti iti vṛddhiḥ yathā syāt . kriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:12452: api vai ṇakāre vṛddhiḥ na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . kṅiti ca iti pratiṣedhāt . ṇitkaraṇasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12453: bhaviṣyati . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . ṇiṅi ṇitkaraṇasya sāvakāśatvāt vṛddhipratiṣedhaprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12454: . ṇiṅi ṇitkaraṇam sāvakāśam . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . sāmānyagrahaṇārthaḥ ṇakāraḥ . kva sāmānyagrahaṇārthena
GS24pmbhasuu:12455: arthaḥ . ṇeḥ aniṭi iti . ṇiṅi ṇitkaraṇasya sāvakāśatvāt vṛddhipratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:12456: . ṅitkaraṇam api tarhi sāvakāśam . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . sāmānyagrahaṇāvighātārthaḥ ṅakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12457: . kva sāmānyagrahaṇāvighātārthena arthaḥ . atra eva . śakyaḥ atra sāmānyagrahaṇāvighātārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12458: anyaḥ anubandhaḥ āsaṅktum . tatra ṅakārānurodhāt vṛddhipratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . avaśayam
GS24pmbhasuu:12459: atra ātmanepadārthaḥ ṅakāraḥ anubandhaḥ āsaṅktavyaḥ ṅitaḥ iti ātmanepadam yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12460: . evam ubhayoḥ sāvakaśayoḥ pratiṣedhabalīyastvāt pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:12461: ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na kameḥ vṛddhipratiṣedhaḥ bhavati iti yat ayam na kamyamicamām
GS24pmbhasuu:12462: iti mitsañjñāyā pratiṣedham śāsti . mitpratiṣedhasya ca arthavattvāt . mitpratiṣedhasya
GS24pmbhasuu:12463: ca arthavattvāt pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . arthavān mitpratiṣedhaḥ . kaḥ arthaḥ . ṇiṅantasya
GS24pmbhasuu:12464: ṇici yā vṛddhiḥ tasyāḥ hrasvatvam mā bhūt iti . nanu etasyāḥ api kṅiti ca iti pratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:12465: bhavitavyam . na bhavitavyam . uktam etat kṅiti pratiṣedhe tannimittagrahaṇam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:12466: . evam tarhi na ṇiṅantasya ṇici yā vṛddhiḥ tasyāḥ hrasvatvam prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:12467: . ṇiṅā vyavahitatvāt . lope kṛte na asti vyavadhānam . sthānivadbhāvāt vyavadhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:12468: eva . ṇiṅi eva tarhi mā bhūt iti . ṇiṅi ca na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . asiddham bahiraṅgalakṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:12469: antaraṅgalakṣaṇe iti . na eva vā punaḥ ṇiṅantasya ṇici vṛddhiḥ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:12470: . ṇiṅā vyavahitatvāt . lope kṛte na asti vyavadhānam . sthānivadbhāvāt vyavadhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:12471: eva . idam tarhi prayojanam . yat tat ciṇṇamuloḥ dīrghaḥ anyatarasyām iti dīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:12472: tat kameḥ ṇiṅi mā bhūt iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam tatra dīrghaḥ anyatarasyām iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:12473: . na hrasvaḥ anyatarasyām iti eva ucyeta . yathāprāptam ca api kameḥ hrasvatvam eva
GS24pmbhasuu:12474: . tatra ayam api arthaḥ . hrasvagrahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati . prakṛtam anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:12475: . kva prakṛtam . mitām hrasvaḥ iti . kā rūpasiddhiḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:12476: aśami aśāmi śamam śamam śāmam śāmam . vṛddhyā siddham . na sidhyati . na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:12477: . na udāttopadeśasya māntasya anācameḥ iti vṛddhipratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . ciṇkṛtoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12478: saḥ pratiṣedhaḥ na ṇici . idam tarhi . ajani ajāni janam janam jānam jānam . janivadhyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12479: ca iti vṛddhipratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . saḥ api ciṇkṛtoḥ eva . ṇijvyavahiteṣu tarhi yaṅlope
GS24pmbhasuu:12480: ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam syāt . śamayantam prayojitavān aśami aśāmi śamam śamam
GS24pmbhasuu:12481: śāmam śāmam . śaṃśamayateḥ aśaṃsami aśaṃśāmi śaṃśamam śaṃśamam śaṃśāmam śaṃśāmam
GS24pmbhasuu:12482: . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . ciṇṇamulpare ṇau mitām aṅgānām hrasvaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:12483: iti ucyate . yaḥ ca atra ṇiḥ ciṇṇamulparaḥ na tasmin mit aṅgam yasmin ca mit aṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:12484: na asau ṇiḥ ṇamulparaḥ . ṇilope kṛte ciṇṇamulparaḥ . sthānivadbhāvāt na ciṇṇamulparaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12485: . atha dīrghaḥ anyatarasyām iti ucyamāne yāvatā sthānivadbhāvaḥ katham eva etat sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:12486: . etat idānīm dīrghagrahaṇasya prayojanam . dīrghavidhim prati ajādeśaḥ na sthānivat
GS24pmbhasuu:12487: iti sthānivadbhāvapratiṣedhaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . yadā khalu api āyādayaḥ ārdhadhātuke
GS24pmbhasuu:12488: vā bhavanti tadā ṇici ṇiṅ na bhavati . tadartham ca mitpratiṣedhaḥ syāt . tasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12489: pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . uktam vā . kim uktam . taddhitakāmyoḥ ikprakaraṇāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12491: 104-107 katham idam vijñāyate . āyādibhyaḥ yat ārdhadhātukam tasmin avasthite vā
GS24pmbhasuu:12492: āyādīnām nivṛttiḥ bhavati . āhosvit āyādiprakṛteḥ yat ārdhadhātukam tasmin avasthite
GS24pmbhasuu:12493: vā āyādīnām utpattiḥ bhavati iti . kim gatam etat iyatā sūtreṇā āhosvit anyatarasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:12494: pakṣe bhūyaḥ sūtram kartavyam . gatam iti āha . katham . yadā tāvat āyādibhyaḥ yat
GS24pmbhasuu:12495: ārdhadhātukam tasmin avasthite vā āyādīnām nivṛttiḥ bhavati iti tadā aviśeṣeṇa sarvam
GS24pmbhasuu:12496: āyādiprakaraṇam anukramya āyādayaḥ ārdhadhātuke vā iti ucyate . yadā api āyādiprakṛteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12497: yat ārdhadhātukam tasmin avasthite vā āyādīnām utpattiḥ bhavati iti tadā ekam vākyam
GS24pmbhasuu:12498: tat ca idam ca . gupūdhūpavicchipaṇipanibhyaḥ āyaḥ ārdhadhātuke vā . ṛteḥ īyaṅ ārdhadhātuke
GS24pmbhasuu:12499: vā . kameḥ ṇiṅ ārdhadhātuke vā iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . āyādibhyaḥ yat ārdhadhātukam
GS24pmbhasuu:12500: āyādiprakṛteḥ yat ārdhadhātukam iti ca ubhayathā aniṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ . āyādibhyaḥ yat
GS24pmbhasuu:12501: ārdhadhātukam āyādiprakṛteḥ yat ārdhadhātukam iti ca ubhayathā aniṣṭam prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12502: yadi vijñāyate āyādibhyaḥ yat ārdhadhātukam tasmin avasthite vā āyādīnām nivṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12503: bhavati iti guptiḥ jugopa iti ca iṣṭam na sidhyati idam ca aniṣṭam prāpnoti . gopām
GS24pmbhasuu:12504: cakāra gopā iti ca . idam tāvat iṣṭam siddham bhavati . gopāyām cakāra gopāya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:12505: . atha vijñāyate āyādiprakṛteḥ yat ārdhadhātukam tasmin avasthite vā āyādīnām utpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12506: bhavati iti guptiḥ jugopa iti ca iṣṭam siddham bhavati . idam ca aniṣṭam na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:12507: . gopāyām cakāra gopāya iti . idam tu iṣṭam na sidhyati . gopayām cakāra gopāya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:12508: . idam tāvat iṣṭam sidhyati . gopayām cakāra iti . katham . astu atra āyādiprakṛteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12509: yat ārdhadhātukam liṭ . tasmin avasthite vā āyādayaḥ . ām madhye patiṣyati yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:12510: vikaraṇāḥ tadvat . idam tarhi iṣṭam na sidhyati gopāyā iti . siddham tu sārvadhātuke
GS24pmbhasuu:12511: nityavacanāt anāśritya vāvidhānam . siddham etat . katham. aviśeṣeṇa āyādīnām vāvidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:12512: uktvā sārvadhātuke nityam iti vakṣyāmi . syādibalīyastvam tu vipratiṣedhena tulyanimittatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12513: . syādibhiḥ tu āyādīnām bādhanam prāpnoti vipratiṣedhena . kim kāraṇam . tulyanimittatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12514: . tulyam nimittam syādīnām āyādīnām ca . syādīnām avakāśaḥ kariṣyati hariṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:12515: āyādīnām avakāśaḥ gopāyati dhūpāyati . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . gopāyiṣyati dhūpāyiṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:12516: iti . paratvāt syādayaḥ prāpnuvanti . na vā āyādividhānasya anavakāśatvāt . na vā
GS24pmbhasuu:12517: eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . āyādividhānasya anavakāśatvāt . anavakāśāḥ āyādayaḥ ucyante
GS24pmbhasuu:12518: ca . te vacanāt bhaviṣyanti . nanu ca idānīm eva avakāśaḥ prakḷptaḥ gopāyati dhūpāyati
GS24pmbhasuu:12519: iti . atra api śap syādiḥ bhavati . yadi api atra api bhavati na tu atra asti viśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12520: sati vā śapi asati vā . anyat idānīm etat ucyate na asti viśeṣaḥ iti . yat tu tat
GS24pmbhasuu:12521: uktam āyādīnām syādibhiḥ avyāptaḥ avakāśaḥ it sa na asti avakāśaḥ . avaśyam khalu
GS24pmbhasuu:12522: api atra śap syādiḥ eṣitavyaḥ . kim kāraṇam . gopāyantī dhūpāyantī iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:12523: śapśyanoḥ nityam iti num yathā syāt iti . yadi tarhi anavakāśāḥ āyādayaḥ āyādibhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12524: syādīnām bādhanam prāpnoti . yathā punaḥ ayam sūtrebhedena parihāraḥ yadi punaḥ śapi
GS24pmbhasuu:12525: nityam iti ucyeta . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:12526: ca uktam āyādibhyaḥ yat ārdhadhātukam āyādiprakṛteḥ yat ārdhadhātukam iti ca ubhayathā
GS24pmbhasuu:12527: aniṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ārdhadhātuke iti na eṣā parasaptamī . kā tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:12528: . viṣayasaptamī . ārdhadhātukaviṣaye iti . tatra ārdhadhātukaviṣaye āyādiprakṛteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12529: āyādiṣu kṛteṣu yaḥ yataḥ pratyayaḥ prāpnoti saḥ tataḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:12531: 107-109 antagrahaṇam kimartham na sanādayaḥ dhātavaḥ iti eva ucyeta . kena idānīm
GS24pmbhasuu:12532: tadantānām bhaviṣyati . tadantavidhinā . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . sanādiṣu antagrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:12533: uktam . kim uktam . padasañjñāyām antagrahaṇam anyatra sañjñāvidhau pratyayagrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:12534: tadantavidhipratiṣedhārtham iti . idam ca api pratyayagrahaṇam . ayam ca api sañjñāvidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12535: . kimartham punaḥ idam ucyate na bhūvādayaḥ dhātavaḥ iti eva siddham . na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:12536: . pāṭhena dhātusañjñā kriyate na ca ime tatra paṭhyante . katham tarhi anyeṣām apaṭhyamānānām
GS24pmbhasuu:12538: asteḥ bhūḥ . bruvaḥ vaciḥ . cakṣiṅaḥ khyāñ iti . yadi api ete tatra na paṭhyante
GS24pmbhasuu:12539: prakṛtayaḥ tu eṣām tatra paṭhyante . tatra sthānivadbhāvāt siddham . ime api tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:12540: yadi api tatra na paṭhyante yeṣām tu arthāḥ ādiśyante te tatra paṭhyante . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:12541: sthānivadbhāvāt siddham . na sidhyati . ādeśaḥ sthānivat bhavati iti ucyate . na
GS24pmbhasuu:12542: ca ime ādeśāḥ . ime api ādeśāḥ . katham . ādiśyate yaḥ saḥ ādeśaḥ . ime ca api ādiśyante
GS24pmbhasuu:12543: . evam api ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭasya ādeśāḥ sthānivat bhavanti iti ucyate . na ce ime ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭasya
GS24pmbhasuu:12544: ādeśāḥ . ṣaṣṭhīgrahaṇam nivartiṣyate . yadi nivartate apavāde utsargakṛtam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:12545: . karmaṇi aṇ ātaḥ anupasarge kaḥ iti ke api aṇkṛtam prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12546: jñāpayati na apavāde utsargakṛtam bhavati iti yat ayam śyanādīn kān cit śitaḥ karoti
GS24pmbhasuu:12549: 109-111 ime vikaraṇāḥ paṭhyante . tatra na jñāyate kaḥ utsargaḥ kaḥ apavādaḥ iti . tatra vaktyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:12550: ayam utsargaḥ ayam apavādaḥ iti . ime brūmaḥ . yak utsargaḥ . apavādaḥ śabdādiḥ syādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12551: ca . yadi evam apavādavipratiṣedhāt śabādibādhanam . apavādvipratiṣedhāt śabādibhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12552: syādīnām bādhanam prāpnoti . śabādīnām avakāśaḥ pacati yajati . syādīnām avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12553: pakṣyate yakṣyate . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . pakṣyati yakṣyati . paratvāt śabādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12554: prāpnuvanti . apavādaḥ nāma anekalakṣaṇaprasaṅgaḥ . apavādaḥ nāma bhavati yatra anekalakṣaṇaprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12555: . tatra bhāvakarmaṇoḥ yak vidhīyate kartari śap . kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ yat bhāvakarmaṇoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12556: yakam kartari śabādayaḥ bādheran . evam tarhi yakśapau utsargau . apavādāḥ śyanādaya
GS24pmbhasuu:12557: syādayaḥ ca . apavādavipratiṣedhāt śyanādibādhanam . apavādvipratiṣedhāt śyanādibhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12558: syādīnām bādhanam prāpnoti . śyanādīnām avakāśaḥ dīvyati sīvyati . syādīnām avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12559: pakṣyati yakṣyati . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . deviṣyati seviṣyati . paratvāt śyanādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12560: prāpnuvanti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . śabādeśāḥ śyanādayaḥ kariṣyante . śap ca syādibhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12561: bādhyate . tatra divādibhyaḥ syādiviṣaye śap eva na asti kutaḥ śyanādayaḥ . tat tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:12562: śapaḥ grahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . kartari
GS24pmbhasuu:12563: śap iti . tat vai prathamānirdiṣṭam ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭena ca iha arthaḥ . divādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12564: iti eṣā pañcamī śap iti prathamāyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayiṣyati tasmāt iti uttarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:12565: iti . pratyayavidhiḥ ayam . na ca pratyayavidhau pañcamyaḥ prakalpikāḥ bhavanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12566: na ayam pratyayavidhiḥ . vihitaḥ pratyayaḥ . prakṛtaḥ ca anuvartate . atha vā anuvṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12567: kariṣyate . sārvadhātuke yak syatāsī lṛluṭoḥ cli luṅi cleḥ sic bhavati . kartari
GS24pmbhasuu:12568: śap syatāsī lṛluṭoḥ cli luṅi cleḥ sic bhavati . divādibhyaḥ śyan syatāsī lṛluṭoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12569: cli luṅi cleḥ sic bhavati . atha vā antaraṅgāḥ syādayaḥ . kā antaraṅgatā . lāvasthāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:12572: 111-112 siP utsargaḥ chandasi . sip utsargaḥ chandasi kartavyaḥ . sanādyante neṣatvādyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12573: . sanādyante ca kartavyaḥ . kim prajojanam . neṣatvādyarthaḥ . indraḥ naḥ tena neṣatu
GS24pmbhasuu:12574: . gā vaḥ neṣṭāt . prakṛtyantaratvāt siddham . prakṛtyantaratvāt siddham etat . prkṛtyantaram
GS24pmbhasuu:12575: neṣatiḥ . neṣatu neṣṭāt iti darśanāt . neṣatu neṣṭāt iti dṛśyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:12577: 112-114 atha kimarthaḥ pakāraḥ . svarārthaḥ . anudāttau suppitau iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12578: yathā syāt . pitkaraṇānarthakyam ca anackatvāt . pitkaraṇam ca anarthakam . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:12579: . anackatvāt . anackaḥ ayam . tatra na arthaḥ svarārthena pakāreṇa anubandhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:12580: iṭi kṛte sāckaḥ bhaviṣyati . iṭaḥ anudāttārtham iti cet āgamānudāttatvāt siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:12581: . āgamānudāttatvena iṭaḥ anudāttatvam bhaviṣyati . evam tarhi sap ayam kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12582: . kim prayojanam . yat eva yāsiṣīṣṭhāḥ . ekājlakṣaṇaḥ iṭpratiṣedhaḥ mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12583: kva ayam akāraḥ śrūyate . na kva cit śrūyate . lopaḥ asya bhaviṣyati ataḥ lopaḥ ārdhadhātuke
GS24pmbhasuu:12584: iti . yadi na kva cit śrūyate na arthaḥ svarārthena pakāreṇa anubandhena . evam api
GS24pmbhasuu:12585: kartavyaḥ eva . kim prayojanam . anudāttasya lopaḥ yathā syāt . udāttasya mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:12586: iti . kim ca syāt . udāttanivṛttisvaraḥ prasajyeta . siP bahulam chandasi ṇit . sip
GS24pmbhasuu:12587: bahulam chandasi ṇit vaktavyaḥ . savitā dharmam dāviṣat . pra ṇaḥ āyūṃṣi tāriṣat .
GS24pmbhasuu:12589: 114-115 kāsgrahaṇe cakāsaḥ upasaṅkhyānam . kāsgrahaṇe cakāsaḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam
