GS24pmbhasuu:12590: . cakāsām cakāra . na kartavyam . cakāspratayayāt iti vakṣyāmi . cakāsgrahaṇe kāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12591: upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . kāsām cakre . sūtram ca bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu
GS24pmbhasuu:12592: . nanu ca uktam kāsgrahaṇe cakāsaḥ upasaṅkhyānam iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . cakāsśabde
GS24pmbhasuu:12593: kāsśabdaḥ asti . tatra kāspratyayāt iti eva siddham . na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12594: arthavataḥ kāsśabdasya grahaṇam . na ca cakāsśabde kāsśabdaḥ arthavān . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:12595: kāsi anekācaḥ iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . culumpādyartham . culumpām cakāra daridrām cakāra .
GS24pmbhasuu:12597: 115-119 gurumataḥ āmvidhāne liṇnimittāt pratiṣedhaḥ . gurumataḥ āmvidhāne liṇnimittāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12598: pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . iyeṣa uvoṣa . guṇe kṛte ijādeḥ ca gurumataḥ anṛcchaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:12599: ām prāpnoti . gurumadvacanam idānīm kimartham syāt . gurumadvacanam kimartham iti
GS24pmbhasuu:12600: cet ṇali uttame yajādipratiṣedhāṛtham . gurumadvacanam kimartham iti cet ṇali uttame
GS24pmbhasuu:12601: yajādīnām mā bhūt iti . iyaja aham uvapa aham . upadeśavacanāt siddham . upadeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:12602: gurumataḥ iti vaktavyam . yadi upadeśagrahaṇam kriyate uccheḥ ām vaktavyaḥ . vyucchām
GS24pmbhasuu:12603: cakāra iti . ṛcchipratiṣedhaḥ jñāpakaḥ uccheḥ āmbhāvasya . yat ayam anṛcchaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:12604: pratiṣedham śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ tugnimittā yasya gurumattā bhavati tasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12605: ām iti . sa tarhi jñāpakārthaḥ ṛcchipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . nanu ca avaśyam prāptyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12606: api vaktavyaḥ . na arthaḥ prāptyarthena . ṛcchatyṝtām iti ṛccheḥ liṭi guṇavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:12607: jñāpakam na ṛccheḥ liṭi ām bhavati iti . na etat asti jñāpakam . artyartham etat
GS24pmbhasuu:12608: syāt . katham punaḥ ṛccheḥ liṭi guṇaḥ ucyamānaḥ artyarthaḥ śakyaḥ vijñātum . sāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12609: . ṛcchiḥ liṭi na asti iti kṛtvā prakṛtyartham vijñāyate . tat yathā . tiṣṭhateḥ it
GS24pmbhasuu:12610: jighrateḥ vā iti caṅi tiṣṭhatijighratī na staḥ iti kṛtvā prakṛtyartham vijñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:12611: . kim punaḥ arteḥ guṇavacane prayojanam . āratuḥ āruḥ etat rūpam yathā syāt . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:12612: punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . dvirvacane kṛte savarṇadīrghatve ca yadi tāvat dhātugrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:12613: grahaṇam ṝkārāntānām liṭi guṇaḥ bhavati iti guṇe kṛte raparate aratuḥ aruḥ iti etat
GS24pmbhasuu:12614: rūpam prasajyeta . atha abhyāsagrahaṇena grahaṇam uḥ attvam raparatvam halādiśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12615: ataḥ ādeḥ iti dīrghatvam ātaḥ lopaḥ iṭi ca iti ākāralopaḥ atuḥ uḥ iti vacanam eva
GS24pmbhasuu:12616: śrūyeta . guṇa punaḥ sati guṇe kṛte raparatve ca dvirvacanam ataḥ ādeḥ iti dīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:12617: . tataḥ siddham bhavati yathā āṭatuḥ āṭuḥ iti . kim punaḥ savarṇadīrghatvam tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:12618: bhavati na punaḥ uḥ attvam . paratvāt uḥ attvena bhavitavyam . antaraṅgatvāt . antaraṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:12619: savarṇadīrghatvam . bahiraṅgam uḥ attvam . kā antaraṅgatā . varṇau āśritya savarṇadīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:12620: . aṅgasya uḥ attvam . uḥ attvam api antaraṅgam . katham . vakṣyati etat . prāk abhyāsavikārebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12621: aṅgādhikāraḥ iti . ubhayoḥ antaraṅgayoḥ paratvāt uḥ attvam . uḥ attve kṛte raparatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:12622: halādiśeṣaḥ ataḥ ādeḥ iti dīrghatvam parasya rūpasya yaṇādeśaḥ . siddham bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:12623: āratuḥ āruḥ iti . atha api katham cit arteḥ liṭi guṇena arthaḥ syāt . evam api na
GS24pmbhasuu:12624: doṣaḥ . ṛcchatyṝtām iti ṛkāraḥ api nirdiśyate . katham . ayam . ṛcchati ṛ ṛtām ṛcchatyṝtām
GS24pmbhasuu:12625: iti . iha api tarhi prāpnoti . cakratuḥ cakruḥ iti . saṃyogādigrahaṇam niyamārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:12626: bhaviṣyati . saṃyogādeḥ eva akevalasya na anyasya akevalasya iti . tat etat antareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:12627: arteḥ liṭi guṇavacanam rūpam siddham antareṇa ca ṛcchigrahaṇam arteḥ liṭi guṇaḥ siddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12628: . saḥ eṣaḥ ananyārthaḥ ṛcchipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ uccheḥ vā ām vaktavyaḥ . ubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:12629: na vaktavyam . upadeśagrahaṇam na kariṣyate . kasmāt na bhavati iyeṣa uvoṣa . uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:12630: vā .kim uktam . sannipātalakṣaṇaḥ vidhiḥ animittam tadvighātasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12632: 119-120 ūrṇoteḥ ca upasaṅkhyānam . ūrṇoteḥ ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . prorṇunāva
GS24pmbhasuu:12633: . na vaktavyam . vācyaḥ ūrṇoḥ ṇuvadbhāvaḥ . yaṅprasiddhiḥ prayojanam . āmaḥ ca pratiṣedhārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:12634: . ekācaḥ ca iḍupagrahāt . atha vā ukāraḥ api atra nirdiśyate . katham . avibhaktikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12635: nirdeśaḥ . anṛccha u anṛccho dayāyāsaḥ ca iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12637: 120 videḥ ām kit . videḥ ām kit vaktavyaḥ . vidām cakāra . na vaktavyaḥ . vidiḥ akārāntaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12638: . yadi akārāntaḥ vetti iti guṇaḥ na sidhyati . liṭsanniyogena . evam api viveda iti
GS24pmbhasuu:12639: na sidhyati . evam tarhi āmsanniyogena . bhāradvājīyāḥ paṭhanti . videḥ ām kit nipātanāt vā aguṇatvam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12641: 120-121 śluvadatideśe kim prayojanam . śluvadatideśe prayojanam dvitvettve . bibharām cakāra .
GS24pmbhasuu:12643: 121-124 kimartham idam ucyate . anuprayogaḥ yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:12644: . āmantam avyaktapadārthakam . tena aparisamāptaḥ arthaḥ iti kṛtvā anuprayogaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:12645: . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . kṛñaḥ anuprayogavacanam astibhūpratiṣedhārtham . kṛñaḥ anuprayogavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:12646: kriyate astibhūpratiṣedhārtham . astibhuvoḥ anuprayogaḥ mā bhūt iti . ātmanepadavidhyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:12647: ca . ātmanepadavidhyartham ca kṛñaḥ anuprayogavacanam kriyate . ātmanepadam yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:12648: syāt . ucyamāne api etasmin avaśyam ātmanepadārthaḥ yatnaḥ kartavyaḥ . astibhūpratiṣedhārthena
GS24pmbhasuu:12649: ca api na arthaḥ . iṣṭaḥ sarvānuprayogaḥ . sarveṣām eva kṛbhvastīnām anuprayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12650: iṣyate . kim iṣyate eva āhosvit prāpnoti api . iṣyate ca prāpnoti ca . katham . kṛñ
GS24pmbhasuu:12651: iti na etat dhātugrahaṇam . kim tarhi . pratyāhāragrahaṇam . kva sanniviṣṭānām pratyāhāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12652: . kṛbhvastiyoge iti ataḥ prabhṛti ā kṛñaḥ ñakārāt . sarvānuprayogaḥ iti cet aśiṣyam
GS24pmbhasuu:12653: arthābhāvāt . sarvānuprayogaḥ iti cet aśiṣyam kṛñaḥ anuprayogavacanam . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:12654: . arthābhāvāt . āmantam avyaktapadārthakam . tena aparisamāptaḥ arthaḥ iti kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:12655: anuprayogaḥ bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam . kṛbhvastīnām eva anuprayogaḥ yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:12656: syāt pacādīnām mā bhūt iti . etat api na asti prayojanam . arthābhāvāt ca anyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:12657: . arthābhāvāt ca anyasya siddham . kṛbhvastayaḥ kriyāsāmānyavācinaḥ . kriyāviśeṣavācinaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12658: pacādayaḥ . na ca sāmānyavācinoḥ eva viśeṣavācinoḥ eva va prayogaḥ bhavati . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:12659: viśeṣavācinaḥ utpattiḥ . sāmānyavācinaḥ anuprayokṣyante . liṭparārtham vā . liṭparārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:12660: tarhi kṛñaḥ anuprayogavacanam kriyate . liṭparasya eva anuprayogaḥ yathā syāt . anyaparasya
GS24pmbhasuu:12661: mā bhūt iti . kimparasya punaḥ prāpnoti . laṭparasya . na laṭparasya anuprayogeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:12662: bhūtakālaḥ viśeṣitaḥ syāt . niṣṭhāparasya tarhi . naniṣṭhāparasya anuprayogeṇa puruṣopagrahau
GS24pmbhasuu:12663: viśeiṣitau syātām . luṅparasya tarhi . na luṅparasya anuprayogeṇa anadyatanaḥ bhūtakālaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12664: viśeṣitaḥ syāt . laṅparasya tarhi . na laṅparasya anuprayogeṇa anadyatanaḥ parokṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12665: kālaḥ viśeṣitaḥ syāt . ayam tarhi bhūte parokṣe anadyatane laṅ vidhīyate . haśaśvatoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12666: laṅ ca iti . tatparasya mā bhūt iti . atat api na asti prayojanam . ekasyāḥ ākṛteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12667: caritaḥ prayogaḥ dvitīyasyāḥ tṛtīyasyāḥ ca na bhavati . tat yathā goṣu svāmi aśveṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:12668: ca iti . na ca bhavati goṣu ca aśvānām ca svāmī iti . arthasamāpteḥ vā anuprayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12669: na syāt . arthasamāpteḥ tarhi anuprayogaḥ na syāt . āmantena parisamāptaḥ arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12670: iti kṛtvā anuprayogaḥ na syāt . etat api na asti prayojanam . idānīm eva uktam āmantam
GS24pmbhasuu:12671: avyaktapadārthakam . tena aparisamāptaḥ arthaḥ iti kṛtvā anuprayogaḥ bhaviṣyati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:12672: . viparyāsanivṛttyartham vā . viparyāsanivṛttyartham tarhi kṛñaḥ anuprayogavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:12673: kriyate . īhām cakre . cakre īhām iti mā bhūt . vyavahitnivṛttyartham ca . vyavahitnivṛttyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:12674: ca kṛñaḥ anuprayogavacanam kriyate . anv eva ca anuprayogaḥ yathā syāt . īhām cakre
GS24pmbhasuu:12675: . vyavahitasya mā bhūt . īhām devadattaḥ cakre iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12677: 125-130 kva ayam cliḥ śrūyate . na kva cit śrūyate . sijādayaḥ ādeśāḥ ucyante . yad
GS24pmbhasuu:12678: na kva cit śrūyate kimarthaḥ tarhi cluḥ utsargaḥ kriyate . na sic utsargaḥ eva kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12679: . tasya ksādayaḥ apavādāḥ bhaviṣyanti . ata uttaram paṭhati . clyutsargaḥ sāmānyagrahaṇārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12680: . cliḥ utsargaḥ kriyate sāmānyagrahaṇārthaḥ . kva sāmānyagrahaṇārthena arthaḥ . mantra
GS24pmbhasuu:12681: ghasahvaraṇaśavṛdahādvṛckṛgamijanibhyaḥ leḥ iti . tatra avarataḥ trayāṇām grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:12682: kartavyam syāt . caṅaṅoḥ sicaḥ ca . ksavidhāne ca aniḍvacane clisampratyayārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12683: . ksavidhāne ca aniḍvacane clisampratyayārthaḥ cliḥ utsargaḥ kriyate . cleḥ aniṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12684: ksaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . ghasḷbhāve ca . ghasḷbhāve ca clav eva kṛte lṛditaḥ iti aṅ
GS24pmbhasuu:12685: siddhaḥ bhavati . atha citkaraṇam kimartham . cleḥ citkaraṇam viśeṣaṇāṛtham . cleḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12686: citkaraṇam kriyate viśeṣaṇārtham . kva viśeṣaṇārthena arthaḥ . cleḥ sic iti . leḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12687: sic iti ucyamāne liṅliṭoḥ api prasajyeta . na etat asti prayojanam . luṅi iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:12688: . na ca luṅi liṅliṭau bhavataḥ . atha iditkaraṇam kimartham . iditkaraṇam sāmānyagrahaṇārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:12689: . iditkaraṇam kriyate ca sāmānyagrahaṇārtham . kva sāmānyagrahaṇārthena arthaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12690: mantre ghasahvaraṇaśavṛdahādvṛckṛgamijanibhyaḥ leḥ iti āmaḥ iti ca . ikāre ca idānīm
GS24pmbhasuu:12691: sāmānyagrahaṇārthe kriyamāṇe avaśyam sāmānyagrahaṇāvighātārthaḥ cakāraḥ kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12692: . kva sāmānyagrahaṇāvighātārthena arthaḥ cakāreṇa . atra eva . yat tāvat ucyate clyutsargaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12693: sāmānyagrahaṇārthaḥ iti . kriyamāṇe api vai clyutsarge tāni eva trīṇi grahaṇāni bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:12694: . clu luṅi cleḥ sic leḥ iti . yat etat leḥ iti tat parārtham bhaviṣyati . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:12695: . yat etat gātisthāghupābhūbhyaḥ sicaḥ parasmaipadeṣu iti atra sicaḥ grahaṇam etat
GS24pmbhasuu:12696: leḥ iti vakṣyāmi . yadi leḥ iti ucyate dheṭaḥ cātuḥśabdyam prāpnoti . adadhat adhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12697: adhāsīt . adadhāt iti api prāpnoti . na caṅaḥ luki dvirvacanena bhavitavyam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:12698: kāraṇam . caṅi iti ucyate . na ca atra caṅam paśyāmaḥ . pratyayalakṣaṇena . na lumatā
GS24pmbhasuu:12699: tasmin iti pratyayalakṣaṇapratiṣedhaḥ . bahuvacane tarhi cātuḥśabdyam prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12700: adadhan adhuḥ adhāsiṣuḥ . adhān iti api prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ātaḥ iti jusbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12701: bhaviṣyati . na sidhyati . sijgrahaṇam tatra anuvartate . sijgrahaṇam nivartiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:12702: . yadi nivartate abhūvan iti pratyayalakṣaṇena jusbhāvaḥ prāpnoti . evam tarhi luk
GS24pmbhasuu:12703: sijapavādaḥ vijñāsyate . yadi luk sijapavādaḥ vijñāyate mā hi dātām mā hi dhātām
GS24pmbhasuu:12704: iti atra ādiḥ sicaḥ anyatarasyām iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ na prāpnoti . tasmāt na etat śakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:12705: vaktum luk sijapavādaḥ iti . na cet ucyate abhūvan iti pratyayalakṣaṇena jusbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12706: prāpnoti . tasmāt ātaḥ iti atra sijgrahaṇam anuvartyam . tasmin ca anuvartamāne dheṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12707: cātuḥśabdyam prāpnoti . tasmāt gātisthāghupābhūbhyaḥ sicaḥ parasmaipadeṣu iti atra
GS24pmbhasuu:12708: sicaḥ grahaṇam kartavyam . tasmin ca kriyamāṇe tāni eva trīṇi grahaṇāni bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:12709: cli luṅi cleḥ sic leḥ iti . yat api ucyate ksavidhāne ca aniḍvacane clisampratyayārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12710: iti . dhātum eva atra aniṭvena viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . dhātoḥ aniṭaḥ iti . katham punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12711: dhātuḥ nāma aniṭ syāt . dhātuḥ eva aniṭ . katham . animittam vā iṭaḥ aniṭaḥ na vā
GS24pmbhasuu:12712: tasmāt iṭ asti saḥ ayam aniṭ iti . atha dhātau viśeṣyamāṇe kva yaḥ aniṭ iti viśeṣayiṣyasi
GS24pmbhasuu:12713: . kim ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate niṣṭhāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:12714: aniṭaḥ iti bhūyiṣṭhebhyaḥ prāpnoti . bhūyiṣṭhāḥ hi śalantāḥ igupadhāḥ niṣṭhāyām aniṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12715: . atha vijñāyate liṭi yaḥ aniṭ iti na kutaḥ cit prāpnoti . sarve his śalantāḥ igupadhāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12716: liṭi seṭaḥ . kim punaḥ kāraṇam dhātau viśeṣyamāṇe etayoḥ viśeṣayoḥ viśeṣayiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:12717: . na punaḥ atra sāmānyena iṭaḥ vidhipratiṣedhau . kva sāmanyena . valādau ārdhadhātuke
GS24pmbhasuu:12718: . yat api ucyate ghasḷbhāve ca iti . ārdhadhātukīyāḥ sāmānyena bhavanti anavasthiteṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:12719: pratyayeṣu . tatra ārdhadhātukasāmānye ghasḷbhāve kṛte lṛditaḥ iti aṅ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:12721: 130-132 kimarthaḥ cakāraḥ . viśeṣaṇārthaḥ . kva viśeṣaṇārthena arthaḥ . sici vṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12722: parasmaipadeṣu iti . sau vṛddhiḥ iti ucyamāne agniḥ vāyuḥ iti atra api prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:12723: . na etat asti prayojanam . parasmaipadeṣu iti ucyate . na ca atra parasmaipadam
GS24pmbhasuu:12724: paśyāmaḥ . svarārthaḥ tarhi . citaḥ antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati iti antodāttatvam yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:12725: syāt . etat api na asti prayojanam . anackaḥ ayam . tatra na arthaḥ svarārthena cakāreṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:12726: anubandhena . iṭi kṛte sāckaḥ bhaviṣyati . tatra pratyayādyudāttatvena iṭaḥ udāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:12727: bhaviṣyati . na sidhyati . āgamāḥ anudāttāḥ bhavanti iti anudāttatvam prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12728: ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . sicaḥ citkaraṇānarthakyam sthānivatvāt . sicaḥ citkaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:12729: narthayam . kim kāraṇam . sthānivatvāt . sthānivadbhāvāt cit bhaviṣyati . arthavat
GS24pmbhasuu:12730: tu citkaraṇasāmarthyāt hi iṭaḥ udāttatvam . arthavat tu citkaraṇam . kaḥ arthaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12731: citkaraṇasāmarthyāt hi iṭaḥ udāttatvam bhaviṣyati . na aprāpte pratyayasvare āgamānudāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:12732: ārabhyate . tat yathā eva pratyayasvaram bādhate evam sthānivadbhāvāt api yā prāptiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12733: tām api bādheta . tasmāt citkaraṇam . tasmāt cakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . atha iditkaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:12734: kimartham . iditkaraṇam nakāralopābhāvārtham . iditkaraṇam kriyate nakāralopaḥ mā
GS24pmbhasuu:12735: bhūt iti . amaṃsta amaṃsthāḥ . aniditām halaḥ upadhāyāḥ kṅiti iti . na vā hanteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12736: sicaḥ kitkaraṇam nakāralopābhāvasya . na vā etat prayojanam asti . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12737: yat ayam hanaḥ sic iti hanteḥ sicaḥ kittvam śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na sijantasya
GS24pmbhasuu:12738: nakārlopaḥ bhavati iti . na etat asti jñāpakam . asti hi anyat etasya vacane prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:12739: . kim . sici eva nalopaḥ yathā syāt . parasmin nimitte mā bhūt iti . kaḥ punaḥ atra
GS24pmbhasuu:12740: viśeṣaḥ sici vā nalope sati parasmin vā nimitte . ayam asti viśeṣaḥ . sici nalope
GS24pmbhasuu:12741: sati nalopasya asiddhatvāt akāralopaḥ na bhavati . parasmin punaḥ nimitte nalope
GS24pmbhasuu:12742: sati akāralopaḥ prāpnoti . samānāśrayam asiddham vyāśrayam ca idam . nanu ca parasmin

GS24pmbhasuu:12775: ksaḥ . saḥ ca aniḍāśrayaḥ . na ca apavādaviṣaye upasargaḥ abhiniviśate . pūrvam hi

GS24pmbhasuu:12782: 136-138 kimartham idam ucyate . niyamārtham . śliṣaḥ āliṅgane eva ksaḥ yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt :

GS24pmbhasuu:12784: . śliṣaḥ āliṅgane niyamānupapattiḥ vidheyabhāvāt . śliṣaḥ āliṅgane niyamasya anupapattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12785: . kim kāraṇam . vidheyabhāvāt . kaimarthakyāt niyamaḥ bhavati . vidheyam na asti
GS24pmbhasuu:12786: iti kṛtvā . iha ca asti vidheyam . kim . puṣādipāṭhāt aṅ prāptaḥ . tadbādhanārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12787: ksaḥ vidheyaḥ . tatra apūrvaḥ vidhiḥ astu niyamaḥ vā iti apūrvaḥ eva vidhiḥ syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12788: na niyamaḥ . kim ca syāt yadi ayam niyamaḥ na syāt . ātmanepadeṣu āliṅgane ca ksaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12789: prasajyeta . yathā eva ca ksaḥ aṅam bādhate evam ciṇam api bādheta . upāśleṣi kanyā
GS24pmbhasuu:12790: devadattena iti . siddham tu śliṣaḥ āliṅgane aciṇviṣaye . siddham etat . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:12791: śliṣaḥ āliṅgane aciṇviṣaye ksaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . aṅvidhāne ca śliṣaḥ anāliṅgane
GS24pmbhasuu:12792: . aṅvidhāne ca śliṣaḥ anāliṅgane iti vaktavyam . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate
GS24pmbhasuu:12793: . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam śliṣaḥ āliṅgane niyamānupapattiḥ vidheyabhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12794: iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yogavibhāgāt siddham . yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . śliṣaḥ . śliṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12795: ksaḥ bhavati . kimartham idam . puṣādipāṭhāt aṅ prāpnoti . tadbādhanārtham . tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12796: āliṅgane . āliṅgane ca śliṣaḥ ksaḥ bhavati . idam idānīm kimartham . niyamārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:12797: . śliṣaḥ āliṅgane eva . kva mā bhūt . upāśliṣat jatu ca kāṣṭham ca . samāśliṣat brāhmaṇakulam
GS24pmbhasuu:12798: iti . yat api ucyate yathā eva ca ksaḥ aṅam bādhate evam ciṇam api bādheta iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12799: purastāt apavādāḥ anantarān vidhīn bādhante na uttarān iti evam ksaḥ aṅam bādhiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:12800: . ciṇam na bādhiṣyate . atha vā tatra vakṣyati :
GS24pmbhasuu:12801: ciṇgrahaṇasya prayojanam ciṇ eva yathā syāt . yat anyat prāpnoti tat mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12803: 138-139 ṇiśridrusruṣu kameḥ upasaṅkhyānam . ṇiśridrusruṣu kameḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:12804: . nākam iṣṭamukham yānti suyuktaiḥ vaḍavārathaiḥ . atha patkāṣīṇaḥ yānti ye acīkamatabhāṣiṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12805: . karmakartari ca . karmakartari ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . kārayati kaṭam devadattaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12806: . acīkarata kaṭaḥ svayam eva . ucchrayayati kaṭam devadattaḥ . audaśiśriyata kaṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12807: svayam eva . na vā karmaṇi avidhānāt kartṛtvāt ca karmakartuḥ siddham . na vā kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:12808: . kim kāraṇam . karmaṇi avidhānāt . na hi kaḥ cit karmaṇi vidhīyate yaḥ caṅam bādheta
GS24pmbhasuu:12809: . kartṛtvāt ca karmakartuḥ siddham . asti ca karmakartari kartṛtvam iti kṛtvā caṅ
GS24pmbhasuu:12810: bhaviṣyati . nanu ca ayam karmaṇi vidhīyate . ciṇ bhāvakarmaṇoḥ iti . pratiṣidhyete
GS24pmbhasuu:12811: tatra yakciṇau . yakciṇoḥ pratiṣedhe hetumaṇṇiśribrūñām upasaṅkhyānam iti . yaḥ tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:12812: ahetumaṇṇic . udapupucchata gauḥ svayam eva . atra api yathā bhāradvājīyāḥ paṭhanti
GS24pmbhasuu:12813: tathā bhavitavyam pratiṣedhena . yakciṇoḥ pratiṣedhe ṇiśrigranthibrūñām ātmanepadākarmakāṇām upasaṅkhyānam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12815: 140 asyatigrahaṇam kimartham . asyatigrahaṇam ātmanepadārtham . asyatigrahaṇam ātmanepadārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:12816: draṣṭavyam . kim ucyate ātmanepadārtham iti . na punaḥ parasmaipadārtham api syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12817: . puṣāditvāt . puṣādipāṭhāt parasmaipadeṣu aṅ bhaviṣyati . karmakartari ca . karmakartari
GS24pmbhasuu:12818: ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . paryāsthetām kuṇḍale svayam eva . atra api na vā karmaṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:12819: avidhānāt kartṛtvāt ca karmakartuḥ siddham iti eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:12821: 140 idam lucigrahaṇam gluñcigrahaṇam ca kriyate . anyatarat śakyam akartum . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:12822: . yadi tāvat glucigrahaṇam kriyate gluñcigrahaṇam na kariṣyate . tena eva siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:12823: nyaglucat nyaglocīt . idam idānīm gluñceḥ rūpam nyagluñcīt . atha gluñcigrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:12824: kriyate gluceḥ grahaṇam na kariṣyate . tena eva siddham nyaglucat nyagluñcīt . idam
GS24pmbhasuu:12827: 141 ayam taśabdaḥ asti eva ātmanepadam asti parasmaipadam asti ekavacanam asti bahuvacanam . kasya idam grahaṇam . yaḥ padeḥ asti . kaḥ ca padeḥ asti . padiḥ ayam ātmanepadī .
GS24pmbhasuu:12829: 141 ciṇ iti vartamāne punaḥ ciṇgrahaṇam kimartham . na iti evam tat abhūt . vidhyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:12830: idam . atha vā vā iti evam tat abhūt . nityārtham idam . atha vā ciṇ iti vartamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:12831: punaḥ ciṇgrahaṇasya etat prayojanam . ciṇ eva yathā syāt . yat anyat prāpnoti tat mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12833: 141-146 iha paśyāmaḥ karmaṇi dvivacanabahuvacanāni udāhriyante . pacyete* odanau ,
GS24pmbhasuu:12834: pacyante odanāḥ iti . bhāve punaḥ ekavacanam eva :
GS24pmbhasuu:12837: āsyate bhavadbhiḥ iti . kena etat evam bhavati . karma anekam . tasya anekatvāt dvivacanabahuvacanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:12838: bhavanti . bhāvaḥ punaḥ ekaḥ eva . katham tarhi iha dvivacanabahuvacanāni bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:12839: . pākau pākāḥ iti . āśrayabhedāt . yat asau dravyam śritaḥ bhavati bhāvaḥ tasya bhedāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12840: dvivacanabahuvacanāni bhavanti . iha api tarhi yāvantaḥ tām kriyām kurvanti sarve
GS24pmbhasuu:12841: te tasyāḥ āśrayā bhavanti . tadbhedāt dvivacanabahuvacanāni prāpnuvanti . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:12842: idam tāvat ayam praṣṭavyaḥ . kim abhisamīkṣya etat prayujyate . pākau pākāḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12843: yadi tāvat pākaviśeṣān abhisamīkṣya yaḥ ca odanasya pākaḥ yaḥ ca guḍasya yaḥ ca tilānām
GS24pmbhasuu:12844: bahavaḥ te śabdāḥ sarūpāḥ ca . tatra yuktam bahuvacanam ekaśeṣaḥ ca . tiṅabhihite
GS24pmbhasuu:12845: ca api tadā bhāve bahuvacanam śrūyate . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:12846: uṣṭṛāsikā āsyante . hataśāyikāḥ śayyante iti . atha kālaviśeṣān abhisamīkṣya yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12847: ca adyatanaḥ pākaḥ yaḥ hyastanaḥ yaḥ śvastanaḥ te api bahavaḥ śabdāḥ sarūpāḥ ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:12848: tatra yuktam bahuvacanam ekaśeṣaḥ ca . tiṅabhihite ca api tadā bhāve asārūpyāt ekaśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12850: āsiṣyate . asti khalu api viśeṣaḥ kṛdabhihitasya bhāvasya tiṅabhihitasya ca . kṛdabhihitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12851: bhāvaḥ dravyavat bhavati . kim idam dravyavat iti . dravyam kriyayā samavāyam gacchati
GS24pmbhasuu:12852: . kam samavāyam . dravyam kriyābhinirvṛttau sādhanatvam upaiti . tadvat ca asya bhāvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:12853: kṛdabhihitasya bhavati . pākaḥ vartate iti . kriyāvat na bhavati . kim idam kriyāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:12854: iti . kriyā kriyayā samavāyam na gacchati . pacati paṭhati iti . tadvac ca asya kṛtabhihitasya
GS24pmbhasuu:12855: na bhavati . pākaḥ vartate iti . asti khalu api viśeṣaḥ kṛdabhihitasya bhāvasya tiṅabhihitasya
GS24pmbhasuu:12856: ca . tiṅabhihitena bhāvena kālapuruṣopagrahāḥ abhivyajyante . kṛdabhihitena punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12857: na vyajyante . asti khalu api viśeṣaḥ kṛdabhihitasya bhāvasya tiṅabhihitasya ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:12858: tiṅabhihitaḥ bhāvaḥ kartrā samprayujyate. kṛdabhihitaḥ punaḥ na samprayujyate . yāvatā
GS24pmbhasuu:12859: kim cit sāmānyam kaḥ cit viśeṣaḥ yuktam yat ayam api viśeṣaḥ syāt liṅgakṛtaḥ saṅkhyākṛtaḥ ca iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12861: 146-149 idam vicāryate . bhāvakarmakartāraḥ sārvadhātukārthāḥ vā syuḥ vikaraṇārthāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12862: vā iti . katham ca sārvadhātukārthaḥ syuḥ katham vā vikaraṇārthāḥ . bhāvakarmavācini
GS24pmbhasuu:12863: sārvadhātuke yak bhavati kartṛvācini śarvadhātuke śap bhavati iti sārvadhātukārthāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12864: . bhāvakarmaṇoḥ yag bhavati sārvadhātuke kartari śap bhavati sārvadhātuke iti vikaraṇārthāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12865: . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . bhāvakarmakartāraḥ sārvadhātukārthāḥ cet ekadvibahuṣu niyamānupapattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12866: atadarthatvāt . bhāvakarmakartāraḥ sārvadhātukārthāḥ cet ekadvibahuṣu niyamasya anupapattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12867: . kim kāraṇam . atadarthatvāt . na hi tadānīm ekatvādayaḥ eva vibhaktyarthāḥ . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:12868: tarhi bhāvakarmakartāraḥ api . santu tarhi vikaraṇārthāḥ . vikaraṇārthāḥ iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:12869: kṛtā abhihite vikaraṇābhāvaḥ . vikaraṇārthāḥ iti cet kṛtā abhihite vikaraṇaḥ na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:12870: . dhārayaḥ pārayaḥ iti . kim ucyate kṛtā abhihite . na lena api abhidhānam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:12871: . aśakyam lena abhidhānam āśrayitum . pakṣāntaram idam āsthitam bhāvakarmakartāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12872: sārvadhātukārthāḥ vā syuḥ vikaraṇārthāḥ vā iti . yadi ca lena api abhidhānam syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12873: na idam pakṣāntaram syāt . katham aśakyam yadā bhavān eva āha laḥ karmaṇi ca bhāve
GS24pmbhasuu:12874: ca akarmakebhyaḥ iti . evam vakṣyāmi . laḥ karmaṇaḥ bhāvāt ca akarmakebhyaḥ . yasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:12875: tarhi le vikaraṇāḥ na śrūyante kaḥ tatra bhāvakarmakartṝn abhidhāsyati . kva ca na
GS24pmbhasuu:12876: śrūyante . ye ete lugvikaraṇāḥ śluvikaraṇāḥ ca . atra api ukte kartṛtve luk bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:12877: . yasmin tarhi le vikaraṇāḥ na eva utpadyante kaḥ tatra bhāvakarmakartṝn abhidhāsyati
GS24pmbhasuu:12878: . kva ca na eva utpadyante . liṅliṭoḥ . tasmāt na etat śakyam vaktum . na lena abhidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:12879: bhavati iti . bhavati cet abhihite vikaraṇābhāvaḥ eva . evam tarhi idam syāt . yadā
GS24pmbhasuu:12880: bhāvakarmaṇoḥ laḥ tadā kartari vikaraṇāḥ . yadā kartari laḥ tadā bhāvakarmaṇoḥ vikaraṇāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12881: . idam asya yadi eva svābhāvikam atha api vācanikam :
GS24pmbhasuu:12882: prakṛtipratyayau pratyayārtham saha brūtaḥ iti . na ca asti sambhavaḥ yat ekasyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12883: prakṛteḥ dvayoḥ nānārthayoḥ yugapat anusahāyībhāvaḥ syāt . evam ca kṛtvā ekapakṣībhūtam idam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:12884: sārvadhātukārthāḥ eva iti . nanu ca uktam bhāvakarmakartāraḥ sārvadhātukārthāḥ cet
GS24pmbhasuu:12885: ekadvibahuṣu niyamānupapattiḥ atadarthatvāt iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . supām karmādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12886: api arthāḥ saṅkhyā ca eva tathā tiṅām . supām saṅkhyā ca eva arthaḥ karmādayaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:12887: . tathā tiṅām . prasiddhaḥ niyamaḥ tatra . prasiddhaḥ tatra niyamaḥ . niyamaḥ prakṛteṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:12888: vā . atha vā prakṛtān arthān apekṣya niyamaḥ . ke ca prakṛtāḥ . ekatvādayaḥ . ekasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:12889: eva ekavacanam na dvayoḥ na bahuṣu . dvayoḥ eva dvivacanam naikasmin na bahuṣu .
GS24pmbhasuu:12890: bahuṣu eva bahuvacanam na dvayoḥ na ekasmin iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12892: 149-153 bhāvakarmaṇoḥ yagvidhāne karmakartari upasaṅkhyānam . bhāvakarmaṇoḥ yagvidhāne
GS24pmbhasuu:12893: karmakartari upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . pacyate svayam eva . paṭhyate svayam eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:12894: kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . vipratiṣedhāt hi śapaḥ balīyastvam . vipratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12895: hi śapaḥ balīyastvam prāpnoti . śapaḥ avakāśaḥ . pacati paṭhati . yakaḥ avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12896: . pacyate odanaḥ devadattena . paṭhyate vidyā devadattena . iha ubhayam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:12897: . pacyate svayam eva . paṭhyate svayam eva . paratvāt śap prāpnoti . yogavibhāgāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12898: siddham . yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . ciṇ bhāvakarmaṇoḥ . sārvadhātuke yak bhāvakarmaṇoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12899: . tataḥ kartari . kartari ca yak bhavati bhāvakarmaṇoḥ . yathā eva tarhi karmaṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:12900: kartari yak bhavati evam bhāve kartari prāpnoti . eti jīvantam ānandaḥ . na asya
GS24pmbhasuu:12901: kim cit rujati rogaḥ iti . dvitīyaḥ yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . ciṇ bhāve . tataḥ karmaṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:12902: . karmaṇi ca ciṇ bhavati . tataḥ sārvadhātuke yak bhavati bhāve ca karmaṇi ca . tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12903: kartari . kartari ca yak bhavati . karmaṇi iti anuvartate . bhāve iti nivṛttam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12904: tataḥ śap . śap ca bhavati . kartari iti eva . karmaṇi iti api nivṛttam . evam api
GS24pmbhasuu:12905: upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . vipratiṣedhāt hi śyanaḥ balīyastvam prāpnoti . śyanaḥ avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12906: . dīvyati sīvyati . yakaḥ avakāśaḥ . pacyate odanaḥ devadattena . paṭhyate vidyā
GS24pmbhasuu:12907: devadattena . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . dīvyate svayam eva . sīvyate svayam eva . paratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12908: śyan prāpnoti . nanu ca etat api yogavibhāgāt eva siddham . na sidhyati . anantarā
GS24pmbhasuu:12909: yā praptiḥ sā yogavibhāgena śakyā bādhitum . kutaḥ etat . anantarasya vidhiḥ vā bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:12910: pratiṣedhaḥ vā iti . parā prāptiḥ apratiṣiddhā . tayā prāpnoti . nanu ca iyam prāptiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12911: parām prāptim bādheta . na utsahate pratiṣiddhā satī bādhitum . evam tarhi śabādeśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12912: śyanādayaḥ kariṣyante . śap ca syādibhiḥ bādhyate . tatra divādibhyaḥ yagviṣaye śap
GS24pmbhasuu:12913: eva na asti kutaḥ śyanādayaḥ . tat tarhi śapaḥ grahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:12914: . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . kartari śap iti . tat vai prathamānirdiṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:12915: ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭena ca iha arthaḥ . divādibhyaḥ iti eṣā pañcamī śap iti prathamāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12916: ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayiṣyati tasmāt iti uttarasya iti . pratyayavidhiḥ ayam . na ca pratyayavidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:12917: pañcamyaḥ prakalpikāḥ bhavanti . na ayam pratyayavidhiḥ . vihitaḥ pratyayaḥ . prakṛtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12918: ca anuvartate . atha vā bhāvakarmaṇoḥ iti anuvṛttyā eva siddhe sati anivṛttiḥ yakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12919: bhāvāya .iha sārvadhātuke yak iti antareṇa bhāvakarmaṇoḥ iti anuvṛttim siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:12920: saḥ ayam evam siddhe sati yat bhāvakarmaṇoḥ iti anuvartayati tasya etat prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:12921: . karmakartari api yathā syāt . kartari iti ca yogavibhāgaḥ śyanaḥ pūrvavipratiṣedhāvacanāya
GS24pmbhasuu:12922: . kartari iti yogavibhāgaḥ kartavyaḥ śyanaḥ pūrvavipratiṣedham mā vocam iti . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:12923: vā karmavadbhāvavacanasāmarthyāt yak bhaviṣyati . asti anyat karmavadbhāvavacane
GS24pmbhasuu:12924: prayojanam . kim . ātmanepadam yathā syāt . vacanāt ātmanepadam bhaviṣyati . ciṇ
GS24pmbhasuu:12925: tarhi yathā syāt . ciṇ api vacanāt bhaviṣyati . ciṇvadbhāvaḥ tarhi yathā syāt . na
GS24pmbhasuu:12926: ekam prayojanam yogārambham prayojayati . tatra karmavadbhāvavacanasāmarthyāt yak
GS24pmbhasuu:12927: bhaviṣyati . atha vā ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati bhavati karmakartari yak iti yat ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:12928: na duhasnnunamām yakciṇau iti yakciṇoḥ pratiṣedham śāsti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12930: 153 anupasargāt iti kimartham . āyasyati prayasyati . anupasargāt iti śakyam akartum
GS24pmbhasuu:12931: . katham āyasyati prayasyati . saṃyasaḥ ca iti etat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . sampūrvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12934: 153-154 kimarthaḥ śakāraḥ . sārvadhātukāṛthaḥ . śit sārvadhātukam iti sārvadhātukasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:12935: . sārvadhātukam apit iti ṅittvam . ṅiti iti guṇapratiṣedhaḥ yathā syāt . bhinatti
GS24pmbhasuu:12936: chinatti iti . na etat asti prayojanam . sārvadhātukārdhadhātukayoḥ aṅgasya guṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12937: ucyate yasmāt ca pratyayavidhiḥ tadādi pratyaye aṅgasañjñam bhavati . yasmāt ca atra
GS24pmbhasuu:12938: pratyayavidhiḥ na tat pratyaye parataḥ . yat ca pratyaye parataḥ na tasmāt pratyayavidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12939: . idam tarhi prayojanam . ārdhadhātukasañjñā mā bhūt iti . kim ca syāt . valādilakṣaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12940: iṭ prasajyeta . etat api na asti prayojanam . valādeḥ ārdhadhātukasya aṅgasya iṭ
GS24pmbhasuu:12941: ucyate . yasmāt ca pratyayavidhiḥ tadādi pratyaye aṅgasañjñam bhavati . yasmāt ca
GS24pmbhasuu:12942: atra pratyayavidhiḥ na tat pratyaye parataḥ . yat ca pratyaye parataḥ na tasmāt pratyayavidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12943: . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . śnami śitkaraṇam pvādihrasvārtham . śnami śitkaraṇam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:12944: pvādīnām śiti hrasvatvam yathā syāt . pṛṇasi mṛṇasi iti . na vā dhātvanyatvāt . na
GS24pmbhasuu:12945: vā kartavyam . kim kāraṇam . dhātvanyatvāt . dhātvantaram pṛṇimṛṇī . yatra bhūmyām
GS24pmbhasuu:12946: vṛṇase . na eṣaḥ śnam . śnaḥ etat hrasvatvam . yadi śnaḥ hrasvatvam svaraḥ na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:12947: . vṛṇase . adupadeśāt lasārvadhātukam anudāttam bhavati iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:12948: . tasmāt śnam eṣaḥ . yadi śnam snasoḥ allopaḥ iti lopaḥ prāpnoti . upadhāyāḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:12949: vartate . anupadhātvāt na bhaviṣyati . na saḥ śakhyaḥ upadhāyāḥ iti vijñātum . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:12950: hi doṣaḥ syāt . aṅktaḥ añjanti . tasmāt śnaḥ eva hrasvatvam . svaraḥ katham . bahulam
GS24pmbhasuu:12951: pit sārvadhātukam chandasi . sārvadhātukasya bhalulam chandasi pittvam vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:12952: . pitaḥ ca apittvam dṛśyate apitaḥ ca pittvam . pitaḥ tāvat apittvam . mātaram pramiṇīmi
GS24pmbhasuu:12953: janitrīm . apitaḥ pittvam . śṛṇota grāvāṇaḥ . tat tarhi hrasvatvam vaktavyam . avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:12954: chandasi hrasvatvam vaktavyam upagāyantu mām patnayaḥ garbhiṇayaḥ yuvatayaḥ iti evamartham
GS24pmbhasuu:12955: . viśeṣaṇāṛthaḥ tarhi . kva viśeṣaṇāṛthena arthaḥ . śnāt nalopaḥ iti . nāt nalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12956: iti ucyamāne yajñānām yatnānām iti atra api prasajyeta . dīrghatve kṛte na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:12957: . idam iha sampradhāryam . dīrghatvam kriyatām nalopaḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12958: paratvāt na lopaḥ syāt . tasmāt śakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . atha kriyamāṇe api śakāre iha
GS24pmbhasuu:12959: kasmāt na bhavati . viśnānām praśnānām iti . lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya eva iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12961: 155-156 atha kimartham karoteḥ pṛthaggrahaṇam kriyate na tanādibhyaḥ iti eva ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:12962: . anyāni tanotyādikāryāṇi mā bhūvan iti . kāni . anunāsikalopādīni . daivaraktāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12963: kiṃsukāḥ . anunāsikābhāvāt eva anunāsikalopaḥ na bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi tanādikāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:12964: mā bhūt tanādibhyaḥ tathāsoḥ iti . nanu ca bhavati eva atra hrasvāt aṅgāt iti . tena
GS24pmbhasuu:12965: eva yathā syāt . anena mā bhūt iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ tena vā sati anena vā .
GS24pmbhasuu:12966: tena sati sijlopasya asiddhatvāt ciṇvadbhāvaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . anena punaḥ sati
GS24pmbhasuu:12967: ciṇvadbhāvaḥ na syāt . anena api sati ciṇvadbhāvaḥ siddhaḥ . katham . vibhāṣā luk
GS24pmbhasuu:12968: . yadā na luk tadā tena lopaḥ . tatra sijlopasya asiddhatvāt ciṇvadbhāvaḥ siddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12969: bhavati . tanāditvāt kṛñaḥ siddham sijlope ca na duṣyati . ciṇvadbhāve atra doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12972: 156-157 kva ayam akāraḥ śrūyate . na kva cit śrūyate . lopaḥ asya bhavati ataḥ lopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12973: ārdhadhātuke iti . yadi na kva cit śrūyate kimartham atvam ucyate na lopaḥ eva ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:12974: . na evam śakyam . lope hi sati guṇaḥ prasajyeta . nanu ca lope api sati na dhātulope
GS24pmbhasuu:12975: ārdhadhātuke iti pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati . ārdhadhātukanimitte lope saḥ pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12976: . na ca eṣaḥ ārdhadhātukanimittaḥ lopaḥ . api ca pratyākhyāyate saḥ yogaḥ . tasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:12977: pratyākhyāte guṇaḥ syāt eva . tasmāt atvam vaktavyam . atha kimartham numanuṣaktayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12978: grahaṇam kriyate na dhivikṛvyoḥ iti eva ucyate . dhivikṛvyoḥ iti ucyamāne atve kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:12979: aniṣṭe deśe num prasajyeta . idam iha sampradhāryam . atvam kriyatām num iti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:12980: atra kartavyam . paratvāt numāgamaḥ . antaraṅgam atvam . kā antaraṅgatā . pratyayotpattisanniyogena
GS24pmbhasuu:12981: atvam ucyate . utpannepratyaye prakṛtipratyayau āśritya aṅgasya numāgamaḥ . num api
GS24pmbhasuu:12982: antaraṅgaḥ . katham . vakṣyati etat numvidhau upadeśivadvacanam pratyayavidhyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:12983: iti . ubhayoḥ antaraṅgayoḥ paratvāt numāgamaḥ . tasmāt dhivikṛvyoḥ iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12985: 157-160 kimarthaḥ śakāraḥ . śit sārvadhātukam iti sārvadhātukasañjñā sārvadhātukam
GS24pmbhasuu:12986: apit iti ṅittvam ṅiti iti pratiṣedhaḥ yathā syāt . kuṣāṇa puṣāṇa iti . ataḥ uttaram
GS24pmbhasuu:12987: paṭhati . śnāvikārasya śitkaraṇānarthakyam sthānivatvāt . śnāvikārasya śitkaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:12988: anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . sthānivatvāt . śitaḥ ayam ādeśaḥ sthānivadbhāvāt śit bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:12989: . arthavat tu jñāpakam sārvadhātukādeśe anubandhāsthānivattvasya . arthavat tu śnāvikārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:12990: śitkaraṇam . kaḥ arthaḥ . jñāpakārtham . kim jñāpyam . etat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ sārvadhātukādeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:12991: anubandhāḥ na sthānivat bhavanti iti . kim etasya jñapane prayojanam . prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:12992: hitātaṅoḥ apittvam . heḥ pittvam na pratiṣedhyam . pitaḥ ayam ādeśaḥ sthānivadbhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12993: pit syāt . sārvadhātukādeśe anubandhāḥ na sthānivat bhavanti iti na ayam pit bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:12994: . tātaṅi ca ṅakāraḥ na uccāryaḥ bhavati . pitaḥ ayam ādeśaḥ sthānivadbhāvāt pit syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12995: . sārvadhātukādeśe anubandhāḥ na sthānivat bhavanti iti na ayam pit bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:12996: tabādiṣu ca aṅittvam . tabādiṣu ca aṅittvam prayojanam . śṛṇota grāvāṇaḥ . ṅitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12997: ime ādeśāḥ sthānivadbhāvāt ṅitaḥ syuḥ . sārvadhātukādeśe anubandhāḥ na sthānivat
GS24pmbhasuu:12998: bhavanti iti na ime ṅitaḥ bhavanti . tasya doṣaḥ mipaḥ ādeśe pidabhāvaḥ . tasya etasya
GS24pmbhasuu:12999: lakṣaṇasya doṣaḥ mipaḥ ādeśe pitaḥ abhāvaḥ . acinavam asunavam akaravam . pitaḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:13000: ādeśaḥ sthānivadbhāvāt pit syāt . sārvadhātukādeśe anubandhāḥ na sthānivat bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:13001: iti na ayam pit syāt . atyalpam idam ucyate . tipsibmipām ādeśāḥ iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:13002: veda vettha . videḥ vasoḥ śittvam . videḥ uttarasya vasoḥ śittvam vaktavyam . śitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13003: ayam ādeśaḥ sthānivadbhāvāt pit syāt . sārvadhātukādeśe anubandhāḥ na sthānivat bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:13004: iti na ayam śit syāt . kitkaraṇāt vā siddham . atha vā avaśyam atra sāmānyagrahaṇāvighātārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13005: kakāraḥ anubandhaḥ kartavyaḥ . kva sāmānyagrahaṇāvighātārthena arthaḥ . vasoḥ samprasāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:13006: . tena eva yatnena guṇaḥ na bhaviṣyati . asya jñāpakasya santi doṣāḥ santi prayojanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:13007: . samāḥ doṣāḥ bhūyāṃsaḥ vā . tasmāt na arthaḥ anena jñāpakena . katham yāni prayojanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:13008: . tāni kriyante nyāse eva . evam api bhavet pitkaraṇasāmarthyāt pitkṛtam syāt ṅitkaraṇasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:13009: ṅitkṛtam . yat tu khalu piti ṅitkṛtam prāpnoti ṅiti ca pitkṛtam kena tat na syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:13010: . tasmāt vaktavyam pit na ṅidvat bhavati ṅit ca na pidvat bhavati iti . na vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:13011: . evam vakṣyāmi . sārvadhātukam ṅit bhavati pit na . evam tāvat pitaḥ ṅittvam pratiṣiddham
GS24pmbhasuu:13012: . tataḥ asaṃyogāt liṭ kit bhavati iti ṅit ca pit na bhavati . evam ṅitaḥ pittvam pratiṣiddham .

GS24pmbhasuu:13015: . hau ca ahau ca . kim prayojanam . mahīaskabhāyat yaḥ askabhāyat udgṛbhāyata unmathāyata ityartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:13017: 160-162 yogavibhāgaḥ kartavyaḥ . vyatyayaḥ bhavati syādīnām iti . āṇḍā śuṣṇasya bhṝdati
GS24pmbhasuu:13018: . bhinatti iti prāpte . saḥ ca na marati . miryate iti prāpte . tataḥ bahulam. bahulam
GS24pmbhasuu:13019: chandasi viṣaye sarve vidhayaḥ bhavanti iti . supām vyatyayaḥ . tiṅām vyatyayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13021: . parasmaipadavyatyayaḥ . supām vyatyayaḥ . yuktā mātā āsīt dhuri dakṣiṇāyāḥ . dakṣiṇāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:13022: iti prāpte . tiṅām vyatyayaḥ . caṣālam ye aśvayūpāya takṣati . takṣanti iti prāpte
GS24pmbhasuu:13023: . varṇavyatyayaḥ . triṣṭubhaujaḥ śubhitam ugravīram . suhitam iti prāpte . liṅgavyatyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13024: . madhoḥ gṛhṇāti . madhoḥ tṛptāḥ iva āsate . madhunaḥ iti prāpte . kālavyatyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13025: . śvaḥ agnīn ādhāsyamānena . śvaḥ somena yakṣyamāṇena . ādhātā yaṣṭā iti evam prāpte
GS24pmbhasuu:13026: . puruṣavyatyayaḥ . adhā saḥ vīraiḥ daśabhiḥ viyūyāḥ . viyūyāt iti prāpte . ātmanepadavyatyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13027: . brahmnacāriṇam icchate . icchati iti prāpte . parasmaipadavyatyayaḥ . pratīpam
GS24pmbhasuu:13028: anyaḥ ūrmiḥ yudhyati . yudhyate iti prāpte . suptiṅupagrahaliṅganarāṇām kālhalacsvarakartṛyaṅām
GS24pmbhasuu:13029: ca vyatyayam icchati śāstrakṛt eṣām . saḥ api ca sidhyati bāhulakena .
GS24pmbhasuu:13031: 161-162 ayam āśiṣi aṅ vidhīyate . tasya kim prayojanam . āśiṣi aṅaḥ prayojanam sthāgāgamivacividayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13032: . sthā . upa stheṣam vṛṣabham . sthā . gā . añjasā satyam upa geṣam . gā . gami .

GS24pmbhasuu:13036: vaktavyaḥ pitaram ca dṛśeyam mātaram ca iti evamartham . iha upastheyāma iti āṭ api
GS24pmbhasuu:13037: vaktavyaḥ . na hi aṅā eva sidhyati . na vaktavyaḥ . sārvadhātukatvāt salopaḥ ārdhadhātukatvāt

GS24pmbhasuu:13041: akarmakāṇām bhāve laḥ bhavati iti laḥ yathā syāt . karmaṇā iti kimartham . karaṇādhikaraṇābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:13042: tulyakriyaḥ kartā yaḥ saḥ karmavat mā bhūt . sādhu asiḥ chinatti . sādhu sthālī pacati
GS24pmbhasuu:13043: . tulyakriyaḥ iti kimartham . pacati odanam devadattaḥ . tulyakriyaḥ iti ucyamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:13044: api atra prāpnoti . atra api hi karmaṇā tulyakriyaḥ kartā . na tulyakriyagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:13045: samānakriyatvam abhisambadhyate . kim tarhi . yasmin karmaṇi kartṛbhūte api tadvat
GS24pmbhasuu:13046: kriya lakṣyate yathā karmaṇi saḥ karmaṇā tulyakriyaḥ kartā karmavat bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13048: 164-167 karmavat akarmakasya kartā . akarmakasya kartā karmavat bhavati iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:13049: . kim prayojanam . sakarmakasya kartā karmavat mā bhūt iti . bhidyamānaḥ kuśūlaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13050: pātrāṇi bhinatti . tathā karma dṛṣṭaḥ cet samānadhātau . karma dṛṣṭaḥ cet samānadhātau

GS24pmbhasuu:13083: . lāntasya kartā karmavat bhavati iti vaktavyam . itarathā hi kṛtyaktakhalartheṣu

GS24pmbhasuu:13085: . kṛtya . bhettavyaḥ kuśūlaḥ iti karma . saḥ yadā svātantryeṇa vivakṣitaḥ tadā asya

GS24pmbhasuu:13088: kuśūlaḥ iti karma . saḥ yadā svātantryeṇa vivakṣitaḥ tadā asya karmavadbhāvaḥ syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:13089: . tasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . tasmin pratiṣiddhi akarmakāṇām bhāve ktaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:13090: iti bhāve ktaḥ yathā syāt . bhinnam kuśūlena . khalarthaḥ . īṣadbhedyaḥ kuśūlaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:13091: karma . saḥ yadā svātantryeṇa vivakṣitaḥ tadā asya karmavadbhāvaḥ syāt . tasya pratiṣedhaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:13093: . īṣadbhedyam kuśūlena iti . tat tarhi lagrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . kriyate

GS24pmbhasuu:13095: . siddham etat . katham . prākṛtakarmatvāt . prākṛtam eva etat karma yathā kaṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:13096: karoti śakaṭam karoti . katham punaḥ jñāyate prākṛtam eva etat karma iti . ātmasaṃyoge
GS24pmbhasuu:13097: akarmakartuḥ karmadarśanāt . ātmasaṃyoge akarmakartuḥ karma dṛśyate . kva . hanti

GS24pmbhasuu:13099: . kartā na dṛśyate . ātmanā hanyate iti kartā dṛśyate . karma na dṛśyate . padalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13100: ca . padalopaḥ ca draṣṭavyaḥ . hanti ātmānam ātmanā . ātmanā hanyate ātmā iti . kaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:13102: antarātmā tat karma karoti yena śarīrātmā sukhaduḥke anubhavati . śarīrātmā tat karma
GS24pmbhasuu:13105: 172-176 sakarmakāṇām pratiṣedhaḥ anyonyam āśliṣyataḥ iti . sakarmakāṇām pratiṣedhaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:13107: gṛhṇītaḥ iti . tapeḥ vā sakarmakasya vacanam niyamārtham . tapeḥ vā sakarmakasya
GS24pmbhasuu:13108: vacanam niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . tapeḥ eva sakarmakasya na anyasya sakarmakasya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:13109: . tasya tarhi anyakarmakasya api prāpnoti . uttapati suvarṇam suvarṇakāraḥ . uttapyamānam
GS24pmbhasuu:13110: suvarṇam suvarṇakāram uttapati . tasya ca tapaḥkarmakasya eva . tasya ca tapaḥkarmakasya
GS24pmbhasuu:13111: eva kartā karmavat bhavati na anyakarmakasya iti . kim idam tapaḥ iti . tapeḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:13112: auṇādikaḥ askāraḥ bhāvasādhanaḥ . kaḥ prakṛtyarthaḥ kaḥ pratyayārthaḥ . saḥ eva santapaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:13114: avayavatapiḥ karma bhavati . tat yathā . saḥ etān poṣān apuṣyat gopoṣam aśvapoṣam
GS24pmbhasuu:13115: raipoṣam iti . sāmānyapuṣeḥ avayavipuṣiḥ karma bhavati . evam iha api sāmānyatapeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13116: avayavatapiḥ karma bhavati . duhipacyoḥ bahulam sakarmakayoḥ . duhipacyoḥ sakarmakayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13117: kartā bahulam karmavat bhavati iti vaktavyam . dugdhe gauḥ payaḥ . tasmāt udumbaraḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:13119: na arthaḥ bahulavacanena . na hi parasmaipadam iṣyate . sṛjiyujyoḥ śyan tu . sṛjiyujyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13120: sakarmakayoḥ kartā bahulam karmavat bhavati iti vaktavyam . śyan tu bhavati . sṛjeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13121: śraddhopapanne kartari karmavadbhāvaḥ vācyaḥ ciṇātmanepadārthaḥ . sṛjyate mālām .
GS24pmbhasuu:13122: asarji mālām . yajeḥ tu nyāyye karmakartari yakaḥ abhāvāya . yujyate brahmacārī yogam
GS24pmbhasuu:13123: . karaṇena tulyakriyaḥ kartā bahulam . karaṇena tulyakriyaḥ kartā bahulam karmavat
GS24pmbhasuu:13124: bhavati iti vaktavyam . parivārayanti kaṇṭakaiḥ vṛkṣam . parivārayante kaṇṭakāḥ vṛkṣam
GS24pmbhasuu:13125: iti . sravatyādīnām pratiṣedhaḥ . sravatyādīnām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . sravati kuṇḍikā

GS24pmbhasuu:13127: udakam iti . saḥ tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . tulyakriyaḥ iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:13128: . kriyāntaram ca atra gamyate . iha tāvat sravati kuṇḍikā udakam iti . visṛjati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:13129: gamyate . sravati kuṇḍikāyāḥ udakam iti . niṣkrāmati iti gamyate . sravanti valīkāni
GS24pmbhasuu:13130: udakam iti . visṛjanti iti gamyate . sravati valīkebhyaḥ udakam iti . patati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:13131: gamyate . bhūṣākarmakiratisanām ca anyatra ātmanepadāt . bhūṣākarmakiratisanām ca
GS24pmbhasuu:13132: pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ anyatra ātmanepadāt . bhūṣayate kanyā svayam eva . abubhūṣata

GS24pmbhasuu:13137: 176-177 yakciṇoḥ pratiṣedhe hetumaṇṇiśribrūñām upasaṅkhyānam . yakciṇoḥ pratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:13138: hetumaṇṇiśribrūñām upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . ṇi . kārayate kaṭaḥ svayam eva . acīkarata
GS24pmbhasuu:13139: kaṭaḥ svayam eva . ṇi . śri . ucchrayate daṇḍaḥ svayam eva . udaśiśriyata daṇḍaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13140: svayam eva . śri . brūñ . brūte kathā svayam eva . avocata kathā svayam eva . bhāradvājīyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13141: paṭhanti . yakciṇoḥ pratiṣedhe ṇiśrigranthibrūñātmanepadākarmakāṇām upasaṅkhyānam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13144: kartavyam . avacane hi liṅliṭoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . akriyamāṇe hi sārvadhātukagrahaṇe liṅliṭoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13145: pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ syāt . cukuṣe pādaḥ svayam eva . rarañje vastram svayam eva
GS24pmbhasuu:13146: . koṣiṣīṣṭa pādaḥ svayam eva . raṅkṣīṣṭa vastram svayam eva . kriyamāṇe api sārvadhātukagrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:13147: iha prāpnoti . kati iha kuṣṇāṇāḥ pādāḥ . śyanā ca syādīnām bādhanam prāpnoti . koṣiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:13148: pādaḥ svayam eva . raṅkṣyate vastram svayam eva . akoṣi pādaḥ svayam eva . arañji
GS24pmbhasuu:13149: vastram svayam eva . yat tāvat ucyate sārvadhātukagrahaṇam kartavyam iti . prakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:13150: anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . sārvadhātuke yak iti . yadi tat anuvartate pūrvasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:13151: yoge kim samuccayaḥ . le ca sārvadhātuke ca iti . āhosvit lagrahaṇam sārvadhātukaviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:13152: . kim ca ataḥ . yadi samuccayaḥ kati iha bhindānāḥ kuśūlāḥ iti atra api prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:13153: . atha lagrahaṇam sārvadhātukaviśeṣaṇam liṅliṭoḥ na sidhyati . bibhide kuśūlaḥ svayam
GS24pmbhasuu:13154: eva . bhitsīṣṭa kuśūlaḥ svayam eva iti . astu lagrahaṇam sārvadhātukaviśeṣaṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:13155: nanu ca uktam liṅliṭoḥ na sidhyati iti . liṅliḍgrahaṇam api prakṛtam anuvartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:13156: kva prakṛtam . kās pratyayāt ām amantre liṭi liṅi āśiṣi āṅ iti . evam ca kṛtvā saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13157: api adoṣaḥ bhavati yat uktam kati iha kuṣṇāṇāḥ pādāḥ iti prāpnoti . atra api laviśiṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:13158: sārvadhātukagrahaṇam anuvartate . yat api ucyate śyanā ca syādīnām bādhanam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:13159: . yakpratiṣedhasambandhena śyanaṃ vakṣyāmi . na duhasnunamām yakciṇau . tataḥ kuṣirajoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13160: prācām yakciṇau na bhavataḥ . tataḥ śyan parasmaipadam ca iti . yathā eva tarhi yakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13161: viṣaye śyan bhavati evam ciṇaḥ api viṣaye prāpnoti . akoṣi pādaḥ svayam eva . arañji
GS24pmbhasuu:13162: vastram svayam eva iti . evam tarhi dvitīyaḥ yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . na duhasnunamām
GS24pmbhasuu:13163: ciṇ bhavati . tataḥ yak . yak ca na bhavati duhasnunamām . tataḥ kuṣirajoḥ prācām
GS24pmbhasuu:13164: yak na bhavati . tataḥ śyan parasmaipadam ca . atha vā anuvṛttiḥ kariṣyate . syatāsī
GS24pmbhasuu:13165: lṛluṭoḥ . cli luṅi . cleḥ sic bhavati . kartari śap syatāsī lṛluṭoḥ cli luṅi cleḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13166: sic bhavati . kuṣirajoḥ prācām śyan parasmaipadam ca syatāsī lṛluṭoḥ cli luṅi cleḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13167: sic bhavati iti . atha vā antaraṅgāḥ syādayaḥ . kā antaraṅgatā . lakārāvasthāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:13170: 179-183 ā kutaḥ ayam dhātvadhikāraḥ . kim prāk lādeśāt āhosvit ā tṛtīyādhyāyaparisamāpteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13171: . dhātuvadhikāraḥ prāk lādeśāt . prāk lādeśāt dhātvadhikāraḥ . lādeśe hi vyavahitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:13172: aprasiddhiḥ . anuvartamāne hi lādeśe dhātvadhikāre vyavahitavtā aprasiddhiḥ syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:13173: . kim ca syāt . ādye yoge na vyavāye tiṅaḥ syuḥ . ādye yoge vikaraṇaiḥ vyavahitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:13174: tiṅaḥ na syuḥ . pacati paṭhati . idam iha sampradhāryam . vikaraṇāḥ kriyantām āḍeśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13175: iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt ādeśāḥ . nityāḥ vikaraṇāḥ . kṛteṣu ādeśeṣu prāpnuvanti
GS24pmbhasuu:13176: akṛteṣu api prāpnuvanti . nityatvāt vikaraṇeṣu kṛteṣu vikaraṇaiḥ vyavahitatvāt ādeśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13177: na prāpnuvanti . anavakāśaḥ tarhi ādeśāḥ . sāvakāśāḥ ādeśāḥ . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . ye ete
GS24pmbhasuu:13178: lugvikaraṇāḥ śluvikaraṇāḥ ca liṅliṭau ca . na syāt etvam ṭeḥ ṭitām yat vidhatte .
GS24pmbhasuu:13179: yat ca ṭitsañjñānām etvam vidhatte tat ca vikaraṇaiḥ vyavahitatvāt na syāt . eśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13180: śittvam . ekāraḥ ca śit kartavyaḥ . kim prayojanam . śit sarvasya iti sarvādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13181: yathā syāt . akriyamāṇe hi śakāre tasmāt iti uttarasya ādeḥ iti takārasya etve kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:13182: dvayoḥ ekārayoḥ śravaṇam prasajyeta . nivṛtte punaḥ lādeśe dhātvadhikāre alaḥ antyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:13183: vidhayaḥ bhavanti iti ekārasya ekārvacanane prayojanam na asti iti kṛtvā antareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:13184: api śakāram sarvādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . yat ca loṭaḥ vidhatte . tat ca vikaraṇaiḥ vyavahitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:13185: na syāt . kim punaḥ tat . loṭaḥ laṅvat eḥ uḥ seḥ hi apit ca vā chandasi iti . yat
GS24pmbhasuu:13186: ca api uktam laṅliṅoḥ tat ca na syāt . kim punaḥ tat . nityam ṅitaḥ itaḥ ca tasthasthamipām
GS24pmbhasuu:13187: tāmtamtāmaḥ liṅaḥ sīyuṭ yāsuṭ parasmaipadeṣu udāttaḥ ṅit ca iti . tasmāt prāk lādeśāt
GS24pmbhasuu:13188: dhātvadhikāraḥ . yadi prāk lādeśāt dhātvadhikāraḥ akāraḥ śit kartavyaḥ . kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:13189: . śit sarvasya iti sarvādeśaḥ yathā syāt . anuvartamāne punaḥ lādeśe dhātvadhikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:13190: tasmāt iti uttarasya ādeḥ iti thakārasya atve kṛte dvayoḥ akārayoḥ pararūpeṇa siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:13191: rūpam syāt . peca yūyam . cakra yūyam iti . nanu ca nivṛtte api lādeśe dhātvadhikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:13192: alaḥ antyasya vidhayaḥ bhavanti iti akārasya akārvacanane prayojanam na asti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:13193: kṛtvā antareṇa api śakāram sarvādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . asti anyat akārasya akāravacane
GS24pmbhasuu:13194: prayojanam . kim . vakṣyati etat tat akārasya akāravacanam samasaṅkhyārtham iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13195: ārdhadhātukasañjñāyām dhātugrahaṇam kartavyam dhātoḥ parasya ārdhadhātukasañjñā yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:13197: vṛkṣtvam vṛkṣatā iti . tasmāt lādeśe dhātvadhikāraḥ anuvartyaḥ . nanu ca uktam ādye
GS24pmbhasuu:13198: yoge na vyavāye tiṅaḥ syuḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ānupūrvyāt siddham etat . na atra
GS24pmbhasuu:13199: akṛteṣu ādeśeṣu vikaraṇāḥ prāpnuvanti . kim kāraṇam . sārvadhātuke vikaraṇāḥ ucyante
GS24pmbhasuu:13200: . na ca akṛteṣu ādeśeṣu sārvadhātukatvam bhavati . ye tarhi na etasmin viśeṣe vidhīyante
GS24pmbhasuu:13201: . ke punaḥ te . syādayaḥ . tatra api vihitaviśeṣaṇam dhātugrahaṇam . dhātoḥ vihitasya
GS24pmbhasuu:13202: lasya iti . yadi evam vindati iti ṇalādayaḥ prāpnuvanti . dhātunā atra vihitam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13203: vidinā ca ānataryam . dhātoḥ vihitasya lasya videḥ anantarasya iti . iha tarhi ajakṣiṣyan
GS24pmbhasuu:13204: ajāgairṣyan iti abhyastāt jheḥ jus bhavati iti jusbhāvaḥ prāpnoti . atra api dhātunā
GS24pmbhasuu:13205: vihitam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ abhyastena ānantaryam . dhātoḥ vihitasya abhastāt anantarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:13206: iti . ātaḥ iti atra katham viśeṣayiṣyasi . yadi tāvat dhātugrahaṇam vihitaviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:13207: ākāragrahaṇam ānantaryaviśeṣaṇam alunan iti atra api prāpnoti . atha ākāragrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:13208: vihitaviśeṣaṇam dhātugrahaṇam ānantaryaviśeṣaṇam apiban iti atra api prāpnoti . astu
GS24pmbhasuu:13209: tarhi dhātugrahaṇam vihitaviśeṣaṇam ākāragrahaṇam ānantaryaviśeṣaṇam . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:13210: alunan iti atra api prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . lope kṛte na bhaviṣyati . na atra
GS24pmbhasuu:13212: kāraṇam . ītvena bādhyate . na atra ītvam prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . antibhāvena bādhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:13213: . na atra antibhāvaḥ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . jusbhāvena bādhyate . na atra jusbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13214: prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . lopena bādhyate . lopaḥ ītvena ītvam antibhāvena antibhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13215: jusbhāvena jusbhāvaḥ lopena iti cakrakam avyavasthā prasajyeta . na asti cakrakaprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13216: . na hi avyavasthākāriṇā śāstreṇa bhavitavyam . śāstreṇa nāma vyavasthākāriṇā bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:13217: . na ca atra halādinā muhūrtam api śakyam avasthātum . tāvati eva antibhāvena bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:13218: . antibhāve kṛte lopaḥ . lopena vyavasthā bhaviṣyati . yat api ucyate eśaḥ śittvam
GS24pmbhasuu:13221: 183-185 kāni punaḥ asya yogasya prayojanāni . prayojanam prātipadikapratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13222: prātipadikapratiṣedhaḥ prayojanam . dhātoḥ tavyādayaḥ yathā syuḥ . prātipadikāt mā
GS24pmbhasuu:13223: bhūvan iti . na etat asti prayojanam . sādhane tāvyādayaḥ vidhīyante sādhanam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:13224: kriyāyāḥ . kriyābhāvāt sādhanābhāvaḥ . sādhanābhāvāt asati api dhātvadhikāre prātipadikāt
GS24pmbhasuu:13225: tavyādayaḥ na bhaviṣyanti . svapādiṣu . svapādiṣu tarhi prayojanam . svapiti . supati
GS24pmbhasuu:13226: iti mā bhūt . aṅgasañjñā ca . aṅgasañjñā ca prayojanam . yasmāt pratyayavidhiḥ tadādi
GS24pmbhasuu:13227: pratyaye aṅgam iti dhātoḥ aṅgasañjñā siddhā bhavati . kṛtsañjñā ca . kṛtsañjñā ca
GS24pmbhasuu:13228: prayojanam . dhātuvihitasya pratyayasya kṛtsañjñā siddhā bhavati . upapadasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:13229: ca. upapadasañjñā ca prayojanam . tatra etasmin dhātvadhikāre saptamīnirdiṣṭam upapadasñjñam
GS24pmbhasuu:13230: bhavati iti upapadasañjñā siddhā bhavati . kṛdupapadasañjñe tāvan na prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:13231: adhikārāt api ete siddhe . svapādiṣu tarhi aṅgasañjñā ca prayojanam . dhātugrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:13232: anarthakam yaṅvidhau dhātvadhikārāt . dhātugrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . yaṅvidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:13233: dhātvadhikārāt . yaṅvidhau dhātugrahaṇam prakṛtam anuvartate . tat ca avaśyam anuvartyam
GS24pmbhasuu:13234: . anadhikāre hi aṅgasañjñābhāvaḥ . anadhikāre hi sati aṅgasañjñāyāḥ abhāvaḥ syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:13235: . kariṣyati hariṣyati iti . yad tat anuvartate cūrṇacurādibhyaḥ ṇic bhavati dhātoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13236: ca iti dhātumātrāt ṇic prāpnoti . hetumadvacanam tu jñāpakam anyatrābhāvasya . yat
GS24pmbhasuu:13237: ayam hetumati ca iti āha tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na dhātumātrāt ṇic bhavati iti . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:13238: tarhi kaṇḍvādibhyaḥ yak bhavati dhātoḥ ca iti dhātumātrāt yak prāpnoti . kaṇḍvādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:13239: ca vyapadeśivadvacanāt . yat ayam kaṇḍvādibhyaḥ yak bhavati iti āha tat jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:13240: ācāryaḥ na dhātumātrāt yak bhavati iti . atha vā kaṇḍvādibhyaḥ dhātugrahaṇena abhisambhantsyāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13243: 185-186 sthagrahaṇam kimartham . tatra upapadam saptamī iti iyati ucyamāne yatra eva saptamī śrūyate tatra eva syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:13244: stamberamaḥ karṇejapaḥ . yatra vā etena śabdena nirdeśaḥ kriyate . saptamyām janeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13245: ḍaḥ iti . iha na syāt . kumbhakāraḥ nagarakāraḥ . sthagrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe yatra
GS24pmbhasuu:13246: ca saptamī śrūyate ya ca na śrūyate yatra ca etena śabdena nirdeśaḥ kriyate yatra
GS24pmbhasuu:13247: ca anyena saptamīsthamātre siddham bhavati . atha tatragrahaṇam kimartham . tatragrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:13248: viṣayārtham . viṣayaḥ pratinirdiśyate . tatra etasmin dhātvadhikāre yat saptamīnirdiṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:13249: tat upapadasañjñam bhavati iti upapadasañjñā siddhā bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:13252: . samartham upapadam pratyayasya iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . āhara kumbham . karoti
GS24pmbhasuu:13253: kaṭam iti . kriyamāṇe ca api samarthagrahaṇe mahāntam kumbham karoti iti atra api
GS24pmbhasuu:13254: prāpnoti . na vā bhavitavyam mahākumbhakāraḥ iti . bhavaitavyam yadā etat vākyam
GS24pmbhasuu:13255: bhavati . mahān kumbhaḥ mahākumbhaḥ mahākumbham karoti iti mahākumbhakāraḥ . yadā
GS24pmbhasuu:13256: tu etat vākyam bhavati mahāntam kumbham karoti iti tadā na bhavitavyam . tadā ca
GS24pmbhasuu:13257: prāpnoti . tadā mā bhūt iti . yat tāvat ucyate samarthagrahaṇam kartavyam iti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:13258: kartavyam . dhātoḥ iti vartate . dhātoḥ karmaṇi aṇ bhavati . tatra sambandhāt etat
GS24pmbhasuu:13259: gantavyam . yasya dhātoḥ yat karma iti . yat api ucyate kriyamāṇe ca api samarthagrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:13260: mahāntam kumbham karoti iti atra api prāpnoti iti . upapadam iti mahatīiham sañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:13261: kriyate . sañjñā ca nāma yataḥ na laghīyaḥ . kutaḥ etat . laghvartham hi sañjñākaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:13262: . tatra mahatyāḥ sañjñāyāḥ karaṇe etat prayojanam anvarthasañjñā yathā vijñāyeta :
GS24pmbhasuu:13263: upoccāri padam upapadam . yat ca atra upoccāri na tat padam yat ca padam na tat upoccāri
GS24pmbhasuu:13264: . yāvatā ca idānīm padagandhaḥ asti padavidhiḥ ayam bhavati . padavidhiḥ ca samarthānām
GS24pmbhasuu:13265: bhavati . tatra asāmārthyān na bhaviṣyati . atha cvyante upapade kim aṇā bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:13266: . akumbham kumbham karoti kumbhīkaroti mṛdam iti . na bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:13267: prakṛtivivakṣāyām cviḥ vidhīyate . tat sāpekṣam . sāpekṣam ca asamartham bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:13269: icchāmi aham kāśakaṭīkāram iti . iṣṭam eva etat gonardīyasya . nimittopādanam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:13270: . nimittopādanam ca kartavyam . nimittam upapadam pratyayasya iti vaktavyam . anupādāne
GS24pmbhasuu:13271: hi anupapade pratyayaprasaṅgaḥ . akriyamāṇe hi nimittopādāne anupapade api prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:13272: . nirdeśaḥ idānīm kimarthaḥ syāt . nirdeśaḥ sañjñākaraṇārthaḥ . yadā upapade pratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13273: tadā upapadasañjñām vakṣyāmi iti . tat tarhi nimittopādanam kartavyam . na kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:13274: . tatravacanam upapadasanniyogārtham . tatravacanam kriyate . tat upapadasanniyogārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:13275: bhaviṣyati . karmaṇi aṇ vidhīyate tatra cet pratyayaḥ bhavati iti . nanu ca anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:13276: tatragrahaṇasya prayojanam uktam . kim . tatragrahaṇam viṣayārtham iti . adhikārāt api etat siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:13278: 190-192 atiṅ iti kimartham . pacati karoti . atiṅ iti śakyam akartum . kasmāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:13279: bhavati pacati karoti iti . dhātoḥ parasya kṛtsañjñā . prāk ca lādeśāt dhātvadhikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13280: . evam api sthānivadbhāvāt kṛtsañjña prāpnoti . yathā atiṅ iti ucyamāne yāvatā sthānivadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13281: katham eva etat sidhyati . pratiṣedhavacanasāmarthyāt . atha vā tiṅbhāvinaḥ lakārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:13282: kṛtsañjñāpratiṣedhaḥ . kim ca syāt yati atra kṛtsañjñā syāt . kṛtprātipadikam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:13283: prātipadikasañjñā syāt . prātipadikāt iti svādyutpattiḥ prasajyeta . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13284: . ekatvādiṣu artheṣu svādayaḥ vidhīyante . te ca atra tiṅoktāḥ ekatvādayaḥ iti kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:13285: uktārthatvāt na bhaviṣyanti . ṭābādayaḥ tarhi tiṅantāt mā bhūvan iti . striyām ṭābādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13286: vidhīyante . na ca tiṅantasya strītvena yogaḥ asti . aṇādayaḥ tarhi tiṅantāt mā bhūvan
GS24pmbhasuu:13287: iti . apatyādiṣu artheṣu aṇādayaḥ vidhīyante . na ca tiṅantasya apatyādibhiḥ yogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13288: asti . atha api katham cit yogaḥ syāt . evam api na doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:13289: na tiṅantāt aṇādayaḥ bhavanti iti yat ayam kva cit taddhitavidhau tiṅgrahaṇam karoti
GS24pmbhasuu:13290: . atiśāyane tamabiṣṭhanau tiṅaḥ ca iti . iha tarhi pacati paṭhati iti . hrasvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:13291: piti kṛti tuk bhavati iti tuk prāpnoti . dhātoḥ iti vartate . evam api cikīrṣati
GS24pmbhasuu:13292: iti atra prāpnoti . atra api śapā vyavadhānam . ekādeśe kṛte na asti vyavadhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:13293: . ekādeśaḥ pūrvavidhau sthānivat bhavati iti sthānivadbhāvāt vyavadhānam eva iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13295: 192-193 katham idam vijñāyate . striyām abhidheyāyām vā asrūpaḥ na bhavati iti āhosvit
GS24pmbhasuu:13296: strīpratyayeṣu iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi striyām abhidheyāyām iti lavyā lavitavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:13297: atra vā asarūpaḥ na prāpnoti . atha vijñāyate strīpratyayeṣu iti vyāvakrośī vayatikruṣṭiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13298: iti na sidhyati . evam tarhi na evam vijñāyate striyām abhidheyāyām na api strīpratyayeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:13299: iti . katham tarhi strīgrahaṇam svarayiṣyate . tatra svaritena adhikāragatiḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:13300: iti striyām iti adhikṛtya ye pratayāḥ vihitāḥ teṣām pratiṣedhaḥ vijñāsyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:13302: 193-198 kimartham punaḥ idam ucyate . asarūpasya vāvacanam utsargasya bādhakaviṣaye
GS24pmbhasuu:13303: anivṛttyartham . asarūpasya vāvacanam kriyate utsargasya bādhakaviṣaye anivṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13304: yathā syāt . tavyattavyānīyaraḥ utsargāḥ . teṣām ajantāt yat apavādaḥ . ceyam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:13305: cetavyam iti api yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . ajantāt yat vidhīyate . halantāt
GS24pmbhasuu:13306: ṇyat vidhīyate . etāvantaḥ ca dhātavaḥ yat uta ajantāḥ halantāḥ ca . ucyante ca tavyādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13307: . te vacanāt bhaviṣyanti . evam tarhi ṇvultṛcau utsargau . tayoḥ pacādibhyaḥ ac apavādaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13308: . pacati iti pacaḥ . paktā pācakaḥ iti api yathā syāt . etat api na asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:13309: . vakṣyati etat . ac api sarvadhātubhyaḥ vaktavyaḥ iti . evam tarhi ṇvultṛjacaḥ utsargāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13310: teṣām igupadhāt kaḥ apavādaḥ . vikṣipaḥ vilikhaḥ . vikṣeptā vikṣepakaḥ iti api yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:13311: syāt . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . tatra utpattivāprasaṅgaḥ yathā taddhite
GS24pmbhasuu:13312: . tatra utpattiḥ vibhāṣā prāpnoti yathā taddhite . astu . yadā vikṣipaḥ vilikhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13313: iti etat na tadā vikṣeptā vikṣepakaḥ iti etat bhaviṣyati . yadi etat labhyeta kṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:13314: syāt . tat tu na labhyam . kim kāraṇam . yathā taddhite iti ucyate . tadditeṣu ca
GS24pmbhasuu:13315: sarvam eva utsargāpavādam vibhāṣā . utpadyate vā na vā . siddham tu asarūpasya bādhakasya
GS24pmbhasuu:13316: vāvacanāt . siddham etat . katham . asarūpasya bādhakasya vāvacanāt . asarūpaḥ bādhakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13317: vā bādhakaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam
GS24pmbhasuu:13318: eva astu . nanu ca uktam tatra utpattivāprasaṅgaḥ yathā taddhite iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13319: . asti kāraṇam yena taddhite vibhāṣā utpattiḥ bhavati . kim kāraṇam . prakṛtiḥ tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:13320: prakṛtyarthe vartate . anyena śabdena pratyayārthaḥ abhidhīyate . iha punaḥ na kevalā
GS24pmbhasuu:13321: prakṛtiḥ prakṛtyarthe vartate na ca anyaḥ śabdaḥ asti yaḥ tam artham abhidadhīta
GS24pmbhasuu:13322: iti kṛtvā anutpattiḥ na bhaviṣyati . atha vā samayaḥ kṛtaḥ . na kevalā prakṛtiḥ prayoktavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:13323: na ca kevalaḥ pratyayaḥ iti . etasmāt samayāt anutpattiḥ na bhaviṣyati . nanu ca
GS24pmbhasuu:13324: yaḥ eva tasya samayasya kartā saḥ eva idam api āha . yadi asau tatra pramāṇam iha
GS24pmbhasuu:13325: api pramāṇam bhavitum arhati . pramāṇam asau tatra ca iha ca . sāmarthyam tu iha
GS24pmbhasuu:13326: draṣṭavyam prayoge . na ca anutpattau sāmarthyam asti . tena anutpattiḥ na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:13327: . katham tarhi taddhiteṣu anutpattau sāmarthyam bhavati . anyena pratyayena sāmarthyam
GS24pmbhasuu:13328: . kena . ṣaṣṭhyā . atha vā rūpavattām āśritya vāvidhiḥ ucyate . na ca anutpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13329: rūpavatī . tena anutpattiḥ na bhaviṣyati . evam api kutaḥ etat apavādaḥ vibhāṣā bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:13330: na punaḥ utsargaḥ iti . na ca eva asti viśeṣaḥ yat apavādaḥ vibhāṣā syāt utsargaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13331: vā . api ca sāpekṣaḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ kriyate vā asarūpaḥ iti . na ca utsargavelāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:13332: kim cit apekṣyam asti . apavādavelāyām punaḥ utsargaḥ apekṣyate . tena yaḥ rūpavān
GS24pmbhasuu:13333: anyapūrvakaḥ bādhakaḥ prāpnoti saḥ vā bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . kaḥ punaḥ asau . apavādaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13334: . yadi yaḥ rūpavān anyapūrvakaḥ bādhakaḥ prāpnoti saḥ vā bādhakaḥ bhavati iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:13335: kvibādiṣu samāveśaḥ na prāpnoti . grāmaṇīḥ grāmaṇāyaḥ iti . na hi ete rūpavantaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13336: . ete api rūpavantaḥ . kasyām avasthāyām . upadeśāvasthāyām . yadi evam anubandhabhinneṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:13337: vibhāṣāprasaṅgaḥ . anubandhabhinneṣu vibhāṣā prāpnoti . karmaṇi aṇ ātaḥ anupasarge
GS24pmbhasuu:13338: kaḥ iti kaviṣaye aṇ api prāpnoti . siddham anubandhasya anekāntatvāt . siddham etat
GS24pmbhasuu:13339: . katham . anubandhasya anekāntatvāt . anekāntāḥ anubandhāḥ . atha vā prayoge asarūpāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:13340: vāvidhiḥ nyāyyaḥ . prayoge cet lādeśeṣu pratiṣedhaḥ . prayoge cet lādeśeṣu pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13341: vaktavyaḥ . hyaḥ apacat iti atra luṅ api prāpnoti . śvaḥ paktā iti atra lṛṭ api prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:13342: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na lādeśeṣu vā asarūpaḥ bhavati iti yat
GS24pmbhasuu:13343: ayam haśaśvatoḥ laṅ ca iti āha . atha vā prayoge asarūpāṇām vāvidhau na sarvam iṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:13344: saṅgṛhītam iti kṛtvā dvitīyaḥ prayogaḥ upāsyate . kaḥ asau . upadeśaḥ nāma . upadeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:13345: ca ete sarūpāḥ . nanu ca uktam anubandhabhinneṣu vibhāṣāprasaṅgaḥ iti . parihṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:13346: etat . katham . siddham anubandhasya anekāntatvāt . atha ekānte doṣaḥ eva . ekānte
GS24pmbhasuu:13347: ca na doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na anubandhakṛtam asārūpyam bhavati iti yat
GS24pmbhasuu:13349: vibhāṣā śam śāsti . atha vā asarūpaḥ bādhakaḥ vā bādhakaḥ bhavati iti ucyate . apavādaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13350: nāma anubandhabhinnaḥ vā bhavati rūpānyatvena vā . tena anena avaśyam kim cit tyājyam
GS24pmbhasuu:13351: kim cit tu saṅgrahītavyam . tat yat anubandhakṛtam asārūpyam tat na āśrayiṣyāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13352: yat tu rūpānyatvena asārūpyam tat āśrayiṣyāmaḥ . atha vā asarūpaḥ bādhakaḥ vā bādhakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13353: bhavati iti ucyate sarvaḥ ca asarūpaḥ . tatra prakarṣagatiḥ vijñāsyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:13354: sādhīyaḥ yaḥ asarūpaḥ iti . kaḥ ca sādhīyaḥ . yaḥ prayoge ca prāk ca prayogāt . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:13355: vā asarūpaḥ bādhakaḥ vā bādhakaḥ bhavati iti ucyate . na ca evam kaḥ cit api sarūpaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13357: kvat cit ye asarūpāḥ . anubandhabhinnāḥ ca prayoge sarūpāḥ .

GS24pmbhasuu:13395: 202-203 yati jāteḥ upasaṅkhyānam . yati jāteḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . janyam vatsena . atyalpam idam ucyate . takiśasicatiyatijanīnām upasaṅkhyānam iti vaktavyam . taki takyam :

GS24pmbhasuu:13752: siddham jāyāghnaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ patighnī vrṣalī iti . jāyāghnaḥ tilakālakaḥ patighnī
GS24pmbhasuu:13753: pāṇilekhā iti na sidhyati . astu lakṣaṇe kartari iti . katham jāyāghnaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:13754: brāhmaṇaḥ patighnī vrṣalī iti . akāraḥ matvarthīyaḥ . jāyāghnaḥ asmin asti iti saḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:13756: iti . katham jāyāghnaḥ tilakālakaḥ patighnī pāṇilekhā iti . amanuṣyakartṛke iti evam bhaviṣyati .

GS24pmbhasuu:13780: 240-241 kimartham khiṣṇuc ikārādiḥ kriyate na ksnuḥ iti eva ucyeta . tatra ayam api
GS24pmbhasuu:13781: arthaḥ . svarārthaḥ cakāraḥ na kartavyaḥ bhavati . kena idānīm ikārāditvam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:13782: . iṣṇucaḥ ikārāditvam udāttatvāt kṛtam bhuvaḥ . bhavateḥ udāttatvāt ikārāditvam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:13783: . idam tarhi prayojanam . khit ayam kriyate . tatra cartve kṛte syāt . kit vā khit
GS24pmbhasuu:13784: vā iti . sandehamātram etat bhavati . sarvasandeheṣu ca idam upatiṣṭhate . vyākhyānataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13785: viśeṣapratipattiḥ . na hi sandehāt alakṣaṇam iti . khit iti vyākhyāsyāmaḥ . nañaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13786: tu svarasiddhyartham ikārāditvam iṣṇucaḥ . idam tarhi prayojanam . kṛtyokeṣṇuccārvādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13787: ca iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ yathā syāt . etat api na asti prayojanam . ayam api iṭi kṛte ṣatve
GS24pmbhasuu:13788: ca iṣṇuc bhaviṣyati . na sidhyati . lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya eva iti
GS24pmbhasuu:13789: . atha vā asiddham khalu api ṣatvam . ṣatvasya asiddhatvāt isnuc eva bhavati . iṣṇucaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13790: ikārāditvam udāttatvāt kṛtam bhuvaḥ . nañaḥ tu svarasiddhyartham ikārāditvam iṣṇucaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13792: 241-242 kimarthaḥ nakāraḥ . ñniti iti ādyudāttatvam yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:13793: . ekācaḥ ayam vidhīyate . tatra na arthaḥ svarārthena nakāreṇa anubandhena . dhātusvareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:13794: eva siddham . yaḥ tarhi anekāc . dadhṛk iti . vakṣyati etat dhṛṣeḥ dvirvacanam antodāttatvam

GS24pmbhasuu:13796: kuḥ iti . kvipratyayasya kuḥ iti ucyamāne sandehaḥ syāt . kviḥ vā eṣaḥ pratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13797: kvip vā iti . sandehamātram etat bhavati . sarvasandeheṣu ca idam upatiṣṭhate . vyākhyānataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13798: viśeṣapratipattiḥ . na hi sandehāt alakṣaṇam iti . kkvipratyayasya iti vyākhyāsyāmaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13800: 242 dadhṛk iti kim nipātyate . dhṛṣeḥ dvirvacanam antodāttatvam ca . dhṛṣeḥ dvirvacanam antodāttatvam ca nipātyate .

GS24pmbhasuu:13825: 245-246 śvetavahādīnāṃ ḍas . śvetavahādīnāṃ ḍas vaktavyaḥ . śvetavāḥ indraḥ . padasya
GS24pmbhasuu:13826: ca . padasya ca iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . śvetavāhau śvetavāhaḥ . kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:13827: . rvartham . ruḥ yathā syāt . kriyate rvartham nipātanam . avayāḥ śvetavāḥ puroḍāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13828: ca iti . ātaḥ ca rvartham . ukthaśasśabdasya sāmānyena ruḥ siddhaḥ . na tasya nipātanam
GS24pmbhasuu:13829: kriyate . tat na vaktavyam . avaśyam tat vaktavyam dīrghārtham . na etat asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:13830: . siddham atra dīrghatvam atvasantasya ca adhātoḥ iti . yatra tena na sidhyati tadartham
GS24pmbhasuu:13831: . kva ca tena na sidhyati . sambuddhau . he śvetavāḥ iti . na tarhi idānīm ḍas vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13832: . vaktavyaḥ ca . kim prayojanam . uttarāṛtham . śvetavobhyām śvetavobhiḥ .

GS24pmbhasuu:13835: ca ātaḥ anupasarge kaḥ iti . na sidhyati . viśeṣvihitaḥ kaḥ sāmānyavihitam kvipam
GS24pmbhasuu:13836: bādhate. vāsarūpeṇa kvip api bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi śaṃsthaḥ śaṃsthāḥ . uktam etat

GS24pmbhasuu:13838: eva ac ṭam bādhate evam kakvipau api bādheta .

GS24pmbhasuu:13842: . ṇinvidhau sādhukāriṇi upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . sādhukārī sādhudāyī . brahmaṇi

GS24pmbhasuu:13845: 247-248 kim udāharaṇam . aśrāddhabhojī . kim yaḥ aśrāddham bhuṅkte saḥ aśrāddhabhojī . kim ca ataḥ . yadā asau aśrāddham na bhuṅkte tadā asya vratalopaḥ syāt . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:13846: sthāyī yadā na tiṣthati tadā asya vratalopaḥ bhavati . evam tarhi ṇinyantena samāsaḥ bhaviṣyati :
GS24pmbhasuu:13847: na śrāddhabhojī aśrāddhabhojī . na evam śakyam . svare hi doṣaḥ syāt . aśrāddhabhojī
GS24pmbhasuu:13848: iti evam svaraḥ prasajyeta . aśrāddhabhojī iti ca iṣyate . evam tarhi nañaḥ eva ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:13850: na bhojī śrāddhasya iti . saḥ tarhi asamarthasamāsaḥ vaktavyaḥ . yadi api vaktavyaḥ
