GS24pmbhasuu:14004: . pāsyāmaḥ payaḥ . śayiṣyāmahe pūtīkatṛṇeṣu . kim kāraṇam . bhūtabhaviṣyatoḥ aviśeṣavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:14005: . bhūtabhaviṣyatoḥ aviśeṣeṇa vidhīyete luṅlṛṭau . tayoḥ viśeṣavihitau lanluṭau apavādau
GS24pmbhasuu:14006: prāpnutaḥ . na vā apavādasya nimittābhāvāt anadyatane hi tayoḥ vidhānam . na vā eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14007: doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . apavādasya nimittābhāvāt . na atra apavādasya nimittam asti
GS24pmbhasuu:14008: . kim kāraṇam . anadyatane hi tayoḥ vidhānam . anadyatane hi tau vidhīyete laṅluṭau
GS24pmbhasuu:14009: . na ca atra anadyatanaḥ kālaḥ vivakṣitaḥ . kim tarhi . bhūtakālasāmānyam bhaviṣyatkālasāmānyam
GS24pmbhasuu:14010: ca . yadi api tāvat atra etat śakyate vaktum gamiṣyāmaḥ ghoṣān pāsyāmaḥ payaḥ śayiṣyāmahe
GS24pmbhasuu:14011: pūtīkatṛṇeṣu iti yatra etat na jñāyate kim kadā iti . iha tu katham agāma ghoṣān
GS24pmbhasuu:14012: apāma payaḥ aśayiṣmahi pūtīkatṛṇeṣu yatra etat nirjñātam bhavati amuṣmin ahani gatam
GS24pmbhasuu:14013: iti . atra api na vā apavādasya nimittābhāvāt anadyatane hi tayoḥ vidhānam iti eva
GS24pmbhasuu:14014: . katham punaḥ sataḥ nāma avivakṣā syāt . sataḥ api avivakṣā bhavati . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:14015: . alomikā eḍakā . anudarā kanyā . asataḥ ca vivakṣā bhavati . tat yathā . samudraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14018: 268 vaseḥ luṅ rātriśeṣe . vaseḥ luṅ rātriśeṣe vaktavyaḥ . nyāyye pratyutthāne pratyutthitam
GS24pmbhasuu:14019: kaḥ cit kam cit pṛcchati . kva bhavān uṣitaḥ iti . saḥ āha . amutra avātsam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14020: amutra avasam iti prāpnoti . jāgaraṇasantatau . jāgaraṇasantatau iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:14021: yaḥ hi muhūrtamātram api svapiti tatra amutra avasam iti eva bhavitavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:14023: 268-269 anadyatane iti bahuvrīhinirdeśaḥ adya hyaḥ abhukṣmahi iti . anadyatane iti
GS24pmbhasuu:14024: bahuvrīhinirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . avidyamānādyatane anadyatane iti . kim prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:14025: adya hyaḥ abhukṣmahi iti . adya ca hyaḥ ca abhukṣmahi iti vyāmiśre luṅ eva yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:14026: syāt . yadi evam adyatane api laṅ prāpnoti . na hi adyatane adyatanaḥ vidyate . adyatane
GS24pmbhasuu:14027: api adyatanaḥ vidyate . katham . vyapadeśivadbhāvena . parokṣe ca lokavijñāte prayoktuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14028: darśanaviṣaye . parokṣe ca lokavijñāte prayoktuḥ darśanaviṣaye laṅ vaktavyaḥ . aruṇat
GS24pmbhasuu:14029: yavanaḥ sāketam . aruṇat yavanaḥ madhamikām . parokṣe iti kimartham . udagāt ādityaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14030: . lokavijñate iti kimartham . cakāra kaṭam devadattaḥ . prayoktuḥ darśanaviṣaye iti
GS24pmbhasuu:14033: 269-270 kim udāharaṇam . tatra saktūn pāsyāmaḥ . abhijānāsi devadatta tatra saktūn
GS24pmbhasuu:14034: apibāma . bhavet pūrvam param ākāṅkṣati iti sākāṅkṣam syāt . param tu katham sākāṅkṣam
GS24pmbhasuu:14035: . param api sākāṅkṣam . katham asti asmin ākāṅkṣā iti ataḥ sākāṅkṣam . vibhāṣā sākāṅkṣe
GS24pmbhasuu:14036: sarvatra . vibhāṣā sākāṅkṣe sarvatra iti vaktavyam . kva sarvatra . yadi ca ayadi
GS24pmbhasuu:14037: ca . yadi tāvat . abhijānāsi devadatta yat kaśmīrān gamiṣyāmaḥ yat kaśmīrān agacchāma
GS24pmbhasuu:14038: yat tatra odanam bhokṣyāmahe yat tatra odanam abhuñjmahi . abhijānāsi devadatta kaśmīrān
GS24pmbhasuu:14039: gamiṣyāmaḥ kaśmīrān agacchāma tatra odanam bhokṣyāmahe tatra odanam abhuñjmahi .
GS24pmbhasuu:14041: 270-271 parokṣe iti ucyate . kim parokṣam nāma . param akṣṇaḥ parokṣam . akṣi punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14042: kim . aśnoteḥ ayam auṇādikaḥ karaṇasādhanaḥ si pratyayaḥ . anute anena iti akṣi .
GS24pmbhasuu:14043: yadi evam parākṣam iti prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . parobhāvaḥ parasya akṣe parokṣe
GS24pmbhasuu:14044: liṭi dṛśyatām . paraśabdasya akṣaśabde uttarapade parobhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . utvam vā
GS24pmbhasuu:14045: ādeḥ parāt akṣṇaḥ .atha vā paraśabdāt uttarasya akṣiśabdasya utvam vaktavyam . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:14048: 271-273 kasmin punaḥ parokṣe . kāle . na vai kālādhikāraḥ asti . evam tarhi dhātoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14049: iti vartate . dhātau parokṣe . dhātuḥ vai śabdaḥ . na ca śabdasya pratyakṣaparokṣatāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:14050: sambhavaḥ asti . śabde asambhavāt arthe kāryam vijñāsyate . parokṣe dhātau parokṣe
GS24pmbhasuu:14051: dhātvarthe iti . kaḥ punaḥ dhātvarthaḥ . kriyā . kriyāyām parokṣāyām . yadi evam
GS24pmbhasuu:14052: hyaḥ apacat iti atra api liṭ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . kriyā nāma iyam atyantāparidṛṣṭā
GS24pmbhasuu:14053: anumānagamyā aśakyā piṇḍībhūtā nidarśayitum yathā garbhaḥ nirluṭhitaḥ . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:14054: sādhaneṣu parokṣeṣu . sādhaneṣu ca bhavataḥ kaḥ sampratyayaḥ . yadi sāvad guṇasamudāyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14055: sādhanam sādhanam api anumānagamyam . atha anyat guṇebhyaḥ sādhanam bhavati prtayakṣaparokṣatāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:14056: sambhavaḥ . atha yadā anena rathyāyām taṇḍulodakam dṛṣṭam katham tatra bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:14057: . yadi tāvat sādhaneṣu parokṣeṣu papāca iti bhavitavyam . bhavanti hi tasya sādhanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:14058: parokṣāṇi . atha ye ete kriyākṛtāḥ viśeṣāḥ cītkārāḥ phūtkārāḥ ca teṣu parokṣeṣu evam
GS24pmbhasuu:14059: api papāca iti bhavitavyam . kathañjātīyakam punaḥ parokṣam nāma . ke cit tāvat āhuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14060: . varṣaśatavṛttam parokṣam iti . apare āhuḥ . kaṭāntaritam parokṣam iti . apare āhūḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14061: . dvyahavṛttam tryahvṛttam ca iti . sarvathā uttamaḥ na sidhyati . suptamattoyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14062: iti vaktavyam . suptaḥ aham kila vilalāpa . mattaḥ aham kila vilalāpa . suptaḥ nu
GS24pmbhasuu:14063: aham kila vilalāpa . mattaḥ nu aham kila vilalāpa . atha vā bhavati vai kaḥ cit jāgarat
GS24pmbhasuu:14064: api vartamānakālam na upalabhate . tat yathā vaiyākaraṇānām śākaṭāyanaḥ rathamārge
GS24pmbhasuu:14065: āsīnaḥ śakaṭasāṛtham yāntam na upalabhate . kim punaḥ kāraṇam jāgarat api vartamānakālam
GS24pmbhasuu:14066: na upalabhate . manasā saṃyuktāni indriyāṇi upalabdhau kāraṇāni bhavanti . manasaḥ asānnidhyāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:14068: 274 parokṣe liṭ atyantāapahnave ca . parokṣe liṭ iti atra atyantāapahnave ca iti
GS24pmbhasuu:14069: vaktavyam . no khaṇḍikān jagāma no kaliṅgān jagāma . na kārisomam prapau . na dārvajasya
GS24pmbhasuu:14070: pratijagrāha . kaḥ me manuṣyaḥ praharet vadhāya . parobhāvaḥ parasya akṣe parokṣe
GS24pmbhasuu:14071: liṭi dṛśyatām . utvam vā ādeḥ parāt akṣṇaḥ . siddham vā asmāt nipātanāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:14073: 275-278 sma purā bhūtamātre na sma purā adyatane . sma purā bhūtamātre na sma purā
GS24pmbhasuu:14074: adyatane iti vaktavyam . kim ayam smādividhiḥ purāntaḥ aviśeṣeṇa bhūtamātre bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:14075: . tatra vaktavyam smalakṣaṇaḥ purālakṣaṇaḥ ca adyatane na bhavataḥ iti . āhosvit
GS24pmbhasuu:14076: smalakṣaṇaḥ purālakṣaṇaḥ ca aviśeṣeṇa bhūtamātre bhavataḥ iti . tatra smādyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:14077: na sma purā adyatane iti vaktavyam . kim ca ataḥ . smādividhiḥ purāntaḥ yadi aviśeṣeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:14078: kim kṛtam bhavati na sma purā adyatane iti bruvatā kātyāyanena iha . smādividhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14079: purāntaḥ yadi aviśeṣeṇa bhavati kim vārttikakāraḥ pratiṣedhena karoti na sma purā
GS24pmbhasuu:14080: adyatane iti . anuvṛttiḥ anadyatanasya lāt sme iti tatra na asti nañkāryam . laṭ
GS24pmbhasuu:14081: sme iti atra anadyatane iti etat anuvartiṣyate . aparokṣānadyatanaḥ nanau ca nanvoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14082: ca nivṛttau na purā adyatane iti bhavet etat vācyam . tatra etāvat vaktavyam syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:14083: na purā adyatane iti . tatra ca api laṅgrahaṇam . tatra ca api laṅgrahaṇam jñapakam
GS24pmbhasuu:14084: na purālakṣaṇaḥ adyatane bhavati iti . atha buddhiḥ aviśeṣād sma purā hetū . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:14085: buddhiḥ aviśeṣeṇa sma purā hetū iti . tatra ca api śrṇu bhūyaḥ . aparokṣe ce iti
GS24pmbhasuu:14086: eṣaḥ prāk purisaṃśabdanāt avinivṛttaḥ sarvatra anadyatanaḥ . tathā sati nañā kim
GS24pmbhasuu:14087: iha kāryam . smādau aparokṣe ca iti akāryam iti śakyam etat api viddhi . śakyam hi
GS24pmbhasuu:14088: nivartayitum parokṣe iti lāt sme iti atra . syāt eṣā tava buddhiḥ . smalakṣaṇe api
GS24pmbhasuu:14089: evam eva siddham iti . laṭ sme iti bhavet na arthaḥ . tasmāt kāryam parārtham tu
GS24pmbhasuu:14090: . evam tarhi jñāpayati ācāryaḥ smalakṣaṇaḥ purālakṣaṇaḥ ca anadyatane bhavataḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14092: 278 nanau pṛṣṭaprativacane iti aśiṣyam kriyāsamāpteḥ vivakṣitatvāt . nanau pṛṣṭaprativacane
GS24pmbhasuu:14093: iti aśiṣyaḥ laṭ . kim kāraṇam . kriyāsamāpteḥ vivakṣitatvāt . kriyāyāḥ atra asamāptiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14094: vivakṣitā . eṣaḥ nāma nyāyyaḥ vartamānaḥ kālaḥ yatra kriyāyāḥ asamāptiḥ bhavat .
GS24pmbhasuu:14095: tatra vartamāne laṭ iti eva siddham . yadi vartamāne laṭ iti eva laṭ bhavati śatṛśānacau
GS24pmbhasuu:14097: nanu mām kurvantam paśya . nanu mām kurvāṇam paśya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14099: 278-279 haśaśvadbhyām purā . haśaśvallakṣaṇāt purālakṣaṇaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:14100: . haśaśvallakṣaṇasya avakāśaḥ . iti ha akarot . iha ha cakāra . śaśvat akarot . śaśvat
GS24pmbhasuu:14101: cakāra . purālakṣaṇasya avakāśaḥ . rathena ayam purā yāti . rathena ayam purā ayāsīt
GS24pmbhasuu:14102: . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . rathena ha śaśvat purā yāti . rathena ha śaśvat purā ayāsīt
GS24pmbhasuu:14103: . purālakṣaṇaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . smaḥ sarvebhyaḥ vipratiṣedhena . smalakṣaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14104: sarvebhyaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . haśaśvallakṣaṇāt purālakṣaṇāt ca . haśaśvallakṣaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:14105: avakāśaḥ . iti ha akarot . iha ha cakāra . śaśvat akarot . śaśvat cakāra . purālakṣaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:14106: avakāśaḥ . rathena ayam purā yāti . rathena ayam purā ayāsīt . smalakṣaṇasya avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14107: . dharmeṇa sma kuravaḥ yudhyante . iha sarvam prāpnoti . na ha sma vai purā śaśvat
GS24pmbhasuu:14108: aparaśuvṛkṇam dahati . smalakṣaṇaḥ laṭ bhavati vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:14110: 279-285 pravṛttasya avirāme śiṣyā bhavantī avartamānatvāt . pravṛttasya avirāme śiṣyā
GS24pmbhasuu:14111: bhavantī . iha adhīmahe . iha vasāmaḥ . iha puṣyamitram yājayāmaḥ . kim punaḥ kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:14112: na sidhyati . avartamānatvāt . nityapravṛtte ca kālāvibhāgāt . nityapravṛtte ca śāsitavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:14113: bhavantī . tiṣṭhanti parvatāḥ . sravanti nadyaḥ iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:14114: . kālāvibhāgāt . iha bhūtabhaviṣyatpratidvandvaḥ vartamānaḥ kālaḥ . na ca atra bhūtabhaviṣyantau
GS24pmbhasuu:14115: kālau staḥ . nyāyyā tu ārambhānapavargāt . nyāyyā tu eṣā vartamānakālatā . kutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14116: . ārambhānapavargāt . ārambhaḥ atra anapavṛktaḥ . eṣaḥ nām nyāyyaḥ vartamānaḥ kālaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14117: yatra ārambhaḥ anapavṛktaḥ . asti ca muktasaṃśaye virāmaḥ . yam khalu api bhavān
GS24pmbhasuu:14118: muktasaṃśayam vartamānam kālam nyāyyam manyate bhuṅkte devadattaḥ iti tena etat tulyam
GS24pmbhasuu:14119: . saḥ api hi avaśyam bhuñjānaḥ hasati vā jalpati vā pānīyam vā pibati . yadi atra
GS24pmbhasuu:14120: yuktā vartamānakālatā dṛśyate iha api yuktā dṛśyatām . santi ca kālavibhāgāḥ . santi
GS24pmbhasuu:14121: khalu api kālavibhāgāḥ . tiṣṭhanti parvatāḥ . sthāsyanti parvatāḥ . tasthuḥ parvatāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14122: . kim śakyante ete śabdāḥ prayoktum iti ataḥ santi kālavibhāgāḥ . na avaśyam prayogāt
GS24pmbhasuu:14123: eva . iha bhūtabhaviṣyadvartamānānām rājñām yāḥ kriyāḥ tāḥ tiṣṭhateḥ adhikaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:14124: . iha tāvat tiṣṭhanti parvatāḥ iti . samprati ye rājānaḥ teṣām yāḥ kriyāḥ tāsu vartamānāsu
GS24pmbhasuu:14125: . sthāsyanti parvatāḥ iti . itaḥ uttaram ye rājānaḥ bhaviṣyanti teṣām yāḥ kriyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14126: tāsu bhaviṣyantīṣu . tasthuḥ parvatāḥ iti . ye rājānaḥ babhūvuḥ teṣām yāḥ kriyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14128: na asti vartamānaḥ kālaḥ iti . api ca atra ślokān udāharanti :
GS24pmbhasuu:14129: na vartate cakram . iṣuḥ na pātyate . na syandante saritaḥ sāgarāya . kūṭasthaḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:14130: lokaḥ na viceṣṭā asti . yaḥ hi evam paśyati saḥ api anandhaḥ . mīmāṃsakaḥ manyamānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14131: yuvā medhāvisammataḥ kākam sma iha anupṛcchati :
GS24pmbhasuu:14132: kim te patitalakṣaṇam . anāgate na patasi atikrānte ca kāka na . yadi samprati patasi
GS24pmbhasuu:14133: sarvaḥ lokaḥ patati ayam . himavān api gacchati . anāgatam atikrāntam vartamānam
GS24pmbhasuu:14134: iti trayam . sarvatra gatiḥ na asti . gacchati iti kim ucyate . kriyāpravṛttau yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14135: hetuḥ tadartham yat viceṣṭitam tat samīkṣya prayuñjīta gacchati iti avicārayan .
GS24pmbhasuu:14136: apraḥ āha . asti vartamānaḥ kālaḥ iti . ādityagativat na upalabhyate . api ca atra
GS24pmbhasuu:14137: ślokam udāharanti . bisasya vālāḥ iva dahyamānāḥ na lakṣyate vikṛtiḥ sannipāte .
GS24pmbhasuu:14138: asti iti tām vedayante tribhabhāvāḥ . sūkṣmaḥ hi bhāvaḥ anumitena gamyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:14140: 286-288 lasya aprathamāsamānādhikaraṇena ayogāt adeśānupapattiḥ yathā anyatra . lasya
GS24pmbhasuu:14141: aprathamāsamānādhikaraṇena ayogāt adeśayoḥ nupapattiḥ yathā anyatra . tat yathā anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:14142: api lasya aprathamāsamānādhikaraṇena yogaḥ na bhavati . kva anyatra . laṅi . apacat
GS24pmbhasuu:14143: odanam devadattaḥ iti . yogaḥ iti cet anyatra api yogaḥ syāt . atha matam etat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:14144: yogaḥ iti anyatra api yogaḥ syāt . kva anyatra . laṅi . apacat odanam devadattaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14145: iti . na kva cit yogaḥ iti kṛtvā ataḥ sarvatra yogena bhavitavyam kva cit ayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14146: iti kṛtvā sarvatra ayogena . tat yathā . samānam īhamānānām ca adhīyānānām ca ke
GS24pmbhasuu:14147: cit arthaiḥ yujyante apare na . na ca idānīm kaḥ cit arthavān iti ataḥ sarvaiḥ arthavadbhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14148: śakyam bhavitum kaḥ cit anarthakaḥ iti sarvaiḥ anarthakaiḥ . tatra kim asmābhiḥ śakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:14149: kartum . yat loṭaḥ aprathamāsamānādhikaraṇena yogaḥ bhavati laṅaḥ na svābhāvikam
GS24pmbhasuu:14150: etat . atha vā ādeśe sāmānādhikaraṇyam dṛṣṭvā anumānāt gantavyam prakṛteḥ api sāmānādhikaraṇyam
GS24pmbhasuu:14151: bhavati iti . tat yathā dhūmam dṛṣṭvā agniḥ atra iti gamyate triviṣṭabdhakam dṛṣṭvā
GS24pmbhasuu:14152: parivrājakaḥ iti . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . pratyakṣaḥ tena agnidhūmayoḥ abhisambandhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14153: kṛtaḥ bhavati triviṣṭabdhakaparivrājakayoḥ ca . saḥ tadvideśastham api dṛṣṭvā jānāti
GS24pmbhasuu:14154: agniḥ atra parivrājakaḥ atra iti . bhavati vai pratyakṣāt api anumānabalīyastvam
GS24pmbhasuu:14155: . tat yathā alātacakram pratyakṣam dṛśyate anumānāt ca gamyate na etat asti iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14156: kasya cit khalu api sakṛt kṛtaḥ abhisambandhaḥ atyantāya kṛtaḥ bhavati . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:14157: vṛkṣaparṇayoḥ ayam vṛkṣaḥ idam parṇam iti . saḥ tadvideśastham api dṛṣṭvā jānāti
GS24pmbhasuu:14163: prathamāsamānādhikaraṇe na iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . laṭaḥ śatṛśānacau aprathamāsamānādhikaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:14164: iti cet pratyayottarapadayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam . laṭaḥ śatṛśānacau aprathamāsamānādhikaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:14165: iti cet pratyayottarapadayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . kaurvataḥ pācataḥ kurvadbhaktiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14166: pacadbhaktiḥ kurvāṇabhaktiḥ pacamānabhaktiḥ . astu tarhi prasajyapratiṣedhaḥ .prathamāsamānādhikaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:14168: ādeśayoḥ anupapattiḥ . kurvatī ca asau bhaktiḥ ca kurvadbhaktiḥ pacabhaktiḥ kurvāṇabhaktiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14169: pacamānabhaktiḥ iti . ye ca api ete samānādhikaraṇavṛttayaḥ taddhitāḥ tatra ca śatṛśānacau
GS24pmbhasuu:14170: na prāpnutaḥ . kurvattaraḥ pacattaraḥ kurvāṇataraḥ pacamānataraḥ kurvadrūpaḥ pacadrūpaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14171: kurvāṇarūpaḥ pacamānarūpaḥ kurvatkalpaḥ pacatkalpaḥ kurvāṇakalpaḥ pacamānakalpaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14172: iti . siddham tu pratyayottarapadayoḥ ca iti vacanāt . siddham etat . katham . pratyayottarapadayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14173: ca śatṛśānacau bhavataḥ iti vaktavyam . tatra pratyayasya ādeśanimittatvāt aprasiddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14174: . tatra pratyayasya ādeśanimittatvāt aprasiddhiḥ . ādeśanimittaḥ pratyayaḥ pratyayanimittaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14175: ca ādeśaḥ . tat etat itaretarāśrayam bhavati . itaretarāśrayāṇi ca na praklpante
GS24pmbhasuu:14176: . uttarapadasya ca subantanimittatvāt śatṛśānacoḥ aprasiddhiḥ . uttarapadasya ca
GS24pmbhasuu:14177: subantanimittatvāt śatṛśānacoḥ aprasiddhiḥ . uttarapadanimittaḥ sup subantanimittam
GS24pmbhasuu:14178: ca uttarapadam . tat etat itaretarāśrayam bhavati . itaretarāśrayāṇi ca na praklpante
GS24pmbhasuu:14179: . na vā lakārasya kṛttvāt prātipadikatvam tadāśrayam pratyayavidhānam . na vā eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14180: doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . lakārasya kṛttvāt prātipadikatvam . lakāraḥ kṛt kṛt prātipadikam
GS24pmbhasuu:14181: iti prātipadikasañjñā . tadāśrayam pratyayavidhānam . prātipadikāśrayā svādyutpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14182: bhaviṣyati . tiṅādeśāt subutpattiḥ . tiṅādeśaḥ kriyatām subutpattiḥ iti paratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:14183: subutpattiḥ bhaviṣyati . tasmāt uttarapadaprasiddhiḥ . tasmāt uttarapadam prasiddham
GS24pmbhasuu:14184: . uttarapade prasiddhe uttarapade iti śatṛśānacau bhaviṣyataḥ . iha api tarhi tiṅādeśāt
GS24pmbhasuu:14185: subutpattiḥ syāt pacati paṭhati iti . asti atra viśeṣaḥ . nityaḥ atra tiṅādeśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:14186: utpanne api supi prāpnoti anutpanne api prāpnoti . nityatvāt tiṅādeśe kṛte subutpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14187: na bhaviṣyati . iha api tarhi nityatvāt tiṅādeśaḥ syāt kurvadbhaktiḥ pacadbhaktiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14188: pacamānabhaktiḥ iti . asti atra viśeṣaḥ . śatṛśānacau tiṅapavādau tau ca nimittavantau
GS24pmbhasuu:14189: . na ca apavādaviṣaye utsargaḥ abhiniviśate . pūrvam hi apavādāḥ abhiniviśante paścāt
GS24pmbhasuu:14190: utsargaḥ . prakalpya vā apavādaviṣayam tataḥ utsargaḥ abhiniviśate . na tāvat atra
GS24pmbhasuu:14191: kadā cit tiṅ bhavati . apavādau śatṛśānacau pratīkṣate . tat etat kva siddham bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:14192: . yatra sāmānyāt utpattiḥ . yatra hi viśeṣāt ataḥ iñ iti itaretarāśrayam eva tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:14193: bhavati . vīkṣamāṇasya apatyam vaikṣamāṇiḥ iti . iha ca śatṛśānacau prāpnutaḥ . pacatitarām
GS24pmbhasuu:14194: jalpatitarām pacatirūpam jalpatirūpam pacatikalpam jalpatikalpam pacati paṭhati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:14195: . tat etat katham kṛtvā siddham bhavati . śatṛśānacau yadi laṭaḥ vā . yadi śatṛśānacau
GS24pmbhasuu:14196: yadi laṭaḥ vā bhavataḥ vyavasthitavibhāṣā ca . tena iha ca bhaviṣyataḥ kaurvataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14197: pācataḥ kurvadbhaktiḥ pacadbhaktiḥ pacamānabhaktiḥ kurvattaraḥ pacattaraḥ pacamānataraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14198: kurvadrūpaḥ pacadrūpaḥ pacamānarūpaḥ kurvatkalpaḥ pacatkalpaḥ pacamānakalpaḥ pacan
GS24pmbhasuu:14199: paṭhan iti ca laṭaḥ śatṛśānacau . iha ca na bhaviṣyataḥ pacatitarām jalpatitarām
GS24pmbhasuu:14200: pacatirūpam jalpatirūpam pacatikalpam jalpatikalpam pacati paṭhati iti ca laṭaḥ śatṛśānacau
GS24pmbhasuu:14201: . tat tarhi vāvacanam kartavyam . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:14202: . nanvoḥ vibhāṣā iti . yadi tat anuvartate vartamāne laṭa iti laṭ api vibhāṣā prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:14203: . sambandham anuvartiṣyate . nanvoḥ vibhāṣā . puri luṅ ca asme vibhāṣā . vartamāne laṭ
GS24pmbhasuu:14204: puri luṅ ca asme vibhāṣā . laṭaḥ śatṛśānacau vibhāṣā . puri luṅ ca asme iti nivṛttam
GS24pmbhasuu:14205: . na tarhi idānīm aprathamāsamānādhikaraṇe iti vaktavyam . vaktavyam ca . kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:14206: . nityāṛtham . aprathamāsamānādhikaraṇe nityau yathā syātām . kva tarhi idānīm vibhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:14207: . prathamāsamānādhikaraṇe . pacan pacati pacamānaḥ pacate iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14209: 292-294 lakṣaṇahetvoḥ kriyāyāḥ guṇe upasaṅkhyānam . lakṣaṇahetvoḥ kriyāyāḥ guṇe upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:14210: kartavyam . tiṣṭhan mūtrayati . gacchan bhakṣayati . kartuḥ ca lakṣaṇayoḥ paryāyeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:14211: acayoge . kartuḥ ca lakṣaṇayoḥ paryāyeṇa acayoge upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . yaḥ adhīyānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14212: āste saḥ devadatttaḥ . yaḥ āsīnaḥ adhīte saḥ devadattaḥ . acayoge iti kimartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:14213: yaḥ āste ca adhīte ca saḥ caitraḥ . tattvānvākhyāne ca . tattvānvākhyāne ca upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:14214: kartavyam . śayānā vardhate dūrvā . āsīnam vardhate bisam iti . sadādayaḥ ca bahulam
GS24pmbhasuu:14215: . sadādayaḥ ca bahulam iti vaktavyam . san brāhmaṇaḥ asti brāhmaṇaḥ . vidyate brāhmaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14216: vidyamānaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ iti . iṅjuhotyoḥ vāvacanam . iṅjuhotyoḥ vā iti vaktavyam . adhīte
GS24pmbhasuu:14217: adhīyānaḥ . juhoti juhvat . māṅi ākrośe . māṅi ākrośe iti vaktavyam . mā pacan .
GS24pmbhasuu:14218: mā pacamānaḥ . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . lakṣaṇahetvoḥ kriyāyāḥ iti eva
GS24pmbhasuu:14219: siddham . iha tāvat tiṣṭhan mūtrayati iti . tiṣṭhatikriyā mūtrayatikriyāyāḥ lakṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:14220: . gacchan bhakṣayati iti . gacchatikriyā bhakṣayatikriyāyāḥ lakṣaṇam . yaḥ adhīyānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14221: āste saḥ devadatttaḥ iti . adhyayanakriyā āsanakriyāyāḥ lakṣaṇam . yaḥ āsīnaḥ adhīte
GS24pmbhasuu:14222: saḥ devadattaḥ iti . āsikriyā adhyayanakriyāyāḥ lakṣaṇam . idam tarhi prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:14223: . acayoge iti vakṣyāmi iti . iha mā bhūt . yaḥ āste ca adhīte ca saḥ caitraḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:14224: . etat api na asti prayojanam . na etat kriyāyāḥ lakṣaṇam . kim tarhi . kartṛlakṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:14225: etat . śayānā vardhate dūrvā iti . śetikriyā vṛddhikriyāyāḥ lakṣaṇam . āsīnam vardhate
GS24pmbhasuu:14226: bisam iti . āsikriyā vṛddhikriyāyāḥ lakṣaṇam . sadādayaḥ ca bahulam iṅjuhotyoḥ vā
GS24pmbhasuu:14229: 294-296 taugrahaṇam kimartham . śatṛśānacau pratinirdiśyete . na etat asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:14230: . prakṛtau śatṛśānacau anuvartiṣyete . kva prakṛtau . laṭaḥ śatṛsānacau aprathamāsamānādhikaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:14231: iti . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . tau sat iti vacanam asaṃsargārtham ṭau grahaṇam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:14232: asaṃsargārtham . asaṃsaktayoḥ etaiḥ viśeṣaiḥ śatṛśānacoḥ sañjñā yathā syāt . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:14233: ca ete viśeṣāḥ nivarteran . yadi api ete viśeṣāḥ nivartante ayam tu khalu vartamānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14234: kālaḥ avaśyam uttarārthaḥ anuvartyaḥ . tasmin anuvartamāne vartamānakālavihitayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14235: eva śatṛśānacoḥ satsñjñā syāt . bhūtabhaviṣyakālavihitayoḥ na syāt . kim punaḥ bhūtabhaviṣyakālavihitayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14236: satsñjñāvacane prayojanam . pūraṇaguṇasuhitasat iti . brāhmaṇasya pakṣyan . brāhmaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:14237: pakṣyamāṇaḥ . atha kriyamāṇe api taugrahaṇe katham eva asaṃsaktayoḥ etaiḥ viśeṣaiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14238: sañjñā labhyā . labhyā iti āha . katham . tau iti śabdataḥ sat iti yoge kriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:14239: tau grahaṇam yogāṅgam jāyate . sati ca yogāṅge yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . tau . tau
GS24pmbhasuu:14240: etau śatṛśānacau dhātumātrāt parasya pratyayasya bhavataḥ . tataḥ sat . satsñjñau
GS24pmbhasuu:14241: bhavatau śatṛśānacau . iha api tarhi prāpnutaḥ . kārakaḥ hārakaḥ iti . avadhāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:14242: lṛṭi vidhānam . lṛtaḥ sat vā iti etat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . lṛṭaḥ eva dhātumātrāt
GS24pmbhasuu:14243: parasya na anyasya iti . kaimarthyakyāt niyamaḥ bhavati . vidheyam na asti iti kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:14244: . iha ca asti vidheyam . kim . nityau śatṛśānacau prāptau . tau vibhāṣā vidheyau
GS24pmbhasuu:14245: . tatra apūrvaḥ vidhiḥ astu niyamaḥ astu iti apūrvaḥ eva vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati na niyamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14246: . yogavibhāgataḥ ca vihitam sat . evam tarhi yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . lṛṭaḥ sat .
GS24pmbhasuu:14247: lṛṭaḥ satsañjñau bhavataḥ . kimartham idam . niyamārtham . lṛṭaḥ eva dhātumātrāt
GS24pmbhasuu:14248: parasya na anyasya iti . tataḥ vā . vā ca lṛṭaḥ śatṛśānacau satsañjñau bhavataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:14249: tatra ayam api arthaḥ . sadvidhiḥ nityam aprathamāsamānādhikaraṇe iti vakṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:14252: 296-297 atha yau etau uttarau śatānau kim etau lādeśau āhosvit alādeśau . kaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:14253: atra viśeṣaḥ . uttarayoḥ lādeśe vāvacanam . uttarayoḥ lādeśe vā iti vaktavyam . pavamānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14254: yajamānaḥ . pavate yajate iti api yathā syāt . sādhanābhidhānam . sādhanābhidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:14255: ca prāpnoti . laḥ karmaṇi ca bhāve ca akarmakebhyaḥ iti bhāvakarmaṇoḥ api prāpnutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14256: . svaraḥ . svaraḥ ca sādhyaḥ . kati iha pavamānāḥ . adupadeśāt lasārvadhātukam anudāttam
GS24pmbhasuu:14257: bhavati iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ prāpnoti . upagrahapratiṣedhaḥ ca . upagrahasya ca pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14258: vaktavyaḥ . kati iha nighnānāḥ . taṅānau ātmanepadam iti ātmanepadasañjñā prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:14259: . stām tarhi alādeśau . alādeśe ṣaṣṭhīpratiṣedhaḥ . alādeśe ṣaṣṭhīpratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14260: . somam pavamānaḥ . naḍam āghnānaḥ . adhīyan pārāyaṇam . laprayoge na iti pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14261: na prāpnoti . mā bhūt evam . tṛn iti eva bhaviṣyati . katham . tṛn iti na idam pratyayagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:14262: . kim tarhi . pratyāhāragrahaṇam . kva sanniviṣṭāṇām pratyāhāraḥ . laṭaḥ śatṛ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:14263: ataḥ ārabhya ā tṛnaḥ nakārāt . yadi pratyāhāragrahaṇam caurasya dviṣan vṛṣalasya
GS24pmbhasuu:14264: dviṣan atra api prāpnoti . dviṣaḥ śatuḥ vāvacanam . dviṣaḥ śatuḥ vā iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:14265: . tat ca avaśyam vaktavyam pratyayagrahaṇe sati pratiṣedhārtham . tat eva pratyāhāragrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:14268: 298-300 tṛnvidhau ṛtvikṣu ca anupasargasya . tṛnvidhau ṛtvikṣu ca anupasargasya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:14269: vaktavyam . hotā potā . anupasargasya iti kimartham . praśāstā pratihartā . nayateḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14270: ṣuk ca . nayateḥ ṣuk vaktavyaḥ . tṛn ca pratyayaḥ vaktavyañ. neṣṭā . na vā dhātvanyatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:14271: . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam . dhātvanyatvāt . dhātvantaram neṣatiḥ . katham jñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:14272: . neṣatu neṣṭāt iti darśanāt . neṣatu neṣṭāt iti prayogaḥ dṛśyate . indraḥ naḥ tena
GS24pmbhasuu:14273: neṣatu . gāḥ vaḥ neṣṭāt . tviṣeḥ devatāyām akāraḥ ca upadhāyāḥ aniṭvam ca . tviṣeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14274: devatāyām tṛn vaktavyaḥ akāraḥ ca upadhāyāḥ aniṭvam ca iti . tvaṣṭā . kim punaḥ idam
GS24pmbhasuu:14275: tviṣeḥ eva aniṭvam . na iti āha . yat ca anukrāntam yat ca anukraṃsyate sarvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:14276: eṣaḥ śeṣaḥ aniṭvam iti . kṣadeḥ ca yukte . kṣadeḥ ca yukte tṛn vaktavyaḥ . kṣattā
GS24pmbhasuu:14277: . chandasi tṛc ca . chandasi tṛc ca tṛn ca vaktavyaḥ . kṣattṛbhyaḥ saṅgrahītṛbhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14280: 299-300 snoḥ kittve sthaḥ īkārpratiṣedhaḥ . snoḥ kittve sthaḥ īkārpratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14281: . sthāsnuḥ iti . ghumāsthāgāpājahātisām hali iti īttvam prāpnoti . evam tarhi na
GS24pmbhasuu:14282: kit kariṣyate . akiti guṇapratiṣedhaḥ . yadi akit guṇapratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . jiṣṇuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14283: iti . bhuvaḥ iṭpratiṣedhaḥ ca . bhuvaḥ iṭpratiṣedhaḥ ca vaktavyaḥ . kim ca anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:14284: . guṇapratiṣedhaḥ ca . bhūṣṇuḥ iti . astu tarhi kit. nanu ca uktam snoḥ kittve sthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14285: īkārpratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . sthādaṃśibhyām snuḥ chandasi . sthādaṃśibhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:14286: snuḥ chandasi vaktavyaḥ . sthāsnu jaṅgamam . daṅkṣṇavaḥ paśavaḥ iti . saḥ idānīm
GS24pmbhasuu:14287: sthaḥ aviśeṣeṇa vidhāsyate . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam astu. nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:14288: snoḥ kittve sthaḥ īkārpratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ iti . evam tarhi git kariṣyate . sthoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14289: gittvāt na sthaḥ īkāraḥ . sthoḥ gittvāt sthaḥ īkāraḥ na bhaviṣyati . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:14290: . kṅitoḥ īttvaśāsanāt . kṅitoḥ īttvam śiṣyate . iha tarhi jiṣṇuḥ iti guṇaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:14291: . guṇābhāvaḥ triṣu smāryaḥ . guṇābhāvaḥ triṣu smartavyaḥ . giti kiti ṅiti iti . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:14292: gakāragrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . kriyate nyāse eva . kakāre gakāraḥ cartvabhūtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14293: nirdiśyate . kkṅiti ca iti . iha tarhi bhūṣṇuḥ iti śryukaḥ kiti iti iṭpratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14294: na prāpnoti . śryuko aniṭtvam gakoḥ itoḥ . śryukaḥ aniṭtvam gakārakakārayoḥ iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:14295: . tat gakāragrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . kriyate nyāsaḥ eva . kakāre gakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14296: cartvabhūtaḥ nirdiśyate . śryukaḥ kkiti iti . yadi evam cartvasya asiddhatvāt haśi
GS24pmbhasuu:14297: iti uttvam prāpnoti . sautraḥ nirdeśaḥ . atha vā asaṃhitayā nirdeśaḥ kariṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:14298: śryukaḥ kkiti iti . sthoḥ gittvāt na sthaḥ īkāraḥ kṅitoḥ īttvaśāsanāt . guṇābhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14299: triṣu smāryaḥ . śryuko aniṭtvam gakoḥ itoḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:14301: 301 ghinaṇ ayam vaktavyaḥ . ghinuṇi hi sati śaminau śaminaḥ taminau taminaḥ ugidacām
GS24pmbhasuu:14302: sarvanāmasthāne adhātoḥ iti num prasajyeta . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . jhalgrahaṇam tatra codayiṣyati . iha tarhi :
GS24pmbhasuu:14304: ugitaḥ ghādiṣu nadyāḥ anyatarasyām hrasvaḥ bhavati iti anyaratasyām hrasvatvam prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:14305: . iṣyate eva hrasvatvam . ghinuṇ akarmakāṇām . ghinuṇ akarmakāṇām iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:14306: iha mā bhūt . sampṛṇakti śākam iti . uktam vā . kim uktam . anabhidhānāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14308: 301-302 kimartham nindādibhyaḥ vuñ vidhīyate na ṇvulā eva siddham . na hi asti viśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14309: nindādibhyaḥ ṇvulaḥ vā vuñaḥ vā . tat eva rūpam saḥ eva svaraḥ . vuñm anekācaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:14310: vuñm anekācaḥ prayojayanti . asūyakaḥ . atha ye atra ekācaḥ paṭhyante teṣām grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:14311: kimartham na teṣām ṇvulā eva siddham . na sidhyati . ayam tacchīlādiṣu tṛn vidhīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:14312: . saḥ viśeṣavihitaḥ sāmānyavihitam ṇvulam bādheta . vāsarūpanyāyena ṇvul api bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:14313: . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . nindādibhyaḥ vuñvacanam anyebhyaḥ ṇvulaḥ pratiṣedhārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:14314: . nindādibhyaḥ vuñvacanam kriyate jñāpakārtham . kim jñāpyam . etat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:14355: sidhyati . iha ke cit ā kveḥ iti sūtram paṭhanti ke cit prāk kveḥ iti . tatra ye
GS24pmbhasuu:14356: ā kveḥ iti paṭhanti taiḥ kvip api ākṣiptaḥ bhavati . tatra tacchīlādiṣu artheṣu kivp
GS24pmbhasuu:14357: yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . yaḥ eva asau aviśeṣavihitaḥ saḥ tacchīlādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:14358: bhaviṣyati anyatra ca . na sidhyati . ayam tacchīlādiṣu tṛn vidhīyate . saḥ viśeṣavihitaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:14365: . āyatastu . āyatastūḥ . āyatastu . kaṭapru . kaṭaprūḥ . kaṭapru . ju . jūḥ . ju
GS24pmbhasuu:14367: vacipracchyoḥ asamprasāraṇam ca iti vaktavyam . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:14368: . dīrghavacanasāmarthyāt samprasāraṇam na bhaviṣyati . idam iha sampradhāryam . dīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:14369: kriyatām samprasāraṇam iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt samprasāraṇam . antaraṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:14370: dīrghatvam . kā antaraṅgatā . pratyayotpattisanniyogena dīrghatvam ucyate utpanne
GS24pmbhasuu:14371: pratyaye samprasāraṇam . tatra antaraṅgatvāt dīrghatve kṛte samprasāraṇam . prasāraṇaparapūrvatve
GS24pmbhasuu:14372: kṛte kāryakṛtatvāt punaḥ dīrghatvam na syāt . tasmāt suṣṭhu ucyate dīrghavacanasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:14373: samprasāraṇam na bhaviṣyati iti . dyutigamijuhotīnām dve ca . dyutigamijuhotīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:14374: dve ca iti vaktavyam . didyut. dyuti . gami . jagat . gami . juhoti . juhoteḥ dīrghaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14375: ca . juhūḥ . dṛṇāteḥ hrasvaḥ ca dve ca kvip ca iti vaktavyam . dadṛt . juhūḥ juhoteḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:14377: ca . dhāyateḥ samprasāraṇam ca kvip ca vaktavyaḥ . dhīḥ dhyāyateḥ vā dadhāteḥ vā .

GS24pmbhasuu:14381: . dhātuvidheḥ tukaḥ ca pratiṣedhaḥ yathā syāt . mitradruḥ mitadrū mitadravaḥ . aci

GS24pmbhasuu:14383: pratiṣedhaḥ mā bhūt . tugvidhiḥ . mitadruḥ . hrasvasya piti kṛti tuk bhavati iti tuk mā bhūt .

GS24pmbhasuu:14387: āhuḥ . amṛtāḥ pūrvavat smṛtāḥ . na mriyante amṛtāḥ . (3.3.1)
GS24pmbhasuu:14388: KA_II,138.2 - 22 Ro_III.309-312 bahulavacanam kimartham . bāhulakam prakṛteḥ tanudṛṣṭeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14389: . tanvībhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaḥ uṇādayaḥ dṛśyante . na sarvābhyaḥ dṛśyante . prāyasamuccayād
GS24pmbhasuu:14390: api teṣām . prāyeṇa khalu api te samuccitāḥ na sarve samuccitāḥ . kāryasaśeṣavidheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14391: ca tat uktam . kāryāṇi khalu api saśeṣāṇi kṛtāni na sarvāṇi lakṣaṇena parisamāptāni
GS24pmbhasuu:14392: . kim punaḥ kāraṇam tanvībhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaḥ uṇādayaḥ dṛśyante na sarvābhyaḥ dṛśyante
GS24pmbhasuu:14393: . kim ca kāraṇam prāyeṇa samuccitāḥ na sarve samuccitāḥ . kim ca kāraṇam kāryāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:14394: saśeṣāṇi kṛtāni na sarvāṇi lakṣaṇena parisamāptāni . naigamarūḍibhavam hi susādhu
GS24pmbhasuu:14395: . naigamāḥ ca rūḍhibhavāḥ ca auṇādikāḥ susādhavaḥ katham syuḥ . nāma ca dhātujam
GS24pmbhasuu:14396: āha nirukte . nāma khalu api dhātujam . evam āhuḥ nairuktāḥ . vyākaraṇe śakaṭasya
GS24pmbhasuu:14397: ca tokam . vaiyākaraṇānām ca śākaṭāyanaḥ āha dhātujam nāma iti . atha yasya viśeṣapadārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14398: na samuttitaḥ katham tatra bhavitavyam . yat na viśeṣapadārthasamuttam pratyayataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14399: prakṛteḥ ca tat ūhyam . prakṛtim dṛṣṭvā pratyayaḥ ūhitavyaḥ pratyayam ca dṛṣṭvā prakṛtiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14400: ūhitavyā . sañjñāsu dhāturūpāṇi pratyayāḥ ca tataḥ pare kāryāt vidyāt anubandham
GS24pmbhasuu:14403: 312-313 bhaviṣyati iti anadyatane upasaṅkhyānam . bhaviṣyati iti anadyatane upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:14404: kartavyam . śvaḥ grāmam gamī . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . lṛṭā ayam nirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14405: kṛiyate . lṛṭ ca anadyatane luṭā bādhyate . tena lṛṭaḥ eva viṣaye ete pratyayāḥ syuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14406: . luṭaḥ viṣaye na syuḥ . itaretarāśrayam ca . itaretarāśrayam ca bhavati . kā itaretarāśrayatā
GS24pmbhasuu:14407: . bhaviṣyatkālena śabdena nirdeśaḥ kriyate . nirdeśottarakālam ca bhbhaviṣyatkālatā
GS24pmbhasuu:14408: . tat etat itaretarāśrayam bhavati . itaretarāśrayāṇi ca na prakalpante . uktam vā
GS24pmbhasuu:14409: . kim uktam . ekam tāvat uktam na vā apavādasya nimittābhāvāt anadyatane hi tayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14410: vidhānam iti . aparam api uktam avyayanirdeśāt siddham iti. avyayavatā śabdena nirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14411: kariṣyate . avartamāne abhūte iti . saḥ tarhi avyayavatā śabdena nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14412: . na kartavyaḥ . avyayam eṣaḥ bhaviṣyatiśabdaḥ na eṣā bhavateḥ lṛṭ . katham avyayatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:14413: . vibhaktisvarapratirūpakāḥ ca nipātāḥ bhavanti iti nipātasañjñā . nipātam avyayam
GS24pmbhasuu:14414: iti avayayasañjñā . atha api bhavateḥ lṛṭ evam api avayayam eva . katham na vyeti
GS24pmbhasuu:14415: iti avyayam . kva punaḥ na vyeti . etau kālaviśeṣau bhūtavartamānau . svabhāvataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14416: bhaviṣyati eva vartate . yadi tatri na vyeti iti avyayam . na vā tadvidhānasya anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:14417: abhāvāt . na vā bhaviṣyadādhikāreṇa arthaḥ . kim kāraṇam . tadvidhānasya anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:14418: abhāvāt . ye api ete itaḥ uttaram pratyayāḥ śiṣyante ete api etau kālaviśeṣau na
GS24pmbhasuu:14419: viyanti bhūtavartamānau . svabhāvataḥ eva te bhaviṣyati eva vartante . ataḥ uttaram
GS24pmbhasuu:14420: paṭhati . bhaviṣyadadhikārasya prayojanam yāvat pacati purā pacati iti anapaśabdatvāya .
GS24pmbhasuu:14422: 314 yāvatpurādiṣu laḍvidhiḥ luṭaḥ pūrvavipratiṣiddham . yāvatpurādiṣu laḍvidhiḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:14423: luṭaḥ pūrvavipratiṣedhena . yāvatpurānipātayoḥ laṭ bhavati iti asya avakāśaḥ . yāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:14424: bhuṅkte . purā bhuṅkte . luṭaḥ avakāśaḥ . śvaḥ kartā . śvaḥ adhyetā . iha ubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:14425: prāpnoti . yāvat śvaḥ bhuṅkte . purā śvaḥ bhuṅkte . laṭ bhavati vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:14426: saḥ tarhi pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . anadyatane luṭ iti atra yāvatpurānipātayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14429: 314 kimartham idam ucyate na lipsyamānasiddhiḥ api lipsā eva tatra kiṃvṛtte lipsāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:14430: iti eva siddham . akiṃvṛttārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . yaḥ bhavatām odanam dadāti saḥ svargam
GS24pmbhasuu:14431: lokam gacchati . yaḥ bhavatām odanam dāsyati saḥ svargam lokam gamiṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:14433: 314-316 kimartham kriyāyām upapade kriyārthāyām ṇvul vidhīyate na aviśeṣeṇa vihitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14434: ṇvul saḥ kriyāyām upapade kriyārthāyām anyatra ca bhaviṣyati . ṇvuli sakarmakagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:14435: coditam . akaramakārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . āsakaḥ vrajati . śāyakaḥ vrajati . pratyākhyātam
GS24pmbhasuu:14436: tat na vā dhātumātrāt darśanāt ṇvulaḥ iti . evam tarhi tṛjādiṣu vartamānakālopādānam
GS24pmbhasuu:14437: coditam . avartamānakālārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . tat api pratyākhyātam na vā kālamātre
GS24pmbhasuu:14438: darśanāt anyeṣām iti . idam tarhi prayojanam. akenoḥ bhaviṣyadādhamrṇyayoḥ iti atra
GS24pmbhasuu:14439: ṣaṣṭhyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ uktaḥ . saḥ yathā syāt . etat api na asti prayojanam . yaḥ eva
GS24pmbhasuu:14440: asau aviśeṣavihitaḥ saḥ yadā bhaviṣyati bhaviṣyati tadā asya pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:14441: . evam tarhi bhaviṣyadadhikāravihitasya pratiṣedhaḥ yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt :
GS24pmbhasuu:14442: aṅga yajatām . lapsyante asya yājakāḥ . ye enam yājayayiṣyanti iti . na eṣaḥ bhaviṣyatkālaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14443: . kaḥ tarhi . bhūtakālaḥ . katham tarhi bhaviṣyatkālatā gamyate . dhātusambandhe
GS24pmbhasuu:14444: pratyayāḥ iti . yaḥ tarhi na dhātusambandhaḥ . ime asya yājakāḥ . ime asya lāvakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14445: iti . eṣaḥ api bhūtakālaḥ . katham tarhi bhaviṣyatkālatā gamyate . sambandhāt . saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14446: ca tāvat taiḥ ayājitaḥ bhavati . tasya ca tāvat taiḥ yavāḥ alūnāḥ bhavanti . ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:14447: ca . idam tarhi prayojanam . ayam kriyāyām upapde kriyārthāyām tumun vidhīyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:14448: saḥ viśeṣavihitaḥ sāmānyavihitam ṇvulam bādheta . etat api na asti prayojanam . bhāve
GS24pmbhasuu:14449: tumun vidhīyate kartari ṇvul . tatra kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ yat bhāve vihitaḥ tumun kartari
GS24pmbhasuu:14450: vihitam ṇvulam bādheta . lṛṭ tarhi bādheta . vāsarūpeṇa bhaviṣyati . ataḥ uttaram
GS24pmbhasuu:14451: paṭhati . ṇvulaḥ kriyārthopapadasya punarvidhānam tṛjādipratiṣedhārtham . ṇvulaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14452: kriyārthopapadasya punarvidhānam kriyate jñāpakārtham . kim jñāpyam . etat jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:14453: ācāryaḥ kriyāyām upapade kriyārthāyām vāsarūpeṇa tṛjādayaḥ na bhavanti iti . ṇvul api tṛjādiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:14455: 316-317 kimartham idam ucyate na aviśeṣeṇa bhāve pratyayāḥ ye vihitāḥ te kriyāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:14456: upapade kriyārthāyām anyatra ca bhaviṣyanti . bhāvavacanānām yathāvihitānām pratipadavidhyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:14457: . bhāvavacanānām yathāvihitānām pratipadavidhyarthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . idānīm eva hi
GS24pmbhasuu:14458: uktam kriyāyām upapde kriyārthāyām vāsarūpeṇa tṛjādayaḥ na bhavanti iti . bhāvavacanāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14459: ca api tṛjādayaḥ . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . yathāvihitāḥ iti tu vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:14460: . kim prayojanam . iha yābhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaḥ yena viśeṣeṇa bhāve pratyayāḥ vihitāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14461: tābhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaḥ tena eva viśeṣeṇa kriyāyām upapde kriyārthāyām yathā syuḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:14462: vyatikaraḥ mā bhūt iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . iha bhāve pratyayāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14463: bhavanti iti iyaṭa siddham . saḥ ayam evam siddhe sati yat vacanagrahaṇam karoti
GS24pmbhasuu:14464: tasya etat prayojanam vācakāḥ yathā syuḥ iti . yadi ca yābhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaḥ yena
GS24pmbhasuu:14465: viśeṣeṇa bhāve pratyayāḥ vihitāḥ tābhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaḥ tena eva viśeṣeṇa kriyāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:14466: upapde kriyārthāyām bhavanti tataḥ amī vācakāḥ kṛtāḥ syuḥ . atha hi prakṛtimātrāt
GS24pmbhasuu:14467: vā syuḥ pratyayamātram vā syāt na amīvācakāḥ kṛtāḥ syuḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:14469: 317-318 kimartham idam ucyate na aviśeṣeṇa karmaṇi aṇ vihitaḥ saḥ kriyāyām upapade
GS24pmbhasuu:14470: kriyārthāyām anyatra ca bhaviṣyati . aṇaḥ punarvacanam apavādaviṣaye anivṛttyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:14471: . aṇaḥ punarvacanam kriyate apavādaviṣaye anivṛttiḥ yathā syāt . godāyaḥ vrajati
GS24pmbhasuu:14472: . kambaladāyaḥ vrajati iti . kim ucyate apavādaviṣaye anivṛttiḥ yathā syāt iti na
GS24pmbhasuu:14473: punaḥ utsargaviṣaye pratipadavidhyartham syāt . idānīm eva hi uktam kriyāyām upapde
GS24pmbhasuu:14474: kriyārthāyām vāsarūpeṇa tṛjādayaḥ na bhavanti iti . aṇ ca api tṛjādiḥ . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:14475: ubhayam anena kriyate . apavādaviṣaye cānivṛttiḥ utsargaviṣaye pratipadavidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:14476: . katham punaḥ ekena yatnena ubhayam labhyam . labhyam iti āha . katham . karmagrahaṇasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:14477: . katham punaḥ antareṇa karmagrahaṇam karmaṇi aṇ labhyaḥ . vacanagrahaṇam prakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:14478: anuvartate . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . aparyāyeṇa iti tu vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:14479: kadā cit hi karmaṇi syāt kadā cit kriyāyām upapade kriyārthāyām iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:14480: . na vaktavyam . cena sanniyogaḥ kariṣyate . aṇ karmaṇi ca . kim ca anyat . kriyāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:14481: upapade kriyārthāyām iti . evam api pratyekam upapadasañjñā na prāpnoti . cena eva
GS24pmbhasuu:14482: sanniyogaḥ kariṣyate . pratyekam vākyaparisamāptiḥ dṛṣṭā iti pratyekam upapadasañjña bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:14484: 318-319 śeṣavacanam kimartham . lṛṭi śeṣavacanam kriyāyām pratipadavidhyartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:14485: lṛṭi śeṣavacanam kriyate kriyāyām pratipadavidhyartham . pratipadavidhiḥ yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:14486: . aviśeṣeṇa vidhāne lṛṭaḥ abhāvaḥ pratiṣiddhatvāt . aviśeṣeṇa vidhāne lṛṭaḥ abhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14487: syāt . kariṣyāmi iti vrajati . hariṣyāmi iti vrajati iti . kim kāraṇam . pratiṣiddhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:14488: . idānīm eva hi uktam kriyāyām upapade kriyārthāyām vāsarūpeṇa tṛjādayaḥ na bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:14489: iti . lṛṭ ca api tṛjādiḥ . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . sādhīyaḥ tu khalu
GS24pmbhasuu:14490: śeṣagrahaṇena kriyārthopapadāt lṛṭ nirbhajyate . kim kāraṇam . akriyārthopapadatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:14491: . śeṣe iti ucyate . śeṣaḥ ca kaḥ . yat anyat kriyāyāḥ kriyārthāyāḥ . evam tarhi lṛṭi
GS24pmbhasuu:14492: śeṣavacanam kriyāyām pratipadavidhyartham . lṛṭi śeṣavacanam kriyate kriyāyām pratipadavidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14493: yathā syāt . lṛṭ śeṣe ca . kariṣyati hariṣyati iti . kva ca . kriyāyām upapade kriyārthāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:14494: iti . saḥ tarhi cakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . iha lṛṭ bhavati iti iyatā siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:14495: . saḥ ayam evam siddhe sati yat śeṣagrahaṇam karoti tasya etat prayojanam yogāṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:14496: yathā upajāyeta . sati ca yogāṅge yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . lṛṭ bhavati kriyāyām upapade
GS24pmbhasuu:14497: kriyārthāyām iti . tataḥ śeṣe . śeṣe ca lṛṭ bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14500: nityam iti vaktavyam . pakṣyantam paśya . pakṣyamāṇam paśya . kva tarhi idānīm vibhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:14503: 320 yogavibhāgaḥ kartavyaḥ . anadyatane lṛṭaḥ satsñjñau bhavataḥ . śvaḥ agnīn ādhyāsyamānena
GS24pmbhasuu:14504: . śvaḥ somena yakṣyamāṇena . tataḥ luṭ . luṭ bhavati anadyatane . śvaḥ kartā . śvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14505: adhyetā . kena vihitasya anadyatane lṛṭaḥ satsañjñau ucyete . etat eva jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:14506: bhavati anadyatane lṛṭ iti yat ayam anadyatane lṛṭaḥ satsñjñau śāsti . evam ca kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:14507: saḥ api adoṣaḥ bhavati yat uktam bhaviṣyati iti anadyatane upasaṅkhyānam .
GS24pmbhasuu:14510: iti vaktavyam . iyam nu kadā gantā yā evam pādau nidadhāti . ayam nu kadā adhyetā
GS24pmbhasuu:14511: yaḥ evam anabhiyuktaḥ iti . kālaprakarṣāt tu upamānam . kālaprakarṣāt tu upamānam
GS24pmbhasuu:14512: . gantā iva iyam gantā . na iyam gamiṣyati . adhyetā iva ayam adhyetā . na vai tiṅantena
GS24pmbhasuu:14513: upamānam asti . evam tarhi anadyatane iva anadyatane iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14515: 321 spṛśaḥ upatāpe . spṛśaḥ upatāpe iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . kambalasparśaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14517: 321 vādhimatsyabaleṣu iti vaktavyam . atīsāraḥ vyādhiḥ . visāraḥ matsyaḥ . bale . śālasāraḥ khadirasāraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:14519: 323-324 bhāve sarvaliṅganirdeśaḥ . bhāve sarvaliṅganirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . bhūtau bhavane
GS24pmbhasuu:14520: bhāve iti . kim prayojanam . sarvaliṅge bhāṅe ete pratyayāḥ yathā syuḥ iti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:14521: punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . puṃliṅgena ayam nirdeśaḥ kriyate ekavacanena ca . ten
GS24pmbhasuu:14522: puṃliṅge eva ekavacane ca ete prratyayāḥ syuḥ . strīnapuṃsakayoḥ dvivacanabahuvacnayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14523: ca na syuḥ . na atra nirdeśaḥ tantram . katham punaḥ tena eva ca nāma nirdeśaḥ kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:14524: tat ca atantram syāt . tatkārī ca bhavān taddveṣī ca . nāntarīyakatvāt atra puṃliṅgena
GS24pmbhasuu:14525: nirdeśaḥ kriyate ekavacanena ca . avaśyam kayā cit vibhaktyā kena cit ca liṅgena
GS24pmbhasuu:14526: nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . tat yathā kaḥ cit annārthī śālikalāpam satuṣam sapalālam āharati
GS24pmbhasuu:14527: nāntarīyakatvāt . saḥ yāvat ādeyam tāvat ādāya tuṣapalālāni utsṛjati . tathā kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14528: cit māṃsārthī matsyān saśakalān sakaṇṭakān āharati nāntarīyakatvāt . saḥ yāvat ādeyam
GS24pmbhasuu:14529: tāvat ādāya śakalakaṇṭakān utsṛjati . evam iha api nāntarīyakatvāt puṃliṅgena nirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14530: kriyate ekavacanāntena ca . na hi atra nirdeśaḥ tantram . kayā cit vibhaktyā kena
GS24pmbhasuu:14531: cit ca liṅgena nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . atha vā kṛbhvastayaḥ kriyāsāmānyavācinaḥ kriyāviśeṣavācinaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14532: pacādayaḥ . yat ca atra pacateḥ bhavatiḥ bhavati na tat bhavateḥ pacatiḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:14533: . yat ca bhavateḥ pacatiḥ bhavati na tat pacateḥ bhavatiḥ bhavati . kim ca pacateḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14534: bhavatiḥ bhavati . sāmānyam . kim ca bhavateḥ pacatiḥ bhavati . viśeṣaḥ . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:14535: upādhyāyasya śiṣyaḥ mātulasya bhāgineyam gatvā āha . upādhyāyam bhavān abhivādayatām
GS24pmbhasuu:14536: iti . saḥ gatvā mātulam abhivādayate . tathā mātulasya bhāgineyaḥ upādhyāyasya śiṣyam
GS24pmbhasuu:14537: gatvā āha . mātulam bhavān abhivādayatām iti . saḥ gatvā upādhyāyam abhivādayate
GS24pmbhasuu:14538: . evam iha api pacateḥ bhavatau yat tat nirdiśyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:14540: 325-327 kārakagrahaṇam kimartham . kārakagrahaṇam anādeśe svārthavijñānāt . kārakagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:14541: anādeśe svārthavijñānāt . anirdiṣṭārthāḥ pratyayāḥ svārthe bhavanti iti . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:14542: . guptijkidbhyaḥ san yāvādibhyaḥ kan iti . evam ime api pratyayāḥ svārthe syuḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:14543: svārthe mā bhūvan kārake yathā syuḥ iti evamartham idam ucyate . na etat asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:14544: . vihitaḥ pratyayaḥ svārthe bhāve ghañ iti . tena atriprasaktam iti kṛtvā niyamārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14545: ayam vijñāyeta . akartari sañjñāyām eva iti . asti ca idānīm kaḥ cit sañjñābhūtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14546: bhāvaḥ yadarthaḥ vidhiḥ syāt . asti iti āha : āvāhaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:14547: vivāhaḥ iti . kaimarthakyāt niyamaḥ bhavati . vidheyam na asti iti kṛtvā . iha ca
GS24pmbhasuu:14548: asti vidheyam . akartari ca kārake sañjñāyām ghañ vidheyaḥ . tatra apūrvaḥ vidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14549: astu niyamaḥ astu iti apūrvaḥ eva vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati na niyamaḥ . tat eva tarhi prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:14550: svārthe mā bhūvan iti . nanu ca uktam vihitaḥ pratyayaḥ svārthe bhāve ghañ iti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:14551: . anyaḥ saḥ bhāvaḥ bāhyaḥ prakṛtyarthāt . anena idānīm ābhyantare bhāve syāt . kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14552: punaḥ etayoḥ bhāvayoḥ viśeṣaḥ . uktaḥ bhāvabhedaḥ bhāṣye . etat api na asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:14553: . nañivayuktam anyasadṛśādhikaraṇe . tathā hi arthagatiḥ . nañyuktam ivayuktam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:14554: asnyasmin tatsadṛśe kāryam vijñayate . tathā hi arthaḥ gamyate . tat yathā . abrāhmaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:14555: ānaya iti ukte brāhmaṇasadṛśam puruṣam ānayati . na asau loṣṭam ānīya kṛtī bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:14556: . evam iha api akartari iti kartṛpratiṣedhāt anyasmin akartari kartṛsadṛśe kāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:14557: vijñasyate . kim ca anyat akartṛ kartṛsadṛśam . kārakam . uttarārtham tarhi kārakagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:14558: kartavyam . parimāṇākhyāyām sarvebhyaḥ kārake yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt . ekā tilocchritiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14559: . deve sṛtī iti . ghañanukramaṇam ajabviṣaye avacane hi strīpratyayānām api avādavijñānam
GS24pmbhasuu:14560: iti vakṣyati . tat na vaktavyam bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam . atra api
GS24pmbhasuu:14561: akartari iti eva anuvartiṣyate . sañjñāgrahaṇānarthakyam ca sarvatra ghañaḥ darśanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:14562: . sañjñāgrahaṇam ca anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . sarvatra ghañaḥ darśanāt . asañjñāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:14563: api hi ghañ dṛśyate . kaḥ bhavatā dāyaḥ dattaḥ . kaḥ bhavatā lābhaḥ labdhaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14564: yadi sañjñāgrahaṇam na kriyate atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . kṛtaḥ kaṭaḥ iti atra kāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14565: kaṭa iti prāpnoti . atiprasaṅgaḥ iti cet abhidhānalakṣaṇatvāt pratyayasya siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:14566: . atiprasaṅgaḥ iti cet tat na . kim kāraṇam . abhidhānalakṣaṇatvāt pratyayasya siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:14569: 327-329 sarvagrahaṇam kimartham . sarvebhyaḥ dhātubhyaḥ ghañ yathā syāt ajapoḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:14570: viṣaye . ekaḥ taṇḍulaniścāyaḥ . dvau śūrpaniṣpāvau . sarvagrahaṇam anarthakam parimāṇākhyāyam
GS24pmbhasuu:14571: iti siddhatvāt . sarvagrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . parimāṇākhyāyam iti siddhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:14572: . parimāṇākhyāyam iti eva ghañ siddhaḥ ajapoḥ api viṣaye . na arthaḥ sarvagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:14573: . asti anyat etasya vacane prayojanam . kim . ekaḥ pākaḥ dvau pākau trayaḥ pākāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14574: iti . pūrveṇa api etat siddham . na sidhyati . sañjñāyām iti pūrvaḥ yogaḥ . na ca
GS24pmbhasuu:14575: eṣā sañjñā . pratyākhyāyate sañjñāgrahaṇam . atha api kriyate evam api na doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:14576: ajau api sañjñāyām eva . yathājātīyakaḥ utsargaḥ tathājātīyakena apavādena bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:14577: . uttarārtham tarhi . iṅaḥ ca sarvebhyaḥ api yathā syāt . nanu ca ayam iṅ ekaḥ eva
GS24pmbhasuu:14578: vaṇṭaraṇḍākalpaḥ . sarveṣu sādhaneṣu yathā syāt . upetya adhīyate tasmāt adhyāyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14579: . adhīyate tasmin adhyāyaḥ . adhyāyanyāyāyodyāvasaṃhārāvāyāḥ ca iti etat nipātanam
GS24pmbhasuu:14580: na kartavyam bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam . kriyate nyāse eva . uttarāṛtham
GS24pmbhasuu:14581: eva tarhi vaktavyam . karmavyatihāre ṇac striyām iti sarvebhyaḥ yathā syāt . etat
GS24pmbhasuu:14582: api na asti prayojanam . vakṣyati etat . karmavyatihāre strīgrahaṇam vyatipākārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:14583: . pṛthak grahaṇam bādhakabādhanārtham . vyāvacorīvyāvacarcyartham . tatra vyatīkṣādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:14584: doṣaḥ . siddham tu prakṛte strīgrahaṇe ṇajgrahaṇam ṇijgrahaṇam ca iti . uttarārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:14585: tarhi abhividhau bhāve inuṇ sarvebhyaḥ yathā syāt . sāṃrāviṇam . etat api na asti
GS24pmbhasuu:14586: prayojanam . vakṣyati etat . abhividhau bhāvagrahaṇam napuṃsake ktādinivṛttyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:14587: . pṛthak grahaṇam bādhakabādhārtham . na tu lyuṭ iti . idam tarhi prayojanam . prakṛtyāśrayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14588: yaḥ apavādaḥ tasya bādhanam yathā syāt . arthāśrayaḥ yaḥ apavādaḥ tasya bādhanam
GS24pmbhasuu:14589: mā bhūt . ekā tilocchritiḥ dve sṛtī iti . ghañanukramaṇam ajabviṣaye . avacane hi
GS24pmbhasuu:14590: strīpratyayānām api apavādavijñānam iti codayiṣyati . tat na vaktavyam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:14592: 329-330 ghañanukramaṇam ajabviṣaye . ghañanukramaṇam ajabviṣaye iti vaktavyam . avacane
GS24pmbhasuu:14593: hi strīpratyayānām api apavādavijñānam . anucyamāne hi etasmin strīpratyayānām api
GS24pmbhasuu:14594: apavādaḥ ayam vijñayeta . ekā tilocchritiḥ dve sṛtī iti . dārajārau kartari ṇiluk
GS24pmbhasuu:14595: ca . dārajārau kartari vaktavyau ṇiluk ca vaktavyaḥ . dārayanti iti dārāḥ . jarayanti
GS24pmbhasuu:14596: iti jārāḥ . karaṇe vā . karaṇe vā vaktavyau . dīryate taiḥ dārāḥ . jīryanti taiḥ jārāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:14598: 330 iṅaḥ ca iti apādāne striyām upasaṅkhyānam tadantāt ca vā ṅīṣ . iṅaḥ ca iti atra
GS24pmbhasuu:14599: apādāne striyām upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam tadantāt ca vā ṅīṣ vaktavyaḥ . upetya adhīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:14600: tasyāḥ uapādhyāyī upādhyāyā . śṝ vāyuvarṇanivṛteṣu . śṝ iti etasmāt vāyuvarṇanivṛteṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:14601: ghañ vaktavyaḥ . śāraḥ vāyuḥ . śāraḥ varṇaḥ . gauḥ iva akṛtanīśāraḥ prāyeṇa śiśire kṛśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:14603: 331 sami muṣṭau iti anarthakam vacanam parimāṇākhyāyām iti siddhatvāt . sami muṣṭau
GS24pmbhasuu:14604: iti etat vacanam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . parimāṇākhyāyām iti siddhatvāt . parimāṇākhyāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:14605: iti eva siddham . aparimāṇārtham tu . aparimāṇārtham tu ayam ārambhaḥ . mallasya
GS24pmbhasuu:14606: saṅgrāhaḥ muṣṭikasya saṅgāhaḥ iti . udgrābhinigrābhau ca chandasi srugudyamananipātanayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14607: . udgrābhaḥ nibrābhaḥ iti imau śabdau chandasi vaktavyau srugudyamananipātanayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14608: . udgrābham ca nigrābham ca brahma devāḥ avīvṛdhan .
GS24pmbhasuu:14610: 331-332 strīgrahaṇam kimartham . karmavyatihāre strīgrahaṇam vyatipākārtham . karmavyatihāre
GS24pmbhasuu:14611: strīgrahaṇam kriyate vyatipākārtham . iha mā bhūt . vyatipākaḥ vartate iti . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:14612: kimartham pṛthak grahaṇam . pṛthak grahaṇam bādhakabādhanārtham . pṛthak grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:14613: kriyate bādhakabādhanārtham . ye tasya bādhakāḥ tadbādhanārtham . kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:14614: . vyāvacorīvyāvacarcyartham . vyāvacorī vartate . vyāvacarcī vartate . tatra vyatīkṣādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:14615: doṣaḥ . tatra vyatīkṣādiṣu doṣaḥ bhavati . vyatīkṣā vartate . vyatīhā vartate . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:14616: tu prakṛte strīgrahaṇe ṇajgrahaṇam ṇijgrahaṇam ca . siddham etat . katham . prakṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:14617: eva strīgrahaṇe ayam yogaḥ kartavyaḥ . striyām ktin . tataḥ karmavyatihāre ṇac . tataḥ ṇicaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:14619: 332-333 bhāvagrahaṇam kimartham . abhividhau bhāvagrahaṇam napuṃsake ktādinivṛttyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:14620: . abhividhau bhāvagrahaṇam kriyate napuṃsake ktādinivṛttyartham . napuṃsakaliṅge
GS24pmbhasuu:14621: ktādayaḥ mā bhūvan iti . atha kimartham pṛthak grahaṇam . pṛthak grahaṇam bādhakabādhārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:14623: ye tasya bādhakāḥ tadbādhanārtham . na tu lyuṭaḥ . lyuṭaḥ tu bādhanam na iṣyate . saṅkūṭanam iti eva bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:14625: 333-334 ajvidhau bhayasya upasaṅkhyānam . ajvidhau bhayasya upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . bhayam . atyalpam idam ucyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:14626: bhayasya iti . bhayādīnām iti vaktavyam iha api yathā syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:14627: bhayam varṣam . kim prayojanam . napuṃsake ktādinivṛttyartham . napuṃsakaliṅge ktādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14628: mā bhūvan iti . kalpādibhyaḥ ca pratiṣedhaḥ . kalpādibhyaḥ ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14629: . kalpaḥ arthaḥ mantraḥ . javasavau chandasi . javasavau chandasi vaktavyau . ūrvoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14630: astu me javaḥ . ayam me pañcaudanaḥ savaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:14632: 334-335 kimartham niṣpūrvāt cinoteḥ ap vidhīyate na acā eva siddham . na hi asti
GS24pmbhasuu:14633: viśeṣaḥ niṣpūrvāt cinoteḥ apaḥ vā acaḥ vā . tat eva rūpam saḥ eva svaraḥ . na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:14634: . hastādāne ceḥ ghañ prāptaḥ . tadbādhanārtham . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . abvidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:14635: niścigrahaṇam anarthakam steyasya ghañvidhau pratiṣedhāt . abvidhau niścigrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:14636: anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . steyasya ghañvidhau pratiṣedhāt . steyasya ghañvidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:14637: pratiṣedhaḥ ucyate . niṣpūrvaḥ cinotiḥ steye vartate . asteyārtham tarhi idam vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:14638: . niṣpūrvāt cinoteḥ asteye yathā syāt . asteyārtham iti cet na aniṣṭatvāt . asteyārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:14639: iti cet tat na . kim kāraṇam . aniṣṭatvāt . na niṣpūrvāt cinoteḥ asteye ap iṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:14640: . kim tarhi ghañ eva iṣyate . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat niṣpūrvāt cinoteḥ apam śāsti
GS24pmbhasuu:14641: tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ yat tat antaḥ thāthaghañktājabitṛkāṇām iti tat niṣpūrvāt cinoteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14642: na bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . niścayaḥ . eṣaḥ svaraḥ siddhaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:14644: 335 vaśiraṇyoḥ ca upasaṅkhyānam . vaśiraṇyoḥ ca upasaṅkhyānam . saḥ vaśam saindhavam
GS24pmbhasuu:14645: . dhanañjayaḥ raṇe raṇe . ghañarthe kavidhānam sthāsnāpāvyadhihaniyudhyartham . ghañarthe
GS24pmbhasuu:14646: kaḥ vidheyaḥ . kim prayojanam . sthāsnāpāvyadhihaniyudhyartham . sthā . pratiṣṭhante
GS24pmbhasuu:14647: asmin dhānyāni iti prasthaḥ . prasthe himavataḥ śrṅge . sthā . snā . prasnānti tasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:14648: iti prasnaḥ . snā . pā . prapibanti asyām iti prapā . pā . vyadhi . āvidhyanti tena
GS24pmbhasuu:14649: āvidham . vyadhi . hani . vighnanti tasmin manāṃsi vighnaḥ . hani . yudhi . āyudhyante tena āyudham .
GS24pmbhasuu:14651: 336 kasmāt ayam kaḥ vidhīyate . hanteḥ iti āha . tat hantigrahaṇam kartavyam . na
GS24pmbhasuu:14652: kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . hanaḥ ca vadhaḥ . tat vai anekena
GS24pmbhasuu:14653: nipātanena vyavacchinnam na śakyam anuvartayitum . na etāni nipātanāni . hanteḥ ete
GS24pmbhasuu:14654: ādeśāḥ . yadi ādeśāḥ ghanasvaraḥ na sidhyati . ghanaḥ . santu tarhi nipātanāni .
GS24pmbhasuu:14655: nanu ca uktam tat vai anekena nipātanena vyavacchinnam na śakyam anuvartayitum iti
GS24pmbhasuu:14656: . sambandham anuvartiṣyate . atha vā punaḥ santu ādeśāḥ . nanu ca uktam svaraḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:14657: sidhyati iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . akārāntaḥ ādeśaḥ . atha yadā iṣīkayā stambaḥ hanyate
GS24pmbhasuu:14658: katham tatra bhavitavyam . ke cid tāvat āhuḥ . stambaghnā iti bhavitavyam . apare āhuḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:14659: stambahetiḥ iti bhavitavyam . ūtiyūtijūtisātihetikīrtayaḥ ca iti nipātanam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14660: apare āhuḥ . stambahananīiti bhavitavyam iti . vakṣyati etat . ajabbhyām strīīkhalanāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14663: 336-337 yajādibhyaḥ nasya ṅittve samprasāraṇapratiṣedhaḥ . yajādibhyaḥ nasya ṅittve
GS24pmbhasuu:14664: samprasāraṇapratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . praśnaḥ iti . evan tarhi āṅit kariṣyate . aṅiti
GS24pmbhasuu:14665: guṇapratiṣedhaḥ . yadi aṅit guṇapratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . viśnaḥ iti . sūtram ca bhidyate
GS24pmbhasuu:14666: . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam yajādibhyaḥ nasya ṅittve samprasāraṇapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14667: iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . nipātanāt etat siddham . kim nipātanam . praśne ca āsannakāle iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14669: 337 striyām ktin ābādibhyaḥ ca . striyām ktin iti atra ābādibhyaḥ ca iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:14670: . āptiḥ rāddhiḥ dīptiḥ . niṣṭhāyām vā seṭaḥ akāravacanāt siddham . atha vā niṣṭhāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:14671: seṭaḥ akāraḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . yadi niṣṭhāyām seṭaḥ akāraḥ bhavati iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:14672: sraṃsā dhvaṃsā iti na sidhyati . srastiḥ dhvastiḥ iti prāpnoti . kim punaḥ idam parigaṇanam
GS24pmbhasuu:14673: trayaḥ eva ābādayaḥ āhosvit udāharaṇamātram . kim ca ataḥ . yadi parigaṇanam bhedaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14674: bhavati . atha udāharaṇamātram na asti bhedaḥ . srasti dhvastiḥ iti eva bhavitavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:14676: 338 sthādibhyaḥ sarvāpavādaprasaṅgaḥ . sthādibhyaḥ sarvāpavādaḥ ktin prāpnoti . saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14677: yathā eva aṅam bādhate evam ṇvuliñau api bādheta . kām tvam sthāyikām asthāḥ . kām
GS24pmbhasuu:14678: sthāyim . siddham tu aṅvidhāne sthādipratiṣedhāt . siddham etat . katham . aṅvidhāne
GS24pmbhasuu:14679: eva sthādipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . pratiṣiddhe tasmin ktin eva bhaviṣyati . sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:14680: . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam sthādibhyaḥ sarvāpavādaprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14681: iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . purastāt apavādāḥ anantarān vidhīn bādhante iti evam ayam striyām
GS24pmbhasuu:14682: ktin aṅam bādhiṣyate . ṇvuliñau na bādhiṣyate . śrutijiṣistubhyaḥ karaṇe . śrutijiṣistubhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14683: karaṇe ktin vaktavyaḥ . śrūyate anayā śrutiḥ . ijyate anayā iṣṭiḥ . iṣyate anayā
GS24pmbhasuu:14684: iṣṭiḥ . stūyate anayā stutiḥ . glājyāhābhyaḥ niḥ . glājyāhābhyaḥ niḥ vaktavyaḥ .

GS24pmbhasuu:14694: . chidhā dvaidhīkaraṇe iti vaktavyam . chittiḥ anyā . ārā śastryām . ārā śastryām

GS24pmbhasuu:14696: anyā . guhā giryoṣadhyoḥ . guhā giryoṣadhyoḥ iti vaktavyam . gūḍhiḥ anyā .
GS24pmbhasuu:14698: 340-341 kimarthaḥ cakāraḥ . svarārthaḥ . citaḥ antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati iti antodāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:14699: yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . udāttaḥ iti vartate bhūvīrāḥ udāttaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14700: yadi udāttaḥ iti vartate vajayajoḥ bhāve kyap kimarthaḥ pakāraḥ . tugarthaḥ . hrasvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:14701: piti kṛti tuk iti . udāttaḥ iti vartate . evam api kutaḥ etat tadantasya udāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:14702: bhaviṣyati na punaḥ ādeḥ iti . udāttaḥ iti anuvartanasāmarthyāt yasya aprāptaḥ svaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14703: tasya bhavati . kasya ca aprāptaḥ . antyasya . sāmānyagrahaṇāvighātārthaḥ tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:14704: kva sāmānyagrahaṇāvighātārthena arthaḥ . yuvoḥ anākau iti . etat api na asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:14705: . vakṣyati etat . siddham tu yuvoḥ anunāsikavacanāt iti .

GS24pmbhasuu:14708: ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . ghaṭṭanā vandanā vedanā . iṣeḥ anicchārthasya . iṣeḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:14713: anyeṣu īhamāneṣu . kā nām śāyikā anyeṣu adhīyāneṣu . ikśtipau dhātunirdeśe . ikśtipau
GS24pmbhasuu:14714: iti etau pratyayau dhātunirdeśe vaktavyau . paceḥ brūhi . pacateḥ brūhi . varṇāt

GS24pmbhasuu:14716: . rephaḥ . matvarthāt chaḥ . matvarthāt chaḥ vaktavyaḥ . matvarthīyaḥ . iṇ ajādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14717: . iṇ ajādibhyaḥ vaktavyaḥ . ājiḥ ātiḥ ādiḥ . iñ vapādibhyaḥ . iñ vapādibhyaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14718: . vāpiḥ vāsiḥ vādiḥ . ik kṛṣyādibhyaḥ . ik kṛṣyādibhyaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kṛṣiḥ kiriḥ giriḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:14724: śakyam akartum . ghañ kasmāt na bhavati . prāyavacanāt yathā kaṣaḥ nikaṣaḥ iti prāyavacanāt ghañ na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:14727: upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . avahriyante asmin avahāraḥ . ādhriyante asmin ādhāraḥ .

GS24pmbhasuu:14731: iha mā bhūt . udakodañcanaḥ . udaṅkaḥ anudakagrahaṇānarthakyam ca prāyavacanāt yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:14732: godohanaḥ prasādhanaḥ iti . udaṅkaḥ anudakagrahaṇam ca anarthakam . ghañ kasmāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:14733: bhavati . prāyavacanāt yathā godohanaḥ prasādhanaḥ iti .

GS24pmbhasuu:14738: avakāśaḥ cayaḥ lavaḥ . strīpratyayānām avakāśaḥ kṛtiḥ hṛtiḥ . iha ubhayam prāpnoti

GS24pmbhasuu:14740: prāpnoti . īṣaccayaḥ sucayaḥ īṣallavaḥ sulavaḥ . anasya avakāśaḥ idhmapravraścanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14741: . ajapoḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . palāśacayanaḥ avilavanaḥ . strīkhalanāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14742: bhavanti vipratiṣedhena . striyāḥ khalanau vipratiṣedhena . striyāḥ khalanau bhavataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14743: vipratiṣedhena . strīpratyayānām avakāśaḥ kṛtiḥ hṛtiḥ . khalaḥ avakāśaḥ īṣadbhedaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14744: subhedaḥ . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . īṣadbhedā subhedā . anasya avakāśaḥ idhmapravraścanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14745: . strīpratyayānām saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . saktudhānī tilapīḍanī . khalanau
GS24pmbhasuu:14747: (P_3,3.127) KA_157.2-7 Ro_III,345-346 khal kartṛkaraṇayoḥ cvyarthayoḥ . khal kartṛkaraṇayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14748: cvyarthayoḥ iti vaktavyam . anāḍhyena bhavatā īṣadāḍhyena śakyam bhavitum īṣadāḍhyambhavam
GS24pmbhasuu:14749: bhavatā . durāḍhyambhavam svāḍhyambhavam . kartṛkarmagrahaṇam ca upapadasañjñārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:14750: . kartṛkarmagrahaṇam ca upapadasañjñārtham draṣṭavyam . dveṣyam vijānīyāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:14751: abhidheyayoḥ iti . tat ācāryaḥ suhṛt bhūtvā anvācaṣṭe :
GS24pmbhasuu:14754: 346 bhāṣāyām śāsiyudhidṛśidhṛṣibhyaḥ yuc . bhāṣāyām śāsiyudhidṛśidhṛṣibhyaḥ yuc vaktavyaḥ . duḥśāsanaḥ duryodhanaḥ durdarśanaḥ durdharṣaṇaḥ . mṛṣeḥ ca iti vaktavyam . durmarṣaṇaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:14756: 346-348 vatkaraṇam kimartham . vartamānasāmīpye vartmānāḥ vā iti iyati ucyamāne vartamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:14757: ye pratyayāḥ vihitāḥ vartamānasāmīpye dhātumātrāt syuḥ . vatkaraṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:14758: na doṣaḥ bhavati . yadi ca yābhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaḥ yena viśeṣeṇa vartamāne pratyayāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14759: vihitāḥ tābhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaḥ tena eva viśeṣeṇa vartamānasāmīpye bhavanti tataḥ amīvartamānavat
GS24pmbhasuu:14760: kṛtāḥ syuḥ . atha hi prakṛtimātrāt vā syuḥ pratyayamātram vā syāt na amīvartamānavat
GS24pmbhasuu:14761: kṛtāḥ syuḥ . iha vartamānasāmīpye vartamānavat vā iti uktvā loṭ eva udāhriyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:14762: yadi punaḥ vā laṭ bhavati iti eva ucyeta . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . vartamānasāmīpye
GS24pmbhasuu:14764: śatrādyartham . śatrādyarthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . eṣaḥ asmi pacan . eṣaḥ asmi pacamānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14765: iti . na etat asti prayojanam . laḍādeśau śatṛśānacau . tatra vā laṭ bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:14766: eva siddham . yau tarhi alaḍādeśau . eṣaḥ asmi pavamānaḥ . eṣaḥ asmi yajamānaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:14767: yau ca api laḍādeśau tau api prayojayataḥ . vartamānavihitasya laṭaḥ śatṛśānacau
GS24pmbhasuu:14768: ucyete . aviśeṣeṇa vihitaḥ ca ayam yogaḥ . śatrādyartham iti khalu api ucyate . bahavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14769: ca śatrādayaḥ . eṣaḥ asmi alaṅkariṣṇuḥ . eṣaḥ asmi prajaniṣṇuḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:14771: 347 āśaṃsā nāma bhaviṣyatkālā . āśaṃsāyām bhūtavadatideśe laṅliṭoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:14772: āśaṃsāyām bhūtavadatideśe laṅliṭoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vā apavādasya nimittābhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:14773: anadyatane hi tayoḥ vidhānam . na vā vaktavyaḥ . kim kāraṇam . apavādasya nimittābhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:14774: . na atra apavādasya nimittam asti . katham . anadyatane hi tayoḥ vidhānam . anadyatane
GS24pmbhasuu:14775: hi tau vidhīyete laṅliṭau . na ca atra anadyatanaḥ kālaḥ vivakṣitaḥ . kaḥ tarhi . bhūtakālasāmānyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:14777: 348-350 āśaṃsāsambhāvanayoḥ aviśeṣāt tadvidhānasya aprāptiḥ . āśaṃsā sambhāvanam
GS24pmbhasuu:14778: iti aviśiṣṭau etau arthau . āśaṃsāsambhāvanayoḥ aviśeṣāt tadvidhānasya aprāptiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:14779: āśaṃsāyām ye vidhīyante te sambhāvane api prāpnuvanti . ye ca sambhāvane vidhīyante
GS24pmbhasuu:14780: te āśaṃsāyām api prāpnuvanti . kim tarhi ucyate aprāptiḥ iti . na sādhīyaḥ prāptiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14781: bhavati . iṣṭā vyavasthā na prakalpeta . na sarve sarvatra iṣyante . na vā sambhāvanāvayavatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:14782: āśaṃsāyāḥ . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . sambhāvanāvayavatvāt āśaṃsāyāḥ . sambhāvanāvayavātmikā
GS24pmbhasuu:14783: āśaṃsā . āśaṃsā nāma pradhāritaḥ arthaḥ abhinītaḥ ca anabhinītaḥ ca . sambhāvanam
GS24pmbhasuu:14784: nāma pradhāritaḥ arthaḥ abhinītaḥ eva. arthāsandehaḥ vā alamarthatvāt sambhāvanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:14785: . atha vā arthāsandehaḥ eva punaḥ asya . kim kāraṇam . alamarthatvāt sambhāvanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:14786: . sambhāvane ālamarthyam gamyate āsaṃśāyām punaḥ anālamarthyam . ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14787: jñāpayati sambhāvane api anālamarthyam gamyate iti yat ayam sambhāvane alam iti āha
GS24pmbhasuu:14788: . tasmāt suṣṭhu ucyate na vā sambhāvanāvayavatvāt āśaṃsāyāḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14790: 350 kṣipravacane lṛaḥ āśaṃsāvacane liṅ vipratiṣedhena . kṣipravacane lṛaḥ āśaṃsāvacane
GS24pmbhasuu:14791: liṅ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . kṣipravacane lṛṭ bhavati iti asya avakāśaḥ . upādhyāyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14792: cet āgataḥ kṣipram adhyeṣyāmahe . āśaṃsāvacabe liṅ bhavati iti asya avakāśaḥ . upādhyāyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14793: cet āgataḥ āśaṃse yuktaḥ adhīyīya . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . upādhyāyaḥ cet āgataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14794: āśaṃse kṣipram adhīyīya . liṅ bhavati vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:14796: 350-351 aniṣpanne niṣpannaśabdaḥ śiṣyaḥ aniṣpannatvāt . aniṣpanne niṣpannaśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14797: śiṣyaḥ śāsitavyaḥ . kim kāraṇam . aniṣpannatvāt . devaḥ cet vṛṣṭaḥ niṣpannāḥ śālayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14798: . tatra bhavitavyam sampatsyante śālayaḥ iti . siddham tu bhaviṣyatpratiṣedhāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:14799: siddham etat . katham . bhaviṣyatpratiṣedhāt . yat lokaḥ bhaviṣyadvācinaḥ śabdasya
GS24pmbhasuu:14800: prayogam na mṛṣyati . kaḥ cit āha . devaḥ cet vṛṣṭaḥ sampatsyante śālayaḥ iti . saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14801: ucyate . mā evam vocaḥ . sampannāḥ śālayaḥ iti evam brūhi . hetubhūtakālasamprekṣitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:14802: vā . hetubhūtakālasamprekṣitatvāt vā punaḥ siddham etat . hetubhūtakālam varṣam varṣākālā
GS24pmbhasuu:14803: ca kriyā . yadi tarhi niṣpannaḥ arthaḥ kim niṣpannakāryāṇi na kriyante . kāni . bhojanādīni
GS24pmbhasuu:14804: . anyat idānīm etat ucyate kim niṣpannakāryāṇi na kriyante iti . yat tu tat niṣpannaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14805: arthaḥ na niṣpannaḥ iti . saḥ niṣpannaḥ arthaḥ . avaśyam khalu api koṣṭhagateṣu api
GS24pmbhasuu:14806: śāliṣu avahananādīni pratīkṣyāṇi . evam iha api niṣpannaḥ arthaḥ . avaśyam tu jananādīni pratīkṣyāṇi .
GS24pmbhasuu:14808: 351-352 astyarthānām bhavantyarthe sarvāḥ vibhaktayaḥ . astyarthānām bhavantyarthe
GS24pmbhasuu:14809: sarvāḥ vibhaktayaḥ . kūpaḥ asti . kūpaḥ bhaviṣyati . kūpaḥ bhavitā . kūpaḥ abhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:14810: . kūpaḥ āsīt . kūpaḥ babhūva iti . katham punaḥ jñāyate bhavantyāḥ eṣaḥ arthaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:14811: . kartuḥ vidyamānatvāt . kartā atra vidyate . katham punaḥ jñāyate kartā atra vidyate
GS24pmbhasuu:14812: iti . kūpaḥ anena kadā cit dṛṣṭaḥ . na ca asya kam cid api apāyam paśyati . saḥ tu
GS24pmbhasuu:14813: tatra buddhyā nityām sattām adhyavasyati . kūpaḥ asti iti . siddham tu yathāsvam
GS24pmbhasuu:14814: kālasamuccāraṇāt . siddham etat . katham . yathāsvam etāḥ vibhaktayaḥ sveṣu sveṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:14815: kāleṣu prayujyante iti . katham punaḥ jñāyate yathāsvam etāḥ vibhaktayaḥ sveṣu sveṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:14816: kāleṣu prayujyante iti . avātvāt . yat na vā bhāṣyante . asiddhaviparyāsaḥ ca . asiddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14817: ca viparyāsaḥ . na hi kaḥ cit kūpaḥ asti iti prayoktavye kūpaḥ abhūt iti prayuṅkte
GS24pmbhasuu:14818: . kim punaḥ kāraṇam . na vā bhāṣyante asiddhaḥ ca viparyāsaḥ . iha kim cit indriyakarma
GS24pmbhasuu:14819: kim cit buddhikarma . indriyakarma samāsādanam buddhikarmavyavasāyaḥ . evam hi kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14820: cit pāṭaliputram jigamiṣuḥ āha . yaḥ ayam adhvā gantavyaḥ ā pāṭaliputrāt etasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:14821: kūpaḥ bhaviṣyati . samāsādya atikramya uṣitvā kūpaḥ āsīt iti . samāsādya atikramya
GS24pmbhasuu:14822: uṣitvā vismṛtya kūpaḥ babhūva iti . tat yadā indriyakarma tadā etāḥ vibhaktayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:14823: yadā hi buddhikarma tadā vartamānā bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:14825: 353-354 kimartham imau dvau pratiṣedhau ucyete na adyatanavat iti eva ucyeta . na
GS24pmbhasuu:14826: anadyatanavatpratiṣedhe laṅluṭoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . na anadyatanavatpratiṣedhe laṅluṭoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14827: pratiṣedhaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ . adyatanavadvacane hi vidhānam . adyatanavadvacane hi sati
GS24pmbhasuu:14828: vidhiḥ iyam vijñāyeta . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . tatra laḍvidhiprasaṅgaḥ . tatra laḍvidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14829: prasajyeta . luṅlṛṭoḥ ca ayathākālam . luṅlṛṭoḥ ca ayathākālam prayogaḥ prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:14830: . luṅaḥ api viṣaye lṛṭ syāt lṛṭaḥ ca viṣaye luṅ syāt . adya punaḥ ayam dvau pratiṣedhau
GS24pmbhasuu:14831: uktvā tūṣṇīm āste . yathāprāptem eva adyatane bhaviṣyati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14833: 354-355 kimartham idam ucyate na na anadyatanavat iti eva siddham . bhaviṣyati maryādāvacane
GS24pmbhasuu:14834: avarasmin iti akriyāprabandhārtham . akriyāprabandhārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . kim ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:14835: akriyāprabandhaḥ . na punaḥ kriyāprabandhārthaḥ api syāt . kriyāprabandhārtham iti
GS24pmbhasuu:14836: cet vacanānarthakyam . kriyāprabandhārtham iti cet vacanam anarthakam . siddham kriyāprabandhe
GS24pmbhasuu:14837: pūrveṇa eva . idam tarhi prayojanam . anahorātrāṇām iti vakṣyāmi iti . iha mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:14838: . yaḥ ayam triṃśadrātraḥ āgāmī tasya yaḥ avaraḥ pañcadaśarātraḥ iti . ahorātrapratiṣedhārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:14839: iti cet na aniṣṭatvāt . ahorātrapratiṣedhārtham iti cet tat na aniṣṭatvāt . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:14840: . aniṣṭatvāt . atra api na anadyatanavat iti eva iṣyate . idam tarhi prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:14841: bhaviṣyati iti vakṣyāmi iti . iha ma bhūt . yaḥ ayam adhvā gataḥ ā pāṭaliputrāt tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:14842: yat avaram sāketāt iti . na aniṣṭatvāt . atra api na anadyatanavat iti eva iṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:14843: . idam tarhi prayojanam maryādāvacane iti vakṣyāmi iti . iha mā bhūt . yaḥ ayam adhvā
GS24pmbhasuu:14844: aparimāṇaḥ gantavyaḥ tasya yat avaram sāketāt iti . atra api na anadyatanavat iti
GS24pmbhasuu:14845: eva iṣyate . tasmāt suṣṭhu ucyate bhaviṣyati maryādāvacane avarasmin iti akriyāprabandhārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:14848: 356 anahorātrāṇām iti tadvibhāge pratiṣedhaḥ . anahorātrāṇām iti tadvibhāge pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14849: vaktavyaḥ . yaḥ ayam triṃśadrātraḥ āgāmītasya yaḥ avaraḥ ardhamāsaḥ . taiḥ ca vibhāge
GS24pmbhasuu:14851: yaḥ ayam māsaḥ āgāmītasya yaḥ avaraḥ pañcadaśarātraḥ iti . dveṣyam vijānīyāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:14852: ahorātrāṇām eva ahorātraiḥ vibhāge pratiṣedhaḥ iti . tat ācāryaḥ suhṛt bhūtvā anvācaṣṭe :
GS24pmbhasuu:14853: anahorātrāṇām iti tadvibhāge pratiṣedhaḥ . taiḥ ca vibhāge iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14855: 356) kasmin parasmin . kālavibhāge . kutaḥ etat . yogavibhāgakaraṇasāmarthyāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:14857: 357 sādhanātipattau iti api vaktavyam iha api yathā syāt . abhokṣyata bhavān māṃsena
GS24pmbhasuu:14858: yadi matsamīpe āsiṣyata iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . na antareṇa sādhanam
GS24pmbhasuu:14859: kriyāyāḥ pravṛttiḥ asti iti sādhanātipattiḥ cet kriyātipattiḥ api bhavati . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:14862: 357 bhūte lṛṅ utāpyādiṣu . bhūte lṛṅ utāpyādiṣu draṣṭavyaḥ . uta adhyāiṣyata . api adhyaiṣyata .
GS24pmbhasuu:14864: 357-358 vibhāṣā garhāprabhṛtau prāk utāpibhyām . vibhāṣā garhāprabhṛtau prāk utāpibhyām iti vaktavyam . vā ā utāpyoḥ iti hi ucyamāne sandehaḥ syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:14865: prāk vā utāpibhyām saha vā iti . tat ācāryaḥ suhṛt bhūtvā anvācaṣṭe vibhāṣā garhāprabhṛtau prāk utāpibhyām iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14868: narthakaḥ . kim kāraṇam . kriyāsamāptivivakṣitatvāt . kriyāyāḥ atra asamāptiḥ gamyate
GS24pmbhasuu:14869: . eṣaḥ ca nāma nyāyyaḥ vartamānaḥ kālaḥ yatra kriyā aparisamāptā bhavati . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:14870: vartamāne laṭ iti eva siddham . yadi vartamāne laṭ iti evam atra laṭ bhavati śatṛśānacau
GS24pmbhasuu:14872: api mām yājayantam paśya . api mām yājayamānam paśya .
GS24pmbhasuu:14875: anadhikārāt uttaratra akiṃvṛttagrahaṇam anarthakam . nivṛttam kiṃvṛtte iti . tasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:14876: nivṛtte aviśeṣeṇa kiṃvṛtte akiṃvṛtte ca bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam upapadasañjñām
GS24pmbhasuu:14877: vakṣyāmi iti . upapadasañjñāvacane kim prayojanam . upapadam atiṅ iti samāsaḥ yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:14878: syāt . atiṅ iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . yadā tarhi lṛṭaḥ satsañjñau tadā upapadasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:14879: bhaviṣyati . bhaviṣyadadhikāravihitasya lṛṭaḥ satsñjñau ucyete aviśeṣavihitaḥ ca ayam .
GS24pmbhasuu:14881: 359 jātuyadoḥ liṅvidhāne yadāyadyoḥ upasaṅkhyānam . jātuyadoḥ liṅvidhāne yadāyadyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14882: upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . yadā bhavadvidhaḥ kṣatriyam yājayet . yadi bhavadvidhaḥ kṣatriyam yājayet .
GS24pmbhasuu:14885: anarthakaḥ . kim kāraṇam . arthānyatvāt . na hi yadau upapade citrīkaraṇam gamyate
GS24pmbhasuu:14888: 360 hetuhetumatoḥ liṅ vā . hetuhetumatoḥ liṅ vā iti vaktavyam . anena cet yāyāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:14889: śakaṭam paryābhavet . anena cet yāsyati na śakaṭam paryābhaviṣyati . bhaviṣyadadhikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:14890: . bhaviṣyadadhikāre iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . varṣati iti dhāvati . hanti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:14891: palayate . atha idānīm śatṛśānacau atra kasmāt na bhavataḥ . devatrātaḥ galaḥ grāhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14892: itiyoge ca sadvidhiḥ . mithaḥ te na vibhāṣyante . gavākṣaḥ saṃśitavrataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:14894: 361 kāmapravedanam cet . kāmapravedanam cet gamyate iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . icchan kaṭam karoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14896: 361 vidhyadhīṣṭayoḥ kaḥ viśeṣaḥ . vidhiḥ nāma preṣaṇam . adhīṣṭam nām satkārpūrvikā
GS24pmbhasuu:14897: vyāpāraṇā . atha nimantraṇāmantraṇayoḥ kaḥ viśeṣaḥ . sannihitena nimantraṇam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:14898: asannihitena ca āmantraṇam . na eṣaḥ asti viśeṣaḥ . asannihitena api nimantraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:14899: bhavati sannihitena ca āmantraṇam . evam tarhi yat niyogataḥ kartavyam tat nimantraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:14900: . kim punaḥ tat . havyam kavyam vā . brāhmaṇena siddham bhujyatām iti ukte adharmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14903: 362-365 katham punaḥ idam vijñāyate . nimantraṇādīīnām arthe iti āhosvit nimantraṇādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:14904: gamyamāneṣu iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . nimantraṇādīīnām arthe iti cet āmantrayai
GS24pmbhasuu:14905: nimantrayai bhavantam iti pratyayānupapattiḥ prakṛtyā abhihitatvāt . nimantraṇādīīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:14906: arthe iti cet āmantrayai nimantrayai bhavantam iti pratyayānupapattiḥ . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:14907: . prakṛtyā abhihitatvāt . prakṛtyā abhihitaḥ saḥ arthaḥ iti kṛtvā pratyayaḥ na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:14908: . dvivacanabahuvanāprasiddhiḥ ca ekārthatvāt . dvivacanabahuvanayoḥ ca a prasiddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14909: . kim kāraṇam . ekārthatvāt . ekaḥ ayam arthaḥ nimantraṇam nāma . tasya ekatvāt ekavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:14910: eva prāpnoti . astu tarhi nimantraṇādiṣu gamyamāneṣu . iha api tarhi prāpnoti . devadattaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14911: bhavantam āmantrayate . devadattaḥ bhavantam nimantrayate iti . siddham tu dvitīyākāṅkṣasya
GS24pmbhasuu:14912: prakṛte pratyayārthe pratyayavidhānāt . siddham etat . katham . dvitīyākāṅkṣasya
GS24pmbhasuu:14913: dhātoḥ prakṛte pratyayārthe pratyayaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . ke ca prakṛtāḥ arthāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14914: . bhāvakarmakartāraḥ . bhavet siddham prāpnotu bhavān āmantraṇam anubhavatu bhavān
GS24pmbhasuu:14915: amantraṇam iti yatra dvitīyaḥ ākāṅkyate . idam tu na sidhyati āmantrayai nimantrayai
GS24pmbhasuu:14916: iti . atra api dvitīyaḥ ākāṅkyate . kaḥ . nimantriḥ eva . āmantrayai āmantraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:14917: nimantrayai nimantraṇam . katham punaḥ nimnatriḥ nimantraṇam ākāṅkṣet . dṛṣṭaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:14918: bhāvena bhāvayogaḥ . tat yathā iṣiḥ iṣiṇā yujyate strītvam ca strītvena . yāvatā
GS24pmbhasuu:14919: atra dvitīyaḥ ākāṅkṣyate asti tarhi nimantraṇādīnām arthe iti . nanu ca uktam nimantraṇādīīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:14920: arthe iti cet āmantrayai nimantrayai bhavantam iti pratyayānupapattiḥ prakṛtyā abhihitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:14921: iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yaḥ asau dvitīyaḥ ākāṅkṣyate saḥ eva mama pratyayārthaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:14922: . ayam tarhi doṣaḥ dvivacanabahuvanāprasiddhiḥ ca ekārthatvāt iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14923: . supām karmādayaḥ api arthāḥ saṅkhyā ca eva tathā tiṅām . supām saṅkhyā ca eva arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14924: karmādayaḥ ca . tathā tiṅām . prasiddhaḥ niyamaḥ tatra . prasiddhaḥ tatra niyamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14925: . niyamaḥ prakṛteṣu vā . atha vā prakṛtān arthān apekṣya niyamaḥ . ke ca prakṛtāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14926: . ekatvādayaḥ . ekasmin eva ekavacanam na dvayoḥ na bahuṣu . dvayoḥ eva dvivacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:14927: naikasmin na bahuṣu . bahuṣu eva bahuvacanam na ekasmin na dvayoḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14929: 365-366 kimartham praiṣādiṣu artheṣu kṛtyāḥ vidhīyante na aviśeṣeṇa vihitāḥ kṛtyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14930: te praiṣādiṣu bhaviṣyanti anyatra ca . praiṣādiṣu kṛtyānām vidhānam niyamārtham .
GS24pmbhasuu:14931: niyamārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . praiṣādiṣu eva kṛtyāḥ yathā syuḥ iti . praiṣādiṣu kṛtyānām
GS24pmbhasuu:14932: vacanam niyamārtham iti cet tat aniṣṭam . praiṣādiṣu kṛtyānām vacanam niyamārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:14933: iti cet tat aniṣṭam prāpnoti . na hi praiṣādiṣu eva kṛtyāḥ iṣyante . kim tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:14934: aviśeṣeṇa iṣyante . busopendhyam tṛṇopendhyam ghanghātyam . vidhyartham tu striyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14935: prāk iti vacanāt . vidhyartham tu praiṣādiṣu kṛtyānām vacanam . ayam praiṣādiṣu loṭ
GS24pmbhasuu:14936: vidhīyate . saḥ viśeṣavihitaḥ sāmānyavihitān kṛtyān bādheta . vāsarūpeṇa kṛtyāḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:14937: bhaviṣyanti . na syuḥ . kim kāraṇam . striyāḥ prāk iti vacanāt . prāk striyāḥ vā asarūpaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:14939: 366 prathamānteṣu iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . iha mā bhūt . kāle bhuṅkte . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:14940: tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . praiṣādiṣu iti vartate . tat ca avaśyam praiṣādigrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:14941: anuvartyam . prathamānteṣu iti hi ucyamāne iha api prasajyeta . kālaḥ pacati bhūtāni
GS24pmbhasuu:14945: kartavyam hiḥ parasmaipadānām yathā syāt svaḥ ātmanepadānām iti . kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:14946: . lādeśapratiṣedhārtham . lādeśau hisvau mā bhūtām iti . kim ca syāt yadi lādeśau
GS24pmbhasuu:14947: hisvau syātām . tiṅantam padam iti padasañjñā na syāt . māt bhūt evam . subantam
GS24pmbhasuu:14948: padam iti padasañjñā bhaviṣyati . katham svādyutpattiḥ . lakārasya kṛttvāt prātipadikatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:14949: tadāśrayam pratyayavidhānam . lakāraḥ kṛt . tasya kṛttvāt kṛt prātipadikam iti prātipadikasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:14950: . prātipadikāśrayā svādyutpattiḥ api bhaviṣyati . yadi svādyutpattiḥ supām śravaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:14951: prāpnoti . avyayāt iti subluk bhaviṣyati . katham avyayatvam . vibhaktisvarapratirūpakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14952: ca nipātāḥ bhavanti iti nipātasañjñā . nipātam avyayam iti avyayasañjñā . iha tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:14953: saḥ bhavān lunīhi lunīhi iti eva ayam lunāti tiṅ atiṅaḥ iti nighātaḥ na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:14954: . samasaṅkhyārtham ca . samasaṅkhyārtham ca hisvoḥ parasmaipadātmanepadagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:14955: kartavyam hiḥ parasmaipadānām yathā syāt svaḥ ātmanepadānām . vyatikaraḥ mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:14956: iti . na vā tadhvamoḥ ādeśavacanam jñāpakam padādeśasya . na vā hisvoḥ parasmaipadātmanepadagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:14957: kartavyam . kim kāraṇam . tadhvamoḥ ādeśavacanam jñāpakam padādeśasya . yat ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:14958: vā ca tadhvamoḥ iti āha tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ padādeśau hisvau iti . tatra padādeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:14959: pittvāṭoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . tatra padādeśe pittvasya āṭaḥ ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:14960: pittvasya tāvat . saḥ bhavān lunīhi lunīhi iti eva ayam lunāti . āṭaḥ khalu api .
GS24pmbhasuu:14961: saḥ aham lunīhi lunīhi iti evam lunāni . pittvasya tāvat na vaktavyaḥ . pitpratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:14962: yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . iha seḥ hi bhavati . tataḥ apit ca . apit ca bhavati yāvān
GS24pmbhasuu:14963: hiḥ nāma . āṭaḥ ca api na vaktavyaḥ . āṭi kṛte sāṭkasya ādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . idam iha sampradhāryam :
