GS24pmbhasuu:14964: āṭ kriyatām ādeśaḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt āḍāgamaḥ . nityaḥ ādeśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:14965: kṛte api āṭi prāpnoti akṛte api prāpnoti . āṭ api nityaḥ . kṛte api ādeśe prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:14966: akṛte api prāpnoti . anityaḥ āṭ . anyasya kṛte api ādeśe prāpnoti anyasya akṛte api
GS24pmbhasuu:14967: prāpnoti . śabdāntarasya ca prāpnuvan vidhiḥ anityaḥ bhavati . ādeśaḥ api anityaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14968: . anyasya kṛte āṭi prāpnoti anyasya akṛte . śabdāntarasya ca prāpnuvan vidhiḥ anityaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14969: bhavati . ubhayoḥ anityayoḥ paratvāt āḍāgamaḥ . āṭi kṛte sāṭkasya ādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:14970: . idam tarhi saḥ aham bhuṅkṣva bhuṅkṣva iti evam bhunajai iti śnasoḥ allopaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:14971: akāralopaḥ na prāpnoti . samasaṅkhyārthatvam ca api aparihṛtam eva. siddham tu loḍmadhyamapuruṣaikavacanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:14972: kriyāsamabhihāre dvirvacanāt . siddham etat . katham . loḍmadhyamapuruṣaikavacanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:14973: kriyāsamabhihāre dve bhavataḥ iti vaktavyam . kena vihitasya kriyāsamabhihāre loḍmadhyamapuruṣaikavacanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:14974: dvirvacanam ucyate . etat eva jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati kriyāsamabhihāre loṭ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:14975: yat ayam kriyāsamabhihāre loḍmadhyamapuruṣaikavacanasya dvirvacanam śāsti . kutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14976: nu khalu etat jñāpakāt atra loṭ bhaviṣyati . na punaḥ yaḥ eva asau aviśeṣavihitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14977: saḥ yadā kriyāsamabhihāre bhavati tadā asya dvirvacanam bhavati iti . loḍmadhyamapuruṣaikavacane
GS24pmbhasuu:14978: eva khalu api siddham syāt . imau ca anyau hisvau sarveṣām puruṣāṇām sarveṣām vacanānām
GS24pmbhasuu:14979: iṣyete . sūtram ca bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam hisvoḥ parasmaipadātmanepadagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:14980: lādeśapratiṣedhārtham . samasaṅkhyārtham ca iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yogavibhāgāt siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:14982: . tataḥ loṭaḥ hisvau bhavataḥ . loṭ iti eva anuvartate . loṭaḥ yau hisvau iti . katham vā ca tadhvamoḥ iti . vā ca tadhvambhāvinaḥ loṭaḥ iti evam etat vijñāyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:14984: 373 kimartham idam ucyate . anuprayogaḥ yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . hisvāntam
GS24pmbhasuu:14985: avyaktapadārthakam . tena aparisamāptaḥ arthaḥ iti kṛtvā anuprayogaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:14986: idam tarhi prayojanam . yathāvidhi iti vakṣyāmi iti . etat api na asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:14987: . samuccaye sāmānyavacanasya iti vakṣyati . tatra antareṇa vacanam yathāvidhi anuprayogaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:14989: 373-374 kimartham idam ucyate . anuprayogaḥ yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:14990: . hisvāntam avyaktapadārthakam . tena aparisamāptaḥ arthaḥ iti kṛtvā anuprayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14991: bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam . sāmānyavacanasya iti vakṣyāmi iti . etat api
GS24pmbhasuu:14992: na asti prayojanam . sāmānyavacanasya anuprayogaḥ astu viśeṣavacanasya iti sāmānyavacanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:14996: narthakam . kim kāraṇam . liṅarthatvāt . liṅarthe leṭ iti eva siddham . kaḥ punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14997: liṅarthaḥ . ke cit tāvat āhuḥ . hetuhetumatoḥ liṅ iti . apare āhuḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:14998: vaktavyaḥ eva etasmin viśeṣe liṅ . prayujyate hi loke yadi me bhavān idam kuryāt aham api te idam dadyām .
GS24pmbhasuu:15000: 375 tumarthe iti ucyate . kaḥ tumarthaḥ . kartā . yadi evam na arthaḥ tumarthagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:15001: . yena eva khalu api hetunā kartari tumun bhavati tena eva hetunā sayādayaḥ api bhaviṣyanti
GS24pmbhasuu:15002: . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat tumarthagrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ asti anyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15003: kartuḥ tumunaḥ arthaḥ iti . kaḥ punaḥ asau . bhāvaḥ . kutaḥ nu khalu etat bhāve tumun
GS24pmbhasuu:15004: bhaviṣyati . na punaḥ karmādiṣu kārakeṣu iti . jñāpakāt ayam kartuḥ apakṛṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:15005: na ca anyasmin arthe ādiśyate . anirdiṣṭārthāḥ pratyayāḥ svārthe bhavanti iti svārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:15006: bhaviṣyati tat yathā guptijkidbhyaḥ san yāvādibhyaḥ kan iti . saḥ asau svārthe bhavan
GS24pmbhasuu:15007: bhāve bhaviṣyati . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . avyayakṛtaḥ bhāve bhavanti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:15009: (P_3,4.19) KA_171.19-172.4 Ro_III,375-376 kimartham meṅaḥ sānubandhakasya āttvabhūtasya
GS24pmbhasuu:15010: grahaṇam kriyate na udīcām meṅaḥ iti eva ucyeta . tatra ayam api arthaḥ . udīcām
GS24pmbhasuu:15011: meṅaḥ iti vyatihāragrahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati . kim kāraṇam . tadviṣayaḥ hi saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15012: . vaytihāraviṣayaḥ eva mayatiḥ . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat meṅaḥ sānubandhakasya
GS24pmbhasuu:15013: āttvabhūtasya grahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na anubandhakṛtam anejantatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:15014: bhavati iti .kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . tatra asarūpasarvādeśadāppratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:15015: pṛthaktvanirdeśaḥ anākārāntatvāt iti uktam . tat na vaktavyam bhavati . kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:15016: punaḥ idam ucyate na samānakartṛkayoḥ pūrvakāle iti eva siddham . apūrvakālārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15017: ayam ārambhaḥ . pūrvam hi asau yācate paścāt apamayate .
GS24pmbhasuu:15020: pūrvam bhuṅkte paścāt vrajati . svaśabdena uktatvāt na bhavati . na tarhi idānīm idam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:15021: pūrvam bhuktvā tataḥ vrajati iti . na etat kriyāpaurvakālyam . kim tarhi . kartṛpaurvakālyam
GS24pmbhasuu:15022: . pūrvam hi asau bhuktvā anyebhyaḥ bhoktṛbhyaḥ tataḥ paścāt vrajati anyebhyaḥ vrajitṛbhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15024: āsyate bhoktum iti . kutaḥ kasmāt na bhavati . kim āseḥ āhosvit bhujeḥ . bhujeḥ kasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15025: na bhavati . apūrvakālatvāt . āseḥ tarhi kasmāt na bhavati . yasmāt atra laṭ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:15026: . etat atra praṣṭavyam . laṭ atra katham bhavati iti . laṭ ca atra vāsarūpeṇa bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:15028: 377-378 samānakartṛkayoḥ iti bahuṣu aprāptiḥ . samānakartṛkayoḥ iti bahuṣu ktvā na
GS24pmbhasuu:15029: prāpnoti . snātvā bhuktvā pītvā vrajati iti . kim puna kāraṇam na sidhyati . dvivacananirdeśāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15030: . dvivacanena ayam nirdeśaḥ kriyate . tena dvayoḥ eva paurvakālye syāt . bahūnām
GS24pmbhasuu:15031: na syāt . siddham tu kriyāpradhanatvāt . siddham etat . katham . kriyāpradhanatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15032: . kriyāpradhānaḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ . na atra nirdeśaḥ tantram . katham punaḥ tena eva
GS24pmbhasuu:15033: nāma nirdeśaḥ kriyate tat ca atantram syāt . tatkārī ca bhavān taddveṣī ca . nāntarīyakatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15034: atra dvivacanena nirdeśaḥ kriyate . avaśyam kayā cit vibhaktyā kena cit vacanena
GS24pmbhasuu:15035: nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . tat yathā kaḥ cit annārthī śālikalāpam satuṣam sapalālam āharati
GS24pmbhasuu:15036: nāntarīyakatvāt . saḥ yāvat ādeyam tāvat ādāya tuṣapalālāni utsṛjati . tathā kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15037: cit māṃsārthī matsyān saśakalān sakaṇṭakān āharati nāntarīyakatvāt . saḥ yāvat ādeyam
GS24pmbhasuu:15038: tāvat ādāya śakalakaṇṭakān utsṛjati . evam iha api nāntarīyakatvāt dvivacanena nirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15039: kriyate . na hi atra nirdeśaḥ tantram . evam api lokavijñānāt na sidhyati . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:15040: . loke brāhmaṇānām pūrvam ānīyatām iti ukte sarvapūrvaḥ ānīyate . evam iha api sarvapūrvāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15041: kriyāyāḥ prāpnoti . anantyavacanāt tu siddham . samānakartṛkayoḥ anantyasya iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:15042: . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam samānakartṛkayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15043: iti bahuṣu aprāptiḥ iti . parihṛtam etat siddham tu kriyāpradhanatvāt iti . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:15044: ca uktam evam api lokavijñānāt na sidhyati iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ sarveṣām atra vrajikriyām
GS24pmbhasuu:15045: prati paurvakālyam . snātvā vrajati bhuktvā vrajati pītvā vrajati iti . evam ca kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:15046: prayogaḥ aniyataḥ bhavati . snātvā bhuktva pītvā vrajati . pītvā snātvā bhutvā vrajati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:15048: 379 vyādāya svapiti iti upasaṅkhyānam apūrvakālatvāt . vyādāya svapiti iti upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:15049: kartavyam . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . apūrvakālatvāt . pūrvam hi asau svapiti
GS24pmbhasuu:15050: paścāt vyādadāti . na vā svapnasya avakālatvāt . na vā kartavyam . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:15051: svapnasya avakālatvāt . avarakālaḥ svapnaḥ . avaśyam asau vyādāya muhurtam api svapiti .
GS24pmbhasuu:15053: 379-381 kim iyam prāpte vibhāṣā āhosvit aprāpte . katham ca prāpte katham vā aprāpte
GS24pmbhasuu:15054: . ābhīkṣṇye iti vā nitye prāpte anyatra vā aprāpte . kim ca ataḥ . yadi prāpte ābhīkṣṇye
GS24pmbhasuu:15055: aniṣṭā vibhāṣā prāpnoti anyatra ca iṣṭā na sidhyati . atha aprāpte . agrādiṣu aprāptavidheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15056: samāsapratiṣedhaḥ . agrādiṣu aprāptavidheḥ samāsapratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . saḥ tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:15057: vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . uktam etat amā eva avyayena iti atra evakārakaraṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:15058: prajojanam . amā eva avyayena yat tulyavidhānam upapadam tatra samāsaḥ yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15059: . amā ca anyena ca yat tulyavidhānam upapadam tatra mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:15061: 381 kimartham svādumi makārāntatvam nipātyate na khamuñ prakṛtaḥ saḥ anuvartiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:15062: . svādumi māntanipātanam īkārābhāvārtham . svādumi māntanipātanam kriyate īkārābhāvārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:15063: . īkāraḥ mā bhūt iti . svādvīm kṛtvā yavāgūm bhuṅkte . svāduṅkāram yavāgūm bhuṅkte
GS24pmbhasuu:15064: . cvyantasya ca makārāntārtham . cvyantasya ca makārāntatvam nipātyate . asvādu svādu
GS24pmbhasuu:15067: 382-385 ā ca tumunaḥ samānādhikaraṇe . ā ca tumunaḥ pratyayāḥ samānādhikaraṇe vaktavyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15068: . kena . anuprayogeṇa . kim prayojanam . svāduṅkāram yavāgūḥ bhujyate devadattena
GS24pmbhasuu:15069: iti devadatte tṛtīyā yathā syāt . kim ca kāraṇam na syāt . ṇamulā abhihitaḥ kartā
GS24pmbhasuu:15070: iti . nanu ca bhujipratyayena anabhihitaḥ kartā iti kṛtvā anabhihitāśrayaḥ vidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15071: bhaviṣyati tṛtīyā . yadi sati abhidhāne ca anabhidhāne ca kutaḥ cit anabhidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:15072: iti kṛtvā anabhihitāśrayaḥ vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati tṛtīyā yavāgvām dvitīyā prāpnoti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:15073: kāraṇam . ṇamulā anabhihitam karma iti . yadi punaḥ ayam karmaṇi vijñāyeta ṇa evam
GS24pmbhasuu:15074: śakyam . iha hi svāduṅkāram yavāgūm bhuṅkte devadattaḥ iti yavāgvām dvitīyā na syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15075: . kim kāraṇam . ṇamulā abhihitam karma iti . nanu ca bhujipratyayena anabhihitam
GS24pmbhasuu:15076: karma iti kṛtvā anabhihitāśrayaḥ vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati dvitīyā . yadi sati abhidhāne
GS24pmbhasuu:15077: ca anabhidhāne ca kutaḥ cit anabhidhānam iti kṛtvā anabhihitāśrayaḥ vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:15078: dvitīyā devadatte tṛtīyā prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . ṇamulā anabhihitaḥ kartā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:15080: paktvā odanaḥ bhujyate devadattena iti . bāḍham arthaḥ . devadatte tṛtīyā yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15081: . kim ca kāraṇam na syāt . ktvayā abhihitaḥ kartā iti . nanu ca bhujipratyayena anabhihitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15082: kartā iti kṛtvā anabhihitāśrayaḥ vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati tṛtīyā . yadi sati abhidhāne ca
GS24pmbhasuu:15083: anabhidhāne ca kutaḥ cit anabhidhānam iti kṛtvā anabhihitāśrayaḥ vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:15084: tṛtīyā odane dvitīyā prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . ktvayā anabhihitam karma iti . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:15085: punaḥ ayam karmaṇi vijñāyeta ṇa evam śakyam . iha hi paktvā odanam bhuṅkte devadattaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15086: iti odane dvitīyā na syāt . kim kāraṇam . ktvayā abhihitam karma iti . nanu ca bhujipratyayena
GS24pmbhasuu:15087: anabhihitam karma iti kṛtvā anabhihitāśrayaḥ vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati dvitīyā . yadi sati
GS24pmbhasuu:15088: abhidhāne ca anabhidhāne ca kutaḥ cit anabhidhānam iti kṛtvā anabhihitāśrayaḥ vidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15089: bhaviṣyati dvitīyā devadatte tṛtīyā prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . ktvayā anabhihitaḥ kartā
GS24pmbhasuu:15090: iti . atha anena tumuni arthaḥ . bhoktum odanaḥ pacyate devadattena . bāḍham arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15091: . devadatte tṛtīyā yathā syāt . kim ca kāraṇam na syāt . tumunā abhihitaḥ kartā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:15092: . nanu ca pacipratyayena anabhihitaḥ kartā iti kṛtvā anabhihitāśrayaḥ vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:15093: tṛtīyā . yadi sati abhidhāne ca anabhidhāne ca kutaḥ cit anabhidhānam iti kṛtvā anabhihitāśrayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15094: vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati tṛtīyā odane dvitīyā prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . tumunā anabhihitam
GS24pmbhasuu:15095: karma iti . yadi punaḥ ayam karmaṇi vijñāyeta ṇa evam śakyam . iha hi bhoktum odanam
GS24pmbhasuu:15096: pacati devadattaḥ iti odane dvitīyā na syāt . kim kāraṇam . tumunā abhihitam karma
GS24pmbhasuu:15097: iti . nanu ca pacipratyayena anabhihitam karma iti kṛtvā anabhihitāśrayaḥ vidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15098: bhaviṣyati dvitīyā . yadi sati abhidhāne ca anabhidhāne ca kutaḥ cit anabhidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:15099: iti kṛtvā anabhihitāśrayaḥ vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati dvitīyā devadatte tṛtīyā prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:15100: kim kāraṇam . tumunā anabhihitaḥ kartā iti . atha anena iha arthaḥ paktvā odanam
GS24pmbhasuu:15101: grāmaḥ gamyate devadattena . bāḍham arthaḥ . devadatte tṛtīyā yathā syāt . kim ca
GS24pmbhasuu:15102: kāraṇam na syāt . ktvayā abhihitaḥ kartā iti . nanu ca gamipratyayena anabhihitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15103: kartā iti kṛtvā anabhihitāśrayaḥ vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati tṛtīyā . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:15104: sati abhidhāne ca anabhidhāne ca kutaḥ cit anabhidhānam iti kṛtvā anabhihitāśrayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15105: vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati tṛtīyā yat uktam odane dvitīyā prāpnoti iti saḥ doṣaḥ na jāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:15106: . tat tarhi vaktavyam ā ca tumunaḥ samānādhikaraṇe iti . na vaktavyam . avyayakṛtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15107: bhāve bhavanti iti bhāve bhaviṣyanti . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam
GS24pmbhasuu:15108: gaṃsyate . tumarthe iti vartate . tumarthaḥ ca kaḥ . bhāvaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:15110: 385 ūlopaścāsyānyatarasyāṅgrahaṇam śakyam akartum . katham goṣpadam vṛṣṭaḥ devaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15111: iti . prātiḥ pūraṇakarmā . tasmāt eṣaḥ kaḥ . yadi kaḥ vibhatīnām śravaṇam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:15112: . śrūyante eva atra vibhaktayaḥ . tat yathā ekena goṣpadapreṇa .
GS24pmbhasuu:15114: 386 hanaḥ karaṇe anarthakam vacanam hiṃsārthebhyaḥ ṇamulvidhānāt . hanaḥ karaṇe anarthakam
GS24pmbhasuu:15115: vacanam . kim kāraṇam . hiṃsārthebhyaḥ ṇamulvidhānāt . hiṃsārthebhyaḥ ṇamulvidhīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:15116: . tena eva siddham . arthavat tu ahiṃsārthasya vidhānāt . arthavat tu hanteḥ ṇamulvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:15117: . kaḥ arthaḥ . ahiṃsārthasya vidhānāt . ahiṃsārthānām ṇamul yathā syāt . asti punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15118: ayam kva cit hantiḥ ahiṃsārthaḥ yadarthaḥ vidhiḥ syāt . asti iti āha . pāṇyupaghātam
GS24pmbhasuu:15119: vedim hanti . nityasamāsārtham ca . nityasamāsārtham ca hiṃsārthāt api hanteḥ anena
GS24pmbhasuu:15120: vidhiḥ eṣitavyaḥ . katham punaḥ icchatā api hiṃsārthāt hanteḥ anena vidhiḥ labhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15121: . anena astu tena vā iti tena syāt vipratiṣedhena . hanteḥ pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ vārttikena
GS24pmbhasuu:15122: eva jñāpitaḥ . yat ayam nityasamāsārtham ca iti āha tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ hiṃsārthāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15123: api hanteḥ anena vidhiḥ bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:15125: 387 iha kasmāt na bhavati . grāme baddhaḥ iti . evam vakṣyāmi . adhikaraṇe bandhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15126: sañjñāyām . tataḥ kartroḥ jīvapuruṣayoḥ naśivahoḥ iti . katham aṭṭālikābandham baddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15127: caṇḍālikābanadham baddhaḥ . upamāne karmaṇi ca iti evam bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:15129: 387 ayuktaḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ . tiraści iti bhavitavyam . sautraḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:15131: 387-388 arthagrahaṇam kimartham . nādhāpratyaye iti iyati ucyamāne iha eva syāt dvidhākṛtya
GS24pmbhasuu:15132: . iha na syāt dvaidhaṅkṛtya . arthagrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ bhavati . nādhāpratyaye
GS24pmbhasuu:15133: siddham bhavati yaḥ ca anyaḥ tena samānārthaḥ . atha pratyayagrahaṇam kimartham iha
GS24pmbhasuu:15134: mā bhūt hiruk kṛtvā pṛthak kṛtvā .
GS24pmbhasuu:15136: 388 ayuktaḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ . anūci iti bhavitavyam . sautraḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:15138: 388-393 kimartham idam ucyate . kartari kṛdvacanam anādeśe svāṛthavijñānāt . kartari
GS24pmbhasuu:15139: kṛtaḥ bhavanti iti ucyate anādeśe svāṛthavijñānāt . anirdiṣṭārthāḥ pratyayāḥ svārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:15140: bhavanti . tat yathā . guptijkidbhyaḥ san yāvādibhyaḥ kan iti . evam ime api pratyayāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15141: svārthe syuḥ . svārthe mā bhūvan kartari yathā syuḥ iti evamartham idam ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:15142: na etat asti prayojanam . yam icchati svārthe āha tam . bhāve ghañ bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:15143: karmaṇi tarhi mā bhūvan iti . karmaṇi api yam icchati āha tam . dhaḥ karmaṇi ṣṭran
GS24pmbhasuu:15144: iti . karaṇādhikaraṇayoḥ tarhi mā bhūvan iti . karaṇādhikaraṇayoḥ api yam icchati
GS24pmbhasuu:15145: āha tam . lyuṭ karaṇādhikaraṇayoḥ bhavati iti . sampradānāpādānayoḥ tarhi mā bhūvan
GS24pmbhasuu:15146: iti . sampradānāpādānayoḥ api yam icchati āha tam . dāśagoghnau sampradāne bhīmādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15147: apādāne iti . yaḥ idānīm anyaḥ pratyayaḥ śeṣaḥ saḥ antareṇa vacanam kartari eva bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:15148: . tat eva tarhi prayojanam svārthe mā bhūvan iti . nanu ca uktam yam icchati svārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:15149: āha tam . bhāve ghañ bhavati iti . anyaḥ saḥ bhāvaḥ bāhyaḥ prakṛtyarthāt . anena
GS24pmbhasuu:15150: idānīm ābhyantare bhāve syuḥ . tatra mā bhūvan iti kartṛgrahaṇam . kaḥ punaḥ anayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15151: bhāvayoḥ viśeṣaḥ . uktaḥ bhāvabhedaḥ bhāṣye . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti
GS24pmbhasuu:15152: . tatra khyunādipratiṣedhaḥ nānāvākyatvāt . tatra khyunādīnām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15153: . khyunādayaḥ kartari mā bhūvan iti . nanu ca karaṇe khunādayaḥ vidhīyante . te kartari
GS24pmbhasuu:15154: na bhaviṣyanti . tena ca karaṇe syuḥ anena ca kartari . nanu ca apavādatvāt khyunādayḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15155: bādhakāḥ syuḥ . na syuḥ . kim kāraṇam . nānāvākyatvāt . nānāvākyam tat ca idam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:15156: . samānavākye apavādaiḥ utsargāhḥ bādhyante . nānāvākyatvāt bādhanam na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:15157: . tadvat ca kṛtyeṣu evakārakaraṇam . evam ca kṛtvā kṛtyeṣu evakāraḥ kriyate . tayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15158: eva kṛtyaktakhalarthāḥ iti bhāve ca akarmakebhyaḥ iti . kim prayojanam . tat ca bhavyādyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:15159: . bhavyādiṣu samāveśaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . geyaḥ māṇavakaḥ sāmnām . geyāni māṇavakena
GS24pmbhasuu:15160: sāmāni iti . ṛṣidevatayoḥ tu kṛdbhiḥ samāveśavacanam jñāpakam asamāveśasya . yat
GS24pmbhasuu:15161: ayam kartari ca ṛṣidevatayoḥ iti siddhe sati samāveśe samāveśārtham cakāram śāsti
GS24pmbhasuu:15162: tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na bhavati samāveśaḥ iti . kimartham tarhi kṛtyeṣu evakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15163: kriyate . evakārakaraṇam ca cārthe . evakārakaraṇam ca cārthe draṣṭavyam . tayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15164: bhāvakarmaṇoḥ kṛtyā bhavanti bhavyādīnām kartari ca iti . kim prayojanam . tat ca
GS24pmbhasuu:15165: bhavyādyartham . bhavyādiṣu samāveśaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . geyaḥ māṇavakaḥ sāmnām .
GS24pmbhasuu:15166: geyāni māṇavakena sāmāni iti . yat tāvat ucyate ṛṣidevatayoḥ tu kṛdbhiḥ samāveśavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:15167: jñāpakam asamāveśasya iti . na etat jñāpakasādhyam apavādaiḥ utsargāḥ apavādaiḥ bādhyante
GS24pmbhasuu:15168: iti . eṣaḥ eva nyāyaḥ yat uta apavādaiḥ utsargāḥ bādhyeran . nanu ca uktam nānāvākyatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15169: bādhanam na prāpnoti iti . na videśastham iti kṛtvā nānāvākyam bhavati . videśastham
GS24pmbhasuu:15170: api sat ekavākyam bhavati . tat yathā dvitīye adhyāye luk ucyate . tasya caturthaṣaṣṭhayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15171: aluk ucyate apavādaḥ . yat api ucyate evakārakaraṇam ca cārthe iti . katham punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15172: anyaḥ nāma anyasya arthe vartate . katham evakāraḥ cārthe vartate . saḥ eṣaḥ evakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15173: svārthe vartate . kim prayojanam . jñāpakārtham . etat jñāpayati acāryaḥ itaḥ uttaram
GS24pmbhasuu:15174: samāveśaḥ bhavati iti . kim etasya jñapane prayojanam . tat ca bhavyādyartham . bhavyādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:15175: samāveśaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . geyaḥ māṇavakaḥ sāmnām . geyāni māṇavakena sāmāni iti
GS24pmbhasuu:15176: . yadi etat jñapyate iha api samāveśaḥ prāpnoti dāśagoghnau sampradāne bhīmādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15177: apādāne iti . atra api siddham bhavati . yat ayam ādikarmaṇi ktaḥ kartari ca iti
GS24pmbhasuu:15178: siddhe samāveśe samāveśam śāsti tat jñapayati ācāryaḥ prāk amutaḥ samāveśaḥ bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:15181: dhātoḥ paraḥ akāraḥ akaśabdaḥ vā niyogataḥ kartāram bruvan kṛtsañjñaḥ ca bhavati pratyayasañjñaḥ ca iti . āhosvit sañjñāniyamaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:15182: dhātoḥ paraḥ akāraḥ akaśabdaḥ vā svabhāvataḥ kartāram bruvan kṛtsañjñaḥ ca bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:15183: pratyayasañjñaḥ ca iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . tatra pratyayaniyame aniṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15184: . tatra pratyayaniyame sati aniṣṭam prāpnoti . kāṣṭhabhit abrāhmaṇaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:15185: balabhit abrāhmaṇaḥ . eṣaḥ api niyogataḥ kartāram bruvan kṛtsañjñaḥ ca syāt pratyayasañjñaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15186: ca . sañjñāniyame siddham . sañjñāniyame sati siddham bhavati . yadi sañjñāniyamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15187: vibhaktādiṣu doṣaḥ . vibhaktāḥ bhrātaraḥ pītāḥ gāvaḥ iti na sidhyati . pratyayaniyame
GS24pmbhasuu:15188: punaḥ sati parigaṇitābhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaḥ paraḥ ktaḥ niyogataḥ kartāram āha . na ca
GS24pmbhasuu:15189: imāḥ tatra parigaṇyante prakṛtayaḥ . vibhaktādiṣu ca aprāptiḥ prakṛteḥ pratyayaparavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15190: . vibhaktādiṣu ca pratyayaniyamasya aprāptiḥ . kim kāraṇam . prakṛteḥ pratyayaparavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15191: . parigaṇitābhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaḥ paraḥ ktaḥ svabhāvataḥ kartāram āha . na ca imāḥ tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:15192: parigaṇyante . na tarhi idānīm ayam sādhuḥ bhavati . bhavati sādhuḥ na tu kartari
GS24pmbhasuu:15193: . katham tarhi idānīm atra kartṛtvam gamyate . akāraḥ matvarthīyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:15194: vibhaktam eṣām asti vibhaktāḥ . pītam eṣām asti pitāḥ iti . atha vā uttarapadalopaḥ atra draṣṭavyaḥ . vibhaktadhanāḥ vibhaktāḥ . pītodakāḥ pitāḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:15196: 396-400 kimartham idam ucyate . laḥ eṣu sādhaneṣu yathā syāt kartari ca karmaṇi ca
GS24pmbhasuu:15197: bhāve ca akarmakebhyaḥ iti . na etat asti prayojanam . bhāvakarmaṇoḥ ātmanepadam
GS24pmbhasuu:15198: vidhīyate śeṣāt kartari parasmaipadam . etāvān ca laḥ yat uta parasmaipadam ātmanepadam
GS24pmbhasuu:15199: ca . saḥ ca ayam evam vihitaḥ . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . lagrahaṇam sakarmakanivṛttyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:15200: . lagrahaṇam kriyate sakarmakanivṛttyartham . sakarmakāṇām bhāve laḥ mā bhūte iti
GS24pmbhasuu:15201: . yadi punaḥ tatra eva akarmakagrahaṇam kriyeta . tatra akarmakagrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:15202: . nanu ca iha api kriyate bhāve ca akarmakebhyaḥ iti . parārtham etat bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:15203: . tayoḥ eva kṛtyaktakhalarthāḥ bhāve ca akarmakebhyaḥ . yāvat iha lagrahaṇam tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:15204: tatra akarmakagrahaṇam . iha vā lagrahaṇam kriyeta tatra vā akarmakagrahaṇam . kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15205: nu atra viśeṣaḥ . ayam asti viśeṣaḥ . iha lagrahaṇe kriyamāṇe ānaḥ kartari siddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15206: bhavati . tatra punaḥ akarmakagrahaṇe kriyamāṇe ānaḥ kartari na prāpnoti . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:15207: api akarmakagrahaṇe kriyamāṇe ānaḥ kartari siddhaḥ bhavati . katham . bhāvakarmaṇoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15208: iti ataḥ anyat yat ātmanepadānukramaṇam sarvam tat kartrartham . vipratiṣedhāt vā
GS24pmbhasuu:15209: ānaḥ kartari . vipratiṣedhāt vā ānaḥ kartari bhaviṣyati . tatra bhāvakarmaṇoḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:15210: etat astu kartari kṛt iti . kartari kṛt iti etat bhaviṣyati vipratiṣedhena . sarvaprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15211: tu . sarvebhyaḥ tu dhātubhyaḥ ānaḥ kartari prāpnoti . parasmaipadibhyaḥ api . na
GS24pmbhasuu:15212: eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . anudāttaṅitaḥ iti eṣaḥ yogaḥ niyamārthaḥ bhaviṣyati . yadi eṣaḥ yogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15213: niyamārthaḥ vidhiḥ na prakalpate . āste śete iti . atha vidhyarthaḥ ānasya niyamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15214: na prāpnoti . āsīnaḥ śayānaḥ . tathā neḥ viśaḥ iti evamādi anukramaṇam yadi niyamāṛthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15215: vidhiḥ na prakalpate . atha vidhyarthaḥ ānasya niyamaḥ na prāpnoti . astu tarhi niyamārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:15216: . nanu ca uktam vidhiḥ na prakalpate iti . vidhiḥ ca prakḷptaḥ . katham . bhāvakarmaṇoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15217: iti atra anudāttaṅitaḥ iti etat anuvartiṣyate . yadi anuvartate evam api anudāttaṅitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15218: eva bhāvakarmaṇoḥ ātmanepadam prāpnoti . evam tarhi yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . anudāttaṅitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15219: ātmanepadam bhavati . tataḥ bhāvakarmaṇoḥ . tataḥ kartari . kartari ca ātmanepadam
GS24pmbhasuu:15220: bhavati anudāttaṅitaḥ iti eva . bhāvakarmaṇoḥ iti nivṛttam . tataḥ karmavyatihāre
GS24pmbhasuu:15221: . kartari iti eva anuvartate . anudāttaṅitaḥ iti api nivṛttam . yat api ucyate neḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15222: viśaḥ iti evamādi anukramaṇam yadi niyamārtham vidhiḥ na prakalpate . atha vidhyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15223: ānasya niyamaḥ na prāpnoti iti . astu vidhyartham . nanu ca uktam ānasya niyamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15224: na prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yathā eva atra aprāptāḥ taṅaḥ bhavanti evam ānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15225: api bhaviṣyati . sarvatra aprasaṅgaḥ tu . sarveṣu tu sādhaneṣu ānaḥ na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:15226: vipratiṣedhāt vā ānaḥ kartari iti bhāvakarmaṇoḥ na syāt . kartari eva syāt . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:15227: punaḥ lagrahaṇe kriyamāṇe kartari kṛt iti etat astu laḥ karmaṇi ca bhāve ca akarmakebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15228: iti laḥ karmaṇi ca bhāve ca akarmakebhyaḥ iti etat bhaviṣyat vipratiṣedhena . sarvaprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15229: tu . lādeśaḥ sarveṣu sādhaneṣu prāpnoti . śatṛkvasūca bhāvakarmaṇoḥ api prāpnutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15230: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . śeṣāt parasmaipadam kartari iti evam tau kartāram hriyete .
GS24pmbhasuu:15232: 400-402 lādeśe sarvaprasaṅgaḥ aviśeṣāt ḷādeśe sarvaprasaṅgaḥ . sarvasya lakārasya ādeśaḥ prāpnoti . asya api prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:15233: lunāti labhate . kim kāraṇam . aviśeṣāt . na hi kaḥ cit viśeṣaḥ upādīyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:15234: evañjātīyakasya lakārasya ādeśaḥ bhavati iti . anupādīyamāne viśeṣe sarvaprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15235: . arthavadgrahaṇāt siddham . arthavataḥ lakārasya grahaṇam na ca eṣaḥ artahvat .
GS24pmbhasuu:15236: arthavadgrahaṇāt siddham iti cet na varṇagrahaṇeṣu . arthavadgrahaṇāt siddham iti
GS24pmbhasuu:15237: cet tat na . kim kāraṇam . varṇagrahaṇam idam . na ca etat varṇagrahaṇeṣu bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:15238: arthavadgrahaṇe na anarthakasya iti . tasmāt viśiṣtagrahaṇam . tasmāt viśiṣtasya
GS24pmbhasuu:15239: lakārasya grahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . dhātoḥ iti vartate . evam api śālā
GS24pmbhasuu:15240: mālā mallaḥ iti atra prāpnoti . uṇādayaḥ avyutpannāni prātipadikāni . evam api nandanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15241: atra prāpnoti . itsañjñā atra bādhikā bhaviṣyati . iha api tarhi bādheta . pacati
GS24pmbhasuu:15242: paṭhati iti . itkāryābhāvāt atra itsañjñā na bhaviṣyati . idam asti itkāryam liti
GS24pmbhasuu:15243: pratyayāt pūrvam udāttam bhavati iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ yathā syāt . liti iti ucyate . na
GS24pmbhasuu:15244: ca atra litam paśyāmaḥ . atha api katham cit vacanāt vā anuvartanāt vā itsañjñkānām
GS24pmbhasuu:15245: ādeśaḥ syāt evam api na doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na lādeśe litkāryam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:15246: iti yat ayam ṇalam litam karoti . atha api uṇādayaḥ vyutpādyante evam api no doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15249: 402 lādeśaḥ varṇavidheḥ pūrvavipratiṣiddham . lādeśaḥ varṇavidheḥ bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:15250: . lādeśasya avakāśaḥ pacatu paṭhatu . varṇavidheḥ avakāśaḥ dadhyatra madhvatra .
GS24pmbhasuu:15251: iha ubhayam prāpnoti . pacatu atra . paṭhatu atra . lādeśaḥ bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:15252: . saḥ tarhi pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . uktam vā . kim uktam .
GS24pmbhasuu:15255: 403-404 ṭitaḥ etve ātmanepadeṣu ānapratiṣedhaḥ . ṭitaḥ etve ātmanepadeṣu ānapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15256: vaktavyaḥ . pacamānaḥ yajamānaḥ . ṭitaḥ iti etvam prāpnoti . uktam vā . kim uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:15257: . jñāpakam vā sānubandhakasya ādeśavacane itkāryābhāvasya iti . na etat asti uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:15258: . evam kila tat uktam syāt yadi evam vijñāyeta . ṭit ātmanepadam ṭidātmanepadam .
GS24pmbhasuu:15259: ṭidātmanepadānām iti . tat ca na . ṭitaḥ lakārasya yāni ātmanepadāni iti evam etat
GS24pmbhasuu:15260: vijñāyate . avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam . ṭit ātmanepadam ṭidātmanepadam . ṭidātmanepadānām
GS24pmbhasuu:15261: iti vijñāyamāne akurvi atra api prasajyeta . na eṣaḥ ṭit . kaḥ tarhi . ṭhit . saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15262: ca avaśyam ṭhit kartavyaḥ ādiḥ mā bhūt iti . katham iṭaḥ at iti . iṭhaḥ at iti vakṣyāmi
GS24pmbhasuu:15263: iti . tat ca avaśyam vaktavyam paryavapādyasya mā bhūt . laviṣīṣṭa . iha tarhi iṣam
GS24pmbhasuu:15264: ūrjam aham itaḥ ādi ātaḥ lopaḥ iṭi ca iti ākāralopaḥ na prāpnoti . tasmāt ṭit eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15265: . ādiḥ tarhi kasmāt na bhavati . saptadaśa ādeśāḥ sthāneyogatvam prayojayanti . tān
GS24pmbhasuu:15266: ekaḥ na utsahate vihantum iti kṛtvā ādiḥ na bhaviṣyati . paryavapādyasya kasmāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:15267: bhavati . laviṣīṣṭa iti . asiddham bahiraṅgalakṣaṇam antaraṅgalakṣaṇe iti . idam
GS24pmbhasuu:15268: tarhi uktam prākṛtānām ātmanepadānām etvam bhavati iti . ke ca prakṛtāḥ . tādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15269: . āne muk jñāpakam tu etve ṭittaṅām . iśisīricaḥ ḍārauraḥsu . ṭit aṭitaḥ . prakṛte tat . guṇe katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:15271: 405-407 ṇalaḥ śitkaraṇam sarvādeśārtham . ṇal śit kartavyaḥ . kim prayojanam . sarvādeśārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:15272: . śit sarvasya iti sarvādeśaḥ yathā syāt . akriyamāṇe hi śakāre alaḥ antyasya vidhayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15273: bhavanti iti antyasya prasajyeta . uktam vā . kim uktam . anittvāt siddham iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:15274: ṇakāraḥ kriyate . tasya anittvāt siddham . kaḥ eṣaḥ parihāraḥ nyāyyaḥ . śakāram asi
GS24pmbhasuu:15275: coditaḥ . ṇakāram kariṣyāmi śakāram na kariṣyāmi iti . ṇakāraḥ atra kriyeta śakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15276: vā kaḥ nu atra viśeṣaḥ . avaśyam atra ṇakāraḥ vṛddhyarthaḥ kartavyaḥ ṇiti iti vṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15277: yathā syāt . na arthaḥ vṛddhyarthena ṇakāreṇa . ṇittve yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . idam
GS24pmbhasuu:15278: asti gotaḥ ṇit . tataḥ al . al ca ṇit bhavati . tataḥ uttamaḥ vā iti . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:15279: lakāraḥ kriyate . tasya anittvāt siddham . kaḥ eṣaḥ parihāraḥ nyāyyaḥ . śakāram asi
GS24pmbhasuu:15280: coditaḥ . lakāram kariṣyāmi śakāram na kariṣyāmi iti . lakāraḥ atra kriyeta śakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15281: vā kaḥ nu atra viśeṣaḥ . avaśyam eva atra svarārthaḥ lakāraḥ kartavyaḥ liti pratyayāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15282: pūrvam udāttam bhavati iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . dhātusvare
GS24pmbhasuu:15283: kṛte dvirvacanam . tatra āntaryataḥ antodāttasya antodāttaḥ ādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:15284: punaḥ ayam antodāttaḥ syāt yadā ekāc . vyapadeśivadbhāvena . yathā eva tarhi vyapadeśivadbhāvena
GS24pmbhasuu:15285: antodāttaḥ evam ādyudāttaḥ api . tatra āntaryataḥ ādyudāttasya ādyudāttaḥ ādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15286: prasajyeta . satyam etat . na tu idam lakṣaṇam asti dhātoḥ ādiḥ udāttaḥ bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:15287: . idam punaḥ asti dhātoḥ antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati iti . saḥ asau lakṣaṇena antodāttaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15288: . tatra āntaryataḥ antodāttasya antodāttaḥ ādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . etat api ādeśe na
GS24pmbhasuu:15289: asti ādeśasya antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati iti . prakṛtitaḥ anena svaraḥ labhyaḥ . prakṛtiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15290: ca asya yathā eva antodāttā evam ādyudāttā api . dviḥprayoge ca api dvirvacane ubhayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15291: antodāttatvam prasajyeta . anudāttam padam ekavarjam iti na asti yaugapadyena sambhavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15292: . paryāyaḥ prasajyeta . tasmāt svarārthaḥ lakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . lakāraḥ kriyate . tasya anittvāt siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:15294: 407-408 akārasya śitkaraṇam sarvādeśārtham . akāraḥ śitkartavyaḥ . kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:15295: . sarvādeśārtham . śit sarvasya iti sarvādeśaḥ yathā syāt . akriyamāṇe hi śakāre
GS24pmbhasuu:15296: alaḥ antyasya vidhayaḥ bhavanti iti antyasya prasajyeta . nanu ca akārasya akāravacane
GS24pmbhasuu:15297: prayojanam na asti iti kṛtvā antareṇa śakāram sarvādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . asti anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:15298: akārasya akāravacane prayojanam . kim . akāravacanam samasaṅkhyārtham . saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15299: yathā syāt . tasmāt śitkaraṇam . tasmāt śakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:15300: nyāse eva . praśliṣṭanirdeśaḥ ayam . a* a* a . saḥ anekālśit sarvasya iti sarvādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:15303: vaktavyaḥ . yāntu vāntu . laṅaḥ śākaṭāyanasya eva iti jusbhāvaḥ prāpnoti . utvavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15304: siddham . utvam atra bādhakam bhaviṣyati . anavakāśāḥ hi vidhayaḥ bādhakāḥ bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:15305: . sāvakāśam ca utvam . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . pacatu paṭhatu . atra api ikāralopaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:15306: . tat yathā eva utvam ikāralopam bādhate evam jusbhāvam api bādhate . na bādhate
GS24pmbhasuu:15307: . kim kāraṇam . yena na aprāpte tasya bādhanam bhavati . na ca aprāpte ikāralope
GS24pmbhasuu:15308: utvam ārabhyate . jusbhāve punaḥ prāpte ca aprāpte ca . atha vā purastāt apavādāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15309: anantarān vidhīn bādhante iti evam utvam ikāralopam bādhate jubhāvam na bādhate .
GS24pmbhasuu:15310: evam tarhi vakṣyati tatra laṅgrahaṇasya prayojanam . laṅ eva yaḥ laṅ tatra yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:15311: syāt . laṅvadbhāvena yaḥ laṅ tatra mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:15314: 409 hinyoḥ utvapratiṣedhaḥ . hinyoḥ ukārasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . lunīhi lunāni
GS24pmbhasuu:15315: . eḥ uḥ iti utvam prāpnoti . na vā uccāraṇasāmarthyāt . na vā vaktavyaḥ . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:15316: . uccāraṇasāmarthyāt atra utvam na bhaviṣyati . alaghīyaḥ ca eva hi ikāroccāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:15317: ukāroccāraṇāt . ikāram ca uccārayati ukāram ca na uccārayati . tasya etat prayojanam utvam mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:15319: 409-410 etaḥ aitve ādguṇapratiṣedhaḥ . etaḥ aitve ādguṇasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . pacāva idam (pacāvedam)
GS24pmbhasuu:15321: . ādguṇe kṛte eta ait iti aitvam prāpnoti . na vā bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . na vā vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15322: . kim kāraṇam . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇaḥ ādguṇaḥ antaraṅgalakṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:15325: 410-411 yāsuḍādeḥ sīyuṭpratiṣedhaḥ . yāsuḍādeḥ sīyuṭaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . cinuyuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15326: sunuyuḥ . liṅaḥ sīyuṭ iti sīyuṭ prāpnoti . na vā vākyāpakarṣāt . na vā vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15327: . kim kāraṇam . vākyāpakarṣāt . vākyāpakarṣāt yāsuṭ sīyuṭam bādhiṣyate . suṭtithoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15328: tu apakarṣavijñānam . suṭaḥ tithoḥ tu apakarṣaḥ vijñāyeta . kṛṣīṣṭa kṛṣīṣṭhāḥ . anādeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15329: ca suḍvacanam . anādeḥ ca suṭ vaktavyaḥ . kṛṣīyāstām kṛṣīyāsthām . takārathakārādeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15330: liṅaḥ iti suṭ na prāpnoti . na vā tithoḥ pradhānabhāvāt tadviśeṣaṇam liṅgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:15331: . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam . tithoḥ pradhānabhāvāt . tithau eva tatra pradhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:15332: . tadviśeṣaṇam liṅgrahaṇam . na evam vijñāyate . takārathakārayoḥ liṅaḥ iti . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:15333: tarhi . takārathakārayoḥ suṭ bhavati tau cet liṅaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:15335: 411-412 kimartham yāsuṭaḥ ṅittvam ucyate . yāsuṭaḥ ṅidvacanam pidartham . piti vacanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:15336: prayojayanti . atha kimartham udāttavacanam kriyate . udāttavacanam ca . kim . pidartham
GS24pmbhasuu:15337: eva . āgamānudāttārtham vā . atha vā etat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ āgamāḥ anudāttāḥ bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:15338: iti . asati anyasmin prayojane jñāpakam bhavati . uktam ca etat yāsuṭaḥ ṅidvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:15339: pidartham udāttavacanam ca iti . śakyam anena vaktum yāsuṭ parasmaipadeṣu bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:15340: apit ca liṅ bhavati iti . saḥ ayam evam laghīyasā nyāsena siddhe sati yat garīyāṃsam
GS24pmbhasuu:15341: yatnam ārabhate tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ āgamāḥ anudāttāḥ bhavanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:15343: 412-414 kim idam jusi ākāragrahaṇam niyamārtham āhosvit prāpakam . katham ca niyamārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:15344: syāt katham vā prāpakam . yadi sijgrahaṇam anuvartate tataḥ niyamārtham . atha nivṛttam
GS24pmbhasuu:15345: tataḥ prāpakam . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . jusi ākāragrahaṇam niyamārtham iti cet sijluggrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:15346: . jusi ākāragrahaṇam niyamārtham iti cet sijluggrahaṇam kartavyam . ātaḥ sijlugantāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15347: iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . akārṣuḥ ahārṣuḥ . astu tarhi prāpakam . prāpakam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:15348: cet pratyayalakṣaṇapratiṣedhaḥ . prāpakam iti cet pratyayalakṣaṇapratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15349: . abhūvan iti pratyayalakṣaṇena jusbhāvaḥ prāpnoti . evakārakaraṇam ca . evakārakaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:15350: ca kartavyam . laṅaḥ śākaṭāyanasya eva iti . niyamāṛthaḥ punaḥ sati na arthaḥ evakāreṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:15351: . nanu ca prāpake api sati siddhi vidhiḥ ārabhyamāṇaḥ antareṇa evakāram niyamārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15352: bhaviṣyati . iṣṭataḥ avadhāraṇārthaḥ tarhi evakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . yathā evam vijñāyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:15353: laṅaḥ śākaṭāyanasya eva . mā evam vijñāyi laṅaḥ eva śākaṭāyanasya iti . kim ca syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15354: . luṅaḥ śākaṭāyanasya na syāt . aduḥ apuḥ adhuḥ asthuḥ . laṅgrahaṇam ca . laṅgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:15355: ca kartavyam . laṅaḥ śākaṭāyanasya eva iti . niyamārthe punaḥ sati na arthaḥ laṅgrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:15356: . ātaḥ ṅitaḥ iti vartate . na ca anyaḥ ākārāt anantaraḥ ṅit asti anyat ataḥ laṅaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15357: . astu tarhi niyamārthaḥ . nanu ca uktam jusi ākāragrahaṇam niyamārtham iti cet sijluggrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:15358: iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . tulyajātīyasya niyamaḥ . kaḥ ca tulyajātīyaḥ . yaḥ dvābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:15359: anantaraḥ ātaḥ ca sicaḥ ca . atha tat evakārakaraṇam na eva kartavyam . kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:15360: ca . kim prayojanam . uttarārtham . liṭ ca liṅ āśiṣi ārdhadhātukam eva yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15361: . itarathā hi vacanāt ārdhadhātukasañjñā syāt tiṅgrahaṇena ca grahaṇāt sārvadhātukasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:15362: . atha tat laṅgrahaṇam na eva kartavyam . kartavyam ca . kim prayojanam . laṅ eva
GS24pmbhasuu:15363: yaḥ laṅ tatra yathā syāt . laṅvadbhāvena yaḥ laṅ tatra mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:15366: kartavyam . dhātoḥ parasya ārdhadhātukasañjñā yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt . vṛkṣatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:15367: vṛkṣatā iti . kriyamāṇe ca api dhātugrahaṇe svādipratiṣedhaḥ . svādīnām pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15368: vaktavyaḥ . iha mā bhūt . lūbhyām lūbhiḥ iti . anukrāntāpekṣam śeṣagrahaṇam .evam
GS24pmbhasuu:15369: api agnikāmpyati vāyukāmyati iti prāpnoti . tasmāt dhātugrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:15370: . ā tṛtīyādhyāyaparisamāpteḥ dhātvadhikāraḥ prakṛtaḥ anuvartate . kva prakṛtaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:15371: dhātoḥ ekācaḥ halādeḥ iti . evam api śrīkāmyati bhūkāmyati iti prāpnoti . tadvidhānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15372: siddham . vihitaviśeṣaṇam dhātugrahaṇam . dhātoḥ yaḥ vihitaḥ iti . dhātoḥ eṣaḥ vihitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15373: . saṅkīrtya dhātoḥ iti evam yaḥ vihitaḥ iti.
GS24pmbhasuu:15375: 419-428 ṅyāpprātipadikagrahaṇam kimartham . ṅyāpprātipadikāt yathā syuḥ . dhātoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15376: mā bhūvan iti . na etat asti prayojanam . dhātoḥ tavyādayaḥ vidhīyante . te apavādatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15377: bādhakāḥ bhaviṣyanti . tiṅantāt tarhi mā bhūvan iti . ekatvādiṣu artheṣu svādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15378: vidhīyante . te ca atra tiṅā uktāḥ ekatvādayaḥ iti kṛtvā uktārthatvān na bhaviṣyanti
GS24pmbhasuu:15379: . ṭābādayaḥ tarhi tiṅantāt mā bhūvan iti . striyām ṭābādayaḥ vidhīyante . na ca tiṅantasya
GS24pmbhasuu:15380: strītvena yogaḥ asti . aṇādayaḥ tarhi tiṅantāt mā bhūvan iti . apatyādiṣv artheṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:15381: aṇādayaḥ vidhīyante . na ca tiṅantasya apatyādibhiḥ yogaḥ asti . atha api katham
GS24pmbhasuu:15382: cit yogaḥ syāt evam api na doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na tiṅantāt aṇādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15383: bhavanti iti yat ayam kva cit taddhitavidhau tiṅgrahaṇam karoti . atiśāyane tamabiṣṭhanau
GS24pmbhasuu:15384: tiṅaḥ ca iti . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . ṅyāpprātipadikagrahaṇam aṅgabhapadasañjñārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:15386: yathā syuḥ iti . kva punaḥ iha aṅgabhapadasañjñārthena ṅyāpprātipadikagrahaṇena arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15387: . ṭābādiṣu . na etat asti prayojanam . grahaṇavadbhyaḥ ṭābādayaḥ vidhīyante . ugitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15388: ṅīp bhavati ataḥ ṭāp bhavati iti . yat tat śabdasvarūpam gṛhyate tasmāt tadutpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15389: . tasya etāḥ sañjñāḥ bhaviṣyanti . atha api kaḥ cit agrahaṇaḥ evam api adoṣaḥ . striyām
GS24pmbhasuu:15390: ṭābādayaḥ vidhīyante . yat tat śabdasvarūpam striyām vartate tasmāt tadutpattiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:15391: tasya etāḥ sañjñāḥ bhaviṣyanti . aṇādiṣu tarhi . aṇādayaḥ api grahaṇavadbhyaḥ ṭābādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15392: vidhīyante . gargādibhyaḥ yañ naḍādibhyaḥ phak iti . yat tat śabdasvarūpam gṛhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:15393: tasmāt tadutpattiḥ . tasya etāḥ sañjñāḥ bhaviṣyanti . atha api kaḥ cit agrahaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15394: evam api adoṣaḥ . apatyādiṣu artheṣu aṇādayaḥ vidhīyante . yat tat śabdasvarūpam
GS24pmbhasuu:15395: apatyādiṣu artheṣu vartate tasmāt tadutpattiḥ . tasya etāḥ sañjñāḥ bhaviṣyanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:15396: svārthikeṣu tarhi . svārthikāḥ api grahaṇavadbhyaḥ vidhīyante . yāvādibhyaḥ kan prajñāidbhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15397: aṇ iti . yat tat śabdasvarūpam gṛhyate tasmāt tadutpattiḥ . tasya etāḥ sañjñāḥ bhaviṣyanti
GS24pmbhasuu:15398: . yaḥ tarhi agrahaṇaḥ śuklataraḥ kṛṣṇataraḥ iti . atra api na yāvat śuklaḥ tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:15399: śuklataraḥ . prakṛṣṭaḥ śuklaḥ śuklataraḥ . yat tat śabdasvarūpam prakṛṣṭe vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:15400: tasmāt tadutpattiḥ . tasya etāḥ sañjñāḥ bhaviṣyanti . svādiṣu tarhi . ekatvādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:15401: artheṣu svādayaḥ vidhīyante . yat tat śabdasvarūpam ekatvādiṣu artheṣu vartate tasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15402: tadutpattiḥ . tasya etāḥ sañjñāḥ bhaviṣyanti . katham punaḥ iha ucyamānāḥ svādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15403: ekatvādiṣu artheṣu śakyā vijñātum . ekavākyatvāt . ekam vākyam tat ca idam ca . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:15404: ekam vākyam tat ca idam ca kimartham nānādeśastham kriyate . kauśalamātram etat ācāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15405: darśayati yat ekam vākyam sat nānādeśastham karoti . anyat api saṅgrahīṣyāmi iti
GS24pmbhasuu:15406: . yacchayoḥ ca lugartham . yacchayoḥ tarhi lugartham ṅyāpprātipadikagrahaṇam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:15407: . kaṃsīyaparaśavyayoḥ yañañau luk ca iti ṅyāpprātipadikāt parasya luk yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15408: . akriyamāṇe hi ṅyāpprātipadikagrahaṇe prakṛteḥ api luk prasajyeta . etat api na
GS24pmbhasuu:15409: asti prayojanam . yathā paribhāṣitam pratyayasya lukślulupaḥ bhavanti iti pratyayasya
GS24pmbhasuu:15410: bhaviṣyati . evam api ukārasakārayoḥ prasajyeta . kameḥ saḥ kaṃsaḥ parān śrṇāti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:15411: paraśuḥ iti . uṇādayaḥ avyutpannāni prātipadikāni . vṛddhāvṛddhāvarṇasvaradvyajlakṣaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:15413: pratyayavidhau tatsampratyayārtham ṅyāpprātipadikagrahaṇam kriyate . vṛddhāt avṛddhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15414: avarṇānṭāt anudāttādeḥ dvyacaḥ iti etāni prātipadikaviśeṣaṇāni yathā syuḥ iti . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:15415: akriyamāṇe ṅyāpprātipadikagrahaṇe kasya etāni viśeṣaṇāni syuḥ . samarthaviśeṣaṇāni
GS24pmbhasuu:15416: . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . udīcām vṛddhāt agotrāt iha ca prasajyeta jñānām brāhmaṇānām apatyam
GS24pmbhasuu:15417: iti . etat hi samartham vṛddham . iha ca na syāt jñayoḥ brāhmaṇayoḥ apatyam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:15418: etat hi samartham avṛddham . vṛddha. avṛddha . prācām avṛddhāt phin bahulam iha ca
GS24pmbhasuu:15419: prasajyeta jñayoḥ brāhmaṇayoḥ apatyam iti . etat hi samartham avṛddham . iha ca na
GS24pmbhasuu:15420: syāt jñānām brāhmaṇānām apatyam iti . etat hi samartham vṛddham . avṛddha . avarṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:15422: eva syāt dakṣasya apatyam dākṣiḥ iti . etat hi samartham akārāntam . iha ca na syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15423: dakṣayoḥ apatyam dakṣāṇām apatyam iti . etat hs samartham anavarṇāntam . avarṇa .
GS24pmbhasuu:15424: svara . anudāttādeḥ añ bhavati iti iha ca prasajyeta vācaḥ vikāraḥ tvacaḥ vikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15425: iti . etat hs samartham anudāttādi . iha ca na syāt sarveṣām vikāraḥ iti . etat hs
GS24pmbhasuu:15426: samartham udāttādi . svara . dvyajlakṣaṇa dvjacaḥ ṭhan iti iha ca prasajyeta vācā
GS24pmbhasuu:15427: tarati tvacā tarati iti . etat hi samartham dvyac . iha ca na syāt ghaṭena tarati
GS24pmbhasuu:15428: iti . etat hi samartham samartham advyac . asti punaḥ samarthaviśeṣaṇe sati kim cit
GS24pmbhasuu:15429: iṣṭam saṅgṛhītam bhavati āhosvit doṣāntam eva . asti iti āha . kim . sāmnā tarati
GS24pmbhasuu:15430: vemnā tarati iti . etat hi samartham api ṅyāpprātipadikam api .
GS24pmbhasuu:15432: 428-438 atha ṅyābgrahaṇam kimartham na prātipadikāt iti eva siddham . na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:15433: . apratyayaḥ iti prātipadikasañjñāyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . yadi eṣaḥ ṅyābgrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:15434: hetuḥ tyūgrahaṇam api kartavyam . tau api hi pratyayau . tigrahaṇe tāvat vārttam
GS24pmbhasuu:15435: . taddhitaḥ prātipadikam iti prātipadikasañjñā bhaviṣyati . ūgrahaṇe ca api vārttam
GS24pmbhasuu:15436: . uvarṇāntāt ūṅ vidhīyate . tatra ekādeśaḥ . ekādeśe kṛte antādivadbhāvāt prātipadikasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:15437: bhaviṣyati . yadi eṣaḥ ūṅaḥ agrahaṇe hetuḥ ābgrahaṇam api na kartavyam . āp api hi
GS24pmbhasuu:15438: akārāntāt vidhīyate . tatra ekādeśaḥ . ekādeśe kṛte antādivadbhāvāt prātipadikasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:15439: bhaviṣyati . yaḥ tarhi anakārāntāt . kruñcā uṣṇihā devaviśā iti . atra api akārāntāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15440: vṛttiḥ lakṣyate . kruñcān ālabheta . uṣṇihakakubhau . devaviśam ca manuṣyaviśam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:15441: iti . iha tāvat uṣṇihakakubhau iti . āpaḥ eva etat auttarapadikam hrasvatvam . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:15442: khalu api devaviśam ca manuṣyaviśam ca iti . na asti viśeṣaḥ akārāntāt utpattau satyām
GS24pmbhasuu:15443: vyañjanāntāt vā iti . yat tāvat ucyate iha tāvat uṣṇihakakubhau iti . āpaḥ eva etat
GS24pmbhasuu:15444: auttarapadikam hrasvatvam iti . sañjñācchandasoḥ iti evam tat . na ca eṣā sañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:15445: na api idam chandaḥ . yat api ucyate iha khalu api devaviśam ca manuṣyaviśam ca iti
GS24pmbhasuu:15446: . na asti viśeṣaḥ akārāntāt utpattau satyām vyañjanāntāt vā iti . svare viśeṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:15447: yadi atra vyañjanāntāt utpattiḥ syāt devaviśam iti evam svaraḥ prasajyeta . devaviśam
GS24pmbhasuu:15448: iti ca iṣyate . tasmāt kaḥ eṣaḥ evamviṣayaḥ . idam tarhi pādaḥ anyatarasyām ṭāp ṛci
GS24pmbhasuu:15449: iti . ṛci iti ucyate . tatra chāndasatvāt bhaviṣyati . ṛci iti na idam chandaḥ vivakṣitam
GS24pmbhasuu:15450: kāṭhakam kāpālakam amudakam paippalādakam vā . kim tarhi . pratyayārthaviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:15451: etat . ṛk cet pratyayārthaḥ bhavati iti . etat api na asti prayojanam padaśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15452: pādaśabdasamānārthaḥ akārāntaḥ chandasi dṛśyate . tasyāḥ saptākṣaram ekam padam eakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15453: pādaḥ iti arthaḥ . tasmāt utpattiḥ bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi ḍāp ubhābhyām anyatarasyām
GS24pmbhasuu:15454: iti . bahurājā bahurāje bahurājāḥ . ṅyābgrahaṇam anarthakam prātipadikagrahaṇe liṅgaviśiṣṭasya
GS24pmbhasuu:15455: api grahaṇāt . ṅyābgrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . prātipadikagrahaṇe liṅgaviśiṣṭasya
GS24pmbhasuu:15456: api grahaṇāt . prātipadikagrahaṇe liṅgaviśiṣṭasya api grahaṇam bhavati iti eṣā paribhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:15457: kartavyā . kaḥ punaḥ viśeṣaḥ eṣā vā paribhāṣā kriyate ābgrahaṇam vā . avaśyam eṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:15458: paribhāṣā kartavyā . bahūni etasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ prayojanāni . kāni . prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:15460: suṭ iha eva syāt teṣām yeṣām . tāsām yāsām iti atra na syāt . na etat asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:15461: . avarṇāntāt ṭāp vidhīyate . tatra ekādeśaḥ . ekādeśe kṛte antādivadbhāvāt suṭ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:15462: . idam tarhi prayojanam . sarvanāmnaḥ tṛtīyā ca iha eva syāt bhavatā hetunā bhavataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15463: hetoḥ iti . bhavatyā hetunā bhavatyāḥ hetoḥ iti atra na syāt . sarvanāma . svara
GS24pmbhasuu:15464: . kuśūlakūpakumbhaśālam bile iha eva syāt kuśūlabilam . kuśūlībilam iti atra na syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15465: . svara . samāsa . dvitīyā śritādibhiḥ saha samasyate iha eva syāt kaṣṭam śritaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15466: kaṣṭaśritaḥ . kaṣṭam śritā kaṣṭaśritā iti atra na syāt . etat api na asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:15467: . śritaśabdaḥ akārāntaḥ . tatra ekādeśaḥ . ekādeśe kṛte antādivadbhāvāt bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:15468: . idam tarhi . pūrvasadṛśa iti iha eva syāt pitrā sadṛśaḥ pitṛsadṛśaḥ . pitrā sadṛśī
GS24pmbhasuu:15469: pitṛsadṛśī iti atra na syāt . samāsaḥ . taddhitavidhi . acittahiastidhenoḥ ṭhak iha
GS24pmbhasuu:15470: eva syāt hastinām samūhaḥ hāstikam . hastinīnām samūhaḥ hāstikam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:15471: atra na syāt . etat api na asti prayojanam . puṃvadbhāvena etat siddham . idam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:15472: . pramāṇe dvayasac yathā iha bhavati hastidvayasam hastimātram evam hastinīdvayasam
GS24pmbhasuu:15473: hastinīmātram iti api yathā syāt . taddhitavidhi . luk . na indsiddhabadhnātiṣu ca
GS24pmbhasuu:15474: iha eva syāt sthaṇḍilaśāyī . sthaṇḍilaśāyinī iti atra na syāt . luk . aluk . śayavāsavāsiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:15475: akālāt iha eva syāt grāmevāsī . grāmevāsinī iti atra na syāt . mānini ca vidhipratiṣedhāṛtham
GS24pmbhasuu:15476: . mānini ca vidhipratiṣedhāṛtham prayojanam . vidhyartham tāvat . kyaṅmāninoḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:15477: iha eva syāt darśanīyamānī . darśanīyamāninī iti atra na syāt . pratiṣedhārtham api
GS24pmbhasuu:15478: . vakyāti śvāṅgāt ca ītaḥ amānini . tasmin kriyamāṇe iha eva syāt dīrghamukhamānī
GS24pmbhasuu:15479: . dīrghamukhamāninī iti atra na syāt . pratyayagrahaṇopacāreṣu ca . pratyayagrahaṇopacāreṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:15480: ca prayojanam . tṛjakābhyām kartari iha eva syāt apām sraṣṭā . apām sraṣṭrī iti atra na syāt . upacāra :
GS24pmbhasuu:15481: ataḥ kṛkamikaṃsakumbha itha eva syāt ayaskumbhaḥ . ayaskumbhī iti atra na syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:15482: etāni asyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ prayojanāni yadartham eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā . etasyām ca
GS24pmbhasuu:15483: satyām na arthaḥ ṅyābgrahaṇena . atiprasaṅgaḥ upapadavidhau . upapadavidhau atiprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15484: bhavati . dviṣatparayoḥ tāpeḥ yathā iha bhavati dviṣantapaḥ iti evam dviṣatītapaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15485: iti atra api syāt . yañiñoḥ phaki . yañiñoḥ phaki atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . yathā iha
GS24pmbhasuu:15486: bhavati gārgyāyaṇaḥ dākṣāyaṇaḥ evam gārgeyaḥ dākṣeyaḥ iti atra api syāt . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15487: doṣaḥ . ḍhak atra bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . samāsānteṣu ca . samāsānteṣu ca atiprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15488: bhavati . rājāhasakhibhyaḥ ṭat yathā iha bhavati madrarājaḥ kaśmīrarājaḥ evam madrarājñī
GS24pmbhasuu:15489: kaśmīrarājñī iti atra api syāt . na vā bhavati madrarājī iti . bhavati yadā samāsāntāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15490: īkāraḥ . liṅgaviśiṣṭagrahaṇe tu īkārāntāt samāsāntaḥ prasajyeta . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15491: . puṃvadbhāvaḥ ṭilopaḥ ca . tatra madrajī iti etat rūpam syāt . madrarājñī iti ca
GS24pmbhasuu:15492: iṣyate . mahadāttve priyādiṣu . mahadāttve priyādiṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . āt mahataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15493: samānādhikaraṇajātīyayoḥ iti yathā iha bhavati mahān priyaḥ asya mahāpriyaḥ evam
GS24pmbhasuu:15494: mahatī priyā asya mahatīpriyaḥ iti atra api syāt . kim ucyate priyādiṣu iti . yatra
GS24pmbhasuu:15495: puṃvadbhāvaḥ pratiṣidhyate . yatra tu na pratiṣidhyate bhavitavyam eva tatra āttvena
GS24pmbhasuu:15496: . ñnitsvare . ñnitsvare atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . ñniti ādiḥ udāttaḥ bhavati yathā iha
GS24pmbhasuu:15497: bhavati dākṣiḥ ahicumbukāyaniḥ evam dākṣī ahicumbukāyanī iti atra api syāt . rājñaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15498: svare brāhmaṇakumārayoḥ . rājñaḥ svare brāhmaṇakumārayoḥ atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . rājā
GS24pmbhasuu:15499: ca brāhmaṇakumārayoḥ iti yathā iha bhavati rājakumāraḥ rājabrāhmaṇaḥ evam rājakumārī
GS24pmbhasuu:15500: rājabrāhmaṇī iti atra api syāt . samāsasaṅghātagrahaṇeṣu ca . samāsasaṅghātagrahaṇeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:15501: ca atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . bahoḥ nañvat uttarapadabhūmni yathā iha bhavati bahugomān
GS24pmbhasuu:15502: bahuyavamān evam bahugomatī bahuyavamatī iti atra api syāt . kim ucyate samāsasaṅghātagrahaṇeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:15503: iti . yat avayavagrahaṇam prayojanam eva tasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ . kumbhaśālam bile kuśūlībilam
GS24pmbhasuu:15504: iti yathā . vibhaktau ca uktam . kim uktam . na vā vibhaktau liṅgaviśiṣṭāgrahaṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15505: iti . ete asyāḥ paribhāṣāḥ doṣāḥ etāni ca prayojanāni syuḥ . ete doṣāḥ samāḥ bhūyāṃsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15506: vā . tasmāt na arthaḥ anayā paribhāṣayā . na hi doṣāḥ santi iti paribhāṣā na kartavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:15507: lakṣaṇam vā na praṇeyam . na hi bhikṣukāḥ santi iti sthālyaḥ na āśrīyante na ca mṛgāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15508: santi iti yavā na upyante . na hi doṣāṇām lakṣaṇam asti iti . tasmāt yāni etasyā
GS24pmbhasuu:15509: paribhāṣayāḥ prayojanāni tadartham eṣā kartavyā pratividheyam ca doṣeṣu . taddhitavidhānāṛtham
GS24pmbhasuu:15510: tu . taddhitavidhānāṛtham tu ṅyābgrahaṇam kartavyam . ṅyābantāt taddhitotpattiḥ yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:15511: syāt . kālitarā hariṇitarā khaṭvātarā mālātarā . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:15512: vipratiṣedhāt hi taddhitabalīyastvam . vipratiṣedhāt hi taddhitotpattiḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:15513: tatra samāsānteṣu doṣaḥ . tatra samāsānteṣu doṣaḥ bhavati . bahugomatkā bahuyavamatkā
GS24pmbhasuu:15514: . samāsāntāḥ api ṅyābantāt syuḥ . tyūṅoḥ ca grahaṇam . tyūṅoḥ ca grahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:15515: . yuvatikā brahmabandhukā iti . ūṅgrahaṇena tāvat na arthaḥ . na asti atra viśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15516: ukārāntāt utpattau satyām ūṅantāt vā . idam tarhi yuvatitarā brahmabandhutarā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:15517: . tadantasya ca pratyayārthena ayogāt taddhitānutpattiḥ . tadantasya ca ṅyābantasya
GS24pmbhasuu:15518: pratyayārthena ayogāt taddhitotpattiḥ na prāpnoti . kālitarā hariṅitarā khaṭvātarā
GS24pmbhasuu:15519: mālātarā . kim kāraṇam . ṅyāpantam etat strīpradhānam . na ca strītvasya prakarṣāpakarṣau
GS24pmbhasuu:15520: staḥ . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na hi kim cit ucyate evañjātīyakāt utpattavyam evañjātīyakāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15521: na iti . etāvat ucyate atiśāyane tamabiṣṭhanau tiṅaḥ ca iti . yasya ca prakarṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15522: asti tasya prakarṣe pratyayaḥ bhaviṣyati . asti ca apradhānasya guṇasya prakarṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15523: . iha khalu api śuklataraḥ kṛṣṇataraḥ iti dravyam pradhānam guṇasya ca prakarṣe pratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15524: utpadyate . uktam vā . kim uktam . siddham tu striyāḥ prātipadikaviśeṣaṇatvāt svārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:15525: ṭābādayaḥ iti . prātipadikaviśeṣaṇam strīgrahaṇam . svārthikāḥ ṭābādayaḥ . na evam
GS24pmbhasuu:15526: vijñayate striyām abhidheyāyām iti na api strīsamānādhikaraṇāt prātipadikāt . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:15527: tarhi . yat striyām prātipadikam vartate tasmāt ṭābādayaḥ bhavanti . kasmin arthe
GS24pmbhasuu:15528: . svārthe iti . nanu ca uktam tatra samāsānteṣu doṣaḥ iti . samāsāntāḥ api svārthikāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15529: . ubhayoḥ svārthikayoḥ paratvāt samāsāntāḥ bhaviṣyanti . katham kālikā iti . pratyayasthāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15530: kāt pūrvsasya iti ittvam bhaviṣyati . katham hariṇikā iti . hariṇaśabdaḥ prakṛtyantaram
GS24pmbhasuu:15531: asti . katham lohinikā iti . vakṣyati etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:15534: 439-452 striyām iti ucyate . kā strī nāma . lokatataḥ ete śabdāḥ prasiddhāḥ strīpumān
GS24pmbhasuu:15535: napuṃsakam iti . yat loke dṛṣṭvā etat avasīyate iyam strī ayam pumān idam napuṃsakam
GS24pmbhasuu:15536: iti sā strīsaḥ pumān tat napuṃsakam iti . kim punaḥ loke dṛṣṭvā etat avasīyate iyam
GS24pmbhasuu:15537: strī ayam pumān idam napuṃsakam iti . liṅgam . kim punaḥ tat . stanakeśavatī strī
GS24pmbhasuu:15538: syāt . lomaśaḥ puruṣaḥ smṛtaḥ . ubhayoḥ antaram yat ca tadabhāve napuṃsakam . liṅgāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15539: strīpuṃsayoḥ jñāne bhrūkuṃse ṭāP prasajyate . liṅgāt strīpuṃsayoḥ jñāne bhrūkuṃse
GS24pmbhasuu:15540: ṭāp prāpnoti . yat hi loke dṛṣṭvā etat avasīyate iyam strī iti asti tat bhrūkuṃse
GS24pmbhasuu:15541: . natvam kharakuṭīḥ paśya . iha cañcāḥ paśya vadhrikāḥ paśya kharakuṭīḥ paśya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:15542: tasmāt śasaḥ naḥ puṃsi iti natvam prāpnoti . yat hi dṛṣṭvā etat avasīyate ayam pumān
GS24pmbhasuu:15543: iti asti tat vadhrikādiṣu . khaṭvāvṛkṣau na sidhyataḥ . khaṭvāvṛkṣayoḥ ca liṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:15544: na sidhyati . yat hi loke dṛṣṭvā etat avasīyate iyam strī ayam pumān iti na tat khaṭvāvṛkṣayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15545: asti . kim tarhi tayoḥ liṅgam nyāyyam . nāpuṃsakam bhavet tasmin . napuṃsakam khaṭvāvṛkṣayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15546: liṅgam nyāyyam . kim idam nāpuṃsakam iti . napuṃsake bhavam nāpuṃsakam . tadabhāve
GS24pmbhasuu:15547: napuṃsakam . tadabhāve strīpuṃsaliṅgābhāve napuṃsakaliṅgam nyāyyam . asat tu mṛgatṛṣṇāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:15548: . asat tu khaṭvāvṛkṣayoḥ liṅgam draṣṭavyam . katham punaḥ asat nāma liṅgam śakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:15549: draṣṭum . mṛgatṛṣṇāvat . tat yathā mṛgāḥ tṛṣitāḥ apām dhārāḥ paśyanti . na ca tāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15550: santi . gandharvnagaram yathā . yathā gandharvanagarāṇi dūrataḥ dṛśyante upasṛtya
GS24pmbhasuu:15551: ca na upalabhyante tadvat khaṭvāvṛkṣayoḥ liṅgam draṣṭavyam . ādityagativat sat na
GS24pmbhasuu:15552: . atha va yathā ādityasya gatiḥ satī na upalabhyate tadvat khaṭvāvṛkṣayoḥ sat liṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:15553: na upalabhyate . vastrāntarhitavat ca tat . yathā vastrāntarhitāni dravyāṇi na upalabhyante
GS24pmbhasuu:15554: tadvat khaṭvāvṛkṣayoḥ sat liṅgam na upalabhyate . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . vastrāntarhitāni
GS24pmbhasuu:15555: dravyāṇi vastrāpāye upalabhyante . khaṭvāvṛkṣayoḥ punaḥ ye api ete rathkārāḥ vāśīvṛkṣādanahastāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15556: mūlāt prabhṛti ā agrāt vṛkṣān takṣṇuvanti te api tayoḥ liṅgam na upalabhante . kena
GS24pmbhasuu:15557: etat avasīyate khaṭvāvṛkṣayoḥ sat liṅgam na upalabhyate iti . ṣaḍbhiḥ prakāraiḥ satām
GS24pmbhasuu:15558: bhāvānām anupalabdhiḥ bhavati . sannikarṣāt ativiprakarṣāt mūrtyantaravyavadhānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15559: tamasā āvṛtatvāt indriyadaurbalyāt atipramādāt iti . ataḥ atra kaḥ cit hetuḥ draṣṭavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15560: yena khaṭvāvṛkṣayoḥ sat liṅgam na upalabhyate . kena etat avasīyate khaṭvāvṛkṣayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15561: sat liṅgam na upalabhyate iti . tayoḥ tu tatkṛtam dṛṣṭvā . strīkṛtam śabdam dṛṣṭvā
GS24pmbhasuu:15562: strī iti avasīyate puṃskṛtam dṛṣṭvā pumān iti . yathā ākāśena jyotiṣaḥ . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:15563: ākāśam dṛṣṭva jyotiḥ atra iti gamyate . jyotirnimittam hi ākāśam . anyonysaṃśrayam
GS24pmbhasuu:15564: tu etat . anyonysaṃśrayam tu etat bhavati . strīkṛtaḥ śabdaḥ śabdakṛtam ca strītvam
GS24pmbhasuu:15565: . etat itaretarāśrayam bhavati . itaretarāśrayāṇi ca na prakalpante . pratyakṣeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:15566: virudhyate . pratyakṣeṇa khalu api saḥ virudhyate yaḥ āha khaṭvāvṛkṣayoḥ sat liṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:15567: na upalabhyate iti . tatra svendriyavirodhaḥ kṛtaḥ bhavati . na ca nāma svendriyavirodhinā
GS24pmbhasuu:15568: bhavitavyam . taṭe ca sarvaliṅgāni dṛṣṭvā kaḥ adhyavasāyati . taṭe ca khalu api sarvāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:15569: liṅgāni dṛṣṭvā taṭaḥ taṭaī taṭam iti kaḥ adhyavasātum arhati iyam strīayam pumān
GS24pmbhasuu:15570: idam napuṃsakam iti . tasmāt na vaiyākaraṇaiḥ śakyam laukikam liṅgam āsthātum . avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:15571: ca kaḥ cit svakṛtāntaḥ āstheyaḥ . kaḥ asau svakṛtāntaḥ . saṃstyānaprasavau liṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:15572: āstheyau svakṛtāntataḥ . saṃstyānaprasavau liṅgam āstheyau . kim idam saṃstyānaprasavau
GS24pmbhasuu:15574: strī . sūteḥ sap prasave pumān iti . nanu ca loke api styāyateḥ eva strī sūteḥ ca pumān . adhikaraṇasādhanā loke strī :
GS24pmbhasuu:15575: styāyati asyām garbhaḥ iti . kartṛsādhanaḥ ca pumān :
GS24pmbhasuu:15576: sūte pumān iti . iha punaḥ ubhayam bhāvasādhanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:15577: styānam strī pravṛttiḥ ca pumān . kasya punaḥ styānam strī pravṛttiḥ vā pumān . guṇānām
GS24pmbhasuu:15578: . keṣām . śabsasparśarūparasagandhānām . sarvāḥ ca punaḥ mūrtayaḥ evamātmikāḥ saṃstyānaprasavaguṇāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15579: śabsasparśarūparasagandhavatyaḥ . yatra alpīyāṃsaḥ guṇāḥ tatra avarataḥ trayaḥ śabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15580: sparśaḥ rūpam iti . rasagandhau na sarvatra . pravṛttiḥ khalu api nityā . na hi iha
GS24pmbhasuu:15581: kaḥ cit svasmin ātmani muhūrtam api avatiṣṭhate . vardhate vā yāvat anena vardhitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:15582: apāyena vā yujyate . tat ca ubhayam sarvatra . yadi ubhayam sarvatra kutaḥ vyavasthā .
GS24pmbhasuu:15583: vivakṣātaḥ . saṃstyānavivakṣāyām strī prasavavivakṣāyām pumān ubhayoḥ avivakṣāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:15584: napūmsakam . tasya uktau lokataḥ nāma . tasya uktau ca vacane lokataḥ nāma etat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:15585: strī pumān napuṃsakam iti . guṇaḥ vā lupi yuktavat . vadhrikādiṣu bhūyān parihāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15586: . lupi yuktavat vyaktivacane iti evam atra guṇaḥ bhavati . na ca etat mantavyam svamanīṣikayā
GS24pmbhasuu:15587: ucyate iti . paṭhiṣyati hi ācāryaḥ liṅgam aśiṣyam lokāśrayatvāt liṅgasya iti . punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15588: paṭhiṣyati ekārthe śabdānyatvāt dṛṣṭam liṅgānyatvam avayavānyatvāt ca iti . saṃstyāne
GS24pmbhasuu:15589: styāyateḥ ḍraṭ strīsūteḥ saP prasave pumān . tasya uktau lokataḥ nāma . guṇaḥ vā lupi yuktavat .
GS24pmbhasuu:15591: 452-458 katham punaḥ idam vijñāyate . striyām abhidheyāyām ṭābādayaḥ bhavanti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:15592: āhosvit strīsamānādhikaraṇāt prātipadikāt iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . striyām iti
GS24pmbhasuu:15594: iti stryarthābhidhāne cet ṭābādayaḥ bhavanti dvivacanabahuvacanayoḥ anupapattiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:15595: kumāryau kumāryaḥ kiśoryau kiśoryaḥ . kim kāraṇam . ekaḥ ayam arthaḥ strītvam nāma
GS24pmbhasuu:15596: . tasya ekatvāt ekavacanam eva prāpnoti . anekapratyayānupapattiḥ ca . anekaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:15597: pratyayaḥ na upapadyate . gārgyāyaṇī kārīṣagandhyā kālitarā iti . kim kāraṇam . ekatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15598: strītvasya . ekaḥ ayam arthaḥ strītvam nāma . tasya ekena uktatvāt dvitīyasya prayogeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:15599: na bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam . uktārthānām aprayogaḥ iti . stryarthasya ca prātipadikārthatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15600: striyām iti liṅgānupapattiḥ . stryarthasya ca prātipadikārthatvāt striyām iti adhikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15601: na prāpnoti . astu tarhi strīsamānādhikaraṇāt prātipadikāt iti . strīsamānādhikaraṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15602: iti cet bhūtādiṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ . strīsamānādhikaraṇāt iti cet bhūtādiṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15603: bhavati . bhūtam iyam brāhmaṇī . kāraṇam iyam brāhmaṇī iti . āvapanam iyam uṣṭrikā
GS24pmbhasuu:15604: iti . stryarthābhidhāne punaḥ ṭābādiṣu satsu iha tāvat bhūtam iyam brāhmaṇī iti na
GS24pmbhasuu:15605: atra strītvam vivakṣitam . kim tarhi . pautanyam . kāraṇam iyam brāhmaṇī iti na atra
GS24pmbhasuu:15606: strītvam vivakṣitam . kim tarhi . prādhānyam . āvapanam iyam uṣṭrikā iti na atra
GS24pmbhasuu:15607: strītvam vivakṣitam . kim tarhi . sambhavanam . ṣaṭsañjñakebhyaḥ ca pratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:15608: ṣaṭsañjñakebhyaḥ ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . pañca brāhmaṇyaḥ daśa brāhmaṇyaḥ . stryarthābhidhāne
GS24pmbhasuu:15609: punaḥ ṭābādiṣu satsu na atra strītvam vivakṣitam . kim tarhi bhedaḥ vivakṣitaḥ saṅkhyā . iha ca strī :
GS24pmbhasuu:15610: īkāraḥ na prāpnoti . na hi tena eva tasya sāmānādhikaraṇyam asti . siddham tu striyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15611: prātipadikaviśeṣaṇatvāt svārthe ṭābādayaḥ . siddham etat . katham . striyāḥ prātipadikaviśeṣaṇatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15612: . prātipadikaviśeṣaṇam strīgrahaṇam . svārthikāḥ ṭābādayaḥ . na evam vijñāyate striyām
GS24pmbhasuu:15613: abhidheyāyām iti na api strīsamānādhikaraṇāt iti . katham tarhi . striyām yat prātipadikam
GS24pmbhasuu:15614: vartate tasmāt ṭābādayaḥ bhavanti . kasmin arthe . svārthe iti . atha vā punaḥ astu
GS24pmbhasuu:15615: striyām abhidheyāyām iti . nanu ca uktam striyām iti stryarthābhidhāne cet ṭābādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15617: iti liṅgānupapattiḥ . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yat tāvat ucyate dvivacanabahuvacanayoḥ anupapattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15618: iti . guṇavacanasya ca āśrayataḥ liṅgavacanabhāvāt . guṇavacanānām hi śabdānām āśrayataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15619: liṅgavacanāni bhavanti . tat yathā śuklam vastram ,
GS24pmbhasuu:15620: śuklā śāṭī śuklaḥ kambalaḥ śuklau kambalau śuklāḥ kambalāḥ iti . yat asau dravyam
GS24pmbhasuu:15621: śritaḥ bhavati guṇaḥ tasya yat liṅgam vacanam ca tat guṇasya api bhavati . evam iha
GS24pmbhasuu:15622: api yat adaḥ dravyam śritam bhavati strītvam tasya yat liṅgam vacanam ca tat strītvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:15623: api bhaviṣyati . yat api ucyate anekapratyayānupapattiḥ iti . bhāvasya ca bhāvayuktatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15624: . bhāvaḥ bhāvena yujyate . tat yatha iṣiḥ iṣiṇā nimantriḥ ca nimantriṇā . viṣamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15625: upanyāsaḥ . yuktam tatra anyatvam sādhanabhedāt kālabhedāt ca . uktam tatra ekasya
GS24pmbhasuu:15626: bāhyam sādhanam sarvakālaḥ ca pratyayaḥ aparasya ābhyantaram sādhanam vartamānakālaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15627: ca pratyayaḥ iti . iha punaḥ ekam strītvam . atha ekam upalabhyate . kim ca ataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15628: yadi ekam upalabhyate dvitīyam api upalabhyatām . atha ekam api anumānagamyam dvtīyam
GS24pmbhasuu:15629: api anumānāt gamyatām . kasya tāvat bhavān evam guṇam nyāyyam manyate strītvam nāma
GS24pmbhasuu:15630: . dravyasya . dravye ca bhavataḥ kaḥ sampratyayaḥ . yadi tāvat guaṇasamudāyaḥ dravyam
GS24pmbhasuu:15631: kā gatiḥ ye ete bhāvāḥ kṛdabhihitāḥ taddhitābhihitāḥ ca . cikīrṣā gotā iti . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:15632: matam etat kṛdabhihitaḥ bhāvaḥ dravyavat bhavati iti strītvam api strītvena abhihitam
GS24pmbhasuu:15633: dravyavat bhaviṣyati . kva ca tāvat doṣaḥ syāt . dṛṣṭasya hi
GS24pmbhasuu:15634: doṣasya susukhaḥ parihāraḥ gārgyāyaṇī kārīṣagandhyā kālitarā iti . iha tāvat gārgyāyaṇī
GS24pmbhasuu:15635: iti ṣitkaraṇasāmarthyāt ṅīṣ bhaviṣyati . kārīṣagandhyā iti vacanāt cāp bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:15636: . kālitarā iti na yāvat kālī tāvat kālitarā . kim tarhi . prakṛṣṭā kālī kālitarā
GS24pmbhasuu:15637: . yat śabdarūpam prakarṣe vartate tasya anuktam strītvam iti kṛtvā ṭāp bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:15638: . yat api ucyate iha ca strī īkāraḥ na prāpnoti iti . nipātanāt etat siddham . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:15641: 458 strīviṣaye ṅyāpoḥ aprasiddhiḥ akārāntādarśanāt . strīviṣaye ṅyāpoḥ aprasiddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15642: . khaṭvā mālā . kim kāraṇam . akārāntādarśanāt . na hi akārāntatā dṛśyate . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:15643: ca iyam dṛśyate . atikhaṭvaḥ atimālaḥ iti . na eṣā akārāntatā . āpaḥ eva etat hrasvatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:15644: . sarveṣām tu svaravarṇānupūrvījñānārthaḥ upadeśaḥ . sarveṣām eva tu prātipadikānām
GS24pmbhasuu:15645: svaravarṇānupūrvījñānārthaḥ upadeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . śaśaḥ . ṣaṣaḥ iti mā bhūt . palāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15646: . palāṣaḥ iti mā bhūt . mañcakaḥ . mañjakaḥ iti mā bhūt . tasmāt siddham . tasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15647: siddham etat bhavati . atha vā iyam akārāntatā dṛśyate . pañcabhiḥ khaṭvābhiḥ krītaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15650: 459-461 śūdrā ca amahatpūrvā . śūdrā ca amahatpūrvā iti vaktavyam . śūdrā . amahatpūrvā
GS24pmbhasuu:15651: iti kimartham . mahāśūdrī . jātiḥ . jātiḥ iti vaktavyam . yā hi mathatī śūdrā mahāśūdrā
GS24pmbhasuu:15652: sā bhavati . śūdrāśabdaḥ ajādiṣu paṭhyate . tatra kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ yat mahatpūrvāt syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15653: . na eva prāpnoti na arthaḥ pratiṣedhena . tadantavidhinā prāpnoti . grahaṇavatā
GS24pmbhasuu:15654: prātipadikena tadantavidhiḥ pratiṣidhyate . evam tarhi jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:15655: iha tadantavidhiḥ iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . bhavatī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:15657: atimahatī : atra tadantavidhiḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . jātiḥ iti ca vakṣyāmi . yadi etat
GS24pmbhasuu:15658: jñāpyate pañcājī daśājī atra api prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ajādibhiḥ striyam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15662: ugitaḥ prātipadikāt iti āhosvit ugitantāt prātipadikāt iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate ugitaḥ prātipadikāt iti siddham :
GS24pmbhasuu:15664: atimahatī iti na sidhyati . tadantavidhinā bhaviṣyati . grahaṇavatā prātipadikena
GS24pmbhasuu:15665: tadantavidhiḥ pratiṣidhyate . atha vijñāyate ugitantāt prātipadikāt iti siddham atibhavatī
GS24pmbhasuu:15666: atimahatī . bhavatī mahatī iti na sidhyati . vyapadeśivadbhāvena bhaviṣyati . vyapadeśivadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15667: aprātipadikena . ubhayathā ca nirgomatī niryavamatī iti na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:15668: . pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ tadādeḥ grahaṇam bhavati iti . yathā icchasi tathā astu
GS24pmbhasuu:15669: . astu tāvat ugitaḥ prātipadikāt iti . katham atibhavatī atimahatī iti . tadantavidhinā
GS24pmbhasuu:15670: bhaviṣyati . nanu ca uktam grahaṇavatā prātipadikena tadantavidhiḥ pratiṣidhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:15671: . na etat prātipadikagrahaṇam . prātipadikāprātipadikayoḥ etat grahaṇam . atha vā
GS24pmbhasuu:15672: punaḥ astu ugitantāt prātipadikāt iti . katham bhavatī mahatī iti . vyapadeśivadbhāvena
GS24pmbhasuu:15673: bhaviṣyati . nanu ca uktam vyapadeśivadbhāvaḥ aprātipadikena iti . na etat prātipadikagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:15674: . prātipadikāprātipadikayoḥ etat grahaṇam . yat api ucyate ubhayathā ca nirgomatī
GS24pmbhasuu:15675: niryavamatī iti na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ tadādeḥ grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:15676: bhavati iti . na etat pratyayagrahaṇam . pratyayāpratyayayoḥ etat grahaṇam . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:15677: . varṇaḥ api ugit pratyayaḥ api ugit prātipadikam api ugit .
GS24pmbhasuu:15679: 463-464 dhātoḥ ugitaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . dhātoḥ ugitaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . ukhāsrāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15680: brāhmaṇī parṇadhvat brāhmaṇī . añcateḥ ca upasaṅkhyānam . añcateḥ ca upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:15681: kartavyam . prācī pratīcī . ugiti añcatigrahaṇāt siddham adhātoḥ . ugiti añcatigrahaṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15682: adhātoḥ siddham . añcatigrahaṇam niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . añcateḥ eva ugitaḥ dhātoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15685: 464-466 iha kasmāt na bhavati . niḥśūnī atiyūnī iti . arthavadgrahaṇe na anarthakasya
GS24pmbhasuu:15686: iti . evam api maghonī atra prāpnoti . maghavanśabdaḥ avyutpannam prātipadikam .
GS24pmbhasuu:15687: vanaḥ na haśaḥ . vanaḥ ra ca iti atra haśantāt na bhavati iti vaktavyam . iha mā
GS24pmbhasuu:15688: bhūt . sahayudhvā brāhmaṇī iti . yadi na haśaḥ iti ucyate śarvarī iti na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:15689: . vihitaviśeṣaṇam haśgrahaṇam . haśantāt yaḥ vihitaḥ iti . evam api prertvarī iti
GS24pmbhasuu:15690: na sidhyati . katham ca atra tugāgamaḥ . chāndasatvāt . ṅībrau api tarhi chāndasatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15691: eva bhaviṣyataḥ . bahulam chandasi ṅībrau vaktavyau . yajvarīḥ iṣaḥ yajvanīḥ iṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15692: . ravidhāne bahuvrīheḥ upasaṅkhyānam pratiṣiddhatvāt . ravidhāne bahuvrīheḥ upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:15693: kartavyam . bahudhīvarī bahupīvarī . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . pratiṣiddhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15694: . anaḥ bahuvrīheḥ iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . anaḥ bahuvrīhipratiṣedhe vā upadhālopinaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15695: vāvacanam . anaḥ bahuvrīhipratiṣedhe vā upadhālopinaḥ vā iti vaktavyam . anyathā
GS24pmbhasuu:15696: kṛtvā coditam anyathā kṛtvā parihāraḥ . yathā upasaṅkhyānam coditam tathā nityābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:15697: ṅībrābhyām bhavitavyam . yathā parihāraḥ tathā vibhāṣayā bhavitavyam . yathā upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:15698: coditam evam api vibhāṣayā bhavitavyam . . na hi atra ṅīp durlabhaḥ . siddhaḥ atra
GS24pmbhasuu:15699: ṅīp anaḥ upadhālopinaḥ anyatarasyām iti . ṅīpsanniyogena raḥ ucyamānaḥ anyena sati
GS24pmbhasuu:15700: na syāt iti evamartham upasaṅkhyānam codyate . kim punaḥ kāraṇam ṅīpsanniyogena raḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15701: ucyate . iha mā bhūt suparvā cāruparvā iti . tat tarhi upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:15702: na kartavyam . vakṣyati ḍāp ubhābhyām anyatarasyām iti atra anyatarasyāṅgrahaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:15703: prayojanam . ḍāppratiṣedhābhyām mukte ṅībrau api yathā syātām iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:15705: 466-468 kasya ayam pratiṣedhaḥ . ṅīp anantaraḥ tasya pratiṣedhaḥ . atha idānīm ṅīpi
GS24pmbhasuu:15706: pratiṣiddhe ṣaṭsañjñānām ante lupte ṭābutpattiḥ kasmāt na syāt . ataḥ iti prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:15707: . asiddhaḥ nalopaḥ . tasya asiddhatvāt na bhaviṣyati . parigaṇiteṣu kāryeṣu nalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15708: asiddhaḥ na ca idam tatra parigaṇyate . idam api tatra parigaṇyate . pratyāhārāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15709: cāpā siddham . sup iti na idam pratyayagrahaṇam . kim tarhi . pratyāhāragrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:15710: . kva sanniviṣṭānām pratyāhāraḥ . prathamaikavacanāt prabhṛti ā cāpaḥ pakārāt . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:15711: pratyāhāragrahaṇam doṣaḥ tu ittve . ittve doṣaḥ bhavati . bahucarmikā . pratyayasthāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15712: kāt pūrvasya ātaḥ iti ittvam na prāpnoti . tasmāt na ubhau . tasmāt ṣaṭsañjñakebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15713: ubhau na bhavataḥ iti vaktavyam . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . striyām iti
GS24pmbhasuu:15714: vartate . striyām yat prāpnoti tasya pratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:15716: 468-469 kimartham ubhābhyām iti ucyate . ubhābhyām yogābhyām ḍāp yathā syāt manantāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15717: anantāt ca bahuvrīheḥ . na etat asti prayojanam . prakṛtam ubhayam anuvartate . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:15718: anyatarasyāṅgrahaṇam kimartham . anyatarasyām ḍāp yathā syāt . ḍāpā mukte pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15719: api yathā syāt iti . na etat asti prayojanam . iha ḍāp api ucyate pratiṣedhaḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:15720: . tau ubhau vacanāt bhaviṣyataḥ . idam tarhi prayojanam . ḍāppratiṣedhābhyām mukte
GS24pmbhasuu:15721: ṅīp api yathā syāt . siddhaḥ atra ṅīp anaḥ upadhālopinaḥ anyatarasyām iti . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:15722: tat anyatarasyāṅgrahaṇam śakyam akartum . bāḍham śakyam . katham . iha ḍāp api ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:15723: pratiṣedhaḥ api ṅīp api . tat sarvam vacanāt bhaviṣyati . na evam śakyam vijñātum
GS24pmbhasuu:15724: . akriyamāṇe hi tatra anyatarasyāṅgrahaṇe anavakāśaḥ ṅīp ḍāppratiṣedhau bādheta .
GS24pmbhasuu:15725: ḍāppratiṣedhau api anavakāśau . tau vacanāt bhaviṣyataḥ . sāvakāśau ḍāppratiṣedhau
GS24pmbhasuu:15726: . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . suparvā cāruparvā iti . tasmāt tat anyatarasyāṅgrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:15727: . idam tu khalu anyatarasyāṅgrahaṇam śakyam akartum . idam api avaśyam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:15728: . kim prayojanam . ḍāppratiṣedhābhyām mukte ṅībrau yathā syātām iti . ravidhāne bahuvrīheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15729: upasaṅkhyānam coditam . tat na vaktavyam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:15731: 469-470 atha iha katham bhavitavyam . bahavaḥ śvānaḥ asyām rathyāyām bahavaḥ śvānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15732: asyām śālāyām iti . bahśūkā bahuyūkā iti bhavitavyam .kā rūpasiddhiḥ . ḍāp ṭilopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15733: prasāraṇam prasāraṇaparapūrvatvam nadṛtaḥ ca iti kap . kapā tāvat na bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:15734: . kim kāraṇam . nadyantānām yaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ iti evam tat vijñāyate . na ca eṣaḥ nadyantānām
GS24pmbhasuu:15735: bahuvrīhiḥ . prasāraṇena api na bhavitavyam . vakṣyati etat . śvādīnām prasāraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:15736: nakārāntagrahaṇam anakārāntapratiṣedhārtham iti . parapūrvatvena api na bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:15738: iti . tasmāt bahuśvā bahuyuvā iti bhavitavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:15740: 471-477 anupasarjanāt iti kimartham . bahukurucarā mathurā priyakurucarā mathurā
GS24pmbhasuu:15741: . na etat asti prayojanam . kurucaraśabdāt prayayaḥ vidhīyate . tatra kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15742: yat bahukurucaraśabdāt syāt . na eva prāpnoti na arthaḥ pratiṣedhena . tadantavidhinā
GS24pmbhasuu:15743: prāpnoti . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . anupasarjanagrahaṇam anarthakam prātipadikena tadantavidhipratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15744: . anupasarjanagrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . prātipadikena tadantavidhipratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15745: . grahaṇavatā prātipadikena tadantavidhiḥ pratiṣidhyate . jñāpakam tu pūrvatra tadantāpratiṣedhasya
GS24pmbhasuu:15746: . evam tarhi jñāpayati ācāryaḥ pūrvatra tadantāpratiṣedhaḥ na bhavati iti . kim etasya
GS24pmbhasuu:15747: jñāpane prayojanam . bhavatī atibhavatī mahatī atimahatī iti atra tadantavidhiḥ siddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15748: bhavati . na etat asti prayojanam . uktam etat varṇaḥ api ugit pratyayaḥ api ugit
GS24pmbhasuu:15749: prātipadikam api ugit iti . idam tarhi . bahudhīvarī bahupīvarī iti . etat api na
GS24pmbhasuu:15750: asti prayojanam . atra api uktam ravidhāne bahuvrīheḥ upasaṅkhyānam pratiṣiddhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15751: iti . idam tarhi atidhīvarī atipīvarī . pūrvasūtranirdeśaḥ vā āpiśalam adhīte iti
GS24pmbhasuu:15752: . pūrvasūtranirdeśaḥ vā punaḥ ayam draṣṭavyaḥ . pūrvasūtre apradhānasya upasarjanam
GS24pmbhasuu:15753: iti sañjñā kriyate . yāvat brūyāt pradhānāt utpattavyam apradhānāt na iti tāvat anupasarjanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15754: iti . kim prayojanam . āpiśalam adhīte iti . āpiśalam adhīte brāhmaṇī āpiśalā brāhmaṇī
GS24pmbhasuu:15755: . aṇantāt iti īkāraḥ mā bhūt iti . atha anupasarjanāt iti ucyamāne kasmāt eva atra
GS24pmbhasuu:15756: na bhavati . aṇantam hi etat anupasarjanam . na anupasarjanagrahaṇena aṇantam viśeṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:15757: . aṇantāt anupasarjanāt iti . kim tarhi . aṇ eva viśeṣyate . aṇ yaḥ anupasarjanam
GS24pmbhasuu:15758: iti . jātiśabdebhyaḥ tu atiprasaṅgaḥ . jātiśabdebhyaḥ tu atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . kuntī
GS24pmbhasuu:15759: gāndhārī . siddham tu jāteḥ anupasarjanatvāt . siddham etat . katham . anupasarjanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15760: iti ucyate . na ca jātiḥ upasarjanam . etat api na asti prayojanam . striyām iti
GS24pmbhasuu:15761: vartate . tena aṇam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . striyām yaḥ aṇ vihitaḥ iti . evam api kāśakṛtsninā
GS24pmbhasuu:15762: proktam māmāṃsā kāśakṛtsnīm kāśakṛtsnīm adhīte kāśakṛtsnā brāhmaṇī atra prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:15763: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . adhetryām abhidheyāyām aṇaḥ īkāreṇa bhavitavyam . yaḥ ca atra adhetryām
GS24pmbhasuu:15764: abhidheyāyām aṇ uktaḥ luptaḥ saḥ yaḥ ca śrūyate utpannaḥ tasmāt īkāraḥ iti kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:15765: punaḥ na bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam tadantavidhiḥ yathā syāt . kumbhakārī
GS24pmbhasuu:15766: nagarakārī . atra hi pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ vihitaḥ tadādeḥ grahaṇam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:15767: iti avayavāt utpattiḥ prāpnoti . kṛdgrahaṇe gatikārakapūrvasya api grahaṇam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:15768: iti saṅghātāt utpattiḥ bhaviṣyati . kṛdgrahaṇe iti ucyate . na ca etat kṛdgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:15769: . kṛdakṛdgrahaṇam etat . kṛt api ayam aṇ taddhitaḥ api . evam tarhi īkārāntena samāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15770: bhaviṣyati . yadi evam labhyeta kṛtam syāt tat tu na labhyam . kim kāraṇam . atra
GS24pmbhasuu:15771: hi gatikārakopapadānām kṛdbhiḥ saha samāsaḥ bhavati iti samāsaḥ eva tāvat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:15772: . samāse kṛte avayavāt utpattiḥ prāpnoti . avayavāt utpattau kaḥ satyām doṣaḥ . kaumbhakāreyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15773: na sidhyati . avyayavasya vṛddhisvarau syātām . tasmāt anupasarjanādhikāraḥ . anupasarjanādhikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:15774: jāteḥ ṅīṣvidhāne suparṇyāḥ upasaṅkhyānam . anupasarjanādhikāre jāteḥ ṅīṣvidhāne suparṇyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15775: upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . suparṇī . na vā samāsasya anupasarjanatvāt jātivācakatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15776: ca śabdasya sāmānyena ṅīṣvidhānam . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . samāsasya anupasarjanatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15777: . samāsaḥ atra anupasarjanam . saḥ ca jātivācakaḥ . samāsasya anupasarjanatvāt tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:15778: ca jātivācakatvāt ca śabdasya sāmānyena ṅīṣ bhaviṣyati jāteḥ astrīviṣayāt ayopadhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15779: iti . katham kṛtvā coditam katham kṛtvā parihāraḥ . bahuvrīhiḥ iti kṛtvā coditam
GS24pmbhasuu:15782: 478-479 ḍhagrahaṇe sānubandhakasya upasaṅkhyānam . ḍhagrahaṇe sānubandhakasya upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:15783: kartavyam . kārikeyī hārikeyī . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . ananubandhakagrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:15784: hi na sānubandhakasya . ananubandhakagrahaṇe hi sānubandhakasya grahaṇam na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:15785: iti eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā . kāni etasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ prayojanāni . tavyagrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:15786: tavyadgrahaṇam mā bhūt . divgrahaṇe divugrahaṇam mā bhūt . nanu ca iyam api kartavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:15787: tadanubandhakagrahaṇe atadanubandhakasya ne iti . kāni etasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ prayojanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:15788: . yadgrahaṇe ṇyadgrahaṇam mā bhūt . aṅgrahaṇe caṅgrahaṇam mā bhūt . ajgrahaṇe ṇyajgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:15789: mā bhūt . tat dve ete paribhāṣe kartavye . na kartavye . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:15790: bhavataḥ ete paribhāṣe yat ayam vāmadevāt ḍyaḍḍyau iti yayatau ḍitau karoti . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:15791: tarhi upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . na kartavyam . ananubandhakaḥ ḍhaśabdaḥ striyām na
GS24pmbhasuu:15792: asti iti kṛtvā sānubandhakasya grahaṇam vijñāsyate . nanu ca ayam asti śilāyāḥ ḍhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15793: iti . na eṣaḥ striyām vartate . ayam tarhi sabhāyāḥ ḍhaḥ chandasi iti . eṣaḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:15794: na striyām vartate . kim kāraṇam . tatra sādhuḥ iti vartate . katham strī nāma sabhāyām sādhvī syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:15796: 479-480 añgrahaṇam anarthakam tadantāt hi ṅīnvidhānam . añgrahaṇam anarthakam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:15797: kāraṇam . tadantāt hi ṅīnvidhānam . tadantāt hi añantāt ṅīn vidhīyate . śārṅgaravādyañaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15798: ṅīn iti . na ca asti viśeṣaḥ añantāt ṅīnaḥ vā ṅīpaḥ vā . tat eva rūpam saḥ eva svaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15799: . na vā jātyadhikārāt . na vā anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . jātyadhikārāt . jāteḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:15800: tatra anuvartate . ajātyarthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . autsī audapānī . tat ca avaśyam jātigrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:15801: anuvartyam . anadhikāre hi puṃyogāt ākhyāyām ṅīnprasaṅgaḥ . ananuvartamāne hi jātigrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:15803: baidasya strī baidī . yadi tarhi asya nibandhanam asti idam eva kartavyam . tat na
GS24pmbhasuu:15804: kartavyam . tat api avaśyam kartavyam . akriyamāṇe hi tasmin baidasya bhaginī baidī
GS24pmbhasuu:15805: paratvāt jātilakṣaṇaḥ ṅīṣ ṅīpam bādheta . ṅīni punaḥ sati paratvāt ṅīn ṅīṣam bādheta .
GS24pmbhasuu:15807: 480-481 khyunaḥ upasaṅkhyānam . khyunaḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . āḍhyaṅkaraṇī subhagaṅkaraṇī . atyalpam idam ucyate :
