GS24pmbhasuu:15808: khyunaḥ iti . nañsnañīkakhyuṃstaruṇatalunānām upasaṅkhyānam . nañsnañīkakhyuṃstaruṇatalunānām upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . nañ snañ :
GS24pmbhasuu:15814: 481 āpatyagrahaṇam kartavyam dvīpāt yañaḥ pratiṣedhārtham . iha mā bhūt dvaipyā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:15815: . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . na evam vijñāyate kañkvarapaḥ yañaḥ ca iti
GS24pmbhasuu:15816: . katham tarhai kañkvarapaḥ ayañaḥ ca iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:15818: 482 taddhitavacanam kimartham . taddhitavacanam ṣitaḥ prātipadikāt īkārārtham . taddhitavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:15819: kriyate ṣitaḥ prātipadikāt īkāraḥ yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . ṣitkaraṇasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15820: eva atra īkāraḥ bhaviṣyati . yathā eva tarhi ṣitkaraṇasāmarthyāt aprātipadikāt īkāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15821: bhavati evam prātipadikāt iti asya anuvartanasāmārthyāt aṣitaḥ api prātipadikāt īkāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15822: syāt . asti anyat prātipadikānuvṛttau prayojanam . kim . uttarārtham . ataḥ iñ dākṣiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:15824: 482-483 sarvatragrahaṇam kimartham . prācām eva syāt . na etat asti prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:15825: siddham prācām pūrveṇa . idam tarhi prayojanam sarveṣām yathā syāt . āvaṭyāyanī .
GS24pmbhasuu:15828: 482-483-484 lohitādiṣu śākalyasya upasaṅkhyānam . lohitādiṣu śākalyasya upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:15829: kartavyam . śākalyāyanī . yadi punaḥ ayam śakalaśabdaḥ lohitādiṣu paṭhyeta . na evam
GS24pmbhasuu:15830: śakyam . iha hi śākalyasya chātrāḥ śākalāḥ kaṇvādibhyaḥ gotre iti aṇ na syāt . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:15831: tarhi . kaṇvāt tu śakalaḥ pūrvaḥ . kaṇvaśabdāt śakalaśabdaḥ pūrvaḥ paṭhitavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:15832: katāt uttaraḥ iṣyate. kataśabdāt śakalaśabdaḥ uttaraḥ paṭhitavyaḥ . pūrvottarau tadantādī
GS24pmbhasuu:15833: . pūrvottarau gaṇau tadantādī draṣṭavyau . ye kaṇvādayaḥ te śakalādayaḥ . ye kataparyantāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15834: te śakalaparyantāḥ . kim prayojanam . ṣphāṇau tatra praoyjanam . tatra evam sati
GS24pmbhasuu:15835: ṣphāṇau siddhau bhavataḥ . kaṇvāt tu śakalaḥ pūrvaḥ . katāt uttaraḥ iṣyate . pūrvottarau
GS24pmbhasuu:15838: 484 kauravyamāṇḍūkayoḥ āsureḥ upasaṅkhyānam . kauravyamāṇḍūkayoḥ āsureḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . āsurāyaṇī . chaḥ ca . chaḥ ca iti vaktavyam . āsurīyaḥ kalpaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:15840: 484-486 vayasi acarame iti vaktavyam iha api yathā syāt . vadhūṭī ciraṇṭī iti . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:15841: kasmāt na bhavati . uttānaśayā lohitapādikā dvivarṣā trivarṣā iti . na etāni vayovācīni
GS24pmbhasuu:15842: . katham tarhi vayaḥ gamyate . sambandhāt . yadi tarhi yatra sambandhāt vayaḥ gamyate
GS24pmbhasuu:15843: tatra na bhavati iha api na prāpnoti . kumārī iti . atra api sambandhāt vayaḥ gamyate
GS24pmbhasuu:15844: . kaḥ asu sambandhaḥ . yaḥ asu puṃsā asamprayogaḥ . sambandhāt eva atra vayaḥ gamyate
GS24pmbhasuu:15845: . iha punaḥ sambandhasambandhāt . iha tāvat uttānaśayā iti . yadā kartṛtvam viśeṣitam
GS24pmbhasuu:15846: bhavati tataḥ uttarakālam vayaḥ gamyate . yadi lohitapādikā iti . yadā bahuvrīhyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15847: viśeṣitaḥ tataḥ uttarakālam vayaḥ gamyate . dvivarṣā trivarṣā iti . yadā dviguarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15848: viśeṣitaḥ tataḥ uttarakālam vayaḥ gamyate . yadi tarhi yatra sambandhāt eva vayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15849: gamyate tatra bhavati iha api tari prapnoti . kanyā iti . nipātanāt etat siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:15850: . kim nipātanam. kanyāyāḥ kanīna ca iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:15852: 486 imau dvau pratiṣedhau ucyete . tatra ekaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum . katham . evam vakṣyāmi
GS24pmbhasuu:15853: . parimāṇāntāt taddhitaluki ṅīp bhavati iti . tat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . parimāṇāntāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15854: eva taddhitaluki ṅīp bhavati na anyataḥ iti . tataḥ vistācitakambalyebhyaḥ na iti
GS24pmbhasuu:15857: 486-488 ūdhasaḥ nakāraḥ liṅgādhikāre . ūdhasaḥ nakāraḥ liṅgādhikāre kartavyaḥ . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:15858: mā bhūt . mahodhāḥ parjanyaḥ iti . na vā samāsāntādhikāre strīgrahaṇāt . na vā liṅgādhikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:15859: nakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . kim kāraṇam . samāsāntādhikāre strīgrahaṇāt . samāsāntādhikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:15860: strīgrahaṇam kartavyam . itarathā hi kabvidhiprasaṅgaḥ . itarathā hi kabvidhiḥ prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:15861: . kasyām punaḥ avasthāyām kap prāpnoti . prāk ṅīṣutpatteḥ . prāk tāvat na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:15862: . kim kāraṇam . na hi ṅīṣ vibhāṣā . lutkpanne tarhi ṅīṣi prāpnoti . utpanne ca api
GS24pmbhasuu:15863: na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . nadyantānām yaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ iti evam tat . na ca eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15864: nadyantānām bahuvrīhiḥ . prāk eva tarhi prāpnoti . nanu ca uktam na hi ṅīṣ vibhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:15865: iti . yadi api na ṅīṣ vibhāṣā kap tu vibhāṣā . kapaḥ avakāśaḥ anyaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:15866: ayavakaḥ avrīhikaḥ . ṅīṣaḥ avakāśaḥ . vibhāṣā kap . yadā na kap saḥ avakāśaḥ . kuṇḍodhnī
GS24pmbhasuu:15867: ghaṭodhnī . kapprasaṅge lubhayam prāpnoti . paratvāt kap syāt . tasmāt suṣthu ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:15868: na vā samāsāntādhikāre strīgrahaṇāt . itarathā hi kabvidhiprasaṅgaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:15870: 488-489 dāmahāyanāntāt saṅkhyādeḥ . dāmahāyanāntāt saṅkhyādeḥ iti vaktavyam . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:15871: mā bhūt . uddāmā vaḍavā iti . tatpuruṣavijñānāt vā siddham . bahuvrīheḥ iti vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:15872: . tatpuruṣaḥ ca ayam . utkrāntā dāmnaḥ utdāmā . bhavet siddham yadā tatpuruṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:15873: yadā tu khalu bahuvrīhiḥ tadā na sidhyati . utkrāntam dāma asyāḥ iti . nanu ca cetanāvataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15874: etat bhavati utkramaṇam vā apakramaṇam vā dāma ca acetanam . acetaneṣu api cetanāvatupacāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15875: dṛśyate . tat yathā . srastāni asyāḥ bandhanāni . srasyante asyāḥ bandhanāni iti
GS24pmbhasuu:15876: . tat tarhi saṅkhyādeḥ iti vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . na vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:15877: . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . saṅkhyāvyayādeḥ ṅīp iti . yadi tat anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:15878: avyayādeḥ api vartate . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . saṅkhyādeḥ iti anuvartate . avyayādeḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:15879: nivṛttam . katham punaḥ ekayoganirdiṣṭayoḥ ekadeśaḥ anuvartate ekadeśaḥ na . ekayoganirdiṣṭānām
GS24pmbhasuu:15880: api ekadeśānuvṛttiḥ bhavati . tat yathā tasya pādamūle pīlvādikarṇādibhyaḥ kuṇabjāhacau
GS24pmbhasuu:15881: . pakṣāt tiḥ iti atra mūle iti anuvartate pāka iti nivṛttam .
GS24pmbhasuu:15883: 489 atha iha katham bhavitavyam . dvau hāyanau asyāḥ śālāyāḥ . dvihāyanā trihāyanā
GS24pmbhasuu:15884: iti . hāyanaḥ vayasi smṛtaḥ . vayovācinaḥ hāyanaśabdasya grahaṇam . na ca eṣaḥ vayovācī
GS24pmbhasuu:15885: . atha ṇatvam kasmāt na bhavati . ṇatvam api vayovācinaḥ eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:15887: 489 māmakagrahaṇam kimartham na aṇantāt iti evam siddham . niyamāṛthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . māmakaśabdāt sañjñācchandasoḥ eva . kva mā bhūt . māmikā buddhiḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:15889: 490 ajasādiṣu iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt . rātrim rātrim smariṣyantaḥ . rātrim rātrim ajānataḥ . sarvām rātrim saha uṣitvā . vṛttyām ekāntarātrim .
GS24pmbhasuu:15891: 490-491 antarvat pativat iti garbhabhartṛsaṃyoge . antarvat pativat iti garbhabhartṛsaṃyoge
GS24pmbhasuu:15892: iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . prathate tvayā patimatī pṛthivī iti . atha antaḥśabdasya
GS24pmbhasuu:15893: agarbhasaṃyoge kim pratyudāhriyate . antaḥ asyām śālāyām asti iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:15894: vākyam eva pratyudāhriyate na punaḥ matup . astisāmānādhikaraṇye matup vidhīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:15895: . na ca atra astisāmānādhikaraṇyam . iha api tarhi na prāpnoti . antarvatnī iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:15896: evam tarhi antarvatpativatoḥ tu matubvatve nipātanāt . antarvat iti matup nipātyate
GS24pmbhasuu:15897: . vatvam siddham . pativat iti vatvam nipātyate . matup siddhaḥ . kim aviśeṣeṇa .
GS24pmbhasuu:15898: na iti āha . garbhiṇyām jīvapatyām ca . etasmin viṣaye . vā ca chandasi nuk bhavet
GS24pmbhasuu:15899: . vā ca chandasi nuk vaktavyaḥ . sā antarvatī devān upait . sā antarvatnī devān upait
GS24pmbhasuu:15902: 48491-492 yajñsaṃyoge iti ucyate . tatra idam na sidhyati . iyam asti patnī . kva
GS24pmbhasuu:15903: tarhi syāt . patnīsaṃyājaḥ iti yatra yajñasaṃyogaḥ . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . patiśabdaḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:15904: aiśvaryavācī . sarveṇa ca gṛhasthena pañca mahāyajñāḥ nivartyāḥ . yat ca adaḥ sāyam
GS24pmbhasuu:15905: prātaḥ homacarupuroḍāśān nirvapati tasya asau īṣṭe . evam api tuṣajakasya patnī iti
GS24pmbhasuu:15906: na sidhyati . upamānāt siddham . patnī iva patnī iti .

GS24pmbhasuu:15909: upasaṅknhyānam kartavyam . vṛddhapatiḥ vṛddhapatnī sthūlapatiḥ sthūlapatnī . vacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15910: bhaviṣyati . asti vacane prayojanam . kim . āśāpatiḥ āsāpatnī . siddham tu patyuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15911: prātipadikaviśeṣaṇatvāt . siddham etat . katham . patyuḥ prātipadikaviśeṣaṇatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15912: . na evam vijñāyate . asti asmāt patiśabdāt pūrvaḥ saḥ ayam sapūrvaḥ . sapūrvāt patiśabdāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15913: anupasarjanāt iti . katham tarhi . asti asmin prātipadike pūrvaḥ tat idam sapūrvam
GS24pmbhasuu:15916: 493-495 pūtakratvādīnām puṃyogaprakaraṇe vacanam . pūtakratvādayaḥ puṃyogaprakaraṇe vaktavyāḥ . pūtakratoḥ strī pūtakratāyī . yayā hi pūtāḥ kratavaḥ pūtakratuḥ sā bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:15918: 493-495 liṅgasannigoyena sarvatra āgamādeśānām vacane liṅgaluki tatkṛtaprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15919: . liṅgasannigoyena sarvatra āgamādeśānām vacane liṅgaluki tatkṛtam prāpnoti . pañcendrāṇyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15920: devatāḥ asya pañcendraḥ pañcāgniḥ daśāgniḥ . kim ucyate sarvatra iti . anyatra api
GS24pmbhasuu:15921: na avaśyam iha eva . kva anyatra . pañcabhiḥ dhīvarībhiḥ krītaḥ pañcadhīvā daśadhīvā
GS24pmbhasuu:15922: iti . liṅgagrahaṇe na arthaḥ . sarvatra āgamādeśānām vacane luki tatkṛtaprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15923: iti eva . idam api siddham bhavati . pañcamena gṛhṇāti pañcakaḥ . na etat asti .
GS24pmbhasuu:15924: maṭ ayam parādiḥ . sa ṭataḥ grahaṇena grahīṣyate . idam tarhi prayojanam . ṣaṣṭhena
GS24pmbhasuu:15925: gṛhṇāti ṣaṭkaḥ iti . siddham tu āgamādeśānām aṅgataḥ strīprakaraṇe vacanāt . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:15926: etat . katham . āgamādeśāḥ ye iha strīprakaraṇe ucyante te aṅgādhikāre vaktavyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15927: . strīprakaraṇagrahaṇena na arthaḥ . siddham tu āgamādeśānām aṅgataḥ vacanāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:15928: eva . idam api siddham bhavati . ṣaṣṭhena gṛhṇāti ṣaṭkaḥ iti . liṅgaluki vā prakṛtipratyāpattivacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:15929: . atha vā liṅgaluki eva prakṛtipratyāpattiḥ vaktavyā . liṅgagrahaṇena na arthaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:15930: luki vā prakṛtipratyāpattivacanam iti eva . idam api siddham bhavati . ṣaṣṭhena gṛhṇāti
GS24pmbhasuu:15931: ṣaṭkaḥ iti . kim punaḥ atra jyāyaḥ . luki prakṛtipratyāpattivacanam iti eva jyāyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15932: . idam api siddham bhavati . pañcabhiḥ paṭvībhiḥ krītaḥ pañcapaṭuḥ daśapaṭuḥ . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:15933: tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . sanniyogaśiṣṭānām anyatarāpāye ubhayoḥ api abhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15934: . tat yathā . devadattayajñadattābhyām idam karma kartavyam . devadattāpāye yajñadattaḥ api na karoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:15936: 496 asitapalitayoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . asitapalitayoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktayaḥ . asitā palitā . chandasi knam eke . chandasi knam eke icchanti :
GS24pmbhasuu:15937: asiknī asi oṣadhe . paliknīḥ it yuvatayaḥ bhavanti . varṇāt ṅībvidhāne piśaṅgāt upasaṅkhyānam . varṇāt ṅībvidhāne piśaṅgāt upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . piśaṅgī .
GS24pmbhasuu:15939: 496-497 nīlāt oṣadhau . nīlāt oṣadhau iti vaktavyam . nīlī oṣadhiḥ . prāṇini ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:15940: prāṇini ca iti vaktavyam . nīlī gauḥ nīlī vaḍavā . vā sañjñāyām . vā sañjñāyām iti
GS24pmbhasuu:15943: 497-499 guṇavacanāt iti ucyate . kaḥ guṇaḥ nāma . sattve niviśate apaiti pṛthagjātiṣu dṛśyate ādheyaḥ ca akriyājaḥ ca saḥ asattvaprakṛtiḥ guṇaḥ . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:15944: upaiti anyat . jahāti anyat . dṛṣṭaḥ dravyāntareṣu api . vācakaḥ sarvaliṅgānām dravyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15945: anyaḥ guṇaḥ smṛtaḥ . guṇavacanāt ṅīP ādyudāttārtham . guṇavacanāt ṅīp vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:15946: kim prayojanam . ādyudāttārtham . ādyudāttāḥ prayojayanti . vasvī . kharusaṃyogopadhapratiṣedhaḥ ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:15949: gopālikā paśupālikā . kim punaḥ iha udāharaṇam . praṣṭḥī pracarī . katham punaḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:15950: praṣṭhaśabdaḥ akārāntaḥ striyām vartate . tasya idam iti anena abhisambandhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:15951: yathā eva hi asau tatkṛtān snānodvartanapariṣekān labhate evam praṣṭhaśabdam api
GS24pmbhasuu:15952: labhate . yadi evam puṃyogāt ākhyāyām taddhitalugvacanam . puṃyogāt ākhyāyām taddhitasya
GS24pmbhasuu:15953: luk vaktavyaḥ . tasya idam iti prāpnoti . na tarhi idānīm idam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:15954: prāṣthyaḥ imāḥ prācaryaḥ imāḥ iti . bhavati ca . vibhāṣā luk vaktavyaḥ . yadā luk
GS24pmbhasuu:15955: tadā praṣṭhī . yadā na luk tadā prāṣṭhī . yadi evam na arthaḥ lukā . vibhāṣā taddhitotpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15956: . yadā taddhitotpattiḥ tadā prāṣṭhī . yadā na taddhitotpattiḥ tadā praṣṭhī . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:15957: api luk vaktavyaḥ . na hi antareṇa taddhitasya lukam parārthe śabdaḥ vartate . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:15958: punaḥ tasyām eva praṣṭhaśabdaḥ varteta . katham punaḥ tasyām apratiṣṭhamānāyām praṣṭhaśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15959: varteta . yathā eva hi asau akurvatī kim cit pāpam tatkṛtān vadhabandanaparikleśān
GS24pmbhasuu:15960: labhate evam praṣṭhaśabdam api labhate . subantasamāsavacanāt ca akārāntānupapattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15961: . subantasamāsavacanāt ca akārāntatā na upapadyate . subantānām samāsaḥ . tatra antaraṅgatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15962: ṭāp . ṭapi utpanne samāsaḥ . sthāśabdaḥ samasyeta . tatra puṃyogāt ākhyāyām akārāntāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15963: iti īkāraḥ na prāpnoti . siddham tu striyāḥ puṃśabdena abhidhānāt . siddham etat
GS24pmbhasuu:15964: . katham . striyāḥ puṃśabdena abhidhānāt . strī puṃśabdena abhidhīyate . nanu ca
GS24pmbhasuu:15965: uktam puṃyogāt ākhyāyām taddhitalugvacanam iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15966: jñāpayati na ataḥ taddhitotpattiḥ bhavati iti yat ayam puṃyogāt ākhyāyām īkāram śāsti
GS24pmbhasuu:15967: . na etat asti jñāpakam . asti hi anyat etasya vacane prayojanam . ye anīkārāḥ strīpratyayāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15968: tadartham etat syāt . yat tarhi ākhyāgrahaṇam karoti . na hi taddhitāntam ākhyā bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:15969: . atha vā punaḥ astu tasya idam iti anena abhisambandhena . nanu ca uktam puṃyogāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15970: ākhyāyām taddhitalugvacanam iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na avaśyam ayam eva abhisambandhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15971: bhavati tasya idam iti . ayam api abhisambandhaḥ asti saḥ ayam iti . katham punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15972: atasmin saḥ iti etat bhavati . caturbhiḥ prakāraiḥ atasmin saḥ iti etat bhavati tātsthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15973: tāddharmyāt tatsāmīpyāt tatsāhacaryāt iti . tātsthyāt tāvat . mañcāḥ hasanti . giriḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15974: dahyate . tāddharmyāt . jaṭinam yāntam brahmadattaḥ iti āha . brahmadatte yāni kāryāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:15975: jaṭini api tāni kriyante iti ataḥ jaṭi brahmadattaḥ iti ucyate . tatsāmīpyāt . gaṅgāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:15976: ghoṣaḥ . kūpe gargakulam . tatsāhacaryāt . kuntān praveśaya . yaṣṭīḥ praveśaya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:15977: . atha vā punaḥ astu tasyām eva praṣṭhaśabdaḥ . nanu ca uktam subantasamāsavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15978: ca akārāntānupapattiḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . gatikārakopapadānām kṛdbhiḥ saha samāsavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:15979: . gatikārakopapadānām kṛdbhiḥ saha samāsaḥ bhavati iti eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā . kāni
GS24pmbhasuu:15980: etasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ prayojanāni . prayojanam ktāt alpākhyāyām . abhraviliptīsūpavilipti
GS24pmbhasuu:15981: . subantānām samāsaḥ . tatra antaraṅgatvāt ṭāp . ṭapi utpanne samāsaḥ . viliptāśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15982: samasyeta . tatra ktāt alpākhyāyām akārāntāt iti ṅīṣ na prāpnoti . jāteḥ ṅīṣvidhāne
GS24pmbhasuu:15983: . jāteḥ ṅīṣvidhāne prayojanam . vyāghrī kacchapī . subantānām samāsaḥ . tatra antaraṅgatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15984: ṭāp . ṭapi utpanne samāsaḥ . ghrāśabdaḥ samasyeta . tatra jāteḥ astrīviṣayāt ayopadhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15985: akārāntāt iti ṅīṣ na prāpnoti . samāsāntasya ṇatve . samāsāntasya ṇatve prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:15986: . vakṣyati prātipadikāntasya ṇatve samāsāntagrahaṇam asamāsāntapratiṣedhārtham iti
GS24pmbhasuu:15987: . tasmin kriyamāṇe māṣavāpiṇī vrīhivāpiṇī subantānām samāsaḥ . tatra antaraṅgatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15988: nakārāntatvāt ṅīp . ṅīpi utpanne samāsaḥ . vāpinī śabdaḥ samasyeta . tatra samāsāntasya
GS24pmbhasuu:15989: iti ṇatvam na prāpnoti . kṛdantāt taddhite vṛddhisvarau ca . kṛdantāt taddhite vṛddhisvarau ca prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:15990: sāṅkuṭinam vyāvakrośī . atra avayavāt utpattiḥ prasajyeta . gatikārakopapadānām kṛdbhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15991: saha samāsaḥ bhavati iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . satyām api etasyām paribhāṣāyām avayavāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15992: utpattiḥ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ tadādeḥ grahaṇam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:15993: iti . kṛdgrahaṇe gatikārakapūrvasya api grahaṇam bhavati iti saṅghātāt utpattiḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:15994: . yadi tarhi eṣā paribhāṣā asti na etasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15995: prayojanam bhavati . etayā eva siddham . na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . aprātipadikatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15996: . kṛttvāt prātipadikasañjñā bhaviṣyati . nanu ca idānīm prātipadikasañjñāyām api
GS24pmbhasuu:15997: etayā paribhāṣayā śakyam upasthātum . na iti āha . iha hi mūlakena upadaṃśam bhuṅkte
GS24pmbhasuu:15998: iti vākye api luk prasajyeta . svare ca doṣaḥ syāt . prakārakaḥ prakaraṇam . gatikārakopapadāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15999: kṛdantam uttarapadam prakṛtisvaram bhavati iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ na syāt . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16001: avayavasya api samudāyasya api . tatra avayavasya yā prātipadikasañjñā tadāśrayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16002: svaraḥ bhaviṣyati . iha api tarhi sāṅkuṭinam vyāvakrośī iti dve atra prātipadikasañjñe
GS24pmbhasuu:16003: avayavasya api samudāyasya api . tatra avayavasya yā prātipadikasañjñā tadāśrayāvayavāt
GS24pmbhasuu:16004: utpattiḥ prasajyeta . avayavāt utpattau satyām kaḥ doṣaḥ . kaumbhakāreyaḥ na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:16005: . avayavasya vṛddhisvarau syātām . tasmāt prayojanam eva etasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ . ubhābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:16006: nu khalu sidhyati . avadātāyām tu ṅīpprasaṅgaḥ . avadātāyām tu ṅīp prāpnoti . avadātā
GS24pmbhasuu:16007: brāhmaṇī . varṇāt anudāttāt topadhāt taḥ naḥ iti . na eṣaḥ varṇavācī . kim tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:16008: viśuddhavācī . ātaḥ ca viśuddhavācī . evam hi āha trīṇi yasya avadātāni vidyā yoniḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16009: ca karma ca etat śivam vijānīhi brāhmaṇāgryasya lakṣaṇam iti . sūryāt devatāyām cāp
GS24pmbhasuu:16010: vaktavyaḥ . sūryasya strī sūryā . devatāyām iti kimartham . sūrī .
GS24pmbhasuu:16012: 510-511 himāraṇyayoḥ mahattve . himāraṇyayoḥ mahattve iti vaktavyam . mahat himam
GS24pmbhasuu:16013: himānī . mahat araṇyam araṇyānī . yavāt doṣe . yavāt doṣe iti vaktavyam . duṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16014: yavaḥ yavānī . yavanāt lipyām . yavanāt lipyām iti vaktavyam . yavanānī lipiḥ . upādhyāyamātulābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:16015: vā . upādhyāyamātulābhyām vā iti vaktavyam . upādhyāyī upādhyāyānī . mātulī mātulānī
GS24pmbhasuu:16016: . mudgalāt chandasi lit ca . mudgalāt chandasi lit ca iti vaktavyam . rathīḥ abhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:16017: mudgalānī . ācāryāt aṇatvam ca . ācāryāt aṇatvam ca iti vaktavyam . ācāryānī . āryakṣatriyābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:16018: vā . āryakṣatriyābhyām vā iti vaktavyam . āryā āryāṇī . kṣatriyā kṣatriyāṇī .
GS24pmbhasuu:16020: 511 karaṇapūrvāt iti kimartham . gavāt krītā . aśvena krītā . karaṇapūrvāt iti ucyamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:16021: api atra prāpnoti . eṣaḥ api hi krītaśabdaḥ karaṇapūrvaḥ . vibhaktyā vyavahitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:16022: na bhaviṣyati . yadi tarhi vibhaktiḥ api vavadhāyikā bhaviṣyati manasākrītī iti na
GS24pmbhasuu:16023: sidhyati . evam tarhi na evam vijñāyate . karaṇam pūrvam asmāt krītaśabdāt saḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:16024: karaṇapūrvaḥ tasmāt karaṇapūrvāt krītaśabdāt anupasarjanāt iti . katham tarhi . karaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:16025: asmin prātipadike pūrvam tat idam karaṇapūrvam tasmāt karaṇapūrvāt prātipadikāt krītāntāt anupasarjanāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:16027: 512-513 antodātte jātapratiṣedhaḥ . antodātte jātasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . dantajātā
GS24pmbhasuu:16028: stanajātā . pāṇigṛhītyādīnām viśeṣe . pāṇigṛhītyādīnām viśeṣe iti vaktavyam . pāṇingṛhītī
GS24pmbhasuu:16029: iti bhāryā . yasya yathā katham cit pāṇiḥ gṛhyate pāṇigṛhītā sā bhavati . bahulam
GS24pmbhasuu:16030: taṇi . bahulam taṇi iti vaktavyam . kim idam taṇi iti . sañjñācchandasoḥ grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:16031: . kim prayojanam . prabaddhavilūnādyartham . prabaddhavilūnī prabaddhavilūnā . antodāttāt
GS24pmbhasuu:16033: . bahu . bahukṛtā . nañ . akṛtā . su . sukṛtā . kāla . māsajātā saṃvatsarajātā .
GS24pmbhasuu:16034: sukhādi . sukhajātā duḥkhajātā . jātipūrvāt vā . atha vā jātipūrvāt iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:16036: 513-513 svāṅgāt ca upasarjanāt iti ucyate . kim svāṅgam nāma . adravam mūrtimat svāṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:16037: prāṇistham avikārajam atatstham tatra dṛṣṭam ca tasya cet tat tathā yutam . aprāṇinaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16038: api svāṅgam . adravam iti kimartham . bahulohitā . na etat asti . bahvacaḥ na iti
GS24pmbhasuu:16039: pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi bahukaphā . mūrtimat iti kimartham . bahubuddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16040: bahumanāḥ . na etat asti . ataḥ iti vartate . idam tarhi . bahujñānā . prāṇistham
GS24pmbhasuu:16041: iti kimartham . ślakṣṇamukhā śālā . avikārajam iti kimartham . bahugaḍuḥ bahupaṭikā
GS24pmbhasuu:16042: . na etat asti . iha tāvat bahugaḍuḥ iti ataḥ iti vartate . bahupaṭikā iti bahvacaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16043: na iti pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi bahuśophā . atatstham tatra dṛṣṭam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:16044: . aprāṇistham prāṇini dṛṣṭam ca svāṅgasañjñam bhavati . dīrghakeśī rathyā iti . tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:16045: cet tat tathā yutam aprāṇinaḥ api svāṅgasañjñam bhavati . dīrghanāsikī arcā tuṅganāsikī arcā .
GS24pmbhasuu:16047: 514-516 atha upasarjanagrahaṇam kimartham . iha mā bhūt . śikhā . upasarjanagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:16048: anarthakam bahuvrīhyadhikārāt . upasarjanagrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . bahuvrīhyadhikārāt
GS24pmbhasuu:16049: . bahuvrīheḥ iti vartate . kva prakṛtam . bahuvrīheḥ ca antodāttāt iti . bahvajartham
GS24pmbhasuu:16050: tarhi upasarjanagrahaṇam kartavyam . bahvacaḥ na iti pratiṣedham vakṣyati . tat bahvajgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:16051: upasarjanaviśeṣaṇam yathā vijñāyeta . bahvacaḥ upasarjanāt na iti . atha akriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:16052: upasarjanagrahaṇe kasya bahvajgrahaṇam viśeṣaṇam syāt . bahurvīheḥ iti vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:16053: bahuvrīhiviśeṣaṇam vijñāyeta . asti ca idānīm kaḥ cit abahvac bahuvrīhiḥ yadarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16055: svaḍā svaḍī iti . bahvajartham iti cet svāṅgagrahaṇāt siddham . svāṅgagrahaṇam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:16056: . tat bahvajgrahaṇena viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . svāṅgāt bahvacaḥ na iti . evam tarhi antodādāttāt
GS24pmbhasuu:16057: iti vartate . antodāttārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . antodāttārtham iti cet sahādikṛtatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:16058: siddham . yat ayam sahanañvidyamānapūrvāt ca iti pratṣedham śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16059: antodāttāt api bhavati iti . svāṅgasamudāyapratiṣedhārtham tu . svāṅgasamudāyapratiṣedhārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:16060: tarhi upasarjanagrahaṇam kartavyam . śvāṅgāt yathā syāt . svāṅgasamudāyāt mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:16061: . kalyāṇapāṇipādā . atha kriyamāṇe api upasarjanagrahaṇe kasmāt eva atra na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:16062: . svāṅgam hi etat upasarjanam . na svāṅgasamudāyaḥ svāṅgagrahaṇena gṛhyate yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:16063: janapadasamudāyaḥ janapadagrahaṇena na gṛhyate . kāśikosalīyā iti janapadatadavadhyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16064: iti vuñ na bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam . asvāṅgapūrvapadāt iti vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:16065: . tena svāṅgam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . asvāṅgapūrvapadāt param yat svāṅgam tadantāt bahuvrīheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16066: iti . yat ca atra asvāṅgapūrvapadāt param na tadantaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ yadantaḥ ca bahuvrīhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16067: na tat asvāṅgapūrvapadāt param svāṅgam . nanu ca tat pūrvasmin yoge bahuvrīhiviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:16068: . na iti āha . pūrvapadaviśeṣaṇam . na svāṅgam asvāṅgam pūrvam padam pūrvapadam asvāṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:16069: pūrvapadam asvāṅgapūrvapadam asvāṅgapūrvapadāt iti . yadi evam pūrvasmin yoge bahuvrīhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16070: aviśeṣitaḥ bhavati . bahuvrīhiḥ ca viśeṣitaḥ . katham . ktāt iti vartate . tena bahuvrīhim
GS24pmbhasuu:16071: viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . asvāṅgāt pūrvapadāt param yat ktāntam tadantāt bahuvrīheḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:16072: idam tarhi prayojanam . bahuvrīheḥ iti vartate upasarjanamātrāt yathā syāt . niṣkeśī
GS24pmbhasuu:16075: 517 nāsikādīnām vibhāṣāyām pucchāt ca . nāsikādīnām vibhāṣāyām pucchāt ca iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:16077: nityam iti vaktavyam . kabarapucchī maṇipucchī viṣapucchī śarapucchī . upamānāt pakṣāt
GS24pmbhasuu:16078: ca . upamānāt pakṣāt ca pucchāt ca iti vaktavyam . ulūkapakṣī śālā ulūkapakṣī senā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:16081: . nāsikādibhyaḥ vibhāṣāyāḥ sahanañvidyamānapūrvebhyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:16082: . nāsikādibhyaḥ vibhāṣāyāḥ avakāśaḥ kalyāṇanāsikī kalyāṇanāsikā . sahanañvidyamānapūrvalakṣaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:16083: pratiṣedhasya avakāśaḥ samukhā amukhā vidyamānmukhā iti . iha ubhayam prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:16084: sanāsikā anāsikā vidyamānanāsikā iti . sahanañvidyamānapūrvebhyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:16085: vipratiṣedhena . na eṣaḥ yuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . ayam vidhiḥ saḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . vidhipratiṣedhayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16086: ca ayuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . ayam api vidhiḥ na mṛdūnām iva karpāsānām kṛtaḥ pratiṣedhaviṣaye
GS24pmbhasuu:16087: ārabhyate . saḥ yathā eva bahvajlakṣaṇam saṃyogopadhalakṣaṇam ca pratiṣedham bādhate
GS24pmbhasuu:16088: evam sahanañvidyamānapūrvalakṣaṇam api bādheta . kā tarhi gatiḥ . iha tāvat nāsikodara
GS24pmbhasuu:16089: iti bahvajlakṣaṇaḥ ca pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti sahanañvidyamānapūrvalakṣaṇaḥ ca . purastāt
GS24pmbhasuu:16090: apavādāḥ anantarān vidhīn bhādante iti evam iyam vibhāṣā bahvajlakṣaṇam pratiṣedham
GS24pmbhasuu:16092: ca iti saṃyogalakṣaṇaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti sahanañvidyamānapūrvalakṣaṇaḥ ca . madhye
GS24pmbhasuu:16093: apavādāḥ pūrvān vidhīn bādhante iti evam iyam vibhāṣā saṃyogalakṣaṇam pratiṣedham
GS24pmbhasuu:16096: 518-519 dikpūrvapadāt ṅīṣaḥ anudāttatvam . dikpūrvapadāt ṅīṣaḥ anudāttatvam vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:16097: . prāṅmukhī pratyaṅmukḥī . ṅībvidhāne hi anyatra api ṅīṣviṣayān ṅīpprasaṅgaḥ . ṅībvidhāne
GS24pmbhasuu:16098: hi sati anyatra api ṅīṣviṣayān ṅīp prasajyeta . prāggulphā pratyaglalāṭā . nanu ca
GS24pmbhasuu:16099: ete viśeṣāḥ anuvarteran asaṃyogopadhāt bahvacaḥ na iti . yadi api ete viśeṣāḥ anuvarteran
GS24pmbhasuu:16100: asaṃyogopadhāt bahvacaḥ na iti evam api dikpūrvapadāt ṅīpā mukte ṅīṣ prasajyeta .
GS24pmbhasuu:16101: na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . uktam etat yatrotsargāpavādam vibhāṣā tatra apavādena mukte utsargaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16102: na bhavati iti . atha vā ṅīṣaḥ ādeśaḥ ṅīp kariṣyate . tat tarhi ṅīṣaḥ grahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:16103: . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . anyataḥ ṅīṣ iti . tat vai prathamānirdiṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:16104: ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭena ca iha arthaḥ . dikpūrvapadāt iti eṣā pañcamī ṅīṣ iti prathamāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16105: ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayiṣyati tasmāt iti uttarasya iti . pratyayavidhiḥ ayam na ca pratyayavidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:16106: pañcamyaḥ prakalpikāḥ bhavanti . na ayam pratyayavidhiḥ . vihitaḥ pratyayaḥ prakṛtaḥ ca anuvartate.
GS24pmbhasuu:16108: 519-521 jāteḥ iti ucyate . kā jātiḥ nāma . ākṛtigrahaṇā jātiḥ liṅgānām ca na sarvabhāk sakṛtākhyātanirgrāhyā gotram ca caraṇaiḥ saha . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:16109: prādurbhāvavināśābhyām sattvasya yugapat guṇaiḥ asarvaliṅgām bahvarthām tām jātim
GS24pmbhasuu:16110: kavayaḥ viduḥ . gotram ca caraṇāni ca . kaḥ punaḥ etayoḥ jātilakṣaṇayoḥ viśeṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:16111: yathā pūrvam jātilakṣaṇam tathā kumārībhāryaḥ iti bhavitavyam . yathā uttaram tathā
GS24pmbhasuu:16114: 522 atha astrīviṣayāt iti katham idam vijñāyate . samānāyām ākṛtau yat astrīviṣayam
GS24pmbhasuu:16115: iti āhosvit kva cit yat astrīviṣayam iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate samānāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:16116: ākṛtau yat astrīviṣayam iti droṇī kuṭī pātrī iti na sidhyati . atha vijñāyate kva
GS24pmbhasuu:16117: cit yat astrīviṣayam iti mālā balākā atra api prāpnoti . astu kva cit yat astrīviṣayam
GS24pmbhasuu:16118: iti . katham mālā balākā iti . ajādiṣu pāṭhaḥ kariṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:16120: 522-523 ayopadhāt iti kimartham . ibhyā kṣatriyā . atyalpam idam ucyate ayopadhāt iti . akopadhāt iti api vaktavyam iha api yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:16121: syāt . caṭakā mūṣikā iti . yadi akopadhāt iti ucyate kākī kokī śukī iti na sidhyati . astu tarhi ayopadhāt iti eva . katham caṭakā mūṣikā iti . ajādiṣu pāṭhaḥ kartavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:16124: puṣpāt pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . satpuṣpā prākpuṣpā kāṇḍapuṣpā prāntapuṣpā śatapuṣpā
GS24pmbhasuu:16126: pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . sam . samphalā . sam . bhastrā . bhastrāphalā . bhastrā .
GS24pmbhasuu:16127: ajina . ajinaphalā . ajina . piṇḍa . piṇḍaphalā . piṇḍa . śaṇa . śaṇaphalā . śaṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:16128: . śvetāt ca iti vaktavyam . śvetaphalā . treḥ ca . treḥ ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16131: 524 jāteḥ iti vartamāne punaḥ jātigrahaṇam kimartham . ayopadhāt iti vartate . yopadhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:16132: api yathā syāt . audameyī . itaḥ manuṣyajāteḥ iñaḥ upasaṅkhyānam . itaḥ manuṣyajāteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16135: 524-525 kimarthaḥ ṅakāraḥ . viśeṣaṇāṛthaḥ . kva viśeṣaṇāṛthena arthaḥ . na ūṅdhātvoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16136: iti . na ūdhātvoḥ iti ucyamāne yavāgvā yavāgvai iti atra api prasajyeta . atha dīrghoccāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:16137: kimartham na ūṅ utaḥ iti eva ucyeta . kā rūpasiddhiḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:16139: dhīvabandhūḥ iti . savarṇadīrghatvena siddham . na sidhyati . gostriyoḥ upasarjanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:16140: iti hrasvatvam prasajyeta . iha ca brahmabandhūchatram brahmabandhūcchatram ṣatvatukoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16141: asiddhaḥ iti ekādeśasya asiddhatvāt nityaḥ tuk prasajyeta . iha ca brahmabandhūḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:16142: dhīvabandhūḥ nadyṛtaḥ kap iti kap prasajyeta . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yat tāvat ucyate brahmabandhūḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:16143: dhīvabandhūḥ iti gostriyoḥ upasarjanasya iti hrasvatvam prasajyeta iti . ubhayataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16144: āśraye na antādivat . yat api ucyate brahmabandhūchatram brahmabandhūcchatram ṣatvatukoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16145: asiddhaḥ iti ekādeśasya asiddhatvāt nityaḥ tuk prasajyeta iti . padāntapadādyoḥ ekādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16146: asiddhaḥ na ca eṣaḥ padāntapadādyoḥ ekādeśaḥ . yat api ucyate iha ca brahmabandhūḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16147: dhīvabandhūḥ nadyṛtaḥ kap iti kap prasajyeta iti . nadyantānām yaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:16148: evam tat na ca eṣaḥ nadyantānām yaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ . śeṣalakṣaṇaḥ tarhi kap prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:16151: 525 ūṅprakaraṇe aprāṇijāteḥ ca arajjvādīnām . ūṅprakaraṇe aprāṇijāteḥ ca arajjvādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:16152: iti vaktavyam . alābūḥ karkandhūḥ . aprāṇijāteḥ iti kimartham . kṛkavākuḥ . arajjvādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:16155: 526 sahitasahhābhyām ca iti vaktavyam . sahitorūḥ sahorūḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:16157: 526 atyalpam idam ucyate kadrukamaṇḍavlvoḥ iti . kadrukamaṇḍaluguggulumadhujatupatayālūṇām iti vaktavyam : kadrūḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:16163: 526 ṣāt ca yañaḥ cāp . ṣāt ca yañaḥ cāp vaktavyaḥ . śārkarākṣyā pautimāṣyā . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:16164: ayam api arthaḥ . gaukakṣyaśabdaḥ krauḍyādiṣu paṭhyate . saḥ na paṭhitavyaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:16165: . yadi na paṭhyate gaukṣīputraḥ iti samprasāraṇam na prāpnoti . iṣṭam eva etat saṅgṛhītam
GS24pmbhasuu:16166: . gaukṣyāputraḥ iti eva bhavitavyam . evam hi saunāgāḥ paṭhanti . ṣyaṅaḥ samprasāraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:16169: 527-528 anaḥ upadhālopinaḥ ūdhasaḥ ṅīṣ pūrvavipratiṣiddham . anaḥ upadhālopinaḥ anyatarasyām
GS24pmbhasuu:16170: iti etasmāt ūdhasaḥ ṅīṣ bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena . ataḥ upadhālopinaḥ anyatarasyām
GS24pmbhasuu:16171: iti etasya avakāśaḥ bahurājñī bahutakṣṇī . ūdhasaḥ ṅīṣ bhavati iti asya avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16172: . vibhāṣā ṅīp . yadā na ṅīp saḥ avakāśaḥ . ṅīpprasaṅge ubhayam prāpnoti . ūdhasaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16173: ṅīṣ bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena . saḥ tarhi pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16174: . anaḥ upadhālopinaḥ anyatarasyām iti atra ūdhasaḥ ṅīṣ bhavati iti etat anuvartiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:16175: . āvaṭyāt yañaḥ ṣphaḥ cāpaḥ . āvaṭyāt yañaḥ ṣphaḥ cāpaḥ bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:16176: . āvaṭyāt yañaḥ cāpaḥ avakāśaḥ udīcām . āvaṭyā . ṣphasya avakāśaḥ anyāni yañantāni
GS24pmbhasuu:16177: . gārgyāyaṇī vātsyāyanī . āvaṭyaśabdāt prācām ubhayam prāpnoti . āvaṭyāyanī . ṣphaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16178: bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena . āvaṭyagrahaṇena na arthaḥ . yañaḥ ṣphaḥ cāpaḥ iti eva
GS24pmbhasuu:16179: . idam api siddham bhavati . śārkarākṣyāyaṇī pautimāṣyāyaṇī . yañgrahaṇena na arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16180: . ṣphaḥ cāpaḥ iti eva . gaukakṣyaśabdaḥ krauḍyādiṣu paṭhyate . idam api siddham bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:16181: gaukakṣyāyaṇī . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . evam vakṣyāmi . prācām ṣphaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16182: taddhitaḥ sarvatra . kva sarvatra . yatra ṣphaḥ ca anyaḥ ca prāpnoti ṣphaḥ eva tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:16183: bhavati iti . tataḥ lohitāidkatantebhyaḥ sarvatra . kva sarvatra . prācām ca udīcām ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:16185: 528-530 iha kasmāt na bhavati . dākṣī plākṣī iti . atiśāyikena ayam tamaśabdena nirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16186: kriyate . saḥ ca triprabhṛtiṣu vartate . triprabhṛtīnām abhāvāt . yadi evam prakarṣe
GS24pmbhasuu:16187: cet tamam kṛtvā dākṣyāḥ na upottamam guru āmvidhiḥ kena te na syāt prakarṣe yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:16188: ayam tamaḥ . prakarṣe cet tamam kṛtvā dākṣyāḥ na upottamam guru iti ucyate āmvidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16189: kena tava na syāt . avyayaghāt iti prāpnoti . prakarṣe yadi ayam tamaḥ . yadi ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:16190: tamaḥ prakarṣe vartate . udgatasya prakarṣaḥ ayam . gataśabdaḥ atra lupyate .udgatasya
GS24pmbhasuu:16191: ayam prakarṣaḥ . gataśabdasya atra lopaḥ bhavati . nāvyayārthaprakarṣaḥ asti . dhātvarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16192: atra prakṛṣyate . nāvyayasya arthasya prakarṣaḥ . kasya tarhi . dhātvarthasya . udgataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16193: apekṣate kim cit . trayāṇām dvau kila udgatau . anudgatam apekṣya udgataḥ iti etat
GS24pmbhasuu:16194: bhavati . trayāṇām dvau kila udgatau . trayāṇām kila dvau udgatau bhavataḥ . catuṣprabhṛtikartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16195: vārāhyāyām na sidhyati . catuṣprabhṛtiṣu ṣyaṅ vaktavyaḥ vārāhyāyām na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:16196: vārāhyāyām na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . catuṣprabhṛtīnām abhāvāt . bhidyate asya svaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16197: tena vidhiḥ ca āmaḥ na lakṣyate . bhidyate khalu asya svaraḥ tena ātiśāyikena śabdena
GS24pmbhasuu:16198: uttamasya . vidhiḥ ca āmaḥ na lakṣyate . vidhiḥ ca āmaḥ na kva cit api lakṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:16199: śabdāntaram idam vidhyāt dṛṣṭam abhyantaram triṣu . evam tarhi anyaḥ ayam ātiśāyikena
GS24pmbhasuu:16202: 530-538 kim punaḥ ayam aṇiñoḥ ādeśaḥ āhosvit aṇiñbhyām paraḥ . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16203: . ṣyaṅi anādeśe yalopavacanam . ṣyaṅi anādeśe yalopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . audameghyāyāḥ chātrāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16204: audameghāḥ . dviḥ aṇvidhiḥ . dviḥ ca aṇ vidheyaḥ . audameghyāyāḥ chātrāḥ audameghāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16205: . audameghyānām saṅghaḥ audameghaḥ . iñaḥ iti aṇ na prāpnoti . astu tarhi ādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16206: . ādeśe nalopavacanam . yadi ādeśaḥ nalopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . auḍulomyā śāralomyā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:16207: ye ca abhāvakarmaṇoḥ iti prakṛtibhāvaḥ prasajyeta . na vā ṣyaṅaḥ lopanimittatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:16208: . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . ṣyaṅaḥ lopanimittatvāt . lopanimittaḥ ṣyaṅ . na
GS24pmbhasuu:16209: akṛte lope ṣyaṅ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . gurūpottamayoḥ iti ucyate na ca akṛte lope
GS24pmbhasuu:16210: gurūpottamam bhavati . atha vā punaḥ astu paraḥ . nanu ca uktam ṣyaṅi anādeśe yalopavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:16211: dviḥ aṇvidhiḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yat tāvat ucyate yalopavacanam iti adoṣaḥ eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16212: . kim kāraṇam . puṃvadbhāvāt yajādau taddhite . yajādau taddhite puṃvadbhāvaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:16213: bhasya aḍhe taddhite puṃvat bhavati iti . ayam tarhi doṣaḥ dviḥ aṇvidhiḥ iti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:16214: eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . siddhaḥ ca pratyayavidhau . saḥ ca siddhaḥ pratyayavidhau . ubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:16215: idam uktam ādeśaḥ paraḥ iti ca . kim atra nyāyyam . adeśaḥ iti etat nyāyyam . kutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16216: etat . evam ca eva hi kṛtvā ācāryeṇa sūtram paṭhitam ṣaṣṭhyā ca nirdeśaḥ kṛtaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:16217: ataḥ eṣaḥ pakṣaḥ nirdoṣaḥ . nanu ca parasmin api sati ye doṣāḥ te parihṛtāḥ . puṃvadbhāvena
GS24pmbhasuu:16218: yalopaḥ parihṛtaḥ . sa ca puṃvadbhāvaḥ aḍe bhavati . tatra audamegheyaḥ na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:16219: . anubandhau tvayā kāryau . yasya ādeśaḥ anubandhau tena kartavyau . ekaḥ sāmānyagrahaṇāṛthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16220: aparaḥ sāmānyagrahaṇāvighātārthaḥ . kva sāmānyagrahaṇāṛthena arthaḥ . yaṅaḥ cāp iti
GS24pmbhasuu:16221: . atha sāmānyagrahaṇāvighātārthena kva arthaḥ . atra eva . kim prayojanam . cāpartham
GS24pmbhasuu:16222: . cāp yathā syāt . tava katham cāp . ṭābvidhiḥ mama . ṭāpā mama siddham . nanu ca
GS24pmbhasuu:16223: mama api ṭāpā siddham . na sidhyati . aṇaḥ iti iñaḥ iti ca īkāraḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16224: doṣaḥ . na evam vijñāyate aṇantāt akārāntāt iñantāt ikārāntāt iti . katham tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:16225: . aṇ yaḥ akāraḥ iñ yaḥ ikāraḥ iti . svarārthaḥ tarhi tvayā cāp vaktavyaḥ . ñniti
GS24pmbhasuu:16226: iti ādyudāttatvam mā bhūt citaḥ antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati iti antodāttatvam yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:16227: iti . tava api tarhi ṣyaṅā uktatvāt strītvasya ṭāp na prāpnoti . ukte api hi bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:16228: ete . ukte api hi strītve bhavanti ete ṭābādayaḥ . uktam etat svāṛthikāḥ ṭābādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16229: iti . mama api tarhi sānubandhakasya ādeśaḥ itkāryam na iti . tena ñit na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:16230: . asthānivattve doṣaḥ te vṛddhiḥ atra na sidhyati . asthānivattve doṣaḥ . vṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16231: te na prāpnoti . auḍulomyā śāralomyā . na ca idānīm ardhajaratīyam labhyam vṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16232: me bhaviṣyati svaraḥ na iti . tat yathā ardham jaratyāḥ kāmayate ardham na iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:16233: tvayā api atra viśeṣārtham kartavyam syāt viśeṣaṇam . tvayā api atra viśeṣārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16234: anubandhaḥ kartavyaḥ . kva viśeṣaṇārthena arthaḥ . ṣyaṅaḥ samprasāraṇam iti . akriyā
GS24pmbhasuu:16235: eva viśeṣaḥ atra sānubandhaḥ viśeṣavān . akriyā eva mama viśeṣaḥ sānubandhaḥ tu viśeṣavān
GS24pmbhasuu:16236: . pāśyāyām te katham na syāt . pāśyāputraḥ iti atra kasmāt na bhavati . ekaḥ me syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:16237: viśeṣaṇam . ekaḥ mama viśeṣaṇāṛthaḥ . tvayā punaḥ dvau kartavyau . atha ekasmin api
GS24pmbhasuu:16238: sati kaḥ kariṣyate . kim ca ataḥ . anyasmin sūtrabhedaḥ syāt . yadi etābhyām anyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16239: kriyate sūtrabhedaḥ kṛtaḥ bhavati . ṣiti liṅgam prasajyeta . atha ṣit kriyate ṣitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16240: iti īkāraḥ prāpnoti . ṅiti cekrīyite doṣaḥ . atha ṅit kriyate cekrīyite doṣaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:16241: . lolūyāputraḥ lolūyāpatiḥ iti . vyavadhānāt na duṣyati . akāreṇa vyavahitatvāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:16242: doṣaḥ bhavati . yaḥ anantaraḥ na dhātuḥ saḥ . dhātoḥ iti vartate yaḥ ca atra anantaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16243: na asau dhātuḥ . yaḥ dhātuḥ saḥ ananantaraḥ . yaḥ ca dhātuḥ sa asau anantaraḥ . na
GS24pmbhasuu:16245: na cet ubhayataḥ sāmyam ubhayatra prāpnoti . yadi punaḥ yaṅā dhātuḥ viśeṣyeta . yaṅā
GS24pmbhasuu:16246: viśeṣyeta yadi iha dhātuḥ yaṅ dhātunā vā yadi tulyam etat . yadi eva yaṅā dhātuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16247: viśeṣyate yadi atha api dhātunā yaṅ tulyam etat bhavati . ubhau pradhānam yadi na
GS24pmbhasuu:16248: atra doṣaḥ . atha ubhau pradhānam bhavataḥ na atra doṣaḥ bhavati . tathā prasāryeta
GS24pmbhasuu:16249: tu vākpatiḥ te . tathā sati vākpatiḥ vākputraḥ iti atra prasāraṇam prāpnoti . dhātuprakaraṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:16250: iha na sthānam iti niścayaḥ . dhātuprakaraṇasya iha sthānam na asti iti kṛtvā eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16251: niścayaḥ kriyate . avaśyam āttvārtham dhātugrahaṇam kartavyam . iha mā bhūt . gobhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:16252: gobhiḥ naubhyām naubhiḥ . āttvārtham yadi kartavyam tatra eva tat kariṣyate . upadeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:16253: yat ejantam tasya ced āttvam iṣyate uddeśaḥ ṛūḍhiśabdānām . tena goḥ na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:16254: . evam tarhi upadeśe iti ucyate uddeśaḥ ca prātipadikānām na upadeśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:16256: 538-540 kimartham idam ucyate . gotrāvayavāt agotrārtham . gotrāvayavāt iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:16257: . agotrārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . gotrāvayavāt agotrārtham iti cet tat aniṣṭam . gotrāvayavāt
GS24pmbhasuu:16258: agotrārtham iti cet tat aniṣṭam prāpnoti . iha api prāpnoti āhicchatrī kānyakubjī
GS24pmbhasuu:16259: . evam tarhi gotrāt eva gotrāvayavāt . gotrāt iti cet vacanānarthakyam . gotrāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:16260: cet vacanam anarthakam . siddham gotre purveṇa eva . idam tarhi prayojanam . gurūpottamayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16261: iti ucyate . agurūpottamāṛthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . agurūpottamāṛtham iti cet sarveṣām
GS24pmbhasuu:16262: avayavatvāt sarvaprasaṅgaḥ . agurūpottamāṛtham iti cet sarveṣām avayavatvāt sarvatra prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:16263: aṣṭāśītiḥ sahasrāṇi ūrdhvaretasām ṛṣīṇām babhūvuḥ . tatra agastyāṣṭamaiḥ ṛṣibhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16264: prajanaḥ abhyupagataḥ . tatrabhavatām yat apatyam tāni gotrāṇi . ataḥ anye gotrāvayavāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16265: . tatra utpattiḥ prāpnoti . tat ca aniṣṭam . tasmāt na arthaḥ anena yogena . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:16266: yebhyaḥ agurūpottamebhyaḥ iṣyate . siddham tu rauḍhyādiṣu upasaṅkhyānāt . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:16267: etat . katham . rauḍhyādiṣu upasaṅkhyānāt . rauḍhyādiṣu upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:16268: ke punaḥ rauḍhyādayaḥ . ye krauḍyādayaḥ . bhāradvājīyāḥ paṭhanti siddham tu kulākhyebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16269: loke gotrābhimatābhyaḥ iti . siddham etat . katham . kulākhyāḥ loke gotrāvayavāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16270: iti ucyante . atha vā gotrāvayavaḥ kaḥ bhavatum arhati . gotrāt avayutaḥ . kaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:16271: gotrāt avayutaḥ . yaḥ anantaraḥ . daivadattyā yājñadattyā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:16273: 541-543 samarthavacanam kimartham . samarthāt utpattiḥ yathā syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:16274: upagoḥ apatyam . asamarthāt mā bhūt iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:16275: kambalaḥ upagoḥ apatyam devadattasya iti . samarthavacanam anarthakam . na hi asamarthena
GS24pmbhasuu:16276: arthābhidhānam . samarthavacanam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . na hi asamarthena arthābhidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:16277: . na hi asamarthāt utpadyamānena pratyayena arthābhidhānam syāt . anabhidhānāt tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16278: utpattiḥ na bhaviṣyati . atha prathamavacanam kimartham . prathamavacanam prakṛtiviśeṣaṇārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:16279: . prathamāt pratyayotpattiḥ yathā syāt . aprathamāt mā bhūt . upagoḥ apatyam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:16280: apatyaśabdāt . prathamavacanam anarthakam . na hi aprathamena arthābhidhānam . prathamavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:16281: anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . na hi aprathamena arthābhidhānam . na hi aprathamāt utpadyamānena
GS24pmbhasuu:16282: pratyayena arthābhidhānam syāt . anabhidhānāt tataḥ utpattiḥ na bhaviṣyati . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:16283: vāvacanam kimartham . vākyam api yathāt syāt . upagoḥ apatyam iti . vāvacane ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:16284: . kim uktam . tatra tāvat uktam . vāvacanānarthakyam ca tatra nityatvāt sanaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:16285: . iha api vāvacanam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . tatra nityatvāt pratyayasya . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:16286: dvau pakṣau vṛttipakṣaḥ ca avṛttipakṣaḥ ca . svabhāvtaḥ ca etat bhavati vākyam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:16287: vṛttiḥ ca . tatra svābhāvike vṛttiviṣaye nitye pratyaye prāpte vāvacanen kim anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:16288: śakyam abhisambandhum anyat ataḥ sañjñāyāḥ . na ca sañjñāyāḥ bhāvābhāvau iṣyete .
GS24pmbhasuu:16289: tasmāt na arthaḥ vāvacanena . atha etat samarthagrahaṇam na eva kartavyam . kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:16290: ca . kim prayojanam . samarthāt utpattiḥ yathā syāt . asamarthāt mā bhūt . kim punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16291: samartham . arthābhidhāne yat samartham . kim punaḥ tat . kṛtavarṇānupūrvīkam padam
GS24pmbhasuu:16292: . sautthitiḥ vaikṣamāṇiḥ iti . atha tat vāvacanam na eva kartavyam . kartavyam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:16293: . kim prayojanam . nityāḥ śabdāḥ . nityeṣu śabdeṣu vākyasya anena sādhutvam anvākhyāyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:16295: 544-545 ayuktaḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ . na hi tatra kaḥ cit dīvyacchabdaḥ paṭhyate . kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16296: tarhi . dīvyatiśabdaḥ . katham tarhi nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . prāk dīvyateḥ iti . saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16297: tarhi tathā nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ prāk dīvyateḥ iti . na kartavyaḥ . dīvyatiśabde dīvyacchabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16298: asti . tasmāt eṣā pañcamī . kim punaḥ kāraṇam vikṛtanirdeśaḥ kriyate . etat jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:16300: ekadeśavikṛtam ananyavat bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . ekadeśavikrṭeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:16301: upasaṅkhyānam coditam . tat na kartavyam bhavati . atha vā prākśabdaḥ ayam dikśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16302: . dikśabdaiḥ ca yoge pañcamī bhavati . tatra aprathamāsamānādhikaraṇe iti śatā bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:16304: 545 atha prāgvacanam kimartham . prāgvacanam sakṛdvidhānārtham . prāgvacanam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:16305: sakṛdvidhānārtham . sakṛdvihitaḥ pratyayaḥ vihitaḥ yathā syāt . yoge yoge tasya grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:16306: mā kārṣam iti . na etat asti prayojanam . adhikārāt api etat siddham . adhikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16307: pratiyogam tasya anirdeśārthaḥ iti yoge yoge upatiṣṭhate . adhikārāt siddham iti
GS24pmbhasuu:16308: cet apavādaviṣaye aṇprasaṅgaḥ . adhikārāt siddham iti cet apavādaviṣaye aṇ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:16309: . ataḥ iñ aṇ ca iti aṇ api prāpnoti . tasmāt prāgvacanam . tasmāt prāgvacanam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:16311: 545-547 atha kriyamāṇe api prāgvacane katham idam vijñāyate . prāk dīvyataḥ yāḥ prakṛtayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16312: āhosvit prāk dīvyataḥ ye arthāḥ iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate prāk dīvyataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16313: yāḥ prakṛtayaḥ iti saḥ eva doṣaḥ apavādaviṣaye aṇprasaṅgaḥ iti . atha vijñāyate prāk
GS24pmbhasuu:16314: dīvyataḥ ye arthāḥ iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . samāne arthe prakṛtiviśeṣāt utpadyamānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16315: iñ aṇam bhādhate . yathā na doṣaḥ tathā astu . prāk dīvyataḥ ye arthāḥ iti vijñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:16316: . kutaḥ etat . tathā hi ayam prādhānyena artham pratinirdiśati . itarathā bahvyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16317: prakṛtayaḥ paṭhyante . tataḥ yām kām cit evam nimittatvena upādadīta . atha vā punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16318: astu prāk dīvyataḥ yāḥ prakṛtayaḥ iti . nanu ca uktam apavādaviṣaye aṇprasaṅgaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:16319: . na vā kva cit vāvacanāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . kva cit vāvacanāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:16320: yat ayam vāvacanam karoti pīlāyāḥ vā udaśvitaḥ anyatarasyām iti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16321: na apavādaviṣaye aṇ bhavati iti . yadi etat jñāpyate na arthaḥ prāgvacanena . adhikārāt
GS24pmbhasuu:16322: siddham . nanu ca uktam adhikārāt siddham iti cet apavādaviṣaye aṇprasaṅgaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:16323: na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . parihṛtam etat na vā kva cit vāvacanāt iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam iyān
GS24pmbhasuu:16324: avadhiḥ gṛhyate . na prāk ṭhakaḥ iti eva ucyeta . etat jñāpayati artheṣu ayam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:16325: iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . prakṛtiviśeṣāt upadyamānaḥ iñ aṇam bādhate .
GS24pmbhasuu:16327: 547-549 vāṅmatipitṛmatām chandasi upasaṅkhyānam . vāṅmatipitṛmatām chandasi upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:16328: kartavyam . vāk . vācyaḥ . vāk . mati . mātyaḥ . mati . pitṛmat . paitṛmatyaḥ . pṛthivyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16329: ñāñau . pṛthivyāḥ ñāñau vaktavyau . pārthivā pārthivī . devasya yañañau . devasya
GS24pmbhasuu:16330: yañañau vaktavyau . daivyam daivam .bahiṣaḥ ṭilopaḥ ca yañ ca . bahiṣaḥ ṭilopaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:16331: yañ ca vaktavyaḥ . bahirbhavaḥ bāhyaḥ . īkak ca . īkak ca vaktavyaḥ . bāhīkaḥ . īkañ
GS24pmbhasuu:16332: chandasi . īkañ chandasi vaktavyaḥ . bāhīkam astu bhadram vaḥ . sthāmnaḥ akāraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:16333: sthāmnaḥ akāraḥ vaktavyaḥ . aśvatthāmaḥ . lomnaḥ apatyeṣu bahuṣu . lomnaḥ apatyeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:16334: bahuṣu akāraḥ vaktavyaḥ .uḍulomāḥ śaralomāḥ . bahuṣu iti kimartham . auḍalomiḥ śāralomiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16335: . sarvatra goḥ ajādiprasaṅge yat . sarvatra goḥ ajādiprasaṅge yat vaktavyaḥ . gavi
GS24pmbhasuu:16336: bhavam gavyam . goḥ idam gavyam . goḥ svam gavyam . gauḥ devatā asya sthālīpākasya
GS24pmbhasuu:16339: 549 ṇyādayaḥ arthaviśeṣalakṣaṇāt aṇapavādāt pūrvavipratiṣeddham . ṇyādayaḥ arthaviśeṣalakṣaṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:16340: aṇapavādāt bhavanti pūrvavipratiṣedhena . ṇyādīnām avakāśaḥ . ditiḥ devatā asya daityaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16341: . athaviśeṣalakṣaṇasya aṇapavādasya avakāśaḥ . duleḥ apatyam dauleyaḥ bāleyaḥ . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:16342: ubhayam prāpnoti . diteḥ apatyam daityaḥ . aparasya athaviśeṣalakṣaṇasya aṇapavādasya
GS24pmbhasuu:16343: avakāśaḥ . acittahastidhenoḥ ṭhak . āpūpikam śāṣkulikam . ṇyādīnām avakāśaḥ . bārhaspatyam
GS24pmbhasuu:16344: prājāpatyam . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . vanaspatīnām samūhaḥ vānaspatyam . ṇyādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16345: bhavanti pūrvavipratiṣedhena . saḥ tarhi pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16346: . iṣṭavācīparaśabdaḥ . vipratiṣedhe yat iṣṭam tat bhavati . ditivanaspatibhyām apatyasamūhayoḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:16348: 550 añprakaraṇe grīṣmāt acchandasi . añprakaraṇe grīṣmāt acchandasi iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:16349: . graiṣmam . acchandasi iti kim . triṣṭup graiṣmī . yadi acchandasi iti ucyate graiṣmau
GS24pmbhasuu:16350: etau māsau atra na prāpnoti . acchandasi iti ucyate . na etat chandaḥ samīkṣitam
GS24pmbhasuu:16351: kāṭhakam kāpālakam maudakam pappalādakam vā . kim tarhi . pratyayārthaviśeṣaṇam eta
GS24pmbhasuu:16352: . na cet chandaḥ pratyayārthaḥ bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:16354: 550-551 kimartham nañsnañau ucyete na nañ eva ucyeta . kā rūpasiddhiḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:16355: pauṃsnam . puṃs iti sakārāntaḥ nakāraśabdaḥ ca pratyayaḥ . na sidhyati . saṃyogāntasya
GS24pmbhasuu:16356: lopaḥ iti lopaḥ prāpnoti . evam tarhi na eva arthaḥ nañā na api snañā . añ prakṛtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16357: . saḥ anuvartiṣyate nakāraḥ ca āgamaḥ vaktavyaḥ . atha nakārāgame sati kim pūrvāntaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16358: kariṣyate āhosvit parādiḥ . kim ca ataḥ . yadi pūrvāntaḥ straiṇāḥ bahuṣu lopaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:16359: . straiṇānām saṅghaḥ saṅghāṅkalakṣaṇeṣu añyañiñām aṇ iti aṇ prāpnoti . atha parādiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16360: pauṃsam saḥ eva doṣaḥ saṃyogāntalopaḥ prāpnoti . astu pūrvāntaḥ . katham straiṇāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16361: straiṇānām saṅghaḥ iti . ubhayatra laukikasya gotrasya grahaṇam . na ca idam laukikam
GS24pmbhasuu:16362: gotram . īkāraḥ tarhi prāpnoti . iṣṭam eva etat saṅgṛhītam . straiṇī pauṃsī iti eva
GS24pmbhasuu:16363: bhavitavyam . evam hi saunāgāḥ paṭhanti nañsnañīkakkhuṃstaruṇatalunānām upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:16364: iti . ṭilopaḥ tarhi prāpnoti . nugvacanāt na bhaviṣyati . bhavet iha nugvacanāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:16365: syāt straiṇam iti . iha tu khalu paūmsam iti nugvacanāt eva prāpnoti . tasmāt nañsnañau vaktavyau .
GS24pmbhasuu:16367: 552 atha imau nañsnañau prāk bhavanāt āhosvit prāk vateḥ . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:16368: nañsnañau bhavanāt iti cet vatyarthe pratiṣedhaḥ . nañsnañau bhavanāt iti cet vatyarthe
GS24pmbhasuu:16369: pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . strīvat puṃvat iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . ima
GS24pmbhasuu:16370: nañsnañau prāk bhavanāt iti ucyete . tau viśeṣavihitau sāmānyavihitam vatim bādheyātām
GS24pmbhasuu:16371: . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . vateḥ prāk iti vakṣyāmi . vateḥ prāk iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:16372: bhāve upasaṅkhyānam . vateḥ prāk iti cet bhāve upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . strībhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16373: straiṇam pumbhāvaḥ pauṃsnam iti . sūtram ca bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:16374: ca uktam nañsnañau bhavanāt iti cet vatyarthe pratiṣedhaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16375: jñāpayati na vatyarthe nañsnañau bhavataḥ iti yat ayam striyāḥ puṃvat iti nirdeśam
GS24pmbhasuu:16376: karoti . evam api strīvat iti na sidhyati . yogāpekṣam jñāpakam .
GS24pmbhasuu:16377: (4.1.88.1) P II.239.2 - 8 R III.553 iha kasmāt na bhavati traividyaḥ pāñcanadaḥ ṣāṭkulaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16378: iti . iha tāvat traividyaḥ iti na evam vijñāyate tisraḥ vidyāḥ adhīte traividyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16379: iti . katham tarhi . tryavayavā vidyā trividyā . trividyām adhīte traividyaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:16380: . iha api pāñcanadaḥ iti na evam vijñāyate pañcasu nadīṣu bhavaḥ pāñcanadaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:16381: katham tarhi . pañcānām nadīnām samāhāraḥ pañcanadam . pañcanade bhavaḥ pāñcanadaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16382: iti . ṣāṭkulaḥ iti na evam vijñāyate ṣaṭsu kuleṣu bhavaḥ ṣāṭkulaḥ iti . katham tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:16383: . ṣaṇṇām kulam ṣaṭkulam ṣaṭkule bhavaḥ ṣāṭkulaḥ iti . ajādigrahaṇam ca kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:16386: 554-556 dvigoḥ luki tannimittagrahaṇam . dvigoḥ luki tannimittagrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:16387: . dvigunimittam yaḥ taddhitaḥ tasya luk bhavati iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . pañcakapālasya
GS24pmbhasuu:16388: idam khaṇḍam pāñcakapālam iti . arthaviśeṣāsampratyaye atannimittāt api . arthaviśeṣāsampratyaye
GS24pmbhasuu:16389: atannimittāt api iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . pañcasu kapāleṣu saṃskṛtaḥ pañcakapālaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16390: . pancakapālyām saṃskrtaḥ iti api vigṛhya pañcakapālaḥ iti eva yathā syāt . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:16391: kriyamāṇe api tannimittagrahaṇe katham idam vijñāyate . tasya nimittam tannimittam
GS24pmbhasuu:16392: tannimittāt iti āhosvit saḥ nimittam asya saḥ ayam tannimittaḥ tannimittāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:16393: kim ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate tasya nimittam tannimittam tannimittāt iti kriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:16394: api tannimittagrahaṇe atra prāpnoti pañcakapālasya idam khaṇḍam iti . atha vijñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:16395: saḥ nimittam asya saḥ ayam tannimittaḥ tannimittāt iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . yatha na
GS24pmbhasuu:16396: doṣaḥ tathā astu . saḥ nimittam asya saḥ ayam tannimittaḥ tannimittāt iti vijñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:16397: . kutaḥ etat . yat ayam āha arthaviśeṣāsampratyaye atannimittāt api iti . tat tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:16398: tannimittagrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . dvigoḥ iti na eṣā pañcamī . kā tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:16399: . sambandhaṣaṣṭhī . dvigoḥ taddhitasya luk bhavati . kim ca dvigoḥ taddhitaḥ . nimittam
GS24pmbhasuu:16400: . yasmin dviguḥ iti etat bhavati . kasmin ca etat bhavati . pratyaye . idam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:16401: vaktavyam arthaviśeṣāsampratyaye atannimittāt api iti . etat ca na vaktavyam . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:16402: asmābhiḥ traiśabdyam sādhyam . pañcasu kapāleṣu saṃskṛtaḥ pañcakapālyām saṃskṛtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16403: pañcakapālaḥ daśakapālaḥ iti . tatra dvayoḥ śabdayoḥ samānārthayoḥ ekena vigrahaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16404: aparasmāt utpattiḥ bhaviṣyati aviravikanyāyena . tat yathā . aveḥ māṃsam iti vigṛhya
GS24pmbhasuu:16405: avikaśabdāt utpattiḥ bhavati . evam pañcasu kapāleṣu saṃskṛtaḥ iti vigṛhya pañcakapālaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16406: iti bhaviṣyati . pañcakapālyām saṃskṛtaḥ iti vigṛhya vākyam eva . traiśabdyam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:16407: iha sādhyam . tat ca evam sati siddham bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:16409: 556-557 gotre aluk aci iti cet itaretarāśrayatvāt aprasiddhiḥ . gotre aluk aci iti
GS24pmbhasuu:16410: cet itaretarāśrayatvāt aprasiddhiḥ . kā itaretarāśrayatā . alugnimittaḥ ajādiḥ ajādinimittaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16411: ca aluk . tat itaretarāśrayam bhavati . itaretarāśrayāṇi ca na prakalpante . vipratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:16412: tu lukaḥ chavidhānam . vipratiṣedhāt tu lukaḥ chaḥ bhaviṣyati . lukaḥ avakāśaḥ gargāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16413: vatsāḥ bidāḥ urvāḥ . chasya avakāśaḥ śālīyaḥ mālīyaḥ gārgīyaḥ vātsīyaḥ . iha ubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:16414: prāpnoti . gargāṇām chātrāḥ gārgīyāḥ vātsīyaḥ . chaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . na
GS24pmbhasuu:16415: eṣaḥ yuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . bhūmni ca luk prāptaḥ bāhye ca arthe vidhīyate ajādiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16416: . bahiraṅgam antaraṅgāt . vipratiṣedhāt ayuktam syāt . bhūmni prāptasya lukaḥ yat
GS24pmbhasuu:16417: ajādau taddhite alukam śāsti etat bravīti kūrvan samānakālau aluk luk ca . yat ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:16418: bhūmni prāptasya lukaḥ ajādau taddhite alukam śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ samānakālau
GS24pmbhasuu:16419: etau aluglukau iti . yadi vā lukaḥ prasaṅge bhavati aluk chaḥ tathā prasiddhaḥ asya
GS24pmbhasuu:16420: . yadi vā lukaḥ prasaṅge bhavati aluk bhavati tathā asya chaḥ prasiddhaḥ asya . pūrvam
GS24pmbhasuu:16421: hi apavādāḥ abhiniviśante paścāt utsargāḥ . luk vā alukaḥ prasaṅgam pratīkṣate che
GS24pmbhasuu:16422: aluk asya tathā . luk vā punaḥ alukaḥ prasaṅgam yadi pratīkṣate tathā asya che aluk
GS24pmbhasuu:16423: siddhaḥ bhavati . prakalpya vā apavādaviṣayam tataḥ utsargaḥ abhiniviśate .
GS24pmbhasuu:16425: 558-562 gotrasya bahuṣu lopinaḥ bahuvacanāntasya pravṛttau dvyekayoḥ aluk . gotrasya
GS24pmbhasuu:16426: bahuṣu lopinaḥ bahuvacanāntasya pravṛttau dvyekayoḥ aluk vaktavyaḥ . bidānām apatyam
GS24pmbhasuu:16427: māṇavakaḥ baidaḥ baidau . kimartham idam na aci iti eva aluk siddhaḥ . aci iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:16428: . na ca atra ajādim paśyāmaḥ . pratyayalakṣaṇena . varṇāśraye na asti pratyayalakṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:16429: . ekavacanadvivacanāntasya pravṛttau bahuṣu lopaḥ yūni . ekavacanadvivacanāntasya
GS24pmbhasuu:16430: pravṛttau bahuṣu lopaḥ yūni vaktavyaḥ . baidasya apatyam bahavaḥ māṇavakāḥ bidāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16431: . baidayoḥ bidāḥ . añ yaḥ bahuṣu yañ yaḥ bahuṣu iti ucyamānaḥ luk na prāpnoti . mā
GS24pmbhasuu:16432: bhūt evam añ yaḥ bahuṣu yañ yaḥ bahuṣu iti . añantam yad bahuṣu yañantam yat bahuṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:16433: iti bhaviṣyati . na evam śakyam . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt . kāśyapapratikṛtayaḥ kāśyapāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16434: iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yat tāvat ucyate gotrasya bahuṣu lopinaḥ bahuvacanāntasya pravṛttau
GS24pmbhasuu:16435: dvyekayoḥ aluk vaktavyaḥ iti . na vaktavyaḥ . aci iti eva aluk siddhaḥ . aci iti
GS24pmbhasuu:16436: ucyate . na ca atra ajādim paśyāmaḥ . pratyayalakṣaṇena . nanu ca uktam varṇāśraye
GS24pmbhasuu:16437: na asti pratyayalakṣaṇam iti . yadi vā kāni cit varṇāśrayāṇi api pratyayalakṣaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:16438: bhavanti tathā ca idam api bhaviṣyati . atha vā aviśeṣeṇa alukam uktvā hali na iti
GS24pmbhasuu:16439: vakṣyāmi . yadi aviśeṣeṇa alukam uktvā hali na iti ucyate bidānām apatyam bahavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16440: māṇavakāḥ bidāḥ atra api prāpnoti . astu . punaḥ asya yuvabahutve vartamānasya luk
GS24pmbhasuu:16441: bhaviṣyati . punaḥ aluk kasmāt na bhavati . samarthānām prathamasya gotrapratyayāntasya
GS24pmbhasuu:16442: aluk ucyate . na ca etat samarthānām prathamam gotrapratyayāntam . kim tarhi . dvitīyam
GS24pmbhasuu:16443: artham upasaṅkrāntam . avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam atribharavājikā vasiṣṭhakaśyapikā
GS24pmbhasuu:16444: bhṛgvaṅgirasikākutsakuśikikā iti evamartham . gargabhārgavikāgrahaṇam vā niyamārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:16445: . atha vā gargabhārgavikāgrahaṇam niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . etasya eva dvitīyam artham
GS24pmbhasuu:16446: upasaṅkrāntasya aluk bhavati na anyasya iti . yat api ucyate ekavacanadvivacanāntasya
GS24pmbhasuu:16447: pravṛttau bahuṣu lopaḥ yūni vaktavyaḥ . añ yaḥ bahuṣu yañ yaḥ bahuṣu iti ucyamānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16448: luk na prāpnoti . mā bhūt evam añ yaḥ bahuṣu yañ yaḥ bahuṣu iti . añantam yad bahuṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:16449: yañantam yat bahuṣu iti bhaviṣyati . nanu ca uktam na evam śakyam . iha hi doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16450: syāt . kāśyapapratikṛtayaḥ kāśyapāḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . laukikasya tatra gotrasya
GS24pmbhasuu:16451: grahaṇam na ca etat laukikam gotram . yadi añantam yad bahuṣu yañantam yat bahuṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:16452: iti evam ucyate bidānām apatyam māṇavakaḥ baidaḥ baidau atra api prāpnoti . aluk
GS24pmbhasuu:16453: atra likam bādhiṣyati . aluki ca kṛte punaḥ lukaḥ nimittam na asti iti kṛtvā punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16454: luk na bhaviṣyati . uktam vā . kim uktam . āpatyaḥ vā gotram . paramaprakṛteḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:16455: āpatyaḥ . āpatyāt jīvadvaṃśyāt svārthe dvitīyaḥ yuvasañjñaḥ . saḥ ca astriyām . ekagotragrahaṇānarthakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:16456: ca . bahuvacanalopiṣu ca siddham iti . tatra bidānām apatyam māṇavakaḥ iti vigṛhya
GS24pmbhasuu:16457: bidaśabdāt dvyekayoḥ utpattiḥ bhaviṣyati . baidaḥ baidau . baidasya apatyam bahavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16458: māṇavakāḥ iti vigṛhya bidaśabdāt bahuṣu utpattiḥ bhaviṣyati . bidā iti aviravikanyāyena .
GS24pmbhasuu:16460: 562-563 yūni luk aci iti cet pratyayasya ayatheṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ . yūni luk aci iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:16461: pratyayasya ayatheṣṭam prāpnoti . aniṣṭe pratyaye avasthite luk . aniṣṭapratyayasya
GS24pmbhasuu:16462: śravaṇam prasjyeta . siddham tu aviśeṣeṇa lugvacanam hali ca pratiṣedhaḥ . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:16463: etat . katham . aviśeṣeṇa lukam uktvā hali na iti vakṣyāmi . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:16464: bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam yūni luk aci iti cet pratyayasya
GS24pmbhasuu:16465: ayatheṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ. aci iti na eṣā parasaptamī . kā tarhi . viṣayasaptamī
GS24pmbhasuu:16466: . ajādau viṣaye iti . tatra aci viṣaye luke kṛte yaḥ yataḥ pratyayaḥ prāpnoti saḥ tataḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:16468: 563-565 kāni punaḥ asya yogasya prayojanāni . prayojanam sauvīragotrebhyaḥ ṇaṭhakchāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16469: . ṇa . phāṇṭāhṛteḥ apatyam māṇavakaḥ phāṇṭāhṛtaḥ . phāṇṭahṛtasya yūnaḥ chātrāḥ phāṇṭāhṛtāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16470: . ṇa . ṭhak . bhāgavitteḥ apatyam māṇavakaḥ bhāgavittikaḥ . bhāgavittikasya yūnaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16471: chātrāḥ bhāgavittāḥ . ṭhak . tailāyaneḥ apatyam māṇavakaḥ tailāyanīyaḥ . tailāyanīya
GS24pmbhasuu:16472: yūnaḥ chātrāḥ tailāyanīyāḥ . iñṇyau sarvatra . iñṇyau sarvatra prayojanam . aupagaveḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16473: yūnaḥ chātrāḥ aupagavīyāḥ . vṛddhavadatideśe sati iñaḥ gotre iti aṇ prāpnoti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:16474: eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . pratyākhyāyate asau atideśaḥ . katham yāni prayojanāni . tāni jñāpakena
GS24pmbhasuu:16475: siddhāni . yatkhacchāntāt tarhi iñaḥ prayojanam . yat . śvaśurasya apatyam śvaśuryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16476: . śvaśuryasya apatyam śvāśuriḥ . śvāśureḥ yūnaḥ chātrāḥ śvāśurāḥ . yat . kha . kulasya
GS24pmbhasuu:16477: apatyam kulīnaḥ . kulīnasya apatyam kaulīniḥ . kaulīneḥ yūnaḥ chātrāḥ kaulīnāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:16478: kha . cha . svasuḥ apatyam svasrīyaḥ . svasrīyasya apatyam svāsrīyiḥ . svāsrīyeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16479: yūnaḥ chātrāḥ svāsrīyāḥ . etāni api hi na santi prayojanāni . atra api yūni śvaśuryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16480: kulīnaḥ svasrīyaḥ iti eva bhavitavyam . uktam etat aṇiñoḥ luki abrāhmaṇagotramātrāt
GS24pmbhasuu:16481: yuvapratyayasya upasaṅkhyānam iti . abrāhmaṇagotramātrāt iti ucyate . na ca etat
GS24pmbhasuu:16482: abrāhmaṇagotramātram . abrāhmaṇagotramātrāt iti na ayam paryudāsaḥ yat anyat brāhmaṇagotramātrāt
GS24pmbhasuu:16483: iti . kim tarhi prasajya ayam pratiṣedhaḥ brāhmaṇagotramātrāt na iti . avaśyam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:16484: etat evam vijñeyam māyuriḥ kāpotiḥ kāpiñjaliḥ iti evamartham . evam tarhi aṇṇyau
GS24pmbhasuu:16485: sarvatra prayojanam . aṇ . glucukāyaneḥ apatyam māṇavakaḥ glaucukāyanaḥ . glaucukāyanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:16486: yūnaḥ chātrāḥ glaucukāyanāḥ . ṇyaḥ ca kāpiñjalādyartham . kāpiñjaleḥ apatyam māṇavakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16489: 565-569 prāgdīvyatodhikāre yūnaḥ vṛddhavadatideśaḥ . prāgdīvyatodhikāre yūnaḥ vṛddhavadatideśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16490: kartavyaḥ . yuvā vṛddhavat bhavati iti vaktavyam . gārgyāyaṇānām samūhaḥ gārgyāṇakam
GS24pmbhasuu:16491: . gārgyāyaṇānām kim cit gārgyāṇakam . gārgyāyaṇaḥ bhaktiḥ asya gārgyāyaṇakaḥ . gotrāśrayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16492: vuñ yathā syāt . yadi vṛddhavadatideśaḥ kriyate aupagaveḥ yūnaḥ chātrāḥ aupagavīyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16493: iti iñaḥ gotre iti aṇ prāpnoti . yadi punaḥ yuvā vṛddhavat iti anena anutpattiḥ atidiśyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:16494: . katham punaḥ yuvā vṛddhavat iti anena anutpattiḥ śakyā atideṣṭum . vatinirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16495: ayam kāmacāraḥ ca vatinirdeśe vākyaśeṣam samarthayitum . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:16496: uśīnaravat madreṣu yavāḥ . santi na santi iti . mātṛvat asyāḥ kalāḥ . santi na santi
GS24pmbhasuu:16497: iti . evam iha api yuvā vṛddhavat bhavati vṛddhavat na bhavati iti evam vākyaśeṣam
GS24pmbhasuu:16498: samarthayiṣyāmahe . yatha gotre yuvapratyayaḥ na bhavati evam prāgdīvyatodhikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:16499: yūni api na bhavati iti . tat vaktavyam . yadi api etat ucyate atha vā etarhi yūni
GS24pmbhasuu:16500: luk iti etat na kriyate . katham tarhi phakphiñoḥ anyatarasyām iti . phakphiñvartī
GS24pmbhasuu:16501: yuvā vā vṛddhavat bhavati iti vakṣyāmi . yadā tarhi na vṛddhavat tadā gārgyāyaṇānām
GS24pmbhasuu:16502: samūhaḥ gārgyāṇakam gārgyāyaṇānām kim cit gārgyāṇakam gārgyāyaṇaḥ bhaktiḥ asya gārgyāyaṇakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16503: gotrāśrayaḥ vuñ na prāpnoti . yadi punaḥ yuvā vṛddhavat iti anena arthaḥ atidiśyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:16504: . prāgdīvyatodhikāreyūnaḥ vṛddhavat arthaḥ bhavati iti . tat vaktavyam . yadi api
GS24pmbhasuu:16505: etat ucyate atha vā etarhi yūni luk iti etat na kariṣyate . katham tarhi phakphiñoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16506: anyatarasyām iti . phakphiñvartī yuvārthaḥ vā vṛddhavat bhavati iti vakṣyāmi . yadā
GS24pmbhasuu:16507: tarhi na vṛddhavat tadā gārgyāyaṇānām samūhaḥ gārgyāṇakam gārgyāyaṇānām kim cit gārgyāṇakam
GS24pmbhasuu:16508: gārgyāyaṇaḥ bhaktiḥ asya gārgyāyaṇakaḥ gotrāśrayaḥ vuñ na prāpnoti . evam tarhi rājanyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:16509: vuñ manuṣyāt ca jñāpakam laukikam param . yat ayam vuñvidhau rājanyamanuṣyayoḥ grahaṇam

GS24pmbhasuu:16615: ca apatyayukte na doṣaḥ . katham . apatyam samudāyaḥ cet niyamaḥ atra samīkṣitaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:16626: īkāraḥ iti kṛtvā punaḥ na bhaviṣyati . iha tarhi aupagavī māṇavikā bhāryā asya aupagavībhāryaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:16633: vaktavyaḥ . sañjñākāribhyaḥ vā pratyayotpattiḥ . atha vā sañjñākāribhyaḥ pratyayotpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16634: vaktavyā . yadi sañjñākāribhyaḥ pratyayotpattiḥ ucyate katham gārgyāyaṇaḥ vātsyāyanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16635: iti . gotrāt yūni ca . gotrāt yūni iti etat vaktavyam . tat ca jātyādinivṛttyartham
