GS24pmbhasuu:16637: . jātyādibhyaḥ utpattiḥ mā bhūt iti . jātiḥ na vartate . saṅkhyā na vartate . sarvanāma
GS24pmbhasuu:16638: na vartate . jātiḥ na vartate . kākasya apatyam kurarasya apatyam iti . saṅkhyā na
GS24pmbhasuu:16639: vartate . navānām apatyam daśānām apatyam iti . sarvanāma na vartate . sarveṣām apatyam
GS24pmbhasuu:16640: viśveṣām apatyam iti . yat tāvat ucyate jātiḥ na vartate . kākasya apatyam kurarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:16641: apatyam iti . yena eva hetunā ekaḥ kākaḥ tena eva hetunā dvitīyaḥ tṛtīyaḥ ca kākaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16642: bhaviṣyati . yat api ucyate saṅkhyā na vartate . navānām apatyam daśānām apatyam
GS24pmbhasuu:16643: iti . saṅkhyeyam apekṣya saṅkhyā pravartate . tat sāpekṣam sāpekṣam ca asamartham
GS24pmbhasuu:16644: bhavati iti asāmarthyāt na bhaviṣyati . yat api ucyate sarvanāma na vartate . sarveṣām
GS24pmbhasuu:16645: apatyam viśveṣām apatyam iti . nirdeśyam apekṣya sarvanāma vartate . tat sāpekṣam
GS24pmbhasuu:16646: sāpekṣam ca asamartham bhavati iti asāmarthyāt na bhaviṣyati . yat tāvat ucyate yena
GS24pmbhasuu:16647: eva hetunā ekaḥ kākaḥ tena eva hetunā dvitīyaḥ tṛtīyaḥ ca kākaḥ bhaviṣyati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:16648: na etat vivadāmahe kākaḥ na kākaḥ iti . kim tarhi . yena eva hetunā etat vākyam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:16649: kākasya apatyam kurarasya apatyam iti tena eva hetunā vṛttiḥ api prāpnoti . yad api
GS24pmbhasuu:16650: ucyate saṅkhyeyam apekṣya saṅkhyā pravartate . tat sāpekṣam sāpekṣam ca asamartham
GS24pmbhasuu:16651: bhavati iti . bhavati vai kasya cit arthāt prakaraṇāt vā apekṣyam nirjñātam . yadā
GS24pmbhasuu:16652: nirjñātam tadā vṛttiḥ prāpnoti . yad api ucyate nirdeśyam apekṣya sarvanāma vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:16653: . tat sāpekṣam sāpekṣam ca asamartham bhavati iti . bhavati vai kasya cit arthāt
GS24pmbhasuu:16654: prakaraṇāt vā apekṣyam nirjñātam . yadā nirjñātam tadā vṛttiḥ prāpnoti . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:16655: anabhidhānāt jātyādibhyaḥ utpattiḥ na bhaviṣyati . tat ca avaśyam anabhidhānam āśrayitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:16656: . kriyamāṇe api hi sañjñākārigrahaṇe yatra jātyādibhyaḥ utpadyamānena pratyayena
GS24pmbhasuu:16657: arthasya abhidhānam bhavati bhavati tatra utpattiḥ . tat yathā . kutaḥ carati māyūriḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16658: kena kāpiñjaliḥ kṛśaḥ āheyena ca daṣṭasya pāñciḥ sutamasaḥ mataḥ . tādāyaniḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:16660: kaimāyaniḥ iti . tat etat ananyārtham sañjñākārigrahaṇam vā kartavyam pratyayāntāt
GS24pmbhasuu:16661: va pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . ubhayam na kartavyam . gotragrahaṇam na kariṣyate . ekaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16662: apatye pratyayaḥ bhavati iti eva . yadi ca idānīm pratyayāntāt api pratyayaḥ syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:16663: na ekaḥ apatye pratyayaḥ syāt . yadi gotragrahaṇam na kriyate katham gārgyāyaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16664: vātsyāyanaḥ iti . vaktavyam eva etat gotrāt yūni astriyām iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:16665: atha api gotragrahaṇam kriyate evam api na doṣaḥ . na ekagrahaṇena pratyayaḥ abhisambadhyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:16666: ekaḥ gotre pratyayaḥ bhavati iti . kim tarhi . prakṛtiḥ abhisambadhyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:16667: ekā prakṛtiḥ gotre pratyayam utpādayati . yadi ca idānīm pratyayāntāt api pratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16668: syāt na ekā prakṛtiḥ gotre pratyayam utpādayet . atha vā asthāne ayam yatnaḥ kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:16669: . na hi idam lokāt bhidyate . loke sañkhyām pravartamānām upacaranti ekaḥ iti vā
GS24pmbhasuu:16670: prathamaḥ iti vā . yāvat brūyāt prathamaḥ apatye pratyayam utpādayati tāvat ekaḥ gotre iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:16672: 590-591 iñaḥ vṛddhāvṛddhābhyām phiñphinau vipratiṣedhena . iñaḥ vṛddhāvṛddhābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:16673: phiñphinau bhavataḥ vipratiṣedhena . iñaḥ avakāśaḥ dākṣiḥ plākṣiḥ . phiñaḥ avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16674: tādāyaniḥ yādāyaniḥ . iha ubhayam prāpnoti tāpasāyaniḥ sāmmitikāyaniḥ . phinaḥ avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16675: tvacāyaniḥ srucāyaniḥ . iñaḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti glucukāyaniḥ mulucukāyaniḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16676: . phiñphinau bhavataḥ vipratiṣedhena . iha kasmāt na bhavati dākṣiḥ plākṣiḥ . bahulavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:16677: . tadrājaḥ ca . tadrājaḥ ca iñaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . tadrājasaya avakāśaḥ aikṣvakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16678: . iñaḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti pāñcālaḥ vaidehaḥ vaidarbhaḥ . tadrājaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:16680: 591-592 bāhvādiprabhṛtiṣu yeṣām darśanam gotrabhāve laukike tataḥ anyatra teṣām pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16681: . bāhvādiprabhṛtiṣu yeṣām darśanam gotrabhāve laukike tataḥ anyatra teṣām pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16682: vaktavyaḥ . bāhoḥ apatyam bāhiḥ . yaḥ hi bāhuḥ nāma bāhavaḥ tasya bhavati . naḍasya
GS24pmbhasuu:16683: apatyam nāḍāyanaḥ . yaḥ hi naḍaḥ nāma nāḍiḥ tasya bhavati . sambandhiśabdapratyayānām
GS24pmbhasuu:16684: tatsadṛśāt pratiṣedhaḥ . sambandhiśabdapratyayānām ca tatsadṛśāt pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16685: . śvaśurasya apatyam śvaśuryaḥ . yaḥ hi śvaśuraḥ nāma śvāśuriḥ tasya bhavati . pratyayagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:16686: na arthaḥ . sambandhiśabdānām tatsadṛśāt pratiṣedhaḥ iti eva . idam api siddham bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:16687: . mātṛpitṛbhyām svasā . mātṛṣvasā . anyā mātṛsvasā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:16691: vayāsakiḥ śukaḥ . atyalpam idam ucyate . sudhātṛvyāsavaruḍaniṣādacaṇḍālabimbānām iti vaktavyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:16697: baimbakiḥ . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . prakṛtyantarāṇi etāni .
GS24pmbhasuu:16699: 593-594 kimarthaḥ cakāraḥ . svarārthaḥ . citaḥ antaḥ undāttaḥ bhavati iti antodāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:16700: yathā syāt . atha ñakāraḥ kimarthaḥ . ñakāraḥ vṛddhyarthaḥ . ñṇiti iti vṛddhiḥ yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:16701: syāt . ekena kakāreṇa ubhayam siddham . avaśyam atra viśeṣaṇāṛthaḥ anyaḥ anubandhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16702: kartavyaḥ . kva viśeṣaṇārthena arthaḥ . vrātacphañoḥ astriyām iti . phakaḥ iti hi
GS24pmbhasuu:16703: ucyamāne nāḍāyanaḥ atra api prasajyeta . atha api phañaḥ iti ucyate evam api āśvāyanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16704: atra api prasajyeta . tasmāt cakāraḥ eva kartavyaḥ antodāttatvam api yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:16705: cakāre ca idānīm viśeṣaṇārthe kriyamāṇe avaśyam vṛddhyarthaḥ anyaḥ anubandhaḥ kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16706: . saḥ ca ñakāraḥ eva kartavyaḥ sūtrabhedaḥ mā bhūt iti . atha kriyamāne api vai cakāre
GS24pmbhasuu:16707: antodāttatvam na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . paratvāt ñniti iti ādyudāttatvam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:16709: prāpnoti . asti anyat ñitkaraṇe prayojanam . kim . vṛddhyarthaḥ ñakāraḥ . citkaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:16710: api tarhi anyat prayojanam asti . kim . viśeṣaṇārthaḥ cakāraḥ . śakyaḥ atra viśeṣaṇārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16711: anyaḥ anubandhaḥ āsaṅktum . tatra cakārānurodhāt antodāttatvam bhavati . vṛddhyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16712: api tarhi anyaḥ śakyaḥ anubandhaḥ āsaṅktum . tatra ñakārānurodhāt ādyudāttatvam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:16713: . evam tarhi svare yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . idam asti . citaḥ . citaḥ antaḥ udāttaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16714: bhavati . tataḥ taddhitasya . taddhitasya ca citaḥ antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati iti . kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:16715: idam . paratvāt ñniti iti ādyudāttatvam prāpnoti . tadbādhanārtham . tataḥ kitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16716: . kitaḥ taddhitasya antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati . kim punaḥ atra svarārthena cakāreṇa anubandhena
GS24pmbhasuu:16717: yāvatā cphañantāt ñyaḥ vidhīyate . tatra ñniti iti ādyudāttatvena bhavitavyam . na
GS24pmbhasuu:16718: etat asti . bahuṣu lope kṛte antodāttatvam yathā syāt . kauñcāyanāḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:16720: 594-595 iha ke cit dvyekayoḥ phyañam vidadhati bahuṣu ca phakam ke cit cphañantāt
GS24pmbhasuu:16721: ñyam . kim atra nyāyyam . ñyavacanam eva nyāyyam . dvyekayoḥ hi phyañi sati bahuṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:16722: ca phaki krauñjāyanānām apatyam māṇavakaḥ kauñjāyanyaḥ kauñjāyanyau kena yaśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16723: śrūyeta . dvyekayoḥ iti ucyamānaḥ na prāpnoti . iha kauñjāyanasya apatyam bahavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16724: māṇavakāḥ kauñjāyanāḥ kena ya śabdaḥ na śrūyeta . dvyekayoḥ iti ucyamānaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:16725: . tat etat katham kṛtvā ñyavacanam jyāyaḥ bhavati . yadi tat na asti . āpatyaḥ vā
GS24pmbhasuu:16726: gotram . paramaprakṛteḥ ca āpatyaḥ . āpatyāt jīvavañśyāt svārthe dvitīyaḥ yuvasañjñaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16727: saḥ ca astriyām . ekogotragrahaṇānarthakyam ca bahuvacanalopiṣu ca siddham iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:16728: sati hi tasmin dvyekayoḥ api phyañi sati bahuṣu ca phaki na doṣaḥ bhavati . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:16729: kauñjāyanānām apatyam māṇavakaḥ iti vigṛhya kuñjaśabdāt dvyekayoḥ utpattiḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:16730: . kauñjāyanyaḥ kauñjāyanyau . kauñjāyanasya apatyam bahavaḥ māṇavakāḥ iti vigṛhya
GS24pmbhasuu:16731: kuñjaśabdāt bahuṣu utpattiḥ bhaviṣyati . kauñjāyanāḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:16733: 595-596 anṛṣyānantarye iti ucyate . tatra idam sidhyati kauśikaḥ viśvāmitraḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:16734: . kim kāraṇam . viśvāmitraḥ tapaḥ tepe na anṛṣhiḥ syām iti . tatrabhavān ṛṣiḥ sampannaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16735: . saḥ punaḥ tapaḥ tepe na anṛṣheḥ putraḥ syām iti . tatrabhavān gādhiḥ api ṛṣiḥ sampannaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16736: . saḥ punaḥ tapaḥ tepe na anṛṣheḥ pautraḥ syām iti . tatrabhavān kuśikaḥ api ṛṣiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16737: sampannaḥ . tat etat ṛṣyānantaryam bhavati . tatra anṛṣyānantarye iti pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16738: prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na evam vijñāyate ṛṣyānantarye na bhavati iti . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:16739: tarhi . ṛṣau anantare na iti . yadi evam . anṛṣyānantaryavacanam anarthakam sañjñāgotrādhikārāt
GS24pmbhasuu:16740: . anṛṣyānantaryavacanam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . sañjñāgotrādhikārāt . sañjñāgotre
GS24pmbhasuu:16741: iti vartate . kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ yat anantere syāt . na eva prāpnoti na arthaḥ pratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:16742: . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat anṛṣyānantarye iti pratiṣedham śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16743: bidādiṣu ye anṛṣayaḥ paṭhante teṣām anantare api vṛttiḥ bhavati . kim etasya jñāpane
GS24pmbhasuu:16744: prayojanam . nānāndraḥ pautraḥ dauhitraḥ iti etat siddham bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:16746: 596-597 kimartham idam ucyate na gargādibhyaḥ yañ iti eva siddham . luk striyām iti vakṣyāmi iti . yadi punaḥ tatra eva ucyeta . na evam śakyam . āṅgirasagrahaṇam hi vicchidyeta .
GS24pmbhasuu:16748: 597-598 kimartham śivādibhyaḥ aṇ vidhīyate na yathāvihitam eva ucyeta . śivādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16749: yathāvihitam iti iyati ucyamāne iñ prasajyeta . iñ ato yathāvihitaḥ . punarvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:16750: idānīm kimartham syāt . punarvacanam idānīm kimartham syāt . ye tasya bādhakāḥ tadbādhanārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:16751: . saḥ vai na asti yaḥ tam bādheta . tatra ārambhasāmarthyāt yaḥ vihitaḥ na ca prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:16752: saḥ bhaviṣyati . kaḥ ca asau . aṇ eva . uttarārtham tarhi :
GS24pmbhasuu:16753: avṛddhābhyaḥ nadīmānuṣībhyaḥ tannāmikābhyaḥ iti . atra yathāvihitam iti iyati ucyamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:16754: ḍhak prasjyeta . ḍhak ataḥ yathāvihitaḥ . punarvacanam idānīm kimartham syāt . ye
GS24pmbhasuu:16755: tasya bādhakāḥ tadbādhanārtham . saḥ vai na asti yaḥ tam bādheta . tatra ārambhasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:16756: yaḥ vihitaḥ na ca prāpnoti saḥ bhaviṣyati . kaḥ ca asau . aṇ eva . uttarārtham eva tarhi :
GS24pmbhasuu:16757: ṛṣyandhakavṛṣṇikurubhyaḥ ca iti . atra yathāvihitam iti iyati ucyamāne iñ prasjyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:16758: . iñ ataḥ yathāvihitaḥ . punarvacanam idānīm kimartham syāt . ye tasya bādhakāḥ tadbādhanārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:16759: . saḥ vai na asti yaḥ tam bādheta . tatra ārambhasāmarthyāt yaḥ vihitaḥ na ca prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:16760: saḥ bhaviṣyati . kaḥ ca asau . aṇ eva . uttarārtham eva tarhi :
GS24pmbhasuu:16762: kanyāyāḥ kanīna ca iti . atra yathāvihitam iti iyati ucyamāne ḍhak prasjyeta . ḍhak
GS24pmbhasuu:16763: ataḥ yathāvihitaḥ . punarvacanam idānīm kimartham syāt . mātuḥ ukāram vakṣyāmi kanyāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16764: kanīnabhāvam iti . yadi etāvat prayojanam syāt tatra eva ayam brūyāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:16767: kanyāyāḥ ca kanīnabhāvaḥ iti . idam tarhi prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:16768: ayam ṛṣṭiṣeṇaśabdaḥ śivādiṣu paṭhyate . tatra yathāvihitam iti iyati ucyamāne iñ
GS24pmbhasuu:16769: prasajyeta . tam paratvāt senāntāt ṇyaḥ bādheta . tatra ārambhasāmarthyāt iñ prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:16772: 559-601 ṛṣistryaṇaḥ ḍhagḍhrakau vipratiṣedhena . ṛṣistryaṇaḥ ḍhagḍhrakau bhavataḥ vipratiṣedhena . ṛṣyaṇaḥ avakāśaḥ : vāsiṣṭhaḥ,
GS24pmbhasuu:16775: bali bāleyaḥ . iha ubhayam prāpnoti : atri ,
GS24pmbhasuu:16780: maudgalikeraḥ . ḍhagḍhrakau bhavataḥ vipratiṣedhena . dvyacaḥ ḍhakaḥ ḍhragḍhañau
GS24pmbhasuu:16781: . dvyacaḥ ḍhak bhavati iti etasmāt ḍhragḍhañau bhavataḥ vipratiṣedhena . dvyacaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16782: ḍhak bhavati iti asya avakāśaḥ : dātteyaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:16783: gaupteyaḥ . ḍhrakaḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:16787: bhādrabāheyaḥ . ḍhakaḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:16788: jambū jāmbeyaḥ . ḍhragḍhañau bhavataḥ vipratiṣedhena . na vā ṛṣyaṇaḥ punarvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:16789: anyanivṛttyartham . na vā eṣaḥ yuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ yaḥ ayam ṛṣyaṇaḥ ḍhakaḥ ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:16790: kim kāraṇam . ṛṣyaṇaḥ punarvacanam anyanivṛttyartham . siddhaḥ atra aṇ utsargeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:16791: eva . tasya punarvacane etat prayojanam ye anye tadapavādāḥ prāpnuvanti tadbādhanārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:16792: . saḥ yathā eva tadapavādam iñam bādhate evam ḍhakam api bādheta . tasmāt ṛṣibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16793: aṇvidhāne atryādipratiṣedhaḥ . tasmāt ṛṣibhyaḥ aṇvidhāne atryādipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16794: . na vaktavyaḥ . madhye apavādāḥ pūrvān vidhīn bādhante iti evam ayam ṛṣyaṇ iñam
GS24pmbhasuu:16795: bādhiṣyate ḍhakam na bādhiṣyate . ayam ca api ayuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ yaḥ ayam ḍhakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16796: ḍragḍhañoḥ ca. kim kāraṇam . ḍhakaḥ punarvacanam anyanivṛttyartham . siddhaḥ atra
GS24pmbhasuu:16797: ḍhak strībhyaḥ ḍhak iti eva . tasya punarvacane etat prayojanam ye anye tadapavādāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16798: prāpnuvanti tadbādhanārtham . saḥ yathā eva tadapavādam tannāmikāṇam bādhate evam
GS24pmbhasuu:16799: ḍhagḍhrañau api bādheta . tasmāt tannāmikāṇi advyacaḥ . tasmāt tannāmikāṇi advyacaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16800: iti vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . madhye apavādāḥ pūrvān vidhīn bādhante iti evam ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:16801: ḍhak tannāmikāṇam tadapavādam bādhiṣyate ḍhragḍhañau na bādhiṣyate . ṛṣyandhakavṛṣṇikurvaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16802: senāntāt ṇyaḥ . ṛṣyandhakavṛṣṇikurvaṇaḥ senāntāt ṇyaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . ṛṣyaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16806: vāriṣeṇyaḥ . jātasenaḥ nām ṛṣiḥ tasmāt ubhayam prāpnoti . ṇyaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . andhakāṇaḥ avakāśaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:16808: śvaitrakaḥ . ṇyasya saḥ eva . ugrasenaḥ nāma andhakaḥ . tasmāt ubhayam prāpnoti . ṇyaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena :
GS24pmbhasuu:16810: bāladevaḥ . ṇyasya saḥ eva . vṣvaksenaḥ nāma vṛṣṇiḥ tasmāt ubhayam prāpnoti . ṇyaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena :
GS24pmbhasuu:16812: sāhadevaḥ . ṇyasya saḥ eva . bhīmasenaḥ nāma kuruḥ tasmāt ubhayam prāpnoti . ṇyaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena :
GS24pmbhasuu:16813: bhaimasenyaḥ . senāntāt ṇyaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena jātograviṣvagbhīmebhyaḥ iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:16815: 601 kimartham strīliṅgena nirdeśaḥ kriyate na saṅkhyāsambhadrapūrvasya iti eva ucyeta . strīliṅgaḥ yaḥ mātṛśabdaḥ tasmāt yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt :
GS24pmbhasuu:16819: 601-602 idam vipratiṣiddham . kaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . apatyam iti vartate . yadi ca kanyā
GS24pmbhasuu:16820: na apatyam atha apatyam na kanyā . kanyā ca apatyam ca iti vipratiṣiddham . na etat
GS24pmbhasuu:16821: vipratiṣiddham . katham . kanyāśabdaḥ ayam puṃsā abhisambandhapūrvake samprayoge
GS24pmbhasuu:16822: nivartate . yā ca idānīm prāk abhisambandhāt puṃsā saha samprayogam gacchati tasyām
GS24pmbhasuu:16823: kanyāśabdaḥ vartate eva . kanyāyāḥ kanyoktāyāḥ kanyābhimatāyāḥ sudarśanāyāḥ yat apatyam saḥ kānīnaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:16825: 603-604 idam sarveṣu eva strīgrahaṇeṣu vicāryate . strīpratyayagrahaṇam vā syāt strīśabdagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:16826: vā stryarthagrahaṇam vā . kim ca ataḥ . yadi śabdagrahaṇam arthagrahaṇam vā iḍaviḍ
GS24pmbhasuu:16827: aiḍadviḍ pṛth pārthaḥ uśij āuśijaḥ śarat śāradasaḥ atra api prāpnoti . atha pratyayagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:16828: laikhābhreyaḥ vaimātreyaḥ iti na sidhyati . astu pratyayagrahaṇam . katham laikhābhreyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16829: vaimātreyaḥ iti . śubhrādiṣu pāṭhaḥ kariṣyate . vaḍavāyāḥ vṛṣe vācye . vaḍavāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16830: vṛṣe vācye ḍhak vaktavyaḥ . vaḍavāyāḥ vṛṣaḥ vāḍaveyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:16832: 604 caṭakāyāḥ pulṃliṅganirdeśaḥ . caṭakāyāḥ pulṃliṅgena nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:16833: api yathā syāt . caṭakasya apatyam cāṭakairaḥ . yadi pulṃlingnirdeśaḥ kriyate caṭakāyā
GS24pmbhasuu:16834: apatyam cāṭakairaḥ iti na sidhyati . prātipadikagrahaṇe liṅgaviśiṣṭasya api grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:16835: bhavati iti evam bhaviṣyati . striyām apatye luk . striyām apatye luk vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:16838: 604 āragvacanam anarthakam rakā siddhatvāt . āragvacanam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:16839: . rakā siddhatvāt . godhā ākārāntā rak ca pratyayaḥ . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat
GS24pmbhasuu:16840: ārakam śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ anyebhyaḥ api ayam bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane
GS24pmbhasuu:16841: prayojanam . mauṇḍāraḥ jāṇḍāraḥ pāṇḍāraḥ iti etat siddham bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:16843: 604 kṣudrābhyaḥ iti ucyate . kā kṣudrā nāma . aniyatapuṃskā aṅgahīnā vā .
GS24pmbhasuu:16845: 605 kena vihite pitṛṣvasuḥ ḍhaki lopaḥ iti ucyate . etat eva jñāpayati bhavati pitṛṣvasuḥ ḍhak iti yat ayam ḍhaki lopam śāsti .
GS24pmbhasuu:16847: 605 ḍhaki lopaḥ iti ucyate . tatra idam na sidhyati mātṛṣvasrīyaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16848: . evam vakṣyāmi . pitṛṣvasuḥ chaṇ ḍhaki lopaḥ . tataḥ mātṛṣvasuḥ ca . pitṛṣvasuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16849: yat uktam tat mātṛṣvasuḥ bhavati iti . kim punaḥ tat . chaṇ ḍhaki lopaḥ ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:16851: 605 rājñaḥ apatye jātigrahaṇam . rājñaḥ apatye jātigrahaṇam kartavyam . rājanyaḥ nāma jātiḥ . kva mā bhūt . rājanaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:16853: 606 vyanvacanam anarthakam pratyayārthābhāvāt . vyanvacanam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:16854: . pratyayārthābhāvāt . kim idam pratyayārthābhāvāt iti . apatyārthābhāvāt . apatyam
GS24pmbhasuu:16855: iti vartate anapatye ca api sapatne bhrātṛvyaśabdaḥ vartate . pāpmanā bhrātṛvyeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:16856: iti . astu tāvat apatyam sapatnaḥ ca tatra bhrātṛvyaḥ iti . katham pāpmanā bhrātṛvyeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:16857: iti . upamānāt siddham . bhrātṛvyaḥ iva bhrātṛvyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:16859: 606-608 kimarthaḥ ṇakāraḥ . vṛddhyarthaḥ . ñṇiti iti vṛddhiḥ yathā syāt . gārgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16860: jālmaḥ . gotrastriyāḥ pratyayasya ṇitkaraṇānarthakyam vṛddhatvāt prātipadikasya .
GS24pmbhasuu:16861: gotrastriyāḥ pratyayasya ṇitkaraṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . vṛddhatvāt prātipadikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:16862: . vṛddham eva etat prātipadikam . lugarthaḥ tarhi ṇakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . yat lugantam
GS24pmbhasuu:16863: avṛddham tatra vṛddhiḥ yathāt syāt . vātaṇḍaḥ jālmaḥ . lugartham iti cet na lukpratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:16864: . lugartham iti cet tat na . kim kāraṇam . lukpratiṣedhāt . pratiṣidhyate atra luk
GS24pmbhasuu:16865: gotre aluk aci iti . vyavahitatvāt apratiṣedhaḥ . īkāreṇa vyavahitatvāt pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16866: na prāpnoti . vyavahitatvāt apratiṣedhaḥ iti cet na puṃvadbhāvāt . vyavahitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:16867: apratiṣedhaḥ iti cet tat na . kim kāraṇam . puṃvadbhāvāt . puṃvadbhāvaḥ atra bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:16868: bhasya taddhite aḍhe puṃvadbhāvaḥ bhavati iti . phinartham tu . phinartham tu ṇakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16869: kartavyaḥ . yat phinantam avṛddham tatra vṛddhiḥ yathā syāt . glaucukāyanaḥ jālmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16870: . puṃvadbhāvapratiṣedhārtham ca . puṃvadbhāvapratiṣedhārtham ca ṇakāraḥ kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16871: . gārgā bhāryā asya gārgābhāryaḥ . vṛddhinimittasya iti puṃvadbhāvapratiṣedhaḥ yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:16872: syāt . gotrāt yūni astriyām iti vacanāt aprayojanam . gotrāt yūni astriyām iti vacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:16873: aprayojanam etat bhavati . na asti gārgā . avaṃśyatvāt vā striyāḥ prayojanam . avaṃśyatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:16874: vā striyāḥ prayojanam etat bhavati . na strī vaṃśyā . asti gārgā strī . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:16875: dvau eva vaṃśau mātṛvaṃśaḥ pitṛvaṃśaḥ ca . yāvatā mātṛvaṃśaḥ api asti na asti gārgā .
GS24pmbhasuu:16877: 609 gotrastriyāḥ vṛddhāt ṭhak pheḥ cha ca phāṇṭāhṛti ime catvāraḥ yogāḥ . tatra trayaḥ kutsane trtayaḥ sauvīragotre . ādyaḥ yogaḥ kutsane eva . paraḥ sauvīragotre eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:16879: 609-610 kimarthaḥ ṇakāraḥ . vṛddhyarthaḥ . ñṇiti iti vṛddhiḥ yathā syāt . phāṇṭāhṛtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16880: . phāṇṭāhṛteḥ pratyayasya ṇitkaraṇānarthakyam vṛddhatvāt prātipadikasya . phāṇṭāhṛteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16881: pratyayasya ṇitkaraṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . vṛddhatvāt prātipadikasya . vṛddham
GS24pmbhasuu:16882: eva etat prātipadikam . puṃvadbhāvapratiṣedhārtham tu . puṃvadbhāvasya pratiṣedhārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16883: ṇakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . phāṇṭāhṛtā bhāryā asya phāṇṭāhṛtabhāryaḥ . vṛddhinimittasya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:16884: puṃvadbhāvapratiṣedhaḥ yathā syāt iti . uktam vā . kim uktam . gotrāt yūni astriyām
GS24pmbhasuu:16885: iti vacanāt aprayojanam . avaṃśyatvāt vā striyāḥ prayojanam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:16887: 610-611 vāmarathasya kaṇvādivat svaravarjam . vāmarathasya kaṇvādivadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16888: . kim aviśeṣeṇa . na iti āha . svaram varjayitvā . kim prayojanam . vāmarathyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:16889: chātrāḥ vāmarathāḥ . kaṇvādibhyaḥ gotre iti aṇ yathā syāt . yadi kaṇvādivat iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:16890: pratyayāśrayam anatidiṣṭam bhavati . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . vāmarathāḥ . bahuṣu lopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16891: na prāpnoti . vāmarathānām saṅghaḥ . saṅghāṅkalakṣaṇeṣu añyañiñām aṇ iti aṇ na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:16892: . yadi punaḥ yañvat iti ucyeta . evam api prakṛtyāśritam anatidiṣṭam bhavati . tatro
GS24pmbhasuu:16893: kaḥ doṣaḥ . vāmarathyasya chātrāḥ vāmarathāḥ . kaṇvādibhyaḥ gotre iti aṇ na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:16894: . astu tarhi kaṇvādivat iti eva . katham vāmarathāḥ vāmarathānām saṅghaḥ iti . yat
GS24pmbhasuu:16895: ayam svaravarjam iti āha tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ pratyayāśritam api atidiṣṭam bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:16897: 611-612 udīcām añvidhau takṣṇaḥ aṇvacanam . udīcām añvidhau takṣṇaḥ aṇ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16898: . tākṣṇaḥ . yadi punaḥ ayam takṣanśabdaḥ śivādiṣu paṭhyeta . śivādiḥ iti cet ṇyavidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16899: . śivādiḥ iti cet ṇyaḥ vidheyaḥ . tākṣṇyaḥ iti . siddham tu udīcām vā ṇyavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:16900: . siddham etat . katham . udīcām vā ṇyavacanāt . udīcām vā ṇyaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:16901: . ṇyena mukte yaḥ yataḥ prāpnoti saḥ tataḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:16903: 612-613 kim idam kausalyakārmāryayoḥ vikṛtayoḥ grahaṇam kriyate . evam vikṛtābhyām yathā syāt . atyalpam idam ucyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:16904: kausalyakārmāryābhyām ca iti . phiñprakaraṇe dagukosalakarmāracchāgavṛṣaṇām yuṭ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:16905: . phiñprakaraṇe dagukosalakarmāracchāgavṛṣaṇām yuṭ ca iti vaktavyam . dagu dāgavyāyaniḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16906: kosala kausalyāyaniḥ karmāra karmāryāyaṇiḥ chāga chāgyāyaniḥ vṛṣa vārṣyāyaṇiḥ . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:16907: yuṭ kriyate yuṭi kṛte anāditvāt ādeśaḥ na prāpnoti . idam iha sampradhāryam . yuṭ
GS24pmbhasuu:16908: kriyatām ādeśaḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt ādeśaḥ . nityaḥ yuṭ . kṛte api
GS24pmbhasuu:16909: ādeśe prāpnoti akṛte api prāpnoti . yuṭ api anityaḥ . anyasya kṛte ādeśe prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:16910: anyasya akṛte . śabdāntarasya ca prāpnuvan vidhiḥ anityaḥ bhavati . antaraṅgaḥ tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:16911: yuṭ . kā antaraṅgatā . utpattisanniyogena yuṭ ucyate . utpanne pratyaye prakṛtipratyayau
GS24pmbhasuu:16912: āśritya aṅgasya ādeśaḥ ucyate . ādeśaḥ api antaraṅgaḥ . katham . vakṣyati etat āyanādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:16913: upadeśivadvacanam svarasiddhyartham iti . anavakāśaḥ tarhi yuṭ . evam tarhi pūrvāntaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16914: kariṣyate . yadi pūrvāntaḥ kriyate dāgavyāyaniḥ oḥ guṇaḥ na prāpnoti . astu tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:16915: parādiḥ eva . nanu ca uktam yuṭi kṛte anāditvāt ādeśaḥ na prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16916: doṣaḥ . siddham tu ādiṣṭasya yuḍvacanāt . siddham etat . katham . ādiṣṭasya yuḍvacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:16917: . yuṭ ca ādiṣṭasya iti vaktavyam . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . cena sanniyogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16918: kariṣyate . yuṭ ca . kim ca . yat ca anyat prāpnoti . kim ca anyat prāpnoti . ādeśaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:16920: 613-614 yadi punaḥ ayam kuṭ parādiḥ kriyeta . kuṭi pratyayādeḥ ādeśānupapattiḥ anāditvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:16921: . kuṭi sati pratyayādeḥ ādeśaḥ na upapadyate . kim kāraṇam . anāditvāt . kuṭi sati
GS24pmbhasuu:16922: anāditvāt ādeśaḥ na prāpnoti . evam tarhi pūrvāntaḥ kariṣyate . pūrvānte nalopavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:16923: . yadi pūrvāntaḥ kriyate nalopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . cārmikāyaṇiḥ vārmikāyaṇiḥ . nalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16924: prātipadikāntasya iti nalopaḥ na prāpnoti . parādau punaḥ sati nalopaḥ prātipadikāntasya
GS24pmbhasuu:16925: iti nalopaḥ sidhyati . astu tarhi parādiḥ eva . nanu ca uktam kuṭi sati anāditvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:16926: ādeśaḥ na prāpnoti . siddham tu ādiṣṭasya kuḍvacanāt . siddham etat . katham . kuṭ
GS24pmbhasuu:16927: ca ādiṣṭasya iti vaktavyam . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . cena sanniyogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16928: kariṣyate . kuṭ ca . kim ca . yat ca anyat prāpnoti . kim ca anyat prāpnoti . ādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16929: . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam pūrvānte
GS24pmbhasuu:16930: nalopavacanam iti . kriyate etat nyāse eva carmivarmiṇoḥ nalopaḥ ca iti . kāribhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16931: iñaḥ agotrāt phiñ vipratiṣedhena . kāribhyaḥ iñ bhavati iti etasmāt agotrāt phiñ
GS24pmbhasuu:16932: bhavati vipratiṣedhena . kāribhyaḥ iñ bhavati iti asya avakāśaḥ āyaskāriḥ lauhakāriḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16933: . phiñaḥ avakāśaḥ tāpasāyaniḥ sāmmitikāyaniḥ . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . nāpitāyaniḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16936: 614-615 yadi ṣuk pūrvāntaḥ kriyate mānuṣāḥ bahuṣu lopaḥ prāpnoti . mānuṣāṇām saṅghaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16937: saṅghāṅkalakṣaṇeṣu añyañiñām it aṇ prāpnoti . astu tarhi parādiḥ . yadi parādiḥ mānuṣī
GS24pmbhasuu:16938: añantāt īkāraḥ na prāpnoti . astu tarhi pūrvāntaḥ eva . katham mānuṣāḥ mānuṣāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:16939: saṅghaḥ iti . ubhayatra laukikasya gotrasya grahaṇam na ca etat laukikam gotram .
GS24pmbhasuu:16940: iha tarhi mānuṣyakam iti halaḥ taddhitasya iti lopaḥ prāpnoti . parādau api eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16941: doṣaḥ . yat hi halaḥ taddhitasya iti halgrahaṇam na tat aṅgaviśeṣaṇam śakyam vijñātum
GS24pmbhasuu:16942: . iha tarhi doṣaḥ syāt . vṛkāt ṭeṇyaṇ vārkeṇī iti . tasmāt ubhābhyām eva vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:16945: 616-617 pautraprabhṛteḥ gotrasañjñāyām yasya apatyam tasya pautraprabhṛtisañjñākaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:16946: . pautraprabhṛteḥ gotrasañjñāyām yasya apatyavivakṣā tasya pautraprabhṛteḥ gotrasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:16947: bhavati iti vaktavyam . gargaḥ api hi kam cit prati pautraḥ kuśikaḥ api . tatra mā
GS24pmbhasuu:16948: bhūt . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . samarthānām prathamāt vā iti vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:16949: . samarthānām prathamasya yat apatyam pautraprabhṛti iti vijñāyate . jīvadvaṃśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:16950: ca kutsitam . jīvadvaṃśyam ca kutsitam gotrasañjñam bhavati iti vaktavyam . gārgyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16951: tvam jālma. vātsyaḥ tvam jālma . kā punaḥ iha kutsā . pitṛtaḥ loke vyapadeśavatā
GS24pmbhasuu:16952: asvatantreṇa bhavitavyam . yaḥ idānīm pitṛmān svatantraḥ bhavati saḥ ucyate gārgyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16953: tvam asi jālma . na tvam pitṛtaḥ vyapadeśam arhasi .
GS24pmbhasuu:16955: 617-619 jīvati tu vaṃśye yuvā iti pautraprabhṛtyapekṣam ca . jīvati tu vaṃśye yuvā
GS24pmbhasuu:16956: iti pautraprabhṛtyapekṣam ca iti vaktavyam . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:16957: pautraprabhṛti iti vartate . evam tarhi anvācaṣṭe pautraprabhṛti iti vartate iti
GS24pmbhasuu:16958: . kim etasya anvākhyāne prayojanam . tat ca daivadattyartham . devadattasya apatyam
GS24pmbhasuu:16959: devadattiḥ iti . anantaram yat apatyam tasya yuvasañjñā mā bhūt iti . devadattasya
GS24pmbhasuu:16960: tarhi pautre yuvasañjñā prāpnoti . etat api pautraprabhṛti bhavati . na pautraprabhṛti
GS24pmbhasuu:16962: pautraprabhṛti yat apatyam iti . kim tarhi . vaṃśye abhisambadhyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:16963: pautraprabhṛtivaṃśye jīvati yat apatyam iti . evam api devadattasya dvau putra tayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16964: kanīyasi yuvasañjñā prāpnoti bhrātari ca jyāyasi iti . evam tarhi apatyam eva abhisambadhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:16965: na tu pautraprabhṛtisamānādhikaraṇam apatyam . na evam vijñāyate pautraprabhṛti yat
GS24pmbhasuu:16966: apatyam iti . katham tarhi . pautraprabhṛteḥ yat apatyam iti . vṛddhasya ca pūjāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:16967: . vṛddhasya ca pūjāyām yuvasañjñā vaktavyā . tatrabhavantaḥ gārgyāyaṇāḥ tatrabhavantaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16968: vātsyāyanāḥ . kā punaḥ iha pūjā . yuvatvam loke īpsitam pūjā iti upacaryate . tatrabhavantaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16969: yuvatvena upacaryamāṇāḥ prītāḥ bhavanti . āpatyaḥ vā gotram . atha vā āpatyaḥ gotrasañjñaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16970: bhavati iti vaktavyam . paramaprakṛteḥ ca āpatyaḥ . paramaprakṛteḥ ca āpatyaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:16971: iti vaktavyam . āpatyāt jīvadvaṃśyāt svārthe dvitīyaḥ yuvasañjñaḥ . āpatyāt jīvadvaṃśyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:16972: svārthe dvitīyaḥ pratyayaḥ vaktavyaḥ yuvasañjñaḥ ca bhavati iti vaktavyam . saḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:16973: astriyām . saḥ ca astriyām iti vaktavyam . ekogotragrahaṇānarthakyam ca . evam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:16974: kṛtvā ekogotragrahaṇam anarthakam bhavati . bahuvacanalopiṣu ca siddham . bahuvacanalopiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:16975: ca siddham bhavati . tatra bidāṇām apatyam māṇavakaḥ iti vigṛhya bidaśabdāt dvyekayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16976: utpattiḥ bhaviṣyati . baidaḥ baidau . baidasya apatyam bahavaḥ māṇavakāḥ iti vigṛhya
GS24pmbhasuu:16977: bidaśabdāt bahuṣu utpattiḥ bhaviṣyati . bidāḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:16979: 620-621 anyagrahaṇam kimartham . bhrātari iti vartate . sapiṇḍamātre yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:16980: atha sthavirataragrahaṇam kimartham . ubhayataḥ viśiṣṭe yathā syāt sthānataḥ vayastaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16981: ca . atha jīvati iti vartamāne punaḥ jīvatigrahaṇam kimartham . jīvataḥ jīvati yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:16982: syāt mṛte mā bhūt . mṛte hi mārgyaḥ mṛtaḥ iti eva bhavitavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:16984: 621-625 atha gotrayūnayoḥ samāveśaḥ bhavati utāho na . kim ca prāpnoti . bāḍham prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:16985: . na hi ayam ekasañjñādhikāraḥ . kim ca ataḥ . gotrayoḥ samāveśe kaḥ doṣaḥ . tatkṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:16986: bhavet . gotrayoḥ samāveśe kaḥ doṣaḥ . tatkṛtam prāpnoti . gotrāśrayāḥ vidhayaḥ yūni
GS24pmbhasuu:16987: api prāpnuvanti . yāskāyanayaḥ lāhyāyanayaḥ . yaskādibhyaḥ gotre iti luk prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:16988: . yaskādiṣu na doṣaḥ asti na yūni iti anuvartanāt . yaskādiṣu na doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:16989: . na yūni iti anuvartanāt . na yūni iti tatra anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . na taulvalibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16990: iti . doṣaḥ atribidapañcālāḥ na yūni iti anuvartanāt . yadi na yūni iti anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:16991: atrayaḥ bidāḥ pañcālāḥ māṇavakāḥ iti na sidhyati . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . sambandham anuvartiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:16992: . na taulvalibhyaḥ . tadrājasya bahuṣu tena eva astriyām luk bhavati taulvalibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16993: yūni na . yaskādibhyaḥ gotre luk bhavati yūni na . taulvalibhyaḥ iti nivṛttam . yañañoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:16994: ca atribhṛgukutsavasiṣṭhagotamāṅgirobhyaḥ ca luk bhavati . yūni na iti nivṛttam .
GS24pmbhasuu:16995: iha tarhi kāṇvyayanasya chātrāḥ kāṇvyāyanīyāḥ . kaṇvādibhyaḥ gotre iti aṇ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:16996: . kaṇvādiṣu na doṣaḥ asti na yūni asti tataḥ param . kaṇvādiṣu doṣaḥ na asti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:16997: kāraṇam . na yūni asti tataḥ param . kaṇvādibhyaḥ yaḥ vihitaḥ tadantāt prātipadikāt
GS24pmbhasuu:16998: iti ucyate . yaḥ ca atra kaṇvādibhyaḥ vihitaḥ na tadantam prātipadikam yadantam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:16999: prātipadikam na asau kaṇvādibhyaḥ . iha tarhi aupagavasya apatyam aupagaviḥ iti ekaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17000: gotre iti etasmāt niyamāt pratyayaḥ na prāpnoti . ekaḥ gotre pratipadam . pratipadam
GS24pmbhasuu:17001: atra pratyayāḥ vidhīyante gotrāt yūni astriyām iti . tadantāt tarhi anekaḥ pratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17002: prāpnoti . gotrāt yūni ca tat smaret . gotrāt yūni astriyām iti tat smaret . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:17003: . ekaḥ iti eva . gotre tarhi aluk uktaḥ . saḥ yūni api prāpnoti . astu . punaḥ yūni
GS24pmbhasuu:17004: luk bhaviṣyati . na evam śakyam . phakphiñoḥ doṣaḥ syāt . śālaṅkeḥ yūnaḥ chātrāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17005: śālaṅkāḥ pailasya pailāḥ . phakphiñoḥ anyatarasyām iti anyatarasyām śravaṇam prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:17006: . tasmāt yuvasañjñāyām gotrasañjñāyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . tuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17007: niyāmakaḥ . tuḥ kriyate . saḥ niyāmakaḥ bhaviṣyati :
GS24pmbhasuu:17008: jīvati tu vaṃśye apatyam yuvasañjñam eva bhavati iti . yadi tarhi yuvasañjñāyām gotrasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:17009: na bhavati ye iṣyante yūni gotrāśrayāḥ vidhayaḥ te na sidhyanti . gārgyāyaṇānām samūhaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:17016: . yadi sāmūhikeṣu jñāpakam gārgyāyaṇānām kim cit gārgyāyaṇakam gārgyāyaṇaḥ bhaktiḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:17018: jñāpakam . yadi vuñvidhau jñāpakam śālaṅkeḥ yūnaḥ chātrāḥ śālaṅkāḥ iñaḥ gotre iti

GS24pmbhasuu:17142: 637-638 yasya iti lopaḥ kasmāt na bhavati . ikāroccāraṇasāmarthyāt . atha yat kāyam
GS24pmbhasuu:17143: haviḥ katham tasya sampraiṣaḥ kartavyaḥ . yadi tāvat kimaḥ kādeśaḥ kasmai anubrūhi

GS24pmbhasuu:17145: api na kimaḥ ubhayathā kasmai anubrūhi iti bhavitavyam . sarvasya hi sarvanāmasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:17146: kriyate . sarvaḥ ca prajāpatiḥ prajāpatiḥ ca kaḥ . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:17147: yadi eva kimaḥ atha api na kimaḥ ubhayathā kāya anubrūhi iti bhavitavyam . sañjñopasarjanayoḥ hi sarvanāmasañjñā pratiṣidhyate . sañjñā ca eṣā tatrabhavataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:17149: 638 atha yat aponaptriyam apānnaptriyam haviḥ katham tasya sampraiṣaḥ kartavyaḥ .

GS24pmbhasuu:17158: bhave ye pratyayāḥ vihitāḥ te bhavanti kālebhyaḥ sā asya devatā iti asmin arthe iti
GS24pmbhasuu:17159: . āhosvit kālebhyaḥ bhave ye pratyayāḥ vihitāḥ te bhavanti kālebhyaḥ sā asya devatā
GS24pmbhasuu:17160: iti asmin arthe iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . kālebhyaḥ bhave pratyayamātraprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17161: . yadi vijñāyate bhave ye pratyayāḥ vihitāḥ te bhavanti kālebhyaḥ sā asya devatā
GS24pmbhasuu:17162: iti asmin arthe iti pratyayamātram prāpnoti . yaḥ kālebhyaḥ bhave tasya vidhāne prātipadikamātrāt
GS24pmbhasuu:17163: prasaṅgaḥ . atha vijñāyate kālebhyaḥ bhave ye pratyayāḥ vihitāḥ te bhavanti kālebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17164: sā asya devatā iti asmin arthe iti prātipadikamātrāt prāpnuvanti . siddham tu ubhayanirdeśāt
GS24pmbhasuu:17165: . siddham etat . katham . ubhayanirdeśāt . ubhayanirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . kālebhyaḥ bhavavat
GS24pmbhasuu:17166: kālebhyaḥ iti . saḥ tarhi ubhayanirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . bhavavat iti
GS24pmbhasuu:17167: vatinā nirdeśaḥ ayam . yadi ca yābhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaḥ yena viśeṣeṇa bhave pratyayāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17168: vihitāḥ tābhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaḥ tena viśeṣeṇa sā asya devatā iti asmin arthe bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:17169: tataḥ amī bhavavat kṛtāḥ syuḥ . atha hi prakṛtimātrāt vā syuḥ pratyayamātram vā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:17172: 640 ṭhañprakaraṇe tat asmin vartate iti navayajñādibhyaḥ upasaṅkhyānam . ṭhañprakaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:17173: tat asmin vartate iti navayajñādibhyaḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . navayajñaḥ vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:17174: asmin kāle nāvayajñikaḥ . pākayajñikaḥ . pūrṇamāsāt aṇ . pūrṇamāsāt aṇ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17175: . pūrṇamāsaḥ vartate asmin kāle paurṇamāsī tithiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:17177: 640-641 pitṛvyamātula iti kim nipātyate . pitṛmātṛbhyām bhrātari vyaḍḍulacau . pitṛmātṛbhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:17178: bhrātari vyaḍḍulacau pratyayau nipātyete . pituḥ bhrātā pitṛvyaḥ . mātuḥ bhrātā mātulaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17179: . mātāmahapitāmaheti kim nipātyate . mātṛpitṛbhyām pitari ḍāmahac . mātṛpitṛbhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:17180: pitari ḍāmahacpratyayaḥ nipātyate . mātuḥ pitā mātāmahaḥ . pituḥ pitā pitāmahaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:17181: mātari ṣit ca . ṣit ca vaktavyaḥ . mātāmahī pitāmahī . mahaḥ vā chandasi ānaṅaḥ avagrahadarśanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:17182: . mahaḥ vā punaḥ eṣaḥ bhaviṣyati chandasi ānaṅaḥ avagrahadarśanāt . chandasi ānaṅaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17183: avagrahaḥ dṛśyate . pitā-mahaḥ iti . aveḥ dugdhe soḍhadūsamarīsacaḥ . aveḥ dugdhe
GS24pmbhasuu:17184: soḍhadūsamarīsacaḥ iti ete pratyayāḥ vaktavyāḥ . avisoḍham avidūsam avimarīsam .
GS24pmbhasuu:17185: tilāt niṣphalāt piñjapejau . tilāt niṣphalāt piñjapejau vaktavyau . tilapiñjaḥ tilapejaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17186: . piñjaḥ chandasi ḍit ca . piñjaḥ chandasi ḍit ca vaktavyaḥ . tilapiñjam daṇḍānatam .
GS24pmbhasuu:17188: 642 kimartham bhikṣādiṣu yuvatiśabdaḥ paṭhyate na tasya samūhaḥ iti eva siddham . na sidhyati . anudāttādilakṣaṇaḥ añ prāptaḥ . tadbādhanārtham . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati :
GS24pmbhasuu:17189: bhikṣādiṣu yuvatigrahaṇānarthakyam puṃvadbhāvasya siddhatvāt pratyayavidhau . bhikṣādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:17190: yuvatigrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . puṃvadbhāvasya siddhatvāt pratyayavidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:17191: . puṃvadbhāvaḥ atra bhaviṣyate bhasa aḍhe taddhite puṃvat bhavati iti . siddhaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:17194: 642-643 vṛddhāt ca iti vaktavyam . vṛddhānām samūhaḥ vārdhakam . añaḥ vuñ pūrvavipratiṣiddham
GS24pmbhasuu:17195: . añaḥ vuñ bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena . añaḥ avakāśaḥ kapota kāpotam . vuñaḥ avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17196: glucukāyani glaucukāyanakam . iha ubhayam prāpnoti aupagavakam kāpaṭavakam . vuñ
GS24pmbhasuu:17197: bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena . saḥ tarhi pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17198: . vakṣyati etat pūrvaḥ api vuñ param añam bādhate iti . atha vā iṣṭavācī paraśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17199: . vipratiṣedhe param yat iṣṭam tat bhavati iti . ṭhak tu vipratiṣedhāt . ṭhak tu
GS24pmbhasuu:17200: bhavati vipratiṣedhena . ṭhakaḥ avakāśaḥ saktu sāktukam . añaḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:17201: prāpnoti āpūpikam śāṣkulikam maudikam . ṭhak bhavati vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:17203: 643 gaṇikāyaḥ ca iti vaktavyam . gaṇikānām samūhaḥ gāṇikyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:17205: 643 kimartham brāhmaṇādibhyaḥ yan vidhīyate na yañ prakṛtaḥ saḥ anuvartiṣyate . na
GS24pmbhasuu:17206: hi asti viśeṣaḥ brāhmaṇādibhyaḥ yanaḥ vā yañaḥ vā . tat eva rūpam saḥ eva svaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17207: . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat brāhmaṇādibhyaḥ yanam śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ anyebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17208: api ayam bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . yanprakaraṇe pṛṣṭhāt upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:17209: iti codayiṣyati . tan na kartavyam bhavati . yanprakaraṇe pṛṣṭhāt upasaṅkhyānam .
GS24pmbhasuu:17210: yanprakaraṇe pṛṣṭhāt upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . pṛṣṭhānām samūhaḥ pṛṣṭhyaḥ ṣaḍahaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:17212: 644 gajasahāyābhyām ca iti vaktavyam . gajatā sahāyatā . ahnaḥ khaḥ . ahnaḥ khaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17213: vaktavyaḥ . ahnām samūhaḥ ahīnaḥ . kratau . kratau iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt .
GS24pmbhasuu:17214: āhnāya dhūtapāpmānaḥ bhāskarāḥ jātamṛtyavaḥ . parśvāḥ saṇ . parśvāḥ saṇ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17215: . parśūnām samūhaḥ pārśvam . yadi saṇ kriyate itsañjñā na prāpnoti . evam tarhi ṇas vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:17217: 644-647 khaṇḍikā śuka ulūka . kimartham kaṇḍikādiṣu ulūkaśabdaḥ paṭhyate na anudāttadeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17218: iti eva siddham . na sidhyati . cāṣolūkayoḥ chandasi ādyudāttaḥ prayogaḥ dṛśyate
GS24pmbhasuu:17219: . caṣeṇa kikidīvinā . yat ulūkaḥ vadati . na etayoḥ chandasi sāmūhikaḥ dṛśyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:17220: yatra ca dṛśyate tatra etau anudāttādī . idam tarhi prayojanam . ayam aulūkyaḥ gotram
GS24pmbhasuu:17221: . tatra gotrāśrayaḥ vuñ prāptaḥ . tadbādhanārtham . etat api na asti prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:17222: bahuvacanāntānām sāmūhikaḥ bahuṣu ca luk . tatra luki kṛte anudāttādeḥ iti eva siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:17223: . na sidhyati . gotre aluk aci iti aluk prāpnoti . añsiddhiḥ anudāttādeḥ kaḥ arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17224: kṣudrakamālavāt . anudāttādeḥ iti eva añ siddhaḥ . kimartham kṣudramālavaśabdaḥ khaṇḍikādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:17225: paṭhyate . gotrāśrayaḥ vuñ prāptaḥ tadbādhanārtham . gotrāt vuñ na ca tat gotram
GS24pmbhasuu:17226: . gotrāt vuñ bhavati iti ucyate na ca kṣudramālavakaśabdaḥ gotram . na ca gotrasamudāyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17227: gotragrahaṇena gṛhyate . tat yathā janapadasamudāyaḥ janapadagrahaṇena na gṛhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:17228: . kāśikosalīyāḥ iti vuñ na bhavati . tadantavidhinā prāpnoti . tadantāt na saḥ sarvataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17229: . parigaṇiteṣu kāryeṣu tadantavidhiḥ . na ca idam tatra parigaṇyate . jñāpakam syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:17230: tadantatve . evam tarhi jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati iha tadantavidhiḥ iti . tathā ca
GS24pmbhasuu:17231: āpiśaleḥ vidhiḥ . evam ca kṛtvā āpiśaleḥ ācāryasya vidhiḥ upapannaḥ bhavati . dhenuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17232: anañi kam utpādayati . dhenūnām samūhaḥ dhainukam . anañi iti kim . adhenūnām samūhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17233: ādhenavam . senāyām niyamārtham vā . atha vā niyamārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . kṣudrakamālavaśabdāt
GS24pmbhasuu:17234: senāyām eva . kva mā bhūt . kṣaudrakamālavakam anyat iti . yathā bādhyeta vā añ vuñā
GS24pmbhasuu:17235: . atha vā jñāpayati ācāryaḥ pūrvaḥ api vuñ param añam bādhate iti . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:17236: gotrāt vuñ na ca tat gotram iti . tadantavidhinā prāpnoti . nanu ca uktam tadantāt
GS24pmbhasuu:17237: na saḥ sarvataḥ iti . jñāpakam syāt tadantatve . evam tarhi jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:17238: iha tadantavidhiḥ iti . katham punaḥ etat ubhayam śakyam jñāpayitum bhavati ca tadantavidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17239: pūrvaḥ ca vuñ param añam bādhate iti . ubhayam jñāpyate .

GS24pmbhasuu:17252: vā . gāndhāryādibhyaḥ vā iti vaktavyam . gāndhāraḥ gāndhārayaḥ vāsātaḥ vasātayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17253: śaibaḥ śibayaḥ . rājanyādibhyaḥ vā vuñ . rājanyādibhyaḥ vā vuñ vaktavyaḥ . rājanyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17254: rājanyakaḥ daivayātavaḥ daivayātavakaḥ . bailvavanādibhyaḥ nityam . bailvavanādibhyaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:17256: vaktavyam . na vā abhidheyasya nivāsaviṣayatvāt nivāsavivakṣāyām lubviṣayavivakṣāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:17257: pratyayaḥ . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam . abhidheyasya nivāsaviṣayatvāt . yat abhidheyam
GS24pmbhasuu:17258: saḥ nivāsaḥ ca viṣayaḥ ca . abhidheyasya nivāsaviṣayatvāt nivāsavivakṣāyām lup viṣayavivakṣāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:17259: pratyayaḥ bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam . etat jñāsyāmi iha nityaḥ vidhiḥ iha
GS24pmbhasuu:17260: vibhāṣā iti . etat api na asti prayojanam . yāvatā yat abhidheyam saḥ nivāsaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:17261: viṣayaḥ ca . abhidheyasya nivāsaviṣayatvāt nivāsavivakṣāyām lup viṣayavivakṣāyām pratyayaḥ .

GS24pmbhasuu:17264: napuṃsakāt svārthe upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . triṣṭup eva traiṣṭubham anuṣṭup eva
GS24pmbhasuu:17267: 650-651 kimartham imau ubhau arthau nirdiśyete na yaḥ adhīte vetti api asau yaḥ tu
GS24pmbhasuu:17268: vetti adhīte api asau . na etayoḥ āvaśyakaḥ samāveśaḥ . bhavati hi kaḥ cit sampāṭham
GS24pmbhasuu:17269: paṭhati na ca vetti kaḥ cit ca vetti na ca sampāṭham paṭhati .
GS24pmbhasuu:17271: 651-653 ukthādi iti ucyate . kāni ukthāni . sāmāni . yadi evam sāmagamātre aukthikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17272: iti prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . tādarthyāt tācchabdyam bhaviṣyati . ukthārtham uktham
GS24pmbhasuu:17273: . iha ukthāni adhīte aukthikaḥ yajñam adhīte yājñikaḥ . yaḥ idānīm aukthikyam yājñikam
GS24pmbhasuu:17274: ca adhīte katham tatra bhavitavyam . aukthikaḥ yājñikaḥ iti eva bhavitavyam . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:17275: . tasyedampratyayāt luk . tasyedampratyayāt luk . tasyedampratyayasya ca . saḥ tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:17276: vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . iha asmābhiḥ traiśabdyam sādhyam . ukthāni adhīte aukthikyam
GS24pmbhasuu:17277: adhīte aukthikaḥ iti . tatra dvayoḥ samānārthayoḥ ekena vigrahaḥ aparasmāt utpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17278: bhaviṣyati aviravikanyāyena . tat yathā aveḥ māṃsam iti vigṛhya avikaśabdāt utpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17279: bhavati āvikam iti . evam ukthāni adhīte iti vigṛhya aukthikaḥ iti bhaviṣyati . aukthikyam
GS24pmbhasuu:17280: adhīte iti vigṛhya vākyam eva. vidyālakṣaṇakalpasūtrāntāt akalpādeḥ ikak smṛtaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:17281: vidyā . vāyasavidyakaḥ . vidyā lakṣaṇa golakṣaṇikaḥ āśvalakṣaṇikaḥ . lakṣaṇa . kalpa
GS24pmbhasuu:17282: . pārāśarakalpikaḥ pārakalpikaḥ . kalp . sūtra . vārttikasūtrikaḥ sāṅgrahasūtrikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17283: . akalpādeḥ iti kimartham . kālpasūtraḥ . vidyā ca anaṅgakṣatradharmatripūrvā . vidyā
GS24pmbhasuu:17284: ca anaṅgakṣatradharmatripūrvā iti vaktavyam . āṅgavidyaḥ kṣātravidyaḥ dhārmavidyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17285: traividyaḥ . ākhyānākhyāyiketihāsapurāṇebhyaḥ ca ṭhak vaktavyaḥ . yāvakrītikaḥ praiyaṅgavikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17286: yāyātikaḥ . ākhyāna . ākhyāyikā . vāsavadattikaḥ saumanottarikaḥ . aitihāsikaḥ paurāṇikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17287: . sarvasādeḥ dvigoḥ ca laḥ . sarvasādeḥ dvigoḥ ca laḥ vaktavyaḥ . sarvavedaḥ sarvatantraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17288: . savārttikaḥ sasaṅgrahaḥ . pañcakalpaḥ dvitantraḥ . anusūḥ lakṣyalakṣaṇe sarvasādeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17289: dvigoḥ ca laḥ ikan padottarapadāt śataṣaṣṭeḥ ṣikan pathaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:17291: 654 ayam yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum . katham anubrāhmaṇī anubrāhmaṇinau anubrāhmaṇinaḥ . ininā eva matvarthīyena siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:17293: 654 ayuktaḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ . adhīte iti vartate na ca vasantaḥ nāma adhyayanam asti
GS24pmbhasuu:17294: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . sāhacaryāt tācchabdyam bhaviṣyati . vasantasahacaritam adhyayanam
GS24pmbhasuu:17297: 654 ayuktaḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ . prauktāt iti bhavitavyam . sautraḥ nirdeśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:17299: 655 saṅkhyāprakṛteḥ iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . māhāvārttikaḥ kālapakaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:17301: 655-657 kimartham idam ucyate . anyatra abhidheyasya anityatvāt chandobrāhmaṇānām
GS24pmbhasuu:17302: tadviṣayavacanam . anyatra abhidheyam anityam bhavati . pāṇinīyam iti vā bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:17303: pāṇinīyāḥ iti vā . anyatra abhidheyasya anityatvāt chandobrāhmaṇānām api anityatā
GS24pmbhasuu:17304: prāpnoti . iṣyate ca tadviṣayatā eva syāt iti . tat ca antareṇa yatnam na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:17305: iti chandobrāhmaṇānām tadviṣayavacanam . evamartham idam ucyate . asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:17306: etat . kim tarhi iti . tatra yathādhikāram tadviṣayaprasaṅgaḥ . tatra yathādhikāram
GS24pmbhasuu:17307: tadviṣayatā prāpnoti . adhīte veda iti vartate . tena adhyetṛveditroḥ eva tadviṣayatā
GS24pmbhasuu:17308: syāt . ye anye upacārāḥ tatra na syāt . yathā iha bhavati pāṇinīyam mahat suvihitam
GS24pmbhasuu:17309: iti evam iha api syāt kaṭham mahat suvihitam iti . siddham tu proktādhikāre tadviṣayavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:17310: . siddham etat . katham . proktādhikāre eva tadviṣayatā vaktavyā . tena proktam .
GS24pmbhasuu:17311: chandobrāhmaṇāni adhyetṛveditroḥ eva iti . tat tarhi adhyetṛveditṛgrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:17312: . nanu ca iha api kriyate . parārtham etad bhavati tat adhīte tat veda iti . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:17313: tarhi yāvat iha chandobrāhmaṇagrahaṇam tāvat atra adhyetṛveditṛgrahaṇam . nanu ca
GS24pmbhasuu:17314: tatra api kriyate . parārtham tat bhaviṣyati . purāṇprokteṣu brāhmaṇakalpeṣu śaunakādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17315: chandasi iti . iha vā chandobrāhmaṇagrahaṇam kriyate tatra vā adhyetṛveditṛgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:17319: . yājñavalkāni brāhmaṇāni . saulabhāni . kim proktādhikāre tadviṣayatā kriyate iti
GS24pmbhasuu:17320: ataḥ yājñavakkyādibhyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na iti āha . sarvathā yājñavakkyādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17321: pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . iniḥ vā prokte tadviṣayaḥ . atha vā iniḥ prokte tadviṣayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17322: bhavati iti vaktavyam . yadi iniḥ prokte tadviṣayaḥ bhavati iti ucyate paiṅgī kalpaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17323: atra api prāpnoti . kāśyapakauśikagrahaṇam ca kalpe niyamārtham . kāśyapakauśikagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:17324: ca kalpe niyamārtham draṣṭavyam . kāśyapakauśikābhyām eva iniḥ kalpe tadviṣayaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:17325: na anyebhyaḥ iti . evam api chaṇādīnām tadviṣayatā na prāpnoti . taittirīyāḥ vāratantavīyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17326: . yadi punaḥ chaṇādayaḥ prokte tadviṣayāḥ bhavanti iti ucyeta . evam api paiṅgī kalpaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17327: atra api prāpnoti . kāśyapakauśikagrahaṇam ca kalpe niyamārtham iti eva . evam api
GS24pmbhasuu:17328: autsargikāṇām tadviṣayatā na prāpnoti . krauḍāḥ kāṅkatāḥ maudāḥ paippalādāḥ . chaṇādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17329: ca api autsargikān adhyetṛveditroḥ eva bādheran . ye anye upacārāḥ tatra na bādheran
GS24pmbhasuu:17330: . tittiriṇā proktāḥ ślokāḥ iti . asti tarhi aviśeṣeṇa . nanu ca uktam yājñavakyādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17331: pratiṣedhaḥ iti . vakṣyati etat . yājñavakyādibhyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ tulyakālatvāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:17332: . tatra eva vaktavyam . tadviṣayatā ca na bhavati iti . katham kāśyapinaḥ kauśikinaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17333: iti . iniḥ prokte tadviṣayaḥ bhavati iti ucyamāne avaśyam kāśyapakauśikagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:17334: kalpe niyamārtham draṣṭavyam . tat eva idānīm vidhyartham bhaviṣyati . katham pārāśariṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17335: bhikṣavaḥ śailālinaḥ naṭāḥ . atra api tadviṣayatā ca iti anuvartiṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:17337: 660-661 kim punaḥ ayam ekaḥ yogaḥ āhosvit nānāyogāḥ . kim ca ataḥ . yadi ekaḥ yogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17338: uttareṣu arthādeśaneṣu deśe tannāmni deśe tannāmni iti asya anuvṛttiḥ kartavyā .
GS24pmbhasuu:17339: na hi ekayoge anuvṛttiḥ bhavati . katham jñāyate . yat ayam tat adhīte tat veda iti
GS24pmbhasuu:17340: dviḥ tadgrahaṇam karoti . atha nānāyogāḥ oḥ añ iti evamādi anukramaṇam yat eva sarvāntyam
GS24pmbhasuu:17341: arthādeśanam tasya eva viṣaye syāt . yathā icchasi tathā astu . astu tāvat ekaḥ yogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17342: . nanu ca uktam uttareṣu arthādeśaneṣu deśe tannāmni deśe tannāmni iti asya anuvṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17343: kartavyā . na hi ekayoge anuvṛttiḥ bhavati iti . ekayoge api anuvṛttiḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:17344: katham jñāyate . yat ayam tat asya asti asmin iti matup iti dviḥ tadgrahaṇam na karoti
GS24pmbhasuu:17345: . katham tat adhīte tat veda iti . pramādakṛtam ācāryasya śakyam akartum . atha vā
GS24pmbhasuu:17346: punaḥ santu nānāyogāḥ . nanu ca uktam oḥ añ iti evamādi anukramaṇam yat eva sarvāntyam
GS24pmbhasuu:17347: arthādeśanam tasya eva viṣaye syāt iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . goyūthavat adhikārāḥ . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:17348: yathā goyūtham ekadaṇḍapraghaṭṭitam sarvam samam ghoṣam gacchati tadvat adhikārāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:17350: 661 oḥ añvidheḥ nadyām matuP vipratiṣiddham . oḥ añvidheḥ nadyām matup bhavati vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:17351: . oḥ añaḥ avakāśahḥ kannatu kānnavatam . matupaḥ avakāśaḥ udumbarāvatī maśakāvatī
GS24pmbhasuu:17352: . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . ikṣumatī drumatī . matup bhavati vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:17354: 661-662 aṅgagrahaṇam kimartham . yathā bahvajgrahaṇam aṅgaviśeṣaṇam vijñāyeta . bahvacaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17355: aṅgāt iti . atha akriyamāṇe aṅgagrahaṇe bahvajgrahaṇam kasya viśeṣaṇam syāt . matvantaviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:17356: . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . iha api prasajyeta . mālāvatām ayam nivāsaḥ mālāvatam . asti
GS24pmbhasuu:17357: ca idānīm abahvac matvantaḥ yadarthaḥ vidhiḥ syāt . asti iti āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:17360: 662 kimartham nadyām matup vidhīyate na tat asya asti asmin iti matup iti eva siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:17361: . nadyām matubvacanam matvarthe aṇvidhānāt . nadyām matubvacanam kriyate matvarthe
GS24pmbhasuu:17362: aṇvidhānāt . ayam matvarthe aṇ vidhīyate . saḥ viśeṣavihitaḥ sāmānyavihitam matupam
GS24pmbhasuu:17363: bādheta . nirvṛttādyartham ca . nirvṛttādyartham ca nadyām matubvacanam kriyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:17368: 662-664 yadi punaḥ ayam kuṭ parādiḥ kriyeta . kuṭi pratyayādeḥ ādeśānupapattiḥ anāditvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:17369: . kuṭi sati pratyayādeḥ iti ādeśasya anupapattiḥ . kuṭi kṛte anāditvāt ādeśaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:17370: prāpnoti . evam tarhi pūrvāntaḥ kariṣyate . pūrvānte hrasvatvam . yadi pūrvāntaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17371: hrasvatvam vaktavyam . kuñcakīyāḥ . parādau punaḥ sati ke aṇaḥ iti hrasvatvam siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:17372: bhavati . astu tarhi parādiḥ . nanu ca uktam kuṭi kṛte anāditvāt ādeśaḥ na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:17373: iti . siddham tu ādiṣṭasya kuḍvacanāt . siddham etat . katham . kuṭ ādiṣṭasya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:17374: vaktavyam . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . sanniyogāt siddham . sanniyogḥ kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:17375: . kaḥ eṣaḥ yatnaḥ codyate sanniyogaḥ nāma . cakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . kuṭ ca . yat ca anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:17376: prāpnoti . kim ca anyat prāpnoti . ādeśaḥ . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam
GS24pmbhasuu:17377: eva astu . nanu ca uktam . pūrvānte hrasvatvam iti . nipātanāt etat siddham . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:17378: nipātanam . kruñcāḥ hrasvatvam ca iti . tat tarhi pūrvānte sati nipātanam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:17379: . parādau api eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yat hi tat ke aṇaḥ iti hrasvatvam na tat kādimātre śakhyam
GS24pmbhasuu:17380: vijñātum . iha api prasajyeta . nadīkalpaḥ parīvāhaḥ kumārīkāmyati iti . tasmāt ubhābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:17381: etat vaktavyam . kruñcāḥ hrasvatvam ca iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:17383: 664-670 śeṣe iti ucyate . kaḥ śeṣaḥ nāma . apatyādibhyaḥ cāturarthparyantebhyaḥ ye
GS24pmbhasuu:17384: anye arthāḥ saḥ śeṣaḥ . kimartham punaḥ śeṣagrahaṇam . śeṣe ghādayaḥ yathā syuḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:17385: svārthe mā bhūvan iti . na etat asti prayojanam . idam tāvat ayam praṣṭavyaḥ . aṇādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17386: svārthe kasmāt na bhavanti iti . apatyādiṣu artheṣu aṇādayaḥ vidhīyante . tena svārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:17387: na bhaviṣyanti . ime api tarhi jātādiṣu artheṣu vidhīyante . tena svārthe na bhaviṣyanti
GS24pmbhasuu:17388: . katham punaḥ iha ucyamānāḥ ghādayaḥ jātādiṣu śakyāḥ vijñātum . anuvartiṣyante tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:17389: ghādayaḥ . yadi anuvartante ghādayaḥ yā yā parā prakṛtiḥ tasyāḥ tasyāḥ pūrve pūrve
GS24pmbhasuu:17390: pratyayāḥ prāpnuvanti . evam tarhi jātādiṣu artheṣu ghādīn apekṣiṣyāmahe . ayuktā
GS24pmbhasuu:17391: evam bahunaḥ apekṣā . apekṣamāṇaḥ ayam anantaram yogam apekṣeta . bahunaḥ api apekṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:17392: bhavati . tat yathā kaṣādiṣu yathāvidhi anuprayogaḥ iti sāmānyakam saviśeṣakam sarvam
GS24pmbhasuu:17393: apekṣyate . atha vā punaḥ astu anuvṛttiḥ . nanu ca uktam yā yā parā prakṛtiḥ tasyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17394: tasyāḥ pūrve pūrve pratyayāḥ prāpnuvanti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . sambandham anuvartiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:17395: . rāṣṭrāvārapārāt ghakhau . grāmāt yakhañau rāṣṭrāvārapārāt ghakhau . kattryādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17396: ḍhakañ rāṣṭrāvārapārāt ghakhau grāmāt yakhañau iti . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . śeṣavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:17397: ghādīnām apatyādiṣu aprasaṅgārtham . śeṣavacanam kriyate śeṣe ghādayaḥ yathā syuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17398: . apatyādiṣu mā bhūvan iti iti . katham ca prāpnuvanti . tasyedaṃvacanāt prasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17399: . tasyedaṃviśeṣāḥ hi ete apatyam samūhaḥ nivāsaḥ vikāraḥ iti . vipratiṣedhāt siddham

GS24pmbhasuu:17628: kariṣyate . pūrvānte kapratiṣedhaḥ . yadi pūrvāntaḥ kādeśasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17629: . śauvastikam . tāntāt iti kādeśaḥ prāpnoti . astu tarhi parādiḥ . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:17630: śvasaḥ tuṭi ādeśānupapattiḥ anāditvāt iti . siddham tu ādiṣṭasya tuḍvacanāt . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:17631: etat . katham . tuḍ ādiṣṭasya iti vaktavyam . atha vā cena sanniyogaḥ kariṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:17632: tuṭ ca . kim ca . yat ca anyat prāpnoti . kim ca anyat prāpnoti . ādeśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:17634: 693-694 hemantasya aṇi talopavacanānarthakyam hemnaḥ prakṛtyantaratvāt . hemantasya
GS24pmbhasuu:17635: aṇi talopavacanam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . hemnaḥ prakṛtyantaratvāt . prakṛtyantaram
GS24pmbhasuu:17636: hemanśabdaḥ . ātaḥ ca prakṛtyantaram . evam hi āha . heman heman āganīganti karṇau
GS24pmbhasuu:17637: . tasmāt etau heman na śuṣyataḥ iti . alopadarśanāt ca . alopaḥ khalu api dṛśyate
GS24pmbhasuu:17639: hemantasya aṇvacanam aṇi ca talopavacanam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . hemnaḥ prakṛtyantaratvāt alopadarśanāt ca iti eva . tatra ṛtubhyaḥ iti eva siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:17641: 694 ciraparutparāribhyaḥ tnaḥ vaktavyaḥ . ciratnam paruttnam parāritnam . pragasya
GS24pmbhasuu:17642: chandasi galopaḥ ca tnaḥ ca vaktavyaḥ . pratnam ātmānam . agrādipaścāt ḍimuc smṛtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17643: . agrimam ādimam paścimam . antāt ca iti vaktavyam . antimam.
GS24pmbhasuu:17645: 695-696 atha sāyacirayoḥ kim nipātyate . sāyacirayoḥ makārāntatvam pratyayasanniyuktam
GS24pmbhasuu:17646: . sāyacirayoḥ makārāntatvam pratyayasanniyogena nipātyate . sāyantanam cirantanam
GS24pmbhasuu:17647: . na etat asti prayojanam . makārāntaḥ sāyaṃśabdaḥ . katham sāyāhnaḥ . sāyamaḥ ahne
GS24pmbhasuu:17648: malopaḥ . sāyamaḥ ahne malopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . katham sāyatare . tare ca iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:17649: . katham sāyam sāye . vā saptamyām iti vaktavyam . atha prāhṇapragayoḥ kim nipātyate
GS24pmbhasuu:17650: . prāhṇapragyoḥ ekārāntatvam . prāhṇapragyoḥ ekārāntatvam nipātyate . prāhṇetanam
GS24pmbhasuu:17651: pragetanam . na etat asti prayojanam . saptamyāḥ alukā api siddham . bhavet siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:17652: yadā saptamī . yadā tu anyā vibhaktiḥ tadā na sidhyati . tuṭi uktam . kim uktam .
GS24pmbhasuu:17653: tuṭi ādeśānupapattiḥ anāditvāt iti . tuṭi kṛte anāditvāt ādeśaḥ na prāpnoti . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:17654: tarhi pūrvāntaḥ kariṣyate . pūrvānte visarjanīyaḥ . yadi pūrvāntaḥ visarjanīyaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17655: . prātastanam punastanam . parādau punaḥ sati kharavasānayoḥ visarjanīyaḥ iti visarjanīyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17656: siddhaḥ bhavati . astu tarhi parādiḥ . nanu ca uktam tuṭi kṛte anāditvāt ādeśaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:17657: prāpnoti iti . siddham tu ādiṣṭasya tuḍvacanāt . siddham etat . katham . tuḍ ādiṣṭasya
GS24pmbhasuu:17658: iti vaktavyam . atha vā cena sanniyogaḥ kariṣyate . tuṭ ca . kim ca . yat ca anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:17659: prāpnoti . kim ca anyat prāpnoti . ādeśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:17662: subantatvam vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . saptamīśravaṇāṛtham . saptamyāḥ śravaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:17663: yathā syāt . pūrvāhṇetanam aparāhṇetanam . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17664: jñāpayati bhavati atra saptamī iti yat ayam ghakālataneṣu kālanāmnaḥ iti saptamyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17665: alukam śāsti . alugvacanam jñāpakam iti cet avyayāt saptamīprasaṅgaḥ . alugvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:17666: jñāpakam iti cet avyayāt saptamī prāpnoti . doṣātanam divātanam . astu avyayāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:17667: luk bhaviṣyati . iha api luk prāpnoti . pūrvāhṇetanam aparāhṇetanam . aluk atra lukam
GS24pmbhasuu:17668: bādhiṣyate . iha api bādheta . doṣātanam divātanam . samānāśrayaḥ luk alukā bādhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:17669: . kaḥ ca samānāśrayaḥ . yaḥ pratyayāśrayaḥ . atra ca prāk eva pratyayotpatteḥ luk
GS24pmbhasuu:17670: bhavati . na sidhyati . iha hi sati pratyaye lukā bhavitavyam . sati luki alukā bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:17671: . tatra ca pratyayaḥ eva na asti . kutaḥ luk bhaviṣyati . sā eṣā jñāpakena asatī
GS24pmbhasuu:17672: vibhaktiḥ ākṛṣyate . sā yathā iha bādhikā bhavati pūrvāhṇetanam aparāhṇetanam evam
GS24pmbhasuu:17673: iha api syāt doṣātanam divātanam . evam tarhi na brūmaḥ alugvacanam jñāpakam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:17674: atra saptamī iti . kim tarhi . bhavati subantāt utpattiḥ iti . kim punaḥ jñāpyam
GS24pmbhasuu:17675: etat yāvatā samarthānām prathamāt vā iti vartate sāmarthyam ca subantena . jñāpyam
GS24pmbhasuu:17676: iti āha . katham . ṅyāpprātipadikāt iti api vartate . tatra kutaḥ etat subantāt utpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17677: bhaviṣyati na punaḥ ṅyāpprātipadikāt iti . katham yat uktam vṛddhāvṛddhāvarṇasvaradvyajlakṣaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:17678: ca pratyayavidhau tatsampratyayārtham iti . samarthasya yat vṛddham ṅyāpprātipadikam
GS24pmbhasuu:17679: iti etat vijñāyate . yadi etat jñapyate katham dvipadaḥ āgatam dvipādrūpyam praṣṭhauhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17680: āgatam praṣṭhvāḍrūpyam kīlālapaḥ āgatam kīlālapārūpyam papuṣaḥ āgatam papivaḍrūpyam
GS24pmbhasuu:17681: . padbhāvaḥ ūhākāralopaḥ prasāraṇam iti ete vidhayaḥ prāpnuvanti . luke kṛte na bhaviṣyanti
GS24pmbhasuu:17682: . iha tarhi sāmasu sādhuḥ sāmanyaḥ vemanyaḥ nalopaḥ prātipadikāntasya iti nalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17683: prāpnoti . luki kṛte bhatvāt na bhaviṣyati . idam iha sampradhāryam . luk kriyatām
GS24pmbhasuu:17684: nalopaḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt nalopaḥ . evam tarhi idam iha sampradhāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:17685: . nalopaḥ kriyatām taddhitotpattiḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt nalopaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:17686: asiddhaḥ nalopaḥ . tasya asiddhatvāt taddhitotpattiḥ bhaviṣyati . parigaṇiteṣu kāryeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:17687: nalopaḥ asiddhaḥ na ca idam tatra parigaṇyate . idam api tatra parigaṇyate . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:17692: 700-701 kimartham jātādayaḥ arthāḥ nirdiśyante . jātādiṣu artheṣu ghādayaḥ yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:17693: syuḥ . svārthe mā bhūvan iti . na etat asti prayojanam . śeṣe iti vartate . tena
GS24pmbhasuu:17694: svārthe na bhaviṣyanti . ataḥ uttaram paṭhat . tatrajātādiṣu vacanam niyamārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:17695: . niyamārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . jātādiṣu eva ghādayaḥ yathā syuḥ . iha mā bhūvan .
GS24pmbhasuu:17696: tatra āste tatra śete iti . yadi niyamaḥ kriyate dārṣadāḥ saktavaḥ aulūkhalaḥ yāvakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17697: iti na sidhyati . saṃskṛtam iti evam bhaviṣyati . bhavet siddham dārṣadāḥ saktavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17699: aulūkhalaḥ yāvakaḥ iti . saṃskṛtam hi nāma tat bhavati yat tataḥ eva apakṛṣya abhyavahriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:17700: . na ca yāvakaḥ ulūkhalāt eva apakṛṣya abhyavahriyate . avaśyam randhanādīni pratīkṣyāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:17701: . tasmāt na arthaḥ anena niyamena . kasmāt na bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:17702: tatra āste tatra śete iti . anabhidhānāt . tat ca avaśyam anabhidhānam āśrayitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:17703: . kriyamāṇeṣu api hi arthanirdeśeṣu yatra jātādiṣu utpadyamānena pratyayena arthasya
GS24pmbhasuu:17704: abhidhāna na bhavati na bhavati tatra pratyayotpattiḥ . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:17705: aṅgulyā khanati vṛkṣamūlāt āgataḥ iti . na tarhi idānīm jātādayaḥ arthāḥ nirdeṣṭavyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17706: . nirdeṣṭavyāḥ ca . kim prayojanam . apavādavidhānārtham . prāviṣaḥ ṭhap . prāvṛṣi
GS24pmbhasuu:17707: jātaḥ prāvṛṣakaḥ . kva mā bhūt . prāvṛṣi bhavaḥ prāveṣeṇyāḥ balāhakāḥ . yāni tu etāni
GS24pmbhasuu:17708: nirapavādāni arthāpadeśāni tāni śakyāni akartum . kṛtalabdhakrītakuśalāḥ . sraughnaḥ devadattaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:17710: 702 lukprakaraṇe citrārevatīrohiṇībhyaḥ striyām upasaṅkhyānam . lukprakaraṇe citrārevatīrohiṇībhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17711: striyām upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . citrāyām jātā citrā strī citrā . revatī revatī
GS24pmbhasuu:17712: strī revatī . rohiṇī rohiṇī strī . phalgunyaṣāḍhābhyām ṭānau . phalgunyaṣāḍhābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:17713: ṭānau vaktavyau . phalgunī . aṣāḍhāḥ upadadhāti . śraviṣṭhāṣāḍhābhyām chaṇ . śraviṣṭhāṣāḍhābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:17714: chaṇ vaktavyaḥ . śrāviṣṭhīyāḥ āṣāḍhīyāḥ . na vā nakṣatrebhyaḥ balulam lugvacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:17715: . na vā vaktavyaḥ . kim kāraṇam . nakṣatrebhyaḥ balulam lugvacanāt . nakṣatrebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17716: balulam luk iti evam atra luk bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:17719: anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . tatrabhavena kṛtatvāt . yaḥ hi rāṣṭre prāyeṇa bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:17720: tatra bhavaḥ asau bhavati . tatra tatra bhavaḥ iti eva siddham . na sidhyati . anityabhavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17721: prāyabhavaḥ . anityabhavaḥ prāyabhavaḥ iti cet muktasaṃśayena tulyam . yat bhavān
GS24pmbhasuu:17722: muktasaṃśayam tatra bhave udāharaṇam nyāyyam manyate sraughnaḥ devadattaḥ iti tena
GS24pmbhasuu:17723: etat tulyam . saḥ api hi avaśyam udakdeśādīni abhiniṣkrāmati . atha etat bhavān prāyabhave
GS24pmbhasuu:17724: udāharaṇam nyāyyam manyate tatra bhave kim udāharaṇam . yat tatra nityam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:17725: . sraughnāḥ prāsādāḥ sraughnāḥ prākārāḥ iti . evam tarhi tatra bhavati iti prakṛtya
GS24pmbhasuu:17726: jīhvāmūlāṅguleḥ chaḥ vidhīyate . saḥ yathā dṛṣṭāpacare aṅgulīyam iti bhavati evam
GS24pmbhasuu:17727: prayabhave api bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam . prāyabhavaḥ iti prakṛtya upajānūpakarṇopanīveḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17728: ṭhakam vakṣyati . saḥ prāyabhave eva yathā syāt . tatra bhave mā bhūt . upajānubhavam
GS24pmbhasuu:17729: gaḍu iti . atha idānīm tatra bhavaḥ iti prakṛtya śarīrāvayavāt yat vidhīyate . saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17730: atra kasmāt na bhavati . anabhidhānāt . saḥ yathā eva anabhidhānāt yat na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:17733: 704-705 vikāre kośāt ḍhañ . vikāre kośāt ḍhañ vaktavyaḥ . kośasya vikāraḥ kauśeyam
GS24pmbhasuu:17734: . sambhūte hi arthānupapattiḥ . sambhūte iti hi ucyamāne arthasya anupapattiḥ syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:17735: . na hi adaḥ kośe sambhavati . kim tarhi . kośasya adaḥ vikāraḥ . yadi vikāraḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:17736: ucyate bhasmani api prāpnoti . bhasma api kośasya vikāraḥ . atha sambhūte iti ucyamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:17737: krimau kasmāt na bhavati . krimiḥ api hi kośe sambhavati . anabhidhānāt . yathā eva
GS24pmbhasuu:17738: tarhi anabhidhānāt krimau na bhavati evam bhasmani api na bhaviṣyati . arthaḥ ca upapannaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:17740: 705 ayuktaḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ . kālāt iti vartate. na ca kalāpī nāma kalaḥ asti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . sāhacaryāt tācchabdyam bhaviṣyati . kalāpisahacaritaḥ kālaḥ kalāpī kālaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:17742: 705-706 tatra iti vartamāne punaḥ tatragrahaṇam kimartham . tatraprakaraṇe tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:17743: iti punarvacanam kālanivṛttyartham . tatraprakaraṇe tatra iti punarvacanam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:17744: kālanivṛttyartham . kālādhikāraḥ nivartyate . na hi kākaḥ vāśyate iti eva adhikārāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17745: nivartante . kaḥ vā abhisambandhaḥ yat tatragrahaṇam kālādhikāram nivartayet . eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17746: abhisambandhaḥ . kālābhisambaddham tatragrahaṇam anuvartate . tatragrahaṇam ca tatragrahaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:17747: nivartakam bhavati . tasmin nivṛtte kālādhikāraḥ api nivartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:17749: 706 ñyaprakaraṇe parimukhādibhyaḥ upasaṅkhyānam . ñyaprakaraṇe parimukhādibhyaḥ upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:17750: kartavyam . pārimukhyam pārihanavyam . avyayībhāvād vidhāne upakūlādibhyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17751: . avyayībhāvād vidhāne upakūlādibhyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . aupakūlaḥ aupamūlaḥ aupaśālaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:17753: 707-708 atyalpam idam ucyate . samānasya tadādeḥ ca adhyātmādiṣu ca iṣyate . samānasya :
GS24pmbhasuu:17755: samānagrāmikaḥ samānadeśikaḥ . adhyātmādiṣu ca iṣyate . ādhyātmikaḥ ādhidaivikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17756: ādhibhautikaḥ . ūrdhvandamāt ca dehāt ca . ṭhañ vaktavyaḥ . aurdhvandamikam aurdhvadehikam
GS24pmbhasuu:17757: . lokottarapadasya ca . ṭhañ vaktavyaḥ . aihalaukikam pāralaukikam . mukhapārśvatasoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17758: īyaḥ . mukha pārśva iti etābhyām tasantābhyām īyaḥ vaktavyaḥ . mukhatīyaḥ pārśvatīyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17759: . kuk janasya parasya ca .īyaḥ vaktavyaḥ . janakīyam parakīyam . īyaḥ kāryaḥ atha
GS24pmbhasuu:17760: madhyasya . madhyīyaḥ . maṇmīyau ca pratyayau . maṇmīyau ca api pratyayau vaktavyau
GS24pmbhasuu:17762: madhyaḥ] madhyam dinaṇ ca asmāt . madhyaśabdaḥ madhyaśabdam āpadyate dinaṇ ca asmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:17763: pratyayaḥ bhavati . mādhyandinaḥ udgāyati . sthāmnaḥ luk ajināt tathā . sthāmnaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17764: luk vaktavyaḥ . aśvatthāmā . ajināntāt ca luk vaktavyaḥ . ulājinaḥ siṃhājinaḥ vyāghrājinaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17765: . bāhyaḥ daivyaḥ pāñcajanyaḥ gāmbhīryam ca ñyaḥ iṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:17767: 709-710 kimartham bhavavyākhyānayoḥ yugapat adhikāraḥ kriyate . bhavavyākhyānayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17768: yugapat adhikāraḥ apavādavidhānārthaḥ . bhavavyākhyānayoḥ yugapat adhikāraḥ kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:17769: apavādavidhānārthaḥ . yugapad apavādān vakṣyāmi iti . kim ucyate apavādavidhānārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17770: iti na punaḥ nirdeśārthaḥ api syāt . kṛtanirdeśau hi tau . kṛtanirdeśau hi etau arthau
GS24pmbhasuu:17771: . ekaḥ tatra bhavaḥ iti aparaḥ tasya idam iti . atha vyākhyātavyanāmnaḥ grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:17772: kimartham . tatra vyākhyātavyanāmnaḥ grahaṇam bhavārtham . tatra vyākhyātavyanāmnaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17773: grahaṇam kriyate bhavārtham . kim ucyate bhavārtham iti na punaḥ vyākhyānārtham api
GS24pmbhasuu:17774: . vyākhyāne hi avacanāt siddham . vyākhyāne hi sati antareṇa vacanam siddham . yat
GS24pmbhasuu:17775: prati vyākhyānam iti etat bhavati tasmāt utpattiḥ bhaviṣyati . kim prati etat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:17776: . vyākhyātavyanāma . yat ucyate bhavārtham iti tat na . vyākhyānārtham api vyākhyātavyanāmnaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17777: grahaṇam kriyate . iha mā bhūt . pāṭaliputrasya vyākhyānī sukosalā iti . atha kriaymāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:17778: api vyākhyātavyanāmnaḥ grahaṇe kasmāt eva atra na bhavati . avayaśaḥ hi ākhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:17779: vyākhyānam . pāṭaliputram ca api avayavaśaḥ vyācaṣṭe . īdṛśāḥ asya prākārāḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:17780: satyam evam etat . kva cit tu kā cit prasṛtatarā gatiḥ bhavati . śabdagrantheṣu ca
GS24pmbhasuu:17781: eṣā prasṛtatarā gatiḥ bhavati . niruktam vyākhyāyate . vyākaraṇam vyākhyāyate iti
GS24pmbhasuu:17782: ucyate . na kaḥ cit āha . pāṭaliputram vyākhyāyate iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:17784: 710 bhave mantreṣu lugvacanam . bhave mantreṣu luk vaktavyaḥ . agniṣṭome bhavaḥ mantraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17785: agniṣṭomaḥ . rājasūyaḥ vājapeyaḥ . kalpe ca vyākhyāne . kalpe ca vyākhyāne luk vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17786: . agniṣṭomasya vyākhyānaḥ kalpaḥ agniṣṭomaḥ . rājasūyaḥ vājapeyaḥ . saḥ tarhi vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17787: . na vā tādarthyāt tācchabdyam . na vā vaktavyaḥ . kim kāraṇam . tādarthyāt tācchabdyam
GS24pmbhasuu:17788: . tādarthyāt tācchabdyam bhaviṣyati . agniṣṭomārthaḥ agniṣṭomaḥ . rājasūyaḥ vājapeyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:17790: 711 kratugrahaṇam kimartham . yajñebhyaḥ iti iyati ucyamāne ye eva sañjñībhūtakāḥ yajñāḥ tataḥ utpattiḥ syāt :

GS24pmbhasuu:18114: śāktīkaḥ yāṣṭīkaḥ iti . śaktiyaṣṭyoḥ īkāraḥ ante kaśabdaḥ ca pratyayaḥ . na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:18115: . vibhāṣā ca eva hi śaktiyaṣṭyoḥ īkāraḥ api ca ke aṇaḥ iti hrasvatvam prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:18116: . evam tarhi ikak ucyate . kā rūpasiddhiḥ . śāktīkaḥ yāṣṭīkaḥ iti . savarṇadīrghatvena
GS24pmbhasuu:18117: siddham . na sidhyati . yasya iti ca lopaḥ prāpnoti . ikāroccāraṇasāmārthyāt na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:18118: . yadi tarhi prāpnuvan vidhiḥ uccāraṇasāmarthyāt bādhyate savarṇadīrghatvam api na
GS24pmbhasuu:18119: prāpnoti . yam vidhim prati upadeśaḥ anarthakaḥ saḥ vidhiḥ bādhyate . yasya tu vidheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18120: nimittam eva na asau bādhyate . yasya iti lopam ca prati ikāroccāraṇam anarthakam
GS24pmbhasuu:18123: 749 kim yasya asti matiḥ saḥ āstikaḥ . kim ca ataḥ . caure api prāpnoti . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:18124: itilopaḥ atra draṣṭavyaḥ . asti iti asya matiḥ āstikaḥ . na asti iti asya matiḥ nāstikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18127: 749 kim yasya chatradhāraṇam śīlam saḥ chātraḥ . kim ca ataḥ . rājapuruṣe prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:18128: . evam tarhi uttarapadalopaḥ atra draṣṭavyaḥ. chatram iva chatram . guruḥ chatram
GS24pmbhasuu:18129: . guruṇā śiṣyaḥ chatravat chādyaḥ śiṣyeṇa ca guruḥ chatravat paripālyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:18131: 750 hitam bhakṣāḥ iti caturthīnirdeśaḥ . hitam bhakṣāḥ iti caturthīnirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18132: . itarathā hi anirdeśaḥ . itarathā hi nirdeśaḥ na bhavati . hitaśabdena ca yoge caturthī
GS24pmbhasuu:18133: vidhīyate . sā prāpnoti . saḥ tarhi caturthīnirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:18134: vakṣyāmi . hitam bhakṣāḥ tasmai . tataḥ dīyate niyuktam . tat asmai iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:18137: . vahat iti abhidhāne rathaśakaṭahalasīrebhyaḥ pratyayavidhānam anarthakam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:18138: kāraṇam . vihitatvāt . vihitaḥ atra pratyayaḥ tasya idam iti . śabdabhedāt avidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:18139: . śabdabhedāt avidhiḥ saḥ bhavati . anyaḥ hi śabdaḥ ratham vahati anyaḥ hi rathasya
GS24pmbhasuu:18140: voḍhā iti . śabdabhedāt avidhānam iti cet arthāśrayatvāt pratyayavidhānasya arthasāmānyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:18141: siddham . śabdabhedāt avidhānam iti cet arthāśrayaḥ pratyayavidhiḥ . saḥ eva artha
GS24pmbhasuu:18142: ratham vahati saḥ eva rathasya voḍhā iti . tatra arthasāmānyāt siddham . idam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:18143: prayojanam . yaḥ dvau rathau vahati saḥ dvirathyaḥ . yaḥ dvayoḥ rathayoḥ voḍhā saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18144: dvirathaḥ . tena sati luk bhavati . anena sati kasmāt na bhavati . prāk dīvyataḥ iti ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:18146: 751-752 kim nipātyate . jananyāḥ janībhāvaḥ nipātyate yat ca pratyayaḥ . janyāḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:18147: nipātanānarthakyam pañcamīnirdeśāt . janyāḥ iti nipātanam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:18148: . pañcamīnirdeśāt . jananīśabdāt eṣā pañcamī . idam tarhi prayojanam . sarvakālaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18149: pratyayavidhiḥ yathā vijñāyeta . janīm vahanti janyāḥ . janīm voḍhāraḥ janyāḥ . janīm
GS24pmbhasuu:18152: 752 vidhyati akaraṇena . vidhyati akaraṇena iti vaktavyam . itarathā ha atiprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18153: . adhanuṣā iti ucyamāne atriprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . iha api prasajyeta . śarkarābhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18154: vidhyati . kaṇṭakaiḥ vidhyati iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . kasmāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:18155: bhavati śarkarābhiḥ vidhyati kaṇṭakaiḥ vidhyati iti . anabhidhānāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:18157: 752-753 gṛhapatinā saṃyukte iti ucyate . tatra dakṣiṇāgnau api prāpnoti . dakṣiṇāgniḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18158: api gṛhapatinā saṃyujyate . evam tarhi gṛhapatinā saṃyukte iti ucyate sarvaḥ ca gṛhapatinā
GS24pmbhasuu:18160: sādhīyaḥ yaḥ gṛhapatinā saṃyuktaḥ iti . kaḥ ca sādhīyaḥ . yasmin patnīsaṃyājyāḥ kriyante . atha vā gṛhapatiḥ nāma mantraḥ . saḥ yasmin ucyate . atha vā sañjñāyām iti vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:18162: 753 māsatanvoḥ anantarārthe vā . māsatanvoḥ anantarārthe vā iti vaktavyam . madhu
GS24pmbhasuu:18163: asmin asiti madhu anantaram vā madhavyaḥ mādhavaḥ . lugakārekārarephāḥ ca . lugakārekārarephāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18164: ca pratyayāḥ vaktavyāḥ . luk madhuḥ tapaḥ nabhaḥ . akāraḥ iṣaḥ ūrjaḥ . ikāraḥ śuciḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18167: 753-754 akṣarasamūhe chandasaḥ upasaṅkhyānam . akṣarasamūhe chandasaḥ upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:18168: kartavyam . o śrāvaya iti caturakṣaram . astu śrauṣaṭ iti caturakṣaram . ye yajāmahe
GS24pmbhasuu:18169: iti pañcākṣaram . yaja iti dvyakṣaram . dvyakṣaraḥ vaṣaṭkāraḥ . eṣaḥ vai saptadaśākṣaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18170: chandasyaḥ prajñāpatiḥ yajñam anu vihitaḥ . chandasi bahubhirvasavyairupasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:18171: . chandasi bahubhirvasavyairupasaṅkhyānam . hastau pṛṇasva bahuviḥ vasavyaiḥ . agnirīśevasavyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:18172: . agnirīśevasavyasya upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . tat tarhi upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:18173: . na kartavyam . svārthavijñānāt siddham . svārthavijñānāt siddham etat . vasavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18175: (P_5,1.1) KA_II.336.2-23 Ro_IV.3-6 prāgvacanam kimartham . prāgvacane uktam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:18176: uktam . tatra tāvat uktam prāgvacanam sakṛdvidhānārtham . adhikārāt siddham iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:18177: apavādaviṣaye aṇprasaṅgaḥ iti . iha api prāgvacanam kriyate sakṛdvidhānārtham . sakṛt
GS24pmbhasuu:18178: vihitaḥ pratyayaḥ vihitaḥ yathā syāt . yoge yoge tasya grahaṇam mā kārṣam iti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:18179: etat asti prayojanam . adhikārāt api etat siddham . adhikāraḥ pratiyogam tasya anirdeśārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18180: iti yoge yoge upatiṣṭhate . adhikārāt siddham iti cet apavādaviṣaye chaprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18181: . adhikārāt siddham iti cet apavādaviṣaye chaḥ prāpnoti . ugavādibhyaḥ yat chaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:18182: iti chaḥ api prāpnoti . tasmāt prāgvacanam kartavyam . atha kriymāṇe api prāgvacane
GS24pmbhasuu:18183: katham idam vijñāyate . prāk krītāt yāḥ prakṛtayaḥ āhosvit prāk krītāt ye arthāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18184: iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate prāk krītāt yāḥ prakṛtayaḥ iti saḥ eva doṣaḥ apavādaviṣaye
GS24pmbhasuu:18185: api chaprasaṅgaḥ iti . atha vijñāyate prāk krītāt ye arthāḥ iti na doṣaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:18186: . samāne arthe prakṛtiviśeṣāt utpadyamānaḥ yat cham bādhiṣyate . yathā na doṣaḥ tathā
GS24pmbhasuu:18187: astu. prāk krītāt ye arthāḥ iti vijñāyate . kutaḥ etat . tathā hi ayam prādhānyena
GS24pmbhasuu:18188: artham pratinirdiśati . itarathā hi bahvyaḥ tatra prakṛtayaḥ paṭhyante . tataḥ yām
GS24pmbhasuu:18189: kām cit evam prakṛtim avadhitvena upādadīta . atha vā punaḥ astu prāk krītāt yāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18190: prakṛtayaḥ iti . nanu ca uktam apavādaviṣaye api chaprasaṅgaḥ iti . na vā kva cit
GS24pmbhasuu:18191: vāvacanāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . kva cit vāvacanāt . yat ayam kvac vāvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:18192: karoti vibhāṣā havirapūpādibhyaḥ iti tat jñāpayati na apavādaviṣaye chaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:18193: iti . yadi evam na arthaḥ prāgvacanena . adhikārāt siddham . nanu ca uktam adhikārāt
GS24pmbhasuu:18194: siddham iti cet apavādaviṣaye chaprasaṅgaḥ iti . parihṛtam etat ṇa vā kva cit vāvacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:18195: iti . atha kimartham iyān avadhiḥ gṛhyate na prāk ṭhañaḥ iti eva ucyeta . etat jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:18196: ācāryaḥ artheṣu ayam bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . samāne arthe prakṛtiviśeṣāt
GS24pmbhasuu:18198: (P_5,1.2.1) KA_II.337.2-21 Ro_IV.6-7 yaññyau añaḥ pūrvavipratiṣiddham sanaṅgūpānahau
GS24pmbhasuu:18199: prayojanam . yaññyau bhavataḥ añaḥ pūrvavipratiṣedhena . kim prayojanam ṣanaṅgūpānahau
GS24pmbhasuu:18200: prayojanam . yataḥ avakāśaḥ śaṅkavyam dāru picavyaḥ kārpāsaḥ . añaḥ avakāśaḥ vārdhram
GS24pmbhasuu:18201: vāratram . sanaṅguḥ nāma carmavikāraḥ . tasmāt ubhayam prāpnoti . sanaṅgavyam carma
GS24pmbhasuu:18202: . ñyasya avakāśaḥ aupānahyam dāru . añaḥ saḥ eva . upānat nāma carmavikāraḥ . tasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:18203: ubhayam prāpnoti . aupānahyam carma . ḍhañ ca . ḍhañ ca bhavati añaḥ pūrvavipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:18204: . ḍhañaḥ avakāśaḥ chādiṣeyam tṛṇam . añaḥ saḥ eva . chadiḥ nām carmavikāraḥ . tasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:18205: ubhayam prāpnoti . chādiṣeyam carma . ḍhañ bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena . havirapūpādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18206: vibhāṣāyāḥ yat . havirapūpādibhyaḥ vibhāṣāyāḥ yat bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena . havirapūpādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18207: vibhāṣāyāḥ avakāśaḥ āmikṣyam āmikṣīyam puroḍāśyam puroḍāśīyam . yataḥ saḥ eva . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:18208: ubhayam prāpnoti . caravyāḥ taṇḍulāḥ . yat bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena . annavikārebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18209: ca . annavikārebhyaḥ ca vibhāṣāyāḥ yat bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena . annavikārebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18210: ca vibhāṣāyāḥ avakāśaḥ suryāḥ surīyāḥ . yataḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . saktavyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18211: dhānāḥ iti . yat bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena . saḥ tarhi pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18212: . na vaktavyaḥ . iṣṭavācī paraśabdaḥ . vipratiṣedhe param yat iṣṭam tat bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:18213: (P_5,1.2.2) KA_II.337.22-338.15 Ro_IV.7-10 ayam nābhiśabdaḥ gavādiṣu paṭhyate. tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:18214: eva ucyate nābhi nabham ca iti . tatra codyate . nābheḥ nabhabhāve pratyayānupapattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18215: prakṛtyabhāvāt . nābheḥ nabhabhāve pratyayānupapattiḥ . kim kāraṇam . prakṛtyabhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:18216: . vikṛteḥ prakṛtau abhidheyāyām pratyayena bhavitavyam na ca nābhisañjñikāyāḥ vikṛteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18217: prakṛtiḥ asti . yat eva hi tanmaṇḍalacakrāṇām maṇḍalacakram tat nabhyam iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:18218: . siddham tu śākhādiṣu vacanāt hrasvatvam ca . siddham etat . katham . śākhādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:18219: nābhiśabdaḥ paṭhitavyaḥ hrasvatvam ca vaktavyam . nābhiḥ iva nabhyam iti . kaḥ punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18220: iha upamārthaḥ . yat tat akṣadhāraṇam parivartanam vā . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:18221: yat tat añjanopāñjanam iti . na tarhi idānīm idam vaktavyam nābhi nabham ca iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:18222: vaktavyam ca . kim prayojanam . yāni etāni aravanti cakrāṇi tadartham . tatra nābhisañjñikāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18223: vikṛteḥ prakṛtiḥ asti . yāni ca api anaravanti cakrāṇi tadartham api idam vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:18224: . dṛśyate hi samudāyāt avayavasya pṛthaktvam . tat yathā vārkṣī śākhā iti . guṇāntarayogāt
GS24pmbhasuu:18225: ca vikāraśabdaḥ dṛśyate . tat yathā vaibhītakaḥ yūpaḥ khādiram caṣālam iti . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:18226: avayavasamudāye vṛttiḥ bhaviṣyati . atha yaḥ nabhyārthaḥ vṛkṣaḥ katham tatra bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:18227: . nabhyaḥ vṛkṣaḥ nabhyā śiṃśipā iti . nabhyāt tu lugvacanam . nabhyāt tu luk vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18228: . saḥ tarhi vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . tādarthyāt tācchabdyam bhaviṣyati . nabhyārthaḥ nabhyaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:18229: (P_5,1.3) KA_II.338.17-21 Ro_IV.10 ayam yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum . katham aśītiśatam
GS24pmbhasuu:18230: kambalyam iti . nipātanāt etat siddham . kim nipātanam . aparimāṇavistācitakambalebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18231: na taddhitaluki iti . idam tarhi prayojanam sañjñāyām iti vakṣyāmi iti . iha mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:18232: . kambalīyāḥ ūrṇāḥ . etat api na asti prayojanam . parimāṇaparyudāsena paryudāse
GS24pmbhasuu:18233: prāpte tatra kambalagrahaṇam kriyate parimāṇārtham parimāṇam ca sañjñā eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:18234: (P_5,1.4) KA_II.338.23-339.2 Ro_IV.10-11 kim iyam prāpte vibhāṣā āhosvit aprāpte
GS24pmbhasuu:18235: . katham ca prāpte katham vā aprāpte . uvarṇāntāt iti vā nitye prāpte anyatra vā
GS24pmbhasuu:18236: aprāpte . havirapūpādibhyaḥ aprāpte . havirapūpādibhyaḥ aprāpte vibhāṣā . prāpte
GS24pmbhasuu:18238: (P_5,1.6) KA_II.339.4-5 Ro_IV.11 yatprakaraṇe rathāt ca . yatprakaraṇe rathāt ca upasaṅkhyānam . rathāya hitā rathyā .
GS24pmbhasuu:18239: (P_5,1.7) KA_II.339.7-18 Ro_IV.11-12 vṛṣaśabdaḥ ayam akārāntaḥ gṛhyate . vṛṣanśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18240: api nakārāntaḥ asti . tasya upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam vṛṣaśabdaḥ ca ādeśaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18241: vṛṣṇe hitam iti vigṛhya vṛṣyam iti eva yathā syāt . tathā brahmanśabdaḥ nakārāntaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18242: gṛhyate . brāhmaṇaśabdaḥ ca akārāntaḥ asti . tasya upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam brahmanśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18243: ca ādeśaḥ vaktavyaḥ brāhmaṇebhyaḥ hitam iti vigṛhya brahmaṇyam iti eva yathā syāt
