GS24pmbhasuu:18244: . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . samānārthau etau vṛṣaśabdaḥ vṛṣanśabdaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:18245: brahmanśabdaḥ brāhmaṇaśabdaḥ ca . ātaḥ ca samānārthau . evam hi āha . kutaḥ nu carasi
GS24pmbhasuu:18246: brahman . kutaḥ nu carasi brāhmaṇa iti . tatra dvayoḥ śabdayoḥ samānārthayoḥ ekena
GS24pmbhasuu:18247: vigrahaḥ aparasmāt utpattiḥ bhaviṣyati aviravikanyāyena . tat yathā . aveḥ māṃsam
GS24pmbhasuu:18248: iti vigṛhya avikaśabdāt utpattiḥ bhavati āvikam iti . evam iha api vṛṣāya hitam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:18249: vigṛhya vṛṣyam iti bhaviṣyati . vṛṣṇe hitam iti vigṛhya vākyam eva . tathā brahmaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:18250: hitam iti vigṛhya brahmaṇyam iti bhaviṣyati . brāhmaṇebhyaḥ hitam iti vigṛhya vākyam
GS24pmbhasuu:18251: eva bhaviṣyati . traiśabdyam ca iha sādhyam . tat ca evam sati siddham bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:18253: pūrvapadārthahitatvāt . bhogottarapadāt khavidhāne anirdeśaḥ . agamakaḥ nirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18254: anirdeśaḥ . kim kāraṇam . pūrvapadārthahitatvāt . uttarapadārthapradhānaḥ tatpuruṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18255: pūrvapadārthapradhāne ca pratyayaḥ iṣyate . pitṛbhogāya hite prāpnoti pitre ca eva
GS24pmbhasuu:18256: hite iṣyate . evam tarhi bhogīnarpratyayaḥ vijñāsyate . bhogīnar iti cet vāvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:18257: . bhogīnar iti yadi pratyayaḥ vidhīyate vāvacanam kartavyam mātrīyaḥ pitrīyaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:18258: api yathā syāt . rājācāryābhyām nityam . rājācāryābhyām nityam iti vaktavyam . rājabhogīnaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18259: . ācāryāt aṇatvam ca . ācāryabhogīnaḥ . kim bhogīnarpratyayaḥ vidhīyate iti ataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18260: rājācāryābhyām nityam iti vaktavyam . na iti āha . sarvathā rājācāryābhyām nityam
GS24pmbhasuu:18261: iti vaktavyam . iha ca grāmaṇibhogīnaḥ senānibhogīnaḥ iti uttarapade iti hrasvatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:18262: na prāpnoti . iha ca abbhoginaḥ iti apaḥ bhi iti tatvam prāpnoti . sūtram ca bhidyate
GS24pmbhasuu:18263: . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam bhogottarapadāt khavidhāne anirdeśaḥ pūrvapadārthahitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:18264: iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ayam bhogaśabdaḥ asti eva dravyapadārthakaḥ . tat yathā bhogavān
GS24pmbhasuu:18265: ayam deśaḥ iti ucyate yasmin gāvaḥ sasnāni ca vartante . asti kriyāpadārthakaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:18266: tat yathā bhogavān ayam brāhmaṇaḥ iti ucyate yaḥ samyak snānādīḥ kriyāḥ anubhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:18267: . tat yaḥ kriyāpadārthakaḥ tasya ayam grahaṇam . yaḥ ca pitṛsthābhyaḥ kriyābhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18268: hitaḥ sambandhāt asau pitre api hitaḥ bhavati . yadi sambandhāt astu dravyapadārthakasya
GS24pmbhasuu:18269: api grahaṇam . yaḥ api hi pitṛdravyāya hitaḥ sambandhāt asau pitre hitaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:18270: . atha vā bhogaśabdaḥ śarīravācī api drśyate . tat yathā ahiḥ iva bhogaiḥ paryeti
GS24pmbhasuu:18271: bāhum iti. ahiḥ iva śarīraiḥ iti gamyate . evam pitṛśarīrāya hitaḥ pitṛbhogīṇaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:18273: khavidhāne pañcajanāt upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . pañcajanāya hitaḥ pañcajanīnaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:18274: samānādhikaraṇe iti vaktavyam . yaḥ hi pañcānām janāya hitaḥ pañcajanīyaḥ saḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:18275: . sarvajanāt ṭhañ ca . sarvajanāt ṭhañ vaktavyaḥ khaḥ ca . sarvajanāya hitaḥ sārvajanikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18276: sārvajanīnaḥ . samānādhikaraṇe iti ca vaktavyam . yaḥ hi sarveṣām janāya hitaḥ sarvajanīyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18277: saḥ . mahājanāt nityam . mahājanāt nityam ṭhañ vaktavyaḥ . mahājanāya hitaḥ māhājanikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18278: . tatpuruṣe iti vaktavyam bahuvrīhau mā bhūt iti . mahān janaḥ asya mahājanaḥ mahājanāya
GS24pmbhasuu:18279: hitaḥ mahājanīyaḥ . yadi tarhi atiprasaṅgāḥ santi iti upādhiḥ kriyate ādyanyāse api
GS24pmbhasuu:18280: upādhiḥ kartavyaḥ . ātmanviśvajane samānādhikaraṇe iti vaktavyam . yaḥ his viśveṣām
GS24pmbhasuu:18281: janāya hitaḥ viśvajanīyaḥ saḥ bhavati . atha matam etat anabhidhānāt ādyanyāse na
GS24pmbhasuu:18282: bhaviṣyati iti iha api na arthaḥ upādhigrahaṇena . iha api anabhidhānāt na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:18283: (P_5,1.10) KA_II.341.8-13 Ro_IV. 15-16 sarvāt ṇasya vāvacanam . sarvāt ṇasya vā iti vaktavyam . sārvaḥ sarvīyaḥ . puruṣāt vadhe . puruṣāt vadhe iti vaktavyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:18285: puruṣāt vadhe iti . puruṣāt vadhavikārasamūhatenakṛteṣu iti vaktavyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:18290: (P_5,1.12) KA_II.341.15-20 Ro_IV.16 tadartham iti kṛtyanāmabhyaḥ ṭhañ . tadartham
GS24pmbhasuu:18291: iti kṛtyanāmabhyaḥ ṭhañ vaktavyaḥ . indramahārtham aindramahiham gāṅgāmahiham kāśeruyajñikam
GS24pmbhasuu:18292: . na vā prayojanena kṛtatvāt . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam . prayojanena kṛtatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:18293: . yat hi indramahārtham indramahaḥ tasya prayojanam bhavati . tatra prayojanam iti eva siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:18295: upadhyartham iti pratyayasya iha anupapattiḥ . kim kāraṇam . upadhyabhāvāt . vikṛteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18296: prakṛtau abhidheyāyām pratyayena bhavitavyam . na ca upadhisañjñikāyāḥ vikṛteḥ prakṛtiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18297: asti . yat hi tat rathāṅgam tat aupadheyam iti ucyate . siddham tu kṛdantasya svārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:18298: añvacanāt . siddham etat . katham . kṛdantasya svārthe añ vaktavyaḥ . upadhīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:18299: upadheyam . upadheyam eva aupadheyam . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam
GS24pmbhasuu:18300: eva astu . nanu ca uktam upadhyartham iti pratyayānupapattiḥ iti . na etat asti .
GS24pmbhasuu:18301: ayam upadhiśabdaḥ asti eva karmasādhanaḥ . upadhīyate upadhiḥ iti . asti bhāvasādhanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18302: . upadhānam upadhiḥ iti . tat yaḥ bhāvasādhanaḥ tasya idam grahaṇam . evam api na
GS24pmbhasuu:18303: sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . vikṛteḥ prakṛtau iti vartate . prakṛtivikṛtigrahaṇam nivartiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:18304: . tat ca avaśyam nivartyam ihārtham uttarātham ca . ihārtham tāvat . bāleyāḥ taṇḍulāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18305: . uttarārtham ṛṣabhopānahoḥ ñyaḥ . ārṣabhyaḥ vatsaḥ iti . atha tadartham iti anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:18306: utāho na . kim ca arthaḥ anuvṛttyā . bāḍham arthaḥ . tat asya tat asmin syāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:18307: tadarthe yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt . prāsādaḥ devadattasya syāt iti . prākāraḥ nagarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:18308: syāt iti . yadi tadartham iti anuvartate ṛṣabhopānahoḥ ñyaḥ ṛṣabhārthaḥ ghāsaḥ upānadarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18309: tilakalkaḥ iti atra api prāpnoti . evam tarhi anuvartate prakṛtivikṛtigrahaṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:18310: nanu ca uktam balyṛṣabhayoḥ na sidhyati iti . kim punaḥ bhavān vikāram matvā āha
GS24pmbhasuu:18311: balyṛṣabhayoḥ na sidhyati iti . yadi tāvat yaḥ prakṛtyupamardena bhavati saḥ vikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18312: vaibhītakaḥ yūpaḥ khādiram caṣālam iti na sidhyati . atha matam etat eva guṇāntarayuktam
GS24pmbhasuu:18313: vikāraḥ iti balyṛṣabhayoḥ api siddham bhavati . guṇantarayuktāḥ hi taṇḍulāḥ bāleyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18314: guṇāntarayuktaḥ ca vatsaḥ ārṣabhaḥ . aupadheyam tu na sidhyati . vacanāt svārthikaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:18315: (P_5,1.16) KA_II.342.22-343.6 Ro_IV.19-21 syādgrahaṇam kimartham . iha mā bhūt .
GS24pmbhasuu:18316: prāsādaḥ devadattasya prākāraḥ nagarasya iti . atha kriyamāṇe api syādgrahaṇe iha
GS24pmbhasuu:18317: kasmāt na bhavati . prāsādaḥ devadattasya syāt . prākāraḥ nagarasya syāt iti . śakyārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:18318: liṅ iti vaktavyam . na evam śakyam . idānīm eva hi uktam na hi upādheḥ upādhiḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:18319: viśeṣaṇasya vā viśeṣaṇam iti . evam tarhi itikaraṇaḥ kriyate . tataḥ cet vivakṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:18320: bhavati . vivakṣā ca dvayī . asti eva prāyoktrī vivakṣā asti laukikī . prayoktā hi
GS24pmbhasuu:18321: mṛdvyā snigdhayā ślakṣṇayā jihvayā mṛdūn snigdhān ślakṣṇān śabdān prayuṅkte . laukikī
GS24pmbhasuu:18322: vivakṣā yatra prāyasya sampratyayaḥ . prāyaḥ iti lokaḥ vyapadiśyate . na ca prāsādaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18323: devadattasya syāt prākāraḥ nagarasya syāt iti atra utpadyamānena pratyayena prāyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:18324: sampratyayaḥ syāt . yadi evam na arthaḥ syādgrahaṇena . na hi prāsādaḥ devadattasya
GS24pmbhasuu:18325: syāt prākāraḥ nagarasya syāt iti atra utpadyamānena pratyayena prāyasya sampratyayaḥ syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:18326: (P_5,1.19.1) KA_II.343.8-344.10 Ro_IV.22-25 kimartham saṅkhyāyāḥ pṛthaggrahaṇam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:18327: na saṅkhyā api parimāṇam eva tatra parimāṇaparyudāsena paryudāsaḥ bhaviṣyati . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:18328: tarhi siddhe sati yat saṅkhyayāḥ pṛthaggrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ anyā
GS24pmbhasuu:18329: saṅkhyā anyat parimāṇam iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . aparimāṇabistācitakambaelbhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18330: na taddhitaluki iti dvābhyām śatābhyām krītā dviśatā triśatā parimāṇaparyudāsena
GS24pmbhasuu:18331: na bhavati iti . yadi etat jñāpyate tat asya parimāṇam saṅkhyāyāḥ sañjñāsaṅghasūtrādhyayaneṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:18332: iti viśeṣaṇam na prakalpate parimāṇam yā saṅkhyā iti . iha ca krītavat parimāṇat
GS24pmbhasuu:18333: iti saṅkhyāvihitasya pratyayasya atideśaḥ na prakalpate . śatasya vikāraḥ śatyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18334: śatikaḥ . sāhasraḥ iti . yat tāvat ucyate tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ anyā saṅkhyā anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:18335: parimāṇam iti . nyāyasiddham eva etat . bhedamātram saṅkhyā āha . yat ca iṣīkāntam
GS24pmbhasuu:18336: yat ca aparimāṇam sarvasya saṅkhyā bhedamātram bravīti . parimāṇam tu sarvataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:18337: sarvataḥ mānam iti ca ataḥ parimāṇam iti . prasthasya ca samānākṛteḥ na kutaḥ cit
GS24pmbhasuu:18338: viśeṣaḥ gamyate na ca unmānataḥ na parimāṇataḥ na pramāṇataḥ . kim punaḥ unmānam
GS24pmbhasuu:18339: kim parimāṇam kim pramāṇam . ūrdhvamānam kila unmānam . ūrdhvam yat mīyate tat unmānam
GS24pmbhasuu:18340: . parimāṇam tu sarvataḥ . sarvataḥ mānam iti ca ataḥ parimāṇam . kuta etat . pariḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18341: sarvatobhāve vartate . āyāmaḥ tu pramāṇam syāt . āyāmavivakṣāyām pramāṇam iti etat
GS24pmbhasuu:18342: bhavati . saṅkhyā bāhyā tu sarvataḥ . ātaḥ ca sarvataḥ saṅkhyā bāhyā . bhedabhāvam
GS24pmbhasuu:18343: bravīti eṣā na eṣā mānam kutaḥ cana . evam ca kṛtvā saṅkhyāyāḥ pṛthaggrahaṇam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:18344: . yat api ucyate tat asya parimāṇam saṅkhyāyāḥ sañjñāsaṅghasūtrādhyayaneṣu iti viśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:18345: na prakalpate iti . āha ayam parimāṇam yā saṅkhyā iti . na ca asti saṅkhyā parimāṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:18346: . tatra vacanāt iyatī vivakṣā bhaviṣyati . yad api ucyate krītavat parimāṇat iti
GS24pmbhasuu:18347: saṅkhyāvihitasya pratyayasya atideśaḥ na prakalpate iti . saṅkhyāyāḥ iti ca tatra vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:18348: (P_5,1.19.2) KA_II.344.11-345.7 Ro_IV.25-27 kim punaḥ ime ṭhagādayaḥ prāk arhāt bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:18349: āhosvit saha arheṇa . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . ṭhagādayaḥ prāk arhāt cet arhe tadvidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18350: . ṭhagādayaḥ prāk arhāt cet arhe tadvidhiḥ . arhe ṭhagādayaḥ vidheyāḥ . śatam arhati
GS24pmbhasuu:18351: śatyaḥ śatikaḥ . sāharaḥ iti . vasne vasanāt siddham . iha yaḥ śatam arhati śatam
GS24pmbhasuu:18352: tasya vasnaḥ bhavati . tatra saḥ asya aṃśavasnabhṛtayaḥ iti eva siddham . vasne vacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:18353: siddham iti cet māṃsaudanikādiṣu aprāptiḥ . vasne vacanāt siddham iti cet māṃsaudanikādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:18354: aprāptiḥ . māṃsaudanikaḥ atithiḥ śvaitacchatrikaḥ kālāyasūpikaḥ . tathā guṇānām paripraśnaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18355: bhavati . kim ayam brāhmaṇaḥ arhati . śatam arhati śatyaḥ śatikaḥ sāhasraḥ naiṣkikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18356: iti na sidhyati . santu tarhi sahārheṇa . ā arhāt cet bhojanādiṣu atrprasaṅgaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:18357: ā arhāt cet bhojanādiṣu atrprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . bhojanam arhati . pānam arhati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:18358: . kim ucyate bhojanādiṣu atrprasaṅgaḥ iti yadā chedādibhyaḥ iti ucyate . avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:18359: māṃsaudanikādyartham yogavibhāgaḥ kartavyaḥ . tat arhati . tataḥ chedādibhyaḥ nityam
GS24pmbhasuu:18360: iti . tasmin kriyamāṇe bhojanādiṣu atrprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . uktam vā . kim uktam .
GS24pmbhasuu:18361: anabhidhānāt iti . anabhidhānāt bhojanādiṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ na bhavati [R:
GS24pmbhasuu:18362: bhaviṣyati] . atha vā yogavibhāgaḥ na kariṣyate . katham māṃsaudanikaḥ atithiḥ śvaitacchatrikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18363: kālāyasūpikaḥ . asmin dīyate asmai iti ca evam etat siddham . atha vā punaḥ astu
GS24pmbhasuu:18364: prāk arhāt . nanu ca uktam ṭhagādayaḥ prāk arhāt cet arhe tadvidhiḥ iti . parihṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:18365: etat vasne vacanāt siddham iti . nanu ca uktam vasne vacanāt siddham iti cet māṃsaudanikādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:18366: aprāptiḥ . māṃsaudanikaḥ atithiḥ śvaitacchatrikaḥ kālāyasūpikaḥ . tathā guṇānām paripraśnaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18367: bhavati . kim ayam brāhmaṇaḥ arhati . śatam arhati śatyaḥ śatikaḥ sāhasraḥ naiṣkikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18368: iti na sidhyati . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . asmin dīyate asmai iti ca evam etat siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:18369: (P_5,1.20.1) KA_II.345.9-25 Ro_IV. 27-29 asamāse iti kimartham . paramaniṣkeṇa krītam
GS24pmbhasuu:18370: paramanaiṣkikam . na etat asti . niṣkaśabdāt pratyayaḥ vidhīyate . tatra kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18371: yat paramaniṣkaśabdāt syāt . na eva prāpnoti na arthaḥ pratiṣedhena . tadantavidhinā
GS24pmbhasuu:18372: prāpnoti . grahaṇavatā prātipadikena tadantividhiḥ pratiṣidhyate . niṣkādiṣu asamāsagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:18373: jñāpakam pūrvatra tadantāpratiṣedhasya . niṣkādiṣu asamāsagrahaṇam kriyate jñāpakārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:18374: . kim jñāpyam . pūrvatra tadantvidheḥ pratiṣedhaḥ na bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane
GS24pmbhasuu:18375: prayojanam . prāk vateḥ ṭhañ iti atra tadantavidhiḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:18376: prayojanam . grahaṇavatā prātipadikena tadantividhiḥ pratiṣidhyate . na ca ṭhañvidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:18377: kā cit prakṛtiḥ gṛhyate . idam tarhi prayojanam . ā arhāt agopucchasaṅkhyāparimāṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:18378: ṭhak . paramagopucchena krītam pāramagopucchikam . atra tadantavidhiḥ siddhaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:18379: . etat api na asti prayojanam . vidhau pratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ ca ayam . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:18380: jñāpayati ācāryaḥ itaḥ uttaram tadantavidheḥ pratiṣedhaḥ na bhavati iti . kim etasya
GS24pmbhasuu:18381: jñāpane prayojanam . pāryāṇaturāyaṇacāndrāyaṇam vartayati dvaipārāyaṇikaḥ traipārāyaṇikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18382: . atra tadantavidhiḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam . vakṣyati etat
GS24pmbhasuu:18383: . prāk vateḥ saṅkhyāpūrvapadānām tadantagrahaṇam aluki . pūrvatra eva tarhi prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:18384: . khalayavamāṣatilavṛṣabrahmaṇaḥ ca iti . kṛṣṇatilebhyaḥ hitaḥ kṛṣṇatilyaḥ . rājamāṣebhyaḥ hitam rājamāṣyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:18385: (P_5,1.20.2) KA_II.346.1-4 Ro_IV.29-30 prāk vateḥ saṅkhyāpūrvapadānām tadantagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:18386: aluki . prāk vateḥ saṅkhyāpūrvapadānām tadantagrahaṇam aluki kartavyam . pāryāṇaturāyaṇacāndrāyaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:18387: vartayati dvaipārāyaṇikaḥ traipārāyaṇikaḥ . aluki iti kimartham . dvābhyām śūrpābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:18388: krītam dviśūrpam . triśūrpam . dviśūrpeṇa krītam dvaiśaurpikam . traiśaurpikam .
GS24pmbhasuu:18389: (P_5,1.21) KA_II.346.6-8 Ro_IV.30-31 śatapratiṣedhe anyaśatatve apratiṣedhaḥ . śatapratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:18390: anyaśatatve pratiṣedhaḥ na bhavati iti vaktavyam. iha mā bhūt . śatena krītam śatyam
GS24pmbhasuu:18391: śāṭakaśatam iti . anyaśatatve iti kim . śatakam nidānam .
GS24pmbhasuu:18392: (P_5,1.22) KA_II.346.10-18 Ro_IV.31-32 ḍateḥ ca iti vaktavyam iha api yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:18393: . katibhiḥ krītam katikam . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . tyantāyāḥ na iti pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18394: prāpnoti . tipratiṣedhāt ḍatigrahaṇam iti cet arthavadgrahaṇāt siddham . arthavataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18395: tiśabdasya grahaṇam na ca ḍateḥ tiśabdaḥ arthavān . na eṣā paribhāṣā iha śakyā vijñātum
GS24pmbhasuu:18396: . na hi kevalena pratyayena arthaḥ gamyate . kena tarhi . saprakṛtikena . kva tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:18397: eṣā paribhāṣā bhavati . yāni etāni śabdasaṅghātagrahaṇāni . tat tarhi vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:18398: na vaktavyam . arthavadgrahaṇāt siddham . nanu ca uktam na eṣā paribhāṣā iha śakyā
GS24pmbhasuu:18399: vijñātum . na hi kevalena pratyayena arthaḥ gamyate iti . kevalena api pratyayena
GS24pmbhasuu:18401: (P_5,1.23) KA_II.346.20-347.8 Ro_IV.32-33 kasya ayam iṭ vidhīyate . kanaḥ iti āha
GS24pmbhasuu:18402: . tat kanaḥ grahaṇam kartavyam . akriyamāṇe hi kanaḥ grahaṇe pratyayādhikārāt pratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18403: ayam vijñāyeta . ṭitkaraṇasāmarthyāt ādiḥ bhaviṣyati . asti anyat ṭitkaraṇe prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:18404: . ṭitaḥ iti īkāraḥ yathā syāt . akārāntaprakaraṇe īkāraḥ na ca eṣaḥ akārāntaḥ . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:18405: api kutaḥ etat ṭitkaraṇasāmarthyāt ādiḥ bhaviṣyati na punaḥ akārāntaprakaraṇe sati
GS24pmbhasuu:18406: anakārāntāt api īkāraḥ syāt . tasmāt kaṇaḥ grahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . prakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:18407: anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . saṅkhyāyāḥ atiśadantāyāḥ kan iti . tat vai prathamānirdiṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:18408: ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭena ca iha arthaḥ . vatoḥ iti eṣā pañcamī kan iti prathamāyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm
GS24pmbhasuu:18409: prakalpayiṣyati tasmāt iti uttarasya iti . pratyayavidhiḥ ayam . na ca pratyayavidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:18410: pañcamyāḥ prakalpikāḥ bhavanti . na ayam pratyayavidhiḥ . vihitaḥ pratyayaḥ prakṛtaḥ ca anuvartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:18411: (P_5,1.24) KA_II.347.10-14 Ro_IV.33-34 asañjñāyām iti kimartham . triṃśatkaḥ viṃśatkaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18412: . katham ca atra kan bhavati . saṅkhyāyāḥ kan bhavati iti . atiśadantāyāḥ iti pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18413: prāpnoti . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati bhavati atra kan iti yat ayam viṃśatikāt
GS24pmbhasuu:18414: khaḥ iti pratyayāntanipātanam karoti . viṃśateḥ etat jñāpakam syāt . na iti āha .
GS24pmbhasuu:18415: yogāpekṣam jñāpakam . atha vā yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . viṃśatitriṃśabhyām kan bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:18417: (P_5,1.25) KA_II.347.16-20 Ro_IV.34 ṭithan ardhāt ca . ṭithan ardhāt ca iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:18418: . ardhikaḥ ardhikī . kārṣāpaṇāt vā pratiḥ ca . kārṣāpaṇāt ṭiṭhan vaktavyaḥ vā ca
GS24pmbhasuu:18419: pratiḥ ādeśaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kārṣāpaṇikaḥ kārṣāpaṇikī pratikaḥ pratikī .
GS24pmbhasuu:18420: (P_5,1.28) KA_II.347.22-349.4 Ro_IV.35-37 dvigoḥ luki uktam . kim uktam . tatra tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:18421: uktam dvigoḥ luki tannimittagrahaṇam. arthaviśeṣāsampratyaye atannimittāt api iti
GS24pmbhasuu:18422: . iha api dvigoḥ luki tannimittagrahaṇam kartavyam . dvigoḥ nimittam yaḥ taddhitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18423: tasya luk bhavati iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . dvābhyām śūrpābhyām krītam dviśūrpam
GS24pmbhasuu:18424: . triśūrpam . dviśūrpeṇa krītam dvaiśaurpikam . traiśaurpikam . arthaviśeṣāsampratyaye
GS24pmbhasuu:18425: atannimittāt api . arthaviśeṣasya asampratyaye atannimittāt api vaktavyam . kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:18426: . dvayoḥ śūrpayoḥ samāhāraḥ dviśūrpī . dviśūrpyā krītam iti vigṛhya dviśūrpam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:18427: eva yathā syāt . atha kriyamāṇe api tannimittagrahaṇe katham idam vijñāyate . tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:18428: nimittam tannimittam tannimittāt iti āhosvit saḥ nimittam asya saḥ ayam tannimittaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18429: tannimittāt iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate tasya nimittam tannimittam tannimittāt
GS24pmbhasuu:18430: iti kriyamāṇe api tannimittagrahaṇe atra prāpnoti . dvābhyām śūrpābhyām krītam dviśūrpam
GS24pmbhasuu:18431: . triśūrpam . dviśūrpeṇa krītam dvaiśaurpikam . traiśaurpikam . atha vijñāyate saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18432: nimittam asya saḥ ayam tannimittaḥ tannimittāt iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . yatha na doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18433: tathā astu . saḥ nimittam asya saḥ ayam tannimittaḥ tannimittāt iti vijñāyate . kutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18434: etat . yat ayam āha arthaviśeṣāsampratyaye atannimittāt api iti . tat tarhi tannimittagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:18435: kartavyam . na kartavyam . dvigoḥ iti na eṣā pañcamī . kā tarhi . sambandhaṣaṣṭhī
GS24pmbhasuu:18436: . dvigoḥ taddhitasya luk bhavati . kim ca dvigoḥ taddhitaḥ . nimittam . yasmin dviguḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18437: iti etat bhavati . kasmin ca etat bhavati . pratyaye . idam tarhi vaktavyam arthaviśeṣāsampratyaye
GS24pmbhasuu:18438: atannimittāt api iti . etat ca na vaktavyam . iha asmābhiḥ traiśabdyam sādhyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:18439: dvābhyām śūrpābhyām krītam dviśūrpam . triśūrpam . dviśūrpeṇa krītam dvaiśaurpikam
GS24pmbhasuu:18440: . traiśaurpikam iti . tatra dvayoḥ śabdayoḥ samānārthayoḥ ekena vigrahaḥ aparasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:18441: utpattiḥ bhaviṣyati aviravikanyāyena . tat yathā . aveḥ māṃsam iti vigṛhya avikaśabdāt
GS24pmbhasuu:18442: utpattiḥ bhavati . evam iha api dvābhyām śūrpābhyām krītam iti vigṛhya dviśūrpam
GS24pmbhasuu:18443: iti bhaviṣyati . dviśūrpyā krītam iti vigṛhya vākyam eva bhaviṣyati . atha asañjñāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:18444: iti kimartham . pāñcalohitikam pāñcakalāpikam . sañjñāpratiṣedhānarthakyam ca tannimittatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:18445: lopasya . sañjñāpratiṣedhaḥ ca anarthakaḥ . kim kāraṇam . tannimittatvāt lopasya
GS24pmbhasuu:18446: . na antareṇa taddhitam taddhitasya ca lukam dviguḥ sañjñā asti . yaḥ tasmāt utpadyate
GS24pmbhasuu:18447: na asu tannimittam syāt . evam tarhi idam syāt . pañcānām lohitānām samāhāraḥ pañcalohitī
GS24pmbhasuu:18448: pañcalohityā krītam . atra api pañcalohitam iti eva bhavitavyam . katham . uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:18449: hi etat arthaviśeṣāsampratyaye atannimittāt api iti . uktam saṅkhyātve prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:18450: tasmāt iha adhyardhagrahaṇānarthakyam . uktam saṅkhyātve adhyardhagrahaṇasya prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:18451: . kim uktam . adhyardhagrahaṇam ca samāsakanvidhyartham luki ca agrahaṇam iti . tasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:18452: iha adhyardhagrahaṇānarthakyam . tasmāt iha adhyardhagrahaṇam anarthakam . dvigoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18457: (P_5,1.30-31) KA_II.349.12-18 Ro_IV.37-38 dvitribhyām dvaiyogyam . dvitribhyām iti
GS24pmbhasuu:18458: yat ucyate dvaiyogyam etat draṣṭavyam . kim idam dvaiyogyam iti . dvayoḥ yogayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18459: bhavam dviyogam . dviyogasya bhāvaḥ dvaiyogyam iti . dveṣyam vijānīyāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:18460: aviśeṣeṇa itaḥ uttaram dvitribhyām iti . tat ācāryaḥ suhṛt bhūtvā anvācaṣṭe :
GS24pmbhasuu:18461: dvitribhyām dvaiyogyam iti . tatra ca bahugrahaṇam . tatra ca bahugrahaṇam kartavyam . bahuniṣkam bahunaiṣkikam . bahubistam bahubaistikam .
GS24pmbhasuu:18462: (P_5,1.33) KA_II.349.20-350.4 Ro_IV.38 khāryāḥ īkan kevalāyāḥ ca . khāryāḥ īkan kevalāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18463: ca iti vaktavyam . khārīkam . kākiṇyāḥ ca upasaṅkhyānam .kākiṇyāḥ ca upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:18464: kartavyam . adhyardhakākiṇīkam dvikākiṇīkam . kevalāyāḥ ca . kevalāyāḥ ca iti vaktavyam . kākiṇīkam .
GS24pmbhasuu:18465: (P_5,1.35) KA_II.350.6-11 Ro_IV.38-39 śataśāṇābhyām vā . śataśāṇābhyām vā iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:18466: . adhyardhaśatam adhyardhaśatyam pañcaśatam pañcaśatyam adhyardhaśāṇam adhyardhaśāṇyam
GS24pmbhasuu:18467: pañcaśāṇam pañcaśāṇyam . dvitripūrvāt aṇ ca . dvitripūrvāt aṇ ca iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:18468: dviśāṇam triśāṇam dvaiśāṇam traiśāṇam dviśāṇyam triśāṇyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:18469: (P_5,1.37) KA_II.350.13-351.6 Ro_IV.39-40 tena krītam iti karaṇāt . tena krītam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:18470: atra karaṇāt iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . devadattena krītam . yajñadattena krītam
GS24pmbhasuu:18471: iti . akartrekāntāt . akartrekāntāt iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . devadattena pāṇinā
GS24pmbhasuu:18472: krītam iti . saṅkhyaikavacanāt dvigoḥ ca upasaṅkhyānam . saṅkhyāyāḥ iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:18473: . iha api yathā syāt . pañcabhiḥ krītam pañcakam . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:18474: . ekavacanāntāt iti vakṣyati . tasya ayam purastāt apakarṣaḥ . ekavacanāt . ekavacanāntāt
GS24pmbhasuu:18475: iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . śūrpābhyām krītam . śūrpaiḥ krītam iti . dvigoḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:18476: . dvigoḥ ca iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt . dvābhyām śūrpābhyām krītam dviśūrpam
GS24pmbhasuu:18477: triśūrpam iti . yadi ekavacanāntāt iti ucyate mudgaiḥ krītam maudgikam māṣaiḥ krītam
GS24pmbhasuu:18478: māṣikam iti na sidhyati . parimāṇasya saṅkhyāyāḥ yat ekavacanam tadantāt iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:18479: . tat tarhi ekavacanāntāt iti vaktavyam . tasmin ca kriyamāṇe bahu vaktavyam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:18480: . na vaktavyam . kasmāt na bhavati śūrpābhyām krītam . śūrpaiḥ krītam iti . uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:18481: vā . kim uktam . anabhidhānāt iti . yadi evam karaṇāt akartrekāntāt iti api na vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:18482: . kartuḥ kartrekāntāt vā kasmāt na bhavati . anabhidhānāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:18483: (P_5,1.38) KA_II.351.8-14 Ro_IV.40-41 saṃyoganipātayoḥ kaḥ viśeṣaḥ . saṃyogaḥ nāma
GS24pmbhasuu:18484: saḥ bhavati idam kṛtvā idam avāpyate iti . utpātaḥ nāma saḥ bhavati yādṛcchikaḥ bhedaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18485: vā chedaḥ vā padmam vā parṇam vā . tasyanimittaprakaraṇe vātapittaśleṣmabhyaḥ śamakopanayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18487: kartavyam . vātasya śamanam kopanam vā vātikam . paittikam ślaiṣmikam . sannipātāt
GS24pmbhasuu:18488: ca . sannipātāt ca iti vaktavyam . sānnipātikam .
GS24pmbhasuu:18489: (P_5,1.39) KA_II.351.16-18 Ro_IV.41 yatprakaraṇe brahmavarcasāt ca . yatprakaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:18490: brahmavarcasāt ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . brahmavarcasasya nimittam brahmvarcasyaḥ . utpātaḥ vā .
GS24pmbhasuu:18491: (P_5,1.47) KA_II.351.20-352.2 Ro_IV.41 tad asmin dīyate asmai iti ca . tad asmin
GS24pmbhasuu:18492: dīyate asmai iti ca iti vaktavyam . pañca vṛddhiḥ vā āyaḥ vā lābhaḥ vā śulkaḥ vā
GS24pmbhasuu:18493: upadā vā dīyate asmai pañcakaḥ . saptakaḥ . aṣṭakaḥ . navakaḥ . daśakaḥ . tat tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:18494: upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . na kartavyam . yat hi yasmai dīyate tasmin api tat dīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:18495: . tat asmin dīyate iti eva siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:18496: (P_5,1.48) KA_II.352.4-8 Ro_IV.41-42 ṭhanprakaraṇe anantāt upasaṅkhyānam . ṭhanprakaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:18497: anantāt upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . dvitīyakaḥ . tṛtīyakaḥ . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:18498: . pūraṇāt iti ucyate . na ca etat pūraṇāntam . anā etat paryavapannam . pūraṇam nāma
GS24pmbhasuu:18499: arthaḥ . tam artham āha tīyaśabdaḥ . pūraṇam saḥ asau bhavati . pūraṇantāt svārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:18500: bhāge an . saḥ api pūraṇam bhavati eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:18501: (P_5,1.52) KA_II.352.10-11 Ro_IV.42 tat pacati iti droṇāt aṇ ca . tat pacati iti droṇāt aṇ ca iti vaktavyam . droṇam pacati . drauṇī . drauṇikī
GS24pmbhasuu:18502: (P_5,1.55) KA_II.352.13-15 Ro_IV.42-43 kulijāt ca iti siddhe lukkhagrahaṇānarthakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:18503: pūrvsamin trikabhāvāt . kulijāt ca iti eva siddham . na arthaḥ lukkhagrahaṇena .
GS24pmbhasuu:18504: kim kāraṇam . pūrvasmin trikabhāvāt . pūrvasmin yoge sarvaḥ eṣaḥ trikaḥ nirdiśyate
GS24pmbhasuu:18506: (P_5,1.57-58.1) KA_II.352.18-354.6 Ro_IV.43-46 sañjñāyām svārthe . sañjñāyām svārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:18507: pratyayaḥ utpādyaḥ . pañca eva pañcakāḥ śakunayaḥ . trikāḥ śālaṅkāyanāḥ . saptakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18508: brahmavṛkṣāḥ . tataḥ parimāṇini . tataḥ paraḥ pratyayaḥ parimāṇini iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:18509: . pañcakaḥ saṅghaḥ . daśakaḥ saṅghaḥ . jīvitaparimāṇe ca upasaṅkhyānam . jīvitaparimāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:18510: ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . ṣaṣṭiḥ jīvitaparimāṇam asya ṣāṣṭikaḥ . sāptatikaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:18511: jīvitaparimāṇe ca iti anarthakam vacanam kālāt iti siddhatvāt . jīvitaparimāṇe ca
GS24pmbhasuu:18512: iti anarthakam vacanam . kim kāraṇam . kālāt iti siddhatvāt . kālāt iti eva siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:18513: . iha yasya ṣaṣṭiḥ jīvitaparimāṇam ṣaṣtim asu bhūtaḥ bhavati . tatra tam adhīṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18514: bhṛtaḥ bhūtaḥ bhāvī iti eva siddham . avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam . iha vacane
GS24pmbhasuu:18515: hi lukprasaṅgaḥ . iha hi kriyamāṇe luk prasajyeta :
GS24pmbhasuu:18516: dviṣāṣṭikaḥ . triṣāṣṭikaḥ . anena sati luk bhavati . tena sati kasmāt na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:18517: . ā arhāt iti ucyate . na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . na hi ime kālaśabdāḥ . kim tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:18518: saṅkhyāśabdāḥ ime . ime api kālaśabdāḥ . katham . saṅkhyā saṅkhyeye vartate . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:18519: tarhi yaḥ yaḥ kāle vartate saḥ saḥ kālaśabdaḥ ramaṇīyādiṣu atriprasaṅgaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:18520: . ramaṇīyam kālam bhūtaḥ . śobhanam kālam bhūtaḥ . atha matam etat . kāle dṛṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18521: śabdaḥ kālaśabdaḥ kālam yaḥ na vyabhicarati iti na ramaṇīyādiṣu atriprasaṅgaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:18522: . jīvitaparimāṇe tu upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . iha ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . vārṣaśatikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18523: . vārṣasahasrikaḥ iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . na hi varṣaśataśabdaḥ saṅkhyā
GS24pmbhasuu:18524: . kim tarhi saṅkhyeye vartate varṣaśataśabdaḥ . evam tarhi anyebhyaḥ api dṛśyate
GS24pmbhasuu:18525: khāraśatādyartham . anyebhyaḥ api dṛśyate iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . khāraśatādyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:18526: . khāraśatikaḥ rāśiḥ . khārasahastrikaḥ rāśiḥ . ayam tarhi doṣaḥ . iha vacane hi
GS24pmbhasuu:18527: lukprasaṅgaḥ iti . na brūmaḥ yatra kriyamāṇe doṣaḥ tatra kartavyam iti . kim tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:18528: . yatra kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ tatra kartavyam . kva ca kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ . param arhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:18529: . tat tarhi upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . na kartavyam . kālāt iti eva siddham . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:18530: ca uktam na ime kālaśabdāḥ . kim tarhi . saṅkhyāśabdāḥ iti . nanu ca uktam ime api
GS24pmbhasuu:18531: kālaśabdāḥ . katham . saṅkhyā saṅkhyeye vartate . nanu ca uktam yadi tarhi yaḥ yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18532: kāle vartate saḥ saḥ kālaśabdaḥ ramaṇīyādiṣu atriprasaṅgaḥ bhavati iti . uktam vā
GS24pmbhasuu:18533: . kim uktam . anabhidhānāt iti . anabhidhānāt ramaṇīyādiṣu utpattiḥ na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:18534: (P_5,1.57-58.2) KA_II.354.7-9 Ro_IV.46 stome ḍavidhiḥ pañcadaśādyarthaḥ . stome ḍaḥ vidheyaḥ . kim prayojanam . pañcadaśādyarthaḥ . pañcadaśaḥ stomaḥ . saptadaśaḥ stomaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:18535: (P_5,1.59) KA_II.355.2-357.8 Ro_IV.46-56 ime viṃśatyādayaḥ saprakṛtikāḥ sapratyayakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18536: nipātyante . tatra na jñāyate kā prakṛtiḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ kaḥ pratyayārthaḥ iti . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:18537: vaktavyam iyam prakṛtiḥ ayam pratyayaḥ ayam pratyayārthaḥ iti . ime brūmaḥ dviśabdāt
GS24pmbhasuu:18538: ayam daśadarthābhidāhinaḥ svārthe śaticpratyayaḥ nipātyate vinbhāvaḥ ca . dvau daśatau
GS24pmbhasuu:18539: viṃśatiḥ . viṃśatyādayaḥ daśāt cet samāsavacanānupapattiḥ . viṃśatyādayaḥ daśāt cet
GS24pmbhasuu:18540: samāsaḥ na upapadyate . viṃśatigavam iti . kim kāraṇam . dravyam anabhihitam . tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:18541: anabhihitatvāt ṣaṣṭhī prāpnoti . ṣaṣṭhyantam ca samāse pūrvam nipatati . tatra goviṃśatiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18542: iti prāpnoti . na ca evam bhavitavyam . bhavitavyam ca viṃśatigavam tu na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:18543: . iha ca triṃśatpūlī catvāriṃśatpūlī samānādhikaraṇalakṣaṇaḥ samāsaḥ na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:18544: . vacanam ca vidheyam . viṃśatiḥ . dvitvāt daśatoḥ dvayoḥ dvivacanam iti dvivacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:18545: prāpnoti . evam tarhi parimāṇini viṃśatyādayaḥ bhaviṣyanti . parimāṇini cet punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18546: svārthe pratyayavidhānam . parimāṇini cet punaḥ svārthe pratyayaḥ vidheyaḥ . viṃśakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18547: saṅghaḥ . ṣaṣṭhīvacanavidhiḥ ca . ṣaṣṭhī ca vidheyā . gavām viṃśatiḥ . dravyam abhihitam
GS24pmbhasuu:18548: . tasya abhihitatvāt ṣaṣṭhī na prāpnoti . ekavacanam ca vidheyam . viṃśatiḥ gāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18549: . gobhiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyāt bahuṣu bahuvacanam iti bahuvacanam prāpnoti . anārambhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18550: vā prātipadikavijñānāt yathā sahasrādiṣu . anārambhaḥ vā punaḥ viṃśatyādīnām nyāyyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18551: . katham sidhyati . prātipadikavijñānāt . katham prātipadikavijñānam . viṃśatyādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18552: avyutpannāni prātipadikāni yathā sahasrādiṣu . tat yathā sahasram ayutam arbudam
GS24pmbhasuu:18553: iti na ca anugamaḥ kriyate bhavati ca abhidhānam . yathā sahasrādiṣu iti ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:18554: atha sahasrādiṣu api katham bhavitavyam . sahasram gavām . sahasram gāvaḥ . sahasragavam
GS24pmbhasuu:18555: . gosahasram iti . yāvatā atra api sandehaḥ na asūyā kartavyā yatra anugamaḥ kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:18556: . nanu ca uktam viṃśatyādayaḥ daśāt cet samāsavacanānupapattiḥ . parimāṇini cet punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18557: svārthe pratyayavidhānam . ṣaṣṭhīvacanavidhiḥ ca iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . samudāye viṃśatyādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18558: bhaviṣyanti . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . saṅghaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18559: iti vartate . saṅghaḥ samūhaḥ samudāyaḥ iti anarthāntaram . te ete viṃśatyādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18560: samudāye santaḥ bhāvavacanāḥ bhavanti bhāvavacanāḥ santaḥ guṇavacanāḥ bhavanti guṇavacanāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18561: santaḥ aviśiṣṭāḥ bhavanti anyaiḥ guṇavacanaiḥ . anyeṣu ca guṇavacaneṣu kadā cit guṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18562: guṇiviśeṣakaḥ bhavati . tat yathā śuklaḥ paṭaḥ iti . kadā cit guṇinā guṇaḥ vyapadiśyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:18563: paṭasya śuklaḥ iti . tat yadā tāvat ucyate viṃśatyādayaḥ daśāt cet samāsavacanānupapattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18564: iti sāmānādhikaraṇyam tadā guṇaguṇinoḥ . vacanaparihāraḥ tiṣṭhatu tāvat . parimāṇini
GS24pmbhasuu:18565: cet punaḥ svārthe pratyayavidhānam iti saṃhanane vṛttaḥ saṃhanane vartiṣyate . saṅkhyāsaṃhanane
GS24pmbhasuu:18566: vṛttaḥ dravyasaṃhanane vartiṣyate . atha ṣaṣṭhī tadā guṇinā guṇaḥ viśeṣyate . vacanaparihāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18567: ubhayoḥ api . yadi tarhi ime viṃśatyādayaḥ guṇavacanāḥ syuḥ sadharmabhiḥ anyaiḥ guṇavacanaiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18568: bhavitavyam . anye ca guṇavacanāḥ dravyasya liṅgasaṅkhye anuvartante . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:18569: . śuklam vastram . śuklā śāṭī . śuklaḥ kambalaḥ . śuklau kambalau . śuklāḥ kambalāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18570: iti . yat asau dravyam śritaḥ guṇaḥ tasya yat liṅgam vacanam ca tat guṇasya api bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:18571: . viṃśatyādayaḥ punaḥ na anuvartante . anye api vai guṇavacanāḥ na avaśyam dravyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:18572: liṅgasaṅkhye anuvartante . tat yathā . gāvaḥ dhanam . putrā apatyam . indrāgnī devatā
GS24pmbhasuu:18573: . viśvedevāḥ devatā . yāvantaḥ te vāśitām anuyanti sarve te dakṣiṇā samṛddhyai iti
GS24pmbhasuu:18574: . atha atra ananuvṛttau hetuḥ śakyaḥ vaktum . bāḍham śakyaḥ vaktum . kāmam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:18575: ucyatām . iha kadā cit guṇaḥ prādhānyena vivakṣitaḥ bhavati . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:18576: pañca uḍupaśatāni tīrṇāni . pañca phalakaśatāni tīrṇāni . aśvaiḥ yuddham . asibhiḥ yuddham iti . na ca asayaḥ yudhyante .
GS24pmbhasuu:18577: asiguṇāḥ puruṣāḥ yudhyante guṇaḥ tu khalu prādhānyena vivakṣitaḥ . iha tāvat gāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18578: dhanam iti dhinoteḥ dhanam ekaḥ guṇaḥ . saḥ prādhānyena vivakṣitaḥ . putrāḥ apatyam
GS24pmbhasuu:18579: iti apatanāt apatyam ekaḥ guṇaḥ . saḥ prādhānyena vivakṣitaḥ . indrāgnī devatā .
GS24pmbhasuu:18580: viśvedevāḥ devatā iti diveḥ aiśvaryakarmaṇaḥ devaḥ . tasmāt svārthe tal . ekaḥ guṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18581: . saḥ prādhānyena vivakṣitaḥ . yāvantaḥ te vāśitām anuyanti sarve te dakṣiṇā samṛddhyā
GS24pmbhasuu:18582: iti dakṣeḥ vṛddhikarmaṇaḥ dakṣiṇā ekaḥ guṇaḥ . saḥ prādhānyena vivakṣitaḥ . tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:18583: ekatvāt ekavacanam bhaviṣyati . viṃśatyādiṣu ca api ekaḥ guṇaḥ . saḥ prādhānyena
GS24pmbhasuu:18584: vivakṣitaḥ . tasya ekatvāt ekavacanam bhaviṣyati . ayam tarhi viṃśatyādiṣu bhāvavacaneṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:18585: doṣaḥ . goviṃśatiḥ ānīyatām iti bhāvānayane codite dravyānanam na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18587: atha iha gauḥ anubandhyaḥ ajaḥ agnīṣomīyaḥ iti katham ākṛtau coditāyām dravye ārambhaṇalambhanaprokṣaṇaviśasanādīni
GS24pmbhasuu:18588: kriyante iti . asambhavāt . ākṛtau ārambhaṇādīnām sambhavaḥ na asti iti kṛtvā ākṛtisahacarite
GS24pmbhasuu:18589: dravye ārambhaṇādīni kriyante . idam api evañjātīyakam eva . asambhavāt bhāvānayanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:18592: . chedādipathibhyaḥ nityagrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . vigrahadarśanāt . vigrahaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18593: dṛśyate . chedam arhati . panthānam gacchati iti . vikārārtham tarhi idam nityagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:18594: kriyate . vikāreṇa vigrahaḥ mā bhūt iti . virāgaviraṅgam ca . panthaḥ ṇa nityam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:18595: . vikārārtham iti cet akaṅādibhiḥ tulyam . vikārārtham iti cet akaṅādibhiḥ tulyam
GS24pmbhasuu:18596: etat . yathā akaṅādibhiḥ vikāraiḥ vigrahaḥ na bhavati evam ābhyām api na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:18597: . kim punaḥ iha akartavyam nityagrahaṇam kriyate āhosvit anyatra kartavyam na kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:18598: . iha akartavyam kriyate . eṣaḥ eva nyāyaḥ yat uta sanniyogaśiṣṭānām anyatarāpāye
GS24pmbhasuu:18599: ubhayoḥ api abhāvaḥ . tat yathā . devadattayajñadattābhyām idam kartavyam iti . devadattāpāye
GS24pmbhasuu:18601: (P_5,1.71) KA_II.357.22-24 Ro_IV.58 yajñartvigbhyāmtat karma arhati iti upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:18602: . yajñartvigbhyāmtat karma arhati iti upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . yjañakarma arhati
GS24pmbhasuu:18603: yajñiyaḥ deśaḥ . ṛtvikkarma arhati ārtvijīnam brāhmaṇakulam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:18604: (P_5,1.72) KA_II.358.2-10 Ro_IV.58-59 tat vartayati iti anirdeśaḥ tatra adarśanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:18605: . tat vartayati iti anirdeśaḥ . agamakaḥ nirdeśaḥ anirdeśaḥ . pārāyaṇam kaḥ vartayati
GS24pmbhasuu:18606: . yaḥ parasya karoti . turāyaṇam kaḥ vartayati . yaḥ carupuroḍāśān nirvapati . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:18607: adarśanāt . na ca tatra pratyayaḥ dṛśyate . iṅyajyoḥ ca darśanāt . iṅyajyoḥ ca pratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18608: dṛśyate . yaḥ pārāyaṇam adhīte saḥ pārāyaṇikaḥ iti ucyate . yaḥ turāyaṇena yajate
GS24pmbhasuu:18609: saḥ taurāyaṇikaḥ iti ucyate . yaḥ ca eva adhīte yaḥ parasya karoti ubhau tau vartayataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18610: . yaḥ ca yajate yaḥ ca yaḥ carupuroḍāśān nirvapati ubhau tau vartayataḥ . ubhayatra
GS24pmbhasuu:18612: (P_5,1.74) KA_II.358.12-18 Ro_IV.59 yojanam gacchati iti krośaśatayojanaśatayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:18613: . yojanam gacchati iti krośaśatayojanaśatayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . krośaśatam
GS24pmbhasuu:18614: gacchati iti krauśaśatikaḥ . yojanaśatam gacchati iti yaujanaśatikaḥ iti . tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18615: abhigamanam arhati iti ca . tataḥ abhigamanam arhati iti ca krośaśatayojanaśatayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18616: upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . krośaśatāt abhigamanam arhati krauśaśatikaḥ bhikṣuḥ . yojanaśatāt
GS24pmbhasuu:18620: . vāripathena gacchati vāripathikaḥ . vāripathena āhṛtam vāripathikam . vāri . jaṅgala
GS24pmbhasuu:18621: . jaṅgalapathena gacchati jāṅgalapathikaḥ . jaṅgalapathena āhṛtam jāṅgalapathikam
GS24pmbhasuu:18622: . jaṅgala . sthala . sthalapathena gacchati sthālapathikaḥ . sthalapathena āhṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:18623: sthālapathikam . sthala . kāntāra . kāntārapathena gacchati kāntārapathikaḥ . kāntārapathena
GS24pmbhasuu:18624: āhṛtam kāntārapathikam . ajapathaśaṅkupathābhyām ca . ajapathaśaṅkupathābhyām ca
GS24pmbhasuu:18625: iti vaktavyam . ajapathena gacchati ājapathikaḥ . ajapathena āhṛtam ājapathikam.
GS24pmbhasuu:18626: śaṅkupathena gacchati śāṅkupathikaḥ . śaṅkupathena āhṛtam śāṅkupathikam . madhukamaricayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18627: aṇ sthalāt . madhukamaricayoḥ aṇ sthalāt vaktavyaḥ . sthālapatham madhukam . sthālapatham maricam .
GS24pmbhasuu:18628: (P_5,1.80) KA_II.12-18 Ro_IV.60-61 adhīṣṭabhṛtayoḥ dvitīyānirdeśaḥ anarthakaḥ tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:18629: adarśanāt . adhīṣṭabhṛtayoḥ dvitīyānirdeśaḥ anarthakaḥ . kim kāraṇam . tatra adarśanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:18630: . na hi asau māsam adhīṣyate . kim tarhi muhūrtam adhīṣṭaḥ māsam tat karma karoti
GS24pmbhasuu:18631: . siddham tu caturthīnirdeśāt . siddham etat . katham . caturthīnirdeśāt . caturthīnirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18632: kartavyaḥ . tasmai adhīṣṭaḥ iti . saḥ tarhi caturthīnirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18633: . tādarthyāt tācchabdyam bhaviṣyati . māsārthaḥ muhūrtaḥ māsaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:18634: (P_5,1.84) KA_II.359.20-22 Ro_IV.61-62 avayasi ṭhan ca iti anantarasya anukarṣaḥ . avayasi ṭhan ca iti anantarasya anukarṣaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ . dveṣyam vijānīyāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:18635: yap api anuvartate iti . tat ācāryaḥ suhṛt bhūtvā anvācaṣṭe :
GS24pmbhasuu:18636: avayasi ṭhan ca iti anantarasya anukarṣaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:18637: (P_5,1.90) KA_II.360.2-6 Ro_IV.62 ṣaṣṭike sañjñāgrahaṇam . ṣaṣṭike sañjñāgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:18638: kartavyam . mudgāḥ api hi ṣaṣṭirātreṇe pacyante . tatra mā bhūt iti . uktam vā .
GS24pmbhasuu:18640: (P_5,1.94) KA_II.360.8-361.5 Ro_IV.62-64) tat asya brahmacaryam iti mahānāmnyādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18641: upasaṅkhyānam . tat asya brahmacaryam iti mahānāmnyādibhyaḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:18642: . mahānāmnīnām brahmacaryam māhānāmnikam . ādityavratikam . tat carati iti ca . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:18643: carati iti ca mahānāmnyādibhyaḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . mahānāmnīḥ carati māhānāmnikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18644: . ādityavratikaḥ . na eṣaḥ yuktaḥ nirdeśaḥ tat carati iti . mahānāmnyaḥ nāma ṛcaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18645: . na ca tāḥ caryante . vratam tāsām caryate . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . sāhacaryāt tācchabyam
GS24pmbhasuu:18646: bhaviṣyati . mahānāmnīsahacaritam vratam mahānāmnyaḥ vratam iti . avāntaradīkṣādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18647: ḍiniḥ . avāntaradīkṣādibhyaḥ ḍiniḥ vaktavyaḥ . avāntaradīkṣī . tilavratī . aṣṭācatvāriṃśataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18648: ḍvun ca . aṣṭācatvāriṃśataḥ ḍvun ca ḍiniḥ ca vaktavyaḥ . aṣṭācatvāriṃśakaḥ . aṣṭācatvāriṃśī
GS24pmbhasuu:18649: . cāturmāsyānām yalopaḥ ca . cāturmāsyānām yalopaḥ ca ḍvun ca ḍiniḥ ca vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18650: . cāturmāsikaḥ . cāturmāsī . atha kim idam cāturmāsyānām iti . caturmāsāt ṇyaḥ yajñe
GS24pmbhasuu:18651: tatra bhave . caturmāsāt ṇyaḥ vaktavyaḥ yajñe tatra bhave iti etasmin arthe . caturṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:18652: māseṣu bhavāni cāturmāsyāni yajñāḥ . sañjñāyām aṇ . sañjñāyām aṇ vaktavyaḥ . caturṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:18654: (P_5,1.95) KA_II.361.7-12 Ro_IV.64 ākhyāgrahaṇam kimartham. tasya dakṣiṇā yajñebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18655: iti iyati ucyamāne ye ete sañjñībhūtakāḥ yajñāḥ tataḥ utapattiḥ syāt . agniṣṭomikyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18656: . rājasūyikaḥ . vājapeyikyaḥ . yatra vā yajñaśabdaḥ asti . nāvayajñikyaḥ . pākayajñikyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18657: . iha na syāt . pāñcaudanikyaḥ . dāśaudanikyaḥ . ākhyāgrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na
GS24pmbhasuu:18658: doṣaḥ bhavati . ye ca sañjñībhūtakāḥ yatra ca yajñaśabdaḥ asti yatra ca na asti tadākhyāmātrāt siccham bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:18659: (P_5,1.96) KA_II.361.14-22 Ro_IV.65-66 kāryagrahaṇam anarthakam tatrabhavena kṛtatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:18660: . kāryagrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . tatrabhavena kṛtatvāt . yat hi māse kāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:18661: māse bhavam tat bhavati . tatra tatra bhavaḥ iti eva siddham . kim idam bhavān kāryagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:18662: eva pratyācaṣṭe na punaḥ dīyategrahaṇam api . yathā eva hi yat māse kāryam tat māse
GS24pmbhasuu:18663: bhavam bhavati evam yat api māse dīyate tat api māse bhavam bhavati . tatra tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:18664: bhavaḥ iti eva siddham . na sidhyati . na tat māse dīyate . kim tarhi māse gate .
GS24pmbhasuu:18665: evam tarhi aupaśleṣikam adhikaraṇam vijñāsyate . evam tarhi yogavibhāgottarakālam
GS24pmbhasuu:18666: idam paṭhitavyam . tasya dakṣiṇā yajñākhyebhyaḥ . tatra ca dīyate . tataḥ kāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:18668: (P_5,1.97) KA_II.362.2-11 Ro_IV.66 aṇprakaraṇe agnipadādibhyaḥ upasaṅkhyānam . aṇprakaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:18669: agnipadādibhyaḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . trīṇi imāni aṇgrahaṇāni . vyuṣṭādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18670: aṇ . samayaḥ tat asya prāptam . ṛtoḥ aṇ . prayojanam . viśākhāṣāḍhāt aṇ manthadaṇḍayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18671: iti . tatra na jñāyate katarasmin aṇprakaraṇe agnipadādibhyaḥ upasaṅkhyānam . aviśeṣāt
GS24pmbhasuu:18672: sarvatra . vyuṣṭādibhyaḥ aṇ bhavati iti uktvā agnipadādibhyaḥ ca iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:18673: agnipade dīyate kāryam vā āgnipadam . pailumūlam . samayaḥ tat asya prāptam . ṛtoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18674: aṇ . agnipadādibhyaḥ ca iti vaktavyam . upavastā prāptaḥ asya aupavastram . prāśitā
GS24pmbhasuu:18675: prāptaḥ asya prāśitram . prayojanam . viśākhāṣāḍhāt aṇ manthadaṇḍayoḥ .agnipadādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18676: ca iti vaktavyam . cūḍā prayojanam asya cauḍam . śraddhā prayojanam asya śrāddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:18678: sapūrvapadāt upasaṅkhyānam . chaprakaraṇe viśipūripadiruhiprakṛteḥ anāt sapūrrvapadāt
GS24pmbhasuu:18679: upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . viśi . gehānupraveśanīyam . pūri . prapāpūraṇīyam . padi
GS24pmbhasuu:18680: . goprapadanīyam . aśvaprapadanīyam . ruhi . prāśādārohaṇīyam . svargādibhyaḥ yat
GS24pmbhasuu:18681: ṣvargādibhyaḥ yat pratyayaḥ bhavati . svargyam . dhanyam . yaśasyam . āyuṣyam . puṇyāhavācanādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18682: luk . puṇyāhavācanādibhyaḥ luk vaktavyaḥ . puṇyāhavācanam . śāntivācanam . svastivācanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:18684: . ekāgārāt nipātanam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . ṭhañprakaraṇāt . ṭhañ prakṛtaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:18685: saḥ anuvartiṣyate . idam tarhi prayojanam . caure iti vakṣyāmi iti . iha mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:18686: . ekāgāram prayojanam asya bhikṣoḥ iti . yadi etāvat prayojanam syāt ekāgārāt caure iti eva brūyāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:18688: ākālāt nipātanam narthakam . kim kāraṇam . ṭhañprakaraṇāt . ṭhañ prakṛtaḥ . saḥ anuvartiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:18689: . idam tarhi prayojanam . etasmin viśeṣe nipātanam kariṣyāmi samānakālasya ādyantavivakṣāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:18690: iti . ākālāt ṭhan ca . ākālāt ṭhan ca vaktavyaḥ . ākālikī . ākālikā .
GS24pmbhasuu:18691: (P_5,1.115) KA_II.363.11-364.10 Ro_IV.69-75 idam ayuktam vartate . kim atra ayuktam
GS24pmbhasuu:18692: . yat tat tṛtīyāsamartham kriyā cet sā bhavati iti ucyate . katham ca tṛtīyāsamartham
GS24pmbhasuu:18693: nāma kriyā syāt . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . sarve ete śabdāḥ guṇasamudāyeṣu vartante . brāhmaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18694: kṣatriyaḥ . vaiśyaḥ śūdraḥ iti . ātaḥ ca guṇasamudāye evam hi āha . tapaḥ śrutam
GS24pmbhasuu:18695: ca yoniḥ ca iti etad brāhmaṇakārakam . tapaḥśtrutābhyām yaḥ hīnaḥ jātibrāhmaṇaḥ eva
GS24pmbhasuu:18696: saḥ . tathā gauraḥ śucyācāraḥ piṅgalaḥ kapilakeśaḥ iti etān api abhyantarān brāhmaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:18697: guṇan kurvanti . samudāyeṣu ca śabdāḥ vṛttāḥ avayaveṣu api vartante . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:18704: kṛṣṇaḥ iti . evam ayam brāhmaṇaśabdaya samudāye vṛttaḥ avayaveṣu api vartate . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:18705: tarhi tṛtīyāsamartham viśeṣyate pratyayārthaḥ aviśeṣitaḥ bhavati . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18706: . tṛtīyāsamarthāt kriyāvācinaḥ guṇatulye api pratyayaḥ syāt . putreṇa tulyaḥ sthūlaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18707: . putreṇa tulyaḥ piṅgalaḥ . astu tarhi pratyayārthaviśeṣaṇam . yat tat tulyam kriyā
GS24pmbhasuu:18708: cet sā bhavati iti . evam api tṛtīyāsamartham aviśeṣitam bhavati . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18709: . tṛtīyāsamarthāt akriyāvācinaḥ kriyātulye api pratyayaḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18710: . yat tat tulyam kriyā cet sā bhavati iti ucyate . tulayā ca sammitam tulyam . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:18711: ca tṛtīyāsamartham api kriyā pratyayārthaḥ api kriyā tataḥ tulayam bhavati . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:18712: vā punaḥ astu yat tat tṛtīyāsamartham kriyā cet sā bhavati iti eva . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:18713: pratyayārthaḥ aviśeṣitaḥ iti . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . tṛtīyāsamarthāt kriyāvācinaḥ guṇatulye
GS24pmbhasuu:18714: api pratyayaḥ syāt . putreṇa tulyaḥ sthūlaḥ . putreṇa tulyaḥ piṅgalaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18715: doṣaḥ . yat tat tṛtīyāsamartham kriyā cet sā bhavati iti ucyate . tulayā ca sammitam
GS24pmbhasuu:18716: tulyam . yadi ca tṛtīyāsamartham api kriyā pratyayārthaḥ api kriyā tataḥ tulayam
GS24pmbhasuu:18717: bhavati . kim punaḥ atra jyāyaḥ . pratyayārthaviśeṣaṇam eva jyāyaḥ . kutaḥ etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:18718: evam ca eva kṛtvā ācāryeṇa sūtram paṭhitam . vatinā sāmānādhikaraṇyam kṛtam . api
GS24pmbhasuu:18719: ca vateḥ avyayeṣu pāṭhaḥ na kartavyaḥ bhavati . kriyāyām ayam bhavan liṅgasaṅkhyābhyam na yokṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:18720: (P_5,1.116) KA_II.365.12-17 Ro_IV.75-77 kimartham idam ucyate na tena tulyam kriyā
GS24pmbhasuu:18721: cet vatiḥ iti eva siddham . na sidhyati . tṛtīyāsamarthāt tatra pratyayaḥ yadā anyena
GS24pmbhasuu:18722: kartavyām kriyām anyaḥ karoti tadā pratyayaḥ utpādyate . na ca kā cid ivaśabdena
GS24pmbhasuu:18723: yoge tṛtīyā vidhīyate . nanu ca sapatamī api na vidhīyate . evam tarhi siddhe sati
GS24pmbhasuu:18724: yat ivaśabdena yoge saptamīsamarthāt vatim śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati ivaśabdena
GS24pmbhasuu:18725: yoge saptamī iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . deveṣu iva nāma . brāhmaṇeṣu iva
GS24pmbhasuu:18727: (P_5,1.117) KA_II.364.19-22 Ro_IV.77-79 kimartham idam ucyate na tena tulyam kriyā
GS24pmbhasuu:18728: cet vatiḥ iti eva siddham . na sidhyati . tṛtīyāsamarthāt tatra pratyayaḥ yadā anyena
GS24pmbhasuu:18729: kartavyām kriyām anyaḥ karoti tadā pratyayaḥ utpādyate . iha punaḥ dvitīyāsamarthāt
GS24pmbhasuu:18730: ātmārhāyām kriyāyām arhatikartari niścitabalādhāne pratyayaḥ utpādyate . brāhmaṇavat
GS24pmbhasuu:18731: bhavān vartate . etat vṛttam brāhmaṇaḥ arhati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:18732: (P_5,1.118.1) KA_II.365.2-6 Ro_IV.79 arthagrahaṇam kimartham . na upasargāt chandasi
GS24pmbhasuu:18733: dhātavu iti eva ucyeta . dhātuḥ vai śabdaḥ . śabde kāryasya asambhavāt arthe kāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:18734: vijñāsyate . kaḥ punaḥ dhātvarthaḥ . kriyā . idam tarhi prayojanam . uttarapadalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18735: yathā vijñāyeta . dhātukṛtaḥ arthaḥ dhātvarthaḥ iti . kaḥ punaḥ dhātukṛtaḥ arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18736: . sādhanam . kim prayojanam . sādhane ayam bhavan liṅgasaṅkhyābhyam yokṣyate . udgatāni
GS24pmbhasuu:18739: vatyupasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . strīvat . puṃvat iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:18740: . imau nañsnañau prāk bhavanāt iti ucyete . tau viśeṣavihitau sāmānyavihitam vatim
GS24pmbhasuu:18741: bādheyātām . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na vatyarthe nañsnañau bhavataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18742: iti yat ayam striyāḥ puṃvat iti nirdeśam karoti . evam api strīvat iti na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:18745: . strīpuṃsābhyām tvataloḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . strībhāvaḥ strītvam strītā .
GS24pmbhasuu:18746: kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . imau nañsnañau prāk bhavanāt iti ucyete . tau viśeṣavihitau
GS24pmbhasuu:18747: sāmānyavihitam vatim bādheyātām . vāvacanam ca . vāvacanam ca kartavyam . kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:18748: . nañsnañau api yathā syātām . strībhāvaḥ straiṇam . pummbhāvaḥ pauṃsnam iti . apavādasamāveśāt
GS24pmbhasuu:18749: vā siddham . apavādasamāveśāt vā siddham etat . tat yathā imanicprabhṛtibhiḥ apavādaiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18750: samāveśaḥ bhavati evam ābhyām api bhaviṣyati . na eva īśvaraḥ ājñāpapayati na api
GS24pmbhasuu:18751: dharmasūtrakārāḥ paṭhanti imanicprabhṛtibhiḥ apavādaiḥ samāveśaḥ bhavati iti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:18752: tarhi ā ca tvāt iti etasmāt yatnāt imanicprabhṛtibhiḥ apavādaiḥ samāveśaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:18753: . na ca etau atra abhyantarau . etau api atra abhyantarau . katham . apavādasadeśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18754: apavādāḥ bhavanti iti . etat ca eva na jānīmaḥ apavādasadeśāḥ apavādāḥ bhavanti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:18755: . api ca kutaḥ etat etau api atra abhyantarau na punaḥ pūrvau vā syātām parau vā
GS24pmbhasuu:18756: . evam tarhi vakṣyati ā ca tvāt iti atra cakārakaraṇasya prayojanam . nañsnañbhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:18758: (P_5,1.119.2) KA_II.366.4-368.4 Ro_IV.83-93 tasya bhāvaḥ iti abhiprāyādiṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18759: . tasya bhāvaḥ iti abhiprāyādiṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . iha api prāpnoti . abhiprāyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18760: devadattasya modakeṣu bhojane . ye naḥ bhāvāḥ te naḥ bhāvāḥ putrāḥ putraiḥ ceṣṭante
GS24pmbhasuu:18761: iti . siddham tu yasya guṇasya bhāvāt dravye śabdaniveśaḥ tadabhidhāne tvatalau .
GS24pmbhasuu:18762: siddham etat . katham . yasya guṇasya bhāvāt dravye śabdaniveśaḥ tadabhidhāne tasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:18763: guṇe vaktavye pratyayena bhavitavyam . na ca abhiprāyādīnām bhāvāt dravye devadattaśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18764: vartate . kim punaḥ dravyam ke punaḥ guṇāḥ . śabdasparśarūparasagandhāḥ guṇāḥ . tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18765: anyat dravyam . kim punaḥ anyat śabdādibhyaḥ dravyam āhosvit ananyat . guṇasya ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:18766: bhāvāt dravye śabdaniveśam kurvan khyāpayati anyat śabdādibhyaḥ dravyam iti . ananyat
GS24pmbhasuu:18767: śabdādibhyaḥ dravyam . na hi anyat upalabhyate . paśoḥ khalu api viśasitasya parṇaśate
GS24pmbhasuu:18768: nyastasya na anyat śabdādibhyaḥ upalabhyate . anyat śabdādibhyaḥ dravyam tat tu anumānagamyam
GS24pmbhasuu:18769: . tat yathā oṣadhivanaspatīnām vṛddhihrāsau . jyotiṣām gatiḥ iti . kaḥ asau anumānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18770: . iha samāne varṣmaṇi pariṇāhe ca anyat tulāgram bhavati lohasya anyat kārpāsānām
GS24pmbhasuu:18771: . yatkṛtaḥ viśeṣaḥ tat dravyam . tathā kaḥ cit spṛśan eva chinatti kaḥ cit lambamānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18772: api na chinatti . yatkṛtaḥ viśeṣaḥ tat dravyam . kaḥ cit ekena eva prahāreṇa vyapavargam
GS24pmbhasuu:18773: karoti kaḥ cit dvābhyām api an karoti . yatkṛtaḥ viśeṣaḥ tat dravyam . atha vā yasya
GS24pmbhasuu:18774: guṇāntareṣu api prādurbhāvatsu tattvam na vihanyate tat dravyam . kim punaḥ tattvam
GS24pmbhasuu:18775: . tadbhāvaḥ tattvam . tat yathā āmalakādīnām phalānām raktādayaḥ pītādayaḥ ca guṇāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18776: prāduḥ bhavanti . āmalakam badaram iti eva bhavati . anvartham khalu api nirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:18777: . guṇasandrāvaḥ dravyam iti . yadi tarhi ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt guṇe pratyayāḥ utapdyante
GS24pmbhasuu:18779: ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt guṇe iti . ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt guṇe iti iyati ucyamāne dviguṇā rajjuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18780: triguṇā rajjuḥ atra api prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . guṇaśabdaḥ ayam bahvarthaḥ . asti
GS24pmbhasuu:18781: eva sameṣu avayaveṣu vartate . tat yathā dviguṇā rajjuḥ triguṇā rajjuḥ iti . asti
GS24pmbhasuu:18782: dravyapadārthakaḥ . tat yathā guṇavān ayam deśaḥ iti ucyate yasmin gāvaḥ sasyāni
GS24pmbhasuu:18783: ca vartante . asti aprādhānye vartate . tat yathā yaḥ yatra apradhānam bhavati saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18784: āha guṇabhūtāḥ vayam atra iti . asti ācāre vartate . tat yathā guṇavān ayam brāhmaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18785: iti ucyate yaḥ samyak ācāram karoti . asti saṃskāre vartate . tat yathā saṃskṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:18786: annam guṇavat iti ucyate . atha vā sarvatra eva ayam guṇaśabdaḥ sameṣu avayaveṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:18787: vartate . tat yathā dviguṇam adhyayanam triguṇam adhyayanam iti ucyate . carcāguṇān
GS24pmbhasuu:18788: kramaguṇān ca apekṣya bhavati na saṃhitāguṇān carcāguṇān ca . yadi evam guṇavat annam
GS24pmbhasuu:18789: iti guṇaśabdaḥ na upapadyate . na hi annasya sūpādayaḥ guṇāḥ samāḥ bhavanti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:18790: avaśyam varṣmataḥ parimāṇataḥ eva vā sāmyam bhavati . kim tarhi yuktitaḥ api . ātaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18791: ca yuktitaḥ . yaḥ hi mudgaprasthe lavaṇaprastham prakṣipet na adaḥ yuktam syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:18792: yadi tāvat adeḥ annam na adaḥ attavyam syāt . atha aniteḥ annam na adaḥ jagdvhā prāṇyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:18793: . śuklādiṣu tarhi vartyabhāvāt vṛttiḥ na prāpnoti . śuklatvam . śuklatā iti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:18794: punaḥ kāraṇam śuklādayaḥ eva udāhriyante na punaḥ vṛkṣādayaḥ api . vṛkṣatvam vṛkṣatā
GS24pmbhasuu:18795: iti . asti atra viśeṣaḥ . ubhayavacanāḥ hi ete dravyam ca āhuḥ guṇam ca . yataḥ dravyavacanāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18796: tataḥ vṛttiḥ bhaviṣyati . ime api tarhi ubhayavacanāḥ . katham . ārabhyate matublopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18797: guṇavacanebhyaḥ matupaḥ luk bhavati iti . yataḥ dravyavacanāḥ tataḥ vṛttiḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:18798: . ḍitthādiṣu tarhi vartyabhāvāt vṛttiḥ na prāpnoti . ḍitthatvam . ḍitthatā . ḍāmbhiṭṭatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:18799: iti . atra api kaḥ cit prāthamakalpikaḥ ḍitthaḥ ḍāmbhiṭṭaḥ ca . tena kṛtām kriyām
GS24pmbhasuu:18800: guṇam vā yaḥ kaḥ cit karoti saḥ ucyate ḍitthatvam te etat ḍāmbhiṭṭatvam te etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:18801: evam ḍitthāḥ kurvanti . evam ḍāmbhiṭṭāḥ kurvanti . yaḥ tarhi prāthamakalpikaḥ ḍitthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18802: ḍāmbhiṭṭaḥ ca tasya vartyabhāvāt vṛttiḥ na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yathā eva tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:18803: kāthañcitkaḥ prayogaḥ evam vṛttiḥ api bhaviṣyati . yat vā sarve bhāvāḥ svena bhāvena
GS24pmbhasuu:18804: bhavanti saḥ teṣām bhāvaḥ tadabhidhāne . kim ebhiḥ tribhiḥ bhāvagrahaṇaiḥ kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:18805: . ekena śabdaḥ pratinirdiśyate dvābhyām arthaḥ . yat vā sarve śabdāḥ svena arthena
GS24pmbhasuu:18806: bhavanti . saḥ teṣām arthaḥ iti tadabhidhāne vā tvatalau
GS24pmbhasuu:18807: bhavataḥ iti vaktavyam . na evam anyatra bhavati . na hi tena raktam rāgāt iti atra
GS24pmbhasuu:18808: śabdena rakte pratyayāḥ utpadyante . śabde asambhavāt arthena rakte pratyayāḥ bhaviṣyanti
GS24pmbhasuu:18809: . tat tarhi anyatarat kartavyam . sūtram ca bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:18810: ca uktam tasya bhāvaḥ iti abhiprāyādiṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ iti . uktam vā . kim uktam .
GS24pmbhasuu:18811: anabhidhānāt iti . anabhidhānāt abhiprāyādiṣu utapattiḥ na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:18813: tvataloḥ svarasiddhyartham . tvatalbhyām nañsamāsaḥ bhavati pūrvavipratiṣdhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:18814: kim prayojanam . tvataloḥ svarasiddhyartham . tvataloḥ svarasiddhiḥ yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:18815: tvataloḥ avakāśaḥ bhāvasya vacanam pratiṣedhasya avacanam . brāhmaṇatvam . brāhmṇatā
GS24pmbhasuu:18816: . nañsamāsasya avakāśaḥ pratiṣedhasya vacanam bhāvasya avacanam . abrāhmaṇaḥ . avṛṣalaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18817: . ubhayavacane ubhayam prāpnoti . abrāhmaṇatvam . abrāhmaṇatā . nañsamāsaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:18818: pūrvavipratiṣdhena . saḥ tarhi pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . na atra
GS24pmbhasuu:18819: tvatalau prāpnutaḥ . kim kāraṇam . asāmarthyāt . katham asāmarthyam . sāpekṣam asamartham
GS24pmbhasuu:18820: bhavati iti . yāvatā brāhmaṇaśabdaḥ pratiṣedham apekṣate . nañsamāsaḥ api tarhi na
GS24pmbhasuu:18821: prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . asāmarthyāt eva . katham asāmarthyam . sāpekṣam asamartham
GS24pmbhasuu:18822: bhavati iti . yāvatā brāhmaṇaśabdaḥ bhāvam apekṣate . pradhānam tadā brāhmaṇaśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18823: . bhavati ca pradhānasya sāpekṣasya api samāsaḥ . idam tarhi prayojanam . nañsamādāt
GS24pmbhasuu:18824: anyaḥ bhāvavacanaḥ svarottarapadavṛddhyartham iti vakṣyati . tatra vyavasthārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:18825: idam vaktavyam . vā chandasi . vā chandasi nañsamāsaḥ vaktavyaḥ . nirvīryatām vai
GS24pmbhasuu:18826: yajamānaḥ āśāste apaśutām . ayonitvāya . aśithilatvāya . agotām anapatyatām . bhavet
GS24pmbhasuu:18827: idam yuktam udāharaṇam . ayonitvāya . aśithilatvāya iti . idam tu ayuktam apaśutām
GS24pmbhasuu:18828: iti . na hi asau samāsabhāvam āśāste . kim tarhi . uttarapadābhāvam āśāste . na paśoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18829: bhāvaḥ iti . nañsamāsāt anyaḥ bhāvavacanaḥ . nañsamāsāt anyaḥ bhāvavacanaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:18830: vipratiṣedhena . kim prayojanam . svarottarapadavṛddhyartham . svarārtham uttarapadavṛddhyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:18831: ca . svarārtham tāvat . aprathimā . amradimā . uttarapadavṛddhyartham . aśauklyam . akārṣṇyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:18832: (P_5,1.120) KA_II.369.4-16 Ro_IV.95-97 kimarthaḥ cakāraḥ . anukarṣaṇārthaḥ . tvatalau
GS24pmbhasuu:18833: anukṛṣyete . na etat asti prayojanam . prakṛtau tvatalau anuvartiṣyete . ataḥ uttaram
GS24pmbhasuu:18834: paṭhati . ā ca tvāt iti cakārakaraṇam apavādasamāveśārtham . ā ca tvāt iti cakārakaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:18835: kriyate apavādasamāveśārtham . imanicprabhṛtibhiḥ apavādaiḥ samāveśaḥ yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:18836: . na etat asti prayojanam . ā tvāt iti evam imanicprabhṛtibhiḥ apavādaiḥ samāveśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18837: bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam . ā tvāt yāḥ prakṛtayaḥ tābhyaḥ ca tvatalau yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:18838: syātām yataḥ ca ucyete . etat api na asti prayojanam . ā tvāt iti eva yāḥ prakṛtayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18839: tābhyaḥ tvatalau bhaviṣyataḥ yataḥ ca ucyete . idam tarhi prayojanam . ā tvāt ye
GS24pmbhasuu:18840: arthāḥ tatra tvatalau yathā syātām yatra ca ucyete . etat api na asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:18841: . ā tvāt iti eva ā tvāt ye arthāḥ tatra tvatalau bhaviṣyataḥ yatra ca ucyete . idam
GS24pmbhasuu:18842: tarhi prayojanam . ā tvāt yāḥ prakṛtayaḥ tābhyaḥ ca tvatalau yathā syātām yasyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18843: ca prakṛteḥ atasmin viśeṣe anyaḥ pratyayaḥ utpadyate . kim kṛtam bhavati . strīpuṃsābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:18844: tvataloḥ upasaṅkhyānam coditam . tat na vaktavyam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:18845: (P_5,1.121) KA_II.369.19-370.12 Ro_IV.97-100 kasya ayam pratiṣedhaḥ . tvataloḥ iti āha . na etat asi prayojanam . iṣyete nañpūrvāt tatpuruṣāt tvatalau :
GS24pmbhasuu:18846: abrāhmaṇatvam abrāhmaṇatā iti . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . na nañpūrvāt iti uttarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:18847: pratiṣedhaḥ . na nañpūrvāt iti uttarasya bhāvapratyayasya pratiṣedhaḥ kriyate . na
GS24pmbhasuu:18848: etat asti prayojanam . parigaṇitābhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaḥ uttaraḥ bhāvapratyayaḥ vidhīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:18849: . na ca tatra kā cit nañpūrvā prakṛtiḥ gṛhyate . tadantavidhinā prāpnoti . grahaṇavatā
GS24pmbhasuu:18850: prātipadikena tadantavidhiḥ pratiṣidhyate . yatra tarhi tadantavidhiḥ asti . patyantapurohitādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18851: yak iti . yadi etāvat prayojanam syāt tatra eva ayam brūyāt apatyantāt yak bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:18852: nañpūrvāt tatpuruṣāt iti . evam tarhi jñāpayati ācārayaḥ uttaraḥ bhāvapratyayaḥ nañpūrvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:18853: bahuvrīheḥ bhavati iti . na iṣyate . tvatalau eva iṣyete :
GS24pmbhasuu:18855: apṛthoḥ bhāvaḥ apṛthutvam apṛthutā iti . evam tarhi jñāpayati ācārayaḥ uttaraḥ bhāvapratyayaḥ anyapūrvāt tatpuruṣāt bhavati iti . na iṣyate . tvatalau eva iṣyete :
GS24pmbhasuu:18857: paramapṛthoḥ bhāvaḥ paramapṛthutvam paramapṛthutā . evam tarhi jñāpayati ācārayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18858: uttaraḥ bhāvapratyayaḥ sāpekṣāt bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . nañsamāsāt
GS24pmbhasuu:18859: anyaḥ bhāvavacanaḥ svarottarapadavṛddhyartham iti uktam . tat upapannam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:18860: etat api na asti prayojanam . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati sarve ete taddhitāḥ sāpekṣāt
GS24pmbhasuu:18861: bhavanti iti yat ayam nañaḥ guṇapratiṣedhe sampādyarhahitālamarthāḥ taddhitāḥ iti āha .
GS24pmbhasuu:18862: (P_5,1.122) KA_II.370.14-19 Ro_IV.100-101 vāvacanam kimartham . vākyam api yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:18863: syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . prakṛṭā mahāvibhāṣā . tayā vākyam api bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:18864: . idam tarhi prayojanam . tvatalau api yathā syātām . etat api na asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:18865: . ā ca tvāt iti etasmāt yatnāt tvatalau api bhaviṣyataḥ . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati .
GS24pmbhasuu:18866: pṛthvādibhyaḥ vāvacanam aṇsamāveśārtham . pṛthvādibhyaḥ vāvacanam kriyate aṇsamāveśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18869: . brāhmaṇādiṣu cāturvarṇyādīnām upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . cāturvarṇyam . cāturvaidyam
GS24pmbhasuu:18870: . cāturāśramyam . arhataḥ num ca . arhataḥ num ca ṣyañ ca vaktavyaḥ . arhataḥ bhāvaḥ ārhantyam ārhatī .
GS24pmbhasuu:18871: (P_5,1.125) KA_II.371.4-6 Ro_IV.101-102 kim idam nalope varṇagrahaṇam āhosvit saṅghātagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:18872: . kim ca ataḥ . yadi varṇagrahaṇam steyam . nalope kṛte ayādeśaḥ prāpnoti . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:18873: saṅghātagrahaṇam antyasya lopaḥ kasmāt na bhavati . siddhaḥ antyasya lopaḥ yasya
GS24pmbhasuu:18874: iti eva . tatra ārambhasāmarthyāt sarvasya bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:18875: (P_5,1.130) KA_II.371.8-10 Ro_IV.102 aṇprakaraṇe śrotriyasya . aṇprakaraṇe śrotriyasya upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam ghalopaḥ ca . śrotriyasya bhāvaḥ śrautram .
GS24pmbhasuu:18876: (P_5,2.4) KA_II.372.2-21 Ro_IV.103-105 tilādibhyaḥ khañ ca . tilādibhyaḥ khañ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:18877: iti vaktavyam . tilyam . tailīnam . kimartham idam ucyate na yatā mukte dhānyānām
GS24pmbhasuu:18878: bhavane kṣetre khañ iti eva siddham . na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . umābhaṅgayoḥ adhānyatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:18879: . dhānyānām bhavane kṣetre khañ iti ucyate . na ca umābhaṅge dhānye . cameṣu yat
GS24pmbhasuu:18880: paṭhyate tat dhānyam . na ca ete tatra paṭhyete . tat tarhi khañgrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:18881: . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . dhānyānām bhavane kṣetre khañ
GS24pmbhasuu:18882: iti . yadi tat anuvartate vrīhiśālayoḥ ḍhak yavayavakaṣaṣṭikāt yat iti khañ ca iti
GS24pmbhasuu:18883: khañ api prāpnoti . sambandham anuvartiṣyate . dhānyānām bhavane kṣetre khañ . vrīhiśālayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18884: ḍhak bhavati . dhānyānām bhavane kṣetre khañ . yavayavakaṣaṣṭikāt yat bhavati . dhānyānām
GS24pmbhasuu:18885: bhavane kṣetre khañ bhavati . vibhāṣā tilamāṣomābhaṅgaṇubhyaḥ . bhavanekṣetregrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:18886: anuvartate . dhānyānām iti nivṛttam . atha vā maṇḍūkaplutayaḥ adhikārāḥ . yathā maṇḍūkāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18887: utplutya utplutya gacchanti tadvat adhikārāḥ . atha vā anyavacanāt cakārākaraṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:18888: prakṛtāpavādaḥ vijñāyate yathā utsargeṇa prasaktasya apavādaḥ . anyasya pratyayasya
GS24pmbhasuu:18889: vacanāt cakārasya ca anukarṣaṇārthasya akaraṇāt prakṛtasya khañaḥ ḍhagyatau bādhakau
GS24pmbhasuu:18890: bhaviṣyataḥ yathā utsargeṇa prasaktasya apavādaḥ bādhakaḥ bhavati . atha vā etat
GS24pmbhasuu:18891: jñāpayati anuvartante ca nāma vidhayaḥ na ca anuvartanāt eva bhavanti . kim tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:18892: . yatnāt bhavanti . atha vā yatā mukte dhānyānām bhavane kṣetre khañ iti eva siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:18893: . nanu ca uktam . na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . umābhaṅgayoḥ adhānyatvāt iti . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18894: doṣaḥ . dhinoteḥ dhānyam . ete ca api dhinutaḥ . atha vā śaṇasaptadaśāni dhānyāni .
GS24pmbhasuu:18895: (P_5,2.6) KA_II.372.23-373.2 Ro_IV.105 sammukha iti kim nipātyate . sammukha iti samasya antalopaḥ . sammukha iti samasya antalopaḥ nipātyate . samamukhasya darśanaḥ sammukhīnaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:18896: (P_5,2.9) KA_II.373.4-6 Ro_IV.105-106 ayānayam neyaḥ iti ucyate . tatra na jñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:18897: kaḥ ayaḥ kaḥ anayaḥ iti . ayaḥ pradakṣiṇam . anayaḥ prasavyam . pradakṣiṇaprasavyagaminām
GS24pmbhasuu:18898: śārāṇām yasmin paraiḥ padānām asamāveśaḥ saḥ ayānayaḥ . ayānayam neyaḥ ayānayīnaḥ śāraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:18899: (P_5,2.10) KA_II.373.8-15 Ro_IV.106-107 parovara iti kim nipātyate . parovara iti
GS24pmbhasuu:18900: parasotvavacanam . parovara iti parasya otvam nipātyate . yadi evam parasyautvavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:18901: iti prāpnoti . śakandhunyāyena nirdeśaḥ . atha vā na evam vijñāyate parasya otvam
GS24pmbhasuu:18902: nipātyate iti . katham tarhi . parasya śabdarūpasya ādeḥ utvam nipātyate iti . parān
GS24pmbhasuu:18903: ca avarān ca anubhavati parovarīṇaḥ . atha parampara iti kim nipātyate . paraparatarāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:18904: paramparabhāvaḥ . paraparatarāṇām paramparabhāvaḥ nipātyate . parān ca paratarān
GS24pmbhasuu:18906: (P_5,2.12) KA_II.373.17-374.9 Ro_IV.107-108 iha samāṃsamīnā gauḥ supaḥ dhātuprātipadikayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18907: iti subluk prāpnoti . samām samām vijāyate iti yalopavacanāt alugvijñānam . samām
GS24pmbhasuu:18908: samām vijāyate iti yalopavacanāt alugvijñānam bhaviṣyati . yat ayam yalopam śāsti
GS24pmbhasuu:18909: tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na atra luk bhavati iti . samām samām vijāyate iti yalopavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:18910: alugvijñānam iti cet uttarapadasya lugvacanam . samām samām vijāyate iti yalopavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:18911: alugvijñānam iti cet uttarapadasya luk vaktavyaḥ . siddham tu pūrvapadasya yalopavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:18912: . siddham etat . katham . pūrvapadasya yalopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . anutpattau uttarapadasya
GS24pmbhasuu:18913: ca vāvacanam . anutpattau pūrvapadasya uttarapadasya ca yalopaḥ vā vaktavyaḥ . samām
GS24pmbhasuu:18914: samām vijāyate . samāyām samāyām vijāyate iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:18915: (P_5,2.14) KA_II.374.11-14 Ro_IV.108 āgavīnaḥ iti kim nipātyate . goḥ āṅpūrvāt a
GS24pmbhasuu:18916: tasya goḥ pratidānāt kāriṇi khaḥ . goḥ āṅpūrvāt a tasya goḥ pratidānāt kāriṇi khaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18917: nipātyate . a tasya goḥ pratidānāt karmakārī āgavīnaḥ karmakaraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:18918: (P_5,2.20) KA_II.374.16-18 Ro_IV.109 kim yaḥ śālāyām adhṛṣṭaḥ saḥ śālīnaḥ kūpe vā
GS24pmbhasuu:18919: yat akāryam tat kaupīnam . na iti āha . uttarapadalopaḥ atra draṣṭavyaḥ . śālāpraveśanam
GS24pmbhasuu:18920: arhati adhṛṣṭaḥ saḥ śālīnaḥ . kūpāvataraṇam arhati akāryam tat kaupīnam .
GS24pmbhasuu:18921: (P_5,2.21) KA_II.374.20-21 Ro_IV.109-110 vrātena jīvati iti ucyate . kim vrātam nāma
GS24pmbhasuu:18922: . nānājātīyāḥ aniyatavṛttayaḥ utsedhajīvinaḥ saṅghāḥ vrātāḥ . teṣām karma vrātam
GS24pmbhasuu:18924: (P_5,2.23) KA_II.375.2-6 Ro_IV.110 haiyaṅgavīnam iti kim nipātyate . hyogodohasya
GS24pmbhasuu:18925: hiyaṅgvādeśaḥ sañjñāyām tasya vikāre . hyogodohasya hiyaṅgvādeśaḥ nipātyate sañjñāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:18926: viṣaye tasya vikāre iti etasmin arthe . hyogodohasya vikāraḥ haiyaṅgavīnam ghṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:18927: . sañjñāyām iti kimartham . hyogodohasya vikāraḥ udaśvit . atra mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:18928: (P_5,2.25) KA_II.375.8-13 Ro_IV.110-111 mūle iti vaktavyam . pakṣasya mūlam pakṣatiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18929: . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . mūle iti vartate . kva prakṛtam . tasya pākamūle
GS24pmbhasuu:18930: pīlvādikarṇāidibhyaḥ kuṇabjāhacau iti . yadi tat anuvartate pāke api prāpnoti . mūle
GS24pmbhasuu:18931: iti anuvartate . pāke iti nivṛttam . katham punaḥ ekayoganirdiṣṭayoḥ ekadeśaḥ anuvarteta
GS24pmbhasuu:18932: ekadeśaḥ vā nivarteta . ekayoganirdiṣṭānām api ekadeśānuvṛttiḥ bhavati . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:18933: . saṅkhyāvayādeḥ ṅīp . dāmahāyanāntāt ca . saṅkhyādeḥ iti anuvartate . avyayādeḥ iti nivṛttam .
GS24pmbhasuu:18934: (P_5,2.27) KA_II.375.15-17 Ro_IV.111 iha nānā iti sahārthaḥ gamyeta . dvau hi pratiṣedhau
GS24pmbhasuu:18935: prakṛtam artham gamayataḥ . na na saḥ saha eva iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na ayam pratyayārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18936: . kim tarhi prakṛtiviśeṣaṇam etat . vi nañ iti etābhyām asahavācibhyām nānāñau bhavataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18938: (P_5,2.28) KA_II.375.19-376.6 Ro_IV.111-112 kasmin arthe śālajādayaḥ bhavanti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:18939: saha iti vartate . bhavet siddham viśāle śṛṅge viśaṅkaṭe śṛṅge iti . iha khalu saṅkaṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:18940: iti saṅgatārthaḥ gamyate . prakaṭam iti pragarārthaḥ gamyate . utkaṭam iti udgatārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18941: gamyate . evam tarhi sādhane śālajādayaḥ bhavanti . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi .
GS24pmbhasuu:18942: katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . upasargebhyaḥ ime vidhīyante . upasargāḥ ca punaḥ evamātmakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18943: yatra kaḥ cit kriyāvācai śabdaḥ prayujyate tatra kriyāviśeṣam āhuḥ . yatra hi na
GS24pmbhasuu:18944: prayujyate sasādhanam tatra kriyām āhuḥ . te ete upasargebhyaḥ vidhīyamānāḥ sasādhanāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:18945: kriyāyām bhaviṣyanti . evam api bhavet siddham viśāle śṛṅge iti . idam tu na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:18946: . viśālaḥ . viśaṅkaṭaḥ iti . etat api siddham . katham . akāraḥ matvarthīyaḥ . viśāle
GS24pmbhasuu:18947: asya staḥ viśālaḥ . viśaṅkaṭe asya staḥ viśaṅkaṭaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:18949: upasaṅkhyānam . kaṭacprakaraṇe alābūtilomābhyaḥ rajasi abhidheye upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:18950: . alābūkaṭaḥ . tilakaṭaḥ . umākaṭaḥ . bhaṅgāyāḥ ca . bhaṅgāyāḥ ca iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:18951: bhaṅgākaṭaḥ . goṣṭhādayaḥ sthānādiṣu paśunāmādibhyaḥ . goṣṭhādayaḥ pratyayāḥ sthānādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:18952: artheṣu paśunāmādibhyaḥ vaktavyāḥ . gogoṣṭham . avigoṣṭham . kaṭac ca vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:18953: avikaṭaḥ uṣṭrakaṭaḥ . paṭac ca vaktavyaḥ . avipaṭaḥ uṣṭrapaṭaḥ . goyugaśabdaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:18954: pratyayaḥ vaktavyaḥ . uṣṭragoyugam . kharagoyugam . tailaśabdaḥ ca pratyayaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18955: . iṅgudatailam . sarṣapatailam . śākaṭaśabdaḥ ca pratyayaḥ vaktavyaḥ . ikṣuśākaṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:18956: . mūlaśākaṭam . śākinaśabdaḥ ca pratyayaḥ vaktavyaḥ . ikṣuśākinam mūlaśākinam . upamānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:18957: vā siddham . upamānāt vā siddham etat . gavām sthānam goṣṭham . yathā gavam tadvat
GS24pmbhasuu:18958: uṣṭrāṇām . kaṭac vaktavyaḥ iti . yathā nānādravyāṇām saṅghātaḥ kaṭaḥ evam avayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18959: saṃhatāḥ avikaṭaḥ . paṭat ca vaktayaḥ iti . yathā paṭaḥ prastīrṇaḥ evam avayaḥ prastīrṇāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18960: avipaṭaḥ . goyugaśabdaḥ ca pratyayaḥ vaktavyaḥ iti . goḥ yugam goyugam . yathā goḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18961: tadvat uṣṭrasya . uṣṭragoyugam . tailaśabdaḥ ca pratyayaḥ vaktavyaḥ iti . prakṛtyantaram
GS24pmbhasuu:18962: tailaśabdaḥ vikāre vartate . evam ca kṛtvā tilatailam iti api siddham bhavati . śākaṭaśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18963: ca pratyayaḥ vaktavyaḥ eva . śākinaśabdaḥ ca pratyayaḥ vaktavyaḥ eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:18964: (P_5,2.33) KA_II.377.6-14 Ro_IV.115 inacpiṭackāḥ pratyayāḥ vaktavyāḥ cikacicik iti
GS24pmbhasuu:18965: ete ca prakṛtyādeśāḥ vaktavyāḥ . cikinaḥ . cipiṭaḥ . cikkaḥ . klinnasya cilpil laḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18966: ca asya cakṣuṣī . klinnasya cil pil iti etau prakṛtyādeśau vaktavyau laḥ ca pratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18967: asya cakṣuṣī iti etasmin arthe . klinne asya cakṣuṣī cillaḥ . pillaḥ . cul ca vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18968: . cullaḥ . yadi asya iti ucyate cille cakṣuṣī pille cakṣuṣī iti na sidhyati . tasmān
GS24pmbhasuu:18969: na arthaḥ asya grahaṇe . katham cillaḥ pillaḥ iti . akāraḥ matvarthīyaḥ . cille asya
GS24pmbhasuu:18970: staḥ cillaḥ . pille asya staḥ pillaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:18971: (P_5,2.37) KA_II.337.16-378.17 Ro_IV.115-118 pramāṇe iti kimayam pratyayārthaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:18972: pramāṇam pratyayārthaḥ na . pramāṇe iti na ayam pratyayārthaḥ . kva tarhi pratyayāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18973: bhavanti . tadvati . kutaḥ etat . asya iti vartanāt . asya iti vartate . kva prakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:18974: . tad asya sañjātam tārakādibhyaḥ itac iti . prathamaḥ ca dvitīyaḥ ca ūrdhvamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:18975: matau mama . ūrudvayasam . ūrudaghnam . pramāṇe laḥ . pramāṇe laḥ vaktavyaḥ : śamaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:18977: vitastiḥ . dvigoḥ nityam . dvigoḥ nityam laḥ vaktavyaḥ . dviśatam . triśatam . dvidiṣṭiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18978: . tridiṣṭiḥ . dvivitastiḥ . trivitastiḥ . kimartham idam ucyate . saṃśaye śrāviṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:18979: vakṣyati yasya asyam purastāt apakarṣaḥ . ḍaṭ stome . ḍaṭ stome vaktavyaḥ . pañcadaśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18980: stomaḥ . śacśanoḥ ḍiniḥ . śacśanoḥ ḍiniḥ vaktavyaḥ . triṃśinaḥ māsāḥ . pañcadaśinaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18981: ardhamāsāḥ . viṃśateḥ ca iti vaktavyam . viṃśinaḥ aṅgirasaḥ . pramāṇaparimāṇābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:18982: saṅkhyāyāḥ ca saṃśaye . mātrac vaktavyaḥ . śamamātram . diṣṭimātram . vitastimātram
GS24pmbhasuu:18983: . kuḍavamātram . pañcamātrāḥ . daśamātrāḥ . vatvantāt svārthe dvayasajmātracau bahulam
GS24pmbhasuu:18984: . vatvantāt svārthe dvayasajmātracau bahulam vaktavyau . tāvat eva tāvaddvayasam
GS24pmbhasuu:18985: . tāvanmātram . yāvat eva yāvaddvayasam . yāvanmātram . [pramāṇam pratyayārthaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:18986: tadvati asya iti vartanāt . prathamaḥ ca dvitīyaḥ ca ūrdhvamāne matau mama . pramāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:18987: laḥ . dvigoḥ nityam . ḍaṭ stome . śacśanoḥ ḍiniḥ . pramāṇaparimāṇābhyām saṅkhyāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18989: (P_5,2.39.1) KA_II.378.19-379.1 Ro_IV.118-119 kimartham parimāṇe iti ucyate na pramāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:18990: iti vartate . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat parimāṇagrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18991: anyat pramāṇam anyat parimāṇam iti . ḍāvatau arthavaiśeṣyāt nirdeśaḥ pṛthak ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:18992: . na etat jñāpakasādhyam anyat pramāṇam anyat parimāṇam iti . uktaḥ atra viśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18993: . mātrādyapratighātāya . evam ca kṛtvā mātrādīnām pratighātaḥ na bhavati . bhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18994: siddhaḥ ca ḍāvatoḥ . ḍāvatvantāt mātrajādīnām bhāvaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:18996: sādṛśe upasaṅkhyānam . vatupprakaraṇe yuṣmadasmadbhyām chandasi sādṛśe upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:18997: kartavyam . na tvāvān anyaḥ divyaḥ na parthivaḥ na jātaḥ na janiṣyate . tvavataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18998: purūvaso . yajñam viprasya mavataḥ . tvatsadṛśasya . matsadṛśasya iti . [ḍāvatau
GS24pmbhasuu:18999: arthavaiśeṣyāt nirdeśaḥ pṛthak ucyate . mātrādyapratighātāya . bhāvaḥ siddhaḥ ca ḍāvatoḥ (R IV.120)]
GS24pmbhasuu:19000: (P_5,2.40) KA_II.379.7-10 Ro_IV.120 kena vihitasya kimidambhyām vatupaḥ vaḥ ghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:19001: ucyate . etat eva jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati kimidambhyām vatup iti yat ayam kimidambhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:19002: uttarasya vatupaḥ vaḥ ghatvam śāsti . atha vā yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . kimidambhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:19003: vatup bhavati . tataḥ vaḥ ghaḥ iti . vaḥ ca asya ghaḥ bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:19004: (P_5,2.41) KA_II.379.12-15 Ro_IV.120-121 bahuṣu iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . kiyān
GS24pmbhasuu:19005: . kiyantau . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . kim iti etat paripraśne vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:19006: paripraśnaḥ ca anirjñāte anirjñātam ca bahuṣu . dvyekayoḥ punaḥ nirjñātam . nirjñātatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:19007: dvyekayoḥ paripraśnaḥ na bhavati . paripraśnābhāvāt kim eva tāvat na asti kutaḥ pratyayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:19008: (P_5,2.42) KA_II.379.17-380.4 Ro_IV.121-122 iha kasmāt na bhavati . bahavaḥ avayavāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19009: asyāḥ saṅkhyāyāḥ iti . avayave yā saṅkhyā iti ucyate . na ca kā cit saṅkhyā asti
GS24pmbhasuu:19010: yasyāḥ bahuśabdaḥ avayavaḥ syāt . nanu ca iyam asti saṅkhyā iti eva . na eṣā saṅkhyā
GS24pmbhasuu:19011: . sañjñā eṣā . avayavavidhāne avayavini pratyayaḥ . avayavavidhāne avayavini pratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19012: bhavati iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . pañca avayavāḥ . daśa avayavāḥ iti . atha avayavini
GS24pmbhasuu:19013: iti ucyamāne avayavasvāmini kasmāt na bhavati . pañca paśvavayavāḥ devadattasya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:19014: . avayavaśabdaḥ ayam guṇaśabdaḥ asya iti ca vartate . tena yam prati avayavaḥ guṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19015: tasmin avayavini pratyayena bhavitavyam . kam ca prati avayavaḥ guṇaḥ . samudāyam
GS24pmbhasuu:19016: . yadi evam avayavini iti api na vaktavyam . avayaveṣu kasmāt na bhavati . asya iti vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:19017: (P_5,2.44) KA_II.380.6-12 Ro_IV.122-123 kimartham udāttaḥ iti ucyate . udāttaḥ yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:19018: syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . pratyayasvareṇa api eṣaḥ svaraḥ siddhaḥ . na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:19019: . citaḥ antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati iti antodāttatvam prasajyeta . atha udāttaḥ iti ucyamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:19020: kutaḥ etat ādeḥ udāttatvam bhaviṣyati na punaḥ antasya iti . udāttavacanasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:19021: yasya aprāptaḥ svaraḥ tasya bhaviṣyati . kasya ca aprāptaḥ . ādeḥ . antasya punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19023: (P_5,2.45) KA_II.380.12-381.5 Ro_IV.123-125 iha kasmāt na bhavati . ekādaśa māṣāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19024: adhikāḥ asmin kārṣāpaṇaśate iti . adhike samānajātau . samānajātau adhike iṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:19025: . atha iha kasmāt na bhavati . ekādaśa kārṣāpaṇāḥ adhikāḥ asyām kārṣāpaṇatriṃsati
GS24pmbhasuu:19026: iti . iṣṭam śatasahasrayoḥ . śatasahasrayoḥ adhike iṣyate . atha ekādaśam śatasahasram
GS24pmbhasuu:19027: iti kasya ādhikye bhavitavyam . yasya saṅkhyā tadādhikye ḍaḥ kartavyaḥ mataḥ mama
GS24pmbhasuu:19028: . yadi tāvat śatāni saṅkhyāyante śatādhikye bhavitavyam . atha sahasrāṇi saṅkhyāyante
GS24pmbhasuu:19029: sahasrādhikye bhavitavyam . ḍavidhāne parimāṇaśabdānām ādhikyasya adhikaraṇābhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:19030: anirdeśaḥ . ḍavidhāne parimāṇaśabdānām ādhikyasya adhikaraṇābhāvāt anirdeśaḥ . agamakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19031: nirdeśaḥ anirdeśaḥ . na hi ekādaśānām śatam adhikaraṇam . siddham tu pañcamīnirdeśāt
GS24pmbhasuu:19032: . siddham etat . katham . pañcamīnirdeśāt . pañcamīnirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . tat asmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:19033: adhikam iti . saḥ tarhi pañcamīnirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . yadi api tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:19034: vyāpake vaiṣayike vā adhikaraṇe sambhavaḥ na asti aupaśleṣikam adhikaraṇam vijñāsyate
GS24pmbhasuu:19035: . ekādaśa kārṣāpaṇāḥ upaśliṣṭāḥ asmin śate ekādaśam śatam .
GS24pmbhasuu:19036: (P_5,2.46) KA_II.381.7-16 Ro_IV.125-126 kimartham śadgrahaṇe antagrahaṇam . śadgrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:19037: antagrahaṇam pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ tadādeḥ adhikārtham . śadgrahaṇe antagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:19038: kriyate . pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ vihitaḥ tadādeḥ tadantasya grahaṇam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:19040: ekatriṃśam śatam . iṣyate ca atra api syāt iti . tat ca antareṇa yatnam na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:19041: iti antagrahaṇam . evamartham idam ucyate . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti
GS24pmbhasuu:19042: . saṅkhyāgrahaṇam ca . saṅkhyāgrahaṇam ca kartavyam . iha mā bhūt . gotriṃśat adhikarm
GS24pmbhasuu:19043: asmin śate iti . viṃśateḥ ca . viṃśateḥ ca antagrahaṇam kartavyam . iha api yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:19044: syāt . ekaviṃśam śatam . cakārāt saṅkhyāgrahaṇam ca kartavyam . iha mā bhūt . goviṃśatiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19046: (P_5,2.47) KA_II.381.18-382.16 Ro_IV.126-129 nimāne guṇini . nimāne guṇini iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:19047: . kim prayojanam . guṇeṣu mā bhūt . bhūyasaḥ . bhūyasaḥ iti ca vaktavyam . kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:19048: . bhūyasaḥ vācikāyāḥ saṅkhyāyāḥ utpattiḥ yathā syāt alpīyasaḥ vācikāyāḥ saṅkhyāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19049: utpattiḥ mā bhūt iti . ekaḥ anyataraḥ . ekaḥ cet anyataraḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:19050: . iha mā bhūt . dvau yavānām trayaḥ udaśvitaḥ iti . samānānām . samānānām ca iti
GS24pmbhasuu:19051: vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . ekaḥ yavānām adhyardhaḥ udaśvitaḥ iti . tat tarhi bahu
GS24pmbhasuu:19052: vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . yat tāvat ucyate . guṇini iti vaktavyam iti . na vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:19053: . guṇeṣu kasmāt na bhavati . asya iti vartate . yat uktam bhūyasaḥ iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:19054: iti . na vaktavyam . alpīyasaḥ vācikāyāḥ saṅkhyāyāḥ utpattiḥ kasmāt na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:19055: anabhidhānāt . yat uktam ekaḥ cet anyataraḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam iti . na vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:19056: . kasmāt na bhavati dvau yavānām trayaḥ udaśvitaḥ iti . tantram vibhaktinirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19057: . yat api ucyate samānānām ca iti vaktavyam iti . na vaktavyam . kasmāt na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:19058: ekaḥ yavānām adhyardhaḥ udaśvitaḥ iti . anabhidhānāt . nimeye ca api dṛśyate . nimeye
GS24pmbhasuu:19059: ca api pratyayaḥ dṛśyate . dvimayāḥ yavāḥ . trimayāḥ . kim punaḥ iha nimānam kim
GS24pmbhasuu:19060: nimeyam yāvatā ubhayam tyajyate . satyam evam etat . kva cit tu kā cit prasṛtatarā
