GS24pmbhasuu:19061: gatiḥ bhavati . tat yathā . samāne tyāge dhānyam vikrīṇite yavān vikrīṇīte iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:19062: . na kaḥ cit āha kārṣāpaṇam vikrīṇite iti . atha vā yena adhigamyate tat nimānam
GS24pmbhasuu:19064: (P_5,2.48) KA_II.382.18-383.22 Ro_IV.129-133 tasya pūraṇe iti atiprasaṅgaḥ . tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:19065: pūraṇe iti atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . iha api prapnoti . pañcānām uṣṭrikāṇām pūraṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19066: ghaṭaḥ . siddham tu saṅkhyāpūraṇe iti vacanāt . siddham etat . katham . saṅkhyāpūraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:19067: iti vaktavyam . evam api ghaṭe prāpnoti . saṅkhyeyam hi asau adbhiḥ pūrayati . saṅkhyāpūraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:19068: iti brūmaḥ na saṅkhyeyapūraṇe iti . yasya vā bhāvāt anyasaṅkhyātvam tatra . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:19069: vā yasya bhāvāt anyā saṅkhyā pravartate tatra iti vaktavyam . evam api dvitīye adhyāye
GS24pmbhasuu:19070: aṣṭamaḥ iti prāpnoti . sarveṣām hi teṣām bhāvāt saṅkhyā pravartate . caramopajāte
GS24pmbhasuu:19071: pūrvasmin ca anapagate iti vaktavyam . evam api ekādaśīdvādaśyau sauviṣṭakṛtī . idam
GS24pmbhasuu:19072: dvitīyam idam tṛtīyam . daśa daśamāni iti na sidhyati . sūtram ca bhidyate . yathānyāsam
GS24pmbhasuu:19073: eva astu . nanu ca uktam tasya pūraṇe iti atiprasaṅgaḥ iti . parihṛtam etat siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:19074: saṅkhyāpūraṇe iti vacanāt iti . tat tarhi saṅkhyāgrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:19075: . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . saṅkhyāyāḥ guṇasya nimāne mayaṭ iti . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:19076: tarhi na iyam vṛttiḥ upālabhyate . kim tarhi . vṛttisthānam upālabhyate . vṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19077: eva atra na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . pratyayārthābhāvāt . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . vacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:19078: svāṛthikaḥ bhaviṣyati . atha vā pūrvasyāḥ saṅkhyāyāḥ parāpekṣāyāḥ utpattiḥ vaktavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:19079: uttarā ca sāṅkhyā ādeśaḥ vaktavyaḥ . atha vā nyūne ayam kṛtsnaśabdaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:19080: caturṣu pañcaśabdaḥ . atha vā sarve eva dvyādayaḥ anyonyam apekṣante . yadi evam
GS24pmbhasuu:19081: dvitīye adhyāye aṣṭamaḥ iti prāpnoti . bhavati eva . prakṛtyarthāt bahiḥ sarvā vṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19082: prāyeṇa lakṣyate . pūraṇe syāt katham vṛttiḥ . vacanāt iti lakṣyatām . tasyāḥ pūrvā
GS24pmbhasuu:19083: tu yā saṅkhyā tasyāḥ [R tasyām ] bhavatu taddhitaḥ . ādeśaḥ ca ottarā saṅkhyā tathā
GS24pmbhasuu:19084: nyāyyā bhaviṣyati . nyūne vā kṛtsnaśabdaḥ ayam pūrvasyām uttarām yadi sāmarthyam
GS24pmbhasuu:19085: ca tayā tasyāḥ tathā nyāyyā bhaviṣyati . anyonyam vā vyapāśritya sarvasmin dvyādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19086: yadi pravartante tathā nyāyyā vṛttiḥ bhavati pūraṇe . bahūnām vācikā saṅkhyā pūraṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19087: ca ekaḥ iṣyate . anyatvāt ubhayoḥ nyāyyā vārkṣī śākhā nidarśanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:19088: (P_5,2.49) KA_II.383.24-384.7 Ro_IV.133-134 maḍādiṣu yasya ādiḥ tannirderdeśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:19089: maḍādiṣu yasya ādiḥ kriyate tannirderdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . asya ādiḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:19090: . akiryamāṇe hi pratyayādhikārāt pratyayaḥ ayam vijñāyeta . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . pratyayāntare
GS24pmbhasuu:19091: hi svare doṣaḥ . pratyayāntare hi sati svare doṣaḥ syāt . viṃśatitamaḥ . eṣaḥ svaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19092: prasajyeta . viṃśatitamaḥ iti ca iṣyate . saḥ tarhi tathā nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na
GS24pmbhasuu:19093: kartavyaḥ . prakṛtam ḍaḍgrahaṇam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . tasya pūraṇe ḍaṭ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:19094: . tat vai prathamānirdiṣṭam ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭena ca arthaḥ . nāntāt iti pañcamī ḍaṭ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:19095: prathamāyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayiṣyati . tasmāt iti uttarasya iti . pratyayavidhiḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:19096: na ca pratyayavidhau pañcamyaḥ prakalpikāḥ bhavanti . na ayam pratyayavidhiḥ . vihitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19098: (P_5,2.51.1) KA_II.384.9-10 Ro_IV.134 caturaḥ chayatau ādyakṣaralopaḥ ca . caturaḥ chayatau vaktavyau ādyakṣaralopaḥ ca vaktavyaḥ . turīyam . turyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:19099: (P_5,2.51.2) KA_II.384.11-17 Ro_IV.134-135 atha kimartham thaṭthukau pṛthak kriyete
GS24pmbhasuu:19100: na sarvam thaṭ eva syāt thuk eva vā . thaṭthukoḥ pṛthakkaraṇam padāntavidhipratiṣedhāṛtham
GS24pmbhasuu:19102: padāntapratiṣedhāṛtham ca . padāntavidhyartham tāvat . parṇamayāni pañcathāni bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:19103: . rathaḥ saptathaḥ . padantasya iti nalopaḥ yathā syāt . padāntapratiṣedhāṛtham .
GS24pmbhasuu:19104: ṣaṣṭhaḥ . padāntasya iti jaśtvam mā bhūt . iha caturthaḥ iti padāntasya iti visarjanīyaḥ mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:19106: . bahukatipayavatūnām liṅgaviśiṣṭād utpattiḥ vaktavyā . iha api yathā syāt . bahvīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:19107: pūraṇī bahutithī . katipayānām pūraṇī katipayathī . tāvatīnām pūraṇī tāvatithī .
GS24pmbhasuu:19108: bahukatipayavatūnām liṅgaviśiṣṭād utpattiḥ siddhā . katham . prātipadikagrahaṇe liṅgaviśiṣṭasya
GS24pmbhasuu:19109: api grahaṇam bhavati iti . puṃvadvacanam ca . puṃvadbhāvaḥ ca vaktavyaḥ . bahvīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:19110: pūraṇī bahutithī . kimartham na bhasya aḍhe taddhite puṃvat bhavati iti siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:19111: bhasya iti ucyate . yajādau ca bham bhavati . na ca atra yajādim paśyāmaḥ . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:19112: . tithukā vyavihitatvāt na prāpnoti . idam iha sampradhāryam . tithuk kriyatām puṃvadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19113: iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt puṃvadbhāvaḥ . nityaḥ tithuk . kṛte api puṃvadbhāve
GS24pmbhasuu:19114: prāpnoti akṛte api prāpnoti . tithuk api anityaḥ . anyasya kṛte puṃvadbhāve prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:19115: anyasya akṛte . śabdāntarasya ca prāpnuvan vidhiḥ anityaḥ bhavati . antaraṅgaḥ tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:19116: tithuk . kā antaraṅgatā . utpattisanniyogena tithuk ucyate utpanne pratyayte prakṛtipratyayau
GS24pmbhasuu:19117: āśritya puṃvadbhāvaḥ . puṃvadbhāvaḥ api antaraṅgaḥ . katham . uktam etat siddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19118: ca pratyayavidhau iti . ubhayoḥ antaraṅgayoḥ paratvāt puṃvadbhāvaḥ . puṃvadbhāve
GS24pmbhasuu:19120: (P_5,2.58) KA_II.385.15-20 Ro_IV.136-137 asaṅkhyādeḥ iti kimartham . iha mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:19121: . ekaṣaṣṭaḥ . dviṣaṣṭaḥ . asaṅkhyādeḥ iti śakyam avaktum . kasmāt na bhavati ekaṣaṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19122: . dviṣaṣṭaḥ iti . ṣaṣṭiśabdāt pratyayaḥ vidhīyate . kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ yat ekaṣaṣṭiśabdāt
GS24pmbhasuu:19123: syāt . na eva prāpnoti na arthaḥ pratiṣedhena . tadantavidhinā prāpnoti . grahaṇavatā
GS24pmbhasuu:19124: prātipadikena tadantavidhiḥ pratiṣidhyate . evam tarhi jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:19125: iha tadantavidhiḥ iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . ekaviṃśatitamaḥ . etat siddham bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:19126: (P_5,2.59) KA_II.385.22-386.14 Ro_IV.137-140 chaprakaraṇe anekapadāt api . chaprakaraṇe anekapadāt api iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:19128: kayāśubhīyam . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . aprātipadikatvāt . siddham tu prātipadikavijñānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:19129: . siddham etat . katham . prātipadikavijñānāt . katham prātipadikavijñānam . svam
GS24pmbhasuu:19130: rūpam śabdasya aśabdasañjñā iti vacanāt . svam rūpam śabdasya aśabdasañjñā bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:19131: iti . evam yaḥ asau āmnāye asyavāmaśabdaḥ paṭhyate saḥ asya padārthaḥ . kim punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19132: anye āmnāyaśabdāḥ anye ime . om iti āha . kutaḥ etat . āmnāyaśabdānām anyabhāvyam
GS24pmbhasuu:19133: svaravarṇānupūrvīdeśakālaniyatatvāt . svaraḥ niyataḥ āmnāye asyavāmaśabdasya . varṇānupūrvī
GS24pmbhasuu:19134: khalu api āmnāye niyatā asyavāmaśabdasya . deśaḥ khalu api āmnāye niyataḥ . śmaśāne
GS24pmbhasuu:19135: na adhyeyam . catuṣpathe na adhyeyam iti . kālaḥ khalu api āmnāye niyataḥ . na amāvāsyāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:19136: na caturdaśāyām iti . padaikadeśasubalopadarśanāt ca . padaikadeśaḥ khalu api āmnāye
GS24pmbhasuu:19137: dṛśyate . asyavāmīyam . nanu ca eṣaḥ sublopaḥ syāt . subalopadarśanāt ca . subalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19138: khalu api dṛśyate . asyavāmīyam iti . yadi tarhi anye āmnāyaśabdāḥ anye ime matvarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19139: na upapadyate . asyavāmaśabdaḥ asmin asti iti . na sañjñā sañjñinam vyabhicarati .
GS24pmbhasuu:19140: (P_5,2.60) KA_II.386.16-18 Ro_IV.140 adhyāyānuvākābhyām vā luk . adhyāyānuvākābhyām vā luk vaktavyaḥ . stambhaḥ . stambhīyaḥ . gardabhāṇḍaḥ . gardabhāṇḍīyaḥ . anukaḥ . anukīyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:19142: kāmābhidhāne iti vaktavyam . ṣaṣthyarthe hi aniṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ . ṣaṣthyarthe hi sati
GS24pmbhasuu:19143: aniṣṭaḥ prāpnoti . dhane kāmaḥ asya iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . kasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:19144: na bhavati dhane kāmaḥ asya iti . anabhidhānāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:19145: (P_5,2.72) KA_II.387.5-8 Ro_IV.141 kim yaḥ śītam karoti saḥ śītakaḥ yaḥ vā uṣṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:19146: karoti sa uṣṇakaḥ . kim ca ataḥ . tuṣāre āditye ca prāpnoti . evam tarhi uttarapadalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19147: atra draṣṭavyaḥ . śītam iva śītam . uṣṇam iva uṣṇam . yaḥ āśu kartavyān arthān cireṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:19148: karoti saḥ ucyate śītakaḥ iti . yaḥ punaḥ āśu kartavyān arthān āśu eva karoti saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19150: (P_5,2.73) KA_II.387.10-13 Ro_IV.141-142 adhikam iti kim nipātyate . adyārūḍhasya
GS24pmbhasuu:19151: uttarapadalopaḥ ca kan ca pratyayaḥ . adhyārūḍham adhikam iti . bhavet siddham adhyārūḍhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19152: droṇaḥ khāryām adhikaḥ droṇaḥ khāryām iti . idam tu na sidhyati . adhyārūḍhā droṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:19153: khārī . adhikā droṇena khārī iti . gatyarthānām hi ktaḥ kartari vidhīyate . gatyarthānām
GS24pmbhasuu:19155: (P_5,2.75) KA_II.387.15-17 Ro_IV.142) kim yaḥ pārśvena anvicchati saḥ pārvśvakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19156: . kim ca ataḥ . rājapuruṣe prāpnoti . evam tarhi uttarapadalopaḥ atra draṣṭavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19157: . pārśvam iva pārśvam . yaḥ ṛjunā upāyena anveṣṭavyān arthān anṛjunā upāyena anvicchati
GS24pmbhasuu:19159: (P_5,2.76) KA_II.387.19-388.2 Ro_IV.142 kim yaḥ ayaḥśulena anvicchati saḥ āyaḥśūlikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19160: . kim ca ataḥ . śivabhāgavate prāpnoti . evam tarhi uttarapadalopaḥ atra draṣṭavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19161: . ayaḥśulam iva ayaḥśulam . yaḥ mṛdunā upāyena anveṣṭavyān arthān rabhasena upāyena
GS24pmbhasuu:19163: (P_5,2.77) KA_II.388.4-8 Ro_IV.143 tāvatitham grahaṇam iti luk vāvacanānarthakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:19164: vibhāṣāprakaraṇāt . tāvatitham grahaṇam iti luk vāvacanam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:19165: . vibhāṣāprakaraṇāt . prakṛtā mahāvibhāṣā . tayā etat siddham . tāvatithena gṛhṇāti
GS24pmbhasuu:19166: iti luk ca . tāvatithena gṛhṇāti iti upasaṅkhyānam kartavya luk ca vaktavyaḥ . ṣaṣthena gṛhṇāti ṣaṭkaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:19167: (P_5,2.79) KA_II.388.10-17 Ro_IV.143-144 śṛṅkhalam asya bandhanam karabhe iti anirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19168: . śṛṅkhalam asya bandhanam karabhe iti anirdeśaḥ . agamakaḥ nirdeśaḥ anirdeśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:19169: na hi tasya śṛṅkhalabandhanam . śṛṅkhalavatyā asau rajjvā badhyate . siddham tu tadvannirdeśāt
GS24pmbhasuu:19170: luk ca . siddham etat . katham . tadvannirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ luk ca vaktavyaḥ . śṛṅkhalavat
GS24pmbhasuu:19171: bandhanam iti . saḥ tarhi tadvannirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . iha yat na antareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:19172: yasya pravṛttiḥ bhavati tat tasya nimittatvāya kalpate . na ca antareṇa śṛṅkhalam
GS24pmbhasuu:19173: bandhanam pravartate . atha vā sāhacaryāt tācchabdyam bhaviṣyati . śṛṅkhalasahacaritam
GS24pmbhasuu:19175: (P_5,2.82) KA_II.388.19-20 Ro_IV.144 prāye sañjñāyām vaṭakebhyaḥ iniḥ . prāye sañjñāyām vaṭakebhyaḥ iniḥ vaktavyaḥ . vaṭakinī paurṇamāsī .
GS24pmbhasuu:19176: (P_5,2.84) KA_II.389.2-7 Ro_IV. 144-145 kim nipātyate . śrotriyan chandaḥ adhīte
GS24pmbhasuu:19177: iti vākyārthe padavacanam . chandaḥ adhīte iti asya vākyasya arthe śrotriyan iti
GS24pmbhasuu:19178: etat padam nipātyate . chandasaḥ vā śrtotrabhāvaḥ tat adhīte iti ghan ca . chandasaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19179: vā śrtotrabhāvaḥ nipātyate tat adhīte iti etasmin arthe ghan ca pratyayaḥ . chandaḥ adhīte śṛotriyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:19180: (P_5,2.85) KA_II.389.9-12 Ro_IV.145 iniṭhanoḥ samānakālagrahaṇam . iniṭhanoḥ samānakālagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:19181: kartavyam . adya bhukte śraḥ śrāddhikaḥ iti mā bhūt . uktam vā . kim uktam . anabhidhānāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:19182: (P_5,2.91) KA_II.389.14-16 Ro_IV.145-146 sañjñāyām iti kimartham . tribhiḥ sākṣāt
GS24pmbhasuu:19183: dṛṣṭam bhavati yaḥ ca dadāti yasmai ca dīyate yaḥ ca upadraṣṭā . tatra sarvatra pratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19185: (P_5,2.92) KA_II.389.18-390.6 Ro_IV.146-147 kim nipātyate . kṣetriyaḥ śrotriyavat
GS24pmbhasuu:19186: . kṣetriyaḥ śrotriyavat nipātyate . parakṣetre cikitsyaḥ iti etasya vākyasya arthe
GS24pmbhasuu:19187: kṣetriyac iti etat padam nipātyate . parakṣetrāt vā tatra cikitsyaḥ iti paralopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19188: ghac ca . parakṣetrāt vā tatra cikitsyaḥ iti etasmin arthe paralopaḥ nipātyate ghac
GS24pmbhasuu:19190: (P_5,2.94.1) KA_II.391.2-23 Ro_IV.147-153 kimartham imau arthau ubhau nirdiśyete :
GS24pmbhasuu:19191: asya asmin iti na yat yasya bhavati tasmin api tat bhavati yat ca yasmin bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:19192: tat tasya api bhavati . na etayoḥ āvaśyakaḥ samāveśaḥ . bhavanti hi devadattasya
GS24pmbhasuu:19193: gāvaḥ na ca tāḥ tasmin ādhṛtāḥ bhavanti . bhavanti ca parvate vṛkṣāḥ na ca te tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:19194: bhavanti . atha astigrahaṇam kimartham . sattāyām arthe pratyayaḥ yathā syāt . na
GS24pmbhasuu:19195: etat asti prayojanam . na sattām padārthaḥ vyabhicarati . idam tarhi prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:19198: gāvaḥ asya āsan . gāvaḥ asya bhavitāraḥ iti . na tarhi idānīm idam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:19199: gomān āsīt . gomān bhavitā iti . bhavati na tu etasmin vākye . yadi etasmin vākye syāt yathā iha asteḥ prayogaḥ na bhavati gomān yavamān iti evam iha api na syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:19200: gomān āsīt . gomān bhavitā iti . sati api asteḥ prayoge yathā iha bahuvacanam śrūyate
GS24pmbhasuu:19201: gāvaḥ asya āsan gāvaḥ asya bhavitāraḥ evam iha api syāt . gomān āsīt . gomān bhavitā
GS24pmbhasuu:19202: iti . kā tarhi iyam vācoyuktiḥ . gomān āsīt . gomān bhavitā iti . eṣā eṣā vācoyuktiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19203: . na eṣā gavām sattā kathyate . kim tarhi . gomatsattā eṣā kathyate . asti atra vartamānakālaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19204: astiḥ . katham tarhi bhūtabhaviṣyatsattā gamyate . dhātusambandhe pratyayāḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:19205: idam tarhi prayojanam . astiyuktāt yathā syāt . anantarādiyuktāt mā bhūt iti . gāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19206: asya anantarāḥ . gāvaḥ asya samīpe iti . atha kriyamāṇe api astrigrahaṇe iha kasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:19207: na bhavati . gāvaḥ asya santi anantarāḥ . gāvaḥ asya santi samīpe iti . asāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:19208: . katham asāmarthyam . sāpekṣam asarmartham bhavati iti . yathā eva tarhi kriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:19209: astrigrahaṇe asāmarthyāt anantarādiṣu na bhavanti evam akriyamāṇe api na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:19210: . asti atra viśeṣaḥ . kriyamāṇe astrigrahaṇe na antareṇa tṛtīyasya padasya prayogam
GS24pmbhasuu:19211: antarādayaḥ arthāḥ gamyante . akriyamāṇe punaḥ astrigrahaṇe antareṇa api tṛtīyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:19213: (P_5,2.94.2) KA_II.391.24-392.19 Ro_IV.153-156 atha iha kasmāt na bhavati . citraguḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19214: . śabalaguḥ iti . bahuvrīhyuktatvāt matvarthasya . atha iha kasmāt na bhavati . citrāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19215: gāvaḥ asya santi iti . kutaḥ kasmāt na bhavati . kim avayavāt āhosvit samudāyāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:19216: avayavāt kasmāt na bhavati . asāmarthyāt . katham asāmarthyam . sāpekṣam asarmartham
GS24pmbhasuu:19217: bhavati iti . samudāyāt tarhi kasmāt na bhavati . aprātipadikatvāt . nanu ca bhoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19218: ākṛtau śāstrāṇi pravartante . tat yathā sup supā iti vartamāne anyasya ca anyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:19219: ca samāsaḥ bhavati . satyam evam etat . ākṛtiḥ tu pratyekam parisamāpyate . yāvati
GS24pmbhasuu:19220: etat parisamāpyate ṅyāpprātipadikāt iti tāvataḥ utpattyā bhavitavyam . avayave ca
GS24pmbhasuu:19221: etat parisamāpyate na samudāye . atha iha kasmāt na bhavati . pañca gāvaḥ asya santi
GS24pmbhasuu:19222: pañcaguḥ . daśaguḥ iti . pratyekam asāmarthyāt samudāyāt aprātipadikatvāt samāsāt
GS24pmbhasuu:19223: samāsena uktatvāt . na etat sāram . ukte api hi pratyayārthe utpadyate dvigoḥ taddhitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19224: . tat yathā dvaimāturaḥ pāñcanāpitiḥ iti . na eṣaḥ dviguḥ . kaḥ tarhi . bahuvrīhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19225: . apavādatvāt dviguḥ prāpnoti . antaraṅgatvāt bahuvrīhiḥ bhaviṣyati . kā antaraṅgatā
GS24pmbhasuu:19226: . anyapadārthe bahuvrīhiḥ vartate viśiṣṭe anyapadārthe taddhitārthe dviguḥ . tasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:19227: ca asya taddhite astigrahaṇam kriyate . yadi tarhi atiprasaṅgāḥ santi bahuvrīhau
GS24pmbhasuu:19228: api astigrahaṇam kartavyam astiyuktāt yathā syāt anantarādiyuktāt mā bhūt iti . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:19229: na santi taddhitavidhau api na arthaḥ astigrahaṇena . satyam evam etat . kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:19230: tu idānīm taddhitavidhau astigrahaṇam . tat vai kriyamāṇam api pratyayavidhyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:19231: na upādhyartham . astimān iti matup yathā syāt . kim ca kāraṇam na syāt . aprātipadikatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:19232: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . avyayam eṣaḥ astiśabdaḥ . na eṣa asteḥ laṭ . katham avyayatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:19233: . vibhaktisvarapratirūpakāḥ ca nipātāḥ bhavanti iti nipātasañjñā . nipātaḥ avyayam
GS24pmbhasuu:19234: iti avyayasañjñā . evam api na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . astisāmānādhikaraṇye matup
GS24pmbhasuu:19235: vidhīyate . na ca asteḥ astinā sāmānādhikaraṇyam . tat etat kriyamāṇam api pratyayavidhyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:19236: na upādhyartham . tasmāt dvigoḥ taddhitasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ yadi tat na asti
GS24pmbhasuu:19237: sarvatra matvarthe pratiṣedhaḥ iti . sati hi tasmin tena eva siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:19238: (P_5,2.94.3) KA_II.392.20-393.10 Ro_IV.156-159 atha matvarthīyāt matvarthīyena bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:19239: . na bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam . arthagatyarthaḥ śabdaprayogaḥ . artham sampratyāyayiṣyāmi
GS24pmbhasuu:19240: iti śabdaḥ prayujyate . tatra ekena uktatvāt tasya arthasya dvitīyasya prayogeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:19241: na bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam . uktārthānām aprayogaḥ iti . na tarhi idānīm idam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:19242: daṇḍimatī śālā . hastimatī upapatyakā iti . bhavati . arthāntare vṛttāt arthāntare
GS24pmbhasuu:19243: vṛttiḥ . ṣaṣṭhyarthe vā vṛttam saptamyarthe vartate saptamyarthe vā vṛttam ṣaṣṭhyarthe
GS24pmbhasuu:19245: gomantaḥ asya santi . yavamantaḥ asya santi iti . na bhavitavyam . kim kāṛaṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:19246: yasya gomantaḥ santi gāvaḥ api tasya santi . tatra uktaḥ gobhiḥ abhisambandhe pratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19247: iti kṛtvā taddhitaḥ na bhaviṣyati . na tarhi idānīm idam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:19248: daṇḍimatī śālā . hastimatī upapatyakā iti . bhavati . arthāntare vṛttāt arthāntare
GS24pmbhasuu:19249: vṛttiḥ . ṣaṣṭhyarthe vā vṛttam saptamyarthe vartate saptamyarthe vā vṛttam ṣaṣṭhyarthe
GS24pmbhasuu:19250: vartate . iha api saptamyarthe vā vṛttam ṣaṣṭhyarthe vartate ṣaṣṭhyarthe vā vṛttam
GS24pmbhasuu:19251: saptamyarthe vartate . anyathājātīyakaḥ khalu api gobhiḥ abhisambandhe pratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19252: anyathājātīyakaḥ tadvatā . yena eva khalu api hetunā etat vākyam bhavati gomantaḥ asya santi ,
GS24pmbhasuu:19253: yavamantaḥ asya santi iti tena eva hetunā vṛttiḥ api prāpnoti . tasmāt matvarthīyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:19254: matubādeḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . tam ca api bruvatā samānvṛttau sarūpaḥ iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:19255: . bhavati hi daṇḍimatī śālā hastimatī upapatyakā iti . śaiṣikāt matubarthīyāt śaiṣikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19256: matubarthīyaḥ sarūpaḥ pratyayaḥ na iṣṭaḥ . sanantāt na san iṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:19257: (P_5,2.94.4) KA_II.393.11-394.6 Ro_IV.159-161 kim punaḥ ime matupprabhṛtayaḥ sanmātre
GS24pmbhasuu:19258: bhavanti . evam bhavitum arhati . matupprabhṛtayaḥ sanmātre cet atiprasaṅgaḥ . matupprabhṛtayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19259: sanmātre cet atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . iha api prāpnoti . vrīhiḥ asya . yavaḥ asya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:19260: . tasmāt bhūmādigrahaṇam kartavyam . ke punaḥ bhūmādayaḥ . bhūmanindāpraśaṃsāsu nityayoge
GS24pmbhasuu:19261: atiśāyane saṃsarge astivivakṣāyām bhavanti matubādayaḥ . bhūmni :
GS24pmbhasuu:19268: daṇḍī chatrī . tat tarhi bhūmādigrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . kasmāt na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:19269: . vrīhiḥ asya . yavaḥ asya iti . uktam vā. kim uktam . anabhidhānāt iti . itikaraṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19270: khalu api kriyate . tataḥ cet vivakṣā . bhūmādiyuktasya eva ca vivakṣā . gomān yavamān
GS24pmbhasuu:19271: . bhūmādiyuktasya eva sattā kathyate . na hi kasya cit yavaḥ na asti . saṅkhādakī
GS24pmbhasuu:19272: kakudāvartinī . nindāuktasya eva sattā kathyate . na hi kaḥ cit na saṅkhādakī . rūpavān
GS24pmbhasuu:19273: varṇavān . praśaṃsāyuktasya eva sattā kathyate . na hi kasya cit rūpam na asti .
GS24pmbhasuu:19274: kṣīriṇaḥ vṛkṣāḥ . kaṇṭakinaḥ vṛkṣāḥ iti . nityayuktasya eva sattā kathyate . na hi
GS24pmbhasuu:19275: kasya cit kṣiram na asti . udariṇī kanyā iti . atiśāyanayuktasya eva sattā kathyate
GS24pmbhasuu:19276: . na hi kasya cit udaram na asti . daṇḍī chatrī . saṃsargayuktasya eva sattā kathyate
GS24pmbhasuu:19277: . na hi kasya cit daṇḍaḥ na asti . yāvatībhiḥ khalu api gobhiḥ vāhadohaprasavāḥ kalpante
GS24pmbhasuu:19278: tāvatīṣu sattā kathyate . kasya cit tisṛbhiḥ kalpante kasya cit śatena api na prakalpante
GS24pmbhasuu:19279: . sanmātre ca ṛṣidarśanāt . sanmātre ca punaḥ ṛṣiḥ darśayati matupam . yavamatībhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19281: (P_5,2.94.5) KA_II.394.7-15 Ro_IV.161-162 guṇavacanebhyaḥ matupaḥ luk . guṇavacanebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19282: matupaḥ luk vaktavyaḥ . śuklaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ iti . avyatirekāt siddham . na guṇaḥ guṇinam
GS24pmbhasuu:19283: vyabhicarati iti . avyatirekāt siddham iti cet dṛṣṭaḥ vyatirekaḥ . dṛśyate vyatirekaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19284: . tat yatha paṭasya śuklaḥ iti . tathā ca liṅgavacanasiddhiḥ . evam ca kṛtvā liṅgavacanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:19285: siddhāni bhavanti . śuklam vastram . śuklā śāṭī . śuklaḥ kambalaḥ . śuklau kambalau
GS24pmbhasuu:19286: . śuklāḥ kambalāḥ iti . yat asau dravyam śritaḥ bhavati guṇaḥ tasya yat liṅgam vacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:19288: (P_5,2.95) KA_II.394.17-22 Ro_IV.162-163 kimartham idam ucyate na tat asya asti asmin
GS24pmbhasuu:19289: iti eva matup siddhaḥ . rasādibhyaḥ punarvacanam anyanirvṛttyartham . rasādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19290: punarvacanam kriyate anyeṣām matvarthīyānām pratiṣedhārtham . matup eva yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:19291: . ye anye matvarthīyāḥ prāpnuvanti te mā bhūvan iti . na etat asti prayojanam . dṛśyante
GS24pmbhasuu:19292: hi anye rasādibhyaḥ matvarthīyāḥ . rasikaḥ naṭaḥ . urvaśī vai rūpiṇī apsarasām .
GS24pmbhasuu:19294: (P_5,2.96) KA_II.395.2-4 Ro_IV.163 iha kasmāt na bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:19296: jihīrṣā asya asti iti . prāṇyaṅgāt iti vaktavyam . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . kasmāt na bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:19299: (P_5,2.97) KA_II.395.6-396.5 Ro_IV.163-165 sidhmādiṣu yāni akārāntāni tebhyaḥ lacā
GS24pmbhasuu:19300: mukte iniṭhanau prapnutaḥ iniṭhanau ca na iṣyete . lac anyatarasyām iti samuccayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19301: . lac anyatarasyām iti samuccayaḥ ayam na vibhāṣā . lac ca matup ca . katham punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19302: etat jñāyate lac anyatarasyām iti samuccayaḥ ayam na vibhāṣā iti . picchādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19303: tundādīnām nānāyogakaraṇam jñāpakam asamāveśasya . yat ayam picchādibhyaḥ tundādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:19304: nānāyogam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ samuccayaḥ ayam na vibhāṣā iti . yadi vibhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:19305: syāt nānāyogakaraṇam anarthakam syāt . tundādīni api picchādiṣu eva paṭhet . na etat
GS24pmbhasuu:19306: asti jñāpakam . asti hi anyat nānāyogakaraṇe prayojanam . kim . tundādiṣu yāni anakārāntāni
GS24pmbhasuu:19307: tebhyaḥ iniṭhanau yathā syātām . yāni tarhi akārāntāni teṣām pāṭhaḥ kimarthaḥ . jñāpakārthaḥ eva . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:19308: picchādibhyaḥ tundādīnām nānāyogakaraṇam jñāpakam asamāveśasya . yat ayam tundādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19309: picchādīnām nānāyogam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ samuccayaḥ ayam na vibhāṣā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:19310: . yadi vibhāṣā syāt nānāyogakaraṇam anarthakam syāt . picchādīni api tundādiṣu eva
GS24pmbhasuu:19311: paṭhet . na etat asti jñāpakam . asti hi anyat nānāyogakaraṇe prayojanam . kim .
GS24pmbhasuu:19312: picchādiṣu yāni anakārāntāni tebhyaḥ iniṭhanau yathā syātām . yāni tarhi akārāntāni
GS24pmbhasuu:19313: teṣām pāṭhaḥ kimarthaḥ . jñāpakārthaḥ eva . vasya ca punarvacanam sarvavibhāṣārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:19314: . vasya khalu api punarvacanam kriyate sarvavibhāṣārtham . keśāt vaḥ anyatarasyām
GS24pmbhasuu:19315: iti . etat eva jñāpayati ācāryaḥ samuccayaḥ ayam na vibhāṣā iti . dyudrubhyām nityārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:19316: eke anyatarasyāṅgrahaṇam icchanti . katham . vibhāṣāmadhye ayam yogaḥ kriyate . vibhāṣāmadhye
GS24pmbhasuu:19317: ye vidhayaḥ nityāḥ te bhavanti iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:19318: (P_5,2.100) KA_II.396.7-13 Ro_IV.165 naprakaraṇe dadrvāḥ hrasvatvam ca . naprakaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:19319: dadrvāḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam hrasvatvam ca naprakaraṇe dadrvāḥ hrasvatvam ca vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:19320: . dadruṇaḥ . atyalpam idam ucyate . śākīpalālīdadrūṇām hrasvatvam ca iti vaktavyam . śākinam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:19322: dadruṇam . viṣvak iti uttarapadalopaḥ ca akṛtasandheḥ . viṣvak iti upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam uttarapadalopaḥ ca akṛtasandheḥ vaktavyaḥ . viṣvak gatāni asya viṣuṇaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:19323: (P_5,2.101) KA_II.396.15-16 Ro_IV.166 vṛtteḥ ca . vṛtteḥ ca iti vaktavyam . vārttam .
GS24pmbhasuu:19324: (P_5,2.102-103.1) KA_II.396.19-22 Ro_IV.166 kimartham tapaḥśabdāt vin vidhīyate na
GS24pmbhasuu:19325: asantāt iti eva siddham . tapasaḥ vinvacanam aṇvidhānāt . tapasaḥ vinvacanam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:19326: . tapaḥśabdāt an vidhīyate . saḥ viśeṣavihitaḥ sāmānyvihitam vinam bādheta .
GS24pmbhasuu:19328: . aṇprakaraṇe jyotsnādibhyaḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . jyautsnaḥ . tāmisraḥ . kauṇḍalaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19330: (P_5,2.107.1) KA_II.397.5-7 Ro_IV.167 ayam madhuśabdaḥ asti eva dravyapadārthakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19331: asti rasavācī . ātaḥ ca rasavācī api . madhuni eva hi madhu idam madhuram iti prasajyate
GS24pmbhasuu:19332: . tat yaḥ rasavācī tasya idam grahaṇam . yadi hi dravyapadārthakasya grahaṇam syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:19333: iha api prasajyeta . madhu asmin ghaṭe asti .
GS24pmbhasuu:19334: (P_5,2.107.2) KA_II.397.8-10 Ro_IV.167-168 raprakaraṇe khamukhkuñjebhyaḥ upasaṅkhyānam . kharaḥ . mukharaḥ . kuñjaraḥ . nagāt ca iti vaktavyam . nagaram .
GS24pmbhasuu:19336: . vaprakaraṇe maṇihiraṇyābhyām upasaṅkhyānam vaktavyam . maṇivaḥ . hiraṇyavaḥ . chandasi
GS24pmbhasuu:19337: īvanipau ca . chandasi īvanipau ca vaktavyau vaḥ ca matup ca . rathīḥ abhūt mudgalanī
GS24pmbhasuu:19338: gaviṣṭau . sumaṅgalīḥ iyam vadhuḥ . ṛtavānam . maghavānam īmahe . ut vā ca udvatī
GS24pmbhasuu:19339: ca . medhārathābhyām iraniracau . medhārathābhyām iraniracau vaktavyau . medhiraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19341: vāprakaraṇe anyebhyaḥ api dṛśyate iti vaktavyam . bimbāvam . kurarāvam iṣṭakāvam .
GS24pmbhasuu:19342: (P_5,2.112) KA_II.397.22-24 Ro_IV.169 valacprakaraṇe anyebhyaḥ api ḍrśyate . valacprakaraṇe anyebhyaḥ api ḍrśyate iti vaktavyam . bhrātṛvalaḥ . putravalaḥ . utsaṅgavalaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:19343: (P_5,2.115) KA_II.398.2-11 Ro_IV.169-170 iniṭhanoḥ ekākṣarāt pratiṣedhaḥ . iniṭhanoḥ ekākṣarāt pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ : svavān ,
GS24pmbhasuu:19344: khavān . atyalpam idam ucyate . ekākṣarāt kṛtaḥ jāteḥ saptamyām ca na tau smṛtau . ekākṣarāt : svavān ,
GS24pmbhasuu:19349: siṃhavān . saptamyām ca na tau . daṇḍāḥ asyām śālāyām santi iti . yadi kṛtaḥ na iti
GS24pmbhasuu:19350: ucyate kāryī kāryikaḥ iti na sidhyati . tathā ca yadi jāteḥ na iti ucyate tuṇḍalī
GS24pmbhasuu:19351: tuṇḍalikaḥ iti na sidhyati . evam tarhi na ayam samuccayaḥ kṛtaḥ ca jāteḥ ca iti
GS24pmbhasuu:19353: kṛt yā jātiḥ iti . katham kārakavān ,
GS24pmbhasuu:19354: hārakavān . anabhidhānāt na bhaviṣyati . yadi evam na arthaḥ anena . katham svavān ,
GS24pmbhasuu:19357: vyāghravān daṇḍāḥ asyām śālāyām santi iti . anabhidhānāt na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:19358: (P_5,2.116) KA_II.398.13-17 Ro_IV.170 śikhādibhyaḥ iniḥ vaktavyaḥ ikan yavakhadādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:19359: . kim prayojanam . niyamārtham . iniḥ eva śikhādibhyaḥ ikan eva yavkhadādibhyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:19360: śikhāyavakhadādibhyaḥ niyamasya avacanam nivartakatvāt . śikhāyavakhadādibhyaḥ niyamasya
GS24pmbhasuu:19361: avacanam . kim kāraṇam . nivartakatvāt . kim nivartakam . anabhidhānam .
GS24pmbhasuu:19362: (P_5,2.118) KA_II.398.19-399.2 Ro_IV.170-171 nityagrahaṇam kimartham . vibhāṣā mā
GS24pmbhasuu:19363: bhūt . na etat asti prayojanam . pūrvasmin eva yoge vibhāṣāgrahaṇam nivṛttam . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:19364: tarhi siddhe sati yat nityagrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ prāk etasmāt yogāt
GS24pmbhasuu:19365: vibhāṣā iti anuvartate . atha ataḥ iti anuvartate utāho na . kim ca ataḥ . yadi anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:19366: ekagavikaḥ na sidhyati . samāsānte kṛte bhaviṣyati . evam api gauśakaṭikaḥ na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:19367: . atha nivṛttam iha api prāpnoti . goviṃśatiḥ asya asti iti . nivṛttam . kasmāt na bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:19368: goviṃśatiḥ asya asti iti . anabhidhānāt na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:19369: (P_5,2.120) KA_II.399.4 Ro_IV.171 yapprakaraṇe anyebhyaḥ api dṛśyate . yapprakaraṇe anyebhyaḥ api dṛśyate iti vaktavyam. himyāḥ parvatāḥ . guṇyāḥ brāhmaṇāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:19371: dīrghaḥ ca . chandovinprakaraṇe aṣṭṛāmekhalādvayobhayarujāhṛdayānām dīrghaḥ ca iti
GS24pmbhasuu:19372: vaktavyam . aṣṭrāvī . mekhalāvī . dvayāvī . ubhayāvī . rujāvī . hṛdayāvī . marmaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19373: ca iti vaktavyam . mamāvī . sarvatra āmayasya . sarvatra āmayasya upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:19374: . āmayāvī . śṛṅgavṛndābhyām ārakan . śṛṅgavṛndābhyām ārakan vaktavyaḥ . śṛṅgārakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19375: . vṛdārakaḥ . phalabarhābhyām inac . phalabarhābhyām inac vaktavyaḥ . phalinaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:19376: barhiṇaḥ . hṛdayāt cāluḥ anyatarasyām . hṛdayāt cāluḥ vaktavyaḥ anyatarasyām . hṛdayāluḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19377: . hṛdayī . hṛdayikaḥ . hṛdayavān . śītoṣṇatṛprebhyaḥ tat na sahate . śītoṣṇatṛprebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19378: tat na sahate iti cāluḥ vaktavyaḥ . śītāluḥ . uṣṇāluḥ . tṛprāluḥ . himāt celuḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:19379: himāt celuḥ vaktavyaḥ tat na sahate iti etasmin arthe . himeluḥ . balāt ca ūlaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:19380: balāt ca ūlaḥ vaktavyaḥ tat na sahate iti etasmin arthe . balūlaḥ . vātāt samūhe
GS24pmbhasuu:19381: ca . vātāt samūhe ca tat na sahate iti etasmin arthe ūlaḥ vaktavyaḥ . vātūlaḥ . parvamarudbhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:19382: tap . parvamarudbhyām tap vaktavyaḥ . parvataḥ . maruttaḥ . dadātivṛttam vā . dadātivṛttam
GS24pmbhasuu:19383: vā punaḥ etat bhaviṣyati . marudbhiḥ dattaḥ maruttaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:19384: (P_5,2.125) KA_II.400.10-11 Ro_IV.173 kutsite iti vaktavyam . yaḥ hi samyak bahu
GS24pmbhasuu:19385: bhāṣate vāgmī iti eva saḥ bhavati . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . nānāyogakaraṇasāmarthyāt na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:19386: (P_5,2.126) KA_II.400.13-14 Ro_IV.173 iha kasmāt na bhavati . svam asya asti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:19387: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na ayam pratyayārthaḥ . kim tarhi prakṛtiviśeṣaṇam etat . svāmin
GS24pmbhasuu:19389: (P_5,2.129) KA_II.400.16 Ro_IV.174 piśācāt ca iti vaktavyam . piśācakī vaiśravaṇaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:19391: upasaṅkhyānam . iniprakaraṇe balāt bāhūrupūrvapadāt upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . bāhubalī
GS24pmbhasuu:19392: . ūrubalī . sarvādeḥ ca . sarvādeḥ ca iniḥ vaktavyaḥ . sarvadhanī . sarvabījī . sarvakeśī
GS24pmbhasuu:19393: . arthāt ca asannihite . arthāt ca asannihite iniḥ vaktavyaḥ . arthī . asannihite
GS24pmbhasuu:19394: iti kimartham . arthavān . tadantāt ca . tadantāt ca iti vaktavyam . dhānyārthī .
GS24pmbhasuu:19395: hiraṇyārthī . kimartham tadantāt iti ucyate na tadantavidhinā siddham . grahaṇavatā
GS24pmbhasuu:19396: prātipadikena tadantavidhiḥ pratiṣidhyate . evarm tarhi inantena saha samāsaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:19397: . dhānyena arthī dhānyārthī . saḥ hi samāsaḥ na prāpnoti . yadi punaḥ ayam arthayateḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19398: ṇiniḥ syāt . evam api kriyām eva kurvāṇe syāt . tūṣṇīm api āsīnaḥ yaḥ tatsamarthāni
GS24pmbhasuu:19399: ācarati saḥ abhiprāyeṇa gamyate arthyam anena iti . evam tarhi ayam arthaśabdaḥ asti
GS24pmbhasuu:19400: eva dravyapadārthakaḥ . tat yathā arthavān ayam deśaḥ iti ucyate yasmin gāvaḥ sasyāni
GS24pmbhasuu:19401: ca vartante . asti kriyāpadārthakaḥ bhāvasādhanaḥ . arthanam arthaḥ iti . tat yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19402: kriyāpadārthakaḥ tasya idam grahaṇam . evam ca kṛtvā arthikapratyarthikau api siddhau bhavataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:19403: (P_5,3.1) KA_II.402.2-13 Ro_IV.177-178 vibhaktitve kim prayojanam . vibhaktitve prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:19404: itpratiṣedhaḥ . idānīm . na vibhaktau tusmāḥ iti itpratiṣedhaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:19405: yadi evam kimaḥ at kva prepsyan dīpyase kva ardhamāsāḥ . atra api prāpnoti . tau
GS24pmbhasuu:19406: ca uktam . kim uktam . vibhaktau tavargapratiṣedhaḥ ataddhite iti . idamaḥ vibhaktisvaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19407: ca . idamaḥ vibhaktisvaraḥ ca prayojanam . itaḥ . iha . idamaḥ tṛtīyādiḥ vibhaktiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19408: udāttā bhavati iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ bhavati . tyadādividhayaḥ ca . tyadādividhayaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:19409: prayojanam . yataḥ . yatra . vibhaktau iti tyadādividhayaḥ siddhāḥ bhavanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:19410: (P_5,3.2) KA_II.402.15-20 Ro_IV.178 bahugrahaṇe saṅkhyāgrahaṇam . bahugrahaṇe saṅkhyāgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:19411: kartavyam . iha mā bhūt . bahau . bahoḥ iti . atha kimartham kimaḥ upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:19412: kriyate na sarvanāmnaḥ iti eva siddham . dvyātipratiṣedhāt kimaḥ upasaṅkhyānam .
GS24pmbhasuu:19413: dvyātipratiṣedhāt kimaḥ upasaṅkhyānam kriyate . advyādibhyaḥ iti pratiṣedhe prāpte
GS24pmbhasuu:19415: (P_5,3.5.1) KA_II.403.2-15 Ro_IV.178-179 kva ayam nakāraḥ śrūyate . na kva cit śrūyate
GS24pmbhasuu:19416: . lopaḥ asya bhavati nalopaḥ prātipadikāntasya iti . yadi na kva cit śrūyate kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:19417: uccāryate . anekālśit sarvasya iti sarvādeśaḥ yathā syāt . kriyamāṇe api nakāre sarvādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19418: na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . nalope kṛte ekāltvāt . idam iha sampradhāryam . nalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19419: kriyatām sarvādeśaḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt nalopaḥ . asiddhaḥ nalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19420: . tasya asiddhatvāt sarvādeśaḥ bhavati . parigaṇiteṣu kāryeṣu nalopaḥ asiddhaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:19421: ca idam tatra parigaṇyate . evam tarhi ānupūrvyā siddham etat . na akṛte sarvādeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:19422: prātipadikasañjñā prāpnoti na ca akṛtāyām prātipadikasañjñāyām nalopaḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:19423: tat ānupūrvyā siddham . na etat asti prayojanam . alaḥ antyasya vidhayaḥ bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:19424: iti akārasya akāravacane prayojanam na asti iti kṛtvā antareṇa nakāram sarvādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19425: bhaviṣyati . asti anyat akārasya akāravacane prayojanam . kim . ye anye akārādeśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19426: prāpnuvanti tadbādhanārtham . tat yathā maḥ rāji samaḥ kvau iti makārasya makāravacanasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:19427: anusvārādayaḥ na bhavanti . tasmāt nakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . kriyate nyāse
GS24pmbhasuu:19428: eva .praśliṣṭanirdeśaḥ ayam a a a iti . saḥ anekālśit sarvasya iti sarvādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:19429: (P_5,3.5.2) KA_II.403.16-24 Ro_IV.180 etadaḥ iti yogavibhāgaḥ . etadaḥ iti yogavibhāgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19430: kartavyaḥ . etadaḥ eta it iti etau ādeśau bhavataḥ tataḥ an . an ca bhavati etadaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19431: iti . kena vihitena thakāre etadaḥ ādeśaḥ ucyate . etadaḥ ca thamaḥ upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:19432: . etadaḥ ca thamaḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . etatprakāram ittham . tat tarhi upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:19433: kartavyam . na kartavyam . etat jñāpayati bhavati atra thamuḥ iti yat ayam thakārādau
GS24pmbhasuu:19434: ādeśam śāsti . kutaḥ nu khalu etajjñāpakāt atra thamuḥ bhaviṣyati . na punaḥ yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19435: eva asau aviśeṣavihitaḥ thakārādiḥ tasmin ādeśaḥ syāt . idamā thakārādim viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19438: ime tasilādayaḥ vibhaktyādeśaḥ vā syuḥ pare vā iti . katham ca ādeśaḥ syuḥ katham
GS24pmbhasuu:19439: vā pare . yadi pañcamyāḥ saptamyāḥ iti ṣaṣṭhī tadā ādeśāḥ . atha pañcamī tataḥ pare
GS24pmbhasuu:19440: . kutaḥ sandehaḥ . samānaḥ nirdeśaḥ . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . tasilādayaḥ vibhaktyādeśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19443: . yatastyaḥ . tatratyaḥ . yatratyaḥ . supaḥ dhātuprātipadikayoḥ iti subluk prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:19444: . subluk . svara . yadā . tadā . anudāttau suppitau iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ prāpnoti . svara
GS24pmbhasuu:19445: . guṇa . kasmāt . kutaḥ . gheḥ ṅiti iti guṇaḥ prāpnoti . guṇa . dīrgha . tasmin .
GS24pmbhasuu:19446: tarhi . ataḥ dīrghaḥ yañi supi ca iti dīrghatvam prāpnoti . dīrgha . ettva. teṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:19447: . tatra . bahuvacane jhali et iti ettvam prāpnoti . ettva . auttva . kasmin . kutra
GS24pmbhasuu:19448: . idudbhyām aut at ca gheḥ iti auttvam prāpnoti . auttva . smāyādividhiḥ . tasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:19449: . tataḥ . tasmin . tatra . ṅasiṅyoḥ smātsminau it smādayaḥ prāpnuvanti . pañcamīnirdeśāt
GS24pmbhasuu:19450: siddham . santu pare . yadi pare samānaśabdānām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . tasmāt tasyati
GS24pmbhasuu:19451: . yasmāt tasyati . pañcamyantasya taseḥ tasil bhavati iti tasil prāpnoti . anādeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:19453: . anarthakaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ . tasil kasmāt na bhavati . svārthavijñānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:19454: . pañcamyantāt parasya taseḥ svārthe vartamānasya tasilā bhavitavyam . na ca atra
GS24pmbhasuu:19456: (P_5,3.8) KA_II.405.2-8 Ro_IV.182-183 kimartham taseḥ tasil ucyate . taseḥ tasilvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:19457: svarārtham . taseḥ tasilvacanam kriyate svarārtham . liti pratyayāt pūrvam udāttam
GS24pmbhasuu:19458: bhavati iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ yathā syāt . nanu ca ayam tasil tasim bādhiṣyate . na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:19459: . paratvāt tasiḥ prāpnoti . tasilaḥ avakāśaḥ . tataḥ hīyate . tataḥ avarohati . taseḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19460: avakāśaḥ . grāmataḥ āgacchati . nagarataḥ āgacchati . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19461: āgacchati . yataḥ āgacchati . paratvāt tasiḥ prāpnoti . tasmāt suṣthu ucyate taseḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19463: (P_5,3.9) KA_II.405.10-12 Ro_IV.183 paryabhibhyām ca iti yat ucyate tat sarvobhayārthe draṣṭavyam . yāvat sarvataḥ tāvat paritaḥ . yāvat ubhayataḥ tāvat abhitaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:19464: (P_5,3.14) KA_II.405.14-22 Ro_IV.183 iha kasmāt na bhavati . saḥ . tau . te . bhavadādibhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19465: yoge iti vaktavyam . ke punaḥ bhavadādayaḥ . bhavān . dīrghāyuḥ . devānāmpriyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:19466: āyuṣmān iti . saḥ bhavān . tatra bhavān . tataḥ bhavān . tam bhavantam . tatra bhavantam
GS24pmbhasuu:19467: . tataḥ bhavantam . tena bhavatā . tatra bhavatā tataḥ bhavatā . tasmai bhavate .
GS24pmbhasuu:19468: tatra bhavate . tataḥ bhavate . tasmāt bhavataḥ . tatra bhavataḥ . tataḥ bhavataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19469: . tasmin bhavati . tatra bhavati . tataḥ bhavati . saḥ dīrghāyuḥ . tatra dīrghāyuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19470: . tataḥ dīrghāyuḥ . tam dīrghāyuṣam . tatra dīrghāyuṣam . tataḥ dīrghāyuṣam . saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19471: devānāmpriyaḥ . tatra devānāmpriyaḥ . tataḥ devānāmpriyaḥ . tam devānāmpriyam . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:19472: devānāmpriyam . tataḥ devānāmpriyam . saḥ āyuṣmān . tatra āyuṣmān . tataḥ āyuṣmān
GS24pmbhasuu:19473: . tam āyuṣmantam . tatra āyuṣmantam . tataḥ āyuṣmantam .
GS24pmbhasuu:19474: (P_5,3.17) KA_II.406.2-3 Ro_IV.184 adhunā iti kim nipātyate . idamaḥ aśbhāvaḥ dhunā ca pratyayaḥ idamaḥ vā lopaḥ adhunā ca pratyayaḥ . asmin kāle adhuna .
GS24pmbhasuu:19475: (P_5,3.18) KA_II.406.5-10 Ro_IV.184 idānīm . idamaḥ tṛtīyādivibhaktiḥ udāttā bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:19476: iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ prāpnoti . dānīm iti nipātanāt svarasiddhiḥ . dānīm iti nipātanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:19477: svarasiddhiḥ bhaviṣyati . ādyudāttanipātanam kariṣyate . saḥ nipātanasvaraḥ vibhaktisvarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:19478: bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . uktam vā . kim uktam . ādau siddham iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:19479: (P_5,3.19) KA_II.406.12-14 Ro_IV.184 tadaḥ dāvacanam anarthakam vihitatvāt . tadaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19480: dāvacanam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . vihitatvāt . vihitaḥ atra pratyayaḥ sarvaikānyakiṃyattadaḥ kāle dā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:19481: (P_5,3.20) KA_II.406.16-18 Ro_IV.184 tayoḥ iti prātipadikanirdeśaḥ . tayoḥ iti prātipadikanirdeśaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ . dveṣyam vijānīyāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:19482: yogayoḥ vā pratyayayoḥ vā iti . tat ācāryaḥ suhṛt bhūtvā anvācaṣṭe :
GS24pmbhasuu:19484: (P_5,3.22) KA_II.407.2-408.2 Ro_IV.185-186 sadyaḥ iti kim nipātyate . samānasya sabhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19485: dyaḥ ca ahani . samānasya sabhāvaḥ nipātyate dyaḥ ca pratyayaḥ ahani abhidheye .
GS24pmbhasuu:19486: samāne ahani sadyaḥ . parut parāri iti kim nipātyate . pūrvapūrvatayoḥ parabhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19487: udārī ca saṃvatsare . pūrvapūrvatayoḥ parabhāvaḥ nipātyate udārī ca pratyayau saṃvatsare
GS24pmbhasuu:19488: abhidheye . pūrvasmin saṃvatsare parut . pūrvatare saṃvatsare parāri . aiṣamaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:19489: kim nipātyate . idamaḥ samasaṇ . idamaḥ samasaṇ pratyayaḥ nipātyate saṃvatsare abhidheye
GS24pmbhasuu:19490: . asmin saṃvatsare aiṣamaḥ . paredyavi iti kim nipātyate . parasmāt edyavi ahani
GS24pmbhasuu:19491: . parasmāt edyavi pratyayaḥ nipātyate ahani abhidheye . parasmin ahani paredyavi
GS24pmbhasuu:19492: . adya iti kim nipātyate . idamaḥ aśbhāvaḥ dyaḥ ca . idamaḥ aśbhāvaḥ nipātyate dyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19493: ca pratyayaḥ ahani abhidheye . asmin ahani adya . pūrvedyuḥ anyedyuḥ anyataredyuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19494: itaredyuḥ aparedyuḥ adharedyuḥ ubhayedyuḥ uttaredyuḥ iti kim nipātyate . pūrvānyānyatarerāparādharobhayottarebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19495: edyusuc . pūrvānyānyatarerāparādharobhayottarebhyaḥ edyusuc pratyayaḥ nipātyate ahani
GS24pmbhasuu:19496: abhidheye . pūrvasmin ahani pūrvedyuḥ . anyasmin ahani anyedyuḥ . anyatarasmin ahani
GS24pmbhasuu:19497: anyataredyuḥ . itarasmin ahani itaredyuḥ . aparasmin ahani aparedyuḥ . adharasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:19498: ahani adharedyuḥ . ubhayoḥ ahnoḥ ubhayedyuḥ . uttarasmin ahani uttaredyuḥ . dyuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19499: ca ubhayāt . ubhayaśabdāt dyuḥ ca vaktavyaḥ . tasmāt manuṣyebhyaḥ ubhayadyuḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:19500: (P_5,3.27) KA_II.408.5 Ro_IV.187 iha kasmāt na bhavati . pūrvasmin deśe vasati iti . na eṣaḥ deśaḥ . deśaviśeṣaṇam etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:19501: (P_5,3.28) KA_II.408.7-22 Ro_IV.188-190 kimartham atasuc kriyate na tasuc eva kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:19502: . tatra ayam api arthaḥ . svarārthaḥ cakāraḥ na kartavyaḥ bhavati . pratyayasvareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:19504: dakṣiṇataḥ grāmasya . uttarataḥ grāmasya . dakṣiṇottaraśabdau akārāntau . tasuśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19505: pratyayaḥ . bhavet siddham yadā akārāntau . yatu tu khalu ākārāntau tadā na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:19506: . tadā api siddham . katham . puṃvadbhāvena . katham puṃvadbhāvaḥ . tasilādiṣu ā
GS24pmbhasuu:19507: kṛtvasucaḥ iti . na sidhyati . bhāṣitapuṃskasya puṃvadbhāvaḥ na ca etau bhāṣitapuṃskau
GS24pmbhasuu:19508: . nanu ca bho dakṣiṇaśabdaḥ uttaraśabdaḥ ca puṃsi bhāṣyete . samānāyām ākṛtau yat
GS24pmbhasuu:19509: bhāṣitapuṃskam iti ucyate ākṛtyantare ca etau bhāṣitapuṃskau . dakṣiṇā uttarā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:19510: dikśabdau . dakṣiṇaḥ uttaraḥ iti vyavasthāśabdau . yadi punaḥ dikśabdāḥ api vyavasthāśabdāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19511: syuḥ . katham yāni digapadiṣṭāni kāryāṇi . diśaḥ yadā vyavasthām vakṣyanti . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:19512: tari yaḥ yaḥ diśi vartate saḥ saḥ dikśabdaḥ ramaṇīyādiṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . ramaṇīyā
GS24pmbhasuu:19513: dik śobhanā dik iti . atha matam etat diśi dṛṣṭaḥ digdṛṣṭaḥ digdṛṣṭaḥ śabdaḥ dikśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19514: diśam yaḥ na vyabhicarati iti ramaṇīyādiṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ na bhavati . puṃvadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19515: tu prāpnoti . evam tarhi sarvanāmnaḥ vṛttimātre puṃvadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ dakṣiṇottarapūrvāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:19516: iti evamartham . viśeṣaṇārtham tarhi . kva viśeṣaṇārthena arthaḥ . ṣaṣṭhī atasarthapratyayena
GS24pmbhasuu:19517: iti . ṣaṣṭhī tasarthapratyayene iti ucyamāne iha api syāt . tataḥ grāmāt . yataḥ grāmāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:19518: (P_5,3.31) KA_II.409.2-4 Ro_IV.191 upari upariṣṭāt iti kim nipātyate . ūrdhvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:19519: upabhāvaḥ riliṣṭātilau ca . ūrdhvasya upabhāvaḥ riliṣṭātilau ca pratyayau nipātyete . upari upariṣtāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:19520: (P_5,3.32) KA_II.409.6-16 Ro_IV.191 paścāt iti kim nipātyate . aparasya paścabhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19521: ātiḥ ca pratayayaḥ . aparasya paścabhāvaḥ nipātyate ātiḥ ca pratayayaḥ . paścāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:19522: dikpūrvapadasya ca . dikpūrvapadasya ca aparasya paścabhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ ātiḥ ca pratayayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19523: . dakṣiṇapaścāt . uttarapaścāt . ardhottarapadasya ca samāse . ardhottarapadasya
GS24pmbhasuu:19524: ca samāse aparasya paścabhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . dakṣiṇapaścārdhaḥ . uttarapaścārdhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:19525: ardhe ca . ardhe ca parataḥ aparasya paścabhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . paścārdhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:19526: (P_5,3.35) KA_II.409.18-20 Ro_IV.191 apañcamyāḥ iti prāk asaḥ . apañcamyāḥ iti yat ucyate prāk asaḥ tat draṣṭavyam . dveṣyam vijānīyāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:19527: aviśeṣeṇa uttaram apañcamyāḥ iti . tat ācāryaḥ suhṛt bhūtvā anvācaṣṭe :
GS24pmbhasuu:19529: (P_5,3.36) KA_II.410.2-5 Ro_IV.191 kimarthaḥ cakāraḥ . svarārthaḥ . citaḥ antaḥ udāttaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19530: bhavati iti antodāttatvam yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . ekāc ayam . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:19531: na arthaḥ svarārthena cakāreṇa anubandhena . pratyayasvareṇa eva siddham . viśeṣaṇārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19533: (P_5,3.42) KA_II.410.7-15 Ro_IV.192-193 vidhārthe iti ucyate . kaḥ vidhārthaḥ nāma
GS24pmbhasuu:19534: . vidhāyāḥ arthaḥ vidhārthaḥ . yadi evam ekā govidhā . ekā hastividhā . atra api
GS24pmbhasuu:19535: prāpnoti . evam tarhi dhāvidhānam dhātvarthapṛthagbhāve . dhāvidhānam dhātvarthapṛthagbhāve
GS24pmbhasuu:19536: iti vaktavyam . kaḥ punaḥ dhātvarthapṛthagbhāvaḥ . kim yat tat devadattaḥ kaṃsapātryām
GS24pmbhasuu:19537: pāṇinā odanam bhuṅkte iti . na iti āha . kārakapṛthaktvam etat . yat tarhi tat kālye
GS24pmbhasuu:19538: bhuṅke sāyam bhuṅkte iti . na iti āha . kālapṛthaktvam etat . yat tarhi śītam bhuṅkte
GS24pmbhasuu:19539: uṣṇam bhuṅkte iti . na iti āha . guṇapṛthaktvam etat . kaḥ tarhi dhātvarthapṛthagbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19540: . kārakāṇām pravṛttiviśeṣaḥ kriyā . yadi evam kriyāprakāre ayam bhavati . vidhayuktagatāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19541: ca prakāre bhavanti . evaṃvidham . evaṃyuktam . evaṅgatam . evamprakāram iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:19542: (P_5,3.44) KA_II.410.17-20 Ro_IV.194 sahabhāve dhyamuñ . sahabhāve dhyamuñ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19543: . eikadhyam rāśim kuru . saḥ tarhi vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . adhikaraṇavicāle iti
GS24pmbhasuu:19544: ucyate na ca saḥ eva adhikaraṇavicālaḥ yat ekam anekam kriyate . yat api anekam ekam
GS24pmbhasuu:19546: (P_5,3.45) KA_II.411.2-3 Ro_IV.194-195 dhamuñantāt svārthe ḍadarśanam . dhamuñantāt svārthe ḍaḥ dṛśyate saḥ ca vidheyaḥ . pathi dvaidhāni . saṃśaye dvaidhāni .
GS24pmbhasuu:19547: (P_5,3.47) KA_II.411.5-10 Ro_IV.195 pāśapi kutsitagrahaṇam . pāśapi kutsitagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:19548: kartavyam . vaiyākaraṇapāśaḥ . yājñikapāśaḥ . yaḥ hi yāpayitavyaḥ yāpyaḥ tatra mā
GS24pmbhasuu:19549: bhūt iti . atha vaiyākaraṇaḥ śarīreṇa kṛśaḥ vyākaraṇena ca śobhanaḥ kartavyaḥ vaiyākaraṇapāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19550: iti . na kartavyaḥ . katham . yasya bhāvāt dravye śabdaniveśaḥ tadabhidhāne tadguṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:19551: vaktavye pratyayena bhavitavyam . na ca kārśyasya bhāvāt dravye vaiyākaraṇaśabdaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:19552: (P_5,3.48) KA_II.411.12-15 Ro_IV.195 pūraṇagrahaṇam śakyam akartum . na hi apūraṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19553: tīyaśabdaḥ asti yatra doṣaḥ syāt . nanu ca ayam asti mukhatīyaḥ pārśvatīyaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:19554: arthavadgrahaṇe na anarthakasya iti evam asya na bhaviṣyati . uttarārtham tarhi pūraṇagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:19555: kartavyam . prāk ekādaśabhyaḥ acchandasi iti pūraṇāt yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:19556: (P_5,3.52) KA_II.411.17-412.10 Ro_IV.19196-197 ekāt ākinici dvibahvarthe pratyayavidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:19557: . ekāt ākinici dvibahvarthe pratyayaḥ vidheyaḥ . ekākinau . ekākinaḥ iti . kim punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19558: kāraṇam na sidhyati . ekaśabdaḥ ayam saṅkhyāpadam saṅkhyāyāḥ ca saṅkhyeyam arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19559: . siddham tu saṅkhyādeśavacanāt . siddham etat . katham . dvibahvarthāyāḥ saṅkhyāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19560: ekaśabdaḥ ādeśaḥ vaktavyaḥ . asahāyasya vā . asahāyasya vā ekaśabdaḥ ādeśaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19561: . asahāyaḥ ekākī . asahāyau ekākinau . asahāyāḥ ekākinaḥ . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:19562: bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam ekāt ākinici dvibahvarthe pratyayavidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:19563: iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ayam ekaśabdaḥ asti eva saṅkhyāpadam . tat yathā ekaḥ dvau
GS24pmbhasuu:19564: bahavaḥ iti . asti anyārthe vartate . tat yathā sadhamādaḥ dyumnaḥ ekāḥ tāḥ . anyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19565: iti arthaḥ . asti asahāyavācī . tat yathā . ekāgnayaḥ . ekahalāni . ekākibhiḥ kṣudrakaiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19566: jitam iti . tat yaḥ asahāyavācī tasya eṣaḥ prayogaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:19567: (P_5,3.55.1) KA_II.413.2-414.14 Ro_IV.197-205 atiśāyane iti ucyate . kim idam atiśāyane
GS24pmbhasuu:19568: iti . deśyāḥ sūtranibandhāḥ kriyante . yāvat brūyāt prakarṣe atiśaye iti tāvat atiśāyane
GS24pmbhasuu:19569: iti . kasya punaḥ prakarṣe pratyayaḥ utpadyate . ṅyāpprātipadikāt iti vartate . ṅyāpprātipadikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:19570: prakarṣe . ṅyāpprātipadikam vai śabdaḥ na ca śabdasya prakarṣāpakarṣau staḥ . śabde
GS24pmbhasuu:19571: asambhavāt arthe kāryam vijñāsyate . kaḥ punaḥ ṅyāpprātipadikārthaḥ . dravyam . na
GS24pmbhasuu:19572: vai dravyasaya prakarṣe iṣyate . evam tarhi guṇaḥ . evam api guṇagrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:19573: . dravyam api ṅyāpprātipadikārthaḥ guṇaḥ api . tatra kutaḥ etat guṇasya prakarṣe
GS24pmbhasuu:19574: bhaviṣyati na punaḥ dravyasya prakarṣe iti . kriyamāṇe ca api guṇagrahaṇe samānaguṇagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:19575: kartavyam śuklāt kṛṣṇe mā bhūt iti . na tarhi idānīm idam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:19576: adhvaryuḥ vai śreyān . pāpīyān pratiprasthātā . andhānām kāṇatamaḥ iti . samānaguṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:19577: eṣā spardhā bhavati . adhvaryuḥ vai śreyān anyebhyaḥ praśasyebhyaḥ . pāpīyān pratiprasthātā
GS24pmbhasuu:19578: anyebhyaḥ pāpebhyaḥ . andhānām kāṇatamaḥ iti kaṇiḥ ayam saukṣmye vartate . sarve
GS24pmbhasuu:19579: ime kim cit paśyanti . ayam eṣām kāṇatamaḥ iti . adūraviprakarṣe iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:19580: iha mā bhūt . mahān sarṣapaḥ . mahān himavān iti . jāteḥ na iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt :
GS24pmbhasuu:19581: vṛkṣaḥ ayam plakṣaḥ ayam iti . na tarhi idānīm idam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:19582: gotaraḥ . gotarā . aśvataraḥ iti . na eṣaḥ jāteḥ prakarṣaḥ . kasya tarhi . guṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:19583: . gauḥ ayam śakaṭam vahati . gotararḥ ayam yaḥ śakaṭam vahati sīram ca . gauḥ iyam
GS24pmbhasuu:19584: yā samām samām vijāyate . gotarā iyam yā samām samām vijāyate strīvatsā ca . aśvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19585: ayam yaḥ catvāri yojanāni gacchati . aśvataraḥ ayam yaḥ aṣṭau yojanāni gacchati .
GS24pmbhasuu:19586: tathā tiṅaḥ ca iti atra kriyāgrahaṇam kartavyam sādhanaprakarṣe mā bhūt . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19587: doṣaḥ . yat tāvat ucyate guṇagrahaṇam kartavyam iti . na kartavyam . yasya prakarṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19588: asti tasya prakarṣe bhaviṣyati . guṇasya ca eva prakarṣaḥ na dravyasya . katham jñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:19589: . evam hi dṛśyate loke . iha samāne āyāme vistāre paṭasya anyaḥ arghaḥ bhavati kāśikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:19590: anyaḥ māthurasya . guṇāntaram khalu api śilpinaḥ utpādayamānāḥ dravyāntareṇa prakṣālayanti
GS24pmbhasuu:19591: . anyena śuddham dhautakam kurvanti anyena śaiphālikam anyena mādhyamikam . yat api
GS24pmbhasuu:19592: ucyate kriyamāṇe ca api guṇagrahaṇe samānaguṇagrahaṇam kartavyam śuklāt kṛṣṇe mā
GS24pmbhasuu:19593: bhūt iti . na kartavyam . samānaguṇe eva spardhā bhavati . nahi āḍhyābhirūpau spardhete
GS24pmbhasuu:19594: . vācakena khalu api utpattavyam na ca śuklāt kṛṣṇe pratyayaḥ utpadyamānaḥ vācakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19595: syāt . yat api ucyate adūraviprakarṣe iti vaktavyam iti . na vaktavyam . adūraviprakarṣe
GS24pmbhasuu:19596: eva spardhā bhavati . na hi niṣkadhanaḥ śataniṣkadhanena spardhate . yat api ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:19597: jāteḥ na iti vaktavyam iti . na vaktavyam . jananena yā prāpyate sā jātiḥ na ca etasya
GS24pmbhasuu:19598: arthasya prakarṣāpakarṣau staḥ . yat api ucyate tiṅaḥ ca iti atra kriyāgrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:19599: sādhanaprakarṣe mā bhūt iti . na kartavyam . sādhanam vai dravyam na ca dravyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:19600: prakarṣāpakarṣau staḥ . kim punaḥ ekam śauklyam āhosvit nānā . kim ca ataḥ . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:19601: ekam prakarṣaḥ na upapadyate . na hi tena eva tasya prakarṣaḥ bhavati . atha nānā
GS24pmbhasuu:19602: samānaguṇagrahaṇam kartavyam śuklāt kṛṣṇe mā bhūt iti . asti ekam śauklyam tat tu
GS24pmbhasuu:19603: viśeṣavat . kiṅkṛtaḥ viśeṣaḥ . alpatvamahattvakṛtaḥ . atha vā punaḥ astu ekam nirviśeṣam
GS24pmbhasuu:19604: ca . nanu ca uktam prakarṣaḥ na upapadyate . na hi tena eva tasya prakarṣaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:19605: iti . guṇāntareṇa pracchādāt prakarṣaḥ bhaviṣyati . atha vā punaḥ astu nānā . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:19606: ca uktam samānaguṇagrahaṇam kartavyam śuklāt kṛṣṇe mā bhūt iti . na kartavyam . samānaguṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:19607: eva spardhā bhavati . nahi āḍhyābhirūpau spardhete . vācakena khalu api utpattavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:19608: na ca śuklāt kṛṣṇe pratyayaḥ utpadyamānaḥ vācakaḥ syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:19609: (P_5,3.55.2) KA_II.414.15-415.17 Ro_IV.205-209 kimantāt punaḥ utpattyā bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:19610: . dvitīyāntāt atiśayyamānāt . śuklam atiśete śuklataraḥ . kṛṣṇam atiśete kṛṣṇataraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19611: . yadi dvitīyāntāt atiśayyamānāt kālaḥ atiśete kālīm kālitaraḥ iti prāpnoti kālataraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19612: iti ca iṣyate . tathā kālī atiśete kālam kālataraḥ iti prāpnoti kālitarā iti ca iṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:19613: . tathā gārgyaḥ atiśete gargān gargataraḥ iti prāpnoti gārgyataraḥ iti ca iṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:19614: . tathā gargāḥ atiśerate gārgyam gārgyatarāḥ iti prāpnoti gargatarāḥ iti ca iṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:19615: . evam tarhi prathamāntāt svārthikaḥ bhaviṣyati . kālaḥ atiśete kālataraḥ . kālī
GS24pmbhasuu:19616: atiśete kālitarā . gārgyaḥ atiśete gārgyataraḥ . gargāḥ atiśerate gargatarāḥ . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:19617: prathamāntāt svārthikaḥ kumāritarā kiśoritarā avyatiriktam vayaḥ iti kṛtvā vayasi
GS24pmbhasuu:19618: prathame iti ṅīp prāpnoti . tarapā uktatvāt strīpratyayaḥ na bhaviṣyati . ṭāp api
GS24pmbhasuu:19619: tarhi na prāpnoti . ukte api hi bhavanti ete ṭābādayaḥ . uktam etat svārthikāḥ ṭābādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19620: iti . ṅīp api tarhi prāpnoti . evam tarhi guṇaḥ abhidhīyate . evam api liṅgavacanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:19621: na sidhyanti . śuklataram . śuklatarā . śuklataraḥ . śuklatarau . śuklatarāḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:19622: . āśrayataḥ liṅgavacanāni bhaviṣyanti . guṇavacanānām hi śabdānām āśrayata liṅgavacanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:19625: śuklau kambalau śuklāḥ kambalāḥ iti . yat asau dravyam śritaḥ bhavati guṇaḥ tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:19626: yat liṅgam vacanam ca tat gu asya api bhaviṣyati . atha vā kriyā abhidhīyate . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:19627: api liṅgavacanāni na sidhyanti . āśrayataḥ liṅgavacanāni bhaviṣyanti . evam api dvivacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:19628: prāpnoti . yaḥ ca atiśete yaḥ ca atiśayyate ubhau tau tasya āśrayau bhavataḥ . na
GS24pmbhasuu:19629: eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . katham . śetiḥ akarmakaḥ . akarmakāḥ api dhātavaḥ sopasargāḥ sakarmakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19630: bhavanti . karmāpadiṣṭāḥ vidhayaḥ karmasthabhāvakānām karmasthakriyāṇam vā bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:19631: kartṛsthabhāvakaḥ ca śetiḥ . atha yadi eva dvitīyāntāt utpattiḥ prathamāntāt vā svārthikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19632: atha api guṇaḥ abhidhīyate atha api kriyā kim gatam etat iyatā sūtreṇa āhosvit anyatarasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:19633: pakṣe bhūyaḥ sūtram kartavyam . gatam iti āha . katham . yadā tāvat dvitīyāntāt utpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19634: prathamāntāt vā svārthikaḥ tadā kṛtyalyuṭaḥ bahulam iti evam atra lyuṭ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:19635: . yadā guṇaḥ abhidhīyate tadā nyāyasiddham eva . yadā lapi kriyā tadā api nyāyasiddham
GS24pmbhasuu:19636: eva . atha vā atiśāyayati iti atiśāyanam . kaḥ prayojyārthaḥ . guṇāḥ guṇinam prayojayanti
GS24pmbhasuu:19637: guṇī vā guṇān prayojayati . kaḥ punaḥ iha śetyarthaḥ . iha yaḥ yatra bhavati śete
GS24pmbhasuu:19638: asau tatra . guṇāḥ ca guṇini śerate . śetyarthaḥ kāritārthaḥ vā nirdeśaḥ ayam samīkṣitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19639: . śetyarthe na asti vaktavyam . kāritārthe bravīmi te . guṇī vā guṇasaṃyogāt guṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19640: vā guṇinā yadi abhivyajyeta saṃyogāt kāritārthaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:19641: (P_5,3.55.3) KA_II.415.18-416.15 Ro_IV.209-211 iha asya api sūkṣmāṇi vastrāṇi asya
GS24pmbhasuu:19642: api sūkṣmāṇi vastrāṇi iti paratvāt ātiśāyikaḥ prāpnoti . atiśāyane bahuvrīhau uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:19643: . kim uktam . pūrvpadātiśaye ātiśāyikāt bahuvrīhiḥ sūkṣmavastratarādyarthaḥ . uttarapadātiśaye
GS24pmbhasuu:19644: ātiśāyikaḥ bahuvrīheḥ bahvāḍhyatarādyarthaḥ iti . iha trīṇi śuklāni vastrāṇi prakarṣāpakarṣayuktāni
GS24pmbhasuu:19645: . tatra pūrvam apekṣya uttare dve tarabante . tatra dvayoḥ tarabantayoḥ ekasmāt prakarṣayuktāt
GS24pmbhasuu:19646: śuklataraśabdāt utpattiḥ prāpnoti śuklaśabdāt eva ca iṣyate . śuklatarasya śuklabhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:19647: prakṛteḥ pratyayavijñānam . śuklataraśabde śuklaśabdaḥ asti . tasmāt utpattiḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:19648: . na etat vivadāmahe śuklataraśabde śuklaśabdaḥ asti na asti iti . kim tarhi . śuklataraśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19649: api asti . tataḥ utpattiḥ prāpnoti . tadantāt ca svārthe chandasi darśanam śreṣṭhamāya
GS24pmbhasuu:19650: iti . tadantāt ātiśāyikāntāt ca svārthe chandasi ātiśāyikaḥ dṛśyate . devo vaḥ savita
GS24pmbhasuu:19651: prarpayatu śreṣṭhamāya karmaṇe . evam tarhi madhyamāt śuklaśabdāt pūrvaparāpekṣāt
GS24pmbhasuu:19652: utpattiḥ vaktavyā . madhyamaḥ ca śuklaśabdaḥ pūrvam apekṣya prakṛṣṭaḥ param apekṣya
GS24pmbhasuu:19653: nyūnaḥ na ca nyūnaḥ pravartate . atha vā utpadyatām . luk bhaviṣyati . vācakena khalu
GS24pmbhasuu:19654: api utpattavyam na ca śuklataraśabdāt utpadyamānaḥ vācakaḥ syāt . na khalu api bahūnām
GS24pmbhasuu:19655: prakarṣe tarapā bhavitavyam . kena tarhi . tamapā . pūrveṇa spardhamānaḥ ayam labhate
GS24pmbhasuu:19656: sitaḥ . parasmin nyūnatām eti na ca nyūnaḥ pravartate . apekṣya madhyamaḥ pūrvam
GS24pmbhasuu:19657: ādhikyam labhate sitaḥ . parasmin nyūnatām eti yathā amātyaḥ sthite nṛpe . astu vā
GS24pmbhasuu:19658: api taraḥ tasmāt . na apaśabdaḥ bhaviṣyati . vācakaḥ cet prayoktavyaḥ vācakaḥ cet prayujyatām .
GS24pmbhasuu:19659: (P_5,3.57) KA_II.416.17-417.7 Ro_IV.212-215 dvivacane iti ucyate . tatra idam na
GS24pmbhasuu:19660: sidhyati . dantoṣṭhasya dantāḥ snigdhatarāḥ . pāṇipādasya pādau sukumāratarau . asmākam
GS24pmbhasuu:19661: ca devadattasya ca devadattaḥ abhirūpataraḥ iti . yadi punaḥ dvyarthopapade iti ucyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:19662: . tatra ayam api arthaḥ . vibhajyopapadagrahaṇam na kartavyam . iha api śaṅkāśyakebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19663: pāṭaliputrakāḥ abhirūpatarāḥ iti dvyarthopapade iti eva siddham . na evañjātīyakā
GS24pmbhasuu:19664: dvyarthatā śakyā vijñātum . iha api prasjyeta . śaṅkāśyakānām pāṭaliputrakāṇām ca
GS24pmbhasuu:19665: pāṭaliputrakāḥ abhirūpatamāḥ iti . avaśyam khalu api vibhajyopapadagrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:19666: yaḥ hi bahūnām vibhāgaḥ tadartham . śaṅkāśyakebhyaḥ ca pāṭaliputrakebhyaḥ ca māthurāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19667: abhirūpatarāḥ iti . tat tarhi dvyarthopapade iti vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . na idam
GS24pmbhasuu:19668: pāribhāṣikasya dvivacanasya grahaṇam . kim tarhi anvarthagrahaṇam . ucyate vacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:19669: . dvayoḥ arthayoḥ vacanam dvivacanam iti . evam api tarabīyasunoḥ ekadravyasya utkarṣāpakarṣayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19670: upasaṅkhyānam . tarabīyasunoḥ ekadravyasya utkarṣāpakarṣayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:19671: . parut bhavān paṭuḥ āsīt . paṭutaraḥ ca aiṣamaḥ iti . siddham tu guṇapradhānatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:19672: . siddham etat . katham . guṇapradhānatvāt . guṇapradhānaḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:19673: . guṇāntarayogāt ca anyatvam bhavati . tat yathā tam eva guṇāntarayuktam vaktāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19675: (P_5,3.58) KA_II.417.9-12 Ro_IV.215 evakāraḥ kimarthaḥ . niyamārthaḥ . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:19676: prayojanam . siddhe vidhiḥ ārabhyamāṇaḥ antareṇa evakāram niyamārthaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:19677: . iṣṭataḥ avadhāraṇārthaḥ tarhi . yathā evam vijñāyeta . ajādī guṇavacanāt eva iti
GS24pmbhasuu:19678: . mā evam vijñāyi . ajādī eva guṇavacanāt iti . kim ca syāt na vyañjanādī guṇavacanāt syātām .
GS24pmbhasuu:19679: (P_5,3.60) KA_II.417.14-418.4 Ro_IV.215-217 idam ayuktam vartate . kim atra ayuktam
GS24pmbhasuu:19680: . ajādī guṇavacanāt eva iti uktvā aguṇavacanānām api ajādyoḥ ādeśāḥ ucyante . na
GS24pmbhasuu:19681: eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . etat eva jñāpayati bhavataḥ etebhyaḥ aguṇavacanebhyaḥ api ajādī iti
GS24pmbhasuu:19682: yat ayam ajādyoḥ parataḥ ādeśān śāsti . evam api tayoḥ iti vaktavyam syāt . tayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19683: parataḥ iti . yadi punaḥ ayam vidhiḥ vijñāyeta . na evam śakyam . vyañjanādī hi na
GS24pmbhasuu:19684: syātām upādhīnām ca saṅkaraḥ syāt punarvidhānāt ajādyoḥ . nanu ca ete viśeṣāḥ anuvarteran
GS24pmbhasuu:19685: . yadi api ete anuvarteran vyañjanādī tarhi na syātām . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19686: jñāpayati bhavataḥ etebhyaḥ aguṇavacanebhyaḥ api ajādī iti yat ayam ajādyoḥ parataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19687: ādeśān śāsti . nanu ca uktam tayoḥ iti vaktavyam iti . na vaktavyam . prakṛtam ajādīgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:19688: anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . ajādī guṇavacanāt eva iti . tat vai prathamānirdiṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:19689: saptamīnirdiṣṭena ca iha arthaḥ . arthāt vibhaktivipariṇāmaḥ bhaviṣyati . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:19690: . uccāni devadattasya gṛhāṇi . āmantrayasva enam . devadattam iti gamyate . devadattasya
GS24pmbhasuu:19691: gāva aśvā hiraṇyam iti . āḍhyaḥ vaidhaveyaḥ . devadattaḥ iti gamyate . purastāt ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:19692: sat arthāt dvitīyānirdiṣṭam prathamānirdiṣṭam ca bhavati . evam iha api purastāt
GS24pmbhasuu:19694: (P_5,3.66.1) KA_II.418.6-25 Ro_IV.217-220 strīliṅgena nirdeśaḥ kriyate ekavacanāntena
GS24pmbhasuu:19695: ca . tena strīliṅgāt eva utpattiḥ syāt ekavacanāntāt ca . punnapuṃsakaliṅgāt dvivacanabahuvacanāntāt
GS24pmbhasuu:19696: ca na syāt . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na ayam pratyayārthaḥ . kim tarhi . prakṛtyarthaviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:19697: etat . praśaṃsāyām yat prātipadikam vartate tasmāt rūpap bhavati . kasmin arthe .
GS24pmbhasuu:19698: svārthe iti . svārthikāḥ ca prakṛtitaḥ liṅgavacanāni anuvartante . prakṛteḥ liṅgavacanābhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:19699: tiṅprakṛteḥ ambhāvavacanam . prakṛteḥ liṅgavacanābhāvāt tiṅprakṛteḥ rūpapaḥ ambhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19700: vaktavyaḥ . pacatirūpam . pacatorūpam . pacantirūpam iti . siddham tu kriyāpradhānatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:19701: . siddham etat . katham . kriyāpradhānatvāt . kriyāpradhānam ākhyātam ekā ca kriyā
GS24pmbhasuu:19702: . dravyapradhānam nāma . katham punaḥ jñayate kriyāpradhānam ākhyātam bhavati dravyapradhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:19703: nāma iti . yat kriyām pṛṣṭaḥ tiṅā ācaṣṭe . kim devadattaḥ karoti . pacati iti . dravyam
GS24pmbhasuu:19704: pṛṣṭaḥ kṛtā ācaṣṭe . kataraḥ devadattaḥ . yaḥ kārakaḥ hārakaḥ iti . yadi tarhi ekā
GS24pmbhasuu:19705: kriyā dvivacanabahuvacanāni na sidyanti . pacataḥ . pacanti iti . na etāni kriyāpekṣāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:19706: . kim tarhi sādhanāpekṣāṇi . iha api tarhi prāpnuvanti . pacatirūpam . pacatorūpam
GS24pmbhasuu:19707: . pacantirūpam iti . tiṅā uktatvāt tasya abhisambandhasya na bhaviṣyati . ekavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:19708: api tarhi na prāpnoti . samayāt bhaviṣyati . dvivacanabahuvacanāni api tarhi samayāt
GS24pmbhasuu:19709: prāpnuvanti . evam tarhi ekavacanam utsargaḥ kariṣyate . tasya dvibahvoḥ dvivacanabahuvacane
GS24pmbhasuu:19710: apavāvau bhaviṣyataḥ . evam api napuṃsakatvam vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . liṅgam aśiṣyam
GS24pmbhasuu:19713: upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . vṛṣalarūpaḥ . dasyurūpaḥ . corarūpaḥ iti . siddham tu prakṛtyarthavaiśiṣṭyavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:19714: . siddham etat . katham . prakṛtyarthasya vaiśiṣṭye iti vaktavyam . vṛṣalarūpaḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:19715: . api ayam palāṇḍunā surām pibet . corarūpaḥ ayam . api ayam akṣṇoḥ añjanam haret
GS24pmbhasuu:19716: . dasyurūpaḥ ayam . api ayam dhāvataḥ lohitam pibet .
GS24pmbhasuu:19718: . īṣadasamāptau kriyāpradhānatvāt liṅgavacanayoḥ anupapattiḥ . paṭukalpaḥ . paṭukalpau
GS24pmbhasuu:19719: . paṭukalpāḥ iti . ekaḥ ayam arthaḥ īṣadasamāptiḥ nāma . tasya ekatvāt ekavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:19720: prāpnoti . prakṛtyarthaviśeṣaṇatvād siddham . siddham etat . katham . na ayam pratyayārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19721: . kim tarhi prakṛtyarthaviśeṣaṇam etat . īṣadasamāptau yat prātipadikam vartate tasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:19722: kalpabādayaḥ bhavanti . kasmin arthe . svārthe iti . svārthikāḥ ca prakṛtitaḥ liṅgavacanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:19723: anuvartante . prakṛtyarthe cet liṅgavacanānupapattiḥ . prakṛtyarthe cet liṅgavacanayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19724: anupapattiḥ . guḍakalpā drākṣā . tailakalpā prasannā . payaskalpā yavāgūḥ iti . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:19725: tu tatsambandhe uttarapadārthe pratyayavacanāt . siddham etat . katham . tatsambandhe
GS24pmbhasuu:19726: īṣadasamāptisambandhe uttarapadārthe pratyayaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:19727: sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam īṣadasamāptaukriyāpradhānatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:19728: liṅgavacanānupapattiḥ iti . parihṛtam etat prakṛtyarthaviśeṣaṇatvād siddham iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:19729: nanu ca uktam prakṛtyarthe cet liṅgavacanānupapattiḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19730: jñāpayati svārthikāḥ ativartante api liṅgavacanāni iti yat ayam ṇacaḥ striyām añ
GS24pmbhasuu:19731: iti strīgrahaṇam karoti . yadi etat jñāpyate bahuguḍaḥ drākṣā . bahutailam prasannā
GS24pmbhasuu:19732: . bahupayaḥ yavāgūḥ iti atra api prāpnoti . na api ativartante . kim punaḥ iha udāharaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:19733: . paṭukalpaḥ . mṛdukalpaḥ iti . na etat asti . nirjñātasya arthasya samāptiḥ vā bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:19734: visamāptiḥ vā guṇaḥ ca anirjñātaḥ . idam tarhi . guḍakalpā drākṣā . tailakalpā prasannā
GS24pmbhasuu:19735: . payaskalpā yavāgūḥ iti . dravyam api anirjñātam . idam tarhi . kṛtakalpam . bhuktakalpam
GS24pmbhasuu:19736: . pītakalpam iti . ktāntāt pratyayavidhānānupapattiḥ ktasya bhūtakālalakṣaṇatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:19737: kalpādīnām ca asamāptivacanāt . ktāntāt pratyayavidhāneḥ anupapattiḥ . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:19738: . ktasya bhūtakālalakṣaṇatvāt . bhūtakālalakṣaṇaḥ ktaḥ . kalpādīnām ca asamāptivacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:19739: . visamāptivacanāḥ ca kalpādayaḥ . na ca asti sambhavaḥ yat bhūtakālaḥ ca syāt asamāptiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19740: ca iti . siddham tu āśaṃsāyām bhūtavadvacanāt . siddham etat . katham . āśaṃsāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:19741: bhūtavat ca iti evam atra ktaḥ bhaviṣyati . idam ca api udāharaṇam paṭukalpaḥ . mṛdukalpaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19742: iti . nanu ca uktam nirjñātasya arthasya samāptiḥ vā bhavati visamāptiḥ vā guṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19743: ca anirjñātaḥ iti . lokataḥ vyavahāram dṛṣṭvā guṇasya nirjñānam . tat yathā paṭuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19744: ayam brāhmaṇaḥ iti ucyate yaḥ laghunā upāyena athān sādhayati . paṭukalpaḥ ayam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:19745: ucyati yaḥ na tathā sādhayati . idam ca api udāharaṇam guḍakalpā drākṣā . tailakalpā
GS24pmbhasuu:19746: prasannā . payaskalpā yavāgūḥ iti . nanu ca uktam dravyam api anirjñātam iti . lokataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19749: bahuc yathā syāt . bahucā mukte vākyam api yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:19750: prakṛtā mahāvibhāṣā . tayā vākyam bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam . kalpādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19751: api yathā syuḥ iti . etat api na asti prayojanam . bahuc ucyate kalpādayaḥ api .
GS24pmbhasuu:19752: tat ubhayam vacanāt bhaviṣyati . na evam śakyam . akriyamāṇe hi vibhāṣāgrahaṇe anavakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19753: bahuc kalpādīn bādheta . kalpādayaḥ api anavakāśāḥ . te vacanāt bhaviṣyanti . sāvakāśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19754: kalpādayaḥ . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . tiṅantāni avakāśaḥ . atha subgrahaṇam kimartham . subantāt
GS24pmbhasuu:19755: utpattiḥ yathā syāt . prātipadikāt mā bhūt iti . na etat asti prayojanam . na asti
GS24pmbhasuu:19756: atra viśeṣaḥ subantāt utpattau satyām prātipadikāt vā . yadi evam iha api na arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19757: subgrahaṇena . supaḥ ātmanaḥ kyac iti . iha api na asti atra viśeṣaḥ subantāt utpattau
GS24pmbhasuu:19758: satyām prātipadikāt vā . ayam asti viśeṣaḥ . subantāt utpattau satyām padasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:19759: siddhā bhavati . prātipadikāt utpattau satyām padasañjñā na prāpnoti . nanu ca prātipadikāt
GS24pmbhasuu:19760: api utpattau satyām padasañjñā siddhā . katham . ārabhyate naḥ kye iti . tat ca avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:19761: kartavyam subantāt utpattau niyamārtham . tat eva prātipadikāt utpattau satyām vidhyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:19762: bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam . subantāt utpattiḥ yathā syāt . tiṅantāt mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:19763: iti . etat api na asti prayojanam . ṅyāpprātipadikāt iti vartate . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati
GS24pmbhasuu:19764: . bahuci subgrahaṇāt pūrvatra tiṅaḥ vidhānam . bahuci subgrahaṇam kriyate pūrvatra
GS24pmbhasuu:19765: tiṅaḥ vidhiḥ yathā vijñāyeta . na etat asti prayojanam . prakṛtam tiṅgrahaṇam anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:19766: . kva prakṛtam . atiśāyane tamabiṣṭhanau . tiṅaḥ ca iti . evam tarhi bahuci subgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:19767: pūrvatra tiṅaḥ vidhānāt . bahuci subgrahaṇam kriyate . kim kāraṇam . pūrvatra tiṅaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19768: vidhānāt . pūrvatra tiṅaḥ ca iti anuvartate . tat iha api prāpnoti . nanu ca tiṅgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:19769: nivarteta . avaśyam uttarārtham anuvartyam avyayasarvanāmnām akac prāk ṭeḥ iti pacataki
GS24pmbhasuu:19770: jalpataki iti evamartham . yadi subgrahaṇam kriyate svaraḥ na sidhyati . bahupaṭavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19771: evam svaraḥ prasajyeta bahupaṭavaḥ iti ca iṣyate . paṭhiṣyati hi ācāryaḥ citaḥ saprakṛteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19772: bahvakajartham iti . svaraḥ katham . svaraḥ prātipadikatvāt . subluki kṛte prātipadikatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:19773: svaraḥ bhaviṣyati . atha tugrahaṇam kimartham . tugrahaṇam nityapūrvārtham . tugrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:19774: kriyate nityam pūrvaḥ yathā syāt . vibhāṣā mā bhūt iti . na etat asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:19775: . na vibhāṣāgrahaṇena pūrvam abhisambadhyate . kim tarhi . bahuc abhisambadhyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:19776: vibhāṣā bahuc bhavati iti . yadā ca bhavati tadā pūrvaḥ bhavati . idam tarhi prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:19777: . prāk utpatteḥ yat liṅgam vacanam ca tat utpanne api pratyaye yathā syāt . bahuguḍaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19778: drākṣā . bahutailam prasannā . bahupayaḥ yavāgūḥ iti . etat api na asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:19779: . svāṛthikaḥ ayam svārthikāḥ ca prakṛtitaḥ liṅgavacanāni anuvartante . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:19780: siddhe sati yat tugrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ svārthikāḥ ativartante api
GS24pmbhasuu:19781: liṅgavacanāni iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . guḍakalpā drākṣā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:19783: payaskalpā yavāgūḥ iti etat siddham bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:19785: tamādibhyaḥ kalpādayaḥ bhavanti vipratiṣedhena . tamādīnām avakāśaḥ prakarṣasya vacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:19786: īṣadasamāpteḥ avacanam . paṭutaraḥ . paṭutamaḥ . kalpādīnām īṣadasamāpteḥ vacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:19787: prakarṣasya avacanam . paṭukalpaḥ . mṛdukalpaḥ . ubhayavacane ubhayam prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:19788: paṭukalpataraḥ . mṛdukalpataraḥ . kalpādayaḥ bhavanti vipratiṣedhena . yadi evam
GS24pmbhasuu:19789: īṣadasamāpteḥ prakarṣe tamādiḥ pratyayaḥ prāpnoti prakṛteḥ eva ca iṣyate . tamādiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19790: īṣatpradhānāt . tamādiḥ īṣatpradhānāt api bhavati . asya prakarṣaḥ asti . tasya prakarṣe
GS24pmbhasuu:19791: bhaviṣyati . kasya ca prakarṣaḥ asti. prakṛteḥ eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:19792: (P_5,3.71-72.1) KA_II.422.16-21 Ro_IV.230 kim ayam subantasya prāk ṭeḥ bhavati āhosvit
GS24pmbhasuu:19793: ṅyāpprātipadikasya . kutaḥ sandehaḥ . ubhayam prakṛtam . anyatarat śakyam viśeṣayitum
GS24pmbhasuu:19794: . kim ca ataḥ . yadi subantasya yuṣmakābhiḥ asmakābhiḥ yuṣmakāsu asmakāsu yuvakayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19795: āvakayoḥ iti na sidhyati . atha prātipadikasya tvayakā mayakā tvayaki mayaki iti
GS24pmbhasuu:19796: atra api prāpnoti . astu subantasya . katham yuṣmakābhiḥ asmakābhiḥ yuṣmakāsu asmakāsu
GS24pmbhasuu:19797: yuvakayoḥ āvakayoḥ iti . anokārasakārabhakārādau iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:19798: (P_5,3.71-72.2) KA_II.422.22-423.2 Ro_IV.230-231 akacprakaraṇe tūṣṇīmaḥ kām . akacprakaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:19799: tūṣṇīmaḥ kām vaktavyaḥ . āsitavyam kila tūṣṇīkām etat paśyataḥ cintitam . śīle kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19800: malopaḥ ca . śīle kaḥ malopaḥ ca vaktavyaḥ . tūṣṇīśīlaḥ . tūṣṇīkaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:19801: (P_5,3.71-72.3) KA_II.423.3-8 Ro_IV.231 iha bhinatti chinatti iti śanami kṛte śap
GS24pmbhasuu:19802: prāpnoti . bahukṛtam bahubhuktam bahupītam iti bahuci kṛte kalpādayaḥ prāpnuvanti
GS24pmbhasuu:19803: . uccakaiḥ nīcakaiḥ akaci kṛte kādayaḥ prāpnuvanti . nanu ca śnambahujakacaḥ apavādāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19804: te bādhakāḥ bhaviṣyanti . śnambahujakakṣu nānādeśatvāt utsargapratiṣedhaḥ . śnambahujakakṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:19805: nānādeśatvāt utsargapratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . samānadeśaiḥ apavādaiḥ utsargāṇām bādhanam
GS24pmbhasuu:19808: . kavidheḥ tamādayaḥ bhavanti pūrvavipratiṣedhena . kavidheḥ avakāśaḥ kutsādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:19809: vacanam prakarṣasya avacanam . paṭukaḥ . mṛdukaḥ . tamādīnām avakāśaḥ prakarṣasya
GS24pmbhasuu:19810: vacanam kutsādīnām avacanam . paṭutaraḥ . paṭutamaḥ . ubhayavacane ubhayam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:19811: . paṭutarakaḥ . paṭutamakaḥ . tamādayaḥ bhavanti pūrvavipratiṣedhena . kadā cit chinnakatarādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19812: . kadā cit chinnakatarādayaḥ bhavanti vipratiṣedhena . chinnakataram . chinnakatamam
GS24pmbhasuu:19813: . ekadeśipradhānaḥ ca samāsaḥ . ekadeśipradhānaḥ ca samāsaḥ kavidheḥ bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:19814: . ardhapippalikā . ardhakośātakikā . uttarapadārthapradhānaḥ ca sañjñāyām kanvidhyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:19815: . uttarapadārthapradhānaḥ ca samāsaḥ kavidheḥ bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena . kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:19816: . sañjñāyām kanvidhyartham . sañjñāyām kan yathā syāt . navagrāmakam . navarāṣṭrakam
GS24pmbhasuu:19817: . navanagarakam . kadā cit dvandvaḥ . kadā cit dvandvaḥ kavidheḥ bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:19819: (P_5,3.74.) KA_II.424.2-24 Ro_IV.232-237 iha kutsitakaḥ anukampitakaḥ iti svaśabdena
GS24pmbhasuu:19820: uktatvāt tasya arthasya pratyayaḥ na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kutsitasya anukampāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:19821: bhaviṣyati anukampitasya kutsāyām . atha vā svārtham abhidhāyaḥ śabdaḥ nirapekṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19822: dravyam āha samavetam . samavetasya ca vacane liṅgam vacanam vibhaktim ca . abhidhāya
GS24pmbhasuu:19823: tān viśeṣān apekṣamāṇaḥ ca kṛtsnamātmānam priyakutsanādiṣu punaḥ pravartate asau
GS24pmbhasuu:19825: kutsitādīnām arthe iti āhosvit kutsitādisamānādhikaraṇāt iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19826: . kutsidādīnām arthe cet liṅgavacanānupapattiḥ . kutsidādīnām arthe cet liṅgavacanayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19827: anupapattiḥ . paṭukam . paṭukā . paṭukaḥ . paṭukau . paṭukāḥ iti . ekaḥ ayam arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19828: kutsitam nāma . tasya ekatvāt ekavacanam eva prāpnoti . asti tarhi kutsitādisamānādhikaraṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:19829: iti . kutsidādisamānādhikaraṇāt iti cet atiprasaṅgaḥ yathā ṭābādiṣu . kutsidādisamānādhikaraṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:19830: iti cet atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati yathā ṭābādiṣu . katham ca ṭābādiṣu . uktam tatra strīsamānādhikaraṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:19831: iti cet bhūtādiṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ iti . evam iha api kutsidādisamānādhikaraṇāt iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:19832: atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . idam ghṛtakam . idam tailakam . idamśabdāt api prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:19833: siddham tu yena kutsitādivacanam tadyuktāt svārthe pratyayavidhānāt . siddham etat
GS24pmbhasuu:19834: . katham . yena kutsitādayaḥ arthāḥ gamyante tadyuktāt svārthe pratyayaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:19835: iti vaktavyam . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca
GS24pmbhasuu:19836: uktam kutsidādīnām arthe cet liṅgavacanānupapattiḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:19837: pratyayārthaḥ . kim tarhi prakṛtyarthaviśeṣaṇam etat . kutsitādiṣu yat prātipadikam
GS24pmbhasuu:19838: vartate tasmāt kādayaḥ bhavanti . kasmin arthe . svārthe . svāṛthikāḥ ca prakṛtitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19840: (P_5,3.83.1) KA_II.425.2-12 Ro_IV.237 caturthyāt . caturthyāt lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . bṛhaspatidattakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19841: . bṛhaspatikaḥ . prajāpatidattakaḥ . prajāpatikaḥ . anajādau ca . anajādau ca lopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19842: vaktavyaḥ . devadattakaḥ . devakaḥ . yajñadattakaḥ . yajñakaḥ . lopaḥ pūrvapadasya
GS24pmbhasuu:19843: ca . pūrvapadasya ca lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . devadattakaḥ . dattakaḥ . yajñadattakaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:19844: dattakaḥ . apratyaye tathā eva iṣṭaḥ . devadattaḥ . dattaḥ . yajñadattaḥ . dattaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19845: . uvarṇāt laḥ ilasya ca . uvarṇāt ilasya ca lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . bhānudattakaḥ . bhānulaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19847: (P_5,3.83.2) KA_II.425.13-22 Ro_IV.237-238 atha ṭhaggrahaṇam kimartham na ike kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:19848: ajādau iti eva siddham . ṭhaggrahaṇam ukaḥ dvitīyatve kavidhānārtham . ṭhaggrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:19849: kriyate ukaḥ dvitīyatve kavidhiḥ yathā syāt . vāyudattakaḥ . vāyukaḥ . pitṛdattakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19850: . pitṛkaḥ . ajādilakṣaṇe hi māthikādivat prasaṅgaḥ . ajādilakṣaṇe hi māthikādivat
GS24pmbhasuu:19851: prasajyeta . tat yatha mathitam paṇyam asya māthitikaḥ iti akāralope kṛte tāntāt
GS24pmbhasuu:19852: iti kādeśaḥ na bhavati evam iha api na syāt . dvitīyāt acaḥ lope sandhyakṣaradvitīyatve
GS24pmbhasuu:19853: tadādeḥ lopavacanam . dvitīyāt acaḥ lope kartavye sandhyakṣaradvitīyatve tadādeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19854: lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . lahoḍaḥ . lahikaḥ . kahoḍaḥ . kahikaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:19855: (P_5,3.84) KA_II.426.2-15 Ro_IV.238-240 varuṇādīnām ca tṛtīyāt saḥ ca akṛtasandhīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:19856: . varuṇādīnām ca tṛtīyāt lopaḥ ucyate . saḥ ca akṛtasandhīnām vaktavyaḥ . suparyāśīrdattaḥ . suparikaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:19858: suparilaḥ . iha ṣaḍaṅguliḥ ṣaḍikaḥ iti ajādilope kṛte padasañjñā na prāpnoti . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:19859: kaḥ doṣaḥ . jaśtvam na syāt . ṣaḍike jaśtve uktam . kim uktam . siddham acaḥ sthānivatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:19860: iti . yadi evam vācikādiṣu padavṛttapratiṣedhaḥ . vācikādiṣu padavṛttasya pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19861: vaktavyaḥ . siddham ekākṣarapūrvapadānām uttarapadalopavacanāt . siddham etat . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:19862: . ekākṣarapūrvapadānām uttarapadasya lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . iha api tarhi prāpnoti . ṣaḍaṅguliḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19863: . ṣaḍikaḥ iti . ṣaṣaḥ ṭhājādivacanāt siddham . ṣaṣaḥ ṭhājādivacanāt siddham etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:19864: (P_5,3.85-86) KA_II.426.18-21 Ro_IV.340 kimartham imau ubhau arthau nirdiśyete na
GS24pmbhasuu:19865: yat alpam hrasvam api tat bhavati yat ca hrasvam alpam api tat bhavati . na etayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19866: āvaśyakaḥ samāveśaḥ . alpam ghṛtam . alpam tailam iti ucyate . na kaḥ cit āha hrasvam
GS24pmbhasuu:19867: ghṛtam . hrasvam tailam iti . tathā hrasvaḥ paṭaḥ . hrasvaḥ śāṭakaḥ iti ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:19868: na kaḥ cit āha alpaḥ paṭaḥ . alpaḥ śāṭakaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:19870: . kuṭīśamīśuṇḍābhyaḥ pratyayasanniyogena puṃvadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kuṭī . kuṭīraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19871: . śamī . śamīraḥ . śuṇḍā . śuṇḍāraḥ iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . svārthikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19872: ayam svārthikāḥ ca prakṛtitaḥ liṅgavacanāni anuvartante . uktam vā . kim uktam .
GS24pmbhasuu:19874: (P_5,3.91) KA_II.427.9-13 Ro_IV.241 vatsādibhyaḥ tanutve kārśye pratiṣedhaḥ . vatsādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19875: tanutve kārśye pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kṛśaḥ vatsaḥ vatsataraḥ iti mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:19876: saḥ tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . yasya guṇasya hi bhāvāt dravye śabdaniveśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19877: tadabhidhāne tasmin guṇe vaktavye pratyayena bhavitavyam . na ca kārśyasya sadbhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:19880: upādhyānarthakyam . kimādīnām dvibahvarthe pratyayavidhānāt upādhigrahaṇam anarthakam
GS24pmbhasuu:19881: . kim kāraṇam . bahirdhāraṇam nirdhāraṇam . yāvatā dvayoḥ ekasya eva bahirdhāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:19883: bahūnām jatiparipraśne ḍatamac iti atra bahugrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:19884: iti etat paripraśne vartate paripraśnaḥ ca anirjñāte anirjñātam ca bahuṣu . dvyekayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19885: punaḥ nirjñātam . nirjñātatvāt dvyekayoḥ paripraśnaḥ na . paripraśnābhāvāt kim eva

GS24pmbhasuu:19888: . prāgvacanānarthakyam ca vibhāṣāprakaraṇāt . prāgvacanam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:19890: (P_5,3.95) KA_II.428.11-15 Ro_IV.243 avakṣepaṇe kan vidhīyate kutsite kaḥ . kaḥ etayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19891: arthayoḥ viśeṣaḥ . avakṣepaṇam karaṇam kutsitam karma . avakṣepaṇam vai kutsitam
GS24pmbhasuu:19892: karaṇam . tena yat kutysyate tat api kutsitam bhavati . tatra kutsitam iti eva siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:19893: bhavati . evam tarhi yat parasya kutsārtham upādīyate tat iha udāharaṇam . vyākaraṇakena
GS24pmbhasuu:19894: nāma ayam garvitaḥ . yājñikyena nāma ayam garvitaḥ . yat svakutsārtham kutsārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:19895: upādīyate tat tatra udāharaṇam . devadattakaḥ . yajñadattakaḥ .

GS24pmbhasuu:19905: api ivārthe pratyayaḥ api samāsenoktatvāt pratyayaḥ na prāpnoti . evam tarhi dvau

GS24pmbhasuu:19908: gotragrahaṇam kartavyam . gotrāt iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . ābhijitaḥ muhūrtaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:19913: . pādaśatagrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . anyatra api darśanāt . anyatra api
