GS24pmbhasuu:19915: (P_5,4.3) KA_II.430.6-7 Ro_IV.247 kanprakaraṇe cañcadbrhatoḥ upasaṅkhyānam . kanprakaraṇe cañcadbrhatoḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . ca~catkaḥ . bṛhatkaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:19916: (P_5,4.4) KA_II.430.9-16 Ro_IV.247-248 anatyantagatau ktāntāt tamādayaḥ pūrvavipratiṣiddham
GS24pmbhasuu:19917: . anatyantagatau ktāntāt tamādayaḥ bhavanti pūrvavipratiṣedhena . anatyantagatau
GS24pmbhasuu:19918: ktāntāt kan bhavati iti asya avakāśaḥ anatyantagateḥ vacanam prakarṣasya avacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:19919: . bhinnakam . chinnakam . tamādīnām avakāśaḥ prakarṣasya vacanam anatyantagateḥ avacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:19920: . paṭutaraḥ . paṭutamaḥ . ubhayavacane ubhayam prāpnoti . bhinnatarakam . chinnatarakam
GS24pmbhasuu:19921: . tamādayaḥ bhavanti pūrvavipratiṣedhena . tadantāt ca svārthe kanvacanam . tadantāt
GS24pmbhasuu:19924: . sāmivacane pratiṣedhaḥ anarthakaḥ . kim kāraṇam . prakṛtyabhihitatvāt . prakṛtyabhihitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19925: saḥ arthaḥ iti kṛtvā kan na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:19927: vigrahābhāvāt . adhyuttarapadāt pratyayavidheḥ anupapattiḥ . kim kāraṇam . vigrahābhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:19928: . vigrahapūrvikā taddhitotpattiḥ . na ca adhyuttarapadena vigrahaḥ dṛśyate . tasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:19929: tatra idam iti sadhīnar . tasmāt tatra idam iti sadhīnar pratyayaḥ vaktavyaḥ . rājani
GS24pmbhasuu:19930: idam rājādhīnam . yadi sadhīnar kriyate sakārasya itsañjñā na prāpnoti . iha ca śryadhīnaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19931: bhrvadhīnaḥ iti aṅgasya iti iyaṅuvaṅau syātām . sūtram ca bhidyate . yathānyāsam
GS24pmbhasuu:19932: eva astu . nanu ca uktam adhyuttarapadāt pratyayavidhānānupapattiḥ vigrahābhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:19933: iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . asti kāraṇam yena atra vigrahaḥ na bhavati . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:19934: nityapratyayaḥ ayam . ke punaḥ nityapratyayāḥ . tamādayaḥ prāk kanaḥ ñyādayaḥ prāk
GS24pmbhasuu:19935: vunaḥ āmādayaḥ prāk mayaṭaḥ bṛhatījātyantāḥ samāsāntāḥ ca iti . evam tarhi na ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:19936: pratyayavidhiḥ upālabhyate . kim tarhi . prakṛtiḥ upālabhyate . adhyuttarapadā prakṛtiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19937: na asti . kim kāraṇam . vigrahābhāvāt . vigrahapūrvikā samāsavṛttiḥ . na ca adhinā
GS24pmbhasuu:19938: vigrahaḥ dṛśyate . evam tarhi bahuvrīhiḥ bhaviṣyati . kim kṛtam bhavati . bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:19939: vai kaḥ cit asvapadavigrahaḥ api bahuvrīhiḥ . tat yathā śobhanam mukham asyāḥ sumukhī
GS24pmbhasuu:19940: iti . na evam śakyam . iha hi mahadadhīnam iti āttvakapau prasajyeyātām . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:19941: avyayībhāvaḥ bhaviṣyati . evam api adheḥ pūrvanipātaḥ prāpnoti . rājadantādiṣu pāṭhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19942: kariṣyate . atha vā saptamīsamāsaḥ ayam . adhiḥ śauṇḍādiṣu paṭhyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:19943: (P_5,4.8) KA_II.432.2-5 Ro_IV.251 diggrahaṇam kimartham . astriyām iti iyati ucyamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:19944: prācīnā brāhmaṇī avācīnā śikhā iti atra api prasajyeta . diggrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:19945: na doṣaḥ bhavati . atha strīgrahaṇam kimartham yāvatā dikśabdaḥ strīviṣayaḥ eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:19946: bhavati vai kaḥ cit dikśabdaḥ astrīviṣayaḥ api . tat yathā prāk prācīnam . pratyak
GS24pmbhasuu:19948: (P_5,4.14) KA_II.432.7-10 Ro_IV.252 strīgrahaṇam kimartham na svārthikaḥ ayam svārthikāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19949: ca prakṛtitaḥ liṅgavacanāni anuvartante . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat strīgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:19950: karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ svārthikāḥ ativartante api liṅgavacanāni . kim etasya
GS24pmbhasuu:19951: jñāpane prayojanam . guḍakalpā drākṣā . tailakalpā prasannā payaskalpā yavāgūḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:19954: . kim prayojanam . punaḥ punaḥ āvṛttiḥ abhyāvṛttiḥ . na ca ekasya punaḥ punaḥ āvṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19955: bhavati . atha kriyāgrahaṇam anuvartate āhosvit na . kim ca arthaḥ anuvṛttyā . bāḍham
GS24pmbhasuu:19957: ekaḥ bhuṅkte iti . atha anuvartamāne api kriyāgrahaṇe iha kasmāt na bhavati . ekaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19958: pākaḥ iti . pūrvayoḥ ca yogayoḥ kasmāt na bhavati . dvau pākau. trayaḥ pākāḥ . catvāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19959: pākāḥ . pañca pākāḥ . daśa pākāḥ iti . na etat kriyāgaṇanam . kim tarhi . dravyagaṇanam
GS24pmbhasuu:19960: etat . katham . kṛdabhihitaḥ bhāvaḥ dravyavat bhavati iti . iha api tarhi dravyagaṇanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:19961: na prāpnoti . sakṛt bhuktvā . sakṛt bhoktum iti . pūrvayoḥ ca yogayoḥ dviḥ bhuktvā
GS24pmbhasuu:19962: dviḥ boktum triḥ bhuktvā triḥ bhoktum pañcakṛtvā bhuktvā pañcakṛtvā bhoktum daśakṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:19963: bhuktvā daśakṛtvā bhoktum iti dravyagaṇanān na prāpnoti . yadi khalu api punaḥ punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19964: āvṛttiḥ abhyāvṛttiḥ dviḥ āvṛtte sakṛt iti syāt triḥ āvṛtte dviḥ iti . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:19965: anuvartate abhyāvṛttigrahaṇam na tu punaḥ punaḥ āvṛttiḥ abhyāvṛttiḥ . kim tarhi abhimukḥī
GS24pmbhasuu:19966: pravṛttiḥ abhyāvṛttiḥ . pūrvā ca pare prati abhimukḥī pare ca pūrvām prati abhimukhyau
GS24pmbhasuu:19967: . yat api ucyate anuvartamāne api kriyāgrahaṇe iha kasmāt na bhavati . ekaḥ pākaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19968: iti . pūrvayoḥ ca yogayoḥ kasmāt na bhavati . dvau pākau. trayaḥ pākāḥ . catvāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19969: pākāḥ . pañca pākāḥ . daśa pākāḥ iti parihṛtam etat . na etat kriyāgaṇanam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:19970: tarhi . dravyagaṇanam etat . katham . kṛdabhihitaḥ bhāvaḥ dravyavat bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:19971: nanu ca uktam iha api tarhi dravyagaṇanāt na prāpnoti . sakṛt bhuktvā . sakṛt bhoktum
GS24pmbhasuu:19972: iti . pūrvayoḥ ca yogayoḥ dviḥ bhuktvā dviḥ boktum triḥ bhuktvā triḥ bhoktum pañcakṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:19973: bhuktvā pañcakṛtvā bhoktum daśakṛtvā bhuktvā daśakṛtvā bhoktum iti dravyagaṇanān
GS24pmbhasuu:19974: na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kriyāgaṇanāt bhaviṣyati . katham . kṛdabhihitaḥ bhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19976: (P_5,4.24) KA_II.433.12-14 Ro_IV.256 devatāntāt iti ucyate . tata idam na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:19977: . pitṛdevatyam iti . kim kāraṇam . na hi lpitaraḥ devatā . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . diveḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19978: aiśvaryakarmaṇaḥ devaḥ . tasmāt svārthe tal . evam ca kṛtvā devadevatyam api siddham bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:19979: (P_5,4.27) KA_II.433.16-20 Ro_IV.256 tali strīliṅgavacanam . tali strīliṅgam vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:19980: . devatā . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . devaśabdaḥ ayam puṃliṅgaḥ svārthikaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:19981: ayam . svārthikāḥ ca prakṛtitaḥ liṅgavacanāni anuvartante . uktam vā . kim uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:19983: (P_5,4.30) KA_II.433.22-435.3 Ro_IV.257-259 lohitāt liṅgabādhanam vā . lohitāt liṅgabādhanam
GS24pmbhasuu:19984: vā iti vaktavyam . lohitika . lohinikā . akṣarasamūhe chandasaḥ upasaṅkhyānam . akṣarasamūhe
GS24pmbhasuu:19985: chandasaḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . o śrāvaya iti caturakṣaram . astu śrauṣaṭ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:19986: caturakṣaram . ye yajāmahe iti pañcākṣaram . yaja iti dvyakṣaram . dvyakṣaraḥ vaṣaṭkāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19987: . eṣaḥ vai saptadaśākṣaraḥ chandasyaḥ prajñāpatiḥ yajñam anu vihitaḥ . chandasi bahubhirvasavyairupasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:19988: . chandasi bahubhirvasavyairupasaṅkhyānam . hastau pṛṇasva bahuviḥ vasavyaiḥ . agnirīśevasavyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:19989: . agnirīśevasavyasya upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . uktam vā . kim uktam . svārthavijñānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:19990: siddham iti . apasyaḥ vasānāḥ . apaḥ vasānāḥ . sve okye . sve oke . kavyaḥ asi havyasūdana
GS24pmbhasuu:19991: . kaviḥ asi . raudreṇa anīkena kavyatāyai . kavitayai . āmuṣyāyaṇasya . amuṣyaputrasya
GS24pmbhasuu:19992: . kṣemyasya īśe . kṣemasya īśe . kṣemyam adhyavasyati . kṣemam adhyavasyati . āyuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19993: varcasyam . varcaḥ eva varcasyam . niṣkevalyam . niṣkevalam . ukthyam . uktham .
GS24pmbhasuu:19994: janyam tābhiḥ sajanyam tābhiḥ . janam tābhiḥ sajanaṃ tābhiḥ . stomaiḥ janayāmi navyam
GS24pmbhasuu:19995: . navam . pra naḥ navyebhiḥ . navaiḥ . brahma pūrvyam . pāthaḥ pūrvyam . tanuṣu pūrvyam
GS24pmbhasuu:19996: . pūrvam . pūrvyāhaḥ . pūrvāhaḥ . pūrvyāḥ viśaḥ . pūrvāḥ viśaḥ . pūrvyāsaḥ . pūrvāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:19997: . saḥ pra pūrvyaḥ . saḥ pra pūrvaḥ . agnim vai pūrvyam . pūrvam . tam juṣasva yaviṣṭhya
GS24pmbhasuu:19998: . yaviṣṭha . hotravāham yaviṣṭhyam . yaviṣṭham . tvam ha yat yaviṣṭhya . yaviṣṭha
GS24pmbhasuu:19999: . samāvat vasati samāvat gṛhṇāti . samam vasati samam gṛhṇāti . samāvat devayajñe
GS24pmbhasuu:20000: hastau . samam . samāvat vīryāvahāni . samāni . samāvat vIryāṇi karoti . samāni .
GS24pmbhasuu:20001: u īvate u lokam . yaḥ īvate brahmaṇe . yaḥ iyate . navasya nūtnaptanakhāḥ ca . navasya
GS24pmbhasuu:20002: nū iti ayam ādeśaḥ vaktavyaḥ tnaptanakhāḥ ca pratyayāḥ vaktavyāḥ . nūtnam . nūtanam
GS24pmbhasuu:20003: . navīnam . naḥ ca purāṇe prāt . naḥ ca purāṇe prāt vaktavyaḥ tnaptanakhāḥ ca pratyayāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20005: (P_5,4.36) KA_II.435.5-436.4 Ro_IV.259-260 tat iti anena kim pratinirdiśyate . vāk
GS24pmbhasuu:20006: eva . yat eva vācā vyavahiryate tat karmaṇā kriyate . aṇprakaraṇe kulālavaruḍaniṣādacaṇḍālāmitrebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20008: kartavyam . kaulālaḥ . vāṛuḍaḥ . naiṣādaḥ . cāṇḍālaḥ . āmitraḥ . bhāgarūpanāmabhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20009: dheyaḥ . bhāgarūpanāmabhyaḥ dheyaḥ vaktavyaḥ . bhāgadheyam . rūpadheyam . nāmadheyam
GS24pmbhasuu:20010: . mitrāt chandasi . mitrāt chandasi dheyaḥ vaktavyaḥ . mitradheye yatasva . aṇ amitrāt
GS24pmbhasuu:20011: ca . aṇ amitrāt ca iti vaktavyam . maitraḥ . āmitraḥ . sānnāyyānujāvarānuṣūkacātuṣprāśyarākṣoghnavaiyātavaikṛtavārivaskṛtāgrāyaṇāgrahāyaṇasāntapanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:20012: nipātnyante . sānnāyyam . ānujāvaraḥ . ānuṣūkaḥ . cātuṣprāśyaḥ . rākṣoghnaḥ . vaiyātaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20013: . vaikṛtaḥ . vārivaskṛtaḥ . āgrāyaṇaḥ . āgrahāyaṇaḥ . sāntapanaḥ . agnīdhrasādhāraṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:20014: añ . agnīdhrasādhāraṇāt añ vaktavyaḥ . āgnīdhram . sādhāraṇam . ayavasamarudbhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:20015: chandasi . ayavasamarudbhyām chandasi añ vaktavyaḥ . āyavase vardhante . mārutam
GS24pmbhasuu:20016: śardhaḥ . navasūramartayaviṣṭhebhyaḥ yat . navasūramartayaviṣṭhebhyaḥ yat vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20017: . navyaḥ . sūryaḥ . martyaḥ . yaviṣthyaḥ . kṣemāt yaḥ . kṣemāt yaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kṣemyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20021: . bahuśaḥ dehi . aniṣṭeṣu śrāddhādiṣu mā bhūt . iṣṭeṣu prāśitrādiṣu yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:20022: alpaśaḥ dehi . iṣṭeṣu prāśitrādiṣu mā bhūt . aniṣṭeṣu śrāddhādiṣu yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:20023: (P_5,4.44) KA_II.436.11-12 Ro_IV. 261 tasiprakaraṇe ādyādibhyaḥ upasaṅkhyānam . tasiprakaraṇe ādyādibhyaḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . āditaḥ . madhyataḥ . antataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:20025: abhūtatadbhāvagrahaṇam kartavyam . iha mā bhūt . sampadyante yavāḥ . sampadyante
GS24pmbhasuu:20026: śālayaḥ iti . atha kriyamāṇe api vā abhūtatadbhāvagrahaṇe iha kasmāt na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:20027: sampadyante asmin kṣetra śālayaḥ iti . prakṛtivivakṣāgrahaṇam ca . prakṛtivivakṣāgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:20028: ca kartavyam . samīpādibhyaḥ upasaṅkhyānam . samīpādibhyaḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:20029: . samīpī bhavati . abhyāśī bhavati . antikī bhavati . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:20030: . na hi asamīpam samīpam bhavati . kim tarhi . asamīpastham samīpastham bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:20031: tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . tātsthyāt tācchabdyam bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:20032: (P_5,4.57) KA_II.437.5-12 Ro_IV.262-263 kimarthaḥ cakāraḥ . svarārthaḥ . citaḥ antaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20033: udāttatḥ bhavati iti udāttatvam yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . ekāc ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:20034: . tatra na arthaḥ svarārthena cakāreṇa anubandhena . pratyayasvareṇa eva siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:20035: . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . ḍāci citkaraṇam viśeṣaṇārtham . ḍāci citkaraṇam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:20036: viśeṣaṇārtham . kva viśeṣaṇāṛthena arthaḥ . lohitādiḍājbhyaḥ kyaṣ iti . ḍā iti hi
GS24pmbhasuu:20037: ucyamāne iḍā ataḥ api prasajyeta . arthavadgrahaṇe na anarthakasya iti evam etasya
GS24pmbhasuu:20038: na bhaviṣyati . iha tarhi prāpnoti . nābhā pṛthivyāḥ nihitaḥ davidyutat . tasmāt cakāraḥ kartavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:20039: (P_5,4.67) KA_II.437.14 Ro_IV.263 bhadrāt ca iti vaktavyam . bhadrā karoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:20040: (P_5,4.68) KA_II.437.16-438.21 Ro_IV.263-265 antagrahaṇam kimartham . antaḥ yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:20041: syāt . na eatat asti prayojanam . pratyayparatvena api etat siddham . idam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:20042: prayojanam . tadgrahaṇena grahaṇam yathā syāt . kāni punaḥ tadgrahaṇasya prayojanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:20044: . pratirājam . uparājam . avyayībhāvaḥ ca samāsaḥ napuṃsakaliṅgaḥ bhavati iti napuṃsakaliṅgatā
GS24pmbhasuu:20045: yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . liṅgam aśiṣyam lokāśrayatvāt liṅgasya . idam
GS24pmbhasuu:20046: tarhi prayojanam . na avyayībhāvāt ataḥ am tu apañcamyāḥ iti eṣaḥ vidhiḥ yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:20047: . avyayībhāva . dvigu . dvigusañjñā ca prayojanam . pañcagavam . daśagavam . dviguḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20048: ca samāsaḥ napuṃsakaliṅgaḥ bhavati iti napuṃsakaliṅgatā yathā syāt . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:20049: prayojanam . liṅgam aśiṣyam lokāśrayatvāt liṅgasya . idam tarhi prayojanam . dvipurī
GS24pmbhasuu:20050: . tripurī . dvigoḥ akārāntāt iti īkāraḥ yathā syāt . etat api na asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:20051: . puraśabdaḥ ayam akārāntaḥ . tena samāsaḥ bhaviṣyati . ātaḥ ca akārāntaḥ iti āha
GS24pmbhasuu:20052: . kṣeme subhikṣe kṛtasañcayāni purāṇi vinayanti kopam iti . idam tarhi prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:20053: . dvidhurī tridhurī . dvigoḥ akārāntāt iti ṅīp yathā syāt . dvigu . dvandva . dvandvasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:20054: ca prayojanam . vāktvacam . sraktvacam . dvandvaḥ ca samāsaḥ napuṃsakaliṅgaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:20055: iti napuṃsakaliṅgatā yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . liṅgam aśiṣyam lokāśrayatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:20056: liṅgasya . idam tarhi prayojanam . idam tarhi prayojanam . kośaḥ ca niṣat ca kośaniṣadam
GS24pmbhasuu:20057: . kośaniṣadinī . dvandvopatāpagarhyāt prāṇisthāt iniḥ iti iniḥ yathā syāt . dvandva
GS24pmbhasuu:20058: . tatpuruṣa . tatpuruṣasañjñā ca prayojanam . paramadhurā uttamadhurā . paravat liṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:20059: dvandvatatpuruṣayoḥ iti paravalliṅgatā yathā syāt . na etat asti prayjonam . uttarapadārthapradhānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20060: tatpuruṣaḥ . idam tarhi prayojanam . ardhadhurā . etat api na asti prayojanam . liṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:20061: aśiṣyam lokāśrayatvāt liṅgasya . idam tarhi prayojanam . idam tarhi . nirdhuraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:20062: avyayam tatpuruṣe prakṛtisvaram bhavati iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ yathā syāt . tatpuruṣa .
GS24pmbhasuu:20063: bahuvrīhi . bahuvrīhisañjñā ca prayojanam . uccadhuraḥ . nīcadhuraḥ . bahuvrīhau
GS24pmbhasuu:20064: prakṛtyā pūrvapadam bhavati iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:20065: (P_5,4.69.1) KA_II.438.23-26 Ro_IV.265 idam vipratiṣiddham . kaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . parigaṇitābhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20066: prakṛtibhyaḥ samāsāntaḥ vidhīyate na ca tatra kā cit pūjanāntā prakṛtiḥ nirdiśyate
GS24pmbhasuu:20067: . na etat vipratiṣiddham . na evam vijñāyate . yābhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaḥ samāsāntaḥ vidhīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:20068: na cet tāḥ pūjanāntāḥ bhavanti iti . katham tarhi . na cet tāḥ pūjanāt parāḥ bhavanti iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:20069: (P_5,4.69.2) KA_II.439.1-5 Ro_IV.265 pūjāyām svatigrahaṇam . pūjāyām svatigrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:20070: kartavyam . surājā . atirājā . kva mā bhūt . paramagavaḥ . uttamagavaḥ . prāgbahuvrīhigrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:20071: ca . prāgbahuvrīhigrahaṇam ca kartavyam . iha mā bhūt . svakṣaḥ . atyakṣaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:20072: (P_5,4.70) KA_II.439.7-8 Ro_IV.266 kṣepe iti kimartham . kasya rājā kiṃrājā . kṣepe
GS24pmbhasuu:20073: iti śakyam akartum . kasmāt na bhavati kasya rājā kiṃrājā iti . lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20075: (P_5,4.73) KA_II.439.10-17 Ro_IV.266 ḍacprakaraṇe saṅkhyāyāḥ tatpuruṣasya upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:20076: nistriṃśādyartham . ḍacprakaraṇe saṅkhyāyāḥ tatpuruṣasya upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:20077: . kim prayojanam . nistriṃśādyartham . nistriṃśāni varṣāṇi . niścatvāriṃśāni varṣāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:20078: . anyatra adhikalopāt . anyatra adhikalopāt iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . ekādhikā
GS24pmbhasuu:20079: viṃśatiḥ ekaviṃśatiḥ . dvyadhikā viṃśatiḥ dvāviṃśatiḥ . avyayādeḥ iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:20080: iha mā bhūt . gotriṃśat . gocatvāriṃśat iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . yadi api etat
GS24pmbhasuu:20081: ucyate atha vā etarhi anyatra adhikalopāt iti etat na kriyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:20082: (P_5,4.74) KA_II.439.19-440.5 Ro_IV.266-267 anakṣe iti katham idam vijñāyate . na
GS24pmbhasuu:20083: cet akṣadhūrantaḥ samāsaḥ iti āhosvit na cet akṣaḥ samāsārthaḥ iti . kim ca ataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20084: . yadi vijñāyate na cet akṣadhūrantaḥ samāsaḥ iti siddham akṣasya dhūḥ akṣadhūḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:20085: . idam tu na sidhyati . dṛḍhadhūḥ ayam akṣaḥ . astu tarhi na cet akṣaḥ samāsārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20086: iti . siddham dṛḍhadhūḥ akṣaḥ iti . idam tu na sidhyati . akṣasya dhūḥ akṣadhūḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:20087: . evam tarhi na evam vijñāyate na cet akṣadhūrantaḥ samāsaḥ iti na api na cet akṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20088: samāsārthaḥ iti . katham tarhi . na cet akṣasya dhūḥ iti . evam ca kṛtvā na api na
GS24pmbhasuu:20089: cet akṣadhūrantaḥ samāsaḥ iti vijñāyate na api na cet akṣaḥ samāsārthaḥ iti . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:20091: (P_5,4.76) KA_II.440.7-8 Ro_IV.267 adarśanāt iti ucyate . tatra idam na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:20092: . kavarākṣam . adarśanāt iti śakyam akartum . katham brāhmaṇakṣi kṣatriyākṣi . aprāṇyaṅgāt iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:20093: (P_5,4.77) KA_II.440.13-23 Ro_IV.268 ādyāḥ trayaḥ bahuvrīhayaḥ . adraṣṭā caturṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:20094: acaturaḥ . vidraṣṭā caturṇām vicaturaḥ . sudraṣṭā caturṇām sucaturaḥ . tataḥ pare
GS24pmbhasuu:20095: ekādaśa dvandvāḥ . strīpuṃsa dhenvanaḍuha ṛksāma vāṅmanasa akṣibhruva dāragava ūrvaṣṭhīva
GS24pmbhasuu:20096: padaṣṭhīva naktandiva rātrindiva ahardiva . tataḥ avyayībhāvaḥ . saha rajasā sarajasam
GS24pmbhasuu:20097: . tataḥ tatpuruṣaḥ . niśritam śreyaḥ niḥśreyasam . tataḥ ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ . puruṣasya
GS24pmbhasuu:20098: āyuḥ puruṣāyuṣam . tataḥ dvigū . dve āyuṣī dvyāyuṣam . trīṇi āyūṃṣi tryāyuṣam . tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20099: dvandvaḥ . ṛk ca yajuḥ ca rgyajuṣam . jātādayaḥ ukṣāntāḥ samānādhikaraṇāḥ . jātaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20100: ukṣā jātokṣaḥ . mahān ukṣā mahokṣaḥ . vṛddhaḥ ukṣā vṛddhokṣaḥ . tataḥ avyayībhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20101: . śunaḥ samīpam upaśunam . tataḥ saptamīsamāsaḥ goṣṭhe śvā goṣṭhaśvaḥ . caturaḥ acprakaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:20102: tryupābhyām upasaṅkhyānam . caturaḥ acprakaraṇe tryupābhyām upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:20104: (P_5,4.78) KA_II.441.2 Ro_IV.268 palyarājabhyām ca iti vaktavyam . palyavarcasam . rājavarcasam .
GS24pmbhasuu:20105: (P_5,4.87) KA_II.441.4-6 Ro_IV.268 ahargrahaṇam dvandvārtham . ahargrahaṇam dvandvārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:20106: draṣṭavyam . kim ucyate dvandvārtham iti na punaḥ tatpuruṣārtham api syāt . tatpuruṣābhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:20107: . na hi rātryantaḥ aharādiḥ tatpuruṣaḥ asti .
GS24pmbhasuu:20108: (P_5,4.88) KA_II.441.8-10 Ro_IV.269 ahnaḥ ahnavacanānarthakyam ca ahnaḥ ṭakhoḥ niyamavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:20109: . ahnaḥ ahnavacanam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . ahnaḥ ṭakhoḥ niyamavacanāt . ahnaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20110: ṭakhoḥ eva iti etat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:20111: (P_5,4.103) KA_II.441.12-13 Ro_IV.268 anasantāt napuṃsakāt chandasi vā iti vaktavyam . brahmasāmam . brahmasāma . devacchandasam . devacchandaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20112: (P_5,4.113) KA_II.441.15-442.3 Ro_IV.269-270 kimartham ṣac pratyayāntaram vidhīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:20113: na ṭac prakṛtaḥ saḥ anuvartiṣyate . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . ṣaci pratyayāntarakaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:20114: anantodāttārtham . ṣaci pratyayāntaram kriyate . kim prayojanam . anantodāttārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:20116: (P_5,4.115) KA_II.442.5-7 Ro_IV.270 kimartham mūrdhnaḥ ṣa pratyayāntaram vidhīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:20117: na ṣac prakṛtaḥ saḥ anuvartiṣyate . mūrdhnaḥ ca ṣavacanam . kim . anantodāttārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:20119: (P_5,4.116) KA_II.442.9-20 Ro_IV.271 api pradhānapūraṇīgrahaṇam . api pradhānapūraṇīgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:20120: kartavyam . pradhānam yā pūraṇī iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . kalyāṇī pañcamī asya
GS24pmbhasuu:20121: pakṣasya kalyāṇapañcamīkaḥ pakṣaḥ . atha iha katham bhavitavyam . kalyāṇī pañcamī
GS24pmbhasuu:20122: asām rātrīṇām iti . kalyāṇīpañcamāḥ rātrayaḥ iti bhavitavyam . ratrayaḥ atra pradhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:20123: . netuḥ nakṣatre upasaṅkhyānam . netuḥ nakṣatre upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . puṣyanetrāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20124: . mṛganetrāḥ . chandasi ca . chandasi ca netuḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . bṛhaspatinetrāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20125: . somanetrāḥ . māsāt bhṛtipratyayapūrvapadāt ṭhajvidhiḥ . māsāt bhṛtipratyayapūrvapadāt
GS24pmbhasuu:20127: (P_5,4.118) KA_II.443.2-3 Ro_IV.272 kharakhurābhyām ca nas vaktavyaḥ . kharaṇāḥ . khuraṇāḥ . śitināḥ arcanāḥ ahināḥ iti naigamāḥ . śitināḥ arcanāḥ ahināḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:20128: (P_5,4.119) KA_II.443.5 Ro_IV.272 veḥ graḥ vaktavyaḥ . vigraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:20129: (P_5,4.131) KA_II.443.7-8 Ro_IV.272 ūdhasaḥ anaṅi strīgrahaṇam . ūdhasaḥ anaṅi strīgrahaṇam kartavyam iha mā bhūt . mahodhāḥ parjanyaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:20130: (P_5,4.135) KA_II.443.10-13 Ro_IV.272-273 gandhasya ittve tadekāntagrahaṇam . gandhasya
GS24pmbhasuu:20131: ittve tadekāntagrahaṇam kartavyam iha mā bhūt . śobhanāḥ gandhāḥ asya sugandhaḥ āpaṇikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20132: iti . atha anulipte katham bhavitavyam . yadi tāvat yat anugatam tat abhisamīkṣitam
GS24pmbhasuu:20133: sugandhiḥ iti bhavitavyam . atha yat praviśīrṇam sugandhaḥ iti bhavitavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:20134: (P_5,4.154) KA_II.443.14-444.11 Ro_IV.273-275 śeṣāt iti ucyate . kaḥ śeṣaḥ nāma .
GS24pmbhasuu:20135: yābhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaḥ samāsāntaḥ ni vidhīyate saḥ śeṣaḥ . kimartham punaḥ śeṣagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:20136: kriyate . yābhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaḥ samāsāntaḥ vidhīyate tābhyaḥ mā bhūt iti . na etat
GS24pmbhasuu:20137: asti prayojanam . ye pratipadam vidhīyante te tatra bādhakāḥ bhaviṣyanti . anavakāśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20138: hi vidhayaḥ bādhakāḥ bhavanti sāvakāśāḥ ca samāsāntāḥ . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . vibhāṣā kap
GS24pmbhasuu:20139: . yadā na kap saḥ avakāśaḥ . kapaḥ prasaṅge ubhayam prāpnoti . paratvāt kap prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:20140: . tasmāt śeṣagrahaṇam kartavyam . kim punaḥ idam śeṣagrahaṇam kabapekṣam yasmāt bahuvrīheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20141: kap iti āhosvit samāsāntāpekṣam yasmāt bahuvrīheḥ samāsāntaḥ na vihitaḥ iti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:20142: ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate kabapekṣam anṛcaḥ bahvṛcaḥ iti atra api prāpnoti . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:20143: samāsāntāpekṣam anṛkkam bahvṛkkam sūktam iti na sidhyati . astu kabapekṣam . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:20144: anṛcaḥ bahvṛcaḥ iti . viśeṣe etat vaktavyam . anṛcaḥ māṇave bahvṛcaḥ caraṇaśākhāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:20145: iti . idam tarhi ūdhasaḥ anaṅi strīgrahaṇam coditam . tasmin kriyamāṇe api prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:20146: . evam tarhi na eva kabapekṣam śeṣagrahaṇam na api samāsāntāpekṣam . kim tarhi anantaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20147: yaḥ bahuvrīhyadhikāraḥ saḥ apekṣyate . anantare bahuvrīhyadhikāre yasmāt bahuvrīheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20148: samāsāntaḥ na vihitaḥ iti . katham anṛcaḥ bahvṛcaḥ iti . vaktavyam eva anṛcaḥ māṇave
GS24pmbhasuu:20150: (P_5,4.156) KA_II.444.13-17 Ro_IV.275-276 īyasaḥ upasarjanadīrghatvam ca . īyasaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20151: upasarjanadīrghatvam ca vaktavyam . bahvyaḥ śreyasyaḥ asya bahuśreyasī . vidyamānaśreyasī
GS24pmbhasuu:20152: . puṃvadvacanāt siddham . puṃvadbhāvaḥ atra bhavati īyasaḥ bahuvrīhau puṃvadvacanam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:20153: (P_6,1.1.1) KA_III.1.1-3.23 Ro_IV.279-287 ekācaḥ iti kim ayam bahuvrīhiḥ . ekaḥ ac
GS24pmbhasuu:20154: asmin saḥ ekāc . ekācaḥ iti . āhosvit tatpuruṣaḥ ayam samānādhikaraṇaḥ . ekaḥ ac
GS24pmbhasuu:20155: ekāc . ekācaḥ . kim ca ataḥ . yadi bahuvrīhiḥ siddham papāca papāṭha . iyāya . āra
GS24pmbhasuu:20156: iti na sidhyati . atha tatpuruṣaḥ samānādhikaraṇaḥ siddham iyāya . āra iti . papāca
GS24pmbhasuu:20157: papāṭha iti na sidhyati . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . ekācaḥ dve prathamasya iti bahuvrīhinirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20158: . ekācaḥ dve prathamasya iti bahuvrīhinirdeśaḥ ayam . ekavarṇeṣu katham . ekavarṇeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:20159: vyapadeśivadvacanāt . vyapadeśivat ekasmin kāryam bhavati iti vaktavyam . evam ekavarṇeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:20160: dvirvacanam bhaviṣyati . ekācaḥ dve bhavataḥ iti ucyate . tatra na jñāyate kasya
GS24pmbhasuu:20161: ekācaḥ dve bhavataḥ iti . vakṣyati liṭi dhātoḥ anabhyāsasya iti . tena dhātoḥ ekācaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20162: iti vijñāyate . yadi dhātoḥ ekācaḥ siddham papāca papāṭha . jajāgāra puputrīyiṣati
GS24pmbhasuu:20163: iti na sidhyati . dhātoḥ iti na eṣā ekācsamānādhikaraṇā ṣaṣṭhī . dhātoḥ ekācaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:20164: . kim tarhi avayavayogā eṣā ṣaṣṭhī . dhātoḥ yaḥ ekāc avayavaḥ iti . avayavayogā eṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:20165: ṣaṣṭhī iti cet siddham jajāgāra puputrīyiṣati iti . papāca papāṭha iti na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:20166: . eṣaḥ api vyapadeśivadbhāvena dhātoḥ ekāc avayavaḥ bhavati . ekācaḥ dve prathamasya
GS24pmbhasuu:20167: iti ucyate . tena yatra eva prathamaḥ ca aprathamaḥ ca tatra dvirvacanam syāt . jajāgāra
GS24pmbhasuu:20168: puputrīyiṣati iti . papāca papāṭha iti atra na syāt . prathamatve ca . prathamatve
GS24pmbhasuu:20169: ca kim . vyapadeśivadvacanāt siddham iti eva . saḥ tarhi vyapadeśivadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20170: . na vaktavyaḥ . uktam vā . kim uktam . tatra vyapadeśivadvacanam . ekācaḥ dve prathamārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:20171: . ṣatve ca ādeśasampratyayārtham . avacanāt lokavijñānāt siddham iti eva . yogavibhāgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20172: vā . atha vā yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . ekācaḥ dve bhavataḥ . kimarthaḥ yogavibhāgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20173: . ekājmātrasya dvirvacanārthaḥ . ekājmātrayta dvirvacanam yathā syāt . iyāya papāca
GS24pmbhasuu:20174: . tataḥ prathamasya . prathamasya ekācaḥ dve bhavataḥ . idam idānīm kimartham . niyamāṛtham
GS24pmbhasuu:20175: . yatra prathamaḥ ca aprathamaḥ ca asti tatra prathamasya ekācaḥ dvirvacanam yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:20176: syāt . aprathamasya mā bhūt . jajāgāra puputrīyiṣati iti . ekācaḥ avayavaikāctvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:20177: avayavānām dvirvacanaprasaṅgaḥ . ekācaḥ avayavaikāctvāt avayavānām dvirvacanam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:20178: . nenijati iti atra nijśabdaḥ api ekāc ijśabdaḥ api ekāc ikāraḥ api ekāc niśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20179: api . tatra nijśabdasya dvirvacane rūpam siddham doṣāḥ ca na santi . ijśabdasya dvirvacane
GS24pmbhasuu:20180: rūpam na sidhyati doṣāḥ ca na santi . ikārasya dvirvacane rūpam na sidhati doṣāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20181: ca na santi . niśabdasya dvirvacane rūpam siddham doṣāḥ tu santi . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20182: . tatra jusbhāvavacanam . tatra jusbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . anenijuḥ . paryaveviṣuḥ . abhyastāt
GS24pmbhasuu:20183: jheḥ jusbhāvaḥ bhavati iti jusbhāvaḥ na prāpnoti jakāreṇavyavadhānāt . svaraḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:20184: . svaraḥ ca na sidhyati . nenijati . yat pariveviṣati iti . abhyastānām ādiḥ udāttaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20185: bhavati ajādau lasārvadhātuke iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ na prāpnoti . adbhāvaḥ ca . adbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20186: ca na sidhyati . nenijati . pariveviṣati iti . abhyastāt iti adbhāvaḥ na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:20187: . numpratiṣedhaḥ ca . numpratiṣedhaḥ ca na sidhyati . nenijat . pariveviṣat . na
GS24pmbhasuu:20188: abhyāstāt śatuḥ it numpratiṣedhaḥ na prāpnoti jakāreṇavyavadhānāt . śāstrahāniḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:20189: . śāstrahāniḥ ca bhavati . samudāyaikācaḥ śāstram hīyate . siddham tu tatsamudāyaikāctvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:20190: śāstrāhāneḥ . siddham etat . katham . tatsamudāyaikāctvāt . kim idam tatsamudāyaikāctvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:20191: iti . tasya samudāyaḥ tatsamudāyaḥ . ekājbhāvaḥ ekāctvam . tatsamudāyasya ekāctvam
GS24pmbhasuu:20193: . kutaḥ . śāstrāhāneḥ . evam hi śāstram ahīnam bhavati . nanu ca samudāyaikācaḥ dvirvacane
GS24pmbhasuu:20195: śāstram hīyate . na hīyate . kim kāraṇam . avayavātmakatvāt samudāyasya . avayavātmakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20196: samudāyaḥ . abhyantaraḥ hi samudāye avayavaḥ . tat yathā vṛkṣaḥ pracalan sahāvayavaiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20197: pracalati . tatra bahuvrīhinirdeśe anackasya dvirvacanam anyapadārthatvāt . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:20198: bahuvrīhinirdeśe anackasya dvirvacanam prāpnoti . āṭatuḥ . āṭuḥ . kim kāraṇam . anyapadārthatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:20199: bahuvrīheḥ . anyapadārthe bahuvrīhiḥ vartate . tena yat anyat acaḥ tasya dvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:20200: syāt . tat yathā citraguḥ ānīyatām iti ukte yasya tāḥ gāvaḥ santi saḥ ānīyate na
GS24pmbhasuu:20201: gāvaḥ . siddham tu tadguṇasaṃvijñānāt pāṇineḥ yathā loke . siddham etat . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:20202: . tadguṇasaṃvijñānāt bhagavataḥ pāṇineḥ ācāryasya yathā loke . loke śuklavāsasam
GS24pmbhasuu:20203: ānaya . lohitoṣṇīṣāḥ pracaranti iti . tadguṇaḥ ānīyate tadguṇāḥ ca pracaranti . evam iha api .
GS24pmbhasuu:20204: (P_6,1.1.2) KA_III.3.24-5.19 Ro_IV.287-293 atha yasya dvirvacanam ārabhyate kim tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:20205: sthāne bhavati āhosvit dviḥprayogaḥ iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . sthāne dvirvacane
GS24pmbhasuu:20206: ṇilopavacanam samudāyādeśatvāt . sthāne dvirvacane ṇilopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . āṭiṭat . āśiśat
GS24pmbhasuu:20207: . kim kāraṇam . samudāyādeśatvāt . samudāyasya samudāyaḥ ādeśaḥ . tatra sampramugdhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:20208: prakṛtipratyayasamudāyasya naṣṭaḥ ṇiḥ bhavati iti ṇeḥ aniṭi iti ṇilopaḥ na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:20209: . idam iha sampradhāryam . dvirvacanam kriyatām ṇilopaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:20210: paratvāt ṇilopaḥ . nityam dvirvacanam . kṛte api ṇilope prāpnoti akṛte api . dvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:20211: api nityam . anyasya kṛte ṇilope prāpnoti anyasya akṛte . śabdāntarasya ca prāpnuvan
GS24pmbhasuu:20212: vidhiḥ anityaḥ bhavati . nityam eva dvirvacanam . katham . rūpasya sthānivatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:20213: yat ca sanyaṅantasya dvirvacane . yat ca sanyaṅantasya dvirvacane codyam tat iha
GS24pmbhasuu:20214: api codyam . kim punaḥ tat . sanyaṅantasya cet aśeḥ sani aniṭaḥ . dīrghakutvaprasāraṇaṣatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:20215: adhikasya dvirvacanāt . ābṛdhyoḥ ca abhyastavipratiṣedhaḥ . saṅāśraye ca samudāyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:20216: samudāyādeśatvāt jhalāśraye ca avyapadeśaḥ āmiśratvāt iti . astu tarhi dviḥprayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20217: dvirvacanam . dviḥprayogaḥ iti cet ṇakāraṣakārādeśādeḥ ettvavacanam liṭi . dviḥprayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20218: iti cet ṇakāraṣakārādeśādeḥ ettvam liṭi vaktavyam . nematuḥ . nemuḥ . sehe . sehāte
GS24pmbhasuu:20219: . sahire . anādeśādeḥ iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . sthāne punaḥ dvirvacane sati samudāyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:20220: samudāyaḥ ādeśaḥ . tatra sampramugdhatvāt prakṛtipratyayasya naṣṭaḥ saḥ ādeśādiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20221: bhavati . dviḥprayoge api dvirvacane sati na doṣaḥ . vakṣyati tatra liḍgrahaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:20222: prayojanam . liṭi yaḥ ādeśādiḥ tadādeḥ na iti . iḍvacanam ca yaṅlope . iṭ ca yaṅlope
GS24pmbhasuu:20223: vaktavyaḥ . bebhiditā . bebhiditum . ekācaḥ upadeśe anudāttāt iti iṭpratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:20224: . sthāne punaḥ dvirvacane sati samudāyasya samudāyaḥ ādeśaḥ . tatra sampramugdhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:20225: prakṛtipratyayasya naṣṭaḥ saḥ bhavati yaḥ ekāc upadeśe anudāttaḥ . dviḥprayoge api
GS24pmbhasuu:20226: dvirvacane sati na doṣaḥ . ekājgrahaṇena aṅgam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . ekācaḥ aṅgāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:20227: . nanu ca ekaikam atra aṅgam . samudāye yā vākyaparisamāptiḥ tasya aṅgasañjñā bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:20228: . kutaḥ etat . śāstrāhāneḥ . evam hi śāstram ahīnam bhavati . iḍdīrghapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20229: ca . iṭaḥ dīrghatvasya ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . jarīgṛhitā . jarīgṛhitum . grahaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20230: aliṭi dīrghaḥ iti dīrghatvam prāpnoti . sthāne punaḥ dvirvacane samudāyasya samudāyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20231: ādeśaḥ . tatra sampramugdhatvāt prakṛtipratyayasya naṣṭaḥ grahiḥ . dviḥprayoge api
GS24pmbhasuu:20232: dvirvacane na doṣaḥ . grahiṇā aṅgam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . graheḥ aṅgāt iti . nanu ca ekaikam
GS24pmbhasuu:20233: atra aṅgam . samudāye yā vākyaparisamāptiḥ tasya aṅgasañjñā bhaviṣyati . kutaḥ etat
GS24pmbhasuu:20234: . śāstrāhāneḥ . evam hi śāstram ahīnam bhavati . padādividhipratiṣedhaḥ ca . padādilakṣaṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:20235: vidheḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . siṣeca . suṣvāpa . sātpadādyoḥ iti ṣatvapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20236: prāpnoti . sthāne punaḥ dvirvacane sati samudāyasya samudāyaḥ ādeśaḥ . tatra sampramugdhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:20237: prakṛtipratyayasya naṣṭaḥ saḥ padādiḥ bhavati . dviḥprayoge ca api dvirvacane na
GS24pmbhasuu:20238: doṣaḥ . suptiṅbhyām padam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . yasmāt suptiṅvidhiḥ tadādi subantam tiṅantam
GS24pmbhasuu:20240: ] suptiṅvidhiḥ . samudāye yā vākyaparisamāptiḥ tayā padasañjñā bhaviṣyati . kutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20241: etat . śāstrāhāneḥ . evam hi śāstram ahīnam bhavati . tau eva suptiṅau tataḥ parau
GS24pmbhasuu:20242: sā eva ca prakṛtiḥ ādyā . ādigrahaṇam prakṛtam . samudāyapadatvam etena .
GS24pmbhasuu:20243: (P_6,1.2.1) KA_III.5.21-24 Ro_IV.294 dvitīyasya iti avacanam ajādeḥ iti karmadhārayāt
GS24pmbhasuu:20244: pañcamī . dvitīyasya iti śakyam avaktum . katham . ajādeḥ iti na eṣā bahuvrīheḥ ṣaṣṭhī
GS24pmbhasuu:20245: . ac ādiḥ yasya saḥ ayam ajādiḥ . ajādeḥ . kim tarhi karmadhārayāt pañcamī . ac ādiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20246: ajādiḥ . ajādeḥ parasya iti . tatra antareṇa dvitīyagrahaṇam dvitīyasya eva bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:20248: . dvitīyadvirvacane prathamasya nivṛttiḥ vaktavyā . aṭiṭiṣati . aśiśiṣati iti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:20249: kāraṇam . prāptatvāt . prāpnoti ekācaḥ dve prathamasya iti . nanu ca dvitīyadvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:20250: prathamadvirvacanam bādhiṣyate . katham anyasya ucyamānasya bādhakam syāt . asati
GS24pmbhasuu:20251: khalu api sambhave bādhanam bhavati asti ca sambhavaḥ yat ubhayam syāt . na vā prathamavijñāne
GS24pmbhasuu:20252: hi dvitīyāprāptiḥ advitīyatvāt . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam . prathamavijñāne
GS24pmbhasuu:20253: hi sati dvitīyasya aprāptiḥ syāt . kim kāraṇam . advitīyatvāt . na hi idānīm prathamadvirvacane
GS24pmbhasuu:20254: kṛte dvitīyaḥ dvitīyaḥ bhavati . kaḥ tarhi . tṛtīyaḥ . tat yathā dvayoḥ āsīnayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20255: tṛtīye upajāte na dvitīyaḥ dvitīyaḥ bhavati . kaḥ tarhi . tṛtīyaḥ . na hi kim cit
GS24pmbhasuu:20256: ucyate akṛte dvirvacane yaḥ dvitīyaḥ tasya bhavitavyam iti . kim tarhi kṛte dvirvacane
GS24pmbhasuu:20257: yaḥ dvitīyaḥ tasya bhaviṣyati . anārambhasamam evam syāt . aṭeḥ prathamasya dvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:20258: syāt . halādiśeṣaḥ . dvitīyasya dvirvacanam . halādiśeṣaḥ . trayāṇām akārāṇām pararūpatve
GS24pmbhasuu:20259: aṭiṣati iti evam rūpam syāt . na anārambhasamam . aṭeḥ prathamasya dvirvacanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:20260: halādiśeṣaḥ . ittvam . dvitīyasya dvirvacanam . halādiśeṣaḥ . ittvam ḍvayoḥ ikārayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20261: savarṇadīrghatvam . abhyāsasya asavarṇe iti iyaṅādeśaḥ . iyaṭiṣati iti etat rūpam
GS24pmbhasuu:20262: yathā syāt . oṇeḥ ca uvaṇiṣati iti . na aniṣṭārthā śāstrapravṛttiḥ bhavitum arhati
GS24pmbhasuu:20263: . yathā vā ādivikāre alaḥ antyavikārābhāvaḥ . yathā vā ādivividhau alaḥ antyavidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20264: na bhavati evam dvitīyadvirvacane prathamadvirvacanam na bhaviṣyati . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20265: . na aprāpte alaḥ antyavidhau ādividhiḥ ārabhyate . saḥ tasya bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:20266: . idam api evañjātīyakam . na aprāpte prathamadvirvacane dvitīyadvirvacanamārabhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:20267: . tat bādhakam bhaviṣyati . yat api ucyate asati khalu api sambhave bādhanam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:20268: asti ca sambhavaḥ yat ubhayam syāt iti . na etat asti . sati api sambhave bādhanam
GS24pmbhasuu:20269: bhavati . tat yathā dadhi brāhmaṇebhyaḥ dīyatām takram kauṇḍinyāya iti . sati api
GS24pmbhasuu:20270: dadhidānasya sambhave takradānam nivartakam bhavati . evam iha api sati api sambhave
GS24pmbhasuu:20271: prathamadvirvacanasya dvitīyadvirvacanam bādhiṣyate . tatra pūrvasya acaḥ nivṛttau
GS24pmbhasuu:20272: vyañjanasya anivṛttiḥ vaktavyā . aṭiṭiṣati iti . yathā eva acaḥ nivṛttiḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:20273: evam vyañjanasya api prāpnoti . tatra pūrvasya acaḥ nivṛttau vyañjanānivṛttiḥ aśāsanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:20274: pūrvasya . tatra pūrvasya acaḥ nivṛttau vyañjanasya anivṛttiḥ siddhā . kutaḥ . aśāsanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:20275: pūrvasya . na iha vayam pūrvasya pratiṣedham śiṣmaḥ . kim tarhi dvitīyasya dvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:20276: ārabhāmahe . vyañjanāni punaḥ naṭabhāryavat bhavanti . tat yathā . naṭānām striyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20277: raṅgam gatāḥ yaḥ yaḥ pṛcchati kasya yūyam kasya yūyam iti tam tam tava tava iti āhuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20278: . evam vyañjanāni yasya yasya acaḥ kāryam ucyate tam tam bhajante . ndrādipratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:20279: ca . yat ayam na ndrāḥ saṃyogādayaḥ iti pratiṣedham śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ pūrvanivṛttau
GS24pmbhasuu:20280: vyañjanasya anivṛttiḥ iti . tatra dvitīyābhāve prathamādvirvacanam pratiṣiddhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:20281: . tatra dvitīyasya ekācaḥ abhāve prathamasya dvirvacanam na prāpnoti . āṭatuḥ . āṭuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20282: . kim kāraṇam . pratiṣiddhatvāt . ajādeḥ dvitīyasya iti pratiṣedhāt . na eṣa doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20283: . sati tasmin pratiṣedhaḥ . sati dvitīyadvirvacane prathamasya pratiṣedhaḥ . sati
GS24pmbhasuu:20284: tasmin pratiṣedhaḥ iti cet halādiśeṣe doṣaḥ . sati tasmin pratiṣedhaḥ iti cet halādiśeṣe
GS24pmbhasuu:20285: doṣaḥ bhavati . halādiśeṣe sati ādye hali anādyasya lopaḥ syāt . iha eva syāt . papāca .
GS24pmbhasuu:20286: papāṭha iti . iha na syāt . āṭatuḥ . āṭuḥ iti . lokavat halādiśeṣe . lokavat halādiśeṣe
GS24pmbhasuu:20287: siddham . tat yathā loke īśvaraḥ ājñāpayati grāmāt grāmāt manuṣyāḥ ānīyantām prāgāṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:20288: grāmebhyaḥ brāhmaṇāḥ ānīyantām iti . yeṣu tatra grāmeṣu brāhmaṇāḥ na santi na tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:20289: idānīm tataḥ anyasya ānayanam bhavati . yathā tatra kva cit api brāhmaṇasya sattā (R: sarvatra)
GS24pmbhasuu:20290: abrāhmaṇasya nivarttikā bhavati evam iha api kva cit api hal ādyaḥ san sarvasya anādyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:20291: halaḥ nivartakaḥ bhavati . kva cit anyatra lopaḥ iti cet dvirvacanam . kva cit anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:20292: lopaḥ iti cet dvirvacanam api evam prāpnoti . kva cit api dvitīyaḥ san sarvasya prathamasya
GS24pmbhasuu:20293: nivartakaḥ syāt . tasmāt astu sati tasmin pratiṣedhaḥ iti eva. nanu ca uktam sati
GS24pmbhasuu:20294: tasmin pratiṣedhaḥ iti cet halādiśeṣe doṣaḥ iti . pratividhāsyate halādiśeṣe .
GS24pmbhasuu:20295: (P_6,1.3) KA_III.8.9-22 Ro_IV.301-302 kimartham idam ucyate . ndrādeḥ dvirvacanaprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20296: tatra ndrāṇām pratiṣedhaḥ . ndrādeḥ ekācaḥ dvirvacanam prāpnoti . tatra ndrāṇām saṃyogādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:20297: pratiṣedhaḥ ucyate . īrṣyateḥ tṛtīyasya . īrṣyateḥ tṛtīyasya dve bhavataḥ iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:20298: . ke cit tāvat āhuḥ ekācaḥ iti . īrṣyiṣiṣati . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:20300: īrṣyiyiṣati . kaṇḍvādīnām ca . kaṇḍvādīnām ca tṛtīyasya dve bhavataḥ iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:20301: . kaṇḍūyiyiṣati . asūyiyiṣati . vā nāmadhātūnām . vā nāmadhātūnām tṛtīyasya dve bhavataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20302: iti vaktavyam . aśvīyiyiṣati . aśiśvīyiṣati . aparaḥ āha yatheṣṭam vā . yatheṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:20303: vā nāmadhātūnām iti . puputrīyiṣati . putitrīyiṣati . putrīyiyiṣati .
GS24pmbhasuu:20304: (P_6,1.4) KA_III.9.2-7 Ro_IV.302 pūrvaḥ abhyāsaḥ iti ucyate . kasya pūrvaḥ abhyāsasañjñaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20305: bhavati . dve iti vartate . dvayoḥ iti vaktavyam . saḥ tarhi tathā nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20306: . na kartavyaḥ . arthāt vibhaktivipariṇāmaḥ bhaviṣyati . tat yathā . uccāni devadattasya
GS24pmbhasuu:20307: gṛhāṇi . āmantrayasva enam . devadattam iti gamyate . devadattasya gāvaḥ aśvāḥ hiraṇyam
GS24pmbhasuu:20308: iti . āḍhyaḥ vaidhaveyaḥ . devadattaḥ iti gamyate . purastāt ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭam sat
GS24pmbhasuu:20309: arthāt dvitīyānirdiṣṭam prathamānirdiṣṭam ca bhavati . evam iha api purastāt prathamānirdiṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:20312: sahagrahaṇam kartavyam . kim prayojanam . ādyudāttatve pṛthagaprasaṅgārtham . ādyudāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:20313: saha bhūtayoḥ yathā syāt . ekaikasya mā bhūt iti . yasmin eva abhyastakārye adoṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20314: tat eva paṭhitam anudāttam padam ekavarjam iti . na asti yaugapadyena sambhavaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:20315: paryāyaḥ tarhi prasajyeta . paryāyaḥ ca . pūrvasya tāvat pareṇa rūpeṇa vyavahitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:20316: na bhaviṣyati . parasya tarhi syāt . tatra ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na parasya bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:20317: iti yat ayam bibhetyādīnām piti pratyayāt pūrvam udāttam bhavati iti āha . evam vyavadhānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:20318: na pūrvasya jñāpakāt na parasya ucyate ca idam abhyastānām ādiḥ udāttaḥ bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:20319: . tatra saḥ eva doṣaḥ paryāyaḥ prasajyeta . tasmāt sahagrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:20320: . ubhegrahaṇam kriyate . tat sahārtham vijñāsyate . asti anyat ubhegrahaṇasya prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:20321: . kim . ubhegrahaṇam sañjñinirdeśārtham . antareṇa api ubhegrahaṇam prakḷptaḥ sañjñinirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20322: . katham . dve iti vartate . idam tarhi prayojanam . yatra ubhe śabdarūpe śrūyete
GS24pmbhasuu:20323: tatra abhyastasañjñā yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt : īrtsanti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:20328: aipsan . kim ca syāt . adbhāvaḥ numpratiṣedhaḥ jusbhāvaḥ iti ete vidhayaḥ prasajyeran . adbhāve tāvat na doṣaḥ . saptame yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . idam asti :
GS24pmbhasuu:20329: at abhyastāt . tataḥ ātmanepadeṣu . ātmanepadeṣu ca at bhavati . anataḥ iti ubhayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20330: śeṣaḥ . yat api ucyate numpratiṣedhaḥ iti ekādeśe kṛte vyapavargābhāvāt na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:20331: . idam iha sampradhāryam . numpratiṣedhaḥ kriyatām ekādeśaḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:20332: . paratvāt numpratiṣedhaḥ . nityaḥ ekādeśaḥ . kṛte api numpratiṣedhe prāpnoti akṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:20333: api . ekādeśaḥ api nityaḥ . anyasya kṛte numpratiṣedhe prāpnoti anyasya akṛte . śabdāntarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:20334: ca prāpnuvan vidhiḥ anityaḥ bhavati . antaraṅgaḥ tarhi ekādeśaḥ . kā antaraṅgatā
GS24pmbhasuu:20335: . varṇau āśritya ekādeśaḥ . vidhiviṣaye numpratiṣedhaḥ vidhiḥ ca numaḥ sarvanāmasthāne
GS24pmbhasuu:20336: prāk tu sarvanāmasthānotpatteḥ ekādeśaḥ . tatra nityatvāt ca antaraṅgatvāt ca ekādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20337: . ekādeśe kṛte vyapavargābhāvāt na bhaviṣyati . yat api ucyate jusbhāvaḥ iti ekādeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:20338: kṛte vyapavargābhāvāt na bhaviṣyati . ekādeśe iti ucyate kena ca atra ekādeśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:20339: antinā . na atra antibhāvaḥ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . jusbhāvena bādhyate . na atra
GS24pmbhasuu:20340: jusbhāvaḥ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . śapā vyavahitatvāt . ekādeśe kṛte na asti vyavadhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:20341: . ekādeśaḥ pūrvavidhau sthānivat bhavati iti vyavadhānam eva . kim puṇaḥ kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:20342: nimittavān antiḥ ekādeśam tāvat pratīkṣate na punaḥ tāvati eva nimittam asti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:20343: antibhāvena bhāvyam . iha api tarhi tāvati eva nimittam asti iti antibhāvaḥ syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:20344: . anenijuḥ . paryaveviṣuḥ iti . astu . antibhāve kṛte sthānivadbhāvāt jhigrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:20345: grahaṇāt jusbhāvaḥ bhaviṣyati . atha vā yadi api nimittavān antiḥ ayam tasya jusbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20346: apavādaḥ . na ca apavādaviṣaye utsargāḥ abhiniviśante . pūrvam hi apavādāḥ abhiniviśante
GS24pmbhasuu:20347: paścāt utsargāḥ . prakalpya vā apavādaviṣayam tataḥ utasrgaḥ pravartate . na tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:20348: atra kadā cit api antibhāvaḥ bhavati . apavādam jusbhāvam pratīkṣate . na khalu api
GS24pmbhasuu:20349: kva cit abhyastānām jheḥ ca ānantaryam . sarvatra vikaraṇaiḥ vyavadhānam . tena anena
GS24pmbhasuu:20350: avaśyam vikaraṇanāśaḥ pratīkṣyaḥ kva cit lukā kva cit ślunā kva cit ekādeśena . saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20351: yathā ślulukau pratīkṣate evam ekādeśam api pratīkṣate . evam tarhi idam iha vyapadeśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:20352: sat ācāryaḥ na vyapadiśati . kim . sthānivadbhāvam . sthānivadbhāvāt vyavadhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:20353: . vyavadhānāt na bhaviṣyati . pūrvavidhau sthānivadbhāvaḥ na ca ayam pūrvasya vidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20354: . pūrvasmāt api vidhiḥ pūrvavidhiḥ . tat etat asati prayojane ubhegrahaṇam sahārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:20355: vijñāsyate . katham kṛtvā ekaikasya abhyastasañjñā prāpnoti . pratyekam vākyaparisamāptiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20356: dṛṣṭā . tat yathā . vṛddhiguṇasañjñe pratyekam bhavataḥ . nanu ca ayam api asti dṛṣṭāntaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20357: samudāye vākyaparisamāptiḥ iti . tat yathā . gargāḥ śatam daṇḍyantām iti . arthinaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20358: ca rājānaḥ hiraṇyena bhavanti na ca pratyekam daṇḍayanti . sati etasmin dṛṣṭānte
GS24pmbhasuu:20359: yadi tatra pratyekam iti ucyate iha api sahagrahaṇam kartavyam . atha tatra antareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:20360: pratyekam iti vacanam pratyekam guṇvṛddhisañjñe bhavataḥ iha api na arthaḥ sahagrahaṇena .
GS24pmbhasuu:20362: jakṣityādiṣu saptagrahaṇam kartavyam . sapta jakṣityādayaḥ abhyastasañjñakāḥ bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:20363: iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . vevītyartham . vevīteḥ abhyastasañjñā yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:20364: . vevyate . aparigaṇanam vā āgaṇāntatvāt . na vā arthaḥ parigaṇanena . astu āgaṇāntam
GS24pmbhasuu:20365: abhyastasañjñā . iha api tarhi prāpnoti . āṅaḥ śāsu . astu . abhyastakāryāṇi kasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:20366: na bhavanti . bhūyiṣṭhāni parasmaipadeṣu ātmanepadī ca ayam . svaraḥ tarhi prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:20367: . yatra api asya ātmanepadeṣu abhyastakāryam svaraḥ tatra api anudāttetaḥ param lasārvadhātukam
GS24pmbhasuu:20368: anudāttam bhavati iti anudāttatve kṛte na asti viśeṣaḥ dhātusvareṇa udāttatve sati
GS24pmbhasuu:20369: abhyastasvareṇa vā . ṣasivaśī chāndasau . dṛṣṭānuvidhiḥ chandasi bhavati . carkarītam
GS24pmbhasuu:20370: abhyastam eva . hnuṅaḥ tarhi prāpnoti . astu . abhyastakāryāṇi kasmāt na bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:20371: . bhūyiṣṭhāni parasmaipadeṣu ātmanepadī ca ayam . svaraḥ tarhi prāpnoti . ahnviṅoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20372: iti pratiṣedhavidhānasāmarthyāt svaraḥ na bhaviṣyati . atha vā sapta eva ime dhātavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20373: paṭhyante . jakṣ abhyastasañjñaḥ bhavati . ityādayaḥ ca ṣaṭ . jakṣ ityādayaḥ ṣaṭ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:20375: chandaḥpratyayagrahaṇam kartavyam . chandasi tujādīnām dīrghaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:20376: . asmin ca asmin ca pratyaye iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . tutoja śabalān harān .
GS24pmbhasuu:20377: anārambhaḥ vā aparigaṇitatvāt . anārambhaḥ vā chandasi dīrghatvasya nyāyyaḥ . kutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20378: . aparigaṇitatvāt . na hi chandasi dīrghatvasya parigaṇanam kartum śakyam . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:20379: . anyeṣām ca darśanāt . yeṣām api dīrghatvam na ārabhyate teṣām api chandasi dīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:20380: dṛśyate . tat yathā pūruṣaḥ . nārakaḥ iti . anekāntatvāt ca . yeṣām ca api ārabhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:20381: teṣām api anekāntaḥ . yasmin eva ca pratyaye dīrghatvam dṛśyate tasmin eva ca na
GS24pmbhasuu:20382: dṛśyate . māmahānaḥ ukthapātram . mamahānaḥ iti ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:20383: (P_6,1.8) KA_III.12.11-13.5 Ro_IV.310-311 dhātoḥ iti kimartham . īhām cakre . na
GS24pmbhasuu:20384: etat asti . liṭi iti ucyate na ca atra liṭam paśyāmaḥ . pratyayalakṣaṇena . na lumatā
GS24pmbhasuu:20385: tasmin iti pratyayalakṣaṇapratiṣedhaḥ . idam tarhi . sasṛvāṃsaḥ viśṛṇvire . liṭi
GS24pmbhasuu:20386: dvirvacane jāgarteḥ vāvacanam . liṭi dvirvacane jāgarteḥ vā iti vaktavyam . yaḥ jāgara
GS24pmbhasuu:20387: tam ṛcaḥ kāmayante . yaḥ jajāgāra tam ṛcaḥ kāmayante . anabhyāsasya iti kim . kṛṣṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20388: nonāva vṛṣabhaḥ yadi idam . nonūyateḥ nonāva . abhyāsapratiṣedhānarthakyam ca chandasi
GS24pmbhasuu:20389: vāvacanāt . abhyāsapratiṣedhaḥ ca anarthakaḥ . kim kāraṇam . chandasi vāvacanāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:20390: avaśyam chandasi vā dve bhavataḥ iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . prayojanam ādityān
GS24pmbhasuu:20391: yāciṣāmahe . yiyāciṣāmahe iti prāpte . devatā no dāti priyāṇi . dadāti priyāṇi .
GS24pmbhasuu:20392: maghavā dātu . maghavā dadātu . saḥ naḥ stutaḥ vīravat dhātu . vīravat dadhātu .
GS24pmbhasuu:20393: yāvatā idānīm chandasi vā dve bhavataḥ iti ucyate dhātugrahaṇena api na arthaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:20394: kasmāt na bhavati sasṛvāṃsaḥ viśṛṇvire iti . chandasi vāvacanāt . tat etat dhātugrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:20396: (P_6,1.9) KA_III.13.7-16.7 Ro_IV.311-317 kim iyam ṣaṣṭhī āhosvit saptamī . kutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20397: sandehaḥ . samānaḥ nirdeśaḥ . kim ca ataḥ . yadi ṣaṣṭhī sanyaṅantasya dvirvacanena
GS24pmbhasuu:20398: bhavitavyam . atha saptamī sanyaṅoḥ parataḥ pūrvasya dvirvacanam . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20399: . sanyaṅoḥ parataḥ iti cet iṭaḥ dvirvacanam parāditvāt . sanyaṅoḥ parataḥ iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:20400: iṭaḥ dvirvacanam kartavyam . aṭiṭiṣati . aśiśiṣati . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:20401: . parāditvāt . iṭ parādiḥ . hanteḥ ca īṭaḥ . hanteḥ ca īṭaḥ dvirvacanam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:20402: . jeghnīyate . nanu ca yasya api sanyaṅantasya dvirvacanam tasya api sthānivadbhāvaprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20403: . īṭi sthānivadbhāvāt īṭaḥ dvirvacanam na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . dvirvacananimitte
GS24pmbhasuu:20404: aci sthānivat iti ucyate na ca asau dvirvacananimittam . yasmin api dvirvacanam yasya
GS24pmbhasuu:20405: api dvirvacanam sarvaḥ asau dvirvacananimittam . tasmāt īṭaḥ dvirvacanam . tasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:20406: ubhābhyām īṭaḥ dvirvacanam kartavyam . yaḥ ca ubhayoḥ doṣaḥ na tam ekaḥ codyaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:20407: . ekācaḥ upadeśe anudāttāt iti upadeśavacanam udāttaviśeṣaṇam cet sanaḥ iṭpratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20408: . ekācaḥ upadeśe anudāttāt iti upadeśavacanam udāttaviśeṣaṇam cet sanaḥ iṭpratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20409: vaktavyaḥ . bibhitsati . cicchitsati . dvirvacane kṛte upadeśe anudāttāt ekācaḥ śrūyamāṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:20410: iti iṭpratiṣedhaḥ na prāpnoti . astu tarhi sanyaṅantasya . sanyaṅantasya iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:20411: aśeḥ sani aniṭaḥ . sanyaṅantasya iti cet aśeḥ sani aniṭaḥ dvirvacanam vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:20412: iyakṣamāṇāḥ bhṛgubhiḥ sajoṣāḥ . yasya api sanyaṅoḥ parataḥ dvirvacanam tena api atra
GS24pmbhasuu:20413: avaśyam iḍabhāve yatnaḥ kartavyaḥ . kim kāraṇam . aśeḥ hi pratipadam iṭ vidhīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:20414: smipūṅrañjvaśām sani iti . tena eva dvitīyadvirvacanam api na bhaviṣyati . atha vā
GS24pmbhasuu:20415: na etat aśeḥ rūpam . yajeḥ eṣaḥ chāndasaḥ varṇalopaḥ . tat yathā tubhya idam agne
GS24pmbhasuu:20416: . tubhyam idam agne iti prāpte . ambānām carum . nāmbānām carum iti prāpte . āvyādhinīḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20417: ugaṇāḥ . sugaṇāḥ iti prāpte . iṣkartaram adhvarasya . niṣkartāram iti prāpte . śivā
GS24pmbhasuu:20418: udrasya bheṣajī . śivā rudrasya bheṣajī iti prāpte . aśyarthaḥ vai gamyate . kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20419: punaḥ aśeḥ arthaḥ . aśnotiḥ vyaptikarmā . yajiḥ api aśyarthe vartate . katham punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20420: anyaḥ nāma anyasya arthe vartate . bahvarthāḥ api dhātavaḥ bhavanti iti . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:20421: . vapiḥ prakiraṇe dṛṣṭaḥ chedane ca api vartate . keśān vapati iti . īḍiḥ studicodanāyācñāsu
GS24pmbhasuu:20422: dṛṣṭaḥ īraṇe ca api vartate . agniḥ vai itaḥ vṛṣṭim īṭṭe . marutaḥ amutaḥ cyāvayanti
GS24pmbhasuu:20423: . karotiḥ ayam abhūtaprādurbhāve dṛṣṭaḥ nirmalīkaraṇe ca api vartate . pṛṣṭham kuru
GS24pmbhasuu:20424: . pādau kuru . unmṛdāna iti gamyate . nikṣepaṇe ca api dṛśyate . kaṭe kuru . ghaṭe
GS24pmbhasuu:20425: kuru . aśmānam itaḥ kuru . sthāpaya iti gamyate . evam tarhi dīrghakutvaprasāraṇaṣatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:20426: adhikasya dvirvacanāt . dīrghatvam dvirvacanādhikasya na sidhyati . cicīṣati . tuṣṭūṣati
GS24pmbhasuu:20427: . samudāyasya samudāyaḥ ādeśaḥ . tatra sampramugdhatvāt prakṛtipratyayasya naṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20428: san bhavati . tatra ajantānām sani iti dīrghatvam na prāpnoti . idam iha sampradhāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:20429: dīrghatvam kriyatām dvirvacanam iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt dīrghatvam . nityam
GS24pmbhasuu:20430: dvirvacanam . kṛte api dīrghatve prāpnoti akṛte api prāpnoti . dīrghatvam api nityam
GS24pmbhasuu:20431: . kṛte api dvirvacane prāpnoti akṛte api prāpnoti . anityam dīrghatvam . na hi kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:20432: dvirvacane prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . samudāyasya samudāyaḥ ādeśaḥ . tatra sampramugdhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:20433: prakṛtipratyayasya ajantatā na asti iti dīrghatvam na prāpnoti . dvirvacanam api
GS24pmbhasuu:20434: anityam . anyasya kṛte dīrghatve prāpnoti anyasya akṛte . śabdāntarasya ca prāpnuvan
GS24pmbhasuu:20435: vidhiḥ anityaḥ bhavati . ubhayoḥ anityayoḥ paratvāt dīrghatvam . yat tarhi na akṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:20436: dvirvacane dīrghatvam tat na sidhyati . juhūṣati iti . kutvam dvirvacanādhikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:20437: na sidhyati . jighāṃsati . jaṅghanyate . kim kāraṇam . samudāyasya samudāyaḥ ādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20438: . tatra sampramugdhatvāt prakṛtipratyayasya naṣṭaḥ hantiḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:20439: tatra abhyāsāt hantihakārasya iti kutvam na sidhyati . samprasāraṇam ca dvirvacanādhikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:20440: na sidhyati . juhūṣati. johūyate . samudāyasya samudāyaḥ ādeśaḥ . tatra sampramugdhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:20441: prakṛtipratyayasya naṣṭaḥ havayatiḥ bhavati . tatra hvaḥ samprasāraṇam abhyastasya
GS24pmbhasuu:20442: iti samprasāraṇam na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . vakṣyati hi etat hvaḥ abhyastanimittasya
GS24pmbhasuu:20443: iti . yāvatā ca idānīm hvaḥ abhyastanimittasya iti ucyate saḥ api adoṣaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:20444: yat uktam yat tarhi na akṛte dvirvacane dīrghatvam tat na sidhyati iti . ṣatvam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:20445: dvirvacanādhikasya na sidhyati . pipakṣati . yiyakṣati . samudāyasya samudāyaḥ ādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20446: . tatra sampramugdhatvāt prakṛtipratyayasya naṣṭaḥ san bhavati . tatra iṇkubhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:20447: uttarasya pratyayasakārasya iti ṣatvam na prāpoti . idam iha sampradhāryam dvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:20448: kriyatām ṣatvam iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt ṣatvam . pūrvatrāsiddhe ṣatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:20449: siddhāsiddhayoḥ ca na asti sampradhāraṇā . ābṛdhyoḥ ca abhyastavidhipratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:20450: ābṛdhyoḥ ca abhyastāśrayaḥ vidhiḥ prāpnoti . saḥ pratiṣedhyaḥ . īpsati . īrtsati
GS24pmbhasuu:20451: . īpsan . īrtsan . aipsan . airtsan . kim ca syāt . adbhāvaḥ numpratiṣedhaḥ jusbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20452: iti ete vidhayaḥ prasajyeran . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . uktāḥ atra parihārāḥ . saṅāśraye ca
GS24pmbhasuu:20453: samudāyasya samudāyādeśatvāt jhalāśraye ca avyapadeśaḥ āmiśratvāt . saṅāśraye ca
GS24pmbhasuu:20454: kārye samudāyasya samudāyādeśatvāt jhalāśraye ca avyapadeśaḥ . kim kāraṇam . āmiśratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:20455: . āmiśrībhūtam idam bhavati . tat yathā . kṣīrodake sampṛkte . āmiśratvāt na jñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:20456: kiyat kṣīram kiyat udakam iti . kasmin avakāśe kṣīram kasmin avakāśe udakam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:20457: evam iha api āmiśratvāt na jñāyate kā prakṛtiḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ kasmin avakāśe prakṛtiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20458: kasmin avakāśe pratyayaḥ iti . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . saṅi jhali iti kutvādīni na sidhyanti
GS24pmbhasuu:20459: . idam iha sampradhāryam dvirvacanam kriyatām kutvādīni iti kim atra kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:20460: paratvāt kutvādīni . pūrvatrāsiddhe kutvādīni siddhāsiddhayoḥ ca na asti sampradhāraṇā
GS24pmbhasuu:20461: . evam tarhi pūrvatrāsiddhīyam advirvacane iti vaktavyam. tat ca avaśyam vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:20462: . vibhāṣitāḥ prayojayanti . drogdhā drogdhā . droḍhā droḍhā . yāvatā ca idānīm pūrvatrāsiddhīyam
GS24pmbhasuu:20463: advirvacane iti ucyate saḥ api adoṣaḥ bhavati yat uktam ṣatvam na sidhyati . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:20464: sthāne dvirvacane ṇilopaḥ aparihṛtaḥ . sanyaṅoḥ parataḥ dvirvacane iṭaḥ dvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:20465: vaktavyam . sanyaṅantasya dvirvacane hanteḥ kutvam aparihṛtam . tatra sanyaṅantasya
GS24pmbhasuu:20466: dvirvacanam dviḥprayogaḥ ca iti eṣaḥ pakṣaḥ nirdoṣaḥ . tatra idam aparihṛtam sanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20467: iṭaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ iti . etasya api parihāram vakṣyati ubhayaviśeṣaṇatvāt siddham iti
GS24pmbhasuu:20468: . katham jeghnīyate . vakṣyati etat yaṅprakaraṇe hanteḥ hiṃsāyām ghnī iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:20469: (P_6,1.12.1) KA_III.16.9-23 Ro_IV.317-318 dāśvān iti kim nipātyate . dāśeḥ vasau
GS24pmbhasuu:20470: dvitveṭpratiṣedhau . dāśeḥ vasau dvitveṭpratiṣedhau nipātyete . dāśvaṃsaḥ dāśuṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20471: sutam . dāśvān . sāhvān iti kim nipātyate . saheḥ dīrghatvam ca . kim ca . dvitveṭpratiṣedhau
GS24pmbhasuu:20472: ca . sāhvān balāhakaḥ . sāhvān . mīḍhvān iti kim nipātyate . miheḥ ḍhatvam ca . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:20473: ca . yat ca pūrvayoḥ . kim ca pūrvayoḥ . dvitveṭpratiṣedhau dīrghatvam ca . mīḍhvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20474: tokaya tanayāya mṛḍaya . yathā iyam indra mīḍhvaḥ . mahyarthaḥ vai gamyate . kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20475: punaḥ mahyarthaḥ . mahatiḥ dānakarmā . ataḥ kim . itvam api nipātyam . mahyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20476: iti cet miheḥ tadarthatvāt siddham . mahyarthaḥ iti cet mihiḥ api mahyarthe vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:20477: . katham punaḥ anyaḥ nāma anyasya arthe vartate . bahvarthāḥ api dhātavaḥ bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:20478: iti . asti punaḥ anyatra api kva cit mihiḥ mahyarthe vartate . asti iti āha . miheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20479: meghaḥ . meghaḥ ca kasmāt bhavati . apaḥ dadāti iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:20480: (P_6,1.12.2) KA_III.17.1-11 Ro_IV.318-319 dvirvacanaprakaraṇe kṛñādīnām ke . dvirvacanaprakaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:20481: kṛñādīnām ke upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . cakram . ciklidam . caknam iti . kādiṣu iti
GS24pmbhasuu:20482: vaktavyam iha api yathā syāt . babhruḥ . yayuḥ iti . caricalipativadīnām aci āk ca
GS24pmbhasuu:20483: abhyāsasya . caricalipativadīnām aci dve bhavataḥ iti vaktavyam āk ca abhyāsasya
GS24pmbhasuu:20484: . carācaraḥ . calācalaḥ . patāpataḥ . vadāvadaḥ . hanteḥ ghaḥ ca . hanteḥ ghaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:20485: vaktavyaḥ . aci dve bhavataḥ āk ca abhyāsasya . ghanāghanaḥ . pāṭeḥ ṇiluk ca dīrghaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20486: ca abhyāsasya ūk ca . pāṭayateḥ ṇiluk ca vaktavyaḥ . aci dve bhavataḥ iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:20487: . dīrghaḥ ca abhyāsasya ūk ca āgamaḥ . pāṭupaṭaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:20490: . dvirvacanasya avakāśaḥ . bibhidatuḥ . bibhiduḥ . yaṇādeśasya avakāśaḥ . dadhi atra
GS24pmbhasuu:20491: . madhu atra . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . cakratuḥ . cakruḥ . ayavāyāvādeśānām avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20492: . cayanam . cāyakaḥ . lavanam . lāvakaḥ . dvirvacanasya saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:20493: . cicāya . cicayitha . lulāva . lulavitha . āllopasya avakāśaḥ . . godaḥ . kambaladaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20494: . dvirvacanasya saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . yayatuḥ . yayuḥ . tasthatuḥ . tasthuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20495: . upadhālopāsya avakāśaḥ . śleṣmaghnam madhu . pittaghnam ghṛtam . dvirvacanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:20496: saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . āṭitat . āśiśat . uttvasya avakāśaḥ nipūrtāḥ piṇḍāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20497: . dvirvacanasya saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . mitrātvaruṇau taturiḥ . dūre hyadhvā
GS24pmbhasuu:20498: jaguriḥ . dvirvacanam bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena . saḥ tarhi pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20499: vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . iṣṭavācī paraśabdaḥ . vipratiṣedhe param yat iṣṭam tat
GS24pmbhasuu:20502: vipratiṣedhena . dvirvacanasya avakāśaḥ . bibhidatuḥ . bibhiduḥ . samprasāraṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:20503: avakāśaḥ . iṣṭam . suptam . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . ījatuḥ . ījuḥ . na etat asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:20504: . astu atra dvirvacanam . dvirvacane kṛte parasya rūpasya kiti iti bhaviṣyati pūrvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:20505: liṭi abhyāsasya ubhayeṣām iti . idam tarhi soṣupyate . idam ca api udāharaṇam . ījatuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:20506: ījuḥ iti . nanu ca uktam . astu atra dvirvacanam . dvirvacane kṛte parasya rūpasya
GS24pmbhasuu:20507: kiti iti bhaviṣyati pūrvasya liṭi abhyāsasya ubhayeṣām iti . na sidhyati . na samprasāraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:20508: samprasāraṇam iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . akāreṇa vyavhitatvāt na bhaviṣyati . ekādeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:20509: kṛte na asti vyavadhānam . ekādeśaḥ pūrvavidhau sthānivat bhavati iti sthānivadbhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:20510: vyavadhānam eva . evam tarhi samānāṅgagrahaṇam tatra codayiṣyati . āttvasya avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20511: . glātā . mlātā . dvirvacanasya saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . jagle . mamle .
GS24pmbhasuu:20512: dhātvādivikārāṇām avakāśaḥ . namati . siñcati . dvirvacanasya saḥ eva . iha ubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:20513: prāpnoti . nanāma . siseca . sasnau . rītvasya avakāśaḥ . mātrīyati . pitrīyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:20514: dvirvacanasya saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . cekrīyate . jehrīyate . ītvasya avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20515: . pīyate . gīyate . dvirvacanasya saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . pepīyate . jegīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:20516: . ittvottvayoḥ avakāśaḥ . āstīrṇam . nipūrtāḥ . dvirvacanasya saḥ eva . iha ubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:20517: prāpnoti . ātestīryate . nipopūryate . guṇavṛddhyoḥ avakāśaḥ . cetā . gauḥ . dvirvacanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:20518: saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . cicāya . cicayitha . lulāva . lulavitha . na etat
GS24pmbhasuu:20519: asti prayojanam . astu atra dvirvacanam . dvirvacane kṛte parasya rūpasya guṇavṛddhī
GS24pmbhasuu:20520: bhaviṣyataḥ . idam tarhi prayojanam . iyāya . iyayitha . nanu ca uktam na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:20521: prayojanam . astu atra dvirvacanam . dvirvacane kṛte parasya rūpasya guṇavṛddhī bhaviṣyataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20522: . na sidhyati . antaraṅgatvāt savarṇadīrghatvam prāpnoti . vārṇāt āṅgam balīyaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:20524: vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:20525: vārṇāt āṅgam balīyaḥ bhavati iti yat ayam abhyāsasya asavarṇe iti asavarṇagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:20526: karoti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . na hi antareṇa guṇavṛddhī asavarṇaparaḥ abhyāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20527: bhavati . na etat asti jñāpakam . artyartham etat syāt . iyṛtaḥ . iyṛthaḥ . [uvoṇa . uvoṇithaḥ (R)
GS24pmbhasuu:20528: ] . yat tarhi dīrghaḥ iṇaḥ kiti iti dīrghatvam śāsti . etasya api asti vacane prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:20529: . kim . savarṇadīrghabādhanārtham etat syāt . saḥ yathā eva tarhi savarṇadīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:20530: bādhate evam yaṇādeśam api bādheta . evam tarhi yaṇādeśe yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:20531: idam asti iṇaḥ yaṇ bhavati . tataḥ eḥ anekācaḥ . eḥ ca anekācaḥ iṇaḥ yaṇ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:20532: . tataḥ asaṃyogapūrvasya . eḥ anekācaḥ iti eva . asavarṇagrahaṇam eva tarhi jñāpakam
GS24pmbhasuu:20533: . nanu ca uktam artyartham etat syāt iti . na ekam udāharaṇam asavarṇagrahaṇam prayojayati
GS24pmbhasuu:20534: . evam api sthānivadbhāvāt iyaṅ na prāpnoti . atha sati api vipratiṣedhe yāvatā sthānivadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20535: katham eva etat sidhyati . yaḥ anādiṣṭāt acaḥ pūrvaḥ tasya vidhim prati sthānivadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20536: . ādiṣṭāt ca eṣaḥ acaḥ pūrvaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:20537: (P_6,1.13.1) KA_III.20.2-22 Ro_IV.323-326 ṣyaṅaḥ samprasāraṇe putrapatyoḥ tadādau
GS24pmbhasuu:20538: atiprasaṅgaḥ . ṣyaṅaḥ samprasāraṇe putrapatyoḥ tadādau atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . putrapatyādau
GS24pmbhasuu:20540: kārīṣagandhyāpatikulam . varṇagrahaṇāt siddham . varṇagrahaṇe etat bhavati yasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:20541: vidhiḥ tadādau iti na ca idam varṇagrahaṇam . varṇagrahaṇe iti cet tadantapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20542: . varṇagrahaṇe iti cet tadantasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . putrapatyante samprasāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:20545: kaumudagandhyāparamapatiḥ . kim kāraṇam . yatra hi tadādividhiḥ na asti tadantavidhinā
GS24pmbhasuu:20546: tatra bhavitavyam . siddham tu uttarapadavacanāt . siddham etat . katham . uttarapadavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:20547: . putrapatyoḥ uttarapadayoḥ iti vaktavyam . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:20548: pūrvapadam uttarapadam iti sambandhiśabdau etau . sati pūrvapade uttarapadam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:20549: sati ca uttarapade pūrvapadam iti . na ca atra putrapatī uttarapade . iha api tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:20551: kārīṣagandhīpatiḥ iti . kim kāraṇam . pūrvapadam iti ucyate . na hi atra ṣyaṅ pūrvapadam
GS24pmbhasuu:20552: asti . ṣyaṅantam etat pūrvapadam . katham . pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ tadādeḥ grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:20553: bhavati . yadi pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ tadādeḥ grahaṇam bhavati iti ucyate paramakārīṣagandhīputraḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:20554: paramakārīṣagandhīpatiḥ iti na sidhyati . pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ tadādeḥ grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:20555: bhavati astrīpratyayena iti . yadi astrīpratyayena iti ucyate atikrāntaḥ kārīṣagandhyām atikārīṣagandhyaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:20557: atikārīṣagandhyapatiḥ iti atra api prāpnoti . astrīpratyayena anupasarjanena . yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20558: hi upasarjanam strīpratyayaḥ bhavati eṣā tatra paribhāṣā pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20560: (P_6,1.13.2) KA_III.20.23-23.25 Ro_IV.326-330 ṣyaṅante yāvantaḥ yaṇaḥ teṣām sarveṣām samprasāraṇam prāpnoti . vārāhiputraḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:20561: tārṇakarṇīputraḥ . tatra apratyayasthasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . yathāgṛhītasya
GS24pmbhasuu:20562: ādeśavacanāt apratyayasthe siddham . nirdiśyamānasya ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti evam apratyayasthasya
GS24pmbhasuu:20563: na bhaviṣyati . anantyavikāre antyasadeśasya vā . atha vā anantyavikāre antyasadeśasya
GS24pmbhasuu:20564: kāryam bhavati iti eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā . kaḥ punaḥ atra viśeṣaḥ eṣā vā paribhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:20565: kriyeta apratyayasthasya vā pratiṣedhaḥ ucyeta . avaśyam eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā .
GS24pmbhasuu:20566: bahūni etasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ prayojanāni . kāni . prayojanam na samprasāraṇe samprasāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:20567: . na samprasāraṇe samprasāraṇam iti etat na vaktavyam bhavati . katham vyadheḥ viddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20568: iti . anantyavikāre antyasadeśasya kāryam bhavati iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . na etat
GS24pmbhasuu:20569: asti prayojanam . kriyate nyāse eva . sāntamahataḥ dīrghatve . sāntamahataḥ dīrghatve
GS24pmbhasuu:20571: yaśāṃsi . pa iti asya api prāpnoti . anantyavikāre antyasadeśasya kāryam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:20572: iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam . nopadhāyāḥ iti tatra vartate . evam api anāṃsi,
GS24pmbhasuu:20573: manāṃsi iti atra api prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . sāntasaṃyogena nopadhām viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . sāntasaṃyogasya nopādhāyāḥ iti . evam api haṃsaśirāṃsi
GS24pmbhasuu:20574: dhvaṃsaśirāṃsai iti atra api prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . hammateḥ haṃsaḥ . kaḥ punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20575: āha hammateḥ haṃsaḥ iti . kim tarhi hanteḥ haṃsaḥ . hanti adhvānam iti . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:20576: sarvanāmasthāne iti vartate . sarvanāmasthānaparatayā sāntasaṃyogam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20577: . sarvanāmasthānaparasya sāntasaṃyogasya nopādhāyāḥ iti . ankārāntasya allope . ankārāntasya
GS24pmbhasuu:20579: takṣṇe iti . ta iti atra api prāpnoti . anantyavikāre antyasadeśasya kāryam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:20580: iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam . anā akāram viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:20581: anaḥ yaḥ akāraḥ iti . evam api anasā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:20582: anase iti atra api prāpnoti . ankāreṇa aṅgam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . ankārāntasya aṅgasya anaḥ yaḥ akāraḥ iti . evam api anastakṣṇā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:20583: anastakṣṇe iti atra api prāpnoti . evam tarhi kāryakālam sañjñāparibhāṣam . yatra
GS24pmbhasuu:20584: kāryam tatra upasthitam draṣṭavyam . bhasya iti upasthitam idam bhavati yaci bham
GS24pmbhasuu:20585: iti . tatra yajādiparatyā ankāram viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ anā akāram . yajādiparasya anaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20586: yaḥ akāraḥ iti . mṛjeḥ vṛddhividhau . mṛjeḥ vṛddhividhau prayojanam . nyamārṭ . aṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20587: api vṛddhiḥ prāpnoti . anantyavikāre antyasadeśasya kāryam bhavati iti na doṣaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:20588: . etat api na asti prayojanam . yathāparibhāṣitam ikaḥ guṇavṛddhī iti ikaḥ eva vṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20589: bhaviṣyati . evam api mimārjiṣati iti atra prāpnoti . astu . abhyāsanirhrāsena hrasvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20590: bhaviṣyati . vasoḥ samprasāraṇe ca . vasoḥ samprasāraṇe ca prayojanam . viduṣaḥ paśya
GS24pmbhasuu:20591: . vidivakārasya api prāpnoti . anantyavikāre antyasadeśasya kāryam bhavati iti na
GS24pmbhasuu:20592: doṣaḥ bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam . na samprasāraṇe samprasāraṇam iti pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20594: vyavahitatvāt na prāpnoti . evam tarhi nirdiśyamānasya ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti na bhaviṣyati . yuvādīnām ca . yuvādīnām ca samprasāraṇe prayojanam . yūnaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:20596: yūne . yakārasya api prāpnoti . anantyavikāre antyasadeśasya kāryam bhavati iti na
GS24pmbhasuu:20597: doṣaḥ bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam . na samprasāraṇe samprasāraṇam iti na
GS24pmbhasuu:20598: bhaviṣyati . ukāreṇa vyavahitatvāt na prāpnoti . ekādeśe kṛte na asti vyavadhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:20599: . ekādeśaḥ pūrvavidhau sthānivat bhavati iti sthānivadbhāvāt vyavadhānam eva . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:20600: tarhi samānāṅgagrahaṇam atra codayiṣyati . rvoḥ upadhāgrahaṇam ca . rvoḥ upadhāgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:20601: ca na kartavyam bhavati . iha kasmāt na bhavati . abibhaḥ bhavān . anantyavikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:20602: antyasadeśasya kāryam bhavati iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:20604: ādityadādividhisaṃyogādilopakutvaḍhatvabhaṣbhāvaṣatvaṇatveṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ . ādividhau atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . dhātvādeḥ ṣaḥ saḥ . ṇaḥ naḥ . iha eva syāt . netā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:20606: siñcati . ādi . tyadādividhi . iha eva syāt . tat ,
GS24pmbhasuu:20608: syaḥ iti atra na syāt . tyadādividhi . saṃyogādilopa . iha eva syāt . maṅktā . maṅktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:20609: iti atra na syāt . saṃyogādilopa . kutva . iha eva syāt . paktā . paktavyambhaṣbhāva
GS24pmbhasuu:20610: . iti atra na syāt . kutva . ḍhatva . iha eva syāt . leḍhā . leḍhavyam iti atra na
GS24pmbhasuu:20611: syāt . ḍhatva . bhaṣbhāva . iha eva syāt . abhutsi . abhutsātām iti atra na syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:20612: . bhaṣbhāva . ṣatva . iha eva syāt . draṣṭā . draṣṭavyam iti atra na syāt . ṣatva
GS24pmbhasuu:20613: . ṇatva . iha eva syāt . māṣāvāpeṇa . māṣāvāpāṇām iti atra na syāt . ṇatva . ete
GS24pmbhasuu:20614: doṣāḥ samāḥ bhūyāṃsaḥ vā . tasmāt na arthaḥ anayā paribhāṣayā . na hi doṣā santi
GS24pmbhasuu:20615: iti paribhāṣā na kartavyā lakṣaṇam vā na praṇeyam . na hi bhikṣukāḥ santi iti sthālyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20616: na adhiśrīyante na ca mṛgāḥ santi iti yavāḥ na upyante . doṣāḥ khalu api sākalyena
GS24pmbhasuu:20617: parigaṇitāḥ prayojanānām udāharaṇamātram . kuta etat . na hi doṣāṇām lakṣaṇam asti
GS24pmbhasuu:20618: . tasmāt yāni etasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ prayojanāni tadartham eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā pratividheyam
GS24pmbhasuu:20619: ca doṣeṣu . idam pratividhīyate . udāttanirdeśāt siddham . yatra eṣā paribhāṣā iṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:20620: tatra udāttanirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . tataḥ vaktavyam anantyavikāre antyasadeśasya kāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:20621: bhavati udāttanirdeśe iti . saḥ tarhi udāttanirdeśḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . yatra
GS24pmbhasuu:20622: eva antyasadeśaḥ ca anantyasadeśaḥ ca yugapat samavasthitau tatra eṣā paribhāṣā bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:20623: . doṣeṣu ca anyatra antyasadeśaḥ anyatra anantyasadeśaḥ . prayojaneṣu punaḥ tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:20624: eva antyasadeśaḥ ca anantyasadeśaḥ ca . tathājātīyakāni khalu api ācāryeṇa prayojanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:20625: paṭhitāni yāni ubhayavanti . idam ekam yathā doṣaḥ tathā rvoḥ upadhāgrahaṇam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:20626: . tat ca api kriyate nyāse eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:20627: (P_6,1.14) KA_III.24.2-5 Ro_IV.331 mātac . kārīṣagandhyā mātā asya kārīṣagandhīmātaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:20631: (P_6,1.16) KA_III.24.8-25.5 Ro_IV.331-333 vayigrahaṇam kimartham na veñ yajādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:20632: paṭhyate veñaḥ ca vayiḥ ādeśaḥ kriyate tatra yajādīnām kiti iti eva siddham . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:20633: etat syāt . ṅidarthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ iti . tat ca na . liṭi ayam ādeśaḥ liṭ ca kit
GS24pmbhasuu:20634: eva . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . vayigrahaṇam veñaḥ pratiṣedhāt . vayigrahaṇam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:20635: veñaḥ pratiṣedhāt . veñaḥ liṭi pratiṣedham vakṣyati . saḥ vayeḥ mā bhūt iti . yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:20636: eva hi veñgrahaṇāt vidhiḥ prārthyate evam pratiṣedhaḥ api prāpnoti . na vā yakārapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20637: jñāpakaḥ apratiṣedhasya . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . yat ayam liṭi vayaḥ yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20638: iti vayeḥ yakārasya samprasāraṇapratiṣedham śāsti tat jñāpati ācāryaḥ na veñgrahaṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:20639: samprasāraṇapratiṣedhaḥ bhavati iti . na etat asti jñāpakam . piti abhyāsārtham etat
GS24pmbhasuu:20640: syāt . vayeḥ pitsu vacaneṣu abhyāsasya yakārasya samprasāraṇam mā bhūt iti . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:20641: ca veñgrahaṇāt vayeḥ pitsu api vacaneṣu abhyāsayakārasya samprasāraṇapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20642: siddhaḥ . na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . kiti iti tatra anuvartate . evam api vayeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20643: pitsu api vacaneṣu abhyāsayakārasya samprasāraṇam na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . halādiśeṣeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:20644: bādhyate . na atra halādiśeṣaḥ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . vakṣyati hi etat abhyāsasamprasāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:20645: halādiśeṣāt vipratiṣedhena iti . saḥ eṣaḥ vayeḥ yakārasya samprasāraṇapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20646: piti abhyāsārthaḥ na jñāpakārthaḥ bhavati . piti abhyāsārtham iti cet na aviśiṣṭatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:20647: . piti abhyāsārtham iti cet tat na . kim kāraṇam . aviśiṣṭatvāt . aviśeṣeṇa pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20648: . nivṛttam tatra kiti iti . ātaḥ ca aviśeṣeṇa . veñaḥ api hi pitsu vacaneṣu abhyāsasya
GS24pmbhasuu:20649: samprasāraṇam na iṣyate . vavau vavitha iti . vikṛtigrahaṇam khalu api pratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:20650: kriyate na ca vikṛtiḥ prakṛtim gṛhṇāti .
GS24pmbhasuu:20652: yat ucyate vṛśceḥ aviśeṣaḥ iti tat na . yadi atra rephasya samprasāraṇam na syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:20653: vakārasya prasajyeta . rephasya punaḥ samprasāraṇe sati uḥ adattvasya sthānivadbhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:20654: na samprasāraṇe samprasāraṇam iti pratiṣedhaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . tasmāt vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:20656: (P_6,1.17.2) KA_III.25.11-22 Ro_IV. 333-334 atha ubhayagrahaṇam kimartham . ubhayeṣām
GS24pmbhasuu:20657: abhyāsasya samprasāraṇam yathā syāt vacisvapiyajādīnām grahādīnām ca . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:20658: prayojanam . prakṛtam ubhayeṣām grahaṇam anuvartate . yadi anuvartate grahijyāvayivyadhivaṣṭivicativṛścatipṛcchatibhṛjjatīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:20659: ṅiti ca iti yajādīnām ṅiti api prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . sambandham anuvartiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:20660: . vacisvapiyajādīnām kiti . grahādīnām ṅiti ca vacisvapiyajādīnām kiti . tataḥ liṭi
GS24pmbhasuu:20661: abhyāsasya ubhayeṣām . kiti ṅiti iti nivṛttam . atha vā maṇḍūkagatayaḥ adhikārāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20662: . yathā maṇḍūkāḥ utplutya utplutya gacchanti tadvat adhikārāḥ . atha vā ekayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20663: kariṣyate . vacisvapiyajādīnām kiti grahādīnām ṅiti ca iti . tataḥ liṭi abhyāsasya
GS24pmbhasuu:20664: iti . na ca ekayoge anuvṛttiḥ bhavati . atha vā ubhayam nivṛttam . tat apekṣiṣyāmahe
GS24pmbhasuu:20665: . idam tarhi ubhayeṣāṅgrahaṇasya prayojanam . ubhayeṣām abhyāsasya samprasāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:20666: eva yathā syāt . yat anyat prāpnoti tat mā bhūt iti . kim ca anyat prāpnoti . halādiśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20667: . abhyāsasamprasāraṇam halādiśeṣāt vipratiṣedhena iti vakṣyati . saḥ pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20669: (P_6,1.17.3) KA_III.25.23-27.3 Ro_IV.334-336 abhyāsasamprasāraṇam halādiśeṣāt vipratiṣedhena . abhyāsasamprasāraṇam halādiśeṣāt bhavati [bhavati halādiśeṣāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:20674: vivyadhitha . abhyāsasamprasāraṇam bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena . saḥ tarhi pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20675: vaktavyaḥ . na vā samprasāraṇāśrayabalīyastvāt anyatra api . na vā vaktavyaḥ . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:20676: kāraṇam . samprasāraṇāśrayabalīyastvāt anyatra api . samprasāraṇam samprasāraṇāśrayam
GS24pmbhasuu:20677: ca balīyaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . anyatra api na avaśyam iha eva vaktavyam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:20679: bhṛṣṭavān . samprasāraṇam ca prāpnoti rambhāvaḥ ca . paratvāt rambhāvaḥ syāt . samprasāraṇam balīyaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam samprasāraṇam yathā syāt . ram . āllopaḥ . juhuvatuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:20680: juhuvuḥ . samprasāraṇam ca prāpnoti āllopaḥ ca . paratvāt āllopaḥ syāt . samprasāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:20681: balīyaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam samprasāraṇam yathā syāt . samprasāraṇe kṛte pūrvatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:20682: ca prāpnoti āllopaḥ ca . paratvāt āllopaḥ syāt . samprasāraṇāśrayam balīyaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:20683: iti vaktavyam pūrvatvam yathā syāt . iyaṅ . śuśuvatuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:20684: śuśuvuḥ . samprasāraṇam ca prāpnoti iyaṅādeśaḥ ca . paratvāt iyaṅādeśaḥ syāt . samprasāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:20685: balīyaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam samprasāraṇam yathā syāt . yaṇ . samprasāraṇe kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:20686: pūrvatvam ca prāpnoti yaṇādeśaḥ ca . paratvāt yaṇādeśaḥ syāt . samprasāraṇāśrayam
GS24pmbhasuu:20687: balīyaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam pūrvatvam yathā syāt . iyaṅ . na etāni santi prayojanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:20688: . yat tāvat ucyate ram iti idam iha sampradhāryam :
GS24pmbhasuu:20689: rambhāvaḥ kriyatām samprasāraṇam iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt rambhāvaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:20690: nityam samprasāraṇam . kṛte api rambhābe prāpnoti akṛte api . rambhāvaḥ api nityaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20691: . kṛte api samprasāraṇe prāpnoti akṛte api . katham . yaḥ asau ṛkāre rephaḥ tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:20692: ca upadhāyāḥ ca prāpnoti . anityaḥ rambhāvaḥ . na hi kṛte samprasāraṇe prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:20693: kim kāraṇam . upadeśe iti vartate . tat ca avaśyam upadeśagrahaṇam anuvartyam barībhṛjyate
GS24pmbhasuu:20694: iti evamartham . āllopeyaṅyaṇaḥ iti . nityam samprasāraṇam . antaraṅgam pūrvatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:20695: . tat etat ananyārtham samprasāraṇāśrayam balīyaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20696: vā vaktavyaḥ . ubhayam na vaktavyam . uktam atra ubhayeṣāṅgrahaṇasya prayojanam ubhayeṣām
GS24pmbhasuu:20697: abhyāsasya samprasāraṇam eva yathā syāt . yat anyat prāpnoti tat mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:20698: (P_6,1.17.4) KA_III.27.4-7 Ro_IV.336 vyaceḥ kuṭāditvam anasi añṇiti samprasāraṇārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:20699: . vyaceḥ kuṭāditvam anasi iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . añṇiti samprasāraṇārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:20702: udvicitavyam . anasi iti kimartham . uruvyacāḥ kaṇṭakaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:20703: (P_6,1.18) KA_III.27.9-10 Ro_IV.336-337 caṅgrahaṇam śakyam akartum . katham . ṅiti iti vartate na ca anyaḥ svāpeḥ ṅit asti anyat ataḥ caṅaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20704: (P_6,1.20) KA_III.27.12-16 Ro_IV.337 vaśeḥ yaṅi pratiṣedhaḥ . vaśeḥ yaṅi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ samprasāraṇasya . vāvaśyate . kva mā bhūt . uṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20705: uśanti iti . saḥ tarhi tathā pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . yaṅi iti vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:20706: . evam tarhi anvācaṣṭe yaṅi iti vartate iti . na etat anvākhyeyam adhikārāḥ anuvartante
GS24pmbhasuu:20707: iti . eṣaḥ eva nyāyaḥ yat uta adhikārāḥ anuvarteran iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:20708: (P_6,1.27) KA_III.27.18-28.5 Ro_IV.337-338 kim nipātyate . śrāsrapyoḥ śṛbhāvaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:20709: śrāsrapyoḥ śṛbhāvaḥ nipātyate . kṣīrahaviṣoḥ iti vaktavyam . śṛtam kṣīram . śṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:20710: haviḥ . kva mā bhūt . śrāṇā yavāgūḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:20711: śrapitā yavāgūḥ iti . śrapeḥ śṛtam anyatra hetoḥ . śrapeḥ śṛtam anyatra hetoḥ iti vaktavyam iha mā bhūt . śrapitam kṣīram devadattena yajñadattena iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:20712: (P_6,1.28) KA_III.28.7-12 Ro_IV.338-339 āṅpūrvāt andhūdhasoḥ . āṅpūrvāt andhūdhasoḥ iti vaktavyam . āpīnaḥ andhuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:20713: āpīnam ūdhaḥ . kim prayojanam . niyamārtham . āṅpūrvāt andhūdhasoḥ eva . kva mā bhūt . āpyānaḥ candramāḥ iti . ubhayataḥ niyamaḥ ca ayam draṣṭavyaḥ . āṅpūrvāt eva andhūdhasoḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:20714: andhūdhasoḥ eva āṅpūrvāt iti . kva mā bhūt . prapyānaḥ andhuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:20715: prapyānam ūdhaḥ . āṅpūrvāt ca eṣa niyamaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ . bhavati hi pīnam mukham ,
GS24pmbhasuu:20719: śveḥ liṭi abhyāsalakṣaṇam samprasāraṇam nityam prāpnoti . tasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . śiśviyatuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:20720: śiśviyuḥ . kim ucyate liṭi abhyāsalakṣaṇasya iti na punaḥ killakṣaṇasya api . killakṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:20721: api hi nityam atra prāpnoti . killakṣaṇam śvayatilakṣaṇam bādhiṣyate . yathā eva
GS24pmbhasuu:20722: tarhi killakṣaṇam śvayatilakṣaṇam bādhate evam abhyāsalakṣaṇam api bādheta . na brūmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20723: apavādatvāt killakṣaṇam śvayatilakṣaṇam bādhiṣyate iti . kim tarhi . paratvāt . śvayatilakṣaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:20727: śiśvayitha . killakṣaṇasya avakāśaḥ anye kitaḥ . śūnaḥ,
GS24pmbhasuu:20729: śiśviyuḥ iti . śvayatilakṣaṇam bhavati vipratiṣedhena . abhyāsalakṣaṇāt api tarhi śvayatilakṣaṇam bhaviṣyati vipratiṣedhena . abhyāsalakṣaṇasya avakāśaḥ anye yajādayaḥ . iyāja,
GS24pmbhasuu:20730: uvāpa . śvayatilakṣaṇasya avakāśaḥ param dhāturūpam . śuśuvatuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:20732: śuśuvitha . śvayateḥ abhyāsasya ubhayam prāpnoti . śiśiviyatuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:20733: śiśviyuḥ . śvayatilakṣaṇam bhaviṣyati vipratiṣedhena . na eṣaḥ yuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20734: . na hi śvayateḥ abhyāsasya anye yajādayaḥ avakāśaḥ . śvayateḥ yajādiṣu yaḥ pāṭhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20735: saḥ anavakāśaḥ . tasya anavakāśatvāt ayuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . tasmāt suṣṭhu uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:20737: (P_6,1.32-33) KA_III.29.8-30.14 Ro_IV.341-344 hvaḥ samprasāraṇe yogavibhāgaḥ . hvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20738: samprasāraṇe yogavibhāgaḥ kartavyaḥ . hvaḥ samprasāraṇam bhavati ṇau ca saṃścaṅoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20739: . tataḥ abhyastasya ca . abhyastasya ca hvaḥ samprasāraṇam bhavati iti . kimarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20740: yogavibhāgaḥ . ṇau saṃścaṅviṣayāṛthaḥ . ṇau ca saṃścaṅviṣaye hvaḥ samprasāraṇam yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:20742: ajūhavat . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . hvaḥ abhyastasya iti ucyate na ca etat
GS24pmbhasuu:20743: hvaḥ abhyastam . kasya tarhi . hvāyayateḥ . hvaḥ etat abhyastam . katham . ekācaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20744: dve prathamasya . evam tarhi hvayateḥ abhyastasya iti ucyate na ca atra hvayatiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20745: abhyastaḥ . kaḥ tarhi . hvāyayatiḥ . hvayatiḥ eva atra abhyastaḥ . katham . ekācaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20746: dve prathamasya iti . evam api abhyastinimitte anabhyastaprasāraṇārtham . abhyastinimitte
