GS24pmbhasuu:20747: iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . anabhyastaprasāraṇārtham . anabhyastasya prasāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:20749: johūyate . abhyastaprasāraṇe hi abhyāsaprasāraṇāprāptiḥ . abhyastaprasāraṇe hi abhyāsaprasāraṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:20750: aprāptiḥ syāt . na samprasāraṇe samprasāraṇam iti pratiṣedhaḥ prasajyeta . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20751: doṣaḥ . vyavahitatvāt na bhaviṣyati . samānāṅge prasāraṇapratiṣedhāt pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20752: . samānāṅge prasāraṇapratiṣedhāt pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . samānāṅgagrahaṇam tatra codayiṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:20753: . kṛdantapratiṣedhārtham ca . kṛdantapratiṣedhārtham ca abhyastinimitte iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:20754: . kim prayojanam . hvāyakam icchati hvāyakīyati . hvāyakīyateḥ san . jihvāyakīyiṣati
GS24pmbhasuu:20755: . saḥ tarhi nimittaśabdaḥ upādeyaḥ . na hi antareṇa nimittaśabdam nimittārthaḥ gamyate
GS24pmbhasuu:20756: . antareṇa api nimittaśabdam nimittārthaḥ gamyate . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:20757: dadhitrapusam pratyakṣaḥ jvaraḥ . jvaranimittam iti gamyate . naḍvalodakam pādarogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20758: . pādaroganimittam iti gamyate . āyuḥ ghṛtam . āyuṣaḥ nimittam iti gamyate . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:20759: vā akāraḥ matvarthīyaḥ . abhyastam asmin asti saḥ ayam abhyastaḥ . abhyastasya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:20760: . atha vā abhyastasya iti na eṣā hvayatisamānādhikaraṇā ṣaṣṭhī . kā tarhi . sambandhaṣaṣṭhī
GS24pmbhasuu:20761: . abhyastasya yaḥ hvayatiḥ . kim ca abhyastasya hvayatiḥ . prakṛtiḥ . hvaḥ abhyastasya
GS24pmbhasuu:20762: prakṛteḥ iti . yogavibhāgaḥ tu kartavyaḥ eva . na atra hvayatiḥ abhyastasya prakṛtiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20764: (P_6,1.36) KA_III.30.17-31.2 Ro_IV.344-345 apaspṛdhethām iti kim nipātyate . spardheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20765: laṅi ātmanepadānām madhyamapuruṣasya dvivacane āthāmi dvirvacanam samprasāraṇam akāralopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20766: ca nipātyate . indraḥ ca viṣṇo yat apaspṛdhethām . aspṛdhethām iti bhāṣāyām . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:20767: apapūrvāt spardheḥ laṅi ātmanepadānām madhyamapuruṣasya dvivacane āthāmi dvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:20768: samprasāraṇam akāralopaḥ ca nipātyate . indraḥ ca viṣṇo yat apaspṛdhethām . apāspṛdhethām
GS24pmbhasuu:20769: iti bhāṣāyām . śrātāḥ śritam iti kim nipātyate . śrīṇāteḥ kte śrābhāvaśribhāvau nipātyete
GS24pmbhasuu:20770: . kva punaḥ śrābhāvaḥ kva vā śribhāvaḥ . some śrābhāvaḥ anyatra śribhāvaḥ . na tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:20772: śritaḥ somaḥ iti . bahuvacane śrābhāvaḥ . na tarhi idānīm idam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:20773: śritāḥ naḥ grahāḥ iti . somabahutve śrābhāvaḥ anyatra śribhāvaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:20774: (P_6,1.37.1) KA_III.31.4-32.14 Ro_IV.345-347 kimartham idam ucyate . vacispaviyajādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:20775: grahādīnām ca samprasāraṇam uktam . tatra yāvantaḥ yaṇaḥ sarveṣām samprasāraṇam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:20776: . iṣyate ca parasya yathā syāt na pūrvasya tat ca antareṇa yatnam na sidhyati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:20777: na samprasāraṇe samprasāraṇam . kim anye api evam vidhayaḥ bhavanti . ataḥ dīrghaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20778: yañi . supi ca iti . ghaṭābhyām . akāramātrasya dīrghatvam kasmāt na bhavati . asti
GS24pmbhasuu:20779: atra viśeṣaḥ . iyam atra paribhāṣā upatiṣṭhate . alaḥ antyasya iti . nanu ca idānīm
GS24pmbhasuu:20781: śakyam upasthātum . na iti āha . na hi vacispaviyajādīnām grahādīnām ca antyaḥ yaṇ
GS24pmbhasuu:20782: asti . evam tarhi anantyavikāre antyasadeśasya kāryam bhavati iti antyasasdeśaḥ yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20783: yaṇ tasya kāryam bhaviṣyati . na etasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ santi prayojanāni . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:20784: ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na sarvasya yaṇaḥ samprasāraṇam bhavati iti yat ayam pyāyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20785: pībhāvam śāsti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . pībhāvavacane etat prayojanam āpīnaḥ andhuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:20786: āpīnam ūdhaḥ etat rūpam yathā syāt iti . yadi ca atra sarvasya yaṇaḥ samprasāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:20787: syāt pībhāvavacanam anarthakam syāt . samprasāraṇe kṛte samprasāraṇaparapūrvatve
GS24pmbhasuu:20788: ca dvayoḥ ikārayoḥ ekādeśe siddham rūpam syāt āpīnaḥ andhuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:20789: āpīnam ūdhaḥ iti . paśyati tu ācāryaḥ na sarvasya yaṇaḥ samprasāraṇam bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:20790: . tataḥ ayam pyāyaḥ pībhāvam śāsti . na etat asti jñāpakam . siddhe hi vidhiḥ ārabhyamāṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20791: jñāpakārthaḥ bhavati na ca pyāyaḥ samprasāraṇena sidhyati . samprasāraṇe hi sati
GS24pmbhasuu:20792: antyasya prasajyeta . evam api jñāpakam eva . katham . pyāyaḥ iti na eṣā sthānaṣaṣṭhī
GS24pmbhasuu:20793: . kā tarhi . viśeṣaṇaṣaṣṭhī . pyāyaḥ yaḥ yaṇ iti . tat etat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:20794: sarvasya yaṇaḥ samprasāraṇam bhavati iti yat ayam pyāyaḥ pībhāvam śāsti . evam api
GS24pmbhasuu:20795: anaikāntikam etat . etāvat jñāpyate na sarvasya yaṇaḥ samprasāraṇam bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:20796: tatra kutaḥ etat parasya bhaviṣyati na pūrvasya iti . ucyamāne api etasmin kutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20797: etat parasya bhaviṣyati na pūrvasya iti . ekayogakṣaṇam khalu api samprasāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:20798: tat yadi tāvat param abhinirvṛttam pūrvam api abhinirvṛttam eva . prasaktasya anabhinirvṛttasya
GS24pmbhasuu:20799: pratiṣedhena nivṛttiḥ śakyā kartum na abhinirvṛttasya . yaḥ hi bhuktavantam brūyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:20800: mā bhukthāḥ iti kim tena kṛtam syāt . atha api pūrvam anabhinirvṛttam param api anabhinirvṛttam
GS24pmbhasuu:20801: eva . tatra nimittasaṃśrayaḥ anupapannaḥ na samprasāraṇe samprasāraṇam iti . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20802: doṣaḥ . yat tāvat ucyate ucyamāne api etasmin kutaḥ etat parasya bhaviṣyati na pūrvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:20803: iti . iha iṅgitena ceṣṭitena nimiṣitena mahatā vā sūtraprabandhena ācāryāṇām abhiprāyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20804: gamyate . etat eva jñāpayati parasya bhaviṣyati na pūrvasya iti yat ayam na samprasāraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:20805: samprasāraṇam iti pratiṣedham śāsti . yat api ucyate ekayogalakṣaṇam khalu api samprasāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:20806: . tat yadi tāvat param abhinirvṛttam pūrvam api abhinirvṛttam eva . prasaktasya anabhinirvṛttasya
GS24pmbhasuu:20807: pratiṣedhena nivṛttiḥ śakyā kartum iti . astu ubhayoḥ abhinirvṛttiḥ . na vayam pūrvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:20808: pratiṣedham śiṣmaḥ . kim tarhi . samprasāraṇāśrayam yat prāpnoti tasya pratiṣedham
GS24pmbhasuu:20809: . tataḥ pūrvatve pratiṣiddhe yaṇādeśena siddham . yat api ucyate atha api pūrvam
GS24pmbhasuu:20810: anabhinirvṛttam param api anabhinirvṛttam eva . tatra nimittasaṃśrayaḥ anupapannaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20811: iti . tādarthyāt tācchabdyam bhaviṣyati . tat yathā indrārthā sthūṇā indraḥ iti evam
GS24pmbhasuu:20812: iha api samprasāraṇārtham samprasāraṇam . tat yat prasāraṇārtham prasāraṇam tasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:20814: (P_6,1.37.2) KA_III.32.15-33.8 Ro_IV.347-349 atha samprasāraṇam iti vartamāne punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20815: samprasāraṇagrahaṇam kimartham . prasāraṇaprakaraṇe punaḥ prasāraṇagrahaṇam ataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20818: etat prayojanam . videśastham api yat samprasāraṇam tasya api pratiṣedhaḥ yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:20819: . vyathaḥ liṭi . vivyathe . na etat asti prayojanam . halādiśeṣāpavādaḥ atra samprasāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:20821: yūne . ucyamāne api etasmin na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . ukāreṇa vyavadhānāt . ekādeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:20822: kṛte na asti vyavadhānam . ekādeśaḥ pūrvavidhau sthānivat bhavati iti sthānivadbhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:20823: vyavadhānam eva . evam tarhi samānāṅgagrahaṇam ca . samānāṅgagrahaṇam ca kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:20824: . na samprasāraṇe samprasāraṇam samānāṅge iti vaktavyam . tatra upoṣuṣi doṣaḥ . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:20825: upoṣuṣi doṣaḥ bhavati . na vā yasya aṅgasya prasāraṇaprāptiḥ tasmin prāptipratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:20826: . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam yasya aṅgasya prasāraṇaprāptiḥ tasmin dvitīyā yā
GS24pmbhasuu:20827: prāptiḥ sā pratiṣidhyate . atra ca vasiḥ kvasau aṅgam kvasantam punaḥ vibhaktau .
GS24pmbhasuu:20828: atha vā yasya aṅgasya prasāraṇaprāptiḥ iti anena kim kriyate . yāvat brūyāt prasaktasya
GS24pmbhasuu:20829: anabhinirvṛttasya pratiṣedhena nivṛttiḥ śakyā kartum iti . atra ca yadā vaseḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:20830: tadā kvasoḥ yadā ca kvasoḥ abhinirvṛttam tadā vaseḥ bhavati . atha vā yasya aṅgasya
GS24pmbhasuu:20831: prasāraṇaprāptiḥ iti anena kim kriyate . yāvat brūyāt asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge
GS24pmbhasuu:20832: iti . asiddhatvāt bahiraṅgalakṣaṇasya vasausamprasāraṇasya antaraṅgalakṣaṇaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:20833: (P_6,1.37.3) KA_III.33.9-17 Ro_IV.349-350 ṛci treḥ uttarapadādilopaḥ chandasi . ṛci
GS24pmbhasuu:20834: treḥ samprasāraṇam vaktavyam . uttarapadādilopaḥ chandasi vaktavyaḥ . tṛcam sūktam
GS24pmbhasuu:20835: . tṛcam sāma . chandasi iti kim . tryṛcāni . rayeḥ matau bahulam . rayeḥ matau samprasāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:20836: bahulam vaktavyam . ā revān etu naḥ viśaḥ . na ca bhavati . rayiman puṣṭivardhanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20837: . kakṣyāyāḥ sañjñāyām . kakṣyāyāḥ sañjñāyām matau samprasāraṇam vaktavyam . kakṣīvantam
GS24pmbhasuu:20838: yaḥ āśijaḥ . kaṇvaḥ kakṣīvān . sañjñāyām iti kim . kaṣyāvān hastī .
GS24pmbhasuu:20839: (P_6,1.39) KA_III.33.19-34.2 Ro_IV.350 vaścāsyagrahaṇam śakyam akartum . anyatarasyām
GS24pmbhasuu:20840: kiti veñaḥ na samprasāraṇam bhavati iti eva siddham . katham . samprasāraṇe kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:20841: uvaṅādeśe ca dvirvacanam savarṇadīrghatvam . tena siddham vavatuḥ,
GS24pmbhasuu:20844: ūvuḥ . vayeḥ api nityam yakārasya pratiṣedhaḥ samprasāraṇasya ūyatuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:20845: ūyuḥ . traiśabyam ca iha sādhyam . tat ca evam sati siddham bhavati . yadi evam vavau,
GS24pmbhasuu:20846: vavitha iti na sidhyati . lyapi ca iti anena cakāreṇa liṭ api anukṛṣyate . tasmin nitye prasāraṇapratiṣedhe prāpte iyam kiti vibhāṣā ārabhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:20848: ec yaḥ upadeśe iti āhosvit ejantantam yat upadeśe iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:20849: ec yaḥ upadeśe iti ḍhaukitā traukitā iti atra api prāpnoti . atha vijñāyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:20850: ejantantam yat upadeśe iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . nanu ca ejantantam yat upadeśe iti
GS24pmbhasuu:20851: api vijñāyamāne atra api prāpnoti . etat api vyapadeśivadbhāvena ejantam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:20852: upadeśe . arthavatā vyapadeśivadbhāvaḥ . nanu ca ec yaḥ upadeśe iti api vijñāyamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:20853: na doṣaḥ bhavati . aśiti iti ucyate na ca atra aśitam paśyāmaḥ . nanu ca kakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20854: eva atra aśit . na kakāre bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam . nañivayuktam anyasadṛśādhikaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:20855: . tathā hi arthagatiḥ . nañyuktam ivayuktam ca anyasmin tatsadṛśe kāryam vijñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:20856: . tathā hi arthaḥ gamyate . tat yathā loke :
GS24pmbhasuu:20857: abrāhmaṇam ānaya iti ukte brāhmaṇasadṛśam ānayati . na asau loṣṭam ānīya kṛtī bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:20858: . evam iha api aśiti iti śitpratiṣedhāt anyasmin aśiti śitsadṛśe kāryam vijñāsyate
GS24pmbhasuu:20859: . kim ca anyat śitsadṛśam . pratyayaḥ . iha tarhi :
GS24pmbhasuu:20864: paratvāt āyādayaḥ prāpnuvanti . nanu ca ejantantam yat upadeśe iti api vijñāyamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:20865: paratvāt āyādayaḥ prāpnuvanti . santu . āyādiṣu kṛteṣu sthānivadbhāvāt ejgrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:20866: grahaṇāt punaḥ āttvam bhaviṣyati . nanu ca ec yaḥ upadeśe iti api vijñāyamāne paratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:20867: āyādiṣu kṛteṣu sthānivadbhāvāt ejgrahaṇena grahaṇāt āttvam bhaviṣyati . na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:20868: . analvidhau sthānivadbhāvaḥ alvidhiḥ ca ayam . evam tarhi ejantantam yat upadeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:20870: hūtavān iti atra api prāpnoti . bhavatu eva atra āttvam . śravaṇam kasmāt na bhavati . pūrvatvam asya bhaviṣyati . na sidhyati . idam iha sampradhāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:20871: āttvam kriyatām pūrvatvam iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt pūrvatvam . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:20872: idam iha sampradhāryam . āttvam kriyatām samprasāraṇam iti . kim atra kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:20873: paratvāt āttvam . nityam samprasāraṇam . kṛte api āttve prāpnoti akṛte api . āttvam
GS24pmbhasuu:20874: api nityam . kṛte api samprasāraṇe prāpnoti akṛte api . anityam āttvam . na hi kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:20875: samprasāraṇe prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . antaraṅgam pūrvatvam . tena bādhyate . yasya
GS24pmbhasuu:20876: lakṣaṇantareṇa nimittam vihanyate na tat anityam . na ca samprasāraṇam eva āttvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:20877: nimittam hanti . avaśyam lakṣaṇāntaram pūrvatvam pratīkṣyam . ubhayoḥ nityayoḥ paratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:20878: āttve kṛte samprasāraṇam samprasāraṇapūrvatvam . kāryakṛtatvāt punaḥ āttvam na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:20879: . atha api katham cit āttvam anityam syāt evam api na doṣaḥ . upadeśagrahaṇam na
GS24pmbhasuu:20880: kariṣyate . yadi na kriyate cetā stotā iti atra api prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20881: jñāpayati na paranimittakasya āttvam bhavati iti yat ayam krīṅjīṇām ṇau āttvam śāsti
GS24pmbhasuu:20882: . na etat asti jñāpakam . niyamārtham etat syāt . krīṅjīṇām ṇau eva iti . yat tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:20883: mīnātiminotidīṅām lyapi ca iti atra ejgrahaṇam anuvartayati . iha tarhi glai glānīyam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:20886: śo niśāmīyam paratvāt āyādayaḥ prāpnuvanti . atra api ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na
GS24pmbhasuu:20887: āyādayaḥ āttvam bādhante iti yat ayam aśiti iti pratiṣedham śāsti . yadi hi bādheran
GS24pmbhasuu:20888: śiti api bādheran . atha vā punaḥ astu ec yaḥ upadeśe iti . nanu ca uktam glai glānīyam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:20891: śo niśāmīyam paratvāt āyādayaḥ prāpnuvanti iti . atra api śitpratiṣedhaḥ jñāpakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20892: na āyādayaḥ āttvam bādhante iti . āttve eśi upasaṅkhyānam . āttve eśi upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:20893: kartavyam . jagle mamle . aśiti iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na evam vijñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:20894: . śakāraḥ it yasya saḥ ayam śit . na śit aśit . aśiti iti . katham tarhi . śakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20895: it śit . na śit śit aśit . aśiti iti . yadi evam stanandhayaḥ iti atra api prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:20897: (P_6,1.45.2) KA_III.35.20-37.5 Ro_IV.355-358 kim punaḥ ayam paryudāsaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:20898: yat anyat śitaḥ iti āhosvit prasajya ayam pratiṣedhaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:20899: śiti na iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . aśiti ekādeśe pratiṣedhaḥ ādivattvāt . aśiti ekādeśe pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:20900: glāyanti mlayanti . kim kāraṇam . ādivattvāt . śidaśitoḥ ekādeśaḥ ādivat syāt . asti
GS24pmbhasuu:20901: anyat śitaḥ iti kṛtvā āttvam prāpnoti . pratyayavidhiḥ . pratyayavidhiḥ ca na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:20902: . suglaḥ sumlaḥ . ākārāntalakṣaṇaḥ pratyayavidhiḥ na prāpnoti . aniṣṭasya pratyayasya
GS24pmbhasuu:20903: śravaṇam prasajyeta . abhyāsarūpam ca . abhyāsarūpam ca na sidhyati :
GS24pmbhasuu:20904: jagle mamle . ivarṇābhyāsatā prāpnoti . ayavāyāvām pratiṣedhaḥ ca . ayavāyāvām ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:20909: paratvāt āyādayaḥ prāpnuvanti . astu tarhi prasajya pratiṣedhaḥ śiti na iti . śiti
GS24pmbhasuu:20910: pratiṣedhe ślulukoḥ upasaṅkhyānam rarīdhvam trādhvam śiśīte . śiti pratiṣedhe ślulukoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20911: upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . divaḥ naḥ vṛṣṭim marutaḥ rarīdhvam . luk . trādhvam naḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20912: devā nijuraḥ vṛkasya . śiśīte śṛṅge rakṣase vinikṣe . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . iha tāvat divaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20913: naḥ vṛṣṭim marutaḥ rarīdhvam iti . na etat rai iti asya rūpam . kasya tarhi . rāteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20914: dānakarmaṇaḥ . śiśīte śṛṅge iti na etat śyateḥ rūpam . kasya tarhi . śīṅaḥ . śyatyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20915: vai gamyate . kaḥ punaḥ śyateḥ arthaḥ . śyatiḥ niśāne vartate . śīṅ api śyatyarthe
GS24pmbhasuu:20916: vartate . katham punaḥ anyaḥ nāma anyasya arthe vartate . bahvarthāḥ api dhātavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20917: bhavanti iti . tat yathā . vapiḥ prakiraṇe dṛṣṭaḥ chedane ca api vartate . keśān
GS24pmbhasuu:20918: vapati iti . īḍiḥ studicodanāyācñāsu dṛṣṭaḥ īraṇe ca api vartate . agniḥ vai itaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20919: vṛṣṭim īṭṭe . marutaḥ amutaḥ cyāvayanti . karotiḥ ayam abhūtaprādurbhāve dṛṣṭaḥ nirmalīkaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:20920: ca api vartate . pṛṣṭham kuru . pādau kuru . unmṛdāna iti gamyate . nikṣepaṇe ca
GS24pmbhasuu:20921: api dṛśyate . kaṭe kuru . ghaṭe kuru . aśmānam itaḥ kuru . sthāpaya iti gamyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:20922: sarveṣām eva parihāraḥ . śiti iti ucyate na ca atra śitam paśyāmaḥ . pratyayalakṣaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:20923: . na lumatā tasmin iti pratyayalakṣaṇapratiṣedhaḥ . trādhvam iti luṅi eṣaḥ vyatyayena
GS24pmbhasuu:20924: bhaviṣyati . atha vā punaḥ astu paryudāsaḥ . nanu ca uktam aśiti ekādeśe pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20925: ādivattvāt iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ekādeśaḥ pūrvavidhau sthānivat bhavati iti sthānivadbhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:20926: vyavadhānam . yat api pratyayavidhiḥ iti . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati bhavati ejantebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20927: ākārāntalakṣaṇaḥ pratyayavidhiḥ iti yat ayam hvāvāmaḥ ca iti aṇam kabādhanārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:20929: pratyākhyāyate saḥ yogaḥ . atha api kriyate evam api na doṣaḥ . katham . liṭi iti anuvartate . dvilakārakaḥ ca ayam nirdeśaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:20930: liṭi lakārādau iti . evam ca kṛtvā saḥ api adoṣaḥ bhavati yat uktam āttve eśi upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:20931: iti . yat api uktam ayavāyāvām pratiṣedhaḥ ca iti . śiti pratiṣedhaḥ jñāpakaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:20933: (P_6,1.45.3) KA_III.37.6-16 Ro_IV.358-359 prātipadikapratiṣedhaḥ . prātipadikānām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . gobhyām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:20936: naubhiḥ . saḥ tarhi vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na prātipadikānām
GS24pmbhasuu:20937: āttvam bhavati iti yat ayam rāyaḥ halaḥ iti āttvam śāsti . na etat asti jñāpakam
GS24pmbhasuu:20938: . niyamārtham etat syāt . rāyaḥ hali eva iti . yat tarhi ā otaḥ amśasoḥ iti āttvam
GS24pmbhasuu:20939: śāsti . etasya api asti vacane prayojanam . ami vṛddhibādhanārtham etat syāt śasi
GS24pmbhasuu:20940: pratiṣedhārtham ca . tasmāt prātipadikānām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:20941: dhātvadhikārāt prātipadikasyāprāptiḥ . dhātvadhikārāt prātipadikasya āttvam na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:20942: . dhātoḥ iti vartate . kva prakṛtam . liṭi dhātoḥ anabhyāsasya iti . atha api nivṛttam
GS24pmbhasuu:20943: evam api adoṣaḥ . upadeśe iti ucyate uddeśaḥ ca prātipadikānām na upadeśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:20944: (P_6,1.48) KA_III.37.18-22 Ro_IV.359 āttve ṇau līyateḥ upasaṅkhyānam pralambhanaśālīnīkaraṇayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20945: . āttve ṇau līyateḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . kim prayojanam . pralambhane ca arthe
GS24pmbhasuu:20946: śālīnīkaraṇe ca nityam āttvam yathā syāt . pralambhane tāvat . jaṭābhiḥ ālāpayate
GS24pmbhasuu:20947: . śmaśrubhiḥ ālāpayate . śālīnīkaraṇe . śyenaḥ vārtikam ullāpayate . rathī rathinam upalapayate .
GS24pmbhasuu:20948: (P_6,1.49) KA_III.38.2-8 Ro_IV.360-361 sidhyateḥ ajñānārthasya . sidhyateḥ ajñānārthasya
GS24pmbhasuu:20949: iti vaktavyam . itarathā hi aniṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ . apāralaukike iti ucyamāne aniṣṭam prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:20950: . annam sādhayati brāhmaṇebhyaḥ dāsyāmi iti . asti punaḥ ayam sidhyatiḥ kva cit anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:20951: vartate . asti iti āha . tapaḥ tāpasam sedhayati . jñānam asya prakāśayati . svāni
GS24pmbhasuu:20952: eva enam karmāṇi sedhayanti . jñānam asya prakāśayanti iti arthaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:20953: (P_6,1.50.1) KA_III.38.10-39.12 Ro_IV.361-363 mīnātyādīnām āttve upadeśavacanam pratyayavidhyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:20954: . mīnātyādīnām āttve upadeśivadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . upadeśāvasthāyām āttvam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:20955: iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . pratyayavidhyartham . upadeśāvasthāyām āttve kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:20956: iṣṭaḥ pratyayavidhiḥ yathā syāt . ke punaḥ pratyayāḥ upadeśivadbhāvam prayojayanti
GS24pmbhasuu:20957: . kāḥ . kāḥ tāvat na prayojayanti . kim kāraṇam . ecaḥ iti ucyate na ca keṣu ec asti
GS24pmbhasuu:20958: . ṇaghañyujvidhayaḥ tarhi prayojayanti . ṇa . avadāyaḥ . ātaḥ iti ṇaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:20959: . ghañ . avadāyaḥ vartate . ātaḥ iti ghañ siddhaḥ bhavati . kim ca bho ātaḥ iti bhañ
GS24pmbhasuu:20960: ucyate . na khalu api ātaḥ iti ucyate ātaḥ tu vijñāyate . katham . aviśeṣeṇa ghañ
GS24pmbhasuu:20961: utsargaḥ . tasya ivarṇāntāt uvarṇāntāt ca ajapau apavādau . tatra upadeśāvasthāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:20962: āttve kṛte apavādasya nimittam na asti iti kṛtvā utsargeṇa ghañ siddhaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:20963: evam ca kṛtvā na ca ātaḥ iti ucyate ātaḥ tu vijñāyate . yuc . īṣadavadānam svavadānam
GS24pmbhasuu:20964: . ātaḥ iti yuc siddhaḥ bhavati . idam vipratiṣiddham ecaḥ upadeśaḥ iti . yadi ecaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20965: na upadeśe atha upadeśe na ecaḥ . ecaḥ ca upadeśe ca iti vipratiṣiddham . na etat
GS24pmbhasuu:20966: vipratiṣiddham . āha ayam ecaḥ upadeśe iti . yadi ecaḥ na upadeśe atha upadeśa na
GS24pmbhasuu:20967: ecaḥ . te vayam viṣayam vijñāsyāmaḥ . ejviṣaye iti . tat tarhi upadeśagrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:20968: . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . āt ecaḥ upadeśe iti . tat vai
GS24pmbhasuu:20969: prakṛtiviśeṣaṇam viṣayaviśeṣaṇena ca iha arthaḥ . na ca anyārtham prakṛtam anyārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:20970: bhavati . na khalu api anyat prakṛtam anuvartanāt anyat bhavati . na hi godhā sarpantī
GS24pmbhasuu:20971: sarpaṇāt ahiḥ bhavati . yat tāvat ucyate na ca anyārtham prakṛtam anyārtham bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:20972: iti anyārtham api prakṛtam anyārtham bhavati ṭat yathā . śālyartham kulyāḥ praṇīyante
GS24pmbhasuu:20973: tābhyaḥ ca pāṇīyam pīyate upaśpṛśyate ca śālayaḥ ca bhāvyante . yat api ucyate na
GS24pmbhasuu:20974: khalu api anyat prakṛtam anuvartanāt anyat bhavati . na hi godhā sarpantī sarpaṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:20975: ahiḥ bhavati iti . bhavet dravyeṣu etat evam syāt . śabdaḥ tu khalu yena yena viśeṣeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:20976: abhisambadhyate tasya tasya viśeṣakaḥ bhavati . tat yatha gauḥ śuklaḥ aśvaḥ ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:20978: (P_6,1.50.2) KA_III.39.13-16 Ro_IV.364 nimimīliyām khalacoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . nimimīliyām khalacoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . īṣannimayam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:20986: (P_6,1.51) KA_III.39.18 Ro_IV.364 kim idam līyateḥ iti . linātilīyatyoḥ yakā nirdeśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:20987: (P_6,1.56) KA_III.39.20-23 Ro_IV.364-365 hetubhaye iti kimartham . kuñcikayā enam
GS24pmbhasuu:20988: bhāyayati . ahinā enam bhāyayati . hetubhaye iti ucyamāne api atra prāpnoti . etat
GS24pmbhasuu:20989: api hi hetubhayam . hetubhaye iti na evam vijñāyate . hetoḥ bhayam hetubhayam . hetubhaye
GS24pmbhasuu:20990: iti . katham tarhi . hetuḥ eva bhayam hetubhayam . hetubhaye iti . yadi saḥ eva hetuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20992: (P_6,1.58) KA_III.40.2-8 Ro_IV.365 ami saṅgrahaṇam . ami saṅgrahaṇam . kim idam saṅ
GS24pmbhasuu:20993: iti . pratyāhāragrahaṇam . kva sanniviṣṭānām pratyāhāraḥ . sanaḥ prabhṛti ā mahiṅaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20994: ṅakārāt . kim prayojanam . kvippratiṣedhāṛtham . kvibantasya mā bhūt . rajjusṛḍbhyām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:20997: devadṛgbhiḥ . uktam vā . kim uktam . dhātoḥ svarūpagrahaṇe tatpratyayavijñānāt siddham iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:20998: (P_6,1.60) KA_III.40.10-15 Ro_IV.365-366 śīrṣan chandasi prakṛtyantaram . śīrṣan
GS24pmbhasuu:20999: chandasi prakṛtyantaram draṣṭavyam . kim prayojanam . kim prayojanam . ādeśapratiṣedhārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:21000: . ādeśaḥ mā vijñāyi . prakṛtyantaram yathā vijñāyeta . kim ca syāt . askārāntasya
GS24pmbhasuu:21001: chandasi śravaṇam na syāt . śiraḥ me śīryaśaḥ mukham (R:
GS24pmbhasuu:21003: . idam te śiraḥ bhinadmi iti . tat vai atharvaṇaḥ śiraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:21004: (P_6,1.61) KA_III.40.17-41.16 Ro_IV.366-368 ye ca taddhite śirasaḥ ādeśārtham . ye
GS24pmbhasuu:21005: ca taddhite iti atra śirasaḥ grahaṇam kartavyam . kim prayojanam .ādeśārtham . ādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21006: yathā vijñāyeta . prakṛtyantaram mā vijñāyi . kim ca syāt . yakārādau taddhite askārāntasya
GS24pmbhasuu:21007: śravaṇam prasajyeta . śīrṣaṇyaḥ hi mukhyaḥ bhavati . śīrṣaṇyaḥ kharaḥ . vā keśeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:21008: . vā keśeṣu śirasaḥ śīrṣanbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . śīrṣaṇyāḥ keśāḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21009: śirasyāḥ . aci śīrṣaḥ . aci parataḥ śirasaḥ śīrṣabhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . hāstiśīrṣiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21011: pailuśīrṣiḥ . chandasi ca . chandasi ca śirasaḥ śīrṣabhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . dve śīrṣe
GS24pmbhasuu:21012: . iha hāstiśīrṣyā pailuśīrṣyā iti śirasaḥ grahaṇena grahaṇāt śīrṣanbhāvaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:21013: . astu . naḥ taddhite iti ṭilopaḥ bhaviṣyati . na sidhyati . ye ca abhāvakarmaṇoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21014: iti prakṛtibhāvaḥ prasajyeta . yadi punaḥ ye aci taddhite iti ucyeta . kim kṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:21015: bhavati . iñi śīrṣanbhāve kṛte ṭilopena siddham . na evam śakyam . iha hi sthūlaśirasaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21016: idam sthaulaśīrṣam iti anaṇi iti prakṛtibhāvaḥ prasajyeta . tasmāt na evam śakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:21017: . na cet evam śirasaḥ grahaṇena grahaṇāt śīrṣanbhāvaḥ prāpnoti . pākṣikaḥ eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21018: . katarasmin pakṣe . ṣyaṅvidhau dvaitam bhavati . aṇiñoḥ vā ādeśaḥ ṣyaṅ aṇiñbhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:21019: vā paraḥ iti . tat yadā tāvad aṇiñoḥ ādeśaḥ tadā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yadā hi aṇiñbhyām paraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21020: na tadā doṣaḥ bhavati aṇiñbhyām vyavahitatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:21021: (P_6,1.63) KA_III.41.19-42.6 Ro_IV.368-369 śasprabhṛtiṣu iti ucyate . aśasprabhṛtiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:21022: api dṛśyate . śalā doṣaṇī . kakut doṣaṇī . yācate mahādevaḥ . padādiṣu māṃspṛtsnūnām
GS24pmbhasuu:21023: upasaṅkhyānam . padādiṣu māṃspṛtsnūnām upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . māṃs . yat nīkṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:21024: māṃspacanyāḥ . māṃsapacanyāḥ iti prāpte . māṃs . pṛt. pṛtsu martyam . pṛtanāsu martyam
GS24pmbhasuu:21025: iti prāpte . pṛt . snu . na te divaḥ na pṛthivyaḥ adhi snuṣu . adhi sānuṣu iti prāpte
GS24pmbhasuu:21026: . nas nāsikāyāḥ yattaskṣudreṣu . yattaskṣudreṣu parataḥ nāsikāyāḥ nasbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21027: . yat . nasyam . yat . tas . nastaḥ . tas. kṣudra . naḥkṣudraḥ . avarṇanagarayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21028: iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . nāsikyaḥ varṇaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21029: nāsikyam nagaram . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . iha tāvat nāsikyaḥ varṇaḥ iti . parimukhādiṣu pāṭhaḥ kariṣyate . nāsikyam nagaram iti . saṅkāśādiṣu pāṭhaḥ kariṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:21030: (P_6,1.64) KA_III.42.8-43.10 Ro_IV.369-371 dhātugrahaṇam kimartham . iha mā bhūt : ṣoḍan ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21032: ṣoḍikaḥ . atha ādigrahaṇam kimartham . iha mā bhūt :
GS24pmbhasuu:21033: peṣṭā peṣṭum . na etat asti prayojanam . astu atra satvam . satve kṛte iṇaḥ uttarasya ādeśasakārasya iti ṣatvam bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi :
GS24pmbhasuu:21034: laṣitā laṣitum . idam ca api udārharaṇam :
GS24pmbhasuu:21035: peṣṭā peṣṭum . nanu ca uktam astu atra satvam . satve kṛte iṇaḥ uttarasya ādeśasakārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:21036: iti ṣatvam bhaviṣyati iti . na evam śakyam . iha hi pekṣyati iti ṣatvasya asiddhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:21037: ṣaḍhoḥ kaḥ si iti katvam na syāt . sādeśe subdhātuṣṭhivuṣvaṣkatīnām pratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:21041: ṣvaṣkate . subdhātūnām tāvat na vaktavyaḥ . upadeśe iti vartate uddeśaḥ ca prātipadikānām na upadeśaḥ . yadi evam na arthaḥ dhātugrahaṇena . kasmāt na bhavati ṣoḍan ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21043: ṣoḍikaḥ iti . upadeśe iti vartate uddeśaḥ ca prātipadikānām na upadeśaḥ . ṣṭhiveḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21044: api dvitīyaḥ varṇaḥ ṭhakāraḥ . yadi ṭhakāraḥ teṣṭhīvyate iti na sidhyati . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:21045: thakāraḥ . yadi thakāraḥ ṭuṣṭhyūṣati ṭeṣṭhīvyatie iti na sidhyati . evam tarhi dvau
GS24pmbhasuu:21046: imau ṣṭhivū . akasya dvitīyaḥ varṇaḥ ṭhakāraḥ aparasya thakāraḥ . yasya thakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21047: tasya satvam prāpnoti . evam tarhi dvau imau dviṣakārau ṣṭhivuṣvaṣkatī . kim kṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:21048: bhavati . pūrvasya satve kṛte pareṇa sannipāte ṣṭutvam bhaviṣyati . na evam śakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:21049: . iha hi śvaliṭ ṣṭhīvati madhuliṭ ṣvaṣkate ṣṭutvasya asiddhatvāt ḍaḥ si dhuṭ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:21050: dhuṭ prasajyeta . evam tarhi yakārādī dviṣakārau ṣṭhivuṣvaṣkatī . kim yakāraḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:21051: śrūyate . luptanirdiṣṭaḥ yakāraḥ . atha kimartham ṣakāram upadiśya tasya sakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21052: ādeśaḥ kriyate na sakāraḥ eva upadiśyeta . laghvartham iti āha . katham . aviśeṣeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:21053: ayam ṣakāram upadiśya sakāram ādeśam uktvā laghunā upāyena ṣatvam nirvartayati ādeśapratyayayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21054: iti . itarathā hi yeṣām ṣatvam iṣyate teṣām tatra grahaṇam kartavyam syāt . ke punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21055: ṣopadeśāḥ dhātavaḥ . paṭhitavyāḥ . kaḥ atra bhavataḥ puruṣakāraḥ . yadi antareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:21056: pāṭham kim cit śakyate vaktum tat ucyatām . antareṇa api pāṭham kim cit śakyate vaktum
GS24pmbhasuu:21057: . katham . ajdantyaparāḥ sādayaḥ ṣopadeśāḥ smiṅsvadisvidisvañjisvapayaḥ ca sṛpisṛjistṛstyāsekṛsṛvarjam .
GS24pmbhasuu:21058: (P_6,1.65) KA_III.43.12-18 Ro_IV.372 atha kimartham ṇakāram upadiśya tasya nakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21059: ādeśaḥ kriyate na nakāraḥ eva upadiśyeta . laghvartham iti āha . katham . aviśeṣeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:21060: ayam ṇakāram upadiśya nakāram ādeśam uktvā laghunā upāyena ṇatvam nirvartayati upasargāt
GS24pmbhasuu:21061: asamāse api ṇopadeśasya iti . itarathā hi yeṣām ṇatvam iṣyate teṣām tatra grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:21062: kartavyam syāt . ke punaḥ ṇopadeśāḥ dhātavaḥ . paṭhitavyāḥ . kaḥ atra bhavataḥ puruṣakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21063: . yadi antareṇa pāṭham kim cit śakyate vaktum tat ucyatām . antareṇa api pāṭham kim
GS24pmbhasuu:21064: cit śakyate vaktum . katham . sarve nādayaḥ ṇopadeśāḥ nṛtinandinardinakkināṭināthṛnādhṛnṝvarjam .
GS24pmbhasuu:21065: (P_6,1.66.1) KA_III.43.20-44.7 Ro_IV.372-374 vyoḥ lope kvau upasaṅkhyānam . vyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21066: lope kvau upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam iha api yathā syāt . kaṇḍūyateḥ apratyayaḥ kaṇḍūḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21067: iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . vali iti ucyate na ca atra valādim paśyāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21068: . nanu ca ayam kvip eva valādiḥ bhavati . kviblope kṛte valādyabhāvāt na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:21069: . idam iha sampradhāryam . kviblopaḥ kriyatām yalopaḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:21070: paratvāt kviblopaḥ nityatvāt ca . nityaḥ khalu api kviblopaḥ . kṛte api yalope prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:21071: akṛte api prāpnoti . nityatvāt paratvāt ca kviblopaḥ . kviblope kṛte valādyabhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:21072: yalopaḥ na prāpnoti . evam tarhi pratyayalakṣaṇena bhaviṣyati . varṇāśraye na asti
GS24pmbhasuu:21073: pratyayalakṣaṇam . yadi vā kāni cit varṇāśrayāṇi pratyayalakṣaṇena bhavanti tathā
GS24pmbhasuu:21074: idam api bhaviṣyati . atha vā evam vakṣyāmi . lopaḥ vyoḥ vali . tataḥ veḥ . vyantayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21075: ca vyoḥ lopaḥ bhavati . tataḥ apṛktasya . apṛktasya ca lopaḥ bhavati . veḥ iti eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:21076: (P_6,1.66.2) KA_III.44.8-45.2 Ro_IV.374-375 valopāprasiddhiḥ ūḍbhāvavacanāt . valopasya aprasiddhiḥ . āsremāṇam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21077: jīradānuḥ iti . kim kāraṇam . ūḍbhāvavacanāt . cchvoḥ śūṭ anunāsike ca iti ūṭh prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:21078: . atiprasaṅgaḥ vraścādiṣu . vraścādiṣu ca atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . iha api prāpnoti . vraścanaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21080: vraṇaḥ iti . upadeśasāmarthyāt siddham . upadeśasāmarthyāt vraścādiṣu lopaḥ na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:21081: . upadeśasāmarthyāt siddham iti cet samprasāraṇahalādiśeṣeṣu sāmarthyam . upadeśasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:21082: siddham iti cet asti anyat upadeśavacane prayojanam . samprasāraṇahalādiśeṣeṣu kṛteṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:21085: vivraściṣati iti . na vā bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . na vā etat prayojanam asti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:21087: lopaḥ . asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge . anārambhaḥ vā . anārambhaḥ vā punaḥ valopasya
GS24pmbhasuu:21089: jīradānuḥ iti . āsremāṇam jīradānuḥ iti varṇalopāt . āsremāṇam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21090: jīradānuḥ iti chāndasāt varṇalopāt siddham . yathā saṃsphānaḥ gayasphānaḥ . tat yathā saṃsphayanaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21094: (P_6,1.67) KA_III.45.4-20 Ro_IV.375-376 darvijāgṛvyoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ : darviḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21095: jāgṛviḥ . kim ucyate darvijāgṛvyoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ iti yadā apṛktasya iti ucyati
GS24pmbhasuu:21096: . bhavati vai kim cit ācāryāḥ kriyamāṇam api codayanti . tat vā kartavyam darvijāgṛvyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21097: vā pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ .veḥ lope darvijāgṛvyoḥ apratiṣedhaḥ anunāsikaparatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:21098: veḥ lope darvijāgṛvyoḥ apratiṣedhaḥ . anarthakaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ . lopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21099: kasmāt na bhavati . anunāsikaparatvāt . anunāsikaparasya viśabdasya grahaṇam na ca
GS24pmbhasuu:21100: atra anunāsikaparaḥ viśabdaḥ . śuddhaparaḥ ca atra viśabdaḥ . yadi anunāsikaparasya
GS24pmbhasuu:21103: atra na prāpnoti . na hi etasmāt viśabdāt anunāsikam param paśyāmaḥ . anunāsikaparatvāt iti na evam vijñāyate . anunāsikaḥ paraḥ asmāt saḥ ayam anunāsikaparaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21104: anunāsikaparatvāt iti . katham tarhi . anunāsikaḥ paraḥ asmin saḥ ayam anunāsikaparaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21106: atra prāpnoti . asiddhaḥ atra anunāsikaḥ . evam api dhātvantasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21107: . ivi divi dhivi . dhātvantasya ca arthavadgrahaṇāt . arthavataḥ viśabdasya grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:21108: . na dhātvantaḥ arthavān . vasya vā anunāsikatvāt siddham . atha vā vakārasya eva
GS24pmbhasuu:21109: idam anunāsikasya grahaṇam . santi hi yaṇaḥ sānunāsikāḥ niranunāsikāḥ ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:21110: (P_6,1.68) KA_III.46.2-47.12 Ro_IV.377-380 yadi punaḥ ayam apṛktalopaḥ saṃyogāntalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21111: vijñāyeta . kim kṛtam bhavati . dvihalapṛktagrahaṇam tisyoḥ ca grahaṇam na kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:21112: bhavati . halantāt apṛktalopaḥ saṃyogāntalopaḥ cet nalopābhāvaḥ yathā pacan iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:21113: halantāt apṛktalopaḥ saṃyogāntalopaḥ cet nalopābhāvaḥ . rājā takṣā . saṃyogāntalopasya
GS24pmbhasuu:21114: asiddhatvāt nalopaḥ na prāpnoti yathā pacan iti . tat yathā pacan,
GS24pmbhasuu:21115: yajan iti atra saṃyogāntalopasya asiddhatvāt nalopaḥ na bhavati . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:21116: ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati siddhaḥ saṃyogāntalopaḥ nalope iti yat ayam na ṅisambuddhyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21117: iti sambuddhau pratiṣedham śāsti . iha api tarhi prāpnoti pacan,
GS24pmbhasuu:21118: yajan . tulyajātīyasya jñāpakam bhavati . kaḥ ca tulyajātīyaḥ . yaḥ sambuddhau anantaraḥ . vasvādiṣu datvam saṃyogādilopabalīyastvāt . vasvādiṣu datvam na sidhyati . ukhāsrat ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21119: parṇadvhat . kim kāraṇam . saṃyogādilopabalīyastvāt . saṃyogāntalopāt saṃyogādilopaḥ balīyān . yathā kūṭataṭ iti . tat yathā kūṭataṭ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21120: kāṣṭhataṭ iti atra saṃyogāntalopāt saṃyogādilopaḥ balīyān bhavati . nanu ca datve
GS24pmbhasuu:21121: kṛte na bhaviṣyati . asiddham datvam . tasya asiddhatvāt prāpnoti . siddhakāṇḍe paṭhitam
GS24pmbhasuu:21122: vasvādiṣu datvam sau dīrghatve iti . tatra sau dīrghatvagrahaṇam na kariṣyate . vasvādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:21123: datvam iti eva . evam api apadāntatvāt na prāpnoti . atha sau api padam bhavati rājā
GS24pmbhasuu:21124: takṣā nalope kṛte vibhakteḥ śravaṇam prāpnoti . sā eṣā ubhayataspāśā rajjuḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:21125: . rāttalopaḥ niyamavacanāt . rāt tasya lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . abibhaḥ bhavān . ajāgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21126: bhavān . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . niyamavacanāt . rāt sasya iti etasmāt niyamāt
GS24pmbhasuu:21127: na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . rāt sasya iti atra takāraḥ api nirdiśyate . yadi evam
GS24pmbhasuu:21128: kīrtayateḥ apratyayaḥ kīḥ iti prāpnoti . kīrt iti ca iṣyate . yathālakṣaṇam aprayukte
GS24pmbhasuu:21129: . roḥ uttvam ca . roḥ uttvam ca vaktavyam . abhinaḥ atra,
GS24pmbhasuu:21130: acchinaḥ atra . saṃyogāntalopasya asiddhatvāt ataḥ ati iti uttrvam na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:21131: na vā saṃyogāntalopasya uttve siddhatvāt . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam . saṃyogāntalopasya
GS24pmbhasuu:21132: uttve siddhatvāt . saṃyogāntalopaḥ uttve siddhaḥ bhavati . yathā harivaḥ medinam
GS24pmbhasuu:21133: iti . tat yathā harivaḥ medinam tvā iti atra saṃyogāntalopaḥ uttve siddhaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:21134: . saḥ eva darhi doṣaḥ sā eṣā ubhayataspāśā . tasmāt aśakyaḥ apṛktalopaḥ saṃyogāntalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21135: vijñātum . na cet vijñāyate dvihalapṛktagrahaṇam tisyoḥ ca grahaṇam kartavyam eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:21136: (P_6,1.69.1) KA_III.47.14-48.27 Ro_IV.380-383 sambuddhilope ḍatarādibhyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . sambuddhilope ḍatarādibhyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . he katarat,
GS24pmbhasuu:21137: he katamat . kim ucyate ḍatarādibhyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ iti yadā apṛktasya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:21138: anuvartate . apṛktādhikārasya nivṛttatvāt . nivṛttaḥ apṛktādhikāraḥ . kim ḍatarādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21139: pratiṣedham vakṣyāmi iti apṛktādhikāraḥ nivartyate . na iti āha . tat ca amartham
GS24pmbhasuu:21140: . saḥ ca avaśyam apṛktādhikāraḥ nivartyaḥ . kimartham . amartham . amaḥ lopaḥ yathā syāt . he kuṇḍa ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21141: he pīṭha . nivṛtte api apṛktādhikāre amaḥ lopaḥ na prāpnoti . na hi lopaḥ sarvāpahārī
GS24pmbhasuu:21142: . mā bhūt sarvasya lopaḥ . alaḥ antyasya vidhayaḥ bhavanti iti antyasya lope kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:21143: dvayoḥ akārayoḥ pararūpeṇa siddham rūpam syāt he kuṇḍa ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21144: he pīṭha iti . yadi etat labhyeta kṛtam syāt . tat tu na labhyate . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:21145: atra hi tasmāt iti uttarasya ādeḥ parasya iti akārasya lopaḥ prāpnoti . akāralope
GS24pmbhasuu:21146: ca sati makāre ataḥ dīrghaḥ yañi supi ca iti dīrghatve he kuṇḍām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21147: he pīṭhām iti etat rūpam prasajyeta . evam tarhi halaḥ lopaḥ sambuddhilopaḥ . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:21148: halgrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . halṅyābbhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21149: dīrghāt sutisi apṛktam hal iti . tat vai prathamānirdiṣṭam ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭena ca iha
GS24pmbhasuu:21150: arthaḥ . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . eṅ hrasvāt iti eṣā pañcamī hal iti asyāḥ prathamāyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm
GS24pmbhasuu:21151: prakalpayiṣyati tasmāt iti uttarasya iti . evam api prathamayoḥ pūrvasavarṇadīrghatve
GS24pmbhasuu:21152: kṛte he pīṭhā iti etat rūpam prasajyeta . ami pūrvatvam atra bādhakam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:21153: . ami iti ucyate na ca atra amam paśyāmaḥ . ekadeśavikṛtam ananyavat bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:21154: . atha vā idam iha sampradhāryam . sambuddhilopaḥ kriyatām ekādeśaḥ iti . kim atra
GS24pmbhasuu:21155: kartavyam . paratvāt ekādeśaḥ . evam api ekādeśe kṛte vyapavargābhāvāt sambuddhilopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21156: na prāpnoti . antādivadbhāvena vyapavargaḥ bhaviṣyati . ubhayataḥ āśraye na antādivat
GS24pmbhasuu:21157: . na ubhayataḥ āśrayaḥ kariṣyate . katham . na evam vijñāyate . hrasvāt uttarasyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21158: sambuddheḥ lopaḥ bhavati iti . katham tarhi . hrasvāt uttarasya halaḥ lopaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:21159: saḥ cet sambuddheḥ iti . saḥ tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . uktam vā
GS24pmbhasuu:21160: . kim uktam . siddham anunāsikopadhatvāt iti . evam api dalopaḥ sādhīyaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:21161: . dukkaraṇāt vā . atha vā duk ḍatarādīnām iti vakṣyāmi . ḍitkaraṇāt vā . atha vā
GS24pmbhasuu:21162: ḍit ayam śabdaḥ kariṣyate . saḥ tarhi ḍakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:21163: nyāse eva . dviḍakāraḥ nirdeśaḥ adḍ ḍatarādibhyaḥ iti . evam api lopaḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:21164: vihitaviśeṣaṇam hrasvagrahaṇam . yasmāt hrasvāt sambuddhiḥ vihitā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:21165: (P_6,1.69.2) KA_III.49.1-10 Ro_IV.383-384 apṛktasambuddhilopābhyām luk . apṛktasambuddhilopābhyām luk bhavati vipratiṣedhena . apṛktalopasya avakāśaḥ gomān ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21167: jatu . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . tat brāhmaṇakulam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21168: yat brāhmaṇakulam . sambuddhilopasya avakāśaḥ he agne,
GS24pmbhasuu:21169: he vāyo . lukaḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . he trapu ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21170: he jatu . luk bhavati vipratiṣedhena . saḥ tarhi vipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vā
GS24pmbhasuu:21171: lopalukoḥ lugavadhāraṇāt yathā anaḍuhyate iti . na vā arthaḥ vipratiṣedhena . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:21172: kāraṇam . lopalukoḥ lugavadhāraṇāt . lopalukoḥ hi luk avadhāryate . luk lopayaṇayavāyāvekādeśebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21173: . yathā anaḍuhyate iti . tat yathā anaḍvān iva ācarati anaḍuhyate iti atra lopalukoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21175: (P_6,1.70) KA_III.49.12-19 Ro_IV.384 ayam yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum . katham agne trī te vajinā trī sadhasthā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21176: ta tā piṇḍānām iti . pūrvasavarṇena api etat siddham . na sidhyati . numā vyavahitatvāt pūrvasavarṇaḥ na prāpnoti . chandasi napuṃsakasya puṃvadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ madhoḥ gṛhṇāti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21177: mahoḥ tṛptā iva āsate iti evamartham . tatra pūṃvadbhāvena numaḥ nivṛttiḥ . numi
GS24pmbhasuu:21178: nivṛtte pūrvasavarṇena siddham . bhavet siddham agne trī te vajinā trī ṣadhasthā
GS24pmbhasuu:21179: iti . idam tu na sidhyati ta tā piṇḍānām iti . idam api siddham . katham . sāptamike
GS24pmbhasuu:21180: pūrvasavarṇe kṛte punaḥ ṣāṣṭhikaḥ bhaviṣyati . evam api jasi guṇaḥ prāpnoti . vakṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:21181: etat . jasādiṣu chandovāvacanam prāk ṇau caṅi upadhāyāḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:21183: dvigusvaraḥ ca . tuki pūrvānte napuṃsakopasarjanahrasvatvam dvigusvaraḥ ca na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:21187: daśāratni chatram . tuke kṛte anantyatvāt ete vidhayaḥ na prāpnuvanti . na vā bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:21188: . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇaḥ tuk .
GS24pmbhasuu:21189: antaraṅgāḥ ete vidhayaḥ . asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge . idam tarhi grāmaṇiputraḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21190: senāniputraḥ iti hrasvatve kṛte tuk prāpnoti . grāmaṇiputrādiṣu ca aprāptiḥ . grāmaṇiputrādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:21191: ca aprāptiḥ . kim kāraṇam . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt eva . atha vā parādiḥ kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:21192: . parādau saṃyogādeḥ iti atiprasaṅgaḥ . parādau saṃyogādeḥ iti atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:21193: . apacchāyāt . vā anyasya saṃyogādeḥ iti etvam prasajyeta . vilopavacanam ca . veḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21195: somasut . apṛktasya iti veḥ lopaḥ na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . apṛktagrahaṇam na kariṣyate . yadi na kriyate darviḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21197: atra api prāpnoti . anunāsikaparasya viśabdasya grahaṇam śuddhaparaḥ ca atra viśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21198: . evam api satukkasya lopaḥ prāpnoti . nirdiśyamānasya ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti evam na
GS24pmbhasuu:21199: bhaviṣyati . iṭpratiṣedhaḥ ca . iṭpratiṣedhaḥ ca vaktavyaḥ . parītat . satukkasya
GS24pmbhasuu:21200: valādilakṣaṇaḥ iṭ prasajyeta . evam tarhi abhaktaḥ . abhakte svaraḥ . yadi abhaktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21201: tarhi svare doṣaḥ bhavati . dadhi chādayati ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21202: madhu chādayati . tiṅ atiṅaḥ iti nighātaḥ na prāpnoti . nanu ca tuk eva atiṅ . na
GS24pmbhasuu:21203: tukaḥ parasya nighātaḥ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . nañivayuktam anyasadṛśādhikaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:21204: . tathā hi arthagatiḥ . nañyukte ivayukte vā anyasmin tatsadṛśe kāryam vijñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:21205: . tathā hi arthaḥ gamyate . tat yathā . abrāhmaṇam ānaya iti ukte brāhmaṇasadṛśam
GS24pmbhasuu:21206: eva ānayati . na asau loṣṭam ānīya kṛtī bhavati . evam iha api atiṅ iti tiṅpratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:21207: anyasmāt atiṅaḥ tiṅsadṛśāt kāryam vijñāsyate . kim ca anyat atiṅ tiṅsadṛśam . padam .
GS24pmbhasuu:21208: (P_6,1.72) KA_III.51.8-11 Ro_IV.387-388 ayam yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum . katham . adhikaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:21209: nāma triprakāram vyāpakam aupaśleṣikam vaiṣayikam iti . śabdasya ca śabdena kaḥ anyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21210: abhisambandhaḥ bhavitum arhati anyat ataḥ upaśleṣāt . ikaḥ yaṇ aci . aci upaśliṣṭasya
GS24pmbhasuu:21211: iti . tatra antareṇa saṃhitāgrahaṇam saṃhitāyām eva bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:21212: (P_6,1.74) KA_III.51.13-17 Ro_IV.388 atha kimartham āṅmāṅoḥ sānubandhakayoḥ nirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21214: sānubandhakayoḥ nirdeśaḥ kriyate āṅaḥ gatikarmapravacanīyasampratyayārthaḥ māṅaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21215: pratiṣedhasampratyayārthaḥ . iha mā bhūt . ā chāyā,
GS24pmbhasuu:21218: (P_6,1.75-76) KA_III.51.20-22 Ro_IV.389 dīrghāt padāntāt vā viśvajanādīnām chandasi
GS24pmbhasuu:21219: . dīrghāt padāntāt vā iti atra viśvajanādīnām chandasi upasaṅkhyanam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:21221: viśvajanasya cchatram . na chāyām kuravaḥ aparām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21223: (P_6,1.77.1) KA_III.52.2-53.6 Ro_IV.389-391 iggrahaṇam kimartham . iha mā bhūt . agnicit atra ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21224: somasut atra . na etat asti prayojanam . jaśtvam atra bādhakam bhaviṣyati . jaśtvam
GS24pmbhasuu:21225: na siddham yaṇam atra paśya . asiddham atra jaśtvam . tasya asiddhatvāt yaṇādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21226: prāpnoti . yaḥ ca apadāntaḥ hal acaḥ ca pūrvaḥ . yaḥ ca apadāntaḥ hal acaḥ ca pūrvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21227: tasya prāpnoti . pacati iti . evam tarhi dīrghasya yaṇ . dīrghasya yaṇ ādeśam vakṣyāmi
GS24pmbhasuu:21228: . tat dīrghagrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:21229: . dīrghāt padāntāt vā iti . tat vai pañcamīnirdiṣṭam ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭena ca iha arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21230: . aci iti eṣā saptamī dīrghāt iti pañcamyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayiṣyati tasmin iti nirdiṣṭe
GS24pmbhasuu:21231: pūrvasya iti . bhavet siddham kumārī atra ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21232: brahmabandhvartham iti . idam tu na sidhyati . dadhi atra ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21233: madhu atra iti . hrasvaḥ iti prtavṛttam . hrasvagrahaṇam api prakṛtam anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:21234: . kva prakṛtam . hrasvyasya piti kṛti tuk iti . yadi tat anuvartate dīrghāt padāntāt
GS24pmbhasuu:21235: vā iti hrasvāt api padāntāt vikalpena prāpnoti . sambandhavṛttyā . sambandham anuvartiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:21236: . hrasvyasya piti kṛti tuk . saṃhitāyām hrasvyasya piti kṛti tuk . che ca hrasvyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:21237: piti kṛti tuk . āṅmāṅoḥ ca hrasvyasya piti kṛti tuk . dīrghāt padāntāt vā hrasvyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:21238: piti kṛti tuk . tataḥ ikaḥ yaṇ aci . hrasvyasya iti vartate . piti kṛti tuk iti nivṛttam
GS24pmbhasuu:21242: lāvakaḥ . ayādayaḥ atra bādhakāḥ bhaviṣyanti . iha tarhi prāpnoti khaṭvā indraḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21245: mālā elakā . guṇavṛddhibādhyaḥ . guṇavṛddhī atra bādhike bhaviṣyataḥ . idam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:21246: prayojanam . ikaḥ aci yaṇ eva syāt . yat anyat prāpnoti tat mā bhūt iti . kim ca
GS24pmbhasuu:21247: anyat prāpnoti . śākalam . sinnityasamāsayoḥ śākalapratiṣedham codayiṣyati . sa na vaktavyaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:21248: (P_6,1.77.2) KA_III.53.7-54.4 Ro_IV.391-393 yaṇādeśaḥ plutapūrvasya ca . yaṇādeśaḥ plutapūrvasya ca iti vaktavyam . agnā3i* indram ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21252: paṭā3v āśā . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . asiddhaḥ plutaḥ plutavikārau ca imau
GS24pmbhasuu:21253: . siddhaḥ plutaḥ svarasandhiṣu . katham jñāyate . yat ayam plutapragṛhyāḥ aci iti
GS24pmbhasuu:21254: plutasya prakṛtibhāvam śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ siddhaḥ plutaḥ svarasandhiṣu iti
GS24pmbhasuu:21255: . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . sataḥ hi kāryiṇaḥ kāryeṇa bhavitavyam . idam tarhi prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:21256: dīrghaśākalapratiṣedhārtham . dīrghatvam śākalam ca mā bhūt iti . etat api na asti
GS24pmbhasuu:21257: prayojanam . ārabhyate plutapūrvasya yaṇādeśaḥ tayoḥ yvau aci saṃhitāyām iti . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:21258: dīrghaśākalapratiṣedhārtham bhaviṣyati . tat na vaktavyam bhavati . nanu ca tasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:21259: api ucyamāne idam na vaktavyam bhavati . avaśyam idam vaktavyam yau plutapūrvau idutau
GS24pmbhasuu:21262: bho3i iha bho3y iha iti . yad tarhi asya nibandhanam asti idam eva vaktavyam . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:21263: na vaktavyam . tat api avaśyam svarārtham vaktavyam . anena hi sati udāttasvaritayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21264: yaṇaḥ iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ prasajyeta . tena punaḥ sati asiddhatvāt na bhaviṣyati . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:21265: tarhi tasya nibandhanam asti tat eva vaktavyam . idam na vaktavyam . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:21266: idam api avaśyam vaktavyam yau plutapūrvau idutau aplutavikārau tadartham . bho3i indram ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21268: bho3i iha bho3y iha iti . chāndasam etat dṛṣṭānuvidhiḥ chandasi bhavati . yat tarhi na chāndasam bho3y indram ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21269: bho3y iha iti sāma gāyati . eṣaḥ api chandasi dṛṣṭasya anuprayogaḥ kriyate . jaśtvam
GS24pmbhasuu:21270: na siddham yaṇam atra paśya . yaḥ ca apadāntaḥ hal acaḥ ca pūrvaḥ . dīrghasya yaṇ
GS24pmbhasuu:21271: . hrasvaḥ iti prtavṛttam . sambandhavṛttyā . guṇavṛddhibādhyaḥ . nitye ca yaḥ śākalabhāksamāse
GS24pmbhasuu:21272: tadartham etad bhagavān cakāra . sāmarthyayogāt na hi kim cit asmin paśyāmi śāstre
GS24pmbhasuu:21274: (P_6,1.79.1) KA_III.54.6-16 Ro_IV.393-394 vāntādeśe sthāninirdeśaḥ . vāntādeśe sthāninirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21275: kartavyaḥ . okāraukārayoḥ iti vaktavyam ekāraikārayoḥ mā bhūt iti . saḥ tarhi kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21276: . na kartavyaḥ . vāntagrahaṇam na kariṣyate . ecaḥ yi pratyaye ayādayaḥ bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:21277: iti eva siddham . yadi vāntagrahaṇam na kriyate ceyam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21278: jeyam iti atra api prāpnoti . kṣayyajayyau śakyārthe iti etat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . kṣijyoḥ eva iti . tayoḥ tarhi śakyārthāt anyatra api prāpnoti . kṣeyam pāpam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21279: jeyaḥ vṛṣalaḥ iti . ubhayataḥ niyamaḥ vijñāsyate . kṣijyoḥ eva ecaḥ tayoḥ ca śakyārthe eva iti . iha api tarhi niyamāt na prāpnoti . lavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:21282: avaśyapāvyam . tulyajātīyasya niyamaḥ . kaḥ ca tulyajātīyaḥ . yathājātīyakaḥ kṣijyoḥ ec . kathañjātīyakaḥ kṣijyoḥ ec . ekāraḥ . evam api rāyam icchati ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21284: atra api prāpnoti . rāyiḥ chāndasaḥ . dṛṣṭānuvidhiḥ chandasi bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:21285: (P_6,1.79.2) KA_III.54.17-22 Ro_IV. 394 goḥ yūtau chandasi . goḥ yūtau chandasi upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:21286: kartavyam . a naḥ mitrāvaruṇā ghṛtaiḥ gavyūtim ukṣatam . goyūtim iti eva anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:21287: . adhvaparimāṇe ca . adhvaparimāṇe ca goḥ yūtau upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . gavyūtim
GS24pmbhasuu:21288: adhvānam gataḥ . goyūtim iti eva anyatra .
GS24pmbhasuu:21289: (P_6,1.80) KA_III.54.24-55.2 Ro_IV.394 evakāraḥ kimarthaḥ . niyamārthaḥ . na etat
GS24pmbhasuu:21290: prayojanam . na etat asti prayojanam . siddhe vidhiḥ ārabhyamāṇaḥ antareṇa evakāram
GS24pmbhasuu:21291: niyamārthaṅ bhaviṣyati . iṣṭataḥ avadhāraṇārthaḥ tarhi . yathā evam vijñāyeta . dhātoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21292: tannimittasya eva iti . mā evam vijñāyi . dhātoḥ eva tannimittasya iti . kim ca syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:21293: . adhātoḥ tannimittasya na syāt . śaṅkavyam dāru ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21295: (P_6,1.82) KA_III.55.4-5 Ro_IV.395 tat iti anena kim pratinirdiśyate . saḥ eva krīṇātyarthaḥ . iha mā bhūt . kreyam naḥ dhānyam . na ca asti krayyam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:21297: . bhayyādiprakaraṇe hradayyāḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . hradayyāḥ āpaḥ . av śarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:21298: ca . śarasya ca hradasya ca ataḥ av vaktayaḥ . hradavyāḥ āpaḥ . śaravyāḥ vai tejanam
GS24pmbhasuu:21299: . śaravyasya paśūn abhighātakaḥ syāt . śaruvṛttāt vā siddham . śaruvṛttāt vā siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:21300: punaḥ siddham etat . ṛñjatī śaruḥ iti api dṛśyate . ṛñjatī śaruḥ iti api śaruśabdapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21301: dṛśyate . śaruhastaḥ iti ca loke . śaruhastaḥ iti ca loke śarahastam upācaranti .
GS24pmbhasuu:21302: (P_6,1.84.1) KA_III.56.2-57.6 Ro_IV.396-398 ekavacanam kimartham . ekavacanam pṛthak
GS24pmbhasuu:21303: ādeśapratiṣedhārtham . ekavacanam kriyate ekaḥ ādeśaḥ yathā syāt . pṛthak ādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21304: mā bhūt iti . na vā dravyavat karmacodanāyām dvayoḥ ekasya abhinirvṛtteḥ . na vā
GS24pmbhasuu:21305: etat prayojanam asti . kim kāraṇam . dravyavat karmacodanāyām dvayoḥ ekasya abhinirvṛtteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21306: ekaḥ ādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . tat yathā dravyeṣu karmacodanāyām dvayoḥ ekasya abhinirvṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21307: bhavati . anayoḥ pūlayoḥ kaṭam kuru . anayoḥ mitpiṇḍayoḥ ghaṭam kuru iti . na ca
GS24pmbhasuu:21308: ucyate ekam iti ekam ca asau karoti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam dravyeṣu karmacodanāyām dvayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21309: ekasya abhinirvṛttiḥ bhavati . tat ca ekavākyabhāvāt . ekavākyabhāvāt dravyeṣu karmacodanāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:21310: dvayoḥ ekasya abhinirvṛttiḥ bhavati . ātaḥ ca ekavākyabhāvāt . vyākaraṇe api hi anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:21311: dvayoḥ sthāninoḥ ekaḥ ādeśaḥ bhavati . jvaratvarasrivyavimavām upadhāyāḥ ca . bhrasjaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21312: ropadhayoḥ ram anyatarasyām iti . yat tāvat ucyate ekavākyabhāvāt iti tat na . arthāt
GS24pmbhasuu:21313: prakaraṇāt vā loke dvayoḥ ekasya abhinirvṛttiḥ bhavati . ātaḥ ca arthāt prakaraṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:21314: vā . vyākaraṇe api hi anyatra dvayoḥ sthāninoḥ dvau ādeśau bhavataḥ . radābhyām niṣṭhātaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21315: naḥ pūrvasya ca daḥ . ubhau sābhyāsasya iti . katham yat tat uktam vyākaraṇe api
GS24pmbhasuu:21316: hi anyatra dvayoḥ sthāninoḥ ekaḥ ādeśaḥ bhavati . jvaratvarasrivyavimavām upadhāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21317: ca . bhrasjaḥ ropadhayoḥ ram anyatarasyām iti . iha tāvat jvaratvarasrivyavimavām
GS24pmbhasuu:21318: upadhāyāḥ ca iti . stām dvau ūṭhau . na asti doṣaḥ . savarṇadīrghatvena siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:21319: iha bhrasjaḥ ropadhayoḥ ram anyatarasyām iti . vakṣyati hi etat . bhrasjaḥ ropadhayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21320: lopaḥ āgamaḥ ram vidhīyate iti . yat ucyate arthāt prakaraṇāt vā iti tat na . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:21321: kāraṇam . ekavākyabhāvāt eva loke dvayoḥ ekasya abhinirvṛttiḥ bhavati . ātaḥ ca ekavākyabhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:21322: . aṅga hi bhavān grāmyam pāṃsulapādam aprakaraṇajñam āgatam bravītu anayoḥ pūlayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21323: kaṭam kuru . anayoḥ mitpiṇḍayoḥ ghaṭam kuru iti . ekam eva asau kariṣyati . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:21324: yat uktam vyākaraṇe api hi anyatra dvayoḥ sthāninoḥ dvau ādeśau bhavataḥ . radābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:21325: niṣṭhātaḥ naḥ pūrvasya ca daḥ . ubhau sābhyāsasya iti . iha tāvat radābhyām niṣṭhātaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21326: naḥ pūrvasya ca daḥ iti dve vākye . katham . yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . radābhyām niṣṭhātaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21327: naḥ . tataḥ pūrvasya ca daḥ iti . iha ubhau sābhyāsasya iti ubhaugrahaṇasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:21330: yathā loke ṭatra avayave śāstrārthasampratyayaḥ prāpnoti yathā loke . tat yathā loke
GS24pmbhasuu:21331: . vasante brāhmaṇaḥ agnīn ādadhīta iti sakṛt ādhāya kṛtaḥ śāstrārthaḥ iti kṛtvā punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21332: pravṛttiḥ na bhavati . tathā garbhāṣṭame brāhmaṇaḥ upaneyaḥ iti sakṛt upanīya kṛtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21333: śāstrārthaḥ iti kṛtvā punaḥ pravṛttiḥ na bhavati . tathā triḥ hṛdayaṅgamābhiḥ adbhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21334: aśabdābhiḥ upaspṛśet iti sakṛt upaspṛśya kṛtaḥ śāstrārthaḥ iti kṛtvā punaḥ pravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21335: na bhavati . evam iha api khaṭvendre kṛtaḥ śāstrārthaḥ iti kṛtvā mālendrādiṣu na
GS24pmbhasuu:21336: syāt . siddham tu dharmopadeśane anavayavavijñānāt yathā laukikavaidikeṣu . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:21337: etat . katham . dharmopadeśanam idam śāstram . dharmopadeśane ca asmin śāstre anavayavena
GS24pmbhasuu:21338: śāstrārthaḥ sampratīyate yathā laukikeṣu vaidikeṣu ca kṛtānteṣu . loke tāvat :
GS24pmbhasuu:21339: brāhmaṇaḥ na hantavyaḥ . surā na peyā iti . brāhmaṇamātram na hanyate surāmātram
GS24pmbhasuu:21340: ca na pīyate . yadi ca avayavena śāstrārthasampratyayaḥ syāt ekam ca brāhmaṇam ahatvā
GS24pmbhasuu:21341: ekām ca surām apītvā anyatra kāmacāraḥ syāt . tathā pūrvavayāḥ brāhmaṇaḥ pratyuttheyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21342: iti pūrvavayomātram pratyutthīyate . yadi avayavena śāstrārthasampratyayaḥ syāt ekam
GS24pmbhasuu:21343: pūrvavayasam pratyutthāya anyatra kāmacāraḥ syāt . tathā vede khalu api . vasante
GS24pmbhasuu:21344: brāhmaṇaḥ agniṣṭomādibhiḥ kratubhiḥ yajeta iti agnyādhānanimittam vasante vasante
GS24pmbhasuu:21345: ijyate . yadi avayavena śāstrārthasampratyayaḥ syāt sakṛt iṣṭvā punaḥ ijyā na pravarteta
GS24pmbhasuu:21346: . ubhayathā iha loke dṛśyate . avayavena api śāstrārthasampratyayaḥ anavayavena api
GS24pmbhasuu:21347: . katham punaḥ idam ubhayam labhyam . labhyam iti āha . katham . iha tāvat vasante
GS24pmbhasuu:21348: brāhmaṇaḥ agnīn ādadhīta iti . agnyādhānam yajñamukhaprtipattyartham . sakṛt ādhāya
GS24pmbhasuu:21349: kṛtaḥ śāstrārthaḥ pratipannam yajñam iti kṛtvā punaḥ pravṛttiḥ na bhavati . ataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21350: atra avayavena śāstrārthaḥ sampratīyate . tathā garbhāṣṭame brāhmaṇaḥ upaneyaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:21351: . upanayanam saṃskārārtham . sakṛt ca asau upanītaḥ saṃskṛtaḥ bhavati . ataḥ atra
GS24pmbhasuu:21352: api avayavena śāstrārthaḥ sampratīyate . tathā triḥ hṛdayaṅgamābhiḥ adbhiḥ aśabdābhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21353: upaspṛśet iti . upasparśanam śaucārtham . sakṛt ca asau upaspṛśya śuciḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:21354: ataḥ atra api avayavena śāstrārthaḥ sampratīyate . iha idānīm brāhmaṇaḥ na hantavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21355: . surā na peyā iti . brāhmaṇavadhe surāpāne ca mahān doṣaḥ uktaḥ . saḥ brāhmaṇavadhamātre
GS24pmbhasuu:21356: surāpānamātre ca prasaktaḥ . ataḥ atra anavayavena śāstrārthaḥ sampratīyate . tathā
GS24pmbhasuu:21357: pūrvavayāḥ brāhmaṇaḥ pratyuttheyaḥ iti . pūrvavayasaḥ apratyutthāne doṣaḥ uktaḥ pratyutthāne
GS24pmbhasuu:21358: ca guṇaḥ . katham . ūrdhvam prāṇāḥ hi utkrāmanti yūnaḥ sthavire āyati . pratyutthānābhābhivādābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:21359: punaḥ tān pratipadyate iti . saḥ ca prūrvavayomātre prasaktaḥ . ataḥ atra api anavayavena
GS24pmbhasuu:21360: śāstrārthaḥ sampratīyate . tathā vasante brāhmaṇaḥ agniṣṭomādibhiḥ kratubhiḥ yajeta
GS24pmbhasuu:21361: iti ijyāyāḥ kim cit prayojanam uktam . kim . svarge loke apsarasaḥ enam jāyāḥ bhūtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:21362: upaśerate iti . tat ca dvitīyasyāḥ tṛtīyasyāḥ ca ijyāyāḥ bhavitum arhati . ataḥ atra
GS24pmbhasuu:21363: api anavayavena śāstrārthaḥ sampratīyate . tathā śabdasya api jñāne prayoge prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:21364: uktam . kim . ekaḥ śabdaḥ samyak jñātaḥ śāstrānvitaḥ suprayuktaḥ svarge loke kāmadhuk
GS24pmbhasuu:21365: bhavati iti . yadi ekaḥ śabdaḥ samyak jñātaḥ śāstrānvitaḥ suprayuktaḥ svarge loke
GS24pmbhasuu:21366: kāmadhuk bhavati kimartham dvitīyaḥ tṛtīyaḥ ca prayujyate . na vai kāmānām tṛptiḥ asti .
GS24pmbhasuu:21367: (P_6,1.84.3) KA_III.58.18-59.8 Ro_IV.402-403 atha pūrvagrahaṇam kimartham . pūrvaparagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:21368: parasya ādeśapratiṣedhārtham . pūrvaparagrahaṇam kriyate parasya ādeśapratiṣedhārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:21369: . parasya ādeśaḥ mā bhūt . āt guṇaḥ iti . katham ca prāpnoti . pañcamīnirdiṣṭāt hi
GS24pmbhasuu:21370: parasya . pañcamīnirdiṣṭāt hi parasya kāryam ucyate . tat yathā dvyantarupasargebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21371: apaḥ īt iti . ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭārtham tu . ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭārtham ca pūrvaparagrahaṇam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:21372: . ṣaṣṭhīnirdeśaḥ yathā pakalpeta . anirdiṣṭe hi ṣaṣṭhyarthāprasiddhiḥ . akriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:21373: hi pūrvaparagrahaṇe ṣaṣṭhyarthasya aprasiddhiḥ syāt . kasya . sthāneyogatvasya .
GS24pmbhasuu:21374: na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . āt iti eṣā pañcamī aci iti saptamyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayiṣyati tasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:21375: iti uttarasya iti . tathā ca aci iti eṣā saptamī āt iti pañcamyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayiṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:21376: tasmin iti nirdiṣṭe pūrvasya iti . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat pūrvagrahaṇam karoti
GS24pmbhasuu:21377: tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na ubhe yugapat prakalpike bhavataḥ iti . kim etasya jñāpane
GS24pmbhasuu:21379: saptamīpañcamyoḥ ca bhāvāt ubhayatra ṣaṣṭhīprakḷptiḥ tatra ubhayakāryaprasaṅgaḥ iti . saḥ na doṣaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:21380: (P_6,1.85.1) KA_III.59.10-60.6 Ro_IV. 404-406 kimartham idam ucyate . antādivadvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:21381: āmiśrasya ādeśavacanāt . antādivat iti ucyate āmiśrasya ādeśavacanāt . āmiśrasya
GS24pmbhasuu:21382: ayam ādeśaḥ ucyate . saḥ na eva pūrvagrahaṇena gṛhyate na api paragrahaṇena . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:21383: yathā kṣīrodake sampṛkte āmiśratvāt na eva kṣīragrahaṇena gṛhyate na api udakagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:21384: . iṣyate ca grahaṇam syāt iti . tat ca antareṇa yatnam na sidhyati iti antādivacvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:21385: . evamartham idam ucyate . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . tatra yasya antādivat
GS24pmbhasuu:21386: tannirdeśaḥ . tatra yasya antādivadbhāvaḥ iṣyate tannirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . asya antavat
GS24pmbhasuu:21387: bhavati asya ādivat bhavati iti vaktavyam . siddham tu pūrvaparādhikārāt . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:21388: etat . katham . pūrvaparādhikārāt . pūrvaparayoḥ iti vartate . pūrvasya kāryam prati
GS24pmbhasuu:21389: antavat bhavati . parasya kāryam prati ādivat bhavati . atha yatra ubhayam āśrīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:21390: kim tatra pūrvasya antavat bhavati āhosvit parasya ādivat bhavati . ubhayataḥ āśraye
GS24pmbhasuu:21391: na antādivat . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . laukikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21392: ayam dṛṣṭāntaḥ . tat yathā loke yaḥ dvayoḥ tulyabalayoḥ preṣyaḥ bhavati saḥ tayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21393: paryāyeṇa kāryam karoti . yadā tu tam ubhau yugapat preṣayataḥ nānādikṣu ca kārye
GS24pmbhasuu:21394: bhavataḥ tatra yadi asau avirodhāṛthī bhavati tataḥ ubhayoḥ na karoti . kim punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21395: kāraṇam ubhayoḥ na karoti . yaugapadyāsambhavāt . na asti yaugapadyena sambhavaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:21396: (P_6,1.85.2) KA_III.60.7-63.7 Ro_IV.406-411 atha antavattve kāni prayojanāni . antavattve
GS24pmbhasuu:21397: prayojanam bahvacpūrvapadāt ṭhajvidhāne . antavattve bahvacpūrvapadāt ṭhajvidhāne
GS24pmbhasuu:21398: prayojanam . dvādaśānyikaḥ . pūrvapadottarapadayoḥ ekādeśaḥ pūrvapadasaya antavat
GS24pmbhasuu:21399: bhavati yathā śakyeta kartum bahucpūrvapadāt ṭhac bhavati iti . kva tarhi syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:21400: yatra kṛte api ekādeśe bahvacpūrvapadam bhavati . tarayodaśānyikaḥ . pratyayaikādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21401: pūrvavidhau . pratyayaikādeśaḥ pūrvavidhau prayojanam . madhu pibanti . śidaśitoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21402: ekādeśaḥ śitaḥ antavat bhavati yathā śakyeta kartum śiti iti pibādeśaḥ . kva tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:21403: syāt . yatra ekādeśaḥ na bhavati . pibati . vaibhaktasya ṇatve . vaibhaktasya ṇatve
GS24pmbhasuu:21405: surāpeṇa . uttarapadavibhaktyoḥ ekādeśaḥ uttarapadasya antavat bhavati yathā śakyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:21406: kartum ekājuttarapade ṇaḥ bhavati iti . kva tarhi syāt . yatra ekādeśaḥ na bhavati . kṣīrapāṇām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21407: surāpāṇam . adasaḥ īttvottve . adasaḥ īttvottve prayojanam . amī atra ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21410: amū āsāte . adasvibhaktyoḥ ekādeśaḥ adasaḥ antavat bhavati yathā śakyeta kartum adasaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21411: aseḥ dāt u daḥ maḥ etaḥ īt bahuvacane iti . kva tarhi syāt . yatra ekādeśaḥ na bhavati . amībhiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21413: hāryā . tidatiroḥ ekādeśaḥ titaḥ antavat bhavati yathā śakyeta kartum tit svaritam iti . kva tarhi syāt . yatra ekādeśaḥ na bhavati . kāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21414: hāryaḥ . svaritatvam vipratiṣedhāt . svaritatvam kriyatām ekādeśaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:21415: . paratvāt svaritatvam bhaviṣyati vipratiṣedhena . na eṣaḥ yuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:21416: nityaḥ ekādeśaḥ . kṛte api svaritatve prāpnoti akṛte api . anityaḥ ekādeśaḥ . anyathāsvarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:21417: kṛte svaritatve prāpnoti anyathāsvarasya akṛte svaritatve prāpnoti . svarabhinnasya
GS24pmbhasuu:21418: ca prāpnuvan vidhiḥ anityaḥ bhavati . antaraṅgaḥ tarhi ekādeśaḥ . kā antaraṅgatā
GS24pmbhasuu:21419: . varṇau āśritya ekādeśaḥ padasya svaritatvam . svaritatvam api antaraṅgam . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:21420: . uktam etat padagrahaṇam parimāṇārtham iti . ubhayoḥ antaraṅgayoḥ paratvāt svaritatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:21421: . svaritatve kṛte āntaryataḥ svaritānudāttayoḥ ekādeśaḥ svaritaḥ bhaviṣyati . liṅgaviśiṣtagrahaṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:21422: vā . atha vā prātipadikagrahaṇe liṅgaviśiṣtasya api grahaṇm bhavati iti evam atra
GS24pmbhasuu:21423: svaritatvam bhaviṣyati . pūrvapadāntodāttatvam ca prayojanam . guḍodakam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21424: mathitodakam . pūrvapadottarapadayoḥ ekādeśaḥ pūrvapadasya antavat bhavati yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:21425: śakyeta kartum udake akevale pūrvapadasya antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati iti . kva tarhi syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:21426: . yatra akādeśaḥ na bhavati . udaśvidudakam . pūrvapadāntodāttatvam ca . pūrvapadāntodāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:21427: ca vipratiṣedhāt . pūrvapadāntodāttatvam kriyatām ekādeśaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:21431: guḍodakam . pūrvapadāntodāttatvam bhavati vipratiṣedhena . saḥ ca avaśyam vipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21432: āśrayayitavyaḥ . ekādeśe hi svaritāprasiddhiḥ . ekādeśe hi svaritasya aprasiddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21433: syāt . yaḥ hi manyate astu atra ekādeśaḥ ekādeśe kṛte pūrvapadāntodāttatvam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:21434: iti svaritatvam tasya na sidhyati svaritaḥ vā anudātte padādau iti . mathitodakam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21436: prāśitā . kṛdgatyoḥ ekādeśaḥ gateḥ antavat bhavati yathā śakyeta kartum gatikārakopapadāt
GS24pmbhasuu:21437: kṛdantam uttarapadam prakṛtisvaram bhavati iti . kva tarhi syāt . yatra na akādeśaḥ . prakārakaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21438: prakaraṇam . kṛdantaprakṛtisvaratvam ca . kṛdantaprakṛtisvaratvam ca vipratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:21439: . kṛdantaprakṛtisvaratvam kriyatām ekādeśaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt kṛdantaprakṛtisvaratvam
GS24pmbhasuu:21443: prāśitā . kṛdantaprakṛtisvaratvam bhavati vipratiṣedhena . saḥ ca avaśyam vipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21444: āśrayayitavyaḥ . ekādeśe hi a prasiddhiḥ uttarapadasya aparatvāt . yaḥ hi manyate
GS24pmbhasuu:21445: astu atra ekādeśaḥ ekādeśe kṛte kṛdantaprakṛtisvaratvam bhaviṣyati iti kṛdantaprakṛtisvaratvam
GS24pmbhasuu:21446: tasya na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . uttarapadasya aparatvāt . na hi idānīm ekādeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:21447: kṛte uttarapadam param bhavati . nanu ca antādivadbhāvena param . ubhayataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21448: āśraye na antādivat . uttarapadavṛddhiḥ ca ekādeśāt . uttarapadavṛddhiḥ ca ekādeśāt bhavati vipratiṣedhena . uttarapadavṛddheḥ avakāśaḥ pūrvatraigartakaḥ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21451: aparaiṣukāmaśaḥ . uttarapadavṛddhiḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . ekādeśaprasaṅgaḥ tu
GS24pmbhasuu:21452: antaraṅgabalīyastvāt . ekādeśaḥ tu prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . antaraṅgasya balīyastvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:21453: . antaraṅgam balīyaḥ . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . tatra vṛddhividhānam . tatra vṛddhiḥ vidheyā
GS24pmbhasuu:21454: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati pūrvottarapadayoḥ tāvat kāryam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:21455: na ekādeśaḥ iti yat ayam na indrasya parasya iti pratiṣedham śāsti . katham kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:21456: jñāpakam . indre dvau acau . tatra ekaḥ yasya īti ca iti lopena hriyate aparaḥ ekādeśena
GS24pmbhasuu:21457: . tataḥ anackaḥ indraḥ sampannaḥ . tatra kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ vṛddheḥ . paśyati tu ācāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21458: pūrvapadottarapadyoḥ tāvatkāryam bhavati na ekādeśaḥ iti tataḥ na indrasya parasya
GS24pmbhasuu:21460: (P_6,1.85.3) KA_III.63.8-64.8 Ro_IV.411-412 atha ādivattve kāni prayojanāni . ādivattve prayojanam pragṛhyasañjñāyām . ādivattve pragṛhyasañjñāyām prayojanam . agnī iti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21461: vāyū iti . dvivacanādvivacanayoḥ ekādeśaḥ dvivacanasya ādivat bhavati yathā śakyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:21462: kartum īdūdet dvivacanam pragṛhyam iti . kva tarhi syāt . yatra ekādeśaḥ na bhavati . trapuṇī iti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21463: jatunī iti . suptiṅābvidhiṣu . suptiṅābvidhiṣu prayojanam . sup . vṛkṣe tiṣṭhati
GS24pmbhasuu:21464: . plakṣe tiṣṭhati . subasupoḥ ekādeśaḥ supaḥ ādivat bhavati yathā śakyeta kartum
GS24pmbhasuu:21465: subantam padam iti . kva tarhi syāt . yatra ekādeśaḥ na bhavati . vṛkṣaḥ tiṣṭhati
GS24pmbhasuu:21467: yaje iti . tiṅatiṅoḥ ekādeśaḥ tiṅaḥ ādivat bhavati yathā śakyeta kartum tiṅantam padam iti . kva tarhi syāt . yatra ekādeśaḥ na bhavati . pacati
GS24pmbhasuu:21469: mālā . abanāpoḥ ekādeśaḥ āpaḥ ādivat bhavati yathā śakyeta kartum ābantāt soḥ lopaḥ bhavati iti . kva tarhi syāt . yatra ekādeśaḥ na bhavati . kruñcā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21471: devadiśā . āṅgrahaṇe padavidhau . āṅgrahaṇe padavidhau prayojanam . adya āhate .
GS24pmbhasuu:21472: kadā āhate . āṅanāṅoḥ ekādeśaḥ āṅaḥ ādivat bhavati yathā śakyeta kartum āṅaḥ yamahanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21473: iti ātmanepadam bhavati iti . kva tarhi syāt . yatra ekādeśaḥ na bhavati . āhate
GS24pmbhasuu:21474: . āṭaḥ ca vṛddhividhau . āṭaḥ ca vṛddhividhau prayojanam . adya aihiṣṭa . kadā aihiṣṭa
GS24pmbhasuu:21475: . āṭaḥ adyaśabdasya ca ekādeśaḥ āṭaḥ ādivat bhavati yathā śakyeta kartum āṭaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:21476: aci vṛddhiḥ bhavati iti . kva tarhi syāt . yatra ekādeśaḥ na . aihiṣṭa ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21477: aikṣiṣṭa . kṛdantaprātipadikatve ca . kṛdantaprātipadikatve ca prayojanam . dhārayaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21478: pārayaḥ . kṛdakṛtoḥ ekādeśaḥ kṛtaḥ ādivat bhavati yathā śakyeta kartum kṛdantam prātipadikam iti . kva tarhi syāt . yatra ekādeśaḥ na . kārakaḥ , hārakaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:21479: (P_6,1.85.4) KA_III.64.9-65.6 Ro_IV.413-414 na abhyāsādīnām hrasvatve . abhyāsādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:21480: hrasvatve na antādivat bhavati iti vaktavyam . ke punaḥ abhyāsādayaḥ . abhyāsohāmbārthanadīnapuṃsakopasarjanahrasvatvāni
GS24pmbhasuu:21489: prāpnoti . na vā bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . na vā etat vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:21490: . antaraṅgam hrasvatvam . bahiraṅgāḥ ete vidhayaḥ . asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge
GS24pmbhasuu:21491: . varṇāśrayavidhau ca . varṇāśrayavidhau ca na antādivat bhavati iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:21492: kim prayojanam . prayojanam khaṭvābhiḥ juhāva asyai aśvaḥ iti . iha khaṭvābhiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21494: ataḥ bhisaḥ ais bhavati iti aisbhāvaḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . taparakaraṇasāmarthyāt na bhaviṣyati . asti anyat taparakaraṇe prayojanam . kim . kīlālapābhiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21495: śubhaṃyābhiḥ . juhāva . ātaḥ au ṇalaḥ iti autvam prāpnoti . asyai aśvaḥ iti . eṅaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21496: padāntāt ati iti pūrvatvam prāpnoti . na vā atādrūpyātideśāt . na vā vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:21497: kim kāraṇam . atādrūpyātideśāt . na iha tādrūpyam atidiśyate . rūpāśrayāḥ vai ete
GS24pmbhasuu:21499: (P_6,1.86.1) KA_III.65.8-66.7 Ro_IV.414-415 kimartham idam ucyate . ṣatvatukoḥ asiddhavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:21502: tāvat . kosiñcat . yosiñcat . ekādeśe kṛte iṇaḥ iti ṣatvam prāpnoti . asiddhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:21504: pretya . ekādeśe kṛte hrasvasya iti tuk na prāpnoti . asiddhatvāt bhavati . asti
GS24pmbhasuu:21505: prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . tatra utsargalakṣaṇāprasiddhiḥ utsargābhāvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:21507: pretya iti . kim kāraṇam . utsargābhāvāt . hrasvasya iti ucyate na ca atra hrasvam
GS24pmbhasuu:21508: paśyāmaḥ . nanu ca atra api asiddhavacanāt siddham . asiddhavacanāt siddham iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:21509: na anyasya asiddhavacanāt anyasya bhāvaḥ . asiddhavacanāt siddham iti cet tat na
GS24pmbhasuu:21510: . kim kāraṇam . anyasya asiddhavacanāt anyasya bhāvaḥ . na hi anyasya asiddhavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:21511: anyasya prādurbhāvaḥ bhavati . na hi devadattasya hantari hate devadattasya prādurbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21512: bhavati . tasmāt sthānivadvacanam asiddhatvam ca . tasmāt sthānivadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21515: yosiñcat iti atra asiddhatvam . sthānivadvacanānarthakyam śāstrāsiddhatvāt . sthānivadvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:21516: anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . śāstrāsiddhatvāt . na anena kāryāsiddhatvam kriyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:21517: kim tarhi . śāstrāsiddhatvam anena kriyate . ekādeśaśāstram tukśāstre asiddham bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:21518: (P_6,1.86.2) KA_III.66.8-23 Ro_IV.416-418 samprasāraṇaṅīṭsu siddhaḥ . samprasāraṇaṅīṭsu siddhaḥ ekādeśaḥ iti vaktavyam . śakahūṣu ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21520: vṛkṣe chatram . ṅi . iṭ . apace cchatram ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21521: apace chatram . samprasāraṇaṅīṭsu siddhaḥ padāntapadādyoḥ ekādeśasya asiddhavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:21522: . samprasāraṇaṅīṭsu siddhaḥ ekādeśaḥ . kutaḥ . padāntapadādyoḥ ekādeśasya asiddhavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:21523: . padāntapadādyoḥ ekādeśaḥ asiddhaḥ bhavati iti ucyate na ca eṣaḥ padāntapadādyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21524: ekādeśaḥ . yadi padāntapadādyoḥ ekādeśaḥ asiddhaḥ susasyāḥ oṣadhīḥ kṛdhi ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21526: atra ṣatvam prāpnoti . tugvidhim prati padāntapadādyoḥ ekādeśaḥ asiddhaḥ . ṣatvam prati ekādeśamātram asiddham bhavati . yadi ṣatvam prati ekādeśamātram asiddham śakahūṣu ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21528: atra ṣatvam na prāpnoti . astu tarhi aviśeṣeṇa . katham susasyāḥ oṣadhīḥ kṛdhi ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21529: supippalāḥ oṣadhīḥ kṛdhi iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . bhrātuṣputragrahaṇam jñāpakam ekādeśanimittāt
GS24pmbhasuu:21530: ṣatvapratiṣedhasya . yat ayam kaskādiṣu bhrātuṣputragrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:21531: ācāryaḥ na ekādeśanimittāt ṣatvam bhavati iti . yadi etat jñāpyate śakahūṣu ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21532: parivīṣu iti atra ṣatvam na prāpnoti . tulyajātīyakasya jñāpakam . kim ca tuljyajātīyam
GS24pmbhasuu:21533: . yaḥ kupvoḥ . yadi evam veñaḥ apratyaye parataḥ uḥ iti prāpnoti ut iti ca iṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:21534: . yathālakṣaṇam aprayukte . atha vā na evam vijñāyate . pūrvasya ca padādeḥ parasya
GS24pmbhasuu:21535: ca padāntasya iti . katham tarhi . parasya ca padādeḥ pūrvasya ca padāntasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:21536: (P_6,1.87.1) KA_III.66.25-68.3 Ro_IV.418-420 guṇagrahaṇam kimartham na āt ekaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:21537: iti eva ucyeta . āt ekaḥ cet guṇaḥ kena . āt ekaḥ cet guṇaḥ kena idānīm bhaviṣyati . khaṭvendraḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21540: mālodakam . sthāne antaratamaḥ hi saḥ . sthāne prāpyamāṇānām antaratamaḥ ādeśaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:21541: . aidautau api tarhi prapnutaḥ . aidautau na eci tau uktau . aidautau na bhaviṣyataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21542: . kim kāraṇam . eci hi aidautau ucyete . iha tarhi khaṭvarśyaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21544: ṛkāraḥ tarhi prāpnoti . ṛkāraḥ na ubhayāntaraḥ . ubhayoḥ yaḥ antaratamaḥ tena bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:21545: . na ca ṛkāraḥ ubhayoḥ antaratamaḥ . ākāraḥ tarhi prāpnoti . ākāraḥ na ṛti dhātau
GS24pmbhasuu:21546: saḥ . ākāraḥ na bhaviṣyati . kim kāraṇam . ṛti dhātau ākāraḥ ucyate . tat niyamārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:21547: bhaviṣyati . ṛkārādau dhātau eva na anyatra iti . plutaḥ tarhi prāpnoti . plutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21548: ca viṣaye smṛtaḥ . viṣaye plutaḥ ucyate . yadā ca saḥ viṣayaḥ bhavitavyam tadā plutena
GS24pmbhasuu:21549: . āntaryāt trimātracaturmātrāḥ . idam tarhi prayojanam . āntaryataḥ trimātracaturmātrāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:21550: sthāne trimātracaturmātrāḥ ādeśāḥ mā bhūvan iti . khaṭvā indraḥ khaṭvendraḥ . khaṭvā
GS24pmbhasuu:21551: udakam khaṭvodakam . khaṭvā īṣā khaṭveṣā . khaṭvā ūḍhā khaṭvoḍhā . khaṭvā elakā khaṭvailakā
GS24pmbhasuu:21552: . khaṭvā odanaḥ khaṭvaudanaḥ khaṭvā aitikāyanaḥ khaṭvaitikāyanaḥ . khaṭvā aupagavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21553: khaṭvaupagavaḥ . atha kriyamāṇe api guṇagrahaṇe kasmāt eva atra trimātracaturmātrāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:21554: sthāne trimātracaturmātrāḥ ādeśāḥ na bhavanti . taparatvāt ne te smṛtāḥ . tapare
GS24pmbhasuu:21555: guṇavṛddhī . nanu ca bhoḥ taḥ paraḥ yasmāt saḥ ayam taparaḥ . na iti āha . tāt api
GS24pmbhasuu:21556: paraḥ taparaḥ iti . yadi tāt api paraḥ taparaḥ ṝdoḥ ap iti iha eva syāt . yavaḥ stavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21557: . lavaḥ pavaḥ iti atra na syāt . na eṣaḥ takāraḥ . kaḥ tarhi . dakāraḥ . kim dakāre
GS24pmbhasuu:21558: prayojanam . atha kim takāre prayojanam . yadi asandehārthaḥ takāraḥ dakāraḥ api .
GS24pmbhasuu:21559: (P_6,1.87.2) KA_III.4-10 Ro_IV.420 guṇe ṅiśītām upasaṅkhyānam dīrghatvabādhanārtham . guṇe ṅiśītām upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . ṅi . vṛkṣe indraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21562: ayaje indram . kim prayojanam . dīrghatvabādhanārtham . savarṇadīrghatvam mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:21563: iti . na vā bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . na vā kartavyam . kim kāraṇam . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:21565: (P_6,1.87.3) KA_III.68.11-14 Ro_IV.420 āt ekaḥ cet guṇaḥ kena . sthāne antaratamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21566: hi saḥ . aidautau na eci tau uktau . ṛkāraḥ na ubhayāntaraḥ . ākāraḥ na ṛti dhātau
GS24pmbhasuu:21567: saḥ . plutaḥ ca viṣaye smṛtaḥ . āntaryāt trimātracaturmātrāḥ . taparatvāt ne te smṛtāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:21568: (P_6,1.89.1) KA_III.68.16-69.6 Ro_IV.421-422 kim idam etyedhatyoḥ rūpagrahaṇam āhosvit dhātugrahaṇam . kim ca ataḥ . yadi rūpagrahaṇam siddham upaiti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21570: praiṣi iti na sidhyati . atha dhātugrahaṇam siddham etat bhavati . kim tarhi iti
GS24pmbhasuu:21571: . iṇi ikārādau vṛddhipratiṣedhaḥ . iṇi ikārādau vṛddheḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . upetaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21572: pretaḥ iti . yogavibhāgāt siddham . yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . vṛddhiḥ eci . tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21573: etyedhatyoḥ . etyedhatyoḥ ca eci vṛddhiḥ bhavati . tata ūṭhi . ūṭhi ca vṛddhiḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:21574: . evam api ā itaḥ etaḥ . upetaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21575: pretaḥ iti atra api prāpnoti . āṅi pararaūpam atra bādhakam bhaviṣyati . na aprāpte
GS24pmbhasuu:21576: pararūpam iyam vṛddhiḥ ārabhyate . sā yathā eṅi pararūpam bādhate evam āṅi pararūpam
GS24pmbhasuu:21577: bādheta . na bādhate . kim kāraṇam . yena na aprāpte tasya bādhanam bhavati . na
GS24pmbhasuu:21578: ca aprāpte eṅi pararūpam iyam vṛddhiḥ ārabhyate . āṅi pararūpe punaḥ prāpte ca aprāpte
GS24pmbhasuu:21579: ca . athavā purastāt apavādāḥ anantarān vidhīn bādhante iti iyam vṛddhiḥ eṅi pararūpam
GS24pmbhasuu:21581: (P_6,1.89.2) KA_III.69.7-21 Ro_IV.422-423 akṣāt ūhinyām . akṣāt ūhinyām vṛddhiḥ vaktavyā . akṣauhiṇī . prāt ūhoḍhoḍhyeṣaiṣyeṣu . prāt ūha,
GS24pmbhasuu:21584: eṣya iti eteṣu vṛddhiḥ vaktavyā . prauhaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21589: īrin iti etayoḥ vṛddhiḥ vaktavyā . svairaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21590: svairī . īringrahaṇam śakyam akartum . katham svarī iti . ininā etat matvarthīyena
GS24pmbhasuu:21591: siddham . svairaḥ asya asti iti svairī . ṛte ca tṛtīyāsamāse . ṛte ca tṛtīyāsamāse
GS24pmbhasuu:21594: duḥkhetaḥ . tṛtīyāgrahaṇam kim . paramartaḥ . samāse iti kim . sukhenartaḥ . pravatsatarakambalvasanānām ca ṛṇe . pravatsatarakambalvasanānām ca ṛṇe vṛddhiḥ vaktavyā . prārṇam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21596: vasanārṇam . ṛṇadaśābhyām ca .ṛṇadaśābhyām ca vṛddhiḥ vaktavyā . ṛṇārṇam , daśārṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:21597: (P_6,1.90) KA_III.70.2-5 Ro_IV.423 kimarthaḥ cakāraḥ . vṛddheḥ anukarṣaṇārthaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:21598: na etat asti prayojanam . prakṛtā vṛddhiḥ anuvartiṣyate . idam tarhi prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:21599: ātaḥ aci vṛddhiḥ eva yathā syāt . yat anyat prāpnoti tat mā bhūt iti . kim ca anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:21600: prāpnoti . pararūpam . usi omāṅkṣu āṭaḥ pararūpapratiṣedham codayiṣyati . saḥ na vaktavyaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:21601: (P_6,1.91.1) KA_III.70.7-14 Ro_IV.423-424 dhātau iti kimartham . iha mā bhūt . prarṣabham
GS24pmbhasuu:21602: vanam . upasargāt vṛddhividhau dhātugrahaṇe uktam . kim uktam . gatyupasargasañjñāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21603: kriyāyoge yatkriyāyuktāḥ prādayaḥ tam prati iti vacanam iti . kriyamāṇe api dhātugrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:21604: prarcchakaḥ iti prāpnoti . yatkriyāyuktāḥ prādayaḥ tam prati iti vacanāt na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:21605: . idam tarhi prayojanam . upasargāt ṛti dhātau vṛddhiḥ eva yathā syāt . yat anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:21606: prāpnoti tat mā bhūt iti . kim ca anyat prāpnoti . hrasvatvam . ṛti akaḥ iti . ṛti
GS24pmbhasuu:21607: hrasvāt upasargāt vṛddhiḥ pūrvavipratiṣedhena iti codayiṣyati . saḥ na vaktavyaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:21608: (P_6,1.91.2) KA_III.70.15-73.14 Ro_IV.424-431 che tukaḥ sambuddhiguṇaḥ . che tuk
GS24pmbhasuu:21609: bhavati iti asmāt sambuddhiguṇaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . che tuk bhavati iti asya
GS24pmbhasuu:21612: vāyo . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . agnec chatram ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21615: vāyo chatram . sambuddhiguṇaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . saḥ tarhi vipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21616: . na vā bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . na vā vaktavyaḥ . kim kāṛaṇam . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:21617: . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇaḥ tuk antaraṅgalakṣaṇaḥ sambuddhiguṇaḥ . asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge
GS24pmbhasuu:21618: . antareṇa vipratiṣedham antareṇa api ca etām paribhāṣām siddham . katham . idam
GS24pmbhasuu:21619: iha sampradhāryam . sambuddhilopaḥ kriyatām guṇaḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:21620: guṇaḥ . nityaḥ sambuddhilopaḥ . kṛte api guṇe prāpnoti akṛte api . guṇaḥ api nityaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21621: . kṛte api samubuddhilope prāpnoti akṛte api . anityaḥ guṇaḥ . na hi kṛte sambuddhilope
GS24pmbhasuu:21622: prāpnoti . tāvati eva chena ānantaryam . tatra tukā bhavitavyam . tasmāt suṣṭhu ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:21623: . che tukaḥ sambuddhiguṇaḥ . na vā bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt iti . samprasāraṇadīrghatvaṇyallopābhyāsaguṇādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21631: hāraṇā . tukaḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . prakārya gataḥ . prahārya gataḥ . allopasya avakāśaḥ . cikīrṣitā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21632: jihīrṣitā . tukaḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . pracikīrṣya gataḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21633: prajihīrṣya gataḥ . abhyāsaguṇādayaḥ ca tukaḥ bhavanti vipratiṣedhena . ke punaḥ abhyāsaguṇādayaḥ . hrasvatvāttvettvaguṇāḥ . hrasvatvasya avakāśaḥ . papatuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21636: tasthuḥ . tukaḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . apacacchatuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21638: cakruḥ . tukaḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . apacacchṛdatuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21640: yiyakṣati . tukaḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . cicchādayiṣati ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21642: bebhidyate . tukaḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . cecchidyate ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21643: cocchupyate . yaṇadeśāt āt guṇaḥ . yaṇadeśāt āt guṇaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . yaṇadeśasya avakāśaḥ . dadhi atra ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21644: madhu atra . āt guṇasya avakāśaḥ . khaṭvendraḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21645: khaṭvodakam . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . vṛkṣaḥ atra,
GS24pmbhasuu:21646: plakśaḥ atra . irurguṇavṛddhividhayaḥ ca . irurguṇavṛddhividhayaḥ ca yaṇadeśāt bhavanti vipratiṣedhena . iruroḥ avakāśaḥ . āstīrṇam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21648: cakruḥ . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . dūre hi adhvā jaguriḥ . mitrāvaruṇau taturiḥ . kirati ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21650: gauḥ . yaṇadeśasya saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . cayanam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21655: ca bhavanti vipratiṣedhena . bhalopasya avakāśaḥ . gārgyaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21658: madhu atra. iha ubhayam prāpnoti . dākṣī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21661: plākṣāyaṇaḥ . aci bhalopaḥ ekādeśāt bhavati viprtiṣedhena . aci bhalopasya avakāśaḥ . dākṣī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21665: kṣupāgram . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . gāṅgeyaḥ gāṅgaḥ . dhātusvarasya avakāśaḥ . pacati ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21666: paṭhati . ekādeśayaṇādeśayoḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . śryartham ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21667: śrīṣā . prātipadikasvarasya avakāśaḥ . āmraḥ . ekādeśayaṇādeśayoḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . agnyudakam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21669: aupagavaḥ . ekādeśayaṇādeśayoḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . cikīrṣuartham ,
