GS24pmbhasuu:21671: brāhmaṇakambalaḥ . ekādeśayaṇādeśayoḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . rājavaidyartham ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21673: kumārī . ekādeśayaṇādeśayoḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . kumāryartham ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21674: kumārī īhate . allopāllopau ca ārdhadhātuke . allopāllopau ca ārdhadhātuke ekādeśāt bhavataḥ vipratiṣedhena . allopasya avakāśaḥ . cikīrṣitā
GS24pmbhasuu:21681: ca ekādeśayaṇādeśābhyām bhavanti vipratiṣedhena . iyaṅuvaṅoḥ avakāśaḥ . śriyau ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21684: bhruvaḥ . ekādeśayaṇādeśayoḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . cikṣiyiva ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21690: gauḥ . ekādeśayaṇādeśayoḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . sādhucāyī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21695: indūnām . ekādeśayaṇādeśayoḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . vṛkṣāṇām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21697: suṣṭhudāyī . ekādeśayaṇādeśayoḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . dāyakaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21699: jatunī . ekādeśayaṇādeśayoḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . asthīni ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21701: atisakhīni brāhmaṇakulāni . pūrvapadavikārāṇām avakāśaḥ . hotāpotārau . ekādeśayaṇādeśayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21702: saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . neṣṭodgātārau āgnendram . uttarapadavikārāḥ ca iti
GS24pmbhasuu:21704: durīpam . ekādeśayaṇādeśayoḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . prepam , parepam .
GS24pmbhasuu:21705: (P_6,1.93) KA_III.73.16-75.8 Ro_IV.431-433 otaḥ tiṅi pratiṣedhaḥ . otaḥ tiṅi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . acinavam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21706: asunavam . saḥ tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . gograhaṇam kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:21707: . ā gotaḥ iti vaktavyam . gograhaṇe dyoḥ upasaṅkhyanam . gograhaṇe dyoḥ upasaṅkhyanam
GS24pmbhasuu:21708: kartavyam . dyam gaccha . samāsāt ca pratiṣedhaḥ . samāsāt ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21709: . citragum paśya . śabalagum paśya . nanu ca ā otaḥ iti ucyamāne api samāsāt pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21710: vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . hrasvatve kṛte na bhaviṣyati . idam iha sampradhāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:21711: . ātvam kriyatām hrasvatvam iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt ātvam . na vā bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:21712: . na vā vaktavyaḥ . kim kāraṇam . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇam ātvam
GS24pmbhasuu:21713: . antaraṅgam hrasvatvam . asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge . nanu ca ā gotaḥ iti ucyamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:21714: api samāsāt pratiṣedhaḥ na vaktavyaḥ . katham . hrasvatve kṛte na bhaviṣyati . sthānivadbhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:21715: prāpnoti . nanu ca ā otaḥ iti ucyamāne api sthānivadbhāvāt prāpnoti . na iti āha
GS24pmbhasuu:21716: . analvidhau sthānivadbhāvaḥ . ā gotaḥ iti ucyamāne api na doṣaḥ . pratiṣidhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:21717: atra sthānivadbhāvaḥ . goḥ pūrvaṇitvātvasvareṣu sthānivat na bhavati iti . saḥ eva
GS24pmbhasuu:21718: tarhi doṣaḥ . gograhaṇe dyoḥ upasaṅkhyanam iti . sūtram ca bhidyate . yathānyāsam
GS24pmbhasuu:21719: eva astu . nanu ca uktam otaḥ tiṅi pratiṣedhaḥ iti . subadhikārāt siddham . supi
GS24pmbhasuu:21720: iti vartate . kva prakṛtam . vā supi āpiśaleḥ iti . yadi anuvartate iha api vibhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:21721: prāpnoti . subgrahaṇam anuvartate . vāgrahaṇam nivṛttam . katham punaḥ ekayoganirdiṣṭayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21722: ekadeśaḥ anuvartate ekadeśaḥ na . ekayoge ca ekadeśānuvṛttiḥ anyatra api . ekayognirdiṣṭānām
GS24pmbhasuu:21723: api ekadeśānuvṛttiḥ bhavati . anyatra api . na avaśyam iha eva . kva anyatra . alugadhikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21724: prāk ānaṅaḥ . uttarapadāhikāraḥ prāk aṅgādhikāraḥ . evam api ami upasaṅkhyānam vṛddhibalīyastvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:21725: . ami upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . gām paśya . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . vṛddhibalīyastvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:21726: . paratvāt vṛddhiḥ prāpnoti . na vā anavakāśatvāt . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:21727: . anavakāśatvāt . anavakāśam ātvam vṛddhim bādhiṣyate . sāvakāśam ātvam . kaḥ avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21728: . dyām gaccha . dyoḥ ca sarvanāmasthāne vṛddhividhiḥ . dyoḥ ca sarvanāmasthāne vṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21729: vidheyā . kim prayojanam . yat dyāvaḥ indra iti darśanāt . yat dyavaḥ indra te śataṃ
GS24pmbhasuu:21730: śatam bhumīḥ uta syuḥ . yāvatā ca idānīm dyoḥ api sarvanāmasthāne vṛddhiḥ ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:21732: (P_6,1.94) KA_III.75.10-76.5 Ro_IV.434-435 pararūpaprakaraṇe tunvoḥ vi nipāte upasaṅkhyānam . pararūpaprakaraṇe tu , nu,
GS24pmbhasuu:21733: iti etayoḥ vakārādau nipāte upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . tu vai tvai ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21734: nu vai nvai . vakārādau iti kimartham . tvāvat ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21735: nvāvat . nipāte iti kimartham . tu vāni ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21736: nu vāni . na vā nipātaikatvāt . na vā kartavyam . kim kāraṇam . nipātaikatvāt . ekaḥ eva ayam nipātaḥ . tvai ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21737: nvai . eve ca aniyoge . eve ca aniyoge pararūpam vaktavyam . iha eva ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21738: iheva . adyeva . aniyoge iti kimartham . ihaiva bhava ma sma gāḥ . atraiva tvam iha
GS24pmbhasuu:21739: vayam suśevāḥ . śakandhvādiṣu ca . śakandhvādiṣu ca pararūpam vaktavyam . śaka-andhuḥ śakandhuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21742: sīma-antaḥ sīmantaḥ . keśeṣu iti vaktavyam . yaḥ hi sīmnaḥ antaḥ sīmāntaḥ saḥ bhavati . otvoṣṭhayoḥ samāse vā . otvoṣṭhayoḥ samāse vā pararūpam vaktavyam . sthūlautuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21744: bimboṣṭhī . emanādiṣu chandasi . emanādiṣu chandasi pararūpam vaktavyam . apam tveman sādayāmi apam todayan sādayāmi iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:21745: (P_6,1.95) KA_III.76.8-14 Ro_IV.435 kimarthaḥ cakāraḥ . eṅi iti anukṛṣyate . kim prayojanam . iha mā bhūt . adya ā ṛśyāt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21747: kadārśyāt . na etat asti prayojanam . adyarśyāt iti eva bhavitavyam . evam hi saunāgāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21748: paṭhanti . caḥ anarthakaḥ anadhikārāt eṅaḥ . usyomāṅkṣu āṭaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . usi pararūpe
GS24pmbhasuu:21749: omāṅoḥ ca āṭaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . ausrīyat ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21751: auṅkārīyat . saḥ tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . uktam ātaḥ ca iti atra cakārasya prayojanam . vṛddhiḥ eva yathā syāt . yat anyat prāpnoti tat mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:21752: (P_6,1.96) KA_III.76.16-21 Ro_IV.436 apadāntāt iti kimartham . kā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21754: kosrā . apadāntāt iti śakyam akartum . kasmāt na bhavati kā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21756: kosrā . arthavadgrahaṇe na anarthakasya iti . na eṣā paribhāṣā iha śakyā vijñātum . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt . bhindyā-us ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21759: chindyuḥ . evam tarhi lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya eva iti evam na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:21760: . uttarārtham tarhi apadāntagrahaṇam kartavyam . ataḥ guṇe apadāntāt yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:21763: (P_6,1.98) KA_III.77.2-3 Ro_IV.436 itau anekājgrahaṇam śradartham . itau anekājgrahaṇam kartavyam . kim prayojanam . śradartham . śrat iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:21764: (P_6,1.99) KA_III.77.5-9 Ro_IV.437 nityam āmreḍite ḍāci . nityam āmreḍite ḍāci pararūpam
GS24pmbhasuu:21765: kartavyam . paṭapaṭāyati . akārantāt anukaraṇāt vā . atha vā akārāntam etad udāharaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:21766: . bhavet siddham yadā akārāntam . yadā tu khalu acchabdāntam tadā na sidhyati . vicitrāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21768: (P_6,1.101) KA_III.77.11-4 Ro_IV.437 savarṇadīrghatve ṛti ṛvāvacanam . savarṇadīrghatve ṛti ṛ vā bhavati iti vaktavyam . hotṛ ṛkāraḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21769: hotṝkāraḥ . lṛti lṛvāvacanam . lṛti ḷ vā bhavati iti vaktavyam . hotṛ ḷkāraḥ , hotĀḷkāraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:21770: (P_6,1.102.1) KA_III.78.2-19 Ro_IV.438-441 prathamyoḥ iti ucyate . kayoḥ iha prathamyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21771: grahaṇam . kim vibhaktyoḥ āhosvit pratyayayoḥ . vibhaktyoḥ iti āha . katham jñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:21772: . aci iti vartate na ca ajādau prathamau pratyayau staḥ . nanu ca evam vijñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:21773: . ajādī yau prathamau ajādīnām vā yau prathamau iti . yat tarhi tasmāt śasaḥ naḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21774: puṃsi iti anukrāntam pūrvasavarṇam pratinirdiśati tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ vibhaktyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21775: grahaṇam iti . atha vā supi iti vartate . atham kimartham pūrvasavarṇadīrghaḥ ami
GS24pmbhasuu:21776: pūrvatvam ca ucyate na prathamyoḥ pūrvasavarṇaḥ iti eva siddham . na sidhyati . prathamyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21777: pūrvasavarṇaḥ iti ucyamāne ami api dīrghaḥ prāpnoti . vṛkṣam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21778: plakṣam . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yat pūrvasmin yoge dīrghagrahaṇam tat uttaratra nivṛttam
GS24pmbhasuu:21779: . evam api idam iha pūrvasavarṇagrahaṇam kriyate . tena ami api pūrvasavarṇaḥ prasajyeta . vṛkṣam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21780: plakṣam . dvimātraḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . savarṇagrahaṇam na kariṣyate . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:21781: savarṇagrahaṇam na kriyate kutaḥ vyavasthā . āntaryataḥ . yadi evam agnī vāyū trimātraḥ prāpnoti vṛkṣam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21782: plakṣam dvimātraḥ . tasmāt savarṇagrahaṇam kartavyam . tasmin ca kriyamāṇe dīrghagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:21783: anuvartate . tasmin anuvartamāne ami pūrvaḥ iti api vaktavyam . atha kimartham pṛthak
GS24pmbhasuu:21784: ucyate na iha eka eva ucyeta . prathamayoḥ pūrvasavarṇaḥ ami ca iti . yadi prathamayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21785: pūrvasavarṇadīrghaḥ ami ca iti ucyate tana ami api dīrghaḥ prasajyeta . vṛkṣam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21786: plakṣam . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . dīrghagrahaṇam nivartayiṣyate . evam api pūrvasavarṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21787: prasajyeta . savarṇagrahaṇam na kariṣyate . yadi savarṇagrahaṇam na kriyate pūrvasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:21788: yoge vipratiṣiddham . yadi pūrvaḥ na dīrghaḥ atha dīrghaḥ na pūrvaḥ . pūrvaḥ dīrghaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21789: ca iti vipratiṣiddham . tasmāt ubhayam ārabdhavyam pṛthak ca kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:21790: (P_6,1.102.2) KA_III.78.20-80.21 Ro_IV.441-446 prathamayoḥ iti yogavibhāgaḥ savarṇadīrghārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21791: . prathamayoḥ iti yogavibhāgaḥ kartavyaḥ . prathamayoḥ ekaḥ savarṇadīrghaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:21792: . tataḥ pūrvasavarṇaḥ . pūrvasavarṇadīrghaḥ bhavati ekaḥ prathamayoḥ iti . kimarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21793: yogavibhāgaḥ . savarṇadīrghatvam yathā syāt . ekayoge hi jaśśahoḥ pararūpaprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21794: . ekayoge hi sati jaśśahoḥ pararūpam prasajyeta . vṛkṣāḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21797: plakṣān . nanu ca pūrvasavarṇadīrghatvam pararūpam bādhiṣyate . na utsahate bādhitum
GS24pmbhasuu:21798: . kim kāraṇam . ādguṇayaṇādeśayoḥ apavādāḥ vṛddhisavarṇadīrghapūrvasavarṇādeśāḥ teṣām
GS24pmbhasuu:21799: pararūpam svarasandhiṣu . ādguṇayaṇādeśau utsargau . tayoḥ apavādāḥ vṛddhisavarṇadīrghapūrvasavarṇādeśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21800: teṣām sarveṣām pararūpam apavādaḥ . tat sarvabādhakam . sarvabādhakatvāt prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:21801: . atha kriyamāṇe api yogavibhāge yāvatā pararūpam apavādaḥ kasmāt eva na bādhate
GS24pmbhasuu:21803: . yogavibhāgaḥ anyaśāstranivṛttiyarthaḥ cet ami atiprasaṅgaḥ . yogavibhāgaḥ anyaśāstranivṛttiyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21805: plakṣam . yathā eva hi yogavibhāgaḥ pararūpam bādhate evam ami pūrvatvam api bādheta . nakārābhāvaḥ ca tasmāt iti anantaranirdeśāt . natvasya ca abhāvaḥ . vṛkṣān ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21806: plakṣān . kim kāraṇam . ca tasmāt iti anantaranirdeśāt . tasmāt iti anena anantaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21807: yogaḥ pratinirdiśyate . kim punaḥ kāraṇam tasmāt iti anena anantaraḥ yogaḥ pratinirdiśyate
GS24pmbhasuu:21808: . iha mā bhūt . etān gāḥ paśya [R:
GS24pmbhasuu:21809: etān gāḥ caturaḥ balivardān paśya] iti . astu tarhi ekayogaḥ eva . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:21810: ekayoge hi jaśśahoḥ pararūpaprasaṅgaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ijgrahaṇam tu jñāpakam
GS24pmbhasuu:21811: pararūpābhāvasya . yat ayam na āt ici iti ijgrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21812: na jaśśasoḥ pararūpam bhavati iti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . ijgrahaṇasya idam prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:21816: plakṣān . yadi ca jaśśasoḥ pararūpam syāt ijgrahaṇam anarthakam syāt . paśyati tu
GS24pmbhasuu:21817: ācāryaḥ na jaśśasoḥ pararūpam bhavati iti . tataḥ ijgrahaṇam karoti . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:21818: jñāpakam . uttarārtham etat syāt . dīrghāt jasi ca ici ca iti . yadi uttarārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:21819: etat syāt atra eva ayam ijdgrahaṇam kurvīta . iha api tarhi kriyamāṇam yadi uttarārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:21820: na jñāpakam bhavati . evam tarhi yadi uttarārtham etat syāt na eva ayam ijdgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:21821: kurvīta na api jasgrahaṇam . etāvat ayam brūyāt . dīrghāt śasi pūrvasavarṇaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:21822: iti . tat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . dīrghāt śasi eva na anyatra iti . saḥ ayam evam
GS24pmbhasuu:21823: laghīyasā nyāsena siddhe yat ijgrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na jaśśasoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21824: pararūpam bhavati iti . atha vā punaḥ astu yogavibhāgaḥ . nanu ca uktam yogavibhāgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21825: anyaśāstranivṛttiyarthaḥ cet ami atiprasaṅgaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ami api yogavibhāgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21826: kariṣyate . ami . ami yat uktam tat na bhavati iti . tataḥ pūrvaḥ . pūrvaḥ ca bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:21827: ami iti . yat api ucyate nakārābhāvaḥ ca tasmāt iti anantaranirdeśāt iti . kaḥ punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21828: arhati tasmāt iti anena anantaram yogam pratinirdeṣṭum . evam kila pratinirdiśyate
GS24pmbhasuu:21829: . tasmāt pūrvasavarṇadīrghāt iti . tat ca na . evam pratinirdiśyate . tasmāt akaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21830: savarṇāt iti . atha vā tasmāt prathamyoḥ dīrghāt iti . atha vā punaḥ astu ami ekayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21831: . nanu ca uktam yogavibhāgaḥ anyaśāstranivṛttiyarthaḥ cet ami atiprasaṅgaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:21832: na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . madhye apavādāḥ pūrvān vidhīn bādhante iti evam ayam yogavibhāgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21833: pararūpam bādhiṣyate ami pūrvatvam na bādhiṣyate . yadi etat asti madhye apavādāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21834: purastāt apavādāḥ iti na arthaḥ ekena api yogavibhāgena . purastāt apavādāḥ anantarān
GS24pmbhasuu:21835: vidhīn bādhante iti evam pararūpam savarṇadīrghatvam bādhiṣyate prathamayoḥ pūrvasavarṇadīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:21836: na bādhiṣyate . atha vā saptame yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . idam asti ataḥ dīrghaḥ yañi
GS24pmbhasuu:21837: supi ca iti . tataḥ vakṣyāmi bahuvacane . bahuvacane ca ataḥ dīrghaḥ bhavati . ekāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21838: ca bhavati bahuvacane jhali iti . iha api tarhi prāpnoti . vṛṣāṇām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21839: plakṣāṇām . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . dīrghatve kṛte hrasvāśrayaḥ nuṭ na prāpnoti . idam iha sampradhāryam . dīrghatvam kriyatām nuṭ iti kim
GS24pmbhasuu:21840: atra kartavyam . paratvāt dīrghatvam . nityam khalu api dīrghatvam . kṛte api nuṭi
GS24pmbhasuu:21841: prāpnoti akṛte api . nityatvāt paratvāt ca dīrghatve kṛte hrasvāśrayaḥ nuṭ na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:21842: . evam tarhi ādgrahaṇam iha api prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . āt jaseḥ asuk
GS24pmbhasuu:21843: iti . tena kṛte api dīrghatve nuṭ bhaviṣyati . iha api tarhi prāpnoti . kīlālapām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21844: śubhaṃyām . ātaḥ lopaḥ atra bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . idam iha sampradhāryam . lopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21845: kriyatām nuṭ iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt nuṭ . evam tarhi hrasvanadyāpaḥ nuṭ
GS24pmbhasuu:21846: iti atra ātaḥ dhātoḥ iti ātaḥ lopaḥ sambandham anuvartiṣyate . iha api tarhi prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:21847: . kīlālapānām brāhmaṇakulānām . napuṃsakasya na iti anuvartiṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:21848: (P_6,1.103) KA_III.80.23-81.19 Ro_IV.446-448 kim idam natvam puṃsām bahutve bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:21849: āhosvit puṃśabdāt bahuṣu . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . natvam puṃsām bahutve cet puṃśabdāt
GS24pmbhasuu:21850: iṣyate striyām . tat na sidhyati . bhrūkuṃsān paśya iti . napuṃsake tathā eva iṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:21851: . tat na sidhyati . ṣaṇḍhān paśya . paṇḍakān paśya iti . strīśabdāt ca prasajyate
GS24pmbhasuu:21855: kharakuṭīḥ paśya . astu tarhi puṃśabdāt bahuṣu . puṃśabāt iti cet iṣṭam sthūrāpatyam
GS24pmbhasuu:21856: na sidhyati . sthūrān paśya iti . kuṇḍinyāḥ ararakāyāḥ . apatyam ca na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:21857: kuṇḍinān paśya . ararakān paśya . puṃsprādhānyāt prasidhyati . puṃspradhānā ete śabdāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21858: . tataḥ natvam bhaviṣyati . puṃsprādhānye te eva syuḥ ye doṣāḥ pūrvacoditāḥ . bhrūkuṃsān
GS24pmbhasuu:21859: paśya . ṣaṇḍhān paśya . paṇḍakān paśya . cañcāḥ paśya . vadhrikāḥ paśya . kharakuṭīḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21860: paśya iti . tasmāt yasmin pakṣe alpīyāṃsaḥ doṣāḥ tam āsthāya pratividheyam doṣeṣu .
GS24pmbhasuu:21861: (P_6,1.107) KA_III.81.21-22 Ro_IV.448 vā chandasi iti eva . yamīm ca yamyam ca . śamīm ca śamyam ca . garuīm ca gauryam ca . kiśorīm ca kiśoryam ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:21862: (P_6,1.108.1) KA_III.82.2 Ro_IV.448 vā chandasi iti eva . mitrāvaruṇau yajyamānaḥ . mitrāvaruṇau ijyamānaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:21865: kim prayojanam . asamānāṅgapratiṣedhārtham . asamānāṅgasya mā bhūt iti . śakahvartham ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21866: parivyartham . siddham asamprasāraṇāt . siddham etat . katham . asamprasāraṇāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:21867: vākyasya samprasāraṇasañjñā na varṇasya . atha varṇasya samprasāraṇasañjñāyām doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21868: eva . varṇasya ca samprasāraṇasañjñāyām na doṣaḥ . katham . anyaḥ ayam samprasāraṇāsamprasāraṇayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21869: sthāne ekaḥ ādiśyate . kāryakṛtatvāt vā . atha vā sakṛt kṛtam pūrvatvam iti kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:21870: punaḥ na bhaviṣyati . tat yathā vasante brāhmaṇaḥ agnīn ādadhīta iti sakṛt ādhāya
GS24pmbhasuu:21871: kṛtaḥ śāstrārthaḥ iti kṛtvā punaḥ pravṛttiḥ na bhavati . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . yuktam
GS24pmbhasuu:21872: yat tasya punaḥ pravṛttiḥ na bhavati . yaḥ tu tadāśrayam prāpnoti na tat śakyam bādhitum
GS24pmbhasuu:21873: . tat yathā vasante brāhmaṇaḥ agniṣṭomādibhiḥ kratubhiḥ yajeta iti agnyādhānanimittam
GS24pmbhasuu:21874: vasante vasante ijyate . tasmāt pūrvoktaḥ eva parihāraḥ siddham asamprasāraṇāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:21875: . yadi tarhi na idam samprasāraṇam hūtaḥ iti dīrghatvam na prāpnoti . dīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:21876: vacanaprāmāṇyāt . anavakāśam dīrghatvam . tat vacanaprāmāṇyāt bhaviṣyati . antavattvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:21877: vā . atha vā pūrvasya kāryam prati antavat bhavati iti dīrghatvam bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:21878: (P_6,1.108.2) KA_III.82.21-84.23 Ro_IV.450-455 āṭaḥ vṛddheḥ iyaṅ . āṭaḥ vṛddhiḥ bhavati iti etasmāt iyaṅ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . āṭaḥ vṛddhiḥ bhavati iti asya avakāśaḥ aikṣiṣṭa ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21881: adhyaiyātām adhyaiyata . iyaṅādeśaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . na eṣaḥ yuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21882: . antaraṅgā āṭaḥ vṛddhiḥ . kā antaraṅgatā . varṇau āśritya āṭaḥ vṛddhiḥ . aṅgasya
GS24pmbhasuu:21883: iyaṅ ādeśaḥ . evam tarhi idam iha sampradhāryam . āṭ kriyatām iyaṅādeśaḥ iti kim
GS24pmbhasuu:21884: atra kartavyam . paratvāt iyaṅ . nityaḥ āṭ āgamaḥ . kṛte api iyaṅi prāpnoti akṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:21885: api . iyaṅ api nityaḥ . kṛte api āṭi prāpnoti akṛte api . anityaḥ iyaṅ . na hi kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:21886: āti prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . antaraṅgā āṭaḥ vṛddhiḥ . yasya ca lakṣaṇāntareṇa nimittam
GS24pmbhasuu:21887: vihanyate na tat anityam . na ca atra āt eva iyaṅaḥ nimittam vihanti . avaśyam lakṣaṇāntaram
GS24pmbhasuu:21888: āṭaḥ vṛddhiḥ pratīkṣyā . ubhayoḥ nityayoḥ paratvāt iyaṅ ādeśaḥ . āt guṇāt savarṇadīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:21889: āṅabhyāsayoḥ . āt guṇāt savarṇadīrghatvam bhavati vipratiṣedhena . kva . āṅabhyāsayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21893: kṣupāgram . iha ubhayam prāpnoti : adya , ā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21900: upatuḥ : upopatuḥ . savarṇadīrghatvam bhavati vipratiṣedhena . abhyāsārthena tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:21901: na arthaḥ . astu atra āt guṇaḥ ayavau ca halādiśeṣaḥ . punaḥ āt guṇaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:21903: upejatuḥ iti . idam tu na sidhyati : upopatuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21904: upopuḥ iti . atra hi āt guṇe kṛte odantaḥ nipātaḥ iti pragṛhyasañjñā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21905: pragṛhyaḥ prakṛtyā iti pragṛhyāśrayaḥ prakṛtibhāvaḥ prāpnoti . padāntaprakaraṇe prkṛtibhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21906: na ca eṣaḥ padāntaḥ . padāntabhaktaḥ padāntagrahaṇena grāhīṣyate . evam tarhi etat
GS24pmbhasuu:21907: eva atra na asti odantaḥ nipātaḥ iti . kim kāraṇam . lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya
GS24pmbhasuu:21908: eva iti . iha api tarhi adyoḍhā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21909: kadoḍhā iti bhavet rūpam siddham syāt . svare doṣaḥ tu . svare tu doṣaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:21910: adyoḍhā* evam svaraḥ prasajyeta. adyoḍhā* iti ca iṣyate . āṅi pararūpavacanam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:21911: idānīm anarthakam syāt . na anarthakam . jñāpakārtham . kim jñāpyam . āṅi pararūpavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:21912: tu jñāpakam antaraṅgabalīyastvāt . etat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ . antaraṅgam balīyaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:21913: iti . kim punaḥ iha antaraṅgam kim bahiraṅgam yāvatā dve pade āśritya savarṇadīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:21914: bhavati āt guṇaḥ api . dhātūpasargayoḥ yat kāryam tat antaraṅgam . kutaḥ etat . pūrvam
GS24pmbhasuu:21915: upasargasya dhātuna yogaḥ bhavati na adya śabdena . kimartham tarhi adyaśabdaḥ prayujyate
GS24pmbhasuu:21916: . adyaśabdaysa api samudāyena yogaḥ bhavati . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:21919: vāyū atra . pūrvasavarṇaḥ ca prāpnoti bahiraṅgalakṣaṇaḥ ca varṇavikāraḥ āvādeśaḥ . pūrvasavarṇadīrghatvam bhavati antaraṅgataḥ . pūrvatva . śakahvartham ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21920: parivyartham . pūrvatvam ca prāpnoti bahiraṅgalakṣaṇaḥ ca varṇavikāraḥ savarṇadīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:21921: . pūrvatvam bhavati antaraṅgataḥ . tahilopa . akāri atra . ahāri atra . paca idam
GS24pmbhasuu:21922: . tahilopau ca prāpnutaḥ bahiraṅgalakṣaṇaḥ ca varṇavikāraḥ savarṇadīrghatvam . tahilopau
GS24pmbhasuu:21924: plakṣeṇa atra . inādeśaḥ ca prāpnoti bahiraṅgalakṣaṇaḥ ca varṇavikāraḥ savarṇadīrghatvam . inādeśaḥ bhavati antaraṅgataḥ . ṅerya . vṛkṣāya atra
GS24pmbhasuu:21925: plakṣāya atra . ṅeḥ yādeśaḥ ca prāpnoti bahiraṅgalakṣaṇaḥ ca varṇavikāraḥ eṅaḥ padāntāt ati iti pararūpatvam . ṅeḥ yādeśaḥ bhavati antaraṅgataḥ . ṅismin . yasmin idam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21927: bahiraṅgalakṣaṇaḥ ca varṇavikāraḥ savarṇadīrghatvam . sminbhāvaḥ bhavati antaraṅgataḥ . ṅiṇalautvam . agnau idam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21928: yayau atra . ṅiṇalautvam prāpnoti bahiraṅgalakṣaṇaḥ ca varṇavikāraḥ savarṇadīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:21929: . autvam bhavati antaraṅgataḥ . na etāni santi prayojanāni . vipratiṣedhena api etāni
GS24pmbhasuu:21930: siddhāni . idam tarhi prayojanam . vṛkṣāḥ atra . plakṣāḥ atra . pūrvasavarṇaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:21931: prāpnoti bahiraṅgalakṣaṇaḥ ca varṇavikāraḥ roḥ aplutāt aplute iti uttvam . pūrvasavarṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21932: bhavati antaraṅgataḥ . na ca avaśyam idam eva prayojanam . ādye yoge bahūni prayojanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:21933: santi yadartham eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā . pratividheyam doṣeṣu .
GS24pmbhasuu:21934: (P_6,1.112) KA_III.84.25-85.3 Ro_IV.455-456 kim idam khyatyāt iti . sakhipatyoḥ vikṛtagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:21935: . kim punaḥ kāraṇam sakhipatyoḥ vikṛtagrahaṇam kriyate na sakhipatibhyām iti eva
GS24pmbhasuu:21936: ucyeta . na evam śakyam . garīyān ca eva hi nirdeśaḥ syāt iha ca prasajyeta . atisakheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21937: āgacchāmi . atisakheḥ svam . iha ca na syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:21940: (P_6,1.113) KA_III.85.5-24 Ro_IV.457-459 kimartham aplutāt aplute iti ucyate . plutāt
GS24pmbhasuu:21941: parasya plute vā parataḥ mā bhūt iti . plutāt parasya susrotā3 atra nu asi . plute
GS24pmbhasuu:21942: parataḥ tiṣṭhatu payaḥ ā3gnidatta . ataḥ ati iti ucyate . kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ plutāt parasya
GS24pmbhasuu:21943: plute vā parataḥ . asiddhaḥ plutaḥ . tasya asiddhatvāt prāpnoti . atha aplutāt aplute
GS24pmbhasuu:21944: iti ucyamāne yāvatā asiddhaḥ plutaḥ kasmāt eva atra na prāpnoti . aplutabhāvinaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21945: aplutabhāvini iti evam etat vijñāyate . na etat asti prayojanam . siddhaḥ plutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21946: svarasandhiṣu . katham jñāyate . yat ayam plutaḥ prakṛtyā iti plutasya prakṛtibhāvam
GS24pmbhasuu:21947: śāsti . sataḥ hi kāryiṇaḥ kāryeṇa bhavitavyam . aplutādaplutavacane akārahaśoḥ samānapade
GS24pmbhasuu:21948: pratiṣedhaḥ . aplutādaplutavacane akārahaśoḥ samānapade pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . payo3ṭ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:21949: payo3da . na vā bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . na vā vaktavyaḥ . kim kāraṇam . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:21950: . bahiraṅgaḥ pluraḥ . antaraṅgam uttvam . asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge . iha api
GS24pmbhasuu:21951: tarhi prāpnoti . susrotā3 atra nu asi . antaraṅgaḥ atra plutaḥ bahiraṅgam uttvam
GS24pmbhasuu:21952: . kva punaḥ iha antaraṅgaḥ plutaḥ kva vā bahiraṅgam uttvam uttvam vā antaraṅgam plutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21953: vā bahiraṅgaḥ . vākyāntasya vākyādau antaraṅgaḥ plutaḥ bahiraṅgam uttvam . samānavākye
GS24pmbhasuu:21954: padāntasya padādau uttvam antaraṅgam bahiraṅgaḥ plutaḥ . kim punaḥ kāraṇam bahiraṅgatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:21955: uttve hetuḥ vyapadiśyate na punaḥ asiddhatvam api . yathā eva hi ayam bahiraṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21956: evam asiddhaḥ api . evam manyate . asiddhaḥ plutaḥ āśrayāt siddhaḥ bhavati . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:21957: vā yasyām na aprāptāyām paribhāṣāyām uttvam ārabhyate sā āśrayāt siddhā syāt . kasyām
GS24pmbhasuu:21958: ca na aprāptāyām . asiddhaparibhāṣāyām . bahiraṅgaparibhāṣāyām punaḥ prāptāyām aprāptāyām ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:21959: (P_6,1.115) KA_III.86.2-20 Ro_IV.459-461 kasya ayam pratiṣedhaḥ . nāntaḥpādam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:21960: sarvapratiṣedhaḥ . nāntaḥpādam iti sarvasya ayam pratiṣedhaḥ . katham . aci iti vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:21961: . aci yat prāpnoti tasya pratiṣedhaḥ . nāntaḥpādam iti sarvapratiṣedhaḥ cet atiprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21962: . nāntaḥpādam iti sarvapratiṣedhaḥ cet atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . iha api prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:21964: prati agniḥ uṣasām agram akhyat . evam tarhi ati iti vartate . akārāśrayam yat prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:21965: tasya pratiṣedhaḥ . akārāśrayam iti cet uttvavacanam . akārāśrayam iti cet uttvam
GS24pmbhasuu:21966: vaktavyam . kālaḥ aśvaḥ . śatadhāraḥ ayam maṇiḥ . ayavoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ ca . ayavoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21967: ca pratiṣedhaḥ ca vaktavyaḥ . sujāte aśvasūnṛte . adhvaro adribhiḥ sutam . śukram
GS24pmbhasuu:21968: te anyat . eṅprakaraṇāt siddham . eṅaḥ ati iti vartate . eṅaḥ ati yat prāpnoti tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:21969: pratiṣedhaḥ . eṅprakaraṇāt siddham cet uttvapratiṣedhaḥ . eṅprakaraṇāt siddham cet
GS24pmbhasuu:21971: vāyoḥ atra. ataḥ roḥ aplutāt aplute eṅaḥ ca iti uttvam prāpnoti . punaḥ eṅgrahaṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:21972: siddham . punaḥ eṅgrahaṇam kartavyam . tat tarhi kartavyam . na kartavyam . prakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:21973: anuvartate . nanu ca uktam eṅprakaraṇāt siddham cet uttvapratiṣedhaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21974: doṣaḥ . padāntābhisambaddham eṅgrahaṇam anuvartate na ca eṅaḥ padāntāt paraḥ ruḥ asti .
GS24pmbhasuu:21975: (P_6,1.123) KA_III.86.22-87.18 Ro_IV.461-463 goḥ agvacanam gavāgre svarasiddhyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:21976: . goḥ ak vaktavyaḥ . kim prayojanam . gavāgre svarasiddhyartham . gavāgre svarasiddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21977: yathā syāt . gavāgram . avaṅādeśe hi svare doṣaḥ . avaṅādeśe hi svare doṣaḥ syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:21978: . antodāttasya āntaryataḥ antodāttaḥ ādeśaḥ prasjyate . katham punaḥ ayam antodāttaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21979: yadā ekāc . vyapadeśivadbhāvena . yathā eva tarhi vyapadeśivadbhāvena antodāttaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21980: evam ādyudāttaḥ api . tatra āntaryataḥ ādyudāttasya ādyudāttaḥ ādeśaḥ bhavati . satyam
GS24pmbhasuu:21981: evam etat . na tu idam lakṣaṇam asti . prātipadikasya ādiḥ udāttaḥ bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:21982: idam punaḥ asti . prātipadikasya antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati iti . saḥ asau lakṣaṇena antodāttaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21983: . tatra āntaryataḥ antodāttasya antodāttaḥ ādeśaḥ prasjyeta . yadi punaḥ gameḥ ḍo
GS24pmbhasuu:21984: vidhīyeta . kim kṛtam bhavati . pratyayādyudāttatve kṛte āntaryataḥ ādyudāttasya
GS24pmbhasuu:21985: ādyudāttaḥ ādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . katham punaḥ ayam ādyudāttaḥ yadā ekāc . vyapadeśivadbhāvena
GS24pmbhasuu:21986: . yathā eva tarhi vyapadeśivadbhāvena ādyudāttaḥ evam antodāttaḥ api . tatra āntaryataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21987: antodāttasya antodāttaḥ ādeśaḥ prasjyeta . satyam evam etat . na tu idam lakṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:21988: asti . pratyayasya antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati iti . idam punaḥ asti . pratyayasya ādiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21989: udāttaḥ bhavati iti . saḥ asau lakṣaṇena ādyudāttaḥ . tatra āntaryataḥ ādyudāttasya
GS24pmbhasuu:21990: ādyudāttaḥ ādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati .etat api ādeśe na asti . ādeśasya ādiḥ udāttaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:21991: iti . prakṛtitaḥ anena svaraḥ labhyaḥ . prakṛtiḥ ca asya yathā eva ādyudāttā evam
GS24pmbhasuu:21992: antodāttā api . evam tarhi ādyudāttanipātanam kariṣyate . saḥ nipātanasvaraḥ prakṛtisvarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:21993: bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . evam api upadeśivadbhāvaḥ vaktayaḥ . yathā eva nipātanasvaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:21994: prakṛtsvarasya bādhakaḥ evam samāsasvarasya api . gavāsthi , gavākṣi .
GS24pmbhasuu:21995: (P_6,1.124) KA_III.87.20-22 Ro_IV.463 indrādau iti vaktavyam iha api yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:21996: gavendrayajñe vīhi iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . na evam vijñāyate indre
GS24pmbhasuu:21997: aci iti . katham tarhi . aci bhavati . katarasmin . indre aci iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:21999: mā bhūt iti . ma etat asti prayojanam . pūrvasmin eva yoge vibhāṣāgrahaṇam nivṛttam
GS24pmbhasuu:22000: . idam tarhi prayojanam . plutapragṛhyāṇam aci prakṛtibhāvaḥ eva yathā syāt . yat
GS24pmbhasuu:22001: anyat prāpnoti tat mā bhūt iti . kim ca anyat prāpnoti . śākalam . sinnityasamāsayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22002: śākalapratiṣedham vakṣyati . saḥ na vaktavyaḥ bhavati . atha ajgrahaṇam kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:22003: . aci prakṛtibhāvaḥ yathā syāt . plutapragṛhyeṣu ajgrahaṇam anarthakam adhikārāt
GS24pmbhasuu:22004: siddham . plutapragṛhyeṣu ajgrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . adhikārāt eva siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:22005: . aci iti prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . ikaḥ yaṇ aci iti . tat tu tasmin prakṛtibhāvārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:22006: . tat tu dvitīyam ajgrahaṇam kartavyam prakṛtibhāvārtham . tasmin aci pūrvasya prakṛtibhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22007: yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt . jānu u asya rujati . jānū asya rujati . jānv asya rujati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:22008: (P_6,1.125.2) KA_III.87.12-23 Ro_IV.465-466 atha kimartham plutasya prakṛtibhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22009: ucyate . svarasandhiḥ mā bhūt iti . ucyamāne api etasmin svarsandhiḥ prāpnoti . plute
GS24pmbhasuu:22010: kṛte na bhaviṣyati . asiddhaḥ plutaḥ . tasya asiddhatvāt prāpnoti . plutaprakṛtibhāvavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:22011: tu jñāpakam ekādeśāt plutaḥ vipratiṣedhena iti . yat ayam plutaḥ prakṛtyā iti prakṛtibhāvam
GS24pmbhasuu:22012: śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ ekādeśāt plutaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena iti . ekādeśāt
GS24pmbhasuu:22013: plutaḥ vipratiṣedhena iti cet śālendre atiprasaṅgaḥ . ekādeśāt plutaḥ vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:22014: iti cet śālendre atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . śālāyām indraḥ śālendraḥ . na vā bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:22015: . na vā atiprasaṅgaḥ . kim kāraṇam . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . bahiraṅgaḥ plutaḥ . antaraṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22017: (P_6,1.126) KA_III.89.2-5 Ro_IV.466 āṅaḥ anarthakasya . āṅaḥ anarthakasya iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:22018: . iha mā bhūt . indraḥ bāhubhyām ātarat . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . bahulagrahaṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:22019: na bhaviṣyati . āṅaḥ anunāsikaḥ chandasi bahulam .
GS24pmbhasuu:22020: (P_6,1.127.1) KA_III.89.7-19 Ro_IV.467-468 kimarthaḥ cakāraḥ . prakṛtyā iti etat
GS24pmbhasuu:22021: anukṛṣyate . kim prayojanam . svarasandhiḥ mā bhūt iti . na etat asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:22022: . hrasvavacanasārmarthyāt na bhaviṣyati . bhavet dīrghāṇām hrasvavacanasārmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:22023: svarasandhiḥ na syāt . hrasvānām tu khalu svarasandhiḥ prāpnoti . hrasvānām api hrasvavacanasāmarthyān
GS24pmbhasuu:22024: svarasandhiḥ na bhaviṣyati . na hrasvānām hrasvāḥ prāpnuvanti . na hi bhuktavān punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22025: bhuṅkte . na ca kṛtaśmaśruḥ punaḥ śmaśrūni kārayati . nanu ca punaḥpravṛttiḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:22026: dṛṣṭā . bhuktavān ca punaḥ bhuṅkte kṛtaśmaśruḥ ca punaḥ śmaśrūni kārayati . sāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:22027: tatra punaḥpravṛttiḥ bhavati bhojanaviśeṣāt śilpiviśeṣāt vā . hrasvāṇām punaḥ hrasvavacane
GS24pmbhasuu:22028: na kim cit prayojanam asti . akṛtakāri khalu api śāstram agnivat . tat yathā agniḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22029: yad adagdham tat dahati . hrasvāṇām api hrasvavacane etat prayojanam svarasandhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22030: mā bhūt iti . kṛtakāri khalu api śāstram parjanyavat . tat yathā parjanyaḥ yāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:22031: ūnam pūrṇam ca sarvam abhivarṣayati . idam tarhi prayojanam . plutapragṛhyāḥ anukṛṣyante
GS24pmbhasuu:22032: . ikaḥ asavarṇe śākalyasya hrasvaḥ ca plutaprgṛhyāḥ ca prakṛtyā . nityagrahaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:22033: api etat prayojanam uktam . anyatarat śakyam akartum .
GS24pmbhasuu:22035: śākalapratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . ayam te yoniḥ ṛtviyaḥ . prajām vindāma ṛtviyām . vaiyākaraṇaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22036: sauvaśvaḥ . nityagrahaṇena na arthaḥ . sitsamāsayoḥ śākalam na bhavati iti eva . idam api siddham bhavati . vāpyām āsvaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22039: nadyātiḥ . īṣā akṣādiṣu chandasi prakṛtibhāvamātram . īṣā akṣādiṣu chandasi prakṛtibhāvamātram draṣṭavyam . īṣa akṣaḥ . ka īm are piśaṅgila . yathā aṅgadaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:22040: (P_6,1.128.1) KA_III.90.5-9 Ro_IV.469 kimartham idam ucyate . ṛti akaḥ savarṇārtham . savarṇārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . hotṛ ṛśyaḥ . anigantārtham ca . khaṭva ṛśyaḥ , māla ṛśyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:22041: (P_6,1.128.2) KA_III.90.10-16 Ro_IV.469 ṛti hrasvāt upasargāt vṛddhiḥ vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:22042: . ṛti hrasvaḥ bhavati iti etasmāt upasargāt vṛddhiḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . ṛti
GS24pmbhasuu:22043: hrasvaḥ bhavati iti etasya avakāśaḥ khaṭva ṛśyaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22044: māla ṛśyaḥ . upasargāt vṛddheḥ avakāśaḥ . vibhāṣā hrasvatvam . yadā na hrasvatvam tadā avakāśaḥ . hrasvaprasaṅge ubhayam prāpnoti . upārdhnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:22045: prārdhnoti . upasargāt vṛddhiḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . saḥ tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22046: . na vaktavyaḥ . uktam tatra dhātugrahaṇasya prayojanam . upasargāt ṛti dhātau vṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22047: eva yathā syāt . anyat yat prāpnoti tat mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:22048: (P_6,1.129) KA_III.90.18-91.8 Ro_IV.469-470 upasthite iti ucyate . kim idam upasthitam
GS24pmbhasuu:22049: nāma . anārṣaḥ itikaraṇaḥ . suślokā3 iti suśloketi . atha vadvacanam kimartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:22051: . plutakāryam pratiṣidhyate . trimātratā na pratiṣidhyate . kim ca idānīm trimātratāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22052: apratiṣedhe prayojanam yāvatā plutakārye pratiṣiddhe svarasandhinā bhavitavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:22053: plutapratiṣedhe hi pragṛhyaplutapratiṣedhaprasaṅgaḥ anyena vihitatvāt . plutapratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:22054: hi sati pragṛhyasya api plutasya trimātratāyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ prasajyeta . agnī3 iti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22055: vāyū3 iti . kim ca idānīm tasyāḥ api trimātratāyāḥ apratiṣedhe prayojanam yāvatā
GS24pmbhasuu:22056: plutakārye pratiṣiddhe svarasandhinā bhavitavyam . na bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:22057: anyena vihitatvāt . anyena hi lakṣaṇena plutapragṛhyasya prakṛtibhāvaḥ ucyate pragṛhyaḥ prakṛtyā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:22058: (P_6,1.130) KA_III.91.10-14 Ro_IV.470 kimartham idam ucyate . ī3 cākravarmaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:22059: iti anupasthitārtham . anupasthitārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . cinu hi3 idam . cinu hīdam
GS24pmbhasuu:22060: . sunu hi3 idam . sunu hīdam . īkāragrahaṇena na arthaḥ . aviśeṣeṇa cākravarmaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:22061: ācāryasya aplutavat bhavati iti eva . idam api siddham bhavati . vaśa3 iyam , vaśeyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:22062: (P_6,1.131) KA_III.91.16-20 Ro_IV.471 kimarthaḥ takāraḥ . taparaḥ tatkālasya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:22063: tatkalaḥ yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . āntaryataḥ ardhamātrikasya vyañjanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:22064: mātrikaḥ bhaviṣyati . na sidhyati . ūṭhi kṛte āntaryataḥ dīrghasya dīrghaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:22065: . tadartham taparaḥ kṛtaḥ . evamarthaḥ taparaḥ kriyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:22066: (P_6,1.135.1) KA_III.91.22-94.2 Ro_IV.471-478 kātpūrvagrahaṇam kimartham . kāt pūrvaḥ yathā syāt . saṃskartā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22067: saṃskartum . na etat asti prayojanam . suṭ iti ādiliṅgaḥ ayam karotiḥ ca kakārādiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22068: . tatra antareṇa kātpūrvagrahaṇam kāt pūrvaḥ eva bhaviṣyati . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati
GS24pmbhasuu:22069: suṭi kātpūrvavacanam akakārādau kātpūrvārtham . suṭi kātpūrvavacanam kriyate akakārādau
GS24pmbhasuu:22071: sañcaskaruḥ . suṭi kātpūrvavacanam akakārādau kātpūrvārtham iti cet antareṇa api
GS24pmbhasuu:22072: tat siddham . suṭi kātpūrvavacanam akakārādau kātpūrvārtham iti cet antareṇa api
GS24pmbhasuu:22073: kātpūrvagrahaṇam siddham . katham . dvirvacanāt suṭ vipratiṣedhena . dvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:22074: kriyatām suṭ iti suṭ bhaviṣyati vipratiṣedhena . tatra dvirvacanam bhavati iti asya
GS24pmbhasuu:22078: sañcaskaruḥ . suṭ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . dvirvacanāt suṭ vipratiṣedhena iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:22079: dvirbhūte śabdāntarabhāvāt punaḥ prasaṅgaḥ . dvirvacanāt suṭ vipratiṣedhena iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:22080: dvirbhūte śabdāntarasya akṛtaḥ suṭ iti punaḥ suṭ syāt . dvirbhūte śabdāntarabhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:22081: punaḥ prasaṅgaḥ iti cet dvirvacanam . suṭi kṛte śabdāntarasya akṛtam dvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:22082: iti punaḥ dvirvacanam prāpnoti . tathā ca anavasthā . punaḥ suṭ punaḥ dvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:22083: iti cakrakam anavasthā prasajyeta . na asti cakrakaprasaṅgaḥ . na hi anavasthākāriṇā
GS24pmbhasuu:22084: śāstreṇa bhavitavyam . śāstrataḥ hi nāma vyavasthāt . tatra suṭi kṛte dvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:22085: . dvirvacanena avasthānam bhaviṣyati . aḍvyavāye upasaṅkhyānam . aḍvyavāye upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:22087: samaskārṣīt . abhyāsavyavāye ca . abhyāsavyavāye ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . sañcaskaratuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22088: sañcaskaruḥ . kim ucyate abhyāsavyavāye iti yadā idānīm eva uktam dvirvacanāt suṭ
GS24pmbhasuu:22089: vipratiṣedhena iti . avipratiṣedhaḥ vā bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . avipratiṣedhaḥ vā punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22090: suṭaḥ . kim kāraṇam . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇaḥ suṭ . antaraṅgam dvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:22091: . asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge . evamartham eva tarhi kātpūrvagrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:22092: kāt pūrvaḥ yathā syāt . kriyamāṇe api vai kātpūrvagrahaṇe atra na sidhyati . na hi
GS24pmbhasuu:22093: ayam kātpūrvagrahaṇena śakyaḥ madhye praveśayitum . kim kāraṇam . ādiliṅgaḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:22094: kriyate karotiḥ ca kakārādiḥ dṛṣṭaḥ ca lpunaḥ ātideśikaḥ karotiḥ akakārādiḥ . pākṣikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22095: ayam doṣaḥ . katarasmin pakṣe . suḍvidhau dvaitam bhavati . aviśeṣeṇa vā vihitasya
GS24pmbhasuu:22096: suṭaḥ kātpūrvagrahaṇam deśaprakḷptyartham syāt viśeṣeṇa vā vidhiḥ iti . dvirvacanavidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:22097: ca api dvaitam bhavati . sthāne dvirvacanam syāt dviḥ prayogaḥ vā dvirvacanam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:22098: . tat yadā dviḥ prayogaḥ dvirvacanam aviśeṣeṇa vihitasya ca suṭaḥ kātpūrvagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:22099: deśaprakḷptyartham tadā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yadā hi sthāne dvirvacanam tadā yadi aviśeṣeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:22100: vihitasya suṭaḥ kātpūrvagrahaṇam deśaprakḷptyartham atha api viśeṣavidhiḥ na tadā
GS24pmbhasuu:22101: doṣaḥ bhavati . dviḥprayoge ca api dvirvacane na doṣaḥ . samparibhyām iti na eṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:22102: pañcamī . kā tarhi . tṛtīyā . samparibhyām upasṛṣṭasya iti . vyavahitaḥ ca api upasṛṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22103: bhavati . upadeśivadvacanam ca . upadeśivadbhāvaḥ ca vaktavyaḥ . kim prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:22104: liṭiguṇacaṅidīrghapratiṣedhārtham . liṭi guṇārtham caṅi dīrghapratiṣedhārtham . liṭi
GS24pmbhasuu:22106: sañcaskaruḥ . caṅi dīrghapratiṣedhārtham ca . samaciskarat . liṭi guṇārthena tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:22107: na arthaḥ . vakṣyati etat saṃyogādeḥ guṇavidhāne saṃyogopadhāgrahaṇam kṛñartham iti
GS24pmbhasuu:22108: . caṅi dīrghapratiṣedhena api na arthaḥ . padam iti iyam bhagavataḥ kṛtrimā sañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:22109: . yuktam iha draṣṭavyam . kim antaraṅgam kim bahiraṅgam iti . dhātūpasargayoḥ kāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:22110: yat tat antaraṅgam . kutaḥ etat . pūrvam hi dhātuḥ upasargeṇa yujyate paścāt sādhanena
GS24pmbhasuu:22111: . na etat sāram . pūrvam dhātuḥ sādhanena yujyate paścāt upasargeṇa . sādhanam hi
GS24pmbhasuu:22112: kriyām nirvartayati . tām upasargaḥ viśinaṣti . abhinirvṛttasya ca arthasya upasargeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:22113: viśeṣaḥ śakyam kartūm . satyam evam etat . yaḥ tu asau dhātūpasargayoḥ abhisambandhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22114: tam abhyantaram kṛtvā dhātuḥ sādhanena yujyate . avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:22115: yaḥ hi manyate pūrvam dhātuḥ sādhanena yujyate paścāt upasargeṇa iti tasya āsyate guruṇā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:22116: akarmakaḥ upāsyate guruḥ iti kena sakarmakaḥ syāt . evam kṛtvā suṭ sarvataḥ antaraṅgatarakaḥ bhavati kātpūrvagrahaṇam ca api śakyam akartum
GS24pmbhasuu:22117: (P_6,1.135.2) KA_III.94.3-20 Ro_IV.478-480 yadi punaḥ ayam suṭ kāt pūrvāntaḥ kriyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:22118: . kāt pūrvāntaḥ iti cet ruvidhipratiṣedhaḥ . kāt pūrvāntaḥ iti cet kaḥ cit vidheyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22119: kaḥ cit patiṣedhyaḥ . saṃskartā . samaḥ vidheyaḥ suṭaḥ pratiṣedhyaḥ . samaḥ tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:22120: na vidheyaḥ . vakṣyati etat sampuṅkānām satvam ruvidhau hi aniṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:22121: suṭaḥ ca api na pratiṣedhyaḥ . samaḥ suṭi iti dvisakārakaḥ nirdeśaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:22122: suṭi sakārādau iti . atha vā padādiḥ kariyṣyate . parādau iḍgrahaṇaprasaṅgaḥ . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:22123: parādiḥ iḍguṇau prāpnutaḥ . saṃskṛṣīṣṭa . ṛtaḥ ca saṃyogādeḥ iti iṭ prāpnoti . saṃskriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:22124: . guṇaḥ artisaṃyogādyoḥ iti guṇaḥ prāpnoti . evam tarhi abhaktaḥ kariṣyate . abhakte
GS24pmbhasuu:22125: svaraḥ . yadi abhaktaḥ svaraḥ na sidhyati . saṃskaroti . tiṅ atiṅaḥ iti nighātaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22126: na prāpnoti . nanu ca suṭ eva atiṅ . na suṭaḥ parasya nighātena bhavitavyam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:22127: kāraṇam . nañivayuktam anyasadṛśādhikaraṇe . tathā hi arthagatiḥ . nañyuktam ivayuktam
GS24pmbhasuu:22128: ca anyasmin tatsadṛśe kāryam vijñāyate . tathā hi arthaḥ gamyate . tat yathā abrāhmaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:22129: ānaya iti ukte brāhmaṇasadṛśam kṣatriyam ānayati . na asau loṣṭam ānīyā kṛtī bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:22130: . evam iha api atiṅ iti pratiṣedhāt anyasmāt atiṅsadṛśāt kāryam vijñāyate . kim ca
GS24pmbhasuu:22133: harṣajīvikākulāyakaraṇeṣu iti vaktavyam . apaskirate vṛṣabhaḥ hṛṣṭaḥ . apaskirate
GS24pmbhasuu:22135: (P_6,1.144) KA_III.95.2-9 Ro_IV.480-481 kim idam sātatye iti . santatabhāvaḥ sātatyam
GS24pmbhasuu:22136: . yadi evam sāntatye iti bhavitavyam . samaḥ hitatatayoḥ vā lopaḥ . samaḥ hitatatayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22140: satatam . samtumunoḥ kāme . samtumunoḥ kāme lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . sakāmaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22141: bhoktukāmaḥ . manasi ca iti vaktavyam . samanāḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22142: bhoktumanāḥ . avaśyamaḥ kṛtye . avaśyamaḥ kṛtye lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . avaśyabhāvyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:22143: (P_6,1.145) KA_III.95.11-14 Ro_IV.481 idam atibahu kriyate sevite ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22145: pramāṇe iti . sevitapramāṇayoḥ iti eva siddham . kena idānīm asevite bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:22146: nañā sevitapratiṣedham vijñāsyāmaḥ . na evam śakyam . sevitaprasaṅge eva syāt . asevite
GS24pmbhasuu:22147: na syāt . asevitagrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe bahuvrīhiḥ ayam vijñāsyate . avidyamānasevite
GS24pmbhasuu:22149: (P_6,1.150) KA_III.95.16-20 Ro_IV.482 viṣkiraḥ śakunau vikiraḥ vā . viṣkiraḥ śakunau
GS24pmbhasuu:22150: vikiraḥ vā iti vaktavyam . śakunau vā iti hi ucyamāne śakunau vā syāt anyatra api
GS24pmbhasuu:22151: nityam . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . na vāvacanena śakuniḥ abhisambadhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:22153: viṣkiraḥ iti etat nipātanam śakunau vā nipātyate iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:22154: (P_6,1.147) KA_III.96.2-9 Ro_IV.482-483 āścaryam adbhute . āścaryam adbhute iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:22155: iha api yathā syāt . āścaryam uccatā vṛkṣasya . āścaryam nīlā dyauḥ . āścaryam antarikṣe
GS24pmbhasuu:22156: abandhanāni nakṣatrāṇi na patanti iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . anitye
GS24pmbhasuu:22157: iti eva siddham . iha tāvat āścaryam uccatā vṛkṣasya iti . āścaryagrahaṇena na vṛkṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22158: abhisambadhyate . kim tarhi . uccatā . sā ca anityā . āścaryam nīlā dyauḥ iti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:22159: āścaryagrahaṇena dyauḥ abhisambadhyate . kim tarhi . nīlatā . sā ca anityā . āścaryam
GS24pmbhasuu:22160: antarikṣe abandhanāni nakṣatrāṇi na patanti iti . na āścaryagrahaṇena nakṣatrāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:22161: abhisambadhyante . kim tarhi . patanakriyā . sā ca anityā . tatra anitye iti eva siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:22162: (P_6,1.154) KA_III.96.11-14 Ro_IV.483 maskarigrahaṇam śakyam akartum . katham maskarī
GS24pmbhasuu:22163: parivrājakaḥ iti . ininā etat matvarthīyena siddham . maskaraḥ asya asti . na vai
GS24pmbhasuu:22164: maskaraḥ asya asti iti maskarī parivrājakaḥ . kim tarhi mā kṛta karmāṇi . mā kṛta
GS24pmbhasuu:22165: karmāṇi . śāntiḥ vaḥ śreyasī iti āha . ataḥ maskarī parivrājakaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:22167: draṣṭavyaḥ . pāraskaraḥ deśaḥ . kāraskaraḥ vṛkṣaḥ . rathaspā nadī . kiṣkindhā guhā
GS24pmbhasuu:22168: . kiṣkuḥ . tadbṛhatoḥ karapatyoḥ coradevatayoḥ suṭ talopaḥ ca . taskaraḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22169: bṛhaspatiḥ . prāyasya citticittayoḥ suṭ askāraḥ vā . prāyaścittiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22171: (P_6,1.158.1) KA_III.97.2-6 Ro_IV.484-485 kim anudāttāni padāni bhavanti ekam padam
GS24pmbhasuu:22172: varjayitvā . na iti āha . pade yeṣām udāttaprasaṅgaḥ anudāttāḥ bhavanti ekam acam
GS24pmbhasuu:22173: varjayitvā . saḥ tarhi tathā nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:22175: anudāttāḥ padasya iti vā . na kartavyaḥ . anudāttam padam ekavarjam iti eva siddham . katham . matublopaḥ atra draṣṭavyaḥ . tat yathā puṣyakāḥ eṣām puṣyakāḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22176: kālakāḥ eṣām kālakāḥ iti . atha vā akāraḥ matvarthīyaḥ . tat yathā tundaḥ , ghāṭaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:22177: (P_6,1.158.2) KA_III.97.7-25 Ro_IV.485-486 kimartham punaḥ idam ucyate . āgamasya
GS24pmbhasuu:22178: vikārasya prakṛteḥ pratyayasya ca pṛthak svaranivṛttyartham ekavarjam padasvaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22180: anaḍvāhaḥ . vikārasya . asthidadhisakthyakṣṇām anaṅ udāttaḥ . asthnā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22183: taittirīyaḥ . eteṣām pade yugapat svaraḥ prāpnoti . iṣyate ca ekasya syāt iti . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:22184: ca antareṇa yatnam na sidhyati iti anudāttam padam ekavarjam . evamartham idam ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:22185: . na etat asti prayojanam . yaugapadyam tavai siddham . yat ayam tavai ca antaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:22186: yugapat iti siddhe yaugapadye yaugapadyam śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na yugapat
GS24pmbhasuu:22187: svaraḥ bhavati iti . paryāyaḥ tarhi prāpnoti . paryāyaḥ riktaśāsanāt . yat ayam rikte
GS24pmbhasuu:22188: vibhāṣā iti siddhe paryāye paryāyam śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na paryāyaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:22189: iti . udātte jñāpakam tu etat . etat udātte jñāpakam syāt . svaritena samāviśet .
GS24pmbhasuu:22190: svaritena samāveśaḥ prāpnoti . svarite api udāttaḥ asti . tasmāt na arthaḥ anena yogena .
GS24pmbhasuu:22191: (P_6,1.158.3) KA_III.98.1-99.21 Ro_IV.487-491 ārabhyamāṇe api etasmin yoge anudātte
GS24pmbhasuu:22192: vipratiṣedhānupapattiḥ ekasmin yugapat sambhavāt . anudātte vipratiṣedhaḥ na upapadyate
GS24pmbhasuu:22193: . paṭhiṣyati hi ācāryaḥ vipratiṣedham je dīrghāt bahvacaḥ iti . saḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22194: na upapadyate . kim kāraṇam . ekasmin yugapat sambhavāt . asati khalu sambhave vipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22195: bhavati asti ca sambhavaḥ yat ubhayam syāt . katham sambhavaḥ yadā anudāttam padam
GS24pmbhasuu:22196: ekavarjam iti ucyate . tat iha na asti . kim kāraṇam . na anena udāttatvam pratiṣidhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:22197: . kim tarhi anudāttatvam anena kriyate asti ca sambhavaḥ yat ubhayoḥ ca udāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:22198: syāt anyeṣām ca anudāttatvam . yadi punaḥ ayam adhikāraḥ vijñāyeta . kim kṛtam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:22199: . adhikāraḥ pratiyogam tasya anirdeśārthaḥ iti yoge yoge upatiṣṭhate . je dīrghāntasya
GS24pmbhasuu:22200: ādiḥ udāttaḥ bhavati . upasthitam idam bhavati anudāttam padam ekavarjam iti . antyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:22201: pūrvam bahvacaḥ . upasthitam idam bhavati anudāttam padam ekavarjam iti . tatra pūrveṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:22202: astu varjyamānatā pareṇa vā iti pareṇa bhaviṣyati paratvāt . na evam śakyam . ṣāṣthikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22203: ekaḥ svaraḥ saṅgṛhītaḥ syāt . ye anye saptādhyāyyām svarāḥ te na saṅgṛhītāḥ syuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22204: . samānodare śayite o ca udāttaḥ . asthidadhisakthyakṣṇām anaṅ udāttaḥ iti . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:22205: tu ekānanudāttatvāt . siddham etat . katham . ekānanudāttatvāt . ekānanudāttam padam
GS24pmbhasuu:22206: bhavati iti vaktavyam . kim idam ananudāttatvāt iti . na udāttaḥ anudāttaḥ . na anudāttaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22207: . ananudāttaḥ . ekaḥ ananudāttaḥ asmin tat idam ekānanudāttam . ekānanudāttatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:22208: iti . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam anudātte
GS24pmbhasuu:22209: vipratiṣedhānupapattiḥ ekasmin yugapat sambhavāt iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . paribhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:22210: iyam . kim kṛtam bhavati . kāryakālam hi sañjñāparibhāṣam . yatra kāryam tatra upasthitam
GS24pmbhasuu:22211: idam draṣṭavyam . je dīrghāntasya ādiḥ udāttaḥ bhavati . upasthitam idam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:22212: anudāttam padam ekavarjam iti . antyāt pūrvam bahvacaḥ . upasthitam idam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:22213: anudāttam padam ekavarjam iti . tatra pūrveṇa astu varjyamānatā pareṇa vā iti pareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:22214: bhaviṣyati paratvāt . atha vā na idam pāribhāṣikānudāttasya grahaṇam . kim tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:22215: . anvarthagrahaṇam . avidyamānodāttam anudāttam iti . ekavarjam iti ca aprasiddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22216: sandehāt . ekavarjam iti ca aprasiddhiḥ . kutaḥ sandehāt . na jñāyate kaḥ ekaḥ varjayitavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22217: iti . siddham tu yasmin anudātte udāttavacanānarthakyam tadvarjam . siddham etat
GS24pmbhasuu:22218: . katham . yasmin anudātte udāttavacanam anarthakam syāt saḥ ekaḥ varjayitavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:22219: prakṛtipratyayayoḥ svarasya sāvakāśatvāt aprasiddhiḥ . prakṛtipratyayayoḥ svarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:22220: sāvakāśatvāt aprasiddhiḥ syāt . prakṛtisvarasya avakāśaḥ yatra anudāttaḥ pratyayaḥ . pacati ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22221: paṭhati . pratyayayasvarasya avakāśaḥ yatra anudāttā prakṛtiḥ . samatvam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22223: taittirīyaḥ . vipratiṣedhāt pratyayasvaraḥ . vipratiṣedhāt pratyayasvaraḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:22224: . na evam . vipratiṣedhe param kāryam iti ucyate . na paraḥ pratyayasvaraḥ . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22225: doṣaḥ . iṣṭavācī paraśabdaḥ . vipratiṣedhe param yat iṣṭam tat bhavati . vipratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:22226: pratyayasvaraḥ iti cet kāmyādiṣu citkaraṇam . vipratiṣedhāt pratyayasvaraḥ iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:22229: ṛtīyate . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . prakṛtisvaraḥ atra bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . prakṛtisvare pratyayasvarābhāvaḥ . prakṛtisvare pratyayasvarasya abhāvaḥ . kartavyam,
GS24pmbhasuu:22230: taittirīyaḥ . siddham tu prakṛtisvarabalīyastvāt pratyayasvarabhāvaḥ . siddham etat
GS24pmbhasuu:22231: . katham . prakṛtisvarāt balīyastvāt pratyayasvarasya bhāvaḥ siddhaḥ . katham . prakṛtisvarāt
GS24pmbhasuu:22234: balīyān bhavati iti vaktavyam . tat ca anekapratyayasamāsārtham . tat ca avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:22235: satiśiṣṭasvarabalīyastvam vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . anekapratyayārtham anekasamāsārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:22236: ca . anekapratyayārtham tāvat . aupagavaḥ . prakṛtisvaram aṇsvaraḥ bādhate . aupagavatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:22237: . tvasvaraḥ aṇsvaram bādhate . aupagavatvakam . tvasvaram kasvaraḥ bādhate . anekasamāsārtham . rājapuruṣaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22239: rājapuruṣaputrapuruṣaḥ . yadi satiśiṣṭasvarabalīyastvam ucyate syādisvaraḥ sārvadhātukasvaram bādheta . sunutaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22240: cinutaḥ . syādisvarāprasaṅgaḥ ca tāseḥ parasya anudāttavacanāt . syādisvarasya ca
GS24pmbhasuu:22241: aprasaṅgaḥ . kutaḥ . tāseḥ parasya anudāttavacanāt . yat ayam tāseḥ parasya lasārvadhātukasya
GS24pmbhasuu:22242: anudāttatvam śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ satiśiṣṭaḥ api vikaraṇasvaraḥ lasārvadhātukasvaram
GS24pmbhasuu:22243: na bādhate . śāstraparavipratiṣedhāniyamāt vā śabdavipratiṣedhāt siddham . atha vā
GS24pmbhasuu:22244: śāstraparavipratiṣedhe na sarvam iṣṭam saṅgṛhītam bhavati iti kṛtvā śabdavipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22245: vijñāsyate . yadi śabdavipratiṣedhaḥ bhavati kāmyādayaḥ citaḥ kartavyāḥ . putrakāmyati ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22247: ṛtīyate . śabdavipratiṣedhaḥ nāma bhavati yatra ubhayoḥ yugapatprasaṅgaḥ na ca kāmyādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:22248: yugapatprasaṅgaḥ . vibhaktisvarāt nañsvaraḥ balīyān . vibhaktisvarāt nañsvaraḥ balīyān
GS24pmbhasuu:22249: iti vaktavyam . vibhaktisvarasya avakāśaḥ . tisraḥ tiṣṭhanti . nañsvarasya avakāśaḥ . abrāhmaṇaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22250: avṛṣalaḥ . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . atisraḥ . nañsvaraḥ bhavati . vibhaktinimittasvarāt
GS24pmbhasuu:22251: ca . vibhaktinimittasvarāt ca nañsvaraḥ balīyān iti vaktavyam . vibhaktinimittasvarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:22253: anaḍvāhaḥ . nañsvarasya saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . acatvāraḥ . ananaḍvāhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22254: . yat ca upapadam kṛti nañ . yat ca upapadam kṛti nañ tasya svaraḥ balīyān iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:22255: . akaraṇiḥ hi te vṛṣala . sahanirdiṣṭasya ca . sahanirdiṣṭasya ca nañaḥ svaraḥ balīyān
GS24pmbhasuu:22257: (P_6,1.159) KA_III.101.6-12 Ro_IV.494 kimartham kṛṣateḥ vikṛtasya grahaṇam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:22258: na kṛṣātvataḥ iti eva ucyeta . yasya kṛṣeḥ vikaraṇe etat rūpam tasya yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:22259: iha mā bhūt . halasya karṣaḥ iti . atha kimartham matupā nirdeśaḥ kriyate na karṣāt
GS24pmbhasuu:22260: iti eva ucyeta . karṣāt iti iyati ucyamāne yatra eva ākārāt anantaraḥ ghañ asti tatra eva syāt : dāyaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22262: pāṭhaḥ . na kva cit ākārāt anantaraḥ ghañ asti . iha api dāyaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22263: dhāyaḥ iti yukā vyavadhānam . evam api vihitaviṣeṣanam ākāragrahaṇam vijñāyeta . ākārāt yaḥ vihitaḥ iti . matubgrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:22264: (P_6,1.161.1) KA_III.101.14-102.2 Ro_IV.494-495 anudāttasya iti kimartham . prāsaṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:22265: vahati prāsaṅgyaḥ . udāttalope svaritodāttayoḥ abhāvāt anudāttagrahaṇānarthakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:22266: . udāttalope svaritodāttayoḥ abhāvāt anudāttagrahaṇam anarthakam . ha hi kaḥ cit
GS24pmbhasuu:22267: udāttaḥ udātte svarite vā lupyate . sarvaḥ anudātte eva . nan ca ayam udāttaḥ svarite
GS24pmbhasuu:22268: lupyate . prāsaṅgam vahati prāsaṅgyaḥ iti . eṣaḥ api nighāte kṛte anudātte eva lupyate
GS24pmbhasuu:22269: . idam iha sampradhāryam . nighātaḥ kriyatām lopaḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:22270: lopaḥ . evam tarhi ayam adya nighātasvaraḥ sarvasvarāṇām apavādaḥ . na ca apavādaviṣaye
GS24pmbhasuu:22271: utsargaḥ bhiniviśate . pūrvam hi apavādāḥ abhiniviśante paścāt utsargāḥ . prakalpya
GS24pmbhasuu:22272: vā apavādaviṣayam tataḥ utsargaḥ abhiniviśate . tat na tāvat atra kadā cit thāthādisvaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22273: bhavati . apavādam nighātam pratīkṣate . tatra nighātaḥ kriyatām lopaḥ iti yadi api
GS24pmbhasuu:22274: paratvāt lopaḥ saḥ asau avidyamānodāttaḥ anudāttaḥ lupyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:22275: (P_6,1.161.2) KA_III.102.3-20 Ro_IV.495-497 kim punaḥ anudāttasya antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:22276: āhosvit ādiḥ . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . antaḥ iti cet śnamksayuṣmadasmadidaṅkiṃlopeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:22277: svaraḥ . antaḥ iti cet śnamksayuṣmadasmadidaṅkiṃlopeṣu svaraḥ na sidhyati . śnam . vindate ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22278: khindate . śnam . ksa . mā hi dhukṣātām . mā hi dhukṣāthām . ksa . yuṣmadasmad . yuṣmabhyam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22280: kiyān . astu tarhi ādiḥ . ādiḥ iti cet indhīta dvayam iti antaḥ . ādiḥ iti cet indhīta dvayam iti antodāttatvam na sidhyati . indhīta . dvayam
GS24pmbhasuu:22281: trayam . ādau siddham . astu tarhi ādiḥ udāttaḥ bhavati iti . nanu ca uktam ādiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22282: iti cet indhīta dvayam iti antaḥ iti . vidīndhikhidibhyaḥ ca lasārvadhātukānudāttapratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:22283: liṅi siddham . vidīndhikhidibhyaḥ ca lasārvadhātukānudāttatvam liṅi na iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:22284: . liṅgrahaṇena na arthaḥ . aviśeṣeṇa ikhidibhyaḥ ca lasārvadhātukānudāttapratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:22285: liṅi siddham . vidīndhikhidibhyaḥ ca lasārvadhātukānudāttatvam na iti eva . idam
GS24pmbhasuu:22287: khindate . ayaci katham . ayaci citkaraṇāt . ayaci citkaraṇasāmarthyāt antodāttatvam bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:22288: (P_6,1.162) KA_III.102.22-103.25 Ro_IV.497-499 kim dhātoḥ antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati āhosvit
GS24pmbhasuu:22289: ādiḥ iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . dhātoḥ antaḥ iti cet anudātte ca bagrahaṇam . dhātoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22290: antaḥ iti cet anudātte ca bagrahaṇam kartavyam . abhyastānām ādiḥ anudātte ca iti
GS24pmbhasuu:22291: vaktavyam . bagrahaṇam ca kartavyam . bāntaḥ ca pibiḥ ādyudāttaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:22292: . pibati . san ca nit . san ca nit kartavyaḥ . kim prayojanam . cikīrṣati jihīrṣati
GS24pmbhasuu:22293: . niti iti ādyudāttatvam yathā syāt . astu tarhi ādiḥ . ādau ūrṇapratyayadhātuṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:22294: antodāttatvam . ādau ūrṇapratyayadhātuṣu antodāttatvam na sidhyati . ūrṇoti . ūrṇu
GS24pmbhasuu:22297: ṛtīyate . antodāttavacanāt siddham . astu tarhi antodāttaḥ bhavati iti . nanu ca
GS24pmbhasuu:22298: uktam dhātoḥ antaḥ iti cet anudātte ca bagrahaṇam kartavyam iti . yat tāvat ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:22299: . anudātte ca grahaṇam kartavyam iti . kriyate nyāse eva . abhyastānām ādiḥ anudātte
GS24pmbhasuu:22300: ca iti . bagrahaṇam kartavyam iti . pibau nipātanāt . pibau ādyudāttanipātanam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:22301: . saḥ nipātanasvaraḥ prakṛtisvarasya bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . san ca nit kartavyaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:22302: . avaśyam sanaḥ viśeṣaṇārthaḥ nakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . kva viśeṣaṇārthena arthaḥ . sanyaṅoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22303: iti . sayaṅoḥ iti iyati ucyamāne haṃsaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22305: atra api prāpnoti . arthavadgrahaṇe na anarthakasya iti evam na bhaviṣyati . iha api tarhi na prāpnoti . jugupsate ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22306: mīmāṃsate iti . arthavān eṣaḥ . na vai kaḥ cit arthaḥ ādiśyate . yadi api kaḥ cit
GS24pmbhasuu:22307: arthaḥ na ādiśyate anirdiṣṭārthāḥ svārthe bhavanti iti antataḥ svārthe bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:22308: . kaḥ ca asya svārthaḥ . prakṛtyarthaḥ . iha api prāpnoti . haṃsaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22309: vatsaḥ iti . uṇādayaḥ avyutpannāni prātipadikāni . saḥ eṣaḥ ananyārthaḥ nakāraḥ kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22310: . na kartavyaḥ . kriyate nyāse eva . atha vā dhātoḥ iti vartate . dhātoḥ saśabdāntasya dve bhavataḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:22311: (P_6,1.163) KA_III.104.2-7 Ro_IV.500 citaḥ saprakṛteḥ bahvakajartham . citaḥ saprakṛteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22312: iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . bahvakajartham . bahujartham akajartham ca . bahujartham
GS24pmbhasuu:22319: viśvake . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . matublopaḥ atra draṣṭavyaḥ . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:22320: puṣyakāḥ eṣām puṣyakāḥ kālakāḥ eṣām kālakāḥ iti . atha vā akāraḥ matvarthīyaḥ . tat yathā tundaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22321: ghāṭaḥ iti . pūrvasūtranirdeśaḥ ca citvān citaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:22322: (P_6,1.166) KA_III.104.9-22 Ro_IV.500-501 jasaḥ iti kimartham . tisṛkā . tisṛbhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22323: jasgrahaṇānarthakyam anyatra abhāvāt . tisṛbhyaḥ jasgrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:22324: . anyatra abhāvāt . na hi anyat tisṛśabdāt antodāttatvam prayojayati anyat ataḥ jasaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22325: . kim kāraṇam . bahuvacanaviṣayaḥ eva tisṛśabdaḥ . tena ekavacanadvivacane na staḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22326: . śasi bhavitavyam udāttayaṇaḥ halpūrvāt iti . anyāḥ sarvāḥ halādayaḥ vibhaktayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22327: . tatra ṣaṭtricaturbhyaḥ halādiḥ jhali upottamam iti anena svareṇa bhavitavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:22328: tatra antareṇa jasaḥ grahaṇam jasaḥ eva bhaviṣyati . nanu ca idānīm eva udāhṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:22329: tisṛkā iti . nitsvaraḥ atra bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . na aprāpte anyasvare tisṛsvaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22330: ārabhyate . saḥ yathā eva anudāttau suppitau iti etam svaram bādhate evam nitsvaram
GS24pmbhasuu:22331: api bādheta . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yena na aprāpte tasya bādhanam bhavati . na ca aprāpte
GS24pmbhasuu:22332: anudāttau suppitau iti etasmin tisṛsvaraḥ ārabhyate . nitsvaraḥ punaḥ prāpte ca aprāpte
GS24pmbhasuu:22333: ca . atha vā madhye apavādāḥ pūrvān vidhīn bādhante iti evam tisṛsvaraḥ anudāttau
GS24pmbhasuu:22334: suppitau iti svaram bādhiṣyate nitsvaram na bādhiṣyate . upasamastārtham eke jasaḥ grahaṇam icchanti :
GS24pmbhasuu:22336: (P_6,1.167) KA_III.105.2-106.7 Ro_IV.502-504 śasi striyām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:22337: catasraḥ paśya . caturaḥ śasi striyām apratiṣedhaḥ ādyudāttanipātanāt . caturaḥ śasi
GS24pmbhasuu:22338: striyām apratiṣedhaḥ . anarthakaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ . śasi svaraḥ kasmāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:22339: bhavati . ādyudāttanipātanāt . ādyudāttanipātanam kariṣyate . saḥ nipātanasvaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22340: śasi svarasya bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . evam api upadeśivadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . yathā eva
GS24pmbhasuu:22341: nipātanasvaraḥ śasi svaram bādhate evam vibhaktisvaram api bādheta catasṛṇam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:22342: . vibhaktisvarabhāvaḥ ca halādigrahaṇāt . vibhaktisvarabhāvaḥ ca siddhaḥ . kutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22343: . halādigrahaṇāt . yat ayam ṣaṭtricaturbhyaḥ halādiḥ iti halādigrahaṇam karoti tat
GS24pmbhasuu:22344: jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na nipātanasvaraḥ vibhaktisvaram bādhate iti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam
GS24pmbhasuu:22345: . ādyudāttanipātane hi halādigrahaṇānarthakyam . ādyudāttanipātane hi sati halādigrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:22346: anarthakam syāt . na hi anyat halādigrahaṇam prayojayati anyat ataḥ catasṛśabdāt
GS24pmbhasuu:22347: . ṣaṭsañjñāḥ tāvat na prayojayanti . kim kāraṇam . bahuvacanaviṣayatvāt . tena dvivacanaikavacane
GS24pmbhasuu:22348: na staḥ . jaśśasī ca atra lupyete . anyāḥ sarvāḥ halādayaḥ vibhaktayaḥ . triśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22349: ca api na prayojayati . kim kāraṇam . bahuvacanaviṣayatvāt . tena dvivacanaikavacane
GS24pmbhasuu:22350: na staḥ . asarvanāmasthānam iti vacanāt jasi na bhaviṣyati . śasi bhavitavyam ekādeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:22351: udāttena udāttaḥ iti . anyāḥ sarvāḥ halādayaḥ vibhaktayaḥ . tisṛśabdaḥ ca api na
GS24pmbhasuu:22352: prayojayati . kim kāraṇam . bahuvacanaviṣayatvāt . tena dvivacanaikavacane na staḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22353: . asarvanāmasthānam iti vacanāt jasi na bhavitavyam . śasi bhavitavyam udāttayaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22354: halpūrvāt iti . anyāḥ sarvāḥ halādayaḥ vibhaktayaḥ . catuḥśabdaḥ tisṛśabdaḥ ca api
GS24pmbhasuu:22355: na prayojayati . kim kāraṇam . bahuvacanaviṣayatvāt . tena dvivacanaikavacane na
GS24pmbhasuu:22356: staḥ . asarvanāmasthānam iti vacanāt jasi na bhavitavyam . śasi bhavitavyam caturaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22357: śasi iti . anyāḥ sarvāḥ halādayaḥ vibhaktayaḥ . tatra catasṛśabdāt ekasmāt śas asarvanāmasthānam
GS24pmbhasuu:22358: ajādiḥ vibhaktiḥ asti . yadi ca atra nipātanasvaraḥ syāt halādigrahaṇam anarthakam
GS24pmbhasuu:22359: syāt . na eva vā punaḥ atra śasisvaraḥ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . yaṇādeśe kṛte śasaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22360: pūrvaḥ udāttabhāvī na asti iti kṛtvā . avaśiṣṭasya tarhi prāpnoti . ṛkāreṇa vyavahitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:22361: na bhaviṣyati . yaṇādeśe kṛte na asti vyavadhānam . sthānivadbhāvāt vyavadhānam eva
GS24pmbhasuu:22362: . pratiṣidhyate atra sthānivadbhāvaḥ svaravidhim prati na sthānivat bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:22363: na eṣaḥ asti pratiṣedhaḥ . uktam etat pratiṣedhe svaradīrghayalopeṣu lopādādeśaḥ na sthānivat iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:22364: (P_6,1.168.1) KA_III.106.9-18 Ro_IV.504-505 sau iti kim idam prathamaikavacanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:22365: grahaṇam āhosvit saptamībahuvacanasya . kutaḥ sandehaḥ . samānaḥ nirdeśaḥ . saptamībahuvacanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:22366: grahaṇam . katham jñāyate . yat ayam na gośvansāvavarṇa iti gośunoḥ pratiṣedham śāsti
GS24pmbhasuu:22367: . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . yadi prathamaikavacanasya grahaṇam syāt gośunoḥ pratiṣedhavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:22368: anarthakam syāt . nanu ca arthasiddhiḥ eva eṣā . anugṛhītāḥ smaḥ yaiḥ asmābhiḥ prathamaikavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:22369: āsthāya gośunoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ na vaktavyaḥ bhavati . bhavet pratiṣedhaḥ na vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22370: doṣāḥ tu bhavanti . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . svinā khinā . antodāttatvam na prāpnoti . svinkhinau
GS24pmbhasuu:22371: na staḥ . uktam etat ekākṣarāt kṛtaḥ jāteḥ saptamyām ca na tau smṛtau . svavān ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22372: khavān iti eva bhavitavyam . iha tarhi yādbhyām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22373: yābhiḥ iti na sidhyati . tasmāt saptamībahuvacanasya grahaṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:22374: (P_6,1.168.2) KA_III.106.19-25 Ro_IV.505-506 sau ekācaḥ udāttatve tvanmadoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22375: . sau ekācaḥ udāttatve tvanmadoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . tvayā mayā . siddham tu
GS24pmbhasuu:22376: yasmāt tṛtīyādiḥ tasya abhāvāt sau . siddham etat . katham . yasmāt atra tṛtīyādiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22377: vibhaktiḥ na tat sau asti . yadi api etat sau na asti prakṛtiḥ tu asya sau asti .
GS24pmbhasuu:22378: prakṛteḥ ca anekāctvāt . yadi api tasya prakṛtiḥ asti sau anekāc tu sā bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:22379: (P_6,1.169) KA_III.107.2-5 Ro_IV.506 uttarapadagrahaṇam kimartham . yathā ekājgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:22380: uttarapadaviśeṣaṇam vijñāyeta . ekācaḥ uttarapadāt iti . atha akriyamāṇe uttarapadagrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:22381: kasya ekājgrahaṇam viśeṣaṇam syāt . samāsaviśeṣaṇam . asti ca idānīm kaḥ cit ekāc
GS24pmbhasuu:22382: samāsaḥ yadarthaḥ vidhiḥ syāt . asti iti āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:22385: (P_6,1.171) KA_III.107.7-10 Ro_IV.507 padādiṣu nicantāni prayojayanti . anyāni padādīni
GS24pmbhasuu:22386: udāttanivṛttisvareṇa siddhāni . ūṭhi upadhāgrahaṇam antyapratiṣedhārtham . ūṭhi upadhāgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:22387: kartavyam . kim prayojanam . antyapratiṣedhārtham . antyasya mā bhūt . akṣadyuvā , akṣadyuve .
GS24pmbhasuu:22388: (P_6,1.172) KA_III.107.13-22 Ro_IV.507-508 dīrghagrahaṇam kimartham . aṣṭasu prakrameṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:22389: brāhmaṇaḥ ādadhīta . dīrghāt iti śakyam akartum . kasmāt na bhavati aṣṭasu prakrameṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:22390: brāhmaṇaḥ ādadhīta iti . ṣaṭsvaraḥ bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . na aprāpte ṣaṭsvare aṣṭanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22391: svaraḥ ārabhyate . saḥ yathā eva dīrghāt bādhate evam hrasvāt api bādheta . na dīrghāt
GS24pmbhasuu:22392: ṣaṭsvaraḥ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . āte kṛte ṣaṭsañjñābhāvāt . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati
GS24pmbhasuu:22393: aṣṭanaḥ dīrghagrahaṇam ṣaṭsañjñājñāpakam ākārāntasya nuḍartham . aṣṭanaḥ dīrghagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:22394: kriyate jñāpakārtham . kim jñāpyam . etat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati ātve kṛte ṣaṭsañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:22395: iti . kim etasya jñapane prayojanam . ākārāntasya nuḍartham . ākārāntasya nuḍ siddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22396: bhavati . aṣṭānām iti . nanu ca nityam ātvam . etat eva jñāpayati vibhāṣā ātvam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:22397: yat ayam dīrghagrahaṇam karoti . itarathā hi aṣṭanaḥ iti eva brūyāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:22398: (P_6,1.173) KA_III.2-4 Ro_IV.508 nadyajādyudāttatve bṛhanmahatoḥ upasaṅkhyānam . nadyajādyudāttatve bṛhanmahatoḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . bṛhatī mahatī bṛhatā mahatā .
GS24pmbhasuu:22399: (P_6,1.174) KA_III.108.6-16 Ro_IV.509-510 halpūrvāt iti kimartham . agnaye vāyave
GS24pmbhasuu:22400: . udāttayaṇi halgrahaṇam nakārāntārtham . udāttayaṇi halgrahaṇam kartavyam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:22401: prayojanam . nakārāntārtham . nakārāntāt api yathā syāt . vākpatnī citpatnī . halpūrvagrahaṇānarthakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:22402: ca samudāyādeśatvāt . halpūrvagrahaṇam ca anarthakam . kim kāṛaṇam . samudāyādeśatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:22403: . samudāyaḥ atra ādeśaḥ . svaritatve ca avacanāt . svaritatve ca halpūrvagrahaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:22404: avacanāt manyāmahe halpūrvagrahaṇam anarthakam iti . yat tāvat ucyate udāttayaṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:22405: halgrahaṇam nakārāntārtham iti kriyate nyāse eva . dvinakārakaḥ nirdeśaḥ . udāttayaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22406: halpūrvāt na ūṅdhātvoḥ iti . yat api ucyate halpūrvagrahaṇānarthakyam ca samudāyādeśatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:22407: iti . ayam asti kevalaḥ ādeśaḥ . bahutitavā .
GS24pmbhasuu:22409: regrahaṇam kartavyam . ā revān etu naḥ viśaḥ . tripratiṣedhaḥ ca . treḥ ca pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22411: (P_6,1.177) KA_III.109.2-21 Ro_IV.510-512 iha kasmāt na bhavati . kiśorīṇām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22412: kumārīṇām . hrasvāt iti vartate . iha api tarhi na prāpnoti . agnīnām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22413: vāyūnām . kim kāraṇam . dīrghatve kṛte hrasvābhāvāt . idam iha sampradhāryam . dīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:22414: kriyatām svaraḥ iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt dīrghatvam . evam tarhi nāmsvare
GS24pmbhasuu:22415: matau hrasvagrahaṇam . nāmsvare matau hrasvagrahaṇam kartavyam . matau hrasvāntāt
GS24pmbhasuu:22416: iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . āha ayam hrasvāntāt na ca nāmi hrasvāntaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22418: hrasvāntam yat bhūtapūrvam iti . sāmpratikābhāve bhūtapūrvagatiḥ vijñāyate ayam ca asti sāmpratikaḥ : tisṛṇām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22419: catasṛṇām iti . na etat asti . ṣaṭtricaturbhyaḥ halādiḥ iti anena svareṇa bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:22420: . tasmin nitye prāpte iyam vibhāṣā ārabhyate . evam tarhi yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:22421: . ṣaṭtricaturbhyaḥ nām udāttaḥ bhavati . tataḥ halādiḥ . halādiḥ ca vibhaktiḥ udāttā
GS24pmbhasuu:22422: bhavati ṣaṭtricaturbhyaḥ iti . idam tarhi tvam nṛṇam nṛpate jāyase śuciḥ . nanu ca
GS24pmbhasuu:22423: atra api nṛ ca anyatarasyām iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . na sidhyati . na
GS24pmbhasuu:22424: sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . jhalgrahaṇam tatra anuvartate . kim punaḥ kāraṇam jhalgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:22425: tatra anuvartate . iha mā bhūt . nrā nre . udāttayaṇaḥ halpūrvāt iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22426: atra svaraḥ bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi nari . na ekam udāharam hrasvagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:22427: prayojayati . yadi etāvat prayojanam syāt nām iti eva brūyāt . tatra vacanāt bhūtapūrvagatiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22428: vijñāsyate . hrasvāntam yat bhūtapūrvam iti . atha vā na evam vijñāyate . nām svarau
GS24pmbhasuu:22429: matau hrasvagrahaṇam kartavyam iti . katham tarhi . nāmsvare matau hrasvāt iti vartate iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:22430: (P_6,1.182) KA_III.109.23-110.11 Ro_IV.512-513 sau iti kim prathamaikavacanasya grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:22431: āhosvit saptamībahuvacanasya . kutaḥ sandehaḥ . samānaḥ nirdeśaḥ . purastāt eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22432: nirṇayaḥ saptamībahuvacanasya grahaṇam iti . iha api tat eva bhavitum arhati . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:22434: yābhyām brāhmaṇābhyām atra na prāpnoti . vidhiḥ api atra na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . na hi etat bhavati yat sau rūpam . idam tarhi tebhyaḥ brāhmaṇebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22435: yebhyaḥ brāhmaṇebhyaḥ . vidhiḥ ca sidddhaḥ bhavati pratiṣedhaḥ tu na prāpnoti . asti
GS24pmbhasuu:22436: punaḥ kim cit sati iṣṭam saṅgṛhītam bhavati āhosvit doṣāntam eva . asti iti āha .
GS24pmbhasuu:22438: tābhyaḥ brāhmaṇībhyaḥ iti vidhiḥ ca sidddhaḥ bhavati pratiṣedhaḥ ca . asti tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:22439: prathamaikavacanasya grahaṇam . yadi prathamaikavacanasya grahaṇam tena iti svaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22440: puṃsi na sidhyati . na ca avaśyam puṃsi eva striyām puṃsi napuṃsake ca . tena brāhmaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:22441: tayā brāhmaṇyā tena kuṇḍena iti . saptamībahuvacanasya grahaṇe api eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . tasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:22442: ubhābhyām eva pratiṣedhe yattatadoḥ ca grahaṇam kartavyam . na gośvansāvavarṇarāḍaṅkruṅkṛdbhyaḥ yattadoḥ ca iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:22443: (P_6,1.185) KA_III.13-24 Ro_IV.514-515 titi pratyayagrahaṇam . titi pratyayagrahaṇam kartavyam . iha mā bhūt . ṝtaḥ it dhātoḥ . kirati ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22444: girati . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . na eṣaḥ takāraḥ . kaḥ tarhi . dakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22445: . yadi dakāraḥ āntaryataḥ dīrghasya dīrghaḥ prāpnoti . bhāvyamānena savarṇānām grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:22446: na iti evam na bhaviṣyati . yadi bhāvyamānena savarṇānām grahaṇam na iti ucyate adasaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22448: amūbhyām iti atra na prāpnoti . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati bhavati ukāreṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:22449: bhāvyamānena savarṇānām grahaṇam iti yat ayam divaḥ ut iti ukāram taparam karoti
GS24pmbhasuu:22450: . evamartham eva tarhi pratyayagrahaṇam kartavyam atra mā bhūt iti . na eṣaḥ takāharaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22451: . kaḥ tarhi . dakāraḥ . yadi dakāraḥ na jñāpakam bhavati . evam tarhi taparaḥ tatkālasya
GS24pmbhasuu:22452: iti dakāraḥ api cartvabhūtaḥ nirdiśyate . yadi evam cartvasya asiddhatvāt haśi ca
GS24pmbhasuu:22453: iti uttvam prāpnoti . sautraḥ nirdeśaḥ . atha vā asaṃhitayā nirdeśaḥ kariṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:22456: (P_6,1.186.1) KA_III.111.3-16 Ro_IV.515-517 adupadeśāt iti kim idam vijñāyate . akāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22457: yaḥ upadeśaḥ iti āhosvit akārāntam yat upadeśaḥ iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:22459: hathaḥ iti atra api prāpnoti . atha vijñāyate akārāntam yat upadeśaḥ iti na doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22460: bhavati . nanu ca akārāntam yat upadeśaḥ iti vijñāyamāne api atra api prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:22461: etat api hi vyapadeśivadbhāvena akārāntam bhavati upadeśe . arthavatā vyapadeśivadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22462: . yadi tarhi akārāntam yat upadeśaḥ iti vijñāyate mā hi dhukṣātām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22463: mā hi dhuṣāthām atra api prāpnoti . astu . anudāttatve kṛte lope udāttanivṛttisvareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:22464: siddham . na sidhyati . idam iha sampradhāryam . adnudāttatvam kriyatām lopaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:22465: kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt lopaḥ . evam tarhi idam adya lasārvadhādukānudāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:22466: pratyayasvarasya apavādaḥ . na ca apavādaviṣaye utsargaḥ abhiniviśate . pūrvam hi
GS24pmbhasuu:22467: apavādāḥ abhiniviśante paścāt utsargāḥ . prakalpya vā apavādaviṣayam tataḥ utasrgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22468: abhiniviśate . tat na tāvat atra kadā cit pratyayasvaraḥ bhavati . apavādaviṣayam
GS24pmbhasuu:22469: lasārvadhātukānudāttatvam pratīkṣate . tatra ānudāttatvam kriyatām lopaḥ iti kim
GS24pmbhasuu:22470: atra kartavyam . paratvāt lopaḥ . yadi api paratvāt lopaḥ saḥ asau avidyamānodātte
GS24pmbhasuu:22473: abhyastasijarthaḥ . tāsyādibhyaḥ anudāttatve saptamīnirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . lasārvadhātuke
GS24pmbhasuu:22474: iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . abhyastasijarthaḥ . abhyastānām ādiḥ udāttaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:22475: lasārvadhātuke . sijantasya ādiḥ udāttaḥ bhavati lasārvadhātuke . lasārvadhātukam
GS24pmbhasuu:22476: iti ucyamāne tasya eva ādyudāttatvam syāt . yadi saptamīnirdeśaḥ kriyate tāsyādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:22477: eva anudāttatvam prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . tāsiyādibhyaḥ iti eṣā pañcamī lasārvadhātuke
GS24pmbhasuu:22478: iti saptamyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayiṣyati tasmāt iti uttarasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:22480: vipratiṣedhena . citsvarāt tāsyādibhyaḥ anudāttatvam bhavati vipratiṣedhena . citsvarasya avakāśaḥ calanaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22481: copanaḥ . tāsyādibhyaḥ anudāttatvasya avakāśaḥ . āste śete . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . āsīnaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22482: śayānaḥ . tāsyādibhyaḥ anudāttatvam bhavati vipratiṣedhena . na eṣaḥ yuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22483: . kim kāraṇam . dvikāryayogaḥ hi vipratiṣedhaḥ . na ca atra ekaḥ dvikāryayuktaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:22484: ādeḥ anudāttatvam antasya udāttatvam . na avaśyam dvikāryayogaḥ eva vipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22485: . kim tarhi. asambhavaḥ api . nanu ca atra api asti sambhavaḥ . ādeḥ anudāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:22486: antasya udāttatvam iti . asti ca sambhavaḥ yat ubhayam syāt . na eṣaḥ asti sambhavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22487: . vakṣyati etat svaravidhau saṅghātaḥ kāryī bhavati iti . mukaḥ ca upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:22489: yajamānaḥ . mukā vyavahitatvāt adupadeśāt lasārvadhātukam anudāttam bhavati iti anudāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:22490: na prāpnoti . nanu ca ayam muk adupadeśabhaktaḥ adupadeśagrahaṇena grāhiṣyate . na
GS24pmbhasuu:22491: sidhyati . aṅgasya muk ucyate vikaraṇāntam ca aṅgam . saḥ asau saṅghātabhaktaḥ aśakyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22492: muk adupadeśagrahaṇena grahītum . atha ayam adbhaktaḥ syāt gṛhyeta ayam adupadeśagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:22493: . bāḍham gṛhyeta . adbhaktaḥ tarhi bhaviṣyati . tat katham . vakṣyati etasya parihāram
GS24pmbhasuu:22494: . itaḥ ca upasaṅkhyānam . itaḥ ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . idbhiḥ ca vyavahitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:22496: paṭhataḥ . itaḥ ca anekāntatvāt . anekāntāḥ anubandhāḥ . yadi anekāntāḥ anubandhāḥ adiprabhṛtijuhotyādibhyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . attaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22497: juhutaḥ iti . adupadeśāt iti anudāttatvam prāpnoti . tatra adiprabhṛtijuhotyādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22498: apratiṣedhaḥ sthānyādeśābhāvāt . tatra adiprabhṛtibhyaḥ juhotyādibhyaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22499: . anarthakaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ . anudāttatvam kasmāt na bhavati . sthānyādeśābhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:22500: . na eva atra sthāninam na eva ādeśam paśyāmaḥ . anudāttaṅidgrahaṇāt vā . atha vā
GS24pmbhasuu:22501: yat ayam anudāttaṅidgrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na luptavikaraṇebhyaḥ anudāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:22502: bhavati iti . na etat asti jñāpakam . śnanartham etat syāt . vindāte ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22503: khindāte . yat tarhi ṅidgrahaṇam karoti . na hi śnamvikaraṇaḥ ṅit bhavati . ṅitaḥ anudāttatve vikaraṇebhyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . cinutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22506: punītaḥ . ṅitaḥ iti anudāttatvam prāpnoti . ṅitaḥ anudāttatve vikaraṇebhyaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22507: sarvasya upadeśaviśeṣaṇatvāt . ṅitaḥ anudāttatve vikaraṇebhyaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ . anarthakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22508: pratiṣedhaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ . anudāttatvam kasmāt na bhavati . sarvasya upadeśaviśeṣaṇatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:22512: (P_6,1.187) KA_III.113.10-12 Ro_IV.520-521 sicaḥ ādyudāttatve aniṭaḥ pitaḥ upasaṅkhyānam . sicaḥ ādyudāttatve aniṭaḥ pitaḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . mā hi karṣam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22513: mā hi kārṣam . aniṭaḥ iti kimartham . mā hi laviṣam .
GS24pmbhasuu:22514: (P_6,1.188) KA_III.113.14-17 Ro_IV.521 svapādīnām vāvacanāt abhyastasvaraḥ vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:22515: . svapādīnām vāvacanāt abhyastasvaraḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . svapādīnām vāvacanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:22516: avakāśaḥ svapanti śvasanti . abhyastasvarasya avakāśaḥ dadati ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22517: dadhati . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . jagrati . abhyastasvaraḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:22518: (P_6,1.190) KA_III.113.19-22 Ro_IV.521 anudātte ca iti bahuvrīhinirdeśaḥ lopayaṇādeśārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:22519: . anudātte ca iti bahuvrīhinirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . avidyamānodātte iti vaktavyam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:22520: prayojanam . lopayaṇādeśārtham . lopayaṇādeśayoḥ kṛtayoḥ ādyudāttatvam yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:22522: (P_6,1.191.1) KA_III.114.2-3 Ro_IV.522 sarvasvaraḥ anackasya . sarvasvaraḥ anackasya iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt sarvake .
GS24pmbhasuu:22523: (P_6,1.191.2) KA_III.114.6-115.2 Ro_IV.522-525 bhyādigrahaṇam kimartham . iha mā
GS24pmbhasuu:22524: bhūt . dadāti dadhāti . na etat asti prayojanam . abhyastasvaraḥ atra bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:22525: . antataḥ ubhayam syāt . anavakāśāḥ khalu api vidhayaḥ bādhakāḥ bhavanti sāvakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22526: ca abhyastasvaraḥ . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . mimīte . atha pratyayagrahaṇam kimartham . pratyayāt
GS24pmbhasuu:22527: pūrvasya udāttatvam yathā syāt . āṭaḥ pūrvasya mā bhūt iti . bibhayāni . na ca eva
GS24pmbhasuu:22528: asti viśeṣaḥ pratyayāt vā pūrvasya udāttatve sati āṭaḥ vā . api ca pidbhaktaḥ pidgrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:22529: grāhiṣyate . idam tarhi prayojanam . pratyayāt pūrvasya udāttatvam yathā syāt . āṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22530: eva mā bhūt iti . etat api na asti prayojanam . pidbhaktaḥ pidgrahaṇena grāhiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:22531: . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat pratyayagrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ svaravidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:22532: saṅghātaḥ kāryī bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . citsvarāt tāsyādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22533: anudāttatvam vipratiṣedhena iti uktam . tat upapannam bhavati . atha pūrvagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:22534: kimartham na tasmin iti nirdiṣṭe pūrvasya iti pūrvasya eva bhaviṣyati . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:22535: siddhe sati yat pūrvagrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ svaravidhau saptamyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22536: tadantasaptamyaḥ bhavanti iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . upottamam riti ridantasya
GS24pmbhasuu:22537: . caṅi anyatarasyām caṅantasya . yadi etat jñāpyate caturaḥ śasi iti śasantasya api
GS24pmbhasuu:22538: prāpnoti . śasgrahaṇasāmarthyāt na bhaviṣyati . itarathā hi tatra eva ayam brūyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:22539: ūḍidampadādyappumraidyubhyaḥ caturbhyaḥ ca iti . atha pidgrahaṇam kimartham . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:22540: mā bhūt . jāgrati. na etat asti prayojanam . bhavati eva atra pūrveṇa . idam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:22541: prayojanam daridrati . ākāreṇa vyavahitatvāt na bhaviṣyati . lope kṛte na asti vyavadhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:22542: . sthānivadbhāvād vyavadhānam eva . pratiṣidhyate atra sthānivadbhāvaḥ svarasandhim
GS24pmbhasuu:22544: (P_6,1.195) KA_III.115.4-21 Ro_IV.525-526 yaki rapare upasaṅkhyānam . yaki rapare
GS24pmbhasuu:22545: upasaṅkhyānamkartavyam . stīryate svayam eva . upadeśavacanāt siddham . upadeśe iti
GS24pmbhasuu:22546: vaktavyam . upadeśavacane janādīnām . upadeśavacane janādīnām svaraḥ na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:22547: . jayate svayam eva . jāyate svayam eva . yogavibhāgāt siddham . yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:22548: . ajantānām kartṛyaki vā ādiḥ udāttaḥ bhavati . cīyate svayam eva . ciyate svayam
GS24pmbhasuu:22549: eva . jayate svayam eva . jāyate svayam eva . tataḥ upadeśe . upadeśe ca ajantānām
GS24pmbhasuu:22550: kartṛyaki vā ādiḥ udāttaḥ bhavati . stīryate svayam eva . stīryate svayam eva . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:22551: tarhi upadeśagrahaṇam kartavyam . na hi antareṇa upadeśagrahaṇam yogāṅgam jāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:22552: . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . tāsyanudāttenṅidadupadeśāt
GS24pmbhasuu:22553: lasārvadhātukam anudāttam ahnviṅoḥ iti . nanu ca uktam upadeśavacane janādīnām svaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22554: na sidhyati iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na evam vijñāyate upadeśavacane janādīnām svaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22555: na sidhyati iti . katham tarhi . janādīnām api āttve upadeśavacanam kartavyam . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:22556: tarhi tatra upadeśagrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva
GS24pmbhasuu:22557: prakṛtam . anudāttopadeśavanatitanotyādīnām anunāsikalopaḥ jhali kṅiti iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:22558: (P_6,1.196) KA_III.115.23-116.1 Ro_IV.526 seḍgrahaṇam kimartham na thali iṭ antaḥ
