GS24pmbhasuu:22559: vā iti ucyeta . iṭ antaḥ vā iti ucyamāne iha api prasajyeta papaktha . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:22560: prayojanam . acaḥ iti vartate . idam tarhi prayojanam yayātha iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:22561: (P_6,1.204) KA_III.116.3-21 Ro_IV.527-528 kimartham idam ucyate na ñniti ādiḥ nityam
GS24pmbhasuu:22562: iti eva siddham . ñniti iti ucyate na ca atra ñnitam paśyāmaḥ . pratyayalakṣaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:22563: . na lumatā tasmin iti pratyayalakṣaṇapratiṣedhaḥ . aṅgādhikāroktasya saḥ pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22564: na lumatā aṅgasya iti . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati upamānasya ādyudāttavacanam jñāpakam
GS24pmbhasuu:22566: jñāpakārtham kriyate . kim jñāpyate . etat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ anubandhalakṣaṇe svare
GS24pmbhasuu:22567: pratyayalakṣaṇam na bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . gargaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22573: ñniti iti ādyudāttatvam mā bhūt iti . iha ca :
GS24pmbhasuu:22575: taddhitasya kitaḥ iti antodāttatvam na bhavati . yadi anubandhalakṣaṇe iti ucyate pathipriyaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22577: pathimathoḥ sarvanāmasthāne iti ādyudāttatvam prāpnoti . evam tarhi ācāryaḥ jñāpayati svare pratyayalakṣaṇam na bhavati iti . evam api sarpiḥ āgaccha ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22579: āmantritasya ca iti ādyudāttatvam na prāpnoti . iha ca : ma hi datām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22581: ādiḥ sicaḥ anyatarasyām iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ na prāpnoti . evam tarhi jñāpayati ācāryaḥ saptamīnirdiṣṭe svare pratyayalakṣaṇam na bhavati iti . evam api sarvastomaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22583: sarvasya supi iti ādyudāttatvam na prāpnoti . astu tarhi anubandhalakṣaṇe iti eva . katham pathipriyaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22585: pathimathoḥ sarvanāmasthāne luki lumatā lupte pratyayalakṣaṇam na bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:22586: (P_6,1.205) KA_III.116.23-117.12 Ro_IV.529-530 niṣṭhāyām yañi dīrghatve pratiṣedhaḥ . niṣṭhāyām yañi dīrghatve pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . dattābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:22587: guptābhyām . na vā bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . bahiraṅgaḥ atra dīrghaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22588: antaraṅgaḥ svaraḥ . asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge . antareṇa pratiṣedham antareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:22589: ca etām paribhāṣām siddham . katham . na evam vijñāyate na cet ākārāntā niṣṭhā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:22590: . katham tarhi . na cet ākārāt parā niṣṭhā iti . yadi evam nirdeśaḥ ca eva na upapadyate
GS24pmbhasuu:22591: . na hi eṣā ākārāt parā pañcamī yuktā . iha ca prāpnoti . āptaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22592: rāddhaḥ iti . evam tarhi na cet avarṇāt parā niṣṭhā iti . bhavet nirdeśaḥ upapannaḥ . iha tu prāpnoti . āptaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22593: rāddhaḥ iti . iha ca na prāpnoti . yataḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22594: rataḥ . evam tarhi vihitaviśeṣaṇam akāragrahaṇam . na cet akārārāntāt vihitā niṣṭhā iti . evam api dattaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22595: atra na prāpnoti iha ca prāpnoti . āptaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22596: rāddhaḥ iti . evam tarhi kāryiviśeṣaṇam akāragrahaṇam . na cet ākārāraḥ kāryī bhavati . evam api adya aṣṭaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22598: atra na prāpnoti . tasmāt suṣṭhu ucyate niṣṭhāyām yañi dīrghatve pratiṣedhaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22600: (P_6,1.207) KA_III.117.14-19 Ro_IV.530 kim nipātyate . āśite kartari nipātanam upadhādīrhatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:22601: ādyudāttatvam ca . āśitaḥ iti ktaḥ kartari nipātyate upadhādīrhatvam . āśitavān āśitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22602: . ādyudāttatvam ca nipātyate . ādyudāttatvam anipātyam . adhikārāt siddham . upadhādīrhatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:22603: anipātyam . āṅpūrvasya prayogaḥ . yadi evam avagrahaḥ prāpnoti . na lakṣaṇena padakārāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22604: anuvartyāḥ . padkāraiḥ nāma lakṣaṇam anuvartyam . yathālakṣaṇam padam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:22605: (P_6,1.208, 215) KA_III.117.22-118.3 Ro_IV.531 kim iyam prāpte vibhāṣā āhosvit aprāpte . katham ca prāpte katham vā aprāpte . yadi sañjñāyām upamānam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22606: niṣṭhā ca dvyac anāt iti nitye prāpte ārambhaḥ tata prāpte anyatra vā aprāpte . veṇuriktayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22607: aprāpte . veṇuriktayoḥ aprāpte vibhāṣā prāpte nityaḥ vidhiḥ . veṇuḥ iva veṇuḥ . riktaḥ nāma kaḥ cit .
GS24pmbhasuu:22608: (P_6,1.217) KA_III.118.5-8 Ro_IV. 531 upottamagrahaṇam kimarthan na riti pūrvam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:22609: eva ucyeta . tatra ayam api arthaḥ . matoḥ pūrvam āt sañjñāyām striyām iti atra pūrvagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:22610: na kartavyam bhavati . evam tarhi upottamagrahaṇam uttarārtham . caṅi anyatarasyām
GS24pmbhasuu:22611: upottamam iti eva . iha mā bhūt . mā hi sma dadhat .
GS24pmbhasuu:22612: (P_6,1.220-221) KA_III.118.11-15 Ro_IV.532 kimartham idam ucyate na vatyāḥ iti eva ucyate . vatyāḥ iti iyati ucyamāne rājavatī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22613: atra api prasajyeta . atha avatyāḥ iti ucyamāne kasmāt eva atra na bhavati . asiddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22614: nalopaḥ . tasya asiddhatvāt na eṣaḥ avatīśabdaḥ . kaḥ tarhi . anvatīśabdaḥ . yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:22615: eva tarhi nalopasya asiddhatvāt na avatīśabdaḥ evam vatvasya api asiddhatvāt na avatīśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22617: (P_6,1.222) KA_III.118.17-119.14 Ro_IV.532-534 coḥ ataddhite . cusvaraḥ ataddhite iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . dādhīcaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22618: mādhūcaḥ iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . pratyayasvaraḥ atra bādhakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22619: bhaviṣyati . sthānāntaraprāptaḥ cusvaraḥ . pratyayasvarasya apavādaḥ anudāttau suppitau
GS24pmbhasuu:22620: iti . anudāttau suppitau iti asya udāttanivṛttisvaraḥ . udāttanivṛttisvarasya cusvaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22621: . saḥ yathā eva udāttanivṛttisvaram bādhate evam pratyayasvaram api bādheta . na
GS24pmbhasuu:22622: atra udāttanivṛttisvaraḥ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . na gośvansāvavarṇa iti pratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:22623: . na eṣaḥ udāttanivṛttisvarasya pratiṣedhaḥ . kasya tarhi . tṛtīyādisvarasya . yatra
GS24pmbhasuu:22624: tarhi tṛtīyādisvaraḥ na asti dadhīcaḥ paśya iti . evam tarhi na tṛtīyādilakṣaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:22625: pratiṣedham ṣiṣmaḥ . kim tarhi . yena kena cit lakṣaṇena prāptasya vibhaktisvarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:22627: plakṣavān atra na prāpnoti . matubgrahaṇam api prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:22628: . hrasvanuḍbhyām matup iti . yadi tat anuvartate vetasvān iti atra prāpnoti . matubgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:22629: anuvartate ḍmatup ca eṣaḥ . yadi tari matubgrahaṇe ḍmatupaḥ grahaṇam na bhavati vetasvān
GS24pmbhasuu:22630: iti atra vatvam na prāpnoti . sāmānyagrahaṇam vatve iha punaḥ viśiṣṭasya grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:22631: . yatra tarhi vibhaktiḥ na asti dadhīcī iti . yadi punaḥ ayam udāttanivṛttisvarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:22632: api pratiṣedhaḥ vijñāyeta . na evam śakyam . iha api prasajyeta kumārī iti . satiśiṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22633: khalu api cusvaraḥ . katham . cau iti ucyate . yatra asya etat rūpam . ajādau asarvanāmasthāne
GS24pmbhasuu:22634: abhinirvṛtte akāralope nakāralope ca . tasmāt suṣthu ucyate coḥ ataddhite iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:22635: (P_6,1.223) KA_III.119.16-120.24 Ro_IV.534-537 samāsāntodāttatve vyañjanānteṣu upasaṅkhyānam . samāsāntodāttatve vyañjanānteṣu upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam : rājadṛṣat,
GS24pmbhasuu:22636: brāhmaṇasamit . halsvaraprāptau vā vyañjanam avidyamānavat . atha vā halsvaraprāptau
GS24pmbhasuu:22637: vyañjanam avidyamānavat bhavati iti eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā . kimartham idam ubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:22638: ucyate na halsvaraprāptau avidyamānavat iti eva ucyate svaraprāptau vyañjanam avidyamānavat
GS24pmbhasuu:22639: bhavati iti vā . dvirbaddham subaddham bhavati iti . yadi halsvaraprāptau vyañjanam
GS24pmbhasuu:22641: udāttāt anudāttasya svaritaḥ iti svaritatvam na prāpnoti . udāttāt ca svaravidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:22642: vyañjanam avidyamānavat bhavati iti eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā . kāni etasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22643: prayojanāni . prayojanam lidādyudāttāntodāttvidhayaḥ . liti pratyayāt pūrvam udāttam
GS24pmbhasuu:22647: jihīrṣakaḥ iti atra na syāt . ñniti ādiḥ nityam iti iha eva syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:22650: kṛtiḥ iti atra na syāt . dhātoḥ antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati iti iha eva syāt ūrṇoti . pacati
GS24pmbhasuu:22651: iti atra na syāt . idam tāvat yat ucyate halsvaraprāptau vyañjanam avidyamānavat
GS24pmbhasuu:22652: bhavati iti katham hi halaḥ nāma svaraprāptiḥ syāt . tat ca api bruvatā udāttāt ca
GS24pmbhasuu:22653: svaravidhau iti vaktavyam . tathā anudāttādeḥ antodāttāt ca yat ucyate tat vyañjanādeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22654: vyañjanāntāt ca na prāpnoti . yadi punaḥ svaravidhau vyañjanam avidyamānavat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:22655: iti ucyeta . atha svaravidhau vyañjanam avidyamānavat bhavati iti ucyamāne anudāttādeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22656: antodāttāt ca yat ucyate tat kim siddham bhavati vyañjanādeḥ vyañjanāntāt ca . bāḍham
GS24pmbhasuu:22657: siddham . katham . svaravidhiḥ iti sarvavibhaktyantaḥ samāsaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:22659: svarasya vidhiḥ svaravidhiḥ iti . na evam śakyam . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt . udaśvitvān ghoṣaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22660: vidyutvān balāhakaḥ iti . hrasvanuḍbhyām matup iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ prasajyeta . astu
GS24pmbhasuu:22661: tarhi halsvaraprāptau vyañjanam avidyamānavat bhavati iti . nanu ca uktam katham
GS24pmbhasuu:22662: hi halaḥ nāma svaraprāptiḥ syāt . uccaiḥ udāttaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22663: nīcaiḥ anudāttaḥ iti atra ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭam ajgrahaṇam nivṛttam . tasmin nivṛtte halaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22664: api svaraprāptiḥ bhavati . yat api ucyate udāttāt ca svaravidhau iti vaktavyam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:22665: . na vaktavyam . na idam pāribhāṣikasya anudāttasya grahaṇam . kim tarhi . anvarthagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:22666: . avidyamānodāttam anudāttam . tasya svaritaḥ iti . yat api ucyate tat vyañjanādeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22667: vyañjanāntāt ca na prāpnoti iti . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati siddham tat bhavati vyañjanādeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22668: vyañjanāntāt ca iti yat ayam na uttarapade anudāttādau iti uktvā apṛthivīrudralkpūṣamanthiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:22669: iti pratiṣedham śāsti . sā tarhi eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā . na kartavyā . ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22670: jñāpayati bhavati eṣā paribhāṣā yat ayam yataḥ anāvaḥ iti nāvaḥ pratiṣedham śāsti .
GS24pmbhasuu:22671: (P_6,2.1) KA_III.121.2-123.3 Ro_IV.538-542 kimartham idam ucyate . bahuvrīhisvaram
GS24pmbhasuu:22672: śāsti samāsāntavidheḥ sukṛt . sukṛt ācāryaḥ samāsāntodāttatve prāpte bahuvrīhisvaram
GS24pmbhasuu:22673: apavādam śāsti . na etat asti prayojanam . nañsubhyām niyamārtham tu . nañsubhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:22674: iti etat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . nañsubhyām eva bahuvrīheḥ antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:22675: na anyasya iti . evam api kutat etat pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaratvam bhaviṣyati na punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22676: parasya iti . parasya śitiśāsanāt . śiteḥ nityābahvac iti etat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:22677: . śiteḥ eva na anyataḥ iti . yat tāvat ucyate nañsubhyām niyamārtham iti kṣepe vidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22678: nañaḥ asiddhaḥ . udarāśveṣuṣu kṣepe iti etasmin prāpte tataḥ etat ucyate . yat api
GS24pmbhasuu:22679: ucyate parasya śitiśāsanāt iti parasya niyamaḥ bhavet . parasya eṣaḥ niyamaḥ syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:22680: . śiteḥ nityābahvac iti . yadi pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaram samāsāntodāttatvam bādhate capriyaḥ vāpriyaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22681: atra api prāpnoti . antaḥ cavāpriye sambhavāt . antodāttatvam cavāpriye siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:22682: kutaḥ . sambhavāt . asati khalu api sambhave bādhanam bhavati . asti ca sambhavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22683: yat ubhayam syāt . sati api sambhave bādhanam bhavati . tat yathā . dadhi brāhmaṇebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22684: dīyatām takram kauṇḍinyāya iti sati api sambhave dadhidānasya takradānam nivartakam
GS24pmbhasuu:22685: bhavati . evam iha api sati api sambhave pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaram samāsāntodāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:22686: bādhiṣyate . evam tarhi prakṛtāt vidheḥ . bahuvrīhau prkṛtyā pūrvapadam prakṛtisvaram
GS24pmbhasuu:22687: bhavati iti . kim ca prakṛtam . udāttaḥ iti ca vartate . evam api kāryapriyaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22689: atra na prāpnoti . svarite api udāttaḥ asti . atha vā svaritagrahaṇam api prakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:22690: anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . tit svaritam iti . bahuvrīhau ṛte siddham . antareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:22691: api bahuvrīhigrahaṇam siddham . tatpuruṣe kasmāt na bhavati . tatpuruṣe tulyārthatṛtīyāsaptamyupamānāvyayadvitīyākṛtyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22692: iti etat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . dvigau tarhi kasmāt na bhavati . igante dvigau
GS24pmbhasuu:22693: iti etat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . dvandve tarhi prāpnoti . rājanyabahuvacanadvandve
GS24pmbhasuu:22694: andhakavṛṣṇiṣu iti etat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . avyayībhāve tarhi prāpnoti . paripratyupāpāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22695: varjyamānāhorātrāvayaveṣu iti etat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . evam api kutaḥ etat evam
GS24pmbhasuu:22696: niyamaḥ bhaviṣyati eteṣām eva tatpuruṣādiṣu iti na punaḥ evam niyamaḥ syāt eteṣām
GS24pmbhasuu:22697: tatpuruṣādiṣu eva iti . iṣṭataḥ ca avadhāraṇam . iṣṭataḥ ca avadhāraṇam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:22698: . eteṣām tarhi bahuvrīheḥ ca paryāyaḥ prāpnoti . dvipāddiṣṭeḥ vitasteḥ ca paryāyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22699: na prakalpate . yat ayam dvitribhyām pāddanmūrdhasu bahuvrīhau diṣṭivitasyoḥ ca iti
GS24pmbhasuu:22700: siddhe paryāye paryāyam śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na paryāyaḥ bhavati iti . udātte
GS24pmbhasuu:22701: jñāpakam tu etat . udātte etat jñāpakam syāt . svaritena samāviśet . svaritena samāveśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22702: prāpnoti . svarite api udāttaḥ asti . bahuvrīhisvaram śāsti samāsāntavidheḥ sukṛt
GS24pmbhasuu:22703: . nañsubhyām niyamārtham tu . parasya śitiśāsanāt . kṣepe vidhiḥ nañaḥ asiddhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:22704: parasya niyamaḥ bhavet . antaḥ cavāpriye sambhavāt . prakṛtāt vidheḥ . bahuvrīhau
GS24pmbhasuu:22705: ṛte siddham . iṣṭataḥ ca avadhāraṇam . dvipāddiṣṭeḥ vitasteḥ ca paryāyaḥ na prakalpate
GS24pmbhasuu:22706: . udātte jñāpakam tu etat . svaritena samāviśet .
GS24pmbhasuu:22708: pratiṣedhaḥ . tatpuruṣe vibhaktiprakṛtisvaratve karmadhāraye pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22709: . paramam kārakam paramakārakam paramena kārakeṇa paramakārakeṇa ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22710: parame kārake paramakārake . siddham tu lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya eva
GS24pmbhasuu:22711: grahaṇāt . siddham etat . katham . lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya eva iti
GS24pmbhasuu:22712: pratipadam yaḥ dvitīyātṛtīyāsaptamīsamāsaḥ tasya grahaṇam lakṣaṇoktaḥ ca ayam . avyaye
GS24pmbhasuu:22713: parigaṇanam kartavyam . avyaye nañkunipātānām . avyaye nañkunipātānām iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:22718: pītvāsthirakaḥ . ktvāyām vā pratiṣedhaḥ . ktvāyām vā pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . snātvākālakaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22719: pītvāsthirakaḥ . ubhayam na vaktavyam . nipātanāt siddham . nipātanāt etat siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:22720: . kim nipātanam . avaśyam atra samāsārtham lyababhāvārtham ca nipātanam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:22723: . sadṛśagrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . tṛtīyāsamāsavacanāt . sadṛśaśabdena tṛtīyāsamāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22724: ucyate . tatra tṛtīyāpūrvapadam prakṛtisvaram bhavati iti eva siddham . ṣaṣṭhyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:22725: tarhi idam vaktavyam . pituḥ sadṛśaḥ pitṛsadṛśaḥ iti . ṣaṣṭhyartham iti cet tṛtīyāsamāsavacanānarthakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:22726: . ṣaṣṭhyartham iti cet tṛtīyāsamāsavacanam anarthakam syāt . kim kāraṇam . iha asmābhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22727: traiśabdyam sādhyam . pitrā sadṛśaḥ pituḥ sadṛśaḥ pitṛsadṛśaḥ iti . tatra dvayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22728: śabdayoḥ samānārthayoḥ ekena vigrahaḥ apareṇa samāsaḥ bhaviṣyati aviravikanyāyena
GS24pmbhasuu:22729: . tat yathā aveḥ māṃsam iti vigṛhya avikaśabdāt utpattiḥ bhavati ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22730: āvikam iti evam pituḥ sadṛśaḥ iti vigṛhya pitṛsadṛśaḥ iti bhaviṣyati pitrā sadṛśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22731: iti vigṛhya vākyam eva . avaśyam tṛtīyāsamāsaḥ vaktavyaḥ yatra ṣaṣṭhyarthaḥ na asti
GS24pmbhasuu:22733: adhayayanasadṛśaḥ iti . yadi tarhi tasya nibandhanam asti tat eva vaktavyam idam na vaktavyam . idam api avaśyam vaktavyam yatra ṣaṣṭhī śrūyate tadartham . dāsyāḥsadṛśaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22735: (P_6,2.29) KA_III.124.14-19 Ro_IV.545 igantaprakṛtisvaratve yaṇguṇayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam . igantaprakṛtisvaratve yaṇguṇayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . pañcāratnyaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22736: daśāratanyaḥ . yaṇguṇayoḥ kṛtayoḥ igante dvigau iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ na prāpnoti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:22737: vā bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:22738: bahiraṅgau yaṇguṇau . antaraṅgaḥ svaraḥ . asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge .
GS24pmbhasuu:22739: (P_6,2.33) KA_III.124.21-125.8 Ro_IV.545-546 paripratyupāpebhyaḥ vanam samāse vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:22740: . paripratyupāpebhyaḥ vanam samāse iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena . paripratyupāpāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22742: parisauvīram . vanam samāse iti asya avakāśaḥ pravaṇe yaṣṭavyam . iha ubhayam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:22743: parivanam apavanam . vanam samāse iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena . na vā vanasyāndodāttatvavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:22744: tadapavādanivṛttyartham . na vā arthaḥ vipratiṣedhena . kim kāraṇam . vanasyāndodāttatvavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:22745: tadapavādanivṛttyartham . siddham atra antodāttatvam utsargeṇa eva . tasya punarvacane
GS24pmbhasuu:22746: etat prayojanam . ye anye tadapavādāḥ prāpnuvanti tadbādhanārtham . saḥ yathā eva
GS24pmbhasuu:22747: tadapavādam avyayasvaram bādhate evam idam api bādhiṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:22748: (P_6,2.36) KA_III.125.10-16 Ro_IV.546-547 ācāryopasarjane anekasya api pūrvapadatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:22749: sandehaḥ . ācāryopasarjane anekasya api pūrvapadatvāt sandehaḥ bhavati . āpiśalapāṇinīyavyāḍīyagautamīyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22750: . ekam padam varjayitvā sarvāṇi pūrvapadāni . tatra na jñāyate kasya pūrvapadasya
GS24pmbhasuu:22751: prakṛtisvareṇa bhavitavyam iti . lokavijñānāt siddham . tat yathā loke ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22752: amīṣām brāhmaṇānām pūrvam ānaya iti yaḥ sarvapūrvaḥ saḥ ānīyate evam iha api yat sarvapūrvapadam tasya prakṛtisvaratvam bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:22753: (P_6,2.38) KA_III.125.19-21 Ro_IV.547 kimartham mahataḥ pravṛddhaśabde uttarapade
GS24pmbhasuu:22754: pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaratvam ucyate na karmadhāraye aniṣṭhā iti eva siddham . na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:22755: . kim kāraṇam . śreṇyādisamāse evat tat iha mā bhūt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22757: (P_6,2.42) KA_III.126.3-14 Ro_IV.547-549 kuruvṛjyoḥ gārhapate . kuruvṛjyoḥ gārhapate iti vaktavyam . kurugārhapatam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22758: vṛjigāṛhapatam . kurugārhapatariktarurvasūtajaratyaślīladṛḍharūpāpārevaḍavātailikadrūḥpaṇyakamabalaḥ dāsībhārādīnām iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt . devahūtiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22762: candramāḥ . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . kurugārhapatariktarurvasūtajaratyaślīladṛḍharūpāpārevaḍavātailikadrūḥpaṇyakamabalaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22763: iti . tataḥ dāsībhārāṇām ca iti . tatra bahuvacananirdeśāt dāsībhārādīnām iti vijñāsyate
GS24pmbhasuu:22764: . paṇyakambalaḥ sañjñāyām . paṇyakambalaḥ sañjñāyām iti vaktavyam . yaḥ paṇitavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22765: kambalaḥ paṇyakambalaḥ eva asau bhavati . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:22766: paṇyakambalaḥ eva yathā syāt . kva mā bhūt . paṇyagavaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22768: (P_6,2.47) KA_III.126.16-20 Ro_IV.549 ahīne iti kimartham . kāntārātītaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22769: yojanātītaḥ . ahīne dvitīyā anupasarge . ahīne dvitīyā anupasarge iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . sukhaprāptaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22770: duḥkhaprāptaḥ . tat tarhi vaktavyam . yadi api etat ucyate atha vā etarhi ahīnagrahaṇam na kariṣyate . iha api kāntārātītaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22771: yojanātītaḥ iti anupasarge iti eva siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:22772: (P_6,2.49) KA_III.126.22-128.14 Ro_IV.550-555 anantaraḥ iti kimartham . iha mā bhūt . abhyuddhṛtam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22773: upasamāhṛtam . gateḥ anantaragrahaṇam anarthakam gatiḥ gatau anudāttavacanāt . gateḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22774: anantaragrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . gatiḥ gatau anudāttavacanāt . gatau parataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22775: gateḥ anudāttatvam ucyate . tat bādhakam bhaviṣyati . tatra yasya aprakṛtisvaratvam
GS24pmbhasuu:22776: tasmāt antodāttaprasaṅgaḥ. tatra yasya gateḥ aprakṛtisvaratvam tasmāt antodāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:22777: prāpnoti antaḥ thāthaghañktājabitrakāṇām iti . prakṛtisvaravacanāt hi ananodāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:22778: . prakṛtisvaravacanasāmarthyāt hi antodāttatvam na bhaviṣyati . yadi hi syāt prakṛtisvaravacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:22779: idānīm kimartham syāt . prakṛtisvaravacanam kimartham iti cet ekagatyartham . prakṛtisvaravacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:22780: kimartham iti cet ekagatyartham . yatra ekaḥ gatiḥ tadartham etat syāt . prakṛtam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22781: prahṛtam . evamartham eva tarhi anantagrahaṇam kartavyam atra yathā syāt . kriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:22782: api vai anantagrahaṇe atra na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . gatiḥ anantaraḥ pūrvapadam
GS24pmbhasuu:22783: prakṛtisvaram bhavati iti ucyate . yaḥ ca atra gatiḥ anantaraḥ na asau pūrvapadam
GS24pmbhasuu:22784: yaḥ ca pūrvapadam na asau anantaraḥ . apūrvapadārtham tarhi idam vaktavyam . apūrvapadasya
GS24pmbhasuu:22785: api gateḥ prakṛtisvaratvam yathā syāt . apūrvapadārtham iti cet kārake atiprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22786: .apūrvapadārtham iti cet kārake atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . āgataḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22787: dūrādāgataḥ . saḥ yathā eva gatipūrvapadasya bhavati evam kārakapūrvapadasya api
GS24pmbhasuu:22788: prāpnoti . siddham tu gateḥ antodāttāprasaṅgāt . siddham etat . katham .yat tat gateḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22789: antodāttāprasaṅgāt antaḥ thāthaghañktājabitrakāṇām iti etat gateḥ na prasaṅktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:22790: . kim kṛtam bhavati . kṛtsvarāpavādaḥ ayam bhavati . tatra gatiḥ anantaraḥ iti asya avakāśaḥ prakṛtam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22791: prahṛtam . antaḥ thāthaghañktājabitrakāṇām iti asya avakāśaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22794: dūrādāgataḥ . antaḥ thāthaghañktājabitrakāṇām iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena . avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:22795: gateḥ tat prasaṅktavyam bhedaḥ prabhedaḥ iti evamartham . evam tarhi yogavibhāgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22796: kariṣyate . antaḥ thāthaghañktājabitrakāṇām iti . tataḥ ktaḥ . ktāntam uttarapadam
GS24pmbhasuu:22797: antodāttam bhavati . atra kārakopapadagrahaṇam . anuvartate gatigrahaṇam nivṛttam
GS24pmbhasuu:22798: . atha vā upariṣṭād yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . idam asti sūpamānāt ktaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22800: pravṛddhādīnām ca iti . tataḥ vakṣyāmi kārakāt . kārakāt ca ktāntam uttarapadam antodāttam
GS24pmbhasuu:22801: bhavati . tataḥ dattaśrutayoḥ eva āśiṣi kārakāt iti . evam ca kṛtvā na arthaḥ anantagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:22802: . katham abhyuddhṛtam . ut haratikriyam viśinaṣṭi . udā viśiṣṭam abhiḥ viśinaṣṭi
GS24pmbhasuu:22803: . . tatra gatiḥ anantaraḥ iti ca prāpnoti gatiḥ gatau iti ca . gatiḥ anantaraḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:22804: asya avakāśaḥ prakṛtam prahṛtam . gatiḥ gatau iti asya avakāśaḥ abhi ut harati ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22805: upa sam ā dadhāti . iha ubhayam prāpnoti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22807: upasamāhṛtam . gatiḥ gatau iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena .evam tarhi siddhe sati
GS24pmbhasuu:22808: yat anantaragrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati eṣā paribhāṣā kṛdgrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:22809: gatikārakapūrvasya api iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . avataptenakulasthitam te etat ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22810: udakeviśīrṇam te etat . sagatikena sanakulena samāsaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:22811: (P_6,2.50) KA_III.128.16-129.2 Ro_IV.555-556 kṛdgrahaṇam kimartham . yathā takārādigrahṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:22812: kṛdviśeṣaṇam vijñāyeta . takārādau niti kṛti iti . atha akriyamāṇe kṛdgrahaṇe kasya
GS24pmbhasuu:22813: takārādigrahṇam viśeṣaṇam syāt . uttarapadaviśeṣaṇam . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . iha eva
GS24pmbhasuu:22814: syāt prataritā prataritum . iha na syāt prakartā prakartum . tādau niti kṛdgrahaṇānarthakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:22815: . tādau niti kṛdgrahaṇam anarthakam . kriyamāṇe api kṛdgrahaṇe aniṣṭam śakyam vijñātum
GS24pmbhasuu:22816: . takārādau uttarapade niti kṛti iti . akriyamāṇe ca iṣṭam . nit yaḥ takārādiḥ tadante
GS24pmbhasuu:22817: uttarapade iti . yāvatā kriyamāṇe api aniṣṭam vijñāyate akriyamāṇe ca iṣṭam akriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:22818: eva iṣṭam vijñāsyāmaḥ . kṛdupadeśe vā tādyartham iḍartham .kṛdupadeśe tarhi tādyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:22819: iḍartham kṛdgrahaṇam kartavyam . kṛdupadeśe yaḥ takārādiḥ iti evam yathā vijñāyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:22820: . kim prayojanam . iḍartham . iḍādau api siddham bhavati . pralavitā pralavitum .
GS24pmbhasuu:22822: . anigantaprakṛtisvaratve yaṇādeśe prakṛtisvarabhāvaḥ prāpnoti . pratyaṅ pratyañcau
GS24pmbhasuu:22823: pratyañcaḥ . anigantavacanam idānīm kimartham syāt . anigantavacanam kimartham iti
GS24pmbhasuu:22824: cet ayaṇādiṣṭārtham . ayaṇādiṣṭārtham etat syāt . yadā yaṇādeśaḥ na . kadā ca yaṇādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22825: na . yādā śākalam . uktam vā . kim uktam . samāse śākalam na bhavati iti . yatra
GS24pmbhasuu:22827: pratīcaḥ pratīicā . cusvaraḥ tatra bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . ayam eva iṣyate . vakṣyati hi etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:22828: coḥ anigantaḥ añcatau vapratyaye iti . yat tarhi nyadhyoḥ prakṛtisvaram śāsti . eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22829: hi yaṇādiṣṭārthaḥ ārambhaḥ . etat api ayaṇādiṣṭārtham eva syāt . yadā yaṇādeśaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:22830: . kadā ca yaṇādeśaḥ na . yādā śākalam . uktam vā . kim uktam . samāse śākalam na
GS24pmbhasuu:22831: bhavati iti . yatra tarhi añcateḥ akāraḥ lupyate . adhīcaḥ adhīcā . cusvaraḥ tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:22832: bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . ayam eva iṣyate . vakṣyati he etat coḥ anigantaḥ añcatau vapratyaye
GS24pmbhasuu:22833: iti . yat tarhi neḥ eva prakṛtisvaram śāsti . eṣaḥ hi yaṇādiṣṭārthaḥ ārambhaḥ . etat
GS24pmbhasuu:22834: api ayaṇādiṣṭārtham eva syāt . katham . akṛte yaṇādeśa pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaratve kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:22835: udāttasvaritoḥ yaṇaḥ svaritaḥ vā anudāttasya iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . nyaṅ
GS24pmbhasuu:22836: . tasmāt suṣṭhu ucyate anigantaprakṛtisvaratve yaṇādeśe prakṛtisvarabhāvaprasaṅgaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:22837: (P_6,2.52.2) KA_III.129.22-131.14 Ro_IV.557-561 coḥ anigantaḥ añcatau vapratyaye
GS24pmbhasuu:22838: . cusvarāt anigantaḥ añcatau vapratyaye iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:22839: cusvarasya avakāśaḥ dadhīcaḥ paśya . dadhīcā dadhīce . anigantaḥ añcatau vapratyaye
GS24pmbhasuu:22840: iti asya avakāśaḥ parāṅ parāñcau parāñcaḥ . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . avācā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22841: avāce . avakāśaḥ iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena . na vā cusvarasya pūrvapadaprakṛtisvarabhāvini
GS24pmbhasuu:22842: pratiṣedhāt itarathā hi sarvāpavādaḥ . na vā etat vipratiṣedhena api sidhyati . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:22843: tarhi sidhyati . cusvarasya pūrvapadaprakṛtisvarabhāvini pratiṣedhāt . cursvaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22844: pūrvapadaprakṛtisvarabhāvinaḥ pratiṣedhyaḥ . itarathā hi sarvāpavādaḥ cusvaraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:22845: akriyamāṇe hi pratiṣedhe sarvāpavādaḥ ayam cusvaraḥ . katham . pratyayasvarasya apavādaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22846: anudāttau suppitau iti . anudāttau suppitau iti asya udāttanivṛttisvaraḥ . udāttanivṛttisvarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:22847: cusvaraḥ . saḥ yathā eva udāttanivṛttisvaram bādhate evam anigantasvaram api bādheta
GS24pmbhasuu:22848: . yadi tāvat saṅkhyātaḥ sāmyam ayam api caturthaḥ . samāsāntodāttatvasya apavādaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22849: avyayasvaraḥ . avyayasvarasya kṛtsvaraḥ . kṛtsvarasya ayam . ubhayoḥ caturthayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22850: yuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . satiśiṣṭaḥ tarhi cusvaraḥ . katham . cau iti ucyate . yatra
GS24pmbhasuu:22851: asya etat rūpam . ajādau asarvanāmasthāne abhinirvṛtte akāralope nakāralope ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:22852: tasmāt suṣthu ucyate na vā cusvarasya pūrvapadaprakṛtisvarabhāvini pratiṣedhāt itarathā
GS24pmbhasuu:22853: hi sarvāpavādaḥ iti . vibhaktīṣatsvarāt kṛtsvaraḥ . vibhaktisvarāt īṣatsvarāt ca
GS24pmbhasuu:22854: kṛtsvaraḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . vibhaktisvarasya avakāśaḥ akṣaśauṇḍaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22856: idhmapravraścanaḥ . iha ubhayam prāpnoti pūrvāhṇesphoṭakāḥ . kṛtsvaraḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . īṣatsvarasya avakāśaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22858: īṣatpiṅgalaḥ . kṛtsvarasya saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22859: īṣadbhedaḥ . kṛtsvaraḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . citsvarāt hārisvaraḥ . citsvarāt hārisvaraḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . citsvarasya avakāśaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22865: mātṛgavaḥ . hārisvaraḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . kṛtsvarāt ca . kṛtsvarāt ca hārisvaraḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . kṛtsvarasya avakāśaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22866: idhmapravraścanaḥ . hārisvarasya saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22868: vāḍavahṛtaḥ . hārisvaraḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . na vā haraṇapratiṣedhaḥ jñāpakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22869: kṛtsvarābhādhakatavsya . na vā arthaḥ vipratiṣedhena . kim kāraṇam . haraṇapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22870: jñāpakaḥ kṛtsvarābhādhakatvasya . yat ayam aharaṇe iti pratiṣedham śāsti tat jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:22871: ācāryaḥ na kṛtsvaraḥ hārisvaram bādhate iti . na etat asti jñāpakam . anaḥ bhāvakarmavacanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22872: iti etasmin prāpte tata etat ucyate . yadi evam sādhīyaḥ jñāpakam . kṛtsvarasya apavādaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22873: anaḥ bhāvakarmavacanaḥ iti . bādhakam kila bādhate kim punaḥ tam . yuktasvaraḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:22876: aśvavallavaḥ . kṛtsvarasya saḥ eva. iha ubhayam prāpnoti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22880: (P_6,2.80) KA_III.131.16-25 Ro_IV.561-562 upamānam iti kimartham . śabdārthaprakṛtau
GS24pmbhasuu:22881: eva iti iyati ucyamāne pūrveṇa atiprasaktam iti kṛtvā niyamaḥ ayam vijñāyeta . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:22882: kaḥ doṣaḥ . iha na syāt . puṣphārī phalahārī . upamānagrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na
GS24pmbhasuu:22883: doṣaḥ bhavati . atha śabdārthagrahaṇam kimartham . upamānam prakṛtau eva iti iyati
GS24pmbhasuu:22884: ucyamāne iha api prasajyeta . vṛkavañcī vṛkaprekṣī . śabdāṛthagrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:22885: na doṣaḥ bhavati . atha prakṛtigrahaṇam kimartham . śabdārthaprakṛtiḥ eva yaḥ nityam
GS24pmbhasuu:22886: tatra yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt . kokilabhivyāhārī . atha evakāraḥ kimarthaḥ . niyamārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22887: . na etat asti prayojanam . siddhe vidhiḥ ārabhyamāṇaḥ antareṇa evakāram niyamāṛthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22888: bhaviṣyati . iṣṭataḥ avadhāraṇārthaḥ tarhi . yathā evam vijñāyete :
GS24pmbhasuu:22889: upamānam śabdārthaprakṛtau eva iti . mā evam vijñāyīta :
GS24pmbhasuu:22890: upamānam eva śabdārthaprakṛtau iti . śabdārthaprakṛtau hi upamānam ca anupamānam ca ādyudāttam iṣyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:22892: (P_6,2.82) KA_III.132.2-6 Ro_IV.562 je dīrghāt bahvacaḥ . je dīrghāntasya ādiḥ udāttaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22893: bhavati iti etasmāt anytāt pūrvam bahvacaḥ iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena . je dīrghāntasya
GS24pmbhasuu:22894: ādiḥ udāttaḥ bhavati iti asya avakāśaḥ kuṭījaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22895: śamījaḥ . anytāt pūrvam bahvacaḥ iti asya avakāśaḥ upasarajaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22897: balabhījaḥ . anytāt pūrvam bahvacaḥ iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:22898: (P_6,2.91) KA_III.132.8-10 Ro_IV.562 ādyudāttaprakaraṇe divodāsādīnām chandasi upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:22899: . ādyudāttaprakaraṇe divodāsādīnām chandasi upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . divodāsāya
GS24pmbhasuu:22901: (P_6,2.92-93) KA_III.132.13-21 Ro_IV.562-563 sarvagrahaṇam kimartham . guṇāt kārtsnye iti iyati ucyamāne iha api prasajyeta paramaśuklaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22902: paramakṣṛṇa iti . sarvagrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ bhavati . atha guṇagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:22903: kimartham . sarvam kārtsnye iti iyati ucyamāne iha api prasajyeta sarvasauvarṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22904: sarvarājataḥ iti . guṇagrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ bhavati . atha kārtsnyagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:22905: kimartham . sarvam guṇe iti iyati ucyamāne iha api prasajyeta sarveṣām śvetaḥ sarvaśvetaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22906: iti . katham ca atra samāsaḥ . ṣaṣṭhīsubantena samasyate iti . guṇena na iti pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22907: prāpnoti . guṇāt tareṇa samāsaḥ taralopaḥ ca . guṇāt tareṇa samāsaḥ taralopaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:22909: (P_6,2.105) KA_III.133.2-5 Ro_IV.563-564 ayuktaḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ . na hi uttarapadam
GS24pmbhasuu:22910: nāma vṛddhiḥ asti . katham tarhi nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . vṛddhimati uttarapade iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:22911: saḥ tarhi tathā nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . na evam vijñāyate . uttarapadam
GS24pmbhasuu:22913: uttarapadavṛddhau iti . katham tarhi . uttarapadasya vṛddhiḥ asmin saḥ ayam uttarapadavṛddhiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22915: (P_6,2.106) KA_III.133.7-14 Ro_IV.564 bahuvrīhau viśvasya antodāttāt sañjñāyām mitrājinayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22916: antaḥ .bahuvrīhau viśvasya antodāttāt sañjñāyām mitrājinayoḥ antaḥ iti etat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:22917: vipratiṣedhena . bahuvrīhau viśvam sañjñāyām iti asya avakāśaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22919: viśvayaśāḥ . sañjñāyām mitrājinayoḥ antaḥ iti asya avakāśaḥ kulamitram ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22921: viśvājinaḥ . sañjñāyām mitrājinayoḥ antaḥ iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena . antodāttaprakaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:22922: marudvṛdhādīnām chandasi upasaṅkhyānam . antodāttaprakaraṇe marudvṛdhādīnām chandasi
GS24pmbhasuu:22925: kṣepe iti etasmāt nañsubhyām iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena . udarāśveṣuṣu kṣepe
GS24pmbhasuu:22927: ghaṭodaraḥ . nañsubhyām iti asya avakāśaḥ ayavaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22934: sūdaraḥ . nañsubhyām iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:22935: (P_6,2.117) KA_III.133.22-134.3 Ro_IV.565 soḥ manasoḥ kapi . soḥ manasī alomoṣasī
GS24pmbhasuu:22936: iti etasmāt kapi pūrvam iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena . soḥ manasī alomoṣasī iti
GS24pmbhasuu:22937: etasya avakāśaḥ suśarmāṇam adhi nāvam ruheyam . suśarmā asi supratiṣṭhānaḥ . susrotāḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22939: suvarcāḥ . kapi pūrvam iti asya avakāśaḥ ayavakaḥ . iha ubhayam prāpnoti suśarmakaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22940: susrotakaḥ . kapi pūrvam iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:22941: (P_6,2.121) KA_III.134.5-9 Ro_IV.565 pūrvādibhyaḥ kūlādīnām ādyudāttatvam . pūrvādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22942: kūlādīnām ādyudāttatvam bhavati vipratiṣedhena . paripratiupāpāḥ varyajānāhorātrāvayaveṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:22948: (P_6,2.126, 130) KA_III.134.12-17 Ro_IV.565 celarājyādibhyaḥ avyayam . celarājyādisvarāt avyayayasvaraḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . celarājyādisvarasya avakāśaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22954: kurājyam . saḥ tarhi pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . iṣṭavācī paraśabdaḥ . vipratiṣedhe param yat iṣṭam tat bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:22956: tatsamudāyagrahaṇam kartavyam . vanasamudāyavācīcet kuṇḍaśabdaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:22958: (P_6,2.139) KA_III.135.2-136.6 Ro_IV.566-570 gatikārakopapadāt iti kimartham . iha mā bhūt . paramam kārakam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22959: paramakārakam . gatikārakopapadāt iti ucyamāne api tatra prāpnoti . etat hi kārakam . idam tarhi . devadattasya kārakam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22960: devadattakārakam . idam ca api udāharaṇam paramam kārakam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22961: paramakārakam iti . na etat kārakam . kārakaviśeṣaṇam etat . yāvat brūyāt prakṛṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:22962: kārakam śobhanam kārakam iti tāvat etat paramakārakam iti . atha kṛdgrahaṇam kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:22964: nivārāṇasiḥ iti . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati gatyādibhyaḥ prakṛtisvaratve kṛdgrahaṇānarthakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:22965: anyasya uttarapadasya abhāvāt . gatyādibhyaḥ prakṛtisvaratve kṛdgrahaṇam anarthakam
GS24pmbhasuu:22966: . kim kāraṇam . anyasya uttarapadasya abhāvāt . na hi anyat gatiyādibhyaḥ uttarapadam
GS24pmbhasuu:22967: asti anyat ataḥ kṛtaḥ . kim kāraṇam . dhātoḥ hi dvaye pratyayāḥ vidhīyante tiṅaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22968: kṛtaḥ ca . tatra kṛtā saha samāsaḥ bhavati tiṅā ca na bhavati . tatra antareṇa kṛdgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:22969: kṛtaḥ eva bhaviṣyati . nanu ca idānīm eva udāhṛtam niṣkauśāmbiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22970: nirvārāṇasiḥ iti . yatkriyāyuktāḥ tam prati gatyupasargsañjñe bhavataḥ na ca nisaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22971: kauśāmbīśabdam prati kriyāyogaḥ . kṛtprakṛtau vā gatitvāt adhikāṛtham kṛdgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:22972: . kṛtprakṛtau tarhi gatitvāt adhikāṛtham kṛdgrahaṇam kartavyam . kṛtprakṛtiḥ dhātuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22973: . dhātum ca prati kriyāyogaḥ . tatra yatkriyāyuktāḥ tam prati iti iha eva syāt . praṇīḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22975: unnāyakaḥ . etat api na asti prayojanam . yatkriyāyuktāḥ iti na evam vijñāyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:22976: yasya kriyā yatkriyā yatkriyāyuktāḥ tam prati gatyupasargsañjñe bhavataḥ iti . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:22977: tarhi yā kriyā yatkriyā yatkriyāyuktāḥ tam prati gatyupasargsañjñe bhavataḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:22978: na ca kaḥ cit kevalaḥ śabdaḥ asti yaḥ tasya arthasya vācakaḥ syāt . kevalaḥ tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:22979: arthasya vācakaḥ na asti iti kṛtvā kṛdadhikasya bhaviṣyati . nanu ca yayam tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:22980: eva arthasya vācakaḥ praṇīḥ iti . eṣaḥ api hi kartṛviśiṣṭasya . ayam tarhi tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:22981: eva arthasya vācakaḥ prabhavanam iti . tasmāt kṛdgrahaṇam kartavyam . yadi kṛdgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:22982: kriyate āmante svaraḥ na prāpnoti . prapacatitarām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:22983: prajalpatitarām . asati punaḥ kṛdgrahaṇe kriyāpradhānam ākhyātam tasya atiśaye tarap
GS24pmbhasuu:22984: utpadyate tarabantasya svārthe ām . tatra yatkriyāyuktāḥ iti bhavati eva saṅghātam
GS24pmbhasuu:22985: prati kriyāyogaḥ . na ca kaḥ cit kevalaḥ śabdaḥ asti yaḥ tasya arthasya vācakaḥ syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:22986: . kevalaḥ tasya arthasya vācakaḥ na asti iti kṛtvā adhikasya bhaviṣyati . nanu ca
GS24pmbhasuu:22987: yayam tasya eva arthasya vācakaḥ prabhavanam iti . eṣaḥ api dravyaviśiṣṭasya . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:22988: kṛdabhihitaḥ bhāvaḥ dravyavat bhavati kriyāvat api iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:22989: (P_6,2.143) KA_III.136.8-137.4 Ro_IV.571-573 kim samāsaya antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati āhosvit
GS24pmbhasuu:22990: uttarapadasya . kutaḥ sandehaḥ . ubhayam prakṛtam . tatra anyatarat śakyam viśeṣayitum
GS24pmbhasuu:22991: . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . antodāttatvam samāsasya iti cet kapi upasaṅkhyānam . antodāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:22992: samāsasya iti cet kapi upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . idametattadbhyaḥ prathamapūraṇayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:22993: kriyāgaṇane kapi ca iti vaktavyam iha api yathā syāt . idamprathamakāḥ . astu tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:22998: asvakaḥ . kapi pūrvam iti asya apavādaḥ hrasvānte antyāt pūrvam iti . tatra hrasvānte
GS24pmbhasuu:22999: antyāt pūrvaḥ udāttabhāvī na asti iti kṛtvā utsargeṇa antodāttatvam prāpnoti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:23000: vā kapi pūrvavacanam jñāpakam uttarapadānantodāttatvasya . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:23001: kāraṇam . yat ayam kapi pūrvam iti āha tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na uttarapadasya antaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23002: udāttatḥ bhavati iti . prakaraṇāt ca samāsāntodāttatvam . prakṛtam samāsagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:23003: anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . cau samāsasya iti . nanu ca uktam antodāttatvam samāsasya
GS24pmbhasuu:23004: iti cet kapi upasaṅkhyānam iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . uttarapadagrahaṇam api prakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:23005: anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . uttarapadādiḥ iti . tatra evam abhisambandhaḥ kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:23006: . nañsubhyām samāsasya antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati . idametattadbhyaḥ prathamapūraṇayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23008: (P_6,2.148) KA_III.137.6-10 Ro_IV.573 kārakāt dattaśrutayoḥ anāśiṣi pratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:23009: kārakāt dattaśrutayoḥ anāśiṣi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . anāhataḥ nadati devadattaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23010: . siddham tu ubhayaniyamāt . siddham etat . katham . ubhayaniyamāt . ubhayataḥ niyamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23011: āśrayiṣyate . kārakāt dattaśrutayoḥ eva āśiṣi. āśiṣi eva kārakāt dattaśrutayoḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:23012: (P_6,2.165) KA_III.137.12-13 Ro_IV.574 ṛṣipratiṣedhaḥ mitre . ṛṣipratiṣedhaḥ mitre vaktavyaḥ . viśvāmitraḥ ṛṣiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:23013: (P_6,2.175) KA_III.137.15-138.4 Ro_IV.574 kimartham bahoḥ nañvat atideśaḥ kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:23014: na nañsubahubhyaḥ iti eva ucyeta . na evam śakyam . uttarapadabhūmni iti vakṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:23015: . tat bahoḥ eva yathā syāt . nañsubhyām mā bhūt iti . na etat asti prayojanam . ekayoge
GS24pmbhasuu:23016: api hi sati yasya uttarapadabhūmā asti tasya bhaviṣyati . kasya ca asti . bahoḥ eva
GS24pmbhasuu:23017: . idam tarhi prayojanam . na guṇādayaḥ avyavāḥ iti vakṣyati . tat bahoḥ eva yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:23018: syāt . nañsubhyām mā bhūt iti . etat api na asti prayojanam . ekayoge api sati yasya
GS24pmbhasuu:23019: guṇādayaḥ avayavā santi tasya kasya ca santi . bahoḥ eva . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati bahoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23020: nañvat uttarapadādyudāttārtham . bahoḥ nañvat atideśaḥ kriayte uttarapadādyudāttārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:23021: . uttarapadasya ādyudāttatvam yathā syāt . nañaḥ jaramaramitramṛtāḥ . ajaraḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23025: (P_6,2.177) KA_III.1386-11 Ro_IV.575 upasargāt svāṅgam dhruvam mukhasya antodāttatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:23026: . mukhasya antodāttatvāt upasargāt svāṅgam dhruvam iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:23028: ślakṣṇamukhaḥ . upasargāt svāṅgam iti asya avakāśaḥ prasphik ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23029: prodaraḥ . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . pramukhaḥ . upasargāt svāṅgam iti etat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:23030: vipratiṣedhena . kaḥ punaḥ viśeṣaḥ tena vā sati anena vā . sāpavādakaḥ saḥ vidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23031: ayam punaḥ nirapavādakaḥ . avyayāt tasya pratiṣedhaḥ apavādaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:23032: (P_6,2.185-186) KA_III.138.14-18 Ro_IV.576 kimartham idam ucyate na upasargāt svāṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:23033: dhruvam iti eva siddham . abheḥ mukham apāt ca adhruvārtham . adhruvārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23034: . abhuvrīhyartham vā . atha vā bahuvrīheḥ iti vartate . abhuvrīhyarthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:23035: (P_6,2.187) KA_III.138.20-139.2 Ro_IV.576 sphigapūtagrahaṇam kimartham na upasargāt
GS24pmbhasuu:23036: svāṅgam dhruvam iti eva siddham . sphigapūtagrahaṇam ca . kim . adhruvārtham abhuvrīhyartham eva vā .
GS24pmbhasuu:23037: (P_6,2.191) KA_III.139.4-6 Ro_IV.576 ateḥ dhātulope . ateḥ dhātulope iti vaktavyam . akṛtpade iti hi ucyamāne iha ca prasajyeta śobhanaḥ gārgyaḥ atigārgyaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23041: (P_6,2.197) KA_III.139.8-140.6 Ro_IV.577-579 kim idam dvitribhyām mūrdhani akārāntagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:23042: āhosvit nakārāntagrahaṇam . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . dvitribhyām mūrdhani akārāntagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:23043: cet nakārāntasya upasaṅkhyānam . dvitribhyām mūrdhani akārāntagrahaṇam cet nakārāntasya
GS24pmbhasuu:23044: upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . dvimūrdhā trimūrdhā . astu tarhi nakārāntagrahaṇam . nakārānte
GS24pmbhasuu:23045: akārāntasya . nakārānte akārāntasya upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . dvimūrdhaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23046: trimūrdhaḥ . udāttalopāt siddham . astu tarhi nakārāntagrahaṇam . antodāttatve kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:23047: lopaḥ udāttanivṛttisvareṇa siddham . idam iha sampradhāryam . antodāttatvam kriyatām
GS24pmbhasuu:23048: lopaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt lopaḥ . evam tarhi idam iha sampradhāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:23049: . antodāttatvam kriyatām samāsāntaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt antodāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:23050: . nityaḥ samāsāntaḥ . kṛte api antodāttatve prāpnoti akṛte api . antodāttatvam api
GS24pmbhasuu:23051: nityam . kṛte api samāsānte prāpnoti akṛte api . anityam antodāttatvam . na hi kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:23052: samāsānte prāpnoti . paratvāt lopena bhavitavyam . yasya ca lakṣaṇāntareṇa nimittam
GS24pmbhasuu:23053: vihanyate na tat anityam . na ca samāsāntaḥ eva antodāttatvasya nimittam hanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:23054: avaśyam lakṣaṇāntaram lopaḥ pratīkṣyaḥ . ubhayoḥ nityayoḥ paratvāt antodāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:23056: ṭilopaḥ . ṭilope kṛte udāttanivṛttisvareṇa siddham . yuktam punaḥ idam vicārayitum
GS24pmbhasuu:23057: . nan u anena asandigdhena nakārāntasya grahaṇena bhavitavyam yāvatā mūrdhasu iti
GS24pmbhasuu:23058: ucyate . yadi hi akārāntasya grahaṇam syāt mūrdheṣu iti brūyāt . sā eṣā samāsāntārthā
GS24pmbhasuu:23059: vicāraṇā . evam tarhi jñāpayati ācāryaḥ . vibhāṣā samāsāntaḥ bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:23060: (P_6,2.199) KA_III.140.8-13 Ro_IV.579-580 atyalpam idam ucyate . parādiḥ ca parāntaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23061: ca pūrvāntaḥ ca dṛśyate .pūrvādayaḥ ca vidyante . vyatayaḥ bahulam smṛtaḥ . antodāttaprakaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:23062: tricakrādīnām chandasi upasaṅkhyānam . antodāttaprakaraṇe tricakrādīnām chandasi
GS24pmbhasuu:23065: (P_6,3.1.2) KA_III.141.12-142.9 Ro_IV.582-584 ekavat ca aluk bhavati iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . stokābhyām muktaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23066: stokebhyaḥ muktaḥ iti vigṛhya stokānmuktaḥ iti eva yathā syāt . ekavadvcanam anarthakam
GS24pmbhasuu:23067: . ekavadbhāvaḥ ca anarthakaḥ . dvibahvoḥ aluk kasmāt na bhavati . dvibahuṣu asamāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23068: . dvivacanabahuvacanānām asamāsaḥ . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi anucyamānaṃ gaṃsyate
GS24pmbhasuu:23069: . uktam vā . kim uktam . anabhidhānāt iti . tat ca avaśyam anabhidhānam āśrayitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:23070: . ekavadvacane hi goṣucare atiprasaṅgaḥ . ekavadvacane hi goṣucare atiprasaṅgaḥ syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:23071: goṣucaraḥ . varṣābhyaḥ ca je . varṣābhyaḥ ca je atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . varṣāsujaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23072: . apaḥ yoniyanmatiṣu ca . apaḥ yoniyanmatiṣu ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . je care
GS24pmbhasuu:23073: ca . je care ca atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . yoni . apsuyoniḥ . yat . apsavyam . mati .
GS24pmbhasuu:23074: apsumatiḥ . je . apsujaḥ . care . apsucaraḥ gahvareṣṭhāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:23077: anyārthe ca . anyārthe ca eṣā pañcamī draṣṭavyā . brāhmaṇāni śaṃsati iti brāhmaṇācchaṃsī
GS24pmbhasuu:23078: . atha vā yuktaḥ eva atra pañcamyarthaḥ . brāhmaṇebhyaḥ gṛhītvā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23080: (P_6,3.3) KA_III.142.18-22 Ro_IV.585 añjasaḥ upasaṅkhyānam . añjasaḥ upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:23081: kartavyam . añjasākṛtam . puṃsānujaḥ januṣāndhaḥ vikṛtākṣaḥ iti ca . puṃsānujaḥ januṣāndhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23082: vikṛtākṣaḥ iti ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . puṃsānujaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23085: (P_6,3.5) KA_III.143.2-8 Ro_IV. 585-586 ātmanaḥ ca pūraṇe . ātmanaḥ ca pūraṇe upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . ātmanāpañcamaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23086: ātmanādaśamaḥ . anyārthe ca . anyārthe ca eṣā tṛtīyā draṣṭavyā . ātmā pañcamaḥ asya
GS24pmbhasuu:23087: ātmāpañcamaḥ . atha vā yuktaḥ eva atra tṛtīyārthaḥ . ātmanā kṛtam tat tasya yena
GS24pmbhasuu:23088: asau pañcamaḥ . katham janārdanaḥ tu ātmacaturthaḥ eva iti . bahuvrīḥ ayam . ātmā
GS24pmbhasuu:23090: (P_6,3.7-8) KA_III.143.11-18 Ro_IV.586-587 ātmanebhāṣaparasmaibhāṣayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam . ātmanebhāṣaparasmaibhāṣayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . ātmanebhāṣaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23091: parasmaibhāṣaḥ . tat katham kartavyam . yadi vyākaraṇe bhavā vaiyākaraṇī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23092: vaiyākaraṇī ākhyā vaiyākaraṇākhyā vaiyākaraṇakhyāyām iti . atha hi vaiyākaraṇānām ākhyā vaiyākaraṇākhyā na arthaḥ upasaṅkhyānena . yadi api vyākaraṇe bhavā vaiyākaraṇī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23093: vaiyākaraṇī ākhyā vaiyākaraṇākhyā evam api na arthaḥ upasaṅkhyānena . vacanāt bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:23094: . asti vacane prayojanam . kim . ātmanepadam . nipātanāt etat siddham . kim nipātanam
GS24pmbhasuu:23097: (P_6,3.9) KA_III.143.20-144.17 Ro_IV.587-588 hṛddyubhyām ṅeḥ upasaṅkhyānam . hṛddyubhyām ṅeḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . hṛdispṛk ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23098: divispṛk . anyārthe ca . anyārthe ca eṣā saptamī draṣṭavyā . hṛdayam spṛśati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:23099: hṛdispṛk . divam śprśati iti divispṛk . haladantādhikāre goḥ upasaṅkhyānam . haladantādhikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:23100: goḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . gaviṣthiraḥ . na kartavyam . lukaḥ avādeśaḥ vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:23101: . luk kriyatām avādeśaḥ iti avādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati vipratiṣedhena . avādeśe kṛte halantāt
GS24pmbhasuu:23102: iti eva siddham . lukaḥ avādeśaḥ vipratiṣedhena iti cet bhūmipāśe atiprasaṅgaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:23103: lukaḥ avādeśaḥ vipratiṣedhena iti cet bhūmipāśe atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . bhūmyām pāśaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23104: bhūmipāśaḥ . akaḥ ataḥ iti vā sandhyakṣarārtham . evam tarhi aviśeṣeṇa saptamyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23105: alukam uktvā akaḥ ataḥ iti vakṣyāmi . tat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . akaḥ ataḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:23106: eva bhavati na anyataḥ iti . tena sandhyakṣarāṇām siddham bhavati . sidhyati . sūtram
GS24pmbhasuu:23107: tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam haladantādhikāre goḥ upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:23108: iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . nipātanāt etat siddham . kim nipātanam . gaviṣṭhiraśabdaḥ vidādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:23109: paṭhyate . asakṛt khalu api nipātanam kriyate . gaviyudhibhyā sthiraḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:23110: (P_6,3.10) KA_III.144.19-145.13 Ro_IV.589-591 kim iyam prāpte vibhāṣā āhosvit aprāpte
GS24pmbhasuu:23111: . katham ca prāpte katham ca aprāpte . yadi sañjñāyām iti vartate tataḥ prāpte .
GS24pmbhasuu:23112: atha nivṛttam tataḥ aprāpte . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . kāranāmni vāvacanārtham cet ajādau
GS24pmbhasuu:23113: atiprasaṅgaḥ . kāranāmni vāvacanārtham cet ajādau atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . iha api
GS24pmbhasuu:23114: prāpnoti . avikaṭe uraṇaḥ dātavyaḥ avikaṭoraṇaḥ . astu tarhi aprāpte . aprāpte samāsavidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:23115: . yadi aprāpte samāsaḥ vidheyaḥ . prāpte punaḥ sati sañjñāyām iti eva samāsaḥ siddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23116: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . etat eva jñāpayati bhavati atra samāsaḥ iti yat ayam kāranāmni
GS24pmbhasuu:23117: saptamyāḥ alukam śāsti . yadi api tāvat jñāpakāt samāsaḥ syāt svaraḥ tu na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:23118: . yat hi tat saptamīpūrvapadam prakṛtisvaram bhavati iti lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya
GS24pmbhasuu:23119: eva iti evam tat . na eva atra anena svareṇa bhavitavyam . kim tarhi saptamīhāriṇau
GS24pmbhasuu:23120: dharmye aharaṇe iti anena atra svareṇa bhavitavyam .kim ca bhoḥ sañjñāḥ api loke
GS24pmbhasuu:23121: kriyante na lokaḥ sañjñāsu pramāṇam . loke ca kāranāma sañjñā . nanu ca uktam kāranāmni
GS24pmbhasuu:23122: vāvacanārtham cet ajādau atiprasaṅgaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yogavibhāgāt siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:23124: tataḥ halādau . halādau ca kāranāmni saptamyāḥ aluk bhavati . idam idānīm kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:23125: . niyamārtham . halādau eva kāranāmni na anyatra . kva mā bhūt . avikaṭe uraṇaḥ dātavyaḥ avikaṭoraṇaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:23126: (P_6,3.11) KA_III.145.15-16 Ro_IV.591 gurau antāt ca . gurau antāt ca iti vaktavyam . anteguruḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:23127: (P_6,3.13) KA_III.145.18-146.2 Ro_IV.591-592 svāṅgagrahaṇam anuvartate utāho na . kim ca ataḥ . yadi anuvartate siddham hastebandhaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23129: cakrabandhaḥ iti na sidhyati . atha nivṛttam siddham cakrebhandaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23131: hastabandhaḥ iti na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . na insiddhabadhnātiṣu iti pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23132: prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . sarvatra eva atra uttarapadādhikare tatpuruṣed kṛti bahulam
GS24pmbhasuu:23133: iti prāpte na insiddhabadhnātiṣu iti pratiṣedhaḥ ucyate . tasmin nitye prāpte iyam
GS24pmbhasuu:23134: vibhāṣā ārabhyate . evam api na jñāyate kasmin viṣaye vibhāṣā kasmin viṣaye pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23135: iti . ghañantasya idam bandhaśabdasya grahaṇam pratiṣedhe punaḥ dhātugrahaṇam . ghañante
GS24pmbhasuu:23137: (P_6,3.14) KA_III.146.4-16 Ro_IV.592-594 tatpuruṣe kṛti bahulam akarmadhāraye . tatpuruṣe
GS24pmbhasuu:23138: kṛti bahulam iti atra akarmadhāraye iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . parame kārake paramakārake
GS24pmbhasuu:23139: iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . bahulavacanāt na bhaviṣyati . atha kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:23140: lugaluganukramaṇam kriyate na tatpuruṣe kṛti bahulam iti eva siddham . lugaluganukramaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:23141: bahulavacanasya akṛtsnatvāt . lugaluganukramaṇam kriyate akṛtsnam bahulavacanam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:23142: . yadi akṛtsnam yat anena kṛtam akṛtam tat . evam tarhi na brūmaḥ akṛtsnam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:23143: kṛtsnam ca kārakam ca sādhakam ca nirvartakam ca . yat ca anena kṛtam suktṛtam tat
GS24pmbhasuu:23144: . kimartham tarhi lugaluganukramaṇam kriyate . udāharaṇabhūyastvāt . te khalu api
GS24pmbhasuu:23145: vidhayaḥ suparigṛhītāḥ bhavanti yeṣu lakṣaṇam prapañcaḥ ca . kevalam lakṣaṇam kevalaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23146: prapañcaḥ vā na tathā kārakam bhavati . avaśyam khalu asmābhiḥ idam vaktavyam bahulam
GS24pmbhasuu:23147: anyatarasyām ubhayathā vā ekeṣām iti . sarvavedapāṛiṣadam hi idam śāstram . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:23153: paśyatoharaḥ . āmuṣyāyaṇāmuṣyputrikā iti upasaṅkhyānam . āmuṣyāyaṇāmuṣyputrikā iti upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . āmuṣyāyaṇaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23154: āmuṣyaputrikā . āmuṣyakulikā iti ca vaktavyam . āmuṣyakulikā . devānāmpriyaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:23155: ca . devānāmpriyaḥ iti ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . devānāmpriyaḥ . śepapucchalāṅgūleṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:23156: śunaḥ sañjñāyām . śepapucchalāṅgūleṣu śunaḥ sañjñāyām upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . śunaḥśephaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23158: śunolāṅgūlaḥ . divaḥ ca dāse . divaḥ ca dāse upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . divodāsāya gāyata .
GS24pmbhasuu:23159: (P_6,3.23) KA_III.147.9-12 Ro_IV.595 vidyāyonisambandhebhyaḥ tatpūrvapadottarapadagrahaṇam . vidyāyonisambandhebhyaḥ tatpūrvapadottarapadagrahaṇam kartavyam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23162: vyatikaraḥ mā bhūt . atha eṣām vyatikareṇa bhavitavyam . bāḍham bhavitavyam . hotuḥputraḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23164: (P_6,3.25.1) KA_III.147.14-18 Ro_IV.595 kva ayam nakāraḥ śrūyate . na kva cit śrūyate
GS24pmbhasuu:23165: . lopaḥ asya bhavati nalopaḥ prātipadikasya iti . yadi na śrūyate kimartham uccāryate
GS24pmbhasuu:23166: . raparatvam mā bhūt iti . kriyamāṇe api vai nakāre raparatvam prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:23167: . nalope kṛte eṣaḥ api hi uḥ sthāne aṇ śiṣyate . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . uḥ sthāne aṇ prasajymānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23168: eva raparaḥ bhavati iti ucyate na ca ayam uḥ sthāne aṇ eva śiṣyate . kim tarhi aṇ ca anaṇ ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:23169: (P_6,3.25.2) KA_III.147.18-148.18 Ro_IV.596-597 katham punaḥ idam vijñāyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:23170: ṛkārāntānām yaḥ dvandvaḥ iti āhosvit dvandve ṛkārasya iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:23171: ṛkārāntānām dvandve putre upasaṅkhyānam . ṛkārāntānām dvandve putre upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:23172: kartavyam . pitāputrau . kāryī ca anirdiṣṭaḥ . kāryī ca anirdiṣṭaḥ bhavati . ṛkārāntānām
GS24pmbhasuu:23173: dvandve na jñāyate kasya ānaṅā bhavitavyam iti . astu tarhi dvande ṛkārasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:23174: aviśeṣeṇa pitṛpitāmahādiṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ . aviśeṣeṇa pitṛpitāmahādiṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23175: bhavati . pitṛpitāmahau iti . astu tarhi ṛkārāntānām yaḥ dvandvaḥ iti . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:23176: ṛkārāntānām dvandve putre upasaṅkhyānam iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . putragrahaṇam api prakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:23177: anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . putre anyatarasyām iti . yadi tat anuvartate vibhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:23178: svasṛpatyoḥ putre ca iti putre api vibhāṣā prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . sambandham
GS24pmbhasuu:23179: anuvartiṣyate . ṣaṣṭhyāḥ ākrośe . putre anyatarasyām ṣaṣṭhyāḥ ākrośe . ṛtaḥ vidyāyonisambandhebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23180: putre anyatarasyām ṣaṣṭhyāḥ ākrośe . vibhāṣā svasṛpatyoḥ putre anyatarasyām ṣaṣṭhyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23181: ākrośe . ānaṅ ṛtaḥ dvandve . putragrahaṇam anuvartate . ṣaṣṭhyāḥ ākrośe iti nivṛttam
GS24pmbhasuu:23182: . yat api ucyate kāryī ca anirdiṣṭaḥ iti . kāryī ca nirdiṣṭaḥ . katham . uttarapade
GS24pmbhasuu:23183: iti vartate . ṅit ca ayam kriyate . saḥ antareṇa api kāryinirdeśam ṛkārāntasya eva
GS24pmbhasuu:23184: bhaviṣyati . putre tarhi kāryī anirdiṣṭaḥ . putre ca kāryī nirdiṣṭaḥ . katham . ṛkāragrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:23185: api prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . ṛtaḥ vidyāyonisambandhebhyaḥ . tat vai pañcamīnirdiṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:23186: ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭena ca iha arthaḥ . putre iti eṣā saptamī ṛtaḥ iti pañcamyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm
GS24pmbhasuu:23187: prakalpayiṣyati tasmin iti nirdiṣṭe pūrvasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:23188: (P_6,3.26) KA_III.148.20-149.2 Ro_IV.597 devatādvandve ubhayatra vāyoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . devatādvandve ubhayatra vāyoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . vāyvagnī
GS24pmbhasuu:23189: agnivāyū . brahmaprajāpatyādīnām ca . brahmaprajāpatyādīnām ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . brahmaprajāpatī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23191: skandviśākhau . saḥ tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . dvandve iti vartamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:23192: punaḥ dvandragrahaṇasya etat prayojanam lokavedayoḥ yaḥ dvandvaḥ tatra yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:23193: . kaḥ ca lokavedayoḥ dvandvaḥ . vede ye sahanirvāpanirdiṣṭāḥ na ca ete sahanirvāpanirdiṣṭāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:23194: (P_6,3.28) KA_III.149.4-5 Ro_IV.598 id vṛddhau viṣṇoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . id vṛddhau viṣṇoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . āgnāvaiṣṇavam carum nirvapet .
GS24pmbhasuu:23195: (P_6,3.32-33) KA_III.149.8-10 Ro_IV.598 kim nipātyate . pūrvapadottarapadayoḥ ṛkārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:23196: arārau nipātyete . mātarapitarau bhojayataḥ . mātarapitarau ānaya . a mā gantām pitarāmātarā
GS24pmbhasuu:23197: ca a mā somaḥ amṛtatvaya gamyāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:23198: (P_6,3.34.1) KA_III.150.3-16 Ro_IV.599-601 bhāṣitapuṃskāt iti katham idam vijñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:23199: . samānāyām ākṛtau yat bhāṣitapuṃskam āhosvit kva cit bhāṣitapuṃskam iti . kim ca
GS24pmbhasuu:23200: ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate samānāyām ākṛtau yat bhāṣitapuṃskam iti garbhibhāryaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23202: prasūtabhāraḥ iti atra na prāpnoti . atha vijñāyate kva cit bhāṣitapuṃskam iti droṇībhāryaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23204: pātrībhāryaḥ atra api prāpnoti . astu samānāyām ākṛtau yat bhāṣitapuṃskam iti . katham garbhibhāryaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23206: prasūtabhāraḥ iti . kartavyaḥ atra yatnaḥ . atha kimartham ūṅaḥ pṛthak pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23207: ucyate na yatra eva anyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ tatra eva ayam ucyeta . na kopadhāyāḥ iti uktvā
GS24pmbhasuu:23208: tataḥ ūṅaḥ ca iti ucyeta . tatra api ayam arthaḥ dviḥ pratiṣedhaḥ na vaktavyaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:23209: . na evam śakyam . paṭhiṣyati hi ācāryaḥ puṃvat karmadhāraye pratiṣiddhārtham iti
GS24pmbhasuu:23211: kārikā vṛndārikā kārakavṛndārikā iti evam iha api syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:23212: brahmabandhūḥ vṛndārikā brahmabandūvṛndārikā iti . atha pṛthak pratiṣedhe api ucyamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:23213: yāvatā saḥ pratiṣiddhārthaḥ ārambhaḥ kasmāt eva atra na bhavati . pṛthakpratiṣedhavacanasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:23214: . atha vā anūṅ iti tatra anuvartiṣyate . atha vā na ayam prasajyapratiṣedhaḥ . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:23215: tarhi paryudāsaḥ ayam yat anyat anūṅ iti . saḥ ca pratiṣedhāṛthaḥ ārambhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:23216: (P_6,3.34.2) KA_III.150.17-153.20 Ro_IV.601-609 kim punaḥ idam puṃvadbhāve strīgrhaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:23217: strīpratyayagrahaṇam āhosvit strīśabdgrahaṇam āhosvit stryarthagrahaṇam . kaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:23218: atra viśeṣaḥ . puṃvadbhāve strīgrahaṇam strīpratyayagrahaṇam cet tatra puṃvat iti
GS24pmbhasuu:23220: cet tatra puṃvat iti uttarapade tatpratiṣedhaḥ ayam vijñāyeta . kasya . strīpratyayasya
GS24pmbhasuu:23221: pratiṣedhaḥ . kim ucyate strīpratyayasya pratiṣedhaḥ iti . na punaḥ anyat api kim
GS24pmbhasuu:23222: cit puṃsaḥ pratipadam kāryam ucyate yat samānādhikaraṇe uttarapade bhāṣitapuṃskasya
GS24pmbhasuu:23223: atidiśyeta . anārambhāt puṃsi . na hi kim cit puṃsaḥ pratipadam kāryam ucyate yat
GS24pmbhasuu:23224: samānādhikaraṇe uttarapade bhāṣitapuṃskasya atidiśyeta . tatra kim anyat śakyam vijñātum
GS24pmbhasuu:23225: anyat ataḥ strīpratyayapratiṣedhāt . katham punaḥ puṃvat iti anena strīpratyayasya
GS24pmbhasuu:23226: pratiṣedhaḥ śakyaḥ vijñātum . vatinirdeśaḥ ayam kāmacāraḥ ca vatinirdeśe vākyaśeṣam
GS24pmbhasuu:23227: samarthayitum . tat yathā . uśīnaravat madreṣu yavāḥ . santi na santi iti . mātṛvat
GS24pmbhasuu:23228: asyāḥ kalāḥ . santi na santi . evam iha api puṃvat bhavati puṃvat na bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:23229: vākyaśeṣam samarthayiṣyāmahe . yathā puṃsaḥ strīpratyayaḥ na bhavati evam samānādhikaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:23230: uttarapade bhāṣitapuṃskasya na bhavati iti . prātipadikasya ca pratyāpattiḥ . prātipadikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:23231: ca pratyāpattiḥ vaktavyā . enī bhāryā asya ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23233: śyetabhāryaḥ . puṃvadbhāvena kim kriyate . strīpratyayasya nivṛttiḥ . arthaḥ anivṛttaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23234: strītvam . tasya anivṛttatvāt kena naśabdaḥ na śrūyeta . striyām iti ucyamānaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:23235: . sthānivatprasaṅgaḥ ca . sthānivabhāvaḥ ca prāpnoti . paṭvībhārā asya paṭubhāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23236: . puṃvadbhāvena kim kriyate . strīpratyayasya nivṛttiḥ . tasya sthānivabhāvāt yaṇādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23237: prāpnoti . kimartham idam ubhayam ucyate na prātipadikasya ca pratyāpattiḥ iti eva
GS24pmbhasuu:23238: sthānivabhāvaḥ api coditaḥ syāt . purastāt idam ācāryeṇa dṛṣṭam sthānivatprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23239: ca iti tat paṭhitam . tataḥ uttarakālam idam dṛṣṭam prātipadikasya ca pratyāpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23240: iti . tat api paṭhitam . na ca idānīm ācāryāḥ sūtrāṇi kṛtvā nivartayanti . vataṇḍyādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:23241: puṃvadvacanam . vataṇḍyādiṣu puṃvadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . ke punaḥ vataṇḍyādayaḥ . lugalugastrīviṣayadvistrīpratyayāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23242: . luk . gārgyaḥ vṛndārikā gargavṛndārikā . puṃvadbhāvena kim kriyate . strīpratyayasya
GS24pmbhasuu:23243: nivṛttiḥ . arthaḥ anivṛttaḥ strītvam . tasya anivṛttatvāt kena yaśabdaḥ na śrūyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:23244: . astriyām iti hi luk ucyate . luk . aluk . vataṇḍī vṛndārikā vātaṇḍyavṛndārikā .
GS24pmbhasuu:23245: puṃvadbhāvena kim kriyate . strīpratyayasya nivṛttiḥ . arthaḥ anivṛttaḥ strītvam
GS24pmbhasuu:23246: . tasya anivṛttatvāt luk striyām vataṇḍāt iti yakārasya luk prāpnoti . yadi punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23247: ayam īkāre eva luk ucyeta . tat īkāragrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:23250: striyām . īkāravidhau vai apratyayakasya pāṭhaḥ kriyate vataṇḍa iti . śārṅgaravādau
GS24pmbhasuu:23251: sapratyayakasya pāṭhaḥ kariṣyate . saḥ vai sapratyayakasya pāṭhaḥ kartavyaḥ . antaraṅgatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:23252: ca luk prāpnoti . aluk . astrīviṣaya . kauṇḍīvṛsī vṛndārikā kauṇḍīvṛsyavṛndārikā
GS24pmbhasuu:23253: . puṃvadbhāvena kim kriyate . strīpratyayasya nivṛttiḥ . arthaḥ anivṛttaḥ strītvam
GS24pmbhasuu:23254: . tasya anivṛttatvāt kena yaśabdaḥ śrūyeta . astriyām iti hi ñyaḥ vidhīyate . astrīviṣaya
GS24pmbhasuu:23255: . dvistrīpratyaya . gārgyāyaṇī vṛndārikā gārgyavṛndārikā . atra puṃvadbhāvaḥ na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:23256: . kim kāraṇam . bhāṣitapuṃskāt anūṅaḥ samānādhikaraṇe uttarapade puṃvadbhāvaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:23257: iti ucyate . yaḥ ca atra bhāṣitapuṃskāt anūṅ na asau uttarapade yaḥ ca uttarapade
GS24pmbhasuu:23258: na asau bhāṣitapuṃskāt anūṅ iti . astu tarhi strīśabdagrahaṇam . strīśabdasya puṃśabdātideśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23259: iti cet sarvaprasaṅgaḥ aviśeṣāt . strīśabdasya puṃśabdātideśaḥ iti cet sarvasya strīśabdasya
GS24pmbhasuu:23261: aṅgārakāḥ nāma śakunayaḥ . teṣām kālikāḥ striyaḥ . kālikāvṛndārikāḥ . aṅgārakavṛndārikāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23262: prāpnuvanti . kṣemavṛddhayaḥ kṣatriyāḥ . teṣām tanukeśyaḥ striyaḥ . tanukeśīvṛndārikāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23264: kacchapasya ḍulī . ṛśyasya rohit . aśvasya vaḍavā . puruṣasya yoṣit . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:23265: . aviśeṣāt . na hi kaḥ cit viśeṣaḥ upādīyate evañjātīyakasya strīśabdasya puṃśabdātideśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23266: bhavati iti . anupādīyamāne viśeṣe sarvatra prasaṅgaḥ . katham ca nāma na upādīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:23267: yāvatā bhāṣitapuṃskāt iti ucyate . bhāṣitapuṃskānupapattiḥ ca . hyarthe ca ayam caḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23268: paṭhitaḥ . sarvaḥ hi śabdaḥ bhāṣitapuṃskāt paraḥ śakyaḥ kartum . astu tarhi arthagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:23269: . arthātideśe vipratiṣedhānupapattiḥ . arthātideśe vipratiṣedhaḥ na upapadyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:23270: paṭhiṣyati hi ācāryaḥ vipratiṣedham puṃvadbhāvāt hrasvatvam khidghādikeṣu iti . saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23271: vipratiṣedhaḥ na upapadyate . dvikāryayogaḥ hi nāma vipratiṣedhaḥ na ca atra ekaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23272: dvikāryayuktaḥ . śabdasya hrasvatvam arthasya puṃvadbhāvaḥ . kim ca sarvaprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23273: aviśeṣāt iti . sarvasya strīśabdasya puṃśabdātideśaḥ prāpnoti . asya api prāpnoti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23274: aṅgārakāḥ nāma śakunayaḥ . teṣām kālikāḥ striyaḥ . kālikāvṛndārikāḥ . aṅgārakavṛndārikāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23275: prāpnuvanti . kṣemavṛddhayaḥ kṣatriyāḥ . teṣām tanukeśyaḥ striyaḥ . tanukeśīvṛndārikāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23276: . kṣemavṛddhivṛndārikāḥ prāpnuvanti . haṃsasya varaṭā . kacchapasya ḍulī . ṛśyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:23277: rohit . aśvasya vaḍavā . puruṣasya yoṣit . kim kāraṇam . aviśeṣāt . na hi kaḥ cit
GS24pmbhasuu:23278: viśeṣaḥ upādīyate evañjātīyakasya strīśabdasya puṃśabdātideśaḥ bhavati iti . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:23279: ca nāma na upādīyate yāvatā bhāṣitapuṃskāt iti ucyate . bhāṣitapuṃskānupapattiḥ hi
GS24pmbhasuu:23280: bhavati . na hi arthen paurvāparyam asti . ayam tāvat adoṣaḥ yat ucyate arthātideśe
GS24pmbhasuu:23281: vipratiṣedhānupapattiḥ iti . na avaśyam dvikārayogaḥ eva vipratiṣedhaḥ . kim tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:23282: . asambhavaḥ api . saḥ ca atra asti asambhavaḥ . kaḥ asambhavaḥ . puṃvadbhāvaḥ abhinirvartamānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23283: hrasvatvasya nimittam vihanti . hrasvatvam abhinirvartamānam puṃvadbhāvam bādhate
GS24pmbhasuu:23284: . sati asambhave yuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . ayam tarhi doṣaḥ sarvaprasaṅgaḥ aviśeṣāt
GS24pmbhasuu:23285: iti . tasmāt astu saḥ eva madhyamaḥ pakṣaḥ . nanu ca uktam strīśabdasya puṃśabdātideśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23286: iti cet sarvaprasaṅgaḥ aviśeṣāt iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . samāsanirdeśaḥ ayam :
GS24pmbhasuu:23287: bhāṣitapuṃskāt anūṅ yasmin saḥ ayam bhāṣitapuṃskādanūṅ iti . yadi evam luk prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:23288: . nipātanāt na bhaviṣyati . atha vā aluk prakṛtaḥ saḥ anuvartiṣyate . katham punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23289: anūṅ iti anyena strīpratyayagrahaṇam śakyam vijñātum . nañivayuktam anyasadṛśādhikaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:23290: tathā hi arthagatiḥ . nañyuktam ivayuktam ca anyasmin tatsadṛśe kāryam vijñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:23291: . tathā hi arthaḥ gamyate . tat yathā abrāhmaṇam ānaya iti ukte brāhmaṇasadṛśaḥ ānīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:23292: . na asau loṣṭam ānīya kṛtī bhavati . evam iha api anūṅ iti ūṅpratiṣedhāt anyasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:23293: ūṅsadṛśe kāryam vijñāyate . kim ca anyat anūṅ ūṅsadṛśam . strīpratyayaḥ . evam api iḍabiḍ vṛndārikā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23301: atra puṃvadbhāvaḥ na prāpnoti . kartavyaḥ atra yatnaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:23302: (P_6,3.34.3) KA_III.153.21-28 Ro_IV.609-610 atha iha katham bhavitavyam . paṭvīmṛdvyau bhārye asya paṭvīmṛdubhāryaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23303: āhosvit paṭumṛdubhāryaḥ iti . paṭvīmṛdubhāryaḥ iti bhavitavyam . puṃvadbhāvaḥ kasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:23304: na bhavati . bhāṣitapuṃskāt iti ucyate . nanu ca bhoḥ paṭuśabdaḥ mṛduśabdaḥ puṃsi
GS24pmbhasuu:23305: bhāṣyete . samānāyām ākṛtau yat bhāṣitapuṃskam ākṛtyantare ca etau bhāṣitapuṃskau
GS24pmbhasuu:23306: . samānāyām ākṛtau api etau bhāṣitapuṃskau . katham . ārabhyate matublopaḥ . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:23307: tarhi bhāṣitapuṃskāt anūṅ samānādhikaraṇe uttarapade kṛtaḥ tasya puṃvadbhāvaḥ yasya
GS24pmbhasuu:23308: ca akṛtaḥ na asau bhāṣitapuṃskāt anūṅ samānādhikaraṇe uttarapade .
GS24pmbhasuu:23310: pradhānapūraṇīgrahaṇam kartavyam . iha mā bhūt . kalyāṇī pañcamī asya pakṣasya kalyāṇapañcamīkaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23311: pakṣaḥ iti . atha iha katham bhavitavyam kalyāṇī pañcamī āsām rātrīṇām iti . kalyāṇīpañcamāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23312: rātrayaḥ iti bhavitavyam . rātrayaḥ atra pradhānam .
GS24pmbhasuu:23313: (P_6,3.35) KA_III.154.6-155.24 Ro_IV.610-614 iha ke cit tasilādayaḥ ā kṛtvasucaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23314: paṭhyante yeṣu puṃvadbhāvaḥ na iṣyate ke cit ca anyatra paṭhyante yeṣu puṃvadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23315: iṣyate . tatra kim nyāyyam . parigaṇanam kartavyam . tasilādī tratasau . tratasau
GS24pmbhasuu:23316: tasilādī draṣṭavyau . tasyām śālāyām vasati . tatra vasati . tasyāḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23321: yataḥ . taratamapau . taratamapau tasilādī draṣṭavyau . darśanīyatarā darśanīyatamā . caraḍjātīyarau . caraḍjātīyarau tasilādī draṣṭavyau . paṭucarī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23322: paṭujātīyā . kalpabdeśīyarau . kalpabdeśīyarau tasilādī draṣṭavyau . darśanīyakalpā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23323: darśanīyadeśīyā . rūpappāśapau . rūpappāśapau tasilādī draṣṭavyau . darśanīyarūpā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23324: darśanīyapāśā . thamthālau . thamthālau tasilādī draṣṭavyau . kayā ākṛtyā katham ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23325: yayā yathā . dārhilau . dārhilau tasilādī draṣṭavyau . tasyām velāyām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23327: tarhi . tilthyanau . tilthyanau tasilādī draṣṭavyau . vṛkī vṛkatiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23328: ajathyā yūthiḥ . śasi bahvalpārthasya . śasi bahvalpārthasya puṃvadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23329: . bahvībhyaḥ dehi . bahuśaḥ dehi . alpaśaḥ . tvataloḥ guṇavacanasya . tvataloḥ guṇavacanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:23331: paṭutā . guṇavacanasya iti kimartham . kaṭhyāḥ bhāvaḥ kaṭhītvam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23332: kaṭhītā . bhasya aḍhe taddhite . bhasya aḍhe taddhite puṃvadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . hastinīnām samūhaḥ hāstikam . aḍhe iti kimartham . śyaineyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23336: atra na prāpnoti . iha ca prāpnoti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23338: sāpatnaḥ iti . yadi punaḥ anapatye iti ucyeta . na evam śakyam . iha hi na syāt . gārgyāyaṇyāḥ apatyam māṇavakaḥ gārgaḥ jālmaḥ . astu tarhi aḍhe iti eva . katham kauṇḍinyaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23339: sāpatnaḥ iti . kauṇḍinye nipātanāt siddham . kim nipātanam . āgastyakauṇḍinyayoḥ iti . sāpatnaśabdaḥ prakṛtayataram . [R 613:
GS24pmbhasuu:23340: sāpatnaḥ prakṛtyantatatvāt . sāpatnaśabdaḥ prakṛtayataram asti .] katham agnāyī devatā asya sthālīpākasya ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23341: āgneyaḥ sthālīpākaḥ iti . astu tarhi anapatye iti . katham gārgaḥ jālmaḥ . gārgāgneyau
GS24pmbhasuu:23342: na saṃvadete . kartavyaḥ atra yatnaḥ . ṭhakchasoḥ ca . ṭhakchasoḥ ca puṃvadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23345: bhavadīyāḥ . ṭhaggrahaṇam kimartham na ike kṛte ajādau iti . na evam śakyam . ajādilakṣaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:23346: hi māthitikādivat prasaṅgaḥ . ajādilakṣaṇe hi māthikādivat prasajyeta . tat yatha
GS24pmbhasuu:23347: mathitam paṇyam asya māthitikaḥ iti akāralope kṛte tāntāt iti kādeśaḥ na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:23349: (P_6,3.36) KA_III.156.2-6 Ro_IV.614 maningrahaṇam kimartham . māningrahaṇam astryartham
GS24pmbhasuu:23350: asamānādhikaraṇārtham ca . māningrahaṇam kriyate astryartham asamānādhikaraṇārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:23351: ca . astryartham tāvat . darśanīyām manyate devadattaḥ yajñadattām darśanīyamānī
GS24pmbhasuu:23352: ayam asyāḥ . asamānādhikaraṇārtham . darśanīyām manyate devadattā yajñadattām darśanīyamāninī iyam asyāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:23353: (P_6,3.37) KA_III.156.8-17 Ro_IV.615-616 kim idam evamādi anukramaṇam ādyasya yogasya viṣaye āhosvit puṃvadbhāvamātrasya . kim ca ataḥ . yadi ādyasya yogasya viṣaye mādhyamkīyaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23355: atra na prāpnoti . vidhīḥ api atra na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . bhāṣitapūṃśkāt anūṅ
GS24pmbhasuu:23356: iti ucyate . na hi etat bhavati bhāṣitapūṃśkāt anūṅ . idam tarhi vilepikāyāḥ dharmyam
GS24pmbhasuu:23357: vailepikam . vidhiḥ ca siddhaḥ bhavati pratiṣedhaḥ ca na prāpnoti . atha puṃvabhāvamātrasya
GS24pmbhasuu:23359: jātilakṣaṇaḥ puṃvabhāvapratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . evam tarhi na kopadhāyāḥ iti eṣaḥ yogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23360: puṃvabhāvamātrasya uttaram evamādi anukramaṇam ādyasya yogasya viṣaye . na kopadhapratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:23361: taddhitavugrahaṇam . na kopadhapratiṣedhe taddhitavugrahaṇam kartavyam . taddhitasya
GS24pmbhasuu:23362: yaḥ kakāraḥ voḥ ca yaḥ kakāraḥ tasya grahaṇam kartavyam . iha mā bhūt . pākabhāryaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23364: (P_6,3.40) KA_III.156.19-157.2 Ro_IV.616 svāṅgāt ca ītaḥ amānini . svāṅgāt ca ītaḥ amānini iti vaktavyam iha api yathā syāt . dīrghamukhamānī
GS24pmbhasuu:23365: ślakṣṇamukhamāninī . yadi amānini iti ucyate dīrghamukhamāninī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23366: ślakṣṇamukhamānininī iti na sidhyati . prātipadikagrahaṇe liṅgaviśiṣṭasya api grahaṇam bhavati iti evam bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:23367: (P_6,3.42.1) KA_III.157.4-14 Ro_IV.616-617 kimartham idam ucyate . puṃvat karmadhāraye
GS24pmbhasuu:23368: pratiṣiddhārtham . pratiṣiddhāṛthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . na kopadhāyāḥ iti uktam . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:23369: api puṃvat bhavati . kārikā vṛndārikā kārakavṛndārikā kārakajātīyā kārakadeśīyā .
GS24pmbhasuu:23370: sañjñāpūraṇayoḥ ca iti uktam . tatra api puṃvat bhavati . dattā vṛndārikā dattavṛndārikā
GS24pmbhasuu:23371: dattajātīyā dattadeśīyā . pañcamī vṛndārikā pañcamavṛndārikā pañcamajātīyā pañcamadeśīyā
GS24pmbhasuu:23372: . vṛddhinimittasya iti uktam . tatra api puṃvat bhavati . sraughnī vṛndārikā sraughnavṛndārikā
GS24pmbhasuu:23373: sraughnajātīyā sraughnadeśīyā . svāṅgāt ca ītaḥ amānini iti uktam . tatra api puṃvat
GS24pmbhasuu:23374: bhavati . ślakṣṇamukhī vṛndārikā ślakṣṇamukhavṛndārikā ślakṣṇamukhajātīyā ślakṣṇamukhadeśīyā
GS24pmbhasuu:23375: . jāteḥ ca iti uktam . tatra api puṃvat bhavati . kaṭhī vṛndārikā kaṭhavṛndārikā
GS24pmbhasuu:23377: (P_6,3.42.2) KA_III.157.15-24 Ro_IV.617-618 kukkuṭyādīnām aṇḍādiṣu puṃvadvacanam . kukkuṭyādīnām aṇḍādiṣu puṃvadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kukkuṭyāḥ aṇḍam kukkuṭāṇḍam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23379: kākyāḥ śāvaḥ kākaśāvaḥ . na vā astrīpūrvapadavivakṣitatvāt . na vā vaktavyam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:23380: kāraṇam astrīpūrvapadavivakṣitatvāt . na atra strīpūrvapadam vivakṣitam . kim tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:23381: . astrīpūrvapadam . ubhayoḥ aṇḍam ubhayoḥ padam ubhayoḥ śāvaḥ . yadi api tāvat atra
GS24pmbhasuu:23382: etat śakyate vaktum iha tu katham . mṛgyāḥ kṣīram mṛghakṣīram iti . atra api na vā
GS24pmbhasuu:23383: astrīpūrvapadavivakṣitatvāt iti eva . katham punaḥ sataḥ nāma avāvivakṣā syāt . sataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23384: api avivakṣā bhavati . tat yathā . alomikā eḍakā . anudarā kanyā iti . asataḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:23385: vivakṣā bhavati . samudraḥ kuṇḍikā . vindhyaḥ vardhitakam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:23386: (P_6,3.42.3) KA_III.158.1-18 Ro_IV.618-619 agneḥ īttvāt varuṇasya vṛddhiḥ vipratiṣedhena . agneḥ īttvāt varuṇasya vṛddhiḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . agneḥ īttvasya avakāśaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23389: āgnivāruṇīm anaḍvāhīm ālabheta . varuṇasya vṛddhiḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23390: yuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . dvikāryayogaḥ hi vipratiṣedhaḥ na ca atra ekaḥ dvikāryayuktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23391: . katham . agneḥ īttvam varuṇasya vṛddhiḥ . na avaśyam dvikārayogaḥ eva vipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23392: . kim tarhi . asambhavaḥ api . saḥ ca atra asti asambhavaḥ . kaḥ asau asambhavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23393: . agneḥ īttvam abhinirvartamanam varuṇasya vṛddhim bādhate . varuṇasya vṛddhiḥ abhinirvartamanā
GS24pmbhasuu:23394: agneḥ īttvam bādhate . eṣaḥ asambhavaḥ . sati asambhave yuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . pūṃvadbhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:23395: hrasvatvam khidghādiṣu . pūṃvadbhāvāt hrasvatvam bhavati vipratiṣedhena khidghādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:23398: mṛdubhāryaḥ . khiti hrasvaḥ bhavati iti asya avakāśaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23402: hariṇimmanyā . ghādiṣu nadyāḥ hrasvaḥ bhavati iti asya avakāśaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23408: paṭvitamā . ke hrasvaḥ bhavati iti asya avakāśaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23412: mṛdvikā . hrasvatvam bhavati vipratiṣedhena . atha idānīm hrasvatve kṛte punaḥprasaṅgavijñānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:23413: puṃvadbhāvaḥ kasmāt na bhavati . sakṛt gatau vipratiṣedhe yat bādhitam tat bādhitam eva iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:23414: (P_6,3.43) KA_III.158.21-159.9 Ro_IV.620-621 ṅīgrahaṇam kimartham . anekācaḥ hrasvaḥ iti iyati ucyamāne khaṭvātarā mālātarā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23415: atra api prasajyeta . na etat asti prayojanam . bhāṣitapuṃskāt iti vartate . evam api dattātarā guptātarā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23416: atra api prāpnoti . ītaḥ iti vartate . evam api grāmaṇītaraḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23417: senāṇītaraḥ atra api prāpnoti . striyām iti vartate . evam api grāmaṇītarā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23418: senāṇītarā atra api prāpnoti . striyāḥ striyām iti vartate . śeṣaprakḷptyartham tarhi ṅīgrahaṇam kartavyam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23419: nadyāḥ śeṣasya anyatarasyām iti . kaḥ śeṣaḥ . āṅīca yā nadī ṅyantam ca yat ekāc . antareṇa api ṅīgrahaṇam kḷptaḥ śeṣaḥ . katham . ītaḥ iti vartate . anīt ca yā nadī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23420: īdantam ca yat ekāc . śeṣagrahaṇam ca api śakyam akartum . katham . aviśeṣeṇa ghādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:23421: nadyāḥ anyatarasyām hrasvatvam utsargaḥ . tasya anekācaḥ nityam hrasvatvam apavādaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23422: . tasmin nitye prāpte ugitaḥ vibhāṣā ārabhyate . yadi evam lakṣmitarā tantritarā
GS24pmbhasuu:23423: iti na sidhyati . lakṣmītarā tantrītarā iti prāpnoti . iṣṭam eva etad saṅgṛhītam
GS24pmbhasuu:23424: . lakṣmītarā tantrītarā iti eva bhavitavyam . evam hi saunāgāḥ paṭhanti . ghādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:23426: (P_6,3.46.1) KA_III.160.2-161.5 Ro_IV.622-627 iha kasmāt na bhavati ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23427: amahān mahān sampannaḥ mahadbhūtaḥ candramāḥ iti . anyaprakṛtiḥ tu amahān mahatprakṛtau
GS24pmbhasuu:23428: mahān mahati eva . anyaḥ mahān . anyaḥ mahān bhūtaprakṛtau vartate . mahān mahati
GS24pmbhasuu:23429: eva . tasmāt āttvam na syāt . tasmāt āttvam na bhaviṣyati . puṃvattvam tu katham
GS24pmbhasuu:23430: bhavet atra . puṃvadbhāvaḥ api tarhi na prāpnoti . amahatī mahatī sampannā mahadbhūtā
GS24pmbhasuu:23431: brāhmaṇī . evam tarhi amahati mahān hi vṛttaḥ tadvācī ca atra bhūtaśabdaḥ ayam .
GS24pmbhasuu:23432: amahati hi mahacchabdaḥ vartate tadvācī ca atra bhūtaśabdaḥ prayujyate . kiṃvācī
GS24pmbhasuu:23433: . mahadvācī . tasmāt sidhyati puṃvat . tasmāt sidhyati puṃvadbhāvaḥ . yadi evam āttvam
GS24pmbhasuu:23434: api prāpnoti . mahadbhūtaḥ candramāḥ . nivartyam āttvam tu manyante . āttvam api
GS24pmbhasuu:23435: prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yaḥ tu mahataḥ pratipadam samāsaḥ uktaḥ tadāśrayam hi
GS24pmbhasuu:23436: āttvam kartavyam manyante na lakṣaṇena lakṣaṇoktaḥ ca ayam . evam tarhi lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23437: pratipadoktasya eva iti pratipadam yaḥ samāsaḥ vihitaḥ tasya grahaṇam . lakṣaṇoktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23438: ca ayam . iha api tarhi na prāpnoti . mahān bāhuḥ asya mahābāhuḥ iti . śeṣavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:23439: tu yaḥ asau pratyārambhāt kṛtaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ tasmāt sidhyati tasmin . yasmāt śeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23440: bahuvrīhiḥ iti siddhe anekam anyapadārthe iti āha tena pratipadam bhavati . pradhānataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23441: vā yataḥ vṛttiḥ . atha vā gauṇamukhyayoḥ mukhye kāryasampratyayaḥ . tat yathā gauḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23442: anubandhyaḥ ajaḥ agnīṣomīyaḥ iti na bāhīkaḥ anubadhyate . katham tarhi bāhīke vṛddhyāttve
GS24pmbhasuu:23444: gām ānaya iti . arthāśraye etat evam . yat hi śabdāśrayam śabdamātre tat bhavati . śabdāśraye ca vṛddhyāttve .
GS24pmbhasuu:23446: puṃvadvacanam ca asamānādhikaraṇārtham . mahadāttve ghāsakaraviśiṣṭeṣu upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:23447: kartavyam puṃvadbhāvaḥ ca asamānādhikaraṇārthaḥ kartavyaḥ . mahatyāḥ ghāsaḥ mahāghāsaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23449: mahatyāḥ viśiṣṭaḥ mahāviśiṣṭaḥ . aṣṭanaḥ kapāle haviṣi . aṣṭanaḥ kapāle haviṣi upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:23450: kartavyam . aṣṭākapālam carum nirvapet . haviṣi iti kimartham . aṣṭakapālam brāhmaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:23451: . gavi ca yukte . gavi ca yukte upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . aṣṭāgavena śakaṭena . yukte
GS24pmbhasuu:23453: (P_6,3.47) KA_III.161.17-18 Ro_IV.629 prāk śatāt iti vaktavyam iha mā bhūt . dviśatam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23457: (P_6,3.48) KA_III.161.20-162.3 Ro_IV.629 sarveṣāṅgrahaṇam kimartham . catvāriṃśatprabhṛtau sarveṣām vibhāṣā yathā syāt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23458: dvyaṣṭanoḥ ca treḥ ca . na etat asti prayojanam . prakṛtam dvyaṣṭangrahaṇamanuvartiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:23459: . yadi tat anuvartate treḥ trayaḥ dvyaṣṭanoḥ ca iti dvyaṣṭanoḥ api dtrayaḥ ādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23460: prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . maṇḍūkagatayaḥ adhikārāḥ . yathā maṇḍūkāḥ utplutya utplutya
GS24pmbhasuu:23461: gacchanti tadvat adhikārāḥ . atha vā ekayogaḥ kariṣyate . dvyaṣṭanaḥ saṅkhyayām abahuvrīhyaśītyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23462: treḥ trayaḥ . tataḥ vibhāṣā catvāriṃśatprabhṛtau sarveṣām iti . atha vā ubhayam nivṛttam tat apekṣiṣyāmahe .
GS24pmbhasuu:23463: (P_6,3.50) KA_III.162.5-17 Ro_IV.629-631 yaṇgrahaṇam idam pratyayagrahaṇam . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:23464: pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ tadādeḥ grahaṇam bhavati iti yadaṇante prāpnoti . yadaṇgrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:23465: rūpagrahaṇam lekhagrahaṇāt . yadaṇgrahaṇe rūpagrahaṇam draṣṭavyam . kutaḥ . lekhagrahaṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:23466: . yat ayam lekhagrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na yadaṇante bhavati iti . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:23467: atyalpam idam ucyate . sarvatra eva uttarapadādhikāre pratyayagrahaṇe rūpagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:23468: draṣṭavyam . kutaḥ . lekhagrahaṇāt eva . kim prayojanam . kumārī gauritarā . ghādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:23469: nadyāḥ hrasvaḥ bhavati iti hrasvatvam prasajyeta . yadi etat jñāpyate khiti anavyayasya
GS24pmbhasuu:23470: iti khiti eva anantarasya anavyayasya hrasvatvam prāpnoti . khiti anantaraḥ hrasvabhāvī
GS24pmbhasuu:23471: na asti iti kṛtvā khidante bhaviṣyati . nanu ca ayam asti stanandhayaḥ iti . atra
GS24pmbhasuu:23472: api śapā vyavadhānam . ekādeśe kṛte na asti vyavadhānam . ekādeśaḥ pūrvavidhau sthānivat
GS24pmbhasuu:23473: bhavati iti sthānivadbhāvāt vyavadhānam eva . atha vā etat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ khiti
GS24pmbhasuu:23474: anantarasya na bhavati iti yat ayam anavyayasya iti pratiṣedham śāsti . na hi khiti
GS24pmbhasuu:23477: padopahatārtham] . padādeśe antodāttanipātanam kartavyam . kim prayojanam . padopahatārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:23478: . pādena upahatam padopahatam . tṛtīyā karmaṇi iti prakṛtisvaratve pūrvapadāntodāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:23479: yathā syāt . upadeśivadvacanam ca svarasiddhyartham . upadeśivadbhāvaḥ ca vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23480: . kim prayojanam . svarasiddhyartham . upadeśāvasthāyām antodāttanipātane kṛte samāsasvareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:23482: (P_6,3.53) KA_III.163.6-7 Ro_IV.632 padbhāve ike caratau upasaṅkhyānam . padbhāve ike caratau upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . pādābhyām carati padikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23483: (P_6,3.56) KA_III.163.9 Ro_IV.632 niṣke ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . panniṣkeṇa pādaniṣkeṇa .
GS24pmbhasuu:23484: (P_6,3.57) KA_III.163.11-12 Ro_IV.632 sañjñāyām uttarapadasya iti vaktavyam iha api yathā syāt . lohitodaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23486: (P_6,3.59) KA_III.163.14-164.2 Ro_IV.633 ekahalādau iti kimartham . udakasthānam
GS24pmbhasuu:23487: . ucyamāne api etasmin atra prapnoti . etat api ekahalādi . kim kāraṇam . ekaikavarṇavartitvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:23488: vācaḥ uccaritapradhvaṃsitvāt ca varṇānām . ekaikavarṇavartinī vāk . na dvau varṇau
GS24pmbhasuu:23489: yugapat uccārayati . tat yathā gauḥ iti ukte yāvat gakāre vāk vartate tāvat na aukāre
GS24pmbhasuu:23490: na visarjanīye . yāvat auakāre na tāvat gakāre na visarjanīye . yāvat visarjanīye
GS24pmbhasuu:23491: na tāvat gakāre na aukāre . uccaritapradhvaṃsitvāt ca varṇānām . uccaritaḥ varṇaḥ
