GS24pmbhasuu:23492: pradhvastaḥ ca . atha aparaḥ prayujyate . na varṇaḥ varṇasya sahāyaḥ . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:23493: ekahalādau iti ucyate sarvaḥ ca ekahalādiḥ . tatra prakarṣagatiḥ vijñāyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:23494: sādhīyaḥ yaḥ ekahalādiḥ iti . kaḥ ca sādhīyaḥ . yatra ekam halam uccārya ac ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:23495: (P_6,3.61) KA_III.164.4-19 Ro_IV.634-635 ikaḥ hrasvatvam uttarapadamātre . ikaḥ hrasvatvam uttarapadamātre vaktavyam iha api yathā syāt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23496: alābukarkandhudṛnbhuphalam iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . sarvānte hi lokavijñānam
GS24pmbhasuu:23497: . lokavijñānāt hi yat eva sarvāntam padam tasmin pūrvapadasya hrasvatvam syāt . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:23498: vā evam vigrahaḥ kariṣyate . alābūḥ ca karkandhūḥ ca ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23502: alābukarkandhudṛnbhūnām phalam alābukarkandhudṛnbhuphalam iti . yadi evam dṛnbhvāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23503: pūrvanipātaḥ prāpnoti . rājadantādiṣu pāṭhaḥ kariṣyate . atha vā evam vigrahaḥ kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:23506: alābūḥ ca karkandhudṛnbhuphalam ca alābukarkandhudṛnbhuphalam iti . evam api phalena
GS24pmbhasuu:23507: akṛtaḥ abhisambandhaḥ bhavati . pratyekam phalaśabdaḥ parisamāpyate . iyaṅuvaṅavyayapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23508: . iyaṅuvaṅbhāinām avyayānām ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . śrīkulam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23511: kuḍyībhūtam vṛṣalakulam . abhrūkaṃsādīnām iti vaktavyam . bhrukuṃsaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23513: akāraḥ bhrūkaṃsādīnām iti vaktavyam . bhrakuṃsaḥ , bhrakuṭiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:23514: (P_6,3.62) KA_III.164.21 Ro_IV.635-636 taddhite kim udāharaṇam . ekatvam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23515: ekatā . na etat asti prayojanam . puṃvadbhāvena api etat siddham . katham puṃvadbhāvaḥ . tāsilādiṣu ā kṛtvasucaḥ . idam tarhi prayojanam . ekasyāḥ āgatam ekarūpyam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23516: ekamayam . idam ca api udāharaṇam . ekatvam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23517: ekatā . nanu ca uktam puṃvadbhāvena api etat siddham iti . na sidhyati . uktam etat
GS24pmbhasuu:23518: tvataloḥ guṇavacanasya iti . atha uttarapade kim udāharaṇam . ekaśāṭī . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:23519: . puṃvadbhāvena api etat siddham . katham puṃvadbhāvaḥ . samānādhikaraṇalakṣaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23520: . idam tarhi prayojanam . ekasyāḥ kṣīram ekaṣīram . idam ca api udāharaṇam . ekaśāṭī
GS24pmbhasuu:23521: . nanu ca uktam puṃvadbhāvena api etat siddham iti . na sidhyati . na kopadhāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23522: iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . uktam etat kopadhapratiṣedhe taddhitavugrahaṇam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:23523: (P_6,3.66) KA_III.165.9-166.3 Ro_IV.636-637 khiti hrasvāprasiddhiḥ anajantatvāt . khiti hrasvāprasiddhiḥ . kālimmanyā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23524: hariṇimmanyā . kim kāraṇam . anajantatvāt . mumi kṛte anajantatvāt hrasvatvam na
GS24pmbhasuu:23525: prāpnoti . siddham tu hrasvāntasya mumvacanāt . siddham etat . katham . hrasvāntasya
GS24pmbhasuu:23526: mum bhavati iti vaktavyam . sanniyogāt vā . atha vā sanniyogaḥ kariṣyate . kaḥ eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23527: yatnaḥ codyate sanniyogaḥ nāma . cakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . mum ca . kim ca. yat ca anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:23528: prāpnoti . kim ca anyat prāpnoti . hrasvatvam . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate
GS24pmbhasuu:23529: . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam khiti hrasvāprasiddhiḥ anajantatvāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:23530: parihṛtam etat siddham tu hrasvāntasya mumvacanāt iti . tat tarhi hrasvagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:23531: kartavyam . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . ikaḥ hrasvaḥ aṅyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23532: gālavasya iti . tat vai prathamānirdiṣṭam ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭena ca iha arthaḥ . khiti
GS24pmbhasuu:23533: iti eṣā saptamī hrasvaḥ iti prathamāyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayiṣyati tasmin iti nirdiṣṭe
GS24pmbhasuu:23534: pūrvasya iti . atha vā khiti hrasvaḥ bhavati iti ucyate . khiti hrasvabhāvī na asti
GS24pmbhasuu:23535: iti kṛtvā bhūtapūrvagatiḥ vijñāsyate . ajantam yat bhūtapūrvam iti . atha vā kāryakālam
GS24pmbhasuu:23536: sañjñāparibhāṣam yatra kāryam tatra draṣṭavyam . khiti hrasvaḥ bhavati iti upasthitam
GS24pmbhasuu:23537: idam bhavati acaḥ iti . tatra vacanāt anajantasya api bhaviṣyati . iha api tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:23538: vacanāt prāpnoti . vāṅmanyaḥ iti . na etat asti . ikaḥ iti vartate . evam api khaṭvammanyaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23539: atra na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ābgrahaṇam api prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . ṅyāpoḥ sañjñācchandasoḥ bahulam iti . evam api kīlālapammanyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23540: śubhaṃyammanyaḥ atra na prāpnoti . tasmāt pūrvoktau eva parihārau .
GS24pmbhasuu:23541: (P_6,3.68.1) KA_III.166.5-167.3 Ro_IV.638-639 amaḥ pratyayavadanudeśe kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:23542: . amaḥ pratyayavadanudeśe prayojanam ātvapūrvasavarṇaguṇeyaṅuvaṅādeśāḥ . amaḥ pratyayavadanudeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:23543: ātvapūrvasavarṇaguṇeyaṅuvaṅādeśāḥ prayojanam . ātvam prayojanam . gāmmanyaḥ . pūrvasavarṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23544: prayojanam . strīmmanyaḥ . guṇaḥ prayojanam . narammanyaḥ . iyaṅuvaṅau prayojanam . śriyammanyaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23546: . amaḥ pratyayavadanudeśe ātvapūrvasavarṇayoḥ aprasiddhiḥ . kim kāraṇam . aprathamātvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:23547: . prathamayoḥ iti ucyate na ca atra prathamām paśyāmaḥ . kim ca bhoḥ ātvam prathamayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23548: iti ucyate . na khalu prathamayoḥ iti ucyate . prathamayoḥ iti tu vijñāyate . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:23549: . amśasoḥ iti ucyate . te evam vijñāsyāmaḥ . śassahacaritaḥ yaḥ amśabdaḥ . kaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:23550: śassahacaritaḥ . prathamā eva . nanu ca pratyayavadanudeśāt bhaviṣyati . na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:23552: hi] viśeṣānatideśaḥ . sāmanye hi atidiśyamāne viśeṣaḥ na atidiṣṭaḥ bhavati . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:23553: yathā . brahmaṇavat asmin kṣatriye vartitavyam iti sāmānyam yat brāhmaṇakāryam tat
GS24pmbhasuu:23554: kṣatriye atidiśyate . yat viśiṣṭam māṭhare kauṇḍinye vā na tat atidiśyate . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:23555: iha api sāmānyam yat pratyayakāryam tat atidiśyate yat viśiṣṭam dvitīyaikavacane
GS24pmbhasuu:23556: bhavati prathamayoḥ iti na tat atidiśyate . siddham tu dvitīyaikavacanavadvacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:23557: . siddham etat . katham . dvitīyaikavacanavat bhavati iti vaktavyam . ekaśeṣanirdeśāt
GS24pmbhasuu:23558: vā . atha vā ekaśeṣanirdeśaḥ ayam . am ca am ca am . icaḥ ekācaḥ am bhavati ampratyayavat
GS24pmbhasuu:23560: (P_6,3.68.2) KA_III.167.4-14 Ro_IV.639-640 atha iha katham bhavitavyam . śriyam ātmānam
GS24pmbhasuu:23561: manyate brāhmaṇakulam . śriyammanyam āhosvit śrimanyam iti . śriyammanyam iti bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:23562: . svamoḥ napuṃsakāt iti luk kasmāt na bhavati . na aprāpte luki am ārabhyate . saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23563: yathā eva supaḥ dhātuprātipadikayoḥ iti etam bādhate evam svamoḥ napuṃsakāt iti etam
GS24pmbhasuu:23564: ami lukam bādheta . na bādhate . kim kāraṇam . yena na aprāpte tasya bādhanam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:23565: . na ca aprāpte supaḥ dhātuprātipadikayoḥ iti etasmin etat ārabhyate . svamoḥ napuṃsakāt
GS24pmbhasuu:23566: iti etasmin punaḥ prāpte ca aprāpte ca . atha vā madhye apavādāḥ pūrvān vidhīn bādhante
GS24pmbhasuu:23567: iti evam supaḥ dhātuprātipadikayoḥ iti etam bādhate . svamoḥ napuṃsakāt iti etam
GS24pmbhasuu:23568: na bādhiṣyate . evam tarhi asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge iti asiddhatvāt bahiraṅgalakṣaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:23569: amaḥ antaraṅgalakṣaṇaḥ luk na bhaviṣyati . na eṣā paribhāṣā uttarapadādhikāre śakyā
GS24pmbhasuu:23570: vijñātum . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt . dviṣantapaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23571: parantapaḥ . saṃyogāntalopaḥ na syāt . tasmāt śrimanyam iti eva bhavitavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:23572: (P_6,3.70) KA_III.167.16-168.14 Ro_IV.641-642 astusatyāgadasya kāre . astusatyāgadasya kāre upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . astuṅkāraḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23574: agadaṅkāraḥ . bhakṣasya chandasi . bhakṣasya chandasi upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:23575: te bhakṣaṅkārasya . chandasi iti kim . bhakṣakārasya tat matam iti . dhenoḥ bhavyāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:23576: . dhenoḥ bhavyāyām upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . dhenumbhavyā . lokasya pṛṇe . lokasya
GS24pmbhasuu:23577: pṛṇe upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . lokamprṇasya dhanvinaḥ . itye anabhyāśasya . itye
GS24pmbhasuu:23578: anabhyāśasya upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . anabhyāśamityaḥ . bhrāṣṭrāgnyoḥ indhe . bhrāṣṭrāgnyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23580: agnimindhaḥ . gile agilasya . gile agilasya upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . timiṅgilaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23581: . agilasya iti kimartham . gilagilaḥ . gilagile ca iti vaktavyam . timiṅgilagilaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23582: . uṣṇabhadrayoḥ karaṇe . uṣṇabhadrayoḥ karaṇe upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . uṣṇaṅkaraṇam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23583: bhadraṅkaraṇam . sūtograrājabhojakulamerubhyaḥ duhituḥ putraṭ vā . sūtograrājabhojakulamerubhyaḥ duhituḥ putraṭ vā bhavati iti vaktavyam . sūtaputrī
GS24pmbhasuu:23595: (P_6,3.72) KA_III.168.16-20 Ro_IV.642-643 kim iyam prāpte vibhāṣā āhosvit aprāpte
GS24pmbhasuu:23596: . katham ca prāpte katham vā aprāpte . khiti iti vā nitye prāpte anyatra vā aprāpte
GS24pmbhasuu:23597: . rātreḥ aprāpte . rātreḥ aprāpte vibhāṣā . prāpte nityaḥ vidhiḥ . rātrimmanyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:23600: (P_6,3.73) KA_III.168.22-169.8 Ro_IV.642-643 kimartham nañaḥ sānubandhakasya grahaṇam kriyate na nasya iti eva ucyeta . nasya iti ucyamāne karṇaputraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23601: varṇaputraḥ iti atra api prasajyeta . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . arthavadgrahaṇe na anarthakasya iti evam etasya na bhaviṣyati . evam api praśnaputraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23602: viśnaputraḥ iti atra api prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ananubandhakagrahaṇe na sānubandhakasya iti evam etasya na bhaviṣyati . evam api vāmanaputraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23603: pāmanaputraḥ iti atra api prāpnoti . tasmāt sānubandhakasya grahaṇam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:23604: nañaḥ nalope avakṣepe tiṅi upasaṅkhyānam . nañaḥ nalope avakṣepe tiṅi upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:23605: kartavyam . apacasi vai tvam jālma . akaroṣi vai tvam jālma .
GS24pmbhasuu:23606: (P_6,3.74) KA_III.169.10-16 Ro_IV.644 kimartham tasmāt iti ucyate na nuṭ aci iti
GS24pmbhasuu:23607: eva ucyeta . nuṭ aci iti ucyamāne nañaḥ eva nuṭ prasajyeta . evam tarhi pūrvāntaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23608: kariṣyate . tatra ayam api arthaḥ . tadoḥ saḥ sau anantyayoḥ iti tadoḥ grahaṇam na
GS24pmbhasuu:23609: kartavyam . tatra hi tavargānirdeśe etat prayojanam iha mā bhūt . aneṣaḥ karoti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:23610: . yāvatā pūrvāntaḥ saḥ api adoṣaḥ bhavati . na evam śakyam . anuṣṇaḥ iti nalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23611: prātipadikāntasya iti nalopaḥ prasajyeta . nugvacanāt na bhaviṣyati . ṅamuṭ tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:23612: prāpnoti . tasmāt parādiḥ kartavyaḥ . parādau ca kriyamāṇe tasmāt iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:23613: (P_6,3.76) KA_III.169.18-170.4 Ro_IV.644-645 kimartham āduk ucyate na aduk eva ucyate . kā rūpasiddhiḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:23615: ekānnaśatam . savarṇadīrghatvena siddham . na sidhyati . ataḥ guṇe iti pararūpatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:23616: prāpnoti . evam tarhi aduṭ kariṣyate . aduṭ ca aśakyaḥ kartum . ānunāsikyam hi na
GS24pmbhasuu:23617: syāt . yat hi tat yaraḥ anunāsike anunāsikaḥ va iti padāntasya iti evam tat . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:23618: punaḥ kāraṇam padāntasya iti evam tat . iha mā bhūt . budhnaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23620: badhnāti . evam tarhi anuṭ kariṣyate . anuṭ ca aśakyaḥ kartum . vibhāṣayā ānunāsikyam
GS24pmbhasuu:23621: . tena idam eva rūpam syāt ekānnaviṃśatiḥ . idam na syāt . ekānnaviṃśatiḥ iti . astu
GS24pmbhasuu:23622: tarhi aduk eva . nanu ca uktam ataḥ guṇe iti pararūpatvam prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23623: doṣaḥ . akāroccāraṇasāmarthyāt na bhaviṣyati . yadi tarhi prāpnuvan vidhiḥ akāroccāraṇasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:23624: bādhyate savarṇadīrghatvam api na prāpnoti . yam vidhim prati upadeśaḥ anarthakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23625: saḥ vidhiḥ bādhyate . yasya tu vidhiḥ nimittam eva na asau bādhyate . pararūpam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:23626: prati akāroccāraṇam anarthakam savarṇadīrghatvasya punaḥ nimittam eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:23627: (P_6,3.78) KA_III.170.6-12 Ro_IV.645-646 sahasya halopavacanam . sahasya halopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23628: vaktavyaḥ . sādeśe hi svare doṣaḥ . sādeśe hi [sati] svare doṣaḥ syāt . āntaryataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23630: sabhāryaḥ .] saḥ tarhi lopaḥ vaktatvyaḥ . na vaktatvyaḥ . ādyudāttanipātanam kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:23631: . saḥ nipātanasvaraḥ prakṛtisvarasya bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . evam api upadeśivadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23632: vaktavyaḥ . saḥ yathā eva hi nipātanasvaraḥ prakṛtisvaram bādhate evam samāsasvaram
GS24pmbhasuu:23635: (P_6,3.79) KA_III.170.14-17 Ro_IV.646 granthānte vacanānarthakyam avyayībhāvena kṛtatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:23636: . granthānte vacanam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . avyayībhāvena kṛtatvāt . avyayībhāve
GS24pmbhasuu:23637: ca akāle iti eva siddham . yaḥ tarhi kālottarapadaḥ granthāntaḥ tadartham idam vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:23641: aviśeṣāt . upasarjanasya vāvacane sarvaprasaṅgaḥ . sarvasya upasarjanasya sādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23644: sahakṛtvā . kim kāraṇam . aviśeṣāt . na hi kaḥ cit viśeṣaḥ upādīyate evañjātīyakasya
GS24pmbhasuu:23645: sādeśaḥ bhavati iti . anupādīyamāne viśeṣe sarvaprasaṅgaḥ . siddham tu bahuvrīhinirdeśāt
GS24pmbhasuu:23646: . siddham etat . katham . bahuvrīhinirdeśāt . bahuvrīhinirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:23648: sahakṛtvapriyaḥ iti atra prāpnoti . bahuvrīhau yat uttarapadam iti evam vijñāsyate
GS24pmbhasuu:23649: . nanu etat api bahuvrīhau uttarapadam . evam tarhi bahuvrīhau yat upasarjanam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:23650: evam vijñāsyate . bahuvrīhau ca yat upasarjanam bahuvrīhim prati ca yat upasarjanam
GS24pmbhasuu:23651: . saḥ tarhi bahuvrīhinirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . iha kaḥ cit pradhānānām
GS24pmbhasuu:23652: eva samāsaḥ kaḥ cit upasarjanānām eva kaḥ cit pradhānopasarjanānām . tat yaḥ upasarjanānām
GS24pmbhasuu:23653: eva samāsaḥ tat upasarjanam . atha vā akāraḥ matvarthīyaḥ . tat yathā tundaḥ ghāṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23654: iti . atha vā matublopaḥ atra draṣṭavyaḥ . tat yathā puṣyakāḥ eṣām te ime puṣyakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23655: . kālakāḥ eṣām te ime kālakāḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:23656: (P_6,3.83): KA_III.171.13-14 Ro_IV.648 prakṛtyā āśiṣi agavādiṣu . prakṛtyā āśiṣi agavādiṣu iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . sagave savatsāya sahalāya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:23657: (P_6,3.86) KA_III.171.16-19 Ro_IV.648 caraṇe kim nipātyate . brahmaṇi upapade samānapūrve
GS24pmbhasuu:23658: vrate karmaṇi careḥ ṇiniḥ vratalopaḥ ca . brahmaṇi upapade samānapūrve vrate karmaṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:23659: careḥ ṇiniḥ pratyayaḥ vratalopaḥ ca nipātyate . samāne brahmaṇi vratam catarti iti sabrahmacārī .
GS24pmbhasuu:23660: (P_6,3.89) KA_III.171.21-22 Ro_IV.649 dṛgdṛśavatuṣu dṛkṣe upasaṅkhyānam . dṛgdṛśavatuṣu dṛkṣe upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . sadṛkṣāsaḥ pratisadṛkṣāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23661: (P_6,3.93, 116) KA_III.172.2-11 Ro_IV.649-650 kimartham añcatinahyādiṣu kvibgrahaṇam kriyate . iha mā bhūt . samañcanam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23662: upanahanam . na etat asti prayojanam . uttarapade iti vartate na ca antareṇa kvipam
GS24pmbhasuu:23663: añcatinahyādayaḥ uttarapadāni bhavanti . tatra antareṇa kvibgrahaṇam kvibante eva
GS24pmbhasuu:23664: bhaviṣyati . tadādividhinā prāpnoti . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati añcatinahyādiṣu kvibgrahaṇanārthakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:23665: yasmin vidhiḥ tadādau algrahaṇe . añcatinahyādiṣu kvibgrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:23666: . yasmin vidhiḥ tadādau algrahaṇe . algrahaṇeṣu etat bhavati na ca idam algrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:23667: . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat kvibgrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ anyatra dhātugrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:23668: tadādividhiḥ bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . ataḥ kṛkami iti atra ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23669: ayaskṛt ayaskāra iti api siddham bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:23671: . adrisadhryoḥ antodāttatvam vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . kṛtsvaranivṛttyartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:23677: sadhryañcaḥ . tatra chandasi striyām pratiṣedhaḥ . tatra chandasi striyām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . viśvācī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23678: ghṛtācī . yadi chandasi striyām pratiṣedhaḥ ucyate katham sā kadrīcī . evam tarhi chandasi striyām bahulam iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:23679: (P_6,3.97) KA_III.173.2-5 Ro_IV.651 samāpaḥ īttvapratiṣedhaḥ . samāpaḥ īttvapratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . samāpam nāma devayajanam . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:23681: antarīpam . iha mā bhūt . prāpam , parāpam .
GS24pmbhasuu:23682: (P_6,3.98) KA_III.173.7-8 Ro_IV.651 dīrghoccāraṇam kimartham na udanoḥ deśe iti eva ucyeta . kā rūpasiddhiḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:23683: anūpaḥ . savarṇadīrghatven siddham . na sidhyati . avagrahe doṣaḥ syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:23684: (P_6,3.99) KA_III.173.11-13 Ro_IV.651 aṣaṣṭhyatṛtīyasthasya iti ucyate . tatra idam
GS24pmbhasuu:23685: na sidhyati . anyasya idam anyadīyam . anyasya kārakam anyatkārakam . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:23686: aviśeṣeṇa anyasya duk chakārakayoḥ iti uktvā tataḥ vakṣyāmi aṣaṣṭhyatṛtīyasthasya
GS24pmbhasuu:23688: (P_6,3.101) KA_III.173.16-17 Ro_IV.651 kadbhāve trau upasaṅkhyānam . kadbhāve trau upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . kutsitāḥ trayaḥ kattrayaḥ . ke vā trayaḥ . na bibhṛyuḥ kattrayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:23689: (P_6,3.109.1) KA_III.173.19-174.15 Ro_IV.652-654 pṛṣodarādīni iti ucyate . kāni pṛṣodarādīni
GS24pmbhasuu:23690: . pṛṣodaraprakārāṇi . kāni punaḥ pṛṣodaraprakārāṇi . yeṣu lopāgamavikārāḥ śrūyante
GS24pmbhasuu:23691: na ca ucyante . atha yathā iti kim idam . prakāravacane thāl . atha kim idam upadiṣṭāni
GS24pmbhasuu:23692: iti . uccāritāni . kutaḥ etat . diśiḥ uccāraṇakriyaḥ . uccārya hi varṇān āha updiṣṭāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23693: ime varṇāḥ iti . kaiḥ punaḥ upadiṣṭāḥ . śiṣṭaiḥ . ke punaḥ śiṣṭāḥ . vaiyākaraṇāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23694: . kutaḥ etat . śāstrapūrvikā hi śiṣṭiḥ vaiyākaraṇāḥ ca śāstrajñāḥ . yadi tarhi śāstrapūrvikā
GS24pmbhasuu:23695: śiṣṭiḥ śiṣṭipūrvakam ca śāstram tat itaretarāśrayam bhavati . itaretarāśrayāṇi ca
GS24pmbhasuu:23696: na prakalpante . evam tarhi nivāsataḥ ācārataḥ ca . saḥ ca ācāraḥ āryāvartte eva
GS24pmbhasuu:23697: . kaḥ punaḥ āryāvarttaḥ . prāk ādarśāt [R adarśanāt] pratyak kālakavanāt dakṣiṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:23698: himavantam uttareṇa pāriyātram . etasmin āryanivāse ye brāhmaṇāḥ kumbhīdhānyāḥ alolupāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23699: agṛhyamāṇakāraṇāḥ kim cit antareṇa kasyāḥ cit vidyāyāḥ pāragāḥ tatrabhavantaḥ śiṣṭāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23700: . yadi tarhi śiṣṭāḥ śabdeṣu pramāṇam kim aṣṭādhyāyyā kriyate . śiṣṭajñānārthā aṣṭādhyāyī
GS24pmbhasuu:23701: . katham punaḥ aṣṭādhyāyyā śiṣṭāḥ śakyāḥ vijñātum . aṣṭādhyāyīm adhīyānaḥ anyam paśyati
GS24pmbhasuu:23702: anadhīyānam ye atra vihitāḥ śabdāḥ tān prayuñjānam . saḥ paśyati . nūnam asya daivānugrahaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23703: svabhāvaḥ vā yaḥ ayam na ca aṣṭādhyāyīm adhīte ye ca asyam vihitāḥ śabdāḥ tān prayuṅkte
GS24pmbhasuu:23704: . nūnam ayam anyān api jānāti . evam eṣā śiṣṭajñānārthā aṣṭādhyāyī .
GS24pmbhasuu:23705: (P_6,3.109.2) KA_III.174.16-175.7 Ro_IV.654-655 dikśabdebhyaḥ tīrasya tārabhāvaḥ vā . dikśabdebhyaḥ tīrasya tārabhāvaḥ vā vaktavyaḥ . dakṣiṇatīram
GS24pmbhasuu:23706: dakṣiṇatāram . vācaḥ vāde ḍatvam valabhāvaḥ ca uttarapadasya iñi . vācaḥ vāde ḍatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:23707: vaktavyam valabhāvaḥ ca uttarapadasya iñi vaktavyaḥ . vāgvādasya apatyam vāḍvaliḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23708: . ṣaṣaḥ utvam datṛdaśasu uttarapadādeḥ ṣṭutvam ca . ṣaṣaḥ utvam vaktavyam uttarapadādeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23710: ṣoḍaśa . dhāsu vā . dhāsu vā iti vaktavyam uttarapadādeḥ ṣṭutvam ca vaktavyam . ṣoḍhā
GS24pmbhasuu:23711: ṣaḍḍhā kuru . atha kimartham bahuvacananirdeśaḥ kriyate na punaḥ dhāyām iti eva ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:23712: . nānādhikaraṇavācī yaḥ dhāśabdaḥ tasya grahaṇam yathā vijñāyeta . iha mā bhūt .
GS24pmbhasuu:23713: ṣaṭ dadhāti iti ṣaḍdhā iti . duraḥ dāśanāśadabhadhyeṣu . duraḥ dāśanāśadabhadhyeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:23714: utvam vaktavyam uttarapadādeḥ ca ṣṭutvam . dūḍāśaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23717: dūḍhyaḥ . svaro rohatau chandasi . svaro rohatau chandasi utvam vaktavyam . ehi tvam
GS24pmbhasuu:23718: jāye svo rohāva . pīvopavasanādīnām chandasi lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . pīvopavasanānām payopavasanānām śriyā idam .
GS24pmbhasuu:23719: (P_6,3.111) KA_III.175.9-14 Ro_IV. 656 pūrvagrahaṇam kimartham na tasmin iti nirdiṣṭe
GS24pmbhasuu:23720: pūrvasya iti pūrvasya eva bhaviṣyati . na sidhyati . na hi ḍhralopena ānantaryam
GS24pmbhasuu:23722: haraṇīyam . na evam vijñāyate ḍhroḥ lopaḥ ḍhralopaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23723: ḍhralope iti . katham tarhi . ḍhroḥ lopaḥ asmin saḥ ayam ḍhralopaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23724: ḍhralope iti . yadi evam na arthaḥ pūrvagrahaṇena . bhavati hi ḍhralopena ānantaryam
GS24pmbhasuu:23725: . idam tarhi prayojanam . uttarapade iti vartate . tena ānantaryamātre yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:23727: (P_6,3.112) KA_III.175.16-176.4 Ro_IV.656-657 varṇagrahaṇam kimartham na sahivahoḥ ot asya iti eva ucyeta . vṛddhau api kṛtāyām yathā syāt . udavoḍhām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23729: udavoḍha iti . atha avarṇagrahaṇam kimartham . iha mā bhūt . ūḍhaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23730: ūḍhavān iti . na etat asti prayojanam . bhavatu atra ottvam . śravaṇam kasmāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:23731: bhavati . pūrvatvam asya bhaviṣyati . idam iha sampradhāryam . ottvam kriyatām pūrvatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:23732: iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt ottvam . antaraṅgam pūrvatvam . evam tarhi idam
GS24pmbhasuu:23733: iha sampradhāryam . ottvam kriyatām samprasāraṇam iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:23734: ottvam . nityam samprasāraṇam . kṛte api ottve prāpnoti akṛte api . ottvam api nityam
GS24pmbhasuu:23735: . kṛte api samprasāraṇe prāpnoti akṛte api . anityam ottvam . na hi kṛte samprasāraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:23736: prāpnoti . antaraṅgam pūrvatvam . yasya ca lakṣaṇāntareṇa nimittam vihanyate na tat
GS24pmbhasuu:23737: anityam . na ca samprasāraṇam eva ottvasya nimittam vihanti . avaśyam lakṣaṇāntaram
GS24pmbhasuu:23738: pūrvatvam pratīkṣyam . ubhayoḥ nityayoḥ paratvāt ottvam . ottve kṛte samprasāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:23739: samprasāraṇapūrvatvam . tatra kāryakṛtatvāt punaḥ ottvam na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:23740: (P_6,3.121) KA_III.176.6 Ro_IV.658 apīlvādīnām iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . rucivaham , cāruvaham .
GS24pmbhasuu:23741: (P_6,3.122) KA_III.176.8-13 Ro_IV.658 amnuṣyādiṣu iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . prasevaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23743: prasāraḥ . sādakārayoḥ kṛtrime . sādakārayoḥ kṛtrime iti vaktavyam . iha eva yathā syāt . prāsādaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23744: prākāraḥ . iha mā bhūt . eṣaḥ asya prasādaḥ . eṣaḥ asya prakāraḥ . prativeśādīnām vibhāṣā . prativeśādīnām vibhāṣā dīrghatvam vaktavyam . prativeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23748: (P_6,3.124) KA_III.176.15-20 Ro_IV.658-659 katham idam vijñāyate . dā iti etasmin takārādau ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23749: āhosvit dā iti etasmin takārānte iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate takārādau iti nīttā vittā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23750: atra na prāpnoti . atha vijñāyate takārānte iti sudattam pratidattam atra api prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:23751: . yathā icchasi tathā astu . astu tāvat takārādau iti . katham nīttā vittā . cartve
GS24pmbhasuu:23752: kṛte bhaviṣyati . asiddham cartvam . tasya asiddhatvāt na prāpnoti . āśrayāt siddhatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:23753: bhaviṣyati . atha vā punaḥ astu takārānte iti . katham sudattam pratidattam . na
GS24pmbhasuu:23755: (P_6,3.138) KA_III.177.5-10 Ro_IV.659 iha anye ācāryāḥ cau pratyaṅgasya pratiṣedham
GS24pmbhasuu:23756: āhuḥ . tat iha api sādhyam . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . etat eva jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na pratyaṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:23757: bhavati iti yat ayam cau dīrghatvam śāsti .
GS24pmbhasuu:23758: (P_6,3.139) KA_III.177.2-3 Ro_IV.659-660 ikaḥ hrasvāt samprasāraṇadīrghatvam vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:23759: . ikaḥ hrasvāt samprasāraṇadīrghatvam bhavati vipratiṣedhena . ikaḥ hrasvasya avakāśaḥ . grāmaṇikulam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23760: senānikulam . samprasāraṇadīrghatvasya avakāśaḥ . vibhāṣā hrasvatvam . yadā na hrasvatvam saḥ avakāśaḥ . hrasvaprasaṅge ubhayam prāpnoti . kārīṣagandhīputraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23761: kaumudagandhīputraḥ . samprasāraṇadīrghatvam bhavati vipratiṣedhena . atha idānīm
GS24pmbhasuu:23762: dīrghatve kṛte punaḥprasaṅgavijñānāt hrasvatvam kasmāt na bhavati . sakṛdgatau vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:23763: yat bādhitam tat bādhitam eva iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:23764: (P_6,4.1.1) KA_III.178.2-10 Ro_IV.661-662 ā kutaḥ ayam adhikāraḥ . ā saptamādhyāyaparisamāpteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23765: aṅgādhikāraḥ . yadi ā saptamādhyāyaparisamāpteḥ aṅgādhikāraḥ guṇaḥ yaṅlukoḥ iti yaṅluggrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:23766: kartavyam . prāk abhyāsavikārebhyaḥ punaḥ aṅgādhikāre sati pratyayalakṣaṇena siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:23767: . astu tarhi prāk abhyāsavikārebhyaḥ aṅgādhikāraḥ . yadi prāk abhyāsavikārebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23768: aṅgādhikāraḥ vavraśca vakārasya samprasāraṇam prāpnoti . ā saptamādhyāyaparisamāpteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23769: punaḥ aṅgādhikāre sati uḥ adatvasya sthānivadbhāvān na samprasāraṇe samprasāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:23770: iti pratiṣedhaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . saḥ ca idānīm aparihāraḥ bhavati yat tat uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:23771: aṅgānyatvāt ca siddham iti . astu tarhi ā saptamādhyāyaparisamāpteḥ aṅgādhikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23772: . nanu ca uktam guṇaḥ yaṅlukoḥ iti yaṅluggrahaṇam kartavyam iti . kriyate nyāse eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:23773: (P_6,4.1.2) KA_III.178.11-179.10 Ro_IV.662-665 kim punaḥ iyam sthānṣaṣṭhī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23774: aṅgasya sthāne iti . evam bhavitum arhati . aṅgasya iti sthānaṣaṣṭhī cet pañcamyantasya
GS24pmbhasuu:23775: ca adhikāraḥ . aṅgasya iti sthānaṣaṣṭhī cet pañcamyantasya ca adhikāraḥ kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23776: . aṅgāt iti api vaktavyam . anucyamāne hi ataḥ bhisaḥ ais bhavati iti ataḥ iti pañcamī
GS24pmbhasuu:23777: aṅgasya iti sthānaṣaṣṭhī . tatra aśakyam vivibhaktikatvāt ataḥ iti pañcamyā aṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:23778: viśeṣayitum . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . akārāt parasya bhismātrasya ais-bhāvaḥ bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:23781: odanabhissaṭā iti . avayavaṣaṣṭhyādīnām ca aprasiddhiḥ . avayavaṣaṣṭhyādayaḥ ca na
GS24pmbhasuu:23782: sidhyanti . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . śāsaḥ it aṅhaloḥ iti śāseḥ ca antyasya syāt upadhāmātrasya
GS24pmbhasuu:23783: ca . ūt upadhāyāḥ gohaḥ iti goheḥ ca antyasya syāt upadhāmātrasya ca . siddham tu
GS24pmbhasuu:23784: parasparam prati aṅgapratyayasaṅjñābhāvāt . siddham etat . katham . parasparam prati
GS24pmbhasuu:23785: aṅgapratyayasaṅjñe bhavataḥ . aṅgasañjñām prati pratyayasañjñā pratyayasañjñām prati
GS24pmbhasuu:23786: aṅgasañjñā . kim ataḥ yat parasparam prati aṅgapratyayasaṅjñe bhavataḥ . sambandhaṣaṣthīnirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23787: ca . sambandhaṣaṣthīnirdeśaḥ ca ayam kṛtaḥ bhavati . aṅgasya yaḥ bhis-śabdaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:23788: . kim ca aṅgasya bhis-śabdaḥ . nimittam . yasmin aṅgam iti etat bhavati . kasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:23789: ca etat bhavati . pratyaye . evam api avayavaṣaṣṭhyādayaḥ aviśeṣitāḥ bhavanti . avayavaṣaṣṭhyādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23790: api sambandhe eva . evam api sthānam aviśeṣitam bhavati . sthānam api sambandhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23791: eva . evam api na jñāyate kva sthānaṣaṣṭhī kva viśeṣaṇaṣaṣṭhī iti . yatra ṣaṣṭhī
GS24pmbhasuu:23792: anyayogam na apekṣate sā sthānaṣaṣṭhī . yatra hi anyayogam apekṣate sā viśeṣaṇaṣaṣṭhī .
GS24pmbhasuu:23793: (P_6,4.1.3) KA_III.179.11-180.23 Ro_IV.665-669 kāni punaḥ aṅgādhikārasya prayojanani
GS24pmbhasuu:23794: . aṅgādhikārasya prayojanam samprasāraṇadīrghatve . halaḥ uttarasya samprasāraṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:23799: durutam . nāmsanoḥ ca . nāmsanoḥ ca dīrghatve prayojanam . nāmi dīrghaḥ bhavati . agnīnām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23800: vāyūnām . aṅgasya iti kimartham . krimiṇām paśya . pāmanām paśya . sani dīrghaḥ bhavati . cicīṣati ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23801: tuṣṭūṣati . aṅgasya iti kimartham . dadhi sanoti . madhu sanoti . liṅi etve . liṅi etve prayojanam . gleyāt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23803: nirvāyāt . ataḥ bhisaḥ aistve . ataḥ bhisaḥ aistve prayojanam . vṛkṣaiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23805: odanabhissaṭā . luṅādiṣu aḍāṭau . luṅādiṣu aḍāṭau prayojanam . akārṣīt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23808: bhruvau bhruvaḥ . aṅgasya iti kimartham . śryartham ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23809: bhrvartham . yuṣmadasmadoḥ prayojanam . sāmaḥ ākam . yuṣmākam asmākam . aṅgasya iti kimartham . yuṣmatsāma ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23810: asmatsāma . tātaṅ prayojanam . jīvatāt bhavān . aṅgasya iti kimartham . paca hi tāvat tvam . jalpa tu tāvat tvam . āmi nuṭ prayojanam . kumārīṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:23813: ām iti āha . āne muk prayojanam . pacamānaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23814: yajamānaḥ . aṅgasya iti kimartham . prāṇaḥ . ke hrasvaḥ prayojanam . kiśorikā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23815: kumārikā . aṅgasya iti kimartham . kumārī kāyati kumārīkaḥ . yi dīrghaḥ prayojanam . cīyate ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23819: abbhakṣaḥ . na etāni santi prayojanāni . katham . arthavadgrahaṇapratyayagrahaṇābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:23820: siddham . arthavadgrahaṇapratyayagrahaṇābhyām etāni siddhāni . kva cit arthavadgrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:23821: na anarthakasya iti evam bhaviṣyati kva cit pratyayāpratyayoḥ grahaṇe pratyayasya
GS24pmbhasuu:23822: eva grahaṇam bhavati iti . atha vā pratyaye iti prakṛtya aṅgakāryam adhyeṣye . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:23823: pratyaye iti prakṛtya aṅgakāryam adhīṣe prākarot ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23825: upasargāt pūrvam aḍāṭau prāpnutaḥ . siddham tu pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ vihitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23826: tadādeḥ tadantasya ca grahaṇam . siddham etat . katham . pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23827: vihitaḥ tadādeḥ tadantasya ca grahaṇam bhavati iti evam upasargāt pūrvam aḍāṭau na bhaviṣyataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:23828: (P_6,4.2) KA_III.180.25-181.10 Ro_IV.669-670 iha kasmāt na bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:23829: tṛtīyaḥ . aṇprakaraṇāt ṛkārasya aprāptiḥ . aṇprakaraṇāt ṛkārasya dīrghatvam na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:23830: . aṇaḥ iti vartate . kva prakṛtam . ḍhralope pūrvasya dīrghaḥ aṇaḥ iti . tat vai
GS24pmbhasuu:23831: ikaḥ kāśe iti anena iggrahaṇena vyavacchinnam na śakyam anuvartayitum . iggrahaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:23832: ca aṇviśeṣaṇatvāt . aṇviśeṣaṇam iggrahaṇam . aṇaḥ ikaḥ iti . yadi tarhi aṇviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:23833: iggrahaṇam cau dīrghaḥ bhavati iti iha na prāpnoti : avācā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23834: avāce . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . aṇgrahaṇam anuvartate iggrahaṇam nivṛttam . evam api kartṝcā kartṝce ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23835: atra na prāpnoti . yathālakṣaṇam aprayukte . atha vā ubhayam nivṛttam . kasmāt na bhavati tṛtīyaḥ . nipātanāt . kim nipātanam . dvitīyatṛtīyacaturthaturyāṇi anyatarasyām iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:23836: (P_6,4.3) KA_III.181.12-182.4 Ro_IV.670-673 kimartham āmaḥ sanakārasya grahaṇam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:23837: na āmi dīrghaḥ iti eva ucyeta . kena idānim sanakārake bhaviṣyati . nuṭ ayam āmbhaktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23839: nāmi dīrghaḥ āmi cet syāt kṛte dīrghe na nuṭ bhavet . nāmi dīrghaḥ āmi cet syāt kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:23840: dīrghatve na nuṭ syāt . idam iha sampradhāryam . dīrghatvam kriyatām nuṭ iti kim
GS24pmbhasuu:23841: atra kartavyam . paratvāt nuṭ . nityam dīrghatvam . kṛte api nuṭi prāpnoti akṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:23842: api . nityatvāt dīrghatve kṛte hrasvāśrayaḥ nuṭ na prāpnoti . evam tarhi āha ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:23843: hrasvāntāt nuṭ iti na ca hrasvāntaḥ asti . tatra vacanāt bhaviṣyati . vacanāt yatra
GS24pmbhasuu:23844: tat na asti . na idam vacanāt labhyam . asti anyat etasya vacane prayojanam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:23846: catasṛṇām iti . na etat asti prayojanam . iha tāvat catasṛṇām iti ṣaṭcaturbhyaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:23847: iti evam bhaviṣyati . tisṛṇām iti trigrahaṇam api tatra prakṛtam anuvartate . kva
GS24pmbhasuu:23848: prakṛtam . treḥ trayaḥ iti . idam tarhi tvam nṛṇam nṛpate jāyase śuciḥ . na ekam
GS24pmbhasuu:23849: udāharaṇam hrasvagrahaṇam prayojayati . tatra vacanāt bhūtapūrvagatiḥ vijñāsyate
GS24pmbhasuu:23850: . hrasvāntam yat bhūtapūrvam iti . uttarāṛtham tarhi sanakāragrahaṇam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:23851: nopadhāyāḥ ca carmaṇām . nopadhāyāḥ nāmi yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt : carmaṇām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23852: varmaṇām iti . nāmi dīrghaḥ āmi cet syāt kṛte dīrghe na nuṭ bhavet . vacanāt yatra tat na asti . nopadhāyāḥ ca carmaṇām .
GS24pmbhasuu:23854: . hanaḥ kvau upadhālakṣaṇam dīrghatvam prāpnoti . anunāsikasya kvijhaloḥ kṅiti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:23855: . tasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . vṛtrahaṇau vṛtrahaṇaḥ iti . niyamavacanāt siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:23856: . inhanpūṣāryamṇām śau sau ca iti etasmāt niyamavacanāt dīrghatvam na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:23857: . niyamavacanāt siddham iti cet sarvanāmasthānaprakaraṇe niyamavacanāt anyatra aniyamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23858: . niyamavacanāt siddham iti cet sarvanāmasthānaprakaraṇe niyamavacanāt anyatra niyamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23859: na prāpnoti . kva anyatra . vṛtrahaṇi bhrūṇahani . evam tarhi dīrghavidhiḥ yaḥ iha
GS24pmbhasuu:23860: inprabhṛtīnām tam viniyamya suṭi iti suvidvān . dīrghavidhiḥ yaḥ iha inprabhṛtīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:23862: inhanpūṣāryamṇām sarvanāmasthāne dīrghaḥ bhavati . kimartham idam . niyamāṛtham .
GS24pmbhasuu:23863: inhanpūṣāryamṇām sarvanāmasthāne eva na anyatra . śau niyamam punaḥ eva vidadhyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:23864: . tataḥ śau . śau eva sarvanāmasthāne na anyatra . tataḥ sau . sau eva sarvanāmasthāne
GS24pmbhasuu:23865: na anyatra . bhrūṇahani iti tathā asya na duṣyet . tathā asya bhrūṇahani iti na doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23866: bhavati . śāsti nivartya suṭi iti aviśeṣe śau niyamam kuru vā api asamīkṣya . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:23867: vā nivṛtte sarvanāmasthānaprakaraṇe aviśeṣeṇa śau niyamam vakṣyāmi . inhanpūṣāryamṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:23868: śau eva . tataḥ sau . sau eva . iha api tarhi niyamāt na prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:23869: indraḥ vṛtrahāyate . dīrghavidheḥ upadhāniyamāt me hanta yi dīrghavidhau ca na doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23870: . upadhālakṣaṇadīrghatvasya niyamaḥ na ca etat upadhālakṣaṇam dīrghatvam . suṭi api
GS24pmbhasuu:23871: vā prakṛte anavakāśaḥ śau niyamaḥ aprakṛtapratiṣedhe . atha vā anuvartamāne sarvanāmasthānagrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:23872: anavakāśaḥ śau niyamaḥ aprakṛtasya api dīrghatvasya niyāmakaḥ bhaviṣyati . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:23873: . yasya hi śau niyamaḥ suṭi na etat tena na tatra bhavet viniyamyam . yasya hi śiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23874: sarvanāmasthānam na tasya suṭ . yasya suṭ sarvanāmasthānam na tasya śiḥ . tatra sarvanāmasthānaprakaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:23875: niyamyam na asti iti kṛtvā aviśeṣeṇa śau niyamaḥ vijñāsyate . dīrghavidhiḥ yaḥ iha
GS24pmbhasuu:23876: inprabhṛtīnām tam viniyamya suṭi iti suvidvān . śau niyamam punaḥ eva vidadhyāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:23877: bhrūṇahani iti tathā asya na duṣyet . śāsti nivartya suṭi iti aviśeṣe śau niyamam
GS24pmbhasuu:23878: kuru vā api asamīkṣya . dīrghavidheḥ upadhāniyamāt me hanta yi dīrghavidhau ca na
GS24pmbhasuu:23879: doṣaḥ . suṭi api vā prakṛte anavakāśaḥ śau niyamaḥ aprakṛtapratiṣedhe . yasya hi
GS24pmbhasuu:23880: śau niyamaḥ suṭi na etat tena na tatra bhavet viniyamyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:23881: (P_6,4.14) KA_III.183.20-184.11 Ro_IV.677-679 atvasantasya dīrghatve pitaḥ upasaṅkhyānam . atvasantasya dīrghatve pitaḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . gomān ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23882: yavamān . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . ananubandhakagrahaṇe hi sānubandhakasya
GS24pmbhasuu:23883: grahaṇam na iti evam pitaḥ na prāpnoti . ananubandhakagrahaṇe iti ucyate . sānubandhakasya
GS24pmbhasuu:23884: idam grahaṇam . evam tarhi tadanubandhakagrahaṇe atadanubandhakasya grahaṇam na iti
GS24pmbhasuu:23885: evam pitaḥ na prāpnoti . tat tarhi upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . na kartavyam . pakāralope
GS24pmbhasuu:23886: kṛte na atubantam bhavati atvantam eva . yathā eva tarhi pakāralope kṛte na atubantam
GS24pmbhasuu:23887: evam ukāralope api kṛte na atvantam . nanu ca bhūtapūrvagatyā bhaviṣyati atvantam
GS24pmbhasuu:23888: . yathā eva tarhi bhūtapūrvagatyā atvantam evam atubantam api . evam tarhi āśrīyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:23889: bhūtapūrvagatiḥ atvantam ca āsrīyate na atubantam . na sidhyati . iha hi vyākaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:23891: yatra asya etat rūpam iti . rūpanirgrahaḥ ca na antareṇa laukikam prayogam . tasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:23892: ca laukike prayoge sānubandhakānām prayogaḥ na asti iti kṛtvā dvitīyaḥ prayogaḥ upāsyate
GS24pmbhasuu:23893: . kaḥ asau . upadeśaḥ nāma . upadeśe ca etat atubantam na atvantam . yadi punaḥ atśabdam
GS24pmbhasuu:23894: gṛhītvā dīrghatvam ucyeta . na evam śakyam . iha api prasajyeta : jagat ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23895: janagat . arthavadgrahaṇe na anarthakasya iti evam etasya na bhaviṣyati . iha api tarhi na prāpnoti : kṛtavān ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23896: bhuktavān iti . kva tarhi syāt . pacan ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23897: yajan . na vai atra iṣyate . aniṣṭam ca prāpnoti iṣtam ca na sidhyati . tasmāt upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:23898: (P_6,4.16.1) KA_III.184.13-25 Ro_IV.679-680 gameḥ dīrghatve iṅgrahaṇam . gameḥ dīrghatve iṅgrahaṇam kartavyam . iṅgameḥ iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt :
GS24pmbhasuu:23899: sañjigaṃsate vatsaḥ mātrā iti . agrahaṇe hi anādeśasya api dīrghaprasaṅgaḥ . akriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:23900: hi iṅgrahaṇe anādeśasya api dīrghatvam prasajyeta . sañjigaṃsate vatsaḥ mātrā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:23901: . na vā chandasi anādeśasya api dīrghatvadarśanāt iṅgrahaṇānarthakyam . na vā iṅgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:23902: kartavyam . kim kāraṇam . chandasi anādeśasya api dīrghatvadarśanāt . chandasi anādeśasya
GS24pmbhasuu:23903: api gameḥ dīrghatvam dṛśyate . svargam lokam sañjigāṃsat . chandasi anādeśasya api
GS24pmbhasuu:23904: dīrghatvadarśanāt iṅgrahaṇam anarthakam . yathā eva tarhi chandasi anādeśasya api
GS24pmbhasuu:23905: gameḥ dīrghatvam bhavati evam bhāṣāyām api prāpnoti . tasmāt iṅgrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:23906: . na kartavyam . yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . acaḥ sani . ajantānām sani dīrghaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:23907: . tataḥ hanigamyoḥ . hanigamyoḥ ca sani dīrghaḥ bhavati . acaḥ iti eva . acaḥ sthāne yau hanigamī .
GS24pmbhasuu:23908: (P_6,4.16.2) KA_III.185.1-7 Ro_IV.681 atha upadhāgrahaṇam anuvartate uta aho na .
GS24pmbhasuu:23909: kim ca ataḥ . sani dīrghe upadhādhikāraḥ cet vyañjanapratiṣedhaḥ . sani dīrghe upadhādhikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23911: cicīṣati tuṣṭūṣati iti evam artham . evam tarhi nivṛttam . anadhikāre uktam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:23912: uktam . hanigamidīrgheṣu ajgrahaṇam iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . uktam etat hrasvaḥ dīrghaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23913: plutaḥ iti yatra brūyāt acaḥ iti etat tatra upasthitam draṣṭavyam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:23914: (P_6,4.19.1) KA_III.185.9-16 Ro_IV.681-683 atha , ūṭ ādiḥ kasmān na bhavati . ādiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23915: ṭit bhavati iti prāpnoti . kasya punaḥ ādiḥ . vakārasya . astu . vakārakasya kā pratipattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23916: . lopaḥ vyoḥ vali iti lopaḥ bhaviṣyati . na evam śakyam . jvaratvarasrivyavimavām
GS24pmbhasuu:23917: upadhāyāḥ ca iti dvau ūṭau syātām . evam tarhi na eṣaḥ ṭit . kaḥ tarhi . ṭhit . yadi tarhi ṭhit ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23918: dhautaḥ paṭaḥ iti etyedhatyūṭsu iti vṛddhiḥ na prāpnoti . cartve kṛte bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:23919: . asiddham cartvam . tasya asiddhatvāt na prāpnoti . āśrayāt siddhatvam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:23920: . asati anyasmin āśrayāt siddhatvam syāt asti ca anyaḥ siddhaḥ vāhaḥ uṭ iti . eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23921: api ṭhit kariṣyate . tatra ubhayoḥ cartve kṛte āśrayāt siddhatvam bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:23922: (P_6,4.19.2) KA_III.185.17-186.15 Ro_IV.683-686 atha kṅidgrahaṇam anuvartate uta
GS24pmbhasuu:23923: aho na . kim ca ataḥ . śūṭtve kṅidadhikāraḥ cet chaḥ ṣatvam . śūṭtve kṅidadhikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23926: praṣṭavyam . tukprasaṅgaḥ ca . tuk ca prāpnoti . nivṛtte api kṅidgrahaṇe avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:23927: atra tugabhāvārthaḥ yatnaḥ kartavyaḥ . antaraṅgatvāt hi tuk prāpnoti . cchvoḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:23928: sannipātagrahaṇam vijñāyate . nanu evam api antyasya prāpnoti . sannipātagrahaṇasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:23929: sarvasya bhaviṣyati . evam api aṅgasya prāpnoti . nirdiśyamānasya ādeśāḥ bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:23930: iti evam aṅgasya na bhaviṣyati . yadi evam utpucchayateḥ apratyayaḥ utpuṭ iti prāpnoti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23931: utput iti ca iṣyate . tathā vāñchateḥ apratyayaḥ vān ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23932: vāṃśau vāṃśaḥ iti na sidhyati . yathālakṣaṇam aprayukte . tatra tu etāvān viśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23933: . anuvartamāne kṅidgrahaṇe chaḥ ṣatvam vaktavyam tatra ca api sannipātagrahaṇam vijñeyam
GS24pmbhasuu:23934: . nivṛtte divaḥ ūḍbhāvaḥ . nivṛtte divaḥ ūḍbhāvaḥ prāpnoti . dyubhyām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23936: dyubhiḥ iti . ūṭhi kṛte divaḥ ut iti uttvam bhaviṣyati . na sidhyati . āntaryataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23937: dīrghasya dīrghaḥ prāpnoti . tadartham taparaḥ kṛtaḥ . evamartham taparaḥ kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:23938: . kva punaḥ kṅidgrahaṇam prakṛtam . anunāsikasya kvijhaloḥ kṅiti iti . yadi tat anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:23939: ajjhanagamām sani kvijhaloḥ ca iti kvijhaloḥ api dīrghatvam prāpnoti . jhali tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:23940: na doṣaḥ . sanam jhalgrahaṇena viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . sani jhalādau iti . kvau api ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23941: jñāpayati na anena kvau dīrghatvam bhavati iti yat ayam kvibvacipracchyāyatastukaṭaprujuśrīṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:23942: dīrghaḥ asamprasāram ca iti dīrghatvam śāsti .
GS24pmbhasuu:23944: uktam . kim uktam . tatra tāvat uktam ṣatvatukoḥ asiddhavacanam ādeśalakṣaṇapratiṣedhāṛtham
GS24pmbhasuu:23945: utsargalakṣaṇabhāvārtham ca iti . iha api asiddhavacanam ādeśalakṣaṇapratiṣedhāṛtham
GS24pmbhasuu:23946: utsargalakṣaṇabhāvārtham ca . ādeśalakṣaṇapratiṣedhāṛtham tāvat . āgahi jahi gataḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23947: gatavān . anunāsikalope jabhāve ca kṛte ataḥ lopaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23948: ataḥ heḥ iti ca prāpnoti . asiddhatvāt na bhavati . utsargalakṣaṇabhāvārtham ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:23949: edhi śādhi . astiśāstyoḥ ettvaśābhāvayoḥ kṛtayoḥ jhallakṣaṇam dhitvam na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:23950: . asiddhatvāt bhavati . atha atragrahaṇam kimartham . atragrahaṇam viṣayārtham .
GS24pmbhasuu:23951: viṣayaḥ pratinirdiśyate . atra etasmin ābhācchāstre ābhācchāstram asiddham yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:23955: (P_6,4.22.2) KA_III.187.10-189.13 Ro_IV.688-693 kāni punaḥ asya yogasya prayojanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:23956: . prayojanam śaittvam dhitve . śābhāvaḥ ettvam ca dhitve prayojanam . edhi śādhi
GS24pmbhasuu:23957: . astiśāstyoḥ ettvaśābhāvayoḥ kṛtayoḥ jhallakṣaṇam dhitvam na prāpnoti . asiddhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:23958: bhavati . śābhāvaḥ tāvat na prayojayati . evam vakṣyāmi . śās hau śā hau iti . yatvabhūtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23959: sakāraḥ . tatra sāt dhitvam dhi ca iti sakārasya lopaḥ . atha vā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23960: ā hau iti vakṣyāmi . evam api sakārasya prāpnoti . upadhāyāḥ iti vartate . upadhāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23961: ātve kṛte sāt dhitvam dhi ca iti sakārasya lopaḥ . atha vā na hau iti vakṣyāmi .
GS24pmbhasuu:23962: tatra ettve pratiṣiddhe sāt dhitvam dhi ca iti sakārasya lopaḥ . ettvam api lopāpavādaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23963: vijñāsyate na ca sakārasya lopaḥ prāpnoti . hilopaḥ uttve . hilopaḥ uttve prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:23964: . kuru iti atra hilope kṛte sārvadhātukapare ukāre iti uttvam na prāpnoti . asiddhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:23965: bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam . vakṣyati tatra sārvadhātukagrahaṇasya prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:23966: sārvadhātuke bhūtapūrvamātre yathā styāt uttvam . tāstilopeṇyaṇādeśāḥ aḍāḍvidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:23967: . talopaḥ astilopaḥ iṇaḥ ca yaṇādeśaḥ aḍāḍvidhau prayojanam . akāri ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23968: aihī iti . talope kṛte luṅi iti aḍāṭau na klprāpnutaḥ . asiddhatvāt bhavataḥ . astilopaḥ iṇaḥ ca yaṇādeśaḥ prayojanam . āsan ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23969: āyan iti . iṇastyoḥ yaṇlopayoḥ kṛtayoḥ anajāditvāt āṭ na prāpnoti . asiddhatvāt bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:23970: . astilopaḥ tāvat na prayojayati . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati lopāt āṭ balīyān iti
GS24pmbhasuu:23971: yat ayam śnasoḥ allopaḥ iti taparakaraṇam karoti . iṇyaṇādeśaḥ ca api na prayojayati
GS24pmbhasuu:23972: . yaṇādeśe yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . iṇaḥ yaṇ bhavati . tataḥ eḥ anekācaḥ . eḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:23973: anekācaḥ iṇaḥ yaṇ bhavati . tataḥ asaṃyogapūrvasya yaṇ bhavati . eḥ anekācaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:23974: eva . sarveṣām eva parihāraḥ . upadeśaḥ iti vartate . tatra upadeśāvasthāyām eva
GS24pmbhasuu:23975: aḍāṭau bhavataḥ . atha vā ārdhadhātuke iti vartate . atha vā luṅlaṅlṛṅkṣu aṭ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:23979: aupyata iti na sidhyati . vakṣyati etat ajādīnām aṭā siddham iti . anunāsikalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23980: hilopāllopayoḥ jabhāvaḥ ca . anunāsikalopaḥ hilopāllopayoḥ jabhāvaḥ ca prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:23982: gatavān . anunāsikalope kṛte jabhāve ca ataḥ heḥ ataḥ lopaḥ iti ca lopaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:23983: . asiddhatvāt na bhavati . anunāsikalopaḥ tāvat na prayojayati . allope upadeśe iti
GS24pmbhasuu:23984: vartate . yadi upadeśe iti vartate dhinutaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:23985: kṛṇutaḥ atra na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na upadeśagrahaṇena prakṛtiḥ abhisambadhyate . kim tarhi . ārdhadhātukam abhisambadhyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:23986: ārdhadhātukopadeśe yat akārāntam iti . jabhāvaḥ ca na prayojayati . hilope yogavibhāgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23987: kariṣyate . ataḥ heḥ . tataḥ utaḥ ca . utaḥ ca heḥ luk bhavati iti . tataḥ pratyayāt
GS24pmbhasuu:23988: . pratyayāt iti ubhayoḥ śeṣaḥ . atha kimartham anunāsikalopaḥ hilopāllopayoḥ jabhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23989: ca iti ucyate na anunāsikalopajabhāvau allopahilopayoḥ iti eva ucyate . saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23990: mā bhūt iti . anunāsikalopaḥ hilope prayojayati . maṇḍūki tābhiḥ āgahi . rohitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:23991: ca iha a gahi . marudbhiḥ agne agahi . samprasāraṇam avarṇalope . samprasāraṇam avarṇalope
GS24pmbhasuu:23993: maghone . samprasāraṇe kṛte yasya iti lopaḥ prāpnoti . asiddhatvāt na bhavati . na etat asti prayojanam . vakṣyati etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:23995: iti . rebhāvaḥ āllope . rebhāvaḥ āllope prayojanam . kim svit garbham prathamam dadhre
GS24pmbhasuu:23996: āpaḥ . rebhāve kṛte ātaḥ lopaḥ iṭi ca iti ākāralopaḥ na prāpnoti . asiddhatvāt bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:23997: . etat api na asti prayojanam . chāndasaḥ rebhāvaḥ liṭ ca chandasi sārvadhātukam
GS24pmbhasuu:23998: api bhavati . tatra sārvadhātukam apit ṅit bhavati iti ṅitvam . śnābhyastayoḥ ātaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24000: (P_6,4.22.3) KA_III.189.14-190.9 Ro_IV.693-695 yadi tarhi ayam yogaḥ na ārabhyate ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24001: ut tu kṛñaḥ katham oḥ vinivṛttau . iha kurvaḥ kurmaḥ kuryāt iti ukāralope kṛte sārvadhātukapare
GS24pmbhasuu:24002: ukāre iti uttvam na prāpnoti . ṇeḥ api ca iṭi katham vinivṛttiḥ . iha ca kārayateḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24003: kāriṣyate ṇeḥ aniṭi iti ṇilopaḥ na prāpnoti . abruvataḥ tava yogam imam syāt luk
GS24pmbhasuu:24004: ca ciṇaḥ nu katham na tarasya . iha ca ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24005: akāritarām ahāritarām iti ciṇaḥ uttarasya tarasya luk na syāt . cam bhagavān kṛtavān
GS24pmbhasuu:24006: tu tadartham tena bhavet iṭi ṇeḥ nivṛttiḥ . iha syasicsīyuṭtāsiṣu bhāvakarmaṇoḥ upadeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:24007: ajjhanagrahadṛśām vā ciṇvat iṭ ca kim ca . ṇilopaḥ ca . mvoḥ api ye ca tathā api
GS24pmbhasuu:24008: anuvṛttau . iha api kurvaḥ kurmaḥ kuryāt iti mvoḥ ye ca iti etat api anuvartiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:24009: . ciṇluki ca kṅitaḥ eva luk syāt . ciṇluki api prakṛtam kṅidgrahaṇam anuvartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:24010: kva prakṛtam . gamahanakhanaghasām lopaḥ kṅiti anaṅi iti . tat vai saptamīnirdiṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:24011: ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭena ca iha arthaḥ . ciṇaḥ iti eṣā pañcamī kṅiti iti saptamyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm
GS24pmbhasuu:24012: lprakalpayiṣyati tasmāt iti uttarasya iti . ut tu kṛñaḥ katham oḥ vinivṛttau . ṇeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24013: api ca iṭi katham vinivṛttiḥ . abruvataḥ tava yogam imam syāt luk ca ciṇaḥ nu katham
GS24pmbhasuu:24014: na tarasya . cam bhagavān kṛtavān tu tadartham tena bhavet iṭi ṇeḥ nivṛttiḥ . mvoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24015: api ye ca tathā api anuvṛttau . ciṇluki ca kṅitaḥ eva luk syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:24016: (P_6,4.22.4) KA_III.190.10-192.8 Ro_IV.695-701 ārabhyamāṇe api etasmin yoge siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:24017: vasusamprasāraṇam ajvidhau . vasusamprasāraṇam ajvidhau siddham vaktavyam . kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:24018: . papuṣaḥ paśya . tasthuṣaḥ paśya . ninyuṣaḥ paśya . cicyuṣaḥ paśya . luluvuṣaḥ paśya
GS24pmbhasuu:24019: . pupuvuṣaḥ paśya iti . vasoḥ samprasāraṇe kṛte aci iti ākāralopādīni yathā syuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24020: iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyanti . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt asiddhatvāt ca . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:24021: ca eva hi vasusamprasāraṇam asiddham ca . āttvam yalopāllopayoḥ paśuṣaḥ na vājān
GS24pmbhasuu:24022: cākhāyitā cākhāyitum . āttvam yalopāllopayoḥ siddham vaktavyam . kim prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:24023: paśuṣaḥ na vājān . paśuṣaḥ iti ātttvasya asiddhatvāt ātaḥ dhātoḥ iti ākāralopaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:24024: prāpnoti . cākhāyitā cākhāyitum iti āttvasya asiddhatvāt yasya halaḥ iti yalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24025: prāpnoti . samānāśrayavacanāt siddham . samānāśrayam asiddham bhavati vyāśrayam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:24031: pupuvuṣaḥ paśya iti . vasau ākāralopādīni vasantasya vibhaktau samprasāraṇam . paśuṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24032: iti viṭi āttvam viḍantasya vibhaktau ākāralopaḥ . cākhāyitā cākhāyitum iti yaṅi āttvam
GS24pmbhasuu:24033: yaṅantasya ca ārdhadhātuke lopaḥ iti . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam
GS24pmbhasuu:24034: gaṃsyate . atragrahaṇasāmarthyāt . nanu ca anyat atragrahaṇasya prayojanam uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:24035: . kim uktam . atragrahaṇam viṣayārtham iti . adhikārāt api etat siddham . iha papuṣaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24038: dvau hetū vypadiṣṭau bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvam asiddhatvam ca iti . tatra bhavaet asiddhatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:24039: pratyuktam bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvam tu na eva pratyuktam . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ bahiraṅgam antaraṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:24040: iti ca pratidvandvibhāvinau etau arthau . katham . sati antaraṅge bahiraṅgam sati
GS24pmbhasuu:24041: ca bahiraṅge antaraṅgam . na ca atra antaraṅgabahiraṅgayoḥ yugapat samavasthānam
GS24pmbhasuu:24042: asti . na anabhinirvṛtte bahiraṅge antaraṅgam prāpnoti . tatra nimittam eva bahiraṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:24043: antaraṅgasya . hrasvayalopāllopāḥ ca ayādeśe lyapi . hrasvayalopāllopāḥ ca ayādeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:24045: pratamayya gataḥ . prabebhidayya gataḥ . pracecchidayya gataḥ . prastanayya gataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24046: . pragadayya gataḥ . hrasvayalopāllopānām asiddhatvāt lyapi laghupūrvāt iti ayādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24047: na prāpnoti . atra api eṣaḥ parihāraḥ samānāśrayavacanāt siddham iti . katham . ṇau
GS24pmbhasuu:24048: ete vidhayaḥ ṇeḥ lyapi ayādeśaḥ . vugyuṭau uvaṅyaṇoḥ . vugyuṭau uvaṅyaṇoḥ siddhau
GS24pmbhasuu:24050: babhūvuḥ : vukaḥ asiddhatvāt uvaṅādeśaḥ prāpnoti . upadidīye ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24052: yuṭaḥ asiddhatvāt yaṇādeśaḥ prāpnoti . vukaḥ tāvat na vaktavyaḥ . vukam na vakṣyāmi . evam vakṣyāmi :
GS24pmbhasuu:24053: bhuvaḥ luṅliṭoḥ ūt upadhāyāḥ iti . atra uvaṅādeśe kṛte yā upadhā tasyāḥ ūttvam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:24054: . evam api kutaḥ nu khalu etat uvaṅādeśe kṛte yā upadhā tasyāḥ ūttvam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:24055: na punaḥ sāmpratikī yā upadhā tasyāḥ syāt bhakārasya . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . oḥ iti vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:24056: . tena uvarṇasya bhaviṣyati . bhavet siddham babhūvatuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24058: babhūva babhūvitha iti . kim kāraṇam . guṇavṛddhyoḥ kṛtayoḥ uvarṇābhāvāt . na atra
GS24pmbhasuu:24059: guṇavṛddhī prāpnutaḥ . kim kāraṇam . kṅiti ca iti pratiṣedhāt . katham kittvam .
GS24pmbhasuu:24060: indhibhavatibhyām ca iti . tat vai vayam kittvam pratyācakṣmahe vukā . iha tu kittvena
GS24pmbhasuu:24061: vuk pratyākhyāyate . kim punaḥ atra nyāyyam . vugvacanam eva nyāyyam . sati api hi
GS24pmbhasuu:24062: kittve syātām eva atra guṇavṛddhī . kim kāraṇam . iglakṣaṇayoḥ guṇavṛddhyoḥ saḥ pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24063: na ca eṣā iglakṣaṇā vṛddhiḥ . evam tarhi na arthaḥ vukā na api kittvena . stām atra
GS24pmbhasuu:24064: guṇavṛddhī . guṇavṛddhyoḥ kṛtayoḥ avāvoḥ ca kṛtayoḥ yā upadhā tasyāḥ ūttvam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:24065: . katham . oḥ iti atra avarṇam api pratinirdiśyate . iha api tarhi prāpnoti . kīlālapaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24067: . lopaḥ atra bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . iha tarhi prāpnoti . kīlālapau kīlālapāḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:24068: evam tarhi vyoḥ iti vartate . tena uvarṇam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . oḥ vyoḥ iti . iha idānīm
GS24pmbhasuu:24069: oḥ iti anuvartate . vyoḥ iti nivṛttam . yuṭaḥ ca api na vaktavyam . yuḍvacanasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:24070: na bhaviṣyati . asti anyat yuḍvacane prayojanam . kim . dvayoḥ yakārayoḥ śravaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:24071: yathā syāt . na vyañjanaparasya anekasya ekasya vā yakārasya śravaṇam prati viśeṣaḥ asti .
GS24pmbhasuu:24072: (P_6,4.22.5) KA_III.192.9-193.19 Ro_IV.701-705 kim punaḥ prāk bhāt asiddhatvam āhosvit
GS24pmbhasuu:24073: saha tena . kutaḥ punaḥ ayam sandehaḥ . āṅā ayam nirdeśaḥ kriyate āṅ ca punaḥ sandeham
GS24pmbhasuu:24075: ā pāṭaliputrāt vṛṣṭaḥ devaḥ iti sandehaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:24076: kim prāk pāṭaliputrāt saha tena iti . evam iha api sandehaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:24077: prāk bhāt saha tena iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . prāk bhāt iti cet sunāmaghonābhūguṇeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:24078: upasaṅkhyānam . prāk bhāt iti cet sunāmaghonābhūguṇeṣu upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:24079: śunaḥ paśya . śunā śune . samprasāraṇe kṛte allopaḥ anaḥ iti prāpnoti . yasya punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24080: saha tena asiddhatvam asiddhatvāt tasya na saṃyogāt vamantāt iti pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:24081: . yasya api prāk bhāt asiddhatvam tasya api eṣaḥ na doṣaḥ . katham . na astri atra
GS24pmbhasuu:24082: viśeṣaḥ allopena vā nivṛttau satyām pūrvatvena vā . ayam asti viśeṣaḥ . allopena
GS24pmbhasuu:24083: nivṛttau satyām udāttanivṛttisvaraḥ prasajyeta . na atra udāttanivṛttisvaraḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:24084: . kim kāraṇam . na gośvansāvavarṇa iti pratiṣedhāt . na eṣaḥ udāttanivṛttisvarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:24085: pratiṣedhaḥ . kasya tarhi . tṛtīyādisvarasya . yatra tarhi tṛtīyādisvaraḥ na asti
GS24pmbhasuu:24086: . śunaḥ paśya iti . evam tarhi na vayam lakṣaṇasya pratiṣedham śiṣmaḥ . kim tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:24087: yena kena cit lakṣaṇena prāptasya vibhaktisvarasya ayam pratiṣedhaḥ . yatra tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:24088: vibhaktisvaraḥ na asti . bahuśunī iti . yadi punaḥ ayam udāttanivṛttisvarasya api
GS24pmbhasuu:24089: pratiṣedhaḥ vijñāyeta . na evam śakyam . iha api prasjyeta kumārī iti . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:24090: ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na udāttanivṛttisvaraḥ śuni avatarati iti yat ayam śvanśabdam
GS24pmbhasuu:24091: gaurādiṣu paṭhati . antodāttārtham yatnam karoti . siddham hi syāt ṅīpā eva . maghonaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24092: paśya . maghonā maghone . samprasāraṇe kṛte yasya iti lopaḥ prāpnoti . yasya punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24093: saha tena asiddhatvam asiddhatvāt tasya na bhaviṣyati . yasya api prāk bhāt asiddhatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:24094: tasya api eṣaḥ na doṣaḥ . katham . vakṣyati etat maghavan-śabdaḥ avyutpannam prātipadikam
GS24pmbhasuu:24095: iti . bhūguṇaḥ . bhūyān . bhūbhāve kṛte oḥ guṇaḥ prāpnoti . yasya punaḥ saha tena
GS24pmbhasuu:24096: asiddhatvam asiddhatvāt tasya na bhaviṣyati . yasya api prāk bhāt asiddhatvam tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:24097: api eṣaḥ na doṣaḥ . katham . dīrghoccāraṇasāmarthyāt na bhaviṣyati . asti dīrghoccāraṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:24098: prayojanam . kim . bhūmā iti . nipātanāt etat siddham . kim nipātanam . bahoḥ nañvat
GS24pmbhasuu:24099: uttarapadabhūmni iti . atha vā punaḥ astu saha tena iti . ā bhāt iti cet susamprasāraṇayalopaprasthādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:24104: pupuvuṣaḥ iti . vasoḥ samprasāraṇe kṛte aci iti ākāralopādīni na sidhyanti . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24105: doṣaḥ . uktam etat samānāśrayavacanāt siddham iti . katham . vasau ākāralopādīni
GS24pmbhasuu:24106: vasantasya vibhaktau samprasāraṇam . yalopaḥ . saurī balākā . yaḥ asau aṇi akāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24107: lupyate tasya asiddhatvāt īti yalopaḥ na prāpnoti . atra api eṣaḥ eva parihāraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:24108: samānāśrayavacanāt siddham iti . katham . aṇi akāralopaḥ aṇantasya īti lopaḥ . prasthādiṣu . preyān ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24109: stheyān . prasthādīnām asiddhatvāt prakṛtyā ekāc iti prakṛtibhāvaḥ na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:24110: na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yathā eva prasthādīnām asiddhatvāt prakṛtibhāvaḥ na prāpnoti evam
GS24pmbhasuu:24112: (P_6,4.23) KA_III.193.21-194.8 Ro_IV.705-707 atha kimartham śnamaḥ saśakārasya grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:24113: kriyate na nāt nalopaḥ iti eva ucyeta . nāt nalopaḥ iti iyati ucyamāne nanditā nandakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24114: iti atra api prasajyeta . evam tarhi evam vakṣyāmi nāt nalopaḥ aniditām . tataḥ halaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24115: upadhāyāḥ kṅiti . aniditām iti . na evam śakyam . iha na syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:24116: hinasti . tasmāt na evam śakyam . na cet evam nanditā nandakaḥ iti prāpnoti . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:24117: tarhi kṅiti iti vartate . evam api hinasti iti atra na prāpnoti . na eṣā parasaptamī
GS24pmbhasuu:24118: . kā tarhi . satsaptamī . kṅiti sati . evam tarhi naśabdaḥ eva atra kṅittvena viśeṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:24119: kṅit cet naśabdaḥ bhavati iti . evam api yajñānām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24120: yatnānām iti atra na prāpnoti . dīrghatvam atra bādhakam bhaviṣyati . idam iha sampradhāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:24121: . dīrghatvam kriyatām nalopaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt nalopaḥ . tasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:24122: saśakārasya grahaṇam kartavyam . atha kriyamāṇe api saśakāragrahaṇe iha kasmāt na bhavati viśnānām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24123: praśnānām iti . lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya eva iti evam na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:24124: (P_6,4.24) KA_III.194.10-195.4 Ro_IV.707-709 aniditām nalope laṅgikampyoḥ upatapaśarīravikārayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24125: upasaṅkhyānam . aniditām nalope laṅgikampyoḥ upatapaśarīravikārayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:24128: vikampitaḥ . bṛheḥ aci aniṭi . bṛheḥ aci aniṭi upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . nibarhayati
GS24pmbhasuu:24129: nibarhakaḥ . aci iti kimartham . nibṛṃhyate . aniṭi iti kimartham . nibṛṃhitā nibṛṃhitum
GS24pmbhasuu:24130: . tat tu upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . na kartavyam . bṛhiḥ prakṛtyantaram . katham jñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:24131: . aci iti lopaḥ ucyate . anajādau api dṛśyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:24132: nibṛhyate . aniṭi iti ucyate . iṭau api dṛśyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:24133: nibarhitum . ajādau iti ucyate . ajādau api na dṛśyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:24134: nibṛṃhayati nibṛṃhakaḥ . rañjeḥ ṇau mṛgamaraṇe upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . rajayati
GS24pmbhasuu:24135: mṛgān . mṛgamaraṇe iti kimartham . rañjayati vastrāṇi . ghinuṇi ca upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:24136: kartavyam . rāgī . ghinuṇi nipātanāt siddham . kim nipātanam . tyajaraja iti . aśakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:24137: dhātunirdeśe nipātanam tantram āśrayitum . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:24139: daṃṣṭrā . na etat dhātunipātanam . kim tarhi . pratyayāntasya etat rūpam . tasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:24140: ca asya pratyaye lopaḥ bhavati . daṃśasañjasvañjām śapi iti . rajakarajanarajaḥsu
GS24pmbhasuu:24143: rajaḥ iti . rajakarajanarajaḥsu kittvāt siddham . kitaḥ eva ete auṇādikāḥ . tat yathā rucakaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24145: (P_6,4.34) KA_III.195.8-196.2 Ro_IV.709-711 śāsaḥ ittve āśāsaḥ kvau . śāsaḥ ittve
GS24pmbhasuu:24146: āśāsaḥ kvau upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . āśīḥ iti . kim punaḥ idam niyamārtham āhosvit
GS24pmbhasuu:24147: vidhyartham . katham ca niyamārtham syāt katham vā vidhyartham . yadi tāvat śāsimātrasya
GS24pmbhasuu:24148: grahaṇam tataḥ niyamārtham . athi hi yasmāt śāsaḥ aṅ vihitaḥ tasya grahaṇam tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24149: vidhyartham . yadi api śāsimātrasya grahaṇam evam api vidhyartham eva . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:24150: aṅhaloḥ iti ucyate na ca atra halādim paśyāmaḥ . nanu ca kvip eva halādiḥ . kvipaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24151: lope kṛte halādyabhāvāt na prāpnoti . idam iha sampradhāryam . kviblopaḥ kriyatām
GS24pmbhasuu:24152: aṅhaloḥ itttvam iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt aṅhaloḥ itttvam . nityaḥ kviblopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24153: . kṛte api aṅhaloḥ itttve prāpnoti akṛte api . nityatvāt kviblope kṛte halādyabhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:24154: na prāpnoti . evam tarhi pratyayalakṣaṇena bhaviṣyati . varṇāśraye na asti pratyayalakṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:24155: . yadi vā kāni cit varṇāśrayāṇi api pratyayalakṣaṇena bhavanti tathā ca idam api
GS24pmbhasuu:24156: bhaviṣyati . atha vā evam vakṣyāmi . śāsaḥ it aṅhaloḥ . tataḥ kvau . kvau ca śāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24158: mitraśīḥ . tataḥ āṅaḥ . āṅpūrvāt ca kvau śāsaḥ it bhavati . āśīḥ iti . idam idānīm kimartham . niyamārtham . āṅpūrvāt śāsaḥ kvau eva . kva mā bhūt . āśāsyate ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24159: āśāsyamānaḥ iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . aviśeṣeṇa śāsaḥ it bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:24160: iti uktvā tataḥ aṅi iti vakṣyāmi . tat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . aṅi eva ajādau na
GS24pmbhasuu:24161: anyasmin ajādau iti . iha api tarhi niyamāt ittvam prāpnoti . āśāsyate ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24162: āśāsyamānaḥ iti . yasmāt śāseḥ aṅ vihitaḥ tasya grahaṇam na ca etasmāt śāseḥ aṅ vihitaḥ . katham āśīḥ iti . nipātanāt siddham . kim nipātanam . kṣiyāśīḥpraiṣeṣu tiṅ ākāṅkṣam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:24163: (P_6,4.37) KA_III.196.5-8 Ro_IV.711 anudāttopadeśe anunāsikalopaḥ lyapi ca . anudāttopadeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:24164: anunāsikalopaḥ lyapi ca iti vaktavyam . pramatya pratatya . tataḥ vā amaḥ . vā amaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24165: iti vaktavyam . prayatya prayamya praratya praramya praṇatya praṇamya .
GS24pmbhasuu:24166: (P_6,4.40) KA_III.196.10-12 Ro_IV.712 gamādīnām iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt . parītat sahakaṇṭhikā . saṃyat ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24167: sanut iti . ūṅ ca gamādīnām iti vaktavyam . agregūḥ , bhrūḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:24168: (P_6,4.42.1) KA_III.196.14-22 Ro_IV.712-713 atha kim ayam samuccayaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24171: sani jhalādau iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi samuccayaḥ sani ajhalādau api prāpnoti . sisaniṣati jijaniṣate cikhaniṣati . atha sanviśeṣaṇam jhalgrahaṇam jātaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24172: jātavān iti atra na prāpnoti . yathā icchasi tathā astu . astu tāvat samuccayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:24173: nanu ca uktam sani ajhalādau api prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . prakṛtam jhalgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:24174: anuvartate . tena sanam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . sani jhalādau iti . atha vā punaḥ astu sanviśeṣaṇam . katham jātaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24175: jātavān iti . prakṛtam jhali kṅiti iti anuvartate . yadi evam na arthaḥ jhalgrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:24176: . yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . janasanakhanām anunāsikasya ākāraḥ bhavati jhali kṅiti
GS24pmbhasuu:24177: . tataḥ sani . sani ca janasanakhanām anunāsikasya ākāraḥ bhavati jhali iti eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:24179: (P_6,4.42.2) KA_III.197.1-198.12 Ro_IV.713-716 sanoteḥ anunāsikalopāt āttvam vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:24180: . sanoteḥ anunāsikalopāt āttvam bhavati vipratiṣedhena . sanoteḥ anunāsikalopasya
GS24pmbhasuu:24181: avakāśaḥ anye tanotyādayaḥ . āttvasya avakāśaḥ anye janādayaḥ . sanoteḥ anunāsikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:24182: ubhayam prāpnoti . sātaḥ sātavān iti . āttvam bhavati vipratiṣedhena . na eṣaḥ yuktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24183: vipratiṣedhaḥ . na hi sanoteḥ anunāsikalopasya anye tanotyādayaḥ avakāśaḥ . sanoteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24184: yaḥ tanotyādiṣu pāṭhaḥ saḥ anavakāśaḥ . na khalu api āttvasya anye janādayaḥ avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24185: . sanoteḥ yat āttve grahaṇam tat anavakāśam . tasya anavakāśatvāt ayuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24186: . evam tarhi tanotyādiṣu pāṭhaḥ tāvat sāvakāśaḥ . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . anyāni tanotyādikāryāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:24187: . tanādibhyaḥ tathāsoḥ iti . āttve api grahaṇam sāvakāśam . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . sani ca
GS24pmbhasuu:24188: ye vibhāṣā ca . ubhayoḥ sāvakāśayoḥ yuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . evam api ayuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24189: . paṭhiṣyati hi ācāryaḥ pūrvatra asiddhe na asti vipratiṣedhaḥ abhāvāt uttarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:24190: iti . ekasya nāma abhāve vipratiṣedhaḥ na syāt kim punaḥ yatra ubhayam na asti .
GS24pmbhasuu:24191: na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . bhavati iha vipratiṣedhaḥ . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamām
GS24pmbhasuu:24192: gaṃsyate . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati bhavati iha vipratiṣedhaḥ iti yat ayam ghumāśthāgāpājahātisām
GS24pmbhasuu:24193: hali iti halgrahaṇam karoti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . halgrahaṇasya etat prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:24194: halādau īttvam yathā syāt iha mā bhūt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24196: kambaladaḥ iti . yadi ca atra vipratiṣedhaḥ na syāt halgrahaṇam anarthakam syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:24197: astu atra īttvam . īttvasya asiddhatvāt lopaḥ bhaviṣyati . paśyati tu ācāryaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:24198: iha vipratiṣedhaḥ . tataḥ halgrahaṇam karoti . na etat asti jñāpakam . vyavasthārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:24199: etat syāt . halādau īttvam yathā syāt ajādau mā bhūt iti . kim ca syāt . iyaṅādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24200: prasajyeta . nanu ca asiddhatvāt eva iyaṅādeśaḥ na bhaviṣyati . na śakyam īttvam
GS24pmbhasuu:24201: iyaṅādeśe asiddham vijñātum . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:24202: dhiyau dhiyaḥ piyau piyaḥ iti . na etat īttvam . kim tarhi . dhyāpyoḥ samprasāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:24203: etat . samānāśrayam khalu api asiddham bhavati vyāśram ca etat . katham . kvau īttvam
GS24pmbhasuu:24204: kvibantasya vibhaktau iyaṅādeśaḥ . vyavasthārtham eva tarhi halgrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:24205: . kutaḥ hi etat īttvasya asiddhatvāt lopaḥ na punaḥ lopasya asiddhatvāt īttvam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:24206: . tatra cakrakam avyavasthā prasajyeta . na asti cakrakaprasaṅgaḥ . na hi avyavasthākāriṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:24207: śāstreṇa bhavitavyam . śāstrataḥ nāma vyavasthā . tatra īttvasya asiddhatvāt lopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24208: lopena vyavasthānam bhaviṣyati . na khalu api tasmin tat eva asiddham bhavati . vyavasthārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:24209: eva tarhi halgrahaṇam kartavyam . halādau īttvam yathā syāt ajādau mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:24210: kutaḥ hi etat īttvasya asiddhatvāt lopaḥ lopena avasthānam bhaviṣyati na punaḥ lopasya
GS24pmbhasuu:24211: asiddhatvāt īttvam īttvena vyavasthānam syāt . tat eva khalu api tasmin asiddham
GS24pmbhasuu:24212: bhavati . katham . paṭhiṣyati hi ācāryaḥ ciṇaḥ luki tagrahaṇānarthakyam saṅghātasya
GS24pmbhasuu:24213: apratyayatvāt talopasya ca asiddhatvāt iti . ciṇaḥ luk ciṇaḥ luki eva asiddhaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:24214: . evam tarhi yadi vyavasthārtham etat syāt na eva ayam halgrahaṇam kurvīta . aviśeṣeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:24215: ayam īttvam uktvā tasya ajādau lopam apavādam vidadhīta . idam asti . ātaḥ lopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24216: iṭi ca iti . tataḥ ghumāśthāgāpājahātisām . lopaḥ bhavati iṭi ca ajādau kṅiti . kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:24217: punaḥ idam . īttvam vakṣyāmi tadbādhanārtham . tataḥ īt . īt ca bhavati ghvādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:24218: . tataḥ eḥ liṅi . vā anyasya saṃyogādeḥ . na lyapi . mayateḥ it anyatarasyām . tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24219: yati . yati ca īt bhavati . saḥ ayam evam laghīyasā nyāsena siddhe sati yat halgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:24220: karoti garīyāṃsam yatnam ārabhate tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati iha vipratiṣedhaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:24221: (P_6,4.45) KA_III.198.14-18 Ro_IV.717 iha anyatarasyāṅgrahaṇam śakyam akartum . katham . sanaḥ ktici lopaḥ ca ātttvam ca vibhāṣā iti . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:24222: sarvaḥ eva ayam yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum . katham . iha lopaḥ api prakṛtaḥ āttvam api prakṛtam vibhāṣāgrahaṇam api prakṛtam . tatra kevalam abhisambandhamātram kartavyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:24223: sanaḥ ktici lopaḥ ca āttvam ca vibhāṣā .
GS24pmbhasuu:24224: (P_6,4.46) KA_III.198.20-199.15 Ro_IV.717-721 kāni punaḥ ārdhadhātukādhikārasya prayojanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:24225: . ataḥ lopaḥ yalopaḥ ca ṇilopaḥ ca prayojanam āllopaḥ īttvam etvam ca ciṇvadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24226: ca sīyuṭi . ataḥ lopaḥ . cikīrṣitā cikīrṣitum . āradhadhātuke iti kimartham . cikīrṣati
GS24pmbhasuu:24227: . na etat asti prayojanam . astu atra sanaḥ akāralopaḥ . śapaḥ akārasya śravaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:24228: bhaviṣyati . śapaḥ eva tarhi mā bhūt . etat api na asti prayojanam . ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24229: jñāpayati na anena śabakārasya lopaḥ bhavati iti yat ayam adiprabhṛtibhyaḥ śapaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24230: lukam śāsti . na etat asti jñāpakam . kāryāṛtham etat syāt . vittaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24231: mṛṣṭaḥ iti . yat tarhi ākārāntebhyaḥ lukam śāsti . idam tarhi prayojanam . vṛkṣasya
GS24pmbhasuu:24232: plakṣasya . ataḥ lopaḥ . prāpnoti . yalopaḥ api prayojanam . bebhiditā cecchiditā
GS24pmbhasuu:24233: . āradhadhātuke iti kimartham . bebhidyate cecchidyate . ṇilopaḥ . pācyate yājyate
GS24pmbhasuu:24234: . āradhadhātuke iti kimartham . pācayati yājayati . āllopaḥ . yayatuḥ yayuḥ . āradhadhātuke
GS24pmbhasuu:24235: iti kimartham . yānti vānti . īttvam . dīyate ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24236: dhīyate . āradhadhātuke iti kimartham . adātām adhātām . etvam . sneyāt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24237: mleyāt . āradhadhātuke iti kimartham . snāyāt . ciṇvadbhāvaḥ ca sīyuṭi . ciṇvadbhāve
GS24pmbhasuu:24238: sīyuṭi kim udāharaṇam . kāriṣīṣṭa hāriṣīṣṭa . āradhadhātuke iti kimartham . kriyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:24239: hriyeta . na etat udāharaṇam . yakā vyavahitatvāt na bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi udāharaṇam :
GS24pmbhasuu:24241: kriyeta hriyeta . nanu ca uktam yakā vyavahitatvāt na bhaviṣyati iti . yakaḥ eva tarhi mā bhūt iti . kim ca syāt . vṛddhiḥ . vṛddhau ca kṛtāyām yuk prasajyeta .
GS24pmbhasuu:24242: (P_6,4.47) KA_III.199.17-200.11 Ro_IV.721-723 ayam ram rephasya sthāne kasmāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:24243: bhavati . mit acaḥ antyāt paraḥ iti anena acām antyāt paraḥ kriyate . rephasya tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:24244: śravaṇam kasmāt na bhavati . ṣaṣṭhyuccāraṇasāmarthyāt . bhāradvājīyāḥ paṭhanti bhrasjaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24245: ropadhayoḥ lopaḥ āgamaḥ ram vidhīyate iti . bhrasjādeśāt samprasāraṇam vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:24246: . bhrasjādeśāt samprasāraṇam bhavati vipratiṣedhena . bhrasjādeśasya avakāśaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:24249: bhṛṣṭavān . samprasāraṇam bhavati vipratiṣedhena . saḥ tarhi pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24250: . na vaktavyaḥ . raseḥ vā ṛvacanāt siddham . rasoḥ vā ṛ bhavati iti vakṣyāmi . rasoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24251: vā ṛvacane sici vṛddheḥ bhrasjādeśaḥ . rasoḥ vā ṛvacane sici vṛddheḥ bhrasjādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24252: vaktavyaḥ . vṛddhau kṛtāyām idam eva rūpam syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:24254: abhārkṣīt . sarvathā vayam pūrvavipratiṣedhāt na mucyāmahe sūtram ca bhidyate . yathānyāsam
GS24pmbhasuu:24255: eva astu . nanu ca uktam bhrasjādeśāt samprasāraṇam vipratiṣedhena iti . idam iha
GS24pmbhasuu:24256: sampradhāryam . bhrasjādeśaḥ kriyatām samprasāraṇam iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:24257: bhrasjādeśaḥ . nityatvāt samprasāraṇam . kṛte api bhrasjādeśe prāpnoti akṛte api
GS24pmbhasuu:24258: . bhrasjādeśaḥ api nityaḥ . kṛte api samprasāraṇe prāpnoti akṛte api prāpnoti . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:24259: . yaḥ asau ṛkāre rephaḥ tasya ca upadhāyāḥ ca kṛte api prāpnoti . anityaḥ bhrasjādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24260: . na hi kṛte samprasāraṇe prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . na hi varṇaikadeśāḥ varṇagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:24261: gṛhyante . atha api gṛhyante evam api anityaḥ . katham . upadeśaḥ iti vartate . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:24262: ca avaśyam upadeśagrahaṇam anuvartyam barībhṛjjyataḥ iti evamartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:24267: śriyau śriyaḥ . iha ubhayam prāpnoti : āṭiṭat ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24268: āśiśat . nanu ca atra yaṇādeśena bhavitavyam . idam tarhi : atatakṣat ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24270: ninyuḥ . ṇilopasya saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti : āṭiṭat ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24272: sakhāyau sakhāyaḥ . ṇilopasya saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:24280: kāryate hāryati . ṇilopaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . saḥ tarhi pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24281: . na vaktavyaḥ . santu atra ete vidhayaḥ . eteṣu vidhiṣu kṛteṣu sthānivadbhāvāt ṇigrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:24282: grahaṇāt ṇilopaḥ bhaviṣyati . na evam śakyam . iyaṅādeśe hi doṣaḥ syāt . antyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:24283: lopaḥ prasajyeta . allopasya iyaṅyaṇoḥ ca na asti sampradhāraṇā . vṛddheḥ avakāśaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:24287: jihīrṣakaḥ . guṇasya allopasya ca na asti sampradhāraṇā . dīrghatvasya avakāśaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:24288: api kākaḥ śyenāyate . allopasya saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:24289: cikīrṣyate jihīrṣyate . allopaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . saḥ tarhi pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24290: vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . iṣṭavācī paraśabdaḥ . vipratiṣedhe param yat iṣṭam tat bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:24291: (P_6,4.49) KA_III.201.8-202.2 Ro_IV.726-728 kim idam yalope varṇagrahaṇam āhosvit
GS24pmbhasuu:24292: saṅghātagrahaṇam . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . yalope varṇagrahaṇam cet dhātvantasya pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24293: . yalope varṇagrahaṇam cet dhātvantasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . śucyitā śucyitum
GS24pmbhasuu:24294: . asti tarjo saṅghātagrahaṇam . yadi saṅghātagrahaṇam antyasya lopaḥ prāpnoti . siddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24295: antyasya pūrveṇa eva . tatra ārambhasāmarthyāt sarvasya bhaviṣyati . evam api tena
GS24pmbhasuu:24296: atiprasaktam iti kṛtvā niyamaḥ vijñāyeta . yasya halaḥ eva na anyataḥ . kva mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:24297: . lolūyitā popūyitā . kaimarthakyāt niyamaḥ bhavati . vidheyam na asti iti kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:24298: . iha ca asti vidheyam . kim . antyasya lopaḥ prāptaḥ saḥ sarvasya vidheyaḥ . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:24299: apūrvaḥ vidhiḥ astu niyama astu iti apūrvaḥ eva vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati na niyamaḥ . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:24300: api antyasya prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . na hi lopaḥ sarvāpahārī . nanu ca saṅghātagrahaṇasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:24301: sarvasya bhaviṣyati . saṅghātagrahaṇam cet kyasya vibhāṣāyām doṣaḥ . saṅghātagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:24302: cet kyasya vibhāṣāyām doṣaḥ bhavati . samidhitā samidhyitā . yadā lopaḥ tadā sarvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:24303: lopaḥ . yadā alopaḥ tadā sarvasya alopaḥ prāpnoti . ādeḥ paravacanāt siddham . halaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24304: iti pañcamī . tasmāt iti uttarasya ādeḥ parasya iti yakārasya eva bhaviṣyati . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:24305: vā punaḥ astu varṇagrahaṇam . nanu ca uktam yalope varṇagrahaṇam cet dhātvantasya
GS24pmbhasuu:24306: pratiṣedhaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . aṅgāt iti hi vartate . na vā aṅgāt iti pañcamī
GS24pmbhasuu:24307: asti . evam tarhi aṅgasya iti sambandhaṣaṣṭhī vijñāsyate . aṅgasya yaḥ yakāraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:24308: kim ca aṅgasya yakāraḥ . nimittam . yasmin aṅgam iti etat bhavati . kasmin ca etat
GS24pmbhasuu:24310: (P_6,4.51) KA_III.202.4-9 Ro_IV.728 atha aniṭi iti kimartham . kārayitā kārayitum
GS24pmbhasuu:24311: . aniṭi iti śakyam avaktum . kasmāt na bhavati kārayitā kārayitum . niṣṭhāyām seṭi
GS24pmbhasuu:24312: iti etat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . niṣṭhāyām eva seṭi ṇeḥ lopaḥ bhavati na ayatra
GS24pmbhasuu:24313: . kva mā bhūt . kārayitā kārayitum . atha vā upariṣṭāt yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . idam
GS24pmbhasuu:24314: asti . niṣṭhāyām seṭi . janita mantra . śamitā yajñe . tataḥ ay . ayādeśaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:24315: ṇeḥ seṭi . tata āmantālvāyetnviṣṇuṣu ay bhavati iti eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:24316: (P_6,4.52.1) KA_III.202.11-203.6 Ro_IV.728-730 atha seḍgrahaṇam kimartham . niṣṭhāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:24317: seḍgrahaṇam aniṭi pratiṣedhārtham . niṣṭhāyām seḍgrahaṇam kriyate aniṭi pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24318: yathā syāt iti . sañjñapitaḥ paśuḥ iti . niṣṭhāyām seḍgrahaṇam aniṭi pratiṣedhārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:24319: iti cet tat siddham aniḍabhāvāt . niṣṭhāyām seḍgrahaṇam aniṭi pratiṣedhārtham iti
GS24pmbhasuu:24320: cet antareṇa api seḍgrahaṇam tat siddham . katham . aniḍabhāvāt . nanu ca yasya vibhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:24321: iti jñapeḥ iṭpratiṣedhaḥ . ekācaḥ hi pratiṣedhaḥ . ekācaḥ hi saḥ pratiṣedhaḥ jñapiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24322: ca anekāc . iḍbhāvārtham tu tannimittatvāt lopasya . iḍbhāvārtham tarhi seḍgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:24323: kriyate . katham punaḥ seṭi iti anena iṭ śakyaḥ bhāvayitum . tannimittatvāt lopasya
GS24pmbhasuu:24324: . na atra akṛte iṭi ṇilopena bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam . seṭi iti ucyate . avacane
GS24pmbhasuu:24325: hi ṇilope iṭpratiṣedhaprasaṅgaḥ . akriyamāṇe hi seḍgrahaṇe ṇilope kṛte ekācaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:24327: hāritam . evam tarhi na arthaḥ seḍgrahaṇena na api sūtreṇa . katham . saptame yogavibhāgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24328: kariṣyate . idam asti . niṣṭhāyām na iṭ bhavati . tataḥ ṇeḥ . ṇyantasya niṣṭhāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:24330: hāritam . tataḥ vṛttam . vṛttam iti ca nipātyate . kim nipātyate . ṇeḥ niṣṭhāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:24331: lopaḥ nipātyate . kim prayojanam . niyamārtham . atra eva ṇeḥ niṣṭhāyām lopaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:24332: na anyatra . kva mā bhūt . kāritam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24335: vartitā bhikṣā iti . tataḥ adhyayane . adhyayane cet vṛtiḥ vartate iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:24337: . vṛdhiramiśṛdhīnām upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . kim kāraṇam . sārvadhātukatvāt . vardhantu
GS24pmbhasuu:24338: tvā suṣṭutayaḥ giraḥ me . vardhayantu iti evam prāpte . bṛhaspatiḥ tvā sumne ramṇātu
GS24pmbhasuu:24339: . ramayatu iti evam prāpte . agne śardha mahate saubhagāya . śardhaya iti evam prāpte
GS24pmbhasuu:24340: . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . vṛdhiramiśṛdhīnām ārdhadhātukatvāt siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:24341: . katham ārdhadhātukatvam . anye api hi dhātupratyayāḥ ubhayathā chandasi dṛśyante .
GS24pmbhasuu:24342: (P_6,4.55) KA_III.203.14-20 Ro_IV.731-732 kim punaḥ ayam ktnuḥ āhosvit itnuḥ . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . ktnau iṭi ṇeḥ guṇavacanam . ktnau iṭi ṇeḥ guṇaḥ vaktavtyaḥ . gadayitnuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24343: stanayitnuḥ . astu tarhi itnuḥ . itnau pratyayāntarakaraṇam . yadi tarhi itnuḥ pratyayāntaram
GS24pmbhasuu:24344: kartavyam . ayādeśe ca upasaṅkhyānam . ayādeśe ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . ubhayam kriyate nyāse eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:24345: (P_6,4.56) KA_III.203.22-204.9 Ro_IV. 732-733 lyapi laghupūrvasya iti cet vyañjanānteṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:24346: upasaṅkhyānam . lyapi laghupūrvasya iti cet vyañjanānteṣu upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:24347: . praśamayya gataḥ . pratamayya gataḥ . allope ca gurupūrvāt pratiṣedhaḥ . allope
GS24pmbhasuu:24348: ca gurupūrvāt pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . pracikīrṣya gataḥ . lyapi laghupūrvāt iti vacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:24349: siddham . lyapi laghupūrvāt iti vaktavyam . evam api hrasvayalopāllopānām asiddhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:24350: lyapi laghupūrvāt iti ayādeśaḥ na prāpnoti . praśamayya gataḥ . pratamayya gataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24351: . prabebhidayya gataḥ . pracecchidayya gataḥ . pragadayya gataḥ . prastanayya gataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24352: . hrasvādiṣu ca uktam . kim uktam . samānāśrayatvāt siddham iti . katham . ṇau ete
GS24pmbhasuu:24354: (P_6,4.57) KA_III.204.11-15 Ro_IV. 734 iṅādeśasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . adhyāpya
GS24pmbhasuu:24355: gataḥ . āpaḥ sānubandhakanirdeśāt iṅi siddham . āpaḥ sānubandhakanirdeśaḥ kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:24356: . tena iṅādeśasya na bhaviṣyati . saḥ tarhi sānubandhakanirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24357: . lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya eva iti evam na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:24358: (P_6,4.62.1) KA_III.205.3-12 Ro_IV. 734-736 bhāvakarmaṇoḥ iti katham idam vijñāyate . bhāvakarmaṇoḥ ye syādayaḥ iti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24359: āhosvit bhāvakarmavācini parataḥ ye syādayaḥ iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate bhāvakarmaṇoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24360: ye syādayaḥ iti sīyuṭ viśeṣitaḥ syasictāsayaḥ aviśeṣitāḥ . atha vijñāyate bhāvakarmavācini
GS24pmbhasuu:24361: parataḥ ye syādayaḥ iti syasictāsayaḥ viśeṣitāḥ sīyuṭ aviśeṣitaḥ . yathā icchasi
GS24pmbhasuu:24362: tathā astu . astu tāvat bhāvakarmaṇoḥ ye syādayaḥ iti . syasictāsayaḥ ca viśeṣitāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24363: . nanu ca uktam sīyuṭ viśeṣitaḥ syasictāsayaḥ aviśeṣitāḥ iti . syasictāsayaḥ ca viśeṣitāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24364: . katham . bhāvakarmaṇoḥ yak bhavati iti atra syādayaḥ api anuvartiṣyante . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:24365: vā punaḥ astu bhāvakarmavācini parataḥ ye syādayaḥ iti . nanu ca uktam syasictāsayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24366: viśeṣitāḥ sīyuṭ aviśeṣitaḥ iti . sīyuṭ ca viśeṣitaḥ . katham . bhāvakarmavācini parataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24367: sīyuṭ na asti iti kṛtva bhāvakarmavācini sīyuṭi kāryam vijñāsyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:24368: (P_6,4.62.2) KA_III.205.13-206.7 Ro_IV. 736-738 atha iṭ ca iti ucyate . kasya ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:24369: iṭ bhavati . aṅgasya iti vartate . yadi evam āditaḥ iṭ prāpnoti aḍāḍvat . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:24370: aḍāṭau ṭittvāt āditaḥ bhavataḥ tadvat . evam tarhi syādīnām eva bhaviṣyanti . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:24371: api ṣaṣṭhyabhāvāt na prāpnoti . nanu ca bhāvakarmaṇoḥ iti eṣā ṣaṣṭhī . na eṣā ṣaṣṭhī
GS24pmbhasuu:24373: bhāve ca arthe karmaṇi ca iti . evam tarhi bhāvakarmaṇoḥ iti eṣā saptamī syādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:24374: iti saptamyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayiṣyati tasmin iti nirdiṣṭe pūrvasya iti . evam api
GS24pmbhasuu:24375: na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . na hi arthena paurvāparyam asti . arthe asambhavāt tadvācini
GS24pmbhasuu:24376: śabde kāryam vijñāsyate . evam api sīyuṭaḥ na prāpnoti . evam tarhi saptame yogavibhāgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24377: kariṣyate . ārdhadhātukasya iṭ . yāvān iṭ nāma saḥ sarvaḥ ārdhadhātukasya iṭ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:24378: . tataḥ valādeḥ . valādeḥ ārdhadhātukasya iṭ bhavati iti . yadi evam syasicsīyuṭtāsiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:24379: iṭ bhavati ciṇvadbhāvaḥ aviśeṣitaḥ bhavati . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . syasicsīyuṭtāsiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:24380: iṭ bhavati ajjhanagrahadṛśām vā ciṇvat iti kva cit eva ciṇvadbhāvaḥ syāt . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:24381: syādīn apekṣiṣyāmahe . syasicsīyuṭtāsiṣu iṭ bhavati ajjhanagrahadṛśām vā ciṇvat syādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:24382: iti . atha ke punaḥ imam iṭam prayojayanti . ye anudāttāḥ . atha ye udāttāḥ teṣām
GS24pmbhasuu:24383: katham . siddham tena eva paratvāt . udāttebhyaḥ api vā anena eva iṭ eṣitavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:24385: hārayateḥ hāriṣyate . iṭaḥ asiddhatvāt aniṭi iti ṇilopaḥ yathā syāt . katham punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24386: icchatā api bhavatā udāttebhyaḥ anena eva iṭ labhyaḥ na punaḥ anena astu tena vā
GS24pmbhasuu:24387: iti tena eva syāt vipratiṣedhena . nanu ca nityaḥ ayam kṛte api tasmin prāpnoti akṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:24388: api prāpnoti . na tu asmin kṛte api saḥ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . avalāditvāt . tasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:24390: (P_6,4.62.3) KA_III.206.8-17 Ro_IV. 739 kāni punaḥ asya yogasya prayojanāni . vṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24391: ciṇvat yuk ca hanteḥ ca ghatvam dīrghaḥ ca uktaḥ yaḥ mitām vā ciṇi iti . vṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24392: prayojanam . ceṣyate cāyiṣyate . yuk ca prayojanam . glāsyate ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24393: glāyiṣyate . hanteḥ ca ghatvam prayojanam . haniṣyate ghāniṣyate . dīrghaḥ ca uktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24394: yaḥ mitām vā ciṇi iti saḥ ca prayojanam . śamiṣyate śāmiṣyate tamiṣyate tāmiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:24395: . iṭ ca asiddhaḥ tena me lupyate ṇiḥ nityaḥ ca ayam valnimittaḥ vighātī . iṭaḥ asiddhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:24396: ṇeḥ aniṭi iti ṇilopaḥ yathā syāt . katham punaḥ ayam nityaḥ . kṛtākṛtaprasaṅgitvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:24397: . kṛte api tasmin iṭi sāptamike ārdhadhātukasya iṭ valādeḥ iti punaḥ ayam bhavati
