GS24pmbhasuu:24398: . asmin tu vihite valāditvasya nimittasya vihatatvāt sāptamikaḥ na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:24399: (P_6,4.62.4) KA_III.206.18-22 Ro_IV. 740 atha upadeśagrahaṇam kimartham . ciṇvadbhāve
GS24pmbhasuu:24400: upadeśavacanam ṛkāraguṇabalīyastvāt . ciṇvadbhāve upadeśavacanam kriyate ṛkāraguṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:24401: balīyastvāt . kāriṣyate . paratvāt guṇe kṛte raparatve ca anajantatvāt ciṇvadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24403: (P_6,4.62.5) KA_III.206.23-207.7 Ro_IV. 740-741 vadhibhāvāt sīyuṭi ciṇvadbhāvaḥ vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:24404: . vadhibhāvāt sīyuṭi ciṇvadbhāvaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . vadhibhāvasya avakāśaḥ : vadhyāt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24409: ghāniṣīṣṭa ghāniṣīyāstām ghāniṣīran . ciṇvadbhāvaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:24410: idānīm ciṇvadbhāve kṛte punaḥprasaṅgavijñānāt vadhibhāvaḥ kasmāt na bhavati . sakṛdgatau
GS24pmbhasuu:24411: vipratiṣedhe yat bādhitam tat bādhitam eva iti . haniṇiṅādeśapratiṣedhaḥ ca . haniṇiṅādeśānām
GS24pmbhasuu:24417: adhyāyiṣyate . luṅi iti haniṇiṅādeśāḥ prāpnuvanti . aṅgasya iti tu prakaraṇāt aṅgaśāstrātideśāt
GS24pmbhasuu:24418: siddham . āṅgam yat kāryam tat pratinirdiśyate na ca haniṇiṅādeśāḥ āṅgāḥ .bhavanti iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:24419: (P_6,4.64) KA_III.207.9-21 Ro_IV.741-743 atha iḍgrahaṇam kimartham . iḍgrahaṇam akṅidartham . iḍgrahaṇam kriyate akṅiti lopaḥ yathā syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:24420: papitha tasthitha iti . sārvadhātuke ca ādi iti ārdhadhātukādhikārāt upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:24421: . sārvadhātuke ca ādi iti ārdhadhātukādhikārāt upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . iṣam ūrjam
GS24pmbhasuu:24422: aham itaḥ ādi . nanu ca kṅiti iti vartamāne yathā eva iḍgrahaṇam akṅidartham evam
GS24pmbhasuu:24423: ārdhadhātuke iti api vartamāne iḍgrahaṇam sārvadhātukārtham bhaviṣyati . na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:24424: . kim kāraṇam . na hi kṅitā ac viśeṣyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:24425: aci bhavati . katarasmin . kṅiti iti . kim tarhi acā kṅit viśeṣyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:24426: kṅiti bhavati . katarasmin . aci iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam acā kṅit viśeṣyate . yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:24427: iṭ api ajgrahaṇena viśeṣyate . asti ca idānīm kva cit iṭ anajādiḥ yadarthaḥ vidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24429: dāsīya dhāsīya . tat tarhi upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . na kartavyam . ārdhadhātukagrahaṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:24430: siddham . katham . ārdhadhātukatvam . ubhayathā chandasi iti vacanāt . anye api dhātupratyayāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24432: (P_6,4.66) KA_III.207.23-208.5 Ro_IV.743-744 īttve vakārapratiṣedhaḥ ghṛtam ghṛtapāvānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24433: iti darśanāt . īttve vakāre pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kim prayojanam . ghṛtam ghṛtapāvānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24435: ghṛtam ghṛtapāvānaḥ pibata . vasām vasapāvānaḥ pibata iti . yadi tarhi vakāre pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24436: ucyate katham dīvarī pīvarī iti . dhīvarī pīvarī iti ca uktam . kim uktam . na etat
GS24pmbhasuu:24437: īttvam . kim tarhi . dhyāpyoḥ etat samprasāraṇam iti . saḥ tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24438: . na vaktavyaḥ . vanip eṣaḥ bhaviṣyati na kvanip iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:24439: (P_6,4.74) KA_III.208.7-209.17 Ro_IV.745-748 kasya ayam pratiṣedhaḥ . āṭaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:24440: . aṭaḥ api iṣyate . tat tarhi aṭaḥ grahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:24441: . kva prakṛtam . luṅlaṅlṅkṣu aṭ udāttaḥ iti . yadi tat anuvartate āṭ ajādīnām aṭ
GS24pmbhasuu:24442: ca iti aṭ api prāpnoti . astu . aṭi kṛte punaḥ āṭi bhaviṣyati . iha api tarhi aṭi
GS24pmbhasuu:24444: ahārṣīt . aḍvacanāt na bhaviṣyati . iha api tarhi aḍvacanāt na syāt : aihiṣṭa ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24445: aikṣiṣta . āḍvacanāt bhaviṣyati . iha api tarhi āḍvacanāt prāpnoti : akārṣīt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24446: ahārṣīt . akṛte aṭi yaḥ ajādiḥ iti evam etat vijñāsyate . kim vaktavyam etat . na
GS24pmbhasuu:24447: hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . ajvacanasāmarthyāt . yadi kṛte aṭi yaḥ ajādiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24448: tatra syāt ajgrahaṇam anarthakam syāt . atha vā upadeśe iti vartate . atha vā ārdhadhātuke
GS24pmbhasuu:24449: iti vartate . atha vā luṅlaṅlṅkṣu aṭ iti dvilakārakaḥ nirdeśaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:24450: luṅādiṣu lakārādiṣu yaḥ ajādiḥ iti . sarvathā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24452: aupyata iti etat na sidhyati . evam tarhi ajādīnām aṭā siddham . ajādīnām aṭā eva
GS24pmbhasuu:24453: siddham . na arthaḥ āṭā . evam tarhi vṛddhyartham āṭ vaktavyaḥ . vṛddhyartham iti
GS24pmbhasuu:24454: cet aṭaḥ . aṭaḥ vṛddhim vakṣyāmi . yadi tarhi aṭaḥ vṛddhiḥ ucyate asvavaḥ hasati
GS24pmbhasuu:24455: iti atra . vṛddhiḥ prapnoti roḥ utve kṛte . dhātau vṛddhim aṭaḥ smaret . dhātau aṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24456: vṛddhim vakṣyāmi . tat tarhi dhātugrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . yogavibhāgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24457: kariṣyate . aṭaḥ aci vṛddhiḥ bhavati . tataḥ upasargāt ṛti vṛddhiḥ bhavati . tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24458: dhātau . dhātau iti ubhayoḥ śeṣaḥ . iha tarhi : āṭīt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24459: āśīt iti ataḥ guṇe iti pararūpatvam prāpnoti . pararūpam guṇe na aṭaḥ . pararūpam
GS24pmbhasuu:24460: guṇe aṭaḥ na iti vakṣyāmi . omāṅoḥ usi tat samam . yadi api etat ucyate atha vā etarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:24461: usi omāṅkṣu āṭaḥ pararūpapratiṣedhaḥ coditaḥ sa na vaktavyaḥ bhavati . chandortham
GS24pmbhasuu:24462: tarhi āṭ vaktavyaḥ . araik u kṛṣṇāḥ . tritaḥ enam āyunak . surucaḥ ven āvaḥ . chandortham
GS24pmbhasuu:24463: bahulam dīrgham . bahulam chandasi dīrghatvam dṛśyate . tat yathā : pūruṣaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24465: āsan . iṇastyoḥ yaṇlopayoḥ kṛtayoḥ anajāditvāt vṛddhiḥ na prāpnoti . iṇastyoḥ antaraṅgataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24466: . antaraṅgatvāt vṛddhiḥ bhaviṣyati . tasmāt na arthaḥ āḍgrahaṇena . ajādīnām aṭā
GS24pmbhasuu:24467: siddham . vṛddhyartham iti cet aṭaḥ . asvavaḥ hasati iti atra . dhātau vṛddhim aṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24468: smaret . pararūpam guṇe na aṭaḥ . omāṅoḥ usi tat samam . chandortham bahulam dīrgham
GS24pmbhasuu:24470: (P_6,4.77) KA_III.209.19-22 Ro_IV.748-749 iyaṅādiprakaraṇe tanvādīnām chandasi bahulam
GS24pmbhasuu:24471: . iyaṅādiprakaraṇe tanvādīnām chandasi bahulam upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . tanvam puṣema
GS24pmbhasuu:24472: . tanuvam puṣema . viṣvam paśya . viṣuvam paśya . svargam lokam . suvargam lokam
GS24pmbhasuu:24474: (P_6,4.82) KA_III.209.24-210.15 Ro_IV.749-751 atha iha kasmāt na bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:24476: brāhmaṇasya niyaḥ . aṅgādhikārāt . aṅgasya iti anuvartate . evam api paramaniyau
GS24pmbhasuu:24477: paramaniyaḥ iti atra prāpnoti . gatikārakapūrvasya iṣyate . yaṇādeśaḥ svarapadapūrvopadhasya
GS24pmbhasuu:24478: ca . yaṇādeśaḥ svarapūrvopadhasya padapūrvopadhasya ca iti vaktavyam . svarapūrvopadhasya : ninyatuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24485: senānyaḥ . asaṃyogapūrve hi aniṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ . asaṃyogapūrvasya iti hi ucyamāne aniṣṭam prasajyeta . uddhyau ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24488: unnyaḥ . asaṃyogapūrvasya iti pratiṣedhaḥ prasajyeta . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:24489: . dhātoḥ iti vartate . tatra dhātunā saṃyogam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . dhātoḥ yaḥ saṃyogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24490: tatpūrvasya na iti . upasarjanam vai saṃyogaḥ na ca upasarjanasya viśeṣaṇam asti
GS24pmbhasuu:24491: . dhātoḥ iti anuvartanasāmarthyāt upasarjanasya api viśeṣaṇam bhaviṣyati . asti anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:24492: dhātoḥ iti anuvartanasya prayojanam . kim . ivarṇam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:24493: prayojanam . yat hi adhātoḥ ivarṇam bhavitavyam eva tasya yaṇādeśena ikaḥ yaṇ aci iti eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:24494: (P_6,4.84) KA_III.210.17-20 Ro_IV.751 varṣābhūpunarbhvaḥ ca . varṣābhū iti atra punarbhvaḥ ca iti vaktavyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:24496: punarbhvaḥ . atyalpam idam ucyate . varṣādṛnkārapunaḥpūrvasya bhuvaḥ iti vaktavyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:24505: (P_6,4.87) KA_III.22-211.14 Ro_IV.751-752 huśnugrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . anyasya abhāvāt . na hi anyat sārvadhātuke asti yasya yaṇādeśaḥ syāt . nanu ca ayam asti : yāti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24506: vāti iti . kṅiti anuvartate . iha tarhi : yātaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24507: vātaḥ iti . aci iti vartate . iha tarhi : yānti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24508: vānti . yvoḥ iti vartate . evam api dhiyanti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24509: piyanti iti atra prāpnoti . oḥ iti vartate . evam api suvanti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24510: ruvanti iti atra prāpnoti . anekācaḥ iti vartate . evam api asuvan ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24511: aruvan iti atra prāpnoti . etat api aṭaḥ asiddhatvāt ekāc bhavati . evam api prorṇuvanti
GS24pmbhasuu:24512: iti atra prāpnoti . asaṃyogapūrvasya iti vartate . yaṅlugartham tarhi huśnugrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:24513: kartavyam . yaṅlugantam anekāc asaṃyogapūrvam uvarṇāntam asti . tadartham idam .
GS24pmbhasuu:24514: nadam yoyuvatīnām . vṛṣabham roruvatīnām . yaṅlugartham iti cet ārdhadhātukatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:24515: siddham . yaṅlugartham iti cet tat na . kim kāraṇam . ārdhadhātukatvāt siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:24516: katham ārdhadhātukatvam . ubhayathā chandasi iti vacanāt . anye api hi dhātupratyayāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24517: ubhayathā chandasi dṛśyante . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat huśnugrahaṇam karoti tat
GS24pmbhasuu:24518: jñāpayati ācāryaḥ yaṅluk bhāṣāyām bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . bebhidīti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24519: cecchidīti etat siddham bhavati bhāṣāyām api .
GS24pmbhasuu:24520: (P_6,4.89) KA_III.211.16-212.8 Ro_IV.753-754 atha kimartham guheḥ vikṛtasya grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:24521: kriyate na punaḥ guhaḥ iti eva ucyeta . gohigrahaṇam viṣayārtham . gohigrahaṇam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:24522: viṣayārtham . viṣayaḥ pratinirdiśyate . yatra asya etat rūpam tatra yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt :
GS24pmbhasuu:24524: nijuguhuḥ iti . ayādeśapratiṣedhārtham ca . ayādeśapratiṣedhārtham ca vikṛtagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:24525: kriyate . hrasvādeśe hi ayādeśaprasaṅgaḥ ūttvasya asiddhatvāt . hrasvādeśe hi sati
GS24pmbhasuu:24526: ayādeśaḥ prasajyeta . pragūhya gataḥ . kim kāraṇam . ūttvasya asiddhatvāt . asiddham
GS24pmbhasuu:24527: ūttvam . tasya asiddhatvāt lyapi laghupūrvāt iti ayādeśaḥ prasajyeta . viṣayārthena
GS24pmbhasuu:24528: tāvat na arthaḥ gohigrahaṇena . praśliṣṭanirdeśāt siddham . praśliṣṭanirdeśaḥ ayam . u-ūt :
GS24pmbhasuu:24534: nigūhakaḥ . paratvāt guṇe kṛte āntaryataḥ dīrghasya dīrghaḥ bhaviṣyati . ayādeśapratiṣedhārthena
GS24pmbhasuu:24535: api na arthaḥ . samānāśrayavacanāt siddham . samānāśrayam asiddham bhavati vyāśrayam
GS24pmbhasuu:24536: ca etat . katham . ṇau ūttvam ṇeḥ lyapi ayādeśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:24537: (P_6,4.90) KA_III.212.10-15 Ro_IV.754 atha kimartham duṣeḥ vikṛtasya grahaṇam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:24538: na punaḥ duṣaḥ iti eva ucyeta . doṣigrahaṇam ca . kim . ayādeśapratiṣedhārtham hrasvādeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:24539: hi ayādeśaprasaṅgaḥ ūttvasya asiddhatvāt . hrasvādeśe hi sati ayādeśaḥ prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:24540: . pradūṣya gataḥ . kim kāraṇam . ūttvasya asiddhatvāt . asiddham ūttvam . tasya asiddhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:24541: lyapi laghupūrvāt iti ayādeśaḥ prasajyeta . atra api samānāśrayavacanāt siddham iti eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:24542: (P_6,4.93) KA_III.212.17-213.4 Ro_IV.754-755 ciṇṇamuloḥ ṇijvyavetānām yaṅlope ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . śamayantam prayojitavān ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24549: śaṃśāmam śaṃśāmam . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . ciṇṇamulpare ṇau mitām aṅgānām
GS24pmbhasuu:24550: dīrghaḥ bhavati iti ucyate . yaḥ ca atra ciṇṇamulparaḥ na tasmin mit aṅgam yasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:24551: ca mit aṅgam na asau ciṇṇamulparaḥ iti . lope kṛte ciṇṇamulparaḥ bhavati . sthānivadbhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:24552: na ciṇṇamulparaḥ . nanu ca pratiṣidhyate atra sthānivadbhāvaḥ dīrghavidhim prati
GS24pmbhasuu:24553: na sthānivat iti . evam api asiddhatvāt na prāpnoti . evam tarhi ciṇṇamuloḥ ṇijvyavetānām
GS24pmbhasuu:24554: yaṅlope ca antaraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt siddham . kim idam antaraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt iti . yāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:24555: brūyāt samānāśrayavacanāt siddham iti eva vyāśrayam ca etat . katham . ṇeḥ ṇau lopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24556: ṇau ciṇṇamulpare mitām aṅgānām dīrghatvam ucyate . tasmāt na arthaḥ upasaṅkhyānena iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:24557: (P_6,4.96) KA_III.213.6-9 Ro_IV.756 adviprabhṛtyupasargasya iti vaktavyam iha api yathā syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:24558: samupābhicchādaḥ iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . yatra triprabhṛtayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24559: santi dvau api tatra staḥ . tatra advyupasargasya iti eva siddham . na vai eṣaḥ loke
GS24pmbhasuu:24560: sampratyayaḥ . na hi dviputraḥ ānīyatām iti ukte triputraḥ ānīyate . tasmāt adviprabhṛtyupasargasya iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:24561: (P_6,4.100) KA_III.213.11-13 Ro_IV.756-757 halgrahaṇam anarthakam anyatra api darśanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:24562: . halgrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . anyatra api darśanāt . anyatra api lopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24563: dṛśyate . agniḥ tṛṇāni babsati . śarāve bapsati caruḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:24564: (P_6,4.101) KA_III.213.15-214.7 Ro_IV.757-758 iṭaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . rudihi
GS24pmbhasuu:24565: svapihi . jhalaḥ iti dhitvam prāpnoti . heḥ dhitve haladhikārāt iṭaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24566: . heḥ dhitve haladhikārāt iṭaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ . anarthakaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24567: . dhitvam kasmāt na bhavati . haladhikārāt . prakṛtam halgrahaṇam anuvartate . kva
GS24pmbhasuu:24568: prakṛtam . ghasibhasoḥ hali iti . tat vai saptamīnirdiṣṭam ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭena ca iha
GS24pmbhasuu:24569: arthaḥ . tat vai tatra pratyākhyāyate . tatra pratyākhyātam sat yayā vibhaktyā nirdiśyamānam
GS24pmbhasuu:24570: arthavattayā nirdiṣṭam iha anuvartiṣyate . atha vā hujhalbhayaḥ iti eṣā pañcamī hali
GS24pmbhasuu:24571: iti saptamyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayiṣyati tasmāt iti uttarasya iti . atha vā nirdiśyamānasya
GS24pmbhasuu:24572: ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti evam na bhaviṣyati . yaḥ tarhi nirdiśyate tasya kasmāt na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:24573: . iṭā vyavahitatvāt . yadi evam chindhaki bhindhaki iti atra dhitvam na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:24574: . dhitve kṛte akac bhaviṣyati . idam iha sampradhāryam . dhitvam kriyatām akac iti
GS24pmbhasuu:24575: kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt dhitvam . nityaḥ akac . kṛte api dhitve prāpnoti akṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:24576: api . akac api anityaḥ . anyasya kṛte dhitve prāpnoti anyasya akṛte śabdāntarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:24577: ca prāpnuvan vidhiḥ anityaḥ bhavati . ubhayoḥ anityayoḥ paratvāt dhitve kṛte akac
GS24pmbhasuu:24578: bhaviṣyati . atha vā hakārasya eva aśaktijena ikāreṇa grahaṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:24579: (P_6,4.104) KA_III.214.9-25 Ro_IV.759-760 ciṇaḥ luki tagrahaṇam kartavyam . kim prayojanam . iha mā bhūt :
GS24pmbhasuu:24581: ahāritarām iti . ciṇaḥ luki tagrahaṇānarthakyam saṅghātasya apratyayatvāt . ciṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24582: luki tagrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . saṅghātasya apratyayatvāt . saṅghātasya
GS24pmbhasuu:24583: luk kasmāt na bhavati . apratyayatvāt . pratyayasya lukślulupaḥ bhavanti iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:24584: na ca saṅghātaḥ pratyayaḥ . talope tarhi kṛte parasya prāpnoti . talopasya ca asiddhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:24585: . asiddhaḥ talopaḥ . tasya asiddhatvāt na bhaviṣyati . kāryakṛtatvāt vā . atha vā
GS24pmbhasuu:24586: kṛtaḥ ciṇaḥ luk iti kṛtvā punaḥ na bhaviṣyati luk . tat yathā vasante brāhmaṇaḥ agnīn
GS24pmbhasuu:24587: ādadhīta iti sakṛt ādhāya kṛtaḥ śāstrārthaḥ iti kṛtvā punaḥ pravṛttiḥ na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:24588: . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . yuktam yat tasya eva punaḥ pravṛttiḥ na syāt . yat tu tadāśrayam
GS24pmbhasuu:24589: prāpnoti na tat śakyam bādhitum . tat yathā vasante brāhmaṇaḥ agniṣṭomādibhiḥ kratubhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24590: yajeta iti agnyādhānanimittam vasante vasante ijyate . tasmāt pūrvoktau eva parihārau
GS24pmbhasuu:24591: . atha vā kṅiti iti vartate . kva prakṛtam . gamahanajanakhanaghasām lopaḥ kṅiti
GS24pmbhasuu:24592: anaṅi iti . tat vai saptamīnirdiṣṭam ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭena ca iha arthaḥ . ciṇaḥ luk iti
GS24pmbhasuu:24593: eṣā pañcamī kṅiti iti saptamyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayiṣyati tasmāt iti uttarasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:24594: (P_6,4.106.1) KA_III.215.2-11 Ro_IV.760-761 katham idam vijñāyate . ukārāt pratyayāt
GS24pmbhasuu:24595: iti āhosvit ukārāntāt pratyayāt iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate ukārāt pratyayāt
GS24pmbhasuu:24596: iti siddham tanu kuru . cinu sunu iti na sidhyati . atha vijñāyate ukārāntāt pratyayāt
GS24pmbhasuu:24597: iti siddham cinu sunu iti . tanu kuru na sidhyati . tathā asaṃyogapūrvagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:24599: akṣṇuhi . āpnuhi śaknuhi iti atra na syāt . yathā icchasi tathā astu . astu tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:24600: ukārāt pratyayāt iti . katham cinu sunu iti . tadantavidhinā bhaviṣyati . atha vā
GS24pmbhasuu:24601: punaḥ astu ukārāntāt pratyayāt iti . katham tanu kuru iti . vyapdeśivadbhāvena bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:24602: . yat api ucyate tathā asaṃyogapūrvagrahaṇena iha eva paryudāsaḥ syāt : takṣṇuhi ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24603: akṣṇuhi . āpnuhi śaknuhi iti atra na syāt iti . na asmābhiḥ asaṃyogapūrvagrahaṇena ukārāntam viśeṣyate . kim tarhi . ukāraḥ . ukāraḥ yaḥ asaṃyogapūrvaḥ tadantāt pratyayāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:24604: (P_6,4.106.2) KA_III.215.12-17 Ro_IV.760-762 utaḥ ca pratyayāt chandovāvacanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:24605: utaḥ ca pratyayāt iti atra chandasi vā iti vaktavyam . ava sthira tanuhi yātujunām
GS24pmbhasuu:24606: . dhinuhi yajñam dhinuhi yajñapatim . tena mā bhāginam kṛṇuhi . uttarārtham ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:24607: ke cit tāvat āhuḥ chandograhaṇam kartavyam iti . apare āhuḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:24608: vāvacanam kartavyam iti . lopaḥ ca asya anyaratasyām mvoḥ iti atra anyaratasyāṅgrahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:24609: (P_6,4.110) KA_III.215.19-217.5 Ro_IV.762-765 sārvadhātuke iti kimartham . iha mā bhūt :
GS24pmbhasuu:24612: kariṣyati kariṣyataḥ . kṛñaḥ uttve ukārāntanirdeśāt syāntasya apratiṣedhaḥ . kṛñaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24613: uttve ukārāntanirdeśāt syāntasya apratiṣedhaḥ . anarthakaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24614: . uttvam kasmāt na bhavati . ukārāntanirdeśāt . aśakyaḥ karotau ukārāntanirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24615: tantram āśrayitum . iha samparibhyām bhūṣaṇasamavāyayoḥ krotau iha eva syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:24616: saṃskaroti . saṃskartā saṃsakrtum iti atra na syāt . na brūmaḥ asmāt ukārāntanirdeśāt
GS24pmbhasuu:24617: yaḥ ayam karoti iti . kim tarhi . ukāraprakaraṇāt ukārāntam aṅgam abhisambadhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:24618: . utaḥ iti vartate . yadi evam na arthaḥ sārvadhātukagrahaṇena . kasmāt na bhavati sañcaskaratuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24619: sañcaskaruḥ iti . utaḥ iti vartate . uttarārtham tarhi sārvadhātukagrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:24620: . śnasoḥ allopaḥ iti . śnam sārvadhātuke eva . asteḥ api ārdhadhātuke bhūbhāvena
GS24pmbhasuu:24621: bhavitavyam . uttarārtham eva tarhi . śnābhyastayoḥ ātaḥ iti . śnā sārvadhātuke eva
GS24pmbhasuu:24622: . abhyastam api ākārāntam ārdhadhātuke na asti . nanu ca idam asti :
GS24pmbhasuu:24623: apsu yāyāvaraḥ pravapeta piṇḍān iti . na etat ākārāntam . yakārāntam etat . uttarārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:24624: eva tarhi . ī hali aghoḥ iti . tatra api śnābhyastayoḥ iti eva . ataḥ api uttarārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:24625: eva tarhi . id daridrasya iti . vakṣyati etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:24626: daridrāteḥ ārdhadhātuke lopaḥ siddhaḥ ca pratyayavidhau iti . ataḥ api uttarārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:24627: . bhiyaḥ anyatarasyām . abhyastasya iti eva . ataḥ api uttarārtham eva . jahāteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24628: ca . abhyastasya iti eva . ataḥ api uttarārtham . ā ca hau . hau iti ucyate . abhyastasya
GS24pmbhasuu:24629: iti eva . ataḥ api uttarārtham . lopaḥ yi . abhyastasya iti eva . ataḥ api uttarārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:24630: . ghavsoḥ et hau abhyāsalopaḥ ca iti . hau iti ucyate . tat eva tarhi prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:24631: . śnasoḥ allopaḥ iti . nanu ca uktam śnam sārvadhātuke eva . asteḥ api ārdhadhātuke
GS24pmbhasuu:24632: bhūbhāvena bhavitavyam iti . anuprayoge tu bhuvā astyabādhanam smaranti kartuḥ vacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:24633: manīṣiṇaḥ . anuprayoge tu bhuvā asteḥ abādhanam iṣyate : īhām āsa ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24635: īhām āsuḥ iti . kim ca syāt yadi atra lopaḥ syāt . lope dvirvacanāsiddhiḥ . lope
GS24pmbhasuu:24636: kṛte anackatvāt dvirvacanam syāt . sthānivadbhādāt bhaviṣyati . sthānivat iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:24637: kṛte bhavet dvitve . kṛte dvitve lopaḥ prāpnoti . asti tarhi parasya lopaḥ . abhyāsasya
GS24pmbhasuu:24638: yaḥ akāraḥ tasya dīrghatvam bhaviṣyati . na evam sidhyati kasmāt pratyaṅgatvāt bhavet
GS24pmbhasuu:24639: hi pararūpam . na evam sidhyati . kasmāt . pratyaṅgatvāt pararūpam prāpnoti . tasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:24640: ca kṛte lopaḥ . pararūpe ca kṛte lopaḥ prāpnoti . dīrghatvam bādhakam bhavet tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:24641: . ataḥ ādeḥ iti dīrghatvam bādhakam bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam . sārvadhātuke
GS24pmbhasuu:24642: bhūtapūrvamātre api yathā syāt : kuru iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:24643: (P_6,4.111) KA_III.217.7-8 Ro_IV. 765-766 atha atra taparakaraṇam kimartham . iha mā bhūt : āstām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24644: āsan . na etat asti prayojanam . āṭaḥ asiddhatvāt na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:24645: (P_6,4.114) KA_III.217.10-18 Ro_IV.766 daridrāteḥ ārdhadhātuke lopaḥ . daridrāteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24646: ārdhadhātuke lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . siddhaḥ ca pratyayavidhau . saḥ ca siddhaḥ pratyayavidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:24647: . kim prayojanam . daridrāti iti daridraḥ . ākārāntalakṣaṇaḥ pratyayavidhiḥ mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:24648: iti . na daridrāyake lopaḥ daridrāṇe ca na iṣyate . didaridrāsasti iti eke didaridriṣati
GS24pmbhasuu:24649: iti vā . vā adyatanyām . adyatanyām vā iti vaktavyam . adaridrīt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24651: (P_6,4.120.1) KA_III.217.20-218.20 Ro_IV.767-768 ṇakāraṣakārādeśādeḥ ettvavacanam liṭi . ṇakāraṣakārādeśādeḥ ettvam liṭi vaktavyam . nematuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24655: sehire . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . anādeśādeḥ iti lpratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:24656: tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . liṭā atra ādeśādim viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . liṭi yaḥ ādeśādiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24657: tadādeḥ na iti . asti anyat liḍgrahaṇasya prayojanam . kim . iha mā bhūt :
GS24pmbhasuu:24658: paktā paktum . na etat asti prayojanam . kṅiti iti vartate . evam api pakvaḥ pakvavān
GS24pmbhasuu:24659: iti atra prāpnoti . abhyāsalopasanniyogena ettvam ucyate na ca atra abhyāsalopasam
GS24pmbhasuu:24660: paśyāmaḥ . evam api pāpacyate atra prāpnoti . dīrghatvam atra bādhakam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:24661: . na aprāpte abhyāsavikāre ettam arabhyate . tat yatha anyān abhyāsavikārān bādhate
GS24pmbhasuu:24662: evam dīrghatvam api bādheta . satyam evam etat . abhyāsavikāreṣu tu jyeṣṭhamadhyamakanīyāṃsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24663: prakārāḥ bhavanti . tatra hrasvahalādiśeṣau utsargau . tayoḥ dīrghatvam apavādaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24664: ettvam ca . apavādavipratiṣedhāt dīrghatvam bhaviṣyati . iha tarhi babhaṇatuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24665: babhaṇuḥ iti abhyāsādeśasya asiddhatvāt ettvam prāpnoti . phalibhajigrahaṇam tu jñāpakam
GS24pmbhasuu:24666: abhyāsādeśasiddhatvasya . yat ayam phalibhajyoḥ grahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24667: siddhaḥ abhyāsādeśaḥ ettve iti . yadi evam prathamatṛtīyādīnām ādeśāditvāt ettvābhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24668: . prathamatṛtīyādīnām tarhi ādeśāditvāt ettvam na prāpnoti . pecatuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24671: debhuḥ . na vā śasidadyoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ jñāpakaḥ rūpābhede ettvavijñānasya . na vā
GS24pmbhasuu:24672: eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . śasidadyoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ jñāpakaḥ rūpābhede ettvavijñānasya
GS24pmbhasuu:24673: . yat ayam śasidadyoḥ pratiṣedham śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ rūpābhedena yaḥ ādeśādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24675: (P_6,4.120.2) KA_III.218.21-219.7 Ro_IV.768-769 dambhaḥ ettvam . dambhaḥ ettvam vaktavyam . debhatuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24676: debhuḥ . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . nalopasya asiddhatvāt . asiddhaḥ nalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24677: . tasya asiddhatvāt ettvam na prāpnoti . naśimanyoḥ aliṭi ettvam . naśimanyoḥ aliṭi
GS24pmbhasuu:24678: ettvam vaktavyam . chandasi amipacyoḥ api . chandasi amipacyoḥ api iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:24679: . kim prayojanam . aneśam menakā iti etat vyemānam liṅi peciran . yaj āyeje vap āvepe
GS24pmbhasuu:24680: dambhaḥ ettvam alakṣaṇam . asiddhatvāt nalopasya dambhaḥ ettvam na sidhyati . śnasoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24681: attve takāreṇa jñāpyate tu ettvaśāsanam . anityaḥ ayam vidhiḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:24682: (P_6,4.121) KA_III.219.9-19 Ro_IV.770-771 thalgrahaṇam kimartham . thalgrahaṇam akṅidartham
GS24pmbhasuu:24683: . thalgrahaṇam kriyate akṅidartham . akṅiti ettvam yathā syāt . pecitha śekitha .
GS24pmbhasuu:24684: na etat asti prayojanam . seḍgrahaṇam eve atra akṅidartham bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:24685: prayojanam . samuccayaḥ yathā vijñāyeta . thali ca seṭi kṅiti ca seṭi iti . kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:24686: . peciva pecima. tatra pacādibhyaḥ iḍvacanam iti vakṣyati . tat na vaktavyam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:24688: lulavitha . guṇasya pratiṣedhāt . iha api tarhi na prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:24689: pecitha śekitha . guṇasya yaḥ akāraḥ iti evam etat vijñāsyate . evam api śaśaritha ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24690: atra prāpnoti . guṇasya eṣaḥ akāraḥ . katham . vṛddhiḥ bhavati guṇaḥ bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:24691: rephaśirāḥ guṇavṛddhisañjñakaḥ abhinirvartate . atha vā ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:24692: ne evañjātīyakānām ettvam bhavati iti yat ayam tṝphalabhajatrapaḥ ca iti tṝgrahaṇam karoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:24693: (P_6,4.123) KA_III.219.21-220.8 Ro_IV.771-772 rādhādiṣu sthāninirdeśaḥ . rādhādiṣu sthāninirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . ekahalmadhye iti vartate . yadi evam tresatuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24695: ra śabdasya ettvam prāpnoti . astu . alaḥ antyasya vidhayaḥ bhavanti iti akārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:24696: bhaviṣyati . anarthake alaḥ antyavidhiḥ na iti evam na prāpnoti . na etasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24697: santi prayojanāni . atha vā ataḥ iti vartate . evam api rādheḥ na prāpnoti . ākāragrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:24698: api prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . śnābhyāstayoḥ ātaḥ iti . atha vā śnasoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24699: allopaḥ iti atra taparakaraṇam pratyākhyāyate . tat prakṛtam iha anuvartiṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:24700: yadi tat anuvartate ataḥ ekahalmadhye anādeśādeḥ liṭi asya ca iti avarṇamātrasya
GS24pmbhasuu:24701: ettvam prāpnoti . babādhe . akāreṇa tapareṇa avarṇam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . asya ātaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:24702: . iha idānīm asya iti anuvartate ataḥ iti nivṛttam .
GS24pmbhasuu:24703: (P_6,4.127-128) KA_III.220.11-18 Ro_IV.772-773 arvaṇas tṛ maghonaḥ ca na śiṣyam chāndasam
GS24pmbhasuu:24704: hi tat . arvaṇas tṛ maghonaḥ ca na śiṣyam . kim kāraṇam . chāndasam hi tat . dṛṣṭānuvidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24705: chandasi bhavati . matubvanyoḥ vidhānāt ca . matubvanī khalu api chandasi vidhīyete
GS24pmbhasuu:24706: . chandasi ubhayadarśanāt . ubhayam khalu api chandasi dṛśyate . imāni arvaṇaḥ padāni
GS24pmbhasuu:24708: (P_6,4.130) KA_III.221.2-222.17 Ro_IV.773-777 pādaḥ upadhāhrasvatvam . pādaḥ upadhāhrasvatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:24709: vaktavyam . dvipadaḥ paśya . ādeśe hi sarvādeśaprasaṅgaḥ . ādeśe hi sati sarvādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24710: prasajyeta . sarvasya dvipācchabdasya tripācchabdasya ca pacchabdādeśaḥ prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:24711: yena vidhiḥ tadantasya iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vā nirdiśyamānasya ādeśatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:24712: . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam . nirdiśyamānasya ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti eṣā paribhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:24713: kartavyā . kaḥ punaḥ atra viśeṣaḥ eṣā vā paribhāṣā kriyeta upadhāhrasvatvam vā ucyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:24714: . avaśyam eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā . bahūni etasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ prayojanāni kāni .
GS24pmbhasuu:24720: yasyām . āḍyāṭsyāṭsu kṛteṣu sāḍyāṭsyāṭkasya ām prāpnoti . nirdiśyamānasya ādeśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24721: bhavanti iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . idam iha sampradhāryam . āḍyāṭsyāṭaḥ kriyantām ām
GS24pmbhasuu:24722: iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt ām . nityāḥ āḍyāṭsyāṭaḥ . kṛte api āmi prapnuvanti
GS24pmbhasuu:24723: akṛte api . anityāḥ āḍyāṭsyāṭaḥ . anyasya kṛte āmi prapnuvanti anyasya akṛte śabdāntarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:24724: ca prāpnuvantaḥ anityāḥ bhavanti . ubhayoḥ anityayoḥ paratvāt ām . idam tarhi . tasyai
GS24pmbhasuu:24725: yasyai . syāṭi kṛte sasyāṭkasya smaibhāvaḥ prāpnoti . nirdiśyamānasya ādeśāḥ bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:24726: iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . yaḥ tarhi nirdiśyate tasya kasmāt na bhavati . syāṭā vyavahitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:24727: . sup . tiṅ. aruditām aruditam arudita iti . iṭi kṛte seṭkasya tāmtamtāmādeśāḥ prāpnuvanti
GS24pmbhasuu:24728: . nirdiśyamānasya ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . idam iha sampradhāryam .
GS24pmbhasuu:24729: iṭ kriyatām tāmtamtāmaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt iḍāgamaḥ . antaraṅgāḥ tāmtamtāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24732: kriyāsta . yāsuṭi kṛte sayāsuṭkasya tāmtamtāmādeśāḥ prāpnuvanti . nirdiśyamānasya
GS24pmbhasuu:24733: ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . lyabbhāve ca . lyabbhāve ca prayojanam . prakṛtya
GS24pmbhasuu:24734: prahṛtya . ktvāntasya lyap prāpnoti . nirdiśyamānasya ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti na doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24737: aticatasraḥ . tricaturantasya tisṛcatasṛbhāvaḥ prāpnoti . nirdiśyamānasya ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . yuṣmat ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24738: asmat . atiyūyam ativayam . yuṣmadasmadantasya yūyavayau prāpnutaḥ . nirdiśyamānasya ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . tyadādivikāra . atisyaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24741: uttamāsau . tyadādyantasya tyadādivikārāḥ prāpnuvanti . kimantasya kādeśaḥ prāpnoti . atikaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24742: paramakaḥ . nirdiśyamānasya ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . udaḥ pūrvatve
GS24pmbhasuu:24743: . udaḥ pūrvatve prayojanam . udasthātām . aṭi kṛte sāṭkasya pūrvasavarṇaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:24744: udaḥ sthāstambhoḥ iti . nirdiśyamānasya ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24745: tarhi nirdiśyate tasya kasmāt na bhavati . aṭā vyavahitatvāt . sā tarhi paribhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:24746: kartavyā . na kartavyā . uktam ṣaṣṭhī sthāneyogā iti etasya yogasya vacane prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:24747: ṣaṣṭhyantam sthānena yathā yujyeta yataḥ ṣaṣṭhī uccāritā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:24748: (P_6,4.132) KA_III.22219-223.7 Ro_IV.777-778 ūṭ ādiḥ kāsmāt na bhavati . ādiḥ ṭit
GS24pmbhasuu:24749: bhavati iti ādiḥ prāpnoti . samprasāraṇam iti anena yaṇaḥ sthānam hriyate . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:24750: evam vāhaḥ ūḍvacanānarthakyam samprasāraṇena kṛtatvāt . vāhaḥ ūḍvacanam anarthakam
GS24pmbhasuu:24751: . kim kāraṇam . samprasāraṇena kṛtatvāt . samprasāraṇena eva siddham . kā rūpasiddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24752: . praṣṭhauhaḥ paśya . guṇaḥ pratyayalakṣaṇatvāt . pratyayalakṣaṇena guṇaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:24753: . ejgrahaṇāt vṛddhiḥ . ejgrahaṇāt vṛddhiḥ bhaviṣyati . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat
GS24pmbhasuu:24754: vāhaḥ ūṭham śāsti śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati eṣā paribhāṣā asiddham bahiraṅgalakṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:24755: antaraṅgalakṣaṇe iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . pacāva idam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24756: pacāma idam . asiddhatvāt bahiraṅgalakṣaṇasya āt guṇasya antaraṅgalakṣaṇam aittvam na bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:24757: (P_6,4.133) KA_III.223.9-20 Ro_IV.778-779 śvādīnām prasāraṇe nakārāntagrahaṇam anakārāntapratiṣedhārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:24758: . śvādīnām prasāraṇe nakārāntagrahaṇam kartavyam . kim prayojanam . anakārāntapratiṣedhārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:24759: . anakārāntasya mā bhūt . mabhavā maghavate . tathā prātipadikagrahaṇe liṅgaviśiṣṭasya
GS24pmbhasuu:24760: api grahaṇam bhavati iti yathā iha bhavati ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24761: yūnaḥ paśye iti evam yuvatīḥ lpaśya iti atra api syāt iti . yat tāvat ucyate nakārāntagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:24762: kartavyam . na kartavyam . uktam vā . kim uktam . arvaṇas tṛ maghonaḥ ca na śiṣyam
GS24pmbhasuu:24763: chāndasam hi tat iti . yat api ucyate prātipadikagrahaṇe liṅgaviśiṣṭasya api grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:24765: yūnaḥ paśye iti evam yuvatīḥ lpaśya iti atra api syāt iti liṅgaviśiṣṭagrahaṇe ca
GS24pmbhasuu:24766: uktam . kim uktam . na vā vibhaktau liṅgaviśiṣṭāgrahaṇāt iti . atha vā upariṣṭāt
GS24pmbhasuu:24767: yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . śvayuvamaghonām ataddhite . tataḥ allopaḥ . akārasya ca
GS24pmbhasuu:24768: lopaḥ bhavati . tataḥ anaḥ . anaḥ iti ubhayoḥ śeṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:24769: (P_6,4.135) KA_III.223.22-224.12 Ro_IV.780-781 atha kim idam ṣapūrvādīnām punarvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:24770: allopārtham āhosvit niyamārtham . katha ca allopārtham syāt katham vā niyamārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:24771: . yadi aviśeṣeṇa allopaṭilopayoḥ saḥ prakṛtibhāvaḥ tataḥ allopārtham . atha hi aṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:24772: ṭilopasya eva prakṛtibhāvaḥ tataḥ niyamārtham . ṣapūrvādīnām punarvacanam allopārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:24773: . ṣapūrvādīnām punarvacanam kriyate allopārtham . aviśeṣeṇa allopaṭilopayoḥ saḥ prakṛtibhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24774: . avadhāraṇe hi anyatra prakṛtibhāve upadhālopaprasaṅgaḥ . avadhāraṇe hi sati anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:24775: prakṛtibhāve upadhālopaḥ prasajyeta . katham . yadi tāvat evam niyamaḥ syāt ṣapūrvādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:24776: eva aṇi iti bhavet iha niyamāt na syāt sāmanaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24777: vaimanaḥ iti . tākṣaṇyaḥ iti prāpnoti . atha api evam niyamaḥ syāt ṣapūrvādīnām aṇi eva iti evam api bhavet iha niyamāt na syāt tākṣaṇyaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:24779: vaimanaḥ iti tu prāpnoti . atha api ubhayataḥ niyamaḥ syāt ṣapūrvādīnām eva aṇi ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24780: aṇi eva ṣapūrvādīnām iti evam api sāmanyaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24781: vemanyaḥ iti prāpnoti . tasmāt suṣthu ucyate ṣapūrvādīnām punarvacanam allopārtham . avadhāraṇe hi anyatra prakṛtibhāve upadhālopaprasaṅgaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:24782: (P_6,4.140) KA_III.224.14-21 Ro_IV.781 ātaḥ anāpaḥ . ātaḥ anāpaḥ iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:24783: samāse anañpūrve ktvaḥ lyap iti . anāpaḥ iti kimartham . khaṭvāyām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24784: mālāyām . yadi anāpaḥ iti ucyate katham ktvāyām . nipātanāt etat siddham . kim nipātanam
GS24pmbhasuu:24785: . ktvāyām va pratiṣedhaḥ iti . yadi evam na arthaḥ anāpaḥ iti anena . katham samāse
GS24pmbhasuu:24786: anañpūrve ktvaḥ lyap iti . nipātanāt etat siddham . katham halaḥ śnaḥ śānac hau iti
GS24pmbhasuu:24787: . etat api nipātanāt siddham . atha vā yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . ātaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:24789: dhātoḥ ca ākārasya lopaḥ bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:24790: (P_6,4.141) KA_III.224.23-225.5 Ro_IV.782 mantreṣu ātmanaḥ pratyayamātraprasaṅgaḥ . mantreṣu ātmanaḥ pratyayamātre lopaḥ prasaṅktavyaḥ . iha api yathā syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:24791: tmanyā samañjan . tmanoḥ antaḥ asthaḥ iti . yadi pratyayamātre lopaḥ ucyate katham
GS24pmbhasuu:24792: ātmanaḥ eva nirmimīṣva iti . tasmāt na arthaḥ pratyayamātre lopena . katham tmanyā
GS24pmbhasuu:24793: samañjan . tmanoḥ antaḥ asthaḥ iti . chāndasatvāt siddham . chāndasam etat . dṛṣṭānuvidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24794: chandasi bhavati . ādigrahaṇānarthakyam ca ākāraprakaraṇāt . ādigrahaṇam ca anarthakam
GS24pmbhasuu:24795: . kim kāraṇam . ākāraprakaraṇāt . ātaḥ iti vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:24796: (P_6,4.142) KA_III.225.7-11 Ro_IV.782-783 tigrahaṇam kimartham na viṃśateḥ ḍiti lopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24797: iti eva ucyeta . na evam śakyam . viṃśateḥ ḍiti lopaḥ iti ucyamāne antyasya prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:24798: . siddhaḥ antyasya yasyeta lopena . tatra ārambhasāmarthyāt tiśabdasya bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:24799: . kutaḥ nu khalu etat ananyārthe ārambhe tiśabdasya bhaviṣyati na punaḥ aṅgasya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:24800: . tasmāt tigrahaṇam kartavyam . atha kriyamāṇe api tigrahaṇe antyasya kasmāt na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:24801: . nirdiśyamānasya ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti evam na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:24802: (P_6,4.143) KA_III.225.13-16 Ro_IV.783 abhasya upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . iha api yathā syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:24804: mandurajaḥ iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . katham upasarajaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24805: mandurajaḥ iti . ḍiti abhasya api anubandhakaraṇasāmarthyāt . abhasya api anubandhakaraṇasāmarthyāt bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:24807: upasaṅkhyānam . nakārantasya ṭilope sabrahmacārin pīṭhasarpin kalāpin kuthumin taitilin
GS24pmbhasuu:24808: jājalin lāṅgalin śilālin śikhaṇḍin sūkarasdman suparvan iti eteṣām upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:24809: kartavyam . sabrahmacārin . sābrahmacārāḥ . sabrahmacārin . pīṭhasarpin . paiṭhasarpāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24810: . pīṭhasarpin . kalāpin . kālapāḥ . kalāpin . kuthumin . kauthumāḥ . kuthumin . taitilin
GS24pmbhasuu:24811: . taitilāḥ . taitilin . jājalin . jājalāḥ . jājalin . lāṅgalin . lāṅgalāḥ . lāṅgalin
GS24pmbhasuu:24812: . śilālin . śailālāḥ . śilālin . śikhaṇḍin . śaikhaṇḍāḥ . śikhaṇḍin . sūkarasdman
GS24pmbhasuu:24813: . saukarasadmāḥ . sūkarasdman . suparvan . sauparvāḥ . suparvan . carmaṇaḥ kośe .
GS24pmbhasuu:24814: carmaṇaḥ kośe upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . cārmaḥ kośaḥ . āsmanaḥ vikāre . āsmanaḥ vikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:24815: upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . aśmanaḥ vikāraḥ āśmaḥ . śunaḥ saṅkoce . śaunaḥ saṅkocaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24816: . avyayānām ca . avyayānām ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . kim prayojanam . sāyampratikādyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:24817: . sāyamprātikaḥ paunaḥpunikaḥ . śāśvatike pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:24818: nipātanāt etat siddham . kim nipātanam . yeṣām ca virodhaḥ śāśvatikaḥ iti . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:24820: (P_6,4.148.1) KA_III.226.20-25 Ro_IV.785-786 ivarṇāntasya iti kim udāharaṇam . he
GS24pmbhasuu:24821: dākṣi dākṣyā dākṝyaḥ . he dākṣi iti . yadi lopaḥ na syāt parasya hrasvatve kṛte savarṇadīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:24822: prasjyeta . dākṣyā iti . yadi lopaḥ na syāt parasya yaṇādeśe kṛte pūrvasya śravaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:24823: prasajyeta . dākṣeyaḥ iti . yadi lopaḥ na syāt parasya lope kṛte pūrvasya śravaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:24824: prasajyeta . na etāni santi prayojanāni . savarṇadīrghatvena api etāni siddhāni .
GS24pmbhasuu:24825: idam tarhi . atisakheḥ āgacchati . atisakheḥ svam . yadi lopaḥ na syāt upasarjanahrasvatve
GS24pmbhasuu:24827: (P_6,4.148.2) KA_III.227.1-19 Ro_IV.787-788 yasya ītyādau śyām pratiṣedhaḥ . yasya
GS24pmbhasuu:24828: ītyādau śyām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kāṇḍe kuḍye . saurye nāma himavataḥ śṛṅge .
GS24pmbhasuu:24829: saḥ tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . iha śyām iti api prakṛtam na iti
GS24pmbhasuu:24831: yasya ītyādau lopaḥ bhavati śyām na . iyaṅuvaṅbhyām lopaḥ vipratiṣedhena . iyaṅuvaṅbhyām lopaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . iyaṅuvaṅoḥ avakāśaḥ śriyau śriyaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24835: laikhābhreyaḥ . lopaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . guṇavṛddhī ca . guṇavṛddhī ca iyaṅuvaṅbhyām bhavataḥ vipratiṣedhena . guṇavṛddhyoḥ avakāśaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:24836: cetā gauḥ . iyaṅuvaṅoḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti : cayanam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24839: lāvakaḥ . guṇavṛddhī bhavataḥ vipratiṣedhena . na vā iyaṅuvaṅādeśasya anyaviṣaye
GS24pmbhasuu:24840: vacanāt . na vā arthaḥ vipratiṣedhena . kim kāraṇam . iyaṅuvaṅādeśasya anyaviṣaye
GS24pmbhasuu:24841: vacanāt . iyaṅuvaṅādeśaḥ anyaviṣaye ārabhyate . kiṃviṣaye . yaṇādiviṣaye . saḥ yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:24842: yaṇādeśam bādhate evam guṇavṛddhī bādheta . tasmāt tatra guṇavṛddhiviṣaye pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24843: . tasmāt tatra guṇavṛddhiviṣaye pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . madhye apavādāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24844: pūrvān vidhīn bādhante iti evam iyaṅuvaṅādeśaḥ yaṇādeśam bādhiṣyate guṇavṛddhī na bādhiṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:24845: (P_6,4.149.1) KA_III.227.21-228.12 Ro_IV.788-789 sūryādīnām aṇante aprasiddhiḥ aṅgānyatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:24846: . sūryādīnām aṇante aprasiddhiḥ . saurī balākā . kim kāraṇam . aṅgānyatvāt . aṇantam
GS24pmbhasuu:24847: etat aṅgam anyat bhavati . lope kṛte na aṅgānyatvam . sthānivadbhāvāt aṅgānyatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:24848: bhavati . siddham tu sthānivatpratiṣedhāt . siddham etat . katham . sthānivatpratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:24849: . pratiṣidhyate atra sthānivadbhāvaḥ yalopavidhim prati na sthānivat bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:24850: . evam api na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . śabdānyatvāt . anyaḥ hi śūryaśabdaḥ anyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24851: sauryaśabdaḥ . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ekadeśavikṛtam ananyavat bhavati iti bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:24852: upadhāgrahaṇānarthakyam ca . sthānivadbhāve ca idānīm pratiṣiddhe upadhāgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:24853: anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . antyaḥ eva hi sūryādīnām yakāraḥ . kim yātam etat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:24854: . suṣṭhu ca yātam sādhu ca yātam yadi prāk bhāt asiddhatvam . atha hi saha tena asiddhatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:24855: asiddhatvāt lopasya na antyaḥ yakāraḥ bhavati . yadi api saha tena asiddhatvam evam
GS24pmbhasuu:24856: api na doṣaḥ . na evam vijñāyate sūryādīnām aṅgānām yakāralopaḥ iti . katham tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:24857: . aṅgasya yalopaḥ bhavati saḥ cet sūryādīnām yakāraḥ iti . evam api sūryacarī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24860: ca kartavyam . sūryamatsyayoḥ ṅyām . sūryamatsyayoḥ ṅyām iti vaktavyam . saurī matsī
GS24pmbhasuu:24861: . sūryāgastyayoḥ che ca . sūryāgastyayoḥ che ca ṅyām ca iti vaktavyam . saurī saurīyaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24863: āgastīyaḥ . tiṣyapuṣyayoḥ nakṣatrāṇi . tiṣyapuṣyayoḥ nakṣatrāṇi lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ : taiṣam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24864: pauṣam . antikasya tasi kādilopaḥ ādyudāttatvam ca . antikasya tasi kādilopaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24865: ādyudāttatvam ca vaktavyam . antitaḥ na dūrāt . tame tādeḥ ca . tame tādeḥ ca kādeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24866: ca lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . agne tvam naḥ antamaḥ . antitamaḥ avarohati . tasi iti eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24867: na vaktavyaḥ . dṛṣṭaḥ dāśataye api hi ghau lopaḥ antiṣat iti yatra . antiṣat . tathā
GS24pmbhasuu:24868: aghau ye antyatharvasu . anti ye ca dūrake .
GS24pmbhasuu:24869: (P_6,4.153) KA_III.229.7-14 Ro_IV.791-793 chagrahaṇam śakyam akartum . iha kasmāt na bhavati bilvakebhyaḥ . bhasya iti vartate . evam api bilvakāya
GS24pmbhasuu:24870: atra prāpnoti . taddhitasya iti vartate . evam api bilvakasya vikāraḥ avayavaḥ vā bailvakaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24871: atra prāpnoti . taddhite taddhitasya iti vartate . evam api bilvakīyāyām bhavaḥ bailvakaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24873: atra prāpnoti . na saḥ bilvakāt . bilvakādibhyaḥ yaḥ vihitaḥ iti ucyate na ca asau
GS24pmbhasuu:24874: bilvakaśabdāt vihitaḥ . kim tarhi bilvakīyaśabdāt . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat chagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:24875: karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati eṣā paribhāṣā :
GS24pmbhasuu:24876: sanniyogaśiṣṭānām anyatarābhāve ubhayoḥ abhāvaḥ iti . tasmāt chagrahaṇam kartavyam chasya eva luk yathā syāt kukaḥ mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:24877: (P_6,4.154) KA_III.229.16-23 Ro_IV.793 tuḥ sarvasya lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ antyasya lopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24878: mā bhūt iti . saḥ tarhi vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . tuḥ sarvalopavijñānam antyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:24879: vacanānarthakyāt . tuḥ sarvalopaḥ vijñāyate . kutaḥ . antyasya vacanānarthakyāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:24880: antyasya lopavacane prayojanam na asti iti kṛtvā sarvasya bhaviṣyati . atha vā luk
GS24pmbhasuu:24881: prakṛtaḥ . saḥ anuvartiṣyate . aśakyaḥ luk anuvartayitum . kim kāraṇam . vijayiṣṭhakariṣthayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24882: guṇadarśanāt . vijayiṣṭhakariṣthayoḥ guṇaḥ dṛśyate . vijayiṣṭhaḥ . āsutim kariṣṭhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:24883: (P_6,4.155) KA_III.230.2-10 Ro_IV.794-795 ṇau iṣṭhavat prātipadikasya . ṇau prātipadikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:24887: prathayati . mradayati . ṭilopārtham . paṭum ācaṣṭe paṭayati . yaṇādiparārtham .
GS24pmbhasuu:24888: sthūlam ācaṣṭe sthavayati . davayati . kim punaḥ idam parigaṇanam āhosvit udāharaṇamātram
GS24pmbhasuu:24889: . udāharaṇamātram iti āha . prādayaḥ api hi iṣyante :
GS24pmbhasuu:24892: (P_6,4.159) KA_III.230.12-13 Ro_IV.795 kim ayam yiśabdaḥ āhosvit yakāraḥ . kim ca ataḥ . yadi lopaḥ api anuvartate tatao yiśabdaḥ . atha nivṛttam tataḥ yakāraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:24893: (P_6,4.160) KA_III.230.15-22 Ro_IV.795-796 kimartham jyāt parasya īyasaḥ āttvam ucyate na lopaḥ prakṛtaḥ saḥ anuvarteta . kā rūpasiddhiḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:24894: jyāyān . akṛtyakāre iti dīrghatvam bhaviṣyati . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat jyāt parasya
GS24pmbhasuu:24895: īyasaḥ āttvam śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati eṣā paribhāṣā aṅgavṛtte punarvṛttau
GS24pmbhasuu:24896: avidhiḥ iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . pibateḥ guṇapratiṣedhaḥ coditaḥ . saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24897: na vaktavyaḥ bhavati . atha kimartham jyāt parasya īyasaḥ dīrghaḥ ucyate na akāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24899: jyāyān . āntaryataḥ dīrghasya dīrghaḥ bhaviṣyati . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat dīrgham karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati eṣā :
GS24pmbhasuu:24900: paribhāṣā bhāvyamānena savarṇānām grahaṇam na iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:24902: halādeḥ aṅgasya iti āhosvit halādeḥ ṛkārasya iti . yuktam punaḥ idam vicārayitum
GS24pmbhasuu:24903: . nanu anena asandigdhena aṅgaviśeṣaṇena bhavitavyam . katham hi ṛkārasya nāma hal
GS24pmbhasuu:24904: ādiḥ syāt anyasya anyaḥ . ayam ādiśabdaḥ asti eva avayavavācī . tat yathā ṛgādiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24906: ślokādiḥ iti . asti sāmīpye vartate . tat yathā . dadhibhojanam arthasiddheḥ ādiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24907: . dadhibhojanasamīpe . ghṛtabhojanam ārogyasya ādiḥ . ghṛtabhojanasamīpe . yāvatā
GS24pmbhasuu:24909: halsamīpasya ṛkārasya halādeḥ aṅgasya iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate halādeḥ aṅgasya iti aprathīyān ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24910: atra na prāpnoti . atha vijñāyate halādeḥ ṛkārasya iti anṛcīyān ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24911: atra api prāpnoti . ubhayathā svṛcīyān iti atra prāpnoti . astu tāvat halādeḥ aṅgasya
GS24pmbhasuu:24912: iti . katham aprathīyān . taddhitāntena samāsaḥ bhaviṣyati . na prathīyān aprathīyān
GS24pmbhasuu:24913: iti . bhavet siddham yadā taddhitāntena samāsaḥ . yadā tu khalu samāsāt taddhitotpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24914: tadā na sidhyati . na eva samāsāt taddhitotpattyā bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam . bahuvrīhiṇā
GS24pmbhasuu:24915: uktatvāt matvarthasya . bhavet yadā bahuvrīhiḥ tadā na syāt . yadā tu khalu tatpuruṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24916: tadā prāpnoti . na pṛthuḥ apṛthuḥ . ayam api apṛthuḥ . ayam api apṛthuḥ . ayam anayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24917: aprathīyān iti . na samāsāt ajādibhyām bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam . guṇavacanāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:24918: ucyate na ca samāsaḥ guṇavacanaḥ iti . yadā tarhi samāsāt vinmatupau vinmatubantāt
GS24pmbhasuu:24919: ajādī tadā prāpnutaḥ . avidyamānāḥ pṛthavaḥ apṛthavaḥ . apṛthavaḥ asya santi apṛthumān
GS24pmbhasuu:24920: . ayam apṛthumān . ayam apṛthumān . ayam anayoḥ aprathīyān iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:24921: apṛthavaḥ eva na santi kutaḥ yasya apṛthavaḥ iti . iha kasmāt na bhavati : mātayati ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24922: bhrātayati . lopaḥ atra bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . idam iha sampradhāryam . ṭilopaḥ kriyatām
GS24pmbhasuu:24923: rabhāvaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt rabhāvaḥ . yadi punaḥ avaśiṣṭasya rabhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24924: ucyeta . na evam śakyam . iha api prasajyeta :
GS24pmbhasuu:24926: kṛtayati iti . evam tarhi parigaṇanam kartavyam . pṛthumṛdukṛśabhṛśadṛḍhaparivṛḍhānām iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:24927: (P_6,4.163) KA_III.231.25-233.5 Ro_IV.799-804 prakṛtyā ekāc iti kim iṣṭheymeyassu
GS24pmbhasuu:24928: āhosvit aviśeṣeṇa . kim ca ataḥ . yadi aviśeṣeṇa svī khī śauvam adhunā iti atra api
GS24pmbhasuu:24929: prāpnoti . svikhinau eva na staḥ . katham . uktam etat . ekākṣarāt kṛtaḥ jāteḥ saptamyām
GS24pmbhasuu:24930: ca na tau smṛtau . svavān khavān iti eva bhavitavyam . śauvam iti paratvāt aijāgame
GS24pmbhasuu:24931: kṛte ṭilopena bhavitavyam . adhunā iti saprakṛtikasya sapratyayakasya sthāne nipātanam
GS24pmbhasuu:24933: dravyam . yasya īti ādau prakṛtibhāvaḥ . yasya īti yasya lopaprāptiḥ tasya prakṛtibhāvaḥ na ca etāni yasya īti ādau . evam api śriye hitaḥ śrīyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24934: jñā devatā asya sthālīpākasya jñaḥ sthālīyāpākaḥ iti atra prāpnoti . tasmāt iṣṭheymeyassu
GS24pmbhasuu:24935: prakṛtibhāvaḥ . atha iṣṭheymeyassu prakṛtibhāve kim udāharaṇam . preyān preṣthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24936: . na etat asti . prādīnām asiddhatvāt na bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi śreyān ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24937: śreṣṭhaḥ . prakṛtyā ekāc iṣṭheymeyassu cet ekācaḥ uccāraṇasāmarthyāt avacanāt prakṛtibhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24938: . prakṛtyā ekāc iṣṭheymeyassu cet tat na . kim kāraṇam . ekācaḥ uccāraṇasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:24939: antareṇa api vacanam prakṛtibhāvaḥ bhaviṣyati . vinmatoḥ tu lugartham . vinmatoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24946: sruciṣṭhaḥ . nanu ca vinmatoḥ luk ṭilopam bādhiṣyate . katham anyasya ucyamānasya
GS24pmbhasuu:24947: anyasya bādhakam syāt . asati khalu api sambhave bādhanam bhavati . asti ca sambhavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24948: yat ubhayam syāt . yathā eva khalu api vinmatoḥ luk ṭilopam bādhate eva naḥ taddhite
GS24pmbhasuu:24949: iti etam api bādheta . yataraḥ naḥ brahmīyān . brahmavattaraḥ iti . yat tāvat ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:24950: katham anyasya ucyamānasya anyasya bādhakam syāt iti . idam tāvat ayam praṣṭavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24951: . yadi tarhi vinmatoḥ luk na ucyeta kim iha syāt iti . ṭilopaḥ iti āha . ṭilopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24952: cet na aprāpte ṭilope vinmatoḥ luk ārabhyate . saḥ bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . yat api
GS24pmbhasuu:24953: ucyate asati khalu api sambhave bādhanam bhavati . asti ca sambhavaḥ yat ubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:24954: syāt iti . sati api sambhave bādhanam bhavati . tat yathā . dadhi brāhmaṇebhyaḥ dīyatām
GS24pmbhasuu:24955: takram kauṇḍinyāya iti sati api sambhave dadhidānasya takradānam nivartakam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:24956: . evam iha api sati api sambhave vinmatoḥ luk ṭilopam bādhiṣyate . yat api ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:24957: yathā eva khalu api vinmatoḥ luk ṭilopam bādhate eva naḥ taddhite iti etam api bādheta
GS24pmbhasuu:24958: iti . na bādhate . kim kāraṇam . yena na aprāpte tasya bādhanam . na aprāpte ṭilope
GS24pmbhasuu:24959: vinmatoḥ luk ārabhyate . naḥ taddhite iti etasmin punaḥ prāpte ca aprāpte ca . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:24960: vā purastāt apavādāḥ anantarān vidhīn bādhante iti evam vinmatoḥ luk ṭilopam bādhiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:24961: . naḥ taddhite iti etam na bādhiṣyate . yadi tarhi vinmatoḥ luk ṭilopam bādhate payiṣthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24962: iti na sidhyati . payasiṣthaḥ iti prāpnoti . yathālakṣaṇam aprayukte . prakṛtyā ake
GS24pmbhasuu:24963: rājanyamanuṣyayuvānaḥ . rājanyamanuṣyayuvānaḥ ake prakṛtyā bhavanti iti vaktavyam . rājanyakam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24965: (P_6,4.170) KA_III.233.10-12 Ro_IV.804 mapūrvāt pratiṣedhe vā hitanāmnaḥ . mapūrvāt pratiṣedhe vā hitanāmnaḥ iti vaktavyam . samānaḥ haitanāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24967: (P_6,4.171) KA_III.233.14-234.3 Ro_IV.805 atha kim idam brāhmasya ajātau anaḥ lopārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:24968: vacanam āhosvit niyamārtham . katha ca lopātham syāt katham va niyamārtham . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:24969: tāvat apatye iti vartate tataḥ niyamārtham . atha nivṛttam tataḥ lopārtham . ataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24970: uttaram paṭhati brāhmasya ajātau lopārtham vacanam . brāhmasya ajātau lopārtham vacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:24971: kriyate . apatye iti nivṛttam . tatra aprāptavidhāne prāptapratiṣedhaḥ . tatra aprāptasya
GS24pmbhasuu:24972: ṭilopasya vidhāne prāptasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . brāhmaṇaḥ . na vā paryudāsasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:24973: . na vā vaktavyaḥ . kim kāraṇam . paryudāsasāmarthyāt paryudāsaḥ atra bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:24974: . asti anyat paryudāse prayojanam . kim . yā jātiḥ eva na apatyam . brāhmī oṣadhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24975: iti . na vai atra iṣyate . aniṣṭam ca prāpnoti iṣṭam ca na sidhyati . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:24976: anuvartate apatye iti na tu apatye iti anena nipātanam abhisambadhyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:24977: brāhmaḥ iti nipātyate apatye ajātau iti . kim tarhi . pratiṣedhaḥ abhisambadhyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:24978: brāhmaḥ iti nipātyate . apatye jātau na iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:24979: (P_6,4.172) KA_III.234.5-8 Ro_IV.806 kimartham idam ucyate na naḥ taddhite iti eva
GS24pmbhasuu:24980: siddham . na sidhyati . an aṇi iti prakṛtibhāvaḥ prasajyeta . aṇi iti ucyate ṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:24981: ca ayam . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat nipātanam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ tācchīlike
GS24pmbhasuu:24982: ṇe aṇkṛtāni bhavanti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . caurī tāpasī iti aṇantāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:24984: (P_6,4.174) KA_III.234.11-235.16 Ro_IV.807-809 atra bhrauṇahatye kim nipātyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:24985: yakārādau taddhite tatvam nipātyate . bhrauṇahatye tatvanipātanānarthakyam sāmānyena
GS24pmbhasuu:24986: kṛtatvāt . bhrauṇahatye tatvanipātanam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . sāmānyena kṛtatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:24987: . sāmānyena eva atra tatvam bhaviṣyati . hanaḥ taḥ aciṇṇamuloḥ iti . jñāpakam tu
GS24pmbhasuu:24988: taddhite tatvapratiṣedhasya . evam tarhi jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na taddhite tatvam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:24989: iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . bhrauṇaghnaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24990: vārtraghnaḥ iti atra tatvam na bhavati . aikṣvākasya svarabhedāt nipātanam pṛthaktvena . aikṣvākasya svarabhedāt nipātanam pṛthaktvena kartavyam . aikṣvākaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:24991: aikṣvākaḥ . ekaśrutyā nirdeśāt siddham .ekaśrutiḥ svarasarvanāma yathā napuṃsakam
GS24pmbhasuu:24992: liṅgasarvanāma . atha maitreye kim nipātyate . maitreye ḍhañi yādilopanipātanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:24993: maitreye ḍhañi yādilopaḥ nipātyate . idam mitrayuśabdasya catuḥ grahaṇam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:24994: . gṛṣṭyādiṣu pratyayavidhyartham pāṭhaḥ kriyate . dvitīye adhyāye yaskādiṣu lugartham
GS24pmbhasuu:24995: grahaṇam kriyate . saptame adhyāye iyādeśārtham . idam caturtham yādilopārtham .
GS24pmbhasuu:24996: dvirgrahaṇam śakyam akartum . bidādiṣu pratyayavidhyartham pāṭhaḥ kartavyaḥ . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:24997: na eva arthaḥ lukā na api yādilopena . iyādeśena eva siddham . na evam śakyam . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:24998: hi maitreyakaḥ saṅghaḥ iti saṅghātalakṣaṇeṣu añyañiñām aṇ iti aṇ prasajyeta . hiraṇmaye
GS24pmbhasuu:24999: kim nipātyate . hiraṇmaye yalopavacanam . hiraṇmaye yalopaḥ nipātyate . atha hiraṇyaye
GS24pmbhasuu:25000: kim nipātyate . hiraṇyayasya chandasi malopavacanāt siddham . hiraṇyayasya chandasi
GS24pmbhasuu:25001: malopaḥ nipātyate . hiraṇyayī naḥ nayatu . hiraṇyayāḥ panthānaḥ āsan . hiraṇyayam āsanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:25003: 1-3 yuvoḥ anākau iti ucyate kayoḥ yuvoḥ anākau bhavataḥ . pratyayayoḥ . katham punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25004: aṅgasya iti anuvartamāne pratyayayoḥ syātām . yuśabdavuśabdāntam etat vibhaktau aṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:25005: bhavati . yadi yuśabdavuśabdāntasya aṅgasya anākau bhavataḥ sarvādeśau prāpnutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25006: . nirdiśyamānasya ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti evam na bhaviṣyataḥ . yatra tarhi vibhaktiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25007: na asti . nandanā kārikā iti . atra api pratyayalakṣaṇena vibhaktiḥ . yatra tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:25008: pratyayalakṣaṇam na asti . nandanapriyaḥ kārakapriyaḥ iti . mā bhūtām yā asau sāmāsikī
GS24pmbhasuu:25009: vibhaktiḥ tasyām yā asau samāsāt vibhaktiḥ tasyām bhaviṣyataḥ . na vai tasyām yuśabdavuśabdāntam
GS24pmbhasuu:25010: aṅgam bhavati . bhavet yaḥ yuśabdavuśabdābhyām aṅgam viśeṣayet tasya ānantyayoḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:25011: syātām . vayam khalu aṅgena yuśabdavuśabdau viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . aṅgasya yuvoḥ anākau
GS24pmbhasuu:25012: bhavataḥ yatratatrasthayoḥ iti . yatra tarhi samāsāt vibhaktiḥ na asti . nandanadadhi
GS24pmbhasuu:25013: kārakadadhi . evam tarhi na ca aparam nimittam sañjñā ca pratyayalakṣaṇena . na ca
GS24pmbhasuu:25015: asmin parataḥ yuvoḥ anākau bhavataḥ iti . kim tarhi aṅgasya yuvoḥ anākau bhavataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25016: iti . aṅgasañjñā ca bhavati pratyayalakṣaṇena . atha vā tayoḥ eva yat aṅgam tannimittatvena
GS24pmbhasuu:25017: āśrayiṣyāmaḥ . katham . aṅgasya iti sambandhasāmānye ṣaṣṭhī vijñāsyate . aṅgasya
GS24pmbhasuu:25018: yau yuvū . kim ca aṅgasya yuvū . nimittam . yayoḥ yuvoḥ aṅgam iti etat bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:25021: 3-7 yuvoḥ anākau iti cet dhātupratiṣedhaḥ . yuvoḥ anākau iti cet dhātupratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25022: vaktavyaḥ . yutvā yutaḥ yutavān yutiḥ . bhujyvādīnām ca . bhujyvādīnām ca pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25023: vaktavyaḥ . bhujyuḥ kaṃyuḥ śaṃyuḥ iti . anunāsikaparatvāt siddham . anunāsikaparayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25024: yuvoḥ grahaṇam na ca etau anunāsikaparau . yadi anunāsikaparayoḥ grahaṇam nandanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25025: kārakaḥ atra na prāpnutaḥ na hi etābhyām yuśabdavuśabdābhyām anunāsikam param paśyāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25026: . anunāsikaparatvāt iti na evam vijñāyate anunāsikaḥ paraḥ ābhyām tau imau anunāsikaparau
GS24pmbhasuu:25027: anunāsikaparatvāt iti . katham tarhi . anunāsikaḥ paraḥ anayoḥ tau imau anunāsikaparau
GS24pmbhasuu:25028: anunāsikaparatvāt iti . yadi anunāsikaparayoḥ grahaṇam itsañjñā prāpnoti . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:25029: kaḥ doṣaḥ . tatra ṅībnumoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . ṅībnumaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . nandanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25030: kārakaḥ . nandanā kārikā . ugillakṣaṇau ṅībnumau prāpnutaḥ . dhātvantasya ca . dhātvantasya
GS24pmbhasuu:25031: ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . divu sivu . ṣiṭṭitkaraṇam tu jñāpakam ugitkāryābhāvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:25032: . yat ayam yuśabdavuśabdau ṣiṭṭitau karoti śilpini ṣvun ṭyuṭyulau tuṭ ca iti tat
GS24pmbhasuu:25033: jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na yuvoḥ ugitkāryam bhavati iti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam ṣiṭṭitkaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:25034: etat prayojanam ṣiṭṭitaḥ iti ikāraḥ yathā syāt . yadi ca atra ugitkāryam syāt ṣiṭṭitkaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:25035: anarthakam syāt . paśyati tu ācāryaḥ na yuvoḥ ugitkāryam bhavati iti tataḥ yuśabdavuśabdau
GS24pmbhasuu:25036: ṣiṭṭitau karoti . na vā ṣitkaraṇam ṅīṣvidhānārtham . na etat asti jñāpakam . asti
GS24pmbhasuu:25037: hi anyat etasya vacane prayojanam . kim . ṣitkaraṇam kriyate ṅīṣvidhānārtham . ṣitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25038: iti ṅīṣ yathā syāt . ṭitkaraṇam anupasarjanārtham . ṭitkaraṇe api anyat prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:25039: asti . kim . anupasarjanāt ṭitaḥ iti īkāraḥ yathā syāt . ṭitaḥ anupasarjanāt bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:25040: ugitaḥ upasarjanāt ca anupasarjanāt ca . evam tarhi vipratiṣedhāt tu ṭāpaḥ balīyastvam
GS24pmbhasuu:25041: . vipratiṣedhāt tu ṭāpaḥ balīyastvam bhaviṣyati . ṭāpaḥ avakāśaḥ khaṭvā mālā . ṅīpaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25042: avakāśaḥ gomatī yavamatī . iha ubhayam prāpnoti nandanā kārikā . ṭāp bhavati vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:25043: . na eṣaḥ yuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . vipratiṣedhe param iti ucyate pūrvaḥ ca ṭāp paraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25044: ṅīp . ṅīpaḥ paraḥ ṭāp kariṣyate . sūtraviparyāsaḥ kṛtaḥ bhavati . evam tarhi ugitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25045: ṅīp bhavati iti atra api ataḥ ṭāp iti anuvartiṣyate . evam api akārāntāt ugitaḥ iha
GS24pmbhasuu:25046: eva syāt nandanā kārikā . gomatī yavamatī iti atra na syāt . evam tarhi sambandhānuvṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25047: kariṣyate . ajādyataḥ ṭāp ṛnnebhyaḥ ṅīp ataḥ ṭāp . ugitaḥ ca ṅīp bhavati ataḥ ṭāp
GS24pmbhasuu:25048: . vanaḥ ra ca vanaḥ ṅīp bhavati ugitaḥ ataḥ ṭāp . pādaḥ anyatarasyām ṅīp bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:25049: ugitaḥ ataḥ ṭāp . tataḥ ṛci . ṛci ca ṭāp bhavati . prakṛtam anuvartate . sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:25050: evam yadi vārttikakāraḥ paṭhati vipratiṣedhāt tu ṭāpaḥ balīyastvam iti etat asaṅgṛhītam
GS24pmbhasuu:25051: bhavati . etat ca saṅgṛhītam bhavati . katham . iṣṭavācī paraśabdaḥ . vipratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:25052: param yat iṣṭam tat bhavati iti . dhātvantasya ca arthavadgrahaṇāt . arthavatoḥ yuvoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25055: 7-9 numvidhau jhalgrahaṇam . numvidhau jhalgrahaṇam kartavyam . jhalantasya ugitaḥ iṣyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:25056: ugidacām sarvanāmasthāne adhātoḥ jhalaḥ iti . tat ca avaśyam kartavyam . liṅgaviśiṣṭapratiṣedhārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:25057: . prātipadikagrahaṇe liṅgaviśiṣṭasya api grahaṇam bhavati iti yathā iha bhavati gomān
GS24pmbhasuu:25058: yavamān evam gomatī yavamatī iti atra api syāt .na vā vibhaktau liṅgaviśiṣṭāgrahaṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:25059: . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam . vibhaktau liṅgaviśiṣṭagrahaṇam na iti eṣā paribhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:25060: kartavyā . kaḥ punaḥ atra viśeṣaḥ eṣā vā paribhāṣā kriyeta jhalgrahaṇam vā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:25061: avaśyam eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā . bahūni etasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ prayojanāni . kāni .
GS24pmbhasuu:25062: prayojanam śunaḥ svare . yathā iha bhavati śunā śunaḥ evam śunyā śunyāḥ iti atra
GS24pmbhasuu:25063: api syāt . yūnaḥ samprasāraṇe . yūnaḥ samprasāraṇe prayojanam . yathā iha bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:25064: yūnaḥ paśya iti evam yuvatīḥ paśya iti atra api syāt . ugidacām numvidhau . ugidacām
GS24pmbhasuu:25065: numvidhau prayojanam . yathā iha bhavati gomān yavamān evam gomatī yavamatī iti atra
GS24pmbhasuu:25066: api syāt . anaḍuhaḥ ca āmvidhau . anaḍuhaḥ ca āmvidhau prayojanam . yathā iha bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:25067: anaḍvān iti evam anaḍuhī iti atra api syāt . na vā bhavati anaḍvāhī iti . bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:25068: anyena yatnena . ām anaḍuhaḥ striyām vā iti . liṅgaviśiṣṭagrahaṇāt īkārāntasya prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:25069: . pathimathoḥ āttve . pathimathoḥ āttve prayojanam . yathā iha bhavati panthāḥ manthāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25070: evam pathī mathī iti atra api prāpnoti . na kevalaḥ pathiśabdaḥ striyām vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:25071: upasamastaḥ tarhi vartate . supathī iti . puṃsaḥ asuṅvidhau . puṃsaḥ asuṅvidhau prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:25072: . yathā iha bhavati pumān evam puṃsī iti atra api syāt . na kevalaḥ puṃśabdaḥ striyām
GS24pmbhasuu:25073: vartate . upasamastaḥ tarhi vartate . supuṃsī iti . sakhyuḥ ṇittvānaṅau . sakhyuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25074: ṇittvānaṅau prayojanam . yathā iha bhavati sakhā sakhāyau sakhāyaḥ evam sakhī sakhyau
GS24pmbhasuu:25075: sakhyaḥ iti atra api prāpnoti . bhavadbhagavadaghavatām odbhāve . bhavadbhagavadaghavatām
GS24pmbhasuu:25076: odbhāve prayojanam . yathā iha bhavati bhoḥ bhagoḥ aghoḥ iti evam bhavati bhagavati
GS24pmbhasuu:25077: aghavati iti atra api syāt . etāni asyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ prayojanāni yadartham eṣā paribhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:25078: kartavyā . etasyām ca satyām na arthaḥ jhalgrahaṇena .
GS24pmbhasuu:25080: 9-10 tat etat ananyārtham jhalgrahaṇam kartavyam numpratiṣedhaḥ vā vaktavyaḥ . ubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:25081: na vaktavyam . upariṣṭāt jhalgrahaṇam kriyate tat purastāt apakrakṣyate . evam api
GS24pmbhasuu:25082: sūtraviparyāsaḥ kṛtaḥ bhavati . evam tarhi yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . ugidacām sarvanāmasthāne
GS24pmbhasuu:25083: adhātoḥ . yujeḥ asamāse . tataḥ napuṃsakasya . napuṃsakasya num bhavati . jhalaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25084: iti ubhayoḥ śeṣaḥ . tataḥ acaḥ . ajantasya ca napuṃsakaliṅgasya num bhavati . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:25085: api tāvat etat ugitkāryam parihṛtam idam aparam prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:25086: śātanitarā pātanitarā . ugitaḥ nadyāḥ ghādiṣu hrasvaḥ bhavati iti anyatarasyām hrasvatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:25087: prasajyeta nityam ca iṣyate . ugitaḥ yā nadī evam etat vijñāyate . ugitaḥ eṣā nadī
GS24pmbhasuu:25088: . ugitaḥ yā parā . atra ca eva doṣaḥ bhavati ugitaḥ hi eṣā parā nadī aiṣumatitarāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:25089: ca prāpnoti . ugitaḥ parā yā vihitā . ugitaḥ eṣā vihitā . ugitaḥ iti evam yā vihitā
GS24pmbhasuu:25090: . evam api bhogavatitarāyām doṣaḥ bhavati . bhogavatitarā bhogavatītarā . tasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:25091: ugitaḥ yā nadī ugitaḥ yā vihitā iti evam etat vijñāsyate . evam vijñāyamāne śātanitarāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:25092: doṣaḥ eva . siddham tu yuvoḥ anunāsikatvāt siddham etat . katham . yakāravakārayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25093: eva idam anunāsikayoḥ grahaṇam . santi hi yaṇaḥ sānunāsikāḥ niranunāsikāḥ ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:25096: vaktavyaḥ . upadeśāvasthāyām āyanādayaḥ bhavanti iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:25097: svarasiddhyartham . upadeśāvasthāyām āyanādiṣu iṣṭaḥ svaraḥ yathā syāt iti . śileyam
GS24pmbhasuu:25098: taittirīyaḥ . akriyamāṇe hi upadeśivadbhāve pratyayasañjñāsanniyogena ādyudāttatve
GS24pmbhasuu:25099: kṛte āntaryataḥ ādeśāḥ asvarakāṇām asvarakāḥ syuḥ . na vā kva cit citkaraṇāt upadeśivadvacanānarthakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:25100: na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam . kva cit citkaraṇāt . yat ayam kva cit ghādīn citaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25101: karoti agrāt yat ghacchau ca tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ upadeśāvasthāyām āyanādayaḥ bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:25102: iti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . citkaraṇe etat prayojanam citaḥ iti antodāttatvam yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:25103: syāt iti . yadi ca upadeśāvasthāyām āyanādayaḥ bhavanti tataḥ citkaraṇam arthavat
GS24pmbhasuu:25104: bhavati . tatra uṇādipratiṣedhaḥ . tatra uṇādīnām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . śaṅkhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25105: śāṇḍhaḥ iti . dhātoḥ vā īyaṅvacanāt . atha vā yat ayam ṛteḥ īyaṅ iti dhātoḥ īyaṅ
GS24pmbhasuu:25106: śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na dhātupratyayānām āyanādayaḥ bhavanti iti . yadi hi
GS24pmbhasuu:25107: syuḥ ṛteḥ chaṅ iti eva brūyāt . siddhe vidhiḥ ārabhyamāṇaḥ jñāpakārthaḥ bhavati na
GS24pmbhasuu:25108: ca ṛteḥ chaṅā sidhyati . chaṅi sati valādilakṣaṇaḥ iṭ prasajyeta . iṭi kṛte anāditvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:25109: ādeśaḥ na syāt . idam iha sampradhāryam . iṭ kriyatām ādeśaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:25110: . paratvāt iḍāgamaḥ . nityaḥ ādeśaḥ . kṛte api iṭi prāpnoti akṛte api . anityaḥ ādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25111: na hi kṛte iṭi prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . anāditvāt . antaraṅgaḥ tarhi ādeśaḥ . kā
GS24pmbhasuu:25112: antaraṅgatā . idānīm eva hi uktam āyanādiṣu upadeśivadvacanam svarasiddhyartham iti
GS24pmbhasuu:25113: . tat etat ṛteḥ īyaṅvacanam jñāpakam eva na dhātupratyayānām āyanādayaḥ bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:25114: iti . prātipadikavijñānāt ca pāṇineḥ siddham prātipadikavijñānāt ca bhagavataḥ pāṇineḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25117: 13.4-15.5 jhādeśe dhātvantapratiṣedhaḥ jhādeśe dhātvantasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25118: . ujjhitā ujjhitum iti . pratyayādhikārāt siddham . pratyayagrahaṇam prakṛtam anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:25119: . kva prakṛtam . āyaneyīnīyiyaḥ phaḍakhachaghām pratyayādīnām iti . pratyayādhikārāt
GS24pmbhasuu:25120: siddham iti cet anādeḥ ādeśavacanam . pratyayādhikārāt siddham iti cet anādeḥ ādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25121: vaktavyaḥ . api naḥ śvaḥ vijaniṣyamāṇāḥ patibhiḥ saha śayāntai . evam tarhi pratyayagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:25122: anuvartate ādigrahaṇam nivṛttam . katham punaḥ samāsanirdiṣṭānām ekadeśaḥ anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:25123: ekadeśaḥ vā nivartate . asamāsanirdeśāt siddham . asamāsanirdeśaḥ kariṣyate . pratyayasya
GS24pmbhasuu:25124: ādīnām iti . saḥ tarhi asamāsanirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . kriyate nyāse eva
GS24pmbhasuu:25125: . katham . avibhaktikaḥ nirdeśaḥ . pratyaya ādīnām iti . tatra śayāntai iti anakārāntatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:25126: aṅgasya ādbhāvapratiṣedhaḥ . tatra etasmin pratyayagrahaṇe anuvartamāne ādigrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:25127: nivṛtte śayāntai iti anakārāntatvāt aṅgasya ādbhāvaḥ prāpnoti tasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25128: . siddham anānantaryāt anakārāntena adbhāvanivṛttiḥ . siddham etat . katham . anānantaryāt
GS24pmbhasuu:25129: anakārāntena adbhāvaḥ na bhaviṣyati . katham kṛtvā coditam katham kṛtvā parihāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25130: . anakārāntagrahaṇam pratyayaviśeṣaṇam iti kṛtvā coditam jhakāraviśeṣaṇam iti kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:25131: parihāraḥ . yadi anakārāntagrahaṇam jhakāraviśeṣaṇam śerate atra na prāpnoti . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:25132: ruṭi sanniyogavacanāt siddham . tatra ruṭi sanniyogaḥ kariṣyate . kaḥ eṣaḥ yatnaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25133: codyate sanniyogaḥ nāma . cakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . ruṭ ca . kim ca . yat ca anyat prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:25134: . kim ca anyat prāpnoti . adbhāvaḥ . saḥ tarhi cakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:25135: yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . śīṅaḥ . śīṅaḥ uttarasya jhasya at bhavati . tataḥ ruṭ .
GS24pmbhasuu:25136: ruṭ ca bhavati śīṅaḥ iti . evam api paryāyaḥ prasajyeta . evam tarhi acśabdasya ruṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:25137: vakṣyāmi . tat acśabdagrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva
GS24pmbhasuu:25138: prakṛtam . at abhyastāt iti . tat vai prathamānirdiṣṭam ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭena ca iha arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25139: . śīṅaḥ iti eṣā pañcamī at iti prathamāyāḥ ṣaṣṭhī prakalpayiṣyati tasmāt iti uttarasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:25141: 15.7-17.6 ruṭi dṛśiguṇapratiṣedhaḥ . ruṭi dṛśiguṇaḥ prāpnoti . adṛśran asya ketavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25142: iti . tasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . parasmin iti kṅiti ca iti pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:25143: . evam api adṛśram asya ketavaḥ iti atra prāpnoti . evam tarhi pūrvāntaḥ kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:25144: . pūrvānte śīṅaḥ guṇavidhiḥ pūrvānte śīṅaḥ guṇaḥ vidheyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:25145: śerate . sūtram ca bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam ruṭi dṛśiguṇapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25146: iti . pūrvānte api eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . katham . ayam dṛśiguṇaḥ pratiṣedhaviṣaye ārabhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:25147: saḥ yathā eva kṅiti ca iti etam pratiṣedham bādhate evam anupadhāyāḥ api prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:25148: . tasmāt ubhābhyām dṛśeḥ akpratyayāntaram vaktavyam pitaram ca dṛśeyam mātaram ca
GS24pmbhasuu:25149: dṛśeyam iti evam artham . jhādeśāt āṭ leṭi jhādeśāt āṭ leṭi bhavati vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:25150: . jhādeśasya avakāśaḥ . lunate lunatām alunata . āṭaḥ avakāśaḥ . patāti didyut .
GS24pmbhasuu:25151: udadhim cyāvayāti . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . api naḥ śvaḥ vijaniṣyamāṇāḥ patibhiḥ saha
GS24pmbhasuu:25152: śayāntai . āṭ leṭi bhavati vipratiṣedhena . saḥ tarhi pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25153: . na vā nityatvāt āṭaḥ . na vā vaktavyaḥ . kim kāraṇam . nityatvāt āṭaḥ . nitaḥ āḍāgamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25154: . saḥ katham nityaḥ . yadi anakārāntagrahaṇam jhakāraviśeṣaṇam . atha hi pratyayaviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:25155: jhādeśaḥ api nityaḥ . antaraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt ca . antaraṅgaḥ khalu api āḍāgamaḥ . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:25156: antaraṅgaḥ . yadi prāk lādeśāt dhātvadhikāraḥ . atha hi lādeśe dhātvadhikāraḥ anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:25157: ubhayam samānāśrayam . yadi eva anakārāntagrahaṇam pratyayaviśeṣaṇam atha api lādeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:25158: dhātvadhikāraḥ anuvartate ubhayathā api pūrvavipratiṣedhena na arthaḥ . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:25159: bahulam chandasi iti evam atra śapaḥ luk na bhaviṣyati . tatra anataḥ iti pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:25161: 17.11-17 idam bahulam chandasi iti dviḥ kriyate . ekam śakyam akartum . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:25162: yadi tāvat pūrvam kriyate param na kariṣyate . ataḥ bhisaḥ ais iti atra bahulam chandasi
GS24pmbhasuu:25163: iti etat anuvartiṣyate . atha param kriyate pūrvam na kariṣyate . bahulam chandasi
GS24pmbhasuu:25164: iti atra ruṭ api anuvartiṣyate . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:25165: ubhe bahulagrahaṇe ekam chandograhaṇam śakyam akartum . katham . idam asti . vetteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25166: vibhāṣā . tataḥ chandasi . chandasi ca vibhāṣā . tataḥ ataḥ bhisaḥ ais bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:25169: 18.2-9 iha vṛkṣaiḥ plakṣaiḥ iti paratvāt ettvam prāpnoti . aisbhāvaḥ idānīm kva bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:25170: . kṛte ettve bhautapūrvyāt . kṛte ettve bhūtapūrvamakārāntam iti ais bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:25171: ais tu nityaḥ tathā sati . evam sati nityaḥ aisbhāvaḥ kṛte api ettve prāpnoti akṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:25172: api prāpnoti . nityatvāt aistve kṛte vihatanimittatvāt ettvam na bhaviṣyati . ettvam
GS24pmbhasuu:25173: bhisi paratvāt cet ataḥ ais kva bhaviṣyati . kṛte ettve bhautapūrvyāt ais tu nityaḥ tathā sati .
GS24pmbhasuu:25175: 18.11-13 imau dvau pratiṣedhau ucyete . ubhau śakyau avaktum . katham . evam vakṣyāmi . idamadasoḥ kāt iti . tanniyamārtham bhaviṣyati . idamadasoḥ kāt eva na anyataḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:25177: 18.15-20.3 kimartham inādeśaḥ ucyate na nādeśaḥ eva ucyeta . kā rūpasiddhiḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:25178: vṛkṣeṇa plakṣeṇa . ettve yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . katham . idam asti . bahuvacane
GS24pmbhasuu:25179: jhali et osi ca . tataḥ āṅi ca . āṅi ca parataḥ ataḥ ettvam bhavati . vṛkṣeṇa plakṣeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:25180: . tataḥ āpaḥ sambuddhau ca . āpaḥ āṅi ca osi ca iti . na evam śakyam . iha hi anena
GS24pmbhasuu:25181: iti idrūpalopaḥ prasajyeta . jhali lopaḥ kariṣyate . na śakyaḥ jhali lopaḥ kartum
GS24pmbhasuu:25182: . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt . ayā viṣṭā iti . evam tarhi anlopāpavādaḥ vijñāsyate . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:25183: . evam vakṣyāmi . an ne ca api ca iti . tat nakāragrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:25184: . kriyate nyāse eva . lupanirdiṣṭaḥ nakāraḥ . yadi evam na upadhāyāḥ iti dīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:25185: prāpnoti . sautraḥ nirdeśaḥ . atha vā napuṃsakanirdeśaḥ kariṣyate . atha kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:25186: āt ucyate na at eva ucyeta . kā rūpasiddhiḥ vṛkṣāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:25187: plakṣāt . savarṇadīrghatvena siddham . na sidhyati . ataḥ guṇe pararūpam iti pararūpatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:25188: prāpnoti . akāroccāraṇasāmarthyāt na bhaviṣyati . yadi prāpnuvan vidhiḥ uccāraṇasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:25189: bādhyate savarṇadīrghatvam api na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yam vidhim prati upadeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25190: anarthakaḥ saḥ vidhiḥ bādhyate yasya tu vidheḥ nimittam eva na asau bādhyate . pararūpam
GS24pmbhasuu:25191: prati akāroccāraṇam anarthakam savarṇadīrghatvasya punaḥ nimittam eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:25193: 20.5-10 kim idam caturthyekavacanasya grahaṇam āhosvit saptamyekavacanasya grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:25194: . kutaḥ sandehaḥ . samānaḥ nirdeśaḥ . caturthyekavacanasya grahaṇam . katham jñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:25195: . lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya eva iti . iha api tarhi caturthyekavacanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:25196: grahaṇam syāt . ṅeḥ ām nadyāmnībhyaḥ . evam tarhi vyākhyānataḥ viśeṣapratipattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25197: na hi sandehāt alakṣaṇam iti iha caturthyekavacanays agrahaṇam vyākhyāsyāmaḥ tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:25200: 21.2-15 aśaḥ ekādiṣṭāt smāyādīnām upasaṅkhyānam aśaḥ ekādiṣṭāt smāyādīnām upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:25201: kartavyam . atha u atra asmai . atha u atra asmāt . atha u atra asmin iti . ekādeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:25202: kṛte ataḥ iti smāyādayaḥ na prāpnuvanti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam ekādeśaḥ tāvat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:25203: na punaḥ smāyādayaḥ . na paratvāt smāyādibhiḥ bhavitavyam . na bhavitavyam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:25204: kāraṇam . nityatvāt ekādeśaḥ . nityaḥ ekādeśaḥ . kṛteṣu api smāyādiṣu prāpnoti akṛteṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:25205: api . nityatvāt ekādeśe kṛte ataḥ iti smāyādayaḥ na prāpnuvanti . kim ucyate aśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25206: iti na iha api kartavyam . atra asmai . atra asmāt . atra asmin iti . ekādeśe kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:25207: ataḥ iti smāyādayaḥ na prāpnuvanti . ānupūrvyā siddham etat . na atra akṛteṣu smāyādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:25208: halādiḥ vibhaktiḥ asti halādau cet rūpalopaḥ na ca akṛtae idrūpalope ekādeśaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:25209: . tat ānupūryā siddham . tat tarhi upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . na vā bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:25210: . na vā kartavyam . kim kāraṇam . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇaḥ ekādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25214: 21.18-21 kimartham śībhāvaḥ śibhāvaḥ ca ucyate na śibhāvaḥ eva ucyeta . kā rūpasiddhiḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:25215: te ye ke . ādguṇena siddham . na evam śakyam . iha hi trapuṇī jatunī dīrghaśravaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:25216: na syāt . evam tarhi śībhavaḥ eva ucyatām . na evam śakyam . iha hi kuṇḍāni vanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:25217: iti hrasvasya śravaṇam na syāt . tasmāt śībhāvaḥ śibhāvaḥ ca vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:25220: iti ucyamāne prathamādvivacanasya eva syāt . atha api auṭ iti ucyate evam api dvitīyādvivacanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:25221: eva syāt . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . ṅitkāryam tu prāpnoti . khaṭve
GS24pmbhasuu:25222: māle . yāṭ āpaḥ iti yāṭ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na evam vijñāyate ṅakāraḥ it asya
GS24pmbhasuu:25223: saḥ ayam ṅit ṅiti iti . katham tarhi . ṅaḥ eva it ṅit ṅiti iti . evam sati varṇagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:25224: idam bhavati varṇagrahaṇeṣu ca etat bhavati yasmin vidhiḥ tadādau algrahaṇe iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:25225: na doṣaḥ bhavati . atha vā varṇagrahaṇam idam bhavati na ca etat varṇagrahaṇeṣu bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:25226: ananubandhakagrahaṇe na sānubandhakasya iti . atha vā pūrvasūtranirdeśaḥ ayam pūrvasūtreṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:25227: ca ye anubandhāḥ na taiḥ iha itkāryāṇi kriyante . aukāraḥ ayam śīvidhau ṅit gṛhītaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25228: ṅit ca asmākam na asti kaḥ ayam prakāraḥ . sāmānyārthaḥ tasya ca āsañjane asmin ṅitkāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:25229: te śyām prasaktam saḥ doṣaḥ . ṅittve vidyāt varṇanirdeśamātram varṇe yat syāt tat
GS24pmbhasuu:25230: ca vidyāt tadādau . varṇaḥ ca ayam tena ṅittve api adoṣaḥ nirdeśaḥ ayam pūrvasūtreṇa vā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:25232: 23.8-25.13 auśaghau . auśaghau iti vaktavyam . kim idam aghau iti . anuttarapade
GS24pmbhasuu:25233: iti . kim prayojanam . iha mā bhūt . aṣṭaputraḥ aṣṭabhāryaḥ iti . astu luk tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:25234: . astu atra auśtvam luk bhaviṣyati . ṣaḍbhyaḥ api evam prasajyate . iha api tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:25235: prāpnoti . aṣṭau tiṣṭhanti . aṣṭau paśya iti . apavādaḥ . apavādatvāt atra auśtvam
GS24pmbhasuu:25236: lukam bādhiṣyate . iha api tarhi bādheta . aṣṭaputraḥ aṣṭabhāryaḥ . yasya viṣaye
GS24pmbhasuu:25237: . yasya lukaḥ viṣaye auśtvam tasya apavādaḥ . yaḥ vā tasmāt anantaraḥ . atha vā anantarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:25238: lukaḥ bādhakam bhaviṣyati . kutaḥ etat . anantarasya vidhiḥ vā bhavati pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25239: vā iti . atha iha kasmāt na bhavati auśtvam . aṣṭa tiṣṭhanti . aṣṭa paśya iti . ātvam
GS24pmbhasuu:25240: yatra tu tatra auśtvam . yatra eva ātvam tatra eva auśtvena bhavitavyam . kutaḥ etat
GS24pmbhasuu:25241: . tathā hi asya grahaḥ kṛtaḥ . tathā hi asya ātvabhūtasya grahaṇam kriyate . aṣṭābhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25242: iti . nanu ca nityam ātvam . etat eva jñāpayati ācāryaḥ vibhāṣātvam iti yat ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:25243: ātvabhūtasya grahaṇam karoti . aṣṭābhyaḥ iti . itarathā hi aṣṭanaḥ iti eva brūyāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:25245: 26.2-28.6 svamoḥ luk tyadādibhyaḥ ca svamoḥ luk tyadādibhyaḥ ca iti vaktavyam . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:25246: api yathā syāt . tat brāhmaṇakulam iti . kṛte hi atve na luk bhavet . atve kṛte luk
GS24pmbhasuu:25248: atvam kriyatām luk iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt atvam . nityaḥ luk . kṛte api
GS24pmbhasuu:25249: atve prāpnoti akṛte api . anityaḥ luk na hi kṛte atve prāpnoti . ataḥ am iti ambhāvena
GS24pmbhasuu:25250: bhavitavyam . tasmāt tyadādibhyaḥ ca iti vaktavyam . idam vicāryate :
GS24pmbhasuu:25251: śiśīlugnumvidhiṣu napuṃsakagrahaṇam śabdagrahaṇam vā syāt arthagrahaṇam vā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:25252: kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . śiśīlugnumvidhiṣu napuṃsakagrahaṇam śabdagrahaṇam cet anyapadārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:25253: pratiṣedhaḥ . śiśīlugnumvidhiṣu napuṃsakagrahaṇam śabdagrahaṇam cet anyapadārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:25254: pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . bahutrapuḥ bahutrapū bahutrapavaḥ iti . astu tarhi arthagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:25255: . yadi arthagrahaṇam priyasakthnā brāhmaṇena iti anaṅ na prāpnoti . astu tarhi śabdagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:25256: eva . nanu ca uktam śiśīlugnumbidhiṣu napuṃsakagrahaṇam cet anyapadārthe pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25257: iti . siddham tu prakṛtārthaviśeṣaṇatvāt . siddham etat . katham . prakṛtasya arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25258: viśeṣyate . kim ca prakṛtam . aṅgam . aṅgasya śiśīlugnumaḥ bhavanti napuṃsake vartamānasya
GS24pmbhasuu:25259: . katham priyasakthnā brāhmaṇena . asthyādiṣu śabdagrahaṇam . asthyādiṣu napuṃsakagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:25260: śabdagrahaṇam draṣṭavyam . yuktam punaḥ idam vicārayitum . nanu anena asandigdhena
GS24pmbhasuu:25261: arthagrahaṇena bhavitavyam na hi napuṃsakam nāma śabdaḥ asti . kim tarhi ucyate asthyādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:25262: śabdagrahaṇam iti . atra api arthagrahaṇam eva . atra etāvān sandehaḥ kva prakṛtasya
GS24pmbhasuu:25263: arthaḥ viśeṣyate kva gṛhyamāṇasya iti . śiśīlugnumvidhiṣu prakṛtasya arthaḥ viśeṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:25266: 28.8-29.5 adbhāve pūrvasavarṇapratiṣedhaḥ . adbhāve pūrvasavarṇasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . katarat tiṣṭhati ,
GS24pmbhasuu:25267: katarat paśya . siddham anunāsikopadhatvāt . siddham etat . katham . anunāsikopadhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25268: acśabdaḥ kariṣyate . dukkaraṇāt vā . atha vā dugḍatarādīnām iti vakṣyati . ḍitkaraṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:25269: vā . atha vā ḍid acchabdaḥ kariṣyate . saḥ tarhi ḍakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25270: . kriyate nyāse eva . dviḍakārakaḥ nirdeśaḥ . adḍḍatarādibhyaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:25272: 29.7-30.8 itarāt chandasi pratiṣedhaḥ ekatarāt sarvatra . itarāt chandasi pratiṣedhaḥ ekatarāt sarvatra iti vaktavyam . ekataram tiṣṭhati ,
GS24pmbhasuu:25273: ekataram paśya . napuṃsakādeśebhyaḥ yuṣmadasmadoḥ vibhaktyādeśāḥ vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:25274: napuṃsakādeśebhyaḥ yuṣmadasmadoḥ vibhaktyādeśāḥ bhavanti vipratiṣedhena . napuṃsakādeśānām avakāśaḥ . trapu ,
GS24pmbhasuu:25276: trapūṇi . yuṣmadasmadoḥ vibhaktyādeśānām avakāśaḥ . tvam brāhmaṇaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:25280: yūyām brāhmaṇāḥ vayam brāhmaṇāḥ . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . tvam brāhmaṇakulam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:25285: vayam brāhmaṇakulāni . yuṣmadasmadoḥ vibhaktyādeśāḥ bhavanti vipratiṣedhena . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:25286: idānīm yuṣmadasmadoḥ vibhaktyādeśeṣu kṛteṣu punaḥprasaṅgāt śiśīlugnumvidhayaḥ kasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:25287: na bhavanti . sakṛdgatau vipratiṣedhena yat bādhitam tat bādhitam eva iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:25289: 30.10-31.14 kimarthaḥ śakāraḥ . sarvādeśārthaḥ . śit sarvasya iti sarvādeśaḥ yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:25290: syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . akriyamāṇe api śakāre alaḥ antyasya vidhayaḥ bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:25291: iti antyasya akāre kṛte trayāṇām akārāṇām ataḥ guṇe pararūpatve siddham rūpam syāt : tava svam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:25292: mama svam . yadi etat labhyeta kṛtam syāt . tat tu na labhyam . kim kāraṇam . atra
GS24pmbhasuu:25293: hi tasmāt iti uttarasya ādeḥ parasya iti akārasya prasajyeta . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati
GS24pmbhasuu:25294: . ṅasaḥ ādeśe śitkaraṇānarthakyam akārasya akāravacanānarthakyāt . ṅasaḥ ādeśe śitkaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:25295: anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . akārasya akāravacanānarthakyāt . akārasya akāravacane
GS24pmbhasuu:25296: prayojanam na asti iti kṛtvā antareṇa śakāram sarvādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . arthavattvādeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:25297: lopārtham . arthavattvakārasya akāravacanam . kaḥ arthaḥ . ādeśe lopārtham . yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25298: saḥ śeṣe lopaḥ ādeśe saḥ vijñāyate . nanu ca ādeśaḥ yā vibhaktiḥ iti evam etat vijñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:25299: . ādeśaḥ eṣā vibhaktiḥ . katham . sarve sarvapadādeśā dākṣīputrasya pāṇineḥ ekadeśavikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:25300: hi nityatvam na upapadyate . tasmāt śitkaraṇam . tasmāt śakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25301: . kriyate nyāse eva . katham . praśliṣṭanirdeśaḥ ayam . a , a , a ,
GS24pmbhasuu:25302: iti . saḥ anekāl śit sarvasya iti sarvasya bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:25304: 32.2-33.8 prathamayoḥ iti ucyate kayoḥ idam prathamayoḥ grahaṇam kim vibhaktyoḥ āhosvit
GS24pmbhasuu:25305: pratyayayoḥ . vibhaktyoḥ iti āha . katham jñāyate . anyatra api hi prathamayoḥ grahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:25306: vibhaktyoḥ grahaṇam vijñāyate na pratyayayoḥ . kva anyatra . prathamayoḥ pūrvasavarṇaḥ
