GS24pmbhasuu:25307: iti . asti kāraṇam yena tatra vibhaktyoḥ grahaṇam vijñāyate . kim kāraṇam . aci iti
GS24pmbhasuu:25308: tatra vartate na ca ajādī prathamau staḥ . nanu ca evam vijñāyate ajādī yau prathamau
GS24pmbhasuu:25309: ajādīnām vā yau prathamau iti . yat tarhi tasmāt śasaḥ naḥ puṃsi iti anukrāntam pūrvasavarṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:25310: pratinirdiśati tajjñāpayati ācāryaḥ vibhaktyoḥ grahaṇam iti . iha api ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25311: jñāpayati vibhaktyoḥ grahaṇam iti yat ayam śasaḥ na iti pratiṣedham śāsti . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25312: pratiṣedhaḥ . natvam etat vidhīyate . siddham atra natvam tasmāt śasaḥ naḥ puṃsi
GS24pmbhasuu:25313: iti . yatra tena na sidhyati tadartham . kva ca tena na sidhyati . striyām napuṃsake
GS24pmbhasuu:25317: asmān brāhmaṇakulāni paśya iti . yat tarhi yuṣmadasmadoḥ anādeśe dvitīyāyām ca iti āha tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ vibhaktyoḥ grahaṇam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:25319: 33.10-34.6 kim ayam bhyamśabdaḥ āhosvit abhyamśabdaḥ . kutaḥ sandehaḥ . samānaḥ nirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25320: . kim ca ataḥ . yadi tāvat bhyamśabdaḥ śeṣe lopaḥ ca antyasya etvam prāpnoti . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:25321: abhyamśabdaḥ śeṣe lopaḥ ca ṭilopaḥ udāttnivṛttisvaraḥ prāpnoti . yathā icchasi tathā
GS24pmbhasuu:25322: astu . astu tāvat abhyamśabdaḥ śeṣe lopaḥ ca antyasya . nanu ca uktam ettvam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:25323: iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . aṅgavṛtte punaḥ vṛttau avidhiḥ niṣṭhitasya iti na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:25324: . atha vā punaḥ astu abhamśabdaḥ śeṣe lopaḥ ca ṭilopaḥ . nanu ca uktam udāttanivṛttisvaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25325: prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ uktam etat ādau siddham iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:25327: 34.8-38.4 kimartham āmaḥ sasakārasya grahaṇam kriyate na āmaḥ ākam iti eva ucyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:25328: . kena idānīm sasakārasya bhaviṣyati . āmaḥ suṭ ayam bhaktaḥ āmgrahaṇena grāhiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:25329: . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . sāmgrahaṇam yathāgṛhītasya ādeśavacanāt . sāmgrahaṇam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:25330: . nirdiśyamānasya ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti evam sasakārasya na prāpnoti . iṣyate ca syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:25331: iti tat ca antareṇa yatnam na sidhyati iti sāmaḥ ākam . evamartham idam ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:25332: na vā dviparyantānām akāravacanāt āmi sakārābhāvaḥ . na vā etat prayojanam asti .
GS24pmbhasuu:25333: kim kāraṇam . dviparyantānām akāravacanāt . dviparyantānām hi tyadādīnam atvam ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:25334: tena āmi sakāraḥ na bhaviṣyati . suṭpratiṣedhaḥ tu ādeśe lopavijñānāt . suṭpratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25335: tu vaktavyaḥ . kim kāraṇam . ādeśe lopavijñānāt . yaḥ saḥ śeṣe lopaḥ ādeśe saḥ vijñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:25336: . na vā ṭilopavacanāt ādeśe ṭāppratiṣedhārtham . na vā suṭpratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:25337: kim kāraṇam . ṭilopavacanāt . ādeśe yaḥ saḥ śeṣe lopaḥ ṭilopaḥ saḥ vaktavyaḥ . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:25338: prayojanam . ṭāppratiṣedhārtham . ṭāp mā bhūt iti . saḥ tarhi ṭilopaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:25339: na vā liṅgābhāvāt ṭilopavacanānarthakyam . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam . liṅgābhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:25340: . aliṅge yuṣmadasmadī . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate
GS24pmbhasuu:25341: . na hi asti viśeṣaḥ yuṣmadasmadoḥ striyām puṃsi napuṃsake vā . asti kāraṇam yena
GS24pmbhasuu:25342: etat evam bhavati . kim kāraṇam . yaḥ asau viśeṣavācī śabdaḥ tadasānnidhyāt . aṅga
GS24pmbhasuu:25343: hi bhavān tam uccārayatu gaṃsyate saḥ viśeṣaḥ . nanu ca na etena evam bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:25344: . na hi śabdanimittakena nāma arthena bhavitavyam . kim tarhi artha nimittakena nāma
GS24pmbhasuu:25345: śabdena bhavitavyam . tat etat evam dṛśyatām :
GS24pmbhasuu:25346: artharūpam eva etat evañjātīyakam yena atra viśeṣaḥ na gamyate iti . avaśyam ca etat
GS24pmbhasuu:25347: evam vijñeyam . yaḥ hi manyate yaḥ asau viśeṣavācī śabdaḥ tadasānnidhyāt atra viśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25348: na gamyate iti iha api tasya viśeṣaḥ na gamyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:25349: dṛṣat samit iti . tasmāt suṭpratiṣedhaḥ tasmāt suṭpratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ sasakāragrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:25350: vā kartavyam . atha kriyamāṇe api sasakāragrahaṇe kasmāt eva atra suṭ na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:25354: tasthau iti trīṇi kāryāṇi yugapat prāpnuvanti :
GS24pmbhasuu:25355: dvirvacanam ekādeśaḥ autvam iti . tat yadi sarvataḥ autvam labhyeta kṛtam syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:25356: atha api dvirvacanam labhyeta evam api kṛtam syāt . tat tu na labhyam . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:25357: . atra hi paratvāt ekādeśaḥ dvirvacanam bādhate . paratvāt autvam . nityaḥ ekādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25358: autvam bādheta . kam punaḥ bhavān autvasya avakāśam matvā āha nityaḥ ekādeśaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:25359: . anavakāśam autvam ekādeśam bādhiṣyate . autve kṛte dvirvacanam ekādeśaḥ iti yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:25360: api paratvāt ekādeśaḥ sthānivadbhāvāt dvirvacanam bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:25362: 40.2-41.1 videḥ vasoḥ kittvam . videḥ vasoḥ kittvam vaktavyam . kim prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:25363: vasugrahaṇeṣu liḍādeśasya api grahaṇam yathā syāt . kim ca kāraṇam na syāt . ananubandhakagrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:25364: hi sānubandhakasya grahaṇam na iti evam liḍādeśasya na prāpnoti . sānubandhakaḥ hi
GS24pmbhasuu:25365: saḥ kriyate . kim punaḥ kāraṇam saḥ sānubandhakaḥ kriyate . ayam ṝkārāntānām liṭi
GS24pmbhasuu:25366: guṅaḥ pratiṣedhaviṣayaḥ ārabhyate saḥ punaḥ kitkaraṇāt bādhyate . ātistīrvān ,
GS24pmbhasuu:25367: nipupūrvān iti . saḥ tarhi asya evamarthaḥ anubandhaḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . kriyate nyāse eva . dvisakārakaḥ nirdeśaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:25370: 41-47 lyabādeśe upadeśivadvacanam . lyabādeśe upadeśivadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . upadeśāvasthāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:25371: lyap bhavati iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . anādiṣṭārtham . akṛteṣu ādeśeṣu lyap
GS24pmbhasuu:25372: yathā syāt . ke punaḥ ādeśāḥ upadeśivadvacanam prayojayanti . hitvadattvāttvetvettvadīrghatvaśūḍitaḥ . hitvam . hitvā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:25381: pradīvya . kim punaḥ kāraṇam ādeśāḥ tāvat bhavanti na punaḥ lyap . na paratvāt lyapā
GS24pmbhasuu:25382: bhavitavyam . santi ca eva atra ke cit pare ādeśāḥ api ca bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:25383: bahiraṅgaḥ lyap . antaraṅgāḥ ādeśāḥ . asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge . saḥ tarhi upadeśivadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25384: vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati antaraṅgān api vidhīn bahiraṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25385: lyap bādhate iti yat ayam adaḥ jagdhiḥ lyapti kiti iti ti kiti iti eva siddhe lyabgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:25386: karoti . snātvākālakādiṣu ca pratiṣedhaḥ snātvākālakādiṣu ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . snātvākālakaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:25388: bhuktvāsuhitakaḥ iti . tadantanirdeśāt siddham . tadantanirdeśāt siddham etat . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:25389: . ktvāntasya lyapā bhavitavyam na ca etat ktvāntam . samāsanipātanāt vā . atha vā
GS24pmbhasuu:25390: avaśyam atra samāsārtham nipātanam kartavyam tena eva yatnena lyap api na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:25391: . anañaḥ vā parasya . atha vā anañaḥ parasya lyapā bhavitavyam na ca atra anañam
GS24pmbhasuu:25392: paśyāmaḥ . nanu ca dhātuḥ eva anañ . na dhātoḥ parasya bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:25393: . nañivayuktam anyasadṛśādhikaraṇe tathā hi arthagatiḥ . nañyuktam iva yuktam vā
GS24pmbhasuu:25394: anyasmin tatsadṛśe kāryam vijñāsyate . kutaḥ etat . tathā hi arthaḥ gamyate . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:25395: yathā . abrāhmaṇam ānaya iti ukte grāhmaṇasadṛśam puruṣam ānayati na asau loṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:25396: ānīya kṛtī bhavati . evam iha api anañ iti nañpratiṣedhāt anyasmāt anañau nañsadṛśāt
GS24pmbhasuu:25397: kāryam vijñāsyate . kim ca anyat anañ nañsadṛśam . padam iti āha . atha vā pratyayagrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:25398: yasmāt saḥ tadādeḥ grahaṇam bhavati iti evam dhātuḥ api ktvāgrahaṇena grāhiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:25399: . nanu ca iyam api paribhāṣā asti :
GS24pmbhasuu:25400: kṛdgrahaṇe gatikārakapūrvasya api grahaṇam bhavati iti sā api iha upatiṣṭhate . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . iha na syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:25401: prakṛtya prahṛtya . kva tarhi syāt . paramakṛtvā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:25402: uttamakṛtvā . na vai atra iṣyate . aniṣṭam ca prāpnoti iṣṭam ca na sidhyati . gatikārakapūrvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:25403: eva iṣyate . kutaḥ na khalu etat dvayoḥ paribhāṣayoḥ sāvakāśayoḥ samavasthitayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25404: pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ tadādeḥ grahaṇam bhavati kṛdgrahaṇe gatikārakapūrvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:25405: iti ca iyam iha paribhāṣā bhavati pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ tadādeḥ grahaṇam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:25406: iti iyam na bhavati kṛdgrahaṇe gatikārakapūrvasya api iti . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:25407: iyam iha paribhāṣā bhavati pratyayagrahaṇe iti iyam na bhavati kṛdgrahaṇe iti yat
GS24pmbhasuu:25408: ayam anañ iti pratiṣedham śāsti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . ayam hi nañ na gatiḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:25409: ca kārakam tatra kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ yat nañpūrvasya syāt . paśyati tu ācāryaḥ iyam iha
GS24pmbhasuu:25410: paribhāṣā bhavati pratyayagrahaṇe iti iyam na bhavati kṛdgrahaṇe iti tataḥ anañ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:25411: pratiṣedham śāsti . kim nañaḥ pratiṣedhena na gatiḥ na ca kārakam yāvatā nañi pūrve
GS24pmbhasuu:25412: tu lyabbhāvaḥ na bhaviṣyati . pratiṣedhāt tu jānīmaḥ tatpūrvam na iha gṛhyate pratyaygrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:25415: 47-49 supām ca supaḥ bhavanti iti vaktavyam . yuktā mātā āsīt bhuri dakṣiṇāyāḥ dakṣiṇāyām iti prāpte . tiṅām ca tiṅaḥ bhavanti iti vaktavyam . caṣālam ye ,
GS24pmbhasuu:25416: aśvayūpāya takṣati takṣanti iti prāpte . luki kim udāharaṇam . ārdre carman ,
GS24pmbhasuu:25417: lohite carman . na etat asti . pūrvasavarṇena api etat siddham . idam tarhi . yat
GS24pmbhasuu:25418: sthavīyasaḥ āvasan uta sapta sākam . nanu ca etat api pūrvasavarṇena eva siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:25419: . na sidhyati . yadi atra pūrvasavarṇaḥ syāt tyadādyatvam prasajyeta . idam ca api
GS24pmbhasuu:25421: lohite carman . nanu ca uktam pūrvasavarṇena api etat siddham iti . na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:25422: yadi atra pūrvasavarṇaḥ syāt āntaryataḥ dakāraḥ prasajyeta . astu . saṃyogāntalopena
GS24pmbhasuu:25423: siddham . iyāḍiyājīkārāṇām upasaṅkhyānam . iyāḍiyājīkārāṇām upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:25425: sugātuyā . ḍiyāc . īkāra . dṛtim na śuṣkam sarasī śayānam . āṅayājayārām ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . āṅ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:25426: pra bāhavā . ayāc . svapnayā sacase janam . ayāc . ayār . saḥ naḥ sindhum iva nāvayā .
GS24pmbhasuu:25428: 49.4-50.3 kimarthaḥ śakāraḥ . śit sarvasya iti sarvādeśaḥ yathā syāt . akriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:25429: hi śakāre alaḥ antyasya vidhayaḥ bhavanti iti antyasya prasajyeta . ataḥ uttaram
GS24pmbhasuu:25430: paṭhati . amaḥ maś na makārasya . makārasya makāravacane prayojanam na asti iti kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:25431: tatra antareṇa śakāram sarvādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . vacanāt anyabādhanam . asti anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:25432: makārasya makāravacane prayojanam . ye anye makārādeśāḥ prāpnuvanti tadbādhanārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:25433: . tat yathā . maḥ rāji samaḥ kvau iti makārasya makāravacanasāmarthyāt anusvārādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25434: bādhyante . evam tarhi dvimakārakaḥ nirdeśaḥ kariṣyate . dvimakāraḥ īṭ apṛkte . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:25435: dvimakārakaḥ apṛktāśrayaḥ īṭ na prāpnoti . vadhīm vṛtram marutaḥ indriyeṇa . yakārādau
GS24pmbhasuu:25436: na duṣyati . kim yakāraḥ na śrūyate . luptanirdiṣṭaḥ yakāraḥ . amaḥ maś na makārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:25437: vacanāt anyabādhanam dvimakāraḥ īṭ apṛkte yakārādau na duṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:25441: āt jaseḥ asuk iti asuki kṛte jasaḥ grahaṇena grahaṇāt śībhāvaḥ prāpnoti . evam tarhi jasi pūrvāntaḥ kariṣyate . yadi pūrvāntaḥ kriyate kā rūpasiddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25442: brāhmaṇāsaḥ pitaraḥ somyāsaḥ . savarṇadīghatvena siddham . na sidhyati . ataḥ guṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:25443: iti pararūpatvam prāpnoti . akāroccāraṇasāmarthyāt na bhaviṣyati . yadi tarhi prāpnuvan
GS24pmbhasuu:25444: vidhiḥ uccāraṇasāmarthyāt bādhyate savarṇadīrghatvam api na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25445: . yam vidhim prati upadeśaḥ anarthakaḥ saḥ vidhiḥ bādhyate yasya tu vidheḥ nimittam
GS24pmbhasuu:25446: na asau bādhyate . pararūpam ca prati akāroccāraṇam anarthakam savarṇadīrghatvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:25447: punaḥ nimittam eva . atha vā asuṭ kariṣyate . evam api ye pūrvāsaḥ ye uparāsaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:25448: asuṭi kṛte jasaḥ grahaṇena grahaṇāt śībhāvaḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . nirdiśyamānasya
GS24pmbhasuu:25449: ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti evam asya na bhaviṣyati . yaḥ tarhi nirdiśyate tasya kasmāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:25450: bhavati . asuṭā vyavahitatvāt . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva
GS24pmbhasuu:25451: astu . nanu ca uktam ye pūrvāsaḥ ye uparāsaḥ asuki kṛte jasaḥ grahaṇena grahaṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:25452: śībhāvaḥ prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . idam iha sampradhāryam . śībhāvaḥ kriyatām
GS24pmbhasuu:25453: asuk iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt asuk . atha idānīm asuki kṛte punaḥ prasaṅgavijñānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:25454: śībhāvaḥ kasmāt na bhavati . sakṛdgatau vipratiṣedhe yat bādhitam tat bādhitam eva iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:25456: 51.4-12 aśvavṛṣayoḥ maithunecchāyām . aśvavṛṣayoḥ maithunecchāyām iti vaktavyam . aśvasyati vaḍavā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:25457: vṛṣasyati gauḥ . maithunecchāyām iti kimartham . aśvīyati ,
GS24pmbhasuu:25458: vṛṣīyati . kṣīralavaṇayoḥ lālasāyām . kṣīrlavaṇayoḥ lālasāyām iti vaktavyam . kṣīrasyati māṇavakaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:25460: sarvaprātipadikebhyaḥ lālasāyām iti vaktavyam dadhyasyati madhvasyati iti evamartham . aparaḥ āha:
GS24pmbhasuu:25465: kāspratyayāt ām amantre liṭi . ṅasosām . kimettiṅavyayaghāt āmu adravyaprakarṣe .
GS24pmbhasuu:25466: ṅeḥ ām nadyāmnībhyaḥ iti . kasya idam grahaṇam . ṣaṣṭhībahuvacanasya grahaṇam . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:25467: asya kasmāt na bhavati kāspratyayāt ām amantre liṭi iti . ananubandhakagrahaṇe hi
GS24pmbhasuu:25468: na sānubandhakasya iti . saḥ tarhi asya evamarthaḥ anubandhaḥ kartavyaḥ iha asya
GS24pmbhasuu:25469: grahaṇam mā bhūt iti . nanu ca avaśyam makārasya itsañjñāparitrāṇārthaḥ anubandhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25470: kartavyaḥ . na arthaḥ itsañjñāparitrāṇārthena . itkāryābhāvāt atra itsañjñā na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:25471: . idam asti itkāryam mit acaḥ antyāt paraḥ iti acām antyāt paraḥ yathā syāt . pratyayāntāt
GS24pmbhasuu:25472: ayam vidhīyate tatra na asti viśeṣaḥ mit acaḥ antyāt paraḥ iti vā paratve pratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25473: paraḥ iti vā . yaḥ tarhi na pratyayāntāt ijādeśaḥ ca gurumataḥ anṛcchaḥ iti . atra
GS24pmbhasuu:25474: api āskāsoḥ āmvacanam jñāpakam na ayam acām antyāt paraḥ bhavati iti . katham kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:25475: jñāpakam . na hi asti viśeṣaḥ āmi acām antyāt pare sati asati vā . ayam asti viśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25476: . asati āmi dvirvacanena bhavitavyam sati na bhavitavyam . sati api bhavitavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:25477: katham . āmaḥ tanmadhyapatitatvāt dhātugrahaṇena grahaṇāt . tat etat kāsāsoḥ āmvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:25478: jñāpakam eva na ayam acām antyāt paraḥ bhavati iti . atha api katham cit kāryam syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:25479: evam api na doṣaḥ . kriyate nyāse eva . āmaḥ amantre iti . yadi evam āmā antre iti
GS24pmbhasuu:25480: prāpnoti . śakandhunyāyena nirdeśaḥ . atha vā astu asya grahaṇam kaḥ doṣaḥ . iha kārayāñcakāra ,
GS24pmbhasuu:25484: hrasvandyāpaḥ nuṭ iti nuṭ prasajyeta . lopāyādeśayoḥ kṛtayoḥ na bhaviṣyati . idam
GS24pmbhasuu:25485: iha sampradhāryam . lopāyādeśau kriyetām nuṭ iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt nuṭ
GS24pmbhasuu:25486: . nityau lopāyādeśau . kṛte api nuṭi prāpnutaḥ akṛte api . tatra nityatvāt lopāyādeśayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25487: kṛtayoḥ vihatanimittatvāt nuṭ na bhaviṣyati . atha asya kasmāt na bhavati kimettiṅavyayaghāt
GS24pmbhasuu:25488: āmu adravyaprakarṣe iti . ananubandhakagrahaṇe hi na sānubandhakasya iti . saḥ tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:25489: evamarthaḥ anubandhaḥ kartavyaḥ . nanu ca avaśyam ugitkāryārthaḥ anubandhaḥ kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25490: . na arthaḥ ugitkāryārthena anubandhena . liṅgavibhaktiprakaraṇe sarvam ugitkāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:25491: na ca āmaḥ liṅgavibhaktī staḥ . avyayam eṣaḥ . makārasya tarhi itsañjñāparitrāṇārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25492: anubandhaḥ kartavyaḥ . itkāryābhāvāt atra itsañjñā na bhaviṣyati . idam asti itkāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:25493: mit acaḥ antyāt paraḥ iti acām antyāt paraḥ yathā syāt . na etat asti . ghāntāt ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:25494: vidhīyate tatra na asti viśeṣaḥ mit acaḥ antyāt paraḥ iti vā paratve pratyayaḥ paraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25495: iti vā paratve . atha api katham cit itkāryam syāt evam api na doṣaḥ . kriyate nyāse
GS24pmbhasuu:25496: eva . atha vā astu asya grahaṇam kaḥ doṣaḥ . iha pacatitarām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:25498: hrasvanadyāpaḥ nuṭ iti nuṭ prasajyeta . lope kṛte na bhaviṣyati . idam iha sampradhāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:25499: . lopaḥ kriyatām nuṭ iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt nuṭ . evam tarhi hrasvanadyāpaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25500: nuṭ iti atra yasya iti lopaḥ anuvartiṣyate . atha asya kasmāt na bhavati ṅeḥ ām nadyāmnībhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25506: yasyām iti hrasvanadyāpaḥ nuṭ iti nuṭ prasajyeta . āḍyāṭsyāṭaḥ atra bādhakāḥ bhaviṣyanti
GS24pmbhasuu:25507: . idam iha sampradhāryam . āḍyāṭsyāṭaḥ kriyantām nuṭ iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:25508: āḍyāṭsyāṭaḥ . atha idānīm āḍyāṭsyāṭsu kṛteṣu punaḥprasaṅgāt nuṭ kasmāt na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:25509: . sakṛdgatau vipratiṣedhe yat bādhitam tat bādhitam eva iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:25511: 55.2-5 ayam yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum . katham śrīṇām udāraḥ dharuṇaḥ rayīṇām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:25512: api tatra sūtagrāmaṇīnām . iha tāvat śrīṇām udāraḥ dharuṇaḥ rayīṇām vibhāṣā āmi nadīsañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:25513: sā chandasi vyavasthitavibhāṣā bhaviṣyati . api tatra sūtagrāmaṇīnām iti sūtāḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:25514: grāmaṇyaḥ ca sūtagrāmaṇi tatra hrasvanadyāpaḥ nuṭ iti eva siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:25517: acchaitsīt . numvidhau upadeśivadvacanam pratyayavidhyartham . numvidhau upadeśivadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25518: vaktavyaḥ . upadeśāvasthāyām num bhavati iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . pratyayavidhyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:25519: . upadeśāvasthāyām numi kṛte iṣṭaḥ pratyayavidhiḥ yathā syāt . kuṇḍā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:25520: huṇḍā iti . itarathā hi anakāre pratyayaḥ . akriyamāṇe hi upadeśivadbhāve anakāre
GS24pmbhasuu:25521: yaḥ pratyayaḥ prāpnoti saḥ tāvat syāt tasmin avasthite num . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:25522: ayatheṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ . tatra ayatheṣṭam prasajyeta . aniṣṭe pratyaye avasthite num
GS24pmbhasuu:25523: . aniṣṭasya pratyayasya śravaṇam prasajyeta . dhātugrahaṇasāmarthyāt vā tadupadeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:25524: numvidhānam dhātugrahaṇasāmarthyāt vā tadupadeśe dhātūpadeśe num bhaviṣyati . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:25525: ca anyat dhātugrahaṇasya prayojanam uktam . kim . abhaitsīt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:25526: acchaitsīt iti . na etat asti prayojanam . prayojanam nāma tat vaktavyam yat niyogataḥ syāt . yat ca atra ikāreṇa kriyate akāreṇa api tat śakyam kartum .
GS24pmbhasuu:25528: 57.2-58.6 śe tṛmpādīnām . śe tṛmpādīnām upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . tṛmpati ,
GS24pmbhasuu:25529: tṛmphati . kimartham idam . na numanuṣaktāḥ eva ete paṭhyante . luptanakāratvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:25530: lupyate atra nakāraḥ aniditām halaḥ upadhāyāḥ kṅiti iti . yadi punaḥ ime iditaḥ paṭhyeran
GS24pmbhasuu:25531: . na evam śakyam . iha hi lopaḥ na syāt . tṛpitaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:25532: dṛpitaḥ iti . yadi punaḥ ime mucādiṣu paṭhyeran . na doṣaḥ syāt . atha vā na evam vijñāyate iditaḥ num dhātoḥ iti . katham tarhi . iditaḥ num . tataḥ dhātoḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:25534: 58.8-59.2 imau dvau pratiṣedhau ucyete . ubhau śakyau avaktum . katham . evam vakṣyāmi
GS24pmbhasuu:25535: . iṭi liṭi radheḥ num bhavati iti . tanniyamārtham bhaviṣyati . liṭi eva iḍādau na
GS24pmbhasuu:25539: ālabhyate . astu . aniditām halaḥ upadhāyāḥ kṅiti iti lopaḥ bhaviṣyati . iha tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:25540: ālambhyā gauḥ poḥ adupadhāt iti yati avasthite num . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . ālambhyā*
GS24pmbhasuu:25541: eṣaḥ svaraḥ prasajyeta . ālambhyā* iti ca iṣyate . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . uktam etat dhātugrahaṇasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:25544: 59.10-61.2 atha kevalagrahaṇam kimartham na na sudurbhyām iti eva ucyeta . suduroḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25545: kevalagrahaṇam anyopasargapratiṣedhārtham . suduroḥ kevalagrahaṇam kriyate anyopasṛṣṭāt
GS24pmbhasuu:25546: mā bhūt iti . prasulambham . na eṣaḥ asti prayogaḥ . idam tarhi . supralambham .
GS24pmbhasuu:25547: preṇa vyavahitatvāt na bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi . atisulambham . karmapravacanīyasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:25548: atra bādhikā bhaviṣyati suḥ pūjāyām atiḥ atikramaṇe ca iti . yadā tarhi na atikramaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:25549: na pūjā . idam ca api udāharaṇam . supralambham . nanu ca uktam preṇa vyavahitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:25550: na bhaviṣyati iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . sudurbhyām iti na eṣā pañcamī . kā tarhi . tṛtīyā
GS24pmbhasuu:25551: . sudurbhyām upasṛṣṭasya iti . vyavahitaḥ ca api upasṛṣṭaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:25553: 61.4-7 ciṇṇamuloḥ anupasargasya . ciṇṇamuloḥ anupasargasya iti vaktavyam . iha mā
GS24pmbhasuu:25554: bhūt . prālambhi . pralambham pralambham . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:25555: upasargāt iti api prakṛtam na iti api tatra abhisambandhamātram kartavyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:25559: parṇadhvat . adhātoḥ iti śakyam avaktum . kasmāt na bhavati khāsrat ,
GS24pmbhasuu:25560: parṇadhvat iti . ugiti añcatigrahaṇāt siddham adhātoḥ . ugiti añcatigrahaṇāt adhātoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25561: siddham . añcatigrahaṇam niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . añcateḥ eva ugitaḥ dhātoḥ na anyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:25562: ugitaḥ dhātoḥ iti . idam tarhi prayojanam adhātubhūtapūrvasya api yathā syāt . gomantam
GS24pmbhasuu:25563: icchati gomatyati gomatyateḥ apratyayaḥ gomān iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:25565: 62-66 jhalacaḥ numvidhau ugitpratiṣedhaḥ . jhalacaḥ numvidhau ugillakṣaṇasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . gomanti brāhmaṇakulāni ,
GS24pmbhasuu:25567: bhūyāṃsi . nanu ca jhallakṣaṇaḥ ugillakṣaṇam bādhiṣyate . katham anyasya ucyamānam
GS24pmbhasuu:25568: anyasya bādhakam syāt . asati khalu api sambhave bādhanam bhavati asti ca sambhavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25569: yat ubhayam syāt . kim ca syāt yadi atra ugillakṣaṇaḥ api syāt . dvayoḥ nakārayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25570: śravaṇam prasajyeta . na vyañjanaparasya ekasya vā aneakasya vā śravaṇam prati viśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25571: asti . nanu ca pratijñābhedaḥ bhavati . śrutibhede asti kim pratijñābhedaḥ kariṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:25572: . nanu ca śrutikṛtaḥ api bhedaḥ asti . iha tāvat śreyāṃsi ,
GS24pmbhasuu:25573: bhūyāṃsi iti parasya anusvāre kṛte pūrvasya śravaṇam prāpnoti . tathā kurvanti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:25574: kṛṣanti iti parasya anusvāraparasavarṇayoḥ kṛtayoḥ pūrvasya ṇatvam prāpnoti . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:25575: ekasmin api numi ṇatvam kasmāt na bhavati . anusvārībhūtaḥ ṇatvam atikrāmati . kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:25576: tarhi parasavarṇe kasmāt na bhavati . asiddhe ca parasavarṇaḥ . vipratiṣedhāt siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:25577: . vipratiṣedhāt siddham etat . jhallakṣaṇaḥ kriyatām ugillakṣaṇaḥ iti jhallakṣaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25580: yavamān . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . gomanti brāhmaṇakulāni ,
GS24pmbhasuu:25583: bhūyāṃsi iti . jhallakṣaṇaḥ bhaviṣyati vipratiṣedhena . nanu ca punaḥprasaṅgavijñānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:25584: ugillakṣaṇaḥ prāpnoti . punaḥprasaṅgaḥ iti cet amādibhiḥ tulyam . punaḥ prasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25585: iti cet amādibhiḥ tulyam etat bhavati . tat yathā . yuṣmadasmadoḥ amādiṣu kṛteṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:25586: punaḥprasaṅgāt śaśīlugnumaḥ na bhavanti . evam jhallakṣaṇe kṛte punaḥprasaṅgāt ugillakṣaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25587: na bhaviṣyati . yat api ucyate asati khalu api sambhave bādhanam bhavati asti ca
GS24pmbhasuu:25588: sambhavaḥ yat ubhayam syāt iti sati api sambhave bādhanam bhavati . tat yathā . dadhi
GS24pmbhasuu:25589: brāhmaṇebhyaḥ dīyatām takram kauṇḍinyāya iti sati api sambhave dadhidānasya takradānam
GS24pmbhasuu:25590: nivartakam bhavati . evam iha api sati api sambhave jhallakṣaṇaḥ ugillakṣaṇam bādhiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:25591: . atha vā astu atra ugillakṣaṇaḥ api . nanu ca uktam cvayoḥ nakārayoḥ śravaṇam prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:25592: iti . parihṛtam etat na vyañjanaparasya ekasya vā anekasya vā śravaṇam prati viśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25593: asti . nanu ca uktam pratijñābhedaḥ bhavati iti . śrutibhede asati pratijñābhedaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25594: kim kariṣyati . nanu ca śrutikṛtaḥ api bhedaḥ uktaḥ iha tāvat śreyāṃsi ,
GS24pmbhasuu:25595: bhūyāṃsi iti parasya anusvāre kṛte pūrvasya śravaṇam prasajyeta kurvanti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:25596: kṛṣanti iti parasya anusvāraparasavarṇayoḥ kṛtayoḥ pūrvasya ṇatvam prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ayogavāhānām aviśeṣeṇa upadeśaḥ coditaḥ . tatra iha tāvat śreyāṃsi ,
GS24pmbhasuu:25597: bhūyāṃsi iti parasya anusvāre kṛte tasya jhalgrahaṇena grahaṇāt pūrvasya anusvāraḥ bhaviṣyati kurvanti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:25598: kṛṣanti iti parasya anusvāraparasavarṇayoḥ kṛtayoḥ tasya jhalgrahaṇena grahaṇāt pūrvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:25599: anusvāraparasavarṇau bhaviṣyataḥ . na eva vā punaḥ atra ugillakṣaṇaḥ prāpnoti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:25600: kāraṇam . midacaḥ antyāt paraḥ iti ucyate na ca dvayoḥ mitoḥ acām antyāt paratve
GS24pmbhasuu:25601: sambhavaḥ asti . katham tarhi imau dvau mitau acām antyāt parau staḥ . bahvanaḍvāṃhi
GS24pmbhasuu:25602: brāhmaṇakulāni iti . vinimittau etau . tatra bahūrji pratiṣedhaḥ . tatra bahūrji
GS24pmbhasuu:25603: pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . bahūrji brāhmaṇakulāni iti . antyāt pūrvam numam eke . antyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:25604: pūrvam numam eke icchanti . kim aviśeṣeṇa āhosvit bahūrjau eva . kim ca ataḥ . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:25605: aviśeṣeṇa kāṣṭhatakṃṣi iti bhavitavyam . atha bahūrjau eva kāṣṭhataṅkṣi iti bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:25607: . saḥ tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . acaḥ iti eṣā pañcamī . acaḥ uttaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25608: yaḥ jhal tadantasya napuṃsakasya numā bhavitavyam . yaḥ ca atra acaḥ uttaraḥ na asau
GS24pmbhasuu:25609: jhal na api tadantam napuṃsakam yadantam ca napuṃsakam na asau acaḥ uttaraḥ . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:25610: api tarhi na prāpnoti . kāṣṭhataṅkṣi iti . atra yaḥ acaḥ uttaraḥ jhal na tadantam
GS24pmbhasuu:25611: napuṃsakam yadantam ca napuṃsakam na asau acaḥ uttaraḥ . na etat asti . jhaljātiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25612: pratinirdiśyate . acaḥ uttarā yā jhaljātiḥ iti . yadi pañcamī kuṇḍāni ,
GS24pmbhasuu:25613: vanāni iti atra na prāpnoti . eva tarhi ikaḥ aci vibhaktau iti atra acaḥ sarvanāmasthāne
GS24pmbhasuu:25614: iti etat anuvartiṣyate . evam api ṣaṣṭhyabhāvāt na prāpnoti . sarvanāmasthāne iti
GS24pmbhasuu:25615: eṣā saptamī acaḥ iti pañcamyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayiṣyati tasmin iti nirdiṣṭe pūrvasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:25617: 66-69 ajgrahaṇam kimartham . ikaḥ aci vyañjane mā bhūt . ikaḥ aci iti ucyate vyañjanādau mā bhūt . trapubhyām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:25618: trapubhiḥ . astu lopaḥ . astu atra num . nalopaḥ prātipadikāntasya iti nalopaḥ bhaviṣyati . svaraḥ katham pañcatrapubhyām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:25619: pañcatrapubhyaḥ . igante dvigau iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ na prāpnoti . svaraḥ vai śrūyamāṇe api . śrūyamāṇe api numi svaraḥ bhavati . pañcatrapuṇā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:25620: pañcatrapuṇaḥ iti . lupte kim na bhaviṣyati . lupte idānīm kim na bhaviṣyati . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:25621: punaḥ kāraṇam śrūyamāne api numi svaraḥ bhavati . saṅghātabhaktaḥ asau na utsahate
GS24pmbhasuu:25622: avayavasya igantatām vihantum iti kṛtvā tataḥ śrūyamāṇe api numi svaraḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:25624: atirābhiḥ . numi kṛte rāyaḥ hali iti ātvam na prāpnoti . idam iha sampradhāryam .
GS24pmbhasuu:25625: num kriyatām ātvam iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt ātvam . iha tarhi priyatisṛbhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:25626: priyatisṛbhiḥ numi kṛte tisṛbhāvaḥ na prāpnoti . idam iha sampradhāryam . num kriyatām
GS24pmbhasuu:25627: tisṛbhāvaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt tisṛbhāvaḥ . atha idānīm tisṛbhāve kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:25628: punaḥprasaṅgāt num kasmāt na bhavati . sakṛdgatau vipratiṣedhe yat bādhitam tat bādhitam
GS24pmbhasuu:25629: eva iti . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . ikaḥ aci vibhaktau ajgrahaṇam numnuṭoḥ vipratiṣedhārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:25630: . ikaḥ aci vibhaktau ajgrahaṇam kriyate numaḥ nuṭ vipratiṣedhena yathā syāt . trapūṇām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:25631: jatūnām . akriyamāṇe hi ajgrahaṇe nityanimittaḥ num . kṛte api nuṭi prāpnoti akṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:25632: api . nityanimittatvāt numi kṛte nuṭaḥ abhāvaḥ syāt . etat api na asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:25633: . kriyamāṇe api vā ajgrahaṇe avaśyam atra nuḍarthaḥ yatnaḥ kartavyaḥ . pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25634: vaktavyaḥ . idam tarhi prayojanam nuṭi kṛte num mā bhūt iti . kim ca syāt . trapūṇām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:25635: jatūnām . itarathā hi numaḥ nityanimittatvāt nuḍabhāvaḥ . nāmi iti dīrghatvam na
GS24pmbhasuu:25636: syāt . mā bhūt evam . nopadhāyāḥ iti evam bhaviṣyati . iha tarhi śucīnām inhanpūṣāryamṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:25637: śau sau ca iti asmāt niyamāt na prāpnoti dīrghatvam . arthavadgrahaṇe na anarthakasya
GS24pmbhasuu:25638: iti evam na bhaviṣyati . na eṣā paribhāṣā iha śakyā vijñātum . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:25639: . vāgmi iti . evam tarhi lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya eva iti . uttarārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:25640: ca . uttarārtham tarhi ajgrahaṇam kartavyam . asthidadhisakthyakṣṇām anaṅ udāttaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25641: ajādau yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt . asthibhyām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:25642: asthibhiḥ iti . yadi uttarārtham syāt tatra eva ayam ajgrahaṇam kurvīta . iha kriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:25643: yadi kim cit prayojanam asti tat ucyatām . iha api kriyamāṇe prayojanam asti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:25644: . ajādau yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt . trapu ,
GS24pmbhasuu:25645: jatu . etat api na asti prayojanam . vibhaktau iti ucyate na ca atra vibhaktim paśyāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25646: . pratyayalakṣaṇena . na lumatā aṅgasya iti pratyayalakṣaṇasya pratiṣedhaḥ . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:25647: tarhi siddhe sati yat ajgrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati iha kaḥ cit
GS24pmbhasuu:25648: anyaḥ api prakāraḥ pratyayalakṣaṇam nāma iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . he trapu ,
GS24pmbhasuu:25649: he trapo . atra guṇaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati iti . ikaḥ aci vyañjane mā bhūt astu lopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25650: svaraḥ katham . svaraḥ vai śrūyamāṇe api lupte kim na bhaviṣyati . rāyātvam tisṛbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25651: ca vyavadhānāt numā api nuṭ vācyaḥ uttarārtham tu iha kim cit trapaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:25653: 70.2-72.7 kim iha puṃvadbhāvena atidiśyate . numpratiṣedhaḥ . katham punaḥ puṃvat
GS24pmbhasuu:25654: iti anena numpratiṣedhaḥ śakyaḥ vijñātum . vatinirdeśaḥ ayam kāmacāraḥ ca vatinirdeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:25656: uśīnaravat madreṣu yavāḥ . santi na santi iti . mātṛvat asyāḥ kalāḥ . santi na santi
GS24pmbhasuu:25657: iti . evam iha api puṃvat bhavati puṃvat na bhavati iti vākyaśeṣam samarthayiṣyāmahe
GS24pmbhasuu:25658: . yathā puṃsaḥ na num bhavati evam tṛtīyādiṣu bhāṣitapuṃskasya api na bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:25659: . kim ucyate numpratiṣedhaḥ iti na punaḥ anyat api puṃsaḥ pratipadam kāryam ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:25660: yat tṛtīyādiṣu vibhaktiṣu ajādiṣu bhāṣitapuṃskasya atidiśyeta . anārambhāt puṃsi
GS24pmbhasuu:25661: . na hi kim cit puṃsaḥ pratipadam kāryam ucyate yat tṛtīyādiṣu ajādiṣu bhāṣitapuṃskasya
GS24pmbhasuu:25662: atidiśyeta . num prakṛtaḥ tatra kim anyat śakyam vijñātum anyat ataḥ numpratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:25663: . puṃvat iti numpratiṣedhaḥ cet guṇanābhāvanuḍauttvapratiṣedhaḥ . puṃvat iti njumpratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25664: cet guṇanābhāvanuḍauttvānām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . guṇa . grāmaṇye brāhmaṇakulāya
GS24pmbhasuu:25665: . guṇa . nābhāva . grāmaṇyā brāhmaṇakulena . nābhāva . nuṭ . grāmaṇyām brāhmaṇakulānām
GS24pmbhasuu:25666: . nuṭ . auttvam . grāmaṇyām brāhmaṇakule . hrasvatvam apratiṣiddham hrasvāśrayāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25667: ca ete vidhayaḥ prāpnuvanti . hrasvābhāvārtham ca . kim ca . numpratiṣedhārtham ca
GS24pmbhasuu:25668: . katham punaḥ atra aprakṛtasya asaṃśabditasya hrasvatvasya pratiṣedhaḥ śakyaḥ vijñātum
GS24pmbhasuu:25669: . arthātideśāt siddham . na evam vijñāyate bhāṣyate pumān anena śabdena saḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:25670: bhāṣitapuṃskaḥ bhāṣitapuṃskasya śabdasya puṃśabdaḥ bhavati iti . katham tarhi . bhāṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:25671: pumān asmin arthe saḥ ayam bhāṣitapuṃskaḥ bhāṣitapuṃskasya arthasya puṃvadarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25672: bhavati iti . taddhitalukpratiṣedhaḥ ca . taddhitalukaḥ ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . pīluḥ vṛkṣaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:25674: pilunaḥ iti . na vā samānāyām ākṛtau bhāṣitapuṃskavijñānāt . na vā vaktavyam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:25675: kāraṇam . samānāyām ākṛtau bhāṣitapuṃskavijñānāt . samānāyām ākṛtau yat bhāṣitapuṃskam
GS24pmbhasuu:25676: ākṛtyantare ca etat bhāṣitapuṃskam . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam
GS24pmbhasuu:25679: 72.9-73.8 kim udāharaṇam . akṣī te indra piṅgale . na etat asti . pūrvasavarṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:25680: api etat siddham . idam tarhi . akṣībhyām te nāsikābhyām . idam ca api udāharaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:25681: . akṣī te indra piṅgale . nanu ca uktam pūrvasavarṇena api etat siddham iti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:25682: sidhyati . numā vyavahitatvāt pūrvasavarṇaḥ na prāpnoti . chandasi napuṃsakasya puṃvadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25684: madhoḥ tṛptāḥ iva asataḥ iti evamartham . puṃvadbhāvena numaḥ nivṛttiḥ numi nivṛtte
GS24pmbhasuu:25685: pūrvasavarṇena eva siddham . svarārthaḥ tarhi īkāraḥ vaktavyaḥ . udāttasvaraḥ yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:25686: syāt napuṃsakasvaraḥ mā bhūt iti . nanu ca puṃvadbhāvātideśāt eva svaraḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:25687: . aśakyaḥ puṃvadbhāvātideśaḥ svare tantram āśrayitum . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:25688: madhu asmin asti madhuḥ māsaḥ iti . saḥ tarhi puṃvadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . prakṛtam puṃvat iti vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:25690: 74.2-8 kasya ayam pratiṣedhaḥ . numaḥ iti āha . tat numaḥ grahaṇam kartavyam . na
GS24pmbhasuu:25691: kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . iditaḥ num dhātoḥ iti tat vā anekagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:25692: vyavacchinnam aśakyam anuvartayitum . evam tarhi sarvanāmasthāne iti varate sarvanāmasthāne
GS24pmbhasuu:25693: yat prāpnoti tasya pratiṣedhaḥ . tat vai bahutarakeṇa grahaṇena vyavacchinnam aśakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:25694: anuvartayitum . atha idānīm vyavahitam api śakyate anuvartayitum num eva anuvartya
GS24pmbhasuu:25695: iha ihārtham uttarārtham ca . iha ca eva pratiṣedhaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati iha ca āt śīnadyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25696: num iti numgrahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:25701: punatī . lope kṛte avarṇābhāvāt . kim tarhi asmin yoge udāharaṇam . yātī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:25702: yāntī . atra api ekādeśe kṛte vyapavargābhāvāt na prāpnoti . antādivadbhāvena vyapavargaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25703: . ubhayataḥ āśraye na antādivat . na ubhayataḥ āśrayaḥ kariṣyate . na evam vijñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:25704: avarṇāntāt śatuḥ num bhavati iti . katham tarhi . avarṇāt num bhavati tat cet avarṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:25707: 75.6-8 nityagrahaṇam kimartham . vibhāṣā mā bhūt iti . na etat asti prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:25708: siddhaḥ atra pūrveṇa eva . tatra ārambhasāmarthyāt nityaḥ vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:25711: 75.14-76.14 anaḍuhaḥ sau āmpratiṣedhaḥ numaḥ anavakāśatvāt . anaḍuhaḥ sau āmpratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25712: prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . numaḥ anavakāśatvāt . anavakāśaḥ num āmam bādhate . na vā
GS24pmbhasuu:25713: avarṇopadhasya numvacanāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . avarṇopadhasya numvacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:25714: . avarṇopadhasya numam vakṣyāmi . tadarthagrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . prakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:25715: anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . āt śīnadyoḥ num iti . yadi tat anuvartate anaḍuhi yāvanti
GS24pmbhasuu:25716: avarṇāni sarvebhyaḥ paraḥ num prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . mit acaḥ antyāt paraḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:25717: anena yat sarvāntyam avarṇam tasmāt paraḥ bhaviṣyati . punaḥprasaṅgavijñānāt vā siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:25718: . atha vā punaḥprsaṅgāt numi kṛte ām bhaviṣyati . yathāttvādiṣu dvirvacanam . tat yathā jagle ,
GS24pmbhasuu:25721: ījuḥ iti āttvādiṣu kṛteṣu punaḥprasaṅgāt dvirvacanam bhavati evam atra api numi kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:25722: ām bhaviṣyati . na eṣaḥ yuktaḥ parihāraḥ . vipratiṣedhe punaḥprasaṅgaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25723: ca dvayoḥ sāvakāśayoḥ bhavati . iha punaḥ anavakāśaḥ num āmam bādhate . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:25724: vṛttāntāt eṣaḥ parihāraḥ prasthitaḥ . kasmāt vṛttāntāt . idam ayam codyaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:25725: anaḍuhaḥ sau āmpratiṣedhaḥ numaḥ anavakāśatvāt iti . tasya parihāraḥ na vā avarṇopadhasya
GS24pmbhasuu:25726: numvacanāt iti . tataḥ ayam codyaḥ bhavati yatra tarhi avarṇaprakaraṇam na asti tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:25727: taḥ āmā numaḥ bādhanam prāpnoti bahvanḍvāṃhi brāhmaṇakulāni iti . tataḥ uttarakālam
GS24pmbhasuu:25728: idam paṭhitam punaḥprasaṅgavijñānāt vā siddham iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:25730: 77.2-11 divaḥ auttve dhātupratiṣedhaḥ . divaḥ auttve dhātoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25731: . akṣadyūḥ iti . adhātvadhikārāt siddham . adhātoḥ iti vartate . kva prakṛtam . ugidacām
GS24pmbhasuu:25732: sarvanāmasthāne adhātoḥ iti . adhātvadhikārāt siddham iti cet napuṃsake doṣaḥ . adhātvadhikārāt
GS24pmbhasuu:25733: siddham iti cet napuṃsake doṣaḥ bhavati . kāṣṭhataṅkṣi ,
GS24pmbhasuu:25734: kūṭataṅkṣi . napuṃsakasya jhal acaḥ adhātoḥ iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . uktam vā . kim uktam . ananubandhakagrahaṇe hi na sānubandhakasya iti . atha vā sambandham anuvartiṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:25736: 77.13-78.4 itaḥ advacanam anarthakam ākāraprakaraṇāt . itaḥ advacanam anarthakam
GS24pmbhasuu:25737: . kim kāraṇam . ākāraprakaraṇāt . āt iti vartate . ṣapūrvārtham tu . ṣapūrvārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:25741: 78.-79 asuṅi upadeśivadvacanam svarasiddhyartham bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . asuṅi upadeśivadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25742: vaktavyaḥ . upadeśāvasthāyām eva asuṅ bhavati iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . svarasiddhyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:25743: . upadeśāvasthāyām asuṅi kṛte iṣṭaḥ svaraḥ yathā syāt . paramapumān iti . akriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:25744: hi upadeśivadbhāve samāsāntodāttatve asuṅ āntaryataḥ asvarakasya asvarakaḥ syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:25745: kim punaḥ kāraṇam samāsāntodāttatvam tāvat bhavati na punaḥ asuṅ . na paratvāt asuṅā
GS24pmbhasuu:25746: bhavitavyam . bahirṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇaḥ asuṅ . antaraṅgaḥ svaraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:25747: asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge . saḥ tarhi upadeśivadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25748: . ādyudāttanipātanam kariṣyate saḥ nipātanasvaraḥ samāsasvarasya bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:25749: . evam api upadeśivadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . saḥ yathā eva hi nipātanasvaraḥ samāsasvaram
GS24pmbhasuu:25750: bādhate evam prakṛtisvaram api bādheta . pumān . tasmāt suṣṭhu ucyate asuṅi upadeśivadvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:25753: 79.7-81.7 kim idam gotaḥ parasya sarvanāmasthānasya ṅittvam ucyate āhosvit sarvanāmasthāne
GS24pmbhasuu:25754: parataḥ ṅitkāryam atidiśyate . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . gotaḥ sarvanāmasthāne ṅitkāryātideśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25755: . gotaḥ sarvanāmasthāne ṅitkāryam atidiśyate . sarvanāmasthāne ṇittvavacane hi asampratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25756: ṣaṣṭhyanirdeśāt . sarvanāmasthānasya ṇidvacane hi asampratyayaḥ syāt . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:25757: . ṣaṣṭhyabhāvāt . ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭasya ādeśāḥ ucyante na ca atra ṣaṣṭhīm paśyāmaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:25759: gotaḥ ṅidvat bhavati iti . saḥ tarhi vatinirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ na hi antareṇa vatim atideśaḥ gamyate . antareṇa api vatim atideśaḥ gamyate . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:25760: eṣaḥ brahmadattaḥ . abrahmadattam brahmadattaḥ iti āha . te manyāmahe :
GS24pmbhasuu:25761: brahmadattavat ayam bhavati iti . evam iha api aṇitam ṇit iti āha ṇidvat iti gamyate
GS24pmbhasuu:25762: . atha vā punaḥ astu gotaḥ parasya sarvanāmasthānasya ṇittvam . nanu ca uktam sarvanāmasthāne
GS24pmbhasuu:25763: ṇittvavacane hi asampratyayaḥ ṣaṣṭhyanirdeśāt iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . gotaḥ iti eṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:25764: pañcamī sarvanāmasthāne iti saptamyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayiṣyati tasmāt iti uttarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:25765: iti . atha taparakaraṇam kimartham . iha mā bhūt . citraguḥ śabalaguḥ iti . na etat
GS24pmbhasuu:25766: asti . hrasvatve kṛte na bhaviṣyati . sthānivadbhāvāt prāpnoti . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati
GS24pmbhasuu:25767: . taparakaraṇam anarthakam sthānivatpratiṣedhāt . taparakarṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:25768: . sthānivatpratiṣedhāt . pratiṣidhyate atra sthānivadbhāvaḥ goḥ pūrvaṇittvātvasvareṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:25769: sthānivadbhāvaḥ na bhavati iti . saḥ ca avaśyam pratiṣedhaḥ āśrayitavyaḥ . itarathā
GS24pmbhasuu:25770: hi sambuddhijasoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . yaḥ hi manyate taparakaraṇasāmarthyāt atra na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:25771: iti sambuddhijasoḥ tena pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:25772: he citrago citragavaḥ iti . atha idānīm sati api sthānivadbhāvapratiṣedha guṇe kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:25773: kasmāt eva atra na bhavati . lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya eva iti . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:25774: ca idānīm asati api sthānivadbhāvapratiṣedhe etayā paribhāṣayā śakyam upasthātum
GS24pmbhasuu:25775: . na iti āha na hi idānīm kva cit api sthānivat syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:25777: 81-84 atha atra vibhaktau iti anuvartate utāho na . kim ca ataḥ . tṛjvat striyām
GS24pmbhasuu:25778: vibhaktau cet kroṣṭrībhaktiḥ na sidhyati . tṛjvat striyām vibhaktau cet kroṣṭrībhaktiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25779: iti na sidhyati . evam tarhi īkāre tṛjvadbhāvam vakṣyāmi . tat īkāragrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:25780: . na kartavyam . kriyate nyāse eva . praśliṣṭanirdeśaḥ ayam . strī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:25781: ī strī striyām iti . īkāre tannimittaḥ saḥ . īkāre cet tat na . kim kāraṇam . tannimittaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25782: saḥ . tṛjvadbhāvanimittaḥ saḥ īkāraḥ . na akṛte tṛjvadbhāve īkāraḥ prāpnoti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:25783: kāraṇam . ṛnnebhyaḥ ṅīp iti ucyate īkāre ca tṛjvadbhāvaḥ . tat idam itaretarāśrayam
GS24pmbhasuu:25784: bhavati . itaretarāśrayāṇi ca na prakalpante . evam tarhi gaurādiṣu pāṭhāt īkāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25785: bhaviṣyati . gaurādiṣu na paṭhyate . na hi kim cit tunantam gaurādiṣu paṭhyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:25786: evam tarhi etat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati atra īkāraḥ iti yat ayam īkāre tṛjvadbhāvam
GS24pmbhasuu:25787: śāsti . tena eva bhāvanam cet syāt aniṣṭaḥ api prasajyate . yadi api na asti viśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25788: ṅīpaḥ vā ṅīṣaḥ vā ṅīn api tu prāpnoti . iha ca na prāpnoti . pañcabhiḥ kroṣṭrībhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25789: krītaiḥ rathaiḥ pañcakroṣṭṛbhiḥ rathaiḥ iti . evam tarhi na ca aparam nimittam sañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:25790: ca pratyayalakṣaṇena . na ca aparam nimittam āśrīyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:25791: asmin parataḥ kroṣṭuḥ tṛjvat bhavati iti . kim tarhi aṅgasya kroṣṭuḥ tṛjvat bhavati . aṅgasañjñā ca bhavati pratyayalakṣaṇena .
GS24pmbhasuu:25794: tṛcaḥ yat śāstram tat atidiśyate . āhosvit rūpātideśaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:25795: tṛcaḥ yat rūpam tat atidiśyate iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . tṛjvat iti śāstrātideśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25796: cet yathā ciṇi tadvat . tṛjvat iti śāstrātideśaḥ cet yathā ciṇi tadvat prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:25797: katham ca ciṇi . uktam aṅgasya iti tu prakaraṇāt āṇgaśāstrātideśāt siddham iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:25798: āṅgam yat kāryam tat atidiśyate . evam iha api anaṅguṇadīrghatvāni atidiṣṭāni raparatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:25799: anatidiṣṭam . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . tatra raparavacanam . tatra raparatvam na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:25800: tat vaktavyam . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . guṇe atidiṣṭe raparatvam api atidiṣṭam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:25801: katham . kāryakālam sañjñāparibhāṣam yatra kāryam tatra draṣṭavyam . ṛtaḥ ṅisarvanāmasthānayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25802: guṅaḥ bhavati . upasthitam idam bhavati uḥ aṇ raparaḥ iti . evam tarhi ayam anyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25803: doṣaḥ jāyate . āhatya tṛcaḥ yat śāstram tat atidiśyeta anāhatya vā iti . kim ca ataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25804: . yadi āhatya dīrghatvam atidiṣṭam anaṅguṇaraparatvāni anatidiṣṭāni . atha anāhatya
GS24pmbhasuu:25805: anaṅguṇaraparatvāni atidiṣṭāni dīrghatvam anatidiṣṭam . astu āhatya . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:25806: dīrghatvam atidiṣṭam anaṅguṇaraparatvāni anatidiṣṭāni iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . dīrghatve
GS24pmbhasuu:25807: atidiṣṭe anaṅguṇaraparatvāni api atidiṣṭāni bhavanti . katham . upadhāyāḥ iti vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:25808: na ca akṛteṣu eteṣu dīrghabhāvini upadhā bhavati . kutaḥ nu khalu etat eteṣu vidhiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:25809: kṛteṣu yā upadhā tasyāḥ dīrghatvam bhaviṣyati na punaḥ kroṣṭoḥ yaḥ antaratamaḥ guṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25810: tasmin kṛte avādeśe ca yā upadhā tasyāḥ dīrghatvam bhaviṣyati . na ekam udāharaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:25811: yogārambham prayojayati iti . tatra tṛjvadvacanasāmarthyāt eteṣu vidhiṣu kṛteṣu yā
GS24pmbhasuu:25812: upadhā tasyāḥ dīrghatvam bhaviṣyati . atha vā kim naḥ etena āhatya anāhatya vā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:25813: . āhatya anāhatya ca tṛcaḥ yat śāstram tat atidiśyate . atha vā punaḥ astu rūpātideśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25814: . atha etasmin rūpātideśe sati kim prāk ādeśebhyaḥ yat rūpam tat atidiśyate āhosvit
GS24pmbhasuu:25815: kṛteṣu ādeśeṣu . kim ca ataḥ . yadi prāk ādeśebhyaḥ yat rūpam tat atidiśyate ṛkāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25816: ekaḥ atidiṣṭaḥ anaṅguṇaraparatvadīrghatvāni anatidiṣṭāni . atha kṛteṣu ādeśeṣu ṛkāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25817: anatidiṣṭaḥ anaṅguṇaraparatvadīrghatvāni atidiṣṭāni . ubhayathā ca svaraḥ anatidiṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25818: na hi svaraḥ rūpavān . astu prāk ādeśebhyaḥ yat rūpam tat atidiśyate . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:25819: ṛkāraḥ atidiṣṭaḥ anaṅguṇaraparatvadīrghatvāni anatidiṣṭāni iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:25820: ṛkāre atidiṣṭe svāśrayāḥ atra ete vidhayaḥ bhaviṣyanti . yat api ucyate ubhayathā
GS24pmbhasuu:25821: ca svaraḥ anatidiṣṭaḥ na hi svaraḥ rūpavān iti sacakāragrahaṇasāmarthyāt svaraḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:25822: . rūpātideśaḥ iti cet sarvādeśaprasaṅgaḥ . rūpātideśaḥ iti cet sarvādeśaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:25823: . sarvasya tunantasya tṛśabdaḥ ādeśaḥ prāpnoti . siddham tu rūpātideśāt . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:25824: etat . katham . rūpātideśāt . rūpātideśaḥ ayam . nanu ca evam eva kṛtvā codyate rūpātideśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25825: iti cet sarvādeśaprasaṅgaḥ iti . siddham tu pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ tadāditadantavijñānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:25826: . siddham etat . katham . pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ vihitaḥ tadādeḥ tadantasya ca
GS24pmbhasuu:25827: grahaṇam bhavati iti evam tunantasya tṛjantaḥ ādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . evam api kim cit
GS24pmbhasuu:25828: eva tṛjantam prāpnoti . idam api prāpnoti paktā iti . āntaratamyāt ca siddham . kroṣṭoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25829: yat antaratamam tat bhaviṣyati . kim punaḥ tat . kruśeḥ yaḥ tṛc vihitaḥ tadantam
GS24pmbhasuu:25830: . tṛjvadvacanam anarthakam tṛjviṣaye tṛcaḥ mṛgavācitvāt . tṛjviṣaye etat tṛjantam
GS24pmbhasuu:25831: mṛgavāci . tunaḥ nivṛttyartham tarhi idam vaktavyam . tunaḥ sarvanāmasthāne nivṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25832: yathā syāt . tunaḥ nivṛttyartham iti cet siddham yathā anyatra api . tunaḥ nivṛttyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:25833: iti cet tat antareṇa vacanam siddham yathā anyatra api aviśeṣavihitāḥ śabdāḥ niyataviṣayāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25834: dṛśyante . kva anyatra . tat yathā . gharatiḥ asmai aviśeṣeṇa upadiṣṭaḥ saḥ ghṛtam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:25836: gharmaḥ iti evaṃviṣayaḥ . raśiḥ asmai aviśeṣeṇa upadiṣṭaḥ saḥ rāśiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:25838: raśanā iti evaṃviṣayaḥ . luśiḥ asmai aviśeṣeṇa upadiṣṭaḥ saḥ loṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25839: iti evaṃviṣayaḥ . idam tarhi prayojanam vibhāṣā vakṣyāmi iti . vibhāṣā tṛtīyādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:25840: aci iti . vāvacanānarthakyam ca svabhāvasiddhatvāt . vāvacanam ca anarthakam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:25841: kāraṇam . svabhāvasiddhatvāt . svabhāvataḥ eva tṛtīyādiṣu ajādiṣu vibhaktiṣu tṛjantam
GS24pmbhasuu:25844: 91-92 guṇavṛddhyauttvatṛjvadbhāvebhyaḥ num pūrvavipratiṣiddham . guṇavṛddhyauttvatṛjvadbhāvebhyaḥ num bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena . tatra guṇasya avakāśaḥ . agnaye ,
GS24pmbhasuu:25847: jatune . vṛddheḥ avakāśaḥ . sakhāyai . sakhāyaḥ . numaḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . atisakhīni brāhmaṇakulāni iti . auttvasya avakāśaḥ . agnau ,
GS24pmbhasuu:25848: vāyau . numaḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . trapuṇi ,
GS24pmbhasuu:25849: jatuni iti . tṛjvadbhāvasya avakāśaḥ . kroṣṭunā . numaḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:25850: . kṛśakṛoṣṭune arṇyāya . hitakroṣṭune vṛṣalakulāya . num bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:25851: . saḥ tarhi pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . iṣṭavācī paraśabdaḥ . vipratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:25852: param yat iṣṭam tat bhavati iti . numaciratṛjvadbhāvebhyaḥ nuṭ . numaciratṛjvadbhāvebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25853: nuṭ pūrvavipratiṣedhena vaktavyaḥ . numaḥ avakāśaḥ . trapūṇi ,
GS24pmbhasuu:25856: jatūnām . aci rādeśasya avakāśaḥ . tisraḥ tiṣṭhanti catasraḥ tiṣṭhanti . nuṭaḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . tisṛṇām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:25858: kroṣṭunā . nuṭaḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . kroṣṭūnām . nuṭ bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:25859: . saḥ tarhi pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vā nuḍviṣaye rapratiṣedhāt . na vā
GS24pmbhasuu:25861: catasṛṇām iti . katham tarhi sidhyati . nuḍviṣaye rapratiṣedhāt . nuḍviṣaye rapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25862: vaktavyaḥ . itarathā hi sarvāpavādaḥ . itarathā hi sarvāpavādaḥ rādeśaḥ . saḥ yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:25863: eva guṇapūrvasavarṇau bādhate eva nuṭam api bādheta . tasmāt nuḍviṣaye rapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25864: . tasmāt nuḍviṣaye rādeśasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25865: jñāpayati na rādeśaḥ nuṭam bādhate iti yat ayam na tisṛcatasṛ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:25868: 92.12-13 ām anaḍuhaḥ striyām vā . ām anaḍuhaḥ striyām vā iti vaktavyam . anaḍuhī , anaḍvāhī .
GS24pmbhasuu:25870: 93.4-8 ittvottvābhyām guṇavṛddhī bhavataḥ vipratiṣedhena . ittvottvayoḥ avakāśaḥ . āstīrṇam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:25877: nipārakaḥ . guṇavṛddhī bhavataḥ vipratiṣedhena . ayuktaḥ ayam vipratiṣedhaḥ yaḥ ayam guṇasya ittvottayoḥ ca . katham . nityaḥ guṇaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:25879: 94.3-95.9 sici vṛddhau okārapratiṣedhaḥ . sici vṛddhau okārasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . udavoḍhām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:25881: udavoḍha iti . saḥ tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . okārāt vṛddhiḥ vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:25882: . ottvam kriyatām vṛddhiḥ iti . vṛddhiḥ bhaviṣyati vipratiṣedhena . okārāt vṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25883: vipratiṣedhena iti cet ottvābhāvaḥ . okārāt vṛddhiḥ vipratiṣedhena iti cet ottvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:25885: udavoḍham . udavoḍha iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . uktam tatra varṇagrahaṇasya prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:25886: vṛddhau api kṛtāyām ottvam yathā syāt . punaḥprasaṅgavijñānāt vā siddham yathā prasāraṇādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:25887: dvirvacanam . atha vā punaḥprasaṅgāt atra vṛddhau kṛtāyām ottvam bhaviṣyati . sauḍhāmitrau
GS24pmbhasuu:25888: bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt siddham . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇā vṛddhiḥ . antaraṅgam ottvam . asiddham
GS24pmbhasuu:25891: 95.10-96.3 antagrahaṇam kimartham na ataḥ rlaḥ iti eva ucyate . kena idānīm tadantasya
GS24pmbhasuu:25892: bhaviṣyati . tadantavidhinā . idam tarhi prayojanam . ayam antaśabdaḥ asti eva avayavavācī
GS24pmbhasuu:25894: vasanāntaḥ . asti sāmīpye vartate . tat yathā . udakāntam gataḥ . udakasamīpam gataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25895: iti gamyate . tat yaḥ sāmīpye vartate tasya idam grahaṇam yathā vijñāyeta . aṅgāntau
GS24pmbhasuu:25896: yau rephalakārau tayoḥ samīpe yaḥ akāraḥ tasya yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt . aśvallīt , avabhrīt .
GS24pmbhasuu:25898: 96.5-101.2 halgrahaṇam kimartham . samuccayaḥ yathā vijñāyeta . vadivrajyoḥ ca halantasya
GS24pmbhasuu:25899: ca acaḥ iti . na etat asti prayojanam . ajgrahaṇāt eva atra samuccayaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:25900: . vadivrajyoḥ ca acaḥ ca iti . asti anyat ajgrahaṇe prayojanam vadivrajiviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:25901: yathā vijñāyeta . vadivrajyoḥ ecaḥ iti . yadi etāvat prayojanam syāt vadivrajyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25902: ataḥ iti evam brūyāt . atha vā etat api na brūyāt . ataḥ iti vartate . idam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:25903: prayojanam halantasya yathā syāt ajantasya mā bhūt . kasya punaḥ ajantasya prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:25905: ajihīrṣīt . lopaḥ atra bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . ākārasya tarhi prāpnoti . ayāsīt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:25906: avāsīt . na asti atra viśeṣaḥ satyām vā vṛddhau asatyām vā . sandhyakṣarasya tarhi prāpnoti . na vai sandhyakṣaram antyam asti . nanu ca idam asti ḍhalope kṛte udavoḍhām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:25908: udavoḍha iti . asiddhaḥ ḍhalopaḥ tasya asiddhatvāt na etat antyam bhavati . ataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25909: uttaram paṭhati . halgrahaṇam iṭi pratiṣedhārtham . halgrahaṇam kriyate iṭi pratiṣedhārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:25910: . na iṭi iti pratiṣedham vakṣyati saḥ halantasya yathā syāt ajantasya mā bhūt . alāvīt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:25911: apāvīt . na vā anantarasya pratiṣedhāt . na vā etat prayojanam asti . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:25912: . anantarasya pratiṣedhāt . anantaram yat vṛddhividhānam tat pratiṣidhyate . kutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25913: etat . anantarasya vidhiḥ vā bhavati pratiṣedhaḥ vā iti . tat ca anantyārtham . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:25914: ca anantaram vṛddhividhānam anantyārtham vijñāyate . katham punaḥ anantaram vṛddhividhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:25915: anantyārtham śakyam vijñātum . antyasya vacanānarthakyāt . antyasya vṛddhividhāne
GS24pmbhasuu:25916: prayojanam na asti iti kṛtvā anantaram vṛddhividhānam anantyārtham vijñāyate . ataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25917: vibhāṣārtham tarhi idam vaktavyam . ataḥ halādeḥ laghoḥ iti vibhāṣā vṛddhim vakṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:25918: sā halantasya yathā syāt ajantasya mā bhūt . acikīrṣīt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:25919: ajihīrṣīt . ataḥ vibhāṣārtham iti cet siddham vṛddheḥ lopabalīyastvāt . ataḥ vibhāṣārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:25920: iti cet tat antareṇa api halgrahaṇam siddham . katham . vṛddheḥ lopabalīyastvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:25921: vṛddheḥ lopaḥ balīyān bhavati iti . idam iha sampradhāryam . vṛddhiḥ kriyatām lopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25922: iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt vṛddhiḥ . nityaḥ lopaḥ . kṛtāyām api vṛddhau prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:25923: akṛtāyām api . anityaḥ lopaḥ na hi kṛtāyām vṛddhau prāpnoti . paratvāt sagiḍbhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:25924: bhavitavyam . na atra sagiṭau prāpnutaḥ . kim kāraṇam . ekācaḥ tau vali iti vā .
GS24pmbhasuu:25925: ekācaḥ sagiṭau ucyete atha vā vali iti tatra anuvartate . kim punaḥ kāraṇam ekācaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25926: tau valī iti vā . dardrāteḥ mā bhūt iti . daridrāteḥ na sagiḍbhyām bhavitavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:25927: uktam etat daridrāteḥ ārdhadhātuke lopaḥ siddhaḥ ca pratyayavidhau iti . yaḥ ca idānīm
GS24pmbhasuu:25928: pratyayavidhau siddhaḥ siddhaḥ asau sagiḍvidhau . evamartham eva tarhi ekājgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:25929: anuvartyam atra sagiṭau mā bhūtām iti . saḥ eṣaḥ nityaḥ lopaḥ vṛddhim bādhiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:25930: . kam punaḥ bhavān vṛddheḥ avakāśam matvā āha nityaḥ lopaḥ iti . anavakāśā vṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25931: lopam bādhiṣyate . sāvakāśā vṛddhiḥ . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . anantyaḥ : akaṇīt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:25932: akāṇīt . katham punaḥ sati antye anantyasya vṛddhiḥ syāt . bhavet yaḥ atā aṅgam viśeṣayet
GS24pmbhasuu:25933: tasya anantyasya na syāt . vayam tu khalu aṅgena akāram viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . tatra anantyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25934: vṛddheḥ avakāśaḥ antyasya lopaḥ bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . evam vṛddheḥ lopabalīyastvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:25935: . atha vā ārabhyate pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ ṇyallopau iyaṅyaṇguṇavṛddhidīrghatvebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25936: pūrvavipratiṣiddham . sā tarhi eṣā anantyārthā vṛddhiḥ halantasya yathā syāt ajantasya
GS24pmbhasuu:25937: mā bhūt . apipaṭhiṣīt . etat api na asti prayojanam . katham . halādeḥ iti na eṣā bahuvrīheḥ ṣaṣṭhī :
GS24pmbhasuu:25938: hal ādiḥ yasya saḥ ayam halādiḥ halādeḥ iti . kā tarhi . karmadhārayāt pañcamī . hal
GS24pmbhasuu:25939: ādiḥ halādiḥ halādeḥ parasya iti . yadi karmadhārayāt pañcamī acakāsīt atra prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:25940: . sicā anantaryam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . halādeḥ parasya sici anantarasya iti . yadi sicā
GS24pmbhasuu:25942: akāṇīt atra na prāpnoti . vacanāt bhaviṣyati . iha api tarhi vacanāt prāpnoti . acakāsīt
GS24pmbhasuu:25943: . yena na avyavadhānam tena vyavahite api vacanaprāmāṇyāt . kena ca na avyavadhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:25944: . varṇena ekena . saṅgātena punaḥ vyavadhānam bhavati na ca bhavati . yadi sicā ānantaryam
GS24pmbhasuu:25945: viśeṣyate astu bahuvrīheḥ ṣaṣṭhī . kasmāt na bhavati . apipaṭhiṣīt . vyavahitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:25946: . evam tarhi atidūram eva idam halgrahaṇam anusṛtam . halgrahaṇam anantyārtham .
GS24pmbhasuu:25949: 101.4-102.7 kimartham jāgarteḥ vṛddhipratiṣedhaḥ ucyate . sici vṛddhiḥ mā bhūt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:25950: . na etat asti prayojanam . jāgarteḥ guṇaḥ ucyate vṛddhiviṣaye pratiṣedhaviṣaye ca
GS24pmbhasuu:25951: saḥ bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . guṇe tarhi kṛte raparatve ca halantalakṣaṇā vṛddhiḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:25952: . na iṭi iti tasyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati . iyam tarhi pratiṣedhottarakālā vṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25953: ārabhyate ataḥ rlāntasya iti . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:25954: kakṣyayā kakṣyā nimātavyā . sici vṛddhiḥ ca prāpnoti guṇāḥ ca . guṇaḥ bhavati . guṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:25955: kṛte raparatve ca halantalakṣaṇā vṛddhiḥ prāpnoti na iṭi iti ca tasyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25956: bhavati . pratiṣedhottarakālam ataḥ halādeḥ laghoḥ iti vibhāṣā vṛddhiḥ prāpnoti na
GS24pmbhasuu:25957: ca kim cit . ataḥ rlāntasya iti ca vṛddhiḥ prāpnoti na ca kim cit .
GS24pmbhasuu:25959: 103-105 kimartham purastāt pratiṣedhaḥ ucyate na vidhyuttarakālaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ kriyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:25960: . tat yathā anyatra api vidhyuttarakālāḥ pratiṣedhāḥ bhavanti . kva anyatra . kartari
GS24pmbhasuu:25961: karmavyatihāre na gatihiṃsārthebhyaḥ iti . devatādvandve ca na indrasya parasya .
GS24pmbhasuu:25962: tatra ayam api arthaḥ dviḥ iḍgrahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati prakṛtam anuvartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:25963: na evam śakyam . iḍartham sārvadhātukagrahaṇam liṅaḥ salope sannihitam tat vicchidyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:25964: . yadi punaḥ na vṛdbhyaḥ caturbhyaḥ iti atra eva ucyeta . kim kṛtam bhavati . vidhyuttarakālāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25965: ca eva pratiṣedhaḥ kṛataḥ bhavati dviḥ ca iḍgrahaṇam na kartavyam iḍartham ca sārvadhātukagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:25966: liṅaḥ salope sannihitam bhavati . tatra ayam api arthaḥ dviḥ pratiṣedhaḥ na kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25967: iti etasmāt niyamāt iṭ prasajyeta . kṛsṛbhṛvṛstudruśrusruvaḥ liṭi iti eṣaḥ yogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25968: pratiṣedhārthaḥ bhaviṣyati . yadi eṣaḥ yogaḥ pratiṣedhārthaḥ yaḥ etasmāt yogāt iṭ
GS24pmbhasuu:25969: pariprāpyate niyamāt saḥ na sidhyati : peciva ,
GS24pmbhasuu:25973: iti eteṣām grahaṇam niyamārtham bhaviṣyati studruśrusruvām pratiṣedhārtham vṛṅvṛñoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25974: jñāpakārtham . evam api sāmānyavihitasya eva iṭaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vijñāyeta viśeṣavihitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25975: ca ayam thali iti . purastāt punaḥ pratiṣedhe sati anārabhyāpavādaḥ ayam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:25976: tena yāvān iṇ nāma tasya sarvasya eva pratiṣedhaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . yadi khalu api
GS24pmbhasuu:25977: eṣaḥ abhiprāyaḥ tat na kriyate iti purastāt api pratiṣedhe sati tat na kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:25978: . katham . idam asti na iṭ vaśi kṛti iti . tataḥ vakṣyāmi . ārdhadhātukasya valādeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25979: iti . iṭ iti anuvartate na iti nivṛttam .
GS24pmbhasuu:25981: 105-107 atha kṛdgrahaṇam kimartham . iha mā bhūt . bibhidiva ,
GS24pmbhasuu:25982: bibhidima iti . na etat asti prayojanam . kṛsṛbhṛvṛstudruśrusruvaḥ liṭi iti etasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:25983: niyamāt atra iṭ bhaviṣyati . na atra tena pariprāpaṇam prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . prakṛtilakṣaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:25984: pratiṣedhasya saḥ pratyārambhaḥ pratyayalakṣaṇaḥ ca ayam pratiṣedhaḥ . ubhayoḥ saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25985: pratyārambhaḥ . katham jñāyate . vṛṅvṛñoḥ grahaṇāt . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . imau
GS24pmbhasuu:25986: vṛṅvṛñau udāttau tayoḥ prakṛtilakṣaṇaḥ pratyayalakṣaṇaḥ ca . tataḥ kim . tulyajātīye
GS24pmbhasuu:25987: asati yathā eva prakṛtilakṣaṇasya niyāmakaḥ bhavati evam pratyayalakṣaṇasya api niyāmakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25988: bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam . iha mā bhūt . rudivaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:25989: rudimaḥ . etat api na asti prayojanam . upariṣṭāt yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . ārdhadhātukasya
GS24pmbhasuu:25990: . yat etat anukrāntam etat ārdhadhātukasya draṣṭavyam . tataḥ iṭ valādeḥ iti . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:25991: etāvat draṣṭavyam yadi kim cit tatra anyat api ārdhadhātukagrahaṇasya prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:25992: asti . atha na kim cit iha vā kṛdgrahaṇam kriyeta tatra vā ārdhadhātukagrahaṇam kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25993: nu atra viśeṣaḥ . na iṭ varam anādau kṛti . varam anādau kṛti iṭpratiṣedham prayojayati . īśitā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26001: yatnaḥ . atha anye ye vaśādayaḥ tatra katham . uṇādayaḥ avyutpannāni prātipadikāni .
GS24pmbhasuu:26003: 107.5-7 titutreṣu agrahādīnām . titutreṣu agrahādīnām iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . nigṛhitiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26008: 107.9-115.2 ekājgrahaṇam kimartham . ekājgrahaṇam jāgartyartham . ekājgrahaṇam kriyate jāgarteḥ iṭpratiṣedhaḥ mā bhūt iti . jāgaritā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26009: jāgaritum . na etat asti prayojanam . upadeśe anudāttāt iti ucyate jāgartiḥ ca upadeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:26010: udāttaḥ . na brūmaḥ ihārtham jāgartyartham ekājgrahaṇam kartavyam iti . kim tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:26011: . uttarārtham . śryukaḥ kiti iti iṭpratiṣedham vakṣyati saḥ jāgarteḥ mā bhūt . jāgaritaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26012: jāgaritavān iti . etat api na asti prayojanam . jāgarteḥ guṇaḥ ucyate vṛddhiviṣaye
GS24pmbhasuu:26013: pratiṣedhaviṣaye ca saḥ bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . tatra guṇe kṛte raparatve ca kṛte anugantatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:26014: iṭpratiṣedhaḥ na bhaviṣyati . nanu ca upadeśādhikārāt prāpnoti . upadeśagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:26017: ittvottvayoḥ kṛtayoḥ raparatve ca anugantatvāt iṭpratiṣedhaḥ na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26018: doṣaḥ . ānupūrvyā siddham etat . na atra akṛte iṭpratiṣedhe ittvottve prāpnutaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:26019: kim kāraṇam . na ktvā seṭ iti kittvapratiṣedhāt . idam tarhi . ātistīrṣati ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26020: nipupūrṣati . ittvottvayoḥ kṛtayoḥ raparatve cxa anugantatvāt iṭpratiṣedhaḥ na prāpnoti . mā bhūt evam śryukaḥ kiti iti . iṭ sani vā iti evam bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi . āstīrṇam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26021: nipūrtāḥ piṇḍāḥ . ittvottvayoḥ kṛtayoḥ raparatve ca anugantatvāt iṭpratiṣedhaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:26022: prāpnoti . mā bhūt evam . iṭ sani vā iti sani vibhāṣā yasya vibhāṣā iti pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26023: bhaviṣyati . ihārtham eva tarhi vadhyartham ekājgrahaṇam kartavyam . vadhaḥ iṭpratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26024: mā bhūt iti . vadhiṣīṣṭa iti . etat api na asti prayojanam . kriyamāṇe api vā ekājgrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:26025: vadhaḥ iṭpratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . vadhiṣīṣṭa iti . kim kāraṇam . vadhaḥ iṭpratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26026: sannipāte ekāctvāt prakṛteḥ ca anudāttatvāt . sannipāte ca eva hi vadhiḥ ekāc śrūyate
GS24pmbhasuu:26027: prakṛtiḥ ca asya anudāttā . kim punaḥ kāraṇam evam vijñāyate upadeśe anudāttāt ekācaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26028: śrūyamāṇāt iti . yaṅlopārtham . yaṅlope mā bhūt iti . bebhiditā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26031: cecchiditum . ekācaḥ upadeśe anudāttāt iti upadeśavacanam anudāttaviśeṣaṇam cet kṛñādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26032: liṭi niyamānupapattiḥ aprāptatvāt pratiṣedhasya . ekācaḥ upadeśe anudāttāt iti upadeśavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:26033: anudāttaviśeṣaṇam cet kṛñādibhyaḥ liṭi niyamasya anupapattiḥ . kim kāraṇam . aprāptatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:26034: pratiṣedhasya . dvirvacane kṛte upadeśe anudāttāt ekācaḥ śrūyamāṇāt iti iṭpratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26035: na prāpnoti . asati iṭpratiṣedhe niyamaḥ na upapadyate . asati niyame kaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:26036: tatra pacādibhyaḥ iḍvacanam . tatra pacādibhyaḥ iṭ vaktavyaḥ . pecima ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26037: śekima . sanaḥ ca iṭpratiṣedhaḥ . sanaḥ ca iṭpratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . bibhitsati ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26038: cicchitsati . dvirvacane kṛte upadeśe anudāttāt ekācaḥ śrūyamāṇāt iti iṭpratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26039: na prāpnoti . iha ca nīttaḥ tatve kṛte anackatvāt iṭpratiṣedhaḥ na prāpnoti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:26040: eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ānupūrvyā siddham etat . na atra akṛte iṭpratiṣedhe tatvam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:26041: . kim kāraṇam . ti kiti iti ucyate . yat api ucyate ekācaḥ upadeśe anudāttāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:26042: upadeśavacanam anudāttaviśeṣaṇam cet kṛñādibhyaḥ liṭi niyamānupapattiḥ aprāptatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:26043: pratiṣedhasya iti mā bhūt niyamaḥ . nanu ca uktam tatra pacādibhyaḥ iḍvacanam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:26044: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . uktam tatra thalgrahaṇasya prayojanam samuccayaḥ yathā vijñāyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:26045: thali ca seṭi kṅiti ca seṭi iti . yat api ucyate sanaḥ ca iṭpratiṣedhaḥ iti . ubhayaviśeṣaṇatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:26046: siddham . ubhayam upadeśagrahaṇena viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . upadeśe anudāttāt upadeśe ekācaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26047: iti . yaṅlope ca tadantadvirvacanāt . sanyaṅantasya sthāne dvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:26048: tatra sampramugdhatvāt prakṛtipratyayasya naṣṭaḥ saḥ bhavati yaḥ saḥ ekājupadeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:26049: anudāttaḥ . atha api dviḥprayogaḥ dvirvacanam evam api na doṣaḥ . na hi asya bhidyupadeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:26050: upadeśaḥ . atha api bhidyupadeśe upadeśaḥ evam api na doṣaḥ . akāreṇa vyavahitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:26051: na bhaviṣyati . nanu ca lope kṛte na asti vyavadhānam . sthānivadbhāvāt vyavadhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:26052: eva . na sidhyati . pūrvavidhau sthānivadbhāvaḥ na ca ayam pūrvavidhiḥ . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:26053: pūrvasmāt api vidhiḥ pūrvavidhiḥ . kaḥ punaḥ upadeśaḥ nyāyyaḥ . yaḥ kṛtsnaḥ . kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26054: ca kṛtsnaḥ . yaḥ ubhayoḥ . yadi tarhi yaḥ ubhayoḥ saḥ kṛtsnaḥ saḥ ca nyāyyaḥ vadhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26055: iṭpratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . āvadhiṣīṣṭa iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ādyudāttanipātanam kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:26056: saḥ nipātanasvaraḥ prakṛtisvarasya bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . evam api upadeśivadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26057: vaktavyaḥ . yathā eva hi saḥ nipātanasvaraḥ prakṛtisvaram bādhate evam pratyayasvaram api bādheta :
GS24pmbhasuu:26058: āvadhiṣīṣṭa iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ārdhadhātukīyāḥ sāmānyena bhavanti anavasthiteṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:26059: pratyayeṣu . tatra ārdhadhātukasāmānye vadhibhāve kṛte satiśiṣṭatvāt pratyayasvaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26060: bhaviṣyati . atha ke punaḥ anudāttāḥ . ādantāḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26061: adaridrāḥ . ivarṇāntāḥ ca aśviśriḍīśīdīdhīvevīṅaḥ . uvarṇāntāḥ yuruṇukṣukṣṇusnūrṇuvarjam
GS24pmbhasuu:26068: 115.4-7 kṛñaḥ asuṭaḥ . kṛñaḥ asuṭaḥ iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . sañcaskariva ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26069: sañcaskarima . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . guṇe kṛte raparatve ca anugantatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:26070: iṭpratiṣedhaḥ na bhaviṣyati . evam api upadeśādhikārāt prāpnoti . tasmāt asuṭaḥ iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:26072: 115-116 śvigrahaṇam kimartham na prasāraṇe kṛte prasāraṇapūrvatve ca ugantāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:26073: eva siddham . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . śvigrahaṇam idantatvāt upadeśasya . śvigrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:26074: kriyate idantatvāt upadeśasya . upadeśaḥ ugantāt iti ucyate śvayatiḥ ca upadeśaḥ idantaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:26076: 117 yasya vibhāṣā avideḥ . yasya vibhāṣā avideḥ iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . viditaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26077: viditavān iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . yadupādheḥ vibhāṣā tadupādheḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . śābvikaraṇasya vibhāṣā lugvikaraṇaḥ ca ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:26079: 117.8-118.2 kimarthaḥ yogavibhāgaḥ na āditaḥ vibhāṣā bhāvādikarmaṇoḥ iti eva ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:26080: . kena idānīm kartari pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati . yasya vibhāṣā iti anena . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:26081: siddhe sati yat yogavibhāgam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ yadupādheḥ vibhāṣā tadupādheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26082: pratiṣedhaḥ iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . yasya vibhāṣā avideḥ iti uktam

GS24pmbhasuu:26099: 119.16-120.10 dṛḍhanipātanam kimartham na dṛheḥ na iṭ bhavati iti eva ucyeta . dṛḍhanipātanam
GS24pmbhasuu:26100: nakārahakāralopārtham parasya ca ḍatvārtham . dṛḍhanipātanam kriyate nakārahakāralopārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:26101: . nakārahakāralopaḥ yathā syāt . parasya ca ḍhatvārtham . parasya ca ḍhatvam yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:26102: syāt . aniḍvacane hi rabhāvāprasiddhiḥ alaghutvāt . aniḍvacane hi rabhāvasya aprasiddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26103: . draḍhīyān . kim kāraṇam . alaghutvāt . nalopavacanam ca . nalopaḥ ca vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26104: . iha ca paridraḍhayya gataḥ lyapi laghupūrvasya iti ayādeśaḥ na syāt . iha ca pāridṛḍhī
GS24pmbhasuu:26107: 120.12-113.5 parivṛḍhaḥ iti kimartham nipātyate na paripūrvāt vṛheḥ na iṭ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:26108: iti eva ucyeta . parivṛḍhanipātanam ca . kim . nakārahakāralopārtham parasya ca ḍhatvārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:26109: aniḍvacane hi rabhāvāprasiddhiḥ alaghutvāt nalopavacanam ca iti eva . parivraḍhīyān
GS24pmbhasuu:26110: iti raḥ ṛtaḥ halādeḥ laghoḥ iti rabhāvaḥ na syāt . iha ca parivraḍhayya gataḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:26111: lyapi laghupūrvasya iti ayādeśaḥ na syāt . iha ca pārivṛḍhī kanyā iti gurūpottamalakṣaṇaḥ ṣyaṅ prasajyeta .
GS24pmbhasuu:26113: 121.7-11 kimartham aviśabdane iti ucyate na viśabdane curādiṇicā bhavitavyam . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:26114: tarhi siddhe sati yat ayam aviśabdane iti āha tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ viśabdane ghuṣeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26115: vibhāṣā ṇic bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . mahīpālavacaḥ śrutvā jughuṣuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26118: 122.2-123.10 kim idam adhyayanābhidhāyikāyām niṣṭhāyām nipātanam kriyate āhosvit
GS24pmbhasuu:26119: adhyayane cet vṛtiḥ vartate iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi adhyayanābhidhāyikāyām niṣṭhāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:26120: nipātanam kriyate siddham vṛttaḥ guṇaḥ vṛttam pārāyaṇam vṛttam guṇasya vṛttam pārāyaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:26121: iti na sidhyati . atha vijñāyate adhyayane cet vṛtiḥ vartate iti na doṣaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:26122: . yathā na doṣaḥ tathā astu . adhyayane cet vṛtiḥ vartate iti api vai vijñāyamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:26123: na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . vṛtiḥ ayam akarmakaḥ . akarmakāḥ ca api ṇyantāḥ sakarmakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26124: bhavanti . akarmkaḥ ca atra vṛtiḥ . katham punaḥ jñāyate akarmakaḥ atra vṛtiḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:26125: . akarmakāṇām bhāve ktaḥ bhavati iti evam atra bhāve ktaḥ bhavati . tatra uditaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26126: ktvi vibhāṣā yasya vibhāṣā iti iṭpratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati . atha ṇigrahaṇam kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:26127: . vṛttanipātane ṇigrahaṇam aṇyantasya avadhāraṇapratiṣedhārtham . vṛttanipātane ṇigrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:26128: kriyate aṇyantasya avadhāraṇam mā bhūt iti . kaimarthakyāt niyamaḥ bhavati . vidheyam
GS24pmbhasuu:26129: na asti iti kṛtvā . iha ca asti vidheyam . kim . ṇyadhikāt vṛteḥ iṭpratiṣedhaḥ vidheyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26130: . tatra apūrvaḥ vidhiḥ astu niyamaḥ astu iti apūrvaḥ eva vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati na niyamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26131: . kutaḥ nu khalu etat adhikārthe ārambhe sati ṇyadhikasya bhaviṣyati na punaḥ sanadhikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:26132: vā syāt yaṅadhikasya vā iti . tasmāt ṇigrahaṇam kartavyam . atha kimartham nipātanam
GS24pmbhasuu:26133: kriyate . nipātanam ṇilpeḍguṇapratiṣedhārtham . nipātanam kriyate ṇilpārtham iḍguṇapratiṣedhārtham ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:26135: 124.2-12 dāntaśāntayoḥ kim nipātyate . dāntaśāntayoḥ upadhādīrghatvam ca . kim ca
GS24pmbhasuu:26136: . ṇilopeṭpratiṣedhau ca . upadhādīrghatvam anipātyam . vṛddhyā siddham . na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:26137: . mitām hrasvaḥ iti hrasvatvena bhavitavyam . evam tarhi anunāsikasya kvijhaloḥ kṅiti
GS24pmbhasuu:26138: iti evam atra dīrghatvam bhaviṣyati . na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . ṇicā vyavahitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:26139: . ṇilope kṛte na asti vyavadhānam . sthānivadbhāvāt vyavadhānam eva . pratiṣidhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:26140: atra sthānivadbhāvaḥ dīrghavidhim prati na sthānivat iti . atha spaṣṭacchannayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26141: kim nipātyate . spaṣṭacchannayoḥ upadhāhrasvatvam ca . kim ca . ṇilopeṭpratiṣedhau
GS24pmbhasuu:26143: 124.14-22 ghuṣisvanoḥ vāvacanam iṭpratiṣedhāt vipratiṣedhena . ghuṣisvanoḥ vāvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:26144: iṭpratiṣedhāt bhavati vipratiṣedhena . ghuṣeḥ iṭpratiṣedhasya avakāśaḥ asampūrvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:26146: ghuṣṭaḥ mārgaḥ . vāvacanasya avakāśaḥ sampūrvāt viśabdanam . saṅghuṣṭam vākyam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26147: saṅghuṣitam vākyam . sampūrvāt aviśabdane ubhayam prāpnoti . saṅghuṣṭā rajjuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26148: saṅghuṣitā rajjuḥ . vāvacanam bhavati vipratiṣedhena . svanaḥ iṭpratiṣedhasya avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26149: anāṅpūrvāt mano'bhidhānam . svāntam manaḥ . vāvacanasya avakāśaḥ aṅpūrvāt amano'bhidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:26151: āsvanitaḥ devadattaḥ . āṅpūrvāt mano'bhidhāne ubhayam prāpnoti . āsvāntam manaḥ . āsvanitam manaḥ . vāvacanam bhavati vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:26153: 125.2-6 hṛṣeḥ lomakeśakartṛkasya iti vaktavyam . hṛṣṭāni lomāni ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26160: hṛṣitam keśaiḥ . vismitapratīghātayoḥ iti vaktavyam . hṛṣṭaḥ devadattaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26165: 125.8-9 apacitaḥ iti kim nipātyate . cāyaḥ cibhāvaḥ nipātyate . apacitaḥ . ktini nityam iti vaktavyam . apacitiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:26168: vijñāyeta . valādeḥ ārdhadhātukasya iti . atha akriyamāṇe ārdhadhātukagrahaṇe kasya
GS24pmbhasuu:26169: valādigrahaṇam viśeṣaṇam syāt . aṅgasya iti vartate . aṅgaviśeṣaṇam . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26170: . aṅgasya valādeḥ āditaḥ iṭ prasajyeta āḍāḍvat . tat yathā āḍāṭau aṅgasya āditaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26171: bhavataḥ tadvat . kriyamāṇe api ārdhadhātukagrahaṇe aniṣṭam śakyam vijñātum . valādeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26172: ārdhadhātukasya yat aṅgam iti . akriyamāṇe ca iṣṭam . aṅgasya yaḥ valādiḥ iti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:26173: ca aṅgasya valādiḥ . nimittam . yasmin aṅgam iti etat bhavati . kasmin ca etat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:26174: . pratyaye . yāvatā kriyamāṇe ca aniṣṭam vijñāyate akriyamāṇe ca iṣṭam tatra akriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:26175: eva iṣṭam vijñāsyāmaḥ . idam tarhi prayojanam . iha mā bhūt . āste,
GS24pmbhasuu:26176: śete . etat api na asti prayojanam . rudādibhyaḥ sārvadhātuke iti etanniyamārtham bhaviṣyati . rudādibhyaḥ eva sārvadhātukaḥ iṭ bhavati na anyebhyaḥ iti . evam api vṛkṣatvam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26177: vṛkṣatā atra prāpnoti . evam tarhi vihitaviśeṣaṇam dhātugrahaṇam . dhātoḥ yaḥ vihitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26178: . nanu dhātoḥ eva ayam vihitaḥ . na ca ayam dhātoḥ iti evam vihitaḥ . kva punaḥ dhātugrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:26179: prakṛtam . ṛtaḥ it dhātoḥ iti . tat vai ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭam pañcamīnirdiṣṭena ca iha
GS24pmbhasuu:26180: vihitaḥ śakyate viśeṣayitum . atha idānīm ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭena ca api vihitaḥ śakyate
GS24pmbhasuu:26183: 127.2-130.4 snukramoḥ anātmanepadanimitte cet kṛti upasaṅkhyānam . snukramoḥ anātmanepadanimitte cet kṛti upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . prasnavitā
GS24pmbhasuu:26188: prakramitavyam . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . aviśeṣeṇa snukramoḥ iḍāgamam
GS24pmbhasuu:26189: uktvā ātmanepadapare na iti vakṣyāmi . ātmanepadaparapratiṣedhe tatparaparasīyuḍekādeśeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:26190: pratiṣedhaḥ . ātmanepadaparapratiṣedhe ca tatparaparasīyuḍekādeśeṣu pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26196: prakraṃsyante . ekādeśe kṛte vyapavargābhāvāt na prāpnoti . antādivadbhāvena vyapavargaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26197: . ubhayataḥ āśraye na antādivat . evam tarhi ekādeśaḥ pūrvavidhim prati sthānivat
GS24pmbhasuu:26198: bhavati iti sthānivadbhāvāt vyapavargaḥ . tatparaparasīyuṭoḥ tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26199: . siddham tu snoḥ ātmanepadena samānapadasthasya iṭpratiṣedhāt . siddham etat . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:26200: . snoḥ ātmanepadena samānapadasthasya na iṭ bhavati iti vaktavyam . yadi snoḥ ātmanepadena
GS24pmbhasuu:26201: samānapadasthasya iṭ na bhavati iti ucyate prasnavitā iva ācarati prasnavitrīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:26202: atra na prāpnoti . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇam atra ātmanepadam . kramoḥ ca . kramoḥ ca ātmanepadena
GS24pmbhasuu:26203: samānapadasthasya iṭ na bhavati iti vaktavyam . atha kimartham krameḥ pṛthaggrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:26204: kriyate na snukramibhyām iti eva ucyeta . kartari ca ātmanepadaviṣayāt kṛti na iti
GS24pmbhasuu:26205: vakṣyatgi tat krameḥ eva syāt snoḥ mā bhūt . vyatiprasnavitārau ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26206: vyatiprasnativāraḥ . kartari ca ātmanepadaviṣayāt kṛti . kartari ca ātmanepadaviṣayāt kṛti pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . prakrantā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26207: upakrantā . tat tarhi idam bahu vaktavyam . snoḥ ātmanepadena samānapadasthasya iṭ
GS24pmbhasuu:26208: na bhavati iti vaktavyam . krameḥ ca iti vaktavyam . kartari ca ātmanepadaviṣayāt
GS24pmbhasuu:26209: kṛti iti vaktavyam . sūtram ca bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam snukramoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26210: anātmanepadanimitte cet kṛti upasaṅkhyānam iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . snukramī eva ātmanepadanimittatvena
GS24pmbhasuu:26211: viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . na cet snukramī ātmanepadasya nimitte iti . katham punaḥ dhātuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26212: nāma ātmanepadasya nimittam syāt . dhātuḥ eva nimittam . āha hi bhagavān anudāttaṅitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26213: ātmanepadam śeṣāt kartari parasmaipadam iti . yatra tarhi dhātuḥ na āśrīyate bhāvakarmaṇoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26214: iti . atra api dhātuḥ eva āśrīyate . bhāvakarmavṛttāt dhātoḥ iti . katham prakramitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:26215: . sati ātmanepade nimittaśabdaḥ vartate . katham prakrantā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26216: upakrantā . tasmāt asati api . katham prakramitavyam . tasmāt sati eva . katham prakrantā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26217: upakrantā . vaktavyam eva etat kartari ca ātmanepadaviṣayāt kṛti iti . atha vā kṛti iti vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:26219: 131.5-135.9 graheḥ dīrghatve iḍgrahaṇam . graheḥ dīrghatve iḍgrahaṇam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:26220: iṭaḥ dīrghaḥ iti vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam .
GS24pmbhasuu:26221: ārdhadhātukasya iṭ valādeḥ iti . evam api kartavyam eva . agrahaṇe hi asampratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26222: ṣaṣṭhyabhāvāt . akriyamāṇe hi iḍgrahaṇe asampratyayaḥ syāt . kim kāraṇam . ṣaṣṭhyabhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:26223: . ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭasya ādeśāḥ ucyante na ca atra ṣaṣṭhīm paśyāmaḥ . kriyamāṇe ca api
GS24pmbhasuu:26224: iḍgrahaṇe . ciṇvadiṭaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . ciṅvaditaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . grāhiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:26225: . yaṅlope ca . yaṅlope ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . jarīgṛhitā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26227: jarīgṛhitavyam . yadi punaḥ iṭ dīrghaḥ āgamāntaram vijñāyeta . iṭ dīrghaḥ iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:26228: vipratiṣiddham . iṭ dīrghaḥ iti cet vipratiṣiddham bhavati . yadi iṭ na dīrghaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:26229: atha dīrghaḥ na iṭ . iṭ dīrghaḥ ca iti vipratiṣiddham . pratiṣiddhasya ca punarvidhāne
GS24pmbhasuu:26230: dīrghatvābhāvaḥ . pratiṣiddhasya ca punarvidhāne dīrghatvasya abhāvaḥ . vuvūrṣate ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26232: vavarīṣate . atra api iṭ dīrghaḥ iti anuvartiṣyate . yat tarhi videśastham pratiṣidhya
GS24pmbhasuu:26233: punarvidhānam tat na sidhyati . jṝvraścyoḥ ktvi . śryukaḥ kiti iti anena pratiṣiddhe
GS24pmbhasuu:26235: jarītvā . īṭaḥ vidhiḥ iṭaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . yathāprāptaḥ iṭ dīrghaḥ bhaviṣyati . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:26236: tarhi iṭaḥ grahaṇe īṭaḥ grahaṇam na bhavati jarītvā na ktvā seṭ iti kittvapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26237: na prāpnoti . iha ca agrhīt iti iṭaḥ īṭi iti sijlopaḥ na prāpnoti . iha ca agrahīt
GS24pmbhasuu:26238: na iṭi iti vṛddhipratiṣedhaḥ na prāpnoti . mā bhūt evam . hmyantānām iti evam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:26239: . atra api na iṭ iti eva anuvartate . tat ca avaśyam iḍgrahaṇam anuvartyam adhākṣīt
GS24pmbhasuu:26241: agrahīḍhvam vibhāṣā iṭaḥ iti mūrdhanyaḥ na prāpnoti . tasmāt na evam śakyam vaktum
GS24pmbhasuu:26242: iṭaḥ grahaṇe īṭaḥ grahaṇam na bhavati iti . bhavati cet pratiṣiddhasya ca punarvidhāne
GS24pmbhasuu:26243: dīrghābhāvaḥ iti eva . tasmāt aśakyaḥ iṭ dīrghaḥ āgamāntaram vijñātum . na cet vijñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:26244: iṭaḥ grahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . ārdhadhātukasya iti vartate . grahaḥ parasya
GS24pmbhasuu:26245: ārdhadhātukasya dīrghatvam vakṣyāmi . iha api tarhi prāpnoti . grahaṇam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26246: grahaṇīyam . valādeḥ iti vartate . evam api grahītā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26247: grahītum atra na prāpnoti . bhūtapūrvagatyā bhaviṣyati . evam api grāhakaḥ atra prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:26248: . kim ca iṭpratīghātena khalu api dīrghatvam ucyamānam iṭam bādhate . tasmāt iṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26249: grahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . ārdhadhātukasya
GS24pmbhasuu:26250: iṭ valādeḥ iti . nanu ca uktam evam api kartavyam eva agrahaṇe hi asampratyayaḥ ṣaṣṭhyanirdeśāt
GS24pmbhasuu:26251: iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . grhaḥ iti eṣā pañcamī iṭ iti prathamāyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayiṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:26252: tasmāt iti uttarasya iti . evam ca kṛtvā saḥ api adoṣaḥ bhavati yat uktam ciṇvadiṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26253: pratiṣedhaḥ iti . katham . prakṛtasya iṭaḥ idam dīrghatvam na ca ciṇvadiṭ prakṛtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26254: . yaṅlope katham . yaṅlope ca uktam iṭi sarvatra . kva sarvatra . yadi eva prakṛtasya
GS24pmbhasuu:26255: iṭaḥ dīrghatvam atha api iṭ dīrghaḥ āgamāntaram vijñāyeta . yaṅlope ca uktam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:26258: 136.2-139.5 atha vā iti vartamāne punaḥ vāvacanam kimartham . punaḥ vāvacanam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:26259: liṅsicoḥ nivṛttyartham . punaḥ vāvacanam kriyate liṅsicoḥ nivṛttyartham . atha kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:26260: sūtisūyatyoḥ pṛthaggrahaṇam kriyate . suvateḥ mā bhūt . atha kimartham dhūñaḥ sānubandhakasya
GS24pmbhasuu:26261: grahaṇam kriyate . dhuvateḥ mā bhūt iti . kim punaḥ iyam prāpte vibhāṣā āhosvit aprāpte
GS24pmbhasuu:26262: . katham ca prāpte katham vā aprāpte . yadi svaratiḥ udāttaḥ tataḥ prāpte . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:26263: anudāttaḥ tataḥ aprāpte . svaratiḥ udāttaḥ . svaratiḥ udāttaḥ paṭhyate . kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:26264: tarhi vāvacanam . vāvacanam nivṛttyartham . vāvacanam kriyate nivṛttyartham . anudātte
GS24pmbhasuu:26265: hi kiti vāprasaṅgaḥ pratiṣidhya punaḥ vidhānāt . anudātte hi sati kiti vibhāṣā prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:26266: . svṛtvā . pratiṣidhya punaḥ vidhānāt . pratiṣidhya kila ayam punaḥ vidhīyate . saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26267: yathā eva ekājlakṣaṇam pratiṣedham bādhate evam śryukaḥ kiti iti etam api bādheta
GS24pmbhasuu:26268: . yadi tarhi udāttaḥ svaratiḥ paṭhiṣyati vipratiṣedham svarateḥ veṭtvāt ṛtaḥ sye
GS24pmbhasuu:26269: vipratiṣedhena iti saḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ na upapadyate . kim kāraṇam . saḥ vidhiḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:26270: pratiṣedhaḥ vidhipratiṣedhayoḥ ca ayuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . saḥ api vidhiḥ na mṛdūnām
GS24pmbhasuu:26271: iva kārpāsānām kṛtaḥ pratiṣedhaviṣaye ārabhyate . saḥ yathā eva ekājlakṣaṇam pratiṣedham
GS24pmbhasuu:26272: bādhate evam imam api bādhiṣyate . atha vā yena na aprāpte tasya bādhanam bhavati
