GS24pmbhasuu:26273: na ca aprāpte valādilakṣaṇe iyam vibhāṣā ārabhyate syalakṣaṇe punaḥ prāpte ca aprāpte
GS24pmbhasuu:26274: ca . atha vā madhye apavādāḥ pūrvān vidhīn bādhante iti evam iyam vibhāṣā valādilakṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:26275: iṭam bādhiṣyate syalakṣaṇam na bādhiṣyate . atha vā punaḥ astu anudāttaḥ . nanu ca
GS24pmbhasuu:26276: uktam anudātte hi kiti vāprasaṅgaḥ pratiṣidhya punaḥ vidhānāt iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26277: . yena na aprāpte tasya bādhanam bhavati na ca aprāpte ekājlakṣaṇe pratiṣedhe iyam
GS24pmbhasuu:26278: vibhāṣā ārabhyate śryukaḥ kiti iti etasmin punaḥ prāpte ca aprāpte ca . atha vā śryukaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26279: kiti iti eṣaḥ yogaḥ udāttārthaḥ ca yebhyaḥ ca anudāttebhyaḥ iṭ prāpyate tadbādhanārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26280: ca . atha vā śryukaḥ kiti iti iha anuvartiṣyate . atha vā ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:26281: na iyam vibhāṣā uglakṣaṇasya pratiṣedhasya viṣaye bhavati iti yat ayam sanīvantardhabhrasjadambhuśrisvṛyūrṇubharajñapisanām
GS24pmbhasuu:26284: 139.7-12 iṭ iti vartamāne punaḥ iḍgrahaṇam kimartham . iḍgrahaṇam nityārtham . nityaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26285: ayam ārambhaḥ . na etat asti prayojanam . siddhā atra vibhaṣā pūrveṇa eva tatra ārambhasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:26286: nityaḥ vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati . na atra pūrveṇa vibhāṣā prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . yasya
GS24pmbhasuu:26287: vibhāṣā iti pratiṣedhāt . tatra ārambhasāmarthyāt vibhaṣā labhyeta punaḥ iḍgrahaṇāt iṭ eva bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:26289: 140.1-3 iṣeḥ takāre śyanpratyayāt pratiṣedhaḥ . iṣeḥ takāre śyanpratyayāt pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . iha mā bhūt . preṣitā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26293: 140.5-7 iṭ iti vartamāne punaḥ iḍgrahaṇam kimartham . punaḥ iḍgrahaṇam nityārtham . iṭ iti vartamāne punaḥ iḍgrahaṇam kriyate nityārtham . nityārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:26295: 140.9-141.2 gameḥ iṭ parasmaipadeṣu cet kṛti upasaṅkhyānam . gameḥ iṭ parasmaipadeṣu cet kṛti upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . jigamiṣitā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26297: jigamiṣitavyam . tat tarhi upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . na kartavyam . aviśeṣeṇa gameḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26298: iḍāgamam uktvā ātmanepadapare na iti vakṣyāmi . ātmanepadaparapratiṣedhe uktam .
GS24pmbhasuu:26299: kim uktam . ātmanepadaparapratiṣedhe tatparaparasīyuḍekādeśeṣu pratiṣedhaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:26300: iha api ātmanepadaparapratiṣedhe tatparaparasīyuḍekādeśeṣu pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26301: . taparapare tāvat . saṅjigaṃsiṣyate . sīyuṭi . saṅgaṃsīṣṭa . ekādeśe . saṅgaṃsyante
GS24pmbhasuu:26302: . ekādeśe kṛte vyapavargābhāvāt na prāpnoti . siddham tu gameḥ ātmanepadena samānapadasthasya
GS24pmbhasuu:26303: iṭpratiṣedhāt . siddham etat . katham . gameḥ ātmanepadena samānapadastheṇa na bhavati iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:26305: 141.3-142.9 vṛtādipratiṣedhe ca . kim . kṛti upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:26307: vivṛtsitavyam . tat tarhi upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . na kartavyam . aviśeṣeṇa vṛtādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26308: iṭpratiṣedham uktvā ātmanepadaparaḥ iṭ bhavati iti vakṣyāmi . ātmanepadapare iḍvacane
GS24pmbhasuu:26310: iṭ vaktavyaḥ . taparapare tāvat . vivartiṣiṣyate . sīyuṭi . vartiṣīṣṭa . ekādeśe . vartiṣyante ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26311: vardhiṣyante . siddham tu vṛtādīnām ātmanepadena samānapadasthasya iḍvacanāt . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:26312: etat . katham . vṛtādīnām ātmanepadena samānapdasthasya iṭ bhavati iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:26313: . catustāsikḷpigrahaṇānarthakyam ca . caturgrahaṇam ca anarthakam . sarvebhyaḥ hi
GS24pmbhasuu:26314: vṛtādibhyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ iṣyate . tāsigrahaṇam ca anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . nivṛttatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:26315: sakārasya . nivṛttam sakārādau iti . tāsgrahaṇe ca idānīm akriyamāṇe kḷpigrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:26316: api na arthaḥ eṣaḥ api hi vṛtādiḥ pañcamaḥ . bhavet kḷpigrahaṇam na kartavyam tāsgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:26317: tu kartavyam . yat hi tat sakārādau iti na tat śakyam nivartayitum tṛci api hi prasajyeta . vartitā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26318: vardhitā . tāsgrahaṇe ca idānīm kriyamāṇe kḷpigrahaṇam api kartavyam anyebhyaḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:26319: vṛtādibhyaḥ tāsau mā bhūt iti . bhavet tāsgrahaṇam kartavyam kḷpigrahaṇam tu na eva
GS24pmbhasuu:26320: kartavyam . anyebhyaḥ api vṛtādibhyaḥ tāsau kasmāt na bhavati . parasmaipadeṣu iti
GS24pmbhasuu:26321: vartate kḷpeḥ eva ca tāsparasmaipadaparaḥ na anyebhyaḥ vṛtādibhyaḥ . yadi evam tāsgrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:26322: api na arthaḥ . tṛci kasmāt na bhavati . parasmaipadeṣu iti vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:26324: 143.2-144.5 tāsau atvatpratiṣedhe ghaseḥ pratiṣedhaprasaṅgaḥ akāravattvāt . tāsau
GS24pmbhasuu:26325: atvatpratiṣedhe ghaseḥ pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . jaghasitha . kim kāraṇam . akāravattvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:26326: . saḥ api hi akāravān . siddham tu halādigrahaṇāt . siddham etat . katham . halādigrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:26327: kartavyam . tat ca avaśyam kartavyam . aṭhyaśī prayojayataḥ . āthyaśī tāvat na prayojayataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26328: . kim kāraṇam . tāsau aniṭaḥ iti ucyate seṭau ca imau tāsau . añjvaśū tarhi prayojayataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26329: . añjvaśū ca api na prayojayataḥ . kim kāraṇam . tāsau nityāniṭaḥ iti ucyate vibhāṣiteṭau
GS24pmbhasuu:26330: ca etau . adiḥ tarhi prayojayati . āditha . kriyamāṇe api vai halādigrahaṇe atra
GS24pmbhasuu:26331: prāpnoti . jaghasitha . eṣaḥ api halādiḥ . tasya ca abhāvāt tāsau . tāsau aniṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26332: iti ucyate na ca ghasiḥ tāsau asti . nanu ca yaḥ tāsau na asti aniṭ api asau tāsau
GS24pmbhasuu:26333: bhavati . na evam vijñāyate yaḥ tāsau aniṭ iti . katham tarhi . yaḥ tāsau asti aniṭ
GS24pmbhasuu:26334: ca iti . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . saptamyarthe
GS24pmbhasuu:26335: api vai vatiḥ bhavati . tat yathā . mathurāyām iva mathurāvat . pāṭaliputre iva pāṭaliputravat
GS24pmbhasuu:26338: 145.2-146.3 kimartham idam ucyate na acaḥ tāsvat thali aniṭaḥ nityam iti eva siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:26339: . evam tarhi niyamārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . ṛtaḥ eva bhāradvājasya na anyataḥ bhāradvājasya
GS24pmbhasuu:26341: vavitha iti . ṛtaḥ bhāradvājasya iti niyamānupapattiḥ aprāptatvāt pratiṣedhasya .
GS24pmbhasuu:26342: ṛtaḥ bhāradvājasya iti niyamānupapattiḥ . kim kāraṇam . aprāptatvāt pratiṣedhasya
GS24pmbhasuu:26343: . guṇe kṛte raparatve ca anajantatvāt pratiṣedhaḥ na prāpnoti . asati niyame kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26344: doṣaḥ . tatra pacādibhyaḥ iḍvacanam . tatra pacādibhyaḥ iṭ vaktavyaḥ . pecitha ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26345: śekitha iti . yadiḥ punaḥ ayam bhāradvājaḥ purastāt apakṛṣyeta . acaḥ tāsvat thali
GS24pmbhasuu:26346: aniṭaḥ nityam bhāradvājasya . upadeśe atvataḥ bhāradvājasya . tataḥ ṛtaḥ . bhāradvājasya
GS24pmbhasuu:26347: iti nivṛttam . sidhyate evam ayam tu bhāradvājaḥ svasmāt matāt pracyāvitaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:26348: . evam tarhi yogavibhāgāt siddham . yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . acaḥ tāsvat thali aniṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26349: nityam upadeśe . tataḥ atvataḥ . atvataḥ ca upadeśe iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:26351: 146.5-7 vṛgrahaṇam kimartham na kṛsṛbhṛvṛstudruśrusruvaḥ liṭi iti eva siddham . evam tarhi niyamārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . nigamaḥ eva yathā syāt . kva mā bhūt . vavaritha .
GS24pmbhasuu:26353: 147 kimartham idam ucyate . vasvekājādghasāṃvacanam niyamārtham . niyamārthaḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:26354: ārambhaḥ . vasau ekājāt ghasām eva . kva mā bhūt . bibhidvān . kim ucyate niyamārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:26355: iti na punaḥ vidhyarthaḥ api syāt . pratiṣedhaḥ api hi atra prāpnoti na iṭ vaśi kṛti
GS24pmbhasuu:26356: iti . kṛt ca eva hi ayam vaśādiḥ ca . evam tarhi kṛsṛbhṛvṛstudruśrusruvaḥ liṭi iti
GS24pmbhasuu:26357: etasmāt niyamāt atra iṭ bhaviṣyati . na atra tena pariprāpaṇam prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:26358: . prakṛtilakṣaṇasya pratiṣedhasya saḥ pratyārambhaḥ pratyayalakṣaṇaḥ ca ayam pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26359: . ubhayoḥ saḥ pratyārambhaḥ . katham jñāyate . vṛṅvṛñoḥ grahaṇāt . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam
GS24pmbhasuu:26360: . imau vṛṅvṛñau udāttau tayoḥ prakṛtilakṣaṇaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ na prāpnoti . paśyati tu
GS24pmbhasuu:26361: ācāryaḥ ubhayoḥ saḥ pratyārambhaḥ iti tataḥ vṛṅvṛñoḥ grahaṇam karoti . na khalu api
GS24pmbhasuu:26362: kaḥ cit ubhayavān pratiṣedhaḥ prakṛtilakṣaṇaḥ pratyayalakṣaṇaḥ ca . tulyajātīye asati
GS24pmbhasuu:26363: yathā eva prakṛtilakṣaṇasaya niyāmakaḥ bhavati evam pratyayalakṣaṇasya api niyāmakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26364: bhaviṣyati . atha yāvatā vasau ekājbhyaḥ iṭā bhavitavyam kaḥ nu atra viśeṣaḥ niyamārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:26365: vā sati vidhyarthe vā . na khalu kaḥ cit viśeṣaḥ . āhopuruṣikāmātram tu bhavān āha
GS24pmbhasuu:26366: vidhyartham iti . vayam tu brūmaḥ niyamārtham iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:26368: 148-149 atha ekājgrahaṇam kimartham . iha mā bhūt . bibhidvān ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26369: cicchidvān iti . kriyamāṇe api vā ekājgrahaṇe atra prāpnoti . eṣaḥ api hi ekāc .
GS24pmbhasuu:26370: evam tarhi kṛte dvirvacane yaḥ ekāc . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam
GS24pmbhasuu:26371: gaṃsyate . ekājgrahaṇasāmarthyāt . na hi kaḥ cit akṛte cirvacane enakāc asti yadartham
GS24pmbhasuu:26372: ekājgrahaṇam kriyate . nanu ca ayam asti jāgartiḥ . gāgṛvāṃsaḥ anu gman . yat tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:26373: ākāragrahaṇam karoti na hi kaḥ cit akṛte dvirvacane ākārāntaḥ anekāc asti . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:26374: ca ayam asti daridrātiḥ . na daridrāteḥ iṭā bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam . uktam etat
GS24pmbhasuu:26375: daridrāteḥ ārdhadhātuke lopaḥ siddhaḥ ca pratyayavidhau iti . yaḥ ca idānīm pratyayavidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:26376: siddhaḥ siddhaḥ asau iḍvidhau . evam api bhūtapūrvagatiḥ vijñāyeta . ākārāntaḥ yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26377: bhūtapūrvaḥ iti . ekājgrahaṇam eva tarhi jñāpakam . nanu ca uktam jāgartyartham etat
GS24pmbhasuu:26378: syāt . na ekam udāharaṇam ekājgrahaṇam prayojayati . yadi etāvat prayojanam syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:26381: 150-151 atha ghasigrahaṇam kimartha na ekāc iti eva siddham . ghasigrahaṇam anackatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:26382: . ghasigrahaṇam kriyate lope kṛte anackatvāt iṭ na prāpnoti . idam iha sampradhāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:26383: . iṭ kriyatām lopaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt iḍāgamaḥ . nityaḥ lopaḥ . kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:26384: api iṭi prāpnoti akṛte api . iṭ api nityaḥ . kṛte api lope prāpnoti akṛte api . anityaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26385: iṭ na hi kṛte lope prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . anackatvāt . evam tarhi dvirvacane kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:26386: abhyāse yaḥ akāraḥ tadāśrayaḥ iṭ bhaviṣyati . na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . dvitvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:26387: lopasya paratvāt . dvirvacanam kriyatām lopaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt lopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26388: . lope kṛte anackatvāt dvirvacanam na prāpnoti . ghasigrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na
GS24pmbhasuu:26389: doṣaḥ bhavati . katham . vacanāt iṭ bhaviṣyati . iṭi kṛte dvirvacanam kriyatām lopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26390: iti yadi api paratvāt lopaḥ sthānivadbhāvāt dvirvacanam bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:26393: dadṛśivān . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . dṛśeḥ iti vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:26395: 151.8-12 svarateḥ veṭtvāt ṛtaḥ sye vipratiṣedhena . svaratilakṣaṇāt vāvacanāt ṛtaḥ sye iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena . svaratilakṣaṇasya vāvacanasya avakāśaḥ . svartā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26396: svaritā . ṛtaḥ sye iti asya avakāśaḥ . kariṣyate ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26398: asvariṣyat . ṛtaḥ sye iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:26404: avāsīt . na etat asti . na asti atra viśeṣaḥ sati vā iṭi asati vā . idam tarhi . ayaṃsiṣṭām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26413: avāsiṣuḥ . idam ca api udāharaṇam . ayaṃsīt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26417: avāsīt . nanu ca uktam na asti atra viśeṣaḥ sati vā iṭi asati vā iti . ayam asti
GS24pmbhasuu:26418: viśeṣaḥ . yadi atra iṭ na syāt vṛddhiḥ prasajyeta . iṭi punaḥ sati na iṭi iti pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26419: siddhaḥ bhavati . mā bhūt evam hmyantānām iti evam bhaviṣyati . atra api na iṭi iti
GS24pmbhasuu:26420: anuvartate . tat ca avaśyam iḍgrahaṇam anuvartyam adhākṣīt iti evamartham . ākārāntāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26421: ca api padapūrvāḥ ekavacane udāharaṇam . mā hi yāsīt . yadi atra iṭ na syāt anudāttasya
GS24pmbhasuu:26422: īṭaḥ śravaṇam prasajyeta . iṭi punaḥ sati uktam etat arthavat tu sicaḥ citkaraṇasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:26423: hi iṭaḥ udāttatvam iti tatra ekādeśaḥ udāttena udāttaḥ iti udāttatvam siddham bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:26425: 152.13-153.4 kimarthaḥ yogavibhāgaḥ na iśīḍajanām sdhve iti eva ucyeta . īśaḥ dhve mā bhūt iti . iṣyate eva :
GS24pmbhasuu:26426: īśidhve iti . īḍajanoḥ tarhi se mā bhūt iti . iṣyate eva . īḍiṣe ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26427: janiṣe iti . īśaḥ tarhi sve mā bhūt iti . iṣyate eva . īśiṣva iti . se tarhi yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26428: svaśabdaḥ tatra yathā syāt kriyāsamabhihāre yaḥ svaśabdaḥ tatra mā bhūt iti . atra
GS24pmbhasuu:26429: api iṣyate . saḥ bhavān īśiṣva iti eva ayam īṣṭe iti . ātaḥ ca iṣyate evam hi āha
GS24pmbhasuu:26430: siddham tu loṇmadhyamapuruṣaikavacanasya kriyāsamabhihāre dvirvacanāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:26432: 154.1-6 kim sārvadhātukagrahaṇam anuvartate utāho na . kim ca arthaḥ anuvṛttyā . bāḍham arthaḥ yadi akārāt paraḥ yāśabdaḥ ārdhadhātukam asti . nanu ca ayam asti . cikīrṣyāt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26433: jihīrṣyāt . lopaḥ atra bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . kim tarhi asmin yoge udāharaṇam . pacet ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26434: yajet . atra api ataḥ dīrghaḥ yañi iti dīrghatvam prāpnoti . saḥ yathā eva ayādeśaḥ dīrghatvam bādhate evam lopam api bādheta . tasmāt sārvadhātukagrahaṇam anuvartyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:26436: 155.2-156.15 muki svare doṣaḥ . muki sati svare doṣaḥ bhavati . pacamānaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26437: yajamānaḥ . mukā vyavahitatvāt anudāttatvam na prāpnoti . nanu ca ayam muk adupadeśabhaktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26438: adupadeśagrahaṇena grāhiṣyate . na sidhyati . aṅgasya muk ucyate vikaraṇāntam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:26439: aṅgam saḥ ayam saṅghātabhaktaḥ aśakyaḥ adupadeśagrahaṇena grahītum . evam tarhi abhaktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26440: kariṣyate . abhakte ca . kim . svare doṣaḥ bhavati . pacamānaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26441: yajamānaḥ . mukā vyavahitatvāt anudāttatvam na prāpnoti . evam tarhi parādiḥ kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:26442: . parādau dīrghaprasaṅgaḥ . yadi parādiḥ kriyate ataḥ dīrghaḥ yañi iti dīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:26443: prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . tiṅi iti evam tat . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:26444: yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam muki svare doṣaḥ iti . parihṛtam etat adupadeśabhaktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26445: adupadeśagrahaṇena grāhiṣyate . nanu ca uktam aṅgasya muk ucyate vikaraṇāntam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:26446: aṅgam saḥ ayam saṅghātabhaktaḥ aśakyaḥ adupadeśagrahaṇena grahītum iti . atha ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:26447: adbhaktaḥ syāt gṛhyeta adupadeśagrahaṇena . bāḍham gṛhyeta . adbhaktaḥ tarhi bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:26448: . tat katham . ataḥ yā iyaḥ iti atra akāragrahaṇam pañcamīnirdiṣṭam aṅgasya iti ca
GS24pmbhasuu:26449: ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭam tatra aśakyam vivibhaktitvāt ataḥ iti pañcamyā aṅgam viśeṣayitum
GS24pmbhasuu:26450: . tat prakṛtam iha anuvartiṣyate . evam api ṣaṣṭhyabhāvāt na prāpnoti . ānaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:26451: eṣā saptamī ataḥ iti pañcamyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayiṣyati tasmin iti nirdiṣṭe pūrvasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:26453: 157.2-159.3 aṣṭanjanādipathimathyātveṣu āntaratamyāt anunāsikaprasaṅgaḥ . aṣṭanjanādipathimathyātveṣu āntaratamyāt anunāsikaḥ prāpnoti . aṣṭābhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26458: manthāḥ . siddham anaṇtvāt . siddham etat . katham . anaṇtvāt . katham anaṇtvam .
GS24pmbhasuu:26459: aṇsavarṇān gṛhṇāti iti ucyate na ca akāraḥ aṇ . uccāraṇasāmarthyāt vā . atha vā śuddhoccāraṇasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:26460: na bhaviṣyati . na etau staḥ parihārau . yat tāvat ucyate anaṇtvāt iti na brūmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26461: aṇsavarṇān gṛhṇāti iti . katham tarhi taparaḥ tatkālasya iti . yat api ucyate uccāraṇasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:26462: vā iti asti anyat uccāraṇe prayojanam . kim . uttarārtham . rāyaḥ hali iti . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:26463: tarhi na imau pṛthakparihārau . ekapariharaḥ ayam . siddham anaṇtvāt uccāraṇasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:26468: manthāḥ uccāraṇsāmarthyāt siddham . yadi evam pṛthakparihārayoḥ api na doṣaḥ . yaḥ yatra parihāraḥ saḥ tatra bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:26470: 159.5-6 anādeśagrahaṇam śakyam akartum . katham hali iti anuvartate na ca ādeśaḥ halādiḥ asti . tat etat anādeśagrahaṇam tiṣṭhatu tāvat sānnyāsikam
GS24pmbhasuu:26472: 159.8-9 ajgrahaṇam śakyam akartum . katham . aviśeṣeṇa yatvam utsargaḥ tasya halādau ātvam apavādaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:26474: 160.2-3 śeṣagrahaṇam śakyam akartum . katham . aviśeṣeṇa lopaḥ utsargaḥ tasya ajādau yatvam apavādaḥ halādau ātvam .
GS24pmbhasuu:26476: 160.5-162.2 parigrahaṇam śakyam akartum . māntasya iti eva siddham . na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:26477: . kim kāraṇam . antaśabdasya ubhayārthatvāt . katham . ayam antaśabdaḥ asti eva saha
GS24pmbhasuu:26478: tena vartate . tat yathā . maryādāntam devadattasya kṣetram . saha maryādayā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:26479: gamyate . asti prāk tasmāt vartate . tat yathā . nadyantam devadattasya kṣetram iti
GS24pmbhasuu:26480: . prāk nadyāḥ iti gamyate . tat yaḥ saha tena vartate tasya idam grahaṇam yathā vijñāyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:26481: . na etat asti prayojanam . sarvatra eva antaśabdaḥ saha tena vartate . atha katham
GS24pmbhasuu:26482: nadyantam devadattasya kṣetram iti . nadyāḥ kṣetratve sambhaḥ na asti iti kṛtvā prāk
GS24pmbhasuu:26483: nadyāḥ iti gamyate . avadhidyotanārtham tarhi parigrahaṇam kartavyam . māntasya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:26484: iyati ucyamāne yatra eva mānte yuṣmadasmadī tatra eva ādeśāḥ syuḥ . kva ca mānte
GS24pmbhasuu:26486: asmān ācaṣṭe iti yuṣmayateḥ asmayateḥ ca apratyayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:26488: 163-164 kimartham idam ucyate na tvamau ekavacane iti eva siddham . na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:26489: kim kāraṇam . ekavacanābhāvāt . ekavacane iti ucyate na ca atra ekavacanam paśyāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26490: . pratyayalakṣaṇena . na lumatā aṅgasya iti pratyayalakṣaṇasya pratiṣedhaḥ . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:26491: tarhi idam iha sampradhāryam . luk kriyatām ādeśau iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:26492: ādeśau . nityaḥ luk . kṛtayoḥ api ādeśayoḥ prāpnoti akṛtayoḥ api . antaraṅgau ādeśau
GS24pmbhasuu:26493: . evam tarhi siddhe sati yatpratyayottarapadayoḥ tvamau śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26494: antaraṅgān api vidhīn bādhitvā bahiraṅgaḥ luk bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:26497: yavamatyate antaraṅgān api numādīn bahiraṅgaḥ luk bādhate iti . na etat asti jñāpakam
GS24pmbhasuu:26498: . asti anyat etasya vacane prayojanam . kim . ye anye ekavacanādeśāḥ prāpnuvanti
GS24pmbhasuu:26499: tadbādhanārtham etat syāt . tat yathā . tava putraḥ tvatputraḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26502: mahyam hitam maddhitam iti . yat tarhi maparyantagrahaṇam anuvartayati . yati atra anye ekavacanādeśāḥ syuḥ mapartyantānuvṛttiḥ anarthikā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:26505: arthagrahaṇam śabdaviśeṣaṇam draṣṭavyam . tricaturoḥ striyām tisṛcatasṛ . yadi api
GS24pmbhasuu:26506: samāsaḥ puṃsi napuṃsake vā vartate tricaturau ca striyām vartete bhavati eva tisṛcatasṛbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26507: . priyāḥ tisraḥ brāhmaṇyaḥ asya brāhmaṇasya priyatisā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26513: priyāḥ tisraḥ brāhmaṇyaḥ asya brāhmaṇakulasya priyatisṛ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26518: priyacatasṝṇi . yadā hi samāsaḥ striyām vartate tricaturau ca puṃsi napuṃsake vā tadā ma bhūtām iti . priyāḥ trayaḥ brāhmaṇāḥ asyāḥ brāhmaṇyāḥ pryatriḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26523: priyacatvāraḥ . priyāṇi trīṇi brāhmaṇakulāni asyāḥ brāhmaṇyāḥ priyatriḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26526: priyacatvāḥ priyacatvārau priyacatvāraḥ . yuvāvau dvivacane . yadi api samāsaḥ ekārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26527: vā bhavati bahvarthaḥ vā bhavati dvyarthe ca yuṣmadasmadī bhavataḥ eva yuvāvau .
GS24pmbhasuu:26528: kim aviśeṣeṇa . na iti āha . yūyavayau jasi tvāhau sau tubhyamahyau ṅayi tavamamau
GS24pmbhasuu:26529: ṅasi iti etān vidhīn varjayitvā . atikrāntaḥ yuvām atitvam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26564: atyāvāsu . tmau ekavacane . yadi api samāsaḥ dvyarthaḥ bhavati bahvarthaḥ vā ekārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:26565: ca yuṣmadasmadī bhavataḥ eva tvamau . kim aviśeṣeṇa . na iti āha . tān eva vidhīn
GS24pmbhasuu:26600: atimāsu . yadi evam yūyavayau jasi tvāhau sau tubhyamahyau ṅayi tavamamau ṅasi iti
GS24pmbhasuu:26601: etebhyaḥ vidhibhyaḥ paratvāt tvamau ekavacane iti prāpnoti . sāvakāsāḥ hi ete vidhayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26602: idānīm bhavanti . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . anekārthe yuṣmadasmadī . tvamau ekavacane iti asya
GS24pmbhasuu:26603: avakāśaḥ . anyāni vacanāni . ekārthayoḥ yuṣmadasmadoḥ eteṣu vacaneṣu ubhayam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:26604: . paratvāt tvamau ekavacane iti prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . śeṣe iti vartate . kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26605: ca śeṣaḥ . jasādibhiḥ avyāptam yat ekavacanam tasmin śeṣe . aśeṣatvāt na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:26606: . atha vā tamau ekavacane iti atra yūyavayau jasi tvāhau sau tubhyamahyau ṅayi tavamamau
GS24pmbhasuu:26609: 167.16-169.2 tisṛbhāve sañjñāyām kani upasaṅkhyānam . tisṛbhāve sañjñāyām kani upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:26610: kartavyam . tisṛkā nāma grāmaḥ . catasari ādyudāttanipātanam ca . catasari ādyudāttanipātanam
GS24pmbhasuu:26611: kartavyam . tricaturoḥ striyām tisṛcatasṛ . kim prayojanam . catasraḥ paśya . śasi
GS24pmbhasuu:26612: svaraḥ mā bhūt iti . kim ca anyat . upadeśivadvacanam ca . upadeśivadbhāvaḥ ca vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26613: . kim prayojanam . svarasiddhyartham . upadeśāvasthāyām eva ādyudāttanipātane kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:26615: catasṛṇām iti . saḥ tarhi upadeśivadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . uktam vā .
GS24pmbhasuu:26616: kim uktam . vibhaktisvarabhāvaḥ ca halādigrahaṇāt ādyudāttanipātane hi halādigrahaṇānarthakyam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:26618: 169.4-171.3 aci rādeśe jasi upasaṅkhyānam guṇaparatvāt . aci rādeśe jasi upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . tisraḥ tiṣṭhanti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26619: catasraḥ tiṣṭhanti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . guṇaparatvāt . paratvāt guṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26620: prāpnoti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vā anavakāśatvāt rasya . na vā vaktavyam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:26621: kāraṇam . anavakāśatvāt rasya . anavakāśaḥ rādeśaḥ guṇam bādhiṣyate . sāvakāśaḥ rādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26622: . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . tisraḥ paśya . catasraḥ paśya . na eṣaḥ asti avakāśaḥ . atra api
GS24pmbhasuu:26623: pūrvasavarṇadīrghaḥ prāpnoti . saḥ yathā eva pūrvasavarṇam bādhate evam guṇam api
GS24pmbhasuu:26624: bādhiṣyate . guṇaḥ api anavakāśaḥ . sāvakāśaḥ guṇaḥ . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . he kartaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:26625: na eṣaḥ sarvanāmasthāne guṇaḥ . kaḥ tarhi . sambuddhiguṇaḥ . ayam tarhi . he mātaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26626: . eṣaḥ api sambuddhiguṇaḥ eva . na atra sambuddhiguṇaḥ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . ambārthanadyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26627: hrasvaḥ iti hrasvatvena bhavitavyam . bhavet dīrghāṇām hrasvavacanasāmarthyāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:26628: syāt hrasvānām tu khalu hrasvatvam kriyatām sambuddhiguṇaḥ iti paratvāt sambuddhiguṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:26629: bhavitavyam . atha api katham cit sāvakāsaḥ guṇaḥ syāt evam api na doṣaḥ . purastāt
GS24pmbhasuu:26630: apavādāḥ anantarān vidhīn bādhante iti evam ayam rādeśaḥ jasi guṇam bādhate sarvanāmasthānaguṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:26631: na bādhiṣyate . tasmāt suṣṭhu ucyate aci rādeśe jasi upasaṅkhyānam guṇaparatvāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:26633: 172.2-173.4 numaḥ anaṅjarasau bhavataḥ vipratiṣedhena . numaḥ avakāśaḥ . trapuṇī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26635: tumburuṇī . anaṅaḥ avakāśaḥ . priyasakthnā brāhmaṇena . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . dadhnā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26638: vanāni . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . atijarāṃsi brāhmaṇakulāni . anaṅjarasau numaḥ bhavataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26639: vipratiṣedhena . atha iha luk kasmāt na bhavati . atijarasam paśya iti . kim punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26640: kāraṇam dvitīyaikavacanam eva udāhriyate na punaḥ prathamaikavacanam api . atijarasam
GS24pmbhasuu:26641: tiṣṭhati iti . asti atra viśeṣaḥ . na atra akṛte ambhāve jarasbhāvaḥ prāpnoti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:26642: kāraṇam . aci iti ucyate . yadā ca jarasbhāvaḥ kṛtaḥ tadā luk na bhaviṣyati sannipātalakṣaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26643: vidhiḥ animittam tadvighātasya iti . yadi evam atijarasam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26644: atijarasaiḥ iti atra na prāpnoti atijaram ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26645: atijaraiḥ iti bhavitavyam . gonardīyaḥ āha . iṣṭam eva etat saṅgṛhītam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:26646: atijaram atijaraiḥ iti bhavitavyam satyām etasyām paribhāṣāyām sannipātalakṣaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26649: 174.2-178.6 tyadādīnām dviparyantānām akāravacanam . tyadādīnām dviparyantānām atvam
GS24pmbhasuu:26650: vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . yuṣmadasmadantānām bhavadantānām vā mā bhūt iti . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:26651: tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . tyadādīnām akāreṇa siddhatvāt yuṣmadasmadoḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26652: śeṣe lopasya lopena jñāyate prāk tataḥ at iti . yat ayam tyadādīnām atvena siddhe
GS24pmbhasuu:26653: yuṣmadasmadoḥ śeṣe lopam śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ prāk tataḥ atvam bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:26654: . na sarveṣām iti . api vā upasamastārtham atvābhāvāt kṛtam bhavet . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:26656: ativayam . upasamastānām hi tyadādīnām atvam na iṣyate : atitat ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26658: atitadaḥ . ṭilopaḥ ṭābabhāvārthaḥ kartavyaḥ iti tat smṛtam . yaḥ tu śeṣe lopaḥ ṭilopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26659: saḥ vaktavyaḥ . kim prayojanam . ṭāppratiṣedhārtham . ṭāp mā bhūt iti . saḥ tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:26660: ṭilopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . atha vā śeṣasaptamyā śeṣe lopaḥ vidhīyate . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:26661: yuṣmadasmadoḥ lopaḥ iti iyatā antyasya lopaḥ siddhaḥ . saḥ ayam evam siddhe sati
GS24pmbhasuu:26662: yat śeṣagrahaṇam karoti tasya etat prayojanam avaśiṣṭasya lopaḥ yathā syāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:26663: luptaśiṣṭe hi tasya āhuḥ kāryasiddhim manīṣiṇaḥ . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:26664: na sarveṣām tyadādīnām atvam bhavati iti yat ayam kimaḥ kaḥ iti kādeśam śāsti . itarathā
GS24pmbhasuu:26665: hi kimaḥ at bhavati iti eva brūyāt . siddhe vidhiḥ ārabhyamāṇaḥ jñāpakārthaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:26666: na ca kimaḥ attvena sidhyati . attve hi sati antyasya prasajyeta . siddham antyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:26667: pūrveṇa eva tatra ārambhasāmarthyāt ikārasya bhaviṣyati . kutaḥ nu khalu etat anantyārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:26668: ārambhe sati ikārasya bhaviṣyati na punaḥ kakārasya syāt . yat tarhi kimaḥ grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:26669: karoti . itarathā hi kaṭ at bhavati iti eva brūyāt . evam api kakāramātrāt parasya
GS24pmbhasuu:26670: prāpnoti . tyadādīnām iti vartate na ca anyat kimaḥ tyadādiṣu kakāravat asti . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:26671: api anaikāntikam jñāpakam . etāvat tu jñāpyate na sarveṣām tyadādīnām atvam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:26672: iti tatra kutaḥ etat dviparyantānām bhaviṣyati na punaḥ yuṣmadasmadantānām vā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:26673: bhavadantānām vā . kim ca avaśyam khalu api uttarārtham kimaḥ grahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:26674: . ku tihoḥ kva ati iti . kādeśaḥ khalu api avaśyam sākackārthaḥ vaktavyaḥ kaḥ kau
GS24pmbhasuu:26675: ke iti evam artham . tasmāt dviparyantānām atvam vaktavyam . tyadādīnām akāreṇa siddhatvāt yuṣmadasmadoḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26676: śeṣe lopasya lopena jñāyate prāk tataḥ at iti . api vā upasamastārtham atvābhāvāt kṛtam bhavet ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26677: ṭilopaḥ ṭābabhāvārthaḥ kartavyaḥ iti tat smṛtam . atha vā śeṣasaptamyā śeṣe lopaḥ vidhīyate ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26678: luptaśiṣṭe hi tasya āhuḥ kāryasiddhim manīṣiṇaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:26680: 178.8-9 kimartham kvādeśaḥ ucyate na ku tihāt si iti eva ucyate . kā rūpasiddhiḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:26681: kva . yaṇādeśena siddham . na sidhyati . oḥ guṇaḥ prasajyeta .
GS24pmbhasuu:26683: 178.11-180.5 kimartham anantyayoḥ iti ucyate . antyayoḥ mā bhūt iti . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:26684: prayojanam . atvam antyayoḥ bādhakam bhaviṣyati . anavakāśāḥ vidhayaḥ bādhakāḥ bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:26685: sāvakāśam ca atvam . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . dviśabdaḥ . satvam api sāvakāśam . kaḥ avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26686: . anantyaḥ . katham punaḥ sati antye anantyasya satvam syāt . bhavet yaḥ takāradakārābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:26687: aṅgam viśeṣayet tasya anantyayoḥ na syāt . vayam tu khalu aṅgena takāradakārau viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26688: . evam api ubhayoḥ sāvakāsaśayoḥ paratvāt satvam prāpnoti . kim ca syāt yadi antyayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26689: satvam syāt . iha he saḥ iti eṅhrasvāt iti sambuddhilopaḥ na syāt . iha ca yā sā
GS24pmbhasuu:26690: ataḥ iti ṭāp na syāt . tasmāt anantyayoḥ iti vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . evam vakṣyāmi
GS24pmbhasuu:26691: . tadoḥ saḥ sau . tataḥ adasaḥ . adasaḥ ca dakārasya saḥ bhavati iti . idam idānīm
GS24pmbhasuu:26692: kimartham . niyamārtham . adasaḥ eva dakārasya na anyasya dakārasya iti . yadi niyamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26693: kriyate dvīyateḥ apratyayaḥ dvaḥ iti prāpnoti svaḥ iti ca iṣyate . yathālakṣaṇam aprayukte .
GS24pmbhasuu:26695: 180-182 adasaḥ soḥ bhavet autvam kim sulopaḥ vidhīyate . adasaḥ eva soḥ bhavet autvam
GS24pmbhasuu:26696: kimartham sulopaḥ vidhīyate . hrasvāt lupyeta sambuddhiḥ . iha he asau iti eṅhrasvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:26697: sambuddheḥ iti lopaḥ prasajyeta . na halaḥ . halaḥ lopaḥ sambuddhilopaḥ . tat halgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:26698: kartavyam . prakṛtam hi tat . prakṛtam halgrahaṇam . kva prakṛtam . halṅyābbhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26699: dīrghāt sutisyapṛktam hal iti . tat vai prathamānirdiṣṭam ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭena ca iha
GS24pmbhasuu:26700: arthaḥ . hrasvāt iti eṣā pañcamī hal iti prathamāyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayiṣyati tasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:26701: iti uttarasya iti . āpaḥ ettvam bhavet tasmin . iha he asau brāhmaṇi āṅi ca āpaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26702: sambuddhau ca iti ettvam prasajyeta . na jhali iti anuvartanāt . jhali iti tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:26703: anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . supi ca bahuvacane jhali et iti . pratyayasthāt ca kāt
GS24pmbhasuu:26704: ittvam . iha ca asakau brāhmaṇī iti pratyaysthāt kāt pūrvasya iti īttvam prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:26705: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . praśliṣṭanirdeśaḥ ayam . ā , āp ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26706: āp iti . iha api tarhi na prāpnoti . kārike ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26708: iti . śībhāvaḥ ca prasajyate . iha ca śībhāvaḥ ca prāpnoti . asau brāhmaṇī . āpaḥ uttarasya auṅaḥ śī bhavati iti śībhāvaḥ prāpnoti . tasmāt soḥ lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:26710: 182 sau autvapratiṣedhaḥ sākackāt vā sāt utvam ca . sau autvapratiṣedhaḥ sākackāt vā vaktavyaḥ . sāt ca parasya utvam vaktavyam . asakau ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26711: asukaḥ . uttarapadabhūtānām ādeśe upadeśavadvacanam . uttarapadabhūtānām tyadādīnām ādeśe upadeśivadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . paramāham ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26713: paramānena . kim prayojanam . anādiṣṭārtham . akṛte ekādeśe ādeśāḥ yathā syuḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:26714: . kim punaḥ kāraṇam ekādeśaḥ tāvat bhavati na punaḥ ādeśāḥ . na paratvāt ādeśaiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26715: bhavitavyam . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . bahiraṅgāḥ ādeśāḥ . antaraṅgaḥ ekādeśaḥ . asiddham
GS24pmbhasuu:26716: bahiraṅgam antaraṅge . saḥ tarhi upadeśivadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26717: jñāpayati pūrvapadottarapadayoḥ tāvat kāryam bhavati na ekādeśaḥ iti yat ayam na
GS24pmbhasuu:26718: indrasya parasya iti pratiṣedham śāsti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . indre dvau acau
GS24pmbhasuu:26719: . tatra ekaḥ yasya iti lopena apahriyate aparaḥ ekādeśena . anackaḥ indraḥ saṃvṛttaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26720: . tatra kaḥ vṛddheḥ prasaṅgaḥ . paśyati tu ācāryaḥ pūrvapadottarapadayoḥ tāvat kāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:26721: bhavati na ekādeśe iti tataḥ na indrasya parasya iti pratiṣedham śāsti .
GS24pmbhasuu:26723: 182-183 adasaḥ soḥ bhavet autvam kim sulopaḥ vidhīyate ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26724: hrasvāt lupyeta sambuddhiḥ na halaḥ prakṛtam hi tat . āpaḥ ettvam bhavet tasmin na jhali iti anuvartanāt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26725: pratyayasthāt ca kāt ittvam śībhāvaḥ ca prasajyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:26727: 183.4-184.4 mṛjeḥ vṛddhividhau kvipratiṣedhaḥ . mṛjeḥ vṛddhividhau kvyantasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kaṃsaparimṛḍbhyām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26728: kaṃsaparimṛḍbhiḥ . dhātoḥ svarūpagrahaṇe vā tatpratyayavijñānāt siddham . atha vā
GS24pmbhasuu:26729: dhātoḥ svarūpagrahaṇe tatpratyaye kāryavijñānāt siddham . dhātupratyaye kāryam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:26730: iti eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā . kāni etasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ prayojanāni . prayojanam sṛjidṛśimasjinaśihantigiratyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:26736: bhrauṇaghnaḥ . hanti . girati . devagiraḥ . yadi svarūpagrahaṇe iti ucyate prasṛbbhyām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26738: anudāttasya ca ṛdupasya anyatarasyām iti am prāpnoti . evam tarhi iyam paribhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:26739: kartavyā dhātoḥ kāryam ucyamānam tatpratyaye bhavati iti . sā tarhi eṣā paribhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:26740: kartavyā . na kartavyā . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati bhavati eṣā paribhāṣā iti yat
GS24pmbhasuu:26743: 184.5-185.7 vṛddhau ajgrahaṇam go'rtham . vṛddhau ajgrahaṇam kriyate gotaḥ vṛdhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26744: yathā syāt . gauḥ iti . na etat asti prayojanam . ṇitkaraṇasāmarthyāt eva atra vṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26745: bhaviṣyati . atha yogavibhāgaḥ kimarthaḥ na ñṇiti ataḥ upadhāyāḥ iti eva ucyeta .
GS24pmbhasuu:26748: kārakaḥ . guṇe kṛte ayavaḥ raparatve ca ataḥ upadhāyāḥ iti eva siddham . yogavibhāgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26749: sakhivyañjanādyarthaḥ . yogavibhāgaḥ kriyate sakhyarthaḥ vyañjanādyarthaḥ ca . sakhyarthaḥ tāvat . sakhāyau ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26752: cyautram . yogavibhāge ca idānīm sakhivyañjanādyarthe kriyamāṇe ajgrahaṇam api kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:26753: bhavati . kim prayojanam . gortham . nanu ca uktam ṇitkaraṇasāmarthyāt eva atra vṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26754: bhaviṣyati iti . asti anyat ṇitkaraṇasaya prayojanam . kim . gāvau ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26755: gāvaḥ . avādeśe kṛte ataḥ upadhāyāḥ iti vṛddhiḥ yathā syāt . yat tu sau ṇitkaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:26756: tat anavakāśam tasya anavakāśatvāt eva vṛddhiḥ bhaviṣyati . yathā eva khalu api ṇitkaraṇasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:26757: anikaḥ api vṛddhiḥ prārthyate evam tatvam api prāpnoti . tatvam api hi ñṇiti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:26760: 185-186 ajgrahaṇam kartavyam . nanu ca kriyate eva . dvitīyam kartavyam yathā acāmādigrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:26761: ajviśeṣaṇam vijñāyeta . acām ādeḥ acaḥ iti . atha akriyamāṇe ajgrahaṇe kasya acāmādigrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:26762: viśeṣaṇam syāt . igviśeṣaṇam iti āha . acām ādeḥ ikaḥ iti . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:26765: vātsyaḥ iti . tat tarhi ajgrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:26766: . kva prakṛtam . acaḥ ñṇiti iti . yadi tat anuvartate ataḥ upadhāyāḥ acaḥ iti ajmātrasya
GS24pmbhasuu:26767: upadhāyāḥ vṛddhiḥ prasajyeta . chedakaḥ iti . akāreṇa tapareṇa acam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26768: . acaḥ ataḥ iti . iha idānīm acaḥ iti eva anuvartate ataḥ iti nivṛttam . atha vā
GS24pmbhasuu:26769: maṇḍūkagatayaḥ adhikārāḥ . yathā maṇḍūkāḥ utplutya utplutya gacchanti tadvat adhikārāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26770: . atha vā ekayogaḥ kariṣyate . acaḥ ñṇiti ataḥ upadhāyāḥ . tataḥ taddhiteṣu acām
GS24pmbhasuu:26771: ādeḥ iti . na ca ekayoge anuvṛttiḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:26774: antyopadhalakṣaṇāyāḥ vṛddheḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . krauṣṭuḥ jāgataḥ iti . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:26775: ca acāmādivṛddhiḥ antyopadhalakṣaṇām vṛddhim bādhiṣyate . katham anyasya ucyamānā
GS24pmbhasuu:26776: anyasya bādhikā syāt . asati khalu api sambhave bādhanam bhavati asti ca sambhavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26777: yat ubhayam syāt . lokavijñānāt siddham . sati api sambhave bādhanam bhavati . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:26778: yathā . brāhmaṇebhyaḥ dadhi dīyatām takram kauṇḍinyāya iti sati api sambhave dadhidānasya
GS24pmbhasuu:26779: takradānam nivartakam bhavati . evam iha api sati api sambhave acāmādivṛddhiḥ antyopadhalakṣaṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:26780: vṛddhim bādhiṣyate . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . na aprāpte dadhidāne takradānam ārabhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:26781: tat prāpte ārabhyamāṇam bādhakam bhaviṣyati . iha punaḥ aprāptāyām antyopadhalakṣaṇāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:26783: sauśrutaḥ iti . puṣkarasadgrahaṇāt vā . atha vā yat ayam anuśatikādiṣu puṣkarasacśabdam paṭhati tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ acāmādivṛddhau antyopadhalakṣaṇā vṛddhiḥ na bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:26785: 189.3-192.2 devikādiṣu tadādigrahaṇam . devikādiṣu tadādigrahaṇam kartavyam . devikādyādīnām iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt . dāvikākulāḥ śālayaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26786: śāṃśapāsthalāḥ devāḥ . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . anyatra tadgrahaṇāt tadantagrahaṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:26787: vā . anyatra hi tasya vā grahaṇam bhavati tadantasya vā na ca idam tat na api tadantam
GS24pmbhasuu:26788: . ādyajviśeṣaṇatvāt siddham . ādyajviśeṣaṇam devikādayaḥ . na evam vijñāyate devikādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:26789: aṅgānām acām ādeḥ ākāraḥ bhavati iti . katham tarhi . ñṇiti aṅgasya acām ādeḥ ākāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26790: bhavati saḥ cet devikādīnām ādjyac bhavati iti . āntaratamyanivartakatvāt vā . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:26791: vā na anena anantaratamā vṛddhiḥ nirvartyate . kim tarhi antaratamā anena nivartyate
GS24pmbhasuu:26792: . siddhā atra vṛddhiḥ taddhiteṣu acām ādeḥ iti eva tatra anena antaratamā vṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26793: nivartyate . parihārāntaram eva idam matvā paṭhitam katham ca idam parihārāntaram
GS24pmbhasuu:26794: syāt . yadi na ādyajviśeṣaṇam devikādayaḥ . avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam adyajviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:26795: devikādayaḥ iti . yadi na ādyajviśeṣaṇam devikādayaḥ syuḥ iha api prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:26796: sudevikāyām bhavaḥ saudevikaḥ iti . atha atra api ādyajviśeṣaṇatvāt iti eva siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:26797: parihārāntaram na bhavati . na brūmaḥ yatra kriyamāṇe doṣaḥ tatra kartavyam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:26798: kim tarhi . yatra kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ tatra kartavyam . kva ca kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26799: . sañjñāvidhau . vṛddhiḥ āt aic devikādīnām ākāraḥ iti . idhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate
GS24pmbhasuu:26800: . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam devikādiṣu tadādigrahaṇam anyatra tadgrahaṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:26801: tadantagrahaṇāt vā iti . parihṛtam etat ādyajviśeṣaṇatvāt siddham iti . nyagrodhe
GS24pmbhasuu:26802: ca kevalagrahaṇāt . nyagrodhe ca kevalagrahaṇāt manyāmahe ādyajviśeṣaṇam devikādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26803: iti . tasya hi kevalagrahaṇasya etat prayojanam iha mā bhūt nyāgrodhamūlāḥ śālayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26804: iti . yadi ca ādyajviśeṣaṇam devikādayaḥ tataḥ kevalagrahaṇam arthavat bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:26805: tat etat katham kṛtvā jñāpakam bhavati . yadi nyagrodhaśabdaḥ avyutpannam prātipadikam
GS24pmbhasuu:26806: bhavati . atha hi nyagrohati iti nyagrodhaḥ tataḥ niyamārtham padāntaḥ iti kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:26807: na jñāpakam bhavati . vahīnarasya idvacanam . vahīnarasya ittvam vaktavyam . vahīnarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:26808: apatyam vaihīnariḥ . kuṇaravāḍavaḥ tu āha . na eṣaḥ vahīnaraḥ . kaḥ tarhi . vihīnaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26809: eṣaḥ . vihīnaḥ naraḥ kāmabhogābhyām vihīnaraḥ . vihīnarasya apatyam vaihīnariḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:26811: 192.4-194.11 yvābhyām parasya avṛddhitvam . yvābhyām parasya avṛddhitvam siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:26812: . kutaḥ . apavādau vṛddheḥ hi tau . apavādau hi vṛddheḥ tau aicau ucyete . nityau
GS24pmbhasuu:26813: aicau tayoḥ vṛddhiḥ . atha vā nityau aicau . kṛtāyām api vṛddhau prāpnutaḥ akṛtāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:26814: api . nityatvāt aicoḥ kṛtayoḥ yadi api vṛddhiḥ tayoḥ eva . kimartham na iti śiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:26815: . atha kimartham pratiṣedhaḥ ucyate . ecoḥ viṣayārtham pratiṣedhasanniyuktavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:26816: . ecoḥ viṣayārtham pratiṣedhasanniyogena aicau ucyete . yatra yvābhyām parāvṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26817: tatra adhyaśveḥ yathā na tau . yatra yvābhyām parasya avṛddhitvam ucyate tatra aicau
GS24pmbhasuu:26818: yathā syātām . iha mā bhūtām . ādhyaśviḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26820: mādhvaśviḥ iti . na etat asti prayojanam . acām ādeḥ yvābhyām hi tau . acām ādinā
GS24pmbhasuu:26821: atra yvau viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . acām ādeḥ yau yvau iti . katham dvyāśītike na tau . dvyāśītikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26822: iti atra kasmāt na tau bhavataḥ . yatra vṛddhiḥ acām ādeḥ tatra aicau atra ghoḥ hi
GS24pmbhasuu:26823: sā . tatra acām ādeḥ iti evam vṛddhiḥ tatra aicau ucyete . atra ghoḥ iti evam vṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26824: . kim idam ghoḥ iti . uttarapadasya iti . uttarapadādhikāre api avaśyam aijāgamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26825: anuvartyaḥ pūrvatryalinde bhavaḥ pūrvatrayalindaḥ iti evamartham . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26826: . uttarapadena atra acām ādi viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ acām ādinā yvau . uttarapadasya acām
GS24pmbhasuu:26827: ādeḥ yau yvau iti . atha kasmāt padāntābhyām . atha kimartham padāntābhyām iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:26828: . yathā iṇaḥ na bhavet yaṇaḥ . iṇaḥ yaṇādeśe mā bhūt. yataḥ chātrā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26830: sauvaśvaḥ iti śākalam prāpnoti yvoḥ ca sthānivadbhāvāt āyāvau prāpnutaḥ . śakalāyāvādeśeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:26831: ca uktam . kim uktam . śākale tāvat uktam sinnityasamāsayoḥ śākalapratiṣedhaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:26832: . āyāvoḥ kim uktam . acaḥ pūrvavijñānāt aicoḥ siddham iti . yvābhyām parasya avṛddhitvam
GS24pmbhasuu:26834: nityau aicau tayoḥ vṛddhiḥ kimartham na iti śiṣyate . yatra yvābhyām parāvṛddhiḥ tatra adhyaśveḥ yathā na tau ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26835: acām ādeḥ yvābhyām hi tau katham dvyāśītike na tau . yatra vṛddhiḥ acām ādeḥ tatra aicau atra ghoḥ hi sā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26836: atha kasmāt padāntābhyām yathā iṇaḥ na bhavet yaṇaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:26838: 195.13-197.2 atha parasya avṛddhiḥ iti anuvartate utāho na . kim ca ataḥ . yadi anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:26839: śauvam māṃsam ṭilope kṛte aijāgamaḥ na prāpnoti . atha nivṛttam svādhyāyaśabdaḥ dvārādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:26840: paṭhyate tatra yāvantaḥ yaṇaḥ sarvebhyaḥ pūrvaḥ aijāgamaḥ prāpnoti . yatha icchasi
GS24pmbhasuu:26841: tathā astu . astu tāvat anuvartate . katha śauvam māṃsam . ānupūrvyā siddham etat
GS24pmbhasuu:26842: . na atra akṛte aijāgame ṭilopaḥ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . prakṛtyā ekāc iti prakṛtibhāvena
GS24pmbhasuu:26843: bhavitavyam . tat etat ānupūrvyā siddham bhavati . atha vā punaḥ astu nivṛttam .
GS24pmbhasuu:26844: nanu ca uktam svādhyāyaśabdaḥ dvārādiṣu paṭhyate tatra yāvantaḥ yaṇaḥ sarvebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26845: pūrvaḥ aijāgamaḥ prāpnoti iti . kaḥ punaḥ arhati svādhyāyaśabdam dvārādiṣu paṭhitum
GS24pmbhasuu:26846: . evam kil paṭhyeta svam adhyayanam svādhyāyaḥ iti . tat ca na . suṣṭhu vā adhyayanam
GS24pmbhasuu:26847: svādhyāyaḥ śobhanam vā adhyayanam svādhyāyaḥ . atha api svam adhyayanam svādhyāyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26848: evam api na doṣaḥ . acām ādeḥ iti vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:26850: 197.4-198.5 ayam śvanśabdaḥ dvārādiṣu paṭhyate tatra kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ yat tadādeḥ syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:26851: . na eva prāpnoti na arthaḥ pratiṣedhena . tadādividhinā prāpnoti . na eva tadādividhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26852: asti . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . pratiṣedhe śvādigrahaṇam jñāpakam anyatra śvangrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:26853: tadādigrahaṇasya śauvahānādyartham . pratiṣedhe śvādigrahaṇam kriyate jñāpakārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:26854: . kim jñāpyam . etat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ anyatra śvangrahaṇe tadādividhiḥ bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:26855: . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . śauvahānādyartham . śauvahānam nāma nagaram . śauvādaṃṣṭraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26856: maṇiḥ iti . ikārādigrahaṇam ca śvāgaṇikādyartham . ikārādigrahaṇam ca kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:26857: kim prayojanam . śvāgaṇikādyartham . śvagaṇena carati śvāgaṇikaḥ . tadantasya ca
GS24pmbhasuu:26858: anyatra pratiṣedhaḥ . tadantasya ca anyatra pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . śvābhastreḥ svam śvābhastram .
GS24pmbhasuu:26860: 198.7-199.9 kimartham idam ucyate . avayavāt ṛtoḥ iti vakṣyati taduttarapadasya yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:26861: syāt acām ādeḥ mā bhūt . na etat asti prayojanam . avayavāt iti pañcamī tatra antareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:26862: api uttarapadagrahaṇam uttarapadasya eva bhaviṣyati . uttarārtham tarhi susarvārdhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:26863: janapadasya iti . susarvārdhāt iti pañcamī . diśaḥ amadrāṇām . diśaḥ iti pañcamī
GS24pmbhasuu:26864: . prācām grāmanagarāṇām . diśaḥ iti eva . saṅkhyāyāḥ saṃvatsarasaṅkhyasya ca . saṅkhyāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26865: iti pañcamī . varṣasya abhaviṣyati . saṅkhyāyāḥ iti eva . parimāṇāntasya asañjñāśāṇayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26866: iti . saṅkhyāyāḥ iti eva . idam tarhi prayojanam je proṣṭhapadānām uttarapadasya
GS24pmbhasuu:26867: yathā syāt pūrvapadasya mā bhūt . proṣṭhapadāsu jātaḥ proṣṭhapādaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ . taddhiteṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:26868: acām ādivṛddheḥ uttarapadavṛddhiḥ vipratiṣedhena dvyāśītikādyartham . taddhiteṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:26869: acām ādivṛddheḥ uttarapadavṛddhiḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . kim prayojanam . dvyāśītikādyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:26873: tryāśītikaḥ . uttarapadavṛddhiḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . kaḥ punaḥ atra viśeṣaḥ acām
GS24pmbhasuu:26874: ādivṛddhau vā satyām uttarapadavṛddhau vā . ayam asti viśeṣaḥ . yadi atra acām ādivṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26877: 199.11-201.3 nagaragrahaṇam kimartham na prācām grāmāṇām iti eva siddham . na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:26878: . anyaḥ grāmaḥ anyat nagaram . katham jñāyate . evam hi kaḥ cit kam cit pṛcchati
GS24pmbhasuu:26879: . kutaḥ bhavān āgacchati grāmāt . saḥ hi āha . na grāmāt nagarāt iti . nanu ca bho
GS24pmbhasuu:26880: yaḥ eva grāmaḥ tat nagaram . katham jñāyate . lokataḥ . ye hi grāme vidhayaḥ na iṣyante
GS24pmbhasuu:26881: sādhīyaḥ te nagare na kriyante . tat yathā . abhakṣyaḥ grāmyakukkuṭaḥ abhakṣyaḥ grāmyaśūkaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26882: iti ukte sutarām nāgaraḥ api na bhakṣyate . tathā grāme na adhyeyam iti sādhīyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26883: nagare na adhīyate . tasmāt yaḥ eva grāmaḥ tat nagaram . katham yat uktam evam hi
GS24pmbhasuu:26884: kaḥ cit kam cit pṛcchati kutaḥ bhavān āgacchati grāmāt saḥ āha na grāmāt nagarāt
GS24pmbhasuu:26885: iti . saṃstyāyaviśeṣam asau ācaṣṭe . saṃstyāyaviśeṣāḥ hi ete grāmaḥ ghoṣaḥ nagaram
GS24pmbhasuu:26886: saṃvāhaḥ iti . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat grāmagrahaṇe nagaragrahaṇam karoti tat
GS24pmbhasuu:26887: jñāpayati ācāryaḥ anyatra grāmagrahaṇe nagaragrahaṇam na bhavati iti . kim etasya
GS24pmbhasuu:26888: jñāpane prayojanam . viśiṣṭaliṅgaḥ nadīdeśaḥ agrāmāḥ iti atra nagarapratiṣedhaḥ coditaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26889: saḥ na vaktavyaḥ bhavati . yadi etat jñāpyate udīcyagrāmāt ca bahvacaḥ antodāttāt
GS24pmbhasuu:26890: iti atra nagaragrahaṇam kartavyam . bāhīkagrāmebhyaḥ ca nagaragrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:26891: . dikśabdāḥ grāmajanapadākhyānacānarāṭeṣu nagaragrahaṇam kartavyam . idam caturtham
GS24pmbhasuu:26892: jñāpakārtham . tatra atinirbandhaḥ na lābhaḥ . tasmāt yasmin eva grāmagrahaṇe nagaragrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:26895: 201.5-18 saṃvatsaragrahaṇam anarthakam parimāṇāntasya iti kṛtatvāt . saṃvatsaragrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:26896: anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . parimāṇāntasya iti kṛtatvāt . parimāṇāntasya asañjñāśāṇayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26897: iti eva siddham . jñāpakam tu kālaparimāṇānām vṛddhipratiṣedhasya . evam tarhi jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:26898: ācāryaḥ kālaparimāṇānām vṛddhiḥ na bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . dvairātrikaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26900: atra vṛddhiḥ na bhavati . na etat asti prayojanam . na asti atra viśeṣaḥ satyām vā uttarapadavṛddhau asatyām vā . idam tarhi . dvasamikaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26901: traisamikaḥ . idam ca api prayojanam dvairātrikaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26902: trairātrikaḥ . nanu ca uktam na asti atra viśeṣaḥ satyām vā uttarapadavṛddhau asatyām
GS24pmbhasuu:26903: vā iti . ayam asti viśeṣaḥ . yadi atra uttarapadavṛddhiḥ syāt acām ādeḥ vṛddhiḥ na syāt . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:26904: jñāpakam tu kālaparimāṇānām parimāṇāgrahaṇasya . evam tarhi jñāpayati ācāryaḥ kālaparimāṇānām
GS24pmbhasuu:26905: parimāṇagrahaṇena grahaṇam na bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . aparimāṇabistācitakambalyebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26909: 202.2-7 parasya vṛddhiḥ na iti anuvartate utāho na . kim ca ataḥ . yadi anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:26910: pravāhaṇeyī bhāryā asya iti pravāhaṇeyībhāryaḥ vṛddhinimittasya iti puṃvadbhāvapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26911: na prāpnoti . atha nivṛttam na doṣaḥ bhavati . yathā na doṣaḥ tathā astu . atha vā
GS24pmbhasuu:26912: punaḥ astu anuvartate . nanu ca uktam pravāhaṇeyī bhāryā asya pravāhaṇeyībhāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26913: vṛddhinimittasya iti puṃvadbhāvapratiṣedhaḥ na prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . mā
GS24pmbhasuu:26914: bhūt evam . jāteḥ iti evam bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:26916: 202.9-203.3 ayam yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum . katham ayāthātathyam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26919: āyathāpuryam . yadā tāvat pūrvapadasya vṛddhiḥ tadā evam vigrahaḥ kariṣyate . na yathātathā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26920: ayathātathā . ayathātathābhāvaḥ āyathātathyam . yadā uttarapadasya vṛddhiḥ tadā evam vigrahaḥ kariṣyate . yathātathābhāvaḥ yāthātathyam . na yāthātathyam ayāthātathyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:26922: 203.5-8 hanteḥ takāre taddhite pratiṣedhaḥ . hanteḥ takāre taddhite pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . vārtraghnam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26923: bhrauṇaghnam . uktam vā . kim uktam . dhātoḥ svarūpagrahaṇe tatpratyaye kāryavijñānāt siddham iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:26925: 203.10-204.2 kṛdgrahaṇam kimartham . iha mā bhūt . dadau ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26926: dadhau . na etat asti prayojanam . aciṇṇaloḥ iti vartate . yadi aciṇṇaloḥ iti vartate adāyi ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26927: adhāyi iti atra na prāpnoti . vacanāt ciṇi bhaviṣyati . aciṇṇaloḥ iti vartate . evam api cauḍiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26928: bālākiḥ iti atra prāpnoti . lopaḥ atra bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . idam iha sampradhāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:26929: . lopaḥ kriyatām yuk iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt yuk . evam tarhi acām ādeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26930: iti vartate . yatra acām ādiḥ ākāraḥ tatra yuk iti . evam api jñā devatā asya sthālīpākasya jñaḥ sthālīpākaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26934: anācameḥ iti . avamikamicamīnām iti vaktavyam : vāmaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26937: 204.6-10 ṇicprakaraṇe dhūñprīñoḥ nugvacanam . ṇicprakaraṇe dhūñprīñoḥ nuk vaktavyaḥ . dhūnayati ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26940: 204-205 sthagrahaṇam kimartham . idam vicārayiṣyate ittve kagrahaṇam saṅghātagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:26941: vā syāt varṇagrahaṇam vā iti . tat yadā saṅghatagrahaṇam tadā sthagrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:26943: hārikā . yadā hi varṇagrahaṇam tadā kevalaḥ kakāraḥ pratyayaḥ na asti iti kṛtvā vacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:26944: bhaviṣyati . atha asupaḥ iti katham idam vijñāyate . asubvataḥ aṅgasya iti . āhosvit
GS24pmbhasuu:26945: na cet supaḥ paraḥ āp iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate asubvataḥ aṅgasya iti bahucarmikā
GS24pmbhasuu:26946: atra na prāpnoti . atha vijñāyate na cet supaḥ paraḥ āp iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:26950: ittve kagrahaṇam saṅghātagrahaṇam vā syāt varṇagrahaṇam vā iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26951: . ittve kagrahaṇam saṅghātagrahaṇam cet etikāsu aprāptiḥ . ittve kagrahaṇam saṅghātagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:26952: cet etikāsvu aprāptiḥ . etikāḥ caranti . vacanāt bhaviṣyati . asti vacane prayojanam . kim . kārikā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26953: hārikā . astu tarhi varṇagrahaṇam . varṇagrahaṇam cet vyavahitatvāt aprasiddhiḥ . varṇagrahaṇam cet vyavahitatvāt na prāpnoti . kārikā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26954: hārikā . akāreṇa vyavahitatvāt na prāpnoti . ekādeśe kṛte na asti vyavadhānam . ekādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26955: pūrvavidhau sthānivat bhavati iti sthānivadbhāvāt vyavadhānam eva . evam tarhi āha
GS24pmbhasuu:26956: ayam pratyayasthāt kāt pūrvasya iti na kva cit avyavadhānam tatra vacanāt bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:26957: . vacanaprāmāṇyāt iti cet rathakaṭyādiṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ . vacanaprāmāṇyāt iti cet rathakaṭyādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:26959: gargakāmyā . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yena na avyavadhānam tena vyavahite api vacanaprāmāṇyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:26960: . kena ca na avyavadhānam varṇena ekena . saṅghātena punaḥ vyavadhānam bhavati na
GS24pmbhasuu:26961: bhavati ca . atha vā punaḥ astu saṅghātagrahaṇam . nanu ca uktam ittve kagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:26962: saṅghātagrahaṇam cet etikāsu aprāptiḥ iti . parihṛtam etat vacanāt bhaviṣyati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:26963: . nanu ca uktam asti vacane prayojanam . kim . kārikā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26964: hārikā iti . atra api ekādeśe kṛte vyapavargābhāvāt na prāpnoti . antādivadbhāvena
GS24pmbhasuu:26965: vyapavargaḥ . ubhayataḥ āśraye na antādivat . evam tarhi ekādeśaḥ pūrvavidhau sthānivat
GS24pmbhasuu:26966: bhavati iti sthānivadbhāvāt vyapavargaḥ . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:26967: evañjātīyakānām api ittvam iti yat ayam na yāsayoḥ iti pratiṣedham śāsti .
GS24pmbhasuu:26972: narikā . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . apratyayasthatvāt . tyaktyapoḥ ca pratiṣiddhatvāt . tyaktyapoḥ ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . dākṣiṇātyikā
GS24pmbhasuu:26973: amātyikā . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . pratiṣiddhatvāt . udīcām ātaḥ sthāne yakapūrvāyāḥ iti pratiṣiddhatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:26975: 208.10-210.15 na yattadoḥ iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt . yakām yakām adhīte ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26976: takām takām pacāmahe iti . pratiṣedhe tyakanaḥ upasaṅkhyānam . pratiṣedhe tyakanaḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . upatyakā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26977: adhityakā . tat tarhi upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . na kartavyam . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:26978: na evañjātīyakānām ittvam bhavati iti yat ayam mṛdaḥ tikan iti ittvabhūtam nirdeśam
GS24pmbhasuu:26979: karoti . pāvakādīnām chandasi upasaṅkhyānam . pāvakādīnām chandasi upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:26983: alomikā . āśiṣi ca . āśiṣi ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . jīvatāt jīvakā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26985: bhavatāt bhavakā . uttarapadalope ca . uttarapadalope ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . devadattikā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26988: yajñakā . kṣipakādīnām ca . kṣipakādīnām ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . kṣipakā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:26990: dhuvakā . tārakā jyotiṣi . tārakā jyotiṣi upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . tārakā . jyotiṣi
GS24pmbhasuu:26991: iti kimartham . tārikā dāsī . varṇakā tānave . varṇakā tāntave upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:26992: . varṇakā . tāntave iti kimartham . varṇikā bhāgurī lokāyatasya . vartakā śakunau
GS24pmbhasuu:26993: prācām . vartakā śakunau prācām upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . vartakā śakuniḥ . śakunau
GS24pmbhasuu:26994: iti kimartham . vartikā bhāgurī lokāyatasya . prācām iti kimartham . vartikā . aṣṭakā
GS24pmbhasuu:26995: pitṛdevatye . aṣṭakā pitṛdevatye upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . aṣṭakā . pitṛdevatye iti
GS24pmbhasuu:26996: kimartham . aṣṭikā khārī . vā sūtakāputrakāvṛndārakāṇām . vā sūtakāputrakāvṛndārakāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:27003: 211.2-7 kimartham strīliṅganirdeśaḥ kriyate na yakapūrvasya iti eva ucyeta . strīviṣayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27004: yaḥ ākāraḥ tasya sthāne yaḥ akāraḥ tasya pratiṣedhaḥ yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt . śubham
GS24pmbhasuu:27006: bhadraṃyikā . yakapūrve dhātvantapratiṣedhaḥ . yakapūrve dhātvantapratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kim prayojanam . sunayikā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:27009: 211.9-212.3 eṣādve nañpūrve anudāharaṇe asupaḥ iti pratiṣedhāt . atha bhastrāgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:27010: kimartham na abhāṣitapuṃskāt iti eva siddham . bhastrāgrahaṇam upasarjanārtham .
GS24pmbhasuu:27012: abhastrakā . nañpūrvagrahaṇānarthakyam ca uttarapadamātrasya idvacanāt . nañpūrvagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:27013: ca anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . uttarapadamātrasya idvacanāt . uttarapadamātrasya ittvam
GS24pmbhasuu:27019: 212.7-215.1 kim idam ṭhādeśe varṇagrahaṇam āhosvit saṅghātagrahaṇam . kaḥ ca atra
GS24pmbhasuu:27020: viśeṣaḥ . ṭhādeśe varṇagrahaṇam cet dhātvantasya pratiṣedhaḥ . ṭhādeśe varṇagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:27022: paṭhitum . astu tarhi saṅghātagrahaṇam . saṅghātagrahaṇam cet aṇādimāthitikādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:27023: pratiṣedhaḥ . saṅghātagrahaṇam cet uṇādimāthitikādīnām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . uṇādīnām tāvat . kaṇṭhaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:27025: śaṇṭhaḥ . iha ca mathitam paṇyam asya māthitikaḥ iti akāralope kṛte tāntāt iti kādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27026: prāpnoti . varṅagrahaṇe punaḥ sati alvidhiḥ ayam bhavati . tasmāt viśiṣṭagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:27027: . tasmāt viśiṣṭasya ṭhakārasya grahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . astu tāvat varṇagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:27028: . nanu ca uktam ṭhādeśe varṇagrahaṇam cet dhātvantasya pratiṣedhaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27029: doṣaḥ . aṅgāt iti vartate . na vā aṅgāt iti pañcamī asti . evam tarhi pratyayasthasya
GS24pmbhasuu:27030: iti vartate . kva prakṛtam . pratyayasthāt kāt pūrvasya ataḥ it āpi asupaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:27031: tat vai pañcamīnirdiṣṭam ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭena ca iha arthaḥ . arthāt vibhaktivipariṇāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27032: bhaviṣyati . tat yathā . uccāni devadattasya gṛhāṇi . āmantrayasva enam . devadattam
GS24pmbhasuu:27033: iti gamyate . devadattasya gāvaḥ aśvāḥ hiraṇyam . āḍhyaḥ vaidhaveyaḥ . devadattaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27034: iti gamyate . purastāt ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭam sat arthāt prathamānirdiṣṭam dvitīyānirdiṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:27035: ca bhavati . evam iha api purastāt pañcamīnirdiṣṭam sat arthāt ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:27036: . evam api uṇādīnām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . uṇādayaḥ avyutpannāni
GS24pmbhasuu:27037: prātipadikāni . evam api karmaṭhaḥ iti atra prāpnoti . evam tarhi aṅgasya iti sambandhaṣaṣṭhī
GS24pmbhasuu:27038: vijñāsyate . aṅgasya yaḥ ṭhakāraḥ . kim ca aṅgasya ṭhakāraḥ . nimittam . yasmin aṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:27039: iti etat bhavati . kasmin ca etat bhavati . pratyaye . atha vā punaḥ astu saṅghātagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:27040: . nanu ca uktam saṅghātagrahaṇam cet uṇādimāthitikādīnām pratiṣedhaḥ iti uṇādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:27041: tāvat pratiṣedhaḥ na vaktavyaḥ . parihṛtam etat uṇādayaḥ avyutpannāni prātipadikāni
GS24pmbhasuu:27042: iti . yat api ucyate iha ca mathitam paṇyam asya māthitikaḥ iti akāralope kṛte tāntāt
GS24pmbhasuu:27043: iti kādeśaḥ prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . akāralopasya sthānivadbhāvāt na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:27044: . na sidhyati . pūrvavidhau sthānivadbhāvaḥ na ca ayam pūrvavidhiḥ . ayam api pūrvavidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27045: . pūrvasmāt api vidhiḥ pūrvavidhiḥ iti . atha api uṇādayaḥ vyutpādyante evam api
GS24pmbhasuu:27046: na doṣaḥ . kriyate nyāse eva viśiṣṭagrahaṇam ṭhasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:27048: 215.3-5 iha kasmāt na bhavati . āśiṣā tarati āśiṣikaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:27049: uṣā tarati auṣikaḥ . lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya eva iti . atha iha katham
GS24pmbhasuu:27050: bhavitavyam . dorbhyām tarati . dauṣkaḥ iti bhavitavyam . katham . yadi varṇaikadeśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27054: ñṇinnakāraparasya hanteḥ yaḥ hakāraḥ iti . āhosvit hakāraviśeṣaṇam :
GS24pmbhasuu:27055: ñṇinnakāraparasya hakārasya saḥ cet hanteḥ iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . hanteḥ tatparasya iti cet nakāre aprasiddhiḥ . hanteḥ tatparasya iti cet nakāre aprasiddhiḥ . ghnanti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:27057: aghnan . astu tarhi hakāraviśeṣaṇam . hakārasya iti cet ñṇiti aprāptiḥ . hakārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:27058: iti cet ñṇiti aprāptiḥ . ghātayati ghātakaḥ . kim kāraṇam . nakāreṇa vyavahitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:27059: na prāpnoti . vacanāt bhaviṣyati . iha api vacanāt prāpnoti . hananam icchati hananīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:27060: hananīyateḥ ṇvul hananīyakaḥ iti . sthānivadbhāvāt ca acaḥ nakāre aprasiddhiḥ . sthānivadbhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:27062: ghnantu . vacanāt bhaviṣyati . vacanaprāmāṇyāt iti cet alope pratiṣedhaḥ . vacanaprāmāṇyāt iti cet alope pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . hantā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:27063: hantum . nakāragrahaṇasāmarthyāt alope na bhaviṣyati . asti anyat nakāragrahaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:27064: prayojanam . kim . śrūyamāṇaviśeṣaṇam . yatra nakāraḥ śrūyate tatra yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:27065: iha mā bhūt . hataḥ hathaḥ iti . siddham tu upadhālope iti vacanāt . siddham etat
GS24pmbhasuu:27066: . katham . upadhālope ca iti vaktavyam . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam
GS24pmbhasuu:27067: eva astu . nanu ca uktam hanteḥ tatparasya iti cet nakāre aprasiddhiḥ iti . vacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:27068: bhaviṣyati . atha vā punaḥ astu hakāraviśeṣaṇam . nanu ca uktam hakārasya iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:27069: ñṇiti aprāptiḥ iti . vacanāt bhaviṣyati . nanu ca uktam iha api vacanāt prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:27070: hananīyakaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yena na avyavadhānam tena vyavahite api vacanaprāmāṇyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:27071: . na ca kva cit dhātvavayavena avyavadhānam etena punaḥ saṅghātena vyavadhānam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:27072: na ca bhavati . yat api ucyate sthānivadbhāvāt ca acaḥ nakāre aprasiddhiḥ iti vacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:27073: bhaviṣyati . nanu ca uktam vacanaprāmāṇyāt iti cet alope pratiṣedhaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27074: doṣaḥ . ānantaryam iha āśrīyate hakārasya nakāraḥ iti . kva cit ca sannipātakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:27075: ānantaryam śāstrakṛtam anānantaryam kva cit ca na sannipātakṛtam na api śāstrakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:27076: . lope sannipātakṛtam ānantaryam alope na eva sannipātakṛtam na api śāstrakṛtam .
GS24pmbhasuu:27077: yatra kutaḥ cit eva ānantaryam tat āśrayiṣyāmaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:27079: 217.15-218.8 abhyāsāt kutvam asupaḥ . abhyāsāt kutvam asupaḥ iti vaktavyam . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:27080: mā bhūt . hananam icchati hananīyati hananīyateḥ san jihananīyiṣati iti . tat tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:27081: vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . hanteḥ abhyāsāt iti ucyate na ca eṣaḥ hanteḥ abhyāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27082: . hanteḥ eṣaḥ abhyāsaḥ . katham . ekācaḥ dve prathamasya iti . evam tarhi hanteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27083: aṅgasya yaḥ abhyāsaḥ tasmāt iti ucyate na ca eṣaḥ hanteḥ aṅgasya abhyāsaḥ . hanteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27084: aṅgasya eṣaḥ abhyāsaḥ . katham . ekācaḥ dve prathamasya iti . evam tarhi yasmin hantiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27085: aṅgam tasmin yaḥ abhyāsaḥ tasmāt iti ucyate . yasmin ca atra hantiḥ aṅgam na tasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:27086: abhyāsaḥ yasmin ca abhyāsaḥ na tasmin hantiḥ aṅgam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:27088: 219.2-8 acaṅi iti kimartham . prājīhayat dūtam . heḥ caṅi pratiṣedhānarthakyam aṅgānyatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:27089: . heḥ caṅi pratiṣedhaḥ anarthakaḥ . kim kāraṇam . aṅgānyatvāt . ṇyantam etat aṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:27090: anyat bhavati . lope kṛte na aṅgānyatvam . sthānivadbhāvāt aṅgānyatvam eva . jñāpakam
GS24pmbhasuu:27091: tu anytra ṇyadhikasya kutvavijñānārtham . evam tarhi jñāpayati ācāryaḥ anyatra ṇyadhikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:27092: kutvam bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . prajighāyayiṣati iti atra kutvam siddham bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:27094: 219.10-14 jigrahaṇe jyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . jigrahaṇe jyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . jijyatuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:27095: jijyuḥ iti . saḥ tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27096: pratipadoktasya eva iti evam etasya na bhaviṣyati . sā tarhi eṣā paribhaṣā kartavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:27097: . avaśyam kartavyā adhyāpya gataḥ iti evamartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:27100: . kvādyajivrajiyācirucīnām apratiṣedhaḥ . anarthakaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ . kutvam
GS24pmbhasuu:27101: kasmāt na bhavati . niṣṭhāyām aniṭaḥ kutvavacanāt . niṣṭhāyām aniṭaḥ kutvam vakṣyāmi
GS24pmbhasuu:27102: seṭaḥ ca ete niṣṭhāyām . yadi niṣṭhāyām aniṭaḥ kutvam ucyate katham śokaḥ samudraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27103: iti . śucyubjyoḥ ghañi kutvam . śucyubjyoḥ ghañi kutvam vaktavyam . katham arkaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27104: . arceḥ kavidhānāt siddham . na etat ghañantam . auṇādikaḥ eṣaḥ kaśabdaḥ tasmin āṣṭamikam kutvam .
GS24pmbhasuu:27106: 221.2-8 bhujaḥ pāṇau . bhujaḥ pāṇau iti vaktavyam . katham nyubjaḥ upatāpe iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:27107: nyubjeḥ kartṛtvāt apratiṣedhaḥ . anarthakaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ . kutvam kasmat
GS24pmbhasuu:27108: na bhavati . kartṛtvāt . na etat ghañantam . kartṛpratyayaḥ eṣaḥ . nyubjati iti nyubjaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27109: . adhikaraṇasādhanaḥ vai lakṣyate ghañ . nyubjitāḥ śerate asmin nyubjaḥ upatāpe iti
GS24pmbhasuu:27110: . eṣaḥ api hi kartṛsādhanaḥ eva . nyubjayati iti nyubjaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:27113: anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . vaco'śabdasañjñābhāvāt . vaco'śabdasañjñāyām pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27114: ucyate prapūrvaḥ ca vaciḥ aśabdasañjñāyām vartate . upasarganiyamārtham tarhi idam
GS24pmbhasuu:27115: vaktavyam . prapūrvasya eva vaceḥ aśabdasañjñāyām pratiṣedhaḥ yathā syāt . iha mā
GS24pmbhasuu:27116: bhūt . avivākyam iti . upasargapūrvaniyamārtham iti cet avivākyasya viśeṣavacanat
GS24pmbhasuu:27117: siddham . viśeṣe etat vaktavyam . avivākyam ahaḥ iti . kva mā bhūt . avivācyam eva
GS24pmbhasuu:27118: anyat iti . ṇyapratiṣedhe tyajeḥ upasaṅkhyānam . ṇyapratiṣedhe tyajeḥ upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:27121: 222.10-14 [bhojyam abhyavahārhye] . bhojyam abhyavahārye iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt . bhojyaḥ sūpaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:27122: bhojyā yavāgūḥ iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . bhakṣiḥ ayam kharaviśade vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:27123: tena drave na prāpnoti . na avaśyam bhakṣiḥ kharaviśade eva vartate . kim tarhi anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:27127: 223.2-4 vā iti śakyam avaktum . kasmāt na bhavati . tat agniḥ agnaye dadāt . astu atra lopaḥ āṭaḥ śravaṇam bhaviṣyati tena ubhayam sidhyati . dadhat ratnāni dāśuṣe ,
GS24pmbhasuu:27130: 223.6-224.1 [otaḥ śiti] . otaḥ śiti iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . uttaratra śidgrahaṇābhāvāya
GS24pmbhasuu:27131: . tatra ayam api arthaḥ ṣṭhivuklamvācamām śiti iti śidgrahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:27132: . nanu ca bhoḥ śyangrahaṇam api tarhi uttarārtham kartavyam . śamām aṣṭānām dīrghaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27133: śyani iti śyangrahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati . atra api astu śiti iti eva . yadi śiti
GS24pmbhasuu:27134: iti ucyate anu tvā indraḥ bhramatu madatu atra api prāpnoti . śamādibhiḥ atra śitam
GS24pmbhasuu:27135: viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . śamādīnām yaḥ śit iti . kaḥ ca śamādīnām śit . śamādibhyaḥ yaḥ vihitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27137: yasyati atra prāpnoti . aṣṭānām iti vacanāt na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:27139: 224.3-5 dīrghatvam āṅi camaḥ . dīrghatvam āṅi camaḥ iti vaktavyam . ācāmati . iha mā bhūt . uccamati ,
GS24pmbhasuu:27142: 224.7-13 iṣeḥ chatvam ahali . iṣeḥ chatvam ahali iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . iṣṇāti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:27143: iṣyati . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . aci iti vartate . evam api iṣāṇa iti
GS24pmbhasuu:27144: atra prāpnoti . atha ahali iti ucyamāne kasmāt eva atra chatvam na bhavati . na evam
GS24pmbhasuu:27145: vijñāyate na hal ahal ahali iti . katham tarhi . avidyamānaḥ hal asmin saḥ ayam ahal
GS24pmbhasuu:27146: ahali iti . yadi evam aci iti api vartamāne na doṣaḥ . na hi acā śit viśeṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:27147: śiti bhavati katarsmin aci iti . katham tarhi . śitā ac viśeṣyate . aci bhavati katarsmin śiti iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:27149: 225.3-8 pibeḥ guṇapratiṣedhaḥ . pibeḥ guṇapratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . pibati . laghūpadhaguṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27150: prāpnoti . saḥ tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . guṇaḥ kasmāt na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:27151: . pibiḥ adantaḥ . adante iti cet uktam . kim uktam . dhātoḥ ante iti cet anudāttecabagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:27152: iti . atha vā aṅgavṛtte punarvṛttau avidhiḥ niṣṭhitasya iti evam na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:27154: 225-226 dīrghoccāraṇam kimartham na jñājanoḥ jaḥ iti eva ucyeta . kā rūpasiddhiḥ : jānāti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:27155: jāyate . ataḥ dīrghaḥ yañi iti dīrghatvam bhaviṣyati . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat
GS24pmbhasuu:27156: dīrghoccāraṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati eṣā paribhāṣā aṅgavṛtte punarvṛttau
GS24pmbhasuu:27157: avidhiḥ iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . pibeḥ guṇapratiṣedhaḥ coditaḥ saḥ na vaktavyaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:27159: 226 jusi guṇe yāsuṭpratiṣedhaḥ . jusi guṇe yāsuḍādau pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . cinuyuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:27160: sunuyuḥ iti . na vaktavyaḥ . na evam vijñāyate mideḥ guṇaḥ jusi ca iti . katham tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:27161: . mideḥ guṇaḥ ajusi ca iti . kim idam ajusi iti . ajādau usi ajusi iti . iha api
GS24pmbhasuu:27163: jahruḥ iti . evam tarhi śiti iti vartate . evam api ajuhavuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:27164: abibhayuḥ iti atra na prāpnoti . bhūtapūrvagatyā bhaviṣyati . na sidhyati na hi us
GS24pmbhasuu:27165: śidbhūtapūrvaḥ . us śidbhūtapūrvaḥ na asti iti kṛtvā usi yaḥ śidbhūtapūrvaḥ tasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:27166: bhaviṣyati . atha vā kriyate nyāse eva . avibhaktikaḥ nirdeśaḥ . na evam vijñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:27167: mideḥ guṇaḥ jusi ca iti . katham tarhi . mideḥ guṇaḥ u jusi iti . kim idam u jusi
GS24pmbhasuu:27168: iti . ukārādau jusi . atha vā aci iti vartate tena jusam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . ajādau jusi iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:27171: jāgarakaḥ iti guṇe kṛte raparatve ca ataḥ upadhāyāḥ iti vṛddhiḥ prāpnoti tasyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27172: vaktavyaḥ . ciṇṇaloḥ pratiṣedhasāmarthyāt anyatra guṇabhūtasya vṛddhipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27173: . yat ayam aciṇṇaloḥ iti pratiṣedham śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na guṇābhinirvṛttasya
GS24pmbhasuu:27174: vṛddhiḥ bhavati iti . kim punaḥ ayam paryudāsaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:27175: yat anyat viciṇṇalṅidbhyaḥ iti . āhosvit prasajya ayam pratiṣedhaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:27176: viciṇṇalṅitsu na iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . prasajyapratiṣedhe jusiguṇapratiṣedhaprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27177: . prasajyapratiṣedhe jusiguṇapratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . ajāgaruḥ . uttame ca ṇali . prasajyapratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:27178: jusiguṇapratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . ajāgaruḥ . na vā anantarasya pratiṣedhāt . na vā eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27179: doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . anantarasya pratiṣedhāt . anantaram yat guṇavidhānam tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:27180: pratiṣedhaḥ . jusi pūrveṇa guṇavidhānam . jusi pūrveṇa guṇaḥ vidhīyate jusi ca iti
GS24pmbhasuu:27181: . ṇali ca . kim . na vā anantarasya pratiṣedhāt iti eva . ṇali ca pūrveṇa guṇaḥ vidhīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:27182: sārvadhātukārdhadhātukayoḥ iti . atha vā punaḥ astu paryudāsaḥ . ataḥ anyatra vidhāne
GS24pmbhasuu:27183: vau aguṇatvam . ataḥ anyatra vidhāne vau aguṇatvam . na vā paryudāsasāmarthyāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:27184: na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam . paryudāsasāmarthyāt atra guṇaḥ na bhaviṣyati . asti
GS24pmbhasuu:27185: anyat paryudāse prayojanam . kim . kvibartham paryudāsaḥ syāt . śuddhaparasya viśabdasya
GS24pmbhasuu:27186: pratiṣedhe grahaṇam anunāsikaparaḥ ca kvau viśabdaḥ . vasvartham tarhi paryudāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27187: syāt . jāgṛvāṃsaḥ anu gman . katham punaḥ veḥ paryudāsaḥ ucyamānaḥ vasvarthaḥ śakyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27188: vijñātum . sāmarthyāt vasvartham iti vijñāsyate . vasvartham iti cet na sārvadhātukatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:27189: siddham . vasvartham iti cet na . kim kāraṇam . sārvadhātukatvāt siddham . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:27190: sārvadhātukasañjñā . chāndasaḥ kvasuḥ . liṭ ca chandasi sārvadhātukam api bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:27191: . tatra sārvadhātukam apin ṅit iti ṅittvāt paryudāsaḥ bhaviṣyati . atha vā vakārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:27194: 229.5-232.4 saṃyoge gurusañjñāyām guṇaḥ bhettuḥ na sidhyati . saṃyoge gurusañjñāyām bhettā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:27195: bhettum iti guṇaḥ na prāpnoti . vidhyapekṣam laghoḥ ca asau . vidhyapekṣam laghugrahaṇam kṛtam laghoḥ ca asau vihitaḥ . katham kuṇḍiḥ na duṣyati . kuṇḍitā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:27196: huṇḍitā atra kasmāt na bhavati . dhātoḥ numaḥ . dhātoḥ numvidhau uktam tatra dhātugrahaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:27197: prayojanam dhātūpadeśāvasthāyām eva num bhavati iti . katham rañjeḥ . katham rañjeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27199: vicitraḥ rāgaḥ . syandiśranthyoḥ nipātanāt . yat ayam syandiśranthyoḥ avṛddhyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:27200: nipātanam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati evañjātīyakānām vṛddhiḥ iti . anaṅlopaśidīrghatve
GS24pmbhasuu:27203: vanāni . evam tarhi abhyastasya yat āha aci . yat ayam na abhyastasya aci piti sārvadhātuke
GS24pmbhasuu:27204: iti ajgrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati evañjātīyakānām guṇaḥ iti . laṅartham
GS24pmbhasuu:27205: tat kṛtam bhavet . laṅartham etat syāt . anena ik . knusunoḥ yat kṛtam kittvam jñāpakam
GS24pmbhasuu:27206: syāt laghoḥ guṇe . yat ayam trasigṛdhidhṛṣikṣipeḥ knuḥ ikaḥ jhal halantāt ca iti
GS24pmbhasuu:27207: knusanau kitau karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati evañjātīyakānām guṇaḥ iti . saṃyoge
GS24pmbhasuu:27209: vidhyapekṣam laghoḥ ca asau katham kuṇḍiḥ na duṣyati . dhātoḥ numaḥ katham rañjeḥ syandiśranthyoḥ nipātanāt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:27210: anaṅlopaśidīrghatve vidhyapekṣe na sidhyataḥ . abhyastasya yat āha aci laṅartham tat kṛtam bhavet ,
GS24pmbhasuu:27211: knusunoḥ yat kṛtam kittvam jñāpakam syāt laghoḥ guṇe .
GS24pmbhasuu:27215: vāvaśatīḥ iti darśanāt . abhyastānām upadhāhrasvatvam aci vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . paspaśāte ,
GS24pmbhasuu:27216: cākaśīmi . vāvaśatīḥ iti prayogaḥ dṛśyate . kapotaḥ śaradam paspaśāte . aham bhuvanam
GS24pmbhasuu:27217: cākaśīmi . vāvaśatīḥ ut ājat iti . bahulam chandasi ānuṣak jujoṣat iti darśanāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:27218: bahulam chandasi vaktavyam upadhāhrasvatvam . kim prayojanam . ānuṣak jujoṣat iti
GS24pmbhasuu:27219: darśanāt . yaḥ te ātityam ānuṣak jujoṣat . yadi upadhāhrasvatvam ucyate ,
GS24pmbhasuu:27220: priyām mayūraḥ pratinarnṛtīti yadvat tvam naravara narnṛtīṣi hṛṣṭaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:27221: atra guṇaḥ prāpnoti . tasmāt na arthaḥ upadhāhrasvatvena . kasmāt na bhavati . paspaśāte ,
GS24pmbhasuu:27225: 233.6-11 bhūsuvoḥ pratiṣedhe ekājgrahaṇam bobhavītyartham . bhūsuvoḥ pratiṣedhe ekājgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:27226: kartavyam . kim prayojanam . bobhavītyartham . iha mā bhūt . bobhavīti . yadi ekājgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:27227: kriyate abhūt atra na prāpnoti . kva tarhi syāt . mā bhūt . tasmāt na arthaḥ ekājgrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:27228: . kasmāt na bhavati . bobhavīti iti . bobhūtu iti etat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . atra
GS24pmbhasuu:27229: eva yaṅlugantasya guṇaḥ na bhavati na anyatra iti . kva mā bhūt . bobhavīti iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:27231: 234.2-12 kimartham tṛhirāgataśnamkaḥ na tṛheḥ im bhavati iti eva ucyeta . tṛṇahigrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:27232: śnamimoḥ vyavasthārtham . tṛṇahigrahaṇam śnami kṛte im yathā syāt . tṛhigrahaṇe hi
GS24pmbhasuu:27233: imviṣaye śnamabhāvaḥ anavakāśatvāt . tṛhigrahaṇe hi sati imviṣaye śnamaḥ abhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27234: syāt . kim kāraṇam . anavakāśatvāt . anavakāśaḥ im śnamam bādheta . idam ayuktam
GS24pmbhasuu:27235: vartate . kim atra ayuktam . tṛṇahigrahaṇam śnamimoḥ vyavasthārtham iti uktvā tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27236: ucyate tṛhigrahaṇe hi imviṣaye śnamabhāvaḥ anavakāśatvāt iti . tatra vaktavyam tṛṇahigrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:27237: śnamimoḥ bhāvāya tṛhigrahaṇe hi imviṣeye śnamabhāvaḥ anavakāśatvāt iti . tat tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:27238: vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . vyavasthārtham iti eva siddham na hi asataḥ vyavasthā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:27240: 234.14-235.1 sārvadhātuke iti vartamāne punaḥ sārvadhātukagrahaṇam kimartham . punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27241: sārvadhātukagrahaṇam apidartham . apidarthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . adhrigo śamīdhvam suśami
GS24pmbhasuu:27244: 235.3-7 ataḥ dīrghāt bahuvacane ettvam vipratiṣedhena . ataḥ dīrghāt bahuvacane ettvam bhavati vipratiṣedhena . ataḥ dīrghaḥ yañi supi ca iti asya avakāśaḥ . vṛkṣābhyām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:27245: plakṣābhyām . bahuvacane jhali et iti asya avakāśaḥ . vṛkṣeṣu ,
GS24pmbhasuu:27251: ambike . talhrasvatvam vā ṅisambuddhyoḥ . talhrasvatvam vā ṅisambuddhyoḥ iti vaktavyam . devata ,
GS24pmbhasuu:27253: devate . saḥ tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . saḥ katham na vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27254: bhavati . ambārtham dvyakṣaram yadi . yadi ambārtham dvyakṣaram gṛhyate . tat tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:27255: hrasvatvam vaktavyam . avaśyam chandasi hrasvatvam vaktavyam upagāyantu mām patnayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27256: garbhiṇayaḥ yuvatayaḥ iti evam artham . mātṝṇām mātac putrārtham arhate . mātṝṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:27257: mātajādeśaḥ vaktavyaḥ putrārtham arhate . gārgīmāta , vātsīmāta .
GS24pmbhasuu:27263: brahmabandhu . hrasvavacanasāmarthyāt . asti anyat hrasvavacane prayojanam pṛthagvibhaktim
GS24pmbhasuu:27264: mā uccīcaram iti . śakyam pṛthagvibhaktiḥ anuccārayitum . katham . evam ayam brūyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:27265: . ambārthānām hrasvaḥ nadīhrasvayoḥ guṇaḥ iti . yadi evam ucyate jasi ca iti atra
GS24pmbhasuu:27266: nadyāḥ api guṇaḥ prāpnoti . evam tarhi yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . ambārthanadyoḥ hrasvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27267: . tataḥ hrasvasya . hrasvasya ca hrasvaḥ bhavati . kimartham idam . guṇam vakṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:27268: tadbādhanārtham . tataḥ guṇaḥ . guṇaḥ ca bhavati hrasvasya iti . atha vā hrasvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:27269: guṇaḥ iti atra ambārthanadyoḥ hrasvaḥ iti etat anuvartiṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:27271: 237.2-7 jasādiṣu chandasi vāvacanam prāk ṇau caṅi upadhāyāḥ . jasādiṣu chandasi vā iti vaktavyam . kim aviśeṣeṇa . na iti āha . prāk ṇau caṅyupadhāyāḥ . kim prayojanam . ambe,
GS24pmbhasuu:27285: 237.9-238.3 gheḥ ṅiti guṇavidhāne ṅīsārvadhātuke pratiṣedhaḥ . gheḥ ṅiti guṇavidhāne ṅīsārvadhātuke pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . paṭvī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:27287: kurutaḥ iti . subadhikārāt siddham . sup iti vartate . kva prakṛtam . supi ca bahuvacane jhali et iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:27290: atimālāya iti hrasvatve kṛte sthānivadbhāvāt yāṭ prāpnoti tasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27291: . na vaktavyaḥ . yāḍvidhāne atikhaṭvāya iti apratiṣedhaḥ hrasvādeśatvāt . yāḍvidhāne atikhaṭvāya ,
GS24pmbhasuu:27292: atimālāya iti apratiṣedhaḥ . anarthakaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ . yāṭ kasmāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:27293: bhavati . hrasvādeśatvāt . hrasvādeśaḥ ayam . uktam etat ṅyābgrahaṇe adīrghaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:27294: . atha idānīm asati api sthānivadbhāve dīrghatve kṛte āp ca asau bhūtapūrvaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:27295: kṛtvā yāṭ kasmāt na bhavati . lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya eva iti . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:27296: ca idānīm sati api sthānivadbhāve etayā paribhāṣayā śakyam upasthātum . na iti āha
GS24pmbhasuu:27297: . na ca tadānīm kvacit api sthānivadbhāvaḥ syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:27299: 239.2-7 idudbhyām āmvidhānam auttvasya paratvāt . idudbhyām ām vidheyaḥ . śakaṭyām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:27301: dhenvām iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . auttvasya paratvāt . paratvāt auttvam
GS24pmbhasuu:27302: prāpnoti . yogavibhāgāt siddham . yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . ṅeḥ ām nadyāmnībhyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:27303: tataḥ idudbhyām . idudbhyām uttarasya ṅeḥ ām bhavati iti . śakaṭyām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:27305: dhenvām iti . tataḥ aut at ca gheḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:27307: 239.9-241.1 auttve yogavibhāgaḥ . auttve yogavibhāgaḥ kartavyaḥ . aut . aut bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:27308: idudbhyām . tataḥ at ca gheḥ . akāraḥ ca bhavati gheḥ iti . kimarthaḥ yogavibhāgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27309: . sakhipatibhyām auttvārthaḥ . sakhipatibhyām auttvam yathā syāt . sakhyau ,
GS24pmbhasuu:27310: patyau . ekayoge hi aprāptiḥ attvasanniyogāt . ekayoge hi sati auttvasya aprāptiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27311: . kim kāraṇam . attvasanniyogāt . attvasanniyogena auttvam ucyate tena yatra eva
GS24pmbhasuu:27312: auttvam syāt . na vā akārasya anvācayavacanāt yathā kyaṅi salopaḥ . na vā artha auttve
GS24pmbhasuu:27313: yogavibhāgena . kim kāraṇam . akārasya anvācayavacanāt . pradhānaśiṣṭam auttvam anvācayaśiṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:27314: attvam yathā kyaṅi salopaḥ . tat yathā . pradhānaśiṣṭaḥ kyaṅ prātipadikamātrāt bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:27315: yatra ca skāraḥ tatra lopaḥ . attve ṭāppratiṣedhaḥ . attve ṭāpaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . śakaṭau ,
GS24pmbhasuu:27317: dhenau . attve kṛte ṭāp prāpnoti . na vā sannipātalakṣaṇasya animittatvāt . na vā
GS24pmbhasuu:27318: vaktavyaḥ . kim kāraṇam . sannipātalakṣaṇasya animittatvāt . sannipātalakṣaṇaḥ vidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27319: animittam tadvighātasya iti ṭāp na bhaviṣyati . ḍitkaraṇāt vā . atha vā ḍit āukāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27322: 241.3-6 kimartham astriyām iti ucyate na āṅaḥ nā puṃsi iti eva ucyeta . kā rūpasiddhiḥ : trapuṇā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:27323: jatunā . numā siddham . na evam śakyam . iha hi amunā brāhmaṇakulena iti mubhāvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:27324: asiddhatvāt num na syāt . astriyām iti punaḥ ucyamāne na doṣaḥ bhavati . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:27327: 242-245 atha ṇigrahaṇam kimartham na caṅi upadhāyāḥ hrasvaḥ iti eva ucyeta . caṅi upadhāyāḥ hrasvaḥ iti iyati ucyamāne ,
GS24pmbhasuu:27330: ūkārasya eva hrasvatvam prasajyeta . na etat asti prayojanam . vṛddhiḥ atra bādhikā
GS24pmbhasuu:27331: bhaviṣyati . vṛddhau tarhi kṛtāyām aukārasya eva hrasvatvam prasajyeta . na etat
GS24pmbhasuu:27332: asti . antaraṅgatvāt atra āvādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . na hi idānīm hrasvabhāvinī upadhā
GS24pmbhasuu:27333: bhavati . tasmāt ṇigrahaṇam kartavyam . atha caṅgrahaṇam kimartham na ṇau upadhāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27334: iti eva siddham . ṇau upadhāyāḥ hrasvaḥ iti iyati ucyamāne ,
GS24pmbhasuu:27336: hārayati iti atra api prasajyeta . na etat asti prayojanam . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:27337: na ṇau eva hrasvatvam bhavati iti yat ayam mitām hrasvatvam śāsti . iha api tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:27339: ajīharat . vacanāt bhaviṣyati . iha api tarhi vacanāt prāpnoti . kārayati ,
GS24pmbhasuu:27340: hārayati . tasmāt caṅgrahaṇam kartavyam . atha upadhāgrahaṇam kimartham . ṇau caṅi
GS24pmbhasuu:27341: upadhāgrahaṇam antyapratiṣedhārtham . ṇau caṅi upadhāgrahaṇam kriyate antyasya hrastvatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:27342: mā bhūt . ṇau caṅi hrasvaḥ iti iyati ucyamāne ,
GS24pmbhasuu:27345: antyasya eva hrasvatvam prasajyeta . na etat asti prayojanam . antaraṅgatvāt atra
GS24pmbhasuu:27346: āvādeśaḥ bhavati . na hi idānīm hrasvabhāvī antyaḥ asti . antyaḥ hrasvabhāvī na asti
GS24pmbhasuu:27347: iti kṛtvā vacanāt anantyasya bhaviṣyati . iha api vacanāt prāpnoti . acakāṅkṣat ,
GS24pmbhasuu:27348: avavāñchat . yena na avyavadhānam tena vyavahite api vacanaprāmāṇyāt . kena ca na
GS24pmbhasuu:27349: avyavadhānam . varṇena . etena punaḥ saṅghatena vayvadhānam bhavati na bhavati ca
GS24pmbhasuu:27350: . uttarārtham tarhi upadhāgrahaṇam kartavyam . lopaḥ pibateḥ ī ca abhyāsasya upadhāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27353: apīpyan . atha iha katham bhavitavyam . mā bhavān aṭiṭat iti . āhosvit mā bhavān
GS24pmbhasuu:27354: āṭiṭat iti . mā bhavān āṭiṭat iti bhavitavyam . hrasvatvam kasmāt na bhavati . dvirvacane
GS24pmbhasuu:27355: kṛte pareṇa rūpeṇa vyavahitam iti kṛtvā . idam iha sampradhāryam . dvirvacanam kriyatām
GS24pmbhasuu:27356: hrasvatvam iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt hrasvatvam . nityam dvirvacanam . kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:27357: hrasvatve prāpnoti akṛte api . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati dvirvacanāt hrasvatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:27358: balīyaḥ iti yat ayam oṇim ṛditam karoti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . ṛditkaraṇe etat
GS24pmbhasuu:27359: prayojanam ṛditām na iti pratiṣedhaḥ yathā syāt . yadi ca atra pūrvam dvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:27360: syāt ṛditkaraṇam anarthakam syāt . dvirvacane kṛte pareṇa vyavahitatvāt hrasvatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:27361: na bhaviṣyati . paśyati tu ācāryaḥ dvirvacanāt hrasvatvam balīyaḥ iti tataḥ oṇim
GS24pmbhasuu:27362: ṛditam karoti . tasmāt mā bhavān aṭiṭat iti eva bhavitavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:27364: 245-247 upadhāhrasvatve ṇeḥ ṇici upasaṅkhyānāt . upadhāhrasvatve ṇeḥ ṇici upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:27365: vāditavantam prayojitavān avīvadadvīṇām parivādakena . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati
