GS24pmbhasuu:27366: . ṇicā vyavahitatvāt . ṇilope kṛte na asti vyavadhānam . sthānivadbhāvāt vyavadhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:27367: eva . pratiṣidhyate atra sthānivadbhāvaḥ caṅparanirhrāse na sthānivat iti . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:27368: api aglopinām na iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . vṛddhau kṛtāyām lopaḥ tat na aglopai
GS24pmbhasuu:27369: aṅgam bhavati . idam iha sampradhāryam . vṛddhiḥ kriyatām lopaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:27370: . paratvāt vṛddhiḥ . nityaḥ lopaḥ . kṛtāyām api vṛddhau prāpnoti akṛtāyām api . anityaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27371: lopaḥ . anyasya kṛtāyām vṛddhau prāpnoti anyasya akṛtāyām śabdāntarasya ca prāpnuvan
GS24pmbhasuu:27372: vidhiḥ anityaḥ bhavati . ubhayoḥ anityayoḥ paratvāt vṛddhiḥ . vṛddhau kṛtāyām lopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27373: tat na aglopi aṅgam bhavati . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati vṛddheḥ lopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27374: balīyān iti yat ayam aglopinām na iti pratiṣedham śāsti . na etat asti jñāpakam .
GS24pmbhasuu:27375: asti anyat etasya vacane prayojanam . kim . yatra vṛddhau api kṛtāyām eva lupyate
GS24pmbhasuu:27376: . atyararājat . yat tarhi pratyāhāragrahaṇam karoti . itarathā hi alopinām na iti
GS24pmbhasuu:27377: brūyāt . evam vā vṛddheḥ lopaḥ balīyān iti . atha vā ārabhyate pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27378: ṇyallopāviyaṅyaṇguṇavṛddhidīrghatvebhyaḥ pūrvavipratiṣiddham iti . tasmāt upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:27381: anarthakaḥ . kim kāraṇam . sthānivadbhāvāt . sthānivadbhāvāt atra hrasvatvam na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:27382: . yatra tarhi sthānivadbhāvaḥ na asti tadartham ayam yogaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kva sthānivadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27383: na asti . yaḥ halacoḥ ādeśaḥ . atyararājat . kim punaḥ kāraṇam halacoḥ ādeśaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:27384: sthānivat iti ucyate . ajādeśaḥ sthānivat iti ucyate na ca ayam acaḥ eva ādeśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:27385: kim tarhi acaḥ anyasya ca . aglopinām na iti api tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:27386: kim kāraṇam . aglopinām na iti ucyate na ca atra ac eva lupyate . kim tarhi . ac
GS24pmbhasuu:27387: ca anyaḥ ca . yaḥ atra ac lupyate tadāśrayaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati . yathā eva tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:27388: yaḥ atra ac lupyate tadāśrayaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ bhavati evam yaḥ atra ac lupyate tadāśrayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27389: sthānivadbhāvaḥ bhaviṣyati . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat aglopinām na iti pratiṣedham
GS24pmbhasuu:27390: śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ itaḥ uttaram sthānivadbhāvaḥ na bhavati iti . kim etasya
GS24pmbhasuu:27391: jñāpane prayojanam . pūrvatra asiddhe na sthānivat iti uktam tat na vaktavyam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:27394: āvevayateḥ āvevakaḥ . yīvarṇayoḥ dīdhīvevyoḥ iti lopaḥ na prāpnoti . iha ca yat pralunīhi
GS24pmbhasuu:27395: atra tiṅi ca udāttavati iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yat tāvat ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:27398: yīvarṇayoḥ iti lopaḥ na prāpnoti iti yīvarṇayoḥ iti atra varṇagrahaṇasāmarthyāt bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:27399: . yat api ucyate yat pralunīhi atra tiṅi ca udāttavati iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:27400: iti bahiraṅgaḥ yaṇādeśaḥ antaraṅgaḥ svaraḥ asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge .
GS24pmbhasuu:27402: 249.6-250.3 kāṇyādīnām ca iti vaktavyam . ke punaḥ kāṇyādayaḥ . kāṇirāṇiśrāṇibhāṇiheṭhilopayaḥ . acakāṇat ,
GS24pmbhasuu:27416: avadigyare digyādeśe kṛte dvirvacanam prāpnoti tatra sābhyāsasya iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:27417: nanu ca dvirvacane kṛte sābhyāsasya digyādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:27418: . digyādeśasya paratvāt sābhyāsasya ādeśavacanam . digyādeśaḥ kriyatām dvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:27419: iti paratvāt digyādeśena bhavitavyam . tatra sābhyāsasya iti vaktavyam . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:27420: digyādeśaḥ dvirvacanam bādhiṣyate . punaḥprasaṅgavijñānāt dvirvacanam prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:27421: punaḥprasaṅgaḥ iti cet amādibhiḥ tulyam . punaḥprasaṅgaḥ iti cet amādibhiḥ tulyam
GS24pmbhasuu:27422: etat bhavati . tat yathā . amādiṣu kṛteṣu punaḥprasaṅgāt śiśīlugnumaḥ na bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:27423: . evam digyādeśe kṛte punaḥprasaṅgāt dvirvacanam na bhaviṣyati . atha vā vipratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:27424: punaḥprasaṅgaḥ iti ucyate vipratiṣedhaḥ ca dvayoḥ sāvakaśayoḥ . iha punaḥ anavakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27425: digyādeśaḥ dvirvacanam bādhiṣyate . yadi tarhi anavakāśāḥ vidhayaḥ bādhakāḥ bhavanti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:27427: bhūbhāvaḥ dvirvacanam bādheta . sāvakāśaḥ bhūbhāvaḥ . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . bhavitā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:27428: bhavitum . iha tarhi cakṣiṅaḥ khyāñ vā liṭi iti khyāñ dvirvacanam bādheta . iha ca
GS24pmbhasuu:27429: api babhūva iti yadi tāvat sthāne dvirvacanam bhūbhāvaḥ sarvādeśaḥ prāpnoti atha
GS24pmbhasuu:27430: dviḥprayogaḥ dvirvacanam parasya bhūbhāve kṛte pūrvasya śravaṇam prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27431: doṣaḥ . ārdhadhātukīyāḥ sāmānyena bhavanti anavasthiteṣu pratyayeṣu . tatra ārdhadhātukasāmānye
GS24pmbhasuu:27432: bhūbhāve kṛte yaḥ yataḥ pratyayaḥ prāpnoti saḥ tataḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:27434: 252.7-254.3 saṃyogādeḥ guṇavidhāne saṃyogopadhagrahaṇam kṛñartham . saṃyogādeḥ guṇavidhāne
GS24pmbhasuu:27435: saṃyogopadhagrahaṇam kartavyam . kimartham . kṛñartham . iha api yathā syāt . sañcaskaratuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:27436: sañcaskaruḥ . yadi saṃyogopadhagrahaṇam kriyate na arthaḥ saṃyogādigrahaṇena . iha api sasvaratuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:27437: sasvaruḥ saṃyogopadhasya iti eva siddham . bhavet siddham sasvaratuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:27438: sasvaruḥ iti idam tu na sidhyati sañcaskaratuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:27439: sañcaskaruḥ iti . kim kāraṇam . suṭaḥ bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . bahiraṅgam suṭ . antaraṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27440: guṇaḥ . asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge . saṃyogādigrahaṇe tu kriyamāṇe saṃyogopadhagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:27441: ananyārtham vijñāyate . ṛtaḥ liṭi guṇāt ñṇiti vṛddhiḥ vipratiṣedhena . ṛtaḥ liṭi
GS24pmbhasuu:27442: guṇāñ ñṅiti vṛddhiḥ bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena . ṛtaḥ liṭi guṇasya avakāśaḥ . sasvaratuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:27445: dadhvāra . ñṇiti vṛddhiḥ bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena . punaḥprasaṅgavijñānāt vā siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:27446: . atha vā punaḥprasaṅgāt guṇe kṛte raparatve ca ataḥ upadhāyāḥ iti vṛddhiḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:27447: . na eṣaḥ yuktaḥ parihāraḥ . punaḥprasaṅgaḥ nāma saḥ bhavati yatra tena eva kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:27448: prāpnoti tena eva ca akṛte . atra khalu guṇe kṛte raparatve ca ataḥ upadhāyāḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:27449: vṛddhiḥ prāpnoti akṛte ca acaḥ ñṇiti iti . tasmāt suṣṭhu ucyate liti guṇāt ñṇiti
GS24pmbhasuu:27452: 254.5-10 kimartham hrasvaḥ vā iti ucyate na guṇaḥ vā iti ucyeta . tatra ayam api
GS24pmbhasuu:27453: arthaḥ guṇagrahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . ṛtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27454: ca saṃyogādeḥ guṇaḥ iti . ṛtaḥ hrasvatvam ittvapratiṣedhārtham . ṛtaḥ hrasvatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:27455: ucyate ittvapratiṣedhārtham . ittvam mā bhūt iti . guṇaḥ vā iti iyati ucyamāne guṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:27456: mukte ittvam prasajyeta . hrasvaḥ vā iti ucyamāne hrasvena mukte yathāprāptaḥ guṇaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:27458: 255.2-5 ke aṇaḥ hrasvatve taddhitagrahaṇam kṛnnivṛttyartham . ke aṇaḥ hrasvatve taddhitagrahaṇam kartavyam . kim prayojanam . kṛnnivṛttyartham . kṛti mā bhūt . rākā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:27459: dhākā iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . uṇādayaḥ avyutpannāni prātipadikāni .
GS24pmbhasuu:27462: upohyate . ekādeśe kṛte vyapavargābhāvāt . evam api ā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:27467: 256.1-5 eteḥ liṅi upasargāt . eteḥ liṅi upasargāt iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . īyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:27468: . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . upasargāt iti vartate . evam tarhi ācāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27469: anvācaṣṭe upasargāt iti anuvartate iti . na etat anvākhyeyam adhikārāḥ anuvartante
GS24pmbhasuu:27470: iti . eṣaḥ eva nyāyaḥ yat uta adhikārāḥ anuvarteran .
GS24pmbhasuu:27472: 256.7-11 dīrghoccāraṇam kimartham na riṅ ṛtaḥ iti eva ucyate . kā rūpasiddhiḥ : mātrīyati ,
GS24pmbhasuu:27473: pitrīyati . akṛtsārvadhātukayoḥ iti dīrghatvam bhaviṣyati . evam tarhi siddhe sati
GS24pmbhasuu:27474: yat dīrghoccāraṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati eṣā paribhāṣā aṅgavṛtte punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27475: vṛttau avidhiḥ niṣṭhitasya iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . pibeḥ guṇapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27478: 256.13-257.3 yaṅprakaraṇe hanteḥ hiṃsāyām īṭ . yaṇprakaraṇe hanteḥ hiṃsāyām īṭ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27479: . jeghnīyate . yadi īṭ abhyāsarūpam na sidhyati . evam tarhi yaṅprakaraṇe hanteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27480: hiṃsāyām īk . evam api upadhālopaḥ na prāpnoti . evam tarhi yaṅprakaraṇe hanteḥ hiṃsāyām ghnī .
GS24pmbhasuu:27483: aputrasya iti . aputrādīnām iti vaktavyam iha api yathā syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:27484: janīyantaḥ nvagravaḥ putrīyantaḥ sudānavaḥ . chandasi pratiṣedhe dīrghapratiṣedhaḥ . chandasi pratiṣedhe dīrghatvasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . saṃsvedayuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:27485: mitrayuḥ . na vā aśvāghasya ādvacanam avadhāraṇārtham . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:27486: . aśvāghasya ādvacanam avadhāraṇārtham bhaviṣyati aśvāghayoḥ eva chancasi dīrghaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27489: 258.2-6 śyateḥ ittvam vrate nityam . śyateḥ ittvam vrate nityam iti vaktavyam . saṃśitavrataḥ . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . devatrātaḥ galaḥ grāhaḥ itiyoge ca sadvidhiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:27490: mithaḥ te na vibhāṣyante gavākṣaḥ saṃśitavrataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:27492: 259.2-15 avadattam vidattam ca pradattam ca ādikarmaṇi ,
GS24pmbhasuu:27493: sudattam anudattam ca nidattam iti ca iṣyate . kim punaḥ ayam takārāntaḥ āhosvit
GS24pmbhasuu:27494: dakārāntaḥ uta dhakārāntaḥ atha vā thakārāntaḥ . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . tānte doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27495: dīrghatvam syāt . yadi takārāntaḥ dasti iti dīrghatvam prāpnoti . dānte doṣaḥ niṣṭhānatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:27496: . atha dakārāntaḥ radābhyām niṣṭhātaḥ iti natvam prāpnoti . dhānte doṣaḥ dhatvaprāptiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27497: . atha dhāntaḥ jhaṣaḥ tathoḥ dhaḥ adhaḥ iti dhatvam prāpnoti . thānte adoṣaḥ tasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:27498: thāntaḥ . atha thakārāntaḥ na doṣaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:27500: 260.2-261.4 acaḥ upasargāt tatve ākāragrahaṇam . acaḥ upasargāt tatve ākāragrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:27501: kartavyam . na kartavyam . alaḥ antyasya vidhayaḥ bhavanti iti ākārasya bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:27502: . na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . ādeḥ hi parasya . atra hi tasmāt iti uttarasya ādeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27503: parasya iti dakārasya prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . avarṇaprakaraṇāt siddham . asya
GS24pmbhasuu:27504: iti vartate . kva prakṛtam . asya dvau iti . yadi avarṇagrahaṇam anuvartate dadbhāve
GS24pmbhasuu:27505: doṣaḥ bhavati . evam tarhi evam vakṣyāmi daḥ adghoḥ iti . daḥ yaḥ ākāraḥ tasya at
GS24pmbhasuu:27506: bhavati . tataḥ acaḥ upasargāt taḥ . asya iti eva . evam api sūtrabhedaḥ kṛtaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:27507: . na asau sūtrabhedaḥ . sūtrabhedam kam upācaranti . yatra tat eva anyat sūtram kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:27508: bhūyaḥ vā . yat hi tat eva upasaṃhṛtya kriyate na asau sūtrabhedaḥ . atha vā dvitakārakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27509: nirdeśaḥ kriyate saḥ anekāl śit sarvasya iti sarvasya bhaviṣyati . iha api tarhi prāpnoti . adbhiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:27510: adbhyaḥ iti . acaḥ iti vartate . tat ca avaśyam ajgrahaṇam anuvartyam lavābhyām iti
GS24pmbhasuu:27511: evamartham . atha vā tritakārakaḥ nirdeśaḥ kariṣyate ihārthau dvau uttarārthaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:27512: ekaḥ . dyateḥ ittvāt acaḥ taḥ . dyateḥ ittvāt acaḥ taḥ iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:27514: nirditavān . acaḥ taḥ iti asya avakāśaḥ . prattam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:27516: vīttam . acaḥ taḥ iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:27518: 261.6-10 apaḥ bhi māsaḥ chandasi . apaḥ bhi iti atra māsaḥ chandasi upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:27519: mā adbhiḥ iṣṭvā indraḥ vṛtrahā . atyalpam idam ucyate . svavassvatavasoḥ māsaḥ uṣasaḥ ca taḥ iṣyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:27525: 261.12-14 istvam sani rādhaḥ hiṃsāyām . istvam sani rādhaḥ hiṃsāyām iti vaktavyam . pratiritsati . hiṃsāyām iti kimartham . ārirātsati .
GS24pmbhasuu:27527: 262.1-9 jñapeḥ īttvam anantyasya . jñapeḥ īttvam anantyasya iti vaktavyam . jñīpsati
GS24pmbhasuu:27528: . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . lopaḥ antyasya bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . anavakāśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27529: vidhayaḥ bādhakāḥ bhavanti sāvakāśaḥ ca ṇilopaḥ . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . kāraṇā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:27530: hāraṇā . evam api īttvam antyasya lopasya bādhakam syāt . anavakāśāḥ hi vidhayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27531: bādhakāḥ bhavanti īttvam api sāvakāśam . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . anantyaḥ . katham punaḥ sati
GS24pmbhasuu:27532: antye anantyasya īttvam syāt . bhavet yaḥ acā āṅgam viśeṣayet tasya anantyasya na
GS24pmbhasuu:27533: syāt . vayam tu khalu aṅena acam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . aṅgasya acaḥ yatratatrasthasya
GS24pmbhasuu:27534: iti . evam api ubhayoḥ sāvakāśayoḥ paratvāt īttvam prāpnoti . tasmāt anantyasya iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:27536: 262.11-12 abhyāsasya anaci . abhyāsasya iti yat ucyate tat anaci draṣṭavyam . patāpataḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:27540: halām ādiḥ halādiḥ halādiḥ śiṣyate iti . āhosvit karmadhārayaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:27541: hal ādiḥ halādiḥ halādiḥ śiṣyate iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . halādiśeṣe ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27542: iti cet ajādiṣu śeṣaprasaṅgaḥ . halādiśeṣe ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ iti cet ajādiṣu śeṣaḥ prāpnoti . ānakṣa ,
GS24pmbhasuu:27544: ānakṣuḥ . astu tarhi karmadhārayaḥ . karmadhārayaḥ iti cet ādiśeṣanimittatvāt lopasya
GS24pmbhasuu:27545: tadabhāve lopavacanam . karmadhārayaḥ iti cet ādiśeṣanimittatvāt lopasya tadabhāve
GS24pmbhasuu:27546: ādyasya halaḥ abhave lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . āṭatuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:27547: āṭuḥ . tasmāt anādilopaḥ . tasmāt anādiḥ hal lupyate iti vaktavyam . uktam vā . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:27548: uktam . pratividhāsyate halādiśeṣaḥ iti . ayam idānīm saḥ pratividhānakālaḥ . idam
GS24pmbhasuu:27549: pratividhīyate . idam prakṛtam atra lopaḥ abhyāsasya iti . tataḥ vakṣyāmi . hrasvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27550: . hrasvaḥ bhavati ādeśaḥ . abhyāsasya lopaḥ iti anuvartate . tatra hrasvabhāvinām
GS24pmbhasuu:27551: hrasvaḥ lopabhāvinām lopaḥ bhaviṣyati . tataḥ halādiḥ śeṣaḥ ca iti . atha vā evam
GS24pmbhasuu:27552: vakṣyāmi . hrasvaḥ ahal . hrasvaḥ bhavati abhyāsasya iti . tataḥ ahal . ahal ca bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:27553: abhyāsaḥ . tataḥ ādiḥ śeṣaḥ . ādiḥ śeṣaḥ bhavati abhyāsasya iti . atha vā yogavibhāgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27554: kariṣyate . hrasvādeśaḥ bhavati abhyāsasya . tataḥ hal . hal ca lupyate abhyāsasya
GS24pmbhasuu:27555: . tataḥ ādiḥ śeṣaḥ . ādiḥ śeṣaḥ ca bhavati abhyāsasya .
GS24pmbhasuu:27558: . kharpūrvāḥ khayaḥ śiṣyante kharaḥ lupyante iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . ucicchiṣati
GS24pmbhasuu:27559: . vyucicchiṣati . tukaḥ śravaṇam mā bhūt iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:27560: . cartve kṛte tuk na bhaviṣyati . asiddham cartvam tasya asiddhatvāt tuk prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:27561: . siddhakāṇḍe paṭhitam abhyāsajaśtvacartvam ettvatukoḥ iti . evam api antaraṅgatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:27562: prāpnoti tasmāt kharpūrvagrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . ettvatuggrahaṇam na
GS24pmbhasuu:27563: kariṣyate . abhyāsajaśtvacartvam siddham iti eva . ādiśeṣaprasaṅgaḥ tu . ādiśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27564: tu prāpnoti . tiṣṭhāsati . nanu ca anādiśeṣaḥ ādiśeṣam bādhiṣyate . katham anyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:27565: ucyamānam anyasya bādhakam syāt . asati khalu api sambhave bādhanam bhavati asti
GS24pmbhasuu:27566: ca sambhavaḥ yat ubhayam syāt . yadi ādiśeṣaḥ api bhavati śarpūrvavacanam idānīm
GS24pmbhasuu:27567: kimartham syāt . śarpūrvavacanam kimartham iti cet khayām lopapratiṣedhārtham . śarpūrvavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:27568: kimartham iti cet khayām lopaḥ mā bhūt iti . vyapakarṣavijñānāt siddham . vyapakarṣavijñānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:27569: siddham etat . kim idam vyapakarṣavijñānāt iti . apavādavijñānāt . apavādatvāt atra
GS24pmbhasuu:27570: anādiśeṣaḥ ādiśeṣam bādhiṣyate . nanu ca uktam katham anyasya ucyamānam anyasya bādhakam
GS24pmbhasuu:27571: syāt iti . idam tāvat ayam praṣṭavyaḥ . yadi tat na ucyeta kim iha syāt . halādiśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27572: . halādiśeṣaḥ cet na aprāpte halādiśeṣe idam ucyate tat bādhakam bhaviṣyati . yat
GS24pmbhasuu:27573: api ucyate asati khalu api sambhave bādhanam bhavati asti ca sambhavaḥ yat ubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:27574: syāt iti sati api sambhave bādhanam bhavati . tat yathā . dadhi brāhmaṇebhyaḥ dīyatām
GS24pmbhasuu:27575: takram kauṇḍinyāya iti sati api sambhave dadhidānasya takradānam bādhakam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:27576: . evam iha api sati api sambhave anādiśeṣaḥ ādiśeṣam bādhiṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:27578: 266.14-267.15 dādharti iti kim nipātyate . dhārayateḥ ślau abhyāsasya dīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:27579: ṇiluk ca . anipātyam . tūtujānavadabhyāsasya dīrghatvam parṇaśuṣivat ṇiluk bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:27580: . dhṛṅaḥ vā abhyāsasya dīrghatvam parasmaipadam ca . anipātyam . tūtujānavadabhyāsasya
GS24pmbhasuu:27581: dīrghatvam yudhyativat parasmaipadam bhaviṣyati . dardharti iti kim nipātyate . dhārayateḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27582: ślau abhyāsasya ruk ṇiluk ca . anipātyam . devāaduhravadruṭ parṇaśruṣivat ṇiluk bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:27583: . dhṛṅaḥ vā abhyāsasya ruk parasmaipadam ca . anipātyam . devāaduhravat ruḍyudhyativat
GS24pmbhasuu:27584: parasmaipadam ca bhaviṣyati . bobhūtu iti kim nipātyate . bhavateḥ yaṅlugantasya
GS24pmbhasuu:27585: aguṇatvam nipātyate . na etat asti prayojanam . siddham atra aguṇatvam bhūsuvoḥ tiṅi
GS24pmbhasuu:27586: iti . evam tarhi niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . atra eva yaṅlugantasya guṇaḥ na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:27587: na anyatra iti . kva mā bhūt . bobhavīti iti . tetikte iti kim nipātyate . tijeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27588: yaṅlugantasya ātmanepadam nipātyate . na etat asti prayojanam . siddham atra ātmanepadam
GS24pmbhasuu:27589: anudāttaṅitaḥ ātmanepadam iti . niyamārtham tarhi bhaviṣyati . atra eva yaṅlugantasya
GS24pmbhasuu:27590: ātmanepadam bhavati na anyatra iti . kva mā bhūt . bebhidi iti cecchidi iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:27592: 268.2-269.2 kimartham svapeḥ abhyāsasya samprasāraṇam ucyate yadā sarveṣu abhyāsasthāneṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:27593: svapeḥ samprasāraṇam uktam . svāpigrahaṇam vyapetārtham . svāpigrahaṇam kriyate vyapetārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:27594: . vyapetārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . suṣvāpayiṣati iti . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:27595: iti . tatra kyajante atiprasaṅgaḥ . tatra kyajante atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . iha api
GS24pmbhasuu:27596: prāpnoti . svāpakam icchati svāpakīyati svāpakīyateḥ san sisvāpakīyiṣati iti . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:27597: tu ṇigrahaṇāt . siddham etat . katham . ṇigrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . nirdeśāt
GS24pmbhasuu:27598: eva hi vyaktam ṇyantasya grahaṇam iti . na atra nirdeśaḥ pramāṇam śakyam kartum .
GS24pmbhasuu:27599: yathā hi nirdeśaḥ tathā iha api prasajyeta . svāpam karoti svāpayati svāpayateḥ san
GS24pmbhasuu:27602: 269.4-8 trigrahaṇānarthakyam gaṇāntatvāt . trigrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:27603: gaṇāntatvāt . trayaḥ eva nijādayaḥ . uttarārtham tu . uttarārtham tarhi trigrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:27604: kartavyam . bhṛñām it trayāṇām yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt . jahāti .
GS24pmbhasuu:27606: 269.10-270.3 artigrahaṇam kimartham na bahulam chandasi iti eva siddham . na hi antareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:27607: chandaḥ arteḥ śluḥ labhyaḥ . evam tarhi siddhe yat artigrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:27608: ācāryaḥ bhāṣāyām śluḥ bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . iyarti iti etat siddham bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:27610: 270.5-272.2 aicoḥ yaṅi dīrghaprasaṅgaḥ hrasvāt hi param dīrghatvam . aicoḥ yaṅi dīrghatvam prāpnoti . ḍoḍhaukyate ,
GS24pmbhasuu:27611: totraukyate iti . nanu ca hrasvatve kṛte dīrghatvam na bhaviṣyati . na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:27612: kim kāraṇam . hrasvāt hi param dīrghatvam . hrasvatvam kriyatām dīrghatvam iti kim
GS24pmbhasuu:27613: atra kartavyam . paratvāt dīrghatvena bhavitavyam . na vā abhyāsavikāreṣu apavādasya
GS24pmbhasuu:27614: utsargābādhakatvāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . abhyāsavikāreṣu apavādasya
GS24pmbhasuu:27615: utsargābādhakatvāt . abhyāsavikāreṣu apavādāḥ utsargān na bādhante iti eṣā paribhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:27616: kartavyā . kāni etasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ prayojanāni . prayojanam sanvadbhāvasya dīrghatvam . acīkarat ,
GS24pmbhasuu:27617: ajīharat . sanvadbhāvam apavādatvāt dīrghatvam na bādhate . mānprabhṛtīnām dīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:27618: ittvasya . mānprabhṛtīnām dīrghatvam apavādatvāt ittvam na bādhate . gaṇeḥ ītvam
GS24pmbhasuu:27619: halādiśeṣasya . gaṇeḥ ītvam apavādatvāt halādiśeṣam na bādhate . idam ayuktam vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:27620: . kim atra ayuktam . aicoḥ yaṅi dīrghaprasaṅgaḥ hrasvāt hi param dīrghatvam iti uktvā
GS24pmbhasuu:27621: tataḥ ucyate na vā abhyāsavikāreṣu apavādasya utsargābādhakatvāt iti . tasyāḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:27622: paribhāṣāyāḥ prayojanāni nāma ucyante prayojanam sanvadbhāvasya dīrghatvam mānprabhṛtīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:27623: dīrghatvam ittvasya gaṇeḥ ītvam halādiśeṣasya iti ca . na ca sanvadbhāvam apavādatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:27624: dīrghatvam bādhate . kim tarhi paratvāt . na khalu api mānprabhṛtīnām dīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:27625: apavādatvāt dīrghatvam bādhate . kim tarhi antaraṅgatvāt . na khalu api gaṇeḥ īttvam
GS24pmbhasuu:27626: apavādatvāt halādiśeṣam bādhate . kim tarhi anavakāśatvāt . evam tarhi iyam paribhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:27627: kartavyā abhyāsavikāreṣu bādhakāḥ na bādhante iti . sā tarhi eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:27628: . na kartavyā . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati bhavati eṣā paribhāṣā iti yat ayam akitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27632: raṃramyate . akitaḥ iti śakyam akartum . kasmāt na bhavati yaṃyamyate ,
GS24pmbhasuu:27633: raṃramyate iti . nuki kṛte anajantatvāt . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . akidvacanam anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:27634: kidantasya alaḥ antyanivṛttyartham . akidvacanam kriyate jñāpakārtham . kim jñāpyam
GS24pmbhasuu:27635: . etat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ anyatra kidantasya abhyāsasya alontyavidhiḥ na bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:27636: . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . prayojanam hrasvatvāttvettvaguṇeṣu . hrasvatvam . avacacchatuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:27640: cocchuṣyate . tuki kṛte anantyatvāt ete vidhayaḥ na prāpnuvanti . vipratiṣedhāt siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:27641: . na etāni santi prayojanāni . vipratiṣedhena api etāni siddhāni . tuk kriyatām ete
GS24pmbhasuu:27642: vidhayaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt ete vidhayaḥ iti . tadantāgrahaṇāt vā
GS24pmbhasuu:27643: . atha vā na evam vijñāyate abhyāsasya ajantasya ṛkārāntasya akārāntasya igantasya
GS24pmbhasuu:27644: iti . katham tarhi . abhyāse yaḥ ac abhyāse yaḥ ṛkāraḥ abhyāse yaḥ akāraḥ abhyāse
GS24pmbhasuu:27645: yaḥ ic iti . evam ca kṛtvā dīrghatvam prāpnoti . evam tarhi idam iha vyapadeśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:27646: sat ācāryaḥ na vyapadiśati . kim apavādaḥ nuk dīrghatvasya iti . evam tarhi siddhe
GS24pmbhasuu:27647: sati yat akitaḥ iti pratiṣedham śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati eṣā paribhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:27648: abhyāsavikāreṣu bādhakāḥ na bādhante iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . aicoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27649: yaṅi dīrghaprasaṅgaḥ hrasvāt hi param dīrghatvam iti uktam saḥ na doṣaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:27652: raṃramyate iti rūpāsiddhiḥ . nuki sati yaṃyamyate ,
GS24pmbhasuu:27653: raṃramyate iti rūpam na sidhyati . anusvārāgamavacanāt siddham . anusvārāgamaḥ vaktavyaḥ . evam api idam eva rūpam syāt yaṃyyamyate ,
GS24pmbhasuu:27654: idam na syāt yaṃyamyate . padāntavat ca . padāntāt ca iti vaktavyam . vā padāntasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:27656: 274.12-14 rīk ṛtvataḥ saṃyogārtham . rīk ṛtvataḥ iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . saṃyogārtham . saṃyogāntāḥ prayojayanti . varīvṛścyate ,
GS24pmbhasuu:27662: marmṛjyamānāsaḥ iti ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . marmṛjyate ,
GS24pmbhasuu:27665: 275.6-12 kim idam ṛkāragrahaṇam aṅgaviśeṣaṇam . ṛkārāntasya aṅgasya iti . āhosvit
GS24pmbhasuu:27666: abhyāsaviśeṣaṇam . ṛkārāntasya abhyāsasya iti . aṅgaviśeṣaṇam iti āha . katham jñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:27667: . yat ayam taparakaraṇam karoti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . na hi kaḥ cit abhyāse dīrghaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27668: asti yadartham taparakaraṇam kriyeta . atha aṅgaviśeṣaṇe ṛkāragrahaṇe sati taparakaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:27669: kim prayojanam . iha mā bhūt . cākīrti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:27671: cākirati . kiratim carkarītāntam pacati iti atra yaḥ nayet ,
GS24pmbhasuu:27672: prāptijñam tam aham manye prārabdhaḥ tena saṅgrahaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:27674: 276.1-278.3 iha kasmāt na bhavati . ajajāgarat . laghuni caṅpare iti ucyate vyavahitam ca atra laghu caṅparam . iha api tarhi na prāpnoti . acīkarat ,
GS24pmbhasuu:27675: ajīharat . vacanāt bhaviṣyati . iha api vacanāt prāpnoti . ajajāgarat . yena na avyavadhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:27676: tena vyavahite api vacanaprāmāṇyāt . kena ca na avyavadhānam . varṇena . etena punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27677: saṅghātena vyavadhānam bhavati na bhavati ca . evam api acikṣaṇat atra na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:27678: . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati bhavati evañjātīyakānām ittvam iti yat ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:27679: atsmṛdṝtvaraprathamradastṝspaśām iti ittvabādhanārtham attvam śāsti . sanvadbhāvadīrghatve
GS24pmbhasuu:27680: ṇeḥ ṇici upasaṅkhyānam . sanvadbhāvadīrghatve ṇeḥ ṇici upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:27682: avīvadat vīṇām parivādakena . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . ṇicā vyavahitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:27683: . lope kṛte na asti vyavadhānam . sthānivadbhāvāt vyavadhānam eva . pratiṣidhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:27684: atra sthānivadbhāvaḥ dīrghavidhim prati na sthānivat iti . evam api anaglopaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:27685: pratiṣedham prāpnoti . vṛddhau kṛtāyām lopaḥ tat na aglopi aṅgam bhavati . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:27686: idam iha sampradhāryam . vṛddhiḥ kriyatām lopaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:27687: vṛddhiḥ . nityaḥ lopaḥ . kṛtāyām api vṛddhau prāpnoti akṛtāyām api . lopaḥ api anityaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27688: . anyasya kṛtāyām vṛddhau prāpnoti akṛtāyām anyasya śabdāntasya ca prāpnuvan vidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27689: anityaḥ bhavati . ubhayoḥ anityayoḥ paratvāt vṛddhiḥ . vṛddhau kṛtāyām lopaḥ tat
GS24pmbhasuu:27690: na aglopi aṅgam bhavati . mīmādīnām tu lopaprasaṅgaḥ . mīmādīnām tu lopaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:27691: . amīmapat . siddham tu rūpātideśāt . siddham etat . katham . rūpātideśaḥ ayam .
GS24pmbhasuu:27692: sani yādṛśam abhyāsarūpam tat sanvadbhāvena atidiśyate na ca mīmādīnām sani abhyāsarūpam
GS24pmbhasuu:27693: asti . aṅgānyatvāt vā siddham . atha vā ṇyantam etat aṅgam anyat . lope kṛte na aṅgānyatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:27694: . sthānivadbhāvāt aṅgam anyat . katham ajijñapat . atra sani api ṇyantasya eva upādānam
GS24pmbhasuu:27695: āpjñapyṛdhām īt iti . atra aṅgānyatvābhāvāt abhyāsalopaḥ syāt . tasmāt pūrvaḥ eva
GS24pmbhasuu:27699: kriyate alontyanivṛttyartham . alaḥ antyasya vidhayaḥ bhavanti iti antyasya dvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:27700: mā bhūt iti . kva punaḥ alontyanivṛttyarthena arthaḥ sarvagrahaṇena . nityavīpsayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27701: iti . nityavīpsayoḥ iti ucyate na ca antyasya dvirvacanena nityatā vīpsā vā gamyate
GS24pmbhasuu:27702: . iha tarhi pareḥ varjane iti antyasya api dvirvacanena varjyamānatā gamyeta . ṣaṣṭhīnirdeśārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:27703: ca . ṣaṣṭhīnirdeśārtham ca sarvagrahaṇam kartavyam . ṣaṣṭhīnirdeśaḥ yathā prakalpeta
GS24pmbhasuu:27704: . anirdeśe hi ṣaṣṭhyarthāprasiddhiḥ . akriyamāṇe sarvagrahaṇe ṣaṣṭhyarthasya aprasiddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27705: syāt . kasya . sthāneyogatvasya . kva punaḥ iha ṣaṣṭhīnirdeśārthena arthaḥ sarvagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:27706: yāvatā sarvatra eva ṣaṣṭhī uccāryate . parervarjane prasamupodaḥpādapūraṇe uparyadhyadhasaḥsāmīpye
GS24pmbhasuu:27707: vākyāderāmantritasya iti . iha na kā cit ṣaṣṭhī nityavīpsayoḥ iti . nanu ca eṣā eva
GS24pmbhasuu:27708: ṣaṣṭhī . na eṣā ṣaṣṭhī . kim tarhi . arthanirdeśaḥ eṣaḥ . nitye ca arthe vīpsāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:27709: ca iti . alontyanivṛttyarthena tāvat na arthaḥ sarvagrahaṇena . idam tāvat ayam praṣṭavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27710: . nityavīpsayoḥ dve bhavataḥ iti ucyate dviśabdaḥ ādeśaḥ kasmāt na bhavati . ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27711: jñāpayati na dviśabdaḥ ādeśaḥ bhavati iti yat ayam tasyaparamāmreḍitam anudāttamca
GS24pmbhasuu:27712: iti āha . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . dviśabdaḥ ayam ekāc tasya ekāctvāt tasyaparamāmreḍitam
GS24pmbhasuu:27713: anudāttamca iti etat na asti . paśyati tu ācāryaḥ na dviśabdaḥ ādeśaḥ bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:27714: tataḥ tasya paramāmreḍitam anudāttamca iti āha . yadi tarhi na dviśabdaḥ ādeśaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:27715: ke tarhi idānīm dve bhavataḥ . dviśabdena yat ucyate . kim punaḥ tat . dviśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27716: ayam saṅkhyāpadam saṅkhyāyāḥ ca saṅkhyeyam arthaḥ . saṅkhyeye dve bhaviṣyataḥ . ke
GS24pmbhasuu:27717: punaḥ te . pade vākye mātre vā . tat yadā tāvat pade vākye vā tadā anekāltvāt sarvādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27718: siddhaḥ . yadā mātre api tadā anekālśitsarvasya iti sarvādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . yadā
GS24pmbhasuu:27719: tarhi ardhamātre tadā sarvādeśaḥ na sidhyati . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na ca ardhamātre dviḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27720: ucyete . kim kāraṇam . iha vyākareṇe yaḥ sarvālpīyān svaravyavahāraḥ saḥ mātrayā
GS24pmbhasuu:27721: bhavati na ardhamātrayā vyavahāraḥ asti . tena ardhamātre na bhaviṣyataḥ . evam api
GS24pmbhasuu:27722: kutaḥ etat pade dve bhaviṣyataḥ iti na punaḥ vākye syātām mātre vā . nityavīpsayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27723: dve bhavataḥ iti ucyate na ca vākyadvirvacanena mātrādvirvacanena vā nityatā vīpsā
GS24pmbhasuu:27724: vā gamyate . ṣaṣṭhīnirdeśārtham eva tarhi sarvagrahaṇam kartavyam . na vā padādhikārāt
GS24pmbhasuu:27725: . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam . padādhikārāt . padasya iti prakṛtya dvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:27726: vakṣyāmi . tat ca samāsataddhitavākyanivṛttyartham . tat ca avaśyam padagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:27727: kartavyam samāsanivṛttyartham taddhitanivṛttyartham vākyanivṛttyartham ca . samāsanivṛttyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:27728: tāvat . saptaparṇaḥ aṣṭāpadam . taddhitanivṛttyartham . dvipadikā tripadikā . māṣaśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27729: kārṣāpaṇaśaḥ . vākyanivṛttyartham . grāme grāme pānīyam . māṣam māṣam dehi . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:27730: kriyamāṇe api vai padagrahaṇe samāsanivṛttyartham iti katham idam vijñāyate . samasasya
GS24pmbhasuu:27731: nivṛttyartham samāsanivṛttyartham iti . āhosvit samāse nivṛttyartham samāsanivṛttyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:27732: iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi viñāyate samāsasya nivṛttyartham samāsanivṛttyartham iti
GS24pmbhasuu:27733: siddham saptaparṇaḥ saptaparṇau saptaparṇāḥ iti saptaparṇābhyām saptaparṇebhyaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:27734: atra prāpnoti . atha vijñāyate samāse nivṛttyartham samāsanivṛttyartham iti saptaparṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27735: saptaparṇau saptaparṇāḥ iti atra api prāpnoti . tathā taddhitanivṛttyartham iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:27736: katham idam vijñāyate . taddhitasya nivṛttyartham taddhitanivṛttyartham iti . āhosvit
GS24pmbhasuu:27737: taddhite nivṛttyartham taddhitanivṛttyartham iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate taddhitasya
GS24pmbhasuu:27738: nivṛttyartham taddhitanivṛttyartham iti siddham dvipadikāḥ tripadikāḥ dvipadikābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:27739: tripadikābhyām māṣaśaḥ kārṣāpaṇaśaḥ iti atra prāpnoti . atha vijñāyate taddhite nivṛttyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:27740: taddhitanivṛttyartham iti dvipadikāḥ tripadikāḥ iti atra api prāpnoti . tathā vākyanivṛttyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:27741: iti katham idam vijñāyate . vākyasya nivṛttyartham vākyanivṛttyartham iti . āhosvit
GS24pmbhasuu:27743: iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate vākyasya nivṛttyartham vākyanivṛttyartham iti
GS24pmbhasuu:27744: yadi vākyam vīpsāyuktam bhavitavyam eva dvirvacanena . atha api avayavaḥ bhavatu
GS24pmbhasuu:27745: eva . tat etat kriyamāṇe api padagrahaṇe ālūnaviśīrṇam bhavati . kim cit saṅgṛhītam
GS24pmbhasuu:27746: kim cit asaṅgṛhītam . sagatigrahaṇam ca . sagatigrahaṇam ca kartavyam . prapacati
GS24pmbhasuu:27747: prapacati . prakaroti prakaroti iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . na hi sagatikam
GS24pmbhasuu:27748: padam bhavati . samāsanivṛttyarthena tāvat na arthaḥ padagrahaṇena . samāsena uktatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:27749: vīpsāyāḥ dvirvacanam na bhaviṣyati . kim ca bhoḥ samāsaḥ vīpsāyām iti ucyate . na
GS24pmbhasuu:27750: khalu vīpsāyām iti ucyate gamyate tu saḥ arthaḥ . tatra uktaḥ samāsena iti kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:27751: dvirvacanam na bhaviṣyati . yatra ca samāsena anuktā vīpsā bhavati tatra dvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:27752: . tat yathā . ekaikavicitāḥ anyonyasahāyāḥ iti . atha vā yat atra vīpsāyuktam na
GS24pmbhasuu:27753: adaḥ prayujyate . kim punaḥ tat . parvaṇi parvaṇi sapta parṇāni asya . paṅktau paṅktau
GS24pmbhasuu:27754: aṣṭau padāni asya iti . taddhitanivṛttyarthena ca api na arthaḥ padagrahaṇena . taddhitena
GS24pmbhasuu:27755: ukatvāt vīpsāyāḥ dvirvacanam na bhaviṣyati . taddhitaḥ khalu api vīpsāyām iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:27756: . yatra ca taddhitena anuktā vīpsā bhavati tatra dvirvacanam . tat yathā . ekaikaśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27757: dadāti iti . vākyanivṛttyarthena ca api na arthaḥ padagrahaṇena . padadvirvacanena
GS24pmbhasuu:27758: uktatvāt vīpsāyāḥ vākyadvirvacanam na bhaviṣyati . yatra ca padadvirvacanena anuktā
GS24pmbhasuu:27759: vīpsā bhavati tatra dvirvacanam . tat yathā . prapacati prapacati . prakaroti prakaroti
GS24pmbhasuu:27760: . uttarārtham tarhi padagrahaṇam kartavyam . tasyaparamāmreḍitam anudāttamca iti
GS24pmbhasuu:27761: vakṣyati tat padadvirvacane yathā syāt vākyadvirvacanemā bhūt . mahyam grahīṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:27762: mahyam grahīṣyati . mām abhivyāhariṣyati mām abhvyāhariṣyati . katham ca atra dvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:27763: . chāndasatvāt . svaraḥ api tarhi chāndasatvāt eva na bhaviṣyati . uttarārtham eva
GS24pmbhasuu:27764: tarhi padagrahaṇam kartavyam . padasya padāt iti vakṣyati tat padagrahaṇam na kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:27765: bhavati . sarvagrahaṇam api tarhi uttarārtham . anudāttaṃsarvamapādādau iti vakṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:27766: tat sarvagrahaṇam kartavyam bhavati . ubhayam kriyate tatra eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:27768: 288-292 ihārtham eva tarhi ṣaṣṭhīnirdeśārtham anyatarat kartavyam . ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭasya
GS24pmbhasuu:27769: sthāne dvirvacanam yathā syāt dviḥprayogaḥ mā bhūt iti . kim ca syāt . ām pacasi
GS24pmbhasuu:27770: devadattā3 āmaekāntaramāmantritamanantike iti ekāntaratā na syāt . iha ca paunaḥpunyam
GS24pmbhasuu:27771: paunaḥpunikam iti aprātipadikatvāt taddhitotpattiḥ na syāt . yadi tarhi sthāne dvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:27772: rājā rājā vāk vāk padasya iti nalopādīni na sidhyanti . idam iha sampradhāryam .
GS24pmbhasuu:27773: dvirvacanam kriyatām nalopādīni iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt nalopādīni . pūrvatra
GS24pmbhasuu:27774: asiddhe nalopādīni siddhāsiddhayoḥ ca na asti sampradhāraṇā . evam tarhi pūrvatra
GS24pmbhasuu:27775: asiddhīyam advirvacane iti vakṣyāmi . tat ca avaśyam vaktavyam . kim prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:27776: vibhāṣitāḥ prayojayanti . drogdhā drogdhā . droḍhā droḍhā iti . iha tarhi bisam bisam
GS24pmbhasuu:27777: musalam musalam ādeśapratyayayoḥ iti ṣatvam prāpnoti . ādeśaḥ yaḥ sakāraḥ pratayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27778: yaḥ sakāraḥ iti evam etat vijñāyate . iha tarhi nṛbhiḥ nṛbhiḥ raṣābhyānnoṇaḥsamānapade
GS24pmbhasuu:27779: iti ṇatvam prāpnoti . samānapade iti ucyate samānam eva yat nityam na ca etat nityam
GS24pmbhasuu:27780: samānapadam eva . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . samānagrahaṇasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:27781: . yadi hi yat samānam ca asamānam ca tatra syāt samānagrahaṇam anarthakaṃ syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:27783: 292-294 atha vā punaḥ astu dviḥprayogaḥ dvirvacanam . nanu ca uktam ām pacasi pacasi
GS24pmbhasuu:27784: devadattā3 āmaḥ ekāntaram āmantritam anantike iti ekāntaratā na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27785: doṣaḥ . suptiṅbhyām padam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . suptiṅantampadam . yasmāt suptiṅvidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27786: tadādi suptiṅantam ca . nanu ca ekaikasmāt eva atra suptiṅvidhiḥ . samudāye yā vākyaparisamāptiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27787: tayā padasañjñā . kutaḥ etat . śāstrāhāneḥ . evam hi śāstram ahīnam bhavati . yat
GS24pmbhasuu:27788: api ucyate iha paunaḥpunyam paunaḥpunikam iti aprātipadikatvāt taddhitotpattiḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:27789: prāpnoti iti mā bhūt evam . samarthāt iti evam bhaviṣyati . atha vā ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27790: jñāpayati bhavati evañjātīyakebhyaḥ taddhitotpattiḥ iti yat ayam kaskādiṣu kautaskutaśabdam paṭhati .
GS24pmbhasuu:27792: 294-296 iha kasmāt na bhavati . himavān khāṇḍavaḥ pāriyātraḥ samudraḥ iti . nitye
GS24pmbhasuu:27793: dve bhavataḥ iti prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ayam nityaśabdaḥ asti eva kūṭastheṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:27795: nityā dyauḥ nityā pṛthivī nityam ākāśam iti . asti ābhīkṣṇye vartate . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:27796: nityaprahasitaḥ nityaprajalpitaḥ iti . tat yaḥ ābhīkṣṇye vartate tasya idam grahaṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:27798: 297-300 atha kim idam vīpsā iti . āpnoteḥ ayam vipūrvāi icchāyām arthe san vidhīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:27799: . yadi evam cikīrṣati jihīrṣati iti atra api prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na evam vijñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:27800: vīpsāyām abhidheyāyām iti . katham tarhi . kartṛviśeṣaṇam etat . vīpsati iti vīpsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27801: . vīpsaḥ cet kartā bhavati iti . kaḥ punaḥ vīpsārthaḥ . anavayavābhidhānam vīpsārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27802: . anavayavena dravyāṇām abhidhānam eṣaḥ vīpsārthaḥ . anavayavābhidhānam vīpsārthaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:27929: . yaṇekādeśasvaraḥ tu ūrdhvam padādhikārāt . yaṇekādeśasvaraḥ tu ūrdhvam padādhikārāt

GS24pmbhasuu:27940: 322-324 sarvavacanam kimartham . sarvavacanam anādeḥ anudāttārtham . sarvagrahaṇam kriyate anādeḥ api anudāttatvam yathā syāt iti . tiṅatiṅaḥ iha eva syāt devadattaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:27942: devadattaḥ karoti iti . sarvavacanam anādeḥ anudāttārtham iti cet luṭi pratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:27943: siddham . sarvavacanam anādeḥ anudāttārtham iti cet tat na . kim kāraṇam . luṭi pratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:27944: siddham . yat ayam luṭi pratiṣedham śāsti naluṭ iti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ anādeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27945: api anudāttatvam bhavati iti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . na hi luḍantam ādyudāttam
GS24pmbhasuu:27946: asti . alo'ntyavidhiprasaṅgaḥ tu . alaḥ antyasya vidhayaḥ bhavanti iti antyasya vidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27947: prāpnoti . yatra hi ādividhiḥ na asti alo'ntyavidhinā tatra bhavitavyam . tatra kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27948: doṣaḥ . tiṅatiṅaḥ iti iha eva syāt devadattayajñadattau kurutaḥ iha na syāt devadattaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27949: karoti iti . lṛṭi pratiṣedhāt siddham . yat ayam lṛṭi pratiṣedham śāsti tat jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:27950: ācāryaḥ anantyasya api anudāttatvam bhavati iti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . na hi lṛḍantam
GS24pmbhasuu:27951: antodāttam asti . nanu ca idam asti bhokṣye iti . uktam vā . kim uktam . na vā padādhikārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:27953: iti vāmnau ādayaḥ savibhaktikasya yathā syuḥ iti . etat api na asti prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:27954: padasya iti hi vartate vibhaktyantam ca padam tatra antareṇa sarvagrahaṇam savibhaktikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:27955: bhaviṣyati . bhavet siddham yatra vibhaktyantam padam yatra tu khalu vibhaktau padam
GS24pmbhasuu:27956: tatra na sidhyati . grāmaḥ vām dīyate . grāmaḥ nau dīyate . janapadaḥ vām dīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:27957: . janapadaḥ nau dīyate . nanu ca sthagrahaṇam kriyate tena savibhaktikasya eva bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:27958: . astī anyat sthagrahaṇasya prayaojanam . kim . śrūyamāṇavibhakiviśeṣaṇam yathā vijñāyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:27959: . yatra vibhaktiḥ śrūyate tatra yathā syāt iha mā bhūt iti yuṣmatputraḥ dadāti iti

GS24pmbhasuu:28101: 344-347 gatau iti kimartham . prapacati prakaroti . gateḥ anudāttatve gatigrahaṇānarthakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:28102: tiṅi avadhāraṇāt . gateḥ anudāttatve gatigrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . tiṅi

GS24pmbhasuu:28104: eva gatiḥ anudāttaḥ bhavati na anyatra iti . chandortham tarhi gatigrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:28105: . chandasi gatau parataḥ anudāttatvam yathā syāt mandraśabde mā bhūt . a mandraiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28106: indra haribhiḥ yāhi mayuraromabhiḥ . chandortham iti cet na agatitvāt . chandortham
GS24pmbhasuu:28107: iti cet tat na . kim kāraṇam . agatitvāt . yatkriyāyuktāḥ tam prati gatyupasargasañjñe
GS24pmbhasuu:28108: bhavataḥ na ca atra āṅaḥ mandraśabdam prati kriyāyogaḥ . kim tarhi yāhiśabdam prati
GS24pmbhasuu:28109: . iha api tarhi na prāpnoti . abhyuddharati upasamādadhāti iti . atra api na abheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28110: udam prati kriyāyogaḥ . kim tarhi haratim prati kriyāyogaḥ . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . udam
GS24pmbhasuu:28111: prati kriyāyogaḥ . katham . uddharatikriyām viśinaṣṭi . udā viśiṣṭām abhiḥ viśinaṣṭi
GS24pmbhasuu:28112: . tatra yatkriyāyuktāḥ iti bhavati eva saṅghātam prati kriyāyogaḥ . iha api tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:28113: mandrasādhanā kriyā āṅā vyajyate . ā yāhi mandraiḥ iti . nanu pūrvam dhātuḥ upasargeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:28114: yujyate paścāt sādhanena iti . na etat sāram . pūrvam dhātuḥ sādhanena yujyate paścāt
GS24pmbhasuu:28115: upasargeṇa . kim kāraṇam . sādhanam hi kriyām nirvartayati tām upasargaḥ viśinaṣṭi
GS24pmbhasuu:28116: abhinirvṛttasya ca arthasya upasargeṇa viśeṣaḥ śakyaḥ vaktum . satyam evam etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:28117: yaḥ tu asau dhātūpasargayoḥ abhisambandhaḥ tam abhyantare kṛtvā dhātuḥ sādhanena
GS24pmbhasuu:28118: yujyate . avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam . yaḥ hi manyate pūrvam dhātuḥ sādhanena
GS24pmbhasuu:28119: yujyate paścāt upasargeṇa iti āsyate guruṇā iti akarmakaḥ upāsyate guruḥ iti kena
GS24pmbhasuu:28120: sakarmakaḥ syāt . gatinā tu viśiṣṭasya gatiḥ eva viśeṣakaḥ . sādhane kena te na syāt

GS24pmbhasuu:28125: . ā mandraiḥ indra haribhiḥ yāhi . yadyogāt gatiḥ . yatkriyāyuktāḥ tam prati gatyupasargasañjñe
GS24pmbhasuu:28126: bhavataḥ na ca āṅaḥ mandraśabdam prati kriyāyogaḥ . kim tarhi yāhiśabdam prati .
GS24pmbhasuu:28127: yadyogāt gatiḥ iti cet pratyayodāttatve aprasiddhiḥ . yadyogāt gatiḥ iti cet pratyayodāttatve
GS24pmbhasuu:28128: aprasiddhiḥ syāt . yatprakaroti . tasmāt tiṅgrahaṇam kartavyam . yadi tiṅgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:28129: kriyate āmante na prāpnoti . prapacatitarām . prajalpatitarām . asati punaḥ tiṅgrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:28130: kriyāpradhānam ākhyātam tasmāt atiśaye tarap utpadyate tarabantāt svārthe ām tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:28131: yatkriyāyuktāḥ tam prati gatyupasargasañjñe bhavataḥ iti bhavati etam saṅghātam prati
GS24pmbhasuu:28132: kriyāyogaḥ . tasmāt na arthaḥ tiṅgrahaṇena . kasmāt na bhavati . a mandraiḥ indra
GS24pmbhasuu:28133: haribhiḥ yāhi mayuraromabhiḥ . yadyogāt gatiḥ iti . nanu ca uktam yadyogāt gatiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28134: iti cet pratyayodāttatve aprasiddhiḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yadkriyāyuktāḥ iti na
GS24pmbhasuu:28135: evam vijñāyate yasya kriyā yatkriyā yatkriyāyuktāḥ tam prati gatyupasargasañjñe bhavataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28136: iti . katham tarhi . yā kriyā yatkriyā yatkriyāyuktāḥ tam prati gatyupasargasañjñe bhavataḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:28138: 349 vatkaraṇam kimartham . svāśrayam api yathā syāt . ām bhoḥ devadatta iti atra āmaekāntaramāmantritamanantike iti ekāntaratā yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:28140: 349-350 pūrvam prati vidyamānavattvāt uttaratra ānantaryāprasiddhiḥ . pūrvam prati
GS24pmbhasuu:28141: vidyamānavattvāt uttaratra ānantaryasya aprasiddhiḥ syāt . imam me gaṅge yamune sarasvati
GS24pmbhasuu:28142: . gaṅgeśabdaḥ ayam yamuneśabdam prati avidyamānavat bhavati . tatra āmantritasya
GS24pmbhasuu:28143: padāt parasya iti anudāttatvam na syāt . siddham tu padapūrvasya iti vacanāt . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:28144: etat . katham . padapūrvasya iti vacanāt . padapūrvasya ca āmantritasya avidyamānavadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28147: 350-352 kāni punaḥ asya yogasya prayojanāni . avidyamānavattve prayojanam āmantritayuṣmadasmattiṅnighātāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28148: . āmantritasya padāt parasya anudāttaḥ bhavati iti iha eva bhavati pacasi devadatta
GS24pmbhasuu:28149: . devadatta yajñadatta iti atra na bhavati avidyamānavattvāt āmantritasya . yuṣmadasmadoḥṣaṣṭhīcaturthīdvitīyāsthayorvāmnāvau
GS24pmbhasuu:28150: iti iha eva bhavati grāmaḥ vām svam janapadaḥ nau svam . devadattayajñadattau yuvayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28151: svam iti atra na bhavati avidyamānavattvāt āmantritasya . tiṅatiṅaḥ iti iha eva bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:28152: devadattaḥ pacati . devadatta pacasi iti atra na bhavati avidyamānavattvāt āmantritasya
GS24pmbhasuu:28153: . pūjāyām anantarapratiṣedhaḥ . pūjāyām anantarapratiṣedhaḥ prayojanam . yāvat pacati
GS24pmbhasuu:28154: śobhanam . yāvat devadatta pacati iti atra api siddham bhavati . jātu apūrvam . jātu
GS24pmbhasuu:28155: apūrvam prayojanam . jātu pacati . devadatta jātu pacasi iti atra api siddham bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:28156: . āho utāho ca anantaravidhau . āho utāho ca anantaravidhau prayojanam . āho pacasi
GS24pmbhasuu:28157: . āho devadatta pacasi iti atra api siddham bhavati . utāho pacasi . utāho devadatta
GS24pmbhasuu:28158: pacasi iti atra api siddham bhavati . āmaḥ ekāntaravidhau . āmaḥ ekāntaravidhau prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:28159: . ām pacasi devadatta . ām bhoḥ pacasi devadatta atra api siddham bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:28161: 352 iha kasmāt na bhavati . aghnye devi sarasvati iḍe kavye vihavye etani te aghnye
GS24pmbhasuu:28162: namāni . yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . na āmantrite samānādhikaraṇe sāmānyavacanam . tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28165: 353 iha kasmāt na bhavati . brahmaṇa vaiyākaraṇa . bahuvacanam iti vakṣyāmi . sāmānyavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:28166: iti śakyam avaktum . katham . vibhāṣitam viśeṣavacane iti ucyate tena yat prati viśeṣavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:28167: iti etat bhavati tasya bhaviṣyati . kim ca prati etat bhavati . sāmānyavacanam . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:28168: viśeṣavacane iti śakyam avaktum . katham . sāmānyavacanam vibhāṣitam iti ucyate tena
GS24pmbhasuu:28169: yat prati sāmānyavacanam iti etat bhavati . kim ca prati etat bhavati . viśeṣavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:28172: 354-356 yā iyam sapādasaptādhyāyī anukrāntā etasyām ayam pādonaḥ adhyāyaḥ asiddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28173: veditavyaḥ . yadi sapādāyām saptādhyāyyām ayam pādonaḥ adhyāyaḥ asiddhaḥ iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:28174: yaḥ iha saptamīnirdeśāḥ pañcamīnirdeśāḥ ca ucyante ṣaṣṭhīnirdeśāḥ ca ucyante te api
GS24pmbhasuu:28175: asiddhāḥ syūḥ . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . jhalojhali hrasvādaṅgāt saṃyogāntasyalopaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:28176: eteṣām nirdeśānām asiddhatvāt tasminnitinirdeṣṭepūrvasya tasmādityuttarasya ṣaṣṭhīsthāneyogā
GS24pmbhasuu:28177: iti etāḥ paribhāṣāḥ na prakalperan . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yadi api idam tatra asiddham
GS24pmbhasuu:28178: tat tu iha siddham . katham . kāryakālam sañjñāparibhāṣam yatra kāryam tatra draṣṭavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:28179: . jhalojhali . hrasvādaṅgāt . saṃyogāntasyalopaḥ . upasthitam idam bhavati tasminnitinirdiṣṭepūrvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:28180: tasmādityuttarasya ṣaṣṭhīsthāneyogā iti . yadi kāryakālam sañjñāparibhāṣam iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:28181: iyam api paribhāṣā asti vipratiṣedhe param iti sā api iha upatiṣṭheta . tatra kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28182: doṣaḥ . visphoryam avagoryam iti guṇāt dīrghatvam syāt vipratiṣedhena . ataḥ uttaram
GS24pmbhasuu:28183: paṭhati . pūrvatrāsiddhe na asti vipratiṣedhaḥ abhāvāt uttarasya . pūrvatrāsiddhe
GS24pmbhasuu:28184: na asti vipratiṣedhaḥ . kim kāraṇam . abhāvāt uttarasya . dvayoḥ hi sāvakāśayoḥ samavasthitayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28185: vipratiṣedhaḥ bhavati na ca pūrvatrāsiddhe param pūrvam prati bhavati . yadi evam
GS24pmbhasuu:28186: dogdhā dogdhum ghatvasya asiddhatvāt ḍhatvam prāpnoti kāṣṭhataṭ kūṭataṭ saṃyogādilopsya
GS24pmbhasuu:28187: asiddhatvāt saṃyogāntalopaḥ prāpnoti . apavādaḥ vacanaprāmāṇyāt . anavakāśau etau
GS24pmbhasuu:28188: vacanaprāmāṇyāt bhaviṣyataḥ . tasmāt kāryakālam sañjñāparibhāṣam iti na doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:28190: 356-357 pūrvatrāsiddham adhikāraḥ . pūrvatrāsiddham iti adhikāraḥ ayam draṣṭavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28191: . kim prayojanam . parasya parasya pūrvatra pūrvatra asiddhavijñānārtham . paraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28192: paraḥ yogaḥ pūrvam pūrvam yogam prati asiddhaḥ yathā syāt . anadhikāre hi samudāye
GS24pmbhasuu:28193: asiddhavijñānam . anadhikāre hi sati samudāyasya samudāye asiddhatvam vijñāyeta .
GS24pmbhasuu:28194: tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . tatra ayatheṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ . tatra ayatheṣṭam prasajyeta . yodhuṅmān
GS24pmbhasuu:28195: guḍaliṇmān iti . ghatvaḍhatvayoḥ kṛtayoḥ jhayaḥ iti vatvam prasajyeta . tasmāt adhikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28198: 357-358 asiddhavacanam kimartham . asiddhavacane uktam . kim uktam . tatra tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:28200: ca iti . evam iha api pūrvatrāsiddhavacanam ādeśalakṣaṇapratiṣedhārtham utsargalakṣaṇabhāvārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:28201: ca . ādeśalakṣaṇapratiṣedhārtham tāvat . rājabhiḥ takṣabhiḥ rājabhyām takṣabhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:28202: rājasu takṣasu iti nalope kṛte ataḥ iti aisbhāvādayaḥ prāpnuvanti . asiddhatvāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:28203: bhavanti . utsargalakṣaṇabhāvārtham ca . amuṣmai amuṣmāt amuṣya amuṣmin iti atra
GS24pmbhasuu:28204: mubhāve kṛte ataḥ iti smāyādayaḥ na prāpnuvanti . asiddhatvāt bhavanti . suparvāṇau
GS24pmbhasuu:28205: suparvāṇaḥ . ṇatve kṛte nopadhāyāḥ iti dīrghatvam na prapnoti . asiddhatvāt bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:28207: 358 subvidhim prati nalopaḥ asiddhaḥ bhavati iti ucyate . bhavet iha rājabhiḥ takṣabhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28208: iti nalope kṛte ataḥ iti aisbhāvaḥ na syāt . iha tu khalu rājabhyām takṣabhyām rājasu
GS24pmbhasuu:28209: takṣasu iti nalope kṛte dīrghatvaittve prāpnutaḥ. na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . subvidhiḥ iti sarvavibhaktyantaḥ samāsaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:28213: 359-361 atha sañjñāvidhau kim udāharaṇam . pañca sapta . pañca sapta iti atra nalope
GS24pmbhasuu:28214: kṛte ṣṇāntāṣaṭ iti ṣaṭsañjñā na prāpnoti . asiddhatvāt bhavati . sañjñāgrahaṇānarthakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:28215: ca tannimittatvāt lopasya . sañjñāgrahaṇam ca anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . tannimittatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:28216: lopasya . na akṛtāyām ṣaṭsañjñāyām jaśśasoḥ luk na ca akṛte luki padasañjñā na ca
GS24pmbhasuu:28217: akṛtāyām padasañjñāyām nalopaḥ prāpnoti . tat etat ānupūrvyā siddham bhavati . idam
GS24pmbhasuu:28218: tarhi prayojanam pañcabhiḥ saptabhiḥ iti ṣaṭtricaturbhyohalādiḥ jhalyupottamam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:28219: eṣaḥ svaraḥ yathā syāt . svare avadhāraṇāt ca . svare avadhāraṇāt ca sañjñāgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:28220: anarthakam . svare avadhāraṇam kriyate svaravidhim prati iti . tugvidhau kim udāharaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:28221: . vṛtrahabhyām vṛtrahabhiḥ . nalope kṛte hrasvasyapitikṛtituk iti tuk prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:28222: asiddhatvāt na bhavati . tugvidhau ca uktam . kim uktam . sannipātalakṣaṇaḥ vidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28223: animittam tadvighātasya iti . idam tarhi prayojanam . kṛti iti vakṣyāmi . iha mā
GS24pmbhasuu:28224: bhūt . brahmahacchatram bhrūṇahacchāyā . na eṣaḥ sannipātalakṣaṇaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:28226: 361-362 iha ne yat kāryam prāpnoti tat prati mubhāvaḥ na asiddhaḥ iti ucyate nābhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28227: ca eva tāvat na prāpnoti . evam tarhi na mu ṭādeśe . na mu ṭādeśe iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:28228: kim idam ṭādeśaḥ iti . ṭāyāḥ ādeśaḥ ṭādeśaḥ iti . yadi tarhi ṭāyāḥ ādeśe iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:28229: ṭāyām ādeśe aprasiddhiḥ . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . amunā iti atra mubhāvasya asiddhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:28230: atodīrghoyañi supica iti dīrghatvam prasajyeta . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . sarvavibhaktyantaḥ samāsaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:28232: ṭāyām ādeśaḥ ṭādeśaḥ iti . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu
GS24pmbhasuu:28233: . nanu ca uktam ne yat kāryam prāpnoti tasmin mubhāvaḥ na asiddhaḥ iti ucyate nābhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28234: ca eva tāvat na prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . iha iṅgitena ceṣṭitena nimiṣitena
GS24pmbhasuu:28235: mahatā vā sūtranibandhena ācāryāṇām abhiprāyaḥ lakṣyate . etat eva jñāpayati bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:28236: atra nābhāvaḥ iti yat ayam ne parataḥ asiddhatvapratiṣedham śāsti . atha vā dvigatāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28237: api hetavaḥ bhavanti . tat yathā . āmrāḥ ca siktāḥ pitaraḥ ca prīṇitāḥ bhavanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:28238: tathā vākyāni api dvigatāni dṛśyante . śvetaḥ dhāvati . alambusānām yātā iti . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:28239: vā vṛddhakumārīvākyavat idam draṣṭavyam . tat yathā . vṛddhakumārī indreṇa uktā varam
GS24pmbhasuu:28240: vṛṇīṣva iti sā varam avṛṇīta putrāḥ me bahukṣīraghṛtam odanam kāṃsyapātryām bhuñjīran
GS24pmbhasuu:28241: iti . na ca tāvat asyāḥ patiḥ bhavati kutaḥ putrāḥ kutaḥ gāvaḥ kutaḥ dhānyam . tatrs
GS24pmbhasuu:28242: anayā ekena vākyena patiḥ putrāḥ gāvaḥ dhānyam iti sarvam saṅgṛhītam bhavati . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:28243: iha api ne asiddhatvapratiṣedham bruvatā nābhāvaḥ api saṅgṛhītaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:28245: 362-364 yaṇsvaraḥ yaṇādeśe svaritayaṇaḥ svaritārtham . yaṇsvaraḥ yaṇādeśe siddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28246: vaktavyaḥ . kim prayojanam . svaritayaṇaḥ svaritārtham . svaritayaṇaḥ svaritatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:28247: yathā syāt . khalapvi aṭati . khalpvi aśnāti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:28248: . āha ayam svaritayaṇaḥ iti na ca asti siddhaḥ svaritaḥ tatra āśrayāt siddhatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:28249: bhaviṣyati . āśrayāt siddhatvam iti cet udāttāt svarite doṣaḥ . āśrayāt siddhatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:28250: iti cet udāttāt svarite doṣaḥ bhavati . dadhyāśa . madhvāśa . evam tarhi yogavibhāgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28251: kariṣyate . udāttayaṇaḥ parasya anudāttasya svaritaḥ bhavati . tataḥ svaritayaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28252: . svaritayaṇaḥ ca parasya anudāttasya svaritaḥ bhavati . udāttayaṇaḥ iti eva . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:28253: vā svaritagrahaṇam na kariṣyate . kena idānīm svaritayaṇaḥ parasya anudāttasya svaritaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28254: bhaviṣyati . udāttayaṇaḥ iti eva . nanu ca svaritayaṇā vyavahitatvāt na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:28255: . svaravidhau vyañjanam avidyamānavat iti na asti vyavadhānam . atha vā na evam vijñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:28256: svaritasya yaṇ svaritayaṇ svaritayaṇaḥ iti . katham tarhi . svarite yaṇ svaritayaṇ svaritayaṇaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:28258: 364-365 svaritagrahaṇam śakyam akartum . katham . anudātte parataḥ padādau vā udāttaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28259: iti eva siddham . kena idānīm svaritaḥ bhaviṣyati . gāṅge anūpe iti . āntaryataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28260: udāttānudāttayoḥ ekādeśaḥ svaritaḥ bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam tena varjyamānatā
GS24pmbhasuu:28261: mā bhūt . atha kriyamāṇe api svaritagrahaṇe yaḥ siddhaḥ svaritaḥ tena varjyamānatā
GS24pmbhasuu:28262: kasmāt na bhavati . kanyā anūpe iti . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . asiddham bahiraṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:28263: antaraṅge iti evam na bhaviṣyati . yathā eva tarhi kriyamāṇe svaritagrahaṇe yaḥ siddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28264: svaritaḥ tena varjyamānatā na bhavati evam akriyamāṇe api na bhaviṣyati . tasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:28267: 365-375 ekādeśasvaraḥ antaraṅgaḥ . ekādeśasvaraḥ antaraṅgaḥ siddhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:28269: plakṣe idam . udāttānudāttayoḥ ekādeśaḥ . tasya ekādeśe udāttenodāttaḥ iti etat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:28270: . tasya siddhatvam vaktavyam āntaryataḥ udāttasya udāttaḥ ayādeśaḥ yathā syāt . avādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28271: na asti . āy . kumāryai idam . udāttānudāttayoḥ ekādeśaḥ . tasya ekādeśe udāttenodāttaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28272: iti etat bhavati . tasya siddhatvam vaktavyam āntaryataḥ udāttasya udāttaḥ āyādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28273: yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . ekādeśe kṛte udāttayaṇohalpūrvāt iti udāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:28274: bhaviṣyati . idam iha sampradhāryam . udāttatvam kriyatām ekādeśaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:28275: . paratvāt udāttatvam . nityaḥ ekādeśaḥ . kṛte api udāttatve prāpnoti akṛte api prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:28276: . ekādeśaḥ api anityaḥ . anyathāsvarasya kṛte udāttatve prāpnoti anyathāsvarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:28277: akṛte svarabhinnasya ca prāpnuvan vidhiḥ anityaḥ bhavati . antaraṅgaḥ tarhi ekādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28278: . kā antaraṅgatā . varṇau āśritya ekādeśaḥ padasya udāttatvam . evam tarhi idam iha
GS24pmbhasuu:28279: sampradhāryam . āṭ kriyatām udāttatvam iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt āḍāgamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28280: . nityam udāttatvam . kṛte api āṭi prāpnoti akṛte api prāpnoti . āṭ api nityaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:28281: kṛte api udāttatve prāpnoti akṛte api prāpnoti . anityaḥ āṭ . anyathāsvarasya kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:28282: udāttatve prāpnoti anyathāsvarasya akṛte svarabhinnasya ca prāpnuvan vidhiḥ anityaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28283: bhavati . udāttatvam api anityam . anyasya kṛte āṭi prāpnoti anyasya akṛte prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:28284: śabdāntarasya ca prāpnuvan vidhiḥ anityaḥ bhavati . ubhayoḥ anityayoḥ paratvāt āḍāgamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28285: āṭi kṛte antaraṅgaḥ ekādeśaḥ . āv . vṛkṣavidam . udāttānudāttayoḥ ekādeśaḥ . tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:28286: ekādeśe udāttena udāttaḥ iti etat bhavati . tasya siddhatvam vaktavyam āntaryataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28287: udāttasya udāttaḥ āvādeśaḥ yathā syāt . ekādeśasvara . gāṅge anūpe iti . udāttānudāttayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28288: ekādeśaḥ . tasya ekādeśe udāttena udāttaḥ iti etat bhavati . tasya siddhatvam vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:28289: svaritovānudāttepadādau iti etat yathā syāt . śatṛsvara . tudati nudati . udāttānudāttayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28290: ekādeśaḥ . tasya ekādeśe udāttena udāttaḥ iti etat bhavati . tasya siddhatvam vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:28291: śatuḥ anumaḥ nadyajādiḥ antodāttāt iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:28292: . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati siddhaḥ ekādeśasvaraḥ śatṛsvaraḥ iti yat ayam anumaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28293: iti pratiṣedham śāsti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . na hi antareṇa udāttānudāttoḥ ekādeśam
GS24pmbhasuu:28294: śatrantam sanumkam antodāttam asti . nanu ca idam asti yantī vantī . etat api nighāte
GS24pmbhasuu:28295: kṛte na antareṇa udāttānudāttayoḥ ekādeśam śatrantam sanumkam antodāttam asti . idam
GS24pmbhasuu:28296: iha sampradhāryam . nighātaḥ kriyatām ekādeśaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:28297: nighātaḥ . nityaḥ ekādeśaḥ . kṛte api nighāte prāpnoti akṛte api prāpnoti . ekādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28298: api anityaḥ . anyathāsvarasya kṛte nighāte prāpnoti anyathāsvarasya akṛte nighāte
GS24pmbhasuu:28299: svarabhinnasya ca prāpnuvan vidhiḥ anityaḥ bhavati . antaraṅgaḥ tarhi ekādeśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:28300: kā antaraṅgatā . varṇau āśritya ekādeśaḥ padasya nighātaḥ . nighātaḥ api antaraṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28301: . katham . uktam etat padagrahaṇam parimāṇārtham iti . ubhayoḥ antaraṅgayoḥ paratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:28302: nighātaḥ nighāte kṛte etat api na antareṇa udāttānudāttayoḥ ekādeśam antodāttam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:28303: . śatṛsvara . ekānudātta . tudanti likhanti. udāttānudāttayoḥ ekādeśaḥ . tasya ekādeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:28304: udāttena udāttaḥ iti etat bhavati . tasya siddhatvam vaktavyam tena varjyamānatā
GS24pmbhasuu:28305: yathā syāt . sarvānudātta . brāhmaṇāḥ tudanti . brāhmaṇāḥ likhanti . udāttānudāttayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28306: ekādeśaḥ . tasya ekādeśe udāttenodāttaḥ iti etat bhavati . tasya siddhatvam vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:28307: . kim prayojanam . tiṅatiṅaḥ iti nighātaḥ yathā syāt . kim ucyate antaraṅgaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:28308: . yaḥ hi bahiraṅgaḥ asiddhaḥ eva asau bhavati . prapacatiti . somasut pacatiti .
GS24pmbhasuu:28309: tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . sarvatra eva numpratiṣedhaḥ jñāpakaḥ siddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28310: ekādeśasvaraḥ antaraṅgaḥ iti . saṃyogāntalopaḥ roḥ uttve harivaḥ medinam tvā . saṃyogāntalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28311: roḥ uttve siddhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kim prayojanam . harivaḥ medinam tvā . saṃyogāntalopasya
GS24pmbhasuu:28312: asiddhatvāt haśi iti uttvam na prāpnoti . plutiḥ ca . plutiḥ ca uttve siddhā vaktavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:28313: . susrota3 atra nu asi iti atra pluteḥ asiddhatvāt ataḥ ati iti uttvam prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:28314: aplutāt aplute iti etat na vaktavyam bhavati . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:28315: prayojanam . kriyate nyāse eva . sijlopaḥ ekādeśe . sijlopaḥ ekādeśe siddhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28316: . alāvīt apāvīt . sijlopasya asiddhatvāt savarṇadīrghatvam na prāpnoti . yadi punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28317: iḍādeḥ sicaḥ lopaḥ ucyeta . na evam śakyam . iha hi mā hi lāvit mā hi pāvit yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:28318: atra iṭ na syāt anudāttasya īṭaḥ śravaṇam prasajyeta . iṭi punaḥ sati uktam etat
GS24pmbhasuu:28319: arthavat tu citkaraṇasāmarthyāt hi iṭaḥ udāttatvam iti tatra ekādeśe udāttenodāttaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28320: iti udāttatvam siddham bhavati . saṃyogādilopaḥ saṃyogāntalope . saṃyogādilopaḥ saṃyogāntasya
GS24pmbhasuu:28321: lope siddhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kāṣṭhataṭ kūṭataṭ . saṃyogādilopasya asiddhatvāt saṃyogāntalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28322: prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ukam etat apavādaḥ vacanaprāmāṇyāt iti . niṣṭhādeśaḥ ṣatvasvarapratyayeḍvidhiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:28323: . niṣṭhādeśaḥ ṣatvasvarapratyayeḍvidhiṣu siddhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . vṛkṇaḥ vṛkṇavān . niṣṭhādeśasya
GS24pmbhasuu:28324: asiddhatvāt jhali iti ṣatvam prāpnoti . svara . kṣivaḥ . niṣṭhādeśasya asiddhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:28325: niṣṭhācadvyajanāt iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ na prāpnoti . pratyaya . kṣīveṇa tarati kṣīvikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28326: . niṣṭhādeśasya asiddhatvāt dvyacaḥ ṭhan iti ṭhan na prāpnoti . iḍvidhi . niṣṭhādeśasya
GS24pmbhasuu:28327: asiddhatvāt valādilakṣaṇaḥ iṭ prāpnoti . nanu ca yaḥ pratyayavidhau siddhaḥ siddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28328: asau iḍvidhau . idam tarhi prayojanam . olasjī lagnaḥ . niṣṭhādeśaḥ siddhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28329: neḍvaśikṛti iti iṭpratiṣedhaḥ yathā syāt . īditkaraṇam na kartavyam bhavati . etat
GS24pmbhasuu:28330: api na asti prayojanam . kriyate etat nyāse eva . vasvādiṣu datvam sau dīrghatve
GS24pmbhasuu:28331: . vasvādiṣu datvam sau dīrghatve siddham vaktavyam . ukhāsrat . parṇadhvat . datvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:28332: asiddhatvāt atvasantasya iti dīrghatvam prāpnoti . adhātoḥ iti na vaktavyam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:28333: . na etat asti prayojanam . kriyate nyāse eva . adasaḥ īttvotve svare bahiṣpadalakṣaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:28334: . adasaḥ īttvotve svare bahiṣpadalakṣaṇe siddhe vaktavye . amī atra . amī āsate .
GS24pmbhasuu:28335: amū atra . amū āsāte . īttvotvayoḥ asiddhatvāt ecaḥ iti ayāvekādeśāḥ prāpnuvanti
GS24pmbhasuu:28336: . kim ucyate bahiṣpadalakṣaṇe iti . yaḥ hi anyaḥ asiddhaḥ eva asau bhavati . amuyā
GS24pmbhasuu:28337: amuyoḥ iti . pragṛhyasañjñāyām ca . pragṛhyasañjñāyām ca siddhe vaktavye . amī atra
GS24pmbhasuu:28338: . amī āsate . amū atra . amū āsāte . īttvotvayoḥ asiddhatvāt adasomāt iti pragṛhyasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:28339: na prāpnoti . kim artham idam ubhayam ucyate na pragṛhyasañjñāyām iti eva svare api
GS24pmbhasuu:28340: bahiṣpadalakṣaṇe coditam syāt . purastāt idam ācāryeṇa dṛṣṭam svare bahiṣpadalakṣaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:28341: iti tat paṭhitam . tataḥ uttarakālam idam dṛṣṭam pragṛhyasañjñāyām ca iti tad api
GS24pmbhasuu:28342: paṭhitam . na ca idānīm ācāryāḥ sūtrāṇi kṛtvā nivartayanti . plutiḥ tugvidhau che
GS24pmbhasuu:28343: . plutiḥ tugvidhau che siddhā vakavyā . agna3i cchattram . paṭa3u cchattram . pluteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28344: asiddhatvāt checa iti tuk na prāpnoti . kim ucyate che iti . yaḥ hi anyaḥ asiddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28345: eva asau bhavati . agnici3t somasu3t .ścutvam dhuṭtve . ścutvam dhuṭtve siddham vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:28346: . aṭ ścyotati . paṭ scyotati . ścutvasya asiddhatvāt ḍaḥsidhuṭ iti dhuṭ prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:28347: . abhyāsajaśtvacartvam ettvatukoḥ . abhyāsajaśtvacartvam ettvatukoḥ siddham vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:28348: . babhaṇatuḥ babhaṇuḥ . abhyāsādeśasya asiddhatvāt ettvam prāpnoti . ucicchiṣati
GS24pmbhasuu:28349: . abhyāsādeśasya asiddhatvāt checa iti tuk prāpnoti . dvirvacane parasavarṇatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:28350: . dvirvacane parasavarṇatvam siddham vaktavyam . sayṃyantā savṃvatsaraḥ talṃ lokam
GS24pmbhasuu:28351: yalṃ lokam iti parasavarṇasya asiddhatvāt yaraḥ iti dvirvacanam na prāpnoti . padādhikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28353: siddhāni vaktavyāni . latva garaḥ garaḥ . galaḥ galaḥ . latva. ghatva . drogdhā drogdhā
GS24pmbhasuu:28354: . droḍhā droḍhā . ghatva . natva. nunnaḥ nunnaḥ . nuttaḥ nuttaḥ . natva . rutva .
GS24pmbhasuu:28355: abhinaḥ abhinaḥ . abhinat abhinat . rutva ṣatva
GS24pmbhasuu:28356: . mātuḥṣvasā mātuḥṣvasā . mātuḥsvasā mātuḥsvasā pituḥṣvasā pituḥṣvasā . pituḥsvasā
GS24pmbhasuu:28357: pituḥsvasā . ṣatva . ṇatva . māṣavāpāṇi māṣavāpāṇi . māṣavāpāni māṣavāpāni . ṇatva
GS24pmbhasuu:28358: . anunāsika . nāṅnayanam nāṅnayanam . vāgnayanam vāgnayanam . anunāsika . chatva
GS24pmbhasuu:28359: . vākchayanam vākchayanam . vākśayanam vākśayanam . ubhayathā ca ayam doṣaḥ yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:28360: api sthāne dvirvacanam atha api dviḥprayogaḥ . katham . yadi tāvat sthāne dvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:28361: sampramugdhatvāt prakṛtipratyayasya latvādyabhāvaḥ . atha dviḥprayogaḥ asiddhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:28364: 375 antagrahaṇam kimartham . nalope antagrahaṇam padādhikārasya viśeṣaṇatvāt . nalope
GS24pmbhasuu:28365: antagrahaṇam kriyate . kim kāraṇam . padādhikārasya viśeṣaṇatvāt . padādhikāraḥ viśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:28366: . katham . padasya iti na eṣā sthānaṣaṣṭhī . kā tarhi . viśeṣaṇaṣaṣṭhī .
GS24pmbhasuu:28368: 375-376 ahnaḥ nalopapratiṣedhaḥ . ahnaḥ nalopapratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . ahobhyām ahobhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28369: iti . saḥ tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . ruḥ atra bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:28370: . asiddhaḥ ruḥ tasya asiddhatvāt nalopaḥ prāpnoti . anavakāśaḥ ruḥ nalopam bādhiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:28371: . sāvakāśaḥ ruḥ . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . anantyaḥ akāraḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na anantyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:28372: ruḥ bhavati iti yat ayam ahangrahaṇam karoti . ahangrahaṇāt iti cet sambuddhyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:28373: vacanam . ahangrahaṇāt iti cet sambuddhyartham etat syāt . he ahaḥ iti . yat tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:28374: rutvam śāsti . etat api sambuddhyartham eva syāt . he dīrghāhaḥ atra . yat tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:28375: rūparātrirathantareṣu upasaṅkhyānam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na anantyasya ruḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28376: bhavati iti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . na hi asti viśeṣaḥ rūparātrirathantareṣu anantyasya rau vā re vā .
GS24pmbhasuu:28378: 377-378 na ṅisambuddhyoḥ anuttarapade . na ṅisambuddhyoḥ anuttarapade iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:28379: . iha mā bhūt . carmaṇi tilā asya carmatilaḥ iti . rājan vṛndāraka rājavṛndāraka
GS24pmbhasuu:28380: iti . vā napuṃsakānām . vā napuṃsakānām iti vaktavyam . he carma he carman . he varma
GS24pmbhasuu:28381: he varman . tat tarhi anuttarapade iti vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . na ṅisambuddhyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28382: iti ucyate na ca atra ṅisambuddhī paśyāmaḥ . pratyayalakṣaṇena . na lumatā tasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:28383: iti pratyayalakṣaṇasya pratiṣedhaḥ . na kvacit ṅiḥ lopena lupyate sarvatra lumatā
GS24pmbhasuu:28384: eva . yathā eva iha bhavati ārdre carman lohite carman iti evam iha api syāt carmaṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:28385: tilā asya carmatilaḥ iti . tasmāt upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . evam tarhi ṅyarthena
GS24pmbhasuu:28386: tāvat na arthaḥ . bhatvāt tu ṅau pratiṣedhānarthakyam . ṅau pratiṣedhaḥ anarthakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28387: . kim kāraṇam . bhatvāt . bhasañjñā atra bhaviṣyati . yadi tarhi bhasañjñā atra bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:28388: rathantare sāman iti atra allopaḥ anaḥ iti allopaḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:28389: ubhayasañjñāni api chandāṃsi dṛśyante tad yathā saḥ suṣṭubhā saḥ ṛkvatā gaṇena padatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:28390: kutvam bhatvāt jaśtvam na bhavati . evam iha api padatvāt allopaḥ na bhatvāt nalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28391: na bhaviṣyati . tasmāt na arthaḥ ṅigrahaṇena . sambuddhyarthena ca api na arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28392: . katham . sambuddhyantānām asamāsaḥ . rājavṛndāraka iti . kim vaktavyam etat . na
GS24pmbhasuu:28393: hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . iha samānārthena vākyena bhavitavyam samāsena
GS24pmbhasuu:28394: ca yaḥ ca iha arthaḥ vākyena gamyate na asau jātu cit samāsena gamyate . avayavasambodhanam
GS24pmbhasuu:28395: vākyena gamyate samudāyasambodhanam samāsena . vā napuṃsakānām iti etat vaktavyam eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:28398: 378 anantyayoḥ api niṣṭhāmatupoḥ ādeśaḥ . niṣṭhāmatupoḥ ādeśaḥ anantyayoḥ api iti
GS24pmbhasuu:28399: vaktavyam . bhinnavantau bhinnavantaḥ . vṛkṣavantau vṛkṣavantaḥ . na vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:28400: vacanāt bhaviṣyati . asti vacane prayojanam . kim . bhinnavān chinnavān . vṛkṣavān plakṣavān .
GS24pmbhasuu:28402: 378-379 nārmate pratiṣedhaḥ . nārmate pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . nṛmataḥ nārmataḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:28403: . uktam vā . kim uktam . niṣṭhāmatupoḥ tāvat uktam na vā padādhikārasya viśeṣaṇatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:28404: iti . nārmate api uktam na vā bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:28406: 379 kim ayam ekayogaḥ āhosvit nānāyogau . kim ca ataḥ . yadi ekayogaḥ hīvatī kapīvatī
GS24pmbhasuu:28407: atra na prāpnoti . atha nānāyogau ikṣumatī drumatī atra api prāpnoti . yathā icchasi
GS24pmbhasuu:28408: tathā astu . astu tāvat ekayogaḥ . katham ahīvatī kapīvatī . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:28409: bhavati evañjātīyakānām vatvam iti yat ayam anto'vatyāḥ īvatyāḥ iti āha . atha vā
GS24pmbhasuu:28410: punaḥ astu nānāyogau . nanu ca uktam ikṣumatī drumatī atra api prāpnoti iti . yavādiṣu pāthaḥ kariṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:28412: 379-380 chandasi iraḥ iti ucyate tatra te viśvakarmāṇam te saptarṣimantam iti atra
GS24pmbhasuu:28413: api prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na evam vijñāyate chandasi iraḥ iti . katham tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:28414: . chandasi īraḥ iti . evam api tviṣīmān patīmān iti atra api prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28415: . vihitaviśeṣaṇam īkāragrahaṅam . īkārāntāt yaḥ vihitaḥ iti . evam api sūram te dyāvāpṛthivīmantam
GS24pmbhasuu:28416: iti atra api prāpnoti . iha ca na prāpnoti trivatīḥ yājyānuvākyāḥ bhavanti iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:28417: evam tarhi parigaṇanam kartavyam . triharyadhipatyagnire . trivatīḥ yājyānuvākyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28418: bhavanti . tri . hari . harivaḥ medinam tvā . hari . adhipati . adhipativatīḥ juhoti
GS24pmbhasuu:28419: . adhipati . agni . caruḥ agnivān iva . agni . re . ā revan etu no viśa iti . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:28420: tarhi parigaṇanam kriyate sarasvatīvān bhāratīvān apūpavān dadhivān caruḥ iti atra
GS24pmbhasuu:28421: na prāpnoti . evam tarhi chandasi iraḥ bahulam iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:28423: 380-382 yadi punaḥ ayam nuṭ pūrvāntaḥ kriyeta . anaḥ nuki vināmaruvidhipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28424: . anaḥ nuki sati vināmaḥ vidheyaḥ . akṣaṇvān . padāntasya na iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:28425: . ruḥ ca pratiṣedhyaḥ . supathintaraḥ . naśchavyapraśān iti ruḥ prāpnoti . astu tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:28426: parādiḥ . parādau vatvapratiṣedhaḥ avagrahaḥ ca . yadi parādiḥ vatvasya pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28427: vaktavyaḥ . akṣaṇvān . mādupadhāyāścamatorvo'yavādibhyaḥ iti vatvam prāpnoti . avagrahaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28428: ca aniṣṭe deśe prāpnoti . akṣaṇvān . astu tarhi pūrvāntaḥ . nanu ca uktam anaḥ nuki
GS24pmbhasuu:28429: vināmaruvidhipratiṣedhaḥ iti . bhatvāt siddham . bhasañjñā vaktavyā . yadi tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:28430: bhasañjñā allopo'naḥ iti allopaḥ prāpnoti . anaḥ tu prakṛtibhāve matubgrahaṇam chandasi
GS24pmbhasuu:28431: . anaḥ tu prakṛtibhāve matubgrahaṇam chandasi vaktavyam . iha tarhi supathintaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28432: nāntasya ṭiḥ taddhite lupyate iti lopaḥ prāpnoti . ghagrahaṇam ca . ghagrahaṇam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:28433: kartavyam . tat tarhi idam bahu vaktavyam . nuk vaktavyaḥ . bhasañjñā ca vaktavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:28434: . anaḥ tu prakṛtibhāve matubgrahaṇam chandasi vaktavyam . ghagrahaṇam ca kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:28435: iti . na kartavyam . yat tāvat ucyate nuk vaktavyaḥ iti nukaḥ eṣaḥ parihāraḥ bhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:28436: siddham iti . bhasañjñā vaktavyā iti kriyate nyāse eva ayasmayādīni chandasi iti
GS24pmbhasuu:28437: . yat api ucyate anaḥ tu prakṛtibhāve matubgrahaṇam chandasi ghagrahaṇam ca kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:28438: iti na kartavyam . ubhayasañjñāni api hi chandāṃsi dṛśyante . tat yathā . saḥ suṣṭubhā
GS24pmbhasuu:28439: sa ṛkvatā gaṇena . padatvāt kutvam bhatvāt jaśtvam na bhavati . evam iha api padatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:28440: allopaṭilopau na bhatvāt vināmaruvidhipratiṣedhau bhaviṣyataḥ . sidhyati . sūtram
GS24pmbhasuu:28441: tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam parādau vatvapratiṣedhaḥ avagrahaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28442: ca iti . yat tāvat ucyate vatvapratiṣedhaḥ iti nirdiśyamānasya ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:28443: evam na bhaviṣyati . yaḥ tarhi nirdiśyate tasya na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . nuṭā
GS24pmbhasuu:28444: vyavahitatvāt . asiddhaḥ nuṭ tasya asiddhatvāt bhaviṣyati . avagrahe api na lakṣaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:28445: padakārāḥ anuvartyāḥ padakāraiḥ nāma lakṣaṇam anuvartyam . yathālakṣaṇam padam kartavyam .

GS24pmbhasuu:28499: 387-388 saṃyogāntasya lope yaṇaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . saṃyogāntasya lope yaṇaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28500: vaktavyaḥ . dadhi atra madhu atra iti . saṃyogādilope ca yaṇaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28501: . kākī artham vāsī artham . na vā jhalaḥ lopāt . na vā vaktavyaḥ . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:28502: jhalaḥ lopāt . jhalaḥ lopaḥ saṃyogāntalopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt vā .

GS24pmbhasuu:28507: na sidhyati . paratvāt ruḥ prāpnoti . asiddhaḥ ruḥ tasya asiddhatvāt lopaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:28508: . na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . ruvidhānasya anavakāśatvāt . anavakāsaḥ ruḥ lopam bādheta
GS24pmbhasuu:28509: . sāvakāśaḥ ruḥ . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . payaḥ śiraḥ . nanu ca atra api jaśtvam prāpnoti

GS24pmbhasuu:28512: prāpte ca aprāpte ca . yogavibhāgāt siddham . atha vā yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:28513: vakṣyāmi . saṃyogāntasya lopaḥ arāt . saṃyogāntasya lopaḥ bhavati arāt . tataḥ sasya
