GS24pmbhasuu:28517: rāt . rāt sasya eva saṃyogāntasya lopaḥ bhavati . atha vā rāt sasya iti atra saṃyogāntasya
GS24pmbhasuu:28520: 389-391 dhi sakāre sicaḥ lopaḥ . dhi sakāre sicaḥ lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:28521: . cakāddhi iti prayojanam . iha mā bhūt . cakāddhi palitam śiraḥ . yadi tarhi sicaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28522: lopaḥ iti ucyate . āśādhvam tu katham te syāt . āśādhvam iti atra na prāpnoti . jaśtvam
GS24pmbhasuu:28523: sasya bhaviṣyati . jaśtvam atra sakārasya bhaviṣyati . sarvatra evam prasiddham syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:28524: . sarvatra evam jaśtvena siddham syāt . iha api āyandhvam arandhvam iti jaśtvena
GS24pmbhasuu:28525: eva siddham . śrutiḥ ca api na bhidyate . śrutikṛtaḥ ca api na kaḥ cit bhedaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:28526: . luṅaḥ ca api na mūrdhanye grahaṇam . tatra ayam api arthaḥ iṇaḥṣīdhvaṃluṅliṭāndho'ṅgāt
GS24pmbhasuu:28527: iti atra luṅgrahaṇam na kartavyam . iha api acyoḍḍhvam aploḍḍhvam iti ṣatve sicaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28528: dhasya ṣṭutve ca kṛte jaśtvena siddham . seṭi duṣyati . seṭi doṣaḥ bhavati . idam
GS24pmbhasuu:28529: eva rūpam syāt alaviḍḍhvam idam na syāt alavidhvam iti . tasmāt sicaḥ grahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:28530: . yadi tarhi sicaḥ grahaṇam kriyate . ghasibhasyoḥ na sidhyet tu . ghasibhasyoḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:28531: sidhyati . sagdhiḥ ca me sapītiḥ ca me,
GS24pmbhasuu:28532: babdhām te harī dhānāḥ iti atra na prāpnoti . tasmāt sijgrahaṇam na tat . tasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:28533: dhica iti atra sicaḥ grahaṇam na kartavyam . katham cakāddhi palitam śiraḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:28534: evam tarhi sijgrahaṇam kartavyam . katham sagdhiḥ ca me sapītiḥ ca me ,
GS24pmbhasuu:28535: babdham te harī dhānāḥ iti . iha tāvat sagdhiḥ iti na etat ghaseḥ rūpam . kim tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:28536: sagheḥ etat rūpam . babdhām te harī dhānāḥ iti na etat bhaseḥ rūpam . kim tarhi bandheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28537: etat rūpam . chāndasaḥ varṇalopaḥ vā yathā iṣkartāramadhvare . atha vā chāndasaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28538: varṇalopaḥ bhaviṣyati yathā iṣkartāramadhvare . tat yathā . tubhyedam agne . tubhyam
GS24pmbhasuu:28539: idam agne iti prāpte . āmbānām caruḥ . nāmbānām caruḥ iti prāpte . āvyādhinīḥ ugaṇāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28540: . āvyādhinīḥ sugaṇāḥ iti prāpte . iṣkartāram adhvarasya . niṣkartāram iti prāpte
GS24pmbhasuu:28541: . śivā udrasya bheṣajī . śivā rudrasya bheṣajīti prāpte . tasmāt sijgrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:28542: . na kartavyam . yat etat rātsasya iti sakāragrahaṇam tat sicaḥ grahaṇam vijñāsyate
GS24pmbhasuu:28543: . katham . rātsasya iti ucyate na ca anyaḥ rephāt paraḥ sakāraḥ asti anyat ataḥ sicaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28544: . nanu ca ayam asti mātuḥ pituḥ iti . tasmāt sicaḥ grahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:28545: . kasmāt na bhavati cakāddhi palitam śiraḥ iti . iṣṭam eva etat saṅgṛhītam . cakādhi
GS24pmbhasuu:28546: iti eva bhavitavyam . dhi sakāre sicaḥ lopaḥ . cakāddhi iti prayojanam . āśādhvam
GS24pmbhasuu:28547: tu katham te syāt . jaśtvam sasya bhaviṣyati . sarvatra evam prasiddham syāt . śrutiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28548: ca api na bhidyate . luṅaḥ ca api na mūrdhanye grahaṇam . seṭi duṣyati . ghasibhasyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28549: na sidhyet tu . tasmāt sijgrahaṇam na tat . chāndasaḥ varṇalopaḥ vā yathā iṣkartāramadhvare . dāder dhātor ghaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28551: 392 iha dogdhā dogdhum iti ghatvasya asiddhatvāt ḍhatvam prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28552: . uktam etat apavādaḥ vacanaprāmāṇyāt iti . atha vā evam vakṣyāmi . haḥ ḍhaḥ adādeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28553: . haḥ ḍhaḥ bhavati adādeḥ . tataḥ dhātoḥ ghaḥ iti . dādeḥ iti anuvartate na iti nivṛttam .
GS24pmbhasuu:28555: 392-393 dādeḥ iti ucyate tatra idam na sidhyati . adhok . kva tarhi syāt . mā sma
GS24pmbhasuu:28556: dhok. na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . dhātoḥ iti na eṣā dādisamānādhikaraṇā ṣaṣṭhī . dādeḥ dhātoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28557: iti . kā tarhi . avayavayogā eṣā ṣaṣṭhī . dhātoḥ yaḥ dādiḥ avayavaḥ iti . sā ca avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:28558: avayavayogā ṣaṣṭhī vijñeyā uttarārthā . kim prayojanam . ekācaḥ baśaḥ bhaṣ jhaṣantasya
GS24pmbhasuu:28559: sdhvoḥ iti iha api yathā syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:28560: gardabhayateḥ apratyayaḥ gardhap iti . yadi avayavayogā ṣaṣṭhī dogdhā dogdhum iti atra na prāpnoti . eṣaḥ api vyapadeśivadbhāvena dhātoḥ dādiḥ avayavaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:28562: 393 hṛgrahoḥ bhaḥ chandasi hasya . hṛgrahoḥ chandasi hasya bhatvam vaktavyam . gardabhena
GS24pmbhasuu:28563: sambharati . marut asya grabhītā . sāmidhenyaḥ jabhrire . udgrābham ca nigrābham
GS24pmbhasuu:28566: 393 kimarthaḥ cakāraḥ . sdhvoḥ iti etat anukṛṣyate . na etat asti prayojanam . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:28567: sdhvoḥ pūrveṇa eva . na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . abaśāditvāt . nanu ca jaśtve kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:28568: baśādiḥ . asiddham jaśtvam tasya asiddhatvāt na baśādiḥ . evam tarhi siddhakāṇḍe
GS24pmbhasuu:28569: paṭhitam abhyāsajaśtvacartvam ettvatukoḥ iti . ettvatukoḥ grahaṇam na kariṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:28570: abhyāsajaśtvacartvam siddham iti eva . evam api ajhaṣantatvāt na prāpnoti . lope
GS24pmbhasuu:28571: kṛte jhaṣantaḥ . sthānivadbhāvāt na jhaṣantaḥ . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . dadhaḥ tathoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28572: anukarṣaṇānarthakyam sthānivatpratiṣedhāt . dadhaḥ tathoḥ anukarṣaṇam anarthakam
GS24pmbhasuu:28573: . kim kāraṇam . sthānivatpratiṣedhāt . pratiṣidhyate atra sthanivadbhāvaḥ pūrvatrāsiddhe
GS24pmbhasuu:28574: na sthānivat iti . sa ca avaśyam pratiṣedhaḥ āśrayitavyaḥ . itarathā hi alope pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28575: . yaḥ hi manyate anukarṣaṇasāmarthyāt me atra bhavati alope tena pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:28578: 394 tathoḥ ca api grahaṇam śakyam akartum . katham . jhali jhaṣantasya iti ucyate tathoḥ ca ayam jhali jhaṣantaḥ bhavati na anyatra .
GS24pmbhasuu:28580: 394 atha api etat na asti pūrvatrāsiddhe na sthānivat iti evam api na eva arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28581: anukarṣaṇārthena cakāreṇa na api tathoḥ grahaṇena . ānantaryam iha āśrīyate jhali
GS24pmbhasuu:28582: jhaṣantasya iti . kva cit ca sannipātakṛtam ānantaryam śāstrakṛtam anānantaryam kva
GS24pmbhasuu:28583: cit na eva sannipātakṛtam na api śāstrakṛtam . lope sannipātakṛtam ānantaryam śāstrakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:28584: anānantaryam alope na eva sannipātakṛtam na api śāstrakṛtam . yatra kutaḥ cit eva
GS24pmbhasuu:28587: 394 adhaḥ iti kimartham . dhattaḥ . dhatthaḥ . adhaḥ iti śakyam akartum . kasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:28588: na bhavati dhattaḥ dhatthaḥ iti . jaśtve yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . idam asti dadhastathośca
GS24pmbhasuu:28589: iti . tataḥ vakṣyāmi jhalām jaśaḥ . jhalām jaśaḥ bhavanti dadhaḥ tathoḥ . tataḥ ante
GS24pmbhasuu:28590: . ante ca jhalām jaśaḥ bhavanti . tatra jaśtve kṛte ajhaṣantatvāt na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:28592: 395 radābhyām iti kimartham . caritam muditam . nanu ca radābhyām iti ucyamāne api
GS24pmbhasuu:28593: atra prāpnoti . atra api rephadakārābhyām parā niṣṭhā . na rephadakārābhyām niṣṭhā
GS24pmbhasuu:28594: viśeṣyate . kim tarhi . takāraḥ viśeṣyate . raphadakārābhyām uttarasya takārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:28595: naḥ bhavati sa cet niṣṭhāyāḥ iti . atha pūrvagrahaṇam kimartham . niṣṭhādeśe pūrvagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:28596: parasya ādeśapratiṣedhārtham . niṣṭhādeśe pūrvagrahaṇam kriyate parasya ādeśaḥ mā
GS24pmbhasuu:28597: bhūt iti . bhinnavadbhyām bhinnavadbhiḥ . pañcamīnirdiṣṭāt hi parasya . pañcamīnirdiṣṭāt
GS24pmbhasuu:28600: 396-397 vṛddhinimittāt pratiṣedhaḥ . vṛddhinimittāt pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:28601: . prayojanam kārtikṣaitiphaullayaḥ . kārtiḥ iti vṛddhau kṛtāyām radābhyām iti natvam
GS24pmbhasuu:28602: prāpnoti . kṣaitiḥ iti vṛddhau kṛtāyām kṣiyodīrghāt iti natvam prāpnoti . phaulliḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28603: iti vṛddhau kṛtāyām udupadhatvasanniyogena latvam ucyamānam na prāpnoti . atha ucyamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:28604: api pratiṣedhe vṛddhinimittāt iti katham idam vijñāyate . vṛddhiḥ eva nimittam vṛddhinimittam
GS24pmbhasuu:28605: vṛddhinimittāt iti . āhosvit vṛddhiḥ nimittam asya saḥ ayam vṛddhinimittaḥ vṛddhinimittāt
GS24pmbhasuu:28606: iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate vṛddhiḥ eva nimittam vṛddhinimittam vṛddhinimittāt
GS24pmbhasuu:28607: iti kṣaitiḥ saṅgṛhītaḥ kārtiḥ asaṅgṛhītaḥ . atha vijñāyate vṛddhiḥ nimittam asya
GS24pmbhasuu:28608: saḥ ayam vṛddhinimittaḥ vṛddhinimittāt iti kārtiḥ saṅgṛhītaḥ kṣaitiḥ asaṅgṛhītaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28609: . ubhayathā ca phaulliḥ asaṅgṛhītaḥ . yathā icchasi tathā astu . astu tāvat vṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28610: eva nimittam vṛddhinimittam vṛddhinimittāt iti . nanu ca uktam kṣaitiḥ saṅgrhītaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28611: kārtiḥ asaṅgṛhītaḥ iti . kārtiḥ ca saṅgṛhītaḥ . katham . vṛddhiḥ bhavati guṇaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:28612: iti rephaśirāḥ guṇavṛddhisañjñakaḥ abhinirvartate . atha vā punaḥ astu vṛddhiḥ nimittam
GS24pmbhasuu:28613: asya saḥ ayam vṛddhinimittaḥ vṛddhinimittāt iti . nanu ca uktam kārtiḥ saṅgṛhītaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28614: kṣaitiḥ asaṅgṛhītaḥ iti . kṣaitiḥ ca saṅgṛhītaḥ . katham . yat tat vṛddhiśāstram
GS24pmbhasuu:28615: tasmin vṛddhiśabdaḥ vartate . saḥ tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vā bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:28616: . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . bahiraṅgā vṛddhiḥ . antaraṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:28617: natvam . asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge . evam ca kṛtvā latvam api siddham bhavati phaulliḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:28619: 397-398 ṛkāralvādibhyaḥ ktinniṣṭhāvat . ṛkāralvādibhyaḥ ktin niṣṭhāvat bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:28620: vaktavyam . kīrṇiḥ gīrṇiḥ . lūniḥ dhūniḥ . dugvoḥ dīrghaḥ ca . dugvoḥ dīrghaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:28621: iti vaktavyam . ādūnaḥ vigūnaḥ . pūñaḥ vināśe . pūñaḥ vināśe iti vaktavyam . pūnāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28622: yavāḥ . vināśe iti kimartham . pūtam dhānyam . sinoteḥ grāsakarmakartṛkasya . sinoteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28623: grāsakarmakartṛkasya iti vaktavyam . sinaḥ grāsaḥ . grāsakarmakartṛkasya iti kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:28626: 398-399 dīrghāt iti kimartham . akṣitam asi mā me kṣeṣṭhāḥ . dīrghāt iti śakyam akartum
GS24pmbhasuu:28627: . kasmāt na bhavati akṣitam asi mā me kṣeṣṭhāḥ iti . nirdeśāt eva idam abhivyaktam
GS24pmbhasuu:28628: dīrghasya grahaṇam iti . yadi hrasvasya grahaṇam syāt kṣeḥ iti eva brūyāt . na atra
GS24pmbhasuu:28629: nirdeśaḥ pramāṇaṃ śakyam kartum . yathā eva atra aprāptā vibhaktiḥ evam iyaṅādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28630: api . na atra aprāptā vibhaktiḥ . siddhā atra vibhaktiḥ prātipadikāt iti . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:28631: prātipadikasañjñā . arthavat prātipadikam iti . nanu ca adhātuḥ iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:28632: . na eṣaḥ dhātuḥ dhātoḥ eṣaḥ anukaraṇaḥ . yadi anukaraṇaḥ iyaṅādeśaḥ na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:28633: . prakṛtivat anukaraṇam bhavati iti evam iyaṅādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . yadi prakṛtivat
GS24pmbhasuu:28634: anukaraṇam bhavati iti ucyate svādyutpattiḥ na prāpnoti . evam tarhi ātideśikānām
GS24pmbhasuu:28635: svāśrayāṇi api na nivartante . atha api etat na asti ātideśikānām svāśrayāṇi api
GS24pmbhasuu:28636: na nivartante iti evam api na doṣaḥ . avaśyam atra sarvataḥ nairdeśikī vibhaktiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28637: vaktavyā . tat yathā . nerviśaḥ parivyavebhyaḥkriyaḥ viparābhyāñjeḥ iti . atha api
GS24pmbhasuu:28638: etat na asti prakṛtivat anukaraṇam bhavati iti evam api na doṣaḥ . dhātoḥ ajādau
GS24pmbhasuu:28641: 400-401 añceḥ natve vyaktapratiṣedhaḥ . añceḥ natve vyaktasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28642: . vyaktam anṛtam kathayati iti . añjivijñānāt siddham . na etat añceḥ rūpam . añjeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28643: etat rūpam . añcatyarthaḥ vai gamyate . kaḥ punaḥ añcatyarthaḥ . añcatiḥ prakāśane
GS24pmbhasuu:28644: vartate . añcitam gacchati . prakāśayati ātmānam iti gamyate . na vai loke añcitam
GS24pmbhasuu:28645: gacchati iti prakāśanam gamyate . kim tarhi . samādhānam gamyate . samāhitaḥ bhūtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:28646: gacchati iti . evam tarhi añcateḥ aṅkaḥ aṅkaḥ ca prakāśanam . aṅkitāḥ gāvaḥ iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:28647: anyābhyaḥ gobhyaḥ prakāśyante . añcatyarthaḥ iti cet añjeḥ tadarthatvāt siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:28648: añcatyarthaḥ iti cet añjiḥ api añcatyarthe vartate . katham punaḥ anyaḥ nāma anyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:28649: arthe vartate . katham añjiḥ añcatyarthe vartate . anekārthāḥ api dhātavaḥ bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:28650: . asti punaḥ kva cit anyatra api añjiḥ añcatyarthe vartate . asti iti āha . añjeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28651: añjanam añjanam ca prakāśanam . aṅkteṣiṇī iti ucyate yat tat sitam ca asitam ca etat
GS24pmbhasuu:28652: prakāśayati . tathā añjeḥ vyañjanam vyañjanam ca prakāśanam . yat tat snehena madhureṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:28653: ca jaḍīkṛtānām indriyāṇām svasmin ātmani vyavasthāpanam saḥ rāgaḥ tat vyañjanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:28654: anvartham khalu api nirvacanam . vyajyate anena iti vyañjanam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:28656: 401-402 avātābhidhāne . avātābhidhāne iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt . nirvāṇaḥ agniḥ vātena . nirvāṇaḥ pradīpaḥ vātena iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:28658: 402-403 anupasargāt iti ucyate tatra idam na sidhyati parikṛśam iti . kṛśeḥ kaḥ eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28659: vihitaḥ igupadhāt . na etat niṣṭhāntam . kim tarhi kṛśaḥ eṣaḥ igupadhāt kaḥ vihitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28660: . svare hi doṣaḥ bhavati parikṛśe . na evam śakyam . iha hi parikṛśaḥ iti svare doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28661: syāt . antasthāthaghañktājabitrakāṇām . iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ prasajyeta . padasya lopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28662: vihitaḥ iti matam . evam tarhi padasya lopaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ . paryāgataḥ kārśyena parikṛśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28665: 403 phaleḥ latve utpūrvasya upasaṅkhyānam . phaleḥ latve utpūrvasya upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:28666: utphullaḥ anṛtam kathayati . atyalpam idam ucyate utpūrvāt iti . utphullasamphullayoḥ iti vaktavyam : utphullaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:28667: samphullaḥ . kṛśeḥ kaḥ eṣaḥ vihitaḥ igupadhāt . svare hi doṣaḥ bhavati parikṛśe . padasya lopaḥ vihitaḥ iti matam . jagati anūnā bhavati hi rucirā .
GS24pmbhasuu:28669: 403-404 kim ayam vidhiḥ āhosvit pratiṣedhaḥ . kim ca ataḥ . yadi tāvat vidhiḥ nakāragrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:28670: kartavyam . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . radābhyānniṣṭhātonaḥpūrvasyacadaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28671: iti . tat vā anekena nipātanena vyavacchinnam na śakyam anuvartayitum . atha pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28672: hrīgrahaṇam anarthakam na hi etasmāt vidhiḥ asti . yathā icchasi tathā astu . astu
GS24pmbhasuu:28673: tāvat vidhiḥ . nanu ca uktam nakāragrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:28674: . kva prakṛtam . radābhyānniṣṭhātonaḥpūrvasyacadaḥ iti . tat vā anekena nipātanena
GS24pmbhasuu:28675: vyavacchinnam na śakyam anuvartayitum iti . sambandham anuvartiṣyate . atha vā kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:28676: nyāse eva . dvinakārakaḥ nirdeśaḥ . nudavidondatrāghrāhrībhyaḥ anyatarasyām n na
GS24pmbhasuu:28677: dhyākhyāpṝmūrchimadām iti . atha vā punaḥ astu pratiṣedhaḥ . nanu ca uktam hrīgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:28678: anarthakam na hi etasmāt vidhiḥ asti iti . na anarthakam . etat eva jñāpayati ācāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28679: bhavati etasmāt vidhiḥ iti yat ayam hrīgrahaṇam karoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:28681: 404-405 bahavaḥ ime vidayaḥ paṭhyante . tatra na jñāyate kasya nityam natvam kasya
GS24pmbhasuu:28682: vibhāṣā kasya pratiṣedhaḥ kasya iṭ iti . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . yasya videḥ śnaśakau
GS24pmbhasuu:28683: taparatve tanavacane tad u vāpratiṣedhau . śnavikaraṇasya vibhāṣā śavikaraṇasya pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28684: . śyavikaraṇāt navidhiḥ chiditulyaḥ . śyanvikaraṇāt videḥ navidhiḥ chidinā tulyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28685: . lugvikaraṇaḥ vali paryavapannaḥ . lugvikaraṇaḥ vidiḥ valādau paryavapannaḥ . eṣa
GS24pmbhasuu:28686: evārthaḥ . yayoḥ vidyoḥ śnaśau uktau tayoḥ natvasya vānañau . yayoḥ tu śya~llukau
GS24pmbhasuu:28687: tābhyām chidivac ca iṭ ca iṣyate . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:28688: vetteḥ tu viditaḥ niṣṭhā . vidyateḥ vinnaḥ iṣyate . vintteḥ vinnaḥ ca vittaḥ ca vittaḥ bhogeṣu vindateḥ . bhittaṃ śakalam .
GS24pmbhasuu:28690: 405-406 bhittam śakalam iti ucyate tatra idam na sidhyati bhittam bhinnam iti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:28691: eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . sarvatra eva atra bhidiḥ vidāraṇasāmānye vartate tatra avaśyam viśeṣārthinā
GS24pmbhasuu:28692: viśeṣaḥ anuprayoktavyaḥ . bhinnam kim bhittam iti . tatvam abhidhāyakam cet śakalasya
GS24pmbhasuu:28693: anarthakaḥ prayogaḥ syāt . śakalena ca api abhihite na bhavati tatvam nigamayāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28696: 407 pratyayagrahaṇam kimartham na kvinaḥ kuḥ iti eva ucyeta . kvinaḥ kuḥ iti iyati
GS24pmbhasuu:28697: ucyamāne vakārasya eva kutvam prasajyeta . nanu ca lope kṛte na bhaviṣyati . anavakāśam
GS24pmbhasuu:28698: kutvam lopam bādheta . sāvakāśam kutvam . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . anantyaḥ . katham punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28699: sati antye anantyasya kutvam syāt . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati nāntyasya kutvam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:28700: iti yat ayam kvinaḥ kuḥ iti kavarganirdeśam karoti . itarathā hi tadguṇam eva ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:28701: nirdiśet . idam tarhi prayojanam yebhyaḥ kvinpratyayaḥ vidhīyate teṣām anyapratyayāntānām
GS24pmbhasuu:28702: api padānte kutvam yathā syāt . mā naḥ asrāk . mā naḥ adrāk . kvinaḥ kuḥ iti vaktavye
GS24pmbhasuu:28703: pratyayagrahaṇam kṛtam . kvinpratyayasya sarvatra padānte kutvam iṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:28705: 408 ruvidhau ahnaḥ rūparātrirathantareṣu upasaṅkhyānam . ruvidhau ahnaḥ rūparātrirathantareṣu upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . ahorūpam ahorātraḥ ahorathantaram sāma .
GS24pmbhasuu:28707: 408-409 asupi rādeśe upasarjanasamāse pratiṣedhaḥ aluki . asupi rādeśe upasarjanasamāse
GS24pmbhasuu:28708: aluki pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . dīrghāhā nidāghaḥ iti . siddham tu supi pratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:28709: . siddham etat . katham . supi pratiṣedhāt . prasajya ayam pratiṣedhaḥ supi na iti
GS24pmbhasuu:28710: . iha api tarhi na prāpnoti . ahan dadāti . ahan bhuṅkte iti . luki ca uktam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:28711: uktam . ahnaḥ ravidhau lumatā lupte pratyayalakṣaṇam na bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:28713: 409 chandasi bhāṣāyām ca pracetasaḥ rājani upasaṅkhyānam . chandasi bhāṣāyām ca pracetasaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28714: rājani upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . pracetaḥ rājan . pracetar rājan . aharādīnām patyādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:28715: upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . aharpatiḥ ahaḥpatiḥ . aharputraḥ ahaḥputraḥ . gīrpatiḥ gīḥpatiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:28717: 409-410 iha kasmāt na bhavati . papivān tasthivān iti . sasya iti vartate . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:28718: api atra prāpnoti . lope kṛte na bhaviṣyati . anavakāśam datvam lopam bādheta . sāvakāśam
GS24pmbhasuu:28719: datvam . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . papivadbhyām papivadbhiḥ iti . atra api ruḥ prāpnoti . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:28720: yathā eva rum bādhate evam lopam api bādheta . na bādhate . kim kāraṇam . yena na
GS24pmbhasuu:28721: aprāpte tasya bādhanam bhavati na ca aprāpte rau datvam ārabhyate lope punaḥ prāpte
GS24pmbhasuu:28722: ca aprāpte ca . yadi tarhi sasya iti vartate anaḍudbhyām anaḍudbhiḥ iti atra na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:28723: . vacanāt anaḍuhi bhaviṣyati . yadi evam . anaḍuhaḥ datve nakārapratiṣedhaḥ . anaḍuhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28724: datve nakārasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . anaḍvān . siddham tu pratipadavidhānāt numaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28725: . siddham etat . katham . numaḥ pratipadavidhānasāmarthyāt datvam na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:28726: yadi tarhi yat yat anaḍuhaḥ prāptam tat tat numaḥ pratipadavidhānasāmarthyāt bādhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:28727: rutvam api na prāpnoti . anaḍvān tatra iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yam vidhim prati upadeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28728: anarthakaḥ saḥ vidhiḥ bādhyate yasya tu vidheḥ nimittam eva na asau bādhyate . datvam
GS24pmbhasuu:28729: ca prati numaḥ pratipadavidhiḥ anarthakaḥ roḥ punaḥ nimittam eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:28731: 411 kimartham idam ucyate na hali iti eva siddham . na sidhyati . dhātoḥ iti tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:28732: vartate tatra rephavakārābhyām dhātuḥ viśeṣyate . rephavakārāntasya dhātoḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:28733: kim punaḥ kāraṇam pūrvasmin yoge rephavakārābhyām dhātuḥ viśeṣyate . iha mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:28734: . agniḥ vāyuḥ iti . evam tarhi pūrvasmin yoge yat dhātugrahaṇam tat uttaratra nivṛttam
GS24pmbhasuu:28735: . evam api kurkuraḥ murmuraḥ iti atra api prāpnoti . evam tarhi anuvartate tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:28736: dhātugrahaṇam na tu rephavakārābhyām dhātuḥ viśeṣyate . kim tarhi . ik viśeṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:28737: . rephavakārāntasya ikaḥ dhātoḥ iti . evam api kurkurīyati murmurīyati iti atra prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:28738: . tasmāt dhātuḥ eva viśeṣyaḥ dhātau ca viśeṣyamāṇe upadhāyām ca iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:28741: pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . riryatuḥ riryuḥ . saṃvivyatuḥ saṃvivyuḥ . jivraḥ . caturyitā
GS24pmbhasuu:28742: caturyitum . uṇādipratiṣedhaḥ ca . uṇādīnām ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kiryoḥ giryoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28743: iti . abhyāsapratiṣedhaḥ tāvat na vaktavyaḥ . hali iti ucyate na ca atra halādim
GS24pmbhasuu:28744: paśyāmaḥ . yaṇādeśe kṛte prāpnoti . sthānivadbhāvāt na bhaviṣyati . pratiṣidhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:28745: atra sthānivadbhāvaḥ dīrghavidhim prati na sthānivat iti . na eṣaḥ asti pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28746: . uktam etat pratiṣedhe svaradirghayalopeṣu lopājādeśaḥ iti . jivripratiṣedhaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:28747: na vaktavyaḥ . uṇādayaḥ avyutpannāni prātipadikāni . caturyitā caturyitum iti supi
GS24pmbhasuu:28748: na iti vartate . yadi evam gīrbhyām gīrbhiḥ iti aprasiddhiḥ . na supaḥ vibhaktivipariṇāmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:28749: gīrbhyām gīrbhiḥ iti adoṣaḥ . uṇādipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ iti parihṛtam etat uṇādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28752: 412-413 adasaḥ anosreḥ . adasaḥ anosreḥ iti vaktavyam . kim idam anosreḥ iti . anokārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:28753: asakārasya arephakasya iti . anokārasya . adaḥ atra . asakārasya . adasyate . arephakasya
GS24pmbhasuu:28754: . adaḥ . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . kriyate nyāse eva . avibhaktikaḥ nirdeśaḥ . adas , o ,
GS24pmbhasuu:28755: iti . okārāt paraḥ patiṣedhaḥ pūrvabhūtaḥ . tataḥ sakāraḥ . tataḥ rephaḥ iti . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:28756: vā na evam vijñāyate adasaḥ asakārasya iti . katham tarhi . akāraḥ asya sakārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:28757: saḥ ayam asiḥ aseḥ iti . yadi evam amumuyaṅ iti na sidhyati adadryaṅ iti prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:28758: . adamuyaṅ iti bhavitavyam anantyavikāre antyasadeśasya kāryam bhavati iti . adasaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28759: adreḥ pṛthak mutvam kecit icchanti latvavat . kecit antyasadeśasya . na iti eke . aseḥ hi dṛśyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:28761: 413 tatra padādhikārāt apadāntasya aprāptiḥ . tatra padādhikārāt apadāntasya na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:28762: . amuyā amuyoḥ iti . siddham tu sakārapratiṣedhāt . siddham etat . katham . sakārapratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:28763: . yat ayam aseḥ iti pratiṣedham śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ apadāntasya api bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:28765: 414 atha dādgrahaṇam kimartham . dādgrahaṇam antyapratiṣedhārtham . dādgrahaṇam kriyate antyapratiṣedhārtham . alaḥ antyasya mā bhūt iti . amuyā amuyoḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:28767: 414 īttvam bahuvacanāntasya . īttvam bahuvacanāntasya iti vaktavyam . bahuvacane
GS24pmbhasuu:28768: iti iyati ucyamāne iha eva syāt . amībhiḥ amīṣu. iha na syāt . amī atra . amī āsate
GS24pmbhasuu:28769: . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . na idam pāribhāṣikasya bahuvacanasya grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:28770: . kim tarhi . anvarthagrahaṇam etat . bahūnām arthānām vacanam bahuvacanam bahuvacane iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:28773: kriyate padanivṛttyarthaḥ . padādhikāraḥ nivartyate . na hi kākaḥ vāśyate iti adhikārāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28774: nivartante . doṣaḥ khalu api syāt yadi vākyādhikāraḥ padādhikāram nivartayet . iṣyante
GS24pmbhasuu:28775: eva uttaratra padakāryāṇi tāni na sidhyanti . naśchavyapraśān iti . padanivṛttyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:28776: iti na evam vijñāyate padasya nivṛttyartham padanivṛttyartham iti . kim tarhi. pade
